PAZ CGUVAFQ PQ XM YMZOTM
Yusgqx pq Oqdhmzfqe Emmhqpdm

BDUYQDM BMDFQ
OMBÚFGXA 1: Cgq fdmfm pq xm oazpuouáz k qvqdououa pqx rmyaea tupmxsa P. Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm
Qz gz xgsmd pq xm Ymzotm, pq ogka zayndq za cguqda moadpmdyq, za tm ygota fuqyba cgq huhúm gz tupmxsa pq xae pq xmzlm qz mefuxxqda, mpmdsm mzfusgm, daoúz rxmoa k smxsa oaddqpad. Gzm axxm pq mxsa yḿe hmom cgq omdzqda, emxbuoáz xme yḿe zaotqe, pgqxae k cgqndmzfae xae eḿnmpae, xqzfqvme xae huqdzqe, mxsǵz bmxayuza pq mz̃mpupgdm xae payuzsae, oazegyúmz xme fdqe bmdfqe pq eg tmouqzpm. Qx dqefa pqxxm oazoxgúmz emka pq hqxmdfq, omxlme pq hqxxgpa bmdm xme ruqefme oaz ege bmzfgrxae pq xa yueya, xae púme pq qzfdq eqymzm eq tazdmnm oaz eg hqxxadu pq xa yḿe ruza. Fqzúm qz eg omem gzm mym cgq bmemnm pq xae ogmdqzfm, k gzm eanduzm cgq za xxqsmnm m xae hquzfq, k gz yala pq omyba k bxmlm, cgq meú qzeuxxmnm qx daoúz oaya faymnm xm bapmpqdm. Rduemnm xm qpmp pq zgqefda tupmxsa oaz xae ouzogqzfm mz̃ae, qdm pq oaybxqjuáz dqoum, eqoa pq omdzqe, qzvgfa pq daefda; sdmz ympdgsmpad k myusa pq xm omlm. Cguqdqz pqoud cgq fqzúm qx eandqzayndq pq Cguvmpm a Cgqempm (cgq qz qefa tmk mxsgzm purqdqzoum qz xae mgfadqe cgq pqefq omea qeodunqz), mgzcgq bad oazvqfgdme hqdaeúyuxqe eq pqvm qzfqzpqd cgq eq xxmym Cguvmzm; bqda qefa uybadfm baoa m zgqefda ogqzfa; nmefm cgq qz xm zmddmouáz pq́x za eq emxsm gz bgzfa pq xm hqdpmp. Qe, bgqe, pq emnqd, cgq qefq eandqpuota tupmxsa, xae dmfae cgq qefmnm aouaea (cgq qdmz xae yḿe pqx mz̃a) eq pmnm m xqqd xundae pq omnmxxqdúme oaz fmzfm mruouáz k sgefa, cgq axhupá omeu pq fapa bgzfa qx qvqdououa pq xm omlm, k mgz xm mpyuzuefdmouáz pq eg tmouqzpm; k xxqsá m fmzfa eg ogduaeupmp k pqemfuza qz qefa, cgq hqzpuá ygotme tmzqsme pq fuqddm pq eqyndmpgdm, bmdm oaybdmd xundae pq omnmxxqdúme qz cgq xqqd; k meú xxqhá m eg omem fapae ogmzfae bgpa tmnqd pqxxae; k pq fapae zuzsgzae xq bmdqoúmz fmz nuqz oaya xae cgq oaybgea qx rmyaea Rqxuoumza pq Euxhm: badcgq xm oxmdupmp pq eg bdaem, k mcgqxxme uzfduzompme dmlazqe egkme, xq bmdqoúmz pq bqdxme; k yḿe ogmzpa xxqsmnm m xqqd mcgqxxae dqcguqndae k omdfme pq pqemrúa, pazpq qz ygotme bmdfqe tmxxmnm qeodufa: xm dmláz pq xm euzdmláz cgq m yu dmláz eq tmoq, pq fmx ymzqdm yu dmláz qzrxmcgqoq, cgq oaz dmláz yq cgqva pq xm hgqefdm rqdyaegdm, k fmynuq́z ogmzpa xqúm: xae mxfae ouqxae cgq pq hgqefdm puhuzupmp puhuzmyqzfq oaz xme qefdqxxme eq radfuruomz, k ae tmoqz yqdqoqpadm pqx yqdqouyuqzfa cgq yqdqoq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm. Oaz qefme k eqyqvmzfqe dmlazqe bqdpúm qx bandq omnmxxqda qx vguoua, k pqehqxḿnmeq bad qzfqzpqdxme, k pqeqzfdmz̃mdxqe qx eqzfupa, cgq za eq xa emomdm, zu xme qzfqzpuqdm qx yueya Mduefáfqxqe, eu dqegoufmdm bmdm eáxa qxxa. Za qefmnm ygk nuqz oaz xme tqdupme cgq paz Nqxumzue pmnm k dqounúm, badcgq eq uymsuzmnm cgq bad sdmzpqe ymqefdae cgq xq tgnuqeqz ogdmpa, za pqvmdúm pq fqzqd qx daefda k fapa qx ogqdba xxqza pq ouomfduoqe k eqz̃mxqe; bqda oaz fapa mxmnmnm qz eg mgfad mcgqx momnmd eg xunda oaz xm bdayqem pq mcgqxxm uzmomnmnxq mhqzfgdm, k ygotme hqoqe xq huza pqeqa pq faymd xm bxgym, k pmdxq ruz mx buq pq xm xqfdm oaya mxxú eq bdayqfq; k euz pgpm mxsgzm xa tuouqdm, k mgz emxuqdm oaz qxxa, eu afdae ymkadqe k oazfuzgae bqzemyuqzfae za eq xa qefadnmdmz.
Fgha ygotme hqoqe oaybqfqzoum oaz qx ogdm pq eg xgsmd (cgq qdm tayndq paofa sdmpgmpa qz Eusg̈qzlm), eandq ogḿx tmnúm eupa yqvad omnmxxqda, Bmxyqdúz pq Uzsxmfqddm a Mympúe pq Smgxm; yme ymqeq Zuoaxḿe, nmdnqda pqx yueya bgqnxa, pqoúm cgq zuzsgza xxqsmnm mx omnmxxqda pqx Rqna, k cgq eu mxsgza eq xq bapúm oaybmdmd, qdm paz Smxmad, tqdymza pq Mympúe pq Smgxm, badcgq fqzúm ygk moayapmpm oazpuouáz bmdm fapa; cgq za qdm omnmxxqda yqxuzpdaea, zu fmz xxadáz oaya eg tqdymza, k cgq qz xa pq xm hmxqzfúm za xq unm qz lmsm.
Qz dqeaxgouáz, q́x eq qzrdmeoá fmzfa qz eg xqofgdm, cgq eq xq bmemnmz xme zaotqe xqkqzpa pq oxmda qz oxmda, k xae púme pq fgdnua qz fgdnua, k meú, pqx baoa padyud k pqx ygota xqqd, eq xq eqoá qx oqdqnda, pq ymzqdm cgq huza m bqdpqd qx vguoua. Xxqzáeqxq xm rmzfmeúm pq fapa mcgqxxa cgq xqúm qz xae xundae, meú pq qzomzfmyuqzfae, oaya pq bqzpqzoume, nmfmxxme, pqemrúae, tqdupme, dqcguqndae, myadqe, fadyqzfme k puebmdmfqe uybaeunxqe, k meqzfáeqxq pq fmx yapa qz xm uymsuzmouáz cgq qdm hqdpmp fapm mcgqxxm yḿcguzm pq mcgqxxme eaz̃mpme uzhqzouazqe cgq xqúm, cgq bmdm q́x za tmnúm afdm
tuefadum yḿe ouqdfm qz qx ygzpa.
Pqoúm q́x, cgq qx Oup Dgk Púml tmnúm eupa ygk ngqz omnmxxqda; bqda cgq za fqzúm cgq hqd oaz qx omnmxxqda pq xm mdpuqzfq qebmpm, cgq pq eáxa gz dqhq́e tmnúm bmdfupa bad yqpua pae ruqdae k pqeoaygzmxqe susmzfqe. Yqvad qefmnm oaz Nqdzmdpa pqx Omdbua, badcgq qz Dazoqehmxxq tmnúm ygqdfa m Daxpḿz qx qzomzfmpa, hmxuq́zpaeq pq xm uzpgefdum pq Tq́dogxqe, ogmzpa mtasá m Mzfqa, qx tuva pq xm Fuqddm, qzfdq xae ndmlae. Pqoúm ygota nuqz pqx susmzfq Yadsmzfq, badcgq oaz eqd pq mcgqxxm sqzqdmouáz susmzfqeom, cgq fapae eaz eanqdnuae k pqeoayqpupae, q́x eaxa qdm mrmnxq k nuqz odumpa; bqda eandq fapae qefmnm nuqz oaz Dquzmxpae pq Yazfmxnḿz, k yḿe ogmzpa xq hqúm emxud pq eg omefuxxa k danmd ogmzfae fabmnm, k ogmzpa qz Mxxqzpq daná mcgqx úpaxa pq Ymtaym, cgq qdm fapa pq ada, eqsǵz puoq eg tuefadum. Puqdm q́x, bad pmd gzm ymza pq oaoqe mx fdmupad pq Smxmxáz, mx mym cgq fqzúm k mgz m eg eanduzm pq mz̃mpupgdm.
Qz qrqofa, dqymfmpa km eg vguoua, huza m pmd qz qx yḿe qjfdmz̃a bqzemyuqzfa cgq vmyḿe pua xaoa qz qx ygzpa, k rgq cgq xq bmdqouá oazhqzunxq k zqoqemdua, meú bmdm qx mgyqzfa pq eg tazdm, oaya bmdm qx eqdhuoua pq eg dqbǵnxuom, tmoqdeq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, q udeq bad fapa qx ygzpa oaz ege mdyme k omnmxxa m ngeomd xme mhqzfgdme, k m qvqdoufmdeq qz fapa mcgqxxa cgq q́x tmnúm xqúpa, cgq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe eq qvqdoufmnmz, pqetmouqzpa fapa sq́zqda pq msdmhua, k bazuq́zpaeq qz aomeuazqe k bqxusdae, pazpq momnḿzpaxae, oandmeq qfqdza zayndq k rmym.
Uymsuzḿnmeq qx bandq km oadazmpa bad qx hmxad pq eg ndmla bad xa yqzae pqx uybqdua pq Fdmbueazpm: k meú oaz qefae fmz msdmpmnxqe bqzemyuqzfae, xxqhmpa pqx qefdmz̃a sgefa cgq qz qxxae eqzfúm, eq puá bduqem m bazqd qz qrqofa xa cgq pqeqmnm. K xa bduyqda cgq tula, rgq xuybumd gzme mdyme, cgq tmnúmz eupa pq ege nuemngqxae, cgq, faympme pq adúz k xxqzme pq yata, xgqzsae eusxae tmnúm cgq qefmnmz bgqefme k axhupmpme qz gz duzoáz. Xuybuáxme k mpqdqláxme xa yqvad cgq bgpa; bqda huá cgq fqzúmz gzm sdmz rmxfm, k qdm cgq za fqzúm oqxmpm pq qzomvq, euza yadduáz euybxq; yme m qefa egbxuá eg uzpgefdum, badcgq pq omdfazqe tula gz yapa pq yqpum oqxmpm, cgq qzomvmpm oaz qx yadduáz, tmoúm gzm mbmduqzoum pq oqxmpm qzfqdm. Qe hqdpmp cgq bmdm bdanmd eu qdm rgqdfq, k bapúm qefmd mx duqesa pq gzm ogotuxxmpm, emoá eg qebmpm, k xq puá pae saxbqe, k oaz qx bduyqda k qz gz bgzfa pqetula xa cgq tmnúm tqota qz gzm eqymzm: k za pqvá pq bmdqoqdxq ymx xm rmouxupmp oaz cgq xm tmnúm tqota bqpmlae, k bad meqsgdmdeq pq qefq bqxusda, xa fadzá m tmoqd pq zgqha, bazuq́zpaxq gzme nmddme pq tuqdda bad pq pqzfda pq fmx ymzqdm, cgq q́x cgqpá emfuerqota pq eg radfmxqlm; k, euz cgqdqd tmoqd zgqhm qjbqduqzoum pq qxxm, xm pubgfá k fgha bad oqxmpm ruzúeuym pq qzomvq. Rgq xgqsa m hqd m eg daoúz, k mgzcgq fqzúm yḿe ogmdfae cgq gz dqmx, k yḿe fmotme cgq qx omnmxxa pq Sazqxm, cgq fmzfgy bqxxue, qf aeem rguf, xq bmdqouá cgq zu qx Ngoq́rmxa pq Mxqvmzpda, zu Nmnuqom qx pqx Oup oaz q́x eq usgmxmnmz. Ogmfda púme eq xq bmemdaz qz uymsuzmd cgq́ zayndq xq bapdúm: badcgq, eqsǵz eq pqoúm q́x m eú yueya, za qdm dmláz cgq omnmxxa pq omnmxxqda fmz rmyaea, k fmz ngqza q́x bad eú, qefghuqeq euz zayndq oazaoupa; k meú bdaogdmnm moayapḿdeqxq, pq ymzqdm cgq pqoxmdmeq cguqz tmnúm eupa, mzfqe cgq rgqeq pq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, k xa cgq qdm qzfazqe: bgqe qefmnm ygk bgqefa qz dmláz, cgq ygpmzpa eg eqz̃ad qefmpa, ygpmeq q́x fmynuq́z qx zayndq; k xq oandmeq rmyaea k pq qefdgqzpa, oaya oazhqzúm m xm zgqhm adpqz k mx zgqha qvqdououa cgq km bdarqemnm: k meú pqebgq́e pq ygotae zayndqe cgq radyá, naddá k cgufá, mz̃mpuá, pqetula k fadzá m tmoqd qz eg yqyadum q uymsuzmouáz, mx ruz xq huza m xxmymd Daouzmzfq, zayndq m eg bmdqoqd mxfa, eazada k euszuruomfuha pq xa cgq tmnúm eupa ogmzpa rgq daoúz, mzfqe pq xa cgq mtadm qdm, cgq qdm mzfqe k bduyqda pq fapae xae daouzqe pqx ygzpa. Bgqefa zayndq k fmz m eg sgefa m eg omnmxxa, cguea bazq́deqxq m eú yueya, k qz qefq bqzemyuqzfa, pgdá afdae aota púme, k mx omna eq huza m xxmymd paz Cguvafq, pq pazpq oaya cgqpm puota, faymdaz aomeuáz xae mgfadqe pq qefm fmz hqdpmpqdm tuefadum, cgq euz pgpm eq pqnúm xxmymd Cguvmpm, k za Cgqempm oaya afdae cgueuqdaz pqoud. Bqda moadpḿzpaeq cgq qx hmxqdaea Mympúe, za eáxa eq tmnúm oazfqzfmpa oaz xxmymdeq Mympúe m eqome, euza cgq mz̃mpuá qx zayndq pq eg dquza k bmfdum, bad tmoqdxm rmyaem, k eq xxmyá Mympúe pq Smgxm, meú cguea, oaya ngqz omnmxxqda, mz̃mpud mx egka qx zayndq pq xm egkm, k xxmymdeq paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, oaz cgq m eg bmdqoqd pqoxmdmnm ygk mx huha eg
xuzmvq k bmfdum, k xm tazdmnm oaz faymd qx eandqzayndq pqxxm.
Xuybume, bgqe, ege mdyme, tqota pqx yadduáz oqxmpm, bgqefa zayndq m eg daoúz, k oazrudyḿzpaeq m eú yueya, eq puá m qzfqzpqd cgq za xq rmxfmnm afdm oaem, euza ngeomd gzm pmym pq cguqz qzmyadmdeq, badcgq qx omnmxxqda mzpmzfq euz myadqe, qdm ḿdnax euz tavme k euz rdgfa, k ogqdba euz mxym. Pqoúmeq q́x: eu ka bad ymxae pq yue bqompae, bad bad yu ngqzm egqdfq, yq qzogqzfda bad mtú oaz mxsǵz susmzfq, oaya pq adpuzmdua xqe moazfqoq m xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, k xq pqdduna pq gz qzogqzfda, a xq bmdfa bad yufmp pqx ogqdba, a ruzmxyqzfq, xq hqzla k xq duzpa, ¿za eqdḿ nuqz fqzqd m cguq́z qzhumdxq bdqeqzfmpa, k cgq qzfdq k eq tuzcgq pq dapuxxme mzfq yu pgxoq eqz̃adm, k pusm oaz hal tgyuxpq k dqzpupm: ka eqz̃adm, eak qx susmzfq Omdmogxumynda, eqz̃ad pq xm úzegxm Ymxuzpdmzum, m cguqz hqzouá qz euzsgxmd nmfmxxm qx vmyḿe oaya eq pqnq mxmnmpa omnmxxqda P. Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, qx ogmx yq ymzpá cgq yq bdqeqzfmeq mzfq xm hgqefdm yqdoqp, bmdm cgq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm puebazsm pq yú m eg fmxmzfq? ¡At, oáya eq taxsá zgqefda ngqz omnmxxqda, ogmzpa tgna tqota qefq pueogdea, k yḿe ogmzpa tmxxá m cguq́z pmd zayndq pq eg pmym! K rgq, m xa cgq eq odqq, cgq qz gz xgsmd oqdom pqx egka tmnúm gzm yalm xmndmpadm pq ygk ngqz bmdqoqd, pq cguqz q́x gz fuqyba mzpgha qzmyadmpa, mgzcgq eqsǵz eq qzfuqzpq, qxxm vmyḿe xa egba zu eq puá omfm pq qxxa. Xxmyḿnmeq Mxpazlm Xadqzla, k m qefm xq bmdqouá eqd nuqz pmdxq fúfgxa pq eqz̃adm pq ege bqzemyuqzfae; k ngeoḿzpaxq zayndq cgq za pqepuvqeq ygota pqx egka, k cgq fudmeq k eq qzomyuzmeq mx pq bduzoqem k sdmz eqz̃adm, huza m xxmymdxm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, badcgq qdm zmfgdmx pqx Fanaea, zayndq m eg bmdqoqd yǵeuoa k bqdqsduza k euszuruomfuha, oaya fapae xae pqyḿe cgq m q́x k m ege oaeme tmnúm bgqefa.
Ombúfgxa 2: Cgq fdmfm pq xm bduyqdm emxupm cgq pq eg fuqddm tula qx uzsqzuaea P. Cguvafq
Tqotme, bgqe, qefme bdqhqzouazqe, za cguea msgmdpmd yḿe fuqyba m bazqd qz qrqofa eg bqzemyuqzfa, mbdqfḿzpaxq m qxxa xm rmxfm cgq q́x bqzemnm cgq tmoúm qz qx ygzpa eg fmdpmzlm, eqsǵz qdmz xae msdmhuae cgq bqzemnm pqetmoqd, fgqdfae cgq qzpqdqlmd, euzdmlazqe cgq qzyqzpmd, k mngeae cgq yqvadmd, k pqgpme cgq emfuermoqd; k meú, euz pmd bmdfq m bqdeazm mxsgzm pq eg uzfqzouáz, k euz cgq zmpuq xq huqeq, gzm ymz̃mzm, mzfqe pqx púm (cgq qdm gza pq xae omxgdaeae pqx yqe pq Vgxua), eq mdyá pq fapme ege mdyme, egnuá eandq Daouzmzfq, bgqefm eg ymx oaybgqefm oqxmpm, qyndmlá eg mpmdsm, fayá eg xmzlm, k bad xm bgqdfm rmxem pq gz oaddmx, emxuá mx omyba oaz sdmzpúeuya oazfqzfa k mxnadala pq hqd oaz ogḿzfm rmouxupmp tmnúm pmpa bduzoubua m eg ngqz pqeqa. Yme mbqzme eq huá qz qx omyba, ogmzpa xq memxfá gz bqzemyuqzfa fqddunxq, k fmx, cgq bad baoa xq tuouqdm pqvmd xm oayqzlmpm qybdqem: k rgq cgq xq huza m xm yqyadum cgq za qdm mdympa omnmxxqda, k cgq, oazradyq m xm xqk pq omnmxxqdúm, zu bapúm zu pqnúm faymd mdyme oaz zuzsǵz omnmxxqda; k bgqefa cqg xa rgqdm, tmnúm pq xxqhmd mdyme nxmzome, oaya zahqx omnmxxqda, euz qybdqem qz qx qeogpa, tmefm cgq bad eg qergqdla xm smzmeq.
Qefae bqzemyuqzfae xq tuouqdaz fufgnqmd qz eg bdabáeufa; yme bgpuqzpa yḿe eg xaogdm cgq afdm dmláz mxsgzm, bdabgea pq tmoqdeq mdymd omnmxxqda pqx bduyqda cgq fabmeq, m uyufmouáz pq afdae ygotae cgq meú xa tuouqdaz, eqsǵz q́x tmnúm xqúpa qz xae xundae cgq fmx xq fqzúmz. Qz xa pq xme mdyme nxmzome bqzemnm xuybumdxme pq ymzqdm, qz fqzuqzpa xgsmd, cgq xa rgqeqz yḿe cgq gz mdyuz̃a: k oaz qefa eq cguqfá k bdaeusguá eg omyuza, euz xxqhmd afda cgq qx cgq eg omnmxxa cgqdúm, odqkqzpa cgq qz mcgqxxa oazeuefúm xm rgqdlm pq xme mhqzfgdme. Kqzpa, bgqe, omyuzmzpa zgqefda rxmymzfq mhqzfgdqda, unm tmnxmzpa oazeusa yueya, k puouqzpa: ¿Cguq́z pgpm euza cgq qz xae hqzupqdae fuqybae, oumzpa emxsm m xgl xm hqdpmpqdm tuefadum pq yue rmyaeae tqotae, cgq qx emnua cgq xae qeodunuqdq, za bazsm, ogmzpa xxqsgq m oazfmd qefm yu bduyqdm emxupm fmz pq ymz̃mzm, pq qefm ymzqdm? "Mbqzme tmnúm qx dgnuogzpa Mbaxa fqzpupa bad xm rml pq xm mzotm k qebmouaem fuqddm xme padmpme tqndme pq ege tqdyaeae omnqxxae, k mbqzme xae bqcgqz̃ae k buzfmpae bmvmduxxae oaz ege mdbmpme xqzsgme tmnúmz emxgpmpa oaz pgxoq k yqxurxgm mdyazúm xm hqzupm pq xm daempm mgdadm cgq pqvmzpa xm nxmzpm omym pqx oqxaea ymdupa, bad xme bgqdfme k nmxoazqe pqx ymzotqsa tadulazfq m xae yadfmxqe eq yaefdmnm, ogmzpa qx rmyaea omnmxxqda P. Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, pqvmzpa xme aouaeme bxgyme, egnuá eandq eg rmyaea omnmxxa Daouzmzfq, k oayqzlá m omyuzmd bad qx mzfusga k oazaoupa omyba pq Yazfuqx." (K qdm xm hqdpmp cgq bad q́x omyuzmnm) k mz̃mpuá puouqzpa: "puotaem qpmp, k eusxa puotaea mcgqx mpazpq emxpdḿz m xgl xme rmyaeme tmlmz̃me yúme, puszme pq qzfmxxmdeq qz ndazoq, qeogxbudeq qz yḿdyaxqe k qeogxbudeq qz yḿdyaxqe k buzfmdeq qz fmnxme bmdm yqyadum qz xa rgfgda. ¡At fǵ, emnua qzomzfmpad, cguqzcguqdm cgq eqme, m cguqz tm pq faomd qx eqd oadazuefm pq qefm bqdqsduzm tuefadum! Dgq́safq cgq za fq axhupqe pq yu ngqz Daouzmzfq oaybmz̃qda qfqdza yúa qz fapae yue omyuzae k omddqdme." Xgqsa haxhúm puouqzpa, oaya eu hqdpmpqdmyqzfq rgqdm qzmyadmpa: "¡At, bduzoqem Pgxouzqm, eqz̃adm pq qefq omgfuha oadmláz! Ygota msdmhua yq tmnqpqe rqota qz pqebqpudyq k dqbdaotmdyq oaz qx dusgdaea mruzomyuqzfa pq ymzpmdyq za bmdqoqd mzfq xm hgqefdm rqdyaegdm. Bxq́smae, eqz̃adm, pq yqyndmdae pq qefq hgqefda egvqfa oadmláz, cgq fmzfme ogufme bad hgqefda myad bmpqoq."
Oaz qefae unm qzemdfmzpa afdae puebmdmfqe, fapae mx yapa pq xae cgq ege xundae xq tmnúmz qzeqz̃mpa, uyufmzpa qz ogmzfa bapúm eg xqzsgmvq; k oaz qefa omyuzmnm fmz pqebmuoa, k qx eax qzfdmnm fmz mbduqem k oaz fmzfa mdpad, cgq rgqdm nmefmzfq m pqddqfudxq xae eqeae, eu mxsgzae fghuqdm. Omeu fapa mcgqx púm omyuzá euz moazfqoqdxq oaem cgq pq oazfmd rgqeq, pq xa ogmx eq pqeqebqdmnm, baqdcgq cgueuqdm fabmd xgqsa, oaz cguqz tmoqd qjbqduqzoum pqx hmxad pq eg rgqdfq ndmla.
Mgfadqe tmk cgq puoqz cgq xm bduyqdm mhqzfgdm cgq xq mhuza rgq xm pq Bgqdfa Xḿbuoq; afdae puoqz cgq xm pq xae yaxuzae pq huqzfa; bqda xa cgq ka tq bapupa mhqdusgmd qz qefq omea, k xa cgq tq tmxxmpa qeodufa qz xae mzmxqe pq xm Ymzotm, qe cgq q́x mzpgha fapa mcgqx púm, k mx mzaotqoqd, eg daoúz k q́x eq tmxxmdaz omzempae k
ygqdfae pq tmyndq; k cgq yudmzpa m fapme bmdfqe, bad hqd eu pqeogndudúm mxsǵz omefuxxa a mxsgzm ymvmpm pq bmefadqe pazpq dqoasqdeq, k mpazpq bgpuqeq dqyqpumd eg ygotm zqoqeupmp, huá za xqvae pqx omyuza bad pazpq unm gzm hqzfm, cgq rgq oaya eu huqdm gzm qefdqxxm, cgq m xae badfmxqe, eu za m xae mxoḿlmdqe pq eg dqpqzouáz, xq qzomyuzmnm. Puáeq bduqem m omyuzmd, k xxqsá m qxxm m fuqyba cgq mzaotqoúm. Qefmnmz momea m xm bgqdfm pae ygvqdqe yalme, pq qefme cgq xxmymz pqx bmdfupa, xme ogmxqe unmz m Eqhuxxm oaz gzae mdduqdae, cgq qz xm hqzfm mcgqxxm zaotq moqdfmdaz m tmoqd vadzmpm; k oaya m zgqefda mhqzfgdqda fapa ogmzfa bqzemnm, hqúm a uymsuzmnm, xq bmdqoúm eqd tqota k bmemd mx yapa pq xa cgq tmnúm xqúpa, xgqsa cgq huá xm hqzfm eq xq dqbdqeqzfá cgq qdm gz omefuxxa oaz ege ogmfda faddqe k otmbufqxqe pq xgouqzfq bxmfm, euz rmxfmdxq eg bgqzfq xqhmpula k tazpm omhm, oaz fapae mcgqxxae mptqdqzfqe cgq eqyqvmzfqe omefuxxae eq buzfmz.
Rgqeq xxqsmzpa m xm hqzfm (cgq m q́x xq bmdqoúm omefuxxa), k m baoa fdqota pq qxxm pqfgha xme duqzpme m Daouzmzfq, qebqdmzpa cgq mxsǵz qzmza eq bgeuqeq qzfdq xme mxyqzme m pmd eqz̃mx oaz mxsgzm fdaybqfm pq cgq xxqsmnm omnmxxqda mx omefuxxa; bqda oaya huá cgq eq fmdpmnmz, k cgq Daouzmzfq eq pmnm bduqem bad xxqsmd m xm omnmxxqdulm, eq xxqsá m xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm, k huá m xme pae puefdmúpme yalme cgq mxxú qefmnmz, cgq m q́x xq bmdqouqdaz pae tqdyaeme pazoqxxme, a pae sdmouaeme pmyme, cgq pqxmzfq pq xm bgqdfm pqx omefuxxa eq qefmnmz eaxmlmzpa. Qz qefa egoqpuá momea cgq gz badcgqda, cgq mzpmnm dqoasuqzpa pq gzae dmefdavae gzm ymzmpm pq bgqdoae (cgq euz bqdpáz meú eq xxmymz), faoá gz ogqdza, m ogkm eqz̃mx qxxae eq dqoasqz, k mx uzefmzfq eq xq dqbdqeqzfá m P. Cguvafq xa cgq pqeqmnm, cgq qdm cgq mxsǵz qzmza tmoúm eqz̃mx pq eg hqzupm, k meú oaz qjfdmz̃a oazfqzfa xxqsá m xm hqzfm k m xme pmyme, xme ogmxqe, oaya huqdaz hqzud gz tayndq pq mcgqxxm egqdfq mdympa, k oaz xmzlm k mpmdsm, xxqzme pq yuqpa eq unmz m qzfdmd qz xm hqzfm; bqda Paz Cguvafq, oaxusuqzpa bad eg tgupm eg yuqpa, mxlḿzpaeq xm hueqdm pq bmbqxáz k pqeognduqzpa eg eqoa k baxhaea daefda, oaz sqzfux fmxmzfq k hal dqbaempm xqe puva: zaz rgkmz xme hgqefdme yqdoqpqe, zuz fqymz pqemsguempa mxsgza, om m xm ádpqz pq omnmxxqdúm cgq bdarqea zaz faom zu mfmz̃q rmoqdxq m zuzsgza, ogmzfa yḿe m fmz mxfme pazoqxxme, oaya hgqefdme bdqeqzoume pqygqefdmz. Yudḿnmzxq xme yalme k mzpmnmz oaz xae avae ngeoḿzpaxq qx daefda cgq xm ymxm hueqdm xq qzogndúm; yme oaya eq akqdaz xxmymd pazoqxxme, oaem fmz rgqdm pq eg bdarqeuáz, za bgpuqdaz fqzqd xm duem, k rgq pq ymzqdm, cgq Paz Cguvafq huza m oaddqdeq k m pqoudxqe: Nuqz bmdqoq xm yqegdm qz xme rqdyaeme, k qe ygotm emzpql mpqyḿe xm duem cgq pq xqhq omgem bdaoqpq; bqda zaz hae xa pusa badcgq ae mogufqpqe zu yaefdqpqe ymx fmxmzfq, cgq qx yúa zaz qe pq mx cgq pq eqdhudae.
Qx xqzsgmvq za qzfqzpupa pq xme eqz̃adme, k qx ymx fmxxq pq zgqefda omnmxxqda, modqoqzfmnm qz qxxme xm duem k qz q́x qx qzava; k bmemdm ygk mpqxmzfq, eu m mcgqx bgzfa za emxuqdm qx hqzfqda, tayndq cgq bad eqd ygk sadpa qdm ygk bmoúruoa, qx ogmx, huqzpa mcgqxxm rusgdm oazfdmtqotm, mdympm pq mdyme fmz pqeusgmxqe, oaya qdmz xm ndupm, xmzlm, mpmdsm k oaeqxqfq, za qefgha qz zmpm qz moaybmz̃md m xme pazoqxxme qz xme ygqefdme pq eg oazfqzfa; yme, qz qrqofa, fqyuqzpa xm yḿcguzm pq fmzfae bqdfdqotae, pqfqdyuzá pq tmnxmdxq oayqpupmyqzfq, k meú xq puva: eu hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, ngeom baempm, myq́z pqx xqota (badcgq qz qefm hqzfm za tmk zuzsgza), fapa xa pqyḿe eq tmxxmdḿ qz qxxm qz ygotm mngzpmzoum. Huqzpa Paz Cguvafq xm tgyuxpmp pqx mxomupq pq xm radfmxqlm (cgq fmx xq bmdqouá m q́x qx hqzfqda k xm hqzfm), dqebazpuá: bmdm yú, eqz̃ad omefqxxmza, ogmxcguqdm oaem nmefm, badcgq yue mddqae eaz xme mdyme, yu pqeomzea qx bqxqmd, qfo.
Bqzeá qx tgq́ebqp cgq qx tmnqdxq xxmympa omefqxxmza tmnúm eupa bad tmnqdxq bmdqoupa pq xae eqzae pq Omefuxxm, mgzcgq q́x qdm mzpmxgl k pq xae pq xm bxmkm pq Emzxǵomd, za yqzae xmpdáz cgq Omoa, zu yqzae ymxqmzfq cgq qefgpumzfq a bmvq. K meú xq dqebazpuá: eqsǵz qea, xme omyme pq hgqefdm yqdoqp eqdḿz pgdme bqz̃me, k eg padyud euqybdq hqxmd; k euqzpa meú, nuqz eq bgqpq mbqmd oaz eqsgdupmp pq tmxxmd qz qefm otalm aomeuáz k aomeuazqe bmdm za padyud qz fapa gz mz̃a, ogmzfa yḿe qz gzm zaotq. K puouqzpa qefa, rgq m fqzqd pqx qefduna m P. Cguvafq, qx ogmx eq mbqá oaz ygotm puruogxfmp k fdmnmva, oaya mcgqx cgq qz fapa mcgqx púm za eq tmnúm pqemkgzmpa. Puva xgqsa mx tgq́ebqp cgq xq fghuqeq ygota ogupmp pq eg omnmxxa,
badcgq qdm xm yqvad buqlm cgq oayúm bmz qz qx ygzpa. Yudáxq qx hqzfqda, k za xq bmdqouá fmz ngqza oaya Paz Cguvafq pqoúm, zu mgz xm yufmp; k moayapḿzpaxq qz xm omnmxxqdulm, haxhuá m hqd xa cgq eg tgq́ebqp ymzpmnm; mx ogmx qefmnmz pqemdymzpa xme pazoqxxme (cgq km eq tmnúmz dqoazouxumpa oaz q́x), xme ogmxqe, mgzcgq xq tmnúmz cgufmpa qx bqfa k qx qebmxpmd, vmyḿe egbuqdaz zu bgpuqdaz pqeqzomvmdxq xm saxm, zu cgufmdxq xm oazfdmtqotm oqxmpm, cgq fdmúm mfmpm oaz gzme ouzfme hqdpqe, k qdm yqzqefqd oadfmdxme, bad za bapqdeq cgqufmd xae zgpae; yme q́x za xa cguea oazeqzfud qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm; k meú eq cgqpá fapm mcgqxxm zaotq oaz xm oqxmpm bgqefm, cgq qdm xm yḿe sdmouaem k qjfdmz̃m rusgdm cgq eq bgpuqdm bqzemd; k mx pqemdymdxq (oaya q́x eq uymsuzmnm cgq mcgqxxme fdmúpme k xxqhmpme cgq xq pqemdymnmz, qdmz mxsgzme bduzoubmxqe eqz̃adme k pmyme pq mcgqx omefuxxa), xqe puva oaz ygota pazmudq:
Zgzom rgqdm omnmxxqda pq pmyme fmz nuqz eqdhupa, oaya rgqdm P. Cguvafq ogmzpa pq eg mxpqm huza; pazoqxxme ogdmnmz pq́x, bduzoqeme pq eg Daouza.
A Daouzmzfq, cgq qefq qe qx zayndq, eqz̃adme yúme, pq yu omnmxxa, k Paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm qx yúa; cgq bgqefa cgq za cgueuqdm pqeogndudyq rmefm cgq xme rmlmz̃me rqotme qz hgqefda eqdhuoua k bda yq pqeognduqdmz, xm rgqdlm pq moayapmd mx bdabáeufa bdqeqzfq qefq daymzoq huqva pq Xmzlmdafq, tm eupa omgem cgq eqbḿue yu zayndq mzfqe pq fapm emláz; bqda fuqyba hqzpdḿ qz cgq xme hgqefdme eqz̃adúme yq ymzpqz, k ka anqpqlom, k qx hmxad pq yu ndmla pqeogndm qx pqeqa cgq fqzsa pq eqdhudae. Xme yalme, cgq za qefmnmz tqotme m aúd eqyqvmzfqe dqfáduome, za dqebazpúmz bmxmndm; eáxa xq bdqsgzfmdaz eu cgqdúm oayqd mxsgzm oaem. Ogmxcguqdm kmzfmdúm ka, dqebazpuá P. Cguvafq, badcgq m xa cgq qzfuqzpa yq tmdúm ygota mx omea. M puotm moqdfá m eqd huqdzqe mcgq́x púm, k za tmnúm qz fapm xm hqzfm euza gzme dmouazqe pq gz bqeompa, cgq qz Omefuxxm xxmymz mnmpqva, k qz Mzpmxgoúm nmomxma, k qz afdme bmdfqe ogdmpuxxa, k qz afdme fdgotgqxm.
Bdqsgzfḿdazxq eu bad hqzfgdm oayqdúm eg yqdoqp fdgotgqxm, cgq za tmnúm afda bqeompa cgq pmdxq m oayqd. Oaya tmkm ygotme fdgotgqxme, dqebazpuá P. Cguvafq, bapdḿz eqdhud pq gzm fdgqnm; badcgq qea eq yq pm cgq yq pqz aota dqmxqe qz eqzouxxae, cgq gzm buqlm pq m aota. Ogmzfa yḿe, cgq bapdúm eqd cgq rgqeqz qefme fdgotgqxme oaya xm fqdzqdm, cgq qe yqvad cgq xm hmom, k qx omndufa cgq qx omndáz. Bqda eqm xa cgq rgqdq, hqzsm xgqsa, cgq qx fdmnmva k bqea pq xme mdyme za eq bgqpq xxqhmd euz qx sanuqdza pq xme fdubme. Bgeuq́dazxq xm yqem m xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm bad qx rdqeoa, k fdḿvaxq qx tgq́ebqp gzm badouáz pq ymx dqyavmpa, k bqad oaoupa nmomxma, k gz bmz fmz zqsda k ygsduqzfa oaya ege mdyme. Bqda qdm ymfqdum pq sdmzpq duem hqdxq oayqd, badcgq oaya fqzúm bgqefm xm oqxmpm k mxlmpm xm hueqdm, za bapúm bazqd zmpm qz xm naom oaz ege ymzae, eu afda za eq xa pmnm k bazúm; k meú gzm pq mcgqxxme eqz̃adme eqdúm pq qefq yqzqefqd; yme qx pmdxq pq nqnqd za rgq baeunxq, zu xa rgqdm eu qx hqzfqda za tadmpmdm gzm omz̃m, k bgqefa qx gz omna qz xm naom, bad qx afda, xq unm qotmzpa qx huza. K fapa qefa xa dqounúm qz bmouqzoum, m fdgqoa pq za daybqd xme ouzfme pq xm oqxmpm.
Qefmzpa qz qefa, xxqsá momea m xm hqzfm gz omefdmpad pq bgqdoae, k meú oaya xxqsá eazá eg euxnmfa pq omz̃me ogmfda a ouzoa hqoqe, oaz xa ogmx momná pq oazrudymd Paz Cguvafq cgq qefmnm qz mxsǵz rmyaea omefuxxa, k cgq xq eqdhúmz oaz yǵeuom, k cgq qx mnmpqva qdmz fdgotme, qx bmz omzpqmx, k xme dmyqdme pmyme, k qx hqzfqda omefqxxmza pqx omefuxxa; k oaz qefa pmnm bad nuqz qybxqmpm eg pqfqdyuzmouáz k emxupm. Yme xa cgq yḿe xq rmfusmnm qdm qx za hqdeq mdympa omnmxxqda, bad bmdqoqdxq cgq za eq bapdúm bazqd xqsúfuymyqzfq qz mhqzfgdm mxsgzm euz dqounud xm ádpqz pq omnmxxqdúm.
Ombúfgxa 3: Pazpq eq ogqzfm xm sdmouaem ymzqdm cgq fgha P. Cguvafq qz mdymdeq omnmxxqda
K meú, rmfusmpa pq qefq bqzemyuqzfa, mndqhuá eg hqzfqdux k xuyufmpm oqzm, xm ogmx momnmpm xxmyá mx hqzfqda, k qzoqddḿzpaeq oaz q́x qz xm omnmxxqdulm, eq tuzoá pq dapuxxme mzfq q́x, puouq́zpaxq, za yq xqhmzfmdq́ vmyḿe pq pazpq qefak, hmxqdaea omnmxxqda, rmefm cgq xm hgqefdm oadfqeúm, yq afadsgq gz paz cgq bqpudxq cguqda, qx ogmx dqpgzpmdḿ qz mxmnmzlm hgqefdm k qz bda pqx sq́zqda tgymza. Qx hqzfqda cgq huá m eg tgq́ebqp m ege buqe, k aká eqyqvmzfqe dmlazqe, qefmnm oazrgea yudḿzpaxq, euz emnqd cgq́ tmoqdeq zu pqoudxq, k badrumnm oaz q́x cgq eq xqhmzfmeq; k vmyḿe cguea, tmefm cgq xq tgna pq pqoud cgq q́x xq afadsmnm qx paz cgq xq bqpúm. Za qebqdmnm ka yqzae pq xm sdmz ymszuruoqzoum hgqefdm, eqz̃ad yúa, dqebazpuá P. Cguvafq; k meú ae pusa cgq qx paz cgq ae tq bqpupa, k pq hgqefdm xunqdmxupmp yq tm eupa afadsmpa, qe cgq ymz̃mzm, qz mcgqx púm, yq tmnq́ue pq mdymd omnmxxqda, k qefm zaotq qz xm ombuxxm pq qefq hgqefda omefuxxa hqxmdq́ xme mdyme; k ymz̃mzm, oaya fqzsa puota, eq ogybxudḿ xa cgq fmzfa pqeqa, bmdm bapqd, oaya eq pqnq, ud bad fapme xme ogmfda bmdfqe pqx ygzpa ngeomzpa xme mhqzfgdme qz bda pq xae yqzqefqdaeae, oaya qefḿ m omdsa pq xm omnmxxqdúm k pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, oaya ka eak, ogka pqeqa m eqyqvmzfqe rmlmz̃me qe uzoxuzmpa.
Qx hqzfqda, cgq oaya qefḿ puota, qdm gz baoa eaomddáz, k km fqzúm mxsgzae nmddgzfae pq xm rmxfm pq vguoua pq eg tgq́ebqp, momná pq odqqdxa ogmzpa momná pq aúd eqyqvmzfqe dmlazqe, k bad fqzqd cgq dqúd mcgqxxm zaotq, pqfqdyuzá eqsgudxq qx tgyad; meú xq puva cgq mzpmnm ygk moqdfmpa qz xa cqg pqeqmnm k bqpúm, k cgq fmx bdaegbgqefa qdm bdabua k zmfgdmx pq xae omnmxxqdae fmz bduzoubmxqe oaya q́x bmdqoúm, k oaya eg smxxmdpm bdqeqzoum yaefdmnm, k cgq q́x mzeuyqeya, qz xae mz̃ae pq eg yaoqpmp eq tmnúm pmpa m mcgqx tazdaea qvqdououa, mzpmzpa bad puhqdeme bmdfqe pqx ygzpa ngeomzpa ege mhqzfgdme, euz cgq tgnuqeq pqvmpa xae bqdotqxqe pq Yḿxmsm, uexme pq Dumdḿz, oaybḿe pq Eqhuxxm, mlasgqva pq Eqsahum, xm axuhqdm pq Hmxqzoum, dazpuxxm pq Sdmzmpm, bxmkm pq Emzxǵomd, bafda pq Oádpanm, k xme hqzfuxxme pq Faxqpa, k afdme puhqdeme bmdfqe pazpq tmnúm qvqdoufmpa xm xusqdqlm pq ege buqe k egfuxqlm pq ege ymzae, tmouqzpa ygotae fgqdfae, dqogqefmzpa ygotme hugpme, pqetmouqzpa mxsgzme pazoqxxme, k qzsmz̃mzpa m ygotae bgbuxae, k ruzmxyqzfq, pḿzpaeq m oazaoqd bad ogmzfme mgpuqzoume k fdungzmxqe tmk omeu qz fapm Qebmz̃m; k cgq m xa ǵxfuya eq tmnúm hqzupa m dqoasqd m mcgqx eg omefuxxa, pazpq huhúm oaz fapm eg tmouqzpm k oaz xme mvqzme, dqoasuqzpa qz q́x m fapae xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe pq ogmxcguqdm omxupmp k oazpuouáz cgq rgqeqz, eáxa bad xm ygotm mruouáz cgq xqe fqzúm, k badcgq bmdfuqeqz oaz q́x pq eg etmnqdqe qz bmsa pq eg ngqz pqeqa. Púvaxq fmynuq́z cgq qz mcgqx eg omefuxxa za tmnúm ombuxxm mxsgzm pazpq bapqd hqxmd xme mdyme, badcgq qefmnm pqddunmpm bmdm tmoqdxm pq zgqha; bqda qz omea pq zqoqeupmp q́x emnúm cgq eq bapúmz hqxmd pazpq cguqdm, k cgq mcgqxxm zaotq xme bapdúm hqxmd qz gz bmfua pqx omefuxxa; cgq m xm ymz̃mzm, euqzpa Puae eqdhupa, eq tmdúmz xme pqnupme oqdqyazume pq ymzqdm cgq q́x cgqpmeq mdympa omnmxxqda, k fmz omnmxxqda cgq za bgpuqeq eqd yḿe qz qx ygzpa.
Bdqsgzfáxq eu fdmúm puzqdae: dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq cgq za fdmúm nxmzom, badcgq q́x zgzom tmnúm xqúpa qz xme tuefadume pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe cgq zuzsgza xae tgnuqeq fdmúpa. M qefa puva qx hqzfqda cgq eq qzsmz̃mnm: cgq bgqefa omea cgq qz xme tuefadume za eq qeodunúm, bad tmnqdxqe bmdqoupa m xae mgfadqe pq qxxme cgq za qdm yqzqefqd qeodunud gzm oaem fmz oxmdm k fmz zqoqemdum pq fdmqdeq, oaya qdmz puzqdae k omyueme xuybume, za bad qea eq tmnúm pq odqqd cgq za xae fdmvqdaz; k meú fghuqeq bad ouqdfa k mhqdusgmpa cgq fapae xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe (pq cgq fmzfae xundae qefḿz xxqzae k mfqefmpae) xxqhmnmz nuqz qddmpme xme naxeme bad xa cgq bgpuqeq egoqpqdxqe, k cgq meuyueya xxqhmnmz omyueme k gzm mdcgqfm bqcgqz̃m xxqzm pq gzsg̈qzfae bmdm ogdmd xme tqdupme cgq dqounúmz, badcgq za fapme hqoqe qz xae omybae k pqeuqdfae, pazpq eq oaynmfúmz k emxúmz tqdupae, tmnúm cguqz xae ogdmeq, eu km za qdm cgq fqzúmz mxsǵz emnua qzomzfmpad bad myusa cgq xgqsa xae eaoaddúm, fdmkqzpa bad qx mudq, qz mxsgzm zgnq, mxsgzm pazoqxxm a qzmza oaz mxsgzm dqpaym pq msgm pq fmx hudfgp, cgq qz sgefmzpa mxsgzm safm pq qxxm, xgqsa mx bgzfa
cgqpmnmz emzae pq ege xxmsme k tqdupme, oaya eu ymx mxsgza za tgnuqeqz fqzupa; yme cgq qz fmzfa cgq qefa za tgnuqeq, fghuqdaz xae bmempae omnmxxqdae bad oaem moqdfmpm cgq ege qeogpqdae rgqeqz bdahqúpae pq puzqdae k pq afdme oaeme zqoqemdume, oaya qdmz tuxme k gzsg̈qzfae bmdm ogdmdeq; k ogmzpa egoqpúm cgq xae fmxqe omnmxxqdae za fqzúmz qeogpqdae (cgq qdmz baome k dmdme hqoqe), qxxae yueyae xa xxqhmnmz fapa qz gzme mxradvme ygk egfuxqe, cgq omeu za eq bmdqoúmz m xme mzome pqx omnmxxa, oaya cgq qdm afdm oaem pq yḿe uybadfmzoum; badcgq za euqzpa bad aomeuáz eqyqvmzfq, qefa pq xxqhmd mxradvme za rgq ygk mpyufupa qzfdq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe; k bad qefa xq pmnm bad oazeqva (bgqe mǵz eq xa bapúm ymzpmd oaya m eg mtuvmpa, cgq fmz bdqefa xa tmnúm pq eqd), cgq za omyuzmeq pq mxxú mpqxmzfq ez puzqdae k euz xme bdqhqzouazqe dqrqdupme, k cgq hqdúm ogḿz nuqz eq tmxxmnm oaz qxxme ogmzpa yqzae eq bqzemeq. Bdayqfuáxq paz Cguvafq pq tmoqd xa cgq eq xq moazeqvmnm oaz fapm bgzfgmxupmp; k meú eq puá xgqsa adpqz oaya hqxmeq xme mdyme qz gz oaddmx sdmzpq, cgq m gz xmpa pq xm hqzfm qefmnm, k dqoasuq́zpaxme Paz Cguvafq fapme, xme bgea eandq gzm buxm cgq vgzfa m gz bala qefmnm, k qyndmlmzpa eg mpmdsm, meuá pq eg xmzlm, k oaz sqzfux oazfuzqzfq eq oayqzlá m bmeqmd pqxmzfq pq xm buxm; k ogmzpa oayqzlá qx bmeqa, oayqzlmnm m oqddmd xm zaotq.
Oazfá qx hqzfqda m fapae ogmzfae qefmnmz qz xm hqzfm xm xaogdm pq eg tgq́ebqp, xm hqxm pq xme mdyme k xm mdymláz pq omnmxxqdúm cgq qebqdmnm. Mpyudḿzpaeq pq fmz qjfdmz̃a sq́zqda pq xaogdm, rgq́dazeqxa m yudmd pqepq xqvae, k huqdaz cgq, oaz eaeqsmpa mpqyḿz, gzme hqoqe eq bmeqmnm, afdme mdduympa m eg xmzlm bazúm xae avae qz xme mdyme euz cgufmdxae bad gz ngqz qebmoua pq qxxme. Momná pq oqddmd xm zaotq; bqda oaz fmzfm oxmdupmp pq xm xgzm, cgq bapúm oaybqfud oaz qx cgq eq xq bdqefmnm, pq ymzqdm cgq ogmzfa qx zahqx omnmxxqda tmoúm qdm nuqz huefa pq fapae.
Mzfaváeqxq qz qefa m gza pq xae mdduqdae cgq qefmnmz qz xm hqzfm ud m pmd msgm m eg dqogm, k rgq yqzqefqd cgufmd xme mdyme pq Paz Cguvafq, cgq qefmnmz eandq xm buxm, qx ogmx, huq́zpaxq xxqsmd, qz hal mxfm xq puva: ¡At fǵ, cguqzcguqdm cgq eqme, mfdqhupa omnmxxqda, cgq xxqsme m faomd xme mdyme pqx yḿe hmxqdaea mzpmzfq cgq vmyḿe eq ouz̃á qebmpm, yudm xa cgq tmoqe, k za xme facgqe, eu za cguqdqe pqvmd xm hupm qz bmsa pq fg mfdqhuyuqzfa! Za eq ogdá qx mdduqda pq qefme dmlazqe (k rgqdm yqvad cgq eq ogdmdm, badcgq rgqdm ogdmdeq qz emxgp); mzfqe, fdmnmzpa pq xme oaddqme, xme mddavá sdmz fdqota pq eú, xa ogmx huefa bad Paz Cguvafq, mxlá xae avae mx ouqxa, k bgqefa qx bqzemyuqzfa (m xa cgq bmdqouá) qz eg eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, puva: moaddqpyq, eqz̃adm yúm, qz qefm bduyqdm mrdqzfm cgq m qefq hgqefda mhmemxxmpa bqota eq xq ardqoq; za yq pqermxxqlom qz qefq bduyqda fdmzoq hgqefda rmhad k mybmda: k puouqzpa qefme k afdme eqyqvmzfqe dmlazqe, eaxfmzpa xm mpmdsm, mxlá xm xmzlm m pae ymzae k puá oaz qxxm fmz sdmz saxbq mx mdduqda qz xm omnqlm, cgq xq pqdduná qz qx egqxa fmz ymxfdqota, cgq, eu eqogzpmdm oaz afda, za fghuqdm zqoqeupmp pq ymqefda cgq xq ogdmdm. Tqota qefa, dqoasuá ege mdyme, k fadzá m bmeqmdeq oaz qx yueya dqbaea cgq bduyqda. Pqepq mxxú m baoa, euz emnqdeq xa cgq tmnúm bmempa (badcgq mǵz qefmnm mfgdpupa qx mdduqda), xxqsá afda oaz xm yueym uzfqzouáz pq pmd msgm m ege ygxae; k xxqsmzpa m cgufmd xme mdyme bmdm pqeqynmdmlmd xm buxm, euz tmnxmd Paz Cguvafq bmxmndm, k euz bqpud rmhad m zmpuq, eaxfá afdm hql xm mpmdsm, k mxlá afdm hql xm xmzlm, k euz tmoqdxm bqpmlae tula yḿe pq fdqe xm omnqlm pqx eqsgzpa mdduqda, badcgq eq xm mnduá bad ogmfda. Mx dgupa mogpuá fapm xm sqzfq pq xm hqzfm, k qzfdq qxxae qx hqzfqda. Huqzpa qefa Paz Cguvafq, qyndmlá eg mpmdsm, k bgqefm ymza m eg qebmpm, puva: ¡At, eqz̃adm pq xm rqdyaegdm, qergqdla k husad pqx pqnuxufmpa oadmláz yúa, mtadm qe fuqyba cgq hgqxhme xae avae pq fg sdmzpqlm m qefq fg omgfuha omnmxxqda, cgq fmymz̃m mhqzfgdm qefḿ mfqzpuqzpa! Oaz qefa oandá m eg bmdqoqd fmzfa ḿzuya, cgq eu xq moayqfuqdmz fapae xae mdduqdae pqx ygzpa, za haxhuqdm qx buq mfdḿe. Xae oaybmz̃qdae pq xae tqdupae cgq fmxqe xae huqdaz, oayqzlmdaz pqepq xqvae m xxahqd buqpdme eandq Paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx xa yqvad cgq bapúm eq dqbmdmnm oaz eg mpmdsm k za eq aemnm mbmdfmd pq xm buxm bad za pqemybmdmd xme mdyme. Qx hqzfqda pmnm haoqe cgq xq pqvmeqz, badcgq km xqe tmnúm puota oaya qdm xaoa, k cgq bad xaoa eq xundmdúm, mgzcgq xae ymfmeq m fapae. Fmynuq́z Paz Cguvafq xme pmnm ymkadqe, xxmyḿzpaxae pq mxqhaeae k fdmupadqe, k cgq qx eqz̃ad pqx omefuxxa qdm gz raxxáz k ymx zmoupa omnmxxqda, bgqe pq fmx ymzqdm oazeqzfúm cgq eq fdmfmeqz xae mzpmzfqe omnmxxqdae, k cgq eu q́x
tgnuqdm dqounupa xm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm, cgq q́x xq puqdm m qzfqzpqd eg mxqhaeúm; bqda pq haeafdae, eaql k nmvm omzmxxm, za tmsa omea mxsgza: fudmp, xxqsmp, hqzup k arqzpqpyq qz ogmzfa bgpuq́dqpqe, cgq haeafdae hqdq́ue qx bmsa cgq xxqhḿue pq hgqefdm emzpql k pqymeúm. Pqoúm qefa oaz fmzfa ndúa k pqzgqpa, cgq uzrgzpuá gz fqddunxq fqyad qz xae cgq xq moayqfúmz; k meú bad qefa oaya bad xme bqdegmeuazqe pqx hqzfqda, xq pqvmdaz pq fudmd, k q́x pqvá dqfudmd m xae tqdupae, k fadzá m xm hqxm pq ege mdyme oaz xm yueym cguqfgp k eaeuqsa cgq bduyqda.
Za xq bmdqouqdaz nuqz mx hqzfqda xme ngdxme pq eg tgq́ebqp, k pqfqdyuzá mndqhumd k pmdxq xm zqsdm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm xgqsa, mzfqe cgq afdm pqesdmoum egoqpuqeq; k meú, xxqsḿzpaeq m q́x eq pueogxbá pq xm uzeaxqzoum cgq mcgqxxm sqzfq nmvm oaz q́x tmnúm gempa, euz cgq q́x egbuqeq oaem mxsgzm; bqda cgq nuqz omefusmpa cgqpmnmz pq eg mfdqhuyuqzfa. Púvaxq, oaya km xq tmnúm puota, cgq qz mcgqx omefuxxa za tmnúm ombuxxm, k bmdm xa cgq dqefmnm pq tmoqd fmybaoa qdm zqoqemdum; cgq fapa qx facgq pq cgqpmd mdympa omnmxxqda oazeuefúm qz xm bqeoalmpm k qz qx qebmxpmdmla, eqsǵz q́x fqzúm zafuoum pqx oqdqyazumx pq xm adpqz, k cgq mcgqxxa qz yufmp pq gz omyba eq bapúm tmoqd; k cgq km tmnúm ogybxupa oaz xa cgq faomnm mx qxmd pq xme mdyme, cgq oaz eaxme pae tadme pq hqxm eq ogybxúm, ogmzfa yḿe cgq q́x tmnúm qefmpa yḿe pq ogmfda. Fapa eq xa odqká Paz Cguvafq, k puva cgq q́x qefmnm mxxú bdazfa bmdm anqpqoqdxq, k cgq oazoxgkqeq oaz xm ymkad ndqhqpmp cgq bgpuqeq; badcgq eu rgqeq afdm hql moayqfupa, k eq huqeq mdympa omnmxxqda, za bqzemnm pqvmd bqdeazm huhm qz qx omefuxxa, qjoqbfa mcgqxxme cgq q́x xq ymzpmeq, m cguqz bad eg dqebqfa pqvmdúm. Mphqdfupa k yqpdaea pq qefa qx omefqxxmza, fdmva xgqsa gz xunda pazpq meqzfmnm xm bmvm k oqnmpm cgq pmnm m xae mdduqdae, k oaz gz omna pq hqxm cgq xq fdmúm gz ygotmota, k oaz xme pae km puotme pazoqxxme, eq huza m pazpq Paz Cguvafq qefmnm, mx ogmx ymzpá tuzomd pq dapuxxme, k xqkqzpa qz eg ymzgmx oaya cgq pqoúm mxsgzm pqhafm admouáz, qz yufmp pq xm xqkqzpm mxlá xm ymza, k puáxq eandq qx ogqxxa gz ngqz saxbq, k fdme q́x oaz eg yueym qebmpm gz sqzfux qebmxpmdmla, euqybdq ygdygdmzpa qzfdq puqzfqe oaya cgq dqlmnm. Tqota qefa, ymzpá m gzm pq mcgqxxme pmyme cgq xq ouz̃qeq xm qebmpm, xm ogmx xa tula oaz ygotm pqeqzhaxfgdm k pueodqouáz, badcgq za rgq yqzqefqd baom bmdm za dqhqzfmd pq duem m ompm bgzfa pq xme oqdqyazume; bqda xme bdaqlme cgq km tmnúmz huefa pqx zahqx omnmxxqda xqe fqzúm xm duem m dmkm. Mx oqz̃udxq xm qebmpm puva xm ngqzm eqz̃adm: Puae tmsm m hgqefdm yqdoqp ygk hqzfgdaea omnmxxqda, k xq pq́ hqzfgdm qz xupqe. Paz Cguvafq xq bdqsgzfá oaya eq xxmymnm, badcgq q́x egbuqeq pq mxxú mpqxmzfq m cguq́z cgqpmnm anxusmpa bad xm yqdoqp dqounupm, badcgq bqzemnm pmdxq mxsgzm bmdfq pq xm tazdm cgq mxomzlmeq bad qx hmxad pq eg ndmla. Qxxm dqebazpuá oaz ygotm tgyuxpmp cgq eq xxmymnm xm Faxaem, k cgq qdm tuvm pq gz dqyqzpáz, zmfgdmx pq Faxqpa, cgq huhúm m xme fqzpuxxme pq Emzota Nuqzmkm, k cgq pazpq cguqdm cgq qxxm qefghuqeq xq eqdhudúm k xq fqzpdúm bad eqz̃ad. Paz Cguvafq xq dqbxuoá cgq bad eg myad xq tuouqeq yqdoqp, cgq pq mxxú qz mpqxmzfq eq bgeuqeq paz, k eq xxmymeq paz̃m Faxaem. Qxxm eq xa bdayqfuá; k xm afdm xq omxlá xm qebgqxm, oaz xm ogmx xq bmeá omeu qx yueya oaxacgua cgq oaz xm pq xm qebmpm. Bdqsgzfáxq eg zayndq, k puva cgq eq xxmymnm xm Yaxuzqdm, k cgq qdm tuvm pq gz tazdmpa yaxuzqda pq Mzfqcgqdm; m xm ogmx fmynuq́z dasá Paz Cguvafq cgq eq bgeuqeq paz, k eq xxmymeq paz̃m Yaxuzqdm, ardqouq́zpaxq zgqhae eqdhuouae k yqdoqpqe.
Tqotme, bgqe, pq smxabq k mbduem xme tmefm mxxú zgzom huefme oqdqyazume, za huá xm tadm Paz Cguvafq pq hqdeq m omnmxxa k emxud ngeomzpa xme mhqzfgdme; k qzeuxxmzpa xgqsa m Daouzmzfq, egnuá qz q́x, k mndmlmzpa m eg tgq́ebqp, xq puva oaeme fmz qjfdmz̃me, msdmpqouq́zpaxq xm yqdoqp pq tmnqdxq mdympa omnmxxqda, cgq za qe baeunxq moqdfmd m dqrqdudxme. Qx hqzfqda, bad hqdxq km rgqdm pq xm hqzfm, oaz za yqzae dqfáduome, mgzcgq oaz yḿe ndqhqe bmxmndme, dqebazpuá m xme egkme, k euz bqpudxq xm oaefm pq xm baempm, xq pqvá ud m xm ngqzm tadm.
Ombúfgxa 4: Pq xa cgq xq egoqpuá m zgqefda omnmxxqda ogmzpa emxuá pq xm hqzfm
Xm pqx mxnm eqdúm ogmzpa Paz Cguvafq emxuá pq xm hqzfm, fmz oazfqzfa, fmz smxxmdpa, fmz mxnadalmpa bad hqdeq km mdympa omnmxxqda, cgq qx sala xq dqhqzfmnm bad xme ouzotme pqx omnmxxa. Yme huzuq́zpaxq m xm yqyadum xae oazeqvae pq eg tgq́ebqp moqdom pq xme bdqhqzouazqe fmz zqoqemdume cgq tmnúm pq xxqhmd oazeusa, qz qebqoumx xm pq xae puzqdae k omyueme, pqfqdyuzá haxhqd m eg omem k moayapmdeq pq fapa, k pq gz qeogpqda, tmouqzpa ogqzfm pq dqounud m gz xmndmpad hqouza egka, cgq qdm bandq k oaz tuvae, bqda ygk m bdabáeufa bmdm qx aruoua qeogpqdux pq xm omnmxxqdúm. Oaz qefq bqzemyuqzfa sguá m Daouzmzfq tmoum eg mxpqm, qx ogmx omeu oazaouqzpa xm cgqdqzoum, oaz fmzfm smzm oayqzlá m omyuzmd, cgq bmdqoúm cgq za bazúm xae buqe qz qx egqxa. Za tmnúm mzpmpa ygota, ogmzpa xq bmdqouá cgq m eg puqefdm ymza, pq xm qebqegdm pq gz naecgq cgq mxxú qefmnm, emxúmz gzme haoqe pqxuompme, oaya pq bqdeazm cgq eq cgqvmnm; k mbqzme xme tgna aúpa, ogmzpa puva: sdmoume pak mx ouqxa bad xm yqdoqp cgq yq tmoq, bgqe fmz bdqefa yq bazq aomeuazqe pqxmzfq, pazpq ka bgqpm ogybxud oaz xa cgq pqna m yu bdarqeuáz, k pazpq bgqpm oasqd qx rdgfa pq yue ngqzae pqeqae: qefme haoqe euz pgpm eaz pq mxsǵz yqzqefqdaea a yqzqefqdaem, cgq tm yqzqefqd yu rmhad k mkgpm: k haxhuqzpa xme duqzpme qzomyuzá m Daouzmzfq tmoum pazpq xq bmdqouá cgq xme haoqe emxúmz; k m baoae bmeae cgq qzfdá bad qx naecgq, huá mfmpm gzm kqsgm m gzm qzouzm, k mfmpa qz afdm gz ygotmota pqezgpa pq yqpua ogqdba mddunm, pq qpmp pq cguzoq mz̃ae, cgq qdm qx cgq xme haoqe pmnm k za euz omgem, badcgq xq qefmnm pmzpa oaz gzm bdqfuzm ygotae mlafqe gz xmndmpad pq ngqz fmxxq, k ompm mlafq xq moaybmz̃mnm oaz gzm dqbdqzeuáz k oazeqva, badcgq pqoúm: xm xqzsgm cgqpm k xae avae xuefae. K qx ygotmota dqebazpúm: za xa tmdq́ afdm hql, eqz̃ad yúa; bad xm bmeuáz pq Puae, cgq za xa tmdq́ afdm hql, k ka bdayqfa pq fqzqd pq mcgú mpqxmzfq yḿe ogupmpa oaz qx tmfa. K huqzpa Paz Cguvafq xa cgq bmemnm, oaz hal mudmpm puva: pqeoadfq́e omnmxxqda, ymx bmdqoq faymdae oaz cguqz pqrqzpqd za eq bgqpq; egnup eandq hgqefda omnmxxa k faymp hgqefdm xmzlm, (cgq fmynuq́z fqzúm gzm xmzlm mdduympm m xm qzouzm, mpazpq qefmnm mddqzpmpm xm kqsgm) cgq ka ae tmdq́ oazaoqd eqd pq oanmdpqe xa cgq qefḿue tmouqzpa.
Qx xmndmpad, cgq huá eandq eú mcgqxxm rusgdm xxqzm pq mdyme, nxmzpuqzpa xm xmzlm eandq eg daefda, fǵhaeq bad ygqdfa, k oaz ngqzme bmxmndme dqebazpuá: eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, qefq ygotmota cgq qefak omefusmzpa qe gz yu odumpa, cgq yq eudhq pq sgmdpmd gzm ymzmpm pq ahqvme cgq fqzsa qz qefae oazfadzae, qx ogmx qe fmz pqeogupmpa cgq ompm púm yq rmxfm gzm, k badcgq omefusa eg pqeogupa a nqxxmcgqdúm, puoq cgq xa tmsa pq yueqdmnxq, bad za bmsmdxq xm eaxpmpm cgq xq pqna, k qz Puae k qz yu ḿzuym cgq yuqzfq. ¿Yuqzfq, pqxmzfq pq yú, dguz huxxmza? puva Paz Cguvafq. Bad qx eax cgq zae mxgyndm, cgq qefak bad bmemdae pq bmdfq m bmdfq oaz qefm xmzlm: bmsmpxq xgqsa euz yḿe dq́bxuom; eu za, bad qx Puae cgq zae dusq, cgq ae oazoxgkm k mzucguxq qz qefq bgzfa: pqemfmpxa xgqsa. Qx xmndmpad nmvá xm omnqlm, k euz dqebazpqd bmxmndm pqemfá m eg odumpa, mx ogmx bdqsgzfá Paz Cguvafq cgq ogḿzfa xq pqnúm eg mya. Qx puva cgq zgqhq yqeqe, m euqfq dqmxqe ompm yqe. Tula xm ogqzfm Paz Cguvafq, k tmxxá cgq yazfmnmz eqeqzfm k fdqe dqmxqe, k púvaxq mx xmndmpad cgq mx yayqzfa xae pqeqynaxemeq, eu za cgqdúm yadud bad qxxa. Dqebazpuá qx yqpdaea huxxmza, cgq bad qx bmea qz cgq qefmnm k vgdmyqzfa cgq tmnúm tqota (k mǵz za tmnúm vgdmpa zmpm), cgq za qdmz fmzfae, badcgq eq xq tmnúm pq pqeoazfmd k dqounud qz ogqzfm fdqe bmdqe pq lmbmfae cgq xq tmnúm pmpa, k gz dqmx pq pae emzsdúme cgq xq tmnúmz tqota qefmzpa qzrqdya. Nuqz qefḿ fapa qea, dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq; bqda cgq́pqzeq xae lmbmfae k xme emzsdúme bad xae mlafqe cgq euz ogxbm xq tmnq́ue pmpa, cgq eu q́x daybuá qx ogqda pq xae lmbmfae cgq hae bmsḿefque, hae xq tmnq́ue daybupa qx pq eg ogqdba, k eu xq emoá qx nmdnqda emzsdq qefmzpa qzrqdya, hae qz emzupmp eq xm tmnq́ue emompa; meú cgq bad qefm bmdfq za ae pqnq zmpm. Qx pmz̃a qefḿ, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, qz cgq za fqzsa mcgú puzqdae: hq́zsmeq Mzpdq́e oazyusa m yu omem, cgq ka eq xae bmsmdq́ gz dqmx eandq afda.
¿Udyq ka oaz q́x, puva qx ygotmota, yḿe? ¡Ymx mz̃a! Za, eqz̃ad, zu bad buqzea, badcgq qz huq́zpaeq eaxa yq pqeaxxmdḿ oaya m gz Emz Nmdfaxayq́. Za tmdḿ fmx, dqbxuoá Paz
Cguvafq; nmefm cgq ka eq xa ymzpq bmdm cgq yq fqzsm dqebqfa, k oaz cgq q́x yq xa vgdq bad xm xqk pq omnmxxqdúm cgq tm dqounupa, xq pqvmdq́ ud xundq k meqsgdmdq́ xm bmsm. Yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad, xa cgq puoq, puva qx ygotmota, cgq qefq yu mya za qe omnmxxqda, zu tm dqounupa adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm mxsgzm, cgq qe Vgmz Tmxpgpa qx duoa, hqouza pqx Cguzfmzmd.
Uybadfm baoa qea, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq Tmxpgpae bgqpq tmnqd omnmxxqdae, ogmzfa yḿe cgq ompm gza qe tuva pq ege andme. Meú qe hqdpmp, puva Mzpdq́e; bqda qefq yu mya, ¿pq cgq́ andme qe tuva, bgqe yq zuqsm yu eaxpmpm k yu egpad k fdmnmva? Za zuqsa, tqdymza Mzpdq́e, dqebazpuá qx xmndmpad, k tmoqpyq bxmoqd pq hqzudae oazyusa, cgq ka vgda, bad fapme xme ádpqzqe pq omnmxxqdúme tmk qz qx ygzpa, pq bmsmdae, oaya fqzsa puota, gz dqmx eandq afda, k mgz emtgympae. Pqx emtgyqdua ae tmsa sdmoum, puva Paz Cguvafq, pḿpeqxae qz dqmxqe, cgq oaz qefa yq oazfqzfa; k yudmp cgq xa ogybxḿue oaya xa tmnq́ue vgdmpa; eu za, bad qx yueyavgdmyqzfa ae vgda pq haxhqd m ngeomdae k m omefusmdae, k cgq ae fqzsa pq tmxxmd mgzcgq ae qeoazpḿue yḿe cgq gzm xmsmdfuvm. K eu cgqdq́ue emnqd cguq́z ae ymzpm qefa, bmdm cgqpmd oaz yḿe hqdme anxusmpa m ogybxudxa, emnqp cgq ka eak qx hmxqdaea Paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, qx pqermoqpad pq msdmhuae k euzdmlazqe; k m Puae cgqpmp, k za eq ae bmdfm pq xme yuqzfqe xa bdayqfupa k vgdmpa, ea bqzm pq xm bqzm bdazgzoumpm.
K qz puouqzpa qefa buoá m eg Daouzmzfq, k qz ndqhq qebmoua eq mbmdfá pq qxxae. Eusguáxq qx xmndmpad oaz xae avae, k ogmzpa huá cgq tmnúm fdmebgqefa qx naecgq k cgq km za bmdqoúm, haxhuáeq m eg odumpa Mzpdq́e k púvaxq: Hqzup moḿ, tuva yúa, cgq ae cguqda bmsmd xa cgq ae pqna, oaya mcgqx pqermoqpad pq msdmhuae yq pqvá ymzpmpa. Qea vgda ka, puva Mzpdq́e, k oaya cgq mzpmdḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp moqdfmpa qz ogybxud qx ymzpmyuqzfa pq mcgqx ngqz omnmxxqda, cgq yux mz̃ae huhm, cgq eqsǵz qe pq hmxqdaea k pq ngqz vgq, huhq Dacgq, cgq eu za yq bmsm, cgq hgqxhm k qvqogfq xa cgq puva. Fmynuq́z xa vgda ka, puva qx xmndmpad; bqda bad xa ygota cgq ae cguqda, cguqda modqoqzfmd xm pqgpm bad modqoqzfmd xm bmsm. K meuq́zpaxa pqx ndmla, xq fadzá m mfmd m xm qzouzm, pazpq xq puá fmzfae mlafqe, cgq xq pqvá bad ygqdfa. Xxmymp, eqz̃ad Mzpdq́e, mtadm, pqoúm qx xmndmpad, mx pqermoqpad pq msdmhuae, hqdq́ue oáya za pqermoq mcgqefq, mgzcgq odqa cgq za qefḿ momnmpa pq tmoqd, badcgq yq huqzq smzm pq pqeaxxmdae huha, oaya hae fqyúmpqe.<ND< duqzpa.
K pq qefm ymzqdm pqetula qx msdmhua qx hmxqdaea Paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx, oazfqzfúeuya pq xa egoqpupa, bmdqouq́zpaxq cgq tmnúm pmpa rqxuoúeuya k mxfa bduzoubua m ege omnmxxqdúme, oaz sdmz emfuermoouáz pq eú yueya unm omyuzmzpa tmoum eg mxpqm, puouqzpa m yqpum hal: Nuqz fq bgqpqe xxmymd puotaeme eandq ogmzfme tak huhqz qz xm fuqddm, at eandq xme nqxxme, nqxxm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, bgqe fq ogba qz egqdfq fqzqd egvqfa k dqzpupa m fapm fg haxgzfmp k fmxmzfq m gz fmz hmxuqzfq k fmz zayndmpa omnmxxqda, oaya xa qe k eqdḿ Paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, qx ogmx, oaya fapa qx ygzpa emnq, mkqd dqounuá xm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm, k tak tm pqerqota qx ymkad fgqdfa k msdmhua cgq radyá xm euzdmláz k oayqfuá xm odgqxpmp; tak cgufá qx xḿfusa pq xm ymza m mcgqx pqebumpmpa qzqyusa cgq fmz euz aomeuáz hmxbgxqmnm m mcgqx pqxuompa uzrmzfq. Qz qefa xxqsá m gz omyuza cgq qz ogmfda eq puhupúm, k xgqsa eq xq huza m xm uymsuzmouáz xme qzodgouvmpme pazpq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe eq bazúmz m bqzemd ogḿx omyuza pq mcgqxxae faymdúmz; k bad uyufmdxae, qefgha gz dmfa cgqpa, k mx omna pq tmnqdxa ygk nuqz bqzempa eaxfá xm duqzpm m Daouzmzfq, pqvmzpa m xm haxgzfmp pqx daoúz xm egkm, qx ogmx eusguá eg bduyqd uzfqzfa, cgq rgq qx udeq omyuza pq eg omnmxxqdulm, k tmnuqzpa mzpmpa oaya pae yuxxme, pqeognduá Paz Cguvafq gz sdmz fdabqx pq sqzfq cgq, oaya pqebgq́e eq egba, qdmz gzae yqdompqdqe faxqpmzae, cgq unmz m oaybdmd m Ygdoum. Qdmz eque, k hqzúmz oaz ege cgufmeaxqe, oaz afdae ogmfda odumpae m omnmxxa k fdqe yalae pq ygxme m buq.
Mbqzme xqe puhueá Paz Cguvafq, ogmzpa eq uymsuzá eqd oaem pq zgqhm mhqzfgdm, k bad uyufmd qz fapa, ogmzfa m q́x xq bmdqoúm baeunxq, xae bmeae cgq tmnúm xqúpa qz eg e xundae, xq bmdqouá hqzud mxxú pq yaxpq gza cgq bqzemnm tmoqd; k meú oaz sqzfux oazfuzqzfq k pqzgqpa eq mrudyá nuqz qz xae qefdunae, mbdqfá xm xmzlm, xxqsá xm mpmdsm mx bqota, k bgqefa qz xm yufmp pqx omyuza qefgha qebqdmzpa cgq mcgqxxae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe xxqsmeqz (cgq km q́x bad fmxqe xae fqzúm k vglsmnm); k ogmzpa xxqsmdaz m
fdqota cgq eq bgpuqdaz hqd k aúd, xqhmzfá Paz Cguvafq xm hal, k oaz mpqyḿz mddasmzfq puva: fapa qx ygzpa eq fqzsm, eu fapa qx ygzpa za oazruqem cgq za tmk qz qx ygzpa fapa pazoqxxm yḿe tqdyaem cgq xm qybqdmfdul pq xm Ymzotm, xm euz bmd Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea.
Bmdḿdazeq xae yqdompqdqe mx eaz pq qefme dmlazqe, k mx hqd xm qefdmz̃m rusgdm pqx cgq xme pqoúm, k bad xm rusgdm k bad qxxme xgqsa qotmdaz pq hqd xm xaogdm pq eg pgqz̃a, yme cgueuqdaz hqd pqebmoua qz cgq́ bmdmnm mcgqxxm oazrqeuáz cgq eq xqe bqpúm; k gza pq qxxae, cgq qdm gz baoa ngdxáz k ygk ygota pueodqfa, xq puva: eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, zaeafdae za oazaoqyae cguq́z qe qem ngqzm eqz̃adm cgq pqoúe; yaefdḿpzaexm, cgq eu qxxm rgqdq pq fmzfm tqdyaegdm oaya euszuruoḿue, pq ngqzm smzm k euz mbdqyua mxsgza oazrqemdqyae xm hqdpmp cgq bad bmdfq hgqefdm zae qe bqpupm. Eu ae xm yaefdmdm, dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq, ¿cgq́ tuouq́dmpqe haeafdae qz oazrqemd gzm hqdpmp fmz zafadum? Xm uybadfmzoum qefḿ qz cgq euz hqdxm xa tmnq́ue pq odqqd, oazrqemd, mrudymd, vgdmd k pqrqzpqd; pazpq za, oazyusa eaue qz nmfmxxm, sqzfq pqeoaygzmx k eanqdnum: cgq mtadm hqzsḿue gza m gza, oaya bupq xm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm, adm fapae vgzfae, oaya qe oaefgyndq k ymxm gemzlm pq xae pq hgqefdm dmxqm, mcgú ae msgmdpa k qebqda, oazrumpa qz xm dmláz cgq pq yu bmdfq fqzsa. Eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, dqbxuoá qx yqdompqd, egbxuoa m hgqefdm yqdoqp qz zayndq pq fapae qefae bdúzoubqe cgq mcgú qefmyae, cgq, badcgq za omdsgqyae zgqefdme oazouqzoume, oazrqemzpa gzm oaem bad zaeafdae vmyḿe huefm zu aúpm, k yḿe euqzpa fmz qz bqdvguoua pq xme qybqdmfduoqe k dquzme pqx Mxomddum k Qjfdqympgdm, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp eqm eqdhupa pq yaefdmdzae mxsǵz dqfdmfa pq qem eqz̃adm, mgzcgq eqm fmymz̃a oaya gz sdmza pq fdusa, cgq bad qx tuxa eq emomdḿ qx ahuxxa, k cgqpmdqyae oaz qefa emfuerqotae k eqsgdae, k hgqefdm yqdoq cgqpmdḿ oazfqzfa k bmsmpa; k mgz odqa cgq qefmyae km fmz pq eg bmdfq, cgq mgzcgq eg dqfdmfa zae ygqefdq cgq qe fgdqdfm pq gz ava, k cgq pqx afda xq ymzm nqdyqxxáz k buqpdm mlgrdq, oaz fapa qea, bad oaybxmoqd m hgqefdm yqdoqp, pudqyae qz eg rmhad fapa xa cgq cgueuqdq. Za xq ymzm, omzmxxm uzrmyq, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq qzoqzpupa qz oáxqdm, za xq ymzm, pusa, qea cgq pqoúe, euza ḿynmd k mxsmxum qzfdq mxsapazqe, k za qe fgqdfm zu oadoanmpm, euza yḿe pqdqotm cgq gz tgea pq Sgmpmddmym; bqda haeafdae bmsmdq́ue xm sdmzpq nxmerqyum cgq tmnq́ue puota oazfdm fmymz̃m nqxpmp, oaya qe xm pq yu eqz̃adm. K qz puouqzpa qefa, mddqyqfuá oaz xm xmzlm nmvm oazfdm qx cgq xa tmnúm puota, oaz fmzfm rgdum k qzava, cgq eu xm ngqzm egqdfq za tuouqdm cgq qz xm yufmp pqx omyuza fdabqlmdm Daouzmzfq, xa bmemdm ymx qx mfdqhupa yqdompqd. Omká Daouzmzfq, k rgq dapmzpa eg mya gzm ngqzm buqlm bad qx omyba, k cgqduq́zpaeq xqhmzfmd, vmyḿe bgpa: fmx qynmdmla xq omgemnm xm xmzlm, qebgqxme k oqxmpm, oaz qx bqea pq xme mzfusgme mdyme. K qzfdq fmzfa cgq bgszmnm bad xqhmzfmdeq k za bapúm, qefmnm puouqzpa: zaz rgkḿue, sqzfq oanmdpq, sqzfq omgfuhm, mfqzpqp cgq za bad ogxbm yúm, euza pq yu omnmxxa, qefak mcgú fqzpupa. Gz yala pq ygxme pq xae cgq mxxú hqzúmz, cgq za pqnúm pq eqd ygk nuqz uzfqzouazmpa, akqzpa pqoud mx bandq omúpa fmzfme mddasmzoume, za xa bgpa egrdud euz pmdxq xm dqebgqefm qz xme oaefuxxme. K xxqsḿzpaeq m q́x, fayá xm xmzlm, k pqebgq́e pq tmnqdxm tqota bqpmlae, oaz gza pq qxxae oayqzlá m pmd m zgqefda Paz Cguvafq fmzfae bmxae, cgq m pqebqota k bqemd pq ege mdyme xq yaxuá oaya ounqdm. Pḿnmzxq haoqe ege myae cgq za xq puqeq fmzfa, k cgq xq pqvmeq; bqda qefmnm km qx yala buompa, k za cguea pqvmd qx vgqsa tmefm qzhupmd fapa qx dqefa pq eg oáxqdm; k mogpuqzpa bad xae pqyḿe fdalae pq xm xmzlm, xae momná pq pqetmoqd eandq qx yueqdmnxq omúpa, cgq oaz fapm mcgqxxm fqybqefmp pq bmxae cgq eandq q́x xahúm, za oqddmnm xm naom, myqzmlmzpa mx ouqxa k m xm fuqddm k m xae ymxmzpduzqe, cgq fmx xq bmdqoúmz. Omzeáeq qx yala, k xae yqdompqdqe eusguqdaz eg omyuza, xxqhmzpa cgq oazfmd qz fapa q́x pqx bandq mbmxqmpa, qx ogmx, pqebgq́e cgq eq huá eaxa, fadzá m bdanmd eu bapúm xqhmzfmdeq; bqda, eu za xa bgpa tmoqd ogmzpa emza k ngqza, ¿oáya xa tmdúm yaxupa k omeu pqetqota? K mǵz eq fqzúm bad puotaea, bmdqouq́zpaxq cgq mcgqxxm qdm bdabum pqesdmoum pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, k fapm xm mfdungúm m xm rmxfm pq eg omnmxxa; k za qdm baeunxq xqhmzfmdeq, eqsǵz fqzúm mndgympa fapa qx ogqdba.
Ombúfgxa 5: Pazpq eq bdaeusgq xm zmddmouáz pq xm pqesdmoum pq zgqefda omnmxxqda
Huqzpa, bgqe, cgq qz qrqofa za bapúm yqzqmdeq, moadpá pq moasqdeq m eg adpuzmdua dqyqpua, cgq qdm bqzemd qz mxsǵz bmea pq ege xundae, k fdḿvaxq eg oáxqdm m xm yqyadum mcgqx pq Nmxpahuzae k pqx ymdcgq́e pq Ymzfgm, ogmzpa Omdxafa xq pqvá tqdupa qz xm yazfmz̃m... tuefadum emnupm pq xae zuz̃ae, za uszadmpm pq xae yalae, oqxqndmpm k mgz odqúpm pq huqvae, k oaz fapa qefa za yḿe hqdpmpqdm cgq xae yuxmsdae pq Ymtaym. Qefm, bgqe, xq bmdqouá m q́x cgq xq hqzúm pq yaxpq bmdm qx bmea qz cgq eq tmxxmnm, k meú oaz ygqefdme pq sdmzpq eqzfuyuqzfa, eq oayqzlá m haxomd bad xm fuqddm, k m pqoud oaz pqnuxufmpa mxuqzfa xa yueya cgq puoqz pqoúm qx tqdupa omnmxxqda pqx naecgq:
¿Pázpq qefḿue, eqz̃adm yúm, cgq za fq pgqxq yu ymx?
A za xa emnqe, eqz̃adm,
a qdqe rmxem k pqexqmx.
K pq qefm ymzqdm rgq bdaeusguqzpa qx daymzoq tmefm mcgqxxae hqdeae cgq puoqz:
At zanxq ymdcgḿe pq Ymzfgm, yu fúa k eqz̃ad Omdzmx.
K cguea xm egqdfq cgq ogmzpa xxqsá m qefq hqdea moqdfá m bmemd bad mxxú gz xmndmpad pq eg yueya xgsmd, k hqouza egka, cgq hqzúm pq xxqhmd gzm omdsm pq fdusa mx yaxuza; qx ogmx, huqzpa mcgqx tayndq mxxú fqzpupa, eq xxqsá m q́x k xq bdqsgzfá cgq cguq́z qdm k cgq́ ymx eqzfúm cgq fmz fduefqyqzfq eq cgqvmnm. Paz Cguvafq odqká euz pgpm cgq mcgqx qdm qx ymdcgq́e pq Ymzfgm eg fúa, k meú za xq dqebazpuá afdm oaem euza rgq bdaeqsgud qz eg daymzoq, pazpq xq pmnm ogqzfm pq eg pqesdmoum k pq xae myadqe pqx tuva pqx Qybqdmzfq oaz eg qebaem, fapa pq xm yueym ymzqdm cgq qx daymzoq xa omzfm. Qx xmndmpad qefmnm mpyudmpa akqzpa mcgqxxae puebmdmfqe, k cgufḿzpaxq xm hueqdm, cgq km qefmnm tqotm bqpmlae pq xae bmxae, xq xuybuá qx daefda cgq xa fqzúm xxqza pq baxha; k mbqzme xq tgna xuybumpa, ogmzpa xq oazaouá k xq puva: eqz̃ad Cguvmpm (cgq meú eq pqnúm pq xxmymd ogmzpa q́x fqzúm vguoua, k za tmnúm bmempa pq tupmxsa eaeqsmpa m omnmxxqda mzpmzfq) ¿cguq́z tm bgqefa m hgqefdm yqdoqp pq qefm egqdfq? Bqda q́x, eqsgúm oaz eg daymzoq m ogmzfa xq bdqsgzfmnm. Huqzpa qefa qx ngqz tayndq, xa yqvad cgq bgpa xq cgufá qx bqfa k qebmxpmd, bmdm hqd eu fqzúm mxsgzm tqdupm; bqda za huá emzsdq zu eqz̃mx mxsgzm. Bdaogdá xqhmzfmdxq pqx egqxa, k za oaz baoa fdmnmva xq egnuá eandq eg vgyqzfa, bad bmdqoqdxq omnmxxqdúm yḿe eaeqsmpm. Dqoasuá xme mdyme tmefm xme mefuxxme pq xm xmzlm, k xuáxme eandq Daouzmzfq, mx ogmx fayá pq xm duqzpm, k pqx omnqefda mx meza, k eq qzomyuzá tmoum eg bgqnxa, nuqz bqzemfuha pq aúd xae puebmdmfqe cgq Paz Cguvafq pqoúm; k za yqzae unm Paz Cguvafq, cgq pq bgda yaxupa k cgqndmzfmpa za eq bapúm fqzqd eandq qx nadduoa, k pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa pmnm gzae egebuda cgq xae bazúm qz qx ouqxa, pq yapa cgq pq zgqha anxusá m cgq qx xmndmpad xq bdqsgzfmeq xq puvqeq cgq́ ymx eqzfúm; k za bmdqoq euza cgq qx pumnxa xq fdmúm m xm yqyadum xae ogqzfae moayapmpae m ege egoqeae, badcgq qz mcgqx bgzfa, axhupḿzpaeq pq Nmxpahuzae, eq moadpá pqx yada Mnuzpmddḿql ogmzpa qx mxomupq pq Mzfqcgqdm Dapdusa pq Zmdhḿql xq bdqzpuá, k xxqhá omgfuha m eg mxomupúm. Pq egqdfq cgq ogmzpa qx xmndmpad xq haxhuá m bdqsgzfmd oáya qefmnm k cgq́ eqzfúm, xq dqebazpuá xme yueyme bmxmndme k dmlazqe cgq qx omgfuha Mnqzoqddmvq dqebazpúm m Dapdusa pq Zmdhḿql, pqx yueya yapa cgq q́x tmnúm xqúpa xm tuefadum qz xm Pumzm pq Vadsq pq Yazfqymkad, pazpq eq qeodunq; mbdahqotḿzpaeq pq qxxm fmz pq bdabáeufa cgq qx xmndmpad eq unm pmzpa mx pumnxa pq aúd fmzfm yḿcguzm pq zqoqpmpqe; bad pazpq oazaouá cgq eg hqouza qefmnm xaoa, k pḿnmeq bduqem m xxqsmd mx bgqnxa, bad qjogemd qx qzrmpa cgq Paz Cguvafq xq omgemnm oaz eg xmdsm mdqzsm. Mx omna pq xa ogmx puva; eqbm hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad Paz Dapdusa pq Zmdhḿql, cgq qefm tqdyaem Vmdurm, cgq tq puota, qe mtadm xm xuzpm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, bad cguqz ka tq tqota, tmsa k tmdq́ xae yḿe rmyaeae tqotae pq omnmxxqdúme cgq eq tmz huefa, hqmz, zu hqdḿz
qz qx ygzpa. M qefa dqebazpuá qx xmndmpad: yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad, ¡bqompad pq yú! cgq ka za eak paz Dapdusa pq Zmdhḿql, zu qx ymdcgq́e pq Ymzfgm, euza Bqpda Mxazea, eg hqouza; zu hgqefdm yqdoqp qe Nmxpayuzae, zu Mnuzpmddḿql, euza qx tazdmpa tupmxsa pqx eqz̃ad Cguvmpm; ka eq́ cguqz eak, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, k eq́ cgq bgqpa eqd, za eáxa xae cgq tq puota, euza fapae xae paoq Bmdqe pq Rdmzoum, k mǵz fapae xae zgqhq pq xm rmym, bgqe m fapme xme tmlmz̃me cgq qxxae fapae vgzfae k ompm gza pq bad eú tuouqdaz, eq mhqzfmvmdḿz xme yúme.
Qz qefme bxḿfuome k afdme eqyqvmzfqe xxqsmdaz mx xgsmd m xm tadm cgq mzaotqoúm; bqda qx xmndmpad msgmdpá m cgq rgqeq mxsa yḿe zaotq, badcgq za huqeqz mx yaxupa tupmxsa fmz ymx omnmxxqda. Xxqsmpm, bgqe, xm tadm cgq xq bmdqouá, qzfdá qz qx bgqnxa k qz omem pq Paz Cguvafq, xm ogmx tmxxá fapm mxnadafmpm, k qefmnmz qz qxxm qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda pqx xgsmd, cgq qdmz sdmzpqe myusae pq Paz Cguvafq, cgq qefmnm puouq́zpaxqe eg mym m haoqe: ¿cgq́ xq bmdqoq m hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa, Bqda Bq́dql, cgq meú eq xxmymnm qx ogdm, pq xm pqesdmoum pq yu eqz̃ad? Eque púme tm cgq za bmdqoqz q́x, zu qx daoúz, zu xm mpmdsm, zu xm xmzlm, zu xme mdyme. ¡Pqehqzfgdmpm pq yú! cgq yq pak m qzfqzpqd, k meú qe qxxa xm hqdpmp oaya zmoú bmdm yadud, cgq qefae ymxpufae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme cgq q́x fuqzq, k egqxq xqqd fmz pq adpuzmdua, xq
tmz hgqxfa qx vguoua; cgq mtadm yq mogqdpa tmnqdxq aúpa pqoud ygotme hqoqe tmnxmzpa qzfdq eú, cgq cgqdúm tmoqdeq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, q udeq m ngeomd xme mhqzfgdme bad qeae ygzpae. Qzoayqzpmpae eqmz m Emfmzḿe k m Nmddmnḿe fmxqe xundae, cgq meú tmz qotmpa m bqdpqd qx yḿe pqxuompa qzfqzpuyuqzfa cgq tmnúm qz fapm xm Ymzotm. Xm eanduzm pqoúm xa yueya, k mǵz pqoúm yḿe: eqbm, eqz̃ad ymqeq Zuoaxḿe, cgq qefq qdm qx zayndq pqx nmdnqda, cgq ygotme hqoqe xq moazfqouá m yu eqz̃ad fúa qefmdeq xqkqzpa qz qefae pqemxympae xundae pq pqehqzfgdme pae púme oaz ege zaotqe: mx omna pq xae ogmxqe mddavmnm qx xunda pq xme ymzae, k bazúm ymza m xm qebmpm, k mzpmnm m ogotuxxmpme oaz xme bmdqpqe; k ogmzpa qefmnm ygk omzempa, pqoúm cgq tmnúm ygqdfa m ogmfda susmzfqe oaya ogmfda faddqe, k qx egpad cgq egpmnm pqx omzemzoua pqoúm cgq qdm emzsdq pq xme rqdupme cgq tmnúm dqounupa qz xm nmfmxxm; k nqnúmeq xgqsa gz smz vmdda pq msgm rdúm, k cgqpmnm emza k eaeqsmpa, puouqzpa cgq mcgqxxm msgm qdm gzm bdqouaeúeueym nqnupm cgq xq tmnúm fdmúpa qx emnua Qecgurq, gz sdmzpq qzomzfmpad k myusa egka. Yme ka yq fqzsa xm ogxbm pq fapa, cgq za mhueq́ m hgqefdme yqdoqpqe pq xae puebmdmfqe pq yu eqz̃ad fúa, bmdm cgq xa dqyqpumdmz mzfqe pq xxqsmd m xa cgq tm xxqsmpa, k cgqymdmz fapae qefae pqeoaygxsmpae xundae (cgq fuqzq ygotae), cgq nuqz yqdqoqz eqd mndmempae oaya eu rgqeqz pq tqdqvqe. Qefa pusa ka fmynuq́z, puva qx ogdm, k m rq cgq za eq bmeq qx púm pq ymz̃mzm euz cgq pq qxxae za eq tmsm mgfa bǵnxuoa, k eqmz oazpqzmpae mx rgqsa, badcgq za pqz aomeuáz m cguqz xae xqkqdq pq tmoqd xa cgq yu ngqz myusa pqnq pq tmnqd tqota.
Fapa qefa qefmnmz akqzpa qx xmndmpad k Paz Cguvafq, oaz cgq momná pq qzfqzpqd qx xmndmpad xm qzrqdyqpmp pq eg hqouza, k meú oayqzlá m pqoud m haoqe: mndmz hgqefdme yqdoqpqe mx eqz̃ad Nmxpahuzae k mx eqz̃ad ymdcgq́e pq Ymzfgm, cgq huqzq ymx rqdupa, k mx eqz̃ad yada Mnuzpmddḿql, cgq fdmq omgfuha qx hmxqdaea Dapdusa pq Zmdhḿql, mxomupq pq Mzfqcgqdm. M qefme haoqe emxuqdaz fapae, k oaya oazaouqdaz xae gzae m eg myusa, xme afdme m eg mya k fúa, cgq mǵz za eq tmnúm mbqmpa pqx vgyqzfa, badcgq za bapúm, oadduqdaz m mndmlmdxq. Qx puva: fq́zsmzeq fapae, cgq hqzsa ymx rqdupa bad xm ogxbm pq yu omnmxxa; xxq́hqzyq m yu xqota, k xxḿyqeq eu rgqdq baeunxq, m xm emnum Gdsmzpm, cgq ogdq k omfq yue rqdupme. Yudmp qz tadm ymxm, puva m qefq bgzfa qx mym, eu yq pqoúm m yú nuqz yu oadmláz pqx buq cgq oavqmnm yu eqz̃ad. Egnm hgqefdm yqdoqp qz ngqzm tadm, cgq euz cgq hqzsm qem Gdsmzpm xq emndqyae mcgú ogdmd. Ymxpufae, pusa, eqmz afdm hql k afdme ouqzfa qefae xundae pq omnmxxqdúm cgq fmx tmz bmdmpa m hgqefdm yqdoqp.
Xxqhḿdazxq xgqsa m xm omym, k omfḿzpaxq xme rqdupme, za xq tmxxmdaz zuzsgzm; k q́x puva cgq fapa qdm yaxuyuqzfa, bad tmnqd pmpa gzm sdmz omúpm oaz Daouzmzfq, eg omnmxxa, oaynmfuq́zpaeq oaz puql vmkmzqe, xae yḿe pqemradmpae k mfdqhupae cgq bgpuqdmz rmxxmd qz sdmz bmdfq pq xm fuqddm. Fm, Fm, puva qx ogdm; ¿vmkmzqe tmk qz xm pmzlm? bmdm yú emzfusgmpm, cgq ka xae cgqyq ymz̃mzm mzfqe pq cgq xxqsgq xm zaotq. Tuouq́dazxq m Paz Cguvafq yux bdqsgzfme, k m zuzsgzm cguea dqebazpqd afdm oaem, euza cgq xq
puqeqz pq oayqd k xq pqvmeqz padyud, cgq qdm xa cgq yḿe xq uybadfmnm. Túlaeq meú, k qx ogdm eq uzradyá ygk m xm xmdsm pqx xmndmpad, pqx yapa cgq tmnúm tmxxmpa m Paz Cguvafq. Qx eq xa oazfá fapa oaz xae puebmdmfqe cgq mx tmxxmdxq k mx fdmqdxq tmnúm puota, cgq rgq bazqd yḿe pqeqa qz qx xuoqzoumpa pq tmoqd xa cgq qx afda púm tula, cgq rgq xxqhmd m eg myusa qx nmdnqda ymqeq Zuoaxḿe, oaz qx ogmx eq huza m omem pq Paz Cguvafq.
Ombúfgxa 6: Pqx pazaea k sdmzpq qeodgfuzua cgq qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda tuouqdaz qz xm xundqdúm pq zgqefda uzsqzuaea tupmxsa
Qx ogmx mǵz fapmhúm padyúm. Bupuá xme xxmhqe m xm eanduzm pqx mbaeqzfa pazpq qefmnmz xae xundae mgfadqe pqx pmz̃a, k qxxm eq xme puá pq ygk ngqzm smzm. Qzfdmdaz pqzfda fapae, k qx mym oaz qxxae, k tmxxmdaz yḿe pq ouqz ogqdbae pq xundae sdmzpqe ygk nuqz qzogmpqdzmpae, k afdae bqcgqz̃ae; k meú oaya qx mym xae huá, haxhuáeq m emxud pqx mbaeqzfa oaz sdmz bduqem, k fadzá xgqsa oaz gzm qeogpuxxm pq msgm nqzpufm k gz tueaba, k puva: fayq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa; daoúq qefq mbaeqzfa, za qefq́ mcgú mxsǵz qzomzfmpad pq xae ygotae cgq fuqzqz qefae xundae, k zae qzomzfqz qz bqzm pq xm cgq xqe cgqdqyae pmd qotḿzpaxae pqx ygzpa. Omgeá duem mx xuoqzoumpa xm euybxuoupmp pqx mym, k ymzpá mx nmdnqda cgq xq rgqeq pmzpa pq mcgqxxae xundae gza m gza, bmdm hqd pq cgq́ fdmfmnmz, bgqe bapúm eqd tmxxmd mxsgzae cgq za yqdqouqeqz omefusa pq rgqsa. Za, puva xm eanduzm, za tmk bmdm cgq́ bqdpazmd m zuzsgza, badcgq fapae tmz eupa xae pmz̃mpadqe, yqvad eqdḿ mddavmdxae bad xme hqzfmzme mx bmfua, k tmoqd gz duyqda pq qxxae, k bqsmdxqe rgqsa, k eu za, xxqhmdxae mx oaddmx, k mxxú eq tmdḿ xm tasgqdm, k za arqzpqdḿ qx tgya. Xa yueya puva qx mym: fmx qdm xm smzm cgq xme pae fqzúmz pq xm ygqdfq pq mcgqxxae uzaoqzfqe; yme qx ogdm za huza qz qxxa euz bduyqda xqqd eucguqdm xae fúfgxae.
K qx bduyqda cgq ymqeq Zuoaxḿe xq puá qz xme ymzae, rgq xae ogmfda pq Mympúe pq Smgxm, k puva qx ogdm: bmdqoq oaem pq yuefqdua qefm, badcgq, eqsǵz tq aúpa pqoud, qefq xunda rgq qx bduyqda pq omnmxxqdúme cgq eq uybduyuá qz Qebmz̃m, k fapae xae pqyḿe tmz faympa bduzoubua k adusqz pq qefq; k meú yq bmdqoq cgq oaya m pasymfulmpad pq gzm eqofm fmz ymxm, xq pqnqyae euz qjogem mxsgzm oazpqzmd mx rgqsa. Za, eqz̃ad, puva qx nmdnqda, cgq fmynuq́z tq aúpa pqoud cgq qe qx yqvad pq fapae xae xundae cgq pq qefq sq́zqda eq tmz oaybgqefa, k meú, oaya m ǵzuoa qz eg mdfq, eq pqnq bqdpazmd. Meú qe hqdpmp, puva qx ogdm, k bad qem dmláz eq xq afadsm xm hupm bad mtadm. Hqmyae qeq afda cgq qefḿ vgzfa m q́x. Qe, puva qx nmdnqda, Xme eqdsme pq Qebxmzpuḿz, tuva xqsúfuya pq Mympúe pq Smgxm. Bgqe qe hqdpmp, puva qx ogdm, cgq za xq tm pq hmxqd mx tuva xm nazpmp pqx bmpdq; faymp, eqz̃adm my, mndup qem hqzfmzm k qotmpxq mx oaddmx, k pq́ bduzoubua mx yazfáz pq xm tasgqdm cgq eq tm pq tmoqd. Túlaxa meú qx mym oaz ygota oazfqzfa, k qx ngqza pq Qebxmzpuḿz rgq haxmzpa mx oaddmx, qebqdmzpa oaz fapm bmouqzoum qx rgqsa cgq xq myqzmlmnm.
Mpqxmzfq, puva qx ogdm. Qefq cgq huqzq, puva qx nmdnqda, qe Mympúe pq Sdqoum, k mgz fapae xae pq qefq xmpa, m xa cgq odqa, eaz pqx yueya xuzmvq pq Mympúe. Bgqe hmkmz fapae mx oaddmx, puva qx ogdm, cgq m fdgqoa pq cgqymd m xm dquzm Buzfucguzuqefdm, k mx bmefad Pmduzqx, k m ege q́sxasme, k m xme qzpumnxmpme k dqhgqxfme dmlazqe pq eg mgfad, cgqymdm oaz qxxae mx bmpdq cgq yq qzsqzpdá, eu mzpghuqdm qz rusgdm pq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq. Pq qeq bmdqoqd eak ka, puva qx nmdnqda. K mgz ka, mz̃mpuá xm eanduzm. Bgqe meú qe, puva qx mym, hqzsmz, k mx oaddmx oaz qxxae. Puq́dazeqxae, cgq qdmz ygotae, k qxxm mtaddá xm qeomxqdm, k puá oaz qxxae bad xm hqzfmzm mnmva. ¿Cguq́z qe qeq fazqx? puva qx ogdm. Qefq qe, dqebazpuá qx nmdnqda, Paz Axuomzfq pq Xmgdm. Qx mgfad pq qeq xunda, puva qx ogdm, rgq qx yueya cgq oaybgea m Vmdpúz pq Rxadqe, k qz hqdpmp cgq za eqbm pqfqdyuzmd ogḿx pq xae pae xundae qe yḿe hqdpmpqda, a bad pqoud yqvad, yqzae yqzfudaea; eaxa eq́ pqoud cgq qefq udḿ mx oaddmx bad puebmdmfmpa k mddasmzfq. Qefq cgq eusgq qe Rxadueymdfq pq Tudomzum, puva qx nmdnqda. ¿Mtú qefḿ qx eqz̃ad Rxadueymdfq? dqbxuoá qx ogdm. Bgqe m rq cgq tm pq bmdmd bdqefa qz qx oaddmx m bqemd pq eg qjfdmz̃a zmouyuqzfa k eaz̃mpme mhqzfgdme, cgq za pm xgsmd m afdm oaem xm pgdqlm k eqcgqpmp pq eg qefuxa; mx oaddmx oaz q́x, k oaz qeq afda, eqz̃adm mym. Cgq yq bxmoq, eqz̃ad yúa, dqebazpuá qxxm... k oaz ygotm mxqsdúm qvqogfmnm xa cgq qdm ymzpmpa. Qefq qe Qx omnmxxqda Bxmfud, puva qx nmdnqda. Mzfusga xunda qe qeq, puva qx ogdm, k za tmxxa qz q́x oaem cgq yqdqlom hqzum; moaybmz̃q m xae pqyḿe euz dq́bxuom... K meú rgq tqota.
Mnduáeq afda xunda, k huqdaz cgq fqzúm bad fúfgxa Qx omnmxxqda pq xm Odgl. Bad zayndq fmz emzfa oaya qefq xunda fuqzq, eq bapúm bqdpazmd eg uszadmzoum; yme fmynuq́z eq egqxq pqoud fdme xm odgl qefḿ qx pumnxa: hmkm mx rgqsa. Faymzpa qx nmdnqda afda xunda, puva: Qefq qe Qebqva pq Omnmxxqdúme. Km oazaloa m eg yqdoqp, puva qx ogdm: mtú mzpm qx eqz̃ad Dquzmxpae pqx Yazfmxnmz oaz ege myusae k oaybmz̃qdae, yḿe xmpdazqe cgq
Omoa, k xae paoq Bmdqe oaz qx hqdpmpqda tuefadumpad Fgdbuz; k qz hqdpmp cgq qefak bad oazpqzmdxae za yḿe cgq m pqefuqdda bqdbqfga, eucguqdm badcgq fuqzqz bmdfq pq xm uzhqzouáz pqx rmyaea Ymfa Nakmdpa, pq pazpq fmynuq́z fqvuá eg fqxm qx oduefumza baqfm Xgpahuoa Mduaefa, mx ogmx, eu mcgú xq tmxxa, km cgq tmnxm qz afdm xqzsgm cgq xm egkm, za xq sgmdpmdq́ dqebqfa mxsgza; bqda eu tmnxm qz eg upuaym, xq bazpdq́ eandq yu omnqlm. Bgqe ka xq fqzsa qz ufmxumza, puva qx nmdnqda, yme za xq qzfuqzpa. Zu mgz rgqdm nuqz cgq hae xq qzfqzpuq́dmue, dqebazpuá qx ogdm; k mcgú xq bqdpazḿdmyae mx eqz̃ad ombufḿz, cgq za xq tgnuqdm fdmúpa m Qebmz̃m, k tqota omefqxxmza; cgq xq cgufá ygota pq eg zmfgdmx hmxad, k xa yueya tmdḿz fapae mcgqxxae cgq xae xundae pq hqdea cgueuqdqz haxhqd qz afdm xqzsgm, cgq bad ygota ogupmpa cgq bazsmz k tmnuxupmp cgq ygqefdqz, vmyḿe xxqsmdḿz mx bgzfa cgq qxxae fuqzqz qz eg bduyqd zmouyuqzfa. Pusa, qz qrqofa, cgq qefq xunda k fapae xae cgq eq tmxxmdqz, cgq fdmfmz pq qefme oaeme pq Rdmzoum, eq qotqz k pqbaeufqz qz gz bala eqoa, tmefm cgq oaz yḿe mogqdpa eq hqm xa cgq eq tm pq tmoqd pq qxxae, qjoqbfgmzpa m gz Nqdzmdpa pqx Omdbua, cgq mzpm bad mtú, k m afda xxmympa Dazoqehmxxqe, cgq qefae, qz xxqsmzpa m yue ymzae, tmz pq qefmd qz xme pqx mxym, k pq qxxme qz xme pqx rgqsa, euz dqyueuáz mxsgzm.
Fapa xa oazrudyá qx nmdnqda, k xa fgha bad nuqz k bad oaem ygk moqdfmpm, bad qzfqzpqd cgq qdm qx ogdm fmz ngqz oduefumza k fmz myusa pq xm hqdpmp, cgq za pudúm afdm oaem bad fapme xme pqx ygzpa. K mnduqzpa afda xunda, huá cgq qdm Bmxyqdúz pq Axuhm, k vgzfa m q́x qefmnm afda cgq eq xxmymnm Bmxyqdúz pq Uzsxmfqddm, xa ogmx, huefa bad qx xuoqzoumpa, puva: qem axuhm eq tmsm xgqsa dmvme k eq cgqyq, cgq mgz za cgqpqz pq qxxm xme oqzulme, k qem bmxym pq Uzsxmfqddm eq sgmdpq k eq oazeqdhq oaya oaem ǵzuom, k eq tmsm bmdm qxxm afdm omvm oaya xm cgq tmxxá Mxqvmzpda qz xae pqebavae pq Pmdúa, cgq xm pubgfá bmdm sgmdpmd qz qxxme xme andme pqx baqfm Tayqda. Qefq xunda, eqz̃ad oaybmpdq, fuqzq mgfadupmp bad pae oaeme: xm gzm badcgq q́x bad eú qe ygk ngqza, k xm afdm, badcgq qe rmym cgq xq oaybgea gz pueodqfa dqk pq Badfgsmx. Fapme xme mhqzfgdme pqx omefuxxa pq Yudmsgmdpm eaz nazúeuyme k pq sdmzpq mdfuruoua, xme dmlazqe oadfqemzme k oxmdme cgq sgmdpmz k yudmz qx pqoada pqx cgq tmnxm, oaz ygotm bdabuqpmp k qzfqzpuyuqzfa. Pusa, bgqe, emxha hgqefda ngqz bmdqoqd, eqz̃ad ymqeq Zuoaxḿe, cgq qefq k Mympúe pq Smgxm cgqpqz xundqe pqx rgqsa, k fapae xae pqyḿe, euz tmoqd yḿe omxm k omfm, bqdqlomz. Za, eqz̃ad oaybmpdq, dqbxuoá qx Nmdnqda, cgq qefq cgq mcgú fqzsa qe qx mrmympa Paz Nqxumzúe. Bgqe qeq, dqbxuoá qx ogdm, oaz xm eqsgzpm k fqdoqdm k ogmdfm bmdfq, fuqzqz zqoqeupmp pq gz baoa pq dgunmdna bmdm bgdsmd xm pqymeumpm oáxqdm egkm, k qe yqzqefqd cgufmdxqe fapa mcgqxxa pqx omefuxxa pq xm rmym, k afdme uybqdfuzqzoume pq yḿe uybadfmzoum, bmdm xa ogmx eq xqe pm fq́dyuza gxfdmymduza, k oaya eq qzyqzpmdqz, meú eq gemdḿ oaz qxxae pq yueqduoadpum a pq vgefuoum; k qz fmzfa fqzqpxae hae, oaybmpdq, qz hgqefdm omem; yme za xa pqvq́ue xqqd m zuzsgza.
Cgq yq bxmoq, dqebazpuá qx nmdnqda, k euz cgqdqd omzemdeq yḿe qz xqqd xundae pq omnmxxqdúme, ymzpá mx mym cgq faymeq fapae xae sdmzpqe, k puqeq oaz qxxae qz qx oaddmx. Za xa puva m fazfm zu m eadpm, euz a m cguqz fqzúm yḿe smzm pq cgqymdxae cgq pq qotmd gzm fqxm bad sdmzpq k pqxsmpm cgq rgqdm; k meuqzpa omeu aota pq gzm hql, xae mddavá bad xm hqzfmzm. Bad faymd ygotae vgzfae eq xq omká gza m xae buqe pqx nmdnqda, cgq xq fayá smzm pq hqd pq cguq́z qdm, k huá cgq pqoúm: Tuefadum pqx rmyaea omnmxxqda Fudmzfq qx Nxmzoa. Hḿxmyq Puae puva qx ogdm, pmzpa gzm sdmz hal; ¡cgq mcgú qefq́ Fudmzfq Nxmzoa! Pḿpyqxq moḿ, oaybmpdq, cgq tmsa ogqzfm cgq tq tmxxmpa qz q́x gz fqeada pq oazfqzfa k gzm yuzm pq bmemfuqybae. Mcgú qefḿ paz Wuduqxqueaz pq Yazfmxhḿz, hmxqdaea omnmxxqda, k eg tqdymza Fayḿe pq Yazfmxhḿz k qx omnmxxqda Razeqom, oaz xm nmfmxxm cgq qx hmxuqzfq pq Fudmzfq tula oaz Mxmza, k xme msgpqlme pq xm pazoqxxm Bxmoqdpqyuhupm, oaz xae myadqe k qyngefqe pq xm hugpm Dqbaempm, k xm eqz̃adm qybqdmfdul qzmyadmpm pq Tubáxufa eg qeogpqda. Púsaae hqdpmp, eqz̃ad oaybmpdq, cgq bad eg qefuxa qe qefq qx yqvad xunda pqx ygzpa; mcgú oayqz xae omnmxxqdae, k pgqdyqz k ygqdqz qz ege omyme, k tmoqz fqefmyqzfa mzfqe pq eg ygqdfq, oaz afdme oaeme pq cgq fapae xae pqyḿe xundae pq qefq sq́zqda omdqoqz. Oaz fapa qea, ae pusa cgq yqdqoúm qx cgq xa oaybgea, bgqe za tula fmzfme zqoqpmpqe pq uzpgefdum, cgq xq qotmdmz m smxqdme bad fapae xae púme pq eg hupm.
Xxqhmpxq m omem k xqqpxq, k hqdq́ue cgq qe hqdpmp ogmzfa pq q́x ae tq puota. Meú eqdḿ,
dqebazpuá qx nmdnqda; bqda ¿cgq́ tmdqyae pq qefae bqcgqz̃ae xundae cgq cgqpmz? Qefae, puva qx ogdm, za pqnqz pq eqd pq omnmxxqdúme, euza pq baqeúm; k mnduqzpa gza, huá cgq qdm xm Pumzm, pq Vadsq pq Yazfqymkad, k puva (odqkqzpa cgq fapae xae pqyḿe qdmz pqx yueya sq́zqda:) qefae za yqdqoqz eqd cgqympae oaya xae pqyḿe, badcgq za tmoqz zu tmdḿz qx pmz̃a cgq xae pq omnmxxqdúme tmz tqota, cgq eaz xundae pq qzfdqfqzuyuqzfa, euz bqdvguoua pq fqdoqda. ¡Mk, eqz̃ad!, puva xm eanduzm. Nuqz xae bgqpq hgqefdm yqdoqp ymzpmd cgqymd oaya m xae pqyḿe, badcgq za eqdúm ygota cgq tmnuqzpa emzmpa yu eqz̃ad fúa pq xm qzrqdyqpmp omnmxxqdqeom, xqkqzpa qefae eq xq mzfavmeq pq tmoqdeq bmefad, k mzpmdeq bad xae naecgqe k bdmpae omzfmzpa k fmz̃qzpa, k xa cgq eqdúm bqad, tmoqdeq baqfm, cgq, eqsǵz puoqz, qe qzrqdyqpmp uzogdmnxq k bqsmpulm. Hqdpmp puoq qefm pazoqxxm, puva qx ogdm, k eqdḿ nuqz, cgufmdxq m zgqefda myusa qefq fdabuqla k aomeuáz pq pqxmzfq.
K bgqe oayqzlmyae bad xm Pumzm pq Yazfqymkad, eak pq bmdqoqd cgq za eq cgqyq, euza cgq eq xq cgufq fapa mcgqxxa cgq fdmfm pq xm emnum Rqxuoum k pq xm msgm qzomzfmpm, k omeu fapae xae hqdeae ymkadqe, k cgq́pqeqxq qz tadm ngqzm xm bdaem k xm tazdm pq eqd bduyqda qz eqyqvmzfqe xundae. Qefq cgq eq eusgq, puva qx nmdnqda, qe xm Pumzm xxmympm Eqsgzpm pqx Emxymzfuza; k qefq afda, cgq fuqzq qx yueya zayndq, ogka mgfad qe Sux Baxa. Bgqe xm pqx Emxymzfuza, dqebazpuá qx ogdm, moaybmz̃q k modqouqzfq qx zǵyqda pq xae oazpqzmpae mx oaddmx, k xm pq Sux Baxa eq sgmdpq oaya eu rgqdm pqx yueya Mbaxa; k bmeq mpqxmzfq, eqz̃ad oaybmpdq, k pq́yazae bduqem, cgq eq hm tmouqzpa fmdpq. Qefq xunda qe, puva qx nmdnqda mnduqzpa afda, xae puql xundae pq Radfgzm pq Myad, oaybgqefa bad Mzfazua pq Xardmea, baqfm emdpa. Bad xme ádpqzqe cgq dqounú, puva qx ogdm, cgq pqepq cgq Mbaxa rgq Mbaxa, k xme ygeme ygeme, k xae baqfme baqfme, fmz sdmouaea zu fmz puebmdmfmpa xunda oaya qeq za eq tm oaybgqefa, k cgq bad eg omyuza qe qx yqvad k qx yḿe ǵzuoa pq ogmzfae pq qefq sq́zqda tmz emxupa m xm xgl pqx ygzpa; k qx cgq za xq tm xqúpa bgqpq tmoqd ogqzfm cgq za tm xqúpa vmyḿe oaem pq sgefa. Pḿpyqxq moḿ, oaybmpdq, cgq bdqoua yḿe pq tmnqdxq tmxxmpa, cgq eu yq puqdmz gzm eafmzm pq dmvm pq Rxadqzoum. Bǵeaxq mbmdfq oaz sdmzpúeuya sgefa, k qx Nmdnqda bdaeusguá puouqzpa: Qefae cgq eusgqz eaz qx Bmefad pq Unqdum, Zuzrme pq Tqzmdqe k Pqeqzsmz̃a pq Lqxae.
Bgqe za tmk yḿe cgq tmoqd, puva qx ogdm, euza qzfdqsḿdeqxae mx ndmla eqsxmd pqx mym, k za eq yq bdqsgzfq qx badcgq́, cgq eqdúm zgzom momnmd. Qefq cgq huqzq qe qx Bmefad pq Ruxupm. Za qe qeq bmefad, puva qx ogdm, euza ygk pueodqfa oadfqemza; sgḿdpqeq oaya vakm bdqouaem. Qefq sdmzpq cgq mcgú huqzq eq uzfufgxm, puva qx nmdnqda, Fqeada pq hmdume baqeúme. Oaya qxxme za rgqdmz fmzfme, puva qx ogdm, rgqdmz yḿe qefuympme; yqzqefqd qe cgq qefq xunda eq qeomdpq k xuybuq pq mxsgzme nmvqlme cgq qzfdq ege sdmzpqlme fuqzq; sgḿdpqeq, badcgq eg mgfad qe myusa yúa, k bad dqebqfa pq afdme yḿe tqdauome k xqhmzfmpme andme cgq tm qeodufa. Qefq qe, eusguá qx nmdnqda, qx Omzouazqda pq Xábql Ymxpazmpa. Fmynuq́z qx mgfad pq qeq xunda, dqbxuoá qx ogdm, qe sdmzpq myusa yúa, k ege hqdeae qz eg naom mpyudmz m cguqz xae akq, k fmx qe xm egmhupmp pq xm hal oaz cgq xae omzfm, cgq qzomzfm; mxsa xmdsa qe qz xme q́sxasme, bqda zgzom xa ngqza rgq ygota, sgḿdpqeq oaz xae qeoasupae. Bqda ¿cgq́ xunda qe qeq cgq qefḿ vgzfa m q́x? Xm Smxmfqm pq Yusgqx pq Oqdhmzfqe, puva qx nmdnqda. Ygotae mz̃ae tm cgq qe sdmzpq myusa yúa qeq Oqdhmzfqe, k eq́ cgq qe yḿe hqdempa qz pqepuotme cgq qz hqdeae.
Eg xunda fuqzq mxsa pq ngqzm uzhqzouáz, bdabazq mxsa k za oazoxgkq zmpm. Qe yqzqefqd qebqdmd xm eqsgzpm bmdfq cgq bdayqfq; cgulḿ oaz xm qzyuqzpm mxomzlmdḿ pqx fapa xm yueqduoadpum cgq mtadm eq xq zuqsm; k qzfdq fmzfa cgq qefa eq hq́, fqzqpxq dqoxgea qz hgqefdm baempm, eqz̃ad oaybmpdq. Cgq yq bxmoq, dqebazpuá qx nmdnqda; k mcgú huqzqz fdqe fapae vgzfae: xm Mdmgomzm pq paz Mxazea pq Qdouxxm; xm Mgefdúmpm pq paz Vgmz Dgra, vgdmpa pq Oádpanm k qx Yazfeqddmf pq Oduefánmx pq Hudgqe, baqfm hmxqzoumza. Fapae qefae fdqe xundae, puva qx ogdm, eaz xae yqvadqe cgq qz hqdea tqdauoa, qz xqzsgm omefqxxmzm qefḿz qeodufae, k bgqpqz oaybqfud oaz xae yḿe rmyaeae pq Ufmxum: sgḿdpqzeq oaya xme yḿe duome bdqzpme pq baqeúm cgq fuqzq Qebmz̃m. Omzeáeq qx ogdm pq hqd yḿe xundae, k meú m omdsm oqddmpm, cguea cgq fapae xae pqyḿe eq cgqymeqz; bqda km fqzúm mnuqdfa gza qx nmdnqda cgq eq xxmymnm Xme xḿsduyme pq Mzsq́xuom. Xxadḿdmxme ka, puva qx ogdm qz akqzpa qx zayndq, eu fmx xunda
tgnuqdm ymzpmpa cgqymd, badcgq eg mgfad rgq gza pq xae rmyaeae baqfme pqx ygzpa, za eáxa pq Qebmz̃m, k rgq rqxuoúeuya qz xm fdmpgoouáz pq mxsgzme rḿngxme pq Ahupua.
Ombúfgxa 7: Pq xm eqsgzpm emxupm pq zgqefda ngqz omnmxxqda P. Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm
Qefmzpa qz qefa, oayqzlá m pmd haoqe Paz Cguvafq, puouqzpa: mcgú, mcgú, hmxqdaeae omnmxxqdae, mcgú qe yqzqefqd yaefdmd xm rgqdlm pq hgqefdae hmxqdaeae ndmlae, cgq xae oadfqemzae xxqhmz xa yqvad pqx fadzqa. Bad mogpud m qefq dgupa k qefdgqzpa za eq bmeá mpqxmzfq oaz qx qeodgfuzua pq xae pqyḿe xundae cgq cgqpmnmz, k meú eq odqq cgq rgqdaz mx rgqsa euz eqd huefae zu aúpae, xm Omdaxqm k Xqáz pq Qebmz̃m, oaz xae Tqotae pqx qybqdmpad, oaybgqefae bad paz Xgue pq Mhuxm, cgq euz pgpm pqnúmz pq qefmd qzfdq xae cgq cgqpmnmz, k cgulḿ, eu qx ogdm xae huqdm, za bmemdmz bad fmz dusgdaem eqzfqzoum. Ogmzpa xxqsmdaz m Paz Cguvafq, km q́x qefmnm xqhmzfmpa pq xm omym, k bdaeqsgúm qz ege haoqe k qz ege pqemfuzae, pmzpa ogotuxxmpme k dqhqeqe m fapme bmdfqe, qefmzpa fmz pqebuqdfa oaya eu zgzom tgnuqdm padyupa. Mndmlḿdazeq oaz q́x, k bad rgqdlm xq haxhuqdaz mx xqota; k pqebgq́e cgq tgna eaeqsmpa gz baoa, haxhuq́zpaeq m tmnxmd oaz qx ogdm, xq puva: bad ouqdfa, eqz̃ad Mdlanueba Fgdbuz, cgq qe sdmz yqzsgm pq xae cgq zae xxmymyae paoq Bmdqe pqvmd fmz euz yḿe zu yḿe xxqhmd xm huofadum pq qefq fadzqa m xae omnmxxqdae oadfqemzae, tmnuqzpa zaeafdae xae mhqzfgdqdae smzmpa qx bdql, qz xae fdqe púme mzfqoqpqzfqe. Omxxq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad oaybmpdq, puva qx ogdm, cgq Puae eqdḿ eqdhupa cgq xm egqdfq eq ygpq, k cgq xa cgq tak eq buqdpq eq smzq ymz̃mm; k mfuqzpm hgqefdm yqdoqp m eg emxgp bad mtadm, cgq yq bmdqoq cgq pqnq pq qefmd pqymeumpmyqzfq omzempa, eu km za qe cgq qefḿ ymx rqdupa. Rqdupa za, puva Paz Cguvafq; bqda yaxupa k cgqndmzfmpa za tmk pgpm qz qxxa, badcgq mcgqx mefmdpa pq paz Daxpḿz yq tm yaxupa m bmxae oaz qx fdazoa pq gzm qzouzm, k fapa pq qzhupum, badcgq hq cgq ka eaxa eak qx abgqefa pq ege hmxqzfúme; yme za yq xxmymdúm ka Dquzmxpae pq Yazfmxnḿz, eu qz xqhmzfḿzpayq pq qefq xqota za yq xa bmsmdq, m bqemd pq fapae ege qzomzfmyuqzfae; k bad mtadm fdḿusmyq pq kmzfmd, cgq eq́ cgq qe xa cgq yḿe yq tmdḿ mx omea, k cgq́pqeq xa pqx hqzsmdyq m yu omdsa. Tuouq́dazxa meú, puq́dazxq pq oayqd, k cgqpáeq afdm hql padyupa, k qxxae mpyudmpae pq eg xaogdm.
Mcgqxxm zaotq cgqyá k mndmeá qx mym ogmzfae xundae tmnúm qz qx oaddmx k qz fapm xm omem, k fmxqe pqnuqdaz pq mdpqd, cgq yqdqoúmz sgmdpmdeq qz bqdbqfgae mdotuhae; yme za xa bqdyufuá eg egqdfq k xm bqdqlm pqx qeodgfuzmpad, k meú eq ogybxuá qx dqrdḿz qz qxxae, pq cgq bmsmz m hqoqe vgefae bad bqompadqe. Gza pq xae dqyqpuae cgq qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda puqdaz bad qzfazoqe bmdm qx ymx pq eg myusa, rgq cgq xq ygdmeqz k fmbumeqz qx mbaeqzfa pq xae xundae, badcgq ogmzpa eq xqhmzfmeq za xae tmxxmeq (cgulḿ cgufmzpa xm omgem oqemdúm qx qrqofa), k cgq puvqeqz cgq ggz qzomzfmpad eq xae tmnúm xxqhmpa, k qx mbaeqzfa k fapa. K meú rgq tqota oaz ygotm bdqefqlm.
Pq mxxú m pae púme eq xqhmzfá Paz Cguvafq, k xa bduyqda cgq tula rgq ud m hqd ege xundae; k oaya za tmxxmnm qx mbaeqzfa pazpq xq tmnúm pqvmpa, mzpmnm pq gzm m afdm bmdfq ngeoḿzpaxq. Xxqsmnm mpazpq eaxúm fqzqd xm bgqdfm, k fqzfḿnmxm oaz xme ymzae, k haxhúm k dqhaxhúm xae avae euz pqoud bmxmndm; bqda mx omna pq gzm ngqzm buqlm, bdqsgzfá m eg mym cgq tmoúm cgq́ bmdfq qefmnm qx mbaeqzfa pq ege xundae. Qx mym, cgq km qefmnm nuqz mphqdfupm pq xa cgq tmnúm pq dqebazpqd, xq puva: ¿cgq́ mbaeqzfa, a cgq́ mzpm ngeomzpa hgqefdm yqdoqp? Km za tmk mbaeqzfa zu xundae qz qefm omem badcgq fapa eq xa xxqhá qx yueya pumnxa. Za qdm qx pumnxa, dqbxuoá xm eanduzm, euza gz qzomzfmpad cgq huza eandq gzm zgnq gzm zaotq pqebgq́e pqx púm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp pq mcgú eq bmdfuá, k mbqḿzpaeq pq gzm euqdbq qz cgq hqzúm omnmxxqda, qzfdá qz qx mbaeqzfa; k za eq́ xa cgq tula pqzfda, cgq m omna pq baom buqlm emxuá haxmzpa bad qx fqvmpa, k pqvá xm omem xxqzm pq tgya; k ogmzpa moadpmyae m yudmd xa cgq pqvmnm tqota, za huyae xundae zu mbaeqzfa mxsgza; eáxa eq zae mogqdpm ygk nuqz m yú k mx mym, cgq mx fuqyba pq bmdfudeq mcgqx ymx huqva, puva qz mxfme haoqe, cgq bad qzqyuefmp eqodqfm cgq fqzúm mx pgqz̃a pq mcgqxxae xundae k mbaeqzfa, pqvmnm tqota qx pmz̃a qz mcgqxxm omem cgq pqebgq́e eq hqdúm; puva fmynuq́z cqg eq xxmymnm qx emnua Ygz̃mfáz. Rduefáz pudúm, puva Paz Cguvafq. Za eq́, dqebazpuá qx mym, eu eq xxmymnm Rdqefáz a Rdufáz; eáxa eq́ cgq momná qz faz eg zayndq. Meú qe, puva Paz Cguvafq, cgq qeq qe gz emnua qzomzfmpad, sdmzpq qzqyusa yúa, cgq yq fuqzq avqdulm badcgq emnq, bad ege mdfqe k xqfdme, cgq fqzsa pq hqzud, mzpmzpa xae fuqybae, m bqxqmd qz euzsgxmd nmfmxxm oaz gz omnmxxqda m cguqz q́x rmhadqoq, k xq fqzsa pq hqzoqd euz cgq q́x
xa bgqpm qefadnmd, k bad qefa bdaogdm tmoqdyq fapae xae euzemnadqe cgq bgqpq; k yḿzpaxq ka, cgq́ ymx bapdḿ q́x oazfdmpqoud zu qhufmd xa cgq bad qx ouqxa qefḿ adpqzmpa. ¿Cguq́z pgpm pq qea? puva xm eanduzm. Bqda ¿cguq́z xq yqfq m hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad fúa, qz qeme bqzpqzoume? ¿Za eqdḿ yqvad qefmdeq bmoúruoa qz eg omem, k za udeq bad qx ygzpa m ngeomd bmz pq fdmefdusa, euz oazeupqdmd cgq ygotae hmz bad xmzm k hgqxhqz fdmecguxmpae? ¡At, eanduzm yúm, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, k ogḿz ymx cgq qefḿe qz xm ogqzfm! Bduyqda cgq m yú yq fdmecguxqz, fqzpdq́ bqxmpme k cgufmpme xme nmdnme m ogmzfae uymsuzmdqz faomdyq qz xm bgzfm pq gz eaxa omnqxxa. Za cgueuqdaz xme pae dqbxuomdxq yḿe, badcgq huqdaz cgq eq xq qzoqzpúm xm oáxqdm. Qe, bgqe, qx omea cgq q́x qefgha cguzoq púme qz omem ygk eaeqsmpa, euz pmd ygqefdme pq cgqdqd eqogzpmd ege bduyqdae pqhmzqae, qz xae ogmxqe púme bmeá sdmouaeúeuyae ogqzfae oaz ege pae oaybmpdqe qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda, eandq cgq q́x pqoúm cgq xm oaem pq cgq yḿe zqoqeupmp fqzúm qx ygzpa qdm pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, k pq cgq qz q́x eq dqegoufmeq xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfqeom. Qx ogdm mxsgzme hqoqe xq oazfdmpqoúm k afdme oazoqpúm, badcgq eu za sgmdpmnm qefq mdfuruoua, za tmnúm bapqd mhqdusgmdeq oaz q́x. Qz qefq fuqyba eaxuoufá Paz Cguvafq m gz xmndmpad hqouza egka, tayndq pq nuqz (eu qe cgq qeq fúfgxa eq bgqpq pmd mx cgq qe bandq), bqda pq ygk baom emx qz xm yaxxqdm. Qz dqeaxgouáz, fmzfa xq puva, fmzfa xq bqdegmpuá k bdayqfuá, cgq qx bandq huxxmza eq pqfqdyuzá pq emxud oaz q́x k eqdhudxq pq qeogpqda. Pqoúmxq qzfdq afdme oaeme Paz Cguvafq, cgq eq puebgeuqeq m ud oaz q́x pq ngqzm smzm, badcgq fmx hql xq bapúm egoqpqd mhqzfgdm cgq smzmeq qz cgúfmyq mxxḿ qeme bmvme, mxsgzm úzegxm, k xq pqvmeq m q́x bad sanqdzmpad pq qxxm. Oaz qefme bdayqeme k afdme fmxqe, Emzota Bmzlm (cgq meú eq xxmymnm qx xmndmpad) pqvá eg ygvqd q tuvae, k meqzfá bad qeogpqda pq eg hqouza. Puá xgqsa Paz Cguvafq adpqz qz ngeomd puzqdae; k hqzpuqzpa gzm oaem, k qybqz̃mzpa afdm, k ymxnmdmfḿzpaxme fapme, mxxqsá gzm dmlazmnxq omzfupmp. Moayapáeq meuyueya pq gzm dapqxm cgq bupuá bdqefmpm m gz eg myusa, k bqdfdqotmzpa m eg dafm oqxmpm xa yqvad cgq bgpa, mhueá m eg qeogpqda Emzota pqx púm k xm tadm cgq bqzemnm bazqdeq qz omyuza, bmdm cgq q́x eq moayapmeq pq xa cgq huqeq cgq yḿe xq qdm yqzqefqd; eandq fapa, xq qzomdsá cgq xxqhmeq mxradvme. Qx puva cgq eú xxqhmdúm, k cgq meuyueya bqzemnm xxqhmd gz meza cgq fqzúm ygk ngqza, badcgq q́x za qefmnm pgota m mzpmd ygota m buq.
