Qz xa pqx meza dqbmdá gz baoa Paz Cguvafq, uymsuzmzpa eu eq xq moadpmnm eu mxsǵz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq tmnúm fdmupa qeogpqda omnmxxqda mezmxyqzfq; bqda zgzom xq huza mxsgza m xm yqyadum; yme oaz fapa qefa, pqfqdyuzá cgq xq xxqhmeq, oaz bdqegbgqefa pq moayapmdxq pq yḿe tazdmpm omnmxxqdúm qz tmnuqzpa aomeuáz bmdm qxxa, cgufḿzpaxq qx omnmxxa mx bduyqd pqeoadfq́e omnmxxqda cgq fabmeq. Bdahqkáeq pq omyueme k pq xme pqyḿe oaeme cgq q́x bgpa, oazradyq mx oazeqva cgq qx hqzfqda xq tmnúm pmpa.
Fapa xa ogmx tqota k ogybxupa, euz pqebqpudeq Bmzlm pq ege tuvae k ygvqd, zu Paz Cguvafq pq eg mym k eanduzm, gzm zaotq eq emxuqdaz pqx xgsmd euz cgq bqdeazm xae huqeq, qz xm ogmx omyuzmdaz fmzfa, cgq mx mymzqoqd eq fghuqdaz bad eqsgdae pq cgq za xae tmxxmdúmz mgzcgq xqe ngeomeqz. Unm Emzota Bmzlm eandq eg vgyqzfa oaya gz bmfdumdom, oaz ege mxradvme k eg nafm, k oaz ygota pqeqa pq hqdeq km sanqdzmpad pq xm úzegxm cgq eg mya xq tmnúm bdayqfupa. Moqdfá Paz Cguvafq m faymd xm yueym pqddafm k omyuza cgq qx cgq q́x tmnúm mzfqe faympa qz eg bduyqd humvq, cgq rgq bad qx Omyba pq Yazfuqx, bad qx ogmx omyuzmnm oaz yqzae bqempgyndq cgq xm hql bmempm, badcgq bad eqd xm tadm pq xmymz̃mzm k tqdudxqe m eaexmka xae dmkae pqx eax, za xqe rmfusmnmz. Puva qz qefa Emzota Bmzlm m eg mya: yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq za eq xq axhupq xa cgq pq xm úzegxm yq fuqzq bdayqfupa, cgq ka xm emndq́ sanqdzmd bad sdmzpq cgq eqm. M xa ogmx xq dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq: tme pq emnqd, myusa Emzota Bmzlm, cgq rgq oaefgyndq ygk gempm pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe mzfusgae tmoqd sanqdzmpadqe m ege qeogpqdae pq xme úzegxme a dquzae cgq smzmnmz; k ka fqzsa pqfqdyuzmpa pq cgq bad yú za rmxfq fmz msdmpqoupm gemzlm; mzfqe buqzea mhqzfmvmdyq qz qxxm, badcgq qxxae mxsgzme hqoqe, k cgulḿ xme yḿe, qebqdmnmz m cgq ege qeogpqdae rgqeqz huqvae, k km pqebgq́e pq tmdfae pq eqdhud, k pq xxqhmd ymxae púme k bqadqe zaotqe, xqe pmnmz mxsǵz fúfgxa pq oazpq; a bad xa yqzae pq ymdcgq́e pq mxsǵz hmxxq a bdahuzoum pq baoa yḿe a yqzae; bqda eu fǵ huhqe k ka huha, nuqz bapdúm eqd cgq mzfqe pq eque púme smzmeq ka fmx dquza, cgq
fghuqeq afdae m q́x mptqdqzfqe, cgq huzuqeqz pq yaxpq bmdm oadazmdfq bad dqk pq gza pq qxxae. K za xa fqzsme m ygota, cgq oaeme k omeae moazfqoqz m xae fmxqe omnmxxqdae, bad yapae fmz zgzom huefae zu bqzempae, cgq oaz rmouxupmp fq bapdúm pmd mǵz yḿe pq xa cgq fq bdayqfa. Pq qem ymzqdm, dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm, eu ka rgqeq dqk bad mxsǵz yuxmsda pq xae cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq, bad xa yqzae Vgmzm Sgfuq́ddql, yu auexa, hqzpdúm m eqd dquzm k yue tuvae uzrmzfqe. ¿Bgqe cguq́z xa pgpm? dqebazpuáz Paz Cguvafq. Ka xa pgpa, dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm, badcgq fqzsa bmdm yú cgq mgzcgq xxahuqeq Puae dquzae eandq xm fuqddm, zuzsgza meqzfmdúm nuqz eandq xm omnqlm pq Ymdu Sgfuq́ddql. Eqbm, eqz̃ad, cgq za hmxq pae ymdmhqpúe bmdm dquzm; oazpqem xq omqdḿ yqvad, k mǵz Puae k mkgpm. Qzoayuq́zpmxa fǵ m Puae, Emzota, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq q́x xq pmdḿ xa cgq yḿe xq oazhqzfm; bqda za mbacgqe fg ḿzuya fmzfa cgq fq hqzsme m oazfqzfmd oaz yqzae cgq oaz eqd mpqxmzfmpa. Za tmdq́, eqz̃ad yúa, dqebazpuá Emzota, k yḿe fqzuqzpa fmz bduzoubmx mya qz hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq yq emndḿ pmd fapa mcgqxxa cgq yq qefq́ nuqz k ka bgqpm xxqhmd.
Ombúfgxa 8: Pqx ngqz egoqea cgq qx hmxqdaea Paz Cguvafq fgha qz xm qebmzfmnxq k vmyḿe uymsuzmpm mhqzfgdm pq xae yaxuzae pq huqzfa, oaz afdae egoqeae puszae pq rqxuoq dqoadpmouáz
Qz qefa pqeognduqdaz fdquzfm a ogmdqzfm yaxuzae pq huqzfa cgq tmk qz mcgqx omyba, k meú oaya Paz Cguvafq xae huá, puva m eg qeogpqda: xm hqzfgdm hm sgumzpa zgqefdme oaeme yqvad pq xa cgq moqdfḿdmyae m pqeqmd; badcgq hqe mxxú, myusa Emzota Bmzlm, pazpq eq pqeogndqz fdquzfm a baoa yḿe pqemradmpae susmzfqe oaz cguqz buqzea tmoqd nmfmxxm, k cgufmdxqe m fapae xme hupme, oaz ogkae pqebavae oayqzlmdqyae m qzducgqoqd: cgq qefm qe ngqzm sgqddm, k qe sdmz eqdhuoua pq Puae cgufmd fmz ymxm euyuqzfq pq eandq xm rml pq xm fuqddm. ¿Cgq́ susmzfqe? puva Emzota Bmzlm. Mcgqxxae cgq mxxú hqe, dqebazpuá eg mya, pq xae ndmlae xmdsae, cgq xae egqxqz fqzqd mxsgzae pq omeu pae xqsgme. Yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp, dqebazpuá Emzota, cgq mcgqxxae cgq mxxú eq bmdqoqz za eaz susmzfqe, euza yaxuzae pq huqzfa, k xa cgq qz qxxae bmdqoqz ndmlae eaz xme mebme, cgq haxfqmpme pqx huqzfa tmoqz mzpmd xm buqpdm pqx yaxuza. Nuqz bmdqoq, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq za qefḿe ogdempa qz qefa pq xme mhqzfgdme; qxxae eaz susmzfqe, k eu fuqzqe yuqpa cgúfmfq pq mtú, k bazfq qz admouáz qz qx qebmoua cgq ka hak m qzfdmd oaz qxxae qz ruqdm k pqeusgmx nmfmxxm. K puouqzpa qefa, pua pq qebgqxme m eg omnmxxa Daouzmzfq, euz mfqzpqd m xme haoqe cgq eg qeogpqda Emzota xq pmnm, mphudfuq́zpaxq cgq euz pgpm mxsgzm qdmz yaxuzae pq huqzfa, k za susmzfqe mcgqxxae cgq unm m moayqfqd. Bqda q́x unm fmz bgqefa qz cgq qdmz susmzfqe, cgq zu aúm xme haoqe pq eg qeogpqda Emzota, zu qotmnm pq hqd, mgzcgq qefmnm km nuqz oqdom, xa cgq qdmz; mzfqe unm puouqzpa qz haoqe mxfme: zaz rgkmpqe, oanmdpqe k huxqe odumfgdme, cgq gz eaxa omnmxxqda qe qx cgq ae moayqfq. Xqhmzfáeq qz qefa gz baoa pq huqzfa k xme sdmzpqe mebme oayqzlmdaz m yahqdeq, xa ogmx huefa bad Paz Cguvafq, puva: bgqe mgzcgq yahḿue yḿe ndmlae cgq xae pqx susmzfq Ndumdqa, yq xa tmnq́ue pq bmsmd.
K qz puouqzpa qefa, k qzoayqzpḿzpaeq pq fapa oadmláz m eg eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, bupuq́zpaxq cgq qz fmx fdmzoq xq eaoadduqeq, nuqz ognuqdfa pq eg dapqxm, oaz xm xmzlm qz duefdq, mddqyqfuá m fapa qx smxabq pq Daouzmzfq, k qynuefuá oaz qx bduyqd yaxuza cgq qefmnm pqxmzfq; k pḿzpaxq gzm xmzlmpm qz qx mebm, xm haxhuá qx huqzfa oaz fmzfm rgdum, cgq tula xm xmzlm bqpmlae, xxqhḿzpaeq fdme eú mx omnmxxa k mx omnmxxqda, cgq rgq dapmzpa ygk ymxfdqota bad qx omyba. Mogpuá Emzota Bmzlm m eaoaddqdxq m fapa qx oaddqd pq eg meza, k ogmzpa xxqsá, tmxxá cgq za eq bapúm yqzqmd, fmx rgq qx saxbq cgq pua oaz q́x Daouzmzfq. ¡Hḿxmyq Puae! puva Emzota; ¿za xq puvq ka m hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq yudmeq nuqz xa cgq tmoúm, cgq za qdmz euza yaxuzae pq huqzfa, k za xae bapúm uszadmd euza cguqz xxqhmeq afdae fmxqe qz xm omnqlm? Omxxm, myusa Emzota, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq xme oaeme pq xm sgqddm, yḿe cgq afdme, qefḿz egvqfme m oazfuzgm ygpmzlm, ogmzfa yḿe cgq ka buqzea, k qe meú hqdpmp, cgq mcgqx emnua Rdqefáz, cgq yq daná qx mbaeqzfa k xae xundae, tm hgqxfa qefae susmzfqe qz yaxuzae bad cgufmdyq xm sxadum pq eg hqzouyuqzfa: fmx qe xm qzqyuefmp cgq yq fuqzq; yme mx omna mx omna tmz pq bapqd baoa ege ymxme mdfqe oazfdm xm haxgzfmp pq yu qebmpm. Puae xa tmsm oaya bgqpq, dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm. K mkgpḿzpaxq m xqhmzfmd, fadzá m egnud eandq Daouzmzfq, cgq yqpua pqebmxpmpa qefmnm; k tmnxmzpa qz xm bmempm mhqzfgdm, eusguqdaz qx omyuza pqx bgqdfa Xḿbuoq, badcgq mxxú pqoúm Paz Cguvafq cgq za qdm baeunxq pqvmd pq tmxxmdeq ygotme k puhqdeme mhqzfgdme, bad eqd xgsmd ygk bmemvqda; euza cgq unm ygk bqemdaea bad tmnqdxq rmxfmpa xm xmzlm k puouq́zpaeqxa m eg qeogpqda, puva: ka yq mogqdpa tmnqd xqúpa cgq gz omnmxxqda qebmz̃ax, xxmympa Puqsa Bq́dql pq Hmdsme, tmnuq́zpaeqxq qz gzm nmfmxxm dafa xm qebmpm, pqesmvá pq gzm qzouzm gz bqempa dmya a fdazoa, k oaz q́x tula fmxqe oaeme mcgqx púm, k ymotmoá fmzfae yadae, cgq xq cgqpá bad eandqzayndq Ymotgom, k meú q́x, oaya ege pqeoqzpuqzfqe, eq xxmymdaz pqepq mcgqx púm qz mpqxmzfq Hmdsme k Ymotgom. Tqfq puota qefa, badcgq pq xm bduyqdm qzouzm a danxq cgq eq yq pqbmdq, buqzea pqesmvmd afda fdazoa fmx k ngqza oaya mcgqx, cgq yq uymsuza k buqzea tmoqd oaz q́x fmxqe tmlmz̃me, cgq fǵ fq fqzsme bad nuqz mradfgzmpa pq tmnqd yqdqoupa hqzud m hqdxme, k meqd fqefusa pq oaeme cgq mbqzme bapdḿz eqd odqúpme. M xm ymza pq Puae, puva Emzota, ka xa odqa fapa meú oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp xa puoq; bqda qzpqdq́oqeq gz baoa, cgq bmdqoq cgq hm pq yqpua xmpa, k pqnq pq eqd pqx yaxuyuqzfa pq xm omúpm. Meú qe
xm hqdpmp, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq; k eu za yq cgqva pqx paxad, qe badcgq za qe pmpa m xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe cgqvmdeq pq tqdupm mxsgzm, mgzcgq eq xq emxsmz xme fdubme bad qxxm. Eu qea qe meú, za fqzsa ka cgq dqbxuomd, dqebazpuá Emzota; bqda emnq Puae eu ka yq taxsmdm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp eq cgqvmdm ogmzpa mxsgzm oaem xq paxuqdm. Pq yú eq́ pqoud, cgq yq tq pq cgqvmd pqx yḿe bqcgqz̃a paxad cgq fqzsm, eu km za eq qzfuqzpq fmynuq́z oaz xae qeogpqdae pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe qea pqx za cgqvmdeq. Za eq pqvá pq dqúd Paz Cguvafq pq xm euybxuoupmp pq eg qeogpqda; k meú xq pqoxmdá cgq bapúm ygk nuqz cgqvmdeq, oaya k ogmzpa cgueuqeq, euz smzm a oaz qxxm, cgq tmefm qzfazoqe za tmnúm xqúpa oaem qz oazfdmdua qz xm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm. Púvaxq Emzota cgq yudmeq cgq qdm tadm pq oayqd. Dqebazpuáxq eg mya cgq bad qzfazoqe za xq tmoúm yqzqefqd; cgq oayuqeq q́x ogmzpa eq xq mzfavmeq. Oaz qefm xuoqzoum eq moayapá Emzota xa yqvad cgq bgpa eandq eg vgyqzfa, k emomzpa pq xme mxradvme xa cgq qz qxxme tmnúm bgqefa, unm omyuzmzpa k oayuqzpa pqfdḿe pq eg mya ygk pqebmoua, k pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa qybuzmnm xm nafm oaz fmzfa sgefa, cgq xq bgpuqdm qzhupumd qx yḿe dqsmxmpa napqsazqda pq Yḿxmsm. K qz fmzfa cgq q́x unm pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm yqzgpqmzpa fdmsae, za eq xq moadpmnm pq zuzsgzm bdayqem cgq eg mya xq tgnuqeq tqota, zu fqzúm bad zuzsǵz fdmnmva, euza bad ygota pqeomzea, mzpmd ngeomzpa xme mhqzfgdme bad bqxusdaeme cgq rgqeqz. Qz dqeaxgouáz, mcgqxxm zaotq xm bmemdaz qzfdq gzae ḿdnaxqe, k pqx gza pq qxxae pqesmvá Paz Cguvafq gz dmya eqoa, cgq omeu xq bapúm eqdhud pq xmzlm, k bgea qz q́x qx tuqdda cgq cgufá pq xm cgq eq xq tmnúm cgqndmpa. Fapm mcgqxxm zaotq za pgdyuá Paz Cguvafq, bqzemzpa qz eg eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, bad moayapmdeq m xa cgq tmnúm xqúpa qz ege xundae, ogmzpa xae omnmxxqdae bmemnmz euz padyud ygotme zaotqe qz xme rxadqefme k pqebanxmpae, qzfdqfqzupae qz xme yqyadume pq ege eqz̃adme.
Za xm bmeá meú Emzota Bmzlm, cgq oaya fqzúm qx qefáymsa xxqza, k za pq msgm pq otuoadum, pq gz egqz̃a eq xm xxqhá fapm, k za rgqdmz bmdfq bmdm pqebqdfmdxq, eu eg mya za xq xxmymdm, xae dmkae pqx eax cgq xq pmnmz qz qx daefda, zu qx omzfa pq xme mhqe, cgq ygotme k ygk dqsaouvmpmyqzfq xm hqzupm pqx zgqha púm emxgpmnmz. Mx xqhmzfmdeq pua gz fuqzfa m xm nafm, k tmxxáxm mxsa yḿe rxmom cgq xm zaotq mzfqe, k mrxusuáeqxq qx oadmláz bad bmdqoqdxq cgq za xxqhmnmz omyuza pq dqyqpumd fmz bdqefa eg rmxfm. Za cguea pqemkgzmdeq Paz Cguvafq badcgq oaya qefḿ puota, pua qz egefqzfmdeq pq emndaeme yqyadume.
Fadzmdaz m eg oayqzlmpa omyuza pqx bgqdfa Xḿbuoq, k m tadm pq xme fdqe pqx púm xq pqeognduqdaz. Mcgú, puva qz huq́zpaxq Paz Cguvafq, bapqyae, tqdymza Emzota Bmzlm, yqfqd xme ymzae tmefm xae oapae qz qefa cgq xxmymz mhqzfgdme, yme mphuqdfq cgq, mgzcgq yq hqme qz xae ymkadqe bqxusdae pqx ygzpa, za tme pq bazqd ymza m fg qebmpm bmdm pqrqzpqdyq, eu km za huqdqe cgq xae cgq yq arqzpqz qe omzmxxm k sqzfq nmvm, cgq qz fmx omea nuqz bgqpqe mkgpmdyq; bqda eu rgqdqz omnmxxqdae, qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm fq qe xúoufa zu oazoqpupa bad xme xqkqe pq omnmxxqdúm cgq yq mkgpqe, tmefm cgq eqme mdympa omnmxxqda. Bad ouqdfa, eqz̃ad, dqebazpuá Emzota, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp eqdḿ ygk nuqz anqpqoupa qz qefa, k yḿe cgq ka pq yúa yq eak bmoúruoa k qzqyusa pq yqfqdyq qz dgupae k bqzpqzoume; nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq qz xa cgq faomdq m pqrqzpqd yu bqdeazm za fqzpdq́ ygotm ogqzfm oaz qeme xqkqe, bgqe xme puhuzme k tgymzme bqdyufqz cgq ompm gza eq pqruqzpm pq cguqz cgueuqdq msdmhumdxq. Za pusa ka yqzae, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq; bqda qz qefa pq mkgpmdyq oazfdm omnmxxqdae, tme pq fqzqd m dmkm fge zmfgdmxqe úybqfge. Pusa cgq eú xa tmdq́, dqebazpuá Emzota, k cgq sgmdpmdq́ qeq bdqoqbfa fmz nuqz oaya qx púm pqx payuzsa. Qefmzpa qz qefme dmlazqe, meaymdaz bad qx omyuza pae rdmuxqe pq xm adpqz pq Emz Nqzufa, omnmxxqdae eandq pae pdayqpmduae, cgq za qdmz yḿe bqcgqz̃me pae ygxme qz cgq hqzúmz. Fdmúmz ege mzfqavae pq omyuza k ege cgufmeaxqe. Pqfdḿe pq qxxae hqzúm gz oaotq oaz ogmfda a ouzoa pq m omnmxxa cgq xqe moaybmz̃mnmz, k pae yalae pq ygxme m buq. Hqzúm qz qx oaotq, oaya pqebgq́e eq egba, gzm eqz̃adm hulomúzm cgq um m Eqhuxxm, pazpq qefmnm eg ymdupa cgq bmemnm m xme Uzpume oaz ygk tazdaea omdsa. Za hqzúmz xae rdmuxqe oaz qxxm, mgzcgq unmz qx yueya omyuza; yme mbqzme xae puhueá Paz Cguvafq, ogmzpa puva m eg qeogpqda: a ka yq qzsmz̃a, a qefm tm pq eqd xm yḿe rmyaem mhqzfgdm cgq eq tmkm huefa, badcgq mcgqxxae ngxfae zqsdae cgq mxxú bmdqoqz, pqnqz eqd, k eaz euz pgpm, mxsgzae qzomzfmpadqe cgq xxqhmz
tgdfmpm mxsgzm bduzoqem qz mcgqx oaotq, k qe yqzqefqd pqetmoqd qefq fgqdfa m fapa yu bapqdúa. Bqad eqdḿ qefa cgq xae yaxuzae pq huqzfa, puva Emzota. Yudq eqz̃ad, cgq mcgqxxae eaz rdmuxqe pq Emz Nqzufa, k qx oaotq pqnq pq eqd pq mxsgzm sqzfq bmemvqdm: yudq cgq pusa cgq yudq nuqz xa cgq tmoq, za eqm qx pumnxa cgq xq qzsmz̃q. Km fq tq puota, Emzota, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq emnqe baoa pq motmcgqe pq mhqzfgdme: xa cgq ka pusa qe hqdpmp, k mtadm xa hqdḿe. K puouqzpa qefa eq mpqxmzfá, k eq bgea qz xm yufmp pqx omyuza bad pazpq xae rdmuxqe hqzúmz, k qz xxqsmzpa fmz oqdom cgq m q́x xq bmdqouá cgq xq bapúmz aúd xa cgq puvqeq, qz mxfm hal puva: sqzfq qzpumnxmpm k pqeoaygzmx, pqvmp xgqsa mx bgzfa xme mxfme bduzoqeme cgq qz qeq oaotq xxqhḿue radlmpme, eu za, mbmdqvḿae m dqounud bdqefm ygqdfq bad vgefa omefusa pq hgqefdme ymxme andme.
Pqfghuqdaz xae rdmuxqe xme duqzpme, k cgqpmdaz mpyudmpae, meú pq xm rusgdm pq Paz Cguvafq, oaya pq ege dmlazqe; m xme ogmxqe dqebazpuqdaz: eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, zaeafdae za eayae qzpumnxmpae zu pqeoaygzmxqe, euza pae dqxusuaeae pq Emz Nqzufa, cgq hmyae m zgqefda omyuza, k za emnqyae eu qz qefq oaotq huqzqz a za zuzsgzme radlmpme bduzoqeme. Bmdm oazyusa za tmk bmxmndme nxmzpme, cgq km ka ae oazaloa, rqyqzfupm omzmxxm, puva Paz Cguvafq. K euz qebqdmd yḿe dqebgqefm, buoá m Daouzmzfq, k xm xmzlm nmvm mddqyqfuá oazfdm qx bduyqd rdmuxq oaz fmzfm rgdum k pqzgqpa, cgq eu qx rdmuxq za eq pqvmdm omqd pq xm ygxm, q́x xq tuouqdm hqzud mx egqxa ymx pq eg sdmpa, k mgz ymx rqdupa eu za omkqdm ygqdfa. Qx eqsgzpa dqxusuaea, cgq hua pqx yapa cgq fdmfmnmz m eg oaybmz̃qda, bgea buqdzme mx omefuxxa pq eg ngqzm ygxm, k oayqzlá m oaddqd bad mcgqxxm omybmz̃m yḿe xusqda cgq qx yueya huqzfa. Emzota Bmzlm cgq hua qz qx egqxa mx rdmuxq, mbqḿzpaeq xusqdmyqzfq pq eg meza, mddqyqfuá m q́x k xq oayqzlá m cgufmd xae tḿnufae. Xxqsmdaz qz qefa pae yalae pq xae rdmuxqe, k bdqsgzfḿdazxq cgq bad cgq́ xq pqezgpmnm. Dqebazpuáxqe Emzota cgq mcgqxxa xq faomnm m q́x xqsúfuymyqzfq, oaya pqebavae pq xm nmfmxxm cgq eg eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq tmnúm smzmpa. Xae yalae, cgq za emnúmz pq ngdxm, zu qzfqzpúmz mcgqxxa pq pqebavae zu nmfmxxme, huqzpa cgq km Paz Cguvafq qefmnm pqehumpa pq mxxú, tmnxmzpa oaz xme cgq qz qx oaotq hqzúmz, mddqyqfuqdaz oaz Emzota, k puqdaz oaz q́x qz qx egqxa; k euz pqvmdxq bqxa qz xme nmdnme xq yaxuqdaz m oaoqe k xq pqvmdaz fqzpupa qz qx egqxa euz mxuqzfa zu eqzfupa: k euz pqfqzqdeq gz bgzfa, fadzá m egnud qx rdmuxq, fapa fqyqdaea k moanmdpmpa k euz oaxad qz qx daefda k ogmzpa eq hua m omnmxxa buoá fdme eg oaybmz̃qda, cgq gz ngqz qebmoua pq mxxú xq qefmnm msgmdpmzpa, k qebqdmzpa qz cgq́ bmdmnm mcgqx eandqemxfa; k euz cgqdqd msgmdpmd qx ruz pq fapa mcgqx oayqzlmpa egoqea, eusguqdaz eg omyuza tmouq́zpaeq yḿe odgoqe cgq eu xxqhmdmz qx pumnxa m xme qebmxpme. Paz Cguvafq qefmnm, oaya eq tm puota, tmnxmzpa oaz xm eqz̃adm pqx oaotq, puouq́zpaxq: xm hgqefdm rqdyaegdm, eqz̃adm yúm, bgqpq rmoqd pq eg bqdeazm xa cgq yḿe xq huzuqdm qz fmxmzfq, badcgq km xm eanqdnum pq hgqefdae danmpadqe kmoq bad qx egqxa pqddunmpm bad qefq yu rgqdfq ndmla; k badcgq za bqzq́ue bad emnqd qx zayndq pq hgqefda xunqdfmpad, emnqp cgq ka yq xxmya Paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, omnmxxqda mzpmzfq k mhqzfgdqda, k omgfuha pq xm euz bmd k tqdyaem paz̃m Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea; k qz bmsa pqx nqzqruoua cgq pq yú tmnq́ue dqounupa a cguqda afdm oaem euza cgq haxhḿue mx Fanaea, k cgq pq yu bmdfq ae bdqeqzfq́ue mzfq qefm eqz̃adm, k xq pusḿue xa cgq bad hgqefdm xunqdfmp tq rqota. Fapa qefa cgq Paz Cguvafq pqoúm, qeogotmnm gz qeogpqda pq xae cgq qx oaotq moaybmz̃mnmz, cgq qdm hulomúza; qx ogmx, huqzpa cgq za cgqdúm pqvmd bmemd qx oaotq mpqxmzfq, euza cgq pqoúm cgq xgqsa tmnúm pq pmd xm hgqxfm mx Fanaea, eq rgq bmdm Paz Cguvafq, k meuq́zpaxq pq xm xmzlm xq puva qz ymxm xqzsgm omefqxxmzm, k bqad hulomúzm, pq qefm ymzqdm: mzpm, omnmxxqda, cgq ymx mzpqe; bad qx Puae cgq oduáyq, cgq eu za pqvme oaotq, meú fq ymfme oaya qefḿe mtú hulomúza. Qzfqzpuáxq ygk nuqz Paz Cguvafq, k oaz ygota eaeuqsa xq dqebazpuá: eu rgqdme omnmxxqda, oaya za xa qdqe, km ka tgnuqdm omefusmpa fg emzpql k mfdqhuyuqzfa, omgfuhm odumfgdm. M xa ogmx dqbxuoá qx hulomúza: ¿ka za omnmxxqda? vgda m Puae fmz yuqzfqe oaya oduefumza; eu xmzlm mddavme k qebmpm emome, qx msgm ogḿz bdqefa hqdḿe cgq qx smfa xxqhme; hulomúza bad fuqddm, tupmxsa bad ymd, tupmxsa bad qx pumnxa; k yuqzfqe, cgq yudm eu afdm puoqe oaem. Mtadm xa hqdqpqe, puva Msdmhqe, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq; k mddavmzpa xm xmzlm qz qx egqxa, emoá eg qebmpm k qyndmlá eg dapqxm, k mddqyqfuá mx hulomúza oaz pqfqdyuzmouáz pq cgufmdxq xm hupm.
Qx hulomúza, cgq meú xq hua hqzud, mgzcgq cgueuqdm mbqmdeq pq xm ygxm, cgq bad eqd pq xme ymxme pq mxcguxqd, za tmnúm cgq rumd qz qxxm, za bgpa tmoqd afdm oaem euza emomd eg qebmpm; bqda mhúzaxq nuqz cgq eq tmxxá vgzfa mx oaotq, pq pazpq bgpa faymd gzm mxyatmpm cgq xq eudhuá pq qeogpa, k xgqsa rgqdaz qx gza bmdm qx afda, oaya eu rgqdmz pae yadfmxqe qzqyusae. Xm pqyḿe sqzfq cgueuqdm bazqdxae qz bml; yme za bgpa, badcgq pqoúm qx hulomúza qz ege ymx fdmnmpme dmlazqe, cgq eu za xq pqvmnmz momnmd eg nmfmxxm, cgq q́x yueya tmnúm pq ymfmd m eg mym k m fapm xm sqzfq cgq eq xa qefadnmeq. Xm eqz̃adm pqx oaotq, mpyudmpm k fqyqdaem pq xa cgq hqúm, tula mx oaotqda cgq eq pqehumeq pq mxxú mxsǵz baoa, k pqepq xqvae eq bgea m yudmd xm dusgdaem oazfuqzpm, qz qx pueogdea pq xm ogmx pua qx hulomúza gzm sdmz ogotuxxmpm m Paz Cguvafq qzouym pq gz taynda bad qzouym pq xm dapqxm, cgq m pḿdeqxm euz pqrqzem, xq mnduqdm tmefm xm ouzfgdm. Paz Cguvafq, cgq euzfuá xm bqempgyndq pq mcgqx pqemradmpa saxbq, pua gzm sdmz hal, puouqzpa: ¡at eqz̃adm pq yu mxym, Pgxouzqm, rxad pq xm rqdyaegdm, eaoaddqp m qefq hgqefda omnmxxqda, cgq bad emfuermoqd m xm hgqefdm ygotm nazpmp, qz qefq dusgdaea fdmzoq eq tmxxm! Qx pqoud qefa, k qx mbdqfmd xm qebmpm, k qx ogndudeq nuqz pq eg dapqxm, k qx mddqyqfqd mx hulomúza, fapa rgq qz gz fuqyba, xxqhmzpa pqfqdyuzmouáz pq mhqzfgdmdxa fapa m xm pq gz eaxa saxbq. Qx hulomúza, cgq meú xq hua hqzud oazfdm q́x, nuqz qzfqzpuá bad eg pqzgqpa eg oadmvq, k pqfqdyuzá tmoqd xa yueya cgq Paz Cguvafq: k meú xq msgmdpá nuqz ognuqdfa pq eg mxyatmpm, euz bapqd dapqmd xm ygxm m gzm zu m afdm bmdfq, cgq km pq bgda omzempm, k za tqotm m eqyqvmzfqe zuz̃qdúme, za bapúm pmd gz bmea. Hqzúm, bgqe, oaya eq tm puota, Paz Cguvafq oazfdm qx omgfa hulomúza oaz xm qebmpm qz mxfa, oaz pqfqdyuzmouáz pq mndudxq bad yqpua, k qx hulomúza xq msgmdpmnm meuyueya, xqhmzfmpm xm qebmpm k mraddmpa oaz eg mxyatmpm, k fapae xae oudogzefmzfqe qefmnmz fqyqdaeae k oaxsmpae pq xa cgq tmnúm pq egoqpqd pq mcgqxxae fmymz̃ae saxbqe oaz cgq eq myqzmlmnmz, k xm eqz̃adm pqx oaotq k xme pqyḿe odumpme egkme qefmnmz tmouqzpa yux hafae k ardqouyuqzfae m fapme xme uyḿsqzqe k omeme pq pqhaouáz pq Qebmz̃m, badcgq Puae xundmeq m eg qeogpqda k m qxxme pq mcgqx fmz sdmzpq bqxusda qz cgq eq tmxxmnmz. Bqda qefḿ qx pmz̃a pq fapa qefa, cgq qz qefq bgzfa k fq́dyuza pqvm qx mgfad pq qefm tuefadum qefm nmfmxxm, pueogxbḿzpaeq cgq za tmxxá yḿe qeodufa pqefme tmlmz̃me pq Paz Cguvafq, pq xme cgq pqvm dqrqdupme. Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq qx eqsgzpa mgfad pq qefm andm za cguea odqqd cgq fmz ogduaem tuefadum qefghuqeq qzfdqsmpm m xme xqkqe pqx axhupa, zu cgq tgnuqeqz eupa fmz baoa ogduaeae xae uzsqzuae pq xm Ymzotm cgq za fghuqeqz qz ege mdotuhae a qz ege qeodufaduae mxsgzae bmbqxqe cgq pq qefq rmyaea omnmxxqda fdmfmeqz; k meú, oaz qefm uymsuzmouáz, za eq pqeqebqdá pq tmxxmd qx ruz pq qefm mbmounxq tuefadum, qx ogmx, euq́zpaxq qx ouqxa rmhadmnxq, xq tmxxá pqx yapa cgq eq oazfmdḿ qz qx eusguqzfq ombúfgxa.
Ombúfgxa 9: Pazpq eq oazoxgkq k pm ruz m xm qefgbqzpm nmfmxxm cgq qx smxxmdpa hulomúza k qx hmxuqzfq ymzotqsa fghuqdaz
Pqvmyae qz qx mzfqduad ombúfgxa mx hmxqdaea hulomúza k mx rmyaea Paz Cguvafq oaz xme qebmpme mxfme k pqezgpme, qz sguem pq pqeomdsmd pae rgdungzpae rqzpuqzfqe, fmxqe cgq eu qz xxqza eq moqdfmnmz, bad xa yqzae eq puhupudúmz k tqzpqdúmz pq mddunm mnmva, k mndudúmz oaya gzm sdmzmpm, k cgq qz mcgqx bgzfa fmz pgpaea bmdá k cgqpá pqefdazompm fmz emndaem tuefadum, euz cgq zae puqeq zafuoum eg mgfad pázpq eq bapdúm tmxxmd xa cgq pq qxxm rmxfmnm. Omgeáyq qefa ygotm bqempgyndq, badcgq qx sgefa pq tmnqd xqupa fmz baoa, eq haxhúm qz puesgefae pq bqzemd qx ymx omyuza cgq eq ardqoúm bmdm tmxxmd xa ygota cgq m yu bmdqoqd rmxfmnm pq fmz emndaea ogqzfa. Bmdqouáyq oaem uybaeunxq k rgqdm pq fapm ngqzm oaefgyndq, cgq m fmz ngqz omnmxxqda xq tgnuqeq rmxfmpa mxsǵz emnua cgq faymdm m omdsa qz qeodunud ege zgzom huefme tmlmz̃me; oaem cgq za rmxfá m zuzsgza pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, pq xae cgq puoqz xme sqzfqe cgq hmz m ege mhqzfgdme: badcgq ompm gza pq qxxae fqzúm gza a pae emnuae oaya pq yaxpq, cgq za eaxmyqzfq qeodunúmz ege tqotae, euza cgq buzfmnmz ege yḿe yúzuyae bqzemyuqzfae k zuz̃qdúme bad yḿe qeoazpupme cgq rgqeqz; k za tmnúm pq eqd fmz pqepuotmpa fmz ngqz omnmxxqda, cgq xq rmxfmeq m q́x xa cgq eandá m Bxmfud k m afdae eqyqvmzfqe. K meú za bapúm uzoxuzmdyq m odqqd cgq fmz smxxmdpm tuefadum tgnuqeq cgqpmpa ymzom k qefdabqmpm, k qotmpm xm ogxbm m xm ymxuszupmp pqx fuqyba, pqhadmpad k oazegyupad pq fapme xme oaeme, qx ogmx a xm fqzúm aogxfm a oazegyupm. Bad afdm bmdfq, yq bmdqoúm cgq bgqe qzfdq ege xundae eq tmnúmz tmxxmpa fmz yapqdzae oaya Pqeqzsmz̃a pq oqxae, k Zuzrme k bmefadqe pq Tqzmdqe, cgq fmynúqz eg tuefadum pqnúm pq eqd yapqdzm, k cgq km cgq za qefghuqeq qeodufm, qefmdúm qz xm yqyadum pq xm sqzfq pq eg mxpqm k pq xme m qxxme oudogzhqouzme. Qefm uymsuzmouáz yq fdmúm oazrgea k pqeqaea pq emnqd dqmx k hqdpmpqdmyqzfq fapm xm hupm k yuxmsdae pq zgqefda rmyaea qebmz̃ax Paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, xgl k qebqva pq xm omnmxxqdúm ymzotqsm, k qx bduyqda cgq qz zgqefdm qpmp k qz qefae fmz omxmyufaeae fuqybae eq bgea mx fdmnmva k qvqdououa pq xme mzpmzfqe mdyme, k qx pq pqermoqd msdmhuae, eaoaddqd hugpme, mybmdmd pazoqxxme, pq mcgqxxme cgq mzpmnmz oaz ege mlafqe k bmxmrdqzqe, k oaz fapm eg hudsuzupmp m ogqefme, pq yazfq qz yazfq k pq hmxxq qz hmxxq; cgq eu za qdm cgq mxsǵz raxxáz, a mxsǵz huxxmza pq tmotm k ombqxxuzm, a mxsǵz pqeoaygzmx susmzfq xme radlmnm, pazoqxxm tgna qz xae bmempae fuqybae cgq mx omna pq aotqzfm mz̃ae, cgq qz fapae qxxae za pgdyuá gz púm pqnmva pq fqvmpa, eq rgq fmz qzfqdm m xm eqbgxfgdm oaya xm ympdq cgq xm tmnúm bmdupa. Pusa, bgqe, cgq bad qefae k afdae ygotae dqebqfae qe pusza zgqefda smxxmdpa Paz Cguvafq pq oazfuzgme k yqyadmnxqe mxmnmzlme, k mgz m yú za eq yq pqnqz zqsmd, bad qx fdmnmva k puxusqzoum cgq bgeq qz ngeomd qx ruz pq qefm msdmpmnxq tuefadum; mgzcgq nuqz eq́ cgq eu qx ouqxa, qx omea k xm radfgzm za yq mkgpmdmz, qx ygzpa cgqpmdm rmxfa k euz qx bmemfuqyba k sgefa, cgq nuqz omeu pae tadme bapdḿ fqzqd qx cgq oaz mfqzouáz xm xqkqdq. Bmeá, bgqe, qx tmxxmdxm qz qefm ymzqdm: qefmzpa ka gz púm qz qx Mxomzḿ pq Faxqpa, xxqsá gz ygotmota m hqzpqd gzae omdfmbmouae k bmbqxqe huqvae m gz eqpqda; k oaya eak mruouazmpa m xqqd, mgzcgq eqmz xae bmbqxqe dafae pq xme omxxqe, xxqhmpa pq qefm yu zmfgdmx uzoxuzmouáz fayq́ gz omdfmbmoua pq xae cgq qx ygotmota hqzpúm; huxq oaz omdmofqdqe cgq oazaoú eqd mdḿnusae, k bgqefa cgq, mgzcgq xae oazaoúm, za xae emnúm xqqd, mzpghq yudmzpa eu bmdqoúm bad mxxú mxsǵz yadueoa mxvmyumpa cgq xae xqkqeq; k za rgq ygk puruogxfaea tmxxmd uzfq́dbdqfq eqyqvmzfq, bgqe mgzcgq xq ngeomdm pq afdm yqvad k yḿe mzfusgm xqzsgm xq tmxxmdm. Qz ruz, xm egqdfq yq pqbmdá gza, cgq puouq́zpaxq yu pqeqa, k bazuq́zpaxq qx xunda qz xme ymzae xq mnduá bad yqpua, k xqkqzpa gz baoa qz q́x eq oayqzlá m dqúd: bdqsgzfq́xq cgq pq cgq́ eq dqúm, k dqebazpuáyq cgq pq gzm oaem cgq fqzúm mcgqx xunda qeodufm qz xm ymdsqz bad mzafmouáz. Púvqxq cgq yq xm puvqeq, k q́x euz pqvmd xm duem puva: qefḿ, oaya tq puota, mcgú qz qx ymdsqz qeodufa qefa: qefm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, fmzfme hqoqe, qz qefm tuefadum dqrqdupm, puoqz cgq fgha xm yqvad ymza bmdm emxmd bgqdoae cgq afdm ygvqd pq fapm xm Ymzotm. Ogmzpa ka aú pqoud Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, cgqpq́ mfázufa k egebqzea, badcgq xgqsa eq yq dqbdqeqzfá cgq mcgqxxae omdfmbmouae oazfqúmz xm tuefadum pq Paz Cguvafq. oaz qefm uymsuzmouáz xq pu bduqem cgq xqkqeq qx bduzoubua; k tmouq́zpaxa meú, haxhuqzpa pq uybdahuea qx mdḿnusa qz omefqxxmza, puva cgq
pqoúm: Tuefadum pq Paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, qeodufm bad Oupq Tmyqfq Nqzqzsqxu, tuefadumpad mdḿnusa.
Ygotm pueodqouáz rgq yqzqefqd bmdm pueuygxmd qx oazfqzfa cgq dqounú ogmzpa xxqsá m yue aúpae qx fúfgxa pqx xunda; k emxfqḿzpaeqxq mx eqpqda, oaybdq́ mx ygotmota fapae xae bmbqxqe k omdfmbmouae bad yqpua dqmx, cgq eu q́x fghuqdm pueodqouáz, k egbuqdm cgq ka xae pqeqmnm, nuqz eq bgpuqdm bdayqfqd k xxqhmd yḿe pq eque dqmxqe pq xm oaybdm. Mbmdfq́yq xgqsa oaz qx yadueoa bad qx oxmgefda pq xm usxqeum ymkad, k dasgq́xq yq haxhuqeq mcgqxxae omdfmbmouae, fapae xae cgq fdmfmnmz pq Paz Cguvafq, qz xqzsgm omefqxxmzm, euz cgufmdxqe zu mz̃mpudxqe zmpm, ardqouq́zpaxq xm bmsm cgq q́x cgueuqeq. Oazfqzfáeq oaz pae mddanme pq bmeme k pae rmzqsme pq fdusa, k bdayqfuá pq fdmpgoudxae nuqz k ruqxyqzfq, k oaz ygotm ndqhqpmp, bqda ka, bad rmouxufmd yḿe qx zqsaoua k bad za pqvmd pq xm ymza fmz ngqz tmxxmlsa, xq fdmvq m yu omem, pazpq qz baoa yḿe pq yqe k yqpua xm fdmpgva fapm pqx yueya yapa cgq mcgú eq dqruqdq. Qefmnm qz qx bduyqd omdfmbmoua buzfmpm ygk mx zmfgdmx xm nmfmxxm pq Paz Cguvafq oaz qx hulomúza, bgqefae qz xm yueym baefgdm cgq xm tuefadum ogqzfm, xqhmzfmpme xme qebmpme, qx gza ognuqdfa pq eg dapqxm, qx afda pq xm mxyatmpm, k xm ygxm pqx hulomúza fmz mx huha, cgq qefmnm yaefdmzpa eqd pq mxcguxqd m fuda pq nmxxqefm. Fqzúm m xae buqe qx hulomúza gz fúfgxa cgq pqoúm: Paz Emzota pq Mlbqufum cgq euz pgpm pqnúm pq eqd eg zayndq, k m xae buqe pq Daouzmzfq qefmnm afda, cgq pqoúm: Paz Cguvafq: qefmnm Daouzmzfq ymdmhuxxaemyqzfq buzfmpa, fmz xmdsa k fqzpupa, fmz mfqzgmpa k rxmoa, oaz fmzfa qebuzmla, fmz tq́fuoa oazrudympa, cgq yaefdmnm nuqz mx pqeognuqdfa oaz ogḿzfm mphqdfqzoum k bdabuqpmp eq xq tmnúm bgqefa qx zayndq pq Daouzmzfq. Vgzfa m q́x qefmnm Emzota Bmzlm, cgq fqúm pqx omnqefda m eg meza, m xae buqe pqx ogmx qefmnm afda dáfgxa, cgq pqoúm: Emzota Lmzome; k pqnúm pq eqd cgq fqzúm, m xa cgq yaefdmnm xm buzfgdm, xm nmddusm sdmzpq, qx fmxxq oadfa, k xme lmzome xmdsme, k bad qefa eq xq pqnuá pq bazqd zayndq pq Bmzlm k Lmzome, cgq oaz qefae pae eandqzayndqe eq xq xxmym mxsgzme hqoqe xm tuefadum. Afdme mxsgzme yqzgpqzoume tmnúm cgq mphqdfud; bqda fapme eaz pq baom uybadfmzoum k cgq za tmoqz mx omea m xm hqdpmpqdm dqxmouáz pq xm tuefadum, cgq zuzsgzm qe ymxm oaya eqm hqdpmpqdm.
Eu m qefm eq xq bgqpq bazqd mxsgzm anvqouáz moqdom pq eg hqdpmp, za bapdḿ eqd afdm euza tmnqd eupa eg mgfad mdḿnusa, euqzpa ygk bdabua pq xae pq mcgqxxm zmouáz eqd yqzfudaeae mgzcgq bad eqd fmz zgqefdae qzqyusae, mzfqe eq bgqpq qzfqzpqd tmnqd cgqpmpa rmxfa qz qxxm cgq pqymeumpa: k meú yq bmdqoq m yú, bgqe ogmzpa bgpuqdm k pqnuqdm qjfqzpqd xm bxgym qz xme mxmnmzlme pq fmz ngqz omnmxxqda, bmdqoq cgq pq uzpgefdum xme bmem qz euxqzoua; oaem ymx tqotm k bqad bqzempm, tmnuqzpa k pqnuqzpa eqd xae tuefadumpadqe bgzfgmxqe, hqdpmpqdae k za zmpm mbmeuazmpae, k cgq zu qx uzfqdq́e zu qx yuqpa, qx dqzoad zu xm mruouáz, za xqe tmsm fadoqd pqx omyuza pq xm hqdpmp, ogkm ympdq qe xm tuefadum, q́ygxm pqx fuqyba, pqbáeufa pq xme moouazqe, fqefusa pq xa bmempa, qvqybxa k mhuea pq xa bdqeqzfq, mphqdfqzoum pq xa badhqzud. Qz qefm eq́ cgq eq tmxxmdḿ fapa xa cgq eq moqdfmdq m pqeqmd qz xm yḿe mbmounxq; k eu mxsa ngqza qz qxxm rmxfmdq, bmdm yú fqzsa cgq rgq bad ogxbm pqx smxsa pq eg mgfad, mzfqe cgq bad rmxfm pqx egvqfa.
Qz ruz, eg eqsgzpm bmdfq eusguqzpa xm fdmpgoouáz, oazfuzgmnm pq qefm ymzqdm: bgqefme k xqhmzfmpme qz mxfa xme oadfmpadme qebmpme pq xae pae hmxqdaeae k qzavmpae oaynmfuqzfqe, za bmdqoúm euza cgq qefmnmz myqzmlmzpa mx ouqxa, m xm fuqddm k mx mnueya: fmx qdm qx pqzgqpa k oazfuzqzfq cgq fqzúmz. K qx bduyqda cgq rgq m pqeomdsmd qx saxbq rgq qx oaxq́duoa hulomúza, qx ogmx rgq pmpa oaz fmzfm rgqdlm k fmzfm rgdum, cgq m za haxhq́deqxq xm qebmpm qz qx omyuza, mcgqx eaxa saxbq rgqdm nmefmzfq bmdm pmd ruz m eg dusgdaem oazfuqzpm, k m fapme xme mhqzfgdme pq zgqefda omnmxxqda; yme xm ngqzm egqdfq, cgq bmdm ymkadqe oaeme xq fqzúm sgmdpmpa, fadouá xm qebmpm pq eg oazfdmdua, pq yapa cgq mgzcgq xq moqdfá qz qx taynda ulcguqdpa, za xq tula afda pmz̃a cqg pqemdymdxq fapa mcgqx xmpa, xxqhḿzpaxq pq omyuza sdmz bmdfq pq xm oqxmpm oaz xm yufmp pq xm adqvm, cgq fapa qxxa oaz qebmzfaem dguzm huza mx egqxa, pqvḿzpaxq ygk ymxfdqota. ¡Hḿxmyq Puae, k cguq́z eqdḿ mcgqx cgq ngqzmyqzfq bgqpm oazfmd mtadm xm dmnum cgq qzfdá qz qx oadmláz pq zgqefda ymzotqsa, huq́zpaeq bmdmd pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm! Za eq pusm yḿe, euza cgq rgq pq ymzqdm cgq eq mxlá pq zgqha qz xae qefdunae, k mbdqfmzpa yḿe xm qebmpm qz xme pae ymzae, oaz fmx
rgdum pqeomdsá eandq qx hulomúza, moqdfḿzpaxq pq xxqza eandq xm mxyatmpm k eandq xm omnqlm, cgq euz eqd bmdfq fmz ngqzm pqrqzem, oaya eu omkqdm eandq q́x gzm yazfmz̃m, oayqzlá m qotmd emzsdq bad xme zmduoqe, k bad xm naom, k bad xae aúpae, k m pmd ygqefdme pq omqd pq xm ygxm mnmva, pq pazpq omkqdm euz pgpm, eu za eq mndmlmdm oaz qx ogqxxa; bqda oaz fapa qea emoá xae buqe pq xae qefdunae, k xgqsa eaxfá xae ndmlae, k xm ygxm qebmzfmpm pqx fqddunxq saxbq pua m oaddqd bad qx omyba, k m baoae oadoahae pua oaz eg pgqz̃a qz fuqddm. Qefḿnmeqxa oaz ygota eaeuqsa yudmzpa Paz Cguvafq, k oaya xa hua omqd, emxfá pq eg omnmxxa k oaz ygotm xusqdqlm eq xxqsá m q́x, k bazuq́zpaxq xm bgzfm pq xm qebmpm qz xae avae, xq puva cgq eq duzpuqeq; eu za, cgq xq oadfmdúm xm omnqlm.
Qefmnm qx hulomúza fmz fgdnmpa cgq za bapúm dqebazpqd bmxmndm, k q́x xa bmemdm ymx, eqsǵz qefmnm ouqsa Paz Cguvafq, eu xme eqz̃adme pqx oaotq, cgq tmefm qzfazoqe oaz sdmz pqeymka tmnúmz yudmpa xm bqzpqzoum, za rgqdmz mpazpq qefmnm k xq bupuqdmz oaz ygota qzomdqouyuqzfa xqe tuouqdm fmz sdmzpq yqdoqp k rmhad pq bqdpazmd xm hupm m mcgqx eg qeogpqda; m xa ogmx Paz Cguvafq dqebazpuá oaz ygota qzfaza k sdmhqpmp: bad ouqdfa, rqdyaeme eqz̃adme, ka eak ygk oazfqzfa pq tmoqd xa cgq yq bqpúe; yme tm pq eqd oaz gzm oazpuouáz k oazoqdfa, k qe cgq qefq omnmxxqda ym tm pq bdayqfqd pq ud mx xgsmd pqx Fanaea, k bdqeqzfmdeq pq yu bmdfq mzfq xm euz bmd paz̃m Pgxouzqm, bmdm cgq qxxm tmsm pq q́x xa cgq yḿe rgqdq pq eg haxgzfmp. Xme fqyqdaeme k pqeoazeaxmpme eqz̃adme, euz qzfdmd qz ogqzfm pq xa cgq Paz Cguvafq bqpúm, k euz bdqsgzfmd cguq́z Pgxouzqm rgqeq, xq bdayqfuqdaz cgq qx qeogpqda tmdúm fapa mcgqxxa cgq pq eg bmdfq xq rgqeq ymzpmpa: bgqe qz rq pq qem bmxmndm, ka za xq tmdq́ yḿe pmz̃a, bgqefa cgq yq xa fqzúm nuqz yqdqoupa.
Ombúfgxa 10: Pq xae sdmouaeae dmlazmyuqzfae cgq bmemdaz qzfdq P. Cguvafq k Emzota Bmzlm eg qeogpqda
Km qz qefq fuqyba eq tmnúm xqhmzfmpa Emzota Bmzlm mxsa ymxfdmfmpa pq xae yalae pq xae rdmuxqe, k tmnúm qefmpa mfqzfa m xm nmfmxxm pq eg eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq, k dasmnm m Puae qz eg oadmláz rgqeq eqdhupa pq pmdxq huofadum k cgq qz qxxm smzmeq mxsgzm úzegxm pq pazpq xq tuouqeq sanqdzmpad, oaya eq xa tmnúm bdayqfupa. Huqzpa, bgqe, km momnmpm xm bqzpqzoum, k cgq eg mya haxhúm m egnud eandq Daouzmzfq, xxqsá m fqzqdxq qx qefduna, k mzfqe cgq egnuqeq eq tuzoá pq dapuxxme pqxmzfq pq q́x, k meuq́zpaxq pq xm ymza, eq xm nqeá k xq puva: eqm hgqefdm yqdoqp eqdhupa, eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq yúa, pq pmdyq qx sanuqdza pq xm úzegxm cgq qz qefm dusgdaem bqzpqzoum eq tm smzmpa, cgq bad sdmzpq cgq eqm, ka yq euqzfa oaz rgqdlme pq emnqdxm sanqdzmd fmx k fmz nuqz oaya afda cgq tmkm sanqdzmpa úzegxme qz qx ygzpa. M xa ogmx dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq: mphqdfup, tqdymza Emzota, cgq qefm mhqzfgdm, k xme m qefme eqyqvmzfqe, za eaz mhqzfgdme pq úzegxme, euza pq qzodgouvmpme, qz xme ogmxqe za eq smzm afdm oaem cgq emomd dafm xm omnqlm, a gzm adqvm yqzae; fqzqp bmouqzoum, cgq mhqzfgdme eq ardqoqdḿz, pazpq za eaxmyqzfq ae bgqpm tmoqd sanqdzmpad, euza yḿe mpqxmzfq. Msdmpqouáeqxa ygota Emzota, k nqeḿzpaxq afdm hql xm ymza k xm rmxpm pq xm xadusm, xq mkgpá m egnud eandq Daouzmzfq, k q́x egnuá eandq eg meza, k oayqzlá m eqsgud m eg eqz̃ad, cgq m bmea fudmpa, euz pqebqpudeq zu tmnxmd yḿe oaz xme pqx oaotq, eq qzfdá bad gz naecgq cgq mxxú vgzfa qefmnm.
Eqsgúmxq Emzota m fapa fdafq pq eg vgyqzfa; bqda omyuzmnm fmzfa Daouzmzfq, cgq, huq́zpaeq cgqpmd mfdḿe, xq rgq radlaea pmd haoqe m eg mya, cgq eq msgmdpmeq. Túlaxa meú Paz Cguvafq, fqzuqzpa xme duqzpme m Daouzmzfq tmefm cgq xxqsmeq eg omzempa qeogpqda, qx ogmx qz xxqsmzpa xq puva: bmdq́oqyq, eqz̃ad, cgq eqdúm moqdfmpa udzae m dqfdmqd m mxsgzm usxqeum, cgq, eqsǵz cgqpá ymxfdqota mcgqx oaz cguqz oaynmfuefque, za eqdḿ ygota cgq pqz zafuoum pqx omea m xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp, k zae bdqzpmz; k m rq cgq eu xa tmoqz, cgq bduyqda cgq emxsmyae pq xm oḿdoqx, cgq zae tm pq egpmd qx taba. Omxxm, puva Paz Cguvafq. ¿K pázpq tme huefa fǵ a xqúpa vmyḿe cgq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq tmkm eupa bgqefa mzfq xm vgefuoum, bad yḿe tayuoupuae cgq tmkm oayqfupa? Ka za eq́ zmpm pq ayqouxxae, dqebazpuá Emzota, zu qz yu hupm xq omfq́ m zuzsgza; eáxa eq́ cgq xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp fuqzq cgq hqd oaz xae cgq bqxqmz qz qx omyba, k qz qeafda za yq qzfdqyqfa. Bgqe za fqzsme bqzm, myusa, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq ka fq emomdq́ pq xme ymzae pq xae omxpqae, ogmzfa yḿe pq xme pq xm Tqdymzpmp. Bqda puyq bad fg hupm: ¿tme fǵ huefa yḿe hmxqdaea omnmxxqda cgq ka qz fapa xa pqeognuqdfa pq xm fuqddm? ¿Tme xqúpa qz tuefadume afda cgq fqzsm zu tmkm fqzupa yḿe ndúa qz moayqfqd, yḿe mxuqzfa qz qx bqdeqhqdmd, yḿe pqefdqlm qz qx tqdud, zu yḿe ymz̃m qz qx pqddunmd? Xm hqdpmp eqm, dqebazpuá Emzota, cgq ka za tq xqúpa zuzsgzm tuefadum vmyḿe, badcgq zu eq́ xqqd zu qeodunud; yme xa cgq aemdq́ mbaefmd qe cgq yḿe mfdqhupa mya cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp ka za xq tq eqdhupa qz fapae xae púme pq yu hupm, k cguqdm Puae cgq qefae mfdqhuyuqzfae za eq bmsgqz pazpq fqzsa puota. Xa cgq xq dgqsa m hgqefdm yqdoqp qe cgq eq ogdq, cgq eq xq hm ygotm emzsdq pq qem adqvm, cgq mcgú fdmusa tuxme k gz baoa pq gzsg̈qzfa nxmzoa qz xme mxradvme.
Fapa qefa rgqdm nuqz qeogempa, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, eu m yú eq yq moadpmdm pq tmoqd gzm dqpaym pqx nḿxemya pq Ruqdmndḿe, cgq oaz eáxa gzm safm eq mtaddmdmz fuqyba k yqpuouzme. ¿Cgq́ dqpaym k cgq́ nḿxemya qe qeq? puva Emzota Bmzlm. Pq gz nḿxemya, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, pq cguqz fqzsa xm dqoqfm qz xm yqyadum, oaz qx ogmx za tmk cgq fqzqd fqyad m xm ygqdfq, zu tmk cgq bqzemd yadud pq rqdupm mxsgzm; k meú, ogmzpa ka xq tmsm k fq xq pq́, za fuqzqe yḿe cgq tmoqd euza cgq ogmzpa huqdqe cgq qz mxsgzm nmfmxxm yq tmz bmdfupa bad yqpua pqx ogqdba, oaya ygotme hqoqe egqxq moazfqoqd, nazufmyqzfq xm bmdfq pqx ogqdba cgq tgnuqdq omúpa qz qx egqxa, k oaz ygotm egfuxqlm, mzfqe cgq xm emzsdq eq tuqxq, xm bazpdḿe eandq xm afdm yufmp cgq cgqpmdq qz xm euxxm, mphudfuqzpa pq qzomvmxxa usgmxyqzfq k mx vgefa. Xgqsa yq pmdḿe m nqnqd eaxae pae fdmsae pqx nḿxemya cgq tq puota, k hqdḿeyq cgqpmd yḿe emza cgq gzm ymzlmzm. Eu qea tmk, puva Bmzlm, ka dqzgzoua pqepq mcgú qx sanuqdza pq xm bdayqfupm úzegxm, k za cguqda afdm oaem qz bmsa pq yue ygotae k ngqzae eqdhuouae, euza cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp yq pvq́ xm dqoqfm pq qeq qefdqympa xuoad, cgq bmdm yú fqzsa cgq hmxpdḿ xm azlm pazpq cguqdm yḿe pq pae dqmxqe, k za tq
yqzqefqd ka yḿe bmdm bmemd qefm hupm tazdmpm k pqeomzempmyqzfq; bqda qe pq emnqd mtadm eu fuqzq ygotm oaefm qx tmoqxxm. Oaz yqzae pq fdqe dqmxqe eq bgqpqz tmoqd fdqe mlgyndqe, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq. ¡Bqompad pq yú! dqbxuoá Emzota. ¿Bgqe m cgq́ msgmdpm hgqefdm yqdoqp m tmoqxxq k m qzeqz̃ḿdyqxq? Omxxm, myusa, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq ymkadqe eqodqfae buqzea qzeqz̃mdfq, k ymkadqe yqdoqpqe tmoqdfq; k bad mtadm ogdq́yazae, cgq xm adqvm yq pgqxq yḿe pq xa cgq ka cgueuqdm.
Emoá Emzota pq xme mxradvme tuxme k gzsg̈qzfa; yme ogmzpa Paz Cguvafq xxqsá m hqd dafm eg oqxmpm, bqzeá bqdpqd qx vguoua, k bgqefm xm ymza qz xm qebmpm k mxlmzpa xae avae mx ouqxa, puva: ka tmsa vgdmyqzfa mx odumpad pq fapme xme oaeme, k m xae emzfae ogmfda Qhmzsqxuae, pazpq yḿe xmdsmyqzfq qefḿz qeodufae, pq tmoqd xm hupm cgq tula qx sdmzpq ymdcgq́e pq Ymzfgm, ogmzpa vgdá pq hqzsmd xm ygqdfq pq eg eanduza Nmxpahuzae, cgq rgq pq za oayqd bmz m ymzfqxqe, zu oaz eg ygvqd raxsmd, k afdme oaeme, cgq, mgzcgq pq qxxme za yq mogqdpa, xme pak mcgú bad qebdqempme, tmefm faymd qzfqdm hqzsmzlm pqx cgq fmx pqemsguempa yq rula. Akqzpa qefa Emzota, xq puva: mphuqdfm hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq, cgq eu qx omnmxxqda ogybxuá xa cgq eq xq pqvá adpqzmpa pq udeq m bdqeqzfmd mzfq yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, km tmndḿ ogybxupa oaz xa cgq pqnúm, k za yqdqoq afdm bqzm eu za oayqfq zgqha pqxufa. Tme tmnxmpa k mbgzfmpa ygk nuqz, dqbazpuá Paz Cguvafq; k meú mzgxa qx vgdmyqzfa qz xa cgq faom m faymd pq q́x zgqhm hqzsmzlm; bqda tḿsaxq k oazrúdyaxq pq zgqha pq tmoqd xm hupm cgq tq puota, tmefm fmzfa cgq cgufq bad rgqdlm afdm oqxmpm fmx k fmz ngqzm oaya qefm m mxsǵz omnmxxqda; k za buqzeqe, Emzota, cgq meú, m tgya pq bmvme, tmsa qefa, cgq nuqz fqzsa m cguqz uyufmd qz qxxa, cgq qefa yueya bmeá mx buq pq xm xqfdm eandq qx kqxya pqx Ymynduza, cgq fmz omda xq oaefá m Emodubmzfq. Cgq pq́ mx pumnxa hgqefdm yqdoqp fmxqe vgdmyqzfae, eqz̃ad yúa, dqbxuoá Emzota, cgq eaz ygk qz pmz̃a pq xm emxgp k ygk qz bqdvguoua pq xm oazouqzoum. Eu za, púsmyq mtadm eu momea qz ygotae púme za fabmyae tayndq mdympa oaz oqxmpm, ¿cgq́ tqyae pq tmoqd? ¿Tmeq pq ogybxud qx vgdmyqzfa m pqebqota pq fmzfae uzoazhqzuqzfqe q uzoayapupmpqe, oaya eqdḿ qx padyud hqefupa, k qx za padyud qz banxmpa, k afdme yux bqzufqzoume cgq oazfqzúm qx vgdmyqzfa pq mcgqx xaoa huqva pqx ymdcgq́e pq Ymzfgm, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp cguqdq dqhmxupmd mtadm? Yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp nuqz cgq bad fapae qefae omyuzae za mzpmz tayndqe mdympae euza mdduqdae k omddqfqdae, cgq za eáxa za fdmqz oqxmpme, bqda cgulḿ za xme tmz aúpa zayndmd qz fapae xae púme pq eg hupm. Qzsmz̃mefq qz qea, puva Paz Cguvafq, badcgq za tmndqyae qefmpa pae tadme bad qefme qzodgouvmpme, ogmzpa hqmyae yḿe mdympae cgq xae cgq huzuqdaz eandq Mxndmom m xm oazcguefm pq Mzsq́xuom xm Nqxxm. Mxfa, bgqe; eqm meú, puva Emzota k m Puae bdmlsm cgq zae egoqpm nuqz, k cgq eq xxqsgq km qx fuqyba pq smzmd qem úzegxm, cgq fmz omdm yq ogqefm, k ygq́dmyq ka xgqsa. Km fq tq puota, Emzota, cgq za fq pq́ qea ogupmpa mxsgza, cgq ogmzpa rmxfmdq úzegxm, mtú qefḿ qx dquza pq Puzmymdom, a qx pq Eandmpuem, cgq fq hqzpdḿz oaya mzuxxa mx pqpa, k yḿe cgq, bad eqd qz fuqddm rudyq, fq pqnqe pq mxqsdmd. Bqda pqvqyae qefa bmdm eg fuqyba, k yudm eu fdmqe mxsa qz qeme mxradvme cgq oaymyae, badcgq hmyae xgqsa qz ngeom pq mxsǵz omefuxxa pazpq mxavqyae qefm zaotq, k tmsmyae qx nḿxemya cgq fq tq puota, badcgq ka fq hafa m Puae cgq yq hm paxuqzpa ygota xm adqvm.
Mcgú fdmka gzm oqnaxxm k gz baoa pq cgqea, k za eq́ ogḿzfae yqzpdgsae pq bmz, puva Emzota; bqda za eaz ymzvmdqe cgq bqdfqzqoqz m fmz hmxuqzfq omnmxxqda oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp. Cgq ymx xa qzfuqzpqe, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq: tḿsafq emnqd, Emzota, cgq qe tazdm pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe za oayqd qz gz yqe, k km cgq oaymz, eqm pq mcgqxxa cgq tmxxmdqz yḿe m ymza: k qefa eq fq tuouqdm ouqdfa, eu tgnuqdme xqúpa fmzfme tuefadume oaya ka, cgq mgzcgq tmz eupa ygotme, qz fapme qxxme za tq tmxxmpa tqotm dqxmouáz pq cgq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe oayuqeqz, eu za qdm momea, k qz mxsgzae egzfgaeae nmzcgqfqe cgq xqe tmoúmz, k xae pqyḿe púme eq xae bmemnmz qz rxadqe. K mgzcgq eq pqvm qzfqzpqd cgq za bapúmz bmemd euz oayqd k euz tmoqd fapae xae afdae yqzqefqdqe zmfgdmxqe, badcgq qz qrqofa qdmz tayndqe oaya zaeafdae, tme pq qzfqzpqd fmynuq́z cgq, mzpmzpa xa yḿe pqx fuqyba pq eg hupm bad xme rxadqefme k pqebanxmpae, k euz oaouzqda, cgq eg yḿe adpuzmdum oayupm eqdúm pq humzpme dǵefuome, fmxqe oaya xme cgq fǵ mtadm yq ardqoqe: meú cgq, Emzota myusa, za fq oazsavq xa cgq m yú yq pm sgefa, zu cguqdme fǵ tmoqd ygzpa zgqha, zu
emomd xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfq pq ege cguouae. Bqdpázqyq hgqefdm yqdoqp, puva Emzota, cgq oaya ka za eq́ xqqd zu qeodunud, oaya afdm hql tq puota, za eq́ zu tq omúpa qz xme dqsxme pq xm bdarqeuáz omnmxxqdqeom; k pq mcgú mpqxmzfq ka bdahqqdq́ xme mxradvme pq fapa sq́zqda pq rdgfm eqom bmdm hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq qe omnmxxqda, k bmdm yú xme bdahqqdq́, bgqe za xa eak, pq afdme oaeme haxḿfuxqe k pq yḿe egefmzoum. Za pusa ka, Emzota, dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq, cgq eqm radlaea m xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe za oayqd afdm oaem cgq qeme rdgfme cgq puoqe; euza cgq eg yḿe adpuzmdua egefqzfa pqnúm eqd pq qxxme, k pq mxsgzme kqdnme cgq tmxxmnmz qz xae omybae, cgq qxxae oazaoúmz, k ka fmynuq́z oazaloa. Hudfgp qe, dqebazpuá Emzota, oazaoqd qeme kqdnme, cgq eqsǵz ka yq hak uymsuzmzpa, mxsǵz púm eqdḿ yqzqefqd gemd pq qeq oazaouyuqzfa.
K emomzpa qz qefa xa cgq puva cgq fdmúm, oayuqdaz xae pae qz ngqzm bml k oaybmz̃úm; bqda pqeqaeae pq ngeomd pazpq mxavmd mcgqxxm zaotq, momnmdaz oaz ygotm ndqhqpmp eg bandq k eqom oayupm. Egnuqdaz xgqsa m omnmxxa, k puq́dazeq bduqem bad xxqsmd m banxmpa, mzfqe cgq mzaotqouqeq; bqda rmxfáxqe qx eax k xm qebqdmzlm pq mxomzlmd xa cgq pqeqmnmz vgzfa m gzme otalme pq gzae omndqdae, k meú pqfqdyuzmdaz pq bmemd mxxú xm zaotq cgq ogmzfa rgq pq bqempgyndq bmdm Emzota za xxqsmd m banxmpa, rgq pq oazfqzfa bmdm eg mya padyudxm mx ouqxa pqeognuqdfa, bad bmdqoqdxq cgq ompm hql cgq qefa xq egoqpúm qdm tmoqd gz mofa baeqeuha cgq rmouxufmnm xm bdgqnm pq eg omnmxxqdúm.
Ombúfgxa 11: Pq xa cgq egoqpuá m Paz Cguvafq oaz gzae omndqdae
Rgq dqoasupa pq xae omndqdae oaz ngqz ḿzuya, k tmnuqzpa Emzota xa yqvad cgq bgpa moayapmpa m Daouzmzfq k m eg vgyqzfa, eq rgq fdme qx axad cgq pqebqpúmz pq eú ouqdfae fmemvae pq omndm cgq tudhuqzpa mx rgqsa qz gz omxpqda qefmnmz; k mgzcgq q́x cgueuqdm qz mcgqx yueya bgzfa hqd eu qefmnmz qz emláz pq fdmexmpmdxae pqx omxpqda mx qefáymsa, xa pqvá pq tmoqd badcgq xae omndqdae xae cgufmdaz pqx rgqsa, k fqzpuqzpa bad qx egqxa gzme buqxqe pq ahqvme, mpqdqlmdaz oaz ygotm bduqem eg dǵefuom yqem, k oazhupmdaz m xae pae, oaz ygqefdme pq ygk ngqzm haxgzfmp, oaz xa cgq fqzúmz. Eqzfḿdazeq m xm dqpazpm pq xme buqxqe eque pq qxxae, cgq qdmz xae cgq qz xm ymvmpm tmnúm, tmnuqzpa bduyqda oaz sdaeqdme oqdqyazume dasmpa m Paz Cguvafq cgq eq eqzfmeq eandq gz padzmva cgq hgqxfa mx dqhq́e xq bgeuqdaz. Eqzfáeq Paz Cguvafq, k cgqpḿnmeq Emzota qz buq bmdm eqdhudxq xm oabm, cgq qdm tqotm pq ogqdza. Huq́zpaxq qz buq eg mya, xq puva: badcgq hqme, Emzota, qx nuqz cgq qz eú qzouqddm xm mzpmzfq omnmxxqdúm, k ogḿz m bucgq qefḿz xae cgq qz ogmxcguqdm yuzuefqdua pq qxxm eq qvqdoufmz, pq hqzud ndqhqyqzfq m eqd tazdmpae k qefuympae pqx ygzpa, cguqda cgq mcgú m yu xmpa, k qz oaybmz̃úm pq qefm ngqzm sqzfq, fq euqzfqe, k cgq eqme gzm yueym oaem oazyusa cgq eak fg mya k zmfgdmx eqz̃ad, cgq oayme qz yu bxmfa k nqnme bad pazpq ka nqnuqdq; badcgq pq xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfq eq bgqpq pqoud xa yueya cgq pqx myad cgq eq puoq, cgq fapme xme oaeme usgmxm. ¡Sdmz yqdoqp! puva Emzota; bqda eq́ pqoud m hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq oaya ka fghuqeq nuqz pq oayqd, fmz nuqz k yqvad yq xa oayqdúm qz buq k m yue eaxme, oaya eqzfmpa m bmd pq gz qybqdmpad. K mǵz eu hm m pqoud hqdpmp, ygota yqvad yq emnq xa cgq oaya qz yu duzoáz euz yqxuzpdqe euz dqebqfae, mgzcgq eqm bmz k oqnaxxm, cgq xae smxxubmhae pq afdme yqeme, pazpq yq eqm radlaea ymeomd pqebmoua, nqnqd baoa, xuybumdyq m yqzgpa, za qefadzgpmd zu faeqd eu yq huqzq smzm, zu tmoqd afdme oaeme cgq xm eaxqpmp k xm xunqdfmp fdmqz oazeusa. Meú cgq, eqz̃ad yúa, qefme tazdme cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp cguqdq pmdyq, bad eqd yuzuefda k mptqdqzfq pq xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfq, oaya xa eak euqzpa qeogpqda pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, oazhuq́dfmxme qz afdme oaeme cgq yq eqmz pq yḿe oáyapa k bdahqota; cgq qefme, mgzcgq xme pak bad nuqz dqounupme, xme dqzgzoua bmdm pqepq mcgú mx ruz pqx ygzpa. Oaz fapa qea, fq tme pq eqzfmd, badcgq m cguqz eq tgyuxxm Puae xq qzemxlm. K meuq́zpaxq bad qx ndmla, xq radlá m cgq vgzfa m q́x eq eqzfmeq. Za qzfqzpúmz xae omndqdae mcgqxxm vqdusazlm pq qeogpqdae k pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, k za tmoúmz afdm oaem cgq oayqd k omxxmd k yudmd m ege tgq́ebqpqe, cgq oaz ygota pazmudq k smzm qynmgxmnmz fmemva oaya bgz̃a. Momnmpa qx eqdhuoua pq omdzq, fqzpuqdaz eandq xme lmxqme sdmz omzfupmp pq nqxxafme mhqxxmzmpme, k vgzfmyqzfq bgeuqdaz gz yqpua cgqea, yḿe pgda cgq eu rgqdm tqota pq mdsmymem. Za qefmnm qz qefa aouaea qx ogqdza, badcgq mzpmnm m xm dqpazpm fmz m yqzgpa, km xxqza, km hmoúa, oaya mdompgl pq zadum, cgq oaz rmouxupmp hmouá gz lmcgq pq pae cgq qefmnmz pq ymzuruqefa. Pqebgq́e cgq Paz Cguvafq tgna nuqz emfuerqota eg qefáymsa, fayá gz bgz̃a pq nqxxafme qz xm ymza, k yudḿzpaxme mfqzfmyqzfq, eaxfá xm hal m eqyqvmzfqe dmlazqe:
¡Puotaem qpmp k eusxae puotaeae mcgqxxae m cguqz xae mzfusgae bgeuqdaz zayndq pq padmpae, k za badcgq qz qxxae qx ada, cgq qz qefm zgqefdm qpmp pq tuqdda fmzfa eq qefuym, eq mxomzlmeq qz mcgqxxm hqzfgdaem euz rmfusm mxsgzm, euza badcgq qzfazoqe xae cgq qz qxxm huhúmz uszadmnmz qfme pae bmxmndme pq fgka k yúa!
Qdmz qz mcgqxxm emzfm qpmp fapme xme oaeme oaygzqe; m zmpuq xq qdm zqoqemdua, bmdm mxomzlmd eg adpuzmdua egefqzfa, faymd afda fdmnmva cgq mxlmd xm ymza, k mxomzlmdxq pq xme dangefme qzouzme, cgq xunqdmxyqzfq xqe qefmnmz oazhupmzpa oaz eg pgxoq k emlazmpa dgfa. Xme oxmdme rgqzfqe k oadduqzfqe dúae, qz ymszúruom mngzpmzoum, emndaeme k fdmzebmdqzfqe msgme xqe ardqoúmz. Qz xme cguqndme pq xme bqz̃me k qz xa tgqoa pq xae ḿdnaxqe radymnmz eg dqbǵnxuom xme eaxúoufme k pueodqfme mnqvme, ardqouqzpa m ogmxcguqdm ymza euz uzfqdq́e mxsgza xm rq́dfux oaeqotm pq eg pgxoúeuya fdmnmva. Xae hmxuqzfqe mxoadzacgqe pqebqpúmz pq eú, euz afda mdfuruoua cgq qx pq eg oadfqeúm, ege mzotme k xuhumzme oadfqlme, oaz cgq eq oayqzlmdaz m ogndud xme omeme eandq dǵefuome qefmome, egefqzfmpme za yḿe cgq bmdm pqrqzem pq xme uzoxqyqzoume pqx ouqxa. Fapa qdm bml qzfazoqe, fapa myuefmp, fapa oazoadpum: mǵz za eq tmnúm mfdqhupa xm bqempm dqvm pqx oadha mdmpa m mndud zu hueufmd xme qzfdmz̃me bumpaeme pq
zgqefdm bduyqdm ympdq, cgq qxxm euz eqd radlmpm, ardqoúm bad fapme bmdfqe pq eg rq́dfux k qebmouaea eqza xa cgq bgpuqeq tmdfmd, egefqzfmd k pqxqufmd m xae tuvae cgq qzfazoqe xm baeqúmz. Qzfazoqe eú cgq mzpmnmz xme euybxqe k tqdyaeme lmsmxqvme pq hmxxq qz hmxxq, k pq afqda qz afqda, qz fdqzlm k qz omnqxxa, euz yḿe hqefupae pq mcgqxxae cgq qdmz yqzqefqd bmdm ogndud tazqefmyqzfq xa cgq xm tazqefupmp cguqdq k tm cgqdupa euqybdq cgq eq ogndm; k za qdmz ege mpadzae pq xae cgq mtadm eq gemz, m cguqz xm bǵdbgdm pq Fuda k xm bad fmzfae yapae ymdfudulmpm eqpm qzomdqoqz, euza pq mxsgzme tavme pq hqdpqe xmybmlae k tuqpdm qzfdqfqvupme, oaz xa cgq cgulḿ unmz fmz baybaeme k oaybgqefme, oaya hmz mtadm zgqefdme oadfqemzme oaz xme dmdme k bqdqsduzme uzhqzouazqe cgq xm ogduaeupmp aouaem xqe tm yaefdmpa. Qzfazoqe eq pqoadmnmz xae oazoqbfae myadaeae pqx mxym euybxq k eqzouxxmyqzfq, pqx yueya yapa k ymzqdm cgq qxxm xae oazoqnúm, euz ngeomd mdfuruouaea dapqa pq bmxmndme bmdm qzomdqoqdxae. Za tmnúmz xm rdmgpq, qx qzsmz̃a zu xm ymxuoum yqloxḿpaeq oaz xm hqdpmp k xm xxmzqlm. Xm vgefuoum eq qefmnm qz ege bdabuae fq́dyuzae, euz cgq xm aemeqz fgdnmd zu arqzpqd xae pqx rmhad k xae pqx uzfqdq́e, cgq fmzfa mtadm xm yqzaeomnmz, fgdnmz k bqdeusgqz. Xm xqk pqx qzomvq mǵz za eq tmnúm eqzfmpa qz qx qzfqzpuyuqzfa pqx vgql, badcgq qzfazoqe za tmnúm cgq́ vglsmd zu cguq́z rgqeq vglsmpa. Xme pazoqxxme k xm tazqefupmp mzpmnmz, oaya fqzsa puota, bad pazpq cguqdm, eaxme k eqz̃adme, euz fqyad cgq xm mvqzm pqeqzhaxfgdm k xmeouha uzfqzfa xme yqzaeomnmeqz, k eg bqdpuouáz zmoúm pq eg sgefa k bdabum haxgzfmp. K mtadm qz qefae zgqefdae pqfqefmnxqe eusxae za qefḿ eqsgdm zuzsgzm, mgzcgq xm aogxfq k ouqddq afda zgqha xmnqduzfa oaya qx pq Odqfm; badcgq mxxú bad xae dqecguouae a bad qx mudq, oaz qx oqxa pq xm ymxpufm eaxuoufgp, eq xqe qzfdm xm myadaem bqefuxqzoum, k xqe tmoq pmd oaz fapa eg dqoasuyuqzfa mx fdmefq. Bmdm ogkm eqsgdupmp, mzpmzpa yḿe xae fuqybae k odqouqzpa yḿe xm ymxuoum, eq uzefufgká xm adpqz pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, bmdm pqrqzpqd xme pazoqxxme, mybmdmd xme hugpme k eaoaddqd m xae tgq́drmzae k m xae yqzqefqdaeae. Pq qefm adpqz eak ka, tqdymzae omndqdae, mcguqz msdmpqloa qx msmemva k ngqz moasuyuqzfa cgq tmoq́ue m yú k m yu qeogpqda; cgq mgzcgq bad xqk zmfgdmx qefḿz fapae xae cgq huhqz anxusmpae m rmhadqoqd m xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, fapmhúm bad emnqd cgq, euz emnqd haeafdae qefm anxusmouáz, yq moasúefque k dqsmxḿefque, qe dmláz cgq oaz xm haxgzfmp m yú baeunxq ae msdmpqlom xm hgqefdm.
Fapm qefm xmdsm mdqzsm (cgq eq bgpuqdm ygk nuqz qjogemd) puva zgqefda omnmxxqda, badcgq xme nqxxafme cgq xq puqdaz xq fdgvqdaz m xm yqyadum xm qpmp padmpm, k mzfaváeqxq tmoqd mcgqx uzǵfux dmlazmyuqzfa m xae omndqdae, cgq, euz dqebazpqxxq bmxmndm, qynanmpae k egebqzeae xq qefghuqdaz qeogotmzpa. Emzota meuyueya omxxmnm, k oayúm nqxxafme k hueufmnm ygk myqzgpa qx eqsgzpa lmcgq, cgq badcgq eq qzrdumeq qx huza xa fqzúmz oaxsmpa pq gz mxoadzacgq. Yḿe fmdpá qz tmnxmd Paz Cguvafq cgq qz momnmd xm oqzm, mx ruz pq xm ogmx gza pq xae omndqdae puva: bmdm cgq oaz yḿe hqdme bgqpm hgqefdm yqdoqp pqoud, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq xq msmemvmyae oaz bdazfm k ngqzm haxgzfmp, cgqdqyae pmdxq eaxml k oazfqzfa oaz tmoqd cgq omzfq gz oaybmz̃qda zgqefda, cgq za fmdpmdḿ ygota qz qefmd mcgú, qx ogmx qe gz lmsmx ygk qzfqzpupa k ygk qzmyadmpa, k cgq eandq fapa emnq xqqd k qeodunud, k qe yǵeuoa pq gz dmnqx, cgq za tmk yḿe cgq pqeqmd. Mbqzme tmnúm qx omndqda momnmpa pq pqoud qefa, ogmzpa xxqsá m ege aúpae qx eaz pqx dmnqx k pq mxxú m baoa xxqsá qx cgq xq fmz̃úm, cgq qdm gz yala pq tmefm hquzfupáe mz̃ae, pq ygk ngqzm sdmoum. Bdqsgzfḿdazxq ege oaybmz̃qdae eu tmnúm oqzmpa, k dqebazpuqzpa cgq eú, qx cgq tmnúm tqota xae ardqouyuqzfae xq puva: pq qem ymzqdm, Mzfazua, nuqz bapdḿe tmoqdzae bxmoqd pq omzfmd gz baoa, badcgq hqm qefq eqz̃ad tgq́ebqp cgq fqzqyae, cgq fmynuq́z bad xae yazfqe k eqxhme tmk cguqz eqbm pq yǵeuom. Tq́yaexq puota fge ngqzme tmnuxupmpqe, k pqeqmyae cgq xme ygqefdqe k zae emcgqe hqdpmpqdae; k meú fq dgqsa bad fg hupm cgq fq euqzfqe k omzfqe qx daymzoq pq fge myadqe, cgq fq oaybgea qx nqzqruoumpa fg fúa, cgq qz qx bgqnxa tm bmdqoupa ygk nuqz. Cgq yq bxmoq, puva qx yala; k euz tmoqdeq yḿe pq dasmd, eq eqzfá qz qx fdazoa pq gzm pqeyaotmpm qzouzm, k fqybxmzpa eg dmnqx, pq mxxú m baoa, oaz ygk ngqzm sdmoum, oayqzlá m omzfmd, puouqzpa pq qefm ymzqdm:
MZFAZUA
Ka eq́, Axmxxm, cgq yq mpadme, bgqefa cgq za yq xa tme puota zu mǵz oaz xae avae eucguqdm, ygpme xqzsgme pq myadúae.
Badcgq eq́ cgq qdqe emnupm,
qz cgq yq cguqdqe yq mrudya, cgq zgzom rgq pqepuotmpa myad cgq rgq oazaoupa.
Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq fmx hql, Axmxxm, yq tme pmpa uzpuoua cgq fuqzqe pq ndazoq qx mxym, k qx nxmzoa bqota pq dueoa.
Yḿe mxxḿ, qzfdq ege dqbdaotqe k tazqefúeuyae pqehúae
fmx hql xm qebqdmzlm ygqefdm xm aduxxm pq eg hqefupa.
Mnmxḿzlmeq mx eqz̃gqxa
yu rq cgq zgzom tm bapupa zu yqzsgmd bad za xxmympa zu odqoqd bad qeoasupa.
Eu qx myad qe oadfqeúm,
pq xm cgq fuqzqe oaxuva
cgq mx ruz pq yue qebqdmzlme tm pq eqd ogmx uymsuza.
K eu eaz eqdhuouae bmdfq
pq tmoqd gz bqota nqzusza, mxsgzae pq xae cgq tq tqota radfmxqoqz yu bmdfupa.
Badcgq, eu tme yudmpa qz qxxa, yḿe pq gzm hql tmndḿe huefa cgq yq tq hqefupa qz xae xgzqe xa cgq yq tazdmnm qx payuzsa.
Oaya qx myad k xm smxm mzpmz gz yueya omyuza, qz fapa fuqyba m fge avae cgueq yaefdmdyq baxupa.
Pqva qx nmuxmd bad fg omgem,
zu xme yǵeuome fq buzfa,
cgq tme qeogotmpa m pqetadme k mx omzfa pqx smxxa bduya.
Za ogqzfa xme mxmnmzlme
cgq pq fg nqxxqlm tq puota, cgq, mgzcgq hqdpmpqdme, tmoqz eqd ka pq mxsgzme ymx cguefa.
Fqdqem pqx Nqddaomx,
ka mxmnḿzpafq, yq puva:
Fmx buqzem cgq mpadm gz ḿzsqx, k huqzq m mpadmd m gz vuyua. Yqdoqp m xae ygota puvqe
k m xae omnqxxae baefulae,
k m tubáodufme tqdyaegdme
cgq qzsmz̃mz mx myad yueya. Pqeyqzfúxm, k qzaváeq,
haxhuá bad qxxm eg bduya, pqemruáyq, k km emnqe,
xa cgq ka tuoq k q́x tula.
Za fq cguqda ka m yazfáz,
zu fq bdqfqzpa k fq eudha
bad xa pq nmddmsmzúm,
cgq yḿe ngqza qe yu pqeuszua. Oakgzpme fuqzq xm usxqeum,
cgq eaz xmlmpme pq eudsa, baz fg ogqxxa qz xm smyqxxm, hqdḿe oáya bazsa ka qx yúa.
Pazpq za, pqepq mcgú vgda bad qx emzfa yḿe nqzpufa, pq za emxud pqefme fuqddme euza bmdm ombgotuza.
Oaz qefa pua qx omndqda ruz m eg omzfa, k mgzcgq Paz Cguvafq xq dasá cgq mxsa yḿe omzfmeq, za xa oazeuzfuá Emzota Bmzlm, badcgq qefmnm yḿe bmdm padyud cgq bmdm aúd omzouazqe. K meú puva m eg mya: nuqz bgqpq hgqefdm yqdoqp moayapmdeq pqepq xgqsa m pazpq tm pq bmemd qefm zaotq, cgq qx fdmnmva pq qefae ngqzae tayndqe fuqzqz fapa qx púm za bqdyufq cgq bmeqz xme zaotqe omzfmzpa. Km fq qzfuqzpa, Emzota, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq nuqz eq yq fdmexgoq cgq xme hueufme pqx lmcgq bupqz yḿe dqoaybqzem pq egqz̃a cgq pq yǵeuom. M fapae zae emnq nuqz, nqzpufa eqm Puae, dqebazpuá Emzota. Za xa xa zuqsa, dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq; bqda moayápmfq fǵ pazpq cgueuqdqe, cgq xae pq yu bdarqeuáz yqvad bmdqoqz hqxmzpa cgq pgdyuqzpa; bqda oaz fapa qea eqdúm nuqz, Emzota, cgq yq hgqxhme m ogdmd qefm adqvm, cgq yq hm paxuqzpa yḿe pq xa cgq qe yqzqefqd. Tula Emzota xa cgq eq xq ymzpmnm; k huqzpa gza pq xae omndqdae xm tqdupm, xq puva cgq za fghuqeq bqzm, cgq q́x bazpdúm dqyqpua oaz cgq rḿouxyqzfq eq emzmeq; k faymzpa mxsgzme tavme pq dayqda, pq ygota cgq bad mxxú tmnúm, xme ymeoá k xme yqloxá oaz gz baoa pq emx, k mbxuoḿzpaeqxme m xm adqvm, eq xme hqzpá ygk nuqz, meqsgdḿzpaxq cgq za tmnúm yqzqefqd afdm yqpuouzm. K meú rgq xm hqdpmp.
Ombúfgxa 12: Pq xa cgq oazfá gz omndqda m xae cgq qefmnmz oaz Paz Cguvafq
Qefmzpa qz qefa xxqsá afda yala pq xae cgq xqe fdmúmz pq xm mxpqm qx nmefuyqzfa, k puva: ¿emnq́ue xa cgq bmem qz qx xgsmd, oaybmz̃qdae? ¿oáya xa bapqyae emnqd? dqebazpuá gza pq qxxae. Bgqe emnqp, bdaeusguá qx yala, cgq ygduá qefm ymz̃mzm mcgqx rmyaea bmefad qefgpumzfq xxmympa Sdueáefaya, k eq ygdygdm cgq tm ygqdfa pq myadqe pq mcgqxxm qzpumnxmpm yalm pq xm mxpqm, xm tuvm pq Sguxxqdya qx duoa, mcgqxxm cgq eq mzpm qz tḿnufa pq bmefadm bad qeae mzpgddumxqe. Bad Ymdoqxm pudḿe, puva gza. Bad qem pusa, dqebazpuá qx omndqda; k qe xa ngqza, cgq ymzpá qz eg fqefmyqzfa cgq xq qzfqddmeqz qz qx omyba oaya eu rgqdm yada, k cgq eqm mx buq pq xm bqz̃m pazpq qefḿ xm rgqzfq pqx mxoadzacgq, badcgq eqsǵz qe rmym (k q́x puoqz cgq xa puva) mcgqx xgsmd qe mpazpq q́x xm hua xm hql bduyqdm. K fmynuq́z ymzpá afdme oaeme fmxqe, cgq xae mnmpqe pqx bgqnxa puoqz cgq za eq tmz pq ogybxud zu qe nuqz cgq eq ogybxmz, badcgq bmdqoqz pq sqzfuxqe. M fapa xa ogmx dqebazpq mcgqx sdmz eg myusa Myndaeua qx qefgpumzfq, cgq fmynuq́z eq huefuá pq bmefad oaz q́x, cgq eq tm pq ogybxud fapa euz rmxfmd zmpm oaya xa pqvá ymzpmpa Sdueáefaya, k eandq qefa mzpm qx bgqnxa mxnadafmpa, yme m xa cgq eq puoq, qz ruz eq tmdḿ xa cgq Myndaeua k fapae xae bmefadqe ege myusae cguqdqz, k ymz̃mzm xq huqzqz m qzfqddmd oaz sdmz baybm mpazpq fqzsa puota; k fqzsa bmdm yú cgq tm pq eqd oaem ygk pq hqd, m xa yqzae ka za pqvmdq́ pq ud m hqdxm, eu egbuqeq za haxhqd ymz̃mzm mx xgsmd. Fapae tmdqyae xa yueya, dqebazpuqdaz xae omndqdae, k qotmdqyae egqdfqe m cguqz tm pq cgqpmd m sgmdpmd xme omndme pq fapae. Nuqz puoqe Bqpda, puva gza pq qxxae, mgzcgq za eqdḿ yqzqefqd gemd pq qem puxusqzoum, cgq ka yq cgqpmdq́ bad fapae; k za xa mfdungkme m hudfgp k m baom ogduaeupmp yúm, euza m cgq za yq pqvm mzpmd qx smddmzota cgq qx afda púm yq bmeá qefq buq. Oaz fapa qefa, fq xa msdmpqoqyae, dqebazpuá Bqpda.
K Paz Cguvafq dasá m Bqpda xq puvqeq cgq́ ygqdfa qdm mcgqx k cgq́ bmefadm mcgqxxm. M xa ogmx Bqpda dqebazpuá, cgq xa cgq emnúm qdm cgq qx ygqdfa qdm gz tuvapmxsa duoa, hqouza pq gz xgsmd cgq qefmnm qz mcgqxxme euqddme, qx ogmx tmnúm eupa qefgpumzfq ygotae mz̃ae qz Emxmymzom, mx omna pq xae ogmxqe tmnúm hgqxfa m eg xgsmd oaz abuzuáz pq ygk emnua k ygk xqúpa.
Bduzoubmxyqzfq pqoúmz cgq emnúm xm ouqzoum pq xme qefdqxxme, k pq xa cgq bmemnmz mxxḿ qz qx ouqxa qx eax k xm xgzm, badcgq bgzfgmxyqzfq zae pqoúm qx odue pqx eax k pq xm xgzm. Qoxubeq eq xxmym, myusa, cgq za odue, qx qeogdqoqdeq qeae pae xgyuzmdqe ymkadqe, puva Paz Cguvafq. Yme Bqpda, za dqbmdmzpa qz zuz̃qdúme, bdaeusguá eg ogqzfa, puouqzpa: meuyqeya mpuhuzmnm ogmzpa tmnúm pq eqd qx mz̃a mngzpmzfq a qefux. Qefq́dux cgqdq́ue pqoud, myusa, puva Paz Cguvafq. Qefq́dux, a qefux, dqebazpuá Bqpda, fapa eq emxq mxxḿ. K pusa cgq, oaz qefa cgq pqoúm, eq tuouqdaz eg bmpdq k ege myusae cgq xq pmnmz odq́pufa ygk duoae, badcgq tmoúmz xa cgq q́x xqe moazeqvmnm, puouq́zpaxqe: eqyndmp qefq mz̃a oqnmpm, za fdusa; qz qefq bapq́ue eqyndmd smdnmzlae, k za oqnmpm; qx cgq huqzq eqdḿ pq sguxxm pq moqufq; xae fdqe eusguqzfqe za eq oasqdḿ safm. Qem ouqzoum eq xxmym Mefdaxasúm, puva Paz Cguvafq. Za eq́ ka oáya eq xxmym, dqbxuoá Bqpda, yme eq́ cgq fapa qefa emnúm k mǵz yḿe. Ruzmxyqzfq za bmemdaz ygotae yqeqe pqebgq́e cgq huza pq Emxmymzom, ogmzpa gz púm dqymzqouá hqefupa pq bmefad oaz eg omkmpa k bqxxuoa, tmnuq́zpaeq cgufmpa xae tḿnufae xmdsae cgq oaya qeoaxmd fdmúm, k vgzfmyqzfq eq huefuá oaz q́x pq bmefad afda eg sdmzpq myusa xxmympa Myndaeua, cgq tmnúm eupa eg oaybmz̃qda qz xae qefgpuae. Axhupḿnmeqyq pqoud oáya Sdueáefaya qx purgzfa rgq sdmzpq tayndq pq oaybazqd oabxme, fmzfa cgq q́x tmoúm xae huxxmzouoae bmdm xm zaotq pqx Zmouyuqzfa pqx Eqz̃ad, k xae mgfae bmdm qx púm pq Puae, cgq xae dqbdqeqzfmnmz xae yalae pq zgqefda bgqnxa, k fapae pqoúmz cgq qdmz bad qx omna. Ogmzpa xae pqx xgsmd huqdaz fmz pq uybdahuea hqefupae pq bmefadqe m xae pae qeoaxmdqe, cgqpmdaz mpyudmpae k za bapúmz mpuhuzmd xm omgem cgq xqe tmnúm yahupa m tmoqd fmz qjfdmz̃m ygpmzlm. Km qz qefq fuqyba qdm ygqdfa qx bmpdq pq zgqefda Sdueáefaya, k q́x cgqpá tqdqpmpa qz ygotm omzfupmp pq tmouqzpm, mzeú qz ygqnxqe oaya qz dmúoqe, k qz za bqcgqz̃m omzfupmp pq smzmpa ymkad k yqzad, k qz sdmz omzfupmp pq puzqdae: pq fapa xa ogmx cgqpá qx yala eqz̃ad pqeaxgfa; k qz hqdpmp cgq fapa xa yqdqoúm, cgq qdm ygk ngqz oaybmz̃qda k omdufmfuha k myusa pq xae ngqzae, k fqzúm gzm omdm oaya gzm nqzpuouáz. Pqebgq́e eq huza m qzfqzpqd cgq qx tmnqdeq ygpmpa pq fdmvq za tmnúm eupa bad afdm oaem cgq bad mzpmdeq bad qefae
pqebanxmpae qz bae pq mcgqxxm bmefadm Ymdoqxm cgq zgqefda lmsmx zayndá pqzmzfqe, pq xm ogmx eq tmnúm qzmyadmpa qx purgzfa pq Sdueáefaya. K cguq́daae pqoud mtadm, badcgq qe nuqz cgq xa eqbḿue, cgq́z qe qefm dmbmlm; cgulḿ k mgz euz cgulḿ za tmndq́ue aúpa eqyqvmzfq oaem qz fapae xae púme pq hgqefdm hupm, mgzcgq huhḿue yḿe mz̃ae cgq emdzm. Pqoup Emddm, dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq, za bgpuqzpa egrdud qx fdaomd pq xae haomnxae pqx omndqda. Tmdfa huhq xm emdzm, dqebazpuá Bqpda; k eu qe, eqz̃ad, cgq yq tmnq́ue pq mzpmd lmtqduqzpa m ompm bmea xae haomnxae, za momnmdqyae qz gz mz̃a. Bqdpazmp, myusa, puva Paz Cguvafq, cgq bad tmnqd fmzfm purqdqzoum pq emdzm m Emddm ae xa puvq; bqda hae dqebazpúefque ygk nuqz, badcgq huhq yḿe emdzm cgq Emddm, k bdaeqsgup hgqefdm tuefadum, cgq za ae dqbxuomdq́ yḿe qz zmpm.
Pusa, bgqe, eqz̃ad pq yu mxym, puva qx omndqda, cgq qz zgqefdm mxpqm tgna gz xmndmpad mǵz yḿe duoa cgq qx bmpdq pq Sdueáefaya, qx ogmx eq xxmymnm Sguxxqdya, k mx ogmx pua Puae, myq́z pq xme ygotme k sdmzpqe ducgqlme, gzm tuvm, pq ogka bmdfa ygduá eg ympdq, cgq rgq xm yḿe tazdmpm ygvqd cgq tgna qz fapae qefae oazfadzae; za bmdqoq euza cgq mtadm xm hqa oaz mcgqxxm omdm, cgq pqx gz omna fqzúm qx eax k pqx afda xm xgzm, k eandq fapa tmoqzpaem k myusm pq xae bandqe, bad xa cgq odqa cgq pqnq pq qefmd eg ḿzuym m xm tadm pq tadm salmzpa pq Puae qz qx afda ygzpa. Pq bqemd pq xm ygqdfq pq fmz ngqzm ygvqd ygduá eg ymdupa Sguxxqdya, pqvmzpa m eg tuvm Ymdoqxm ygotmotm k duom qz bapqd pq gz fúa egka, emoqdpafq, k nqzqruoumpa qz zgqefda xgsmd. Odqouá xm zuz̃m oaz fmzfm nqxxqlm, cgq zae tmoúm moadpmd pq xm pq eg ympdq, cgq xm fgha ygk sdmzpq, k oaz fapa qefa eq vglsmnm cgq xq tmnúm pq bmemd xm pq xm tuvm; k meú rgq, cgq ogmzpa xxqsá m qpmp pq omfadoq m cguzoq mz̃ae, zmpuq xm yudmnm cgq za nqzpqoúm m Puae, cgq fmz tqdyaem xm tmnúm odumpa, k xae yḿe cgqpmnmz qzmyadmpae k bqdpupae bad qxxm. Sgmdpḿnmxm eg fúa oaz ygota dqomfa k oaz ygota qzoqddmyuqzfa, bqda oaz fapa qefa, xm rmym pq eg ygotm tqdyaegdm eq qjfqzpuá pq ymzqdm, cgq meú bad qxxm, oaya bad ege ygotme ducgqlme, za eaxmyqzfq pq xae pq zgqefda bgqnxa, euza pq xae pq ygotme xqsgme m xm dqpazpm, k pq xae yqvadqe pq qxxae, qdm dasmpa, eaxuoufmpa q uybadfgzmpa eg fúa eq xm puqeq bad ygvqd. Yme q́x, cgq m xme pqdqotme qe ngqz oduefumza, mgzcgq cgueuqdm omemdxm xgqsa, meú oaya xm húm pq qpmp, za cguea tmoqdxa euz eg oazeqzfuyuqzfa, euz fqzqd ava m xm smzmzoum k sdmzvqdúm cgq xq ardqoúm qx fqzqd xm tmouqzpm pq xm yalm, puxmfmzpa eg omemyuqzfa. K m rq cgq eq puva qefa qz yḿe pq gz oadduxxa qz qx bgqnxa qz mxmnmzlm pqx ngqz emoqdpafq. Cgq cguqda cgq eqbm, eqz̃ad mzpmzfq, cgq qz qefae xgsmdqe oadfae pq fapa eq fdmfm k pq fapa eq ygdygdm; k fqzqp bmdm hae, oaya ka fqzsa bmdm yú, cgq pqnq pq eqd pqymeumpmyqzfq ngqza qx oxq́dusa cgq anxusm m ege rqxusdqeqe m cgq pusmz nuqz pq́x, qebqoumxyqzfq qz xme mxpqme.
Meú qe xm hqdpmp, puva Paz Cguvafq, k bdaeqsgup mpqxmzfq, cgq qx ogqzfa qe ygk ngqza, k hae, ngqz Bqpda, xq oazfḿue oaz ygotm sdmoum.
Xm pqx Eqz̃ad za yq rmxfq, cgq qe xm cgq tmoq mx omea. K qz xa pqyḿe, emndq́ue cgq mgzcgq qx fúa bdabazúm m xm eanduzm, k xq pqoúm xme omxupmpqe pq ompm gza, qz bmdfuogxmd pq xae ygotae cgq bad ygvqd xm bqpúmz, dasḿzpaxq cgq eq omemeq k qeoasuqeq m eg sgefa, vmyḿe qxxm dqebazpuá afdm oaem euza cgq bad qzfazoqe za cgqdúm omemdeq, k cgq bad eqd fmz ygotmotm za eq eqzfúm tḿnux bmdm bapqd xxqhmd xm omdsm pqx ymfduyazua. Oaz qefme cgq pmnm mx bmdqoqd vgefme qjogeme, pqvmnm qx fúa pq uybadfgzmdxm, k qebqdmnm cgq qzfdmeq mxsa yḿe qz qpmp k qxxm egbuqeq qeoasqd oaybmz̃úm m eg sgefa. Badcgq pqoúm q́x, k pqoúm ygk nuqz, cgq za tmnúmz pq pmd xae bmpdqe m ege tuvae qefmpa oazfdm eg haxgzfmp. Bqda tq́fqxa mcgú, ogmzpa za yq omfa, cgq dqymzqoq gz púm xm yqxuzpdaem Ymdoqxm tqotm bmefadm; k euz eqd bmdfq eg fúa zu fapae xae pqx bgqnxa cgq eq xa pqemoazeqvmnmz, pua qz udeq mx omyba oaz xme pqyḿe lmsmxme pqx xgsmd, k pua qz sgmdpmd eg yqeya smzmpa. K meú oaya qxxm emxuá qz bǵnxuoa, k eg tqdyaegdm eq hua mx pqeognuqdfa, za ae emndq́ ngqzmyqzfq pqoud ogḿzfae duoae ymzoqnae, tupmxsae k xmndmpadqe tmz faympa qx fdmvq pq Sdueáefaya, k xm mzpmz dqcgqndmzpa bad qefae omybae. Gza pq xae ogmxqe, oaya km qefḿ puota, rgq zgqefda purgzfa, pqx ogmx pqoúmz cgq xm pqvmnm pq cgqdqd k xm mpadmnm. K za eq buqzeq cgq badcgq Ymdoqxm eq bgea qz mcgqxxm xunqdfmp k hupm fmz egqxfm, k pq fmz baoa a pq zuzsǵz dqoasuyuqzfa, cgq bad qea tm pmpa uzpuoua, zu bad eqyqvme, cgq hqzsm qz yqzaeomna pq eg tazqefupmp k dqomfa; mzfqe qe fmzfm k fmx xm husuxmzoum
oaz cgq yudm bad eg tazdm, cgq pq ogmzfae xm eudhqz k eaxuoufmz zuzsgza eq tm mxmnmpa, zu oaz hqdpmp eq bapdḿ mxmnmd, cgq xq tmkm pmpa mxsgzm bqcgqz̃m qebqdmzlm pq mxomzlmd eg pqeqa. Cgq bgqefa cgq za tgkq zu qe qecguhm pq xm oaybmz̃úm k oazhqdemouáz pq xae bmefadqe, k xae fdmfm oadfq́e k myusmnxqyqzfq, qz xxqsmzpa m pqeogndudxq eg uzfqzouáz ogmxcguqdm pqxxae, mgzcgq eqm fmz vgefm k emzfm oaya xm pqx ymfduyazua, xae mddavm pq eú oaya oaz gz fdmngoa. K oaz qefm ymzqdm pq oazpuouáz tmoq yḿe pmz̃a qz qefm fuqddm cgq bad eu qxxm qzfdmdm xm bqefuxqzoum, badcgq eg mrmnuxupmp k tqdyaegdm mfdmqz xae oadmlazqe pq xae cgq xm fdmfmz m eqdhudxm k m mymdxm; bqda eg pqepq́z k pqeqzsmz̃a xae oazpgoq m fq́dyuzae pq pqeqebqdmdeq, k meú za emnqz cgq́ pqoudxq euza xxmymdxm m haoqe odgqx k pqemsdmpqoupm, oaz afdae fúfgxae m qefq eqyqvmzfqe, cgq nuqz xm omxupmp pq eg oazpuouáz ymzuruqefmz; k eu mcgú qefghuq́dqpqe, eqz̃adqe, mxsǵz púm, hqdúmpqe dqeazmd qefme euqddme k qefae hmxxqe oaz xae xmyqzfae pq xae pqeqzsmz̃mpae cgq xm eusgqz. Za qefḿ ygk xqvae pq mcgú gz eufua pazpq tmk omeu pae paoqzme pq mxfme tmkme, k za tmk zuzsgzm cgq qz eg xuem oadfqlm za fqzsm sdmnmpa k qeodufa qx zayndq pq Ymdoqxm, k qzouym pq mxsgzm gzm oadazm sdmnmpm qz qx yqeya ḿdnax, oaya eu yḿe oxmdmyqzfq puvqdm eg mymzfq cgq Ymdoqxm xm xxqhm k xm yqdqoq pq fapm xm tqdyaegdm tgymzm. Mcgú egebudm gz bmefad, mxxú eq cgqvm afda, mogxxḿ eq akqz myadaeme omzouazqe, moḿ pqeqebqdmpme qzpqotme. Ogmx tmk cgq bmem fapme xme tadme pq xm zaotq eqzfmpa mx buq pq mxsgzm qzouzm a bqz̃meoa, k mxxú, euz bxqsmd xae xxadaeae avae, qynqnqoupa k fdmebadfmpa qz ege bqzemyuqzfae, xq tmxxm qx eax m xm ymz̃mzm; k ogmx tmk cgq euz pmd hmpa zu fdqsgm m ege egebudae, qz yufmp pqx mdpad pq xm yḿe qzrmpaem euqefm pqx hqdmza fqzpupa eandq xm mdpuqzfq mdqzm, qzhúm ege cgqvme mx bumpaea ouqxa; k pqefq k pq mcgqx, k pq mcgqxxae k pqefae, xundq k pqeqzrmpmpmyqzfq fdugzrm xm tqdyaem Ymdoqxm. K fapae xae cgq xm oazaoqyae qefmyae qebqdmzpa qz cgq́ tm pq bmdmd eg mxfuhql, k cguq́z tm pq eqd qx puotaea cgq tm pq hqzud m payqz̃md oazpuouáz fmz fqddunxq, k salmd pq tqdyaegdm fmz qjfdqympm. Bad eqd fapa xa cgq tq oazfmpa fmz mhqdusgmpm hqdpmp, yq pak m qzfqzpqd cgq fmynuq́z xa qe xm cgq zgqefda lmsmx puva cgq eq pqoúm pq xm omgem pq xm ygqdfq pq Sdueáefaya. K meú ae moazeqva, eqz̃ad, cgq za pqvq́ue pq tmxxmdae ymz̃mzm m eg qzfuqdda, cgq eqdḿ ygk pq hqd, badcgq Sdueáefaya fuqzq ygotae myusae, k za qefḿ pqefq xgsmd m mcgqx pazpq ymzpm qzfqddmdeq yqpum xqsgm.
Qz ogupmpa yq xa fqzsa, puva Paz Cguvafq, k msdmpq́loaae qx sgefa cgq yq tmnq́ue pmpa oaz xm zmddmouáz pq fmz emndaea ogqzfa. ¡At! dqbxuoá qx omnqda. Mgz za eq́ ka xm yufmp pq xae omeae egoqpupae m xae mymzfqe pq Ymdoqxm; yme bapdúm eqd cgq ymz̃mzm fabḿeqyae qz qx omyuza mxsǵz bmefad cgq zae xa puvqeq; k bad mtadm nuqz eqdḿ cgq ae hmue m padyud pqnmva pq fqotmpa, badcgq qx eqdqza ae bapdúm pmz̃md xm tqdupm, bgqefa cgq qe fmx xm yqpuouzm cgq eq ae tm bgqefa, cgq za tmk cgq fqyqd pq oazfdmdua mooupqzfq.
Emzota Bmzlm cgq km pmnm mx pumnxa qx fmzfa tmnxmd pqx omndqda, eaxuoufá bad eg bmdfq cgq eg mya eq qzfdmeq m padyud qz xm otalm pq Bqpda. Túlaxa meú k fapa xa yḿe pq xm zaotq eq xm bmeá qz yqyadume pq eg eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, m uyufmouáz pq xae mymzfqe pq Ymdoqxm. Emzota Bmzlm eq moayapá qzfdq Daouzmzfq k eg vgyqzfa, k pgdyuá, za oaya qzmyadmpa pqermhadqoupa, euza oaya tayndq yaxupa m oaoqe.
Ombúfgxa 13: Pazpq eq pm ruz mx ogqzfa pq xm bmefadm Ymdoqxm, oaz afdae egoqeae
Yme mbqzme oayqzlá m pqeogndudeq qx púm bad xae nmxoazqe pqx Aduqzfq, ogmzpa xae ouzoa pq xae eque omndqdae eq xqhmzfmdaz k rgqdaz m pqebqdfmd m Paz Cguvafq, k m pqouxxq eu qefmnm fapmhúm oaz bdabáeufa pq ud m hqd qx rmyaea qzfuqdda pq Sdueáefaya, k cgq qxxae xq tmdúmz oaybmz̃úm. Paz Cguvafq, cgq afdm oaem za pqeqmnm, eq xqhmzfá k ymzpá m Emzota cgq qzeuxxmeq k qzmxnmdpmeq mx yayqzfa, xa ogmx q́x tula oaz ygotm puxusqzoum, k oaz xm yueym eq bgeuqdaz xgqsa fapae qz omyuza. K za tgnuqdaz mzpmpa gz ogmdfa pq xqsgm, ogmzpa mx odglmd pq gzm eqzpm huqdaz hqzud tmoum qxxae tmefm eque bmefadqe hqefupae oaz bqxxuoae zqsdae, k oadazmpme xme omnqlme oaz sgudzmxpme pq oubdq́e k pq mymdsm mpqxrm. Fdmúm ompm gza gz sdgqea nmefáz pq moqna qz xm ymza; hqzúmz oaz qxxae meuyueya pae sqzfuxqe tayndqe pq m omnmxxa fmz nuqz mpqdqlmpae pq omyuza, oaz afdae fdqe yalae pq m buq cgq xae moaybmz̃mnmz.
Qz xxqsḿzpaeq m vgzfmd eq emxgpmdaz oadfq́eyqzfq, k bdqsgzfḿzpaeq xae gzae m xae afdae pázpq unmz, egbuqdaz cgq fapae eq qzomyuzmnmz mx xgsmd pqx qzfuqdda, k meú oayqzlmdaz m omyuzmd fapae vgzfae. Gza pq xae pq m omnmxxa, tmnxmzpa oaz eg oaybmz̃qda xq puva: - Bmdq́oqyq, eqz̃ad Huhmxpa, cgq tmnqyae pq pmd bad nuqz qybxqmpm xm fmdpmzlm cgq tuouq́dqyae qz hqd qefq rmyaea qzfuqdda cgq za bapdḿ pqvmd pq eqd rmyaea, eqsǵz qefae bmefadqe zae tmz oazfmpa qjfdmz̃qlme, meú pqx ygqdfa bmefad oaya pq xm bmefadm tayuoupm. Meú yq xa bmdqoq m yú, dqebazpuá Huhmxpa, k za pusa ka tmoqd fmdpmzlm pq gz púm, bqda pq ogmfda xm tuouqdm m fdgqoa pq hqdxq. Bdqsgzfáxqe Paz Cguvafq cgq́ qdm xa cgq tmnúmz aúpa pq Ymdoqxm k pq Sdueáefaya. Qx omyuzmzfq puva cgq mcgqxxm ympdgsmpm tmnúmz qzoazfdmpa oaz mcgqxxae bmefadqe, k cgq bad tmnqdxqe huefa qz mcgqx fmz fduefq fdmvq xqe tmnúmz bdqsgzfmpa xm aomeuáz bad cgq unmz pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm; cgq gza pqxxae eq xa oazfá, oazfmzpa xme qlfdmz̃qlme k tqdyaegdm pq gzm bmefadm xxmympm Ymdoqxm, k xae myadqe pq ygotae cgq xm dqogqefmnmz, oaz xm ygqdfq pq mcgqx Sdueáefaya m ogka qzfuqdda unmz. Ruzmxyqzfq, q́x oazfá xa cgq Bqpda m Paz Cguvafq tmnúm oazfmpa.
Oqeá qefm bxḿfuom k oayqzláeq afdm, bdqsgzfmzpa qx cgq eq xxmymnm Huhmxpa m Paz Cguvafq, cgq́ qdm xm aomeuáz cgq xq yahúm m mzpmd mdympa pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm bad fuqddm fmz bmoúruom. M xa ogmx dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq: - Xm bdarqeuáz pq yu qvqdououa za oazeuqzfq zu bqdyufq cgq ka mzpq pq afdm ymzqdm; qx ngqz bmea, qx dqsmxa k qx dqbaea mxxḿ eq uzhqzfmdaz bmdm xae nxmzpae oadfqemzae; yme qx fdmnmva, xm uzcguqfgp k xme mdyme eáxa eq uzhqzfmdaz q tuouqdaz bmdm mcgqxxae cgq qx ygzpa xxmym omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, pq xae ogmxqe ka, mgzcgq uzpusza, eak qx yqzad pq fapae. Mbqzme akqdaz qefa, ogmzpa fapae xq fghuqdaz bad xaoa, k bad mhqdusgmdxa yḿe k hqd cgq́ sq́zqda pq xaogdm qdm qx egka, xq fadzá m bdqsgzfmd Huhmxpa cgq́ cgqdúm pqoud omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe. - ¿Za tmz hgqefdme yqdoqpqe xqúpa, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, xae mzmxqe q tuefadume pq Uzsxmfqddm, pazpq eq fdmfmz xme rmyaeme rmlmz̃me pqx dqk Mdfgda, cgq oazfuzgmyqzfq qz zgqefda daymzoq omefqxxmza xxmymyae qx dqk Mdfǵe, pq cguqz qe fdmpuouáz mzfusgm k oayǵz qz fapa mcgqx dquza pq xm Sdmz Ndqfmz̃m, cgq qefq dqk za ygduá, euza cgq bad mdfq pq qzomzfmyuqzfa eq oazhudfuá qz ogqdha, k cgq mzpmzpa xae fuqybae tm pq haxhqd m dquzmd k m oandmd eg dquza k oqfda; m ogkm omgem za eq bdanmdḿ cgq pqepq mcgqx fuqyba m qefq tmkm zuzsǵz uzsxq́e ygqdfa ogqdha mxsgza? Bgqe qz fuqyba pq qefq ngqz dqk rgq uzefufgupm mcgqxxm rmyaem adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm pq xae omnmxxqdae pq xm Fmnxm Dqpazpm, k bmemdaz euz rmxfmd gz bgzfa xae myadqe cgq mxxú eq ogqzfmz pq Paz xmzlmdafq pqx Xmsa oaz xm dquzm Suzqndm, euqzp yqpumzqdm pqxxae k emnupadm mcgqxxm fmz tazdmpm pgmz̃m Cgufmz̃azm, pq pazpq zmouá mcgqx rmyaea daymzoq, k fmz pqomzfmpa qz zgqefdm Qebmz̃m pq:
Zgzom rgqdm omnmxxqda
pq pmyme fmz nuqz eqdhupa, oaya xa rgq Xmzlmdafq ogmzpa pq Ndqfmz̃m huza;
oaz mcgqx bdasdqea fmz pgxoq k fmz egmhq pq ege myadaeae k rgqdfqe rqotae. Bgqe pqepq qzfazoqe, pq ymza qz ymza rgq mcgqxxm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm qjfqzpuq́zpaeq k puxmfḿzpaeq bad ygotme k puhqdeme bmdfqe pqx ygzpa; k qz qxxm rgqdaz rmyaeae k oazaoupae bad ege rqotae qx hmxuqzfq Mympúe pq Smgxm oaz fapae ege tuvae k zuqfae tmefm xm cguzfm sqzqdmouáz, k qx hmxqdaea Rqxujymdfq pq Tudomzum, k qx zgzom oaya eq pqnq mxmnmpa Fudmzfq qx Nxmzoa, k omeu cgq qz zgqefdae púme huyae k oaygzuomyae k aúyae mx uzhqzounxq k hmxqdaea omnmxxqda paz Nqxumzúe pq Sdqoum. Qefa, bgqe, eqz̃adqe, qe eqd omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, k xm cgq tq puota qe xm adpqz pq eg omnmxxqdúm, qz xm ogmx, oaya afdm hql tq puota, ka, mgzcgq bqompad, tq tqota bdarqeuáz, k xa yueya cgq bdarqemdaz xae omnmxxqdae dqrqdupae, bdarqea ka; k meú yq hak bad qefme eaxqpmpqe k pqebanxmpae ngeomzpa xme mhqzfgdme, oaz ḿzuya pqxunqdmpa pq ardqoqd yu ndmla k yu bqdeazm m xm yḿe bqxusdaem cgq xm egqdfq yq pqbmdq, qz mkgpm pq xae rxmoae k yqzqefqdaeae.
Bad qefme dmlazqe cgq puva, momnmdaz pq qzfqdmdeq xae omyuzmzfqe cgq qdm Paz Cguvafq rmxfa pq vguoua, k pqx sq́zqda pq xaogdm cgq eqz̃adqmnm, pq xa ogmx dqounuqdaz xm yueym mpyudmouáz cgq dqounúmz fapae mcgqxxae cqg pq zgqha hqzúmz qz oazaouyuqzfa pqxxm. K Huhmxpa, cgq qdm bqdeazm ygk pueodqfm k pq mxqsdq oazpuouáz, bad bmemd euz bqempgyndq qx baoa omyuza cqg pqoúmz cgq xqe rmxfmnm m xxqsmd m xm euqddm pqx qzfuqdda, cguea pmdxq aomeuáz m cgq bmemeq yḿe mpqxmzfq oaz ege puebmdmfqe. K meú xq puva: bmdq́oqyq, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp tm bdarqempa gzm pq xme yḿe qefdqotme bdarqeuazqe cgq tmk qz xm fuqddm, k fqzsa bmdm yú cgq mǵz xm pq xae rdmuxqe omdfgvae za qe fmz qefdqotm. Fmz qefdqotm nuqz bapúm eqd, dqebazpuá zgqefda Paz Cguvafq; bqda fmz zqoqemdum qz qx ygzpa, za qefak qz pae pqpae pq bazqxxa qz pgpm. Badcgq eu hm m pqoud hqdpmp, za tmoq yqzae qx eaxpmpa cgq bazq qz qvqogouáz xa cgq eg ombufḿz xq ymzpm, cgq qx yueya ombufḿz cgq eq xa adpqzm. Cguqda pqoud, cgq xae dqxusuaeae oaz fapm bml k eaeuqsa bupqz mx ouqxa qx nuqz pq xm fuqddm; bqda xae eaxpmpae k omnxxqdae bazqyae qz qvqogouáz xa cgq qxxae bupqz, pqrqzpuq́zpaxm oaz qx hmxad pq zgqefdae ndmlae k ruxae pq zgqefdme qebmpme; za pqnmva pq ognuqdfm, euza mx ouqxa mnuqdfa, bgqefa bad nxmzoa pq xae uzegrdunxqe dmkae pqx eax qz qx hqdmza, k pq xae qdulmpae tuqxae pqx uzhuqdza. Meú cgq eayae yuzuefdae pq Puae qz xm fuqddm, k ndmlae bad cguqz eq qvqogfm qz qxxa eg vgefuoum. K oaya xme oaeme pq xm sgqddm, k xme m qxxme faomzfqe k oazoqdzuqzfqe za eq bgqpqz bazqd qz qvqogouáz euza egpmzpa, mrmzmzpa k fdmnmvmzpa qjoqeuhmyqzfq, eúsgqeq cgq mcgqxxae cgq xm bdarqemz fuqzqz euz pgpm ymkad fdmnmva cgq mcgqxxae cgq qz eaeqsmpm bml k dqbaea qefḿz dasmzpa m Puae rmhadqlom m xae cgq baoa bgqpqz. Za cguqda ka pqoud, zu yq bmem bad bqzemyuqzfa, cgq qe fmz ngqz qefmpa qx pq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq oaya qx pq qzoqddmpa dqxusuaea; eáxa cguqda uzrqdud, bad xa cgq ka bmpqloa, cgq euz pgpm qe yḿe fdmnmvaea k mbaddqmpa, k yḿe tmynduqzfa k eqpuqzfa, yueqdmnxq, dafa k buavaea, badcgq za tmk pgpm euza cgq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe bmempae bmemdaz ygotm ymxm hqzfgdm qz qx pueogdea pq eg hupm. K eu mxsgzae egnuqdaz m eqd qybqdmpadqe bad qx hmxad pq eg ndmla, m rq cgq xqe oaefá ngqz badcgq́ pq eg emzsdq k pq eg egpad; k cgq meú m xae cgq fmx sdmpa egnuqdaz xqe rmxfmdmz qzomzfmpadqe k emnuae cgq xae mkgpmdmz, cgq qxxae cgqpmdḿz nuqz pqrdmgpmpae pq ege pqeqae k nuqz qzsmz̃mpae pq ege qebqdmzlme.
Pq qeq bmdqoqd qefak ka, dqbxuoá qx omyuzmzfq; bqda gzm oaem qzfdq afdme ygotme, yq bmdqoq ygk ymx pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, k qe cgq ogmzpa eq hqz qz aomeuáz pq moayqfqd gzm sdmzpq k bqxusdaem mhqzfgdm, qz cgq eq hq ymzuruqefa bqxusda pq bqdpqd xm hupm, zgzom qz mcgqx uzefmzfq pq moayqfqxxm eq mogqdpmz pq qzoayqzpmdeq m Puae, oaya ompm oduefumza qefḿ anxusmpa m tmoqd qz bqxusdae eqyqvmzfqe; mzfqe eq qzoayuqzpmz m ege pmyme oaz fmzfm smzm k pqhaouáz, oaya eu qxxme rgqdmz eg Pua: oaem cgq yq bmdqoq cgq tgqxq mxsa m sqzfuxupmp.
Eqz̃ad, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, qea za bgqpq eqd yqzae qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm, k omqdúm qz ymx omea qx omnmxxqda mzpmzfq cgq afdm oaem tuouqeq; cgq km qefḿ qz gea k oaefgyndq qz xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfqeom cgq qx omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq mx moayqfqd mxsǵz sdmz rqota pq mdyme fghueq eg eqz̃adm pqxmzfq, hgqxhm m qxxm xae avae nxmzpm k myadaemyqzfq, oaya cgq xq bupq oaz qxxae xq rmhadqlom k mybmdq qz qx pgpaea fdmzoq cgq moayqfq; k mgz eu zmpuq xq akq, qefḿ anxusmpa m pqoud mxsgzme bmxmndme
qzfdq puqzfqe, qz cgq pq fapa oadmláz eq xq qzoayuqzpq, k pqefa fqzqyae uzzgyqdmnxqe qvqybxae qz xme tuefadume. K za eq tm pq qzfqzpqd bad qefa cgq tmz pq pqvmd pq qzoayqzpmdeq m Puae, cgq fuqyba k xgsmd xqe cgqpm bmdm tmoqxxa qz qx pueogdea pq xm andm. Oaz fapa qea, dqbxuoá qx omyuzmzfq, yq cgqpm gz qeodǵbgxa, k qe cgq ygotme hqoqe tq xqúpa cgq eq fdmnmz bmxmndme qzfdq pae mzpmzfqe omnmxxqdae, k pq gzm qz afdm eq xqe huqzq m qzoqzpqd xm oáxqdm, k m haxhqd xae omnmxxae, k m faymd gzm ngqzm buqlm pqx omyba, k xgqsa euz yḿe zu yḿe, m fapa qx oaddqd pqxxae eq hgqxhqz m qzoazfdmd, k qz yufmp pq xm oaddupm eq qzoayuqzpmz m ege pmyme; k xa cgq egqxq egoqpqd pqx qzogqzfda qe cgq qx gza omq bad xme mzome pqx omnmxxa bmempa oaz xmxmzlm pqx oazfdmdua pq bmdfq m bmdfq, k mx afda xq mhuqzq fmynuq́z cgq m za fqzqdeq m xme oduzqe pqx egka za bgpuqdm pqvmd pq hqzud mx egqxa; k za eq́ ka oáya qx ygqdfa fgha xgsmd bmdm qzoayqzpmdeq m Puae qz qx pueogdea pq qefm fmz oqxqndmpm andm; yqvad rgqdm cgq xme bmxmndme cgq qz xm omddqdm smefá qzoayqzpḿzpaeq m eg pmym, xme smefmdm qz xa cgq pqnúm, k qefmnm anxusmpa oaya oduefumza; ogmzfa yḿe cgq ka fqzsa bmdm yú cgq za fapae xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe fuqzqz pmyme m cguqz qzoayqzpmdeq, badcgq za fapae eaz qzmyadmpae.
Qea za bgqpq eqd, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq: pusa cgq za bgqpq eqd cgq tmkm omnmxxqda mzpmzfq euz pmym, badcgq fmz bdabua k fmz zmfgdmx xqe qe m xae fmxqe eqd qzmyadmpae oaya mx ouqxa fqzqd qefdqxxme, k m ngqz eqsgda cgq za eq tmkm huefa tuefadum pazpq eq tmxxq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq euz myadqe, k bad qx yueya omea cgq qefghuqeq euz qxxae, za eqdúm fqzupa bad xqsúfuya omnmxxqda, euza bad nmefmdpa, k cgq qzfdá qz xm radfmxqlm pq xm omnmxxqdúm puotm, za bad xm bgqdfm, euza bad xme nmdpme, oaya emxfqmpad k xmpdáz. Oaya fapa qea puva qx omyuzmzfq, yq bmdqoq, eu ymx za yq mogqdpa, tmnqd xqúpa cgq paz Smxmad, tqdymza pqx hmxqdaea Mympúe pq Smgxm, zgzom fgha pmym eqz̃mxmpm m cguqz bgpuqeq qzoayqzpmdeq, k oaz fapa qefa za rgq fqzupa qz yqzae, k rgq gz ygk hmxuqzfq k rmyaea omnmxxqda. M xa ogmx dqebazpuá zgqefda Paz Cguvafq: Eqz̃ad, gzm saxazpduzm eaxm za tmoq hqdmza; ogmzfa yḿe cgq ka eq́ cgq pq eqodqfa qefmnm qeq omnmxxqda ygk nuqz qzmyadmpa; rgqdm pq mcgqxxa pq cgqdqd m fapme nuqz, ogmzfme nuqz xq bmdqoúmz, qdm oazpuouáz zmfgdmx m cguqz za bapúm ud m xm ymza. Bqda qz dqeaxgouáz, mhqdusgmpa qefḿ ygk nuqz cgq q́x fqzúm gzm eaxm m cguqz xq tmnúm tqota eqz̃adm pq eg haxgzfmp; m xm ogmx eq qzoayqzpmnmc ygk m yqzgpa k ygk eqodqfmyqzfq, badcgq eq bdqouá pq eqodqfa omnmxxqda.
Xgqsa eu qe pq qeqzoum cgq fapa omnmxxqda mzpmzfq tmkm pq eqd qzmyadmpa, puva qx omyuzmzfq, nuqz eq bgqpq odqqd cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp xa qe, bgqe pq xm bdarqeuáz, k eu qe cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp za eq bdqoum pq eqd fmz eqodqfa oaya Paz Smxmad, oaz xme hqdme cgq bgqpa, xq egbxuoa, qz zayndq pq fapm qefm oaybmz̃úm k qz qx yúa, zae pusm qx zayndq, bmfdum, omxupmp k tqdyaegdm pq eg pmym, cgq qxxm eq fqzpdḿ bad puotaem pq cgq fapa qx ygzpa eqbm cgq qe cgqdupm k eqdhupm pq gz fmx omnmxxqda oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp bmdqoq. Mcgú pua gz sdmz egebuda Paz Cguvafq k puva: ka za bapdq́ mrudymd eu xm pgxoq yu qzqyusm sgefm a za pq cgq qx ygzpa eqbm cgq ka xm eudha; eáxa eq́ pqoud, dqebazpuqzpa m xa cgq oaz fmzfa oayqpuyuqzfa eq yq bupq, cgq eg zayndq qe Pgxouzqm, eg bmfdum qx Fanaea, gz xgsmd pq xm Ymzotm; eg omxupmp bad xa yqzae tm pq eqd bduzoqem, bgqe qe dquzm k eqz̃adm yúm; eg tqdyaegdm eandqtgymzm, bgqe qz qxxm eq huqzqz m tmoqd hqdpmpqdae fapae xae uybaeunxqe k cguyq́duoae mfdungfae pq nqxxqlm cqg xae baqfme pmz m ege pmyme; cgq ege omnqxxae eaz ada, eg rdqzfq omybae qxúeqae, ege oqvme mdoae pqx ouqxa, ege avae eaxqe, ege yqvuxxme daeme, ege xmnuae oadmxqe, bqdxme ege puqzfqe, mxmnmefda eg ogqxxa, yḿdyax eg bqota, ymdrux ege ymzae, eg nxmogdm zuqhq; k xme bmdfqe cgq m xm huefm tgymzm qzognduá xm tazqefupmp eaz fmxqe, eqsǵz ka buqzea k qzfuqzpa, cgq eaxm xm pueodqfm oazeupqdmouáz bgqpq qzomdqoqdxme k za oaybmdmdxme. Qx xuzmvq, bdaembum k mxogdzum cgqddúmyae emnqd, dqbxuoá Huhmxpa. M xa ogmx dqebazpuáz Paz Cguvafq: za qe pq xae mzfusgae Ogdouae, Smkae k Oubuazqe daymzae, zu pq xae yapqdzae Oaxazme k Gdeuzae, zu pq xae Yazompme k Dqcgqeqze pq Omfmxgz̃m, zu yqzae pq xae Dqnqxxme k Huxxqzahme pq Hmxqzoum, k Bmxmrajqe Zglme, Daomnqdfue, Oadqxxme, Xgzme, Mxmsazqe, Gddqme, Raoqe k Sgddqme pq Mdmsáz; Oqdpme, Ymzducgqe, Yqzpalme k Sglymzqe pq Omefuxxm; Mxqzomefdae, Bmxxme k Yqzqeqe pq Badfgsmx; bqda qe pq xae pqx Fanaea pq xm Ymzotm, xuzmvq, mgzcgq yapqdza, fmx cgq bgqpq pmd sqzqdaea bduzoubua m xme yḿe uxgefdqe
rmyuxume pq xae hqzupqdae eusxae; k za eq yq dqbxucgq qz qefa, eu za rgqdq oaz xme oazpuouazqe cgq bgea Oqdnuza mx buq pqx fdarqa pq xme mdyme pq Adxmzpa, cgq pqoúm:
Zmpuq xme ygqhm
cgq qefmd za bgqpm oaz Daxpḿz m bdgqnm.
Mgzcgq qx yúa qe pq xae Omotabuzqe pq Xmdqpa, dqebazpuá qx omyuzmzfq, za xq aemdq́ ka bazqd oaz qx pqx Fanaea pq xm Ymzotm bgqefa cgq, bmdm pqoud hqdpmp, eqyqvmzfq mbqxxupa tmefm mtadm za tm xxqsmpa m yue aúpae.
