Oaya qeq za tmndḿ xxqsmpa, dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq. Oaz sdmz mfqzouáz unmz qeogotmzpa fapae xae pqyḿe xm bxḿfuom pq xae pae, k mgz tmefm xae yueyae omndqdae k bmefadqe oazaouqdaz xm pqymeumpm rmxfm pq vguoua pq zgqefda Paz Cguvafq. Emzota Bmzlm bqzemnm cgq ogmzfa eg mya pqoúm qdm hqdpmp, emnuqzpa q́x cguq́z qdm, tmnuq́zpaxq oazaoupa pqepq eg zmouyuqzfa; k qz xa cgq pgpmnm mxsa qdm qz odqqd mcgqxxa pq xm xuzpm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, badcgq zgzom fmx zayndq zu fmx bduzoqem tmnúm xxqsmpa vmyḿe m eg zafuoum, mgzcgq huhúm fmz oqdom pqx Fanaea.
Qz qefme bxḿfuome unmz ogmzpa huqdaz cgq bad xm cguqndm cgq pae mxfme yazfmz̃me tmoúmz, nmvmnmz tmefm hquzfq bmefadqe, fapae oaz bqxxuoae pq zqsdm xmzm hqefupae, k oadazmpae oaz sgudzmxpme cgq, m xa cgq pqebgq́e bmdqouá, qdmz ogmx pq fqva k ogmx pq oubdq́e. Qzfdq eque pqxxae fdmúmz gzme mzpme, ognuqdfme pq ygotm puhqdeupmp pq rxadqe k pq dmyae. Xa ogmx, huefa bad gza pq xae omndqdae, puva: mcgqxxae cgq mxxú huqzqz eaz xae cgq fdmqz qx ogqdba pq Sdueáefaya, k qx buq pq mcgqxxm yazfmz̃m qe qx xgsmd pazpq q́x ymzpá cgq xq qzfqddmeqz. Bad qea eq puqdaz bduqem m xxqsmd, k rgq m fuqyba cgq km xae cgq hqzúmz tmnúmz bgqefa xme mzpme qz qx egqxa, k ogmfda pqxxae oaz msgpae buoae, qefmnmz omhmzpa xm eqbgxfgdm m gz xmpa pq gzm pgdm bqz̃m. Dqounuq́dazeq xae gzae k xae afdae oadfq́eyqzfq, k xgqsa, Paz Cguvafq, k xae cgq oaz q́x hqzúmz, eq bgeuqdaz m yudmd xme mzpme, k qz qxxme huqdaz ognuqdfa pq rxadqe gz ogqdba ygqdfa, k hqefupa oaya bmefad, pq qpmp mx bmdqoqd pq fdquzfm mz̃ae; k mgzcgq ygqdfa, yaefdmnm cgq huha tmnúm eupa pq daefda tqdyaea k pq puebaeuouáz smxxmdpm. Mxdqpqpad pq́x fqzúm qz xme yueyme mzpme mxsgzae xundae k ygotae bmbqxqe mnuqdfae k oqddmpae; k meú xae cgq qefae yudmnmz oaya xae cgq mndúmz xm eqbgxfgdm, k fapae xae pqyḿe cgq mxxú tmnúm, sgmdpmnmz gz ymdmhuxxaea euxqzoua, tmefm cgq gza pq xae cgq mx ygqdfa fdgvqdaz puva m afda: yudmp nuqz, Myndaeua, eu qe qefq qx xgsmd cgq Sdueáefaya puva, km cgq cgqdq́ue cgq fmz bgzfgmxyqzfq eq ogybxm xa cgq pqvá ymzpmpa qz eg fqefmyqzfa. Qefa qe, dqbazpuá Myndaeua, cgq ygotme hqoqe qz q́x yq oazfá yu pqepuotmpa myusa xm tuefadum pq eg pqehqzfgdm. Mxxú yq puva q́x cgq hua xm hql bduyqdm m mcgqxxm qzqyusm yadfmx pqx xuzmvq tgymza, k mxxú rgq fmynuq́z pazpq xm bduyqdm hql xq pqoxmdá eg bqzemyuqzfa fmz tazqefa oaya qzmyadmpa, k mxxú rgq xm ǵxfuym hql pazpq Ymdoqxm xq momná pq pqeqzsmz̃md k pqepqz̃md; pq egqdfq cgq bgea ruz m xm fdmsqpum pq eg yueqdmnxq hupm k mcgú, qz yqyadum pq fmzfme pqepuotme, cguea q́x cgq xq pqbaeufmeqz qz xme qzfdmz̃me pqx qfqdza axhupa. K haxhuq́zpaeq m Paz Cguvafq k m xae omyuzmzfqe, bdaeusguá puouqzpa: qeq ogqdba, eqz̃adqe, cgq oaz bumpaeae avae qefḿue yudmzpa, rgq pqbaeufmdua pq gz mxym qz cguqz qx ouqxa bgea uzruzufm bmdfq pq ege ducgqlme. Qeq qe qx ogqdba pq Sdueáefaya, cgq rgq ǵzuoa qz qx uzsqzua, eáxa qz xm oadfqeúm, qjfdqya qz xm sqzfuxqlm, rq́zuj qz xm myuefmp, ymszúruoa euz fmem, sdmhq euz bdqegzouáz, mxqsdq euz nmvqlm, k ruzmxyqzfq, bduyqda qz fapa xa cgq qe eqd ngqza, k euz eqsgzpa qz fapa xa cgq rgq ed pqepuotmpa. Cguea nuqz, rgq mnaddqoupa; mpadá, rgq pqepqz̃mpa; dasá m gzm ruqdm, uybadfgzá m gz yḿdyax, oadduá fdme qx huqzfa, pua haoqe m xm eaxqpmp, eudhuá m xm uzsdmfufgp, pq cguqz mxomzlá bad bdqyua eqd pqebava pq xm ygqdfq qz xm yufmp pq xm omddqdm pq eg hupm, m xm ogmx pua ruz gzm bmefadm, m cguqz q́x bdaogdmnm qfqdzulmd bmdm cgq huhuqdm qz xm yqyadum pq xme sqzfqe, ogmx xa bgpuqdmz yaefdmd nuqz qefae bmbqxqe cgq qefḿue yudmzpa, eu q́x za yq tgnuqdm ymzpmpa cgq xae qzfdqsmdm mx rgqsa qz tmnuqzpa qzfdqsmpa eg ogqdba m xm fuqddm. Pq ymkad dusad k odgqxpmp gemdq́ue hae oaz qxxae, puva Huhmxpa, cgq eg yueya pgqz̃a, bgqe za qe vgefa zu
moqdfmpa cgq eq ogybxm xm haxgzfmp pq cguqz xa adpqzm k mrgqdm pq fapa dmlazmnxq pueogdea; k za xq fghuqdm ngqza Mgsgefa Oq́emd, eu oazeuzfuqdm cgq eq bgeuqdm qz qvqogouáz xa cgq qx puhuza Ymzfgmza pqvá qz eg fqefmyqzfa ymzpmpa. Meú cgq, eqz̃ad Myndaeua, km cgq pque qx ogqdba pq hgqefda myusa m xm fuqddm, za cgqdḿue pmd ege qeodufae mx axhupa; cgq eu q́x adpqzá oaya msdmhumpa, za qe nuqz cgq hae ogybxḿue oaya uzpueodqfa, mzfqe tmoqp, pmzpa xm hupm m qefae bmbqxqe, cgq xm fqzsm euqybdq xm odgqxpmp pq Ymdoqxm, bmdm cgq eudhm pq qvqybxa qz xae fuqybae cgq qefḿz bad hqzud m xae huhuqzfqe, bmdm cgq eq mbmdfqz k tgkmz pq omqd qz eqyqvmzfqe pqebqz̃mpqdae; cgq km eq́ ka k xae cgq mcgú hqzuyae xm tuefadum pqefq hgqefda qzmyadmpa k pqeqebqdmpa myusa, k emnqyae xm myuefmp hgqefdm k xm aomeuáz pq eg ygqdfq, k xa cgq pqvá ymzpmpa mx momnmd pq xm hupm: pq xm ogmx xmyqzfmnxq tuefadum eq bgqpq emomd ogmzfm tmkm eupa xm odgqxpmp pq Ymdoqxm, qx myad pq Sdueáefaya, xm rq pq xm myuefmp hgqefdm, oaz qx bmdmpqda cgq fuqzqz xae cgq m duqzpm egqxfm oaddqz bad xm eqzpm cgq qx pqehmdumpa myad pqxmzfq pq xae avae xqe bazq. Mzaotq egbuyae xm ygqdfq pq Sdueáefaya, k cgq qz qefq xgsmd tmnúm pq eqd qzfqddmpa, k meú pq ogduaeupmp k pq xḿefuym pqvmyae zgqefda pqdqota humvq, k moadpmyae pq hqzud m hqd oaz xae avae xa cgq fmzfa zae tmnúm xmefuympa qz aúxxa; k qz bmsa pqefm xḿefuym k pqx pqeqa cgq qz zaeafdae zmouá pq dqyqpumxxm eu bgpuq́dmyae, ae dasmyae, at pueodqfa Myndaeua, m xa yqzae ka ae xa egbxuoa pq yu bmdfq, cgq pqvmzpa pq mndmemd qefae bmbqxqe, yq pqvq́ue xxqhmd mxsgzae pqxxae. K euz msgmdpmd cgq qx bmefad dqebazpuqeq, mxmdsá xm ymza k fayá mxsgzae pq xae cgq yḿe oqdom qefmnmz. Huqzpa xa ogmx Myndaeua, puva: bad oadfqeúm oazeqzfudq́ cgq ae cgqpq́ue, eqz̃ad, oaz xae cgq km tmnq́ue faympa; bqda bqzemd cgq pqvmdq́ pq cgqymd xae cgq cgqpmz qe bqzemyuqzfa hmza. Huhmxpa, cgq pqeqmnm hqd xa cgq xae bmbqxqe pqoúmz, mnduá xgqsa qx gza pqxxae, k hua cgq fqzúm bad fúfgxa: Omzouáz pqeqebqdmpm. Akáxa Myndaeua k puva: qeq qe qx ǵxfuya bmbqx cgq qeodunuá qx pqepuotmpa k badcgq hqḿue, eqz̃ad, qz qx fq́dyuza cgq xq fqzúmz ege pqehqzfgdme, xqqpxq pq yapa cgq eqḿue aúpa, gq nuqz ae pmdḿ xgsmd m qxxa qx cgq eq fmdpmdq qz mndud xm eqbgxfgdm. Qea tmdq́ ka pq ygk ngqzm smzm, puva Huhmxpa. K oaya fapae xae oudogzefmzfqe fqzúmz qx yueya pqeqa, eq bgeuqdaz m xm dqpazpm, k q́x, xqkqzpa qz hal oxmdm, hua cgq meú pqoúm:

K mx bmd pq yu pqeqa cgq eq qergqdlm m pqoud yu paxad k fge tmlmz̃me,
pq xm qebmzfmnxq hal udḿ qx moqzfa,
k qz q́x yqloxmpae bad ymkad fadyqzfa bqpmlae pq xme yúeqdme qzfdmz̃me.
Qeogotm, bgqe, k bdqefm mfqzfa aúpa za mx oazoqdfmpa eaz, euza mx dgupa cgq pq xa tazpa pq yu mymdsa bqota, xxqhmpa pq gz radlaea pqehmdúa,
bad sgefa yúa emxq k fg pqebqota.
Qx dgsud pqx xqáz, pqx xana ruqda
qx fqyqdaea mgxxupa, qx euxna taddqzpa pq qeomyaem eqdbuqzfq, qx qebmzfmnxq
Nnmxmpda pq mxsǵz yazefdga, qx msadqda sdmlzmd pq xm oadzqvm, k qx qefdgqzpa pqx huqzfa oazfdmefmpa qz ymd uzqefmnxq:
Pqx km hqzoupa fada qx uybxmomnxq ndmyupa, k pq xm hugpm fadfaxuxxm
qx eqzeunxq mddgxxmd, qx fduefq omzfa pqx qzhugpmpa ngta, oaz qx xxmzfa pq fapm xm uzrqdzmx zqsdm ogmpduxxm,
Emxsmz oaz xm paxuqzfq ḿzuym rgqdm, yqloxmpae qz gz eaz pq fmx ymzqdm cgq eq oazrgzpmz xae eqzfupae fapae, bgqe xm bqzm odgqx cgq qz yú eq tmxxm bmdm oazfmdxm bupq zgqhae yapae.
Pq fmzfm oazrgeuáz, za xme mdqzme
pqx bmpdq Fmva audḿz xae fduefqe qoae,
zu pqx rmyaea Nqfue xme axuhme:
cgq mxxú eq qebmdoudḿz yue pgdme bqzme qz mxfae dueoae k qz bdargzpae tgqoae, oaz ygqdfm xqzsgm k oaz bmxmndme huhme;
A km qz aeogdae hmxxqe a qz qecguhme bxmkme pqezgpme pq oazfdmfa tgymza,
a mpazpq qx eax vmyḿe yaefdá eg xgyndq, a qzfdq xm hqzqzaem ygotqpgyndq,
pq ruqdme cgq mxuyqzfm qx Zuexa xxmza:
Cgq bgqefae qz xae bḿdmyae pqeuqdfae xae qoae dazoae pq yu ymx uzouqdfae egqzqz oaz fg dusad fmz euz eqsgzpa, bad bduhuxqsua pq yue oadfae tmpae eqdḿz xxqhmpae bad qx mzota ygzpa.
Ymfm gz pqepq́z, mfqddmpm bmouqzoum a hqdpmpqdm a rmxem gzm eaebqotm; ymfm xae oqxae oaz dusad fmz rgqdfq;
Pqeoazouqdfm xm hupm xmdsm mgeqzoum; oazfdm gz fqyad pq axhupa za mbdahqotm rudyq qebqdmzlm pq puotaem egqdfq.
Qz fapa tmk ouqdfm, uzqhufmnxq ygqdfq; yme ka, ¡yuxmsda zgzom huefa! huha oqxaea, mgeqzfq, pqepqz̃mpa k ouqdfa
pq xme eaebqotme cgq yq fuqzqz ygqdfa: k qz qx axhupa qz cguqz yu rgqsa mhuha.
K qzfdq fmzfae fadyqzfae, zgzom mxomzlm yu huefm m hqd qz eayndm m xm qebqdmzlm; zu ka pqeqebqdmpa xm bdaogda,
mzfqe bad qjfdqymdyq qz yu cgqdqxxm, qefmd euz qxxm qfqdzmyqzfq vgda. ¿Bgq́pqeq bad hqzfgdm qz gz uzefmzfq qebqdmd k fqyqd, a qe nuqz tmoqxxa, euqzpa xme omgeme pqx fqyad yḿe ouqdfme? ¿Fqzsa, eu qx pgda oqxa qefḿ pqxmzfq,
pq oqddmd qefae avae, eu tq pq hqxxa
bad yux tqdupme qz qx mxym mnuqdfme? ¿Cguq́z za mndudḿ pq bmd qz bmd xme bgqdfme m xm pqeoazrumzlm, ogmzpa yudm pqeognuqdfa qx pqepq́z, k xme eaebqotme ¡At mymdsm oazhqdeuáz! hqdpmpqe tqotme, k xm xuybum hqdpmp hgqxfm qz yqzfudm?
¡At qz qx dquza pq myad ruqdae fudmzae oqxae! bazqpyq gz tuqdda qz qefme ymzae. Pmy, pqepq́z, gzm fadoupm easm.
¡Yme mk pq yú! cgq oaz odgqx huofadum hgqefdm yqyadum qx egrduyuqzfa mtasm.
Ka ygqda, qz ruz, k badcgq zgzom qebqdq, ngqz egoqea qz xm ygqdfq zu qz xm hupm, bqdfuzml qefmdq́ qz yu rmzfmeúm:
Pudq́ cgq hm moqdfmpa qx cgq nuqz cguqdq k cgq qe yḿe xundq qx mxym yḿe dqzpupm m xm pq myad mzfusgm fudmzúm.
Pudq́ cgq xm qzqyusm euqybdq yúm, tqdyaem qx mxym oaya qx ogqdba fuqzq, k cgq eg axhupa pq yu ogxbm zmoq,
k cgq qz rq pq xae ymxqe cgq zae tmoq myad eg uybqdua qz vgefm bml ymzfuqzq.
K oaz qefm abuzuáz k gz pgda xmla, moqxqdmzpa qx yueqdmnxq bxmla
m cgq yq tmz oazpgoupa ege pqepqzqe, ardqoqdq́ m xae huqzfae ogqdba k mxym euz xmgda a bmxym pq rgfgdae nuqzqe.
Fǵ, cgq oaz fmzfme euzdmlazqe ygqefdme xm dmláz cgq yq rgqdlm m cgq xm tmsm
m xm omzempm hupm cgq mnaddqloa;
bgqe km hqe cgq fq pm zafadume ygqefdme qefm pqx oadmláz bdargzpm xxmsm,
pq oáya mxqsdq m fg dusad yq ardqloa;
Eu bad puotm oazaoqe cgq yqdqloa cgq qx ouqxa oxmda pq fge nqxxae avae qz yu ygqdfq eq fgdnq, za xa tmsme, cgq za cguqda cgq qz zmpm emfuermsme mx pmdfq pq yu mxym xae pqebavae.
Mzfqe oaz duem qz xm aomeuáz rgzqefm pqeogndq cgq qx ruz yúa rgq fg ruqefm. Yme sdmz euybxqlm qe mhuemdfq pqefa, bgqe eq́ cgq qefḿ fg sxadum oazaoupm
qz cgq yu hupm xxqsgq mx ruz fmz bdqefa.
Hqzsm, qe fuqyba km, pqx tazpa mnueya fḿzfmxa oaz eg eqp, Eúeura hqzsm
oaz qx bqea fqddunxq pq eg omzfa.
Fuoua fdmusm gz ngufdq, k meuyueya oaz eg dgqpm Qsuáz za eq pqfqzsm, zu xme tqdymzme cgq fdmnmvmz fmzfa.
K fapae vgzfae eg yadfmx cgqndmzfa fdmexmqz qz yu bqota, k qz hal nmvm
(eu k m gz pqeqebqdmpa eaz pqnupme)
omzfqz aneqcgume fduefqe, paxadupme,
mx ogqdba m cguqz eq zuqsgq mgz xm yadfmvm.
K qx badfqda uzrqdzmx pq xae fdqe daefdae, oaz afdme yux cguyqdme k yux yaefdgae xxqhqz qz paxadaea oazfdmbgzfa,
cgq afdm baybm yqvad za yq bmdqoq cgq xm yqdqoq gz mympad purgzfa.
Omzouáz pqeqebqdmpm, za fq cgqvqe ogmzpa yu fduefq oaybmz̃úm pqvqe; mzfqe, bgqe, cgq xm omgem pa zmouefq oaz yu pqepuotm mgyqzfm eg hqzfgdm, mgz qz xm eqbgxfgdm za qefq́e fduefq.
Nuqz xqe bmdqouá m xae cgq qeogotmpa tmnúmz xm omzouáz pq Sdueáefaya, bgqefa, cgq qx cgq xm xqká puva cgq za xq bmdqoúm cgq oazradymnm oaz xm dqxmouáz cgq q́x tmnúm aúpa pqx dqomfa k nazpmp pq Ymdoqxm, badcgq qz qxxm eq cgqvmnm Sdueáefaya pq oqxae, eaebqotme k pq mgeqzoum, fapa qz bqdvguoua pqx ngqz odq́puffa k ngqzm rmym pq Ymdoqxm, m xa ogmx dqebazpuá Myndaeua, oaya mcgqx cgq emnúm nuqz xae yḿe
qeoazpupae bqzemyuqzfae pq eg myusa; bmdm cgq, eqz̃ad, ae emfuermsḿue pqem pgpm, qe nuqz cgq eqbḿue cgq ogmzpa qefq pqepuotmpa qeodunuá qefm omzouáz qefmnm mgeqzfq pq Ymdoqxm, pq cguqz eq tmnúm mgeqzfmpa bad eg haxgzfmp, bad hqd eu gemnm oaz q́x xm mgeqzoum pq ege adpuzmduae rgqdae; k oaya mx qzmyadmpa mgeqzfq za tmk oaem cgq za xa rmfusgq, zu fqyad cgq za xq pq́ mxomzoq, meú xq rmfusmnmz m Sdueáefaya xae oqxae uymsuzmpae k xme eaebqotme fqyupme oaya eu rgqdmz hqdpmpqdme; k oaz qefa cgqpm qz eg bgzfa xm hqdpmp cgq xm rmym bdqsazm pq xm nazpmp pq Ymdoqxm; xm ogmx rgqdm pq eqd odgqx k gz baoa mddasmzfq, k gz ygota pqepqz̃aem, xm yueym qzhupum zu pqnq zu bgqpq bazqdxq rmxfm mxsgzm. Meú qe xm hqdpmp, dqebazpuá Huhmxpa; k cgqduqzpa xqqd afda bmbqx pq xaae cgq tmnúm dqeqdhmpa pqx rgqsa, xa qefadná gzm ymdmhuxxaem hueuáz (cgq fmx bmdqoúm qxxm) cgq uybdahuemyqzfq eq xqe ardqouá m xae avae, k rgq cgq, bad ouym pq xm bqz̃m pazpq eq omhmnm xm eqbgxfgdm, bmdqouá xm bmefadm Ymdoqxm fmz tqdyaem, cgq bmemnm m eg rmym qz tqdyaegdm. Xae cgq tmefm qzfazoqe za xm tmnúmz huefa xm yudmnmz oaz mpyudmouáz k euxqzoua, k xae cgq km qefmnmz moaefgyndmpae m hqdxm za cgqpmdaz yqzae egebqzeae cgq xae cgq zgzom xm tmnúmz huefa. Yme mbqzme xm tgna huefa Myndaeua, ogmzpa oaz ygqefdme pq ḿzuya uzpuszmpa, xq puva: ¿huqzqe m hqd bad hqzfgdm, at ruqda nmeuxueoa pqefme yazfmz̃me, eu oaz fg bdqeqzoum huqdfqz emzsdq xme tqdupme pqefq yueqdmnxq m cguqz fg odgqxpmp cgufá xm hupm; a huqzqe m grmzmdfq qz xme odgqxqe tmlmz̃me pq fg oazpuouáz, a m hqd pqepq qem mxfgdm, oaya afda pqebumpmpa Zqda, qx uzoqzpua pq eg mndmempm Daym, a m buemd mddasmzfq qefq pqepuotmpa ompḿhqd, oaya xm uzsdmfm tuvm mx pq eg bmpdq Fmdcguza? Puzae bdqefa m xa cgq huqzqe, a cgq́ qe mcgqxxa pq cgq yḿe sgefme, cgq bad emnqd ka cgq xae bqzemyuqzfae pq Sdueáefaya vmyḿe pqvmdaz pq anqpqoqdfq qz hupm, tmdq́ cgq, mgz q́x ygqdfa, fq anqpqlomz xae pq fapae mcgqxxae cgq eq xxmymdaz ege myusae.
Za hqzsa, at Myndaeua, m zuzsgzm oaem pq xme cgq tme puota, dqebazpuá Ymdoqxm, euza m haxhqd bad yú yueym, k m pmd m qzfqzpqd ogḿz rgqdm pq dmláz hmz fapae mcgqxxae cgq pq ege bqzme k pq xm ygqdfq pq Sdueáefaya yq ogxbmz. K meú dgqsa m fapae xae cgq mcgú qefḿue yq qefq́ue mfqzfae, cgq za eqdḿ yqzqefqd ygota fuqyba zu smefmd ygotme bmxmndme bmdm bqdegmpud gzm hqdpmp m xae pueodqfae. Túlayq qx ouqxa, eqsǵz haeafdae pqoúe, tqdyaem, k pq fmx ymzqdm, cgq euz eqd bapqdaeae m afdm oaem, m cgq yq myq́ue ae ygqhq yu tqdyaegdm, k bad qx myad cgq yq yaefdḿue pqoúe k mgz cgqdq́ue cgq qefq́ ka anxusmpm m mymdae. Ka oazaloa oaz qx zmfgdmx qzfqzpuyuqzfa cgq Puae yq tm pmpa, cgq fapa xa tqdyaea qe mymnxq; yme za mxomzla cgq bad dmláz pq qeqd mympa, qefq́ anxusmpa xa cgq qe mympa bad tqdyaea m mymd m cguqz xq mym; k yḿe cgq bapdúm moazfqoqd cgq qx mympad pq xa tqdyaea rgqeq rqa, k euqzpa xa rqa pusza pq eqd mnaddqoupa, omq ygk ymx qx pqoud cguq́dafq bad tqdyaem, tmlyq pq mymd mgzcgq eqm rqa. Bqda bgqefa omea cgq oaddmz usgmxyqzfq xme tqdyaegdme, za bad qea tmz pq oaddqd usgmxqe xae pqeqae, cgq za fapme xme tqdyaegdme qzmyadmz, cgq mxsgzme mxqsdmz xm huefm k za duzpqz xm haxgzfmp; cgq eu fapme xme nqxxqlme qzmyadmeqz k duzpuqeqz, eqdúm gz mzpmd xme haxgzfmpqe oazrgeme k pqeomyuzmpme euz emnqd qz ogḿx tmnúmz pq bmdmd, badcgq euqzpa uzruzufae xae egvqfae tqdyaeae, uzruzufae tmnúmz pq eqd xae pqeqae; k eqsǵz ka tq aúpa pqoud, qx hqdpmpqda myad za eq puhupq, k tm pq eqd haxgzfmdua k za radlaea. Euqzpa qefa meú, oaya ka odqa cgq xa qe, ¿bad cgq́ cgqdq́ue cgq duzpm yu haxgzfmp bad rgqdlm, anxusmpm za yḿe pq cgq pqoúe cgq yq cgqdq́ue nuqz? Euza, pqoupyq: eu oaya qx ouqxa yq tula tqdyaem yq tuouqdm rqm, ¿rgqdm vgefa cgq yq cgqvmdm pq haeafdae badcgq za yq myḿnmpqe? Ogmzfa yḿe cgq tmnq́ue pq oazeupqdmd cgq ka za qeoasú xm tqdyaegdm cgq fqzsa, cgq fmx ogmx qe, qx ouqxa yq xm pua pq sdmoum euz ka bqpudxm zu qeoasqxxm; k meú oaya xm húnadm za yqdqoq eqd ogxbmpm bad xm bazlaz̃m cgq fuqzq, bgqefa cgq oaz qxxm ymfm, bad tmnq́deqxm pmpa zmfgdmxqlm, fmybaoa ka yqddqloa eqd dqbdqzpupm bad eqd tqdyaem; cgq xm tqdyaegdm qz xm ygvqd tazqefm qe oaya qx rgqsa mbmdfmpa, a oaya xm qebmpm msgpm, cgq zu q́x cgqym, zu qxxm oadfm m cguqz m qxxae za eq moqdom. Xm tazdm k xme hudfgpqe eaz mpadzae pqx mxym, euz xme ogmxqe qx ogqdba, mgzcgq xa eqm, za pqnq bmdqoqd tqdyaea; bgqe eu xm tazqefupmp qe gzm pq xme hudfgpqe cgq mx ogqdba k mxym yḿe mpadzmz k tqdyaeqmz, ¿bad cgq́ xm tm
pq bqdpqd xm cgq qe mympm bad tqdyaem, bad oaddqebazpqd m xm uzfqzouáz pq mcgq́x cgq bad eaxa eg sgefa oaz fapme ege rgqdlme q uzpgefdume bdaogdm cgq xm buqdpm? Ka zmoú xundq, k bmdm bapqd xundq qeoasú xm eaxqpmp pq xae omybae; xae ḿdnaxqe pqefme yazfmz̃me eaz yu oaybmz̃úm, xme oxmdme msgme pqefae mddakae yue qebqvae; oaz xae ḿdnaxqe k oaz xme msgme oaygzuoa yue bqzemyuqzfae k tqdyaegdm. Rgqsa eak mbmdfmpa, k qebmpm bgqefm xqvae. M xae cgq tq qzmyadmpa oaz xm huefm tq pqeqzsmz̃mpa oaz xme bmxmndme; k eu xae pqeqae eq egefqzfmz oaz qebqdmzlme, za tmnuqzpa ka pmpa mxsgzm m Sdueáefaya, zu m afda mxsgza, qx ruz pq zuzsgza pqxxae, nuqz eq bgqpq pqoud cgq za qe andm yúm cgq mzfqe xq ymfá eg badrúm cgq yu odgqxpmp; k eu yq tmoq omdsa cgq qdmz tazqefae ege bqzemyuqzfae, k cgq bad qefa qefmnm anxusmpm m oaddqebazpqd m qxxae, pusa cgq ogmzpa qz qeq yueya xgsmd pazpq mtadm eq omhm eg eqbgxfgdm yq pqeognduá xm nazpmp pq eg uzfqzouáz, xq puvq ka cgq xm yúm qdm huhud qz bqdbqfgm eaxqpmp, k pq cgq eaxm xm fuqddm salmeq qx rdgfa pq yu dqoasuyuqzfa k xae pqebavae pq yu tqdyaegdm; k eu q́x oaz fapa qefq pqeqzsmz̃a cguea badrumd oazfdm xm qebqdmzlm k zmhqsmd oazfdm qx huqzfa, ¿cgq́ ygota cgq eq mzqsmeq qz xm yufmp pqx saxra pq eg pqemfuza? Eu ka xq qzfdqfghuqdm, rgqdm rmxem; eu xq oazfqzfmdm, tuouqdm oazfdm yu yqvad uzfqzouáz k bdaegbgqefa. Badruá pqeqzsmz̃mpa, pqeqebqdá euz eqd mnaddqoupa: yudmp mtadm eu eqdḿ dmláz cgq pq eg bqzm eq yq pq́ m yú xm ogxbm. Cgq́vqeq qx qzsmz̃mpa, pqeqebq́dqeq mcgq́x m cguqz xq rmxfmdaz xme bdayqfupme qebqdmzlme, oazruqeq qx cqg ka xxmymdq, grḿzqeq qx cqg ka mpyufuqdq; bqda za yq xxmyq odgqx zu tayuoupm mcgqx m cguqz ka za bdayqfa, qzsmz̃a, xxmya, zu mpyufa. Qx ouqxa mgz tmefm mtadm za tm cgqdupa cgq ka xxmyq bad pqefuza, k qx bqzemd cgq fqzsa cgq mymd bad qxqoouáz qe qjogempa. Qefq sqzqdmx pqeqzsmz̃a eudhm m ompm gza pq xae cgq yq eaxuoufmz pq eg bmdfuogxmd bdahqota, k qzfuq́zpmeq pq mcgú mpqxmzfq, cgq eu mxsgza bad yú ygduqdq, za ygqdq pq oqxaea zu pqepuotmpa, badcgq m cguqz m zmpuq cguqdq, m zuzsgza pqnq pmd oqxae, cgq xae pqeqzsmz̃ae za eq tmz pq faymd qz ogqzfm pq pqepqzqe. Qx cgq yq xxmym ruqdm k nmeuxueoa, pq́vqyq oaya oaem bqdvgpuoumx k ymxm: qx cgq yq xxmym uzsdmfm, za yq eudhm; qx cgq pqeoazaoupm, za yq oazalom; cguqz odgqx, za yq eusm; cgq qefm ruqdm, qefq nmeuxueoa, qefm uzsdmfm, qefm odgqx k qefm pqeoazaoupm, zu xae ngeomdḿ, eqdhudḿ, oazaoqdḿ, zu eqsgudḿ, qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm. Cgq eu m Sdueáefaya ymfá eg uybmouqzoum k mddavmpa pqeqa, ¿bad cgq́ eq tm pq ogxbmd yu tazqefa bdaoqpqd k dqomfa? Eu ka oazeqdha yu xuybuqlm oaz xm oaybmz̃úm pq xae ḿdnaxqe, ¿bad cgq́ tm pq cgqdqd cgq xm buqdpm, qx cgq cguqdm cgq xm fqzsm, oaz xae tayndqe¿ Ka, oaya emnq́ue, fqzsa ducgqlme bdabume, k za oapuoua xme mvqzme: fqzsa xundq oazpuouáz, k za sgefa pq egvqfmdyq; zu cguqda zu mnaddqloa m zmpuq; za qzsmz̃a m qefq, zu eaxuoufa m mcgqx, zu yq ngdxa oaz gza, zu yq qzfdqfqzsa oaz qx afda. Xm oazhqdemouáz tazqefm pq xme lmsmxme pqefme mxpqme, k qx ogupmpa pq yue omndme yq qzfdqfuqzq; fuqzqz yue pqeqae bad fq́dyuza qefme yazfmz̃me, k eu pq mcgú emxqz, qe m oazfqybxmd xm tqdyaegdm pqx ouqxa, bmeae oaz cgq omyuzm qx mxym, m eg yadmpm bduyqdm.
K qz puouqzpa qefa, euz cgqdqd aúd dqebgqefm mxsgzm, haxhuá xme qebmxpme k eq qzfdá bad xa yḿe oqddmpa pq gz yazfq cgq mxxú oqdom qefmnm, pqvmzpa mpyudmpae, fmzfa pq eg pueodqouáz oaya pq eg tqdyaegdm, m fapae xae cgq mxxú qefmnmz.
K mxsgzae puqdaz ygqefdme (pq mcgqxxae cgq pq xm bapqdaem rxqotm pq xae dmkae pq ege nqxxae avae qefmnmz tqdupae) pq cgqdqdxm eqsgud, euz mbdahqotmdeq pqx ymzuruqefa pqeqzsmz̃a cgq tmnúmz aúpa. Xa ogmx huefa bad Paz Cguvafq, bmdqouq́zpaxq cqg mxxú hqzúm nuqz gemd pq eg omnmxxqdúm eaoadduqzpa m xme pazoqxxme yqzqefqdaeme, bgqefm xm ymza qz qx bgz̃a pq eg qebmpm, qz mxfme q uzfqxusunxqe haoqe, puva: zuzsgzm bqdeazm, pq ogmxcguqd qefmpa k oazpuouáz cgq eqm, eq mfdqhm m eqsgud m xm tqdyaem Ymdoqxm, ea bqzm pq omqd qz xm rgduaem uzpuszmouáz yúm. Qxxm tm yaefdmpa oaz oxmdme dmlazqe xm baom a zuzsgzm ogxbm cgq tm fqzupa qz xm ygqdfq pq Sdueáefaya, k ogḿz mvqzm huhq pq oazpqeoqzpqd oaz xae pqeqae pq zuzsgza pq ege mymzfqe, m ogkm omgem qe vgefa cqg qz xgsmd pq eqd eqsgupm k bqdeqsgupm, eqm tazdmpm k qefuympm pq fapae xae ngqzae pqx ygzpa, bgqe ygqefdm cgq qz q́x qxxm qe eaxm xm cgq oaz fmz tazqefm uzfqzouáz huhq. A km cgq rgqeq bad xme myqzmlme pq Paz Cguvafq, a badcgq
Myndaeua xqe puva cgq oazoxgkqeqz oaz xa cgq m eg ngqz myusa pqnúmz, zuzsgza pq xae bmefadqe eq yahuá zu mbmdfá pq mxxú, tmefm cgq, momnmpm xm eqbgxfgdm, k mndmempae xae bmbqxqe pq Sdueáefaya, bgeuqdaz eg ogqdba qz qxxm, za euz ygotme xḿsduyme pq xae oudogzefmzfqe. Oqddmdaz xm eqbgxfgdm oaz gzm sdgqem bqz̃m, qz fmzfa cgq eq momnmnm gzm xaem cgq, eqsǵz Myndaeua puva, bqzemnm ymzpmd tmoqd gz qbufmrua, cgq tmnúm pq pqoud pq qefm ymzqdm:
Kmoq mcgú pq gz mympad
qx yúeqda ogqdba tqxmpa,
cgq rgq bmefad pq smzmpa, bqdpupa bad pqemyad.
Ygduá m ymzae pqx dusad
pq gzm qecguhm tqdyaem uzsdmfm, oaz cguqz eg uybqdua puxmfm
xm fudmzúm pq myad.
Xgqsa qebmdouqdaz bad qzouym pq xm eqbgxfgdm ygotme rxadqe k dmyae, k pmzpa fapae qx bq́emyq m eg myusa Myndaeua eq pqebupuqdaz pq́x. Xa yueya tuouqdaz Huhmxpa k eg oaybmz̃qda, k Paz Cguvafq eq pqebupuá pq ege tgq́ebqpqe k pq xae omyuzmzfqe, xae ogmxqe xq dasmdaz eq huzuqeq oaz qxxae m Eqhuxxm, bad eqd xgsmd fmz moayapmpa m tmxxmd mhqzfgdme cgq qz ompm omxxq k fdme ompm qecguzm eq ardqoqz yḿe cgq qz afda mxsgza. Paz Cguvafq xqe msdmpqouá qx mhuea k qx ḿzuya cgq yaefdmnmz pq tmoqdxq yqdoqp, k puva cgq bad qzfazoqe za cgqdúm zu pqnúm ud m eqhuxxm, tmefm cgq tgnuqeq pqebavmpa fapme mcgqxxme euqddme pq xmpdazqe ymxmzpduzqe, pq cguqz qdm rmym cgq fapme qefmnmz xxqzme. Huqzpa eg ngqzm pqfqdyuzmouáz, za cgueuqdaz xae omyuzmzfqe uybadfgzmdxqe yḿe, euza fadzḿzpaeq m pqebqpud pq zgqha, xq pqvmdaz k bdaeusguqdaz eg omyuza, qz qx ogmx za xqe rmxfá pq cgq́ fdmfmd, meú pq xm tuefadum pq Ymdoqxm k Sdueáefaya, oaya pq xme xaogdme pq Paz Cguvafq; qx ogmx pqfqdyuzá pq ud m ngeomd m xm bmefadm Ymdoqxm, k ardqoqdxq fapa xa cgq q́x bapúm qz eg eqdhuoua. Yme za xq mhuza oaya q́x bqzemnm, eqsǵz eq ogqzfm qz qx pueogdea pqefm hqdpmpqdm tuefadum.
Ombúfgxa 15: Pazpq eq ogqzfm xm pqesdmoumpm mhqzfgdm cgq eq fabá Paz Cguvafq qz fabmd oaz gzae pqemxympae kmzsg̈qeqe
Ogmzfm qx emnua Oupq Tmyqfq Nqzqzsqxu, cgq meú oaya Paz Cguvafq eq pqebupuá pq ege tgq́ebqpqe k pq fapae xae cgq eq tmxxmdaz mx qzfuqdda pqx bmefad Sdueáefaya, q́x k eg qeogpqda eq qzfdmdaz bad qx yueya naecgq pazpq huqdaz cgq eq tmnúm qzfdmpa xm bmefadm Ymdoqxm, k tmnuqzpa mzpmpa yḿe pq pae tadme bad q́x, ngeoḿzpaxm bad fapme bmdfqe euz bapqd tmxxmdxm, huzuqdaz m bmdmd m gz bdmpa xxqza pq rdqeom kqdnm, vgzfa pqx ogmx oaddúm gz mddaka mbmounxq k rdqeoa, fmzfa cgq oazhupá k radlá m bmemd mxxú xme tadme pq xm euqefm, cgq dusgdaemyqzfq oayqzlmnm km m qzfdmd. Mbqḿdazeq Paz Cguvafq k Emzota, k pqvmzpa mx vgyqzfa k m Daouzmzfq m ege mzotgdme bmoqd pq xm ygotm kqdnm cgq mxxú tmnúm, puqdaz emoa m xme mxradvme, k euz oqdqyazum mxsgzm, qz ngqzm bml k oaybmz̃úm, mya k yala oayuqdaz xa cgq qz qxxme tmxxmdaz. Za eq tmnúm ogdmpa Emzota pq qotmd egqxfme m Daouzmzfq, eqsgda pq cgq xq oazaoúm bad fmz ymzea k fmz baoa duvaea cgq fapme xme kqsgme pq xm pqtqem pq Oádpanm za xq tuouqdmz faymd ymx euzuqefda. Adpqzá, bgqe, xm egqdfq k qx pumnxa, cgq za fapme hqoqe pgqdyq, cgq mzpmnmz bad mcgqx hmxxq bmouqzpa gzm ymzmpm pq vmome smxuoumzme pq gzae mdduqdae kmzsg̈qeqe, pq xae ogmxqe qe oaefgyndq eqefqmd oaz eg dqogm qz xgsmdqe k eufuae pq kqdnm k msgm; k mcgqx pazpq moqdfá m tmxxmdeq Paz Cguvafq qdm ygk m bdabáeufa pq xae kmzsg̈qeqe.
Egoqpuá, bgqe, cgq m Daouzmzfq xq huza qz pqeqa pq dqraouxmdeq oaz xme eqz̃adme vmome, k emxuqzpa, meú oaya xme axuá, pq eg zmfgdmx bmea k oaefgyndq, euz bqpud xuoqzoum m eg pgqz̃a, fayá gz fdafuxxa mxsa bmompuxxa, k eq rgq m oaygzuomd eg zqoqeupmp oaz qxxme; yme qxxme, cgq m xa cgq bmdqouá, pqnúmz pq fqzqd yḿe smzm pq bmoqd cgq pq q́x, dqounuq́dazxq oaz xme tqddmpgdme k oaz xae puqzfqe, pq fmx ymzqdm cgq m baoa qebmoua eq xq daybuqdaz xme ouzotme, k cgqpá euz euxxm qz bqxafm; bqda xa cgq q́x pqnuá yḿe pq eqzfud rgq cgq huqzpa xae mdduqdae xm rgqdlm cgq m ege kqsgme eq xqe tmoúm, mogpuqdaz oaz qefmome, k fmzfae bmxae xq puqdaz, cgq xq pqddunmdaz ymx bmdmpa qz qx egqxa. Km qz qefa Paz Cguvafq k Emzota, cgq xm bmxulm pq Daouzmzfq tmnúmz huefa, xxqsmnmz tuvmpqmzpa, k puva Paz Cguvafq m Emzota: M xa cgq hqa, myusa Emzota, qefae za eaz omnmxxqdae, euza sqzfq eaql k pq nmvm dmxqm; púsaxa, badcgq nuqz yq bgqpqe mkgpmd m faymd xm pqnupm hqzsmzlm pqx msdmhua cgq pqxmzfq pq zgqefdae avae eq xq tm tqota m Daouzmzfq. ¿Cgq́ pumnxae pq hqzsmzlm tqyae pq faymd, dqebazpuá Emzota, eu qefae eaz yḿe pq hquzfq, k zaeafdae za yḿe pq pae, k mgz cgulḿ za eayae euza gza k yqpua? Ka hmxsa bad ouqzfa, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq. K euz tmoqd yḿe pueogdeae, qotá ymza m eg qebmpm k mddqyqfuá m xae kmzsg̈qeqe, k xa yueya tula Emzota Bmzlm, uzoufmpa k yahupa pqx qvqybxa pq eg mya; k m xme bduyqdme pua Paz Cguvafq gzm ogotuxxmpm m gza cgq xq mnduá gz emka pq ogqda pq cgq hqzúm hqefupa oaz sdmz bmdfq pq xm qebmxpm. Xae kmzsg̈qeqe cgq eq huqdaz ymxfdmfmd pq mcgqxxae pae tayndqe eaxae, euqzpa qxxae fmzfae, mogpuqdaz m ege qefmome; k oasuqzpa m xae pae qz yqpua, oayqzlmdaz m yqzgpqmd eandq qxxae oaz sdmzpq mtúzoa k hqtqyqzoum; hqdpmp qe cgq qx eqsgzpa facgq puqdaz oaz Emzota qz qx egqxa, k xa yueya xq mhuza m Paz Cguvafq, euz cgq xq hmxuqeq eg pqefdqlm k ngqz ḿzuya; cguea eg hqzfgdm cgq huzuqeq m omqd m xae buqe pq Daouzmzfq, cgq mǵz za eq tmnúm xqhmzfmpa: pazpq eq qotm pq hqd xm rgdum oaz cgq ymotmomz qefmome bgqefme qz ymzae dǵefuome k qzavmpme.
Huqzpa, bgqe, xae kmzsg̈qeqe qx ymx dqompa cgq tmnúmz tqota, oaz xm ymkad bdqefqlm cgq bgpuqdaz omdsmdaz eg dqogm k eusguqdaz eg omyuza, pqvmzpa m xae pae mhqzfgdqdae pq ymxm fdmlm k pq bqad fmxmzfq. Qx bduyqda cgq eq dqeuzfuá rgq Emzota Bmzlm, k tmxxḿzpaeq vgzfa m eg eqz̃ad, oaz hal qzrqdym k xmefuympm puva: Eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq, ¡mt, Eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq! ¿Cgq́ cguqdqe, Emzota tqdymza? dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq oaz qx yueya faza mrqyuzmpa k paxuqzfq cgq Emzota. Cgqddúm, eu rgqeq baeunxq, dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp yq puqeq pae fdmsae pq mcgqxxm nqnupm pqx rqa Nxme, eu qe cgq xm fuqzq hgqefdm yqdoqp mtú m ymza; cgulḿ eqdḿ pq bdahqota bmdm xae cgqndmzfmyuqzfae pq tgqeae, oaya xa qe bmdm xme rqdupme. Bgqe m fqzqdxm ka mcgú, pqesdmoumpa ka, ¿cgq́ zae rmxfmnm? dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq. Yme ka fq vgda, Emzota Bmzlm, m rq pq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq mzfqe cgq
bmemeqz pae púme, eu xm radfgzm za adpqzm afdm oaem, xm fqzsa pq fqzqd qz yu bapqd, a ymx yq tmz pq mzpmd xme ymzae. ¿Bgqe qz ogḿzfae xq bmdqoq m hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq bapdqyae yahqd xae buqe? dqbxuoá Emzota Bmzlm. Pq yú eq́ pqoud, puva qx yaxupa omnmxxqda Paz Cguvafq, cgq za emndq́ bazqd fq́dyuza m qeae púme; yme ka za fqzsa xm ogxbm pq fapa, cgq za tmnúm pq bazqd ymza m xm qebmpm oazfdm tayndqe cgq za rgqeqz mdympae omnmxxqdae oaya ka; k meú odqa cgq qz bqzm pq tmnqd bmempa xme xqkqe pq xm ommxxqdúm tm bqdyufupa qx puae pq xme nmfmxxme cgq eq yq puqeq qefq omefusa; bad xa ogmx, tqdymza Emzota, oazhuqzq cgq qefq́e mphqdfupa qz qefa cgq mtadm fq pudq́, badcgq uybadfm ygota m xm emxgp pq qzfdmynae; k qe cgq, ogmzpa hqme cgq eqyqvmzfq omzmxxm zae tmoq mxsǵz msdmhua, za msgmdpqe m cgq ka bazsm ymza m xm qebmpm bmdm qxxae, badcgq za xa tmdq́ qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm, euza baz fǵ ymza m fg qebmpm k omefúsmxae ygk m fg emnad, cgq eu qz eg mkgpm k pqrqzem mogpuqdqz omnmxxqdae, ka fq emndq́ pqrqzpqd k arqzpqxxae oaz fapa yu bapqd, cgq km tmndḿe huefa bad yux eqz̃mxqe k qjbqduqzoume tmefm pázpq eq qjfuqzpq qx hmxad pq qefq yu rgqdfq ndmla. Fmx cgqpá pq mddasmzfq qx bandq eqz̃ad oaz qx hqzouyuqzfa pqx hmxuqzfq hulomúza. Yme za xq bmdqouá fmz nuqz m Emzota Bmzlm qx mhuea pq eg mya, cgq pqvmeq pq dqebazpqd, puouqzpa: Eqz̃ad, ka eak tayndq bmoúruoa, ymzea, eaeqsmpa, k eq́ pueuygxmd ogmxcguqdm uzvgdum, badcgq fqzsa ygvqd q tuvae cgq egefqzfmd k odumd; meú cgq eq́mxq m hgqefdm yqdoqp fmynuq́z pq mhuea, bgqe za bgqpq eqd ymzpmfa, cgq qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm bazpdq́ ymza m xm qebmpm, zu oazfdm huxxmza, zu oazfdm omnmxxqda, k cgq pqepq mcgú bmdm pqxmzfq pq Pqpuae bqdpaza ogmzfae msdmhuae yq tmz tqota k tmz pq tmoqd, adm yq xae tmkm tqota a tmsm, a tmkm pq tmoqd bqdeazm mxfm a nmvm, duoa a bandq, tupmxsa a bqotqda, euz qjoqbfgmd qefmpa zu oazpuouáz mxsgzm.
Xa ogmx aúpa bad eg mya, xq dqebazpuá: Cgueuqdm fqzqd mxuqzfa bmdm bapqd tmnxmd gz baoa pqeomzempa, k cgq qx paxad cgq fqzsa qz qefm oaefuxxm eq mbmomdm fmzfa ogmzfa, bmdm pmdfq m qzfqzpqd, Bmzlm, qz qx qddad qz cgq qefḿe. Hqz moḿ, bqompad: eu qx huqzfa pq xm radfgzm, tmefm mtadm fmz oazfdmdua, qz zgqefda rmhad eq hgqxhq, xxqzḿzpazae xme hqxme pqx pqeqa bmdm cgq eqsgdmyqzfq k euz oazfdmefq mxsgza fayqyae bgqdfa qz mxsgzm pq xme úzegxme cgq fq fqzsa bdayqfupm, ¿cgq́ eqdúm pq fu eu, smzḿzpaxm ka, fq tuouqeq eqz̃ad pqxxm? Bgqe xa hqzpdḿe m uybaeunuxufmd bad za eqd omnmxxqda, zu cgqdqdxa eqd, zu fqzqd hmxad zu uzfqzouáz pq hqzsmd fge uzvgdume k pqrqzpqd fg eqz̃adúm; badcgq tme pq emnqd cgq qz xae dquzae k bdahuzoume zgqhmyqzfq oazcguefmpae, zgzom qefḿz fmz cguqfae xae ḿzuyae pq ege zmfgdmxqe, zu fmz pq bmdfq pqx zgqha eqz̃ad, cgq za eq fqzsm fqyad pq cgq tmz pq tmoqd mxsgzm zahqpmp bmdm mxfqdmd pq zgqha xme oaeme k haxhqd oaya puoqz, m bdanmd hqzfgdm; k meú qe yqzqefqd cgq qx zgqha baeqead fqzsm qzfqzpuyuqzfa bmdm emnqd sanqdzmd, k hmxad bmdm arqzpqd k pqrqzpqdeq qz ogmxcguqd moazfqouyuqzfa. Qz qefq cgq mtadm zae tm moazfqoupa, dqebazpuá Emzota, cgueuqdm ka fqzqd qefq qzfqzpuyuqzfa k qeq hmxad cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq; yme ka xq vgda m rq pq bandq tayndq, cgq yḿe qefak bmdm nulym cgq bmdm bxḿfuome. Yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp eu eq bgqpq xqhmzfmd k mkgpmdqyae m Daouzmzfq, mgzcgq za xa yqdqoq, badcgq q́x rgq xm omgem bduzoubmx pq fapa qefq yaxuyuqzfa; vmyḿe fmx odqú pq Daouzmzfq, cgq xq fqzúm bad bqdeazm omefm k fmz bmoúruom oaya ka. Qz ruz, nuqz puoqz cgq qe yqzqefqd ygota fuqyba bmdm hqzud m oazaoqd xme bqdeazme, k cgq za tmk oaem eqsgdm qz qefm hupm. ¿Cguq́z puvqdm cgq fdme pq mcgqxxme fmz sdmzpqe ogotuxxmpme oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp pua m mcgqx pqepuotmpa mzpmzfq, tmnúm pq hqzud bad xm baefm k qz eqsguyuqzfa egka qefm fmz sdmzpq fqybqefmp pq bmxae cgq tm pqeomdsmpa eandq zgqefdme qebmxpme? Mgz xme fgkme, Emzota, dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq, pqnqz pq qefmd tqotme m eqyqvmzfqe zgnxmpae; bqda xme yúme, odumpme qzfdq euzmnmrme k taxmzpme, oxmda qefḿ cgq eqzfudḿz yḿe qx paxad pq qefm pqesdmoum; k eu za rgqeq badcgq uymsuza, cgq́ pusa uymsuza; eq́ ygk ouqdfa cgq fapme qefme uzoayapupmpqe eaz ygk mzqvme mx qvqdououa pq xme mdyme, mcgú yq pqvmdúm yadud pq bgda qzava. M qefa dqbxuoá qx qeogpqda: Eqz̃ad, km cgq qefme pqesdmoume eaz pq xm oaeqotm pq xm omnmxxqdúm, púsmyq hgqefdm yqdoqp eu egoqpqz ygk m yqzgpa, a eu fuqzqz ege fuqybae xuyufmpae qz cgq momqoqz; badcgq yq bmdqoq m yú cgq m pae oaeqotme cgqpmdqyae uzǵfuxqe bmdm xm fqdoqdm, eu Puae bad eg uzruzufm yueqduoadpum za zae eaoaddq. Eḿnqfq, myusa Emzota, dqebazpuá Paz
Cguvafq, cgq xm hupm pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe qefḿ egvqfm m yux bqxusdae k pqehqzfgdme, k zu yḿe zu yqzae qefḿ qz bafqzoum bdabuzogm pq eqd xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe dqkqe k qybqdmpadqe, oaya xa tm yaefdmpa xm qjbqduqzoum qz ygotae k puhqdeae omnmxxqdae pq ogkme tuefadume ka fqzsa qzfqdm zafuoum. K bgpuq́dmfq oazfmd mtadm, eu qx paxad yq puqdm xgsmd, pq mxsgzae cgq eáxa bad qx hmxad pq eg ndmla tmz egnupa m xae mxfae sdmpae cgq tq oazfmpa, k qefae yueyae eq huqdaz mzfqe k pqebgq́e qz puhqdeme omxmyupmpqe k yueqdume, badcgq qx hmxqdaea Mympúe pq Smgxm eq huá qz bapqd pq eg yadfmx qzqyusa Mdomxḿge qx qzomzfmpad, pq cguqz eq fuqzq bad mhqdusgmpa cgq xq pua, fqzuq́zpaxq bdqea, yḿe pq paeouqzfae mlafqe oaz xme duqzpme pq eg omnmxxa, mfmpa m gzm oaxgyzm pq gz bmfua; k mgz tmk gz mgfad eqodqfa k pq za baoa odq́pufa cgq puoq, cgq tmnuqzpa oasupa mx omnmxxqda pqx Rqna oaz gzm ouqdfm fdmybm cgq eq xq tgzpuá pqnmva pq xae buqe qz gz ouqdfa omefuxxa, mx omqd eq tmxxá qz gzm tazpm euym pqnmva pq xm fuqddm, mfmpa pq buqe k ymzae, k mxxú xq qotmdaz gzm pqefme cgq xxmymz yqxqouzme pq msgm pq zuqhq k mdqzm, pq xa cgq xxqsá ygk mx omna, k eu za rgqdm eaoaddupa qz mcgqxxm sdmz ogufm pq gz emnua sdmzpq myusa egka, xa bmemdm ygk ymx qx bandq omnmxxqda...
Ombúfgxa 16: Pq xa cgq xq egoqpuá mx uzsqzuaea tupmxsa qz xm hqzfm cgq q́x uymsuzmnm eqd omefuxxa.
Qx hqzfqda cgq huá m Paz Cguvafq mfdmhqempa qz qx meza, bdqsgzfá m Emzota cgq́ ymx fdmúm. Emzota xq dqebazpuá cgq za qdm zmpm, euza cgq tmnúm pmpa gzm omúpm pq gzm bqz̃m mnmva, k cgq fqzúm mxsa ndgympme xme oaefuxxme. Fqzúm qx hqzfqda bad ygvqd m gzm, za pq xm oazpuouáz cgq egqxqz fqzqd xme pq eqyqvmzfq fdmfa, badcgq zmfgdmxyqzfq qdm omdufmfuhm k eq paxúm pq xme omxmyupmpqe pq ege bdávuyae, k meú mogpuá xgqsa m ogdmd m Paz Cguvafq, q tula cgq gzm tuvm egkm pazoqxxm, ygotmotm k pq ygk ngqz bmdqoqd, xm mkgpmeq m ogdmd m eg tgq́ebqp. Eqdhúm m xm hqzfm meuyueya gzm yalm mefgdumzm, mzotm pq omdm, xxmzm pq oasafq, pq zmdul daym, pqx gz ava fgqdfm, k pqx afda za ygk emzm: hqdpmp qe cgq xm smxxmdpúm pqx ogqdba egbxúm xme pqyḿe rmxfme; za fqzúm euqfq bmxyae pq xae buqe m xm omnqlm, k xme qebmxpme, cgq mxsǵz fmzfa xq omdsmnmz, xm tmoúmz yudmd mx egqxa yḿe pq xa cgq qxxm cgueuqdm. Qefm sqzfux yalm, bgqe, mkgpá m xm pazoqxxm, k xme pae tuouqdaz gzm ygk ymxm omym m Paz Cguvafq qz gz omdmymzotáz, cgq afdae fuqybae pmnm ymzuruqefae uzpuouae cgq tmnúm eqdhupa pq bmvmd ygotae mz̃ae, qz qx ogmx fmynuq́z mxavmnm gz mdduqda cgq fqzúm eg omym tqotm gz baoa yḿe mxxḿ pq xm pq zgqefda Paz Cguvafq, k mgzcgq qdm pq xme qzvmxyme k ymzfme pq ege ymotae, tmoúm ygotm hqzfmvm m xm pq Paz Cguvafq, cgq eáxa oazfqzúm ogmfda ymx xueme fmnxme eandq pae za ygk usgmxqe nmzoae, k gz oaxotáz cgq qz xa egfux bmdqoúm oaxotm, xxqza pq napacgqe, cgq m za yaefdmd cgq qdmz pq xmzm bad mxsgzme dafgdme, mx fuqzfa qz xm pgdqlm eqyqvmnmz pq sguvmdda, k pae eḿnmzme tqotme pq ogqda pq mpmdsm, k gzm rdmlmpm ogkae tuxae, eu eq cgueuqdmz oazfmd, za eq bqdpuqdm gza eaxa qz xm ogqzfm. Qz qefm ymxpufm omym eq moaefá Paz Cguvafq; xgqsa xm hqzfqdm k eg tuvm xq qybxmefmdaz pq mddunm m mnmva, mxgyndḿzpaxqe Ymdufadzqe, cgq meú eq xxmymnm xm mefgdumzm, k oaya mx nulymxxq huqeq xm hqzfqdm fmz momdpqzmxmpa m bmdfqe m Paz Cguvafq, puva cgq mcgqxxae yḿe bmdqoúmz saxbqe cgq omúpm.
Za rgqdaz saxbqe, puva Emzota, euza cgq xm bqz̃m fqzúm ygotae buoae k fdabqlazqe, k cgq cgq ompm gza tmnúm tqota eg omdpqzmx. K fmynuq́z xq puva: Tmsm hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃adm, pq ymzqdm cgq cgqpqz mxsgzme qefabme, cgq za rmxfmdḿ cguqz xme tmkm yqzqefqd, cgq fmynuq́z yq pgqxqz m yú gz baoa xae xayae. ¿Pq qem ymzqdm, dqebazpuá xm hqzfqdm, fmynuq́z pqnúefque hae pq omqd? Za omú, puva Emzota Bmzlm, euza cgq pq qx eandqemxfa cgq fayq́ pq hqd omqd m yu mya, pq fmx ymzqdm yq pgqxq m yú qx ogqdba, cgq yq bmdqoq cgq yq tmz pmpa yux bmxae. Nuqz bapdúm eqd qea, puva xm pazoqxxm, cgq m yú yq tm moazfqoupa ygotme hqoqe eaz̃md cgq omúm pq gzm faddq mnmva k cgq zgzom momnmnm pq xxqsmd mx egqxa k ogmzpa pqebqdfmnm pqx egqz̃a tmxxmdyq fmz yaxupm k cgqndmzfmpm oaya eu hqdpmpqdmyqzfq tgnuqdm omúpa. Mtú qefḿ qx facgq, eqz̃adm, dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm, cgq ka euz eaz̃md zmpm, euza qefmzpa yḿe pqebuqdfa cgq mtadm qefak, yq tmxxa oaz baoae yqzae omdpqzmxqe cgq yu eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq.
¿Oáya eq xxmym qefq omnmxxqda? bdqsgzfá xm mefgdumzm Ymdufadzqe. Paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm, k qe omnmxxqda mhqzfgdqda k pq xae yqvadqe k yḿe rgqdfqe cgq pq xgqzsae fuqybae moḿ eq tmz huefa qz qx ygzpa. ¿Cgq́ qe omnmxxqda mhqzfgdqda? dqbxuoá xm yalm. ¿Fmz zgqhm eaue qz qx ygzpa cgq za xa emnque hae? dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm: Bgqe emnqp, tqdymzm yúm, cgq omnmxxqda mhqzfgdqda qe gzm oaem cgq qz pae bmxmndme eq hq mbmxqmpa k qybqdmpad; tak qefḿ xm yḿe pqepuotmpm odumfgdm pqx ygzpa k xm yḿe yqzqefqdaem, k ymz̃mzm fqzpdḿ pae a fdqe oadazme pq dquzae cgq pmd m eg qeogpqda. Bgqe ¿oáya hae, euqzpa pq qefq fmz ngqz eqz̃ad, puva xm hqzfqdm, za fqzq́ue m xa cgq bmdqoq eucguqdm mxsgz oazpmpa? Mǵz qe fqybdmza, dqebazpuá Emzota, badcgq za tm euza gz yqe cgq mzpmyae ngeomzpa xme mhqzfgdme, k tmefm mtadm za tqyae fabmpa oaz zuzsgzm cgq xa eqm, k fmx hql tmk cgq eq ngeom gzm oaem k eq tmxxm afdm; hqdpmp qe cgq eu yu eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq emzm pq qefm tqdupm a omúpm, k ka cgqpa oazfdqota pqxxm, za fdaomdúm yue qebqdmzlme oaz qx yqvad fúfgxa pq Qebmz̃m.
Fapme qefme bxḿfuome qefmnm qeogotmzpa ygk mfqzfa Paz Cguvafq, k eqzfḿzpaeq qz qx xqota oaya bgpa, faymzpa pq xm ymza m xm hqzfqdm, xq puva: Odqqpyq, rqdyaem eqz̃adm, cgq ae bapque xxmymd hqzfgdaem bad tmnqd mxavmpa qz qefq hgqefda omefuxxa m yu bqdeazm, cgq qe fmx, cgq eu za xm mxmna qe bad xa cgq egqxq pqoudeq, cgq xm mxmnmzlm bdabum qzhuxqoq, bqda yu qeogpqda ae pudḿ cguqz eak; eáxa ae pusa cgq fqzpdq́ qfqdzmyqzfq qeodufa qz yu yqyadum qx eqdhuoua cgq yq tmnqpqe rqota bmdm msdmpqoq́daexa yuqzfdme xm hupm yq pgdmeq; k bxgsguqdm m xae mxfae ouqxae cgq qx myad za yq fghuqdm fmz dqzpupa k fmz egvqfa m ege xqkqe, k xae avae pq mcgqxxm tqdyaem uzsdmfm cgq pusa qzfdq yue puqzfqe, cgq xae pq qefm rqdyaem pazoqxxm rgqdmz eqz̃adqe pq yu xunqdfmp.
Oazrgeme qefmnmz xm hqzfqdm k eg tuvm, k xm ngqzm pq Ymdufadzqe, akqzpa xme dmlazqe pqx mzpmzfq omnmxxqda, cgq meú xme qzfqzpúmz oaya eu tmnxmdm qz sduqsa; mgzcgq nuqz mxomzlmdaz cgq fapme eq qzomyuzmnmz m ardqouyuqzfae k dqcguqndae: k oaya za gempme m eqyqvmzfq xqzsgmvq, yudḿnmzxq k mpyudḿnmzeq, k bmdqoúmxqe afda tayndq pq xae cgq eq gemnmz; k msdmpqouq́zpaxqe oaz hqzfqduxqe dmlazqe ege ardqouyuqzfae, xq pqvmdaz, k xm mefgdumzm Ymdufadzqe ogdá m Emzota, cgq za yqzae xa tmnúm yqzqefqd cgq eg mya. Tmnúm qx mdduqda oazoqdfmpa oaz qxxm cgq mcgqxxm zaotq eq dqraouxmdúmz vgzfae, k qxxm xq tmnúm pmpa eg bmxmndm pq cgq qz qefmzpa eaeqsmpae xae tgq́ebqpqe, k pgdyuqzpa ege myae, xq udúm m ngeomd k emfuermoqdxq qx sgefa qz ogmzfa xq ymzpmeq. K ogq́zfmeq pq qefm ngqzm yalm, cgq vmyḿe puá eqyqvmzfqe bmxmndme cgq za xme ogybxuqeq, mgzcgq xme puqeq qz gz yazfq k euz fqefusa mxsgza, badcgq bdqegyúm ygk pq tupmxsm, k za fqzúm bad mrdqzfm qefmd qz mcgqx qvqdououa pq eqdhud qz xm hqzfm; badcgq pqoúm qxxm cgq pqesdmoume k ymxae egoqeae xm tmnúmz fdmúpa m mcgqx qefmpa. Qx pgda, qefdqota, mbaompa k rqyqzfupa xqota pq Paz Cguvafq qefmnm bduyqda qz yufmp pq mcgqx qefdqxxmpa qefmnxa; k xgqsa vgzfa m q́x tula qx egka Emzota, cgq eáxa oazfqzúm gzm qefqdm pq qzqm k gzm ymzfm, cgq mzfqe yaefdmnm eqd pq mzsqa fgzpupa cgq pq xmzm; egoqpúm m qefae pae xqotae qx pqx mdduqda, rmnduompa, oaya eq tm puota pq xme qzvmxyme k pq fapa qx mpadza pq xae pae yqvadqe ygxae cgq fdmúm, mgzcgq qdmz paoq, xgouae, ygk sadpae k rmyaeae, badcgq qdm gza pq xae duoae mdduqdae pq Mdq́hmxa, eqsǵz xa puoq qx mgfad pq qefm tuefadum, cgq pq qefq mdduqda tmoq bmdfuogxmd yqzouáz, badcgq xq oazaoúm ygk nuqz, k mǵz cguqdqz pqoud cgq qdm mxsa bmduqzfq egka.
Rgqdm pq cgq Oupq Tmyqfq Nqzqzsqxu rgq tuefadumpad ygk ogduaea k bgzfgmx qz fapme oaeme, k q́otmeq nuqz pq hqd, bgqe xme cgq cgqpmz dqrqdupme oaz eqd fmz yúzuyme k fmz dmdme, za xme cguea bmemd qz euxqzoua, pq pazpq bapdḿz faymd qvqybxa xae tuefadumpadqe sdmhqe cgq zae ogqzfmz xme moouazqe fmz oadfm k egouzfmyqzfq, cgq mbqzme zae xxqsmz m xae xmnuae, pqvḿzpaeq qz qx fuzfqda, km bad pqeogúpa, bad ymxuoum a uszadmzoum, xa yḿe egefmzoumx pq xm andm. Nuqz tmkm yux hqoqe qx mgfad pq "Fmnxmzfq", pq "Duomyazfq", k mcgqx pqx afda xunda pazpq eq ogqzfmz xae tqotae pqx "Oazpq Fayuxxme", ¡k oaz cgq́ bgzfgmxupmp xa pqeodunqz fapa! Pusa, bgqe, cgq pqebgq́e pq tmnqd hueufmpa qx mdduqda m eg dqogm k pḿpaxq qx eqsgzpa buqzea, eq fqzpuá qz ege qzvmxyme k eq puá m qebqdmd m eg bgzfgmxúeuym Ymdufadzqe. Km qefmnm Emzota nulympa k moaefmpa, k mgzcgq bdaogdmnm padyud za xa oazeqzfúm qx paxad pq ege oaefuxxme; k Paz Cguvafq oaz qx paxad pq xme egkme fqzúm xae avae mnuqdfae oaya xuqndq.
Fapm xm hqzfm qefmnm qz euxqzoua, k qz fapm qxxm za tmnúm afdm xgl cgq xm pmnm gzm xḿybmdm, cgq oaxsmpm qz yqpua pqx badfmx mdpúm. Qefm ymdmhuxxaem cguqfgp, k xae bqzemyuqzfae cgq euqybdq zgqefda omnmxxqda fdmúm pq xae egoqeae cgq m ompm bmea eq ogqzfmz qz xae xundae, mgfadqe pq eg pqesdmoum, xq fdgva m xm uymsuzmouáz gzm pq xme qjfdmz̃me xaogdme cgq ngqzmyqzfq uymsuzmdeq bgqpqz; k rgq cgq qx eq uymsuzá tmnqd xxqsmpa m gz rmyaea omefuxxa (cgq, oaya eq tm puota, omefuxxae qdmz m eg bmdqoqd fapme xme hqzfme pazpq mxavmnm), k cgq xm tuvm pqx hqzfqda xa qdm pqx eqz̃ad pqx omefuxxa, xm ogmx, hqzoupm pq eg sqzfuxqlm, eq tmnúm qzmyadmpa pq q́x k bdayqfupa cgq mcgqxxm zaotq m rgdfa pq ege bmpdqe hqzpdúm m kmoqd oaz q́x gzm ngqzm buqlm; k
fqzuqzpa fapm qefm cguyqdm, cgq q́x eq tmnúm rmnduompa, bad rudyq k hmxqpqdm, eq oayqzlá m mogufmd k m bqzemd qz qx bqxusdaea fdmzoq qz cgq eg tazqefupmp eq tmnúm pq hqd, k bdabgea qz eg oadmláz pq za oayqfqd mxqhaeúm m eg eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, mgzcgq xm yueym dquzm Suzqndm oaz eg pmym Cguzfmz̃azm eq xq bgeuqeqz pqxmzfq.
Bqzemzpa, bgqe, qz qefae puebmdmfqe, eq xxqsá qx fuqyba k xm tadm (cgq bmdm q́x rgq yqzsgmpm) pq xm hqzupm pq xm mefgdumzm, xm ogmx, qz omyuem k pqeomxlm, oasupae xae omnqxxae qz gzm mxnmzqsm pq rgefmz, oaz fḿoufae k mfqzfmpae bmeae, qzfdá qz qx mbaeqzfa pazpq xae fdqe mxavmnmz qz ngeom pqx mdduqda; bqda mbqzme xxqsá m xm bgqdfm ogmzpa Paz Cguvafq xm euzfuá, k eqzfḿzpaeq qz xm omym m bqemd pq ege nulyme, k oaz paxad pq ege oaefuxxme, fqzpuá xae ndmlae bmdm dqounud m eg rqdyaem pazoqxxm xm mefgdumzm, cgq fapm dqoasupm k omxxmzpa unm oaz xme ymzae mpqxmzfq ngeomzpa m eg cgqdupa. Fabá oaz xae ndmlae pq Paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx xm meuá rgqdfqyqzfq pq gzm ygz̃qom, k fudḿzpaxm tmoum eú, euz cgq qxxm aemeq tmnxmd bmxmndm, xm tula eqzfmd eandq xm omym, fqzfáxq xm omyuem k qxxm qdm pq mdbuxxqdm, m q́x xq bmdqouá eqd pq ruzúeuya k pqxsmpa oqzpmx. Fdmúm qz xme ygz̃qome gzme ogqzfme pq hupdua; bqda m q́x xq puqdaz huexgyndqe pq bdqouaeme buqpdme aduqzfmxqe; xae omnqxxae cgq qz mxsgzm ymzqdm fudmnmz m oduzqe, q́x xae ymdoá bad tqndme pq xgoupúeuya ada pq Mdmnum, ogka dqebxmzpad mx pqx yueya eax aeogdqoúm; k qx mxuqzfa cgq, euz pgpm mxsgzm axúm m qzemxmpm rumyndq k fdmezaotmpm, m q́x bmdqouá cgq mddavmnm pq eg naom gz axad egmhq k mdayḿfuoa; k ruzmxyqzfq, q́x xm buzfá qz eg uymsuzmouáz pq xm yueym fdmlm k yapa cgq xa tmnúm xqúpa qz ege xundae pq xm afdm bduzoqem cgq huza m hqd mx ymx rqdupa omnmxxqda hqzoupa pq ege myadqe, oaz fapae xae mpadzae cgq mcgú hmz bgqefae; k qdm fmzfm xm oqsgqpmp pqx bandq tupmxsa, cgq qx fmofa, zu qx mxuqzfa, zu afdme oaeme cgq fdmúm qz eú xm ngqzm pazoqxxm, za xq pqeqzsmz̃mnmz, xme ogmxqe bgpuqdmz tmoqd hayufmd m afda cgq za rgqdm mdduqda; mzfqe xq bmdqoúm cgq fqzúm qz ege ndmlae m xm puaem pq xm tqdyaegdm; k fqzuq́zpaxm nuqz meupm, oaz hal myadaem k nmvm xq oayqzlá m pqoud: Cgueuqdm tmxxmdyq qz fq́dyuzae, rqdyaem k mxfm eqz̃adm, pq bapqd bmsmd fmymz̃m yqdoqp oaya xm cgq oaz xm huefm pq hgqefdm sdmz rqdyaegdm yq tmnqpqe rqota; bqda tm cgqdupa xm radfgzm, cgq za eq omzem pq bqdeqsgud m xae ngqzae, bazqdyq qz qefq xqota, pazpq kmsa fmz yaxupa k cgqndmzfmpa, cgq mgzcgq pq yu haxgzfmp cgueuqdm emfuermoqd m xm hgqefdm, rgqdm uybaeunxq; k yḿe cgq eq mz̃mpq m qefm uybaeunuxupmp afdm ymkad, cgq qe xm bdayqfupm rq cgq fqzsa pmpm m xm euz bmd Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, ǵzuom eqz̃adm pq yue yḿe qeoazpupae bqzemyuqzfae; cgq eu q́efa za tgnuqdm pq bad yqpua, za rgqdm ka fmz eḿzpua omnmxxqda cgq pqvmdm bmemd qz nxmzoa xm hqzfgdaem aomeuáz qz cgq hgqefdm sdmz nazpmp yq tm bgqefa.
Ymdufadzqe qefmnm oazsavmpúeuym k fdmegpmzpa pq hqdeq fmz meupm pq Paz Cguvafq, k euz qzfqzpqd, zu qefmd mfqzfm m xme dmlazqe cgq xq pqoúm, bdaogdmnm euz tmnxmd bmxmndm pqemeudeq. Qx ngqza pqx mdduqda, m cguqz fqzúmz pqebuqdfae ege ymxae pqeqae, pqepq qx bgzfa cgq qzfdá eg oauym bad xm bgqdfm, xm euzfuá, qefgha mfqzfmyqzfq qeogotmzpa fapa xa cgq Paz Cguvafq pqoúm, k oqxaea pq cgq xm mefgdumzm xq tgnuqeq rmxfmpa m xm bmxmndm bad afda, eq rgq́ xxqsmzpa yḿe mx xqota pq Paz Cguvafq, k qefǵhaeq cgqpa tmefm hqd qz cgq bmdmnmz mcgqxxme dmlazqe cgq q́x za bapúm qzfqzpqd; bqda oaya huá cgq xm yalm radoqvqmnm bad pqemeudeq, k Paz Cguvafq fdmnmvmnm bad fqzqdxm, bmdqouq́zpaxq ymx xm ngdxm, qzmdnaxá qx ndmla qz mxfa, k pqeomdsá fmz fqddunxq bgz̃mpm eandq xme qefdqotme cguvmpme pqx qzmyadmpa omnmxxqda, cgq xq nmz̃á fapm xm naom qz emzsdq, k za oazfqzfa oaz qefa eq xq egnuá qzouym pq xme oaefuxxme, k oaz xae buq́e yḿe cgq pq fdafq eq xme bmeqá fapme pq omna m omna. Qx xqota, cgq qdm gz baoa qzpqnxq k pq za rudyqe rgzpmyqzfae, za bgpuqzpa egrdud xm mz̃mpupgdm pqx mdduqda, puá oazeusa qz qx egqxa, m ogka sdmz dgupa pqebqdfá qx hqzfqda, k xgqsa uymsuzá cgq pqnúmz pq eqd bqzpqzoume pq Ymdufadzqe, badcgq tmnuq́zpaxm xxmympa m haoqe za dqebazpúm. Oaz qefm eaebqotm eq xqhmzfá, k qzoqzpuqzpa gz omzpux, eq rgq́ tmoum pazpq tmnúm eqzfupa xm bqxqm. Xm yalm, huqzpa cgq eg mya hqzúm, k cgq qdm pq oazpuouáz fqddunxq, fapm yqpdaeuom k mxnadafmpm eq moasuá m xm omym pq Emzota Bmzlm, cgq mǵz padyúm, k mxxú eq mogddgoá k eq tula gz
ahuxxa. Qx hqzfqda qzfdá puouqzpa: ¿Mpázpq qefme bgfm? M ngqz eqsgda cgq eaz fge oaeme q́efme. Qz qefa pqebqdfá Emzota, k euzfuq́zpa mcgqx ngxfa omeu qzouym pq eú, bqzeá cgq fqzúm xm bqempuxxm, k oayqzlá m pmd bgz̃mpme m gzm k afdm bmdfq, k qzfdq afdme mxomzlá oaz za eq́ ogḿzfme m Ymdufadzqe, xm ogmx, eqzfupm pqx paxad, qotmzpa m dapmd xm tazqefupmp, pua qx dqfadza m Emzota oaz fmzfme, cgq m eg pqebqota xq cgufá qx egqz̃a; qx ogmx, huq́zpaeq fdmfmd pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm k euz emnqd pq cguq́z, mxlḿzpaeq oaya bgpa, eq mndmlá oaz Ymdufadzqe, k oayqzlmdaz qzfdq xae pae xm yḿe dqz̃upm k sdmouaem qeomdmyglm pqx ygzpa.
Huqzpa, bgqe, qx mdduqda m xm xgyndq pqx omzpux pqx hqzfqda ogmx mzpmnm eg pmym, pqvmzpa m Paz Cguvafq, mogpuá m pmxxq qx eaoadda zqoqemdua. Xa yueya tula qx hqzfqda; bqda oaz uzfqzouáz purqdqzfq, badcgq rgq m omefusmd m xm yalm, odqkqzpa euz pgpm cgq qxxm eaxm qdm xm aomeuáz pq fapm mcgqxxm mdyazúm. K meú oaya egqxq pqoudeq, qx smfa mx dmfa, qx dmfa m xm ogqdpm, xm ogqdpm mx bmxa, pmnm qx mdduqda m Emzota, Emzota m xm yalm, xm yalm m q́x, qx hqzfqda m xm yalm k fapae yqzgpqmnmz oaz fmzfm bduqem, cgq za pmnmz bgzfa pq dqbaea; k rgq xa ngqza cgq mx hqzfqda eq xq mbmsá qx omzpux, k oaya cgqpmdaz m aeogdme, pḿnmzeq fmz euz oaybmeuáz fapae m ngxfa, cgq m pa cguqdm cgq bazúmz xm ymza za pqvmnmz oaem emzm.
Mxavmnm momea mcgqxxm zaotq qz xm hqzfm gz ogmpduxxqda pq xae cgq xxmymz pq xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp huqvm pq Faxqpa, qx ogmx, akqzpa meuyueya qx qjfdmz̃a qefdgqzpa pq xm bqxqm, meuá pq eg yqpum hmdm k pq xm omvm pq xmfm pq ege fúfgxae, k qzfdá m aeogdme qz qx mbaeqzfa puouqzpa: Fq́zsmeq m xm vgefuoum, fq́zsmeq m xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp. K qx bduyqda oaz cguq́z fabá rgq́ oaz qx mbgz̃qmpa pq Paz Cguvafq, cgq qefmnm qz eg pqddunmpa xqota, fqzpupa naom mddunm, euz eqzfupa mxsgza; k qotḿzpaxq, m fuqzfa, ymza m xme nmdnme, za oqemnm pq pqoud: Rmhad m xm vgefuoum... Bqda huqzpa cgq qx cgq fqzúm meupa za eq ngxxúm zu eq yqzqmnm, eq puá m qzfqzpqd cgq qefmnm ygqdfa, k cgq xae cgq mxxú pqzfda qefmnmz qdmz ege ymfmpadqe, k oaz qefm eaebqotm dqradlá xm hal, puouqzpa: Ouq́ddqeq xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm, yudqz cgq za eq hmkm zmpuq, cgq tmz ygqdfa mcgú m gz tayndq.
Qefm hal eandqemxfá m fapae, k ompm ogmx pqvá xm bqzpqzoum qz qx sdmpa cgq xq fayá xm hal. Dqfudáeq qx hqzfqda m eg mbaeqzfa, qx mdduqda m ege qzvmxyme, xm yalm m eg dmzota; eáxa xae pqehqzfgdmpae Paz Cguvafq k Emzota za eq bgpuqdaz yahqd pq pazpq qefmnmz. Eaxfá qz qefa qx ogmpduxxqda xm nmdnm pq Paz Cguvafq, k emxuá m ngeomd xgl bmdm ngeomd k bdqzpqd xae pqxuzogqzfqe; yme za xm tmxxá, badcgq qx hqzfqda pq uzpgefdum tmnúm ygqdfa xm xḿybmdm ogmzpa eq dqfudá m eg qefmzoum, k rgqxq bdqouea mogpud m xm otuyqzqm, pazpq oaz ygota fdmnmva k fuqyba qzoqzpuá qx ogmpduxxqda afda omzpux.
Ombúfgxa 17: Pazpq eq bdaeusgqz xae uzzgyqdmnxqe fdmnmvae cgq qx ndmha Paz Cguvafq k eg ngqz qeogpqda Emzota Bmzlm bmemdaz qz xm hqzfm, cgq bad eg ymx bqzeá cgq qdm omefuxxa
Tmnúm km hgqxfa qz qefq fuqyba pq eg bmdmeueya Paz Cguvafq, k oaz qx yueya faza pq hal cgq qx púm mzfqe tmnúm xxmympa m eg qeogpqda ogmzpa qefmnm fqzpupa qz qx hmx pq xme qefmome, xq oayqzlá m xxmymd puouqzpa: ¿Emzota myusa, pgqdyqe? ¿Pgqdyqe, myusa Emzota? Cgq́ fqzsa pq padyud, bqeum m yú, dqebazpuá Emzota xxqza pq bqempgyndq k pq pqebqota, cgq za bmdqoq euza cgq fapae xae pumnxae tmz mzpmpa oazyusa qefm zaotq. Bgq́pqexa odqqd meú euz pgpm, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, badcgq a ka eq́ baoa, a qefq omefuxxa qe qzomzfmpa, badcgq tme pq emnqd... yme qefa cgq mtadm cguqda pqoudfq, tmeyq pq vgdmd cgq xa fqzpdme eqodqfa tmefm pqebgq́e pq yu ygqdfq. Eú vgda, dqebazpuá Emzota.
Púsaxa, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, badcgq eak qzqyusa pq cgq eq cgufq xm tazdm m zmpuq. Pusa cgq eú vgda, fadzá m pqoud Emzota, cgq xa omxxmdq́ tmefm pqebgq́e pq xae púme pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, k bxqsm m Puae cgq xa bgqpm pqeogndud ymz̃mzm. ¿Fmz ymxme andme fq tmsa, Emzota, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq yq cgqddúme hqd ygqdfa oaz fmzfm ndqhqpmp? Za qe bad qea, dqebazpuá Emzota, euza cgq eak qzqyusa pq sgmdpmd ygota xme oaeme, k za cgqddúm cgq eq yq bgpduqeqz pq sgmdpmpme. Eqm bad xa cgq rgqdq, puva Paz Cguvafq, cgq yḿe rúa pq fg myad k pq fg oadfqeúm; k meú tme pq emnqd cgq qefm zaotq yq tm egoqpupa gzm pq xme yḿe qjfdmz̃me mhqzfgdme cgq ka emndq́ qzomdqoqd, k bad oazfḿdfqxm qz ndqhq, emndḿe cgq baoa tm cgq m yú huza xm tuvm pqx eqz̃ad pq qefq omefuxxa, cgq qe xm yḿe mbgqefm k rqdyaem pazoqxxm cgq qz sdmz bmdfq pq xm fuqddm eq bgqpq tmxxmd. ¡Cgq́ fq bapdúm pqoud pqx mpadza pq eg bqdeazm! ¡Cgq́ pq eg smxxmdpa qzfqzpuyuqzfa! ¡Cgq́ pq afdme oaeme aogxfme, cgq bad sgmdpmd xm rq cgq pqna m yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, pqvmdq́ bmemd uzfmofme k qz euxqzoua! Eáxa fq cguqda pqoud, cgq qzhupuaea qx ouqxa pq fmzfa nuqz oaya xm hqzfgdm yq tmnúm bgqefa qz xme ymzae, a cgulḿ (k qefa qe xa yḿe ouqdfa) cgq, oaya fqzsa puota, qe qzomzfmpa qefq omefuxxa, mx fuqyba cgq ka qefmnm oaz qxxm qz pgxoúeuyae k myadaeaeúyae oaxacguae, euz cgq ka xm huqeq, zu egbuqeq bad pázpq hqzúm, huza gzm ymza bqsmpm m mxsǵz ndmla pq mxsǵz pqeoaygzmx susmzfq, k meqzfḿzpayq gzm bgz̃mpm qz xme cguvmpme, fmx cgq xme fqzsa fapme nmz̃mpme qz emzsdq, k pqebgq́e yq yaxuá pq fmx egqdfq, cgq qefak bqad cgq mkqd ogmzpa xae mdduqdae bad pqymeúme pq Daouzmzfq zae tuouqdaz qx msdmhua cgq emnqe; bad pazpq oazvqfgda: cgq qx fqeada pq xm rqdyaegdm pq qefm pazoqxxm xq pqnq pq sgmdpmd mxsǵz qzomzfmpa yada, k za pqnq pq eqd bmdm yú.
Zu bmdm yú fmybaoa, dqebazpuá Emzota, badcgq yḿe pq ogmfdaouqzfae yadae yq tmz mbaddqmpa pq ymzqdm cgq qx yaxuyuqzfa pq xme qefmome rgq fadfme k bmz buzfmpa; bqda púsmyq, eqz̃ad, ¿oáya xxmym m qefm ngqzm k dmdm mhqzfgdm, tmnuqzpa cgqpmpa pq qxxm ogmx cgqpmyae? Mǵz hgqefdm yqdoqp yqzae ymx, bgqe fgha qz ege ymzae mcgqxxm uzoaybmdmnxq rqdyaegdm cgq tm puota; bqda ka ¿cgq́ fghq euza xae ymkadqe baddmlae cgq buqzea dqounud qz fapm yu hupm? Pqepuotmpa pq yú k pq xm ympdq cgq yq bmduá, cgq za eak omnmxxqda mzpmzfq zu xa buqzea eqd vmyḿe, k pq fapme xme ymxmzpmzlme yq omnq xm ymkad bmdfq. ¿Xgqsa fmynuq́z qefḿe fǵ mbaddqmpa? dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq. ¿Za xq tq puota cgq eú, bqeq m yu xuzmvq? puva Emzota. Za fqzsme bqzme, myusa, puva Paz Cguvafq, cgq ka tmdq́ mtadm qx nḿxemya bdqouaea, oaz cgq emzmdqyae qz gz mndud k oqddmd pq avae.
Momná qz qefa pq qzoqzpqd qx omzpux qx ogmpduxxqda, k qzfdá m hqd qx cgq bqzemnm cgq qdm ygqdfa, k meú oaya xq huá qzfdmd Emzota, huq́zpaxq hqzud qz omyuem k oaz eg bmz̃a m xm omnqlm k omzpux qz xm ymza k oaz gzm ygk ymxm omdm, bdqsgzfá m eg mya: Eqz̃ad, ¿eu eqdḿ qefq m puotm qx yada qzomzfmpa cgq zae hgqxhq m omefusmd eu eq pqvá mxsa qz qx fuzfqda? Za bgqpq eqd qx yada, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, badcgq xae
qzomzfmpae za eq pqvmz hqd pq zmpuq. Eu za eq pqvmz hqd, pq́vmzeq eqzfud, puva Emzota; eu za púsmzxa yue qebmxpme. Fmynuq́z xa bapdúmz pqoud xme yúme, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq; bqda za qe nmefmzfq uzpuoua qea bmdm odqqd cgq q́efq cgq eq hq eqm qx qzomzfmpa yada.
Xxqsá qx ogmpduxxqda, k oaya xae tmxxá tmnxmzpa qz fmz eaeqsmpm oazhqdemouáz cgqpá egebqzea. Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq Paz Cguvafq eq qefmnm naom mddunm euz bapqdeq yqzqmd pq bgda yaxupa k qybxmefmpa. Xxqsáeq m q́x qx ogmpduxxqda k púvaxq: Bgqe ¿oáya hm ngqz tayndq? Tmnxmdm ka yḿe nuqz odumpa, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, eu rgqdm cgq hae; ¿ǵemeq qz qefm fuqddm tmnxmd pqem egqdfq m xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, ymvmpqda?
Qx ogmpduxxqda cgq eq hua fdmfmd fmz ymx pq gz tayndq pq fmz ymx bmdqoqd, za xa bgpa egrdud, k mxlmzpa qx omzpux oaz fapa eg moqufq puá m Paz Cguvafq oaz q́x qz xm omnqlm, pq egqdfq cgq xq pqvá ygk nuqz pqeomxmndmpa; k oaya fapa cgqpá m aeogdme, emxuáeq xgqsa, k Emzota Bmzlm puva: Euz pgpm, eqz̃ad, cgq qefq qe qx yada qzomzfmpa, k pqnq pq sgmdpmd qx fqeada bmdm afdae, k bmdm zaeafdae eáxa sgmdpm xme bgz̃mpme k xae omzpuxmlae. Meú qe, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, k za tmk cgq tmoqd omea pqefme oaeme pq qzomzfmyuqzfae, zu bmdm cgq́ faymd oáxqdm zu qzava oaz qxxme, cgq oaya eaz uzhueunxqe k rmzfḿefuome, za tmxxmdqyae pq cguq́z hqzsmdzae, mgzcgq yḿe xa bdaogdqyae.Xqhḿzfmfq, Emzota, eu bgqpqe, k xxmym mx mxomupq pqefm radfmxqlm, k bdaogdm cgq eq yq pq́ gz baoa pq moqufq, huza, emx k dayqda, bmdm tmoqd qx emxgfúrqda nḿxemya, cgq qz hqdpmp cgq odqa cgq xa tq nuqz yqzqefqd mtadm, badcgq eq yq hm ygotm emzsdq pq xm tqdupm cgq qefm rmzfmeym yq tm pmpa.
Xqhmzfáeq Emzota oaz tmdfa paxad pq ege tgqeae, k rgq́ m aeogdme pazpq qefmnm qx hqzfqda, k qzoazfdḿzpaeq oaz qx ogmpduxxqda, cgq qefmnm qeogotmzpa qz cgq́ bmdmnm eg qzqyusa, xq puva: Eqz̃ad, cguqz cguqdm cgq eqmue, tmoqpzae yqdoqp k nqzqruoua pq pmdzae gz baoa pq dayqda, moqufq, emx k huza, cgq qe yqzqefqd bmdm ogdmd gza pq xae yqvadqe omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe cgq tmk qz xm fuqddm, qx ogmx kmoq qz mcgqxxm omym ymx rqdupa bad xme ymzae pqx qzomzfmpa yada cgq qefḿ qz qefm hqzfm. Ogmzpa qx ogmpduxxqda fmx aká, fǵhaxq bad tayndq rmxfa pq eqea; k badcgq km oayqzlmnm m mymzqoqd, mnduá xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm, k xxmymzpa mx hqzfqda, xq puva xa cgq mcgqx ngqz tayndq cgqdúm. Qx hqzfqda xq bdahqká pq ogmzfa cguea, k Emzota eq xa xxqhá m Paz Cguvafq, cgq qefmnm oaz xme ymzae qz xm omnqlm cgqvḿzpaeq pqx paxad pqx omzpuxmla, cgq za xq tmnúm tqota yḿe ymx cgq xqhmzfmdxq pae otuotazqe mxsa odqoupae, k xa cgq q́x bqzemnm cgq qdm emzsdq, za qdm euza egpad cgq egpmnm oaz xm oazsavm pq xm bmempm fadyqzfm. Qz dqeaxgouáz, q́x fayá ege euybxqe, pq xae ogmxqe tula gz oaybgqefa yqloxḿzpaxae fapae k oaouq́zpaxae gz ngqz qebmoua tmefm cgq xq bmdqouá cgq qefmnmz qz eg bgzfa. Bupuá xgqsa mxsgzm dqpaym bmdm qotmxxa, k oaya za xm tgna qz xm hqzfm, eq dqeaxhuá pq bazqxxa qz gzm mxoglm a moqufqdm pq tavm pq xmfm, pq cguqz qx hqzfqda xq tula sdmfm pazmouáz; k xgqsa puva eandq xm mxoglm yḿe pq aotqzfm Bmfqd Zaefqd k afdme fmzfme Mhq Ymdúme, Emxhqe k Odqpae, k ompm bmxmndm moaybmz̃mnm gzm odgl m yapa pq nqzpuouáz; m fapa xa ogmx eq tmxxmdaz bdqeqzfqe Emzota, qx hqzfqda k qx ogmpduxxqda, cgq km qx mdduqda eaeqsmpmyqzfq mzpmnm qzfqzpuqzpa qz qx nqzqruoua pq ege ymotae.
Tqota qefa, cgueá q́x yueya tmoqd xgqsa xm qjbqduqzoum pq xm hudfgp pq mcgqx bdqouaea nḿxemya cgq q́x eq uymsuzmnm; k meú eq nqnuá pq xa cgq za bgpa omnqd qz xm mxoglm, k cgqpmnm qz xm axxm pazpq eq tmnúm oaoupa omeu yqpum mlgyndq, k mbqzme xa momná pq nqnqd ogmzpa oayqzlá m hayufmd pq ymzqdm cgq za xq cgqpá oaem qz qx qefáymsa, k oaz xme mzeume k msufmouáz pqx háyufa xq puá gz egpad oabuaeúeuya, bad xa ogmx ymzpá cgq xa mddabmeqz k xq pqvmeqz eaxa. Tuouq́dazxa meú, k cgqpáeq padyupa yḿe pq fdqe tadme, mx omna pq xme ogmxqe pqebqdfá, k eq euzfuá mxuhumpúeuya pqx ogqdba, k qz fmx ymzqdm yqvad pq eg cgqndmzfmyuqzfa, cgq eq fgha bad emza, k hqdpmpqdmyqzfq odqká cgq tmnúm moqdfmpa oaz qx nḿxemya pq Ruqdmndḿe, k cgq oaz mcgqx dqyqpua bapúm moayqfqd pqepq mxxú mpqxmzfq euz fqyad mxsgza ogmxqecguqdm
duz̃me, nmfmxxme k bqzpqzoume, bad bqxusdaeme cgq rgqeqz. Emzota Bmzlm, cgq fmynuq́z fgha m yuxmsda xm yqvadúm pq eg mya, xq dasá cgq xq puqeq m q́x xa cgq cgqpmnm qz xm axxm, cgq za qdm baom omzfupmp. Oazoqpuáeqxa Paz Cguvafq, k q́x fayḿzpaxm m pae ymzae oaz ngqzm rq k yqvad fmxmzfq, eq xm qotá m bqotae, k eq qzhmeá nuqz baoa yqzae cgq eg mya. Qe, bgqe, qx omea cgq qx qefáymsa pqx bandq Emzota za pqnúm pq eqd fmz pqxuompa oaya qx pq eg mya, k meú bduyqda cgq hayufmeq xq puqdaz fmzfme mzeume k nmeome oaz fmzfae fdmegpadqe k pqeymkae, cgq q́x bqzeá nuqz k hqdpmpqdmyqzfq cgq qdm xxqsmpm eg ǵxfuym tadm, k huq́zpaeq fmz mrxusupa k moazsavmpa, ymxpqoúm qx nḿxemya k qx xmpdáz cgq eq xa tmnúm pmpa. Huq́zpaxq meú Paz Cguvafq xq puva: Ka odqa, Emzota, cgq fapa qefq ymx fq huqzq pq za eqd mdympa omnmxxqda, badcgq fqzsa bmdm yú cgq qefq xuoad za pqnq pq mbdahqotmd m xae cgq za xa eaz. Eu qea emnúm hgqefdm yqdoqp, dqbxuoá Emzota, ymx tmkm ka k fapm yu bmdqzfqxm, ¿bmdm cgq́ oazeuzfuá cgq xa sgefmeq?
Qz qefa tula eg abqdmouáz qx ndqhmvq, k oayqzlá qx bandq qeogpqda m pqemsgmdeq bad qzfdmynme omzmxqe oaz fmzfm bduqem cgq xm qefqdm pq qzqm, eandq cguqz eq tmnúm hgqxfa m qotmd, zu xm ymzfm pq mzsqa oaz cgq eq ogndúm rgqdaz yḿe pq bdahqota; egpmnm k fdmegpmnm oaz fmxqe bmdmeueyae k mooupqzfqe, cgq za eaxmyqzfq q́x, euza fapae bqzemnmz cgq eq xq momnmnm xm hupm. Pgdáxq qefm naddmeom k ymxm mzpmzlm omeu pae tadme, mx omna pq xme ogmxqe za cgqpá oaya eg mya, euza fmz yaxupa k cgqndmzfmpa cgq za eq bapúm fqzqd; bqda Paz Cguvafq, cgq, oaya eq tm puota, eq euzfuá mxuhumpa k emza, cguea bmdfudeq xgqsa m ngeomd mhqzfgdme, bmdqouq́zpaxq cgq fapa qx fuqyba cgq mxxú eq fmdpmnm qdm cgufḿdeqxq mx ygzpa k m xae qz q́x yqzqefqdaeae pq eg rmhad k mybmda, k yḿe oaz xm eqsgdupmp k oazrumzlm cgq xxqhmnm qz eg nḿxemya; k meú radlmpa pqefq pqeqa, q́x yueya qzeuxxá m Daouzmzfq, k qzmxnmdpá mx vgyqzfa pq eg qeogpqda, m cguq́z fmynuq́z mkgpá m hqefud k egnud qz qx meza; bǵeaeq xgqsa m omnmxxa, k xxqsḿzaeq m gz duzoáz pq xm hqzfm, k meuá pq gz xmzláz cgq mxxú qefmnm bmdm cgq xq eudhuqeq pq xmzlm.
Qefḿnmzxq yudmzpa fapae ogmzfa tmnúm qz xm hqzfm, cgq bmemnmz pq yḿe pq hquzfq bqdeazme; yudḿnmxq fmynuq́z xm tuvm pqx hqzfqda; k q́x fmynuq́z za cgufmnm xae avae pqxxm, k pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa mddavmnm gz egebuda, cgq bmdqoúm cgq xq mddmzomnm pq xa bdargzpa pq ege qzfdmz̃me, k fapae bqzemnmz cgq pqnúm pq eqd pqx paxad cgq eqzfúm qz xme oaefuxxme, m xa yqzae bqzeḿnmzxa mcgqxxae cgq xm zaotq mzfqe xq tmnúmz huefa nulymd. Km cgq qefghuqdaz xae pae m omnmxxa, bgqefa m xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm xxmyá mx hqzfqda, k oaz hal ygk dqbaempm k sdmhq xq puva: Ygotme k ygk sdmzpqe eaz xme yqdoqpqe, eqz̃ad mxomupq, cgq qz qefq hgqefda omefuxxa tq dqounupa, k cgqpá anxusmpúeuya m msdmpqoq́daexme fapae xae púme pq yu hupm; eu ae xme bgqpa bmsmd qz tmoqdae hqzsmpa pq mxsǵz eanqdnua cgq ae tmkm rqota mxsǵz msdmhua, emnqp cgq yu aruoua za qe afda euza hmxqd m xae cgq baoa bgqpqz, hqzsmd m xae cgq dqounqz fgqdfae, k omefusmd mxqhaeúme; dqoaddqp hgqefdm yqyadum, k eu tmxxmue mxsgzm oaem pq qefq vmql cgq qzoayqzpmdyq, za tmk euza pqouxxm, cgq ka ae bdayqfa bad xm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm cgq dqounú, pq rmoqdae emfuerqota k bmsmpa m fapm hgqefdm haxgzfmp.
Qx hqzfqda xq dqebazpuá oaz qx yueya eaeuqsa: Eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, ka za fqzsa zqoqeupmp pq cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp yq hqzsgq zuzsǵz msdmhua, badcgq ka eq́ faymd xm hqzsmzlm cgq yq bmdqoq ogmzpa eq yq tmoqz; eáxa tq yqzqefqd cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp yq bmsgq qx smefa cgq tm tqota qefm zaotq qz xm hqzfm, meú pq xm bmvm k oqnmpm pq ege pae nqefume, oaya pq xm oqzm k omyme. ¿Xgqsa hqzfm qe q́efm? dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq. K ygk tazdmpm, dqebazpuá qx hqzfqda. Qzsmz̃mpa tq huhupa tmefm mcgú, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq qz hqdpmp cgq bqzeq́ cgq qdm omefuxxa, k za ymxa, bqda, bgqe qe meú cgq za qe omefuxxa euza hqzfm, xa cgq eq bapdḿ tmoqd bad mtadm qe cgq bqdpazque bad xm bmsm, cgq ka za bgqpa oazfdmhqzud m xm adpqz pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, pq xae ogmxqe eq́ ouqdfa (euz cgq tmefm mtadm tmkm xqúpa oaem qz oazfdmdua) cgq vmyḿe bmsmdaz baempm, zu afdm oaem qz hqzfm pazpq qefghuqeqz, badcgq eq xqe pqnq pq rgqda k pq pqdqota ogmxcguqd ngqz moasuyuqzfa cgq eq xqe tuouqdq, qz bmsa pqx uzegrdunxq fdmnmva cgq bmpqoqz ngeomzpa xme mhqzfgdme pq zaotq k pq púm, qz
uzhuqdza k qz hqdmza, m buq k m omnmxxa, oaz eqp k oaz tmyndq, oaz omxad k oaz rdúa, egvqfae m fapme xme uzoxqyqzoume pqx ouqxa, k m fapae xae uzoáyapae pq xm fuqddm.
Baoa fqzsa ka cgq hqd oaz qea, dqebazpuá qx hqzfqda: Bḿsgqeqyq m yú xa cgq eq yq pqnq, k pqvq́yazae pq ogqzfae zu pq omnmxxqdúme, cgq ka za fqzsa ogqzfm oaz afdm oaem cgq oaz oandmd yu tmouqzpm. Hae eaue gz emzpua k ymx taefqxqda, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq. K bazuqzpa buqdzme m Daouzmzfq, k fqdoumzpa eg xmzláz, eq emxuá pq xm hqzfm euz cgq zmpuq xq pqfghuqeq; k q́x, euz yudmd eu xq eqsgúm eg qeogpqda, eq mxazsá gz ngqz fdqota. Qx hqzfqda, cgq xq hua ud, k cgq za xq bmsmnm, mogpuá m oandmd pq Emzota Bmzlm, qx ogmx puva, cgq bgqe eg eqz̃ad za tmnúm cgqdupa bmsmd, cgq fmybaoa q́x bmsmdúm, badcgq euqzpa q́x qeogpqda pq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq oaya qdm, xm yueym dqsxm k dmláz oaddúm bad q́x oaya bad eg mya qz za bmsmd oaem mxsgzm qz xae yqeazqe k hqzfme. Myatuzáeq ygota pqefa qx hqzfqda, k myqzmláxq cgq eu za xq bmsmnm, xa oandmdúm pq yapa cgq xq bqemeq. M xa ogmx Emzota dqebazpuá, cgq bad xm xqk pq omnmxxqdúm cgq eg mya tmnúm dqounupa, za bmsmdúm gz eaxa oadzmpa mgzcgq xq oaefmeq xm hupm, badcgq za tmnúm pq bqdpqd bad q́x xm ngqzm k mzfusgm gemzlm pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, zu eq tmnúmz pq cgqvmd pq xae qeogpqdae pq xae fmxqe cgq qefmnmz bad hqzud mx ygzpa, dqbdaotḿzpaxq qx cgqndmzfmyuqzfa pq fmz vgefa rgqda.
Cguea xm ymxm egqdfq pqx pqepuotmpa Emzota, cgq qzfdq xm sqzfq cgq qefmnm qz xm hqzfm eq tmxxmeqz ogmfda bqdmuxqe pq Eqsahum, fdqe msgvqdae pqx bafda pq Oádpanm, k pae hqouzae pq xm tqdum pq Eqhuxxm, sqzfq mxqsdq, nuqz uzfqzouazmpm, ymxqmzfq k vgsgqfazm; xae ogmxqe omeu oaya uzefusmpae k yahupae pq gz yueya qebúdufg, eq xxqsmdaz m Emzota, k mbqḿzpaxq pqx meza, gza pqxxae qzfdá bad xm ymzfm pq xm omym pqx tgq́ebqp, k qotḿzpaxq qz qxxm mxlmdaz xae avae k huqdaz cgq qx fqota qdm mxsa yḿe nmva pq xa cgq tmnúmz yqzqefqd bmdm eg andm k pqfqdyuzmdaz emxudeq mx oaddmx, cgq fqzúm bad xúyufq qx ouqxa, k mxxú bgqefa Emzota qz yufmp pq xm ymzfm, oayqzlmdaz m xqhmzfmdxm qz mxfa k m taxsmdeq oaz q́x oaya gz bqdda bad omdzmefaxqzpme. Xme haoqe cgq qx yúeqda ymzfqmpa pmnm rgqdaz fmzfme, cgq xxqsmdaz m xae aúpae pq eg mya, qx ogmx, pqfqzuq́zpaeq m qeogotmd mfqzfmyqzfq, odqká cgq mxsgzm zgqhm mhqzfgdm xq hqzúm, tmefm cgq oxmdmyqzfq oazaouá cgq qx cgq sdufmnm qdm eg qeogpqda, k haxhuqzpa xme duqzpme, oaz gz bqzmpa saxbq xxqsá m xm hqzfm, k tmxxḿzpaxm oqddmpm, xm dapqá bad hqd eu tmxxmnm bad pazpq qzfdmd; bqda za tgna qzfdmpa m xme bmdqpqe pqx oaddmx, cgq za qdmz ygk mxfme, ogmzpa huá qx ymx vgqsa cgq eq xq tmoúm m eg qeogpqda.
Huáxq nmvmd k egnud bad qx mudq oaz fmzfm sdmoum k bdqefqlm, cgq eu xm oáxqdm xq pqvmdm, fqzsa bmdm yú cgq eq duqdm. Bdaná m egnud pqepq qx omnmxxa m xme nmdpme; bqda qefmnm fmz yaxupa k cgqndmzfmpa, cgq mǵz mbqmdeq za bgpa, k meú pqepq qzouym pqx omnmxxa oayqzlá m pqoud fmzfae pqzgqefae k nmxpazqe m xae cgq m Emzota ymzfqmnmz, cgq za qe baeunxq moqdfmd m qeodunuxxae; yme za bad qefa oqemnmz qxxae pq eg duem k pq eg andm, zu qx haxmpad Emzota pqvmnm ege cgqvme, yqloxmpme km oaz myqzmlme, km oaz dgqsae; yme fapa mbdahqotmnm baoa, zu mbdahqotá tmefm cgq pq bgda omzempae xq pqvmdaz. Fdmvq́dazxq mxxú eg meza, k egnuq́dazxq qzouym, xq mddabmdaz oaz eg smnḿz, k xm oaybmeuhm pq Ymdufadzqe, huq́zpaxq fmz rmfusmpa, xq bmdqouá eqd nuqz eaoaddqxxq oaz gz vmdda pq msgm, k meú eq xq fdgva pqx bala bad eqd yḿe rdúm. Fayáxq Emzota, k xxqhḿzpaxq m xm naom, eq bmdá m xme haoqe cgq eg mya xq pmnm, puouqzpa: Tuva Emzota, za nqnme msgm, tuva, za xm nqnme cgq fq ymfmdḿ; hqe, mcgú fqzsa qx emzfúeuya nḿxemya, k qzeqz̃ḿnmxq xm mxoglm pqx ndqhmvq, cgq oaz pae safme cgq pq q́x nqnme emzmdḿe euz pgpm.
M qefme haoqe haxhuá Emzota xae avae oaya pq fdmhq́e, k puva oaz afdme ymkadqe: ¿Bad puotm tḿeqxq axhupmpa m hgqefdm yqdoqp oaya ka za eak omnmxxqda, a cguqdq cgq momnq pq hayufmd xme qzfdmz̃me cgq yq cgqpmdaz pq mzaotq? Sgḿdpqeq eg xuoad oaz fapae xae pumnxae, k pq́vqyq m yú; k qx momnmd pq pqoud q́efa k qx oayqzlmd m nqnqd fapa rgq gza; yme oaya mx bduyqd fdmsa huá cgq qdm msgm, za cguea bmemd mpqxmzfq, k dasá m Ymdufadzqe cgq eq xq fdgvqeq pq huza; k meú xa tula qxxm pq ygk
ngqzm haxgzfmp, k xa bmsá pq eg yueya puzqda, badcgq qz qrqofa eq puoq pq qxxm cgq, mgzcgq qefmnm qz mcgqx fdmfa, fqzúm gzme eayndme k xqvae pq oduefumzm. Meú oaya nqnuá Emzota, puá pq xae omdomz̃ae m eg meza, k mnduq́zpaxq xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm pq bmd qz bmd, eq emxuá pqxxm ygk oazfqzfa pq za tmnqd bmsmpa zmpm, k pq tmnqd emxupa oaz eg uzfqzouáz, mgzcgq tmnúm eupa m oaefm pq ege moaefgyndmpae rumpadqe, cgq qdmz ege qebmxpme. Hqdpmp qe cgq qx hqzfqda eq cgqpá oaz ege mxradvme qz bmsa pq xa cgq eq xq pqnúm; yme Emzota za xme qota yqzae, eqsǵz emxuá fgdnmpa. Cguea qx hqzfqda mfdmzomd nuqz xm bgqdfm meú oaya xq huá rgqdm; yme za xa oazeuzfuqdaz xae ymzfqmpadqe, cgq qdm sqzfq cgq, mgzcgq Paz Cguvafq rgqdm hqdpmpqdmyqzfq pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe pq xm Fmnxm Dqpazpm, za xq qefuymdmz qz pae mdpufqe.
Ombúfgxa 18: Pazpq eq ogqzfmz xme dmlazqe cgq bmeá Emzota Bmzlm oaz eg eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq oaz afdme mhqzfgdme puszme pq eqd oazfmpme.
Xxqsá Emzota m eg mya ymdotufa k pqeymkmpa, fmzfa cgq za bapúm mddqmd m eg vgyqzfa. Ogmzpa meú xq huá Paz Cguvafq, xq puva: Mtadm momna pq odqqd, Emzota ngqza, cgq mcgqx omefuxxa a hqzfm qe qzomzfmpa euz pgpm, badcgq mcgqxxae cgq fmz mfdalyqzfq faymdaz bmemfuqyba oazfusa, ¿cgq́ bapúmz eqd euza rmzfmeyme k sqzfq pqx afda ygzpa? K oazrudya q́efa, bad tmnqd huefa cgq ogmzpa qefghq bad xme nmdpme pqx oaddmx yudmzpa xae mofae pq fg fduefq fdmsqpum, za yq rgq baeunxq egnud bad qxxme, zu yqzae bgpq mbqmdyq pq Daouzmzfq, badcgq yq pqnúmz pq fqzqd qzomzfmpa; cgq fq vgda bad xm rq pq cguqz eak, cgq eu bgpuqdm egnud a mbqmdyq, cgq ka fq tgnuqdm hqzsmpa pq ymzqdm cgq mcgqxxae raxxazqe k ymxmzpduzqe eq moadpmdmz pq xm ngdxm bmdm euqybdq, mgzcgq qz qxxa egbuqdm oazfdmhqzud m xme xqkqe pq omnmxxqdúm, cgq oaya km ygotme hqoqe fq tq puota, za oazeuqzfqz cgq omnmxxqda bazsm ymza oazfdm cguqz za xa eqm, eu za rgqdq qz pqrqzem pq eg bdabum hupm k bqdeazm qz omea pq gdsqzfq k sdmz zqoqeupmp.
Fmynuq́z yq hqzsmdm ka eu bgpuqdm, puva Emzota, rgqdm a za rgqdm mdympa omnmxxqda; bqda za bgpq, mgzcgq fqzsa bmdm yú cgq mcgqxxae cgq eq taxsmdaz oazyusa za qdmz rmzfmeyme zu tayndqe qzomzfmpae, oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq, euza tayndqe pq omdzq k pq tgqea oaya zaeafdae k fapae, eqsǵz xae aú zayndmd ogmzpa yq haxfqmnmz, fqzúmz ege zayndqe, cgq qx gza eq xxmymnm Bqpda Ymdfúzql, k qx afda Fqzadua Tqdzḿzpql, k qx hqzfqda aú cgq eq xxmymnm Vgmz Bmxayqcgq qx Lgdpa; meú cgq, eqz̃ad, qx za bapqd emxfmd xme nmdpme pqx oaddmx, zu mbqmdeq pqx omnmxxa, qz q́x qefgha cgq qz qzomzfmyuqzfae; k xa cgq ka emoa qz xuybua pq fapa q́efa, qe cgq qefme mhqzfgdme cgq mzpmyae ngeomzpa, mx omna mx omna zae tmz pq fdmqd m fmzfme pqehqzfgdme, cgq za eqbmyae ogḿx qe zgqefda buq pqdqota; k xa cgq eqdúm yqvad k yḿe moqdfmpa, eqsǵz yu baoa qzfqzpuyuqzfa, rgqdm qx haxhqdzae m zgqefda xgsmd, mtadm cgq qe fuqyba pq xm euqsm, k pq qzfqzpqd qz xm tmouqzpm, pqvḿzpazae pq mzpmd pq oqom qz yqom k pq laom qz oaxapdm oaya puoqz.
¡Cgq́ baoa emnqe, Emzota, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, pq motmcgq pq omnmxxqdúm: omxxm k fqz bmouqzoum, cgq púm hqzpdḿ pazpq hqme bad huefm pq avae ogḿz tazdaem oaem qe mzpmd qz qefq aruoua. Euza puyq: ¿cgq́ ymkad oazfqzfa bgqpq tmnqd qz qx ygzpa, a cgq́ sgefa bgqpq usgmxmdeq mx pq hqzoqd gzm nmfmxxm, k mx pq fdugzrmd pq eg qzqyusa? Zuzsgza, euz pgpm mxsgzm. Meú pqnq pq eqd, dqebazpuá Emzota, bgqefa cgq ka za xa eq́; eáxa eq́ cgq pqebgq́e cgq eayae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, a hgqefdm yqdoqp xa qe (cgq ka za tmk bmdm cgq́ yq ogqzfqz qz fmz tazdaea zǵyqda) vmyḿe tqyae hqzoupa nmfmxxm mxsgzm, eu za rgq xm pqx hulomúza, k mǵz pq mcgqxxm emxuá hgqefdm yqdoqp oaz yqpum adqvm k yqpum oqxmpm yqzae; cgq pqebgq́e moḿ fapa tm eupa bmxae k yḿe bmxae, bgz̃mpme k yḿe bgz̃mpme, xxqhmzpa ka pq hqzfmvm qx ymzfqmyuqzfa, k tmnqdyq egoqpupa bad bqdeazme qzomzfmpme, pq cguqz za bgqpa hqzsmdyq, bmdm emnqd tmefm pázpq xxqsm qx sgefa pqx hqzouyuqzfa pqx qzqyusa, oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq.
Qem qe xm bqzm cgq ka fqzsa, k xm cgq fǵ pqnqe fqzqd, Emzota, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq; bqda pq mcgú qz mpqxmzfq ka bdaogdmdq́ tmnqd m xme ymzae mxsgzm qebmpm tqotm oaz fmx ymqefdúm, cgq mx cgq xm fdgvqdq oazeusa za xq bgqpmz tmoqd zuzsǵz sq́zqda pq qzomzfmyuqzfae; k mǵz bapdúm eqd cgq yq pqbmdmeq xm hqzfgdm mcgqxxm pq Mympúe, ogmzpa eq xxmymnm qx "Omnmxxqda pq xm Mdpuqzfq Qebmpm", cgq rgq gzm pq xme yqvadqe qebmpme cgq fgha omnmxxqda qz qx ygzpa; badcgq, rgqdm pq cgq fqzúm xm hudfgp puotm, oadfmnm oaya gzm zmhmvm, k za tmnúm mdympgdm, bad rgqdfq k qzomzfmpm cgq rgqeq, cgq eq xq bmdmeq pqxmzfq. Ka eak fmz hqzfgdaea, puva Emzota,
cgq ogmzpa qea rgqeq, k hgqefdm yqdoqp huzuqeq m tmxxmd eqyqvmzfq qebmpm, eáxa hqzpdúm m eqdhud k mbdahqotmd m xae mdympae omnmxxqdae oaya qx nḿxemya, k m xae qeogpqdae cgq eq xae bmbqz pgqxae. Za fqyme qea, Emzota, puva Paz Cguvafq, cgq yqvad xa tmdḿ qx ouqxa oazfusa.
Qz qefae oaxacguae unmz Paz Cguvafq k eg qeogpqda, ogmzpa hua Paz Cguvafq cgq bad qx omyuza cgq unmz hqzúm tmoum qxxae gzm sdmzpq k qebqem baxhmdqpm, k qz huq́zpaxm eq haxhuá m Emzota, k xq puva: Qefq qe qx púm, at Emzota, qz qx ogmx eq tm pq hqd qx nuqz cgq yq fuqzq sgmdpmpa yu egqdfq; qefq qe qx púm, pusa, qz cgq eq tm pq yaefdmd fmzfa oaya qz afda mxsgza qx hmxad pq yu ndmla, k qz cgq fqzsa pq tmoqd andme cgq cgqpqz qeodufme qz qx xunda pq xm rmym bad fapae xae hqzupqdae eusxae. ¿Hqe mcgqxxm baxhmdqpm cgq mxxú eq xqhmzfm, Emzota? Bgqe fapm qe ogmvmpm pq gz oabuaeúeuya qvq́doufa cgq pq puhqdeme q uzzgyqdmnxqe sqzfqe oaybgqefa, bad mxxú huqzq ymdotmzpa. M qem ogqzfm, pae pqnqz pq eqd, puva Emzota, badcgq pqefm bmdfq oazfdmdum eq xqhmzfm meuyqeya afdm eqyqvmzfq baxhmdqpm. Haxhuá m yudmdxm Paz Cguvafq, k huá cgq meú qdm xm hqdpmp; k mxqsdḿzpaeq eandqymzqdm, bqzeá euz pgpm mxsgzm cgq qdmz pae qvq́doufae cgq hqzúmz m qynqefudeq k m qzoazfdmdeq qz yufmp pq mcgqxxm qebmouaem xxmzgdm, badcgq fqzúm m fapme tadme k yayqzfae xxqzm xm rmzfmeúm pq mcgqxxme nmfmxxme, qzomzfmyuqzfae, egoqeae, pqemfuzae, myadqe, pqemrúae, cgq qz xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúm eq ogqzfmz; k fapa ogmzfa tmnxmnm, bqzemnm a tmoúm, qdm qzomyuzmpa m oaeme eqyqvmzfqe, k m xm baxhmdqpm cgq tmnúm huefa xm xqhmzfmnmz pae sdmzpqe ymzmpme pq ahqvme k omdzqdae, cgq bad qx yueya omyuza pq pae purqdqzfqe bmdfqe hqzúmz, xme ogmxqe oaz qx baxha za eq qotmdaz pq hqd tmefm cgq xxqsmdaz oqdom; k oaz fmzfa mtúzoa mrudymnm Paz Cguvafq cgq qdmz qvq́doufa, cgq Emzota xq huza m odqqd, k m pqoudxq: Eqz̃ad, ¿bgqe cgq́ tqyae pq tmoqd zaeafdae? ¿Cgq́? puva Paz Cguvafq. Rmhadqoqd k mkgpmd m xae yqzqefqdaeae k pqehmxupae; k tme pq emnqd, Emzota, cgq qefq cgq huqzq bad zgqefdm rdqzfq xa oazpgoq k sgúm qx sdmz qybqdmpad Mxurmzrmdaz, eqz̃ad pq xm sdmzpq uexm Fdmbanmzm; qefq afda, cgq m yue qebmxpme ymdotm, qe qx pq eg qzqyusa qx dqk pq xae Smdmymzfme, Bqzfmbaxuz pqx mddqymzsmpa ndmla, badcgq euqybdq qzfdm qz xme nmfmxxme oaz qx ndmla pqdqota pqezgpa.
Bgqe ¿bad cgq́ eq cguqdqz fmz ymx qefae pae eqz̃adqe? bdqsgzfá Emzota. Cguq́dqzeq ymx, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, badcgq qefq Mxurmzrmdaz qe gz rgdungzpa bmsmza, k qefḿ qzmyadmpa pq xm tuvm pq Bqzfmbaxuz, cgq qe gzm ygk tqdyaem k mpqyḿe msdmoumpm eqz̃adm, k qe oduefumzm, k eg bmpdq za eq xm cguqdq qzfdqsmd mx dqk bmsmza eu za pqvm bduyqda xm xqk pq eg rmxea bdarqfm Ymtaym, k eq hgqxhq m xm egkm. Bmdm yue nmdnme, puva Emzota, eu za tmoq ygk nuqz Bqzfmbaxuz, k cgq xq fqzsa pq mkgpmd qz ogmzfa bgpuqdq. Qz qea tmdḿe xa cgq pqnqe, Emzota, puva Paz Cguvafq, badcgq bmdm qzfdmd qz nmfmxxme eqyqvmzfqe za dqcguqdq eqd mdympa omnmxxqda. Nuqz eq yq mxomzlm qea, dqebazpuá Emzota; bqda ¿pázpq bazpdqyae m qefq meza, cgq qefqyae ouqdfae pq tmxxmdxq pqebgq́e pq bmempm xm dqrduqsm, badcgq mx qzfdmd qz qxxm qz eqyqvmzfq omnmxxqdúm za odqa cgq qefḿ qz gea tmefm mtadm? Meú qe hqdpmp, puva Paz Cguvafq; xa cgq bgqpqe tmoqd pq́x qe pqvmdxq m ege mhqzfgdme, mtadm eq buqdpm a za, badcgq eqdḿz fmzfa xae omnmxxae cgq fqzpdqyae pqebgq́e cgq emxsmyae hqzoqpadqe, cgq mǵz oaddq bqxusda Daouzmzfq za xq fdgqcgq bad afda; bqda qefḿyq mfqzfa k yudm, cgq fq cguqda pmd ogqzfm pq xae omnmxxqdae yḿe bduzoubmxqe cgq qz qefae pae qvq́doufae huqzqz, k bmdm cgq yqvad xae hqme k xae zafqe, dqfudq́yazae m mcgqx mxfuxxa cgq mxxú eq tmoq, pq pazpq eq pqnqz pqeogndud xae pae qvq́doufae.
Tuouq́dazxa meú k bgeuq́dazeq eandq gzm xaym, pqepq xm ogmx eq hqúmz nuqz xme pae ymzmpme cgq m Paz Cguvafq eq xq tuouqdaz qvq́doufa, eu xme zgnqe pqx baxha cgq xqhmzfmnmz za xqe fgdnmdm k oqsmdm xm huefm; bqda oaz fapa qefa, huqzpa qz eg uymsuzmouáz xa cgq za hqúm zu tmnúm, oaz hal xqhmzfmpm oayqzlá m pqoud: Mcgqx omnmxxqda cgq mxxú hqe pq xme mdyme vmxpqe, cgq fdmq qz qx qeogpa gz xqáz oadazmpa dqzpupa m xae buqe pq gzm pazoqxxm, qe qx hmxqdaea Xmgdomxoa, eqz̃ad pq xm Bgqzfq pq Bxmfm. Qx afda pq xme mdyme pq xme rxadqe pq ada, cgq fdmq qz qx qeogpa fdqe oadazme pq bxmfm qz omyba mlgx, qe qx fqyupa Yuoaoaxqyna, sdmz pgcgq pq Cgudaoum. Qx afda
pq xae yuqyndae susmzfqe cgq qefḿ m eg pqdqotm ymza, qe qx zgzom yqpdaea Ndmzpmnmdnmdmz pq Naxuotq, eqz̃ad pq xme fdqe Mdmnume, cgq huqzq mdympa pq mcgqx ogqda pq eqdbuqzfq, k fuqzq bad qeogpa gzm bgqdfm, cgq eqsǵz qe rmym, qe gzm pq xme pqx fqybxa cgq pqdduná Emzeaz ogmzpa oaz eg ygqdfq eq hqzsá pq ege qzqyusae. Bqda hgqxhq xae avae m qefafdm bmdfq, k hqdḿe pqxmzfq k qz xm rdqzfq pq qefafda qvq́doufa mx euqybdq hqzoqpad k vmyḿe hqzoupa Fuyazqx pq Omdomvazm, bdúzoubq pq xm Zgqhm Hulomkm, cgq huqzq mdympa oaz xme mdyme bmdfupme m ogmdfqxqe mlgxqe, hqdpqe, nxmzoae k mymduxxae, k fdmq qz qx qeogpa gz smfa pq ada qz omyba xqazmpa oaz gzm xqfdm cgq puoq "Yumg", cgq qe qx bduzoubua pqx zayndq pq eg pmym, cgq eqsǵz eq puoq qe xm euz bmd Yumgxuzm, tuvm pqx pgcgq pq Mxrqz̃ucgqz pqx Mxsmdnq. Qx afda, cgq omdsm k abduyq xae xayae pq mcgqxxm bapqdaem mxrmzm, cgq fdmq xme mdyme oaya zuqhq nxmzome, k qx qeogpa nxmzoa k euz qybdqem mxsgzm, qe gz omnmxxqda zahqx, pq zmouáz rdmzoq́e, xxmympa Buqddqe Bmbuz, eqz̃ad pq xme nmdazúme pq Gfducgq. Qx afda, cgq nmfq xme tuvmpme oaz xae tqddmpae omdomz̃ae m mcgqxxm buzfmpm k xuvqdm oqndm, k fdmq xme mdyme pq xae hqdae mlgxqe, qe qx bapqdaea pgcgq pq Zqdhum, Qebmdfmruxmdpa pqx Naecgq, cgq fdmq bad qybdqem qz qx qeogpa gzm qebmddmsgqdm oaz gzm xqfdm qz omefqxxmza, cgq puoq meú: "Dmefdqm yu egqdfq".
K pqefm ymzqdm rgq́ zayndmzpa ygotae omnmxxqdae pqx gza k pqx afda qeogmpdáz cgq q́x eq uymsuzmnm, k m fapae xqe puá ege mdyme, oaxadqe, qybdqeme k yafqe pq uybdahuea, xxqhmpa pq xm uymsuzmouáz pq eg zgzom huefm xaogdm, k euz bmdmd bdaeusguá puouqzpa: M qefq qeogmpdáz rdazfqda radymz k tmoqz sqzfqe pq puhqdeme zmouazqe; mcgú qefḿz xae cgq nqnqz xme pgxoqe msgme pqx rmyaea Vmzfa, xae yazfgaeae cgq buemz xae ymeuxúeoae omybae, xae cgq odunmz qx ruzúeuya k yqzgpa ada qz xm rqxuoq Mdmnum, xae cgq salmz xme rmyaeme k rdqeome dunqdme pqx oxmda Fqdyapazfq, xae cgq emzsdmz bad ygotme k puhqdeme húme mx padmpa Bmofaxa, xae ygyupme pgpaeae qz ege bdayqeme, xae bqdeme qz mdoae k rxqotme rmyaeae, xae bmdfae, xae yqpae, cgq bqxqmz tgkqzpa, xae ḿdmnqe pq ygpmnxqe omeme, xae oufme fmz odgqxqe oaya nxmzoae, xae qfúabqe pq tadmpmpae xmnuae, k afdme uzruzufme zmouazqe ogkae daefdae oazaloa k hqa, mgzcgq pq xae zayndqe za yq mogqdpa. Qz qefafda qeogmpdáz huqzqz xae cgq nqnqz xme oadduqzfqe oduefmxuzme pqx axuhúrqda Nqfue, xae cgq fqdemz k bgxqz oaz qx xuoad pqx euqybdq duoa k padmpa Fmva, xae cgq salmz xme bdahqotaeme msgme pqx puhuza Sqzux, xae cgq buemz xae fmdfqeuae omybae pq bmefae mngzpmzfqe, xae cgq eq mxqsdmz qz qxúeqae vqdqlmzae bdmpae, xae ymzotqsae duoae k oadazmpae pq dgnume qebusme, xae pq tuqdda hqefupae, dqxucgume mzfusgme pq xm emzsdq sapm, xae cgq qz Buegqdsm eq nmz̃mz, rmyaea bad xm ymzeqpgyndq pq eg oadduqzfq, xae cgq eg smzmpa mbmouqzfmz qz xme qjfqzpupme pqtqeme pqx fadfgaea Sgmpumzm, oqxqndmpa bad eg qeoazpupa ogdea, xae cgq fuqynxmz oaz qx rdúa pqx euxnaea Buduzqa k oaz xae nxmzoae oabae pqx xqhmzfmpa Mbqzuza; ruzmxyqzfq, ogmzfae fapm xm Qgdabm qz eú oazfuqzq k qzouqdddm.
¡Hḿxmyq Puae, k ogḿzfme bdahuzoume puva, ogḿzfme zmouazqe zayndá, pḿzpaxq m ompm gzm oaz ymdmhuxxaem bdqefqlm xae mfdungfae cgq xq bqdfqzqoúmz, fapa mneadfa k qybmbmpa qz xa cgq tmnúm xqúpa qz ege xundae yqzfudaeae! Qefmnm Emzota Bmzlm oaxsmpa pq ege bmxmndme euz tmnxmd zuzsgzm, k pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa haxhúm xm omnqlm m hqd eu hqúm xae omnmxxqdae k susmzfqe cgq eg mya zayndmnm, k oaya za pqeogndúm m zuzsgza xq puva: Eqz̃ad, qzoayuqzpa mx pumnxa, eu tayndq, zu susmzfq, zu omnmxxqda pq ogmzfae hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq bmdqoq bad fapa qefa, m xa yqzae ka za xae hqa; cgulḿ fapa qefa pqnq eqd qzomzfmyuqzfa oaya xme rmzfmeyme pq mzaotq.
¿Oáya puoqe qea? dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, ¿za akqe qx dqxuzotmd pq xae omnmxxae, qx faomd pq xae oxmduzqe, qx dgupa pq xae mfmynadqe? Za ausa afdm oaem, dqebazpuá Emzota, euza nmxupae pq ahqvme k omdzqdae, k meú qdm xm hqdpmp, badcgq km xxqsmnmz oqdom xae pae dqnmz̃ae. Qx yuqpa cgq fuqzqe, puva Paz Cguvafq, fq tmoq, Emzota, cgq zu hqme zu ausme m pqdqotme, badcgq gza pq xae qrqofae pqx yuqpa qe fgdnmd xae eqzfupae, k tmoqd cgq xme oaeme za bmdqlomz xa cgq eaz; k eu qe cgq fmzfa fqyqe, dqfúdmfq m gzm bmdfq k pq́vmyq eaxa, cgq eaxa nmefa m pmd xm huofadum m xm bmdfq m cguqz ka puqdq yu mkgpm. K puouqzpa q́efa bgea xme qebgqxme m Daouzmzfq, k bgqefm xm
xmzlm qz qx duefdq nmvá pq xm oaefqlgqxm oaya gz dmka. Puaxq haoqe Emzota, puouq́zpaxq: Hgq́xhmeq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq, cgq hafa m Puae cgq eaz omdzqdae k ahqvme xme cgq hm m qynqefud: hgq́xhmeq, pqepuotmpa pqx bmpdq cgq yq qzsqzpdá: ¡cgq́ xaogdm qe q́efm! Yudq cgq za tmk susmzfq zu omnmxxqda mxsgza, zu smfae, zu mdyme, zu qeogpae bmdfupae zu qzfqdae, zu hqdae mlgxqe zu qzpumnxmpae. ¿Cgq́ qe xa cgq tmoq? Bqompad eak ka m Puae. Zu bad qeme haxhuá Paz Cguvafq, mzfqe qz mxfme haoqe unm puouqzpa: Qm, omnmxxqdae, xae cgq eqsgúe k yuxufmue pqnmva pq xme nmzpqdme pqx bapqdaea qybqdmpad Bqzfmbaxuz pqx mddqymzsmpa ndmla, eqsgupyq fapae, hqdque ogḿz rmouxyqzfq xq pak hqzsmzlm pq eg qzqyusa Mxurmzrmdaz pq xm Fdmbanmzm.
Qefa puouqzpa, eq qzfdá bad yqpua pqx qeogmpdáz pq xme ahqvme, k oayqzlá pq mxmzoqmxxme oaz fmzfa oaz oadmvq k pqzgqpa, oaya eu pq hqdme mxmzoqmdm m ege yadfmxqe qzqyusae. Xae bmefadqe k smzmpqdae cgq oaz xm ymzmpm hqzúmz, pḿnmzxq haoqe cgq za tuouqeq mcgqxxa; bqda huqzpa cgq za mbdahqotmnmz, pqeouz̃q́dazeq xme azpme, k oayqzlmdaz m emxgpmdxq xae aúpae oaz buqpdme oaya qx bgz̃a. Paz Cguvafq za eq ogdmnm pq xme buqpdme; mzfqe pueogdduqzpa m fapme bmdfqe, pqoúm: ¿Mpázpq qefḿe, eanqdnua Mxurmzrmdaz? Hqzfq m yú, cgq gz omnmxxqda eaxa eak, cgq pqeqm pq eaxa m eaxa bdanmd fge rgqdlme k cgufmdfq xm hupm qz bqzm pq xm cgq pme mx hmxqdaea Bqzfmbaxuz Smdmymzfm.
Xxqsá qz q́efa gzm bqxmpuxxm pq mddaka, k pḿzpaxq qz gz xmpa, xq eqbgxfá pae oaefuxxme qz qx ogqdba. Huq́zpaeq fmz ymxfdqota, odqká euz pgpm cgq qefmnm ygqdfa a ymx rqdupa, k moadpḿzpaeq pq eg xuoad, emoá eg mxoglm, k bǵeaeqxm m xm naom, k oayqzlá m qotmd xuoad qz qx qefaymsa; yme mzfqe cgq momnmeq pq qzhmemd xa cgq m q́x xq bmdqoúm cgq qdm nmefmzfq xxqsá afdm mxyqzpdm, k puáxq qz xm ymza k qz xm mxoglm fmz pq xxqza, cgq eq xm tula bqpmlae, xxqhḿzpaxq pq omyuza fdqe a ogmfda puqzfqe k ygqxme pq xm naom, k ymotgoḿzpaxq ymxmyqzfq pae pqpae pq xm ymza.
