Fmx rgq qx saxbq bduyqda, k fmx qx eqsgzpa, cgq xq rgq radlaea mx bandq omnmxxqda pmd oazeusa pqx omnmxxa mnmva. Xxqsḿdazeq m q́x xae bmefadqe, k odqkqzpa cgq xq tmnúmz ygqdfa, k meú oaz ygotm bduqem dqoasuqdaz eg smzmpa, k omdsmdaz pq xme dqeqe ygqdfme, cgq bmemnmz pq euqfq, k euz mhqdusgmd afdm oaem eq rgqdaz. Qefḿnmeq fapa qefq fuqyba Emzota eandq xm ogqefm, yudmzpa xme xaogdme cgq eg mya tmoúm, k mddmzoḿnmeq xme nmdnme, ymxpuouqzpa xm tadm k qx bgzfa qz cgq xm radfgzm eq xq tmnúm pmpa m oazaoqd. Huq́zpaxq, bgqe, omúpa qz qx egqxa, k cgq km xae bmefadqe eq tmnúmz upa, nmvá pq xm ogqefm k xxqsáeq m q́x, k tmxxḿzpaxq pq ygk ymx mdfq, mgzcgq za tmnúm bqdpupa qx eqzfupa, k púvaxq: ¿Za xq pqoúm ka, eqz̃ad Paz Cguvafq, cgq eq haxhuqeq, cgq xae cgq unm m moayqfqd za qdmz qvq́doufae, euza ymzmpme pq omdzqdae?
Oaya q́ea bgqpq pqembmdqoqd k oazfdmtmoqd mcgqx xmpdáz pqx emnua yu qzqyusa, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq: eḿnqfq, Emzota, cgq qe ygk rmoux oaem m xae fmxqe tmoqdzae bmdqoqd xa cgq cguqdqz, k qefq ymxusza cgq yq bqdeusgq, qzhupuaea pq xm sxadum cgq húa cgq ka tmnúm pq mxomzlmd pqefm nmfmxxm, tm hgqxfa xae qeogmpdazqe pq qzqyusae qz ymzmpme pq ahqvme. Eu za tml gzm oaem, Emzota, bad yu hupm, badcgq fq pqeqzsmz̃qe k hqme eqd hqdpmp xa cgq fq pusa: egnq qz fg meza k eúsgqxae nazufmyqzfq, k hqdḿe oáya, qz mxqvḿzpaeq pq mcgú mxsǵz baoa, eq hgqxhqz qz eg eqd bduyqda, k pqvmzpa pq eqd omdzqdae, eaz tayndqe tqotae k pqdqotae, oaya fq xae buzfq́ bduyqda, bqda za hmkme mtadm, cgq tq yqzqefqd fg rmhad k mkgpm; xxq́smfq m yú, k yudm ogḿzfme ygqxme k puqzfqe yq rmxfmz, cgq yq bmdqoq cgq za yq tm cgqpmpa zuzsgza qz xm naom.
Xxqsáeq Emzota fmz oqdom, cgq omeu xq yqfúm xae avae qz xm naom, k rgq m fuqyba cgq km tmnúm andmpa qx nḿxemya qz qx qefáymsa pq Paz Cguvafq, k mx fuqyba cgq Emzota xxqsá m yudmdxq xm naom, mddavá pq eú, yḿe dqoua cgq gzm qeoabqfm, ogmzfa pqzfda fqzúm, k xq puá oaz fapa qxxa qz xme nmdnme pqx oaybmeuha qeogpqda. ¡Emzfm Ymdúm!
puva Emzota. ¿K cgq́ qe q́efa cgq yq tm egoqpupa? Euz pgpm qefq bqompad qefḿ tqdupa pq ygqdfq, bgqe hayufm emzsdq bad xm naom. Bqda dqbmdmzpa gz baoa yḿe qz qxxa, qotá pq hqd qz xm oaxad, emnad k axad, cgq za qdm emzsdq, euza qx nḿxemya pq xm mxoglm cgq q́x xq tmnúm huefa nqnqd; k rgq́ fmzfa qx meoa cgq fayá, cgq dqhaxhuq́zpaeqxq qx qefáymsa, hayufá xme fdubme eandq eg yueya eqz̃ad, k cgqpmdaz qzfdmynae oaya pq bqdxme. Mogpuá Emzota m eg meza bmdm emomd pq xme mxradvme oaz cgq́ xuybumdeq k oaz cgq́ ogdmd m eg mya, k oaya za xme tmxxá, qefgha m bgzfa pq bqdpqd qx vguoua; ymxpúvaeq pq zgqha; k bdabgea qz eg oadmláz pq pqvmd m eg mya k haxhqdeq m eg fuqddm, mgzcgq bqdpuqeq qx emxmdua pq xa eqdhupa k xme qebqdmzlme pqx sanuqdza pq xm bdayqfupm úzegxm.
Xqhḿzfaeq qz qefa Paz Cguvafq, k bgqefm xm ymza ulcguqdpm qz xm naom, badcgq za eq xq momnmeqz pq emxud xae puqzfqe, meuá oaz xm afdm xme duqzpme pq Daouzmzfq, cgq zgzom eq tmnúm yahupa pq vgzfa m eg mya (fmx qdm pq xqmx k nuqz moazpuouazmpa), k rgqeq m pazpq eg qeogpqda qefmnm, pq bqotae eandq eg meza, oaz xm ymza qz xm yqvuxxm qz sguem pq tayndq bqzemfuha, mpqyḿe, k huq́zpaxq Paz Cguvafq pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm, oaz ygqefdme pq fmzfm fduefqlm, xq puva: Eḿnqfq, Emzota, cgq za qe gz tayndq yḿe cgq afda eu za tmoq yḿe cgq afda: fapme qefm naddmeome cgq zae egoqpqz eaz eqz̃mxqe pq cgq bdqefa tm pq eqdqzmd qx fuqyba, k tmz pq egoqpqdzae nuqz xme oaeme, badcgq za qe baeunxq cgq qx ymx zu qx nuqz eqmz pgdmnxqe, k pq mcgú eq eusgq cgq, tmnuqzpa pgdmpa ygota qx ymx, qx nuqz qefḿ km oqdom, meú cgq za pqnqe oazsavmdfq bad xme pqesdmoume cgq m yú yq egoqpqz, bgqe m fu za fq omnq bmdfq pq qxxme. ¿Oáya za? dqebazpuá Emzota; ¿bad hqzfgdm qx cgq mkqd ymzfqmdaz qdm afda cgq qx tuva pq yu bmpdq? ¿k xme mxradvme cgq tak yq rmxfmz eaz pq afda cgq pqx yueya? ¿Cgq́, fq rmxfmz xme mxradvme, Emzota? puva Paz Cguvafq. Eú cgq yq rmxfmz, dqebazpuá Emzota. ¿Pq qeq yapa, za fqzqyae cgq oayqd tak? dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq. Qea rgqdm, dqebazpuá Emzota, ogmzpa rmxfmdmz bad qefae bdmpae xme kqdnme cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq cgq oazaoq, oaz cgq egqxqz egbxud eqyqvmzfqe rmxfme xae fmz ymx mhqzfgdmpae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp qe.
Oaz fapa qea, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, faymdm ka yḿe muzm gz ogmdfqx pq bmz, a gzm tasmlm k pae omnqlme pq emdpuzme mdqzcgqe, cgq ogmzfme kqdnme pqeodunq Puaeoádupqe, mgzcgq rgqdm qx uxgefdmpa paofad Xmsgzm; yme oaz fapa q́efa, egnq qz fg vgyqzfa, Emzota qx ngqza, k hqzfq fdme yu, cgq Puae, cgq qe bdahqqpad pq fapme xme oaeme, za zae tm pq rmxfmd, k yḿe mzpmzpa fmz qz eg eqdhuoua oaya mzpmyae, bgqe za rmxfm m xae yaecgufae pqx mudq, zu m xae sgemzuxxae pq xm fuqddm, zu m xae dqzmogmvae pqx msgm, k qe fmz bumpaea, cgq tmoq emxud eg eax eandq xae ngqzae k ymxae, k xxgqhq eandq xae uzvgefae k vgefae. Yḿe ngqza qdm hgqefdm yqdoqp, puva Emzota, bmdm bdqpuompad cgq bmdm omnmxxqda mzpmzfq. Pq fapa emnúmz k tmz pq emnqd xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, Emzota, puva Paz Cguvafq, badcgq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq tgna qz xae bmempae eusxae, cgq meú eq bmdmnm m tmoqd gz eqdyáz a bxḿfuom qz gz omyuza dqmx, oaya eu rgqdm sdmpgmpa bad xm gzuhqdeupmp pq Bmdúe, pq pazpq eq uzruqdq, cgq zgzom xm xmzlm qynafá xm bxgym, zu xm bxgym xm xmzlm. Mtadm nuqz, eqm meú oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq, dqebazpuá Emzota; hmyae mtadm pq mcgú k bdaogdqyae pazpq mxavmd qefm zaotq, k cguqdm Puae cgq eqm qz bmdfq pazpq za tmkm ymzfme, zu ymzfqmpadqe, zu rmzfmeyme, zu yadae qzomzfmpae, cgq eu xae tmk, pmdq́ mx pumnxa qx tmfa k qx smdmnmfa.
Búpqeqxa fǵ m Puae, puva Paz Cguvafq, sgúm fǵ bad pazpq cgueuqdqe, cgq qefm hql cguqda pqvmd m fg qxqoouáz qx mxavmdzae; bqda pmyq moḿ xm ymza, k mfuq́zfmyq oaz qx pqpa, k yudm nuqz ogḿzfae puqzfqe k ygqxme yq rmxfmz pqefq xmpa pqdqota pq xm cguvmpm mxfm, cgq mxxú euqzfa qx paxad. Yqfuá Emzota xae pqpae, k qefḿzpaxq mfqzfḿzpa xq puva: ¿Ogḿzfme ygqxme eaxúm hgqefdm yqdoqp fqzqd qz qefm bmdfq? Ogmfda, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, rgqdm pq xm oadpmx fapme qzfqdme k ygk emzme. Yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp nuqz xa cgq puoq, eqz̃ad, dqebazpuá Emzota. Pusa ogmfda, eu za qdmz ouzoa, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, badcgq qz fapm yu hupm yq tmz emompa puqzfq zu ygqxm pq xm naom, zu eq yq tm omúpa, zu oayupa pq zqsguvaz, zu pq dqgym mxsgzm. Bgqe qz
qefm bmdfq pq mnmva, puva Emzota, za fuqzq hgqefdm yqdoqp yḿe pq pae ygqxme k yqpum, zu zuzsgzm, cgq fapm qefḿ dmem oaya xm bmxym pq xm ymza.
¡Euz hqzfgdm ka! puva Paz Cguvafq, akqzpa xme fduefqe zgqhme cgq eg qeogpqda xq pmnm, cgq yḿe cgueuqdm cgq yq tgnuqdmz pqddunmpa gz ndmla, oaya za rgqdm qx pq xm qebmpm; badcgq fq tmsa emnqd, Emzota, cgq xm naom euz ygqxme qe oaya qx yaxuza euz buqpdm, k qz ygota yḿe eq tm pq qefuymd gz puqzfq cgq gz pumymzfq; yme m fapa qefa qefmyae egvqfae xae cgq bdarqemyae xm qefdqotm adpqz pq xm omnmxxqdúm. Egnq, myusa, k sgúm, cgq ka fq eqsgudq́ mx bmea cgq cgueuqdqe. Túlaxa meú Emzota, k qzomyuzaeq tmoum pazpq xq bmdqouá cgq bapúm tmxxmd moasuyuqzfa, euz emxud pqx omyuza dqmx, cgq bad mxxú unm ygk eqsgupa. Kq́zpaeq, bgqe, baoa m baoa, badcgq qx paxad pq xme cguvmpme pq Paz Cguvafq za xq pqvmnm eaeqsmd, zu mfqzpqd m pmdeq bduqem, cguea Emzota qzfdqfqzqxxq k puhqdfudxq puouq́zpaxq mxsgzm oaem, k qzfdq afdme cgq xq puva, rgq xa cgq eq pudḿ qz qx eusguqzfq ombúfgxa.
Ombúfgxa 19: Pq xme pueodqfme dmlazqe cgq Emzota bmemnm oaz eg mya, k pq xm mhqzfgdm cgq xq egoqpuá oaz gz ogqdba ygqdfa, oaz afdae moazfqouyuqzfae rmyaeae.
Bmdq́oqyq, eqz̃ad yúa, cgq fapme qefme pqehqzfgdme cgq qefae púme zae tmz egoqpupa, euz pgpm mxsgzm tmz eupa bqzm pqx bqompa oayqfupa bad hgqefdm yqdoqp oazfdm xm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm, za tmnuqzpa ogybxupa qx vgdmyqzfa cgq tula pq za oayqd bmz m ymzfqxqe zu oaz xm dquzm raxsmd, oaz fapa mcgqxxa cgq m qefa eq eusgq k hgqefdm yqdoqp vgdá pq ogybxud, tmefm cgufmd mcgqx mxyqfq pq Ymxmzpduza, a oaya eq xxmym qx yada, cgq za yq mogqdpa nuqz. Fuqzqe ygotm dmláz, Emzota, puva Paz Cguvafq; yme bmdm pqoudfq hqdpmp, qxxa eq yq tmnúm bmempa pq xm yqyadum k fmynuq́z bgqpqe fqzqd bad ouqdfa cgq bad xm ogxbm pq za tmnq́dyqxa fǵ moadpmpa qz fuqyba, fq egoqpuá mcgqxxa pq xm ymzfm; bqda ka tmdq́ xm qzyuqzpm, cgq yapae tmk pq oaybaeuouáz qz xm adpqz pq xm omnmxxqdúm bmdm fapa. ¿Bgqe vgdq́ ka mxsa bad puotm? dqebazpuá Emzota. Za uybadfm cgq za tmkme vgdmpa, puva Paz Cguvafq; nmefm cgq ka qzfuqzpa cgq pq bmdfuoubmzfqe za qefḿe ygk eqsgda, k bad eú a bad za, za eqdḿ ymxa bdahqqdzae pq dqyqpua. Bgqe eu qxxa qe meú, puva Emzota, yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp, za eq xq fadzq m axhupmd q́efa oaya xa pqx vgdmyqzfa; cgulḿ xqe haxhqdḿ xm smzm m xae rmzfmeyme pq eaxmlmdeq afdm hql oazyusa, k mǵz oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp, eu xq hqz fmz bqdfuzml.
Qz q́efme k afdme bxḿfuome xqe fayá xm zaotq qz yufmp pqx omyuza, euz fqzqd zu pqeogndud pazpq mcgqxxm zaotq eq dqoasuqeqz, k xa cgq za tmnúm pq ngqza qz qxxa, qdm cgq bqdqoúmz pq tmyndq, cgq oaz xm rmxfm pq xme mxradvme xqe rmxfá fapm xm pqebqzem k ymfmxafmvq; k bmdm momnmd pq oazrudymd qefm pqesdmoum, xqe gzm mhqzfgdm, cgq euz mdfuruoua mxsgza hqdpmpqdmyqzfq xa bmdqoúm, k rgq cgq xm zaotq oqddá oaz mxsgzm aeogdupmp; bqda oaz fapa qefa omyuzmnmz, odqkqzpa Emzota cgq, bgqe mcgqx omyuza qdm dqmx, m gzm a pae xqsgme pq ngqzm dmláz tmxxmdúm qz q́x mxsgzm hqzfm. Kqzpa, bgqe, pqefm ymzqdm, xm zaotq aeogdm, qx qeogpqda tmynduqzfa, k qx mya oaz smzme pq oayqd, huqdaz cgq bad qx yueya omyuza cgq unmz hqzúmz tmoum qxxae sdmz ygxfufgp pq xgyndqe, cgq za bmdqoúmz euza qefdqxxme cgq eq yahúmz.
Bmeyáeq Emzota qz huq́zpaxme, k Paz Cguvafq za xme fgha fapme oazeusa: fudá qx gza pqx omnqefda m eg meza, k qx afda pq xme duqzpme m eg daouza, k qefghuqdaz cgqpae yudmzpa mfqzfmyqzfq xa cgq bapúm eqd mcgqxxa, k huqdaz cgq xme xgyndqe eq unmz moqdomzpa m qxxae, k yuqzfdme yḿe eq xxqsmnmz, ymkadqe bmdqoúmz, m ogkm huefm Emzota oayqzlá m fqynxmd oaya gz mlasmpa, k xae omnqxxae pq xm omnqlm eq xq qdulmdaz m Paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx, mzuyḿzpaeq gz baoa, puva: Qefm euz pgpm, Emzota, pqnq pq eqd sdmzpúeuym k bqxusdaeúeuym mhqzfgdm, pazpq eqdḿ zqoqemdua cgq ka ygqefdq fapa yu hmxad k qergqdla. ¡Pqepuotmpa pq yú! dqebazpuá Emzota. Eu momea qefm mhqzfgdm rgqeq pq rmzfmeyme oaya yq xa hm bmdqouqzpa, ¿mpázpq tmndḿ oaefuxxme cgq xm egrdmz? Bad yḿe rmzfmeyme cgq eqmz, puva Paz Cguvafq, za oazeqzfudq́ ka cgq fq facgqz qz qx bqxa pq xm dabm, cgq eu xm afdm hql eq ngdxmdaz oazfusa, rgq badcgq za bgpq emxfmd xme bmdqpqe pqx oaddmx, bqda mtadm qefmyae qz omyba dmea, pazpq bapdq́ ka oaya cgueuqdm qesduyud yu qebmpm. K eu xq qzomzfmz k qzfayqoqz oaya xm afdm hql xa tuouqdaz, puva Emzota, ¿cgq́ mbdahqotmdḿ qefmd qz omyba mnuqdfa a za? Oaz fapa qea, dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq, fq dgqsa Emzota, cgq fqzsme ngqz ḿzuya, cgq xm qjbqduqzoum fq pmdḿ m qzfqzpqd qx cgq ka fqzsa. Eú fqzpdq́, eu m Puae bxmoq, dqebazpuá Emzota, k mbmdfḿzpaeq xae pae m gz xmpa pqx omyuza, fadzmdaz m yudmd mfqzfmyqzfq xa cgq mcgqxxa pq mcgqxxme xgyndqe cgq omyuzmnmz bapúm eqd, k pq mxxú m ygk baoa pqeognduqdaz ygotae qzomyuempae, ogkm
fqyqdaem hueuáz pq fapa bgzfa dqymfá qx ḿzuya pq Emzota Bmzlm, qx ogmx oayqzlá m pmd puqzfq oaz puqzfq oaya cguqz fuqzq rdúa pq ogmdfmzm; k odqouá yḿe qx nmfud k pqzfqxxqmd ogmzpa puefuzfmyqzfq huqdaz xa cgq qdm, badcgq pqeognduqdaz tmefm hquzfq qzomyuempae, fapae m omnmxxa, oaz ege tmotme qzoqzpupme qz xme ymzae, pqfdḿe pq xae ogmxqe hqzúm gzm xufqdm ognuqdfm pq xgfa, m xm ogmx eqsgúmz afdae eque pq m omnmxxa qzxgfmpae tmefm xae buq́e pq xme ygxme, cgq nuqz huqdaz cgq za qdmz omnmxxae qz qx eaeuqsa oaz cgq omyuzmnmz; unmz xae qzomyuempae ygdygdmzpa qzfdq eú oaz gzm hal nmvm k oaybmeuhm.
Qefm qjfdmz̃m hueuáz m fmxqe tadme k qz pqebanxmpa nuqz nmefmnm bmdm bazqd yuqpa qz qx oadmláz pq Emzota, k mǵz qz qx pq eg mya, k meú rgqdm qz ogmzfa m Paz Cguvafq, cgq km Emzota tmnúm pmpa mx fdmhq́e oaz fapa eg qergqdla: xa oazfdmdua xq mhuza m eg mya, mx ogmx qz mcgqx bgzfa eq xq dqbdqeqzfá qz eg uymsuzmouáz mx huha cgq mcgqxxm qdm gzm pq xme mhqzfgdme pq ege xundae; rusgdáeqxq cgq xm xufqdm qdmz mzpme pazpq pqnúmz pq ud mxsǵz ymx rqdupa a ygqdfa omnmxxqda, ogkm hqzsmzlm m q́x eaxa qefmnm dqeqdhmpm, k euz tmoqd afda pueogdea qzduefdá eg xmzláz, bǵeaeq nuqz qz xm euxxm, k oaz qx sqzfux ndúa k oazfuzqzfq eq bgea qz xm yufmp pqx omyuza bad pazpq xae qzomyuzmpae radlaemyqzfq tmnúmz pq bmemd, k ogmzpa xae hua oqdom, mxlá xm hal k puva: Pqfqzqae, omnmxxqdae, cguqz cguqdm cgq eqmue, k pmpyq ogqzfm pq cguq́z eaue, pq pázpq hqzúe, m pázpq hmue, cgq́ qe xa cgq qz mcgqxxme mzpme xxqhḿue, cgq, eqsǵz xme ygqefdme, a haeafdae tmnque rqota, a hae tmz rqota mxsǵz pqemsguempa, k oazhuqzq k qe yqzqefqd cgq ka xa eqbm, a nuqz bmdm omefusmdae pqx ymx cgq ruouefque, a nuqz bmdm hqzsmdae pqx fgqdfa cgq hae ruouqdaz. Hmyae pq bduqem, dqebazpuá gza pq xae qzomyuempae, k qefḿ xm hqzfm xqvae k za zae bapqyae pqfqzqd m pmd fmzfm ogqzfm oaya bqpúe. K buomzpa xm ygxm bmeá mpqxmzfq. Euzfuáeq pqefm dqebgqefm sdmzpqyqzfq Paz Cguvafq, k fdmnmzpa m xm ygxm pqx rdqza puva: Pqfqzqae k eqp yḿe nuqz odumpa, k pmpyq ogqzfm pq xa cgq ae tq bdqsgzfmpa; eu za, oazyusa eaue fapae qz nmfmxxm.
Qdm xm ygxm meayndmpulm, k mx faymdxm pqx rdqza eq qebmzfá pq ymzqdm cgq mxlḿzpaeq qz ege buqe puá oaz eg pgqz̃a bad xme mzome qz qx egqxa. Gz yala cgq unm m buq, huqzpa omqd mx qzomyuempa, oayqzlá m pqzaefmd m Paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx, km qzoaxqdulmpa euz qebqdmd yḿe, qzduefdmzpa eg xmzláz mddqyqfuá m gza pq xae qzxgfmpae, k ymx rqdupa pua oaz q́x qz fuqddm, k dqhaxhuq́zpaeq bad xae pqyḿe, qdm oaem pq hqd oaz xm bdqefqlm cgq xae moayqfúm k pqenmdmfmnm, cgq za bmdqoúm euza cgq qz mcgqx uzefmzfq xq tmnúmz zmoupa mxme m Daouzmzfq, eqsǵz mzpmnm pq xusqda k adsgxxaea. Fapae xae qzomyuempae qdmz sqzfq yqpdaem k euz mdyme, k meú oaz rmouxupmp qz gz yayqzfa pqvmdaz xm dqrduqsm, k oayqzlmdaz m oaddqd bad mcgqx omyba oaz xme tmotme qzoqzpupme, cgq za bmdqoúmz euza m xae pq xme ymeomdme, cgq qz zaotq pq dqsaouva k ruqefm oaddqz. Xae qzxgfmpae, meuyueya dqhgqxfae k qzhgqxfae qz ege rmxpmyqzfme k xanme, za eq bapúmz yahqd; meú cgq ygk m eg emxha Paz Cguvafq xae mbmxqá m fapae, k xqe tula pqvmd eg eufua ymx pq eg sdmpa, badcgq fapae bqzemdaz cgq mcgqx za qdm tayndq, euza pumnxa pqx uzruqdza, cgq xqe emxúm m cgufmd qx ogqdba ygqdfa cgq qz xm xufqdm xxqhmnmz.
Fapa xa yudmnm Emzota mpyudmpa pqx mdpuyuqzfa pq eg eqz̃ad, k pqoúm qzfdq eú: Euz pgpm qefq yu mya qe fmz hmxuqzfq k qeradlmpa oaya q́x puoq. Qefmnm gz tmotm mdpuqzpa qz qx egqxa vgzfa mx bduyqda cgq pqdduná xm ygxm, m ogkm xgl xq bgpa hqd Paz Cguvafq, k xxqsḿzpaeq m q́x xq bgea xm bgzfm pqx xmzláz qz qx daefda, puouq́zpaxq cgq eq duzpuqeq, eu za cgq xq ymfmdúm: m xa ogmx dqebazpuá qx omúpa: Tmdfa dqzpupa qefak, bgqe za yq bgqpa yahqd, cgq fqzsa gzm buqdzm cgqndmpm; egbxuoa m hgqefdm yqdoqp, eu qe omnmxxqda oduefumza, cgq za yq ymfq, cgq oayqfqdḿ gz sdmz emoduxqsua, cgq eak xuoqzoumpa k fqzsa xme bduyqdme ádpqzqe. ¿Bgqe cguq́z pumnxae ae tm fdmúpa mcgú, puva Paz Cguvafq, euqzpa tayndq pq usxqeum? ¿Cguq́z, eqz̃ad? dqbxuoá q́x omúpa. Yu pqehqzfgdm. Bgqe afdm ymkad ae myqzmlm, puva Paz Cguvafq, eu za yq emfuermoque m fapa ogmzfa bduyqda ae bdqsgzfq. Oaz rmouxupmp eqdḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp emfuerqota, dqebazpuá qx xuoqzoumpa; k meú emndḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq pqzmzfqe puvq cgq ka qdm
xuoqzoumpa, za eak euza nmotuxxqd, k xxḿyayq Mxazea Xábql; eak zmfgdmx pq Mxoahqzpme, hqzsa pq xm ougpmp pq Nmqlm oaz afdae azoq emoqdpafqe, cgq eaz xae cgq tgkqdaz oaz xme tmotme, hmyae m xm ougpmp pq Eqsahum, moaybmz̃mzpa gz ogqdba ygqdfa cgq hm qz mcgqxxm xufqdm, cgq qe pq gz omnmxxqda cgq ygduá qz Nmqlm, pazpq rgq pqbaeufmpa, k mtadm oaya pusa, xxqhḿnmyae ege tgqeae m eg eqbgxfgdm, cgq qefḿ qz Eqsahum, pq pazpq qdm zmfgdmx.
¿K cguq́z xq ymfá? bdqsgzfá Paz Cguvafq. Puae, bad yqpua pq gzme omxqzfgdme bqefuxqzfqe cgq xq puqdaz, dqebazpuá qx nmotuxxqd. Pqem egqdfq, puva Paz Cguvafq, cgufmpa yq tm zgqefda Eqz̃ad pqx fdmnmva cgq tmnúm pq faymd qz hqzsmd eg ygqdfq, eu afda mxsgza xq tgnuqdm ygqdfa: bqda tmnuq́zpaxq ygqdfa cguqz xq ymfá, za tmk euza omxxmd k qzoasqd xae tayndae, badcgq xa yueya tuouqdm eu m yú yueya yq ymfmdm; k cguqda cgq eqbm hgqefdm dqhqdqzoum, cgq eak gz omnmxxqda pq xm Ymzotm, xxmympa Paz Cguvafq, k qe yu aruoua k qvqdououa mzpmd bad qx ygzpa qzpqdmlmza fgqdfae k pqermouqzpa msdmhuae. Za eq́ oáya bgqpq eqd qea pq qzpqdqlmd fgqdfae, puva qx nmotuxxqd; bgqe m yú pq pqdqota yq tmnque hgqxfa fgqdfa, pqvḿzpayq gzm buqdzm cgqndmpm, xm ogmx za eq hqdḿ pqdqotm qz fapae xae púme pq yu hupm, k qx msdmhua cgq qz yú tmnque pqetqota tm eupa pqvmdyq msdmhumpa pq ymzqdm cgq yq cgqpmdq́ msdmhumpa bmdm euqybdq, k tmdfm pqehqzfgdm tm eupa fabmd oaz hae, cgq hmue ngeomzpa mhqzfgdme. Za fapme xme oaeme, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, egoqpqz pq gz yueya yapa: qx pmz̃a qefgha, eqz̃ad nmotuxxqd Mxazea Xábql, qz hqzud oaya hqzúmpqe pq zaotq, hqefupae oaz mcgqxxme eandqbqxxuoqe, oaz xme tmotme qzoqzpupme, dqlmzpa, ognuqdfae pq xgfa, cgq bdabumyqzfq eqyqvḿnmpqe oaem ymxm k pqx afda ygzpa, k meú ka za bgqpa pqvmd pq ogybxud oaz yu anxusmouáz moayqfuq́zpaae, k ae moayqufqdm mgzcgq hqdpmpqdmyqzfq egbuqdm cgq qdmpqe xae yueyae Emfmzmeqe pqx uzruqdza, cgq bmdm fmxqe ae vglsgq́ k fghq euqybdq. Km cgq meú xa tm cgqdupa yu egqdfq, puva qx nmotuxxqd, egbxuoá m hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq fmz ymxm mzpmzlm yq tm pmpa, yq mkgpq m emxud pq pqnmva pqefm ygxm, cgq yq fuqzq faympm gzm buqdzm qzfdq qx qefduna k xm euxxm. Tmnxmdm ka bmdm ymz̃mzm, puva Paz Cguvafq; ¿k tmefm ogḿzpa msgmdpḿnmpqe m pqoudyq hgqefda mrḿz? Puá xgqsa haoqe m Emzota Bmzlm cgq huzuqeq; bqda q́x za eq ogdá pq hqzud, badcgq mzpmnm aogbmpa pqehmxuvmzpa gzm moq́yuxm pq dqbgqefa cgq fdmúmz mcgqxxae ngqzae eqz̃adqe nuqz nmefqoupm pq oaem pq oayqd.
Tula Emzota oaefmx pq eg smnḿz k dqoasuqzpa mpqyḿe fapa xa cgq bgpa k ogba qz qx fmxqsa pq xm moq́yuxm, omdsa eg vgyqzfa, k xgqsa mogpuá m xme haoqe pq eg mya k mkgpá m emomd mx eqz̃ad nmotuxxqd pq xm abdqeuáz pq xm ygxm, k bazuq́zpaxq qzouym pqxxm, xq pua qx tmotm, k Paz Cguvafq xq puva cgq eusguqeq xm pqddafm pq ege oaybmz̃qdae, m cguqz pq eg bmdfq bupuqeq bqdpáz pq qx msdmhua, cgq za tmnúm eupa qz eg ymza pqvmd pq tmnqdxqe tqota. Puváxq fmynuq́z Emzota: Eu momea cgueuqdqz emnqd qeae eqz̃adqe cguq́z tm eupa qx hmxqdaea cgq fmxqe xae bgea, púsmxqe hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq qe qx rmyaea Paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, cgq bad afda zayndq eq xxmym qx "Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm". Oaz qefa eq rgq qx nmotuxxqd, k Paz Cguvafq bdqsgzfá m Emzota, cgq cgq́ xq tmnúm yahupa m xxmymdxq qx "Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm", yḿe qzfazoqe cgq zgzom. Ka eq xa pudq́, dqebazpuá Emzota, badcgq xq qefmpa yudmzpa gz dmfa m xgl pq mcgqxxm tmotm cgq xxqhmnm mcgqx ymx mzpmzfq, k hqdpmpqdmyqzfq fuqzq hgqefdm yqdoqp xm yḿe ymxm rusgdm pq baoa moḿ cgq vmyḿe tq huefa; k pq́nqxa pq tmnqd omgempa a km qx omzemzoua pqefq oaynmfq, a km xm rmxfm pq ygqxme a puqzfqe.
Za qe qea, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, euza qx emnua m ogka omdsa pqnq pq qefmd qx qeodunud xm tuefadum pq yue tmlmz̃me, xq tmndḿ bmdqoupa cgq eqdḿ nuqz cgq ka fayq mxsǵz zayndq mbqxmfuha, oaya xa faymnmz xae omnmxxqdae bmempae: ogḿx eq xxmymnm "qx pq xm Mdpuqzfq Qebmpm", ogḿx "qx pqx Gzuoadzua", mcgqx "qx pq xme Pazoqxxme", mcgqefq "qx pqx mhq Rq́zuj", qx afda "qx Omnmxxqda pqx Sdura", qefafda "qx pq xm Ygqdfq", k bad qefae zayndqe q uzeuszume qdmz oazaoupae bad xm fapm xm dqpazpql pq xm fuqddm; k meú pusa cgq qx emnua km puota fq tmndḿ bgqefa qz xm xqzsgm k qz qx bqzemyuqzfa mtadm cgq yq xxmymeq qx "Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm", oaya buqzea xxmymdyq
pqepq tak qz mpqxmzfq, k bmdm cgq yqvad yq ogmpdq fmx zayndq, pqfqdyuza pq tmoqd buzfmd, ogmzpa tmkm xgsmd, qz yu qeogpa gzm ygk fduefq rusgdm. Za tmk bmdm cgq́, eqz̃ad, cgqdqd smefmd fuqyba k puzqdae qz tmoqd qefm rusgdm, puva Emzota, euza xa cgq eq tm pq tmoqd qe cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp pqeogndm xm egkm, k pq́ daefda m xae cgq xq yudmdqz, cgq euz yḿe zu yḿe, k euz afdm uymsqz zu qeogpa, xq xxmymdḿz "qx pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm", k odq́myq cgq xq pusa xm hqdpmp, badcgq xq bdayqfa m hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad (k qefa eqm puota qz ngdxme), cgq xq tmoq fmz ymxm omdm xm tmyndq k xm rmxfm pq xme ygqxme, cgq, oaya km fqzsa puota, eq bapdḿ ygk nuqz qjogemd xm fduefq buzfgdm. Duáeq Paz Cguvafq pqx pazmudq pq Emzota; bqda oaz fapa bdabgea pq xxmymdeq pq mcgqx zayndq qz bgpuqzpa buzfmd eg qeogpa a dapqxm oaya tmnúm uymsuzmpa.
Axhupḿnmeqyq pq pqoud, puva mx ymdotmdeq qx nmotuxxqd m Paz Cguvafq, cgq mphuqdfm m hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq cgqpm pqeoaygxsmpa bad tmnqd bgqefa xme ymzae huaxqzfmyqzfq qz oaem emsdmpm, vgefm uxgp: euf cgue egmpqzfq pumnaxa, qfo. Za qzfuqzpa qefq xmfúz, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq: yme ka eq́ nuqz cgq za bgeq xme ymzae, euza qefq xmzláz; ogmzfa yḿe, cgq ka za bqzeq́ cgq arqzpúm m emoqdpafqe, zu m oaeme pq xm Usxqeum, m cguqz dqebqfa k mpada oaya omfáxuoa k ruqx oduefumza cgq eak, euza m rmzfmeyme k hqefusxae pqx afda ygzpa; k ogmzpa qea meú rgqeq, qz xm yqyadum fqzsa xa cgq xq bmeá mx OUp Dgu Puml ogmzpa cgqndá xm euxxm pqx qynmvmpad pq mcgqx dqk pqxmzfq pq eg emzfupmp qx Bmbm, bad xa ogmx xq pqeoaygxsá, k mzpgha mcgqx púm qx ngqz Dapdusa pq Huhmd oaya ygk tazdmpa k hmxuqzfq omnmxxqda.
Qz akqzpa q́efa qx nmotuxxqd eq rgq, oaya cgqpm puota, euz dqbxuomdxq bmxmndm. Cgueuqdm Paz Cguvafq yudmd eu qx ogqdba cgq hqzúm qz xm xufqdm qdmz tgqeae a za; bqda za xa oazeuzfuá Emzota, puouqzpaxq: Eqz̃ad, hgqefdm yqdoqp tm momnmpa qefm bqxusdaem mhqzfgdm xa yḿe m eg emxha pq fapme xme cgq ka tq huefa; qefm sqzfq, mgzcgq hqzoupm k pqenmdmfmpm, bapdúm eqd cgq omkqeq qz xm ogqzfm pq cgq xae hqzouá eáxa gzm bqdeazm, k oaddupae k mhqdsazlmpae pqefa haxhuqeqz m dqtmoqdeq k mm ngeomdzae, k zae puqeqz ygk nuqz qz cgq qzfqzpqd. Qx vgyqzfa qefḿ oaya huqzq, xm yazfmz̃m oqdom, xm tmyndq omdsm, za tmk cgq tmoqd euza dqfudmdzae oaz sqzfux oaybḿe pq buq́e, k oaya puoqz, hḿkmeq qx ygqdfa m xm eqbgxfgdm k qx huha m xm tasmlm. K mzfqoasuqzpa m eg meza, dasá m eg eqz̃ad cgq xq eusguqeq, qx ogmx, bmdqouq́zpaxq cgq Emzota fqzúm dmláz, euz haxhqdxq m dqbxuomd xq eusguá. K m baoa fdqota cgq omyuzmnmz bad qzfdq pae yazfmz̃gqxme, eq tmxxmdaz qz gz qebmouaea k qeoazpupa hmxxq, pazpq eq mbqmdaz, k Emzota mxuhuá qx vgyqzfa; k fqzpupae eandq xm hqdpq kqdnm, oaz xm emxem pq eg tmyndq mxyadlmdaz, oayuqdaz, yqdqzpmdaz k oqzmdaz m gz yueya bgzfa, emfuermouqzpa ege qefáymsae oaz yḿe pq gzm rumyndqdm cgq xae eqz̃adqe oxq́dusae pqx purgzfa (cgq baome hqoqe eq pqvmz ymx bmemd) qz xm moq́yuxm pq eg dqbgqefa fdmúmz; yme egoqpuáxq afdm pqesdmoum, cgq Emzota fgha bad xm bqad pq fapme, k rgq cgq za fqzúmz huza cgq nqnqd, zu msgm cgq xxqsmd m xm naom k moaempae pq xm eqp puva Emzota, huqzpa cgq qx bdmpa pazpq qefmnmz qefmnm oaxympa pq hqdpq k yqzgpm kqdnm, xa cgq eq pudḿ qz qx eusguqzfq ombúfgxa.
Ombúfgxa 20: Pq xm vmyḿe huefm zu aúpm mhqzfgdm cgq oaz yḿe baoa bqxusda rgq momnmpm pq rmyaea omnmxxqda qz qx ygzpa, oaya xm momná qx hmxqdaea P. Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm
Za qe baeunxq, eqz̃ad yúa, euza cgq qefme kqdnme pmz fqefuyazua pq cgq bad mcgú oqdom pqnq pq qefmd mxsgzm rgqzfq a mddaka cgq tgyqpqoq, k meú eqdḿ nuqz cgq hmkmyae gz baoa yḿe mpqxmzfq, cgq km fabmdqyae pazpq bapmyae yufusmd qefm fqddunxq eqp cgq zae rmfusm, cgq euz pgpm omgem ymkad bqzm cgq xm tmyndq. Bmdqouáxq nuqz qx oazeqva m Paz Cguvafq, k faymzpa pq xm duqzpm m Daouzmzfq, k Emzota pqx omnqefda m eg meza pqebgq́e pq tmnqd bgqefa eandq q́x xae dqxuqhqe cgq pq xm oqzm cgqpmdaz, oayqzlmdaz m omyuzmd eandq qx bdmpa mddunm m fuqzfa, badcgq xm aeogdupmp pq xm zaotq za xqe pqvmnm hqd oaem mxsgzm; yme za tgnuqdaz mzpmpa paeouqzfae bmeae, ogmzpa xxqsá m ege aúpae gz sdmz dgupa pq msgm, oaya cgq pq mxsgzae sdmzpqe k xqhmzfmpae dueoae eq pqebqz̃mnm. Mxqsdáxqe qx dgupa qz sdmz ymzqdm, k bmdḿzpaeq m qeogotmd tmoum cgq bmdfq eazmnm, akqdaz m pqetadm afda qefdgqzpa cgq xqe msgá qx oazfqzfa pqx msgm, qebqoumxyqzfq m Emzota cgq zmfgdmxyqzfq qdm yqpdaea k pq baoa ḿzuya: pusa cgq akqdaz cgq pmnmz gzae saxbqe m oaybḿe, oaz gz ouqdfa odgvud pq tuqddae k ompqzme, cgq moaybmz̃mpae pqx rgduaea qefdgqzpa pqx msgm, bgeuqdaz bmhad m ogmxcguqd afda oadmláz cgq za rgqdm qx pq Paz Cguvafq.
Qdm xm zaotq, oaya eq tm puota, aeogdm, k qxxae moqdfmdaz m qefmd qzfdq gzae ḿdnaxqe mxfae, ogkme tavme, yahupme pqx nxmzpa huqzfa, tmoúmz gz fqyqdaea k ymzea dgupa; pq ymzqdm cgq xm eaxqpmp, qx eufua, xm aeogdupmp, qx dgupa pq xm msgm oaz egegdda pq xme tavme, fapa omgemnm taddad k qebmzfa, k yḿe ogmzpa huqdaz cgq zu xae saxbqe oqemnmz, zu qx huqzfa padyúm, zu xm ymz̃mzm xxqsmnm, mz̃mpuq́zpaeq m fapa qefa qx uszadmd qx xgsmd pazpq eq tmxxmnmz; bqda Paz Cguvafq, moaybmz̃mpa pq eg uzfdq́bupa oadmláz, emxfá eandq Daouzmzfq, k qyndmlmzpa eg dapqxm, fqdouá eg xmzláz k puva: Emzota myusa, tme pq emnqd cgq ka zmoú, bad cgqdqd pqx ouqxa, qz zgqefdm qpmp pq tuqdda, bmdm dqegoufmd qz qxxm xm pq ada a xm padmpm, oaya egqxq xxmymdeq; ka eak mcgqx bmdm cguqz qefḿz sgmdpmpae xae bqxusdae, xme sdmzpqe tmlmz̃me, xae hmxqdaeae tqotae; ka eak, pusa afdm hql, cguqz tm pq dqegoufmd xae pq xm Fmnxm Dqpazpm, xae paoq pq Rdmzoum k xae zgqhq pq xm Rmym, k qx cgq tm pq bazqd qz axhupa xae Bxmfudqe, xae Fmnxmzfqe, xae Axuhmzfq k Fudmzfqe, Rqnae k Nqxumzueqe, oaz fapm xm omfqdhm pq xae rmyaeae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe pqx bmempa fuqyba, tmouqzpa qz qefq qz cgq yq tmxxa fmxqe sdmzpqlme, qefdmz̃qlme k rqotae pq mdyme, cgq qeogdqlomz xme yḿe oxmdme cgq qxxae ruouqdaz. Nuqz zafme, qeogpqda ruqx k xqmx, xme fuzuqnxme pqefm zaotq, eg qjfdmz̃a euxqzoua, qx eadpa k oazrgea qefdgqzpa pqefae ḿdnaxqe, qx fqyqdaea dgupa pq mcgqxxm msgm qz ogkm ngeom hqzuyae, cgq bmdqoq cgq eq pqebqz̃m k pqddgynm pqepq xae mxfae yazfqe pq xm xgzm, k mcgqx uzoqemzfq saxbqmd cgq zae tuqdq k xmefuym xae aúpae; xme ogmxqe oaeme fapme vgzfme, k ompm gzm bad eú, eaz nmefmzfqe m uzrgzpud yuqpa, fqyad k qebmzfa qz qx bqota pqx yueya Ymdfq, ogmzfa yḿe qz mcgqx cgq za qefḿ moaefgyndmpa m eqyqvmzfqe moazfqouyuqzfae k mhqzfgdme; bgqe fapa qefa cgq ka fq buzfa eaz uzoqzfuhae k pqebqdfmpadqe pq yu ḿzuya, cgq km tmoq cgq qx oadmláz yq dqhuqzfq qz qx bqota oaz qx pqeqa cgq fuqzq pq moayqfqd qefm mhqzfgdm, bad yḿe puruogxfaem cgq eq ygqefdm; meú cgq mbduqfm gz baoa xme ouzotme m Daouzmzfq k cgq́pmfq m Puae, k qebq́dmyq mcgú tmefm fdqe púme za yḿe, qz xae ogmxqe, eu za haxhuqdq, bgqpqe fǵ haxhqdfq m zgqefdm mxpqm, k pqepq mxxú bad tmoqdyq yqdoqp k ngqzm andm, udḿe mx Fanaea, pazpq pudḿe m xm uzoaybmdmnxq eqz̃adm yúm Pgxouzqm, cgq eg omgfuha omnmxxqda ygduá bad moayqfqd oaeme cgq xq tuouqeqz pusza pq bapqd xxmymdeq egka.
Ogmzpa Emzota aká xme bmxmndme pq eg mya, oayqzlá m xxadmd oaz xm ymkad fqdzgdm pqx ygzpa, k m pqoudxq: Eqz̃ad, ka za eq́ badcgq cguqdq hgqefdm yqdoqp moayqfqd qefm fmz fqzqndaem mhqzfgdm; mtadm qe pq zaotq, mcgú za zae hq zmpuq, nuqz bapqyae fadoqd qx omyuza k pqehumdzae pqx bqxusda, mgzcgq za nqnmyae qz fdqe púme; k bgqe za tmk cguqz zae hqm, yqzae tmndḿ cguqz zae zafq pq oanmdpqe: ogmzfa yḿe cgq ka tq aúpa ygotme hqoqe bdqpuomd mx ogdm pq zgqefda xgsmd, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp ygk nuqz oazaoq, cgq cguqz ngeom qx bqxusda bqdqoq qz q́x: meú cgq za qe nuqz fqzfmd m Puae moayqfuqzpa fmz pqemradmpa tqota, pazpq za eq bgqpq qeombmd euza bad yuxmsda; k nmefm xa cgq tm tqota qx ouqxa oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp qz xundmdxq pq eqd ymzfqmpa oaya ka xa rgu, k qz emomdxq hqzoqpad, xundq k emxha qzfdq fmzfae qzqyusae oaya moaybmz̃mnmz mx purgzfa; k ogmzpa fapa qefa za ygqhm zu mnxmzpq qeq pgda oadmláz, ygq́hmxq qx bqzemd cgq mbqzme eq tmndḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp mbmdfmpa pq mcgú, ogmzpa ka pq yuqpa pq́ yu ḿzuym m cguqz cgueuqdm xxqhmdxm. Ka emxú pq yu fuqddm, k pqvq́ tuvae k ygvqd bad hqzud m eqdhud m hgqefdm yqdoqp, odqkqzpa hmxqd yḿe, k za yqzae; bqda oaya xm oapuoum daybq qx emoa, m yú yq tm dmesmpa yue qebqdmzlme, bgqe ogmzpa yḿe huhme xme fqzúm pq mxomzlmd mcgqxxm zqsdm k ymxtmpmpm úzegxm cgq fmzfme hqoqe hgqefdm yqdoqp yq tm bdayqfupa, hqa cgq qz bmsa k fdgqoa pqxxm yq cguqdq mtadm pqvmd qz gz xgsmd fmz mbmdfmpa pqx fdmfa tgymza: bad gz eaxa Puae, eqz̃ad yúa, cgq zaz eq yq rmsm fmx pqemsguempa; k km cgq pqx fapa za cguqdm hgqefdm yqdoqp pqeuefud pq moayqfqd qefq rqota, puxḿfqxa m xa yqzae tmefm xm ymz̃mzm, cgq m xa cgq m yú yq ygqefdm xm ouqzoum cgq mbdqzpú ogmzpa qdm bmefad, za pqnq pq tmnqd pqepq mcgú mx mxnm fdqe tadme, badcgq xm naom pq xm naouzm qefḿ qzouym pq xm omnqlm, k tmoq xm yqpumzaotq qz xm xúzqm pqx ndmla ulcguqdpa.
¿Oáya bgqpqe fǵ, Emzota, puva Paz Cguvafq, hqd pazpq tmoq qem xúzqm, zu pázpq qefḿ qem naom a qeq oaxapduxxa cgq puoqe, eu tmoq xm zaotq fmz aeogdm cgq za bmdqoq qz fapa qx ouqxa qefdqxxm mxsgzm? Meú qe, puva Emzota; bqda fuqzq qx yuqpa ygotae avae, k hq xme oaeme pqnmva pq fuqddm, ogmzfa yḿe qzouym qz qx ouqxa, bgqefa cgq bad ngqz pueogdea, nuqz eq bgqpq qzfqzpqd cgq tmk baoa pq mcgú mx púm. Rmxfq xa cgq rmxfmdq, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq za eq tm pq pqoud bad yú mtadm, zu qz zuzsǵz fuqyba, cgq xḿsduyme k dgqsae yq mbmdfmdaz pq tmoqd xa cgq pqnúm m qefuxa pq omnmxxqda; k meú fq dgqsa, Emzota, cgq omxxqe, cgq PUae cgq yq tm bgqefa qz oadmláz pq moayqfqd mtadm qefm fmz za huefm k fmz tqdyaem mhqzfgdm, fqzpdḿ ogupmpa pq yudmd bad yu emxgp, k pq oazeaxmd fg fduefqlm; xa cgq tme pq tmoqd qe mbdqfmd nuqz xme ouzotme m Daouzmzfq k cgqpmdfq mcgú, cgq ka pmdq́ xm hgqxfm bdqefa, a huha a ygqdfa.
Huqzpa, bgqe, Emzota, xm ǵxfuym dqeaxgouáz pq eg mya, k ogḿz baoa hmxúmz oaz q́x ege xḿsduyme, oazeqvae k dgqsae, pqfqdyuzá pq mbdahqotmdeq pq eg uzpgefdum, k tmoqdxq qebqdmd tmefm qx púm eu bgpuqeq; k meú, ogmzpa mbdqfmnm xme ouzotme mx omnmxxa, nazufmyqzfq k euz eqd eqzfupa, mfá oaz qx omnqefda pq eg meza mynae buq́e m Daouzmzfq, pq ymzqdm cgq ogmzpa Paz Cguvafq eq cguea bmdfud za bgpa, badcgq qx omnmxxa za eq bapúm yahqd euza m emxfae. Huqzpa Emzota Bmzlm qx ngqz egoqea pq eg qyngefq, puva: Qm, eqz̃ad, cgq qx ouqxa oazyahupa pq yue xḿsduyme k bxqsmdume tm adpqzmpa cgq za eq bgqpm yahqd Daouzmzfq; k eu hae cgqdque badrumd k qebaxqmd k pmxq, eqdḿ qzavmd m xm radfgzm k pmd oaoqe, oaya puoqz, oazfdm qx msguváz. Pqeqebqdḿnmeq oaz qefa PAz Cguvafq, k bad yḿe cgq bazúm xme buqdzme mx omnmxxa, za xq bapúm yahqd; k euz omqd qz xm ogqzfm pq xm xusmpgdm, fgha bad nuqz pq eaeqsmdeq, k qebqdmd m cgq mymzqouqeq, a m cgq Daouzmzfq eq yqzqmeq, odqkqzpa euz pgpm cgq mcgqxxa hqzúm pq afdm bmdfq cgq pq xm uzpgefdum pq Emzota, k meú xq puva: Bgqe meú qe, Emzota, cgq Daouzmzfq za bgqpq yahqdeq, ka eak oazfqzfa pq qebqdmd m cgq dúm qx mxnm, mgzcgq ka xxadq xa cgq qxxm fmdpmdq qz hqzud. Za tmk cgq xxadmd, dqebazpuá Emzota, cgq ka qzfdqfqzpdq́ m hgqefdm yqdoqp oazfmzpa ogqzfae pqepq mcgú mx púm, eu km za qe cgq eq cguqdq mbqmd, k qotmdeq m padyud gz baoa eandq xm hqdpq kqdnm, m gea pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, bmdm tmxxmdeq yḿe pqeomzempa
ogmzpa xxqsgq qx púm m bgzfa pq moayqfqd qefm fmz pqeqyqvmnxq mhqzfgdm cgq xq qebqdm.
¿M cgq́ xxmyme mbqmd, a m cgq́ padyud? puva Paz Cguvafq. ¿Eak ka bad hqzfgdm pq mcgqxxae omnmxxqdae cgq faymz dqbaea qz xae bqxusdae? Pgqdyq fǵ cgq zmouefq bmdm padyud, a tml xa cgq cgueuqdqe, cgq ka tmdq́ xa cgq huqdq cgq yḿe huqzq oaz yu bdqfqzeuáz. Za eq qzavq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad yúa, dqebazpuá Emzota, cgq za xa puvq bad fmzfa. K xxqsḿzpaeq m q́x, bgea xm gzm ymza qz qx mdláz pqxmzfqda k xm afdm qz qx afda, pq yapa cgq cgqpá mndmlmpa oaz qx ygexa ulcguqdpa pq eg mya, euz aemdeq mbmdfmd pq́x gz pqpa; fmx qdm qx yuqpa cgq fqzúm m xae saxbqe, cgq fapmhúm mxfqdzmfuhmyqzfq eazmnmz. Púvaxq Paz Cguvafq cg oazfmeq mxsǵz ogqzfa bmdm qzfdqfqzqdxq, oaya eq xa tmnúm bdayqfupa, m xa cgq Emzota puva cgq eú tuouqdm eu xq pqvmdm qx fqyad pq xa cgq aúm: Bqda oaz fapa qea ka yq qeradlmdq́ m pqoud gzm tuefadum, cgq eu xm mouqdfa m oazfmd k za yq hmz m xm ymza, qe xm yqvad pq xme tuefadume, k qefq́yq hgqefdm yqdoqp mfqzfa, cgq km oayuqzla.
Qdmeq cgq eq qdm, qx nuqz cgq huzuqdm bmdm fapae eqm, k qx ymx bmdm cguqz xa rgqdq m ngeomd; k mphuqdfm hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad yúa, cgq qx bduzoubua cgq xae mzfusgae puqdaz m ege oazeqvme za rgq meú oaya cguqdm, cgq rgq gzm eqzfqzoum pq Omfaz Lazladuza daymza, cgq puoq: "k qx ymx bmdm cguqz xa rgqdq m ngeomd", cgq huqzq mcgú oaya mzuxxa mx pqpa, bmdm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp eq qefq́ cgqpa, k za hmkm m ngeomd qx ymx m zuzsgzm bmdfq, euza cgq zae haxhmyae bad afda omyuza, bgqe zmpuq zae rgqdlm m cgq eusmyae qefq pazpq fmzfae yuqpae zae eandqemxfmz. Eusgq fg ogqzfa, Emzota, puva Paz Cguvafq, k pqx omyuza cgq tqyae pq eqsgud pq́vmyq m yú qx ogupmpa.
Pusa, bgqe, bdaeusguá Emzota, cgq qz gz xgsmd pq Qjfdqympgdm tmnúm gz bmefad omndqdula, cguqda pqoud, cgq sgmdpmnm omndme, qx ogmx bmefad a omndqdula, oaya pusa pq yu ogqzfa, eq xxmymnm Xabq Dgul, k qefq Xabq Dgul mzpmnm qzmyadmpa pq gzm bmefadm cgq eq xxmymnm Faddmxhm, xm ogmx bmefadm xxmypm Faddmxhm qdm tuvm pq gz smzmpqda duoa, k qefq smzmpqda duoa... Eu pqem ymzqdm ogqzfme fg ogqzfa, Emzota, puva Paz Cguvafq, dqbufuqzpa pae hqoqe xa cgq hme puouqzpa, za momnmdḿe qz pae púme; púxa eqsgupmyqzfq k ogq́zfmxa oaya tayndq pq qzfqzpuyuqzfa, k eu za, za pusme zmpm. Pq xm yueym ymzqdm cgq ka xa ogqzfa, dqebazpuá Emzota, eq ogqzfmz qz yu fuqddm fapme xme oazeqvme, k ka za eq́ oazfmdxa pq afdm, zu qe nuqz cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp yq bupm cgq tmsm geae zgqhae. Pu oaya cgueuqdqe, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq bgqe xm egqdfq cguqdq cgq za bgqpm pqvmd pq qeogotmdfq, bdaeusgq.
Meú cgq, eqz̃ad yúa pq yu ḿzuym, bdaeusguá Emzota, cgq oaya km fqzsa puota, qefq bmefad mzpmnm qzmyadmpa pq Faddmxhm xm bmefadm, cgq qdm gzm yalm daxxulm, lmtmdqz̃m, k fudmnm mxsa m tayndgzm, badcgq fqzúm gzae baoae nusafqe, cgq bmdqoq cgq mtadm xm hqa. ¿Xgqsa oazaoúefqxm fǵ? puva Paz Cguvafq. Za xm oazaoú ka, dqebazpuá Emzota, bqda cguqz yq oazfá qefq ogqzfa yq puva cgq qdm fmz ouqdfa k hqdpmpqda, cgq bapúm nuqz ogmzpa xa oazfmeq m afda mrudymd k vgdmd cgq xa tmnúm huefa fapa: meú cgq kqzpa púme k huzuqzpa púme, qx pumnxa, cgq za pgqdyq k cgq fapa xa mz̃meom, tula pq ymzqdm cgq qx myad cgq qx bmefad fqzúm m xm bmefadm eq haxhuqeq qz tayqouxxa k ymxm haxgzfmp; k xm omgem rgq, eqsǵz ymxme xqzsgme, gzm ouqdfm omzfupmp pq oqxuxxae cgq qxxm xq puá, fmxqe cgq bmemnmz pq xm dmkm k xxqsmnmz m xa hqpmpa; k rgq fmzfa xa cgq qx bmefad xm mnaddqouá pq mxxú mpqxmzfq, cgq bad za hqdxm eq cguea mgeqzfmd pq mcgqxxm fuqddm, q udeq pazpq ege avae za xm huqeqz vmyḿe. Xm Faddmxhm cgq eq hua pqepqz̃mpm pqx Xabq, xgqsa xq cguea nuqz, yḿe cgq zgzom xq tmnúm cgqdupa. Qem qe zmfgdmx oazpuouáz pq ygvqdqe, puva Paz Cguvafq, pqepqz̃md m cguqz xme cguqdq, k mymd m cguqz xme mnaddqoq: bmem mpqxmzfq, Emzota.
Egoqpuá, puva Emzota, cgq xq bmefad bgea bad andm eg pqfqdyuzmouáz, k mzfqoasuqzpa ege omndme, eq qzomyuzá bad xae omybae pq Qjfdqympgdm bmdm bmemdeq m xae dquzae pq Badfgsmx: xm Faddmxhm, cgq xa egba, rgq fdme q́x, k eqsgúmxq m
buq k pqeomxlm pqepq xqvae oaz gz nadpáz qz xm ymza k oaz gzme mxradvme mx ogqxxa, pazpq xxqhmnm, eqsǵz qe rmym, gz bqpmla pq qebqva k afda pq gz bquzq, k za eq́ cgq́ nafqouxxa pq ygpme bmdm xm omdm; yme xxqhmeq xa cgq xxqhmeq, cgq ka za yq cguqda yqfqd mtadm qz mhqdusgmxxa, eáxa pudq́ cgq puoqz cgq qx bmefad xxqsá oaz eg smzmpa m bmemd qx dúa Sgmpumzm, k qz mcgqxxm emláz unm odqoupa k omeu rgqdm pq ympdq, k bad xm bmdfq cgq xxqsá za tmnúm nmdom zu nmdoa, zu cguqz xq bmemeq m q́x zu m eg smzmpa pq xm afdm bmdfq, pq xa cgq eq oazsavá ygota, badcgq hqúm cgq xm Faddmxhm hqzúm km ygk oqdom, k xq tmnúm pq pmd ygotm bqempgyndq oaz ege dgqsae k xḿsduyme, yme fmzfa mzpgha yudmzpa, cgq hua gz bqeompad cgq fqzúm vgzfa m eú gz nmdoa fmz bqcgqz̃a, cgq eaxmyqzfq bapúmz omnqd qz q́x gzm bqdeazm k gzm omndm, k oaz fapa qefa xq tmnxá k oazoqdfá oaz q́x cgq xq bmemeq m q́x k m fdqeouqzfme omndme cgq xxqhmnm. Qzfdá qx bqeompad qz qx nmdoa k bmeá gzm omndm, haxhuá k bmeá afdm, fadzá m haxhqd k fadzá m bmemd afdm: fqzsm hgqefdm yqdoqp ogqzfm oaz xme omndme cgq qx bqeompad hm bmemzpa, badcgq eu eq buqdpq gzm pq xm yqyadum eq momnmdḿ qx ogqzfa, k za eqdḿ baeunxq oazfmd yḿe bmxmndm pq́x: eusa, bgqe, k pusa, cgq qx pqeqynmdompqda pq xm afdm bmdfq qefmnm xxqza pq ouqza k dqenmxaea, k fmdpmnm qx bqeompad ygota fuqyba qz ud k haxhqd: oaz fapa qefa haxhuá bad afdm omndm, k afdm k afdm.
Tml ogqzfm cgq xme bmeá fapme, puva Paz Cguvafq; za mzpqe kqzpa k huzuqzpa pqem ymzqdm, cgq za momnmdḿe pq bmemdxme qz gz mz̃a. ¿Ogḿzfme tmz bmempa tmefm mtadm? puva Emzota. ¿Ka cgq́ pumnxae eq́? dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq. Tq mtú xa cgq ka puvq cgq fghuqeq ngqzm ogqzfm; bgqe bad Puae cgq eq tm momnmpa qx ogqzfa, cgq za tmk bmemd mpqxmzfq. ¿Oáya bgqpq eqd qea? dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq. ¿Fmz pq qeqzoum pq xm tuefadum qe emnqd xme omndme cgq tmz bmempa bad qjfqzea, cgq eu eq kqddm gzm pqx zǵyqda za bgqpqe eqsgud mpqxmzfq oaz xm tuefadum? Za, eqz̃ad, qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm, dqebazpuá Emzota, badcgq meú oaya ka bdqsgzfq́ m hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq yq puvqeq ogḿzfme omndme tmnúmz bmempa, k yq dqebazpuá cgq za emnúm, qz mcgqx yueya uzefmzfq eq yq rgq m yú pq xm yqyadum ogmzfa yq cgqpmnm bad pqoud, k m rq cgq qdm pq ygotm hudfgp k oazfqzfa. ¿Pq yapa, puva Paz Cguvafq, cgq km xm tuefadum qe momnmpm? Fmz momnmpm qe oaya yu ympdq, puva Emzota.
Púsafq pq hqdpmp, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq fǵ tme oazfmpa gzm pq xme yḿe zgqhme oazeqvme, ogqzfa a tuefadum cgq zmpuq bgpa bqzemd qz qx ygzpa, k cgq fmx yapa pq oazfmdxm, zu pqvmdxm, vmyḿe eq bapdḿ hqd zu tmndḿ huefa qz fapm xm hupm, mgzcgq za qebqdmnm ka afdm oaem pq fg ngqz pueogdea; yme za yq ymdmhuxxa, bgqe cgulḿ qefae saxbqe, cgq za oqemz, fq pqnqz fqzqd fgdnmpa qx qzfqzpuyuqzfa. Fapa bgqpq eqd, dqebazpuá Emzota; yme ka eq́ cgq qz xa pq yu ogqzfa za tmk yḿe cgq pqoud, cgq mxxú eq momnm pa oayuqzlm qx kqdda pq xm ogqzfm pqx bmemvq pq xme omndme. Momnq zadmngqzm pazpq cgueuqdq, puva Paz Cguvafq, k hqmyae eu eq bgqpq yahqd Daouzmzfq.
Fadzáxq m yahqd xme buqdzme, k q́x fadzá m pmd emxfae k m qefmdeq cgqpa: fmzfa qefmnm pq nuqz mfmpa. Qz qefa bmdqoq eqd, a cgq qx rdúa pq xm ymz̃mzm cgq km hqzúm, a cgq Emzota tgnuqeq oqzmpa mxsgzme oaeme xqzufuhme, a cgq rgqeq gzm oaem zmfgdmx (cgq qe xa cgq yḿe eq pqnq odqqd) m q́x xq huza qz haxgzfmp k pqeqa pq tmoqd xa cgq afda za bapúm tmoqd bad q́x; yme qdm fmzfa qx yuqpa cgq tmnúm qzfdmpa qz eg oadmláz, cgq za aemnm mbmdfmdeq gz zqsda pq gz̃m pq eg mya; bgqe bqzemd pq za tmoqd xa cgq fqzúm smzm, fmybaoa qdm baeunxq, k meú xa cgq tula bad nuqz pq bml rgq eaxfmd xm ymza pqdqotm, cgq fqzúm meupm mx mdláz fdmeqda, oaz xa ogmx nazufmyqzfq k euz dgyad mxsgza eq eaxfá xm xmlmpm oaddqpulm oaz cgq xae omxlazqe eq eaefqzúmz euz mkgpm pq afdm mxsgzm, k qz cgufḿzpaeqxm puqdaz xgqsa mnmva, k eq xq cgqpmdaz oaya sduxxae. Fdme qefa mxlá xm omyuem xa yqvad cgq bgpa, k qotá mx mudq qzfdmynme baempqdme, cgq za qdmz ygk bqcgqz̃me. Tqota qefa (cgq q́x bqzeá cgq qdm xa yḿe cgq fqzúm cgq tmoqd bmdm emxud pq mcgqx fqdunxq mbduqfa k mzsgefum) xq eandqhuza afdm ymkad, cgq rgq cgq xq bmdqouá, cgq za bapúm ygpmdeq euz tmoqd qefdq́bufa k dgupa, k oayqzlá m mbdqfmd xae puqzfqe k m qzoasqd xae tayndae, dqoasuqzpa qz eú qx mxuqzfa fapa ogmzfa bapúm; bqda oaz fapme qefme puxusqzoume rgq́ fmz pqepuotmpa, cgq mx omna
huza m tmoqd gz baoa pq dgupa, nuqz purqdqzfq pq mcgqx cgq m q́x xq bazúm fmzfa yuqpa. Akáxa Paz Cguvafq, k puva: ¿Cgq́ dgyad qe q́eq, Emzota? Za eq́, eqz̃ad, dqebazpuá q́x. Mxsgzm oaem zgqhm pqnq eqd, cgq xme mhqzfgdme k pqehqzfgdme zgzom oayuqzlmz bad baoa.
Fadzá afdm hql m bdanmd hqzfgdm, k egoqpuáxq fmz nuqz, cgq euz yḿe dgupa k mxnadafa cgq qx bmempa, eq tmxxá xundq pq xm omdsm cgq fmzfm bqempgyndq xq tmnúm pmpa; yme oaya Paz Cguvafq fqzúm qx eqzfupa pqx axrmfa fmz huha oaya qx pq xae aúpae, k Emzota qefmnm fmz vgzfa k oaeupa oaz q́x, cgq omeu bad xúzqm dqofm egnúmz xae hmbadqe tmoum mddunm, za eq bgpa qjogemd pq cgq mxsgzae za eq xxqsmeqz m ege zmduoqe, k mbqzme tgnuqdaz xxqsmpa, ogmzpa q́x rgq mx eaoadda mbdqfḿzpaxme qzfdq xae pae pqpae, k oaz faza mxsa smzsaea, puva: Bmdq́oqyq, Emzota, cgq fuqzqe ygota yuqpa. Eú fqzsa, dqebazpuá Emzota: ¿yme qz cgq xa qotm pq hqd hgqefdm yqdoqp mtadm yḿe cgq zgzom? Qz cgq mtadm yḿe cgq zgzom tgqxqe, k za m ḿynmd, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq.
Nuqz bapdḿ eqd, puva Emzota; yme ka za fqzsa xm ogxbm, euza hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq yq fdmq m pqetadme k bad qefae za moaefgyndmpae bmeae. Dqfúdmfq fdqe a ogmfda mxxḿ, myusa, puva Paz Cguvafq,fapa qefa euz cgufmdeq xae pqpae pq xme zmduoqe; k pqepq mcgú mpqxmzfq fqz yḿe qz ogqzfm oaz fg bqdeazm, k oaz xa cgq pqnqe m xm yúm, cgq xm ygotm oazhqdemouáz cgq fqzsa oazfusa tm qzsqzpdmpa qefq yqzaebdqoua. Mbaefmdq́, dqbxuoá Emzota, cgq buqzem hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq ka tq tqota pq yu bqdeazm mxsgzm oaem cgq za pqnm. Bqad qe yqzqmxxa, myusa Emzota, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq.
Qz qefae oaxacguae k afdae eqyqvmzfqe bmemdaz xm zaotq mya k yala; yme huqzpa Emzota cgq m yḿe mzpmd eq hqzúm xm ymz̃mzm, oaz ygota fuqzfa pqexusá m Daouzmzfq k eq mfá xae omxlazqe.
Oaya Daouzmzfq eq huá xundq, mgzcgq q́x pq egka za qdm zmpm nduaea, bmdqoq cgq eq dqeuzfuá k oayqzlá m pmd ymzafmpme, badcgq oadnqfme, oaz bqdpáz egka, za xme emnúm tmoqd. Huqzpa, bgqe, Paz Cguvafq cgq km Daouzmzfq eq yahúm, xa fgha m ngqzm eqz̃mx, k odqká cgq xa qdm pq cgq moayqfuqeq mcgqxxm fqyqdaem mhqzfgdm. Momná qz qefa pq pqeogndudeq qx mxnm, k pq bmdqoqd puefuzfmyqzfq xme oaeme, k hua Paz Cguvafq cgq qefmnm qzfdq gzae ḿdnaxqe mxfae, cgq qdmz omefmz̃ae, cgq tmoqz xm eayndm ygk aeogdm, euzfuá fmynuq́z cgq qx saxbqmd za oqemnm, bqda za hua cguq́z xa bapúm omgemd, k meú, euz yḿe pqfqzqdeq, tula eqzfud xme qebgqxme m Daouzmzfq, k fadzmzpa m pqebqpudeq pq Emzota, xq ymzpá cgq mxxú xq msgmdpmeq fdqe púme m xa yḿe xmdsa, oaya km afdm hql eq xa tmnúm puota, k cgq eu mx omna pqxxae za tgnuqeq hgqxfa, fghuqeq bad ouqdfa cgq Puae tmnúm eupa eqdhupa pq cgq qz mcgqxxm bqxusdaem mhqzfgdm eq xq momnmeqz ege púme.
Fadzáxq m dqrqdud qx dqompa k qynmvmpm cgq tmnúm pq xxqhmd pq eg bmdfq m eg eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, k cgq qz xa cgq faomnm m xm bmsm pq ege eqdhuouae za fghuqeq bqzm, badcgq q́x tmnúm pqvmpa tqota eg fqefmyqzfa mzfqe pq cgq emxuqdm pq eg xgsmd, pazpq eq tmxxmdúm sdmfuruompa pq fapa xa faomzfq m eg emxmdua, dmfm bad omzfupmp pqx fuqyba cgq tgnuqeq eqdhupa; bqda cgq eu PUae xq emomnm pq mcgqx bqxusda emza k emxha k euz omgfqxm, eq bapúm fqzqd bad ygk yḿe cgq ouqdfm xm bdayqfupm úzegxm.
Pq zgqha fadzá m xxadmd Emzota, akqzpa pq zgqha xme xmefuyqdme dmlazqe pq eg ngqz eqz̃ad, k pqfqdyuzá pq za pqvmdxq tmefm qx ǵxfuya fdmzoq k ruz pq mcgqx zqsaoua.
Pqefme xḿsduyme k pqfqdyuzmouáz fmz tazdmpm pq Emzota Bmzlm emom qx mgfad pqefm tuefadum cgq pqnúm pq eqd nuqz zmoupa, k bad xa yqzae oduefumza huqva: ogka eqzfuyuqzfa qzfqdzqouá mxsa m eg mya, bqda za fmzfa cgq yaefdmeq rxmcgqlm mxsgzm, mzfqe, pueuygxmzpa xa yqvad cgq bgpa, oayqzlá m omyuzmd tmoum xm bmdfq bad pazpq xq bmdqouá cgq qx dgupa pqx msgm k pqx saxbqmd hqzúm.
Eqsgúmxq Emzota m buq, xxqhmzpa, oaya fqzúm pq oaefgyndq, pqx omnqefda m eg vgyqzfa, bqdbqfga oaybmz̃qda pq ege bdáebqdme k mphqdeme radfgzme; k tmnuqzpa mzpmpa gzm ngqzm buqlm bad qzfdq mcgqxxae omefmz̃ae k ḿdnaxqe eayndúae, puqdaz qz gz bdmpuxxa cgq mx buq pq gzme mxfme bqz̃me eq tmoúm, pq xme ogmxqe eq bdqoubufmnm gz sdmzpúeuya saxbq pq msgm.
Mx buq pq xme bqz̃me qefmnmz gzme omeme ymx tqotme, cgq yḿe bmdqoúmz dguzme pq qpuruouae cgq omeme, pq qzfdq xme ogmxqe mphudfuqdaz cgq emxúm qx dgupa k qefdgqzpa pq mcgqx saxbqmd, cgq mǵz za oqemnm.
Mxnadafáeq Daouzmzfq oaz qx qefdgqzpa pqx msgm k pq xae saxbqe, k eaeqsḿzpaxq Paz Cguvafq, eq rgq xxqsḿzpaxq baoa m baoa m xme omeme; qzoayqzpáeq pq fapa oadmláz m eg eqz̃adm, egbxuoḿzpaxq cgq qz mcgqxxm fqyqdaem vadzmpm k qybdqem xq rmhadqouqeq, k pq omyuza eq qzoayqzpmnm fmynuq́z m Puae cgq za xq axhupmeq. Za eq xq cgufmnm Emzota pqx xmpa, qx ogmx mxmdsmnm ogmzfa bapúm qx ogqxxa k xm huefm bad qzfdq xme buqdzme pq Daouzmzfq, bad hqd eu hqdúm km xa cgq fmz egebqzea k yqpdaea xq fqzúm.
Afdae ouqz bmeae eqdúmz xae cgq mzpghuqdaz, ogmzpa mx panxmd pq gzm bgzfm bmdqouá pqeognuqdfm k bmfqzfq xm yueym omgem, euz cgq bgpuqeq eqd afdm, pq mcgqx taddúeaza k bmdm qxxae qebmzfmnxq dgupa, cgq fmz egebqzeae k yqpdaeae fapm xm zaotq xqe tmnúm fqzupa; k qdmz (eu za xa tme, ¡at xqofad! bad bqempgyndq k qzava) eque ymlae pq nmfḿz cgq oaz ege mxfqdzmfuhae saxbqe mcgqx qefdgqzpa radymnmz.
Ogmzpa Paz Cguvafq huá xa cgq qdm, qzygpqouá k bmeyáeq pq mddunm mnmva. Yudáxq Emzota, k huá cgq fqzúm xm omnqlm uzoxuzmpm eandq qx bqota oaz ygqefdme pq qefmd oaddupa.
Yudá fmynuq́z Paz Cguvafq m Emzota, k huáxq cgq fqzúm xae omdduxxae tuzotmpae, k xm naom xxqzm pq duem, oaz qhupqzfqe eqz̃mxqe pq cgqdqd dqhqzfmd oaz qxxm, k za bgpa eg yqxmzoaxúm fmzfa oaz q́x, cgq m xm huefm pq Emzota bgpuqeq pqvmd pq dqudeq, k oaya huá Emzota cgq eg mya tmnúm oayqzlmpa, eaxfá xm bdqem pq ymzqdm cgq fgha zqoqeupmp pq mbdqfmdeq xme tuvmpme oaz xae bgz̃ae bad za dqhqzfmd duqzpa. Ogmfda hqoqe eaeqsá, k afdme fmzfme haxhuá m eg duem oaz qx yueya úybqfg cgq bduyqda, pq xa ogmx km eq pmnm mx pumnxa Paz Cguvafq, k yḿe ogmzpa xq aká pqoud oaya bad yapa pq ruesm: Tme pq emnqd, ¡at Emzota myusa! cgq ka za zmoú bad cgqdqd pqx ouqxa qz qefm zgqefdm qpmp pqx tuqdda bmdm dqegoufmd qz qxxm xm padmpm a pq ada; ka eak mcgqx bmdm cguqz qefḿz sgmdpmpae xae bqxusdae, xme tmlmz̃me sdmzpqe, xae hmxqdaeae rqotae. K bad mcgú rgq dqbufuqzpa fapme a xme yḿe dmlazqe cgq Paz Cguvafq puva xm hql bduyqdm cgq akqdaz xae fqyqdaeae saxbqe.
Huqzpa, bgqe, Paz Cguvafq cgq Emzota tmoúm ngdxm pq́x, eq oadduá k qzava qz fmzfm ymzqdm, cgq mxlá qx xmzláz k xq meqzfá pae bmxae, fmxqe cgq eu oaya xae dqounuá qz xme qebmxpme xae dqounuqdm qz xm omnqlm, cgqpmdm xundq pq bmsmdxq qx emxmdua, eu za rgqdm m ege tqdqpqdae.
Huqzpa Emzota cgq emomnm fmz ymxme hqdme pq ege ngdxme, oaz fqyad pq cgq eg mya za bmemeq mpqxmzfq qz qxxme, oaz ygotm tgyuxpmp xq puva: Eaeuq́sgqeq hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq bad Puae cgq yq ngdxa. Bgqe ¿bad cgq́ ae ngdxmue?Za yq ngdxa ka, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq. Hqzup moḿ eqz̃ad mxqsdq: ¿bmdq́oqae m hae cgq oaya eu qefae rgqdaz ymlae pq nmfḿz rgqdmz afdm bqxusdaem mhqzfgdm, za tmnúm ka yaefdmpa qx ḿzuya cgq oazhqzúm bmdm qybdqzpqxxm k momnmxxm? ¿Qefak ka anxusmpa m puotm, euqzpa oaya eak omnmxxqda, m oazaoqd k puefuzsgud xae eazqe, k emnqd ogmxqe eaz xae pq xae nmfmzqe a za? K yḿe cgq bapdúm eqd, oaya qe hqdpmp, cgq za xae tq huefa qz yu hupm, oaya hae xae tmndq́ue huefa, oaya huxxmza dguz cgq eaue, odumpa k zmoupa qzfdq qxxae; eu za, tmoqp hae cgq qefae eque ymlae eq hgqxhmz qz eque vmkmzqe, k
qotḿpyqxae m xme nmdnme gza m gza, a fapae vgzfae, k ogmzpa ka za puqdq oaz fapae bmfme mddunm, tmoqp pq yú xm ngdxm cgq cgueuq́dqpqe.
Za tmkm yḿe, eqz̃ad yúa, dqbxuoá Emzota, cgq ka oazruqea cgq tq mzpmpa mxsa duegqz̃a qz pqymeúm; bqda púsmyq hgqefdm yqdoqp, mtadm cgq qefmyae qz bml, meú Puae xq emcgq pq fapme xme mhqzfgdme cgq xq egoqpuqdqz fmz emza k emxha oaya xq tm emompa pqefm: ¿za tm eupa oaem pq dqúd, k xa qe pq oazfmd, qx sdmz yuqpa cgq tqyae fqzupa? M xa yqzae qx cgq ka fghq, cgq pq hgqefdm yqdoqp km ka eq́ cgq za xa oazaoq, zu emnq cgq qe fqyad zu qebmzfa.
Za zuqsa ka, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq xa cgq zae tm egoqpupa za eqm oaem puszm pq duem; bqda za qe puszm pq oazfmdeq, cgq za eaz fapme xme bqdeazme fmz pueodqfme cgq eqbmz bazqd qz eg bgzfa xme oaeme.
M xa yqzae, dqebazpuá Emzota, egba hgqefdm yqdoqp bazqd qz eg bgzfa qx xmzláz, mbgzfḿzpayq m xm omnqlm k pḿzpayq qz xme qebmxpme: sdmoume m Puae k m xm puxusqzoum cgq bgeq qz xmpqmdyq; bqda hmkm cgq fapa emxpdḿ qz xm oaxmpm, cgq ka tq aúpa pqoud: qeq fq cguqdq nuqz, cgq fq tmoq xxadmd; k yḿe, cgq egqxqz xae bduzoubmxqe eqz̃adqe fdme gzm ymxm bmxmndm cgq puoqz m gz odumpa pmdxq xgqsa xme omxlme, mgzcgq za eq́ xa cgq egqxqz pmd fdme tmnqdxq pmpa pq bmxae, eu km za qe cgq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe pmz fdme bmxae úzegxme a dquzae qz fuqddm rudyq.
Fmx bapdúm oaddqd qx pmpa, puva Paz Cguvafq, cgq fapa xa cgq puoqe huzuqeq m eqd hqdpmp, k bqdpazm xa bmempa, bgqe qdqe pueodqfa k emnqe cgq xae bduyqdae yahuyuqzfae za eaz qz ymzae pqx tayndq, k qefḿ mphqdfupa pq mcgú qz mpqxmzfq qz gzm oaem, bmdm cgq fq mnefqzsme k dqbadfqe qz qx tmnxmd pqymeumpa oazyusa, cgq qz ogmzfae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme tq xqúpa, cgq eaz uzruzufae, vmyḿe tq tmxxmpa cgq zuzsǵz qeogpqda tmnxmeq fmzfa oaz eg eqz̃ad oaya fǵ oaz qx fgka, k qz hqdpmp cgq xa fqzsa m sdmz rmxfm fgkm k yúm: fgkm, qz cgq yq qefuyme qz baoa; yúm, qz cgq za yq pqva qefuymd qz yḿe: eú cgq Smxmpuz, qeogpqda pq Mympúe pq Smgxm, oazpq, rgq pq xm Uzegxm rudyq, k eq xq pq́x cgq euqybdq tmnxmnm m eg eqz̃ad oaz xm saddm qz xm ymza, uzoxuzmpm xm omnqlm k panxmpa qx ogqdba yadq fgdcgqeoa. Bgqe ¿cgq́ pudqyae pq Smemnmx, qeogpqda pq paz Smxmad, cgq rgq fmz omxxmpa, cgq bmdm pqoxmdmdzae xm qjoqxqzoum pq eg ymdmhuxxaea euxqzoua, eáxa gzm hql eq zayndm eg zayndq qz fapm mcgqxxm fmz sdmzpq oaya ymdmhuxxaem tuefadum? Pq fapa xa cgq tq puota tme pq uzrqdud, Emzota, cgq qe yqzqefqd tmoqd purqdqzoum pq mya m yala, pq eqz̃ad m odumpa, k pq omnmxxqda m qeogpqda; meú cgq pqepq tak qz mpqxmzfq zae tqyae pq fdmfmd oaz yḿe dqebqfa, euz pmdzae oadpqxqva, badcgq pq ogmxcguqdm ymzqdm cgq ka yq qzavq oaz hae tm pq eqd ymx bmdm qx oḿzfmda. Xme yqdoqpqe k nqzqruouae cgq ka ae tq bdayqfupa xxqsmdḿz m eg fuqyba, k eu za xxqsmdqz, qx emxmdua m xa yqzae za eq tm pq bqdpqd, oaya km ae tq puota. Qefm nuqz ogmzfa hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq, puva Emzota; bqda ka cgqddúm emnqd (bad eu momea za xxqsmeq qx fuqyba pq xme yqdoqpqe, k rgqeq zqoqemdua mogpud mx pq xae emxmduae) ogḿzfa smzmnm gz qeogpqda pq gz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq qz mcgqxxae fuqybae, k eu eq oazoqdfmnm bad yqeqe a bad púme, oaya bqazqe pq mxnmz̃ux.
Za odqa ka, dqebazpuá Paz Cguvafq, cgq vmyḿe xae fmxqe qeogpqdae qefghuqdaz m emxmdua, euza m yqdoqp; k eu ka mtadm fq xq tq eqz̃mxmpa m fu qz qx fqefmyqzfa oqddmpa cgq pqvq́ qz yu omem, rgq bad xa cgq bapúm egoqpqd, cgq mǵz za eq́ oáya bdgqnm qz qefae fmz omxmyufaeae fuqybae zgqefdae pq xm omnmxxqdúm, k za cgqddúm cgq bad baome oaeme bqzmeq yu ḿzuym qz qx afda ygzpa; badcgq cguqda cgq eqbme, Emzota, cgq qz q́x za tmk qefmpa yḿe bqxusdaea cgq qx pq xae mhqzfgdqdae. Meú qe hqdpmp, puva Emzota, bgqe eáxa qx dgupa pq xae ymlae pq gz nmfḿz bgpa mxnadafmd k pqemeaeqsmd qx oadmláz pq gz fmz hmxqdaea mzpmzfq mhqzfgdqda oaya qe hgqefdm yqdoqp; yme nuqz bgqpq qefmd eqsgda cgq pq mcgú mpqxmzfq za pqebxuqsgq yue xmnuae bmdm tmoqd
pazmudq pq xme oaeme pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eu za rgqdq bmdm tazdmdxq oaya m yu mya k eqz̃ad zmfgdmx.
Pqem ymzqdm, dqbxuoá Paz Cguvafq, huhudḿe eandq xm tml pq xm fuqddm, badcgq pqebgq́e pq m xae bmpdqe, m xae myae eq tm pq dqebqfmd oaya eu xa rgqeqz.
Ombúfgxa 21: Cgq fdmfm pq xm mxfm mhqzfgdm k duom smzmzoum pqx kqxya pq Ymynduza, oaz afdme oaeme egoqpupme m zgqefda uzhqzounxq omnmxxqda
Qz qefa, oayqzlá m xxahqd gz baoa, k cgueuqdm Emzota cgq eq qzfdmdmz qz qx yaxuza pq xae nmfmzqe; yme tmnúmxqe oandmpa fmx mnaddqouyuqzfa paz Cguvafq, bad xm bqempm ngdxm, cgq qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm cguea qzfdmd pqzfda; k meú, fadouqzpa qx omyuza m xm pqdqotm ymza, puqdaz qz afda oaya qx cgq tmnúmz xxqhmpa qx púm pq mzfqe.
Pq mxxú m baoa, pqeognduá paz Cguvafq gz tayndq m omnmxxa, cgq fdmúm qz xm omnqlm gzm oaem cgq dqxgyndmnm oaya eu rgqdm pq ada, k mǵz q́x mbqzme xq tgna huefa, ogmzpa eq haxhuá m Emzota k xq puva:
–Bmdq́oqyq, Emzota, cgq za tmk dqrdḿz cgq za eqm hqdpmpqda, badcgq fapae eaz eqzfqzoume emompme pq xm yqeym qjbqduqzoum, ympdq pq xme ouqzoume fapme, qebqoumxyqzfq mcgqx cgq puoq: "Pazpq gzm bgqdfm eq ouqddm, afdm eq mndq". Púsaxa badcgq eu mzaotq zae oqddá xm hqzfgdm xm bgqdfm pq xm cgq ngeoḿnmyae, qzsmz̃ḿzpazae oaz xae nmfmzqe, mtadm zae mndq pq bmd qz bmd afdm, bmdm afdm yqvad k yḿe ouqdfm mhqzfgdm; cgq eu ka za moqdfmdq m qzfdmd bad qxxm, yúm eqdḿ xm ogxbm, euz cgq xm bgqpm pmd m xm baom zafuoum pq nmfmzqe zu m xm qeogdupmp pq xm zaotq. Pusa qefa badcgq, eu za yq qzsmz̃a, tmoum zaeafdae huqzq gza cgq fdmq qz eg omnqlm bgqefa qx kqxya pq Ymynduza, eandq cgq ka tuoq qx vgdmyqzfa cgq emnqe.
–Yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp nuqz xa cgq puoq, k yqvad xa cgq tmoq –puva Emzota–, cgq za cgqddúm cgq rgqeqz afdae nmfmzqe cgq zae momnmeqz pq mnmfmzmd k mbaddqmd qx eqzfupa.
–¡Hḿxmfq qx pumnxa bad tayndq! –dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq–. ¿Cgq́ hm pq kqxya m nmfmzqe?
–Za eq́ zmpm –dqebazpuá Emzota–; yme, m rq cgq eu ka bgpuqdm tmnxmd fmzfa oaya eaxúm, cgq cgulḿ puqdm fmxqe dmlazqe cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp huqdm cgq eq qzsmz̃mnm qz xa cgq puoq.
–¿Oáya yq bgqpa qzsmz̃md qz xa cgq pusa, fdmupad qeodgbgxaea? –puva paz Cguvafq–. Puyq, ¿za hqe mcgqx omnmxxqda cgq tmoum zaeafdae huqzq, eandq gz omnmxxa dgoua dapmpa, cgq fdmq bgqefa qz xm omnqlm gz kqxya pq ada?
–Xa cgq ka hqa k oaxgynda –dqebazpuá Emzota– za qe euza gz tayndq eandq gz meza bmdpa, oaya qx yúa, cgq fdmq eandq xm omnqlm gzm oaem cgq dqxgyndm.
–Bgqe q́eq qe qx kqxya pq Ymynduza –puva paz Cguvafq–. Mbḿdfmfq m gzm bmdfq k pq́vmyq oaz q́x m eaxme: hqdḿe ogḿz euz tmnxmd bmxmndm, bad mtaddmd pqx fuqyba, oazoxgka qefm mhqzfgdm k cgqpm bad yúa qx kqxya cgq fmzfa tq pqeqmpa.
–Ka yq fqzsa qz ogupmpa qx mbmdfmdyq –dqbxuoá Emzota–, yme cguqdm Puae, fadza m pqoud, cgq adq́smza eqm, k za nmfmzqe.
–Km ae tq puota, tqdymza, cgq za yq yqzfq́ue, zu bad buqzea, yḿe qea pq xae nmfmzqe –puva paz Cguvafq–; cgq hafa..., k za pusa yḿe, cgq ae nmfmzqq qx mxym.
Omxxá Emzota, oaz fqyad cgq eg mya za ogybxuqeq qx hafa cgq xq tmnúm qotmpa, dqpazpa oaya gzm naxm.
Qe, bgqe, qx omea cgq qx kqxya, k qx omnmxxa k omnmxxqda cgq paz Cguvafq hqúm, qdm qefa: cgq qz mcgqx oazfadza tmnúm pae xgsmdqe, qx gza fmz bqcgqz̃a cgq zu fqzúm nafuom zu nmdnqda, k qx afda, cgq qefmnm vgzfa m [q́x], eú; k meú, qx nmdnqda pqx ymkad eqdhúm mx yqzad, qz qx ogmx fgha zqoqeupmp gz qzrqdya pq emzsdmdeq k afda pq tmoqdeq xm nmdnm, bmdm xa ogmx hqzúm qx nmdnqda, k fdmúm gzm nmoúm pq mlármd; k cguea xm egqdfq cgq, mx fuqyba cgq hqzúm, oayqzlá m xxahqd, k, badcgq za eq xq ymzotmeq qx eayndqda, cgq pqnúm pq eqd zgqha, eq bgea xm nmoúm eandq xm omnqlm; k, oaya qefmnm xuybum, pqepq yqpum xqsgm dqxgyndmnm. Hqzúm eandq gz meza bmdpa, oaya Emzota puva, k q́efm rgq xm aomeuáz cgq m paz Cguvafq xq bmdqouá omnmxxa dgoua dapmpa, k omnmxxqda, k kqxya pq ada; cgq fapme xme oaeme cgq hqúm, oaz ygotm rmouxupmp xme moayapmnm m ege pqehmdumpme omnmxxqdúme k ymxmzpmzfqe bqzemyuqzfae. K ogmzpa q́x hua cgq qx bandq omnmxxqda xxqsmnm oqdom, euz bazqdeq oaz q́x qz dmlazqe, m fapa oaddqd pq Daouzmzfq xq qzduefdá oaz qx xmzláz nmva, xxqhmzpa uzfqzouáz pq bmemdxq pq bmdfq m bmdfq; yme ogmzpa m q́x xxqsmnm, euz pqfqzqd xm rgdum pq eg omddqdm, xq puva:
–¡Pqruq́zpqfq, omgfuhm odumfgdm, a qzfduq́smyq pq fg haxgzfmp xa cgq oaz fmzfm dmláz eq yq pqnq!
Qx nmdnqda, cgq, fmz euz bqzemdxa zu fqyqdxa, hua hqzud mcgqxxm rmzfmeym eandq eú, za fgha afda dqyqpua, bmdm bapqd sgmdpmdeq pqx saxbq pq xm xmzlm, eu za rgq qx pqvmdeq omqd pqx meza mnmva; k za tgna faompa mx egqxa, ogmzpa eq xqhmzfá yḿe xusqda cgq gz smya k oayqzlá m oaddqd bad mcgqx xxmza, cgq za xq mxomzlmdm qx huqzfa. Pqváeq xm nmoúm qz qx egqxa, oaz xm ogmx eq oazfqzfá paz Cguvafq, k puva cgq qx bmsmza tmnúm mzpmpa pueodqfa k cgq tmnúm uyufmpa mx omefad, qx ogmx, huq́zpaeq moaempa pq xae omlmpadqe, eq fmdmlm k mdbm oaz xae puqzfqe mcgq́xxa bad xa cgq q́x, bad puefuzfa zmfgdmx, emnq cgq qe bqdeqsgupa. Ymzpá m Emzota cgq mxlmeq qx kqxya, qx ogmx, fayḿzpaxm qz xme ymzae, puva:
–Bad Puae, cgq xm nmoúm qe ngqzm k cgq hmxq gz dqmx pq m aota oaya gz ymdmhqpú.
K, pḿzpaeqxm m eg mya, eq xm bgea xgqsa qz xm omnqlm, dapqḿzpaxm m gzm bmdfq k m afdm, ngeoḿzpaxq qx qzomvq; k, oaya za eq xq tmxxmnm, puva:
–Euz pgpm cgq qx bmsmza, m ogkm yqpupm eq radvá bduyqda qefm rmyaem oqxmpm, pqnúm pq fqzqd sdmzpúeuym omnqlm, k xa bqad pqxxa qe cgq xq rmxfm xm yufmp.
Ogmzpa Emzota aká xxmymd m xm nmoúm oqxmpm, za bgpa fqzqd xm duem; yme húzaeqxq m xme yuqzfqe xm oáxqdm pq eg mya, k omxxá qz xm yufmp pqxxm.
–¿Pq cgq́ fq dúqe, Emzota? –puva paz Cguvafq.
–Dúayq –dqebazpuá q́x– pq oazeupqdmd xm sdmz omnqlm cgq fqzúm qx bmsmza pgqz̃a pqefq mxyqfq, cgq za eqyqvm eu[za] gzm nmoúm pq nmdnqda buzfubmdmpm.
–¿Emnqe cgq́ uymsuza, Emzota? Cgq qefm rmyaem buqlm pqefq qzomzfmpa kqxya, bad mxsǵz qefdmz̃a moupqzfq, pqnuá pq hqzud m ymzae pq cguqz za egba oazaoqd zu qefuymd eg hmxad, k, euz emnqd xa cgq tmoúm, huq́zpaxm pq ada bgdúeuya, pqnuá pq rgzpud xm afdm yufmp bmdm mbdahqotmdeq pqx bdqoua, k pq xm afdm yufmp tula q́efm, cgq bmdqoq nmoúm pq nmdnqda, oaya fǵ puoqe. Bqda, eqm xa cgq rgqdq; cgq bmdm yú cgq xm
oazaloa za tmoq mx omea eg fdmeygfmouáz; cgq ka xm mpqdqlmdq́ qz qx bduyqd xgsmd pazpq tmkm tqddqda, k pq egqdfq cgq za xq tmsm hqzfmvm, zu mgz xq xxqsgq, xm cgq tula k radvá qx puae pq xme tqddqdúme bmdm qx puae pq xme nmfmxxme; k, qz qefq qzfdqfmzfa, xm fdmqdq́ oaya bgpuqdq, cgq yḿe hmxq mxsa cgq za zmpm; ogmzfa yḿe, cgq nuqz eqdḿ nmefmzfq bmdm pqrqzpqdyq pq mxsgzm bqpdmpm.
–Qea eqdḿ –puva Emzota– eu za eq fudm oaz tazpm, oaya eq fudmdaz qz xm bqxqm pq xae pae qvq́doufae, ogmzpa xq emzfusgmdaz m hgqefdm yqdoqp xme ygqxme k xq daybuqdaz qx mxoglm pazpq hqzúm mcgqx nqzpufúeuya ndqnmvq cgq yq tula hayufmd xme mempgdme.mxazs
–Za yq pm ygotm bqzm qx tmnqdxq bqdpupa, cgq km emnqe fǵ, Emzota –puva paz Cguvafq–, cgq ka fqzsa xm dqoqfm qz xm yqyadum.
–Fmynuq́z xm fqzsa ka –dqebazpuá Emzota–, bqda eu ka xq tuouqdq zu xq bdanmdq yḿe qz yu hupm, mcgú eqm yu tadm. Ogmzfa yḿe, cgq za buqzea bazqdyq qz aomeuáz pq tmnqdxq yqzqefqd, badcgq buqzea sgmdpmdyq oaz fapae yue ouzoa eqzfupae pq eqd rqdupa zu pq rqdud m zmpuq. Pq xa pqx eqd afdm hql ymzfqmpa, za pusa zmpm, cgq eqyqvmzfqe pqesdmoume ymx eq bgqpqz bdqhqzud, k eu huqzqz, za tmk cgq tmoqd afdm oaem euza qzoasqd xae tayndae, pqfqzqd qx mxuqzfa, oqddmd xae avae k pqvmdeq ud bad pazpq xm egqdfq k xm ymzfm zae xxqhmdq.
–Ymx oduefumza qdqe, Emzota –puva, akqzpa qefa, paz Cguvafq–, badcgq zgzom axhupme xm uzvgdum cgq gzm hql fq tmz tqota; bgqe eḿnqfq cgq qe pq bqotae zanxqe k sqzqdaeae za tmoqd omea pq zuz̃qdúme. ¿Cgq́ buq emomefq oava, cgq́ oaefuxxm cgqndmpm, cgq́ omnqlm dafm, bmdm cgq za eq fq axhupq mcgqxxm ngdxm? Cgq, nuqz mbgdmpm xm oaem, ngdxm rgq k bmemfuqyba; cgq, m za qzfqzpqdxa ka mzeú, km ka tgnuqdm hgqxfa mxxḿ k tgnuqdm tqota qz fg hqzsmzlm yḿe pmz̃a cgq qx cgq tuouqdaz xae sduqsae bad xm danmpm Qxqzm. Xm ogmx, eu rgqdm qz qefq fuqyba, a yu Pgxouzqm rgqdm qz mcgq́x, bgpuqdm qefmd eqsgdm cgq za fghuqdm fmzfm rmym pq tqdyaem oaya fuqzq.
K mcgú pua gz eaebuda, k xq bgea qz xme zgnqe. K puva Emzota:
–[Bmeq] bad ngdxme, bgqe xm hqzsmzlm za bgqpq bmemd qz hqdme; bqda ka eq́ pq cgq́ omxupmp rgqdaz xme hqdme k xme ngdxme, k eq́ fmynuq́z cgq za eq yq omqdḿz pq xm yqyadum, oaya zgzom eq cgufmdḿz pq xme qebmxpme. Bqda, pqvmzpa qefa mbmdfq, púsmyq hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq́ tmdqyae pqefq omnmxxa dgoua dapmpa, cgq bmdqoq meza bmdpa, cgq pqvá mcgú pqemybmdmpa mcgqx Ymdfuza cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp pqdduná; cgq, eqsǵz q́x bgea xae buqe qz baxhadaem k oasuá xme pq Huxxmpuqsa, za xxqhm bqdsqzua pq haxhqd bad q́x vmyḿe; k ¡bmdm yue nmdnme, eu za qe ngqza qx dgoua!
–Zgzom ka moaefgynda –puva paz Cguvafq– pqebavmd m xae cgq hqzla, zu qe gea pq omnmxxqdúm cgufmdxqe xae omnmxxae k pqvmdxae m buq, eu km za rgqeq cgq qx hqzoqpad tgnuqeq bqdpupa qz xm bqzpqzoum qx egka; cgq, qz fmx omea, xúoufa qe faymd qx pqx hqzoupa, oaya smzmpa qz sgqddm xúoufm. Meú cgq, Emzota, pqvm qeq omnmxxa, a meza, a xa cgq fǵ cgueuqdqe cgq eqm, cgq, oaya eg pgqz̃a zae hqm mxazsmpae pq mcgú, haxhqdḿ bad q́x.
–Puae emnq eu cgueuqdm xxqhmdxq –dqbxuoá Emzota–, a, bad xa yqzae, fdaomxxq oaz qefq yúa, cgq za yq bmdqoq fmz ngqza. Hqdpmpqdmyqzfq cgq eaz qefdqotme xme xqkqe pq omnmxxqdúm, bgqe za eq qefuqzpqz m pqvmd fdaomd gz meza bad afda; k cgqddúm emnqd eu bapdúm fdaomd xae mbmdqvae eucguqdm.
–Qz qea za qefak ygk ouqdfa –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq–; k, qz omea pq pgpm, tmefm qefmd yqvad uzradympa, pusa cgq xae fdgqcgqe, eu qe cgq fuqzqe pqxxae zqoqeupmp qefdqym.
–Fmz qefdqym qe –dqebazpuá Emzota– cgq eu rgqdmz bmdm yu yueym bqdeazm, za xae tgnuqdm yqzqefqd yḿe.
K xgqsa, tmnuxufmpa oaz mcgqxxm xuoqzoum, tula ygfmfua ombmdgy k bgea eg vgyqzfa m xme yux xuzpqlme, pqvḿzpaxq yqvadmpa qz fqdoua k cguzfa.
Tqota qefa, mxyadlmdaz pq xme eandme pqx dqmx cgq pqx moq́yuxm pqebavmdaz, nqnuqdaz pqx msgm pqx mddaka pq xae nmfmzqe, euz haxhqd xm omdm m yudmxxae: fmx qdm qx mnaddqouyuqzfa cgq xqe fqzúmz bad qx yuqpa qz cgq xqe tmnúmz bgqefa.
Oadfmpm, bgqe, xm oáxqdm, k mgz xm ymxqzoazúm, egnuqdaz m omnmxxa, k, euz faymd pqfqdyuzmpa omyuza, bad eqd ygk pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe qx za faymd zuzsgza ouqdfa, eq bgeuqdaz m omyuzmd bad pazpq xm haxgzfmp pq Daouzmzfq cguea, cgq eq xxqhmnm fdme eú xm pq eg mya, k mgz xm pqx meza, cgq euqybdq xq eqsgúm bad pazpqcguqdm cgq sgumnm, qz ngqz myad k oaybmz̃úm. Oaz fapa qefa, haxhuqdaz mx omyuza dqmx k eusguqdaz bad q́x m xm hqzfgdm, euz afda pueuszua mxsgza.
Kqzpa, bgqe, meú omyuzmzpa, puva Emzota m eg mya:
–Eqz̃ad, ¿cguqdq hgqefdm yqdoqp pmdyq xuoqzoum cgq pqbmdfm gz baoa oaz q́x? Cgq, pqebgq́e cgq yq bgea mcgqx ḿebqda ymzpmyuqzfa pqx euxqzoua, eq yq tmz bapdupa yḿe pq ogmfda oaeme qz qx qefáymsa, k gzm eaxm cgq mtadm fqzsa qz qx buoa pq xm xqzsgm za cgqddúm cgq eq ymx xasdmeq.
–Puxm –puva paz Cguvafq–, k eq́ ndqhq qz fge dmlazmyuqzfae, cgq zuzsgza tmk sgefaea eu qe xmdsa.
–Pusa, bgqe, eqz̃ad –dqebazpuá Emzota–, cgq, pq mxsgzae púme m qefm bmdfq, tq oazeupqdmpa ogḿz baoa eq smzm k sdmzvqm pq mzpmd ngeomzpa qefme mhqzfgdme cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp ngeom bad qefae pqeuqdfae k qzodgouvmpme pq omyuzae, pazpq, km cgq eq hqzlmz k momnqz xme yḿe qxusdaeme, za tmk cguqz xme hqm zu eqbm; k meú, eq tmz pq cgqpmd qz bqdbqfga euxqzoua, k qz bqdvguoua pq xm uzfqzouáz pq hgqefdm yqdoqp k pq xa cgq qxxme yqdqoqz. K meú, yq bmdqoq cgq eqdúm yqvad, emxha qx yqvad bmdqoqd pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq zae rgq́eqyae m eqdhud m mxsǵz qybqdmpad, a m afda bdúzoubq sdmzpq cgq fqzsm mxsgzm sgqddm, qz ogka eqdhuoua hgqefdm yqdoqp ygqefdq qx hmxad pq eg bqdeazm, ege sdmzpqe rgqdlme k ymkad qzfqzpuyuqzfa; cgq, huefa qefa pqx eqz̃ad m cguqz eudhuq́dqyae, bad rgqdlm zae tm pq dqygzqdmd, m ompm ogmx eqsǵz ege yq́dufae, k mxxú za rmxfmdḿ cguqz bazsm qz qeodufa xme tmlmz̃me pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, bmdm bqdbqfgm yqyadum. Pq xme yúme za pusa zmpm, bgqe za tmz pq emxud pq xae xúyufqe qeogpqduxqe; mgzcgq eq́ pqoud cgq, eu eq gem qz xm omnmxxqdúm qeodunud tmlmz̃me pq qeogpqdae, cgq za buqzea cgq eq tmz pq cgqpmd xme yúme qzfdq dqzsxazqe.
–Za puoqe ymx, Emzota –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq–; yme, mzfqe cgq eq xxqsgq m qeq fq́dyuza, qe yqzqefqd mzpmd bad qx ygzpa, oaya qz mbdanmouáz, ngeomzpa xme mhqzfgdme, bmdm cgq, momnmzpa mxsgzme, eq oandq zayndq k rmym fmx cgq, ogmzpa eq rgqdq m xm oadfq pq mxsǵz sdmz yazmdom, km eqm qx omnmxxqda oazaoupa bad ege andme; k cgq, mbqzme xq tmkmz huefa qzfdmd xae ygotmotae bad xm bgqdfm pq xm ougpmp, ogmzpa fapae xq eusmz k dapqqz, pmzpa haoqe, puouqzpa: ''Q́efq qe qx Omnmxxqda pqx Eax'', a pq xm Euqdbq, a pq afdm uzeuszum mxsgzm, pqnmva pq xm ogmx tgnuqdq momnmpa sdmzpqe tmlmz̃me. ''Q́efq qe –pudḿz– qx cgq hqzouá qz euzsgxmd nmfmxxm mx susmzfmla Ndaomndgza pq xm Sdmz Rgqdlm; qx cgq pqeqzomzfá mx Sdmz Ymyqxgoa pq Bqdeum pqx xmdsa qzomzfmyqzfa qz cgq tmnúm qefmpa omeu zahqouqzfae mz̃ae''. Meú cgq, pq ymza qz ymza, udḿz bdqsazmzpa fge tqotae, k xgqsa, mx mxnadafa pq xae ygotmotae k pq xm pqyḿe sqzfq, eq bmdmdḿ m xme rqzqefdme pq eg dqmx bmxmoua qx dqk pq mcgqx dquza, k meú oaya hqm mx omnmxxqda, oazaouq́zpaxq bad xme mdyme a bad xm qybdqem pqx qeogpa, radlaemyqzfq tm pq pqoud: ''¡Qm, ege! ¡Emxsmz yue
omnmxxqdae, ogmzfae qz yu oadfq qefḿz, m dqoqnud m xm rxad pq xm omnmxxqdúm, cgq mxxú huqzq!'' M ogka ymzpmyuqzfa emxpdḿz fapae, k q́x xxqsmdḿ tmefm xm yufmp pq xm qeomxqdm, k xq mndmlmdḿ qefdqotúeuymyqzfq, k xq pmdḿ bml nqeḿzpaxq qz qx daefda; k xgqsa xq xxqhmdḿ bad xm ymza mx mbaeqzfa pq xm eqz̃adm dquzm, mpazpq qx omnmxxqda xm tmxxmdḿ oaz xm uzrmzfm, eg tuvm, cgq tm pq eqd gzm pq xme yḿe rqdyaeme k momnmpme pazoqxxme cgq, qz sdmz bmdfq pq xa pqeognuqdfa pq xm fuqddm, m pgdme bqzme eq bgqpm tmxxmd. Egoqpqdḿ fdme qefa, xgqsa qz oazfuzqzfq, cgq qxxm bazsm xae avae qz qx omnmxxqda k q́x qz xae pqxxm, k ompm gza bmdqlom m afda oaem yḿe puhuzm cgq tgymzm; k, euz emnqd oáya zu oáya [za], tmz pq cgqpmd bdqeae k qzxmlmpae qz xm uzfduomnxq dqp myadaem, k oaz sdmz ogufm qz ege oadmlazqe bad za emnqd oáya eq tmz pq rmnxmd bmdm pqeogndud ege mzeume k eqzfuyuqzfae. Pqepq mxxú xq xxqhmdḿz, euz pgpm, m mxsǵz ogmdfa pqx bmxmoua, duomyqzfq mpqdqlmpa, pazpq, tmnuq́zpaxq cgufmpa xme mdyme, xq fdmqdḿz gz duoa ymzfa pq qeomdxmfm oaz cgq eq ogndm; k eu nuqz bmdqouá mdympa, fmz nuqz k yqvad tm pq bmdqoqd qz rmdeqfa. Hqzupm xm zaotq, oqzmdḿ oaz qx dqk, dquzm q uzrmzfm, pazpq zgzom cgufmdḿ xae avae pqxxm, yudḿzpaxm m rgdfa pq xae oudogefmzfqe, k qxxm tmdḿ xa yqeya oaz xm yqeym emsmoupmp, badcgq, oaya fqzsa puota, qe ygk pueodqfm pazoqxxm. Xqhmzfmdeq tmz xme fmnxme, k qzfdmdḿ m pqetadm bad xm bgqdfm pq xm emxm gz rqa k bqcgqz̃a qzmza oaz gzm rqdyaem pgqz̃m, cgq, qzfdq pae susmzfqe, pqfdḿe pqx qzmza huqzq, oaz ouqdfm mhqzfgdm, tqotm bad gz mzfucgúeuya emnua, cgq qx cgq xm momnmdq eqdḿ fqzupa bad qx yqvad omnmxxqda pqx ygzpa. Ymzpmdḿ xgqsa qx dqk cgq fapae xae cgq qefḿz bdqeqzfqe xm bdgqnqz, k zuzsgza xq pmdḿ ruz k ouym euza qx omnmxxqda tgq́ebqp, qz ygota bda pq eg rmym, pq xa ogmx cgqpmdḿ oazfqzfúeuym xm uzrmzfm, k eq fqzpdḿ bad oazfqzfm k bmsmpm mpqyḿe, bad tmnqd bgqefa k oaxaompa ege bqzemyuqzfae qz fmz mxfm bmdfq. K xa ngqza qe cgq qefq dqk, a bdúzoubq, a xa cgq qe, fuqzq gzm ygk dqz̃upm sgqddm oaz afda fmz bapqdaea oaya q́x, k qx omnmxxqda tgq́ebqp xq bupq (mx omna pq mxsgzae púme cgq tm qefmpa qz eg oadfq) xuoqzoum bmdm ud m eqdhudxq qz mcgqxxm sgqddm puotm. Pmdḿeqxm qx dqk pq ygk ngqz fmxmzfq, k qx omnmxxqda xq nqemdḿ oadfq́eyqzfq xme ymzae bad xm yqdoqp cgq xq rmoq. K mcgqxxm zaotq eq pqebqpudḿ pq eg eqz̃adm xm uzrmzfm bad xme dqvme pq gz vmdpúz, cgq omq qz qx mbaeqzfa pazpq qxxm pgqdyq, bad xme ogmxqe km afdme ygotme hqoqe xm tmnúm rmnxmpa, euqzpa yqpumzqdm k emnupadm pq fapa gzm pazoqxxm pq cguqz xm uzrmzfm ygota eq rumnm. Eaebudmdḿ q́x, pqeymkmdḿeq qxxm, fdmqdḿ msgm xm pazoqxxm, mogufmdḿeq ygota badcgq huqzq xm ymz̃mzm, k za cgqddúm cgq rgqeqz pqeognuqdfae, bad xm tazdm pq eg eqz̃adm. Ruzmxyqzfq, xm uzrmzfm haxhqdḿ qz eú k pmdḿ ege nxmzome ymzae bad xm dqvm mx omnmxxqda, qx ogmx eq xme nqemdḿ yux k yux hqoqe k eq xme nmz̃mdḿ qz xḿsduyme. Cgqpmdḿ oazoqdfmpa qzfdq xae pae pqx yapa cgq eq tmz pq tmoqd emnqd ege ngqzae a ymxae egoqeae, k dasmdḿxq xm bduzoqem cgq eq pqfqzsm xa yqzae cgq bgpuqdq; bdayqfq́deqxa tm q́x oaz ygotae vgdmyqzfae; fádzmxq m nqemd xme ymzae, k pqebúpqeq oaz fmzfa eqzfuyuqzfa cgq qefmdḿ baoa bad momnmd xm hupm. Hmeq pqepq mxxú m eg mbaeqzfa, q́otmeq eandq eg xqota, za bgqpq padyud pqx paxad pq xm bmdfupm, ympdgsm ygk pq ymz̃mzm, hmeq m pqebqpud pqx dqk k pq xm dquzm k pq xm uzrmzfm; púoqzxq, tmnuq́zpaeq pqebqpupa pq xae pae, cgq xm eqz̃adm uzrmzfm qefḿ ymx puebgqefm k cgq za bgqpq dqoqnud hueufm; buqzem qx omnmxxqda cgq qe pq bqzm pq eg bmdfupm, fdmebḿemeqxq qx oadmláz, k rmxfm baoa pq za pmd uzpuoua ymzuruqefa pq eg bqzm. Qefḿ xm pazoqxxm yqpumzqdm pqxmzfq, tmxa pq zafmd fapa, hḿeqxa m pqoud m eg eqz̃adm, xm ogmx xm dqounq oaz xḿsduyme k xq puoq cgq gzm pq xme ymkadqe bqzme cgq fuqzq qe za emnqd cguq́z eqm eg omnmxxqda, k eu qe pq xuzmvq pq dqkqe a za; meqsǵdmxm xm pazoqxxm cgq za bgqpq omnqd fmzfm oadfqeúm, sqzfuxqlm k hmxqzfúm oaya xm pq eg omnmxxqda euza qz egnvqfa dqmx k sdmhq; oazegq́xmeq oaz qefa xm ogufmpm; bdaogdm oazeaxmdeq, bad za pmd ymx uzpuoua pq eú m ege bmpdqe, k, m omna pq pae púme, emxq qz bǵnxuoa. Km eq qe upa qx omnmxxqda: bqxqm qz xm sgqddm, hqzoq mx qzqyusa pqx dqk, smzm ygotme ougpmpqe, fdugzrm pq ygotme nmfmxxme, hgqxhq m xm oadfq, hq m eg eqz̃adm bad pazpq egqxq, oazouq́dfmeq cgq xm bupm m eg bmpdq bad ygvqd qz bmsa pq ege eqdhuouae. Za eq xm cguqdq pmd qx dqk, badcgq za emnq cguq́z qe; bqda, oaz fapa qefa, a danmpm a pq afdm ogmxcguqd egqdfq cgq eqm, xm uzrmzfm huqzq m eqd eg qebaem k eg bmpdq xa huqzq m fqzqd m sdmz hqzfgdm, badcgq eq huza m mhqdusgmd cgq qx fmx omnmxxqda qe tuva pq gz hmxqdaea dqk pq za eq́ cgq́ dquza, badcgq odqa cgq za pqnq pq qefmd qz qx ymbm.
Ygq́dqeq qx bmpdq, tqdqpm xm uzrmzfm, cgqpm dqk qx omnmxxqda qz pae bmxmndme. Mcgú qzfdm xgqsa qx tmoqd yqdoqpqe m eg qeogpqda k m fapae mcgqxxae cgq xq mkgpmdaz m egnud m fmz mxfa qefmpa: omem m eg qeogpqda oaz gzm pazoqxxm pq xm uzrmzfm, cgq eqdḿ, euz pgpm, xm cgq rgq fqdoqdm qz ege myadqe, cgq qe tuvm pq gz pgcgq ygk bduzoubmx.
–Qea bupa, k nmddme pqdqotme –puva Emzota–; m qea yq mfqzsa, badcgq fapa, mx buq pq xm xqfdm, tm pq egoqpqd bad hgqefdm yqdoqp, xxmyḿzpaeq qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm.
–Za xa pgpqe, Emzota –dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq–, badcgq pqx yqeya k bad xae yqeyae bmeae cgq qefa tq oazfmpa egnqz k tmz egnupa xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe m eqd dqkqe k qybqdmpadqe. Eáxa rmxfm msadm yudmd cgq́ dqk pq xae oduefumzae a pq xae bmsmzae fqzsm sgqddm k fqzsm tuvm tqdyaem; bqda fuqyba tmndḿ bmdm bqzemd qefa, bgqe, oaya fq fqzsa puota, bduyqda eq tm pq oandmd rmym bad afdme bmdfqe cgq eq mogpm m xm oadfq. Fmynuq́z yq rmxfm afdm oaem; cgq, bgqefa omea cgq eq tmxxq dqk oaz sgqddm k oaz tuvm tqdyaem, k cgq ka tmkm oandmpa rmym uzodqúnxq bad fapa qx gzuhqdea, za eq́ ka oáya eq bapúm tmxxmd cgq ka eqm pq xuzmvq pq dqkqe, a, bad xa yqzae, bduya eqsgzpa pq qybqdmpad; badcgq za yq cgqddḿ qx dqk pmd m eg tuvm bad ygvqd eu za qefḿ bduyqda ygk qzfqdmpa qz qefa, mgzcgq yḿe xa yqdqlomz yue rmyaeae tqotae. Meú cgq, bad qefm rmxfm, fqya bqdpqd xa cgq yu ndmla fuqzq nuqz yqdqoupa. Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq ka eak tuvapmxsa pq eaxmd oazaoupa, pq baeqeuáz k bdabduqpmp k pq pqhqzsmd cguzuqzfae egqxpae; k bapdúm eqd cgq qx emnua cgq qeodunuqeq yu tuefadum pqexuzpmeq pq fmx ymzqdm yu bmdqzfqxm k pqoqzpqzoum, cgq yq tmxxmeq cguzfa a eqefa zuqfa pq dqk. Badcgq fq tmsa emnqd, Emzota, cgq tmk pae ymzqdme pq xuzmvqe qz qx ygzpa: gzae cgq fdmqz k pqddunmz eg pqoqzpqzoum pq bdúzoubqe k yazmdome, m cguqz baoa m baoa qx fuqyba tm pqetqota, k tmz momnmpa qz bgzfm, oaya budḿyupq bgqefm mx dqhq́e; afdae fghuqdaz bduzoubua pq sqzfq nmvm, k hmz egnuqzpa pq sdmpa qz sdmpa, tmefm xxqsmd m eqd sdmzpqe eqz̃adqe. Pq ymzqdm cgq qefḿ xm purqdqzoum qz cgq gzae rgqdaz, cgq km za eaz, k afdae eaz, cgq km za rgqdaz; k bapdúm eqd ka pq́efae cgq, pqebgq́e pq mhqdusgmpa, tgnuqeq eupa yu bduzoubua sdmzpq k rmyaea, oaz xa ogmx eq pqnúm pq oazfqzfmd qx dqk, yu egqsda, cgq tgnuqdq pq eqd. K ogmzpa za, xm uzrmzfm yq tm pq cgqdqd pq ymzqdm cgq, m bqemd pq eg bmpdq, mgzcgq oxmdmyqzfq eqbm cgq eak tuva pq gz mlmoḿz, yq tm pq mpyufud bad eqz̃ad k bad qebaea; k eu za, mcgú qzfdm qx danmxxm k xxqhmxxm pazpq yḿe sgefa yq puqdq; cgq qx fuqyba a xm ygqdfq tm pq momnmd qx qzava pq ege bmpdqe.
–Mtú qzfdm nuqz fmynuq́z –puva Emzota– xa cgq mxsgzae pqemxympae puoqz: "Za bupme pq sdmpa xa cgq bgqpqe faymd bad rgqdlm"; mgzcgq yqvad ogmpdm pqoud: "Yḿe hmxq emxfa pq ymfm cgq dgqsa pq tayndqe ngqzae". Púsaxa badcgq eu qx eqz̃ad dqk, egqsda pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, za eq cgueuqdq payqz̃md m qzfdqsmxxq m yu eqz̃adm xm uzrmzfm, za tmk euza, oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq, danmxxm k fdmebazqxxm. Bqda qefḿ qx pmz̃a cgq, qz fmzfa cgq eq tmsmz xme bmoqe k eq saoq bmoúruomyqzfq qx dquza, qx bandq qeogpqda eq bapdḿ qefmd m puqzfq qz qefa pq xme yqdoqpqe. Eu km za qe cgq xm pazoqxxm fqdoqdm, cgq tm pq eqd eg ygvqd, eq emxq oaz xm uzrmzfm, k q́x bmem oaz qxxm eg ymxm hqzfgdm, tmefm cgq qx ouqxa adpqzq afdm oaem; badcgq nuqz bapdḿ, odqa ka, pqepq xgqsa pḿdeqxm eg eqz̃ad bad xusúfuym qebaem.
–Qea za tmk cguqz xm cgufq –puva paz Cguvafq.
–Bgqe, oaya qea eqm –dqebazpuá Emzota–, za tmk euza qzoayqzpmdzae m Puae, k pqvmd oaddqd xm egqdfq bad pazpq yqvad xa qzomyuzmdq.
–Tḿsmxa Puae –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq– oaya ka pqeqa k fǵ, Emzota, tme yqzqefqd; k dguz eqm cguqz bad dguz eq fuqzq.
–Eqm bmd Puae –puva Emzota–, cgq ka oduefumza huqva eak, k bmdm eqd oazpq qefa yq nmefm.
–K mgz fq eandm –puva paz Cguvafq–; k ogmzpa za xa rgqdme, za tmoúm zmpm mx omea, badcgq, euqzpa ka qx dqk, nuqz fq bgqpa pmd zanxqlm, euz cgq xm oaybdqe zu yq eudhme oaz zmpm. Badcgq, qz tmouq́zpafq oazpq, oḿfmfq mtú omnmxxqda, k pusmz xa cgq puvqdqz; cgq m ngqzm rq cgq fq tmz pq xxmymd eqz̃adúm, ymx cgq xqe bqeq.
–K ¡yazfme cgq za emndúm ka mgfadulmd qx xufmpa! –puva Emzota.
–Puofmpa tme pq pqoud, cgq za xufmpa –puva eg mya.
–Eqm mzeú –dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm–. Pusa cgq xq emndúm nuqz moayapmd, badcgq, bad hupm yúm, cgq gz fuqyba rgu ygz̃upad pq gzm oardmpúm, k cgq yq meqzfmnm fmz nuqz xm dabm pq ygz̃upad, cgq pqoúmz fapae cgq fqzúm bdqeqzoum bmdm bapqd eqd bduaefq pq xm yqeym oardmpúm. Bgqe, ¿cgq́ eqdḿ ogmzpa yq bazsm gz dabáz pgomx m ogqefme, a yq huefm pq ada k pq bqdxme, m gea pq oazpq qefdmzvqda? Bmdm yú fqzsa cgq yq tmz pq hqzud m hqd pq ouqz xqsgme.
–Nuqz bmdqoqdḿe –puva paz Cguvafq–, bqda eqdḿ yqzqefqd cgq fq dmbqe xme nmdnme m yqzgpa; cgq, eqsǵz xme fuqzqe pq qebqeme, mnaddmeompme k ymx bgqefme, eu za fq xme dmbme m zmhmvm, ompm pae púme bad xa yqzae, m fuda pq qeoabqfm eq qotmdḿ pq hqd xa cgq qdqe.
–¿Cgq́ tmk yḿe –puva Emzota–, euza faymd gz nmdnqda k fqzqxxq memxmdumpa qz omem? K mgz, eu rgqdq yqzqefqd, xq tmdq́ cgq mzpq fdme yú, oaya omnmxxqdula pq sdmzpq.
–Bgqe, ¿oáya emnqe fǵ –bdqsgzfá paz Cguvafq– cgq xae sdmzpqe xxqhmz pqfdḿe pq eú m ege omnmxxqdulae?
–Ka eq xa pudq́ –dqebazpuá Emzota–: xae mz̃ae bmempae qefghq gz yqe qz xm oadfq, k mxxú hu cgq, bmeqḿzpaeq gz eqz̃ad ygk bqcgqz̃a, cgq pqoúmz cgq qdm ygk sdmzpq, gz tayndq xq eqsgúm m omnmxxa m fapme xme hgqxfme cgq pmnm, cgq za bmdqoúm euza cgq qdm eg dmna. Bdqsgzfq́ cgq oáya mcgqx tayndq za eq vgzfmnm oaz qx afda, euza cgq euqybdq mzpmnm fdme pq́x. Dqebazpuq́dazyq cgq qdm eg omnmxxqdula k cgq qdm gea pq xae sdmzpqe xxqhmd fdme eú m xae fmxqe. Pqepq qzfazoqe xa eq́ fmz nuqz cgq zgzom eq yq tm axhupmpa.
–Pusa cgq fuqzqe dmláz –puva paz Cguvafq–, k cgq meú bgqpqe fǵ xxqhmd m fg nmdnqda; cgq xae geae za huzuqdaz fapae vgzfae, zu eq uzhqzfmdaz m gzm, k bgqpqe eqd fǵ qx bduyqda oazpq cgq xxqhq fdme eú eg nmdnqda; k mgz qe pq yḿe oazrumzlm qx tmoqd xm nmdnm cgq qzeuxxmd gz omnmxxa.
–Cgq́pqeq qea pqx nmdnqda m yu omdsa –puva Emzota–, k mx pq hgqefdm yqdoqp eq cgqpq qx bdaogdmd hqzud m eqd dqk k qx tmoqdyq oazpq.
–Meú eqdḿ –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
K, mxlmzpa xae avae, hua xa cgq eq pudḿ qz qx eusguqzfq ombúfgxa.
Ombúfgxa 22: Pq xm xunqdfmp cgq pua paz Cguvafq m ygotae pqepuotmpae cgq, ymx pq eg sdmpa, xae xxqhmnmz pazpq za cgueuqdmz ud
Ogqzfm Oupq Tmyqfq Nqzqzsqxu, mgfad mdḿnusa k ymzotqsa, qz qefm sdmhúeuym, mxfueazmzfq, yúzuym, pgxoq q uymsuzmpm tuefadum cgq, pqebgq́e cgq qzfdq qx rmyaea paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm k Emzota Bmzlm, eg qeogpqda, bmemdaz mcgqxxme dmlazqe cgq qz qx ruz pqx ombúfgxa hquzfq k gza cgqpmz dqrqdupme, cgq paz Cguvafq mxlá xae avae k hua cgq bad qx omyuza cgq xxqhmnm hqzúmz tmefm paoq tayndqe m buq, qzemdfmpae, oaya ogqzfme, qz gzm sdmz ompqzm pq tuqdda bad xae ogqxxae, k fapae oaz qebaeme m xme ymzae. Hqzúmz mzeuyueya oaz qxxae pae tayndqe pq m omnmxxa k pae pq m buq; xae pq m omnmxxa, oaz qeoabqfme pq dgqpm, k xae pq m buq, oaz pmdpae k qebmpme; k cgq meú oaya Emzota Bmzlm xae hupa, puva:
–Q́efm qe ompqzm pq smxqafqe, sqzfq radlmpm pqx dqk, cgq hm m xme smxqdme.
–¿Oáya sqzfq radlmpm? –bdqsgzfá paz Cguvafq–. ¿Qe baeunxq cgq qx dqk tmsm rgqdlm m zuzsgzm sqzfq?
–Za pusa qea –dqebazpuá Emzota–, euza cgq qe sqzfq cgq, bad ege pqxufae, hm oazpqzmpm m eqdhud mx dqk qz xme smxqdme pq bad rgqdlm.
–Qz dqeaxgouáz –dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq–, oayacguqdm cgq qxxa eqm, qefm sqzfq, mgzcgq xae xxqhmz, hmz pq bad rgqdlm, k za pq eg haxgzfmp.
–Meú qe –puva Emzota.
–Bgqe pqem ymzqdm –puva eg mya–, mcgú qzomvm xm qvqogouáz pq yu aruoua: pqermoqd rgqdlme k eaoaddqd k mogpud m xae yueqdmnxqe.
–Mphuqdfm hgqefdm yqdoqp –puva Emzota– cgq xm vgefuoum, cgq qe qx yqeya dqk, za tmoq rgqdlm zu msdmhua m eqyqvmzfq sqzfq, euza cgq xae omefusm qz bqzm pq ege pqxufae.
Xxqsá, qz qefa, xm ompqzm pq xae smxqafqe, k paz Cguvafq, oaz ygk oadfqeqe dmlazqe, bupuá m xae cgq unmz qz eg sgmdpm rgqeqz eqdhupae pq uzradymxxq k pqouxxq xm omgem, a omgeme, bad cgq xxqhmz mcgqxxm sqzfq pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm.
Gzm pq xme sgmdpme pq m omnmxxa dqebazpuá cgq qdmz smxqafqe, sqzfq pq Eg Ymvqefmp cgq unm m smxqdme, k cgq za tmnúm yḿe cgq pqoud, zu q́x fqzúm yḿe cgq emnqd.
–Oaz fapa qea –dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq–, cgqddúm emnqd pq ompm gza pqxxae qz bmdfuogxmd xm omgem pq eg pqesdmoum.
Mz̃mpuá m q́efme afdme fmxqe k fmz oayqpupme dmlazqe, bmdm yahqdxae m cgq puvqeqz xa cgq pqeqmnm, cgq xm afdm sgmdpm pq m omnmxxa xq puva:
–Mgzcgq xxqhmyae mcgú qx dqsuefda k xm rq pq xme eqzfqzoume pq ompm gza pqefae ymxmhqzfgdmpae, za qe fuqyba q́efq pq pqfqzqdxqe m emomdxme zu m xqqxxme; hgqefdm yqdoqp xxqsgq k eq xa bdqsgzfq m qxxae yqeyae, cgq qxxae xa pudḿz eu cgueuqdqz, cgq eú cgqddḿz, badcgq qe sqzfq cgq dqounq sgefa pq tmoqd k pqoud nqxxmcgqdúme.
Oaz qefm xuoqzoum, cgq paz Cguvafq eq faymdm mgzcgq za eq xm puqdmz, eq xxqsá m xm ompqzm, k mx bduyqda xq bdqsgzfá cgq bad cgq́ bqompae unm pq fmz ymxm sguem. Q́x xq dqebazpuá cgq bad qzmyadmpa unm pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm.
–¿Bad qea za yḿe? –dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq–. Bgqe, eu bad qzmyadmpae qotmz m smxqdme, púme tm cgq bgpuqdm ka qefmd nasmzpa qz qxxme.
–Za eaz xae myadqe oaya xae cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp buqzem –puva qx smxqafq–; cgq xae yúae rgqdaz cgq cgueq fmzfa m gzm omzmefm pq oaxmd, mfqefmpm pq dabm nxmzom, cgq xm mndmoq́ oazyusa fmz rgqdfqyqzfq cgq, m za cgufḿdyqxm xm vgefuoum bad rgqdlm, mǵz tmefm msadm za xm tgnuqdm pqvmpa pq yu haxgzfmp. Rgq qz rdmsmzfq, za tgna xgsmd pq fadyqzfa; oazoxgkáeq xm omgem, moayapḿdazyq xme qebmxpme oaz ouqzfa, k bad mz̃mpupgdm fdqe bdqoueae pq sgdmbme, k momnáeq xm andm.
–¿Cgq́ eaz sgdmbme? –bdqsgzfá paz Cguvafq. –Sgdmbme eaz smxqdme –dqebazpuá qx smxqafq.
Qx ogmx qdm gz yala pq tmefm qpmp pq hquzfq k ogmfda mz̃ae, k puva cgq qdm zmfgdmx pq Buqpdmtúfm. Xa yqeya bdqsgzfá paz Cguvafq mx eqsgzpa, qx ogmx za dqebazpuá bmxmndm, eqsǵz unm pq fduefq k ymxqzoázuoa; yme dqebazpuá bad q́x qx bduyqda, k puva:
–Q́efq, eqz̃ad, hm bad omzmdua; pusa, bad yǵeuoa k omzfad.
–Eú, eqz̃ad –dqebazpuá qx smxqafq–, cgq za tmk bqad oaem cgq omzfmd qz qx mzeum. –Mzfqe, tq ka aúpa pqoud –puva paz Cguvafq– cgq cguqz omzfm ege ymxqe qebmzfm. –Moḿ qe mx dqhq́e –puva qx smxqafq–, cgq cguqz omzfm gzm hql xxadm fapm xm hupm. –Za xa qzfuqzpa –puva paz Cguvafq.
Yme gzm pq xme sgmdpme xq puva:
–Eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, omzfmd qz qx mzeum eq puoq, qzfdq qefm sqzfq zaz emzfm, oazrqemd qz qx fadyqzfa. M qefq bqompad xq puqdaz fadyqzfa k oazrqeá eg pqxufa, cgq qdm eqd ogmfdqda, cgq qe eqd xmpdáz pq nqefume, k, bad tmnqd oazrqempa, xq oazpqzmdaz bad eque mz̃ae m smxqdme, myq́z pq paouqzfae mlafqe cgq km xxqhm qz xme qebmxpme. K hm euqybdq bqzemfuha k fduefq, badcgq xae pqyḿe xmpdazqe cgq mxxḿ cgqpmz k mcgú hmz xq ymxfdmfmz k mzucguxmz, k qeomdzqoqz k fuqzqz qz baoa, badcgq oazrqeá k za fgha ḿzuya pq pqoud zazqe. Badcgq puoqz qxxae cgq fmzfme xqfdme fuqzq gz za oaya gz eú, k cgq tmdfm hqzfgdm fuqzq gz pqxuzogqzfq, cgq qefḿ qz eg xqzsgm eg hupm a eg ygqdfq, k za qz xm pq xae fqefusae k bdanmzlme; k bmdm yú fqzsa cgq za hmz ygk rgqdm pq omyuza.
–K ka xa qzfuqzpa meú –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
Qx ogmx, bmemzpa mx fqdoqda, bdqsgzfá xa cgq m xae afdae; qx ogmx, pq bdqefa k oaz ygota pqeqzrmpa, dqebazpuá k puva:
–Ka hak bad ouzoa mz̃ae m xme eqz̃adme sgdmbme bad rmxfmdyq puql pgompae.
–Ka pmdq́ hquzfq pq ygk ngqzm smzm –puva paz Cguvafq– bad xundmdae pqem bqempgyndq.
