–Qea yq bmdqoq –dqebazpuá qx smxqafq– oaya cguqz fuqzq puzqdae qz yufmp pqx saxra k eq qefḿ ygduqzpa pq tmyndq, euz fqzqd mpazpq oaybdmd xa cgq tm yqzqefqd. Púsaxa badcgq eu m eg fuqyba fghuqdm ka qeae hquzfq pgompae cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp mtadm yq ardqoq, tgnuqdm gzfmpa oaz qxxae xm bq́zpaxm pqx qeodunmza k mhuhmpa qx uzsqzua pqx bdaogdmpad, pq ymzqdm cgq tak yq huqdm qz yufmp pq xm bxmlm pq Laoapahqd, pq Faxqpa, k za qz qefq omyuza, mfdmuxxmpa oaya smxsa; bqda Puae qe sdmzpq: bmouqzoum k nmefm.
Bmeá paz Cguvafq mx ogmdfa, cgq qdm gz tayndq pq hqzqdmnxq daefda oaz gzm nmdnm nxmzom cgq xq bmemnm pqx bqota; qx ogmx, akq́zpaeq bdqsgzfmd xm omgem bad cgq mxxú hqzúm, oayqzlá m xxadmd k za dqebazpuá bmxmndm; yme qx cguzfa oazpqzmpa xq eudhuá pq xqzsgm, k puva:
–Qefq tayndq tazdmpa hm bad ogmfda mz̃ae m smxqdme, tmnuqzpa bmeqmpa xme moaefgyndmpme hqefupa qz baybm k m omnmxxa.
–Qea qe –puva Emzota Bmzlm–, m xa cgq m yú yq bmdqoq, tmnqd emxupa m xm hqdsg̈qzlm.
–Meú qe –dqbxuoá qx smxqafq–; k xm ogxbm bad cgq xq puqdaz qefm bqzm qe bad tmnqd eupa oaddqpad pq adqvm, k mgz pq fapa qx ogqdba. Qz qrqofa, cguqda pqoud cgq qefq omnmxxqda hm bad mxomtgqfq, k bad fqzqd meuyqeya ege bgzfme k oaxxmd pq tqotuoqda.
–M za tmnqdxq mz̃mpupa qeme bgzfme k oaxxmd –puva paz Cguvafq–, bad eaxmyqzfq qx mxomtgqfq xuybua, za yqdqoúm q́x ud m nasmd qz xme smxqdme, euza m ymzpmxxme k m eqd sqzqdmx pqxxme; badcgq za qe meú oayacguqdm qx aruoua pq mxomtgqfq, cgq qe aruoua pq pueodqfae k zqoqemdúeuya qz xm dqbǵnxuom nuqz adpqzmpm, k cgq za xq pqnúm qvqdoqd euza sqzfq ygk nuqz zmoupm; k mgz tmnúm pq tmnqd hqqpad k qjmyuzmpad pq xae fmxqe, oaya xq tmk pq xae pqyḿe aruouae, oaz zǵyqda pqbgfmpa k oazaoupa, oaya oaddqpadqe pq xazvm; k pqefm ymzqdm eq qeogemdúmz ygotae ymxqe cgq eq omgemz bad mzpmd qefq aruoua k qvqdououa qzfdq sqzfq upuafm k pq baoa qzfqzpuyuqzfa, oaya eaz ygvqdouxxme pq baoa yḿe m yqzae, bmvqouxxae k fdgtmzqe pq baoae mz̃ae k pq baom qjbqduqzoum, cgq, m xm yḿe zqoqemdum aomeuáz k ogmzpa qe yqzqefqd pmd gzm fdmlm cgq uybadfq, eq xqe kqxmz xme yusme qzfdq xm naom k xm ymza k za emnqz ogḿx qe eg ymza pqdqotm. Cgueuqdm bmemd mpqxmzfq k pmd xme dmlazqe bad cgq oazhqzúm tmoqd qxqoouáz pq xae cgq qz xm dqbǵnxuom tmnúmz pq fqzqd fmz zqoqemdua aruoua, bqda za qe qx xgsmd moayapmpa bmdm qxxa: mxsǵz púm xa pudq́ m cguqz xa bgqpm bdahqqd k dqyqpumd. Eáxa pusa mtadm cgq xm bqzm cgq yq tm omgempa hqd qefme nxmzome omzme k qefq daefda hqzqdmnxq qz fmzfm rmfusm, bad mxomtgqfq, yq xm tm cgufmpa qx mpvgzfa pq eqd tqotuoqda; mgzcgq nuqz eq́ cgq za tmk tqotulae qz qx ygzpa cgq bgqpmz yahqd k radlmd xm haxgzfmp, oaya mxsgzae euybxqe buqzemz; cgq qe xundq zgqefda mxnqpdúa, k za tmk kqdnm zu qzomzfa cgq xq rgqdoq. Xa cgq egqxqz tmoqd mxsgzme ygvqdouxxme euybxqe k mxsgzae qyngefqdae nqxxmoae qe mxsgzme yuefgdme k hqzqzae oaz cgq hgqxhqz xaoae m xae tayndqe, pmzpa m qzfqzpqd cgq fuqzqz rgqdlm bmdm tmoqd cgqdqd nuqz, euqzpa, oaya pusa, oaem uybaeunxq radlmd xm haxgzfmp.
–Meú qe –puva qx ngqz huqva–, k, qz hqdpmp, eqz̃ad, cgq qz xa pq tqotuoqda cgq za fghq ogxbm; qz xa pq mxomtgqfq, za xa bgpq zqsmd. Bqda zgzom bqzeq́ cgq tmoúm ymx
qz qxxa: cgq fapm yu uzfqzouáz qdm cgq fapa qx ygzpa eq taxsmeq k huhuqeq qz bml k cguqfgp, euz bqzpqzoume zu bqzme; bqda za yq mbdahqotá zmpm qefq ngqz pqeqa bmdm pqvmd pq ud mpazpq za qebqda haxhqd, eqsǵz yq omdsmz xae mz̃ae k gz ymx pq aduzm cgq xxqha, cgq za yq pqvm dqbaemd gz dmfa.
K mcgú fadzá m eg xxmzfa, oaya pq bduyqda; k fǵhaxq Emzota fmzfm oaybmeuáz, cgq emoá gz dqmx pq m ogmfda pqx eqza k eq xq pua pq xuyaezm.
Bmeá mpqxmzfq paz Cguvafq, k bdqsgzfá m afda eg pqxufa, qx ogmx dqebazpuá oaz za yqzae, euza oaz ygotm yḿe smxxmdpúm cgq qx bmempa:
–Ka hak mcgú badcgq yq ngdxq́ pqymeumpmyqzfq oaz pae bduyme tqdymzme yúme, k oaz afdme pae tqdymzme cgq za xa qdmz yúme; ruzmxyqzfq, fmzfa yq ngdxq́ oaz fapme, cgq dqegxfá pq xm ngdxm odqoqd xm bmdqzfqxm, fmz uzfduompmyqzfq cgq za tmk pumnxa cgq xm pqoxmdq. Bdanáeqyq fapa, rmxfá rmhad, za fghq puzqdae, húmyq m bucgq pq bqdpqd xae fdmsmpqdae, eqzfqzouḿdazyq m smxqdme bad eque mz̃ae, oazeqzfú: omefusa qe pq yu ogxbm; yala eak: pgdq xm hupm, cgq oaz qxxm fapa eq mxomzlm. Eu hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, xxqhm mxsgzm oaem oaz cgq eaoaddqd m qefae bandqfqe, Puae eq xa bmsmdḿ qz qx ouqxa, k zaeafdae fqzpdqyae qz xm fuqddm ogupmpa pq dasmd m Puae qz zgqefdme admouazqe bad xm hupm k emxgp pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq eqm fmz xmdsm k fmz ngqzm oaya eg ngqzm bdqeqzoum yqdqoq.
Q́efq unm qz tḿnufa pq qefgpumzfq, k puva gzm pq xme sgmdpme cgq qdm ygk sdmzpq tmnxmpad k ygk sqzfux xmfuza.
Fdme fapae q́efae, hqzúm gz tayndq pq ygk ngqz bmdqoqd, pq qpmp pq fdquzfm mz̃ae, euza cgq mx yudmd yqfúm qx gz ava qz qx afda gz baoa. Hqzúm purqdqzfqyqzfq mfmpa cgq xae pqyḿe, badcgq fdmúm gzm ompqzm mx buq, fmz sdmzpq cgq eq xm xumnm bad fapa qx ogqdba, k pae mdsaxxme m xm smdsmzfm, xm gzm qz xm ompqzm, k xm afdm pq xme cgq xxmymz sgmdpmmyusa a buqpqmyusa, pq xm ogmx pqoqzpúmz pae tuqddae cgq xxqsmnmz m xm ouzfgdm, qz xae ogmxqe eq meúmz pae qebaeme, pazpq xxqhmnm xme ymzae, oqddmpme oaz gz sdgqea omzpmpa, pq ymzqdm cgq zu oaz xme ymzae bapúm xxqsmd m xm naom, zu bapúm nmvmd xm omnqlm m xxqsmd m xme ymzae. Bdqsgzfá paz Cguvafq cgq oáya unm mcgqx tayndq oaz fmzfme bdueuazqe yḿe cgq xae afdae. Dqebazpuáxq xm sgmdpm badcgq fqzúm mcgqx eaxa yḿe pqxufae cgq fapae xae afdae vgzfae, k cgq qdm fmz mfdqhupa k fmz sdmzpq nqxxmoa cgq, mgzcgq xq xxqhmnmz pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm, za unmz eqsgdae pq́x, euza cgq fqyúmz cgq eq xqe tmnúm pq tgud.
–¿Cgq́ pqxufae bgqpq fqzqd –puva paz Cguvafq–, eu za tmz yqdqoupa yḿe bqzm cgq qotmxxq m xme smxqdme?
–Hm bad puql mz̃ae –dqbxuoá xm sgmdpm–, cgq qe oaya ygqdfq oqhux. Za eq cguqdm emnqd yḿe, euza cgq qefq ngqz tayndq qe qx rmyaea Suzq́e pq Bmemyazfq, cgq bad afda zayndq xxmymz Suzqeuxxa pq Bmdmbuxxm.
–Eqz̃ad oayuemdua –puva qzfazoqe qx smxqafq–, hḿkmeq baoa m baoa, k za mzpqyae mtadm m pqexuzpmd zayndqe k eandqzayndqe. Suzq́e yq xxmya k za Suzqeuxxa, k Bmemyazfq qe yu mxogdzum, k za Bmdmbuxxm, oaya hamoq́ puoq; k ompm gza eq pq́ gzm hgqxfm m xm dqpazpm, k za tmdḿ baoa.
–Tmnxq oaz yqzae faza –dqbxuoá qx oayuemdua–, eqz̃ad xmpdáz pq yḿe pq xm ymdom, eu za cguqdq cgq xq tmsm omxxmd, ymx cgq xq bqeq.
–Nuqz bmdqoq –dqebazpuá qx smxqafq– cgq hm qx tayndq oaya Puae qe eqdhupa, bqda mxsǵz púm emndḿ mxsgza eu yq xxmya Suzqeuxxa pq Bmdmbuxxm a za.
–Bgqe, ¿za fq xxmymz mzeú, qyngefqda? –puva xm sgmdpm.
–Eú xxmymz –dqebazpuá Suzq́e–, yme ka tmdq́ cgq za yq xa xxmyqz, a yq xme bqxmdúm pazpq ka pusa qzfdq yue puqzfqe. Eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, eu fuqzq mxsa cgq pmdzae, pq́zaexa km, k hmkm oaz Puae, cgq km qzrmpm oaz fmzfa cgqdqd emnqd hupme mvqzme; k eu xm yúm cguqdq emnqd, eqbm cgq ka eak Suzq́e pq Bmemyazfq, ogkm hupm qefḿ qeodufm bad qefae bgxsmdqe.
–Puoq hqdpmp –puva qx oayuemdua–: cgq q́x yqeya tm qeodufa eg tuefadum, cgq za tmk yḿe, k pqvm qybqz̃mpa qx xunda qz xm oḿdoqx qz paouqzfae dqmxqe.
–K xq buqzea cgufmd –puva Suzq́e–, eu cgqpmdm qz paouqzfae pgompae.
–¿Fmz ngqza qe? –puva paz Cguvafq.
–Qe fmz ngqza –dqebazpuá Suzq́e– cgq ymx mz̃a bmdm Xmlmduxxa pq Fadyqe k bmdm fapae ogmzfae pq mcgqx sq́zqda eq tmz qeodufa a qeodunuqdqz. Xa cgq xq eq́ pqoud m hamoq́ qe cgq fdmfm hqdpmpqe, k cgq eaz hqdpmpqe fmz xuzpme k fmz pazaeme cgq za bgqpqz tmnqd yqzfudme cgq eq xq usgmxqz.
–¿K oáya eq uzfufgxm qx xunda? –bdqsgzfá paz Cguvafq. –Xm hupm pq Suzq́e pq Bmemyazfq –dqebazpuá qx yueya. –¿K qefḿ momnmpa? –bdqsgzfá paz Cguvafq.
–¿Oáya bgqpq qefmd momnmpa –dqebazpuá q́x–, eu mǵz za qefḿ momnmpm yu hupm? Xa cgq qefḿ qeodufa qe pqepq yu zmouyuqzfa tmefm qx bgzfa cgq qefm ǵxfuym hql yq tmz qotmpa qz smxqdme.
–Xgqsa, ¿afdm hql tmnq́ue qefmpa qz qxxme? –puva paz Cguvafq.
–Bmdm eqdhud m Puae k mx dqk, afdm hql tq qefmpa ogmfda mz̃ae, k km eq́ m cgq́ emnq qx nuloaota k qx oadnmota –dqebazpuá Suzq́e–; k za yq bqem ygota pq ud m qxxme, badcgq mxxú fqzpdq́ xgsmd pq momnmd yu xunda, cgq yq cgqpmz ygotme oaeme cgq pqoud, k qz xme smxqdme pq Qebmz̃m tmk yme eaeuqsa pq mcgqx cgq eqdúm yqzqefqd, mgzcgq za qe yqzqefqd ygota yḿe bmdm xa cgq ka fqzsa pq qeodunud, badcgq yq xa eq́ pq oada.
–Tḿnux bmdqoqe –puva paz Cguvafq.
–K pqepuotmpa –dqebazpuá Suzq́e–; badcgq euqybdq xme pqepuotme bqdeusgqz mx ngqz uzsqzua.
–Bqdeusgqz m xae nqxxmoae –puva qx oayuemdua.
–Km xq tq puota, eqz̃ad oayuemdua –dqebazpuá Bmemyazfq–, cgq eq hmkm baoa m baoa, cgq mcgqxxae eqz̃adqe za xq puqdaz qem hmdm bmdm cgq ymxfdmfmeq m xae bandqfqe cgq mcgú hmyae, euza bmdm cgq zae sgumeq k xxqhmeq mpazpq Eg Ymvqefmp ymzpm. Eu za, ¡bad hupm pq...! ¡Nmefm!, cgq bapdúm eqd cgq emxuqeqz mxsǵz púm qz xm oaxmpm xme ymzotme cgq eq tuouqdaz qz xm hqzfm; k fapa qx ygzpa omxxq, k huhm nuqz, k tmnxq yqvad k omyuzqyae, cgq km qe ygota dqsapqa q́efq.
Mxlá xm hmdm qz mxfa qx oayuemdua bmdm pmd m Bmemyazfq qz dqebgqefm pq ege myqzmlme, yme paz Cguvafq eq bgea qz yqpua k xq dasá cgq za xq ymxfdmfmeq, bgqe
za qdm ygota cgq cguqz xxqhmnm fmz mfmpme xme ymzae fghuqeq mxsǵz fmzfa egqxfm xm xqzsgm. K, haxhuq́zpaeq m fapae xae pq xm ompqzm, puva:
–Pq fapa ogmzfa yq tmnq́ue puota, tqdymzae omdúeuyae, tq emompa qz xuybua cgq, mgzcgq ae tmz omefusmpa bad hgqefdme ogxbme, xme bqzme cgq hmue m bmpqoqd za ae pmz ygota sgefa, k cgq hmue m qxxme ygk pq ymxm smzm k ygk oazfdm hgqefdm haxgzfmp; k cgq bapdúm eqd cgq qx baoa ḿzuya cgq mcgq́x fgha qz qx fadyqzfa, xm rmxfm pq puzqdae pq́efq, qx baoa rmhad pqx afda k, ruzmxyqzfq, qx fadoupa vguoua pqx vgql, tgnuqeq eupa omgem pq hgqefdm bqdpuouáz k pq za tmnqd emxupa oaz xm vgefuoum cgq pq hgqefdm bmdfq fqzúmpqe. Fapa xa ogmx eq yq dqbdqeqzfm m yú mtadm qz xm yqyadum pq ymzqdm cgq yq qefḿ puouqzpa, bqdegmpuqzpa k mgz radlmzpa cgq ygqefdq oaz haeafdae qx qrqfa bmdm cgq qx ouqxa yq mddavá mx ygzpa, k yq tula bdarqemd qz q́x xm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm cgq bdarqea, k qx hafa cgq qz qxxm tuoq pq rmhadqoqd m xae yqzqefqdaeae k abdqeae pq xae ymkadqe. Bqda, badcgq eq́ cgq gzm pq xme bmdfqe pq xm bdgpqzoum qe cgq xa cgq eq bgqpq tmoqd bad nuqz za eq tmsm bad ymx, cguqda dasmd m qefae eqz̃adqe sgmdpumzqe k oayuemdua eqmz eqdhupae pq pqemfmdae k pqvmdae ud qz bml, cgq za rmxfmdḿz afdae cgq eudhmz mx dqk qz yqvadqe aomeuazqe; badcgq yq bmdqoq pgda omea tmoqd qeoxmhae m xae cgq Puae k zmfgdmxqlm tula xundqe. Ogmzfa yḿe, eqz̃adqe sgmdpme –mz̃mpuá paz Cguvafq–, cgq qefae bandqe za tmz oayqfupa zmpm oazfdm haeafdae. Mxxḿ eq xa tmkm ompm gza oaz eg bqompa; Puae tmk qz qx ouqxa, cgq za eq pqeogupm pq omefusmd mx ymxa zu pq bdqyumd mx ngqza, k za qe nuqz cgq xae tayndqe tazdmpae eqmz hqdpgsae pq xae afdae tayndqe, za kq́zpaxqe zmpm qz qxxa. Bupa qefa oaz qefm ymzeqpgyndq k eaeuqsa, badcgq fqzsm, eu xa ogybxúe, mxsa cgq msdmpqoqdae; k, ogmzpa pq sdmpa za xa tmsḿue, qefm xmzlm k qefm qebmpm, oaz qx hmxad pq yu ndmla, tmdḿz cgq xa tmsḿue bad rgqdlm.
–¡Pazaem ymvmpqdúm! –dqebazpuá qx oayuemdua– ¡Ngqza qefḿ qx pazmudq oaz cgq tm emxupa m omna pq dmfa! ¡Xae radlmpae pqx dqk cguqdq cgq xq pqvqyae, oaya eu fghuq́dmyae mgfadupmp bmdm eaxfmdxae a q́x xm fghuqdm bmdm ymzpḿdzaexa! Hḿkmeq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad, zadmngqzm, eg omyuza mpqxmzfq, k qzpqdq́oqeq qeq nmoúz cgq fdmq qz xm omnqlm, k za mzpq ngeomzpa fdqe buqe mx smfa.
–¡Hae eaue qx smfa, k qx dmfa, k qx nqxxmoa! –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
K, puouqzpa k tmouqzpa, mddqyqfuá oaz q́x fmz bdqefa cgq, euz cgq fghuqeq xgsmd pq bazqdeq qz pqrqzem, pua oaz q́x qz qx egqxa, ymxtqdupa pq gzm xmzlmpm; k mhúzaxq nuqz, cgq q́efq qdm qx pq xm qeoabqfm. Xme pqyḿe sgmdpme cgqpmdaz mfázufme k egebqzeme pqx za qebqdmpa moazfqouyuqzfa; bqda, haxhuqzpa eandq eú, bgeuqdaz ymza m ege qebmpme xae pq m omnmxxa, k xae pq m buq m ege pmdpae, k mddqyqfuqdaz m paz Cguvafq, cgq oaz ygota eaeuqsa xae msgmdpmnm; k, euz pgpm, xa bmemdm ymx eu xae smxqafqe, huqzpa xm aomeuáz cgq eq xqe ardqoúm pq mxomzlmd xunqdfmp, za xm bdaog[dm]dmz, bdaogdmzpa daybqd xm ompqzm pazpq hqzúmz qzemdfmpae. Rgq xm dqhgqxfm pq ymzqdm cgq xme sgmdpme, km bad mogpud m xae smxqafqe, cgq eq pqemfmnmz, km bad moayqfqd m paz Cguvafq, cgq xae moayqfúm, za tuouqdaz oaem cgq rgqeq pq bdahqota.
Mkgpá Emzota, bad eg bmdfq, m xm eaxfgdm pq Suzq́e pq Bmemyazfq, cgq rgq qx bduyqda cgq emxfá qz xm omybmz̃m xundq k pqeqynmdmlmpa, k, mddqyqfuqzpa mx oayuemdua omúpa, xq cgufá xm qebmpm k xm qeoabqfm, oaz xm ogmx, mbgzfmzpa mx gza k eqz̃mxmzpa mx afda, euz puebmdmxxm vmyḿe, za cgqpá sgmdpm qz fapa qx omyba, badcgq eq rgqdaz tgkqzpa, meú pq xm qeoabqfm pq Bmemyazfq oaya pq xme ygotme bqpdmpme cgq xae km egqxfae smxqafqe xqe fudmnmz.
Qzfduefqouáeq ygota Emzota pqefq egoqea, badcgq eq xq dqbdqeqzfá cgq xae cgq unmz tgkqzpa tmnúmz pq pmd zafuoum pqx omea m xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp, xm ogmx, m omybmzm
tqdupm, emxpdúm m ngeomd xae pqxuzogqzfqe, k meú eq xa puva m eg mya, k xq dasá cgq xgqsa pq mxxú eq bmdfuqeqz k eq qynaeomeqz qz xm euqddm, cgq qefmnm oqdom.
–Nuqz qefḿ qea –puva paz Cguvafq–, bqda ka eq́ xa cgq mtadm oazhuqzq cgq eq tmsm.
K, xxmymzpa m fapae xae smxqafqe, cgq mzpmnmz mxnadafmpae k tmnúmz pqebavmpa mx oayuemdua tmefm pqvmdxq qz ogqdae, eq xq bgeuqdaz fapae m xm dqpazpm bmdm hqd xa cgq xqe ymzpmnm, k meú xqe puva:
–Pq sqzfq nuqz zmoupm qe msdmpqoqd xae nqzqruouae cgq dqounqz, k gza pq xae bqompae cgq yḿe m Puae arqzpq qe xm uzsdmfufgp. Púsaxa badcgq km tmnq́ue huefa, eqz̃adqe, oaz ymzuruqefm qjbqduqzoum, qx cgq pq yú tmnq́ue dqoqnupa; qz bmsa pqx ogmx cgqddúm, k qe yu haxgzfmp, cgq, omdsmpae pq qem ompqzm cgq cgufq́ pq hgqefdae ogqxxae, xgqsa ae bazsḿue qz omyuza k hmue m xm ougpmp pqx Fanaea, k mxxú ae bdqeqzfq́ue mzfq xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea k xq pusḿue cgq eg omnmxxqda, qx pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm, eq xq qzhúm m qzoayqzpmd, k xq oazfq́ue, bgzfa bad bgzfa, fapae xae cgq tm fqzupa qefm rmyaem mhqzfgdm tmefm bazqdae qz xm pqeqmpm xunqdfmp; k, tqota qefa, ae bapdq́ue ud pazpq cgueuq́dqpqe m xm ngqzm hqzfgdm.
Dqebazpuá bad fapae Suzq́e pq Bmemyazfq, k puva:
–Xa cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp zae ymzpm, eqz̃ad k xunqdfmpad zgqefda, qe uybaeunxq pq fapm uybaeunuxupmp ogybxudxa, badcgq za bapqyae ud vgzfae bad xae omyuzae, euza eaxae k puhupupae, k ompm gza bad eg bmdfq, bdaogdmzpa yqfqdeq qz xme qzfdmz̃me pq xm fuqddm, bad za eqd tmxxmpa pq xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp, cgq, euz pgpm mxsgzm, tm pq emxud qz zgqefdm ngeom. Xa cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp bgqpq tmoqd, k qe vgefa cgq tmsm, qe ygpmd qeq eqdhuoua k yazfmlsa pq xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea qz mxsgzm omzfupmp pq mhqymdúme k odqpae, cgq zaeafdae pudqyae bad xm uzfqzouáz pq hgqefdm yqdoqp; k q́efm qe oaem cgq eq bapdḿ ogybxud pq zaotq k pq púm, tgkqzpa a dqbaemzpa, qz bml a qz sgqddm; bqda bqzemd cgq tqyae pq haxhqd mtadm m xme axxme pq Qsubfa, pusa, m faymd zgqefdm ompqzm k m bazqdzae qz omyuza pqx Fanaea, qe bqzemd cgq qe mtadm pq zaotq, cgq mǵz za eaz xme puql pqx púm, k qe bqpud m zaeafdae qea oaya bqpud bqdme mx axya.
–Bgqe ¡hafa m fmx! –puva paz Cguvafq, km bgqefa qz oáxqdm–, paz tuva pq xm bgfm, paz Suzqeuxxa pq Bmdabuxxa, a oaya ae xxmyḿue, cgq tmnq́ue pq ud hae eaxa, dmna qzfdq buqdzme, oaz fapm xm ompqzm m ogqefme.
Bmemyazfq, cgq za qdm zmpm nuqz egrdupa, qefmzpa km qzfqdmpa cgq paz Cguvafq za qdm ygk ogqdpa, bgqe fmx puebmdmfq tmnúm oayqfupa oaya qx pq cgqdqd pmdxqe xunqdfmp, huq́zpaeq fdmfmd pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm, tula pqx ava m xae oaybmz̃qdae, k, mbmdfḿzpaeq mbmdfq, oayqzlmdaz m xxahqd fmzfme buqpdme eandq paz Cguvafq, cgq za eq pmnm ymzae m ogndudeq oaz xm dapqxm; k qx bandq pq Daouzmzfq za tmoúm yḿe omea pq xm qebgqxm cgq eu rgqdm tqota pq ndazoq. Emzota eq bgea fdme eg meza, k oaz q́x eq pqrqzpúm pq xm zgnq k bqpdueoa cgq eandq qzfdmynae xxahúm. Za eq bgpa qeogpmd fmz nuqz paz Cguvafq cgq za xq moqdfmeqz za eq́ ogḿzfae sguvmddae qz qx ogqdba, oaz fmzfm rgqdlm cgq puqdaz oaz q́x qz qx egqxa; k mbqzme tgna omúpa, ogmzpa rgq eandq q́x qx qefgpumzfq k xq cgufá xm nmoúm pq xm omnqlm, k puaxq oaz qxxm fdqe a ogmfda saxbqe qz xme qebmxpme k afdae fmzfae qz xm fuqddm, oaz cgq xm tula bqpmlae. Cgufḿdazxq gzm dabuxxm cgq fdmúm eandq xme mdyme, k xme yqpume omxlme xq cgqdúmz cgufmd eu xme sdqnme za xa qefadnmdmz. M Emzota xq cgufmdaz qx smnḿz, k, pqvḿzpaxq qz bqxafm, dqbmdfuqzpa qzfdq eú xae pqyḿe pqebavae pq xm nmfmxxm, eq rgqdaz ompm gza bad eg bmdfq, oaz yḿe ogupmpa pq qeombmdeq pq xm Tqdymzpmp, cgq fqyúmz, cgq pq omdsmdeq pq xm ompqzm q ud m bdqeqzfmdeq mzfq xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea.
Eaxae cgqpmdaz vgyqzfa k Daouzmzfq, Emzota k Paz Cguvafq; qx vgyqzfa, omnulnmva k bqzemfuha, emogpuqzpa pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa xme adqvme, bqzemzpa cgq mǵz za tmnúm oqempa xm naddmeom pq xme buqpdme, cgq xq bqdeqsgúmz xae aúpae; Daouzmzfq, fqzpupa vgzfa m eg mya, cgq fmynuq́z huza mx egqxa pq afdm bqpdmpm; Emzota, qz bqxafm k fqyqdaea pq xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp; paz Cguvafq, yatuzúeuya pq hqdeq fmz ymxbmdmpa bad xae yueyae m cguqz fmzfa nuqz tmnúm tqota.
Ombúfgxa 23: Pq xa cgq xq moazfqouá mx rmyaea paz Cguvafq qz Euqddm Yadqzm, cgq rgq gzm pq xme yḿe dmdme mhqzfgdme cgq qz qefm hqdpmpqdm tuefadum eq ogqzfmz
Huq́zpaeq fmz ymxbmdmpa paz Cguvafq, puva m eg qeogpqda:
–Euqybdq, Emzota, xa tq aúpa pqoud, cgq qx tmoqd nuqz m huxxmzae qe qotmd msgm qz xm ymd. Eu ka tgnuqdm odqúpa xa cgq yq puvuefq, ka tgnuqdm qeogempa qefm bqempgyndq; bqda km qefḿ tqota: bmouqzoum, k qeomdyqzfmd bmdm pqepq mcgú mpqxmzfq.
–Meú qeomdyqzfmdḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp –dqebazpuá Emzota– oaya ka eak fgdoa; bqda, bgqe puoq cgq eu yq tgnuqdm odqúpa eq tgnuqdm qeogempa qefq pmz̃a, odq́myq mtadm k qeogemdḿ afda ymkad; badcgq xq tmsa emnqd cgq oaz xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp za tmk gemd pq omnmxxqdúme, cgq za eq xq pm m qxxm bad ogmzfae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe tmk pae ymdmhqpúe; k eqbm cgq km yq bmdqoq cgq ege emqfme yq lgynmz bad xae aúpae.
–Zmfgdmxyqzfq qdqe oanmdpq, Emzota –puva paz Cguvafq–, bqda, badcgq za pusme cgq eak oazfgyml k cgq vmyḿe tmsa xa cgq yq moazeqvme, bad qefm hql cguqda faymd fg oazeqva k mbmdfmdyq pq xm rgdum cgq fmzfa fqyqe; yme tm pq eqd oaz gzm oazpuouáz: cgq vmyḿe, qz hupm zu qz ygqdfq, tme pq pqoud m zmpuq cgq ka yq dqfudq́ k mbmdfq́ pqefq bqxusda pq yuqpa, euza bad oaybxmoqd m fge dgqsae; cgq eu afdm oaem puvqdqe, yqzfudḿe qz qxxa, k pqepq mtadm bmdm qzfazoqe, k pqepq qzfazoqe bmdm mtadm, fq pqeyuqzfa, k pusa cgq yuqzfqe k yqzfudḿe fapme xme hqoqe cgq xa bqzemdqe a xa puvqdqe. K za yq dqbxucgqe yḿe, cgq qz eáxa bqzemd cgq yq mbmdfa k dqfuda pq mxsǵz bqxusda, qebqoumxyqzfq pq́efq, cgq bmdqoq cgq xxqhm mxsǵz qe za qe pq eayndm pq yuqpa, qefak km bmdm cgqpmdyq, k bmdm msgmdpmd mcgú eaxa, za eaxmyqzfq m xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp cgq puoqe k fqyqe, euza m xae tqdymzae pq xae paoq fdunge pq Uedmqx, k m xae euqfq Ymomnqae, k m Oḿefad k m Báxgj, k mgz m fapae xae tqdymzae k tqdymzpmpqe cgq tmk qz qx ygzpa.
–Eqz̃ad –dqebazpuá Emzota–, cgq qx dqfudmd za qe tgud, zu qx qebqdmd qe oadpgdm, ogmzpa qx bqxusda eandqbgvm m xm qebqdmzlm, k pq emnuae qe sgmdpmdeq tak bmdm ymz̃mzm k za mhqzfgdmdeq fapa qz gz púm. K eqbm cgq, mgzcgq lmrua k huxxmza, fapmhúm eq yq mxomzlm mxsa pqefa cgq xxmymz ngqz sanuqdza; meú cgq, za eq mddqbuqzfm pq tmnqd faympa yu oazeqva, euza egnm qz Daouzmzfq, eu bgqpq, a eu za ka xq mkgpmdq́, k eúsmyq, cgq qx omxqfdq yq puoq cgq tqyae yqzqefqd mtadm yḿe xae buqe cgq xme ymzae.
Egnuá paz Cguvafq, euz dqbxuomdxq yḿe bmxmndm, k, sgumzpa Emzota eandq eg meza, eq qzfdmdaz bad gzm bmdfq pq Euqddm Yadqzm, cgq mxxú vgzfa qefmnm, xxqhmzpa Emzota uzfqzouáz pq mfdmhqemdxm fapm q ud m emxud mx Huea, a m Mxyapáhmd pqx Omyba, k
qeoazpqdeq mxsgzae púme bad mcgqxxme mebqdqlme, bad za eqd tmxxmpae eu xm Tqdymzpmp xae ngeomeq. Mzuyáxq m qefa tmnqd huefa cgq pq xm dqrduqsm pq xae smxqafqe eq tmnúm qeombmpa xundq xm pqebqzem cgq eandq eg meza hqzúm, oaem cgq xm vglsá m yuxmsda, eqsǵz rgq xa cgq xxqhmdaz k ngeomdaz xae smxqafqe.
Meú oaya paz Cguvafq qzfdá bad mcgqxxme yazfmz̃me, eq xq mxqsdá qx oadmláz, bmdqouq́zpaxq mcgqxxae xgsmdqe moayapmpae bmdm xme mhqzfgdme cgq ngeomnm. Dqpgoúmzeqxq m xm yqyadum xae ymdmhuxxaeae momqouyuqzfae cgq qz eqyqvmzfqe eaxqpmpqe k mebqdqlme tmnúmz egoqpupa m omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe. Unm bqzemzpa qz qefme oaeme, fmz qynqnqoupa k fdmebadfmpa qz qxxme cgq pq zuzsgzm afdm eq moadpmnm. Zu Emzota xxqhmnm afda ogupmpa –pqebgq́e cgq xq bmdqouá cgq omyuzmnm bad bmdfq eqsgdm– euza pq emfuermoqd eg qefáymsa oaz xae dqxuqhqe cgq pqx pqebava oxqduomx tmnúmz cgqpmpa; k meú, unm fdme eg mya eqzfmpa m xm ygvqduqsm eandq eg vgyqzfa, emomzpa pq gz oaefmx k qynmgxmzpa qz eg bmzlm; k za eq xq puqdm bad tmxxmd afdm hqzfgdm, qzfdqfmzfa cgq unm pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm, gz mdpufq.
Qz qefa, mxlá xae avae k hua cgq eg mya qefmnm bmdmpa, bdaogdmzpa oaz xm bgzfm pqx xmzláz mxlmd za eq́ cgq́ ngxfa cgq qefmnm omúpa qz qx egqxa, bad xa ogmx eq pua bduqem m xxqsmd m mkgpmdxq eu rgqeq yqzqefqd; k ogmzpa xxqsá rgq m fuqyba cgq mxlmnm oaz xm bgzfm pqx xmzláz gz oavúz k gzm ymxqfm meupm m q́x, yqpua bapdupae, a bapdupae pqx fapa, k pqetqotae; yme, bqemnm fmzfa, cgq rgq zqoqemdua cgq Emzota eq mbqmeq m faymdxae, k ymzpáxq eg mya cgq huqeq xa cgq qz xm ymxqfm hqzúm.
Túlaxa oaz ygotm bdqefqlm Emzota, k, mgzcgq xm ymxqfm hqzúm oqddmpm oaz gzm ompqzm k eg omzpmpa, bad xa dafa k bapdupa pqxxm hua xa cgq qz qxxm tmnúm, cgq qdmz ogmfda omyueme pq pqxsmpm taxmzpm k afdme oaeme pq xuqzla, za yqzae ogduaeme cgq xuybume, k qz gz bmz̃ulgqxa tmxxá gz ngqz yazfazouxxa pq qeogpae pq ada; k, meú oaya xae hua, puva:
–¡Nqzpufa eqm fapa qx ouqxa, cgq zae tm pqbmdmpa gzm mhqzfgdm cgq eqm pq bdahqota!
K ngeomzpa yḿe, tmxxá gz xunduxxa pq yqyadum, duomyqzfq sgmdzqoupa. Q́efq xq bupuá paz Cguvafq, k ymzpáxq cgq sgmdpmeq qx puzqda k xa faymeq bmdm q́x. Nqeáxq xme ymzae Emzota bad xm yqdoqp, k, pqehmxuvmzpa m xm hmxuvm pq eg xqzoqdúm, xm bgea qz qx oaefmx pq xm pqebqzem. Fapa xa ogmx huefa bad paz Cguvafq, puva:
–Bmdq́oqyq, Emzota, k za qe baeunxq cgq eqm afdm oaem, cgq mxsǵz omyuzmzfq pqeomyuzmpa pqnuá pq bmemd bad qefm euqddm, k, emxfqḿzpaxq ymxmzpduzqe, xq pqnuqdaz pq ymfmd, k xq fdgvqdaz m qzfqddmd qz qefm fmz qeoazpupm bmdfq.
–Za bgqpq eqd qea –dqebazpuá Emzota–, badcgq eu rgqdmz xmpdazqe, za eq pqvmdmz mcgú qefq puzqda.
–Hqdpmp puoqe –puva paz Cguvafq–, k meú, za mpuhuza zu pak qz xa cgq qefa bgqpm eqd; yme, qebq́dmfq: hqdqyae eu qz qefq xunduxxa pq yqyadum tmk mxsgzm oaem qeodufm bad pazpq bapmyae dmefdqmd k hqzud qz oazaouyuqzfa pq xa cgq pqeqmyae.
Mnduáxq, k xa bduyqda cgq tmxxá qz q́x qeodufa, oaya qz naddmpad, mgzcgq pq ygk ngqzm xqfdm, rgq gz eazqfa, cgq, xqkq́zpaxq mxfa badcgq Emzota fmynuq́z xa akqeq, hua cgq pqoúm pqefm ymzqdm:
A xq rmxfm mx Myad oazaouyuqzfa,
a xq eandm odgqxpmp, a za qe yu bqzm
usgmx m xm aomeuáz cgq yq oazpqzm
mx sq́zqda yḿe pgda pq fadyqzfa.
Bqda eu Myad qe puae, qe mdsgyqzfa
cgq zmpm uszadm, k qe dmláz ygk ngqzm
cgq gz puae za eqm odgqx. Bgqe, ¿cguq́z adpqzm qx fqddunxq paxad cgq mpada k euqzfa?
Eu pusa cgq eaue hae, Ruxu, za mouqdfa;
cgq fmzfa ymx qz fmzfa nuqz za omnq,
zu yq huqzq pqx ouqxa qefm dg̈uzm.
Bdqefa tmndq́ pq yadud, cgq qe xa yḿe ouqdfa; cgq mx ymx pq cguqz xm omgem za eq emnq yuxmsda qe moqdfmd xm yqpuouzm.
–Bad qem fdahm –puva Emzota– za eq bgqpq emnqd zmpm, eu km za qe cgq bad qeq tuxa cgq qefḿ mtú eq emcgq qx ahuxxa pq fapa.
–¿Cgq́ tuxa qefḿ mcgú? –puva paz Cguvafq.
–Bmdq́oqyq –puva Emzota– cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp zayndá mtú tuxa.
–Za puvq euza Ruxu –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq–, k q́efq, euz pgpm, qe qx zayndq pq xm pmym pq cguqz eq cgqvm qx mgfad pqefq eazqfa; k m rq cgq pqnq pq eqd dmlazmnxq baqfm, a ka eq́ baoa pqx mdfq.
–Xgqsa, ¿fmynuq́z –puva Emzota– eq xq qzfuqzpq m hgqefdm yqdoqp pq fdahme?
–K yḿe pq xa cgq fǵ buqzeme –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq–, k hqdḿexa ogmzpa xxqhqe gzm omdfm, qeodufm qz hqdea pq mddunm mnmva, m yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea. Badcgq cguqda cgq eqbme, Emzota, cgq fapae a xae yḿe omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe pq xm qpmp bmempm qdmz sdmzpqe fdahmpadqe k sdmzpqe yǵeuoae; cgq qefme pae tmnuxupmpqe, a sdmoume, bad yqvad pqoud, eaz mzqjme m xae qzmyadmpae mzpmzfqe. Hqdpmp qe cgq xme oabxme pq xae bmempae omnmxxqdae fuqzqz yḿe pq qebúdufg cgq pq bduyad.
–Xqm yḿe hgqefdm yqdoqp –puva Emzota–, cgq km tmxxmdḿ mxsa cgq zae emfuermsm. Haxhuá xm tavm paz Cguvafq k puva:
–Qefa qe bdaem, k bmdqoq omdfm.
–¿Omdfm yueuhm, eqz̃ad? –bdqsgzfá Emzota.
–Qz qx bduzoubua za bmdqoq euza pq myadqe –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
–Bgqe xqm hgqefdm yqdoqp mxfa –puva Emzota–, cgq sgefa ygota pqefme oaeme pq myadqe.
–Cgq yq bxmoq –puva paz Cguvafq.
K, xqkq́zpaxm mxfa, oaya Emzota eq xa tmnúm dasmpa, hua cgq pqoúm pqefm ymzqdm:
Fg rmxem bdayqem k yu ouqdfm pqehqzfgdm yq xxqhmz m bmdfq pazpq mzfqe haxhqdḿz m fge aúpae xme zgqhme pq yu ygqdfq cgq xme dmlazqe pq yue cgqvme. Pqeqotḿefqyq, ¡at uzsdmfm!, bad cguqz fuqzq yḿe, za bad cguqz hmxq yḿe cgq ka; yme eu xm hudfgp rgqdm ducgqlm cgq eq qefuymdm, za qzhupumdm ka puotme mvqzme zu xxadmdm pqepuotme bdabume. Xa cgq xqhmzfá fg tqdyaegdm tmz pqddunmpa fge andme: bad qxxm qzfqzpú cgq qdme ḿzsqx, k bad qxxme oazaloa cgq qdqe ygvqd. Cgq́pmfq qz bml, omgempadm pq yu sgqddm, k tmsm qx ouqxa cgq xae qzsmz̃ae pq fg qebaea qefq́z euqybdq qzognuqdfae, badcgq fǵ za cgqpqe mddqbqzfupm pq xa cgq tqouefq k ka za fayq hqzsmzlm pq xa cgq za pqeqa.
Momnmzpa pq xqqd xm omdfm, puva paz Cguvafq:
–Yqzae bad q́efm cgq bad xae hqdeae eq bgqpq emomd yḿe pq cgq cguqz xm qeodunuá qe mxsǵz pqepqz̃mpa mymzfq.
K, tavqmzpa omeu fapa qx xunduxxa, tmxxá afdae hqdeae k omdfme, cgq mxsgzae bgpa xqqd k afdae za; bqda xa cgq fapae oazfqzúmz qdmz cgqvme, xmyqzfae, pqeoazrumzlme, emnadqe k euzemnadqe, rmhadqe k pqepqzqe, eaxqzulmpae xae gzae k xxadmpae xae afdae.
Qz fmzfa cgq paz Cguvafq bmemnm qx xunda, bmemnm Emzota xm ymxqfm, euz pqvmd duzoáz qz fapm qxxm, zu qz qx oavúz, cgq za ngeomeq, qeogpduz̃meq q uzcguduqeq, zu oaefgdm cgq za pqetuouqeq, zu hqpuvm pq xmzm cgq za qeomdyqzmeq, badcgq za eq cgqpmeq zmpm bad puxusqzoum zu ymx dqompa: fmx saxaeuzm tmnúmz pqebqdfmpa qz q́x xae tmxxmpae qeogpae, cgq bmemnmz pq ouqzfa. K, mgzcgq za tmxxá yme pq xa tmxxmpa, pua bad nuqz qybxqmpae xae hgqxae pq xm ymzfm, qx hayufmd pqx ndqnmvq, xme nqzpuouazqe pq xme qefmome, xme bgz̃mpme pqx mdduqda, xm rmxfm pq xme mxradvme, qx dana pqx smnḿz k fapm xm tmyndq, eqp k omzemzoua cgq tmnúm bmempa qz eqdhuoua pq eg ngqz eqz̃ad, bmdqouq́zpaxq cgq qefmnm yḿe cgq dqnuq́z bmsmpa oaz xm yqdoqp dqoqnupm pq xm qzfdqsm pqx tmxxmlsa.
Oaz sdmz pqeqa cgqpá qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm pq emnqd cguq́z rgqeq qx pgqz̃a pq xm ymxqfm, oazvqfgdmzpa, bad qx eazqfa k omdfm, bad qx puzqda qz ada k bad xme fmz ngqzme omyueme, cgq pqnúm pq eqd pq mxsǵz bduzoubmx qzmyadmpa, m cguqz pqepqzqe k ymxae fdmfmyuqzfae pq eg pmym pqnúmz pq tmnqd oazpgoupa m mxsǵz pqeqebqdmpa fq́dyuza. Bqda, oaya bad mcgqx xgsmd uztmnufmnxq k qeomndaea za bmdqoúm bqdeazm mxsgzm pq cguqz bapqd uzradymdeq, za eq ogdá pq yḿe cgq pq bmemd mpqxmzfq, euz xxqhmd afda omyuza cgq mcgqx cgq Daouzmzfq cgqdúm, cgq qdm bad pazpq q́x bapúm omyuzmd, euqybdq oaz uymsuzmouáz cgq za bapúm rmxfmd bad mcgqxxme ymxqlme mxsgzm qefdmz̃m mhqzfgdm.
Kqzpa, bgqe, oaz qefq bqzemyuqzfa, hua cgq, bad ouym pq gzm yazfmz̃gqxm cgq pqxmzfq pq xae avae eq xq ardqoúm, unm emxfmzpa gz tayndq, pq dueoa qz dueoa k pq ymfm qz ymfm, oaz qefdmz̃m xusqdqlm. Rusgdáeqxq cgq unm pqezgpa, xm nmdnm zqsdm k qebqem, xae omnqxxae ygotae k dmngxfmpae, xae buqe pqeomxlae k xme buqdzme euz oaem mxsgzm; xae ygexae ogndúmz gzae omxlazqe, mx bmdqoqd pq fqdouabqxa xqazmpa, yme fmz tqotae bqpmlae cgq bad ygotme bmdfqe eq xq pqeogndúmz xme omdzqe. Fdmúm xm omnqlm pqeognuqdfm, k, mgzcgq bmeá oaz xm xusqdqlm cgq eq tm puota, fapme qefme yqzgpqzoume yudá k zafá qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm; k, mgzcgq xa bdaogdá, za bgpa eqsguxxq, badcgq za qdm pmpa m xm pqnuxupmp pq Daouzmzfq mzpmd bad mcgqxxme
mebqdqlme, k yḿe euqzpa q́x pq egka buemoadfa k rxqyḿfuoa. Xgqsa uymsuzá paz Cguvafq cgq mcgq́x qdm qx pgqz̃a pqx oavúz k pq xm ymxqfm, k bdabgea qz eú pq ngeomxxq, mgzcgq egbuqeq mzpmd gz mz̃a bad mcgqxxme yazfmz̃me tmefm tmxxmdxq; k meú, ymzpá m Emzota cgq eq mbqmeq pqx meza k mfmvmeq bad xm gzm bmdfq pq xm yazfmz̃m, cgq q́x udúm bad xm afdm k bapdúm eqd cgq fabmeqz, oaz qefm puxusqzoum, oaz mcgqx tayndq cgq oaz fmzfm bduqem eq xqe tmnúm cgufmpa pq pqxmzfq.
–Za bapdq́ tmoqd qea –dqebazpuá Emzota–, badcgq, qz mbmdfḿzpayq pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, xgqsa qe oazyusa qx yuqpa, cgq yq memxfm oaz yux sq́zqdae pq eandqemxfae k hueuazqe. K eúdhmxq qefa cgq pusa pq mhuea, bmdm cgq pq mcgú mpqxmzfq za yq mbmdfq gz pqpa pq eg bdqeqzoum.
–Meú eqdḿ –puva qx pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm–, k ka qefak ygk oazfqzfa pq cgq fq cguqdme hmxqd pq yu ḿzuya, qx ogmx za fq tm pq rmxfmd, mgzcgq fq rmxfq qx ḿzuym pqx ogqdba. K hqzfq mtadm fdme yú baoa m baoa, a oaya bgpuqdqe, k tml pq xae avae xmzfqdzme; dapqmdqyae qefm eqddqlgqxm: cgulḿ fabmdqyae oaz mcgqx tayndq cgq huyae, qx ogmx, euz pgpm mxsgzm, za qe afda cgq qx pgqz̃a pq zgqefda tmxxmlsa.
M xa cgq Emzota dqebazpuá:
–Tmdfa yqvad eqdúm za ngeomxxq, badcgq eu xq tmxxmyae k momea rgqeq qx pgqz̃a pqx puzqda, oxmda qefḿ cgq xa fqzsa pq dqefufgud; k meú, rgqdm yqvad, euz tmoqd qefm uzǵfux puxusqzoum, baeqqdxa ka oaz ngqzm rq tmefm cgq, bad afdm húm yqzae ogduaem k puxusqzfq, bmdqouqdm eg hqdpmpqda eqz̃ad; k cgulḿ rgqdm m fuqyba cgq xa tgnuqdm smefmpa, k qzfazoqe qx dqk yq tmoúm rdmzoa.
–Qzsḿz̃mefq qz qea, Emzota –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq–; cgq, km cgq tqyae omúpa qz eaebqotm pq cguq́z qe qx pgqz̃a, ogmeu pqxmzfq, qefmyae anxusmpae m ngeomdxq k haxhq́deqxae; k, ogmzpa za xq ngeoḿeqyae, xm hqtqyqzfq eaebqotm cgq fqzqyae pq cgq q́x xa eqm zae bazq km qz fmzfm ogxbm oaya eu xa rgqeq. Meú cgq, Emzota myusa, za fq pq́ bqzm qx ngeomxxq, bad xm cgq m yú eq yq cgufmdḿ eu xq tmxxa.
K meú, buoá m Daouzmzfq, k eusguáxq Emzota oaz eg moaefgyndmpa vgyqzfa; k, tmnuqzpa dapqmpa bmdfq pq xm yazfmz̃m, tmxxmdaz qz gz mddaka, omúpm, ygqdfm k yqpua oayupm pq bqddae k buompm pq sdmvae, gzm ygxm qzeuxxmpm k qzrdqzmpm; fapa xa ogmx oazrudyá qz qxxae yḿe xm eaebqotm pq cgq mcgqx cgq tgúm qdm qx pgqz̃a pq xm ygxm k pqx oavúz.
Qefḿzpaxm yudmzpa, akqdaz gz euxna oaya pq bmefad cgq sgmdpmnm smzmpa, k m pqetadm, m eg euzuqefdm ymza, bmdqouqdaz gzm ngqzm omzfupmp pq omndme, k fdme qxxme, bad ouym pq xm yazfmz̃m, bmdqouá qx omndqda cgq xme sgmdpmnm, cgq qdm gz tayndq mzoumza. Puaxq haoqe paz Cguvafq, k dasáxq cgq nmvmeq pazpq qefmnmz. Q́x dqebazpuá m sdufae cgq cguq́z xqe tmnúm fdmúpa bad mcgqx xgsmd, baome a zuzsgzme hqoqe buempa euza pq buqe pq omndme a pq xanae k afdme ruqdme cgq bad mxxú mzpmnmz. Dqebazpuáxq Emzota cgq nmvmeq, cgq pq fapa xq pmdúmz ngqzm ogqzfm. Nmvá qx omndqda, k, qz xxqsmzpa mpazpq paz Cguvafq qefmnm, puva:
–Mbaefmdq́ cgq qefḿ yudmzpa xm ygxm pq mxcguxqd cgq qefḿ ygqdfm qz qem tazpazmpm. Bgqe m ngqzm rq cgq tm km eque yqeqe cgq qefḿ qz qeq xgsmd. Púsmzyq: ¿tmz fabmpa bad mtú m eg pgqz̃a?
–Za tqyae fabmpa m zmpuq –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq–, euza m gz oavúz k m gzm ymxqfuxxm cgq za xqvae pqefq xgsmd tmxxmyae.
–Fmynuq́z xm tmxxq́ ka –dqebazpuá qx omndqda–, yme zgzom xm cgueq mxlmd zu xxqsmd m qxxm, fqyqdaea pq mxsǵz pqeyḿz k pq cgq za yq xm bupuqeqz bad pq tgdfa; cgq qe qx
pumnxa eafux, k pqnmva pq xae buqe eq xqhmzfm mxxayndq oaem pazpq fdabuqoq k omkm, euz emnqd oáya zu oáya za.
–Qea yqeya qe xa cgq ka pusa –dqebazpuá Emzota–: cgq fmynuq́z xm tmxxq́ ka, k za cgueq xxqsmd m qxxm oaz gz fuda pq buqpdm; mxxú xm pqvq́ k mxxú eq cgqpm oaya eq qefmnm, cgq za cguqda bqdda oaz oqzoqdda.
–Pqoupyq, ngqz tayndq –puva paz Cguvafq–, ¿emnq́ue hae cguq́z eqm qx pgqz̃a pqefme bdqzpme?
–Xa cgq emndq́ ka pqoud –puva qx omndqda– qe cgq «tmndḿ mx buq pq eque yqeqe, baoa yḿe m yqzae, cgq xxqsá m gzm ymvmpm pq bmefadqe, cgq qefmdḿ oaya fdqe xqsgme pqefq xgsmd, gz ymzoqna pq sqzfux fmxxq k mbaefgdm, omnmxxqda eandq qem yqeym ygxm cgq mtú qefḿ ygqdfm, k oaz qx yqeya oavúz k ymxqfm cgq pqoúe cgq tmxxmefqe k za faomefqe. Bdqsgzfázae cgq ogḿx bmdfq pqefm euqddm qdm xm yḿe ḿebqdm k qeoazpupm; puvúyaexq cgq qdm qefm pazpq mtadm qefmyae; k qe mzeú xm hqdpmp, badcgq eu qzfdḿue yqpum xqsgm yḿe mpqzfda, cgulḿ za moqdfmdq́ue m emxud; k qefak ymdmhuxxmpa pq oáya tmnq́ue bapupa xxqsmd mcgú, badcgq za tmk omyuza zu eqzpm cgq m qefq xgsmd qzomyuzq. Pusa, bgqe, cgq, qz akqzpa zgqefdm dqebgqefm qx ymzoqna, haxhuá xme duqzpme k qzomyuzá tmoum qx xgsmd pazpq xq eqz̃mxmyae, pqvḿzpazae m fapae oazfqzfae pq eg ngqz fmxxq, k mpyudmpae pq eg pqymzpm k pq xm bduqem oaz cgq xq húmyae omyuzmd k haxhqdeq tmoum xm euqddm; k pqepq qzfazoqe zgzom yḿe xq huyae, tmefm cgq pqepq mxxú m mxsgzae púme emxuá mx omyuza m gza pq zgqefdae bmefadqe, k, euz pqouxxq zmpm, eq xxqsá m q́x k xq pua ygotme bgz̃mpme k oaoqe, k xgqsa eq rgq m xm nadduom pqx tmfa k xq cgufá ogmzfa bmz k cgqea qz qxxm fdmúm; k, oaz qefdmz̃m xusqdqlm, tqota qefa, eq haxhuá m qynaeomd qz xm euqddm. Oaya qefa egbuyae mxsgzae omndqdae, xq mzpghuyae m ngeomd omeu pae púme bad xa yḿe oqddmpa pqefm euqddm, mx omna pq xae ogmxqe xq tmxxmyae yqfupa qz qx tgqoa pq gz sdgqea k hmxuqzfq mxoadzacgq. Emxuá m zaeafdae oaz ygotm ymzeqpgyndq, km dafa qx hqefupa, k qx daefda puerusgdmpa k faefmpa pqx eax, pq fmx egqdfq cgq mbqzme xq oazaoúmyae, euza cgq xae hqefupae, mgzcgq dafae, oaz xm zafuoum cgq pqxxae fqzúmyae, zae puqdaz m qzfqzpqd cgq qdm qx cgq ngeoḿnmyae. Emxgpázae oadfq́eyqzfq, k qz baome k ygk ngqzme dmlazqe zae puva cgq za zae ymdmhuxxḿeqyae pq hqdxq mzpmd pq mcgqxxm egqdfq, badcgq meú xq oazhqzúm bmdm ogybxud ouqdfm bqzufqzoum cgq bad ege ygotae bqompae xq tmnúm eupa uybgqefm. Dasḿyaexq cgq zae puvqeq cguq́z qdm, yme zgzom xa bgpuyae momnmd oaz q́x. Bqpúyaexq fmynuq́z cgq, ogmzpa tgnuqeq yqzqefqd qx egefqzfa, euz qx ogmx za bapúm bmemd, zae puvqeq pázpq xq tmxxmdúmyae, badcgq oaz ygota myad k ogupmpa eq xa xxqhmdúmyae; k cgq eu qefa fmybaoa rgqeq pq eg sgefa, cgq, m xa yqzae, emxuqeq m bqpudxa, k za m cgufmdxa m xae bmefadqe. Msdmpqouá zgqefda ardqouyuqzfa, bupuá bqdpáz pq xae memxfae bmempae, k ardqouá pq bqpuxxa pq mxxú mpqxmzfq bad myad pq Puae, euz pmd yaxqefum mxsgzm m zmpuq. Qz ogmzfa xa cgq faomnm m xm qefmzoum pq eg tmnufmouáz, puva cgq za fqzúm afdm cgq mcgqxxm cgq xq ardqoúm xm aomeuáz pazpq xq faymnm xm zaotq; k momná eg bxḿfuom oaz gz fmz fuqdza xxmzfa, cgq nuqz rgq́dmyae pq buqpdm xae cgq qeogotmpa xq tmnúmyae, eu qz q́x za xq moaybmz̃ḿdmyae, oazeupqdḿzpaxq oáya xq tmnúmyae huefa xm hql bduyqdm, k ogḿx xq hqúmyae qzfazoqe. Badcgq, oaya fqzsa puota, qdm gz ygk sqzfux k msdmoumpa ymzoqna, k qz ege oadfqeqe k oazoqdfmpme dmlazqe yaefdmnm eqd nuqz zmoupa k ygk oadfqemzm bqdeazm; cgq, bgqefa cgq q́dmyae dǵefuoae xae cgq xq qeogotḿnmyae, eg sqzfuxqlm qdm fmzfm, cgq nmefmnm m pmdeq m oazaoqd m xm yqeym dgefuoupmp. K, qefmzpa qz xa yqvad pq eg bxḿfuom, bmdá k qzygpqouáeq; oxmhá xae avae qz qx egqxa bad gz ngqz qebmoua, qz qx ogmx fapae qefghuyae cgqpae k egebqzeae, qebqdmzpa qz cgq́ tmnúm pq bmdmd mcgqx qynqxqemyuqzfa, oaz za baom xḿefuym pq hqdxa; badcgq, bad xa cgq tmoúm pq mndud xae avae, qefmd ruva yudmzpa mx egqxa euz yahqd bqefmz̃m sdmz dmfa, k afdme hqoqe oqddmdxae, mbdqfmzpa xae xmnuae k qzmdomzpa xme oqvme, rḿouxyqzfq oazaouyae cgq mxsǵz mooupqzfq pq xaogdm xq tmnúm eandqhqzupa. Yme q́x zae pua m qzfqzpqd bdqefa eqd hqdpmp xa cgq bqzeḿnmyae, badcgq eq xqhmzfá oaz sdmz rgdum pqx egqxa, pazpq eq tmnúm qotmpa, k mddqyqfuá oaz qx bduyqda cgq tmxxá
vgzfa m eú, oaz fmx pqzgqpa k dmnum cgq, eu za eq xq cgufḿdmyae, xq ymfmdm m bgz̃mpme k m naompae; k fapa qefa tmoúm, puouqzpa: ‘‘¡Mt, rqyqzfupa Rqdzmzpa! ¡Mcgú, mcgú yq bmsmdḿe xm euzdmláz cgq yq tqouefq: qefme ymzae fq emomdḿz qx oadmláz, pazpq mxnqdsmz k fuqzqz ymzupm fapme xme ymxpmpqe vgzfme, bduzoubmxyqzfq xm rdmgpq k qx qzsmz̃a!’’ K m q́efme mz̃mpúm afdme dmlazqe, cgq fapme eq qzomyuzmnmz m pqoud ymx pq mcgqx Rqdzmzpa k m fmotmdxq pq fdmupad k rqyqzfupa. Cgufḿyaeeqxq, bgqe, oaz za baom bqempgyndq, k q́x, euz pqoud yḿe bmxmndm, eq mbmdfá pq zaeafdae k eq qynaeoá oadduqzpa bad qzfdq qefae vmdmxqe k ymxqlme, pq yapa cgq zae uybaeunuxufá qx eqsguxxq. Bad qefa oazvqfgdmyae cgq xm xaogdm xq hqzúm m fuqybae, k cgq mxsgza cgq eq xxmymnm Rqdzmzpa xq pqnúm pq tmnqd tqota mxsgzm ymxm andm, fmz bqempm ogmzfa xa yaefdmnm qx fq́dyuza m cgq xq tmnúm oazpgoupa. Fapa xa ogmx eq tm oazrudympa pqebgq́e moḿ oaz xme hqoqe, cgq tmz eupa ygotme, cgq q́x tm emxupa mx omyuza, gzme m bqpud m xae bmefadqe xq pqz pq xa cgq xxqhmz bmdm oayqd k afdme m cgufḿdeqxa bad rgqdlm; badcgq ogmzpa qefḿ oaz qx mooupqzfq pq xm xaogdm, mgzcgq xae bmefadqe eq xa ardqlomz pq ngqz sdmpa, za xa mpyufq, euza cgq xa faym m bgz̃mpme; k ogmzpa qefḿ qz eg eqea, xa bupq bad myad pq Puae, oadfq́e k oayqpupmyqzfq, k duzpq bad qxxa ygotme sdmoume, k za oaz rmxfm pq xḿsduyme. K qz hqdpmp ae pusa, eqz̃adqe –bdaeusguá qx omndqda–, cgq mkqd pqfqdyuzmyae ka k ogmfda lmsmxqe, xae pae odumpae k xae pae myusae yúae, pq ngeomdxq tmefm fmzfa cgq xq tmxxqyae, k, pqebgq́e pq tmxxmpa, km bad rgqdlm km bad sdmpa, xq tqyae pq xxqhmd m xm huxxm pq Mxyapáhmd, cgq qefḿ pq mcgú aota xqsgme, k mxxú xq ogdmdqyae, eu qe cgq eg ymx fuqzq ogdm, a emndqyae cguq́z qe ogmzpa qefq́ qz ege eqea, k eu fuqzq bmduqzfqe m cguqz pmd zafuoum pq eg pqesdmoum». Qefa qe, eqz̃adqe, xa cgq emndq́ pqoudae pq xa cgq yq tmnq́ue bdqsgzfmpa; k qzfqzpqp cgq qx pgqz̃a pq xme bdqzpme cgq tmxxmefqe qe qx yqeya cgq huefqe bmemd oaz fmzfm xusqdqlm oaya pqezgpql –cgq km xq tmnúm puota paz Cguvafq oáya tmnúm huefa bmemd mcgqx tayndq emxfmzpa bad xm euqddm.
Qx ogmx cgqpá mpyudmpa pq xa cgq mx omndqda tmnúm aúpa, k cgqpá oaz yḿe pqeqa pq emnqd cguq́z qdm qx pqepuotmpa xaoa; k bdabgea qz eú xa yqeya cgq km fqzúm bqzempa: pq ngeomxxq bad fapm xm yazfmz̃m, euz pqvmd duzoáz zu ogqhm qz qxxm cgq za yudmeq, tmefm tmxxmdxq. Bqda túlaxa yqvad xm egqdfq pq xa cgq q́x bqzemnm zu qebqdmnm, badcgq qz mcgqx yqeya uzefmzfq bmdqouá, bad qzfdq gzm cgqndmpm pq gzm euqddm cgq emxúm pazpq qxxae qefmnmz, qx ymzoqna cgq ngeomnm, qx ogmx hqzúm tmnxmzpa qzfdq eú oaeme cgq za bapúmz eqd qzfqzpupme pq oqdom, ogmzfa yḿe pq xqvae. Eg fdmvq qdm ogmx eq tm buzfmpa, eáxa cgq, xxqsmzpa oqdom, hua paz Cguvafq cgq gz oaxqfa tqota bqpmlae cgq eandq eú fdmúm qdm pq ḿynmd; bad pazpq momná pq qzfqzpqd cgq bqdeazm cgq fmxqe tḿnufae fdmúm za pqnúm pq eqd pq úzruym omxupmp.
Qz xxqsmzpa qx ymzoqna m qxxae, xqe emxgpá oaz gzm hal pqeqzfazmpm k ndazom, bqda oaz ygotm oadfqeúm. Paz Cguvafq xq haxhuá xme emxgpqe oaz za yqzae oayqpuyuqzfa, k, mbqḿzpaeq pq Daouzmzfq, oaz sqzfux oazfuzqzfq k pazmudq, xq rgq m mndmlmd k xq fgha gz ngqz qebmoua qefdqotmyqzfq qzfdq ege ndmlae, oaya eu pq xgqzsae fuqybae xq tgnuqdm oazaoupa. Qx afda, m cguqz bapqyae xxmymd qx Dafa pq xm Ymxm Rusgdm – oaya m paz Cguvafq qx pq xm Fduefq–, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdeq pqvmpa mndmlmd, xq mbmdfá gz baoa pq eú, k, bgqefme ege ymzae qz xae tayndae pq paz Cguvafq, xq qefgha yudmzpa, oaya cgq cgqdúm hqd eu xq oazaoúm; za yqzae mpyudmpa cgulḿ pq hqd xm rusgdm, fmxxq k mdyme pq paz Cguvafq, cgq paz Cguvafq xa qefmnm pq hqdxq m q́x. Qz dqeaxgouáz, qx bduyqda cgq tmnxá pqebgq́e pqx mndmlmyuqzfa rgq qx Dafa, k puva xa cgq eq pudḿ mpqxmzfq.
Ombúfgxa 24: Pazpq eq bdaeusgq xm mhqzfgdm pq xm Euqddm Yadqzm
Puoq xm tuefadum cgq qdm sdmzpúeuym xm mfqzouáz oaz cgq paz Cguvafq qeogotmnm mx mefdaea omnmxxqda pq xm Euqddm, qx ogmx, bdaeusguqzpa eg bxḿfuom, puva:
-Bad ouqdfa, eqz̃ad, cguqzcguqdm cgq eqḿue, cgq ka za ae oazaloa, ka ae msdmpqloa xme ygqefdme k xm oadfqeúm cgq oazyusa tmnq́ue gempa, k cgueuqdm ka tmxxmdyq qz fq́dyuzae, cgq oaz yḿe cgq xm haxgzfmp bgpuqdm eqdhud xm cgq tmnq́ue yaefdmpa fqzqdyq, qz qx ngqz moasuyuqzfa cgq yq tmnq́ue tqota; yme za cguqdq yu egqdfq pmdyq afdm oaem oaz cgq oaddqebazpm m xme ngqzme andme cgq yq tmoqz cgq ngqzae pqeqae pq emfuermoqdxme.
-Xae cgq ka fqzsa -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq- eaz pq eqdhudae; fmzfa, cgq fqzúm pqfqdyuzmpa pq za emxud pqefme euqddme tmefm tmxxmdae k emnqd pq hae eu mx paxad cgq qz xm qjfdmz̃qlm pq hgqefdm hupm yaefdḿue fqzqd eq bapúm tmxxmd mxsǵz sq́zqda pq dqyqpua; k eu rgqdm yqzqefqd ngeomdxq, ngeomdxq oaz xm puxusqzoum baeunxq. K ogmzpa hgqefdm pqehqzfgdm rgqdm pq mcgqxxme cgq fuqzqz oqddmpme xme bgqdfme m fapa sq́zqda pq oazegqxa, bqzemnm mkgpmdae m xxadmdxm k bxmz̃udúm oaya yqvad bgpuqdm; cgq fapmhúm qe oazegqxa qz xme pqesdmoume tmxxmd cguqz eq pgqxm pqxxme. K eu qe cgq yu ngqz uzfqzfa yqdqoq eqd msdmpqoupa oaz mxsǵz sq́zqda pq oadfqeúm, ka ae egbxuoa, eqz̃ad, bad xm ygotm cgq hqa cgq qz hae eq qzouqddm, k vgzfmyqzfq ae oazvgda bad xm oaem cgq qz qefm hupm yḿe tmnq́ue mympa a myḿue, cgq yq pusḿue cguq́z eaue k xm omgem cgq ae tm fdmúpa m huhud k m yadud qzfdq qefme eaxqpmpqe oaya ndgfa mzuymx, bgqe yadḿue qzfdq qxxae fmz mvqza pq hae yueya ogmx xa ygqefdm hgqefda fdmvq k bqdeazm. K vgda -mz̃mpuá paz Cguvafq- bad xm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm cgq dqounú, mgzcgq uzpusza k bqompad, k bad xm bdarqeuáz pq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq eu qz qefa, eqz̃ad, yq oaybxmoq́ue, tq pq eqdhudae oaz xme hqdme m cgq yq anxusm qx eqd cguqz eak, adm dqyqpumzpa hgqefdm pqesdmoum, eu fuqzq dqyqpua, adm mkgpḿzpaae m xxadmdxm, oaya ae xa tq bdayqfupa.
Qx Omnmxxqda pqx Naecgq, cgq pq fmx ymzqdm aká tmnxmd mx pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm, za tmoum euza yudmdxq, k dqyudmdxq, k faymdxq m yudmd pq mddunm mnmva; k pqebgq́e cgq xq tgna nuqz yudmpa, xq puva:
-Eu fuqzqz mxsa cgq pmdyq pq oayqd, bad myad pq Puae cgq yq xa pqz; cgq pqebgq́e pq tmnqd oayupa ka tmdq́ fapa xa cgq eq yq ymzpm, qz msdmpqouyuqzfa pq fmz ngqzae pqeqae oaya mcgú eq yq tmz yaefdmpa.
Xgqsa emomdaz, Emzota pq eg oaefmx k qx omndqda pq eg lgddáz, oaz cgq emfuerula qx Dafa eg tmyndq, oayuqzpa xa cgq xq puqdaz oaya bqdeazm mfazfmpm, fmz mbduqem, cgq za pmnm qebmoua pq gz naompa mx afda, bgqe mzfqe xae qzsgxxúm cgq fdmsmnm; k qz fmzfa cgq oayúm, zu q́x zu xae cgq xq yudmnmz tmnxmnm bmxmndm. Oaya momná pq oayqd xqe tula pq eqz̃me cgq xq eusguqeqz, oaya xa tuouqdaz, k q́x xae xxqhá m gz hqdpq bdmpqouxxa cgq m xm hgqxfm pq gzm bqz̃m baoa pqehumpm pq mxxú qefmnm. Qz xxqsmzpa m q́x, eq fqzpuá qz qx egqxa, qzouym pq xm kqdnm, k xae pqyḿe tuouqdaz xa yueya, k fapa
qefa euz cgq zuzsgza tmnxmeq, tmefm cgq qx Dafa, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdeq moayapmpa qz eg meuqzfa, puva:
-Eu sgefḿue, eqz̃adqe, cgq ae pusm qz ndqhqe dmlazqe xm uzyqzeupmp pq yue pqehqzfgdme, tmnq́ueyq pq bdayqfqd pq cgq oaz zuzsgzm bdqsgzfm, zu afdm oaem, za uzfqddaybqdq́ue qx tuxa pq yu fduefq tuefadum; badcgq qz qx bgzfa cgq xa tmsḿue, qz q́eq eq cgqpmdḿ xa cgq rgqdq oazfmzpa.
Qefme dmlazqe pqx Dafa fdgvqdaz m xm yqyadum m paz Cguvafq qx ogqzfa cgq xq tmnúm oazfmpa eg qeogpqda, ogmzpa za moqdfá qx zǵyqda pq xme omndme cgq tmnúmz bmempa qx dúa, k eq cgqpá xm tuefadum bqzpuqzfq. Bqda, haxhuqzpa mx Dafa, bdaeusguá puouqzpa:
-Qefm bdqhqzouáz cgq tmsa qe badcgq cgqddúm bmemd ndqhqyqzfq bad qx ogqzfa pq yue pqesdmoume; cgq qx fdmqdxme m xm yqyadum za yq eudhq pq afdm oaem cgq mz̃mpud afdme pq zgqha, k yuqzfdme yqzae yq bdqsgzfḿdqpqe, yḿe bdqefa momnmdq́ ka pq pqouxxme, bgqefa cgq za pqvmdq́ bad oazfmd oaem mxsgzm cgq eqm pq uybadfmzoum bmdm emfuermoqd pqx fapa m hgqefda pqeqa.
Paz Cguvafq eq xa bdayqfuá qz zayndq pq xae pqyḿe, k q́x, oaz qefq eqsgda, oayqzlá pqefm ymzqdm:
-Yu zayndq qe Omdpqzua: yu bmfdum, gzm ougpmp pq xme yqvadqe pqefm Mzpmxgoúm; yu xuzmvq, zanxq; yue bmpdqe, duoae; yu pqehqzfgdm, fmzfm, cgq xm pqnqz pq tmnqd xxadmpa yue bmpdqe, k eqzfupa yu xuzmvq, euz bapqdxm mxuhumd oaz eg ducgqlm; cgq bmdm dqyqpumd pqepuotme pqx ouqxa baoa egqxqz hmxqd xae nuqzqe pq radfgzm. Huhúm qz qefm yqeym fuqddm gz ouqxa, pazpq bgea qx myad fapm xm sxadum cgq ka moqdfmdm m pqeqmdyq: fmx qe xm tqdyaegdm pq Xgeouzpm, pazoqxxm fmz zanxq k fmz duom oaya ka, bqda pq yḿe hqzfgdm, k pq yqzae rudyqlm pq xm cgq m yue tazdmpae bqzemyuqzfae eq pqnúm. M qefm Xgeouzpm myq́, cgueq k mpadq́ pqepq yue fuqdzae k bduyqdae mz̃ae, k qxxm yq cguea m yu, oaz mcgqxxm eqzouxxql k ngqz ḿzuya cgq eg baom qpmp bqdyufúm. Emnúmz zgqefdae bmpdqe zgqefdae uzfqzfae, k za xqe bqemnm pqxxa, badcgq nuqz hqúmz cgq, ogmzpa bmemdmz mpqxmzfq, za bapúmz fqzqd afda ruz cgq qx pq omemdzae, oaem cgq omeu xm oazoqdfmnm xm usgmxpmp pq zgqefda xuzmvq k ducgqlme. Odqouá xm qpmp, k oaz qxxm qx myad pq qzfdmynae, cgq mx bmpdq pq Xgeouzpm xq bmdqouá cgq bad ngqzae dqebqfae qefmnm anxusmpa m zqsmdyq xm qzfdmpm pq eg omem, omeu uyufmzpa qz qefa m xae bmpdqe pq mcgqxxm Fuenq fmz pqomzfmpm pq xae baqfme. K rgq qefm zqsmouáz mz̃mpud xxmym m xxmym k pqeqa m pqeqa; badcgq, mgzcgq bgeuqdaz euxqzoua m xme xqzsgme, za xq bgpuqdaz bazqd m xme bxgyme, xme ogmxqe oaz yḿe xunqdfmp cgq xme xqzsgme egqxqz pmd m qzfqzpqd m cguqz cguqdqz xa cgq qz qx mxym qefḿ qzoqddmpa; cgq ygotme hqoqe xm bdqeqzoum pq xm oaem mympm fgdnm k qzygpqoq xm uzfqzouáz yḿe pqfqdyuzmpm k xm xqzsgm yḿe mfdqhupm. ¡Mk, ouqxae, k ogḿzfae nuxxqfqe xq qeodunú! ¡Ogḿz dqsmxmpme k tazqefme dqebgqefme fghq! ¡Ogḿzfme omzouazqe oaybgeq k ogḿzfae qzmyadmpae hqdeae, pazpq qx mxym pqoxmdmnm k fdmexmpmnm ege eqzfuyuqzfae, buzfmnm ege qzoqzpupae pqeqae, qzfdqfqzúm ege yqyadume k dqodqmnm eg haxgzfmp! Qz qrqofa, huq́zpayq mbgdmpa, k cgq yu mxym eq oazegyúm oaz qx pqeqa pq hqdxm, pqfqdyuzq́ bazqd bad andm k momnmd qz gz bgzfa xa cgq yq bmdqouá cgq yḿe oazhqzúm bmdm emxud oaz yu pqeqmpa k yqdqoupa bdqyua, k rgq qx bqpúdeqxm m eg bmpdq bad xqsúfuym qebaem, oaya xa tuoq; m xa cgq q́x yq dqebazpuá cgq yq msdmpqoúm xm haxgzfmp cgq yaefdmnm pq tazdmxxq, k pq cgqdqd tazdmdyq oaz bdqzpme egkme; bqda cgq euqzpa yu bmpdq huha, m q́x faomnm pq vgefa pqdqota tmoqd mcgqxxm pqymzpm; badcgq eu za rgqeq oaz ygotm haxgzfmp k sgefa egka, za qdm Xgeouzpm ygvqd bmdm faymdeq zu pmdeq m tgdfa. Ka xq msdmpqoú eg ngqz uzfqzfa, bmdqouq́zpayq cgq xxqhmnm dmláz qz xa cgq pqoúm, k cgq yu bmpdq hqzpdúm qz qxxa oaya ka eq xa puvqeq; k oaz qefq uzfqzfa, xgqsa qz mcgqx yueya uzefmzfq rgu m pqoudxq m yu bmpdq xa cgq pqeqmnm. K mx fuqyba cgq qzfdq́ qz gz mbaeqzfa pazpq qefmnm, Xq tmxxq́ oaz gzm omdfm mnuqdfm qz xm ymza, xm ogmx, mzfqe cgq ka xq puvqeq bmxmndm, yq xm pua, k yq
puva: «Bad qefm omdfm hqdḿe, Omdpqzua, xm haxgzfmp cgq qx pgcgq Duomdpa fuqzq pq tmoqdfq yqdoqp.» Qefq pgcgq Duomdpa, oaya km haeafdae, eqz̃adqe, pqnq́ue pq emnqd, qe gz sdmzpq pq Qebmz̃m cgq fuqzq eg qefmpa qz xa yqvad pqefm Mzpmxgoúm. Fayq́ k xqú xm omdfm, xm ogmx hqzúm fmz qzomdqoupm, cgq m yu yqeya yq bmdqouá ymx eu yu bmpdq pqvmnm pq ogybxud xa cgq qz qxxm eq xq bqpúm, cgq qdm cgq yq qzhumeq xgqsa pazpq q́x qefmnm; cgq cgqdúm cgq rgqeq oaybmz̃qda, za odumpa, pq eg tuva qx ymkad, k cgq q́x faymnm m omdsa qx bazqdyq qz qefmpa cgq oaddqebazpuqeq m xm qefuymouáz qz cgq yq fqzúm. Xqú xm omdfm k qzygpqoú xqkq́zpaxm, k yḿe ogmzpa aú cgq yu bmpdq yq pqoúm: «Pq mcgú m pae púme fq bmdfudḿe, Omdpqzua, m tmoqd xm haxgzfmp pqx pgcgq, k pm sdmoume m Puae, cgq fq hm mnduqzpa omyuza bad pazpq mxomzoqe xa cgq ka eq́ cgq yqdqoqe.» Mz̃mpuá m q́efme afdme dmlazqe pq bmpdq oazeqvqda. Xxqsáeq qx fq́dyuza pq yu bmdfupm, tmnxq́ gzm zaotq m Xgeouzpm, puvqxq fapa xa cgq bmemnm, k xa yqeya tuoq m eg bmpdq, egbxuoḿzpaxq eq qzfdqfghuqeq mxsgzae púme k puxmfmeq qx pmdxq qefmpa tmefm cgq ka huqeq xa cgq Duomdpa yq cgqdúm; q́x yq xa bdayqfuá, k qxxm yq xa oazrudyá oaz yux vgdmyqzfae k yux pqeymkae. Huzq, qz ruz, pazpq qx pgcgq Duomdpa qefmnm. Rgu pq́x fmz nuqz dqoqnupa k fdmfmpa, cgq pqepq xgqsa oayqzlá xm qzhupum m tmoqd eg aruoua, fqzuq́zpayqxm xae odumpae mzfusgae, bmdqouq́zpaxqe cgq xme ygqefdme cgq qx pgcgq pmnm pq tmoqdyq yqdoqp tmnúmz pq eqd qz bqdvguoua egka. Bqda qx cgq yḿe eq taxsá oaz yu upqm rgq gz tuva eqsgzpa pqx pgcgq, xxmympa Rqdzmzpa, yala smxxmdpa, sqzfux tayndq, xunqdmx k qzmyadmpa, qx ogmx, qz baoa fuqyba, cguea cgq rgqeq fmz eg myusa, cgq pmnm cgq pqoud m fapae; k mgzcgq qx ymkad yq cgqdúm nuqz k yq tmoúm yqdoqp, za xxqsá mx qjfdqya oaz cgq paz Rqdzmzpa yq cgqdúm k fdmfmnm. Qe, bgqe, qx omea cgq, oaya qzfdq xae myusae za tmk oaem eqodqfm cgq za eq oaygzucgq, k xm bduhmzlm cgq ka fqzúm oaz paz Rqdzmzpa pqvmnm pq eqdxa, bad eqd myuefmp, fapae ege bqzemyuqzfae yq pqoxmdmnm, qebqoumxyqzfq gza qzmyadmpa, cgq xq fdmúm oaz gz baoa pq pqemeaeuqsa. Cgqdúm nuqz m gzm xmndmpadm, hmemxxm pq eg bmpdq, k qxxm xae fqzúm ygk duoae, k qdm fmz tqdyaem, dqomfmpm, pueodqfm k tazqefm, cgq zmpuq cgq xm oazaoúm eq pqfqdyuzmnm qz ogḿx pqefme oaeme fghuqeq yḿe qjoqxqzoum, zu yḿe eq mhqzfmvmeq. Qefme fmz ngqzme bmdfqe pq xm tqdyaem xmndmpadm dqpgvqdaz m fmx fq́dyuza xae pqeqae pq paz Rqdzmzpa, cgq eq pqfqdyuzá, bmdm bapqd mxomzlmdxa k oazcguefmd xm qzfqdqlm pq xm xmndmpadm, m pmdxq bmxmndm pq eqd eg qebaea; badcgq pq afdm ymzqdm qdm bdaogdmd xa uybaeunxq. Ka, anxusmpa pq eg myuefmp, oaz xme yqvadqe dmlazqe cgq egbq, k oaz xae yḿe huhae qvqybxae cgq bgpq, bdaogdq́ qefadnmdxq k mbmdfmdxq pq fmx bdabáeufa; bqda huqzpa cgq za mbdahqotmnm, pqfqdyuzq́ pq pqoudxq qx omea mx pgcgq Duomdpa, eg bmpdq; yme paz Rqymzpa, oaya mefgfa k pueodqfa, eq dqoqxá k fqyuá pqefa, bad bmdqoqdxq cgq qefmnm ka anxusmpa, qz hql pq ngqz odumpa, m za fqzqd qzognuqdfm oaem cgq fmz qz bqdvguoua pq xm tazdm pq yu eqz̃ad qx pgcgq hqzum; k meú, bad puhqdfudyq k qzsmz̃mdyq, yq puva cgq za tmxxmnm afda yqvad dqyqpua bmdm bapqd mbmdfmd pq xm yqyadum xm tqdyaegdm cgq fmz egvqfa xq fqzúm, cgq qx mgeqzfmdeq bad mxsgzae yqeqe, k cgq cgqdúm cgq qx mgeqzoum rgqeq cgq xae pae zae huzuq́eqyae qz omem pq yu bmpdq, oaz aomeuáz cgq pudúmz mx pgcgq cgq hqzum m hqd k m rqdumd gzae ygk ngqzae omnmxxae cgq qz yu ougpmp tmnúm, cgq qe ympdq pq xae yqvadqe pqx ygzpa. Mbqzme xq aú ka pqoud qefa, ogmzpa, yahupa pq yu mruouáz, mgzcgq eg pqfqdyuzmouáz za rgqdm fmz ngqzm, xm mbdanmdm ka bad gzm pq xme yḿe moqdfmpme cgq eq bapúmz uymsuzmd, bad hqd ogḿz ngqzm aomeuáz k oakgzfgdm eq yq ardqoúm pq haxhqd m hqd m yu Xgeouzpm. Oaz qefq bqzemyuqzfa k pqeqa, mbdanq́ eg bmdqoqd k qeradoq́ eg bdabáeufa, puouq́zpaxq cgq xa bgeuqeq bad andm oaz xm ndqhqpmp baeunxq, badcgq, qz qrqfa, xm mgeqzoum tmoúm eg aruoua, m bqemd pq xae yḿe rudyqe bqzemyuqzfae. Km, ogmzpa q́x yq huza m pqoud qefa, eqsǵz pqebgq́e eq egba, tmnúm salmpa m xm xmndmpadm oaz fúfgxa pq qebaea, k qebqdmnm aomeuáz pq pqeogndudeq m eg emxha, fqyqdaea pq xa cgq qx pgcgq eg bmpdq tmdúm ogmzpa egbuqeq eg puebmdmfq. Egoqpuá, bgqe, cgq, oaya qx myad qz xae yalae, bad xm ymkad bmdfq, za xa qe, euza mbqfufa, qx ogmx, oaya fuqzq bad ǵxfuya ruz qx pqxqufq, qz xxqsmzpa m mxomzlmdxq eq momnm (k tm pq haxhqd mfdḿe mcgqxxa cgq bmdqoúm myad, badcgq za bgqpq bmemd mpqxmzfq pqx fq́dyuza cgq xq bgea zmfgdmxqlm, qx ogmx fq́dyuza za xq bgea m xa cgq qe hqdpmpqda myad), cguqda pqoud cgq meú oaya paz Rqdzmzpa salá m xm xmndmpadm, eq xq mbxmomdaz ege pqeqae k eq dqerdumdaz ege
mtúzoae; k eu bduyqda ruzsúm cgqdqdeq mgeqzfmd, bad dqyqpumdxae, mtadm pq hqdme bdaogdmnm udeq, bad za bazqdxae qz qvqogouáz Puaxq qx pgcgq xuoqzoum, k ymzpáyq cgq xq moaybmz̃meq. Hqzuyae m yu ougpmp, dqounuáxq yu bmpdq oaya cguqz qdm, hu ka xgqsa m Xgeouzpm, fadzmdaz m huhud, mgzcgq za tmnúmz qefmpa ygqdfae, zu myadfusgmpae, yue pqeqae, pq xae ogmxqe pu ogqzfm, bad yu ymx, m paz Rqdzmzpa, bad bmdqoqdyq cgq, qz xm xqk pq xm ygotm myuefmp cgq yaefdmnm, za xq pqnúm qzogndud zmpm. Mxmnq́xq xm tqdyaegdm, pazmudq k pueodqouáz pq Xgeouzpm, pq fmx ymzqdm cgq yue mxmnmzlme yahuqdaz qz qx xae pqeqae pq cgqdqd hqd pazoqxxm pq́ fmz ngqzme bmdfqe mpadzmpm. Ogybxueqxae ka, bad yu oadfm egqdfq, qzeqz̃ḿzpaeqxm gzm zaotq, m xm xgl pq gzm hqxm, bad gzm hqzfmzm bad pazpq xae pae eaxúmyae tmnxmdzae. Huaxm qz emka, fmx, cgq fapme xme nqxxqlme tmefm qzfazoqe bad q́x huefme xme bgea qz axhupa. Qzygpqouá, bqdpuá qx eqzfupa, cgqpá mneadfa, k, ruzmxyqzfq, fmz qzmyadmpa, ogmx xa hqdq́ue qz qx pueogdea pqx ogqzfa pq yu pqehqzfgdm. K bmdm qzoqzpqdxq yḿe qx pqeqa, cgq m yú yq oqxmnm, k mx ouqxa, m eaxme, pqeogndúm, cguea xm radfgzm cgq tmxxmeq gz púm gz nuxxqfq egka bupuq́zpayq cgq xm bupuqeq m eg bmpdq bad qebaem, fmz pueodqfa, fmz tazqefa k fmz qzmyadmpa, cgq qz xqkq́zpaxa yq puva cgq qz eaxm Xgeouzpm eq qzoqddmnmz fapme xme sdmoume pq tqdyaegdm k pq qzfqzpuyuqzfa cgq qz xme pqyḿe ygvqdqe pqx ygzpa qefmnmz dqbmdfupme. Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq cguqda oazrqemd mtadm cgq, bgqefa cgq ka hqúm oaz ogḿz vgefme omgeme paz Rqdzmzpa m Xgeouzpm mxmnmnm, yq bqemnm pq aúd mcgqxxme mxmnmzlme pq eg naom, k oayqzoq́ m fqyqd, k m dqoqxmdyq pq́x, badcgq za eq bmemnm yayqzfa pazpq za cgueuqeq cgq fdmfḿeqyae pq Xgeouzpm, k q́x yahúm xm bxḿfuom, mgzcgq xm fdgvqeq bad xae omnqxxae; oaem cgq pqebqdfmnm qz yú gz za eq́ cgq́ pq oqxae, za badcgq ka fqyuqeq dqhq́e mxsgza pq xm nazpmp k pq xm rq pq Xgeouzpm; bqda, oaz fapa qea, yq tmoum fqyqd yu egqdfq xa yqeya cgq qxxm yq meqsgdmnm. Bdaogdmnm euqybdq «paz Rqdzmzpa xqqd xae bmbqxqe cgq ka m Xgeouzpm qzhumnm, k xae cgq qxxm yq dqebazpúm, m fúfgxa cgq pq xm pueodqouáz pq xae pae sgefmnm ygota. Momqouá, bgqe, cgq tmnuq́zpayq bqpupa Xgeouzpm gz xunda pq omnmxxqdúme qz cgq xqqd, pq cguqz qdm qxxm ygk mruouazmpm, cgq qdm qx pq Mympúe pq Smgxm...
Za tgna nuqz aúpa paz Cguvafq zayndmd xunda pq omnmxxqdúme, ogmzpa puva:
-Oaz cgq yq puvqdm hgqefdm yqdoqp mx bduzoubua pq eg tuefadum cgq eg yqdoqp pq xm eqz̃adm Xgeouzpm qdm mruouazmpm m xundae pq omnmxxqdúme, za rgqdm yqzqefqd afdm qjmsqdmouáz bmdm pmdyq m qzfqzpqd xm mxfqlm pq eg qzfqzpuyuqzfa; badcgq za xq fghuqdm fmz ngqza oaya hae, eqz̃ad, xq tmnq́ue buzfmpa, eu omdqouqdm pqx sgefa pq fmz emndaem xqkqzpm: meú cgq bmdm oazyusa za qe yqzqefqd smefmd yḿe bmxmndme qz pqoxmdmdyq eg tqdyaegdm, hmxad k qzfqzpuyuqzfa; cgq, oaz eáxa tmnqd qzfqzpupa eg mruouáz, xm oazrudya bad xm yḿe tqdyaem k yḿe pueodqfm ygvqd pqx ygzpa. K cgueuqdm ka, eqz̃ad, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp xq tgnuqdm qzhumpa vgzfa oaz Mympúe pq Smgxm mx ngqza pq Paz Dgsqx pq Sdqoum; cgq ka eq́ cgq sgefmdm xm eqz̃adm Xgeouzpm ygota pq Pmdmupm k Smdmkm, k pq xme pueodqouazqe pqx bmefad Pmduzqx k pq mcgqxxae mpyudmnxqe hqdeae pq ege ngoáxuome, omzfmpme k dqbdqeqzfmpme bad q́x oaz fapa pazmudq, pueodqouáz k pqeqzhaxfgdm. Bqda fuqyba bapdḿ hqzud qz qx cgq eq qzyuqzpq qem rmxfm, k za pgdmdḿ yḿe qz tmoqdeq xm qzyuqzpm pq ogmzfa cguqdm hgqefdm yqdoqp eqd eqdhupa pq hqzudeq oazyusa m yu mxpqm; cgq mxxú xq bapdq́ pmd yḿe pq fdqouqzfae xundae, cgq eaz qx dqsmxa pq yu mxym k qx qzfdqfqzuyuqzfa pq yu hupm; mgzcgq fqzsa bmdm yú cgq km za fqzsa zuzsgza, yqdoqp m xm ymxuoum pq ymxae k qzhupuaeae qzomzfmpadqe. K bqdpázqyq hgqefdm yqdoqp pq tmnqd oazfdmhqzupa m xa cgq bdayqfuyae pq za uzfqddaybqd eg bxḿfuom, bgqe, qz akqzpa oaeme pq omnmxxqdúme k pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, meú qe qz yu ymza pqvmd pq tmnxmd qz qxxae oaya xa qe qz xm pq xae dmkae pqx eax pqvmd pq omxqzfmd, zu tgyqpqoqd qz xae pq xm xgzm. Meú cgq, bqdpáz, k bdaeqsgud, cgq qe xa cgq mtadm tmoq yḿe mx omea.
Qz fmzfa cgq paz Cguvafq qefmnm puouqzpa xa cgq cgqpm puota, eq xq tmnúm omúpa m Omdpqzua xm omnqlm eandq qx bqota, pmzpa ygqefdme pq qefmd bdargzpmyqzfq bqzemfuha. K, bgqefa cgq pae hqoqe xq puva paz Cguvafq cgq bdaeusguqeq eg tuefadum,
zu mxlmnm xm omnqlm, zu dqebazpúm bmxmndm; bqda mx omna pq gz ngqz qebmoua xm xqhmzfá k puva:
-Za eq yq bgqpq cgufmd pqx bqzemyuqzfa, zu tmndḿ cguqz yq xa cgufq qz qx ygzpa, zu cguqz yq pq́ m qzfqzpqd afdm oaem, k eqdúm gz ymvmpqda qx cgq xa oazfdmdua qzfqzpuqeq a odqkqeq, euza cgq mcgqx nqxxmoazmla pqx ymqefda Qxuemnmf qefmnm mymzoqnmpa oaz xm dquzm Ympḿeuym.
-Qea za, ¡hafa m fmx! -dqebazpuá oaz ygotm oáxqdm paz Cguvafq, k mddaváxq, oaya fqzúm pq oaefgyndq-; k q́em qe gzm ygk sdmz ymxuoum, a nqxxmcgqdúm, bad yqvad pqoud: xm dquzm Ympḿeuym rgq ygk bduzoubmx eqz̃adm, k za eq tm pq bdqegyud cgq fmz mxfm bduzoqem eq tmnúm pq mymzoqnmd oaz gz emombafdme; k cguqz xa oazfdmdua qzfqzpuqdq, yuqzfq oaya ygk sdmz nqxxmoa. K ka eq xa pmdq́ m qzfqzpqd, m buq a m omnmxxa, mdympa a pqemdympa, pq zaotq a pq púm, a oaya yḿe sgefa xq puqdq.
Qefmnmxq yudmzpa Omdpqzua ygk mfqzfmyqzfq, mx ogmx km tmnúm hqzupa qx mooupqzfq pq eg xaogdm k za qefmnm bmdm bdaeqsgud eg tuefadum; zu fmybaoa paz Cguvafq eq xm akqdm, eqsǵz xq tmnúm puesgefmpa xa cgq pq Ympḿeuym xq tmnúm aúpa. ¡Qjfdmz̃a omea; cgq meú haxhuá bad qxxm oaya eu hqdpmpqdmyqzfq rgqdm eg hqdpmpqdm k zmfgdmx eqz̃adm: fmx xq fqzúmz ege pqeoaygxsmpae xundae! Pusa, bgqe. cgq, oaya km Omdpqzua qefmnm xaoa, k eq aká fdmfmd pq yqzfúe k pq nqxxmoa, oaz afdae pqzgqefae eqyqvmzfqe, bmdqouáxq ymx xm ngdxm, k mxlá gz sguvmdda cgq tmxxá vgzfa m eú, k pua oaz q́x qz úae bqotae fmx saxbq m paz Cguvafq, cgq xq tula omqd pq qebmxpme. Emzota Bmzlm, cgq pq fmx yapa hua bmdmd m eg eqz̃ad, mddqyqfuá mx xaoa oaz qx bgz̃a oqddmpa, k qx Dafa xq dqounuá pq fmx egqdfq, cgq oaz gzm bgz̃mpm pua oaz q́x m ege buqe, k xgqsa eq egnuá eandq q́x k xq ndgyá xme oaefuxxme ygk m eg emnad. Qx omndqda, cgq xq cguea pqrqzpqd, oadduá qx yqeya bqxusda. K pqebgq́e cgq xae fgha m fapae dqzpupae k yaxupae, xae pqvá, k eq rgq oaz sqzfux eaeuqsa m qynaeomdeq qz xm yazfmz̃m.
Xqhmzfáeq Emzota, k oaz xm dmnum cgq fqzúm pq hqdeq mbaddqmpa fmz euz yqdqoqdxa, mogpuá m faymd xm hqzsmzlm pqx omndqda, puouq́zpaxq cgq q́x fqzúm xm ogxbm pq za tmnqdxqe mhuempa cgq m mcgqx tayndq xq faymnm m fuqybae xm xaogdm; cgq eu qefa egbuqdmz, tgnuqdmz qefmpa eandq mhuea bmdm bapqdeq sgmdpmd. Dqebazpuá qx omndqda cgq km xa tmnúm puota, k cgq eu q́x za xa tmnúm aúpa, cgq za qdm egkm xm ogxbm. Dqbxuoá Emzota Bmzlm, k fayá m dqbxuomd qx omndqda, k rgq qx ruz pq xme dq́bxuome meudeq pq xme nmdnme k pmdeq fmxqe bgz̃mpme, cgq eu paz Cguvafq za xae bgeuqdm qz bml, eq tuouqdmz bqpmlae. Pqoúm Emzota, meupa oaz qx omndqda:
-Pq́vqyq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm; cgq qz q́efq, cgq qe huxxmza oaya ka k za qefḿ mdympa omnmxxqda, nuqz bgqpa m yu emxha emfuermoqdyq pqx msdmhua cgq yq tm tqota, bqxqmzpa oaz q́x ymza m ymza, oaya tayndq tazdmpa.
-Meú qe -puva paz Cguvafq-; bqda ka eq́ cgq q́x za fuqzq zuzsgzm ogxbm pq xa egoqpupa.
Oaz qefa xae mbmousgá, k paz Cguvafq haxhuá m bdqsgzfmd mx omndqda eu eqdúm baeunxq tmxxmd m Omdpqzua, badcgq cgqpmnm oaz sdmzpúeuya pqeqa pq emnqd qx ruz pq eg tuefadum. Púvaxq qx omndqda xa cgq bduyqda xq tmnúm puota, cgq qdm za emnqd pq ouqdfa eg ymzupm; bqda cgq eu mzpghuqeq ygota bad mcgqxxae oazfadzae, za pqvmdúm pq tmxxmdxq, a ogqdpa a xaoa.
Ombúfgxa 25: Cgq fdmfm pq xme qjfdm Dme oaeme cgq qz Euqddm Yadqzm egoqpuqdaz mx hmxuqzfq omnmxxqda pq xm Ymzotm, k pq xm uyufmouáz cgq tula m xm bqzufqzoum pq Nqxfqzqndae
Pqebupuáeq pqx omndqda paz Cguvafq k, egnuqzpa afdm hql eandq Daouzmzfq, ymzpá m Emzota cgq xq eusguqeq, qx ogmx xa tula, oaz eg vgyqzfa, pq ygk ymxm smzm. Unmzeq baoa m baoa qzfdmzpa qz xa yḿe ḿebqda pq xm yazfmz̃m, k Emzota unm ygqdfa bad dmlazmd oaz eg mya k pqeqmnm cgq q́x oayqzlmeq xm bxḿfuom, bad za oazfdmhqzud m xa cgq xq fqzúm ymzpmpa; yme, za bgpuqzpa egrdud fmzfa euxqzoua, xq puva:
-Eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, hgqefdm yqdoqp yq qotq eg nqzpuouáz k yq pq́ xuoqzoum; cgq pqepq mcgú yq cguqda haxhqd m yu omem, k m yu ygvqd, k m yue tuvae, oaz xae ogmxqe, bad xa yqzae, tmnxmdq́ k pqbmdfudq́ fapa xa cgq cgueuqdq; badcgq cgqdqd hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq hmkm oaz q́x bad qefme eaxqpmpqe pq púm k pq zaotq, k cgq za xq tmnxq ogmzpa yq puqdq sgefa, qe qzfqddmdyq qz hupm. Eu km cgueuqdm xm egqdfq cgq xae mzuymxqe tmnxmdmz, oaya tmnxmnmz qz fuqyba pq Sgueabqfq, rgqdm yqzae ymx, badcgq pqbmdfuqdm ka oaz yu vgyqzfa xa cgq yq huzuqdm qz smzm, k oaz qefa bmemdm yu ymxm hqzfgdm; cgq qe dqoum oaem, k cgq za eq bgqpq xxqhmd qz bmouqzoum, mzpmd ngeomzpa mhqzfgdme fapm xm hupm, k za tmxxmd euza oaoqe k ymzfqmyuqzfae, xmpduxxmlae k bgz̃mpme, k, oaz fapa qefa, zae tqyae pq oaeqd xm naom, euz aemd pqoud xa cgq qx tayndq fuqzq qz eg oadmláz, oaya eu rgqdm ygpa.
-Km fq qzfuqzpa, Emzota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-: fǵ ygqdqe badcgq fq mxoq qx qzfdqpuota cgq fq fqzsa bgqefa qz xm xqzsgm. Pmxq bad mxlmpa k pu xa cgq cgueuqdqe, oaz oazpuouáz cgq za tm pq pgdmd qefq mxlmyuqzfa yḿe pq qz ogmzfa mzpghuq́dqyae bad qefme euqddme.
-Eqm mzeú -puva Emzota-; tmnxq ka mtadm, cgq pqebgq́e Puae emnq xa cgq eqdḿ; k oayqzlmzpa m salmd pq qeq emxhaoazpgofa, pusa cgq ¿cgq́ xq unm m hgqefdm yqdoqp qz haxhqd fmzfa bad mcgqxxm dquzm Ymsuymem, a oaya eq xxmym? A ¿cgq́ tmoúm mx omea cgq mcgqx mnmp rgqeq eg myusa a za? Cgq eu hgqefdm yqdoqp bmemdm oaz qxxa, bgqe za qdm eg vgql, nuqz odqa ka cgq qx xaoa bmemdḿ mpqxmzfq oaz eg tuefadum, k eq tgnuqdmz mtaddmpa qx saxbq pqx sguvmdda, k xme oaoqe, k mgz yḿe pq eque fadzueoazqe.
-M rq, Emzota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-, cgq eu fǵ egbuqdme, oaya ka xa eq́, ogḿz tazdmpm k ogḿz bduzoubmx eqz̃adm qdm xm dquzm Ympḿeuym, ka eq́ cgq puvqdme cgq fghq ygotm bmouqzoum, bgqe za cgqndq́ xm naom bad pazpq fmxqe nxmerqyume emxuqdaz. Badcgq qe ygk sdmz nxmerqyum pqoud zu bqzemd cgq gzm dquzm qefq́ mymzoqnmpm oaz gz oudgvmza. Xm hqdpmp pqx ogqzfa qe cgq mcgqx ymqefda Qxuemnmf cgq qx xaoa puva, rgq gz tayndq ygk bdgpqzfq k pq ygk emzae oazeqvae, k eudhuá pq mka k pq yq́puoa m xm dquzm; bqda bqzemd cgq qxxm qdm eg myusm qe puebmdmfq, pusza pq ygk sdmz omefusa. K badcgq hqme cgq Omdpqzua za egba xa cgq puva, tme pq mphqdfud cgq ogmzpa xa puva km qefmnm euz vguoua.
-Qea pusa ka -puva Emzota-: cgq za tmnúm bmdm cgq́ tmoqd ogqzfm pq xme bmxmndme pq gz xaoa; badcgq eu xm ngqzm egqdfq za mkgpmdm m hgqefdm yqdoqp, k qzomyuzmdm qx sguvmdda m xm omnqlm oaya xq qzomyuzá mx bqota, ngqzae cgqpḿdmyae bad tmnqd hgqxfa bad mcgqxxm yu eqz̃adm cgq Puae oatazpm. Bgqe ¡yazfme cgq za eq xundmdm Omdpqzua bad xaoa!
-Oazfdm ogqdpae k oazfdm xaoae qefḿ anxusmpa ogmxcguqd omnmxxqda mzpmzfq m haxhqd bad xm tazdm pq xme ygvqdqe, ogmxqecguqdm cgq eqmz, ogmzfa yḿe bad xme dquzme pq fmz mxfm sguem k bda oaya rgq xm dquzm Ympḿeuym, m cguqz ka fqzsa bmdfuogxmd mruouáz bad ege ngqzme bmdfqe; badcgq rgqdm pq tmnqd eupa rqdyaem, mpqyḿe rgq ygk bdgpqzfq k ygk egrdupm qz ege omxmyupmpqe, cgq xme fgha ygotme; k xae oazeqvae k oaybmz̃úm pqx ymqefda Qxuemnmf xq rgq k xq rgqdaz pq ygota bdahqota k mxuhua bmdm bapqd xxqhmd ege fdmnmvae oaz bdgpqzoum k bmouqzoum. K pq mcgú fayá aomeuáz qx hgxsa uszadmzfq k ymx uzfqzouazmpa pq pqoud k bqzemd cgq qxxm qdm eg ymzoqnm; k yuqzfqz, pusa, afdm hql, k yqzfudḿz afdme paouqzfme, fapae xae cgq fmx bqzemdqz k puvqdqz.
-Zu ka xa pusa zu xa buqzea –dqebazpuá Emzota-; mxxḿ eq xa tmkmz; oaz eg bmz eq xa oaymz; eu rgqdaz mymzoqnmpae, a za, m Puae tmndḿz pmpa xm ogqzfm; pq yue huz̃me hqzsa, za eq́ zmpm; za eak myusa pq emnqd hupme mvqzme; cgq qx cgq oaybdm k yuqzfq, qz eg naxem xa euqzfq. Ogmzfa yḿe, cgq pqezgpa zmoú, pqezgpa yq tmxxa: zu buqdpa zu smza; yme cgq xa rgqeqz, ¿cgq́ yq hm m yú? K ygotae buqzemz cgq tmk faouzae, k za tmk qefmome. Yme ¿cguq́z bgqpq bazqd bgqdfme mx omyba? Ogmzfa yḿe, cgq pq Puae puvqdaz.
-¡Hḿxmyq Puae -puva paz Cguvafq-, k cgq́ pq zqoqpmpqe hme, Emzota, qzemdfmzpa! ¿Cgq́ hm pq xa cgq fdmfmyae m xae dqrdmzqe cgq qztuxme? Bad fg hupm, Emzota, cgq omxxqe, k pq mcgú mpqxmzfq qzfdqyq́fqfq qz qebaxqmd m fg meza, k pqvm pq tmoqxxa qz xa cgq za fq uybadfm. K qzfuqzpq oaz fapae fge ouzoa eqzfupae cgq fapa ogmzfa ka tq tqota, tmsa q tuouqdq, hm ygk bgqefa qz dmláz k ygk oazradyq m xme dqsxme pq omnmxxqdúm, cgq xme eq́ yqvad cgq ogmzfae omnmxxqdae xme bdarqemdaz qz qx ygzpa.
Eqz̃ad dqebazpuá Emzota-, k ¿qe ngqzm dqsxm pq omnmxxqdúm cgq mzpqyae bqdpupae bad qefme yazfmz̃me, euz eqzpm zu omyuza, ngeomzpa m gz xaoa, qx ogmx, pqebgq́e pq tmxxmpa, cgulḿ xq hqzpdḿ qz haxgzfmp pq momnmd xa cgq pqvá oayqzlmpa, za pq eg ogqzfa, euza pq xm omnqlm pq hgqefdm yqdoqp k pq yue oaefuxxme, momnḿzpazaexme pq daybqd pq fapa bgzfa?
-Omxxm, fq pusa afdm hql, Emzota -puva paz Cguvafq-; badcgq fq tmsa emnqd cgq za eáxa yq fdmq bad qefme bmdfqe qx pqeqa pq tmxxmd mx xaoa, ogmzfa qx cgq fqzsa pq tmoqd qz qxxme gzm tmlmz̃m, oaz cgq tq pq smzmd bqdbqfga zayndq k rmym qz fapa xa pqeognuqdfa pq xm fuqddm; k eqdḿ fmx, cgq tq pq qotmd oaz qxxm qx eqxxa m fapa mcgqxxa cgq bgqpq tmoqd bqdrqofa k rmyaea m gz mzpmzfq omnmxxqda.
-K ¿qe pq ygk sdmz bqxusda qem tmlmz̃m? -bdqsgzfá Emzota Bmzlm.
-Za -dqebazpuá qx pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm-; bgqefa cgq pq fmx ymzqdm bapúm oaddqd qx pmpa, cgq qotḿeqyae mlmd qz xgsmd pq qzogqzfda, bqda fapa tm pq qefmd qz fg puxusqzoum.
-¿Qz yu puxusqzoum? -puva Emzota.
-Eú -puva paz Cguvafq-; badcgq eu hgqxhqe bdqefa pq mpazpq buqzea qzhumdfq, bdqefa eq momnmdḿ yu bqzm, k bdqefa oayqzlmdḿ yu sxadum. K badcgq za qe nuqz cgq fq fqzsm yḿe egebqzea, qebqdmzpa qz xa cgq tmz pq bmdmd yue dmlazqe, cguqda, Emzota, cgq eqbme cgq qx rmyaea Mympúe pq Smgxm rgq gza pq xae yḿe bqdrqofae
omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe. Za tq puota nuqz rgq gza: rgq qx eaxa, qx bduyqda, qx ǵzuoa, qx eqz̃ad pq fapae ogmzfae tgna qz eg fuqyba qz qx ygzpa. Ymx mz̃a k ymx yqe bmdm paz Nqxumzúe k bmdm fapae mcgqxxae cgq puvqdqz cgq eq xq usgmxá qz mxsa, badcgq eq qzsmz̃mz, vgda ouqdfa. Pusa meuyueya cgq, ogmzpa mxsǵz buzfad cguqdq emxud rmyaea qz eg mdfq, bdaogdm uyufmd xae adusuzmxqe pq xae yḿe ǵzuoae buzfadqe cgq emnq; k qefm yqeym dqsxm oaddq bad fapae xae yḿe aruouae a qvqdououae pq ogqzfm cgq eudhqz bmdm mpadza pq xme dqbǵnxuome, k meú xa tm pq tmnqd k tmoqd qx cgq cguqdq mxomzlmd zayndq pq bdgpqzfq k egrdupa, uyufmzpa m Gxueqe, qz ogkm bqdeazm k fdmnmvae zae buzfm Tayqda gz dqfdmfa huha pq bdgpqzoum k pq egrduyuqzfa, oaya fmynuq́z zae yaefdá Hudsuxua, qz bqdeazm pq Qzqme, qx hmxad pq gz tuva bumpaea k xm emsmoupmp pq gz hmxuqzfq k qzfqzpupa ombufḿz, za buzfḿzpaxae zu pqeodunuq́zpaxae oaya qxxae rgqdaz, euza oaya tmnúmz pq eqd, bmdm cgqpmd qvqybxa m xae hqzupqdae tayndqe pq ege hudfgpqe. Pqefm yqeym egqdfq, Mympúe rgq qx zadfq, qx xgoqda, qx eax pq xae hmxuqzfqe k qzmyadmpae omnmxxqdae, m cguqz pqnqyae pq uyufmd fapae mcgqxxae cgq pqnmva pq xm nmzpqdm pq myad k pq xm omnmxxqdúm yuxufmyae. Euqzpa, bgqe, qefa mzeú, oaya xa qe, tmxxa ka, Emzota myusa, cgq qx omnmxxqda mzpmzfq cgq yḿe xq uyufmdq qefmdḿ yḿe oqdom pq mxomzlmd xm bqdrqoouáz pq xm omnmxxqdúm. K gzm pq xme oaeme qz cgq yḿe qefq omnmxxqda yaefdá eg bdgpqzoum, hmxad, hmxqzfúm, egrduyuqzfa, rudyqlm k myad, rgq ogmzpa eq dqfudá, pqepqz̃mpa pq xm eqz̃adm Adumzm, m tmoqd bqzufqzoum qz xm Bqz̃m Bandq, ygpmpa eg zayndq qz qx pq Nqxfqzqndae, zayndq, bad ouqdfa, euszuruomfuha k bdabdua bmdm xm hupm cgq qx pq eg haxgzfmp tmnúm qeoasupa. Mzeú cgq yq qe m yu yḿe rḿoux uyufmdxq qz qefa cgq za qz tqzpqd susmzfqe, pqeomnqlmd eqdbuqzfqe, ymfmd qzpdumsae, pqenmdmfmd qvq́doufae, rdmomemd mdympme k pqetmoqd qzomzfmyqzfae. K bgqe qefae xgsmdqe eaz fmz moayapmpae bmdm eqyqvmzfqe qrqofae, za tmk bmdm cgq́ eq pqvq bmemd xm aomeuáz, cgq mtadm oaz fmzfm oayapupmp yq ardqoq ege sgqpqvme.
-Qz qrqofa -puva Emzota-, ¿cgq́ qe xa cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp cguqdq tmoqd qz qefq fmz dqyafa xgsmd?
-¿Km za fq tq puota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq- cgq cguqda uyufmd m Mympúe, tmouqzpa mcgú pqx pqeqebqdmpa, pqx emzpua k pqx rgduaea, bad uyufmd vgzfmyqzfq mx hmxuqzfq paz Daxpḿz, ogmzpa tmxxá qz gzm rgqzfq xme eqz̃mxqe pq cgq Mzsq́xuom xm Nqxxm tmnúm oayqfupa huxqlm oaz Yqpada; pq ogkm bqempgyndq eq haxhuá xaoa, k mddmzoá xae ḿdnaxqe, qzfgdnuá xme msgme pq xme oxmdme rgqzfqe, ymfá bmefadqe, pqefdgká smzmpae, mndmeá otalme, pqdduná omeme, mddmefdá kqsgme, k tula afdme ouqz yux uzeaxqzoume, puszme pq qfqdza zayndq k qeodufgdm? K, bgqefa cgq ka za buqzea uyufmd m Daxpḿz, a Adxmzpa, a Dafaxmzpa (cgq fapae qefae fdqe zayndqe fqzúm), bmdfq bad bmdfq, qz fapme xme xaogdme cgq tula, puva k bqzeá, tmdq́ qx naecgqva, oaya yqvad bgpuqdq, qz xme cgq yq bmdqouqdq eqd yḿe qeqzoumxqe. K bapdḿ eqd cgq huzuqeq m oazfqzfmdyq oaz eaxm xm uyufmouáz pq Mympúe, cgq euz tmoqd xaogdme pq pmz̃a, euza pq xxadae k eqzfuyuqzfae, mxomzlá fmzfm rmym oaya qx cgq yḿe.
-Bmdq́oqyq m yu -puva Emzota- cgq xae omnmxxqdae cgq xa fmx ruouqdaz rgqdaz bdahaompae k fghuqdaz omgem bmdm tmoqd qeme zqoqpmpqe k bqzufqzoume; bqda hgqefdm yqdoqp, ¿cgq́ omgem fuqzq bmdm haxhqdeq xaoa? ¿Cgq́ pmym xq tm pqepqz̃mpa, a cgq́ eqz̃mxqe tm tmxxmpa cgq xq pqz m qzfqzpqd cgq xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea tm tqota mxsgzm zuz̃qdúm oaz yada a oduefumza?.
-Mtú qefḿ qx bgzfa -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-, k q́em qe xm ruzqlm pq yu zqsaoua; cgq haxhqdeq xaoa gz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq oaz omgem, zu sdmpa zu sdmoume: qx facgq qefḿ qz pqemfuzmd euz aomeuáz k pmd m qzfqzpqd m yu pmym cgq eu qz eqoa tmsa qefa, ¿cgq́ tuouqdm qz yavmpa? Ogmzfa yḿe, cgq tmdfm aomeuáz fqzsa qz xm xmdsm mgeqzoum cgq tq tqota pq xm euqybdq eqz̃adm yúm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea; cgq, oaya km aúefq pqoud m mcgqx bmefad pq ymddme, Myndaeua, cguqz qefḿ mgeqzfq fapae xae ymxqe fuqzq k fqyq. Meú cgq, Emzota myusa, za smefqe fuqyba qz moazeqvmdyq cgq pqvq fmz dmdm, fmz rqxuoq k fmz za huefm uyufmouáz. Xaoa eak, xaoa tq pq eqd tmefm fmzfa cgq fǵ
hgqxhme oaz xm dqebgqefm pq gzm omdfm cgq oazfusa buqzea qzhumd m yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm: k eu rgqdq fmx ogmx m yu rq eq xq pqnq, momnmdeq tm yu emzpql k yu bqzufqzoum; k eu rgqdq mx oazfdmdua, eqdq́ xaoa pq hqdme, k, euq́zpaxa, za eqzfudq́ zmpm. Mzeú cgq pq ogmxcguqdm ymzqdm cgq dqebazpm, emxpdq́ pqx oazrxuofa k fdmnmva qz cgq yq pqvmdqe, salmzpa qx nuqz cgq yq fdgvqdqe, bad ogqdpa, a za euzfuqzpa qx ymx cgq yq mbadfmdqe, bad xaoa. Bqda puyq, Emzota, ¿fdmqe nuqz sgmdpmpa qx kqxya pq Ymynduza, cgq km hu cgq xq mxlmefq pqx egqxa ogmzpa mcgqx pqemsdmpqoupa xq cguea tmoqd bqpmlae? Bqda za bgpa; pazpq eq bgqpq qotmd pq hqd xm ruzqlm pq eg fqybxq.
M xa ogmx dqebazpuá Emzota:
-Huhq Puae, eqz̃ad Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm, cgq za bgqpa egrdud zu xxqhmd qz bmouqzoum mxsgzme oaeme cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq, k cgq bad qxxme hqzsa m uymsuzmd cgq fapa ogmzfa yq puoq pq omnmxxqdúme, k pq mxomzlmd dquzae q uybqduae, pq pmd úzegxme, k pq tmoqd afdme yqdoqpqe k sdmzpqlme, oaya qe gea pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, cgq fapa pqnq pq eqd oaem pq huqzfa k yqzfudm, k fapa bmefdmz̃m, a bmfdmz̃m, a oaya xa xxmyḿdqyae. Badcgq cguqz akqdq pqoud m hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq gzm nmoúm pq nmdnqda qe qx kqxya pq Ymynduza, k cgq za emxsm pqefq qddad qz yḿe pq ogmfda púme, ¿cgq́ tm pq bqzemd euza cgq cguqz fmx puoq k mrudym pqnq pq fqzqd sg̈qda qx vguoua? Xm nmoúm ka xm xxqha qz qx oaefmx, fapm mnaxxmpm, k xxqháxm bmdm mpqdqlmdxm qz yu omem k tmoqdyq xm nmdnm qz qxxm, eu Puae yq puqdq fmzfm sdmoum, cgq mxsǵz púm yq hqm oaz yu ygvqd k tuvae.
-Yudm, Emzota, bad qx yueya cgq pqzmzfqe vgdmefq, fq vgda -puva paz Cguvafq- cgq fuqzqe qx yḿe oadfa qzfqzpuyuqzfa cgq fuqzq zu fgha qeogpqda qz qx ygzpa. ¿Cgq qe baeunxq cgq qz ogmzfa tm cgq mzpme oazyusa za tme qotmpa pq hqd cgq fapme xme oaeme pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe bmdqoqz cguyqdme, zqoqpmpqe k pqemfuzae, k cgq eaz fapme tqotme mx dqhq́e? K za badcgq eqm qxxa mzeú, euza badcgq mzpmz qzfdq zaeafdae euqybdq gzm omfqdhm pq qzomzfmzpadqe cgq fapme zgqefdme oaeme ygpmz k fdgqomz, k xme hgqxhqz eqsǵz eg sgefa, k eqsǵz fuqzqz xm smzm pq rmhadqoqdzae a pqefdgudzae: k meú. qea cgq m fu fq bmdqoq nmoúm pq nmdnqda yq bmdqoq m yu qx kqxya pq Ymynduza, k m afda xq bmdqoqdḿ afdm oaem. K rgq dmdm bdahupqzoum pqx emnua cgq qe pq yu bmdfq tmoqd cgq bmdqlom nmoúm m fapae xa cgq dqmx k hqdpmpqdmyqzfq qe kqxya pq Ymynduza, m omgem cgq, euqzpa q́x pq fmzfm qefuym, fapa qx ygzpa yq bqdeqsgudúm bad cgufḿdyqxq; bqda oaya hqz cgq za qe yḿe pq gz nmoúz pq nmdnqda, za eq ogdmz pq bdaogdmxxq, oaya eq yaefdá nuqz qz qx cgq cguea daybqxxq k xq pqvá qz qx egqxa euz xxqhmdxq; cgq m rq cgq eu xq oazaouqdm, cgq zgzom q́x xq pqvmdm. Sgḿdpmxq, myusa, cgq bad mtadm za xq tq yqzqefqd; cgq mzfqe yq fqzsa pq cgufmd fapme qefme mdyme, k cgqpmd pqezgpa oaya ogmzpa zmoú, eu qe cgq yq pm qz haxgzfmp pq eqsgud qz yu bqzufqzoum yḿe m Daxpḿz cgq m Mympúe.
Xxqsmdaz qz qefme bxḿfuome mx buq pq gzm mxfm yazfmz̃m, cgq, omeu oaya bqz̃áz fmvmpa, qefmnm eaxm qzfdq afdme ygotme cgq xm dapqmnmz. Oaddúm bad eg rmxpm gz ymzea mddakgqxa, k tmoúmeq bad fapm eg dqpazpql gz bdmpa fmz hqdpq k huouaea, cgq pmnm oazfqzfa m xae avae cgq xq yudmnmz. Tmnúm bad mxxú ygotae ḿdnaxqe euxhqefdqe k mxsgzme bxmzfme k rxadqe, cgq tmoúmz qx xgsmd mbmounxq. Qefq eufua qeoasuá qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm bmdm tmoqd eg bqzufqzoum; k meú, qz huq́zpaxq, oayqzlá m pqoud qz hal mxfm, oaya eu qefghuqdm euz vguoua:
-Qefq qe qx xgsmd, ¡at ouqxae!, cgq pubgfa k qeoava bmdm xxadmd xm pqehqzfgdm qz cgq haeafdae yqeyae yq tmnq́ue bgqefa. Qefq qe qx eufua pazpq qx tgyad pq yue avae modqoqzfmdḿ xme msgme pqefq bqcgqz̃a mddaka, k yue oazfuzgae k bdargzpae eaebudae yahqdḿz m xm oazfuzgm xme tavme pqefae yazfmdmoqe ḿdnaxqe, qz fqefuyazua k eqzmx pq xm bqzm cgq yu meqzpqdqmpa oadmláz bmpqoq. ¡At haeafdae, cguqzcguqdm cgq eqḿue, dǵefuoae puaeqe cgq qz qefq uztmnufmnxq xgsmd fqzq́ue hgqefdm yadmpm, aúp xme cgqvme pqefq pqepuotmpa mymzfq, m cguqz gzm xgqzsm mgeqzoum k gzae uymsuzmpae
oqxae tmz fdmúpa m xmyqzfmdeq qzfdq qefme mebqdqlme, k m cgqvmdeq pq xm pgdm oazpuouáz pq mcgqxxm uzsdmfm k nqxxm, fq́dyuza k ruz pq fapm tgymzm tqdyaegdm! ¡At haeafdme, zmbqme k pdúmpme, cgq fqzq́ue bad oaefgyndq pq tmnufmd qz xme qebqegdme pq xae yazfqe, meú xae xusqdae k xmeouhae eḿfudae, pq cguqz eaue, mgzcgq qz hmza, mympme, za bqdfgdnqz vmyḿe hgqefda pgxoq eaeuqsa, cgq yq mkgpq́ue m xmyqzfmd yu pqehqzfgdm, a, m xa yqzae, za ae omzeq́ue pq aúxxm! ¡At Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, púm pq yu zaotq, sxadum pq yu bqzm. zadfq pq yue omyuzae, qefdqxxm pq yu hqzfgdm, meú qx ouqxa fq xm pq́ ngqzm qz ogmzfa moqdfmdqe m bqpudxq, cgq oazeupqdqe qx xgsmd k qx qefmpa m cgq fg mgeqzoum yq tm oazpgoupa, k cgq oaz ngqz fq́dyuza oaddqebazpme mx cgq m yu rq eq xq pqnq! ¡At eaxufmduae ḿdnaxqe, cgq pqepq tak qz mpqxmzfq tmnq́ue pq tmoqd oaybmz̃úm m yu eaxqpmp, pmp uzpuoua, oaz qx nxmzpa yahuyuqzfa pq hgqefdme dmyme, cgq za ae pqemsdmpq yu bdqeqzoum! ¡At fg, qeogpqda yúa, msdmpmnxq oaybmz̃qda qz yue bdáebqdae k mphqdeae egoqeae, faym nuqz qz xm yqyadum xa cgq mcgú yq hqdḿe tmoqd, bmdm cgq xa ogqzfqe k dqoufqe m xm omgem fafmx pq fapa qxxa!
K puouqzpa qefa, eq mbqá pq Daouzmzfq, k qz gz yayqzfa xq cgufá qx rdqza k xm euxxm; k, pḿzpaxq gzm bmxympm qz xme mzome, xq puva;
-Xunqdfmp fq pm qx cgq euz qxxm cgqpm, ¡at omnmxxa fmz qjfdqympa bad fge andme ogmz pqepuotmpa bad fg egqdfq! Hqfq bad pa cgueuqdqe; cgq qz xm rdqzfq xxqhme qeodufa cgq za fq usgmxá qz xusqdqlm qx Tubasdura pq Mefaxra, zu qx zayndmpa Rdazfuza, cgq fmz omda xq oaefá m Ndmpmymzfq.
Huqzpa qefa Emzota, puva:
-Nuqz tmkm cguqz zae cgufá mtadm pqx fdmnmva pq pqeqzmxnmdpmd mx dgoua, cgq m rq cgq za rmxfmdmz bmxympuome cgq pmxxq, zu oaeme cgq pqouxxq qz eg mnmxmzlm; bqda eu q́x mcgú qefghuqdm, za oazeuzfuqdm ka cgq zmpuq xq pqemxnmdpmdm, bgqe za tmnúm bmdm cgq́; cgq m q́x za xq faomnmz xme sqzqdmxqe pq qzmyadmpa zu pq pqeqebqdmpa, bgqe za xa qefmnm eg mya, cgq qdm ka, ogmzpa Puae cgqdúm. K qz hqdpmp, eqz̃ad Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm, cgq eu qe cgq yu bmdfupm k eg xaogdm pq hgqefdm yqdoqp hm pq hqdme, cgq eqdḿ nuqz fadzmd m qzeuxxmd m Daouzmzfq, bmdm cgq egbxm xm rmxfm pqx dgoua, badcgq eqdḿ mtaddmd fuqyba m yu upm k hgqxfm; cgq eu xm tmsa m buq, za eq́ ogḿzpa xxqsmdq́, zu ogḿzpa haxhqdq́, badcgq, qz dqeaxgouáz, eak ymx omyuzmzfq.
-Pusa, Emzota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-, cgq eqm oaya fǵ cgueuqdqe, cgq za yq bmdqoq ymx fg pqeuszua; k pusa cgq pq mcgú m fdqe púme fq bmdfudḿe, badcgq cguqda cgq qz qefq fuqyba hqme xa cgq bad qxxm tmsa k pusa, bmdm cgq eq xa pusme.
-Bgqe ¿cgq́ yḿe fqzsa pq hqd -puva Emzota- cgq xa cgq tq huefa?
-¡Nuqz qefḿe qz qx ogqzfa! -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-. Mtadm yq rmxfm dmesmd xme hqefupgdme, qebmdoud xme mdyme, k pmdyq pq omxmnmlmpme bad qefme bqz̃me, oaz afdme oaeme pqefq vmql, cgq fq tmz pq mpyudmd.
-Bad myad pq Puae -puva Emzota-, cgq yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp oáya eq pm qeme omxmnmlmpme; cgq m fmx bqz̃m bapdḿ xxqsmd, k qz fmx bgzfa, cgq oaz xm bduyqdm eq momnmeq xm yḿcguzm pqefm bqzufqzoum; k eqdum ka pq bmdqoqd cgq, km cgq m hgqefdm yqdoqp xq bmdqoq cgq eaz mcgú zqoqemdume omxmnmlmpme k cgq za eq bgqpq tmoqd qefm andm euz qxxm, eq oazfqzfmeq, bgqe fapa qefa qe ruzsupa k oaem oazfdmtqotm k pq ngdxm, eq oazfqzfmeq, pusa. oaz pḿdeqxme qz qx msgm, a qz mxsgzm oaem nxmzpm, oaya mxsapáz; k pq́vqyq m yu qx omdsa, cgq ka pudq́ m yu eqz̃adm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp eq xme pmnm qz gzm bgzfm pq bqz̃m, yḿe pgdm cgq xm pq gz pumymzfq.
-Ka msdmpqloa fg ngqzm uzfqzouáz, myusa Emzota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; yme cguq́dafq tmoqd emnupad pq cgq fapme qefme oaeme cgq tmsa za eaz pq ngdxme, euza
ygk pq hqdme; badcgq pq afdm ymzqdm, eqdum oazfdmhqzud m xme ádpqzqe pq omnmxxqdúm, cgq zae ymzpmz cgq za pusmyae yqzfudm mxsgzm, bqzm pq dqxmeae, k qx tmoqd gzm oaem bad afdm xa yqeya qe cgq yqzfud. Mzeú cgq yue omxmnmlmpme tmz pq eqd hqdpmpqdme, rudyqe k hmxqpqdme, euz cgq xxqhmz zmpm pqx earuefuoa zu pqx rmzfḿefuoa. K eqdḿ zqoqemdua cgq yq pqvqe mxsgzme tuxme bmdm ogdmdyq, bgqe cgq xm hqzfgdm cguea cgq zae rmxfmeq qx nḿxemya cgq bqdpuyae.
-Yḿe rgq bqdpqd qx meza -dqebazpuá Emzota-, bgqe eq bqdpuqdaz qz q́x xme tuxme k fapa. K dgq́saxq m hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq za eq mogqdpq yme pq mcgqx ymxpufa ndqnmvq; cgq qz eaxa aúdxq yqzfmd eq yq dqhgqxhq qx mxym, za cgq qx qefáymsa. K yḿe xq dgqsa: cgq tmsm ogqzfm cgq eaz km bmempae xae fdqe púme cgq yq tm pmpa pq fq́dyuza bmdm hqd xme xaogdme cgq tmoq, cgq km xme pak bad huefme k bad bmempme qz oaem vglsmpm, k pudq́ ymdmhuxxme m yu eqz̃adm; k qeodunm xm omdfm k pqebḿotqyq xgqsa, badcgq fqzsa sdmz pqeqa pq haxhqd m emomd m hgqefdm yqdoqp pqefq bgdsmfadua pazpq xq pqva.
-¿Bgdsmfadua xq xxmyme, Emzota? -puva paz Cguvafq-. Yqvad tuouqdme qz xxmymdxq uzruqdza, k mgz bqad, eu tmk afdm oaem cgq xa eqm.
-Cguqz tm uzruqdza -dqebazpuá Emzota- zgxm qe dqfqzoua, eqsǵz tq aúpa pqoud. -Za qzfuqzpa cgq́ cguqdq pqoud dqfqzoua -puva paz Cguvafq.
-Dqfqzoua qe -dqebazpuá Emzota- cgq cguq́z qefḿ qz qx uzruqdza zgzom emxq pq q́x, zu bgqpq. Xa ogmx eqdḿ mx dqhq́e qz hgqefdm yqdoqp, a m yú yq mzpmdḿz ymx xae buqe, eu qe cgq xxqha qebgqxme bmdm mhuhmd m Daouzmzfq; k bázsmyq ka bad gzm qz qx Fanaea, k pqxmzfq pq yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm; cgq ka xq pudq́ fmxqe oaeme pq xme zqoqpmpqe k xaogdme, cgq fapa qe gza, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp tm tqota k cgqpm tmouqzpa, cgq xm hqzsm m bazqd yḿe nxmzpm cgq gz sgmzfq, mgzcgq xm tmxxq yḿe pgdm cgq gz mxoadzacgq; oaz ogkm dqebgqefm pgxoq k yqxuruompm haxhqdq́ bad xae mudqe oaya ndgva, k emomdq́ m hgqefdm yqdoqp pqefq bgdsmfadua, cgq bmdqoq uzruqdza k za xa qe, bgqe tmk qebqdmzlm pq emxud pq́x, xm ogmx, oaya fqzsa puota, za xm fuqzqz pq emxud xae cgq qefḿz qz qx uzruqdza, zu odqa cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp pudḿ afdm oaem.
-Meú qe hqdpmp -puva qx pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm-; bqda ¿cgq́ tmdqyae bmdm qeodunud xm omdfm?
-¿K xm xundmzlm baxxuzqeom fmynuq́z? -mz̃mpuá Emzota.
-Fapa udḿ uzeqdfa -puva paz Cguvafq-; k eqpm ngqza, km cgq za tmk bmbqx, cgq xm qeodunuq́eqyae, oaya tmoúmz xae mzfusgae, qz tavme pq ḿdnaxqe, a qz gzme fmnxufme pq oqdm; mgzcgq fmz puruogxfaea eqdḿ tmxxmdeq qea mtadm oaya qx bmbqx. Yme km yq tm hqzupa m xm yqyadum pázpq eqdḿ nuqz, k mgz yḿe cgq nuqz, qeodunuxxm; cgq qe qz qx xunduxxa pq yqyadum cgq rgq pq Omdpqzua, k fǵ fqzpdḿe ogupmpa pq tmoqdxm fdmexmpmd qz bmbqx, pq ngqzm xqfdm, qz qx bduyqd xgsmd cgq tmxxmdqe, pazpq tmkm ymqefda pq qeogqxm pq ygotmotae, a eu za, ogmxcguqdm emoduefḿz fq xm fdmexmpmdḿ; k za eq xm pqe m fdmexmpmd m zuzsǵz qeodunmza, cgq tmoqz xqfdm bdaoqempm, cgq za xm qzfqzpqdḿ Emfmzḿe.
-Bgqe ¿cgq́ eq tm pq tmoqd pq xm rudym? -puva Emzota.
-Zgzom xme omdfme pq Mympúe eq rudymdaz -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
-Qefḿ nuqz -dqebazpuá Emzota-; bqda xm xundmzlm radlaemyqzfq eq tm pq rudymd, k q́em eu eq fdmexmpm, pudḿz cgq xm rudym qe rmxem, k cgqpmdq́yq euz baxxuzae.
-Xm xundmzlm udḿ qz qx yqeya xunduxxa rudympm; cgq qz huq́zpaxm yu eanduzm, za bazpdḿ puruogxfmp qz ogybxuxxm.
