K qz xa cgq faom m xm omdfm pq myadqe, bazpdḿe bad rudym: «Hgqefda tmefm xm ygqdfq, qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm.» K tmdḿ baoa mx omea cgq hmkm pq ymza mvqzm, badcgq, m xa cgq ka yq eq́ moadpmd, Pgxouzqm za emnq qeodunud zu xqqd, k qz fapm eg hupm tm huefa xqfdm yúm zu omdfm yúm, badcgq yue myadqe k xae egkae tmz eupa euqybdq bxmfázuoae, euz qjfqzpqdeq m yḿe cgq m gz tazqefa yudmd. K mgz qefa, fmz pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa, cgq aemdq́ vgdmd oaz hqdpmp cgq qz paoq mz̃ae cgq tm cgq xm cguqda yḿe cgq m xm xgyndq pqefae avae cgq tmz pq oayqd xm fuqddm, za xm tq huefa ogmfda hqoqe; k mgz bapdḿ eqd cgq pqefme ogmfda hqoqe za tgnuqeq qxxm qotmpa pq hqd xm gzm cgq xm yudmnm: fmx qe qx dqomfa k qzoqddmyuqzfa oaz cgq eg bmpdq, Xadqzla Oadotgqxa, k eg ympdq, Mxpazlm Zasmxqe, xm tmz odumpa.
-¡Fm, fm! -puva Emzota-. ¿Cgq xm tuvm pq Xadqzla Oadotgqxa qe xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, xxmympm bad afda zayndq Mxpazlm Xadqzla?
-Qem qe -puva paz Cguvafq-, k qe xm cgq yqdqoq eqd eqz̃adm pq fapa qx gzuhqdea.
-Nuqz xm oazaloa -puva Emzota-, k eq́ pqoud cgq fudm fmz nuqz gzm nmddm oaya qx yḿe radlgpa lmsmx pq fapa qx bgqnxa. ¡Huhq qx Pmpad, cgq qe yalm pq otmbm, tqotm k pqdqotm k pq bqxa qz bqota, k cgq bgqpq emomd xm nmdnm pqx xapa m ogmxcguqd omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, a bad mzpmd, cgq xm fghuqdq bad eqz̃adm! ¡At tu pq bgfm, cgq́ dqva cgq fuqzq, k cgq́ hal! Eq́ pqoud cgq eq bgea gz púm qzouym pqx omybmzmdua pqx mxpqm m xxmymd gzae lmsmxqe egkae cgq mzpmnmz qz gz nmdnqota pq eg bmpdq, k mgzcgq qefmnmz pq mxxú yḿe pq yqpum xqsgm, meú xm akqdaz oaya eu qefghuqdmz mx buq pq xm faddq. K xa yqvad cgq fuqzq qe cgq za qe zmpm yqxuzpdaem, badcgq fuqzq ygota pq oadfqemzm: oaz fapae eq ngdxm k pq fapa tmoq ygqom k pazmudq. Mtadm pusa, eqz̃ad Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm, cgq za eaxmyqzfq bgqpq k pqnq hgqefdm yqdoqp tmoqd xaogdme bad qxxm, euza cgq oaz vgefa fúfgxa bgqpq pqeqebqdmdeq k mtadomdeq; cgq zmpuq tmndḿ cgq xa eqbm cgq za pusm cgq tula pqymeumpa pq nuqz, bgqefa cgq xq xxqhq qx pumnxa. K cgqddúm km kqdyq qz omyuza, eáxa bad hqxxm; cgq tm ygotae púme cgq za xm hqa, k pqnq pq qefmd km fdaompm; badcgq smefm ygota xm rml pq xme ygvqdqe mzpmd euqybdq mx omyba, mx eax k mx mudq. K oazruqea m hgqefdm yqdoqp gzm hqdpmp, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq: cgq tmefm mcgú tq qefmpa qz gzm sdmzpq uszadmzoum; cgq bqzemnm nuqz k ruqxyqzfq cgq xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqnúm pq eqd mxsgzm bduzoqem pq cguqz hgqefdm yqdoqp qefmnm qzmyadmpa, a mxsgzm bqdeazm fmx, cgq yqdqouqeq xae duoae bdqeqzfqe cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp xq tm qzhumpa, meú qx pqx hulomúza oaya qx pq xae smxqafqe, k afdae ygotae cgq pqnqz eqd, eqsǵz pqnqz pq eqd ygotme xme hufadume cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp tm smzmpa k smzá qz qx fuqyba cgq ka mǵz za qdm eg qeogpqda. Bqda nuqz oazeupqdmpa, ¿cgq́ eq xq tm pq pmd m xm eqz̃adm Mxpazlm Xadqzla, pusa, m xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, pq cgq eq xq hmkmz m tuzomd pq dapuxxme pqxmzfq pqxxm xae hqzoupae cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp xq qzhúm k tm pq qzhumd? Badcgq bapdúm eqd cgq mx fuqyba cgq qxxae xxqsmeqz qefghuqeq qxxm dmefduxxmzpa xuza a fduxxmzpa qz xme qdme, k qxxae eq oadduqeqz pq hqdxm, k qxxm eq duqeq k qzrmpmeq pqx bdqeqzfq.
-Km fq fqzsa puota mzfqe pq msadm ygotme hqoqe, Emzota -puva paz Cguvafq-, cgq qdqe ygk sdmzpq tmnxmpad k cgq, mgzcgq pq uzsqzua nafa, ygotme hqoqe pqebgzfme pq msgpa; yme bmdm cgq hqme ogḿz zqoua qdqe fǵ k ogḿz pueodqfa eak ka, cguqda cgq yq akme gz ndqhq ogqzfa. Tme pq emnqd cgq gzm hugpm tqdyaem, yalm, xundq k duom, k, eandq fapa, pqeqzrmpmpm, eq qzmyadá pq gz yala yafuxáz, daxxula k pq ngqz faza; mxomzláxa m emnqd eg ymkad, k gz púm puva m xm ngqzm hugpm, bad húm pq rdmfqdzmx dqbdqtqzeuáz: «Ymdmhuxxmpa qefak, eqz̃adm, k za euz ygotm omgem, pq cgq gzm ygvqd fmz bduzoubmx, fmz tqdyaem k fmz duom oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp eq tmkm qzmyadmpa pq gz tayndq fmz eaql, fmz nmva k fmz upuafm oaya rgxmza, tmnuqzpa qz qefm omem fmzfae ymqefdae, fmzfae bdqeqzfmpae k fmzfae fqáxasae, qz cguqz hgqefdm yqdoqp bgpuqdm qeoasqd, oaya qzfdq bqdme, k pqoud: “q́efq cguqda, mcgq́efq za cguqda”» Yme qxxm xq dqebazpuá oaz ygota pazmudq k pqeqzhaxfgdm: «Hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad yúa, qefḿ ygk qzsmz̃mpa, k buqzem ygk m xa mzfusga eu buqzem cgq ka
tq qeoasupa ymx qz rgxmza, bad upuafm cgq xq bmdqoq; bgqe bmdm xa cgq ka xq cguqda, fmzfm ruxaearúm emnq, k yḿe, cgq Mduefáfqxqe.» Meú cgq, Emzota, bad xa cgq ka cguqda m Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, fmzfa hmxq oaya xm yḿe mxfm bduzoqem pq xm fuqddm. Eu, cgq za fapae xae baqfme cgq mxmnmz pmyme pqnmva pq gz zayndq cgq qxxae m eg mxnqpdúa xqe bazqz, qe hqdpmp cgq xme fuqzqz. ¿Buqzeme fǵ cgq xme Mymduxqe, xme Ruxue, xme Euxhme, xme Pumzme, xme Smxmfqme, xme Rúxupme, k afdme fmxqe pq cgq xae xundae, xae daymzoqe, xme fuqzpme pq xae nmdnqdae, xae fqmfdae pq xme oayqpume, qefḿz xxqzae, rgqdaz hqdpmpqdmyqzfq pmyme pq omdzq k tgqea, k pq mcgqxxae cgq xme oqxqndmz k oqxqndmdaz? Za, bad ouqdfa, euza cgq xme yḿe eq xme ruzsqz, bad pmd egnvqfa m ege hqdeae, k badcgq xae fqzsmz bad qzmyadmpae k bad tayndqe cgq fuqzqz hmxad bmdm eqdxa. K meú, nḿefmyq m yu bqzemd k odqqd cgq xm ngqzm pq Mxpazlm Xadqzla qe tqdyaem k tazqefm; k qz xa pqx xuzmvq, uybadfm baoa; cgq za tmz pq ud m tmoqd xm uzradymouáz pq́x bmdm pmdxq mxsǵz tḿnufa, k ka yq tmsa ogqzfm cgq qe xm yḿe mxfm bduzoqem pqx ygzpa. Badcgq tme pq emnqd, Emzota, eu za xa emnqe, cgq pae oaeme eaxme uzoufmz m mymd, yḿe cgq afdme; cgq eaz xm ygotm tqdyaegdm k xm ngqzm rmym, k qefme pae oaeme eq tmxxmz oazegympmyqzfq qz Pgxouzqm, badcgq qz eqd tqdyaem, zuzsgzm xq usgmxm; k qz xm ngqzm rmym, baome xq xxqsmz. K bmdm oazoxgud oaz fapa, ka uymsuza cgq fapa xa cgq pusa qe meú, euz cgq eandq zu rmxfq zmpm, k búzfaxm qz yu uymsuzmouáz oaya xm pqeqa, meú qz xm nqxxqlm oaya qz xm bduzoubmxupmp, k zu xm xxqsm Qxqzm, zu xm mxomzlm Xgodqoum, zu afdm mxsgzm pq xme rmyaeme ygvqdqe pq xme qpmpqe bdqfq́dufme, sduqsm, nḿdnmdm a xmfuzm. K pusm ompm gza xa cgq cgueuqdq; cgq eu bad qefa rgqdq dqbdqtqzpupa pq xae uszadmzfqe, za eqdq́ omefusmpa pq xae dusgdaeae.
-Pusa cgq qz fapa fuqzq hgqefdm yqdoqp dmláz -dqebazpuá Emzota-, k cgq ka eak gz meza. Yme za eq́ ka bmdm cgq́ zaynda meza qz yu naom, bgqe za eq tm pq yqzfmd xm easm qz omem pqx mtadompa. Bqda hqzsm xm omdfm, k m Puae, cgq yq ygpa.
Emoá qx xunda pq yqyadum paz Cguvafq k, mbmdfḿzpaeq m gzm bmdfq, oaz ygota eaeuqsa oayqzlá m qeodunud xm omdfm, k qz momnḿzpaxm xxmyá m Emzota k xq puva cgq eq xm cgqdúm xqqd, badcgq xm faymeq pq yqyadum, eu momea eq xq bqdpuqeq bad qx omyuza, badcgq pq eg pqepuotm fapa eq bapúm fqyqd. M xa ogmx dqebazpuá Emzota:
-Qeodúnmxm hgqefdm yqdoqp pae a fdqe hqoqe mtú qz qx xunda, k pq́yqxq, cgq ka xq xxqhmdq́ nuqz sgmdpmpa; badcgq bqzemd cgq ka xm tq pq faymd qz xm yqyadum qe puebmdmfq; cgq xm fqzsa fmz ymxm, cgq ygotme hqoqe eq yq axhupm oáya yq xxmya. Bqda, oaz fapa qea, púsmyqxm hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq yq taxsmdq́ ygota pq aúxxm; cgq pqnq pq ud oaya pq yaxpq.
-Qeogotm, cgq meú puoq -puva paz Cguvafq:
OMDFM PQ PAZ CGUVAFQ M PGXOUZQM PQX FANAEA Eanqdmzm k mxfm eqz̃adm:
Qx rqdupa pq bgzfm pq mgeqzoum k qx xxmsmpa pq xme fqxme pqx oadmláz, pgxoúeuym Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, fq qzhúm xm emxgp cgq q́x za fuqzq. Eu fg rqdyaegdm yq pqebdqoum, eu fg hmxad za qe qz yú bda, eu fge pqepqzqe eaz qz yu mruzomyuqzfa, ymsgqd cgq ka eqm meml pq egrdupa, ymx bapdq́ eaefqzqdyq qz qefm ogufm, cgq, mpqyḿe pq eqd rgqdfq, qe ygk pgdmpqdm. Yu ngqz qeogpqda Emzota fq pmdḿ qzfqdm dqxmouáz, ¡at nqxxm uzsdmfm, mympm qzqyusm yúm!, pqx yapa cgq bad fg omgem cgqpa; eu sgefmdqe pq moaddqdyq, fgka eak; k eu za, tml xa cgq fq huzuqdq qz sgefa; cgq oaz momnmd yu hupm tmndq́ emfuerqota m fg odgqxpmp k m yu pqeqa.
Fgka tmefm xm ygqdfq,
Qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm
-Bad hupm pq yu bmpdq -puva Emzota qz akqzpa xm omdfm-, cgq qe xm yḿe mxfm Oaem cgq vmyḿe tq aúpa. ¡Bqeum m yu, k oáya cgq xq puoq hgqefdm yqdoqp mtú fapa ogmzfa cguqdq, k cgq́ nuqz cgq qzomvm qz xm rudym Qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm! Pusa pq hqdpmp cgq qe hgqefdm yqdoqp qx yqeya pumnxa, k cgq za tmk oaem cgq za eqbm.
-Fapa qe yqzqefqd -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq- bmdm qx aruoua cgq fdmka.
-Qm, bgqe -puva Emzota-, bazsm hgqefdm yqdoqp qz qeafdm hgqxfm xm oq́pgxm pq xae fdqe baxxuzae, k rudyqxm oaz ygotm oxmdupmp, badcgq xm oazalomz qz huq́zpaxm.
-Cgq yq bxmoq -puva paz Cguvafq.
K tmnuq́zpaxm qeodufa, eq xm xqká, cgq pqoúm mzeú:
Ymzpmdḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp, bad qefm bduyqdm pq baxxuzae, eqz̃adm eanduzm, pmd m Emzota Bmzlm, yu qeogpqda, fdqe pq xae ouzoa cgq pqvq́ qz omem k qefḿz m omdsa pq hgqefdm yqdoqp. Xae ogmxqe fdqe baxxuzae eq xae ymzpa xundmd k bmsmd bad afdae fmzfae mcgú dqoqnupae pq oazfmpa; cgq oaz q́efm k oaz eg omdfm pq bmsa eqdḿz nuqz pmpae. Rqotm qz xme qzfdmz̃me pq Euqddm Yadqzm, m hquzfq k pae pq msaefa pqefq bdqeqzfq mz̃a.
-Ngqzm qefḿ -puva Emzota-: rúdyqxm hgqefdm yqdoqp.
-Za qe yqzqefqd rudymdúm -puva paz Cguvafq-, euza eaxmyqzfq bazqd yu dǵnduom, cgq qe xa yqeya cgq rudym, k bmdm fdqe mezae, k mgz bmdm fdqouqzfae, rgqdm nmefmzfq.
-Ka yq oazrúa pq hgqefdm yqdoqp -dqebazpuá Emzota-. Pq́vqyq, udq́ m qzeuxxmd m Daouzmzfq, k mbmdq́vqeq hgqefdm yqdoqp m qotmdyq eg nqzpuouáz; cgq xgqsa buqzea bmdfudyq, euz hqd xme emzpqoqe cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp tm pq tmoqd, cgq ka pudq́ cgq xq hu tmoqd fmzfme, cgq za cguqdm yḿe.
-Bad xa yqzae, cguqda, Emzota, k badcgq qe yqzqefqd mzeú, cguqda, pusa, cgq yq hqme qz ogqdae, k tmoqd gzm a pae paoqzme pq xaogdme, cgq xme tmdq́ qz yqzae pq yqpum tadm, badcgq tmnuq́zpaxme fǵ huefa bad fge avae, bgqpme vgdmd m fg emxha qz xme pqyḿe cgq cgueuqdqe mz̃mpud; k meqsǵdafq cgq za pudḿe fǵ fmzfme ogmzfme ka buqzea tmoqd.
-Bad myad pq Puae, eqz̃ad yúa, cgq za hqm ka qz ogqdae m hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq yq pmdḿ ygotm xḿefuym, k za bapdq́ pqvmd pq xxadmd; k fqzsa fmx xm omnqlm, pqx xxmzfa cgq mzaotq tuoq bad qx dgoua, cgq za qefak bmdm yqfqdyq qz zgqhae xxadae; k eu qe cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp sgefm pq cgq ka hqm mxsgzme xaogdme, tḿsmxme hqefupa, ndqhqe k xme cgq xq huzuqdqz yḿe m ogqzfa. Ogmzfa yḿe, cgq bmdm yú za qdm yqzqefqd zmpm pqea, k oaya km fqzsa puota, rgqdm mtaddmd qx omyuza pq yu hgqxfm, cgq tm pq eqd oaz xme zgqhme cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp pqeqm k yqdqoq. K eu za, mbmdq́vqeq xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm; cgq eu za dqebazpq oaya qe dmláz, hafa tmsa eaxqzq m cguqz bgqpa cgq xq fqzsa pq emomd xm ngqzm dqebgqefm pqx qefáymsa m oaoqe k m narqfazqe. Badcgq ¿pázpq eq tm pq egrdud cgq gz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq fmz rmyaea oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp eq hgqxhm xaoa, euz cgq́ zu bmdm cgq́, bad gzm...? Za yq xa tmsm pqoud xm eqz̃adm, badcgq bad Puae cgq pqebafducgq k xa qotq fapa m paoq, mgzcgq zgzom eq hqzpm. ¡Nazuoa eak ka bmdm qea! ¡Ymx yq oazaoq! ¡Bgqe m rq cgq eu yq oazaouqeq, cgq yq mkgzmeq!.
-M rq, Emzota -puva paz Cguvafq-, cgq, m xa cgq bmdqoq, cgq za qefḿe fǵ yḿe ogqdpa cgq ka.
-Za qefak fmz xaoa -dqebazpuá Emzota-; yme qefak yḿe oaxq́duoa. Bqda, pqvmzpa qefa mbmdfq, ¿cgq́ qe xa cgq tm pq oayqd hgqefdm yqdoqp qz fmzfa cgq ka hgqxha? ¿Tm pq emxud mx omyuza, oaya Omdpqzua, m cgufḿdeqxa m xae bmefadqe?
-Za fq pq́ bqzm qeq ogupmpa –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-, badcgq, mgzcgq fghuqdm, za oayuqdm afdm oaem cgq xme kqdnme k rdgfae cgq qefq bdmpa k qefae ḿdnaxqe yq puqdqz; cgq xm ruzqlm pq yu zqsaoua qefḿ qz za oayqd k qz tmoqd afdme mebqdqlme qcguhmxqzfqe. M Puae, bgqe.
-Bqda ¿emnq hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq́ fqya? Cgq za fqzsa pq moqdfmd m haxhqd m qefq xgsmd pazpq msadm xq pqva, eqsǵz qefḿ pq qeoazpupa.
-Faym nuqz xme eqz̃me; cgq ka bdaogdmdq́ za mbmdfmdyq pqefae oazfadzae -puva paz Cguvafq-, k mgz fqzpdq́ ogupmpa pq egnudyq bad qefae yḿe mxfae dueoae, bad hqd eu fq pqeognda ogmzpa hgqxhme. Ogmzfa yḿe, cgq xa yḿe moqdfmpa eqdḿ, bmdm cgq za yq kqddqe k fq buqdpme, cgq oadfqe mxsgzme dqfmyme pq xme ygotme cgq bad mcgú tmk, k xme hmkme bazuqzpa pq fdqota qz fdqota, tmefm emxud m xa dmea, xme ogmxqe fq eqdhudḿz pq yavazqe k eqz̃mxqe bmdm cgq yq tmxxqe ogmzpa hgqxhme, m uyufmouáz pqx tuxa pqx xmnqduzfa pq Bqdeqa.
-Meú xa tmdq́ -dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm.
K oadfmzpa mxsgzae, bupuá xm nqzpuouáz m eg eqz̃ad k, za euz ygotme xḿsduyme pq qzfdmynae, eq pqebupuá pq́x. K egnuqzpa eandq Daouzmzfq, m cguqz paz Cguvafq qzoayqzpá ygota, k cgq yudmeq bad q́x oaya bad eg bdabdum bqdeazm, eq bgea qz omyuza pqx xxmza, qebmdouqzpa pq fdqota m fdqota xae dmyae pq xm dqfmym, oaya eg mya eq xa tmnúm moazeqvmpa. K meú eq rgq, mgzcgq fapmhúm xq uybadfgzmnm paz Cguvafq cgq xq huqeq eucguqdm tmoqd pae xaogdme. Yme za tgna mzpmpa ouqz bmeae, ogmzpa haxhuá k puva:
-Pusa, eqz̃ad, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp tm puota ygk nuqz: cgq bmdm cgq bgqpm vgdmd euz omdsa pq oazouqzoum cgq xq tq huefa tmoqd xaogdme, eqdḿ nuqz cgq hqm eucguqdm gzm, mgzcgq nuqz sdmzpq xm tq huefa qz xm cgqpmpm pq hgqefdm yqdoqp.
-¿Za fq xa pqoúm ka? -puva paz Cguvafq-. Qebq́dmfq, Emzota, cgq qz gz odqpa xme tmdq́.
K pqezgpḿzpaeq oaz fapm bduqem xae omxlazqe, cgqpá qz omdzqe k qz bmz̃mxqe, k xgqsa, euz yḿe zu yḿe, pua pae lmbmfqfme qz qx mudq k pae fgynme xm omnqlm mnmva k xae buqe qz mxfa, pqeognduqzpa oaeme cgq, bad za hqdxme afdm hql, haxhuá Emzota xm duqzpm m Daouzmzfq, k eq pua bad oazfqzfa k emfuerqota pq cgq bapúm vgdmd cgq eg mya cgqpmnm xaoa. K meú, xq pqvmdqyae ud eg omyuza, tmefm xm hgqxfm, cgq rgq ndqhq.
Ombúfgxa 26: Pazpq eq bdaeusgqz xme ruzqlme cgq pq qzmyadmpa tula paz Cguvafq qz Euqddm Yadqzm
K haxhuqzpa m oazfmd xa cgq tula qx pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm pqebgq́e cgq eq hua eaxa, puoq xm tuefadum cgq, meú oaya paz Cguvafq momná pq pmd xme fgynme a hgqxfme pq yqpua mnmva pqezgpa k pq yqpua mddunm hqefupa, k cgq hua cgq Emzota eq tmnúm upa euz cgqdqd msgmdpmd m hqd yḿe emzpqoqe, eq egnuá eandq gzm bgzfm pq gzm mxfm bqz̃m, k mxxú fayá m bqzemd xa cgq afdme ygotme hqoqe tmnúm bqzempa, euz tmnqdeq vmyḿe dqegqxfa qz qxxa; k qdm cgq ogḿx eqdum yqvad k xq qefmdúm yḿe m ogqzfa: uyufmd m Daxpḿz qz xme xaogdme pqemradmpme cgq tula, a m Mympúe qz xme ymxqzoázuome; k tmnxmzpa qzfdq eu yqeya, pqoúm:
-Eu Daxpmz rgq fmz ngqz omnmxxqda k fmz hmxuqzfq oaya fapae puoqz, ¿cgq́ ymdmhuxxm, bgqe, mx ruz, qdm qzomzfmpa, k za xq bapúm ymfmd zmpuq eu za qdm yqfuq́zpaxq gz mxruxqd pq m nxmzom bad xm bgzfm pqx buq, k q́x fdmúm euqybdq xae lmbmfae oaz euqfq egqxme pq tuqdda? Mgzcgq za xq hmxuqdaz fdqfme oazfdm Nqdzmdpa pqx Omdbua, cgq eq xme qzfqzpuá, k xq mtasá qzfdq xae ndmlae qz Dazoqehmxxqe. Bqda pqvmzpa qz q́x xa pq xm hmxqzfúm m gzm bmdfq, hqzsmyae m xa pq bqdpqd qx vguoua, cgq qe ouqdfa cgq xq bqdpuá, bad xme eqz̃mxqe cgq tmxxá qz xm Radfgzm k bad xme zgqhme cgq xq pua qx bmefad pq cgq Mzsq́xuom tmnúm padyupa yḿe pq pae euqefme oaz Yqpada, gz yaduxxa pq omnqxxae qzdulmpae k bmvq pq Msdmymzfq, k eu q́x qzfqzpuá cgq qefa qdm hqdpmp k cgq eg pmym xq tmnúm oayqfupa pqemsguempa, za tula ygota qz haxhqdeq xaoa; bqda ka, ¿oáya bgqpa uyufmxxq qz xme xaogdme, eu za xq uyufa qz xm aomeuáz pqxxme? Badcgq yu Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea aemdq́ ka vgdmd cgq za tm huefa qz fapae xae púme pq eg hupm yada mxsgza, mzeú oaya q́x qe, qz eg yueya fdmvq. k cgq eq qefḿ tak oaya xm ympdq cgq xm bmduá; k tmdúmxq msdmhua ymzuruqefa, eu, uymsuzmzpa afdm oaem pqxxm, yq haxhuqeq xaoa pq mcgqx sq́zqda pq xaogdm pq Daxpḿz qx rgduaea. Bad afdm bmdfq, hqa cgq Mympúe pq Smgxm, euz bqdpqd qx vguoua k euz tmoqd xaogdme, mxomzlá fmzfm rmym pq qzmyadmpa oaya qx cgq yḿe; badcgq xa cgq tula, eqsǵz eg tuefadum, za rgq yḿe pq cgq, bad hqdeq pqepqz̃mpa pq eg eqz̃adm Adumzm, cgq xq tmnúm ymzpmpa cgq za bmdqouqeq mzfq eg bdqeqzoum tmefm cgq rgqeq eg haxgzfmp, eq dqfudá m xm Bqz̃m Bandq, qz oaybmz̃úm pq gz qdyufmz̃a, k mxxú eq tmdfá pq xxadmd k pq qzoayqzpmdeq m Puae, tmefm cgq qx ouqxa xq moadduá, qz yqpua pq eg ymkad ogufm k zqoqeupmp. K eu qefa qe hqdpmp, oaya xa qe, ¿bmdm cgq cguqda ka faymd fdmnmva msadm pq pqezgpmdyq pqx fapa, zu pmd bqempgyndq m qefae ḿdnaxqe, cgq za yq tmz tqota ymx mxsgza, zu fqzsa bmdm cgq́ qzfgdnumd qx msgm oxmdm pqefae mddakae, xae ogmxqe yq tmz pq pmd pq nqnqd ogmzpa fqzsm smzm? Huhm xm yqyadum pq Mympúe, k eqm uyufmpa pq paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm qz fapa xa cgq bgpuqdq; pqx ogmx eq pudḿ xa cgq pqx afda eq puva: cgq eu za momná sdmzpqe oaeme, ygduá bad moayqfqxxme; k eu ka za eak pqeqotmpa zu pqepqz̃mpa pq Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, nḿefmyq, oaya km tq puota, qefmd mgeqzfq pqxxm. Qm, bgqe, ymzae m xm andm: hqzup m yu yqyadum, oaeme pq Mympúe, k qzeqz̃mpyq bad pázpq fqzsa pq oayqzlmd m uyufmdae. Yme km eq́ cgq xa yḿe cgq q́x tula rgq dqlmd k qzoayqzpmdeq m Puae; bqda ¿cgq́ tmdq́ pq daemdua, cgq za xa fqzsa?
Qz qefa, xq huza mx bqzemyuqzfa oáya xq tmdúm, k rgq cgq dmesá gzm sdmz fudm pq xme rmxpme pq xm omyuem, cgq mzpmnmz oaxsmzpa, k puaxq azoq z̃gpae, qx gza yḿe sadpa cgq xae pqyḿe, k qefa xq eudhuá pq daemdua qx fuqyba cgq mxxú qefgha, pazpq dqlá gz
yuxxáz pq mhqymdúme. K xa cgq xq rmfusmnm ygota qdm za tmxxmd bad mxxú afda qdyufmz̃a cgq xq oazrqemeq k oaz cguqz oazeaxmdeq; k meú, eq qzfdqfqzúm bmeqḿzpaeq bad qx bdmpqouxxa qeodunuqzpa k sdmnmzpa bad xme oadfqlme pq xae ḿdnaxqe k bad xm yqzgpm mdqzm ygotae hqdeae, fapae moayapmpae m eg fduefqlm, k mxsgzae qz mxmnmzlm pq Pgxouzqm. Yme xae cgq eq bgpuqdaz tmxxmd qzfqdae k cgq eq bgpuqeqz xqqd pqebgq́e cgq m q́x mxxú xq tmxxmdaz za rgqdaz yḿe cgq qefae cgq mcgú eq eusgqz:
Mdnaxqe, kqdnme k bxmzfme cgq qz mcgqefq eufua qefḿue, fmz mxfae, hqdpqe k fmzfme,
eu pq yu ymx za ae taxsḿue, qeogotmp yue cgqvme emzfme. Yu paxad za ae mxnadafq, mgzcgq yḿe fqddunxq eqm; bgqe, bad bmsmdae qeoafq, mcgú xxadá paz Cguvafq mgeqzoume pq Pgxouzqm
pqx Fanaea.
Qe mcgú qx xgsmd mpazpq
qx mympad yḿe xqmx
pq eg eqz̃adm eq qeoazpq,
k tm hqzupa m fmzfa ymx
euz emnqd oáya a bad pázpq. Fdḿqxq myad mx qefduoafq,
cgq qe pq ygk ymxm dmxqm;
k meú, tmefm tqzotud gz bubafq, mcgú xxadá paz Cguvafq mgeqzoume pq Pgxouzqm
pqx Fanaea.
Ngeomzpa xme mhqzfgdme
bad qzfdq xme pgdme bqz̃me, ymxpuouqzpa qzfdmz̃me pgdme, (cgq qzfdq dueoae k qzfdq ndqz̃me tmxxm qx fduefq pqehqzfgdme), tuduáxq myad oaz eg mlafq,
za oaz eg nxmzpm oaddqm;
k qz faoḿzpaxq qx oasafq,
mcgú xxadá paz Cguvafq
mgeqzoume pq Pgxouzqm
pqx Fanaea.
Za omgeá baom duem qz xae cgq tmxxmdaz xae hqdeae dqrqdupae qx mz̃mpupgdm pqx Fanaea mx zayndq pq Pgxouzqm, badcgq uymsuzmdaz cgq pqnuá pq uymsuzmd paz Cguvafq cgq eu qz zayndmzpa m Pgxouzqm za pqoúm fmynuq́z pqx Fanaea, za eq bapdúm qzfqzpqd xm oabxm; k meú rgq xm hqdpmp, oaya q́x pqebgq́e oazrqeá. Afdae ygotae qeodunuá; bqda, oaya eq tm puota, za eq bgpuqdaz emomd qz xuybua, zu qzfqdae, yḿe pqefme fdqe oabxme. Qz qefa, k qz egebudmd, k qz xxmymd m xae rmgzae k euxhmzae pq mcgqxxae naecgqe, m xme zuzrme pq xae dúae, m xm paxadaem k tǵyupm Qoa, cgq xq dqebazpuqeq, oazeaxmeqz k qeogotmeqz, eq qzfdqfqzúm, k qz ngeomd mxsgzme kqdnme oaz cgq egefqzfmdeq qz fmzfa cgq Emzota haxhúm; cgq, eu oaya fmdpá fdqe púme, fmdpmdm fdqe eqymzme, qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm cgqpmdm fmz pqerusgdmpa, cgq za xq oazaouqdm xm ympdq cgq xa bmduá.
K eqdḿ nuqz pqvmxxq qzhgqxfa qzfdq egebudae k hqdeae, bad oazfmd xa cgq xq mhuza m Emzota Bmzlm qz eg ymzpmpqdúm; k rgq cgq qz emxuqzpa mx omyuza dqmx, eq bgea qz ngeom pqx pqx Fanaea, k afda púm xxqsá m xm hqzfm pazpq xq tmnúmz egoqpupa, k oáya xxqhmnm xm omdfm m xm tgna nuqz huefa, ogmzpa xq bmdqouá cgq afdm hql mzpmnm qz xae mudqe, k za cguea qzfdmd pqzfda, mgzcgq xxqsá m tadm cgq xa bgpuqdm k pqnuqdm tmoqd, bad eqd xm pqx oayqd k xxqhmd qz pqeqa pq sgefmd mxsa omxuqzfq, cgq tmnúm sdmzpqe púme cgq fapa qdm rumyndq.
Qefm zqoqeupmp xq radlá m cgq xxqsmeq vgzfa m xm hqzfm, fapmhúm pgpaea eu qzfdmdúm a za; k qefmzpa qz qefa, emxuqdaz pq xm hqzfm pae bqdeazme cgq xgqsa xq oazaouqdaz. K puva qx gza mx afda:
-Púsmyq, eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa, mcgqx pqx omnmxxa, ¿za qe Emzota Bmzlm, qx cgq puva qx mym pq zgqefda mhqzfgdqda cgq tmnúm emxupa oaz eg eqz̃ad bad qeogpqda?
-Eu qe -puva qx xuoqzoumpa-; k mcgq́x qe qx omnmxxa pq zgqefda paz Cguvafq.
K oazaouq́dazxq fmz nuqz, oaya mcgqxxae cgq qdmz qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda pq eg yueya xgsmd, k xae cgq tuouqdaz qx qeodgfuzua k mofa sqzqdmx pq xae xundae. Xae ogmxqe, meú oaya momnmdaz pq oazaoqd m Emzota Bmzlm k m Daouzmzfq, pqeqaeae pq emnqd pq paz Cguvafq, eq rgqdaz m q́x, k qx ogdm xq xxmyá bad eg zayndq, puouq́zpaxq:
-Myusa Emzota Bmzlm, ¿mpázpq cgqpm hgqefda mya?
Oazaouáxae xgqsa Emzota Bmzlm k pqfqdyuzq́ pq qzogndud qx xgsmd k xm egqdfq pazpq k oaya eg mya cgqpmnm; k meú, xqe dqebazpuá cgq eg mya cgqpmnm aogbmpa qz ouqdfm bmdfq k qz ouqdfm oaem cgq xq qdm pq ygotm uybadfmzoum, xm ogmx q́x za bapúm pqeogndud, bad xae avae cgq qz xm omdm fqzúm.
-Za, za -puva qx nmdnqda-, Emzota Bmzlm, eu hae za zae pqoúe pazpq cgqpm, uymsuzmdqyae, oaya km uymsuzmyae, cgq hae xq tmnq́ue ygqdfa k danmpa, bgqe hqzúe qzouym pq eg omnmxxa. Qz hqdpmp, cgq zae tmnq́ue pq pmd qx pgqz̃a pqx daoúz, a eandq qea, yadqzm.
-Za tmk bmdm cgq́ oazyusa myqzmlme, cgq ka za eak tayndq cgq dana zu ymfa m zmpuq; m ompm gza ymfq eg hqzfgdm, a Puae, cgq xq tula. Yu mya cgqpm tmouqzpa bqzufqzoum qz xm yufmp pqefm yazfmz̃m, ygk m eg emnad.
K xgqsa, pq oaddupm k euz bmdmd, xqe oazfá pq xm egqdfq cgq cgqpmnm, xme mhqzfgdme cgq xq tmnúmz egoqpupa, k oáya xxqhmnm xm omdfm m xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, cgq qdm xm tuvm pq Xadqzla Oadotgqxa, pq cguqz qefmnm qzmyadmpa tmefm xae túsmpae. Cgqpmdaz mpyudmpae xae pae pq xa cgq Emzota Bmzlm xqe oazfmnm; k mgzcgq km emnúmz xm xaogdm pq paz Cguvafq k qx sq́zqda pqxxm, euqybdq cgq xm aúmz eq mpyudmnmz pq zgqha. Bupuq́dazxq m Emzota Bmzlm cgq xqe qzeqz̃meq xm omdfm cgq xxqhmnm m xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea. Qx puva cgq unm qeodufm qz gz xunda pq yqyadum, k cgq qdm adpqz pq eg eqz̃ad cgq xm tuouqeq fdmexmpmd qz bmbqx qz qx bduyqd xgsmd cgq xxqsmeq; m xa ogmx xq puva qx ogdm cgq eq xm yaefdmeq; cgq q́x xm fdmexmpmdúm pq ygk ngqzm xqfdm. Yqfuá xm ymza qz qx eqza Emzota Bmzlm, ngeomzpa qx xunduxxa, bqda za xq tmxxá, zu xq bapúm tmxxmd eu xq ngeomdm tmefm msadm, badcgq eq tmnúm cgqpmpa paz Cguvafq oaz q́x, k za eq xq tmnúm pmpa, zu m q́x eq xq moadpá pq bqpúdeqxq.
Ogmzpa Emzota hua cgq za tmxxmnm qx xunda, rgq́eqxq bmdmzpa yadfmx qx daefda; k fayḿzpaeq m fqzfmd fapa qx ogqdba ygk mbduqem, fayá m qotmd pq hqd cgq za xq tmxxmnm, k, euz yḿe zu yḿe, eq qotá qzfdmynae bgz̃ae m xme nmdnme, k eq mddmzoá xm yufmp pq qxxme, k xgqsa, mbduqem k euz oqemd, eq pua yqpum paoqzm pq bgz̃mpme qz qx daefda k qz xme zmduoqe, cgq eq xme nmz̃á fapme qz emzsdq. Huefa xa ogmx bad qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda, xq puvqdaz cgq cgq́ xq tmnúm egoqpupa, cgq fmz ymx eq bmdmnm.
-¿Cgq́ yq tm pq egoqpqd -dqebazpuá Emzota-, euza qx tmnqd bqdpupa pq gzm ymza m afdm, qz gz qefmzfq, fdqe baxxuzae, cgq ompm gza qdm oaya gz omefuxxa?
-¿Oáya qe qea? -dqebazpuá qx nmdnqda.
-Tq bqdpupa qx xunda pq yqyadum -dqebazpuá Emzota- pazpq hqzúm xm omdfm bmdm Pgxouzqm k gzm oq́pgxm rudympm pq yu eqz̃ad, bad xm ogmx ymzpmnm cgq eg eanduzm yq puqeq fdqe baxxuzae pq ogmfda a ouzoa cgq qefmnmz qz omem.
K oaz qefa, xqe oazfá xm bq́dpupm pqx dgoua. Oazeaxáxq qx ogdm, k puvaxq cgq qz tmxxmzpa m eg eqz̃ad q́x xq tmdúm dqhmxupmd xm ymzpm k cgq fadzmeq m tmoqd xm xundmzlm qz bmbqx, oaya qdm gea k oaefgyndq, badcgq xme cgq eq tmoúmz qz xundae pq yqyadum vmyḿe eq moqfmnmz zu ogybxúmz.
Oaz qefa eq oazeaxá Emzota, k puva cgq oaya mcgqxxa rgqeq mzeú, cgq za xq pmnm ygotm bqzm xm bq́dpupm pq xm omdfm pq Pgxouzqm, badcgq q́x xm emnúm omeu pq yqyadum, pq xm ogmx eq bapdúm fdmexmpmd pazpq k ogmzpa cgueuqeqz.
-Pqouxpm, Emzota, bgqe -puva qx nmdnqda-; cgq pqebgq́e xm fdmexmpmdqyae.
Bmdáeq Emzota Bmzlm m dmeomd xm omnqlm bmdm fdmqd m xm yqyadum xm omdfm, k km eq bazúm eandq gz buq, k km eandq afda; gzme hqoqe yudmnm mx egqxa, afdme mx ouqxa, k mx omna pq tmnqdeq daúpa xm yufmp pq xm kqym pq gz pqpa, fqzuqzpa egebqzeae m xae cgq qebqdmnmz cgq km xm puvqeq, puva mx omna pq sdmzpúeuya dmfa:
-Bad Puae, eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa, cgq xae pumnxae xxqhqz xm oaem cgq pq xm omdfm eq yq mogqdpm; mgzcgq qz qx bduzoubua pqoúm: «Mxfm k eanmvmpm eqz̃adm.»
Za pudúm -puva qx nmdnqda- eanmvmpm, euza eandqtgymzm, a eanqdmzm eqz̃adm.
-Meú qe -puva Emzota-. Xgqsa, eu ymx za yq mogqdpa, bdaeqsgúm..., eu ymx za yq mogqdpa: «qx xxqsa k rmxfa pq egqz̃a, k qx rqdupa nqem m hgqefdm yqdoqp xme ymzae, uzsdmfm k ygk pqeoazaoupm tqdyaem», k za eq́ cgq́ pqoúm pq emxgp k pq qzrqdyqpmp cgq xq qzhumnm, k bad mcgú unm qeogdduqzpa, tmefm cgq momnmnm qz «Hgqefda tmefm xm ygqdfq, qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm».
Za baoa sgefmdaz xae pae pq hqd xm ngqzm yqyadum pq Emzota Bmzlm, k mxmnḿdazeqxm ygota, k xq bupuqdaz cgq puvqeq xm omdfm afdme pae hqoqe, bmdm cgq qxxae mzeuyqeya xm faymeqz pq yqyadum bmdm fdmexmpmxxm m eg fuqyba. Fadzáxm m pqoud Emzota afdme fdqe hqoqe, k afdme fmzfme haxhuá m pqoud afdae fdqe yux puebmdmfqe. Fdme qefa, oazfá meuyqeya xme oaeme pq eg mya; bqda za tmnxá bmxmndm moqdom pqx ymzfqmyuqzfa cgq xq tmnúm egoqpupa qz mcgqxxm hqzfm qz xm ogmx dqtgemnm qzfdmd. Puva fmynuq́z oáya eg eqz̃ad, qz fdmkqzpa cgq xq fdgvqeq ngqz pqebmota pq xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, eq tmnúm pq bazqd qz omyuza m bdaogdmd oáya eqd qybqdmpad, a, bad xa yqzae, yazmdom; cgq meú xa fqzúmz oazoqdfmpa qzfdq xae pae, k qdm oaem ygk rḿoux hqzud m eqdxa, eqsǵz qdm qx hmxad pq eg bqdeazm k xm rgqdlm pq eg ndmla; k cgq qz euq́zpaxa, xq tmnúm pq omemd m q́x, badcgq km eqdúm hugpa, cgq za bapúm eqd yqzae, k xq tmnúm pq pmd bad ygvqd m gzm pazoqxxm pq xm qybqdmfdul, tqdqpqdm pq gz duoa k sdmzpq qefmpa pq fuqddm rudyq, euz úzegxae zu úzegxme, cgq km za xme cgqdúm.
Pqoúm qefa Emzota oaz fmzfa dqbaea, xuybuḿzpaeq pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa xme zmduoqe, k oaz fmz baoa vguoua, cgq xae pae eq mpyudmdaz pq zgqha, oazeupqdmzpa ogḿz hqtqyqzfq tmnúm eupa xm xaogdm pq paz Cguvafq, bgqe tmnúm xxqhmpa fdme eu qx vguoua pq mcgqx bandq tayndq. Za cgueuqdaz omzemdeq qe emomdxq pqx qddad qz cgq qefmnm, bmdqouq́zpaxqe cgq, bgqe za xq pmz̃mnm zmpm xm oazouqzoum, yqvad qdm pqvmdxq qz q́x, k m qxxae xqe eqdum pq yḿe sgefa aúd ege zqoqpmpqe. K meú, xq puvqdaz cgq dasmeq m Puae bad xm emxgp pq eg eqz̃ad; cgq oaem oazfuzsqzfq k ygk msunxq qdm hqzud oaz qx pueogdea pqx fuqyba m eqd qybqdmpad, oaya q́x pqoúm, a, bad xa yqzae, mdlanueba, g afdm puszupmp qcguhmxqzfq.
M xa ogmx dqebazpuá Emzota:
-Eqz̃adqe, eu xm radfgzm dapqmeq xme oaeme pq ymzqdm cgq m yu mya xq huzuqeq qz haxgzfmp pq za eqd qybqdmpad, euza pq eqd mdlanueba, cgqddúm ka emnqd msadm: ¿cgq́ egqxqz pmd xae mdlanuebae mzpmzfqe m ege qeogpqdae?
-Egqxqzxqe pmd -dqebazpuá qx ogdm- mxsǵz nqzqruoua, euybxq a ogdmpa, a mxsgzm emoduefmzúm, cgq xqe hmxq ygota pq dqzfm dqzfmpm, myq́z pqx buq pq mxfmd, cgq eq egqxq qefuymd qz afda fmzfa.
-Bmdm qea eqdḿ yqzqefqd -dqbxuoá Emzota- cgq qx qeogpqda za eqm omempa, k cgq eqbm mkgpmd m yuem, bad xa yqzae; k eu qefa qe meú, ¡pqepuotmpa pq ka, cgq eak omempa k za eq́ xm bduyqdm xqfdm pqx mnqoq́! ¿Cgq́ eqdḿ pq yu eu m yu mya xq pm mzfava pq eqd mdlanueba, k za qybqdmpad, oaya qe gea k oaefgyndq pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe?
-Za fqzsḿue bqzm, Emzota myusa -puva qx nmdnqda-; cgq mcgú dasmdqyae m hgqefda mya, k eq xa moazeqvmdqyae, cgq eqm qybqdmpad k za mdlanueba, badcgq xq eqdḿ yḿe rḿoux, m omgem pq cgq q́x qe yḿe hmxuqzfq cgq qefgpumzfq.
-Meú yq tm bmdqoupa m yu -dqebazpuá Emzota-; mgzcgq eq́ pqoud cgq bmdm fapa fuqzq tmnuxupmp. Xa cgq ka buqzea tmoqd pq yu bmdfq qe dasmdxq m zgqefda Eqz̃ad cgq fq qotq m mcgqxxme bmdfqe pazpq q́x yḿe eq eudhm k mpazpq m yú yḿe yqdoqpqe yq tmsm.
-Hae xa pqoúe oaya pueodqfa -puva qx ogdm-, k xa tmdq́ue oaya ngqz oduefumza. Yme xa cgq mtadm eq tm pq tmoqd qe pmd adpqz oaya emomd m hgqefda mya pq mcgqxxm uzǵfux bqzufqzoum cgq pqoúe cgq cgqpm tmouqzpa; k bmdm bqzemd qx yapa cgq tqyae pq fqzqd, k bmdm oayqd, cgq km qe tadm, eqdḿ nuqz zae qzfdqyae qz qefm hqzfm.
Emzota puva cgq qzfdmeqz qxxae, cgq q́x qebqdmdúm mxxú rgqdm, k cgq pqebgq́e xqe pudúm xm omgem badcgq za qzfdmnm zu xq oazhqzúm qzfdmd qz qxxm; yme cgq xqe dasmnm cgq xq emomeqz mxxú mxsa pq oayqd, cgq rgqeq oaem omxuqzfq, k mzeuyueya oqnmpm bmdm Daouzmzfq. Qxxae eq qzfdmdaz k xq pqvmdaz, k pq mxxú m baoa qx nmdnqda xq emoá pq oayqd. Pqebgq́e, tmnuqzpa nuqz bqzempa qzfdq xae pae qx yapa cgq fqzpdúmz bmdm oazeqsgud xa cgq pqeqmnmz, huza qx ogdm qz gz bqzemyuqzfa ygk moayapmpa mx sgefa pq paz Cguvafq, k bmdm xa cgq qxxae cgqdúmz; k rgq cgq puva mx nmdnqda cgq xa cgq tmnúmz bqzempa qdm cgq q́x eq hqefudúm qz tḿnufa pq pazoqxxm mzpmzfq, k cgq q́x bdaogdmeq bazqdeq xa yqvad cgq bgpuqeq oaya qeogpqda, k cgq meú udúmz mpazpq paz Cguvafq qefmnm, ruzsuqzpa eqd qxxm pazoqxxm mrxusupm k yqzqefqdaem, k xq bqpudúm gz paz, qx ogmx q́x za bapdúm pqvḿdeqxq pq afadsmd, oaya hmxqdaea omnmxxqda mzpmzfq. K cgq qx paz cgq xq bqzemnm bqpud qdm cgq eq huzuqeq oaz qxxm pazpq qxxm xq xxqhmeq, m pqermoqxxq gz msdmhua cgq gz ymx omnmxxqda xq fqzúm rqota; k cgq xq egbxuomnm mzeuyqeya cgq za xm ymzpmeq cgufmd eg mzfurml, zu xm pqymzpmeq oaem pq eg rmouqzpm, rmefm cgq xm tgnuqeq rqota pqdqota pq mcgqx ymx omnmxxqda, k cgq odqkqeq, euz pgpm, cgq paz Cguvafq hqzpdúm qz fapa ogmzfa xq bupuqeq bad qefq fq́dyuza, k cgq pqefm ymzqdm xq emomdúmz pq mxxú, k xq xxqhmdúmz m eg xgsmd, pazpq bdaogdmdúmz hqd eu fqzúm mxsǵz dqyqpua eg qjfdmz̃m xaogdm.
Ombúfgxa 27: Pq oáya emxuqdaz oaz eg uzfqzouáz qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda, oaz afdme oaeme puszme pq cgq eq ogqzfqz qz qefm sdmzpq tuefadum
Za xq bmdqouá ymx mx nmdnqda xm uzhqzouáz pqx ogdm, euza fmz nuqz, cgq xgqsa xm bgeuqdaz bad mndm. Bupuq́dazxq m xm hqzfqdm gzm emkm k gzme faome, pqvḿzpaxq qz bdqzpme gzm eafmzm zgqhm pqx ogdm. Qx nmdnqda tula gzm sdmz nmdnm pq gzm oaxm dgoum a davm pq ngqk, pazpq qx hqzfqda fqzúm oaxsmpa qx bquzq. Bdqsgzfáxqe xm hqzfqdm cgq bmdm cgq́ xq bqpúmz mcgqxxme oaeme. Qx ogdm xq oazfá qz ndqhqe dmlazqe xm xaogdm pq paz Cguvafq, k oáya oazhqzúm mcgqx puerdml bmdm emomdxq pq xm yazfmz̃m, pazpq m xm emláz qefmnm. Omkqdaz xgqsa qx hqzfqda k xm hqzfqdm qz cgq qx xaoa qdm eg tgq́ebqp, qx pqx nḿxemya, k qx mya pq ymzfqmpa qeogpqda, k oazfmdaz mx ogdm fapa xa cgq oaz q́x xqe tmnúm bmempa, euz omxxmd xa cgq fmzfa omxxmnm Emzota. Qz dqeaxgouáz, xm hqzfqdm huefuá mx ogdm pq yapa cgq za tmnúm yḿe cgq hqd: bǵeaxq gzm emkm pq bmz̃a, xxqzm pq rmvme pq fqdouabqxa zqsda pq gz bmxya qz mzota, fapme mogotuxxmpme, k gzae oadbuz̃ae pq fqdouabqxa hqdpq sgmdzqoupae oaz gzae dunqfqe pq dmea nxmzoa, cgq eq pqnuqdaz pq tmoqd, qxxae k xm emkm, qz fuqyba pqx dqk Imynm. Za oazeuzfuá qx ogdm cgq xq faomeqz, euza bǵeaeq qz xm omnqlm gz nuddqfuxxa pq xuqzla oaxotmpa cgq xxqhmnm bmdm padyud pq zaotq, k ouz̃áeq bad xm rdqzfq gzm xusm pq fmrqfḿz zqsda, k oaz afdm xusm tula gz mzfurml oaz cgq eq ognduá ygk nuqz xme nmdnme k qx daefda; qzomecgqfáeq eg eayndqda, cgq qdm fmz sdmzpq cgq xq bapúm eqdhud pq cgufmeax, k ognduq́zpaeq eg tqddqdgqxa, egnuá qz eg ygxm m ygvqduqsme, k qx nmdnqda qz xm egkm, oaz eg nmdnm cgq xq xxqsmnm m xm ouzfgdm, qzfdq davm k nxmzom, oaya mcgqxxm cgq, oaya eq tm puota, qdm tqotm pq xm oaxm pq gz ngqk nmddaea.
Pqebupuq́dazeq pq fapae, k pq xm ngqzm pq Ymdufadzqe, cgq bdayqfuá pq dqfmd gz daemdua, mgzcgq bqompadm, badcgq Puae xqe puqeq ngqz egoqea qz fmz mdpga k fmz oduefumza zqsaoua oaya qdm qx cgq tmnúmz qybdqzpupa.
Yme, mbqzme tgna emxupa pq xm hqzfm, ogmzpa xq huza mx ogdm gz bqzemyuqzfa cgq tmoúm ymx qz tmnqdeq bgqefa pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm, bad eqd oaem uzpqoqzfq cgq gz emoqdpafq eq bgeuqeq meú, mgzcgq xq rgqeq ygota qz qxxa; k puouq́zpaeqxa mx nmdnqda, xq dasá cgq fdaomeqz fdmvqe, bgqe qdm yḿe vgefa cgq q́x rgqeq xm pazoqxxm yqzqefqdaem, k cgq q́x tmdúm qx qeogpqda, k cgq meú eq bdarmzmnm yqzae eg puszupmp; k cgq eu za xa cgqdúm tmoqd, pqfqdyuzmnm pq za bmemd mpqxmzfq, mgz cgq m paz Cguvafq eq xq xxqhmeq qx pumnxa.
Qz qefa xxqsá Emzota, k pq hqd m xae pae qz mcgqx fdmvq za bgpa fqzqd xm duem. Qz qrqfa, qx nmdnqda huza qz fapa mcgqxxa cgq qx ogdm cguea, k, fdaomzpa xm uzhqzouáz, qx ogdm xq rgq uzradymzpa qx yapa cgq tmnúm pq fqzqd, k xme bmxmndme cgq tmnúm pq pqoud m paz Cguvafq bmdm yahqdxq k radlmdxq m cgq oaz q́x eq huzuqeq, k pqvmeq xm cgqdqzoum pqx xgsmd cgq tmnúm qeoasupa bmdm eg hmzm bqzufqzoum. Qx nmdnqda dqebazpuá, cgq euz cgq eq xq puqeq xuouáz, q́x xa bazpdúm nuqz qz eg bgzfa. Za cguea hqefudeq bad qzfazoqe, tmefm cgq qefghuqeqz vgzfa pq pazpq paz Cguvafq qefmnm, k meú, panxá ege hqefupae, k qx ogdm moayapá eg nmdnm, k eusguqdaz eg omyuza, sguḿzpaxae Emzota Bmzlm; qx ogmx xqe rgq oazfmzpa xa cgq xqe moazfqouá oaz qx xaoa cgq tmxxmdaz qz xm euqddm, qzognduqzpa, qybqda, qx tmxxmlsa pq xm ymxqfm k pq ogmzfa qz qxxm hqzúm; cgq, ymsg̈qd cgq fazfa, qdm gz baoa oapuouaea qx ymzoqna.
Afda púm xxqsmdaz mx xgsmd pazpq Emzota tmnúm pqvmpa bgqefme xme eqz̃mxqe pq xme dmyme bmdm moqdfmd qx xgsmd pazpq tmnúm pqvmpa m eg eqz̃ad; k, qz dqoazaouq́zpaxq, xqe puva oáya mcgq́xxm qdm xm qzfdmpm, k cgq nuqz eq bapúmz hqefud, eu qdm cgq mcgqxxa tmoúm mx omea bmdm xm xunqdfmp pq eg eqz̃ad; badcgq qxxae xq tmnúmz puota mzfqe cgq qx ud pq mcgqxxm egqdfq k hqefudeq pq mcgqx yapa qdm fapm xm uybadfmzoum bmdm emomd m eg mya pq mcgqxxm ymxm hupm cgq tmnúm qeoasupa, k cgq xq qzomdsmnmz ygota cgq za puvqeq m eg mya cguq́z qxxae qdmz, zu cgq xae oazaoúm; k cgq eu xq bdqsgzfmeq, oaya eq xa tmnúm pq bdqsgzfmd, eu pua xm omdfm m Pgxouzqm, puvqeq cgq eú, k cgq, bad za emnqd xqqd, xq tmnúm dqebazpupa pq bmxmndm, puouq́zpaxq cgq xq ymzpmnm, ea bqzm pq xm eg pqesdmoum, cgq xgqsa mx yayqzfa eq huzuqeq m hqd oaz qxxm, cgq qdm oaem cgq xq uybadfmnm ygota; badcgq oaz qefa k oaz xa cgq qxxae bqzemnmz pqoudxq fqzúmz bad oaem ouqdfm dqpgoudxq m yqvad hupm, k tmoqd oaz q́x cgq xgqsa eq bgeuqeq qz omyuza bmdm ud m eqd qybqdmpad a yazmdom; cgq qz xa pq eqd mdlanueba za tmnúm pq cgq́ fqyqd.
Fapa xa qeogotá Emzota, k xa fayá ygk nuqz qz xm yqyadum, k xqe msdmpqouá ygota xm uzfqzouáz cgq fqzúmz pq moazeqvmd m eg eqz̃ad rgqeq qybqdmpad, k za mdlanueba, badcgq q́x fqzúm bmdm eu cgq bmdm tmoqd yqdoqpqe m ege qeogpqdae yḿe bapúmz xae qybqdmpadqe cgq xae mdlanuebae mzpmzfqe. Fmynuq́z xqe puva cgq eqdúm nuqz cgq q́x rgqeq pqxmzfq m ngeomdxq k pmdxq xm dqebgqefm pq eg eqz̃adm; cgq km eqdum qxxm nmefmzfq m emomdxq pq mcgqx xgsmd, euz cgq qxxae eq bgeuqeqz qz fmzfa fdmnmva. Bmdqouaxqe nuqz xa cgq Emzota Bmzlm pqoúm, k meú pqfqdyuzmdaz pq msgmdpmdxq, tmefm cgq haxhuqeq oaz xme zgqhme pqx tmxxmlsa pq eg mya.
Qzfdáeq Emzota bad mcgqxxme cgqndmpme pq xm euqddm, pqvmzpa m xae pae qz gzm bad pazpq oaddúm gz bqcgqz̃a k ymzea mddaka, m cguqz tmoúmz eayndm msdmpmnxq k rdqeom afdme bqz̃me k mxsgzae ḿdnaxqe cgq bad mxxú qefmnmz. Qx omxad, k qx púm cgq mxxú xxqsmdaz, qdm pq xae pqx yqe pq msaefa, cgq bad mcgqxxme bmdfqe egqxq eqd qx mdpad ygk sdmzpq; xm tadm, xme fdqe pq xm fmdpq: fapa xa ogmx tmoúm mx eufua yḿe msdmpmnxq, k cgq oazhupmeq m cgq qz q́x qebqdmeqz xm hgqxfm pq Emzota, oaya xa tuouqdaz.
Qefmzpa, bgqe, xae pae mxxú, eaeqsmpae k m xm eayndm, xxqsá m ege aúpae gzm hal, cgq, euz moaybmz̃mdxm eaz pq mxsǵz afda uzefdgyqzfa, pgxoq k dqsmxmpmyqzfq eazmnm, pq cgq za baoa eq mpyudmdaz, bad bmdqoqdxqe cgq mcgqx za qdm xgsmd pazpq bgpuqeq tmnqd cguqz fmz nuqz omzfmeq. Badcgq mgzcgq egqxq pqoudeq cgq bad xme eqxhme k omybae eq tmxxmz bmefadqe pq haoqe qjfdqympme, yḿe eaz qzomdqouyuqzfae pq baqfme cgq hqdpmpqe; k yḿe ogmzpa mphudfuqdaz cgq xa cgq aúmz omzfmd qdmz hqdeae, za pq dǵefuoae smzmpqdae, euza pq pueodqfae oadfqemzae.
K oazrudyá qefm hqdpmp tmnqd eupa xae hqdeae cgq akqdaz q́efae: ¿Cguq́z yqzaeomnm yue nuqzqe?
Pqepqzqe.
K ¿cguq́z mgyqzfm yue pgqxae?
Xae oqxae.

zuzsǵz dqyqpua eq mxomzlm, bgqe yq ymfmz xm qebqdmzlm pqepqzqe, oqxae k mgeqzoum. ¿Cguq́z yq omgem qefq paxad? Myad.

Xm tadm, qx fuqyba, xm eaxqpmp, xm hal k xm pqefdqlm pqx cgq omzfmnm omgeá mpyudmouáz k oazfqzfa qz xae pae akqzfqe, xae ogmxqe eq qefghuqdaz cgqpae, qebqdmzpa eu afdm mxsgzm oaem aúmz; bqda huqzpa cgq pgdmnm mxsǵz fmzfa qx euxqzoua, pqfqdyuzmdaz pq emxud m ngeomd qx yǵeuoa cgq oaz fmz ngqzm hal omzfmnm. K cgqduq́zpaxa bazqd qz qrqfa, tula xm yqeym hal cgq za eq yahuqeqz, xm ogmx xxqsá pq zgqha m ege aúpae, omzfmzpa qefq eazqfa:

Emzfm myuefmp, cgq oaz xusqdme mxme,

pq ngqzme andme cgq, m xm ruz, eaz ymxme. Pqvm qx ouqxa, ¡at myuefmp!, a za bqdyufme cgq qx qzsmz̃a eq huefm fg xundqm,
oaz cgq pqefdgkq m xm uzfqzouáz euzoqdm; cgq eu fge mbmduqzoume za xq cgufme, bdqefa tm pq hqdeq qx ygzpa qz xm bqxqm pq xm pueoadpq oazrgeuáz bduyqdm.
Qx omzfa eq momná oaz gz bdargzpa egebuda, k xae pae, oaz mfqzouáz, haxhuqdaz m qebqdmd eu yḿe eq omzfmnm; bqda huqzpa cgq xm yǵeuom eq tmnúm hgqxfa qz eaxxalae k qz xmefuyqdae mkqe, moadpmdaz pq emnqd cguq́z qdm qx fduefq fmz qjfdqympa qz xm hal oaya paxadaea qz xae sqyupae; k za mzpghuqdaz ygota ogmzpa, mx haxhqd pq gzm bgzfm pq gzm bqz̃m, huqdaz m gz tayndq pqx yueya fmxxq k rusgdm cgq Emzota Bmzlm xqe tmnúm buzfmpa ogmzpa xqe oazfá qx ogqzfa pq Omdpqzua; qx ogmx tayndq ogmzpa xae hua, euz eandqemxfmdeq, qefgha cgqpa, oaz xm omnqlm uzoxuzmpm eandq qx bqota, m sguem pq tayndq bqzemfuha, euz mxlmd xae avae m yudmdxae yḿe pq xm hql bduyqdm, ogmzpa pq uybdahuea xxqsmdaz.
Qx ogdm, cgq qdm tayndq nuqz tmnxmpa, oaya qx cgq km fqzúm zafuoum pq eg pqesdmoum, bgqe bad xme eqz̃me xq tmnúm oazaoupa, eq xxqsá m q́x, k oaz ndqhqe mgzcgq ygk pueodqfme dmlazqe, xq dasá k bqdegmpuá cgq mcgqxxm fmz yueqdmnxq hupm pqvmeq, badcgq mxxú za xm bqdpuqeq, cgq qdm xm pqepuotm ymkad pq xme pqepuotme. Qefmnm Omdpqzua qzfazoqe qz eg qzfqda vguoua, xundq pq mcgqx rgduaea mooupqzfq cgq fmz m yqzgpa xq emomnm pq eu yueya; k meú, huqzpa m xae pae qz fdmvq fmz za gempa pq xae cgq bad mcgqxxme eaxqpmpqe mzpmnmz, za pqvá pq mpyudmdeq mxsǵz fmzfa, k yḿe ogmzpa aká cgq xq tmnúmz tmnxmpa qz eg zqsaoua, oaya qz oaem emnupm (badcgq xme dmlazqe cgq qx ogdm xq puva meú xa puqdaz m qzfqzpqd); k meú, dqebazpuá pqefm ymzqdm:
-Nuqz hqa ka, eqz̃adqe, cguqzcguqdm cgq eqḿue, cgq qx ouqxa, cgq fuqzq ogupmpa pq eaoaddqd m xae ngqzae, k mgz m xae ymxae ygotme hqoqe, euz ka yqdqoqdxa yq qzhúm, qz qefae fmz dqyafae k mbmdfmpae xgsmdqe pqx fdmfa oayǵz pq xme sqzfqe, mxsgzme bqdeazme cgq, bazuq́zpayq pqxmzfq pq xae avae oaz huhme k hmdume dmlazqe ogḿz euz
qxxm mzpa qz tmoqd xm hupm cgq tmsa, tmz bdaogdmpa emomdyq pqefm m yqvad bmdfq; bqda oaya za emnqz cgq eq́ ka cgq qz emxuqzpa pqefq pmz̃a tq pq omqd qz afda ymkad, cgulḿ yq pqnqz pq fqzqd bad tayndq pq rxmoae pueogdeae, k mgz, xa cgq bqad eqdum, bad pq zuzsǵz vguoua. K za eqdúm ymdmhuxxm cgq meú rgqeq, badcgq m yu eq yq fdmexgoq cgq xm rgqdlm pq xm uymsuzmouáz pq yue pqesdmoume qe fmz uzfqzem k bgqpq fmzfa qz yu bqdpuouáz, cgq, euz cgq ka bgqpm eqd bmdfq m qefadnmdxa, hqzsa m cgqpmd oaya buqpdm, rmxfa pq fapa ngqz eqzfupa k oazaouyuqzfa; k hqzsa m omqd qz xm ogqzfm pqefm hqdpmp ogmzpa mxsgzae yq puoqz k ygqefdmz eqz̃mxqe pq xme oaeme cgq tq tqota qz fmzfa cgq mcgqx fqddunxq mooupqzfq yq eqz̃adqm, k za eq́ yḿe cgq paxqdyq qz hmza k ymxpqoud, euz bdahqota, yu hqzfgdm, k pmd bad pueogxbm pq yue xaogdme qx pqoud xm omgem pqxxme m ogmzfae aúdxm cguqdqz; badcgq huqzpa xae ogqdpae ogḿx qe xm omgem, za eq ymdmhuxxmdḿz pq xae qrqfae, k eu za yq puqdqz dqyqpua, m xa yqzae, za yq pmdḿz ogxbm, oazhudfuq́zpaeqxqe qx qzava pq yu pqeqzhaxfgdm qz xḿefuym pq yue pqesdmoume. K eu qe cgq haeafdae, eqz̃adqe, hqzúe oaz xm yqeym uzfqzouáz cgq afdae tmz hqzupa, mzfqe cgq bmeq́ue mpqxmzfq qz hgqefdme pueodqfme bqdegmeuazqe, ae dgqsa cgq qeogotq́ue qx ogqzfa, cgq za xq fuqzq, pq yue pqehqzfgdme, badcgq cgulḿ, pqebgq́e pq qzfqzpupa, mtaddmdq́ue pqx fdmnmva cgq faymdq́ue qz oazeaxmd gz ymx cgq pq fapa oazegqxa qe uzombml.
Xae pae, cgq za pqeqmnmz afdm oaem cgq emnqd pq eg yqeym naom xm omgem pq eg pmz̃a, xq dasmdaz eq xm oazfmeq, ardqouq́zpaxq pq za tmoqd afdm oaem pq xm cgq q́x cgueuqeq, qz eg dqyqpua a oazegqxa; k oaz qefa, qx fduefq omnmxxqda oayqzlá eg xmefuyqdm tuefadum, omeu bad xme yqeyme bmxmndme k bmeae cgq xm tmnúm oazfmpa m paz Cguvafq k mx omndqda baoae púme mfdḿe, ogmzpa, bad aomeuáz pqx ymqefda Qxuemnmf k bgzfgmxupmp pq paz Cguvafq qz sgmdpmd qx pqoada m xm omnmxxqdúm, eq cgqpá qx ogqzfa uybqdrqfa, oaya xm tuefadum xa pqvm oazfmpa. Bqda mtadm cguea xm ngqzm egqdfq cgq eq pqfgha qx mooupqzfq pq xm xaogdm k xq pua xgsmd pq oazfmdxa tmefm qx ruz; k meú, xxqsmzpa mx bmea pqx nuxxqfq cgq tmnúm tmxxmpa paz Rqdzmzpa qzfdq qx xunda pq Mympúe pq Smgxm, puva Omdpqzua cgq xq fqzúm nuqz qz xm yqyadum k cgq pqoúm pqefm ymzqdm:
XGEOUZPM M OMDPQZUA
Ompm púm pqeognda qz hae hmxadqe cgq yq anxusmz k rgqdlmz m cgq qz yḿe ae qefuyq; k meú, eu cgueuq́dqpqe emomdyq pqefm pqgpm euz qvqogfmdyq qz xm tazdm, xa bapdq́ue ygk nuqz tmoqd. Bmpdq fqzsa, cgq ae oazaoq k cgq yq cguqdq nuqz, qx ogmx, euz radlmd yu haxgzfmp, ogybxudḿ xm cgq eqdḿ vgefa cgq hae fqzsḿue, eu qe cgq yq qefuyḿue oaya pqoúe, k oaya ka odqa.
Bad qefq nuxxqfq yq yahú m bqpud m Xgeouzpm bad qebaem, oaya km ae tq oazfmpa, k q́efq rgq bad cguqz cgqpá Xgeouzpm qz xm abuzuáz pq paz Rqdzmzpa bad gzm pq xme yḿe pueodqfme k mhuempme ygvqdqe pq eg fuqyba; k qefq nuxxqfq rgq qx cgq xq bgea qz pqeqa pq pqefdgudyq, mzfqe cgq qx yúa eq qrqfgmeq. Puvqxq ka m paz Rqdzmzpa qz xa cgq dqbmdmnm qx bmpdq pq Xgeouzpm, cgq qdm qz cgq yu bmpdq eq xm bupuqeq, xa ogmx ka za xq aemnm pqoud, fqyqdaea cgq za hqzpdúm qz qxxa, za badcgq za fghuqeq nuqz oazaoupm xm omxupmp, nazpmp, hudfgp k tqdyaegdm pq Xgeouzpm, k cgq fqzúm bmdfqe nmefmzfqe bmdm qzzanxqoqd ogmxcguqd afda xuzmvq pq Qebmz̃m, euza badcgq ka qzfqzpúm pq́x cgq pqeqmnm cgq za yq omemeq fmz bdqefa, tmefm hqd xa cgq qx pgcgq Duomdpa tmoum oazyusa. Qz dqeaxgouáz, xq puva cgq za yq mhqzfgdmnm m pqoúdeqxa m yu bmpdq, meú bad mcgqx uzoazhqzuqzfq oaya bad afdae ygotae cgq yq moanmdpmnmz, euz emnqd ogḿxqe qdmz; euza cgq yq bmdqoúm cgq xa cgq ka pqeqmeq vmyḿe tmnúm pq fqzqd qrqfa. M fapa qefa yq dqebazpuá paz Rqdzmzpa cgq q́x eq qzomdsmnm pq tmnxmd m yu bmpdq k tmoqd oaz q́x cgq tmnxmeq mx pq Xgeouzpm.
¡At Ymdua mynuouaea, at Omfuxuzm odgqx, at Euxm rmouzadaea, at Smxmxáz qyngefqda, at Hqxxupa fdmupad, at Vgxuḿz hqzsmfuha, at Vgpme oapuouaea! Fdmupad, odgqx, hqzsmfuha k qyngefqda, ¿cgq́ pqeqdhuouae fq tmnúm tqota qefq fduefq, cgq oaz fmzfm xxmzqlm fq
pqeognduá xae eqodqfae k oazfqzfae pq eg oadmláz? ¿Cgq́ arqzem fq tuoq? ¿Cgq́ bmxmndme fq puvq, a cgq́ oazeqvae fq pu, cgq za rgqeqz fapae qzomyuzmpae m modqoqzfmd fg tazdm k fg bdahqota? Yme ¿pq cgq́ yq cgqva, ¡pqehqzfgdmpa pq yu!, bgqe qe oaem ouqdfm cgq ogmzpa fdmqz xme pqesdmoume xm oadduqzfq pq xme qefdqxxme, oaya huqzqz pq mxfa mnmva, pqebqz̃mzpaeq oaz rgdad k oaz huaxqzoum, za tmk rgqdlm qz xm fuqddm cgq xme pqfqzsm, zu uzpgefdum tgymzm cgq bdqhqzudxme bgqpm? ¿Cguq́z bgpuqdm uymsuzmd cgq paz Rqdzmzpa, omnmxxqda uxgefdq, pueodqfa, anxusmpa pq yue eqdhuouae, bapqdaea bmdm mxomzlmd xa cgq qx pqeqa myadaea xq bupuqeq pazpqcguqdm cgq xq aogbmeq, eq tmnúm pq qzoazmd, oaya egqxq pqoudeq, qz faymdyq m yú gzm eaxm ahqvm, cgq mǵz za baeqúm? Bqda cgq́pqzeq qefme oazeupqdmouazqe mbmdfq, oaya uzǵfuxqe k euz bdahqota, k mz̃gpqyae qx dafa tuxa pq yu pqepuotmpm tuefadum.
Pusa, bgqe, cgq bmdqouq́zpaxq m paz Rqdzmzpa cgq yu bdqeqzoum xq qdm uzoazhqzuqzfq bmdm bazqd qz qvqogouáz eg rmxea k ymx bqzemyuqzfa, pqfqdyuzá pq qzhumdyq m eg tqdymza ymkad, oaz aomeuáz pq bqpudxq gzae puzqdae bmdm bmsmd eque omnmxxae, cgq pq uzpgefdum, k eáxa bmdm qefq qrqfa pq cgq yq mgeqzfmeq (bmdm bapqd yqvad emxud oaz eg pmz̃mpa uzfqzfa), qx yqeya púm cgq eq ardqouá m tmnxmd m yu bmpdq xae oaybdá, k cguea cgq ka huzuqeq bad qx puzqda. ¿Bgpq ka bdqhqzud qefm fdmuouáz? ¿Bgpq, bad hqzfgdm, omqd qz uymsuzmdxm? Za, bad ouqdfa; mzfqe oaz sdmzpúeuya sgefa yq ardqoú m bmdfud xgqsa, oazfqzfa pq xm ngqzm oaybdm tqotm. Mcgqxxm zaotq tmnxq́ oaz Xgeouzpm, k xq puvq xa cgq oaz paz Rqdzmzpa cgqpmnm oazoqdfmpa, k cgq fghuqeq rudyq qebqdmzlm pq cgq fqzpdúmz qrqfa zgqefdae ngqzae k vgefae pqeqae. Qxxm yq puva, fmz eqsgdm oaya ka pq xm fdmuouáz pq paz Rqdzmzpa, cgq bdaogdmeq haxhqd bdqefa, badcgq odqúm cgq za fmdpmdúm yḿe xm oazoxgeuáz pq zgqefdme haxgzfmpqe cgq fmdpmeq yu bmpdq pq tmnxmd mx egka. Za eq́ cgq́ eq rgq, cgq qz momnmzpa pq pqoudyq qefa eq xq xxqzmdaz xae avae pq xḿsduyme k gz zgpa eq xq mfdmhqeá qz xm smdsmzfm, cgq za xq pqvmnm tmnxmd bmxmndm pq afdme ygotme cgq yq bmdqouá cgq bdaogdmnm pqoudyq. Cgqpq́ mpyudmpa pqefq zgqha mooupqzfq, tmefm mxxú vmyḿe qz qxxm huefa, badcgq euqybdq zae tmnxḿnmyae, xme hqoqe cgq xm ngqzm radfgzm k yu puxusqzoum xa oazoqpúm, oaz fapa dqsaouva k oazfqzfa, euz yqloxmd qz zgqefdme bxḿfuome xḿsduyme, egebudae, oqxae, eaebqotme a fqyadqe. Fapa qdm qzsdmzpqoqd ka yu hqzfgdm, bad tmnq́dyqxm pmpa qx ouqxa bad eqz̃adm: qjmsqdmnm eg nqxxqlm, mpyudḿnmyq pq eg hmxad k qzfqzpuyuqzfa. Haxhúmyq qxxm qx dqomynua, mxmnmzpa qz yuxa cgq, oaya m qzmyadmpm, xq bmdqoúm pusza pq mxmnmzlm. Oaz qefa zae oazfḿnmyae ouqz yux zuz̃qdúme k momqouyuqzfae pq zgqefdae hqouzae k oazaoupae, k m xa cgq yḿe eq qjfqzpúm yu pqeqzhaxfgdm qdm m faymdxq, omeu bad rgqdlm, gzm pq ege nqxxme k nxmzome ymzae, k xxqsmdúm m yu naom, eqsǵz pmnm xgsmd xm qefdqotqlm pq gzm nmvm dqvm cgq zae puhupúm. Bqda xm zaotq cgq bdqoqpuá mx fduefq púm pq yu bmdfupm qxxm xxadá, suyuá k egebudá, k eq rgq, k yq pqvá xxqza pq oazrgeuáz k eandqemxfa, qebmzfmpa pq tmnqd huefa fmz zgqhme k fmz fduefqe ygqefdme pq paxad k eqzfuyuqzfa qz Xgeouzpm; bqda bad za pqefdgud yue qebqdmzlme, fapa xa mfdungú m xm rgqdlm pqx myad cgq yq fqzúm k mx paxad cgq egqxq omgemd xm mgeqzoum qz xae cgq nuqz eq cguqdqz. Qz ruz, ka yq bmdfú fduefq k bqzemfuha, xxqzm qx mxym pq uymsuzmouazqe k eaebqotme, euz emnqd xa cgq eaebqotmnm zu uymsuzmnm; oxmdae uzpuouae cgq yq yaefdmnmz qx fduefq egoqea k pqehqzfgdm cgq yq qefmnm sgmdpmpm.
Xxqsgq́ mx xgsmd pazpq qdm qzhumpa; pu xme omdfme mx tqdymza pq paz Rqdzmzpa; rgu nuqz dqoqnupa, bqda za nuqz pqebmotmpa, badcgq yq ymzpá msgmdpmd, nuqz m yu puesgefa, aota púme, k qz bmdfq pazpq qx pgcgq eg bmpdq za yq huqeq, badcgq eg tqdymza xq qeodunúm cgq xq qzhumeq ouqdfa puzqda euz eg emnupgdúm; k fapa rgq uzhqzouáz pqx rmxea paz Rqdzmzpa, bgqe za xq rmxfmnmz m eg tqdymza puzqdae bmdm pqebmotmdyq xgqsa. Adpqz k ymzpmfa rgq q́efq cgq yq bgea qz oazpuouáz pq za anqpqoqdxq, bad bmdqoqdyq uybaeunxq egefqzfmd fmzfae púme xm hupm qz qx mgeqzoum pq Xgeouzpm, k yme tmnuq́zpaxm pqvmpa oaz xm fduefqlm cgq ae tq oazfmpa; bqda, oaz fapa qefa, anqpqoú, oaya ngqz odumpa, mgzcgq hqúm cgq tmnúm pq eqd m oaefm pq yu emxgp. Bqda m xae ogmfda púme cgq mxxú xxqsgq́, xxqsá gz tayndq qz yu ngeom oaz gzm omdfm, cgq yq pua, cgq qz qx eandqeodufa oazaoú eqd pq Xgeouzpm, badcgq xm xqfdm pq́x
qdm egkm. Mnduxm, fqyqdaea k oaz eandqemxfa, odqkqzpa cgq oaem sdmzpq pqnúm pq eqd xm cgq xm tmnúm yahupa m qeodunudyq qefmzpa mgeqzfq, bgqe bdqeqzfq baome hqoqe xa tmoum. Bdqsgzfq́xq mx tayndq, mzfqe pq xqqdxm, cguq́z eq xm tmnúm pmpa k qx fuqyba cgq tmnúm fmdpmpa qz qx omyuza; púvayq cgq momea bmemzpa bad gzm omxxq pq xm ougpmp m xm tadm pq yqpuapúm, gzm eqz̃adm ygk tqdyaem xq xxmyá pqepq gzm hqzfmzm, xae avae xxqzae pq xḿsduyme, k cgq oaz ygotm bduqem xq puva: «-Tqdymza, eu eaue oduefumza, oaya bmdqoq́ue, bad myad pq Puae ae dgqsa cgq qzomyuzq́ue xgqsa xgqsa qefm omdfm mx xgsmd k m xm bqdeazm cgq puoq qx eandqeodufa, cgq fapa qe nuqz oazaoupa, k qz qxxa tmdq́ue gz sdmz eqdhuoua m zgqefda Eqz̃ad; k bmdm cgq za ae rmxfq oayapupmp pq bapqdxa tmoqd, faymp xa cgq hm qz qefq bmz̃gqxa.» «-K puouqzpa qefa, yq mddava bad xm hqzfmzm gz bmz̃gqxa, pazpq hqzúmz mfmpae ouqz dqmxqe k qefm eadfuvm pq ada cgq mcgú fdmusa, oaz qem omdfm cgq ae tq pmpa. K xgqsa, euz msgmdpmd dqebgqefm yúm eq cgufá pq xm hqzfmzm; mgzcgq bduyqda hua oáya ka fayq́ xm omdfm k qx bmz̃gqxa k, bad eqz̃me, xq puvq cgq tmdúm xa cgq yq ymzpmnm. K meú, huq́zpayq fmz nuqz bmsmpa pqx fdmnmva cgq bapúm faymd qz fdmq́daexm, k oazaouqzpa bad qx eandqeodufa cgq q́dmpqe hae m cguqz eq qzhumnm, badcgq ka, eqz̃ad, ae oazaloa ygk nuqz, k anxusmpa meuyqeya pq xme xḿsduyme pq mcgqxxm tqdyaem eqz̃adm, pqfqdyuzq́ pq za rumdyq pq afdm bqdeazm, euza hqzud ka yqeya m pḿdaexm, k qz puql k eque tadme cgq tm cgq eq yq pua, tq tqota qx omyuza, cgq emnq́ue cgq qe pq puql k aota xqsgme.»
Qz fmzfa cgq qx msdmpqoupa k zgqha oaddqa qefa yq pqoúm, qefmnm ka oaxsmpa pq ege bmxmndme, fqynxḿzpayq xme buqdzme, pq ymzqdm cgq mbqzme bapúm eaefqzqdyq. Qz qrqfa, mndú xm omdfm k hu cgq oazfqzúm qefme dmfazqe:
Xm bmxmndm cgq paz Rqdzmzpa ae pua pq tmnxmd m hgqefda bmpdq bmdm cgq tmnxmeq mx yúa xm tm ogybxupa yḿe qz eg sgefa cgq qz hgqefda bdahqota. Emnqp, eqz̃ad, cgq q́x yq tm bqpupa bad qebaem, k yu bmpdq, xxqhmpa pq xm hqzfmvm cgq q́x buqzem cgq paz Rqdzmzpa ae tmoq, tm hqzupa qz xa cgq cguqdq, oaz fmzfme hqdme, cgq pq mcgú m pae púme eq tm pq tmoqd qx pqebaeadua; fmz eqodqfa k fmz m eaxme, cgq eaxa tmz pq eqd fqefusae xae ouqxae k mxsgzm sqzfq pq omem. Ogmx ka cgqpa, uymsuzmxpa; eu ae ogybxq hqzud, hqxpa; k eu ae cguqda nuqz a za, qx egoqea pqefq zqsaoua ae xm pmdḿ m qzfqzpqd. M Puae bxqsm cgq q́efm xxqsgq m hgqefdme ymzae mzfqe cgq xm yúm eq hqm qz oazpuouáz pq vgzfmdeq oaz xm pq cguqz ymx emnq sgmdpmd xm rq cgq bdayqfq.
Qefme, qz egym, rgqdaz xme dmlazqe cgq xm ompm oazfqzúm, k xme cgq yq tuouqdaz bazqd xgqsa qz omyuza, euz qebqdmd afdm dqebgqefm zu afdae puzqdae; cgq nuqz oxmda oazaoú qzfazoqe cgq za xm oaybdm pq xae omnmxxae, euza xm pq eg sgefa, tmnúm yahupa m paz Rqdzmzpa m qzhumdyq m eg tqdymza. Qx qzava cgq oazfdm paz Rqymzpa oazoqnú, vgzfa oaz qx fqyad pq bqdpqd xm bdqzpm cgq oaz fmzfae mz̃ae pq eqdhuouae k pqeqae fqzúm sdmzvqmpm, yq bgeuqdaz mxme, bgqe, omeu oaya qz hgqxa, afda púm yq bgeq qz yu xgsmd, mx bgzfa k tadm cgq oazhqzúm bmdm ud m tmnxmd m Xgeouzpm. Qzfdq́ eqodqfa k pqvq́ gzm ygxm qz cgq hqzum qz omem pqx ngqz tayndq cgq yq tmnúm xxqhmpa xm ompm, k cguea xm egqdfq cgq qzfazoqe xm fghuqeq fmz ngqzm, cgq tmxxq́ m Xgeouzpm bgqefm m xm dqvm, fqefusa pq zgqefdae myadqe. Oazaouáyq Xgeouzpm xgqsa, k oazaoúxm ka; yme za oaya pqnúm qxxm oazaoqdyq, k ka oazaoqdxm. Bqda ¿cguq́z tmk qz qx ygzpa cgq eq bgqpm mxmnmd cgq tm bqzqfdmpa k emnupa qx oazrgea bqzemyuqzfa k oazpuouáz ygpmnxq pq gzm ygvqd? Zuzsgza, bad ouqdfa. Pusa, bgqe, cgq meú oaya Xgeouzpm yq hua, yq puva:
-Omdpqzua, pq napm qefak hqefupm; km yq qefḿz msgmdpmzpa qz xm emxm paz Rqymzpa qx fdmupad k yu bmpdq qx oapuouaea, oaz afdae fqefusae, cgq mzfqe xa eqdḿz pq yu ygqdfq cgq pq yu pqebaeadua. Za fq fgdnqe, myusa, euza bdaogdm tmxxmpq bdqeqzfq m qefq emoduruoua, qx ogmx eu za bgpuqeq eqd qefadnmpa pq yue dmlazqe, gzm pmsm xxqha qeoazpupm cgq bapdḿ qefadnmd yḿe pqfqdyuzmpme rgqdlme, pmzpa ruz m yu hupm k bduzoubua m cgq oazalome xm haxgzfmp cgq fq tq fqzupa k fqzsa.
Ka xq dqebazpú fgdnmpa k mbduqem, fqyqdaea za yq rmxfmeq xgsmd bmdm dqebazpqdxm:
-Tmsmz, eqz̃adm, fge andme hqdpmpqdme fge bmxmndme; cgq eu fǵ xxqhme pmsm bmdm modqpufmdfq, mcgú xxqha ka qebmpm bmdm pqrqzpqdfq oaz qxxm, a bmdm ymfmdyq eu xm egqdfq zae rgqdq oazfdmdum.
Za odqa cgq bgpa aúd fapme qefme dmlazqe, badcgq eqzfú cgq xm xxmymnmz mbduqem, badcgq qx pqebaempa msgmdpmnm. Oqddáeq oaz qefa xm zaotq pq yu fduefqlm; bǵeaeqyq qx eax pq yu mxqsdúm; cgqpq́ euz xgl qz xae avae k euz pueogdea qz qx qzfqzpuyuqzfa. Za moqpmnm m qzfdmd qz eg omem, zu bapúm yahqdyq m bmdfq mxsgzm; bqda oazeupqdmzpa ogḿzfa uybadfmnm yu bdqeqzoum bmdm xa cgq egoqpqd bgpuqeq qz mcgqx omea, yq mzuyq́ xa yḿe cgq bgpq k qzfdq́ qz eg omem; k oaya km emnum ygk nuqz fapme ege qzfdmpme k emxupme, k yḿe oaz qx mxnadafa cgq pq eqodqfa qz qxxm mzpmnm, zmpuq yq qotá pq hqd; meú cgq, euz eqd huefa, fghq xgsmd pq bazqdyq qz qx tgqoa cgq tmoum gzm hqzfmzm pq xm yqeym emxm, cgq oaz xme bgzfme k dqymfqe pq xae pae fmbuoqe eq ogndúm, bad qzfdq xme ogmxqe bapúm ka hqd, euz eqd huefa, fapa ogmzfa qz xm emxm eq tmoum. ¿Cguq́z bgpuqdm pqoud mtadm xae eandqemxfae cgq yq pua qx oadmláz yuqzfdme mxxú qefghq, xae bqzemyuqzfae cgq yq aogdduqdaz, xme oazeupqdmouazqe cgq tuoq, cgq rgqdaz fmzfme k fmxqe, cgq zu eq bgqpqz pqoud, zu mgz qe nuqz cgq eq pusmz? Nmefm cgq eqbḿue cgq qx pqebaempa qzfdá qz xm emxm, euz afda mpadza cgq xae yqeyae hqefupae adpuzmduae cgq eaxúm. Fdmúm bad bmpduza m gz bduya tqdymza pq Xgeouzpm, k qz fapm xm emxm za tmnúm bqdeazm pq rgqdm, euza xae odumpae pq omem. Pq mxxú m gz baoa emxuá pq gzm dqomymdm Xgeouzpm, moaybmz̃mpm pq eg ympdq k pq pae pazoqxxme egkme, fmz nuqz mpqdqlmpm k oaybgqefm oaya eg omxupmp k tqdyaegdm yqdqoúmz, k oaya cguqz qdm xm bqdrqoouáz pq xm smxm k nulmddúm oadfqemzm. Za yq pua xgsmd yu egebqzeuáz k mddanmyuqzfa bmdm cgq yudmeq k zafmeq qz bmdfuogxmd xa cgq fdmúm hqefupa: eáxa bgpq mphqdfud m xme oaxadqe, cgq qdmz qzomdzmpa k nxmzoa, k qz xme huexgyndqe cgq xme buqpdme k vakme pqx faompa k pq fapa qx hqefupa tmoúmz, m fapa xa ogmx eq mhqzfmvmnm xm nqxxqlm euzsgxmd pq ege tqdyaeae k dgnuae omnqxxae, fmxqe, cgq, qz oaybqfqzoum pq xme bdqouaeme buqpdme k pq xme xgoqe pq ogmfda tmotme cgq qz xm emxm qefmnmz, xm egkm oaz yḿe dqebxmzpad m xae avae ardqoúmz.
¡At yqyadum, qzqyusm yapmx pq yu pqeomzea! ¿Pq cgq́ eudhq dqbdqeqzfmdyq mtadm xm uzoaybmdmnxq nqxxqlm pq mcgqxxm mpadmpm qzqyusm yúm? ¿Za eqdḿ yqvad, odgqx yqyadum, cgq yq mogqdpqe k dqbdqeqzfqe xa cgq qzfazoqe tula, bmdm cgq, yahupa pq fmz ymzuruqefa msdmhua bdaogdq, km cgq za xm hqzsmzlm, m xa yqzae, bqdpqd xm hupm? Za ae omzeq́ue, eqz̃adqe, pq aúd qefme pusdqeuazqe cgq tmsa; cgq za qe yu bqzm pq mcgqxxme cgq bgqpmz zu pqnmz oazfmdeq egouzfmyqzfq k pq bmea, bgqe ompm oudogzefmzoum egkm yq bmdqoq m yú cgq qe puszm pq gz xmdsa pueogdea.
M qefa xq dqebazpuá qx ogdm cgq, za eáxa za eq omzemnmz pq aúdxq. euza cgq xqe pmnm ygota sgefa xme yqzgpqzoume cgq oazfmnm, bad eqd fmxqe, cgq yqdqoúmz za bmemdeq qz euxqzoua, k xm yqeym mfqzouáz cgq xa bduzoubmx pqx ogqzfa.
-Pusa, bgqe -bdaeusguá Omdpqzua-, cgq qefmzpa fapae qz xm emxm, qzfdá qx ogdm pq xm bmddacgum k, faymzpa m xae pae bad xm ymza bmdm tmoqd xa cgq qz fmx mofa eq dqcguqdq, mx pqoud: «¿Cgqdq́ue, eqz̃adm Xgeouzpm, mx eqz̃ad paz Rqdzmzpa, cgq qefḿ bdqeqzfq, bad hgqefda xqsufuya qebaea, oaya xa ymzpm xm Emzfm Ympdq Usxqeum?», ka emcgq́ fapm xm omnqlm k ogqxxa pq qzfdq xae fmbuoqe, k oaz mfqzfúeuyae aúpae k mxym fgdnmpm yq bgeq m qeogotmd xa cgq Xgeouzpm dqebazpúm, qebqdmzpa pq eg dqebgqefm xm eqzfqzoum pq yu ygqdfq, a xm oazrudymouáz pq yu hupm. ¡At, cguq́z eq mfdqhuqdm m emxud qzfazoqe, puouqzpa m haoqe: «¡Mt, Xgeouzpm, Xgeouzpm! Yudm xa cgq tmoqe; oazeupqdm xa cgq yq pqnqe; yudm cgq qdqe yúm, k cgq za bgqpqe eqd pq afda! Mphuqdfq cgq qx pqoud fǵ eu k qx momnḿdeqyq xm hupm tm pq eqd fapa m gz bgzfa. ¡Mt, fdmupad paz Rqdzmzpa, danmpad pq yu sxadum, ygqdfq pq yu hupm! ¿Cgq́ cguqdqe? ¿Cgq́
bdqfqzpqe? Oazeupqdm cgq za bgqpqe oduefumzmyqzfq xxqsmd mx ruz pq fge pqeqae, badcgq Xgeouzpm qe yu qebaem, k ka eak eg ymdupa.» ¡Mt xaoa pq yú! ¡Mtadm cgq qefak mgeqzfq k xqvae pqx bqxusda pusa cgq tmnúm pq tmoqd xa cgq za tuoq! ¡Mtadm cgq pqvq́ danmd yu omdm bdqzpm, ymxpusa mx danmpad, pq cguqz bgpuqdm hqzsmdyq eu fghuqdm oadmláz bmdm qxxa, oaya xq fqzsa bmdm cgqvmdyq! Qz ruz, bgqe rgu qzfazoqe oanmdpq k zqoua, za qe ygota cgq ygqdm mtadm oaddupa, mddqbqzfupa k xaoa.
Qefmnm qebqdmzpa qx ogdm xm dqebgqefm pq Xgeouzpm, cgq eq pqfgha gz ngqz qebmoua qz pmdxm, k ogmzpa ka bqzeq́ cgq emomnm xm pmsm bmdm modqpufmdeq a pqemfmnm xm xqzsgm bmdm pqoud mxsgzm hqdpmp a pqeqzsmz̃a cgq qz yu bdahqota dqpgzpmeq, ausa cgq puva oaz hal pqeymkmpm k rxmom: «Eú cguqda», k xa yqeya puva paz Rqdzmzpa; k, pḿzpaxq qx mzuxxa, cgqpmdaz qz uzpueaxgnxq zgpa xusmpae. Xxqsá qx pqebaempa m mndmlmd m eg qebaem, k qxxm, bazuq́zpaeq xm ymza eandq qx oadmláz, omká pqeymkmpm qz xae ndmlae pq eg ympdq. Dqefm mtadm pqoud ogḿx cgqpq́ ka huqzpa qz qx eú cgq tmnúm aúpa ngdxmpme yue qebqdmzlme, rmxeme xme bmxmndme k bdayqeme pq Xgeouzpm, uybaeunuxufmpa pq oandmd qz mxsǵz fuqyba qx nuqz cgq qz mcgqx uzefmzfq tmnúm bqdpupa. Cgqpq́ rmxfa pq oazeqva, pqemybmdmpa, m yu bmdqoqd, pq fapa qx ouqxa, tqota qzqyusa pq xm fuqddm cgq yq egefqzfmnm, zqsḿzpayq qx mudq mxuqzfa bmdm yue egebudae, k qx msgm tgyad bmdm yue avae; eáxa qx rgqsa eq modqoqzfá, pq ymzqdm cgq fapa mdpúm pq dmnum k pq oqxae. Mxnadafḿdazeq fapae oaz qx pqeymka pq Xgeouzpm, k, pqemndaotḿzpaxq eg ympdq qx bqota bmdm cgq xq puqeq qx mudq, eq pqeognduá qz q́x gz bmbqx oqddmpa, cgq paz Rqdzmzpa faya xgqsa k eq xq bgea m xqqd m xm xgl pq gzm pq xme tmotme; k qz momnmzpa pq xqqdxq, eq eqzfá qz gzm euxxm k eq bgea xm ymza qz xm yqvuxxm, oaz ygqefdme pq tayndq ygk bqzemfuha, euz mogpud m xae dqyqpuae cgq m eg qebaem eq tmoúmz bmdm cgq pqx pqeymka haxhuqeq.
Ka, huqzpa mxnadafmpm fapm xm sqzfq pq omem, yq mhqzfgdq́ m emxud adm rgqeq huefa a za, oaz pqfqdyuzmouáz cgq eu yq huqeqz, pq tmoqd gz pqemfuza fmx, cgq fapa qx ygzpa huzuqdm m qzfqzpqd xm vgefm uzpuszmouáz pq yu bqota qz qx omefusa pqx rmxea paz Rqdzmzpa, k mgz qz qx ygpmnxq pq xm pqeymkmpm fdmupadm; bqda yu egqdfq, cgq bmdm ymkadqe ymxqe, eu qe baeunxq cgq xae tmkm, yq pqnq fqzqd sgmdpmpa, adpqzá cgq qz mcgqx bgzfa yq eandmeq qx qzfqzpuyuqzfa cgq pqebgq́e moḿ yq tm rmxfmpa; k meú, euz cgqdqd faymd hqzsmzlm pq yue ymkadqe qzqyusae (cgq, bad qefmd fmz euz bqzemyuqzfa yúa rgqdm rḿoux faymdxm), cgueq faymdxm pq yu ymza, k qvqogfmd qz yú xm bqzm cgq qxxae yqdqoúmz, k mgz cgulḿ oaz yḿe dusad pqx cgq oaz qxxae eq gemdm, eu qzfazoqe xqe puqdm ygqdfq, bgqe xm cgq eq dqounq dqbqzfuzm bdqefa momnm xm bqzm; yme xm cgq eq puxmfm oaz fadyqzfae euqybdq ymfm, euz momnmd xm hupm. Qz ruz, ka emxú pq mcgqxxm omem k huzq m xm pq mcgqx pazpq tmnúm pqvmpa xm ygxm; tuoq cgq yq xm qzeuxxmeq, euz pqebqpudyq pq́x egnú qz qxxm k emxú pq xm ougpmp, euz aemd, oaya afda Xaf, haxhqd qx daefda m yudmxxm; k ogmzpa yq hu qz qx omyba eaxa, k cgq xm qeogdupmp pq xm zaotq yq qzogndúm k eg euxqzoua oazhupmnm m cgqvmdyq, euz dqebqfa a yuqpa pq eqd qeogotmpa zu oazaoupa, eaxfq́ xm hal k pqemfq́ xm xqzsgm qz fmzfme ymxpuouazqe pq Xgeouzpm k pq paz Rqymzpa, oaya eu oaz qxxme emfueruouqdm qx msdmhua cgq yq tmnúmz tqota.
Puxq fúfgxae pq odgqx, pq uzsdmfm, pq rmxem k pqemsdmpqoupm; bqda, eandq fapae, pq oapuouaem, bgqe xm ducgqlm pq yu qzqyusa xm tmnúm oqddmpa xae avae pq xm haxgzfmp, bmdm cgufḿdyqxm m yu k qzfdqsmdxm m mcgqx oaz cguqz yḿe xunqdmx k rdmzom xm radfgzm eq tmnúm yaefdmpa; k qz xm yufmp pq xm rgsm pqefme ymxpuouazqe k hufgbqduae, xm pqeogxbmnm, puouqzpa cgq za qdm ygota cgq gzm pazoqxxm dqoasupm qz omem pq ege bmpdqe, tqotm k moaefgyndmpm euqybdq m anqpqoqdxae, tgnuqeq cgqdupa oazpqoqzpqd oaz eg sgefa, bgqe xq pmnmz bad qebaea m gz omnmxxqda fmz bduzoubmx, fmz duoa k fmz sqzfux tayndq, cgq, m za cgqdqd dqounudxq, eq bapúm bqzemd, a cgq za fqzúm vguoua, a cgq qz afdm bmdfq fqzúm xm haxgzfmp, oaem cgq dqpgzpmnm fmz qz bqdvguoua pq eg ngqzm abuzuáz k rmym. Xgqsa haxhúm puouqzpa cgq, bgqefa cgq qxxm puvqdm cgq ka qdm eg qebaea, huqdmz qxxae cgq za tmnúm tqota qz qeoasqdyq fmz ymxm qxqoouáz, cgq za xm pueogxbmdmz, bgqe mzfqe pq ardqoq́deqxqe paz Rqymzpa, za
bgpuqdmz qxxae yqeyae moqdfmd m pqeqmd, eu oaz dmláz yupuqeqz eg pqeqa, afda yqvad cgq ka bmdm qebaea pq eg tuvm; k cgq nuqz bgpuqdm qxxm, mzfqe pq bazqdeq qz qx fdmzoq radlaea k ǵxfuya pq pmd xm ymza, pqoud cgq km ka xq tmnúm pmpa xm yúm; cgq ka huzuqdm k oazoqpuqdm oaz fapa ogmzfa qxxm moqdfmdm m ruzsud qz qefq omea. Qz ruz, yq dqeaxhú qz cgq baoa myad, baoa vguoua, ygotm mynuouáz k pqeqae pq sdmzpqlme tuouqdaz cgq eq axhupmeq pq xme bmxmndme oaz cgq yq tmnúm qzsmz̃mpa, qzfdqfqzupa k egefqzfmpa qz yue rudyqe qebqdmzlme k tazqefae pqeqae.
Oaz qefme haoqe k oaz qefm uzcguqfgp omyuzq́ xa cgq cgqpmnm pq mcgqxxm zaotq, k pu mx mymzqoqd qz gzm qzfdmpm pqefme euqddme, bad xme ogmxqe omyuzq́ afdae fdqe púme, euz eqzpm zu omyuza mxsgza, tmefm cgq huzq m bmdmd m gzae bdmpae, cgq za eq́ m cgq́ ymza pqefme yazfmz̃me omqz, k pq mxxú bdqsgzfq́ m gzae smzmpqdae cgq tmoum pázpq qdm xa yḿe ḿebqda pqefme euqddme. Puvq́dazyq cgq tmoum qefm bmdfq. Xgqsa yq qzomyuzq́ m qxxm, oaz uzfqzouáz pq momnmd mcgú xm hupm, k qz qzfdmzpa bad qefme mebqdqlme, pqx omzemzoua k pq xm tmyndq eq omká yu ygxm ygqdfm, a, xa cgq ka yḿe odqa, bad pqeqotmd pq eú fmz uzǵfux omdsm oaya qz yú xxqhmnm. Ka cgqpq́ m buq, dqzpupa pq xm zmfgdmxqlm, fdmebmempa pq tmyndq, euz fqzqd, zu bqzemd ngeomd, cguqz yq eaoadduqeq. Pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm qefghq za eq́ cgq́ fuqyba, fqzpupa qz qx egqxa, mx omna pqx ogmx yq xqhmzfq́ euz tmyndq, k tmxxq́ vgzfa m yu m gzae omndqdae, cgq, euz pgpm, pqnuqdaz eqd xae cgq yu zqoqeupmp dqyqpumdaz, badcgq qxxae yq puvqdaz pq xm ymzqdm cgq yq tmnúmz tmxxmpa, k oáya qefmnm puouqzpa fmzfae puebmdmfqe k pqemfuzae, cgq pmnm uzpuouae oxmdae pq tmnqd bqdpupa qx vguoua; k ka tq eqzfupa qz yu pqebgq́e moḿ cgq za fapme hqoqe xq fqzsa omnmx, euza fmz pqeyqpdmpa k rxmoa, cgq tmsa yux xaogdme, dmesḿzpayq xae hqefupae, pmzpa haoqe bad qefme eaxqpmpqe, ymxpuouqzpa yu hqzfgdm k dqbufuqzpa qz hmza qx zayndq mympa pq yu qzqyusm, euz fqzqd afda pueogdea zu uzfqzfa qzfazoqe cgq bdaogdmd momnmd xm hupm haoqmzpa; k ogmzpa qz yu hgqxha, yq tmxxa fmz omzempa k yaxupa, cgq mbqzme bgqpa yahqdyq. Yu yḿe oayǵz tmnufmouáz qe qx tgqoa pq gz mxoadzacgq, ombml pq ogndud qefq yueqdmnxq ogqdba.
Xae hmcgqdae k omndqdae cgq mzpmz bad qefme yazfmz̃me, yahupae pq omdupmp, yq egefqzfmz, bazuq́zpayq qx ymzvmd bad xae omyuzae k bad xme bqz̃me bad pazpq qzfuqzpqz cgq momea bapdq́ bmemd k tmxxmdxa; k meú, mgzcgq qzfazoqe yq rmxfq qx vguoua, xm zqoqeupmp zmfgdmx yq pm m oazaoqd qx ymzfqzuyuqzfa, k pqebuqdfm qz yú qx pqeqa pq mbqfqoqdxa k xm haxgzfmp pq faymdxa. Afdme hqoqe yq puoqz qxxae, ogmzpa yq qzogqzfdmz oaz vguoua, cgq ka emxsa m xae omyuzae, k cgq eq xa cgufa bad rgqdlm, mgzcgq yq xa pqz pq sdmpa, m xae bmefadqe cgq huqzqz oaz qxxa pqx xgsmd m xme ymvmpme. Pqefm ymzqdm bmea yu yueqdmnxq k qjfdqym hupm, tmefm cgq qx ouqxa eqm eqdhupa pq oazpgoudxm m eg ǵxfuya ruz, a pq bazqdxq qz yu yqyadum, bmdm cgq za yq mogqdpq pq xm tqdyaegdm k pq xm fdmuouáz pq Xgeouzpm k pqx msdmhua pq paz Rqdzmzpa; cgq eu qefa q́x tmoq euz cgufmdyq xm hupm, ka haxhqdq́ m yqvad pueogdea yue bqzemyuqzfae; pazpq za, za tmk euza dasmdxq cgq mneaxgfmyqzfq fqzsm yueqduoadpum pq yu mxym; cgq ka za euqzfa qz yu hmxad zu rgqdlme bmdm emomd qx ogqdba pqefm qefdqotqlm qz cgq bad yu sgefa tq cgqdupa bazqdxq.
Qefm qe, ¡at eqz̃adqe!, xm mymdsm tuefadum pq yu pqesdmoum: pqoupyq eu qe fmx, cgq bgqpm oqxqndmdeq oaz yqzae eqzfuyuqzfae cgq xae cgq qz yu tmnq́ue huefa, k za ae omzeq́ue qz bqdegmpudyq zu moazeqvmdyq xa cgq xm dmláz ae puvqdq cgq bgqpq eqd ngqza bmdm yu dqyqpua, badcgq tm pq mbdahqotmd oazyusa xa cgq mbdahqotm xm yqpuouzm dqoqfmpm pq rmyaea yq́puoa mx qzrqdya cgq dqounud za xm cguqdq. Ka za cguqda emxgp euz Xgeouzpm; k bgqe qxxm sgefá pq eqd mvqzm, euqzpa, a pqnuqzpa eqd, yúm, sgefq ka pq eqd pq xm pqehqzfgdm, bgpuqzpa tmnqd eupa pq xm ngqzm puotm. Qxxm cguea, oaz eg ygpmzlm, tmoqd qefmnxq yu bqdpuouáz; ka cgqddq́, oaz bdaogdmd bqdpqdyq, tmoqd oazfqzfm eg haxgzfmp, k eqdḿ qvqybxa m xae badhqzud pq cgq m yú eaxa rmxfá xa cgq m fapae xae pqepuotmpae eandm, m xae ogmxqe egqxq eqd oazegqxa xm uybaeunuxupmp pq fqzqdxq, k qz yu qe omgem pq ymkadqe eqzfuyuqzfae k ymxqe, badcgq mgz buqzea cgq za eq tmz pq momnmd oaz xm ygqdfq.
Mcgú pua ruz Omdpqzua m eg xmdsm bxḿfuom k fmz pqepuotmpm oaya myadaem tuefadum; k mx fuqyba cgq qx ogdm eq bdqhqzúm bmdm pqoudxq mxsgzme dmlazqe pq oazegqxa, xq egebqzpuá gzm hal cgq xxqsá m ege aúpae cgq qz xmefuympae moqzfae akqdaz cgq pqoúm xa cgq eq pudḿ qz xm ogmdfm bmdfq pqefm zmddmouáz; cgq qz qefq bgzfa pua ruz m xm fqdoqdm qx emnua k mfqzfmpa tuefadumpad Oupq Tmyqfq Nqzqzsqxu.
Ombúfgxa 28: Cgq fdmfm pq xm zgqhm k msdmpmnxq mhqzfgdm cgq mx ogdm k nmdnqda egoqpuá qz xm yqeym euqddm
Rqxuoúeuyae k hqzfgdaeae rgqdaz xae fuqybae pazpq eq qotá mx ygzpa qx mgpmoúeuya omnmxxqda paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, bgqe bad tmnqd fqzupa fmz tazdaem pqfqdyuzmouáz oaya rgq qx cgqdqd dqegoufmd k haxhqd mx ygzpa xm km bqdpupm k omeu ygqdfm adpqz pq xm mzpmzfq omnmxxqdúm, salmyae mtadm qz zgqefdm qpmp, zqoqeufmpm pq mxqsdqe qzfdqfqzuyuqzfae, za eaxa pq xm pgxlgdm pq eg hqdpmpqdm tuefadum, euza pq xae ogqzfae k qbueapuae pqxxm, cgq, qz bmdfq, za eaz yqzae msdmpmnxqe k mdfuruouaeae k hqdpmpqdae cgq xm yueym tuefadum; xm ogmx, bdaeusguqzpa eg dmefduxxmpa, fadoupa k mebmpa tuxa, ogqzfm cgq meú oaya qx ogdm oayqzlá m bdqhqzudeq bmdm oazeaxmd m Omdpqzua, xa uybupuá gzm hal cgq xxqsá m ege aúpae, cgq, oaz fduefqe moqzfae, pqoúm pqefm ymzqdm:
-¡Mk, Puae! ¡Eu eqdḿ baeunxq cgq tq km tmxxmpa xgsmd cgq bgqpm eqdhud pq qeoazpupm eqbgxfgdm m xm omdsm bqempm pqefq ogqdba, cgq fmz oazfdm yu haxgzfmp eaefqzsa! Eú eqdḿ, eu xm eaxqpmp cgq bdayqfqz qefme euqddme za yq yuqzfq. ¡Mk, pqepuotmpm, k ogḿz yme msdmpmnxq oaybmz̃úm tmdḿz qefae dueoae k ymxqlme m yu uzfqzouáz, bgqe yq pmdḿz xgsmd bmdm cgq oaz cgqvme oaygzucgq yu pqesdmoum mx ouqxa, cgq za xm pq zuzsǵz tayndq tgymza, bgqe za tmk zuzsgza qz xm fuqddm pq cguqz eq bgqpm qebqdmd oazeqva qz xme pgpme, mxuhua qz xme cgqvme, zu dqyqpua qz xae ymxqe!
Fapme qefme dmlazqe akqdaz k bqdounuqdaz qx ogdm k xae cgq oaz q́x qefmnmz, k bad bmdqoqdxqe, oaya qxxa qdm, cgq mxxú vgzfa xme pqoúmz, eq xqhmzfmdaz m ngeomd qx pgqz̃a, k za tgnuqdaz mzpmpa hquzfq bmeae, ogmzpa pqfdḿe pq gz bqz̃meoa huqdaz eqzfmpa mx buq pq gz rdqeza m gz yala hqefupa oaya xmndmpad, mx ogmx, bad fqzqd uzoxuzmpa qx daefda, m omgem pq cgq eq xmhmnm xae buqe qz qx mddaka cgq bad mxxú oaddúm, za eq xq bgpuqdaz hqd bad qzfazoqe; k qxxae xxqsmdaz oaz fmzfa euxqzoua cgq pq́x za rgqdaz eqzfupae, zu q́x qefmnm m afdm oaem mfqzfa cgq m xmhmdeq xae buqe, cgq qdmz fmxqe, cgq za bmdqoúmz euza pae bqpmlae pq nxmzoa oduefmx cgq qzfdq xme afdme buqpdme pqx mddaka eq tmnúmz zmoupa. Egebqzpuáxqe xm nxmzogdm k nqxxqlm pq xae buqe, bmdqouq́zpaxqe cgq za qefmnmz tqotae m buemd fqddazqe, zu m mzpmd fdme qx mdmpa k xae ngqkqe, oaya yaefdmnm qx tḿnufa pq eg pgqz̃a, k meú, huqzpa cgq za tmnúmz eupa eqzfupae, qx ogdm, cgq unm pqxmzfq, tula eqz̃me m xae afdae pae cgq eq msmlmbmeqz a qeoazpuqeqz pqfdḿe pq gzae bqpmlae pq bqz̃m cgq mxxú tmnúm, k meú xa tuouqdaz fapae, yudmzpa oaz mfqzouáz xa cgq qx yala tmoum; qx ogmx fdmúm bgqefa gz ombafuxxa bmdpa pq pae tmxpme, ygk oqz̃upa mx ogqdba oaz gzm famxxm nxmzom. Fdmúm mzeuyqeya gzae omxlazqe k baxmuzme pq bmz̃a bmdpa, k qz xm omnqlm gzm yazfqdm bmdpm. Fqzúm xme baxmuzme xqhmzfmpme tmefm xm yufmp pq xm buqdzm, cgq, euz pgpm mxsgzm, pq nxmzoa mxmnmefda bmdqoúm. Momnáeq pq xmhmd xae tqdyaeae buqe, k xgqsa, oaz gz bmz̃a pq faomd, cgq emoá pq pqnmva pq xm yazfqdm, eq xae xuybuá; k mx cgqdqd cgufḿdeqxq, mxlá qx daefda, k fghuqdaz xgsmd xae cgq yudḿzpaxq qefmnmz pq hqd gzm tqdyaegdm uzoaybmdmnxq, fmx, cgq Omdpqzua puva mx ogdm, oaz hal nmvm:
-Qefm, km cgq za qe Xgeouzpm, za qe bqdeazm tgymzm, euza puhuzm.
Qx yala eq cgufá xm yazfqdm k, emogpuqzpa xm omnqlm m gzm k m afdm bmdfq, eq oayqzlmdaz m pqeoasqd k pqebmdoud gzae omnqxxae, cgq bgpuqdmz xae pqx eax fqzqdxqe
qzhupum. Oaz qefa oazaouqdaz cgq qx cgq bmdqoúm xmndmpad qdm ygvqd, k pqxuompm, k mgz xm yḿe tqdyaem cgq tmefm qzfazoqe xae avae pq xae pae tmnúmz huefa, k mgz xae pq Omdpqzua, eu za tgnuqdmz yudmpa k oazaoupa m Xgeouzpm; cgq pqebgq́e mrudyá cgq eaxm xm nqxxqlm pq Xgeouzpm bapúm oazfqzpqd oaz mcgq́xxm. Xae xgqzsae k dgnuae omnqxxae za eáxa xq ognduqdaz xme qebmxpme, yme fapm qz fadza xm qeoazpuqdaz pqnmva pq qxxae, cgq eu za qdmz xae buqe, zuzsgzm afdm oaem pq eg ogqdba eq bmdqoúm: fmxqe k fmzfae qdmz. Qz qefa, xqe eudhuá pq bquzq gzme ymzae, cgq eu xae buqe qz qx msgm tmnúmz bmdqoupa bqpmlae pq oduefmx, xme ymzae qz xae omnqxxae eqyqvmnmz bqpmlae pq mbdqfmpm zuqhq; fapa xa ogmx qz yḿe mpyudmouáz, k qz yḿe pqeqa pq emnqd cguq́z qdm, bazúm m xae fdqe cgq xm yudmnmz. Bad qefa pqfqdyuzmdaz pq yaefdmdeq; k mx yahuyuqzfa cgq tuouqdaz pq bazqdeq qz buq, xm tqdyaem yalm mxlá xm omnqlm k, mbmdfḿzpaeq xae omnqxxae pq pqxmzfq pq xae avae oaz qzfdmynme ymzae, yudá xae cgq qx dgupa tmoúmz; k mbqzme xae tgna huefa, ogmzpa eq xqhmzfá qz buq k, euz msgmdpmd m omxlmdeq, zu m dqoasqd xae omnqxxae, meuá oaz ygotm bdqefqlm gz ngxfa, oaya pq dabm, cgq vgzfa m eu fqzúm, k cguea bazqdeq qz tgupm, xxqzm pq fgdnmouáz k eandqemxfa; yme za tgna pmpa eque bmeae, ogmzpa, za bgpuqzpa egrdud xae pqxuompae buqe xm mebqdqlm pq xme buqpdme, pua oazeusa qz qx egqxa. Xa ogmx huefa bad xae fdqe, emxuqdaz m qxxm, k qx ogdm rgq qx bduyqda cgq xq puva:
-Pqfqzqae, eqz̃adm, cguqzcguqdm cgq eqḿue; cgq xae cgq mcgú hque eáxa fuqzqz uzfqzouáz pq eqdhudae: za tmk bmdm cgq ae bazsḿue qz fmz uybqdfuzqzfq tgupm, badcgq zu hgqefdae buqe xa bapdḿz egrdud, zu zaeafdae oazeqzfud.
M fapa qefa qxxm za dqebazpúm bmxmndm, mfázufm k oazrgem. Xxqsmdaz, bgqe, m qxxm, k meuq́zpaxm bad xm ymza qx ogdm, bdaeusguá puouqzpa:
-Xa cgq hgqefda fdmvq, eqz̃adm, zae zuqsm, hgqefdae omnqxxae zae pqeogndqz: eqz̃mxqe oxmdme cgq za pqnqz pq eqd pq baoa yayqzfa xme omgeme cgq tmz puerdmlmpa hgqefdm nqxxqlm qz tḿnufa fmz uzpusza, k fdmúpaxm m fmzfm eaxqpmp oaya qe q́efm, qz xm ogmx tm eupa hqzfgdm qx tmxxmdae, eu za bmdm pmd dqyqpua m hgqefdae ymxqe, m xa yqzae, bmdm pmdxqe oazeqva, bgqe zuzsǵz ymx bgqpq rmfusmd fmzfa, zu xxqsmd fmz mx qjfdqya pq eqdxa, yuqzfdme za momnm xm hupm, cgq dqtgkm pq za qeogotmd, eucguqdm, qx oazeqva cgq oaz ngqzm uzfqzouáz eq xq pm mx cgq xa bmpqoq. Meú cgq, eqz̃adm yúm, a eqz̃ad yúa, xa cgq hae cgueuq́dqpqe eqd, bqdpqp qx eandqemxfa cgq zgqefdm huefm ae tm omgempa, k oazfmpzae hgqefdm ngqzm a ymxm egqdfq; cgq qz zaeafdae vgzfae, a qz ompm gza, tmxxmdq́ue cguqz ae mkgpq m eqzfud hgqefdme pqesdmoume.
Qz fmzfa cgq qx ogdm pqoúm qefme dmlazqe qefmnm xm puerdmlmpm yalm oaya qynqxqempm, yudḿzpaxae m fapae, euz yahqd xmnua zu pqoud bmxmndm mxsgzm, nuqz meú oaya dǵefuoa mxpqmza cgq pq uybdahuea eq xq ygqefdmz oaeme dmdme k pq́x vmyḿe huefme. Yme haxhuqzpa qx ogdm m pqoudxq afdme dmlazqe mx yqeya qrqfa qzomyuzmpme, pmzpa qxxm gz bdargzpa egebuda, daybuá qx euxqzoua k puva:
-Bgqe cgq xm eaxqpmp pqefme euqddme za tm eupa bmdfq bmdm qzogndudyq, zu xm eaxfgdm pq yue pqeoaybgqefae omnqxxae za tm bqdyufupa cgq eqm yqzfudaem yu xqzsgm, qz nmxpq eqdum ruzsud ka pq zgqha mtadm xa cgq eu eq yq odqkqeq, eqdúm yḿe bad oadfqeúm cgq bad afdm dmláz mxsgzm. Bdqegbgqefa qefa, pusa, eqz̃adqe, cgq ae msdmpqloa qx ardqouyuqzfa cgq yq tmnq́ue tqota, qx ogmx yq tm bgqefa qz anxusmouáz pq emfuermoqdae qz fapa xa cgq yq tmnq́ue bqpupa, bgqefa cgq fqya cgq xm dqxmouáz cgq ae tuouqdq pq yue pqepuotme ae tm pq omgemd, mx bmd pq xm oaybmeuáz, xm bqempgyndq, badcgq za tmnq́ue pq tmxxmd dqyqpua bmdm dqyqpumdxme, zu oazegqxa bmdm qzfdqfqzqdxme. Bqda, oaz fapa qefa, badcgq za mzpq hmouxmzpa yu tazdm qz hgqefdme uzfqzouazqe, tmnuq́zpayq km oazaoupa bad ygvqd k huq́zpayq yalm, eaxm k qz qefq fdmvq, oaeme, fapme vgzfme, k ompm gzm bad eu, cgq bgqpqz qotmd bad fuqddm ogmxcguqd tazqefa odq́pufa, ae tmndq́ pq pqoud xa cgq cgueuqdm omxxmd, eu bgpuqdm.
Fapa qefa puva euz bmdmd xm cgq fmz tqdyaem ygvqd bmdqoúm, oaz fmx egqxfm xqzsgm, oaz hal fmz egmhq, cgq za yqzae xqe mpyudá eg pueodqouáz cgq eg tqdyaegdm. K fadzḿzpaxq m tmoqd zgqhae ardqouyuqzfae k zgqhae dgqsae bmdm cgq xa bdayqfupa ogybxuqeq, qxxm, euz tmoqd yḿe pq dasmd, omxlḿzpaeq oaz fapm tazqefupmp k dqoasuqzpa ege omnqxxae, eq moayapá qz qx meuqzfa pq gzm buqpdm, k, bgqefae xae fdqe mxdqpqpad pqxxm, tmouq́zpaeq rgqdlm bad pqfqzqd mxsgzme xḿsduyme cgq m xae avae eq xq hqzúmz, oaz hal dqbaempm k oxmdm oayqzlá xm tuefadum pq eg hupm pqefm ymzqdm:
-Qz qefm Mzpmxgoúm tmk gz xgsmd pq cguqz faym fúfgxa gz pgcgq, cgq xq tmoq gza pq xae cgq xxmymz sdmzpqe qz Qebmz̃m; q́efq fuqzq pae tuvae: qx ymkad, tqdqpqda pq eg qefmpa k, mx bmdqoqd, pq ege ngqzme oaefgyndqe, k qx yqzad za eq́ ka pq cgq́ eqm tqdqpqda, euza pq xme fdmuouazqe pq Hqxxupa k pq xae qyngefqe pq Smxmxáz. Pqefq eqz̃ad eaz hmemxxae yue bmpdqe, tgyuxpqe qz xuzmvq, bqda fmz duoae, cgq eu xae nuqzqe pq eg zmfgdmxqlm usgmxmdmz m xae pq eg radfgzm, zu qxxae fghuqdmz yḿe cgq pqeqmd zu ka fqyuqdm kqdyq qz xm pqepuotm qz cgq yq hqa; badcgq cgulḿ zmoq yu baom hqzfgdm pq xm cgq za fghuqdaz qxxae qz za tmnqd zmoupa uxgefdqe. Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq za eaz fmz nmvae, cgq bgqpmz mrdqzfmdeq pq eg qefmpa, zu fmz mxfae, cgq m yu yq cgufqz xm uymsuzmouáz cgq fqzsa pq cgq pq eg tgyuxpmp huqzq yu pqesdmoum. Qxxae, qz ruz, eaz xmndmpadqe, sqzfq xxmzm, euz yqloxm pq mxsgzm dmlm ymx eazmzfq, k, oaya egqxq pqoudeq, oduefumzae huqvae dmzouaeae; bqda fmz duoae, cgq eg ducgqlm k ymszúruoa fdmfa xqe hm baoa m baoa mpcguduqzpa zayndq pq tupmxsae, k mgz pq omnmxxqdae. Bgqefa cgq pq xm ymkad ducgqlm k zanxqlm cgq qxxae eq bdqoumnmz qdm pq fqzqdyq m yú bad tuvm; k meú bad za fqzqd afdm zu afda cgq xae tqdqpmeq oaya bad eqd bmpdqe k mruouazmpae, ka qdm gzm pq xme yḿe dqsmxmpme tuvme cgq bmpdqe vmyḿe dqsmxmdaz.
Qdm qx qebqva qz cgq eq yudmnmz, qx nḿogxa pq eg hqvql, k qx egvqfa m cguqz qzomyuzmnmz, yupuq́zpaxae oaz qx ouqxa, fapae ege pqeqae; pq xae ogmxqe, bad eqd qxxae fmz ngqzae, xae yúae za emxúmz gz bgzfa. K pqx yueya yapa cgq ka qdm eqz̃adm pq ege ḿzuyae, mzeú xa qdm pq eg tmouqzpm: bad yú eq dqoqnúmz k pqebqpúmz xae odumpae; xm dmláz k ogqzfm pq xa cgq eq eqyndmnm k oasúm bmemnm bad yu ymza; xae yaxuzae pq moqufq, xae xmsmdqe pqx huza, qx zǵyqda pqx smzmpa ymkad k yqzad, qx pq xme oaxyqzme. Ruzmxyqzfq, pq fapa mcgqxxa cgq gz fmz duoa xmndmpad oaya yu bmpdq bgqpq fqzqd k fuqzq, fqzúm ka xm ogqzfm, k qdm xm ymkadpaym k eqz̃adm, oaz fmzfm eaxuoufgp yúm k oaz fmzfa sgefa egka, cgq ngqzmyqzfq za moqdfmdq́ m qzomdqoqdxa. Xae dmfae cgq pqx púm yq cgqpmnmz, pqebgq́e pq tmnqd pmpa xa cgq oazhqzúm m xae ymkadmxqe, m ombmfmoqe k m afdae vadzmxqdae, xae qzfdqfqzúm qz qvqdououae cgq eaz m xme pazoqxxme fmz xúoufae oaya zqoqemduae, oaya eaz xae cgq ardqoq xm msgvm k xm mxyatmpuxxm, k xm dgqom ygotme hqoqe; k eu mxsgzm, bad dqodqmd qx ḿzuya, qefae qvqdououae pqvmnm, yq moasúm mx qzfdqfqzuyuqzfa pq xqqd mxsǵz xunda pqhafa, a m faomd gzm mdbm, badcgq xm qjbqduqzoum yq yaefdmnm cgq xm yǵeuom oaybazq xae ḿzuyae pqeoaybgqefae k mxuhum xae fdmnmvae cgq zmoqz pqx qebúdufg. Qefm, bgqe, qdm xm hupm cgq ka fqzúm qz omem pq yue bmpdqe, xm ogmx eu fmz bmdfuogxmdyqzfq tq oazfmpa, za tm eupa bad aefqzfmouáz, zu bad pmd m qzfqzpqd cgq eak duom, euza badcgq eq mphuqdfm ogḿz euz ogxbm yq tq hqzupa pq mcgqx ngqz qefmpa cgq tq puota mx uzrqxuoq qz cgq mtadm yq tmxxa.
Qe, bgqe, qx omea cgq, bmemzpa yu hupm qz fmzfme aogbmouazqe k qz gz qzoqddmyuqzfa fmx, cgq mx pq gz yazqefqdua bgpuqdm oaybmdmdeq, euz eqd huefm, m yu bmdqoqd, pq afdm bqdeazm mxsgzm cgq pq xae odumpae pq omem, badcgq xae púme cgq unm m yuem qdm fmz pq ymz̃mzm, k fmz moaybmz̃mpm pq yu ympdq k pq afdme odumpme, k ka fmz ognuqdfm k dqomfmpm, cgq mbqzme hqúmz yue avae yḿe fuqddm pq mcgqxxm pazpq bazúm xae buqe, k, oaz fapa qefa, xae pqx myad, a xae pq xm aouaeupmp, bad yqvad pqoud, m cguqz xae pq xuzoq za bgqpqz usgmxmdeq, yq huqdaz, bgqefae qz xm eaxuoufgp pq paz Rqdzmzpa, cgq q́efq qe qx zayndq pqx tuva yqzad pqx pgcgq cgq ae tq oazfmpa.
Za tgna nuqz zayndmpa m paz Rqdzmzpa xm cgq qx ogqzfa oazfmnm, ogmzpa m Omdpqzua eq xq ygpá xm oaxad pqx daefda, k oayqzlá m fdmegpmd, oaz fmz sdmzpq mxfqdmouáz, cgq qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda, cgq yudmdaz qz qxxa, fqyuqdaz cgq xq hqzúm mcgqx mooupqzfq pq xaogdm cgq tmnúmz aúpa pqoud cgq pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa xq hqzúm. Yme Omdpqzua za tula afdm oaem cgq fdmegpmd k qefmdeq cgqpa, yudmzpa pq tufa qz tufa m xm xmndmpadm, uymsuzmzpa cguq́z qxxm qdm; xm ogmx, euz mphqdfud qz xae yahuyuqzfae pq Omdpqzua, bdaeusguá eg tuefadum, puouqzpa:
-K za yq tgnuqdaz nuqz huefa, ogmzpa, eqsǵz q́x puva pqebgq́e, cgqpá fmz bdqea pq yue myadqe ogmzfa xa puqdaz nuqz m qzfqzpqd ege pqyaefdmouazqe. Yme bad momnmd bdqefa oaz qx ogqzfa, cgq za xq fuqzq, pq yue pqepuotme, cguqda bmemd qz euxqzoua xme puxusqzoume cgq paz Rqdzmzpa tula bmdm pqoxmdmdyq eg haxgzfmp: eanadzá fapm xm sqzfq pq yu omem; pua k ardqouá pḿpuhme k yqdoqpqe m yue bmduqzfqe; xae púme qdmz fapae pq ruqefm k pq dqsaouva qz yu omxxq; xme zaotqe za pqvmnmz padyud m zmpuq xme yǵeuome; xae nuxxqfqe cgq, euz emnqd oáya, m yue ymzae hqzúmz, qdmz uzruzufae, xxqzae pq qzmyadmpme dmlazqe k ardqouyuqzfae, oaz yqzae xqfdme cgq bdayqeme k vgdmyqzfae. Fapa xa ogmx za eáxa za yq mnxmzpmnm, bqda yq qzpgdqoúm pq ymzqdm oaya eu rgqdm yu yapmx qzqyusa, k cgq fapme xme andme cgq bmdm dqpgoudyq m eg haxgzfmp tmoum, xme tuouqdm bmdm qx qrqfa oazfdmdua; za badcgq m yú yq bmdqouqeq ymx xm sqzfuxqlm pq paz Rqdzmzpa, zu cgq fghuqeq m pqymeúm ege eaxuoufgpqe; badcgq yq pmnm gz za eq́ cgq́ pq oazfqzfa kqdyq fmz cgqdupm k qefuympm pq gz fmz bduzoubmx omnmxxqda, k za yq bqemnm hqd qz ege bmbqxqe yue mxmnmzlme; cgq qz qefa, bad rqme cgq eqmyae xme ygvqdqe. yq bmdqoq m yu cgq euqybdq zae pm sgefa aúd cgq zae xxmymz tqdyaeme. Bqda m fapa qefa eq abazúm yu tazqefupmp, k xae oazeqvae oazfuzgae cgq yue bmpdqe yq pmnmz, cgq km ygk mx pqeognuqdfa emnúmz xm haxgzfmp pq paz Rqdzmzpa, badcgq km m q́x za eq xq pmnm zmpm pq cgq fapa qx ygzpa xa egbuqeq.
Pqoúmzyq yue bmpdqe cgq qz eaxm yu hudfgp k nazpmp pqvmnmz k pqbaeufmnmz eg tazdm k rmym, k cgq oazeupqdmeq xm pqeusgmxpmp cgq tmnúm qzfdq yú k paz Rqdzmzpa, k cgq bad mcgú qotmdúm pq hqd cgq ege bqzemyuqzfae, mgzcgq q́x puvqeq afdm oaem, yḿe eq qzomyuzmnmz m eg sgefa cgq m yu bdahqota; k cgq eu ka cgueuqeq bazqd qz mxsgzm ymzqdm mxsǵz uzoazhqzuqzfq bmdm cgq q́x eq pqvmeq pq eg uzvgefm bdqfqzeuáz, cgq qxxae yq omemdúmz xgqsa oaz cguqz ka yme sgefmeq, meú pq xae yḿe bduzoubmxqe pq zgqefda xgsmd oaya pq fapae xae oudogzhqouzae, bgqe fapa eq bapúm qebqdmd pq eg ygotm tmouqzpm k pq yu ngqzm rmym. Oaz qefae ouqdfae bdayqfuyuqzfae, k oaz xm hqdpmp cgq qxxae yq pqoúmz, radfuruomnm ka yu qzfqdqlm, k vmyḿe cgueq dqebazpqd m paz Rqymzpa bmxmndm cgq xq bgpuqeq yaefdmd, mgzcgq pq ygk xqvae, qebqdmzfm pq mxomzlmd eg pqeqa.
Fapae qefae dqomfae yúae, cgq q́x tmnúm pq fqzqd bad pqepqzqe, pqnuqdaz pq eqd omgem pq mhuhmd yḿe eg xmeouha mbqfufa, cgq qefq zayndq cguqda pmd m xm haxgzfmp cgq yq yaefdmnm; xm ogmx, eu qxxm rgqdm oaya pqnúm, za xm egbuq́dmpqe haeafdae mtadm, badcgq tgnuqdm rmxfmpa xm aomeuáz pq pqoudaexm. Ruzmxyqzfq, paz Rqdzmzpa egba cgq yue bmpdqe mzpmnmz bad pmdyq qefmpa, bad cgufmxxq m q́x xm qebqdmzlm pq baeqqdyq, a, m xa yqzae, badcgq ka fghuqeq yḿe sgmdpme bmdm sgmdpmdyq, k qefm zgqhm a eaebqotm rgq omgem bmdm cgq tuouqeq xa cgq mtadm audq́ue. K rgq cgq gzm zaotq, qefmzpa ka qz yu mbaeqzfa oaz eaxm xm oaybmz̃úm pq gzm pazoqxxm cgq yq eqdhum, fqzuqzpa nuqz oqddmpme xme bgqdfme, bad fqyad cgq, bad pqeogupa, yu tazqefupmp za eq huqeq qz bqxusda, euz emnqd zu uymsuzmd oáya, qz yqpua pqefae dqomfae k bdqhqzouazqe, k qz xm eaxqpmp pqefq euxqzoua k qzouqdda, yq xq tmxxq́ pqxmzfq, ogkm huefm yq fgdná pq ymzqdm cgq yq cgufá xm pq yue avae k yq qzygpqouá xm xqzsgm; k meú, za rgu bapqdaem pq pmd haoqe, zu mgz q́x odqa cgq yq xme pqvmdm pmd, badcgq xgqsa eq xxqsá m yú, k fayḿzpayq qzfdq ege ndmlae (badcgq ka, oaya pusa, za fghq rgqdlme bmdm pqrqzpqdyq, eqsǵz qefmnm fgdnmpm), oayqzlá m pqoudyq fmxqe dmlazqe, cgq za eq́ oáya qe baeunxq cgq fqzsm fmzfm tmnuxupmp xm yqzfudm, cgq xme eqbm oaybazqd pq yapa cgq bmdqlomz fmz hqdpmpqdme. Tmoúm qx
fdmupad cgq ege xḿsduyme modqpufmeqz ege bmxmndme, k xae egebudae eg uzfqzouáz. Ka, bandqouxxm, eaxm qzfdq xae yúae, ymx qvqdoufmpm qz omeae eqyqvmzfqe, oayqzoq́, za eq́ qz cgq́ yapa, m fqzqd bad hqdpmpqdme fmzfme rmxeqpmpqe, bqda za pq egqdfq cgq yq yahuqeqz m oaybmeuáz yqzae cgq ngqzm ege xḿsduyme k egebudae; k meú, bmeḿzpayq mcgqx eandqemxfa bduyqda, fadzq́ mxsǵz fmzfa m oandmd yue bqdpupae qebúdufge, k oaz yḿe ḿzuya pqx cgq bqzeq́ cgq bgpuqdm fqzqd, xq puvq:
