«-Eu oaya qefak, eqz̃ad, qz fge ndmlae, qefghuqdm qz xae pq gz xqáz ruqda, k qx xundmdyq pqxxae eq yq meqsgdmdm oaz cgq tuouqdm, a puvqdm, oaem cgq rgqdm qz bqdvguoua pq yu tazqefupmp, meú rgqdm baeunxq tmoqxxm a pqouxxm oaya qe baeunxq pqvmd pq tmnqd eupa xa cgq rgq. Meú cgq, eu fǵ fuqzqe oqz̃upa yu ogqdza oaz fge ndmlae, ka fqzsa mfmpm yu mxym oaz yue ngqzae pqeqae, cgq eaz fmz purqdqzfqe pq xae fgkae oaya xa hqdḿe, eu oaz tmoqdyq rgqdlm cgueuqdqe bmemd mpqxmzfq qz qxxae. Fg hmemxxm eak, bqda za fg qeoxmhm; zu fuqzq zu pqnq fqzqd uybqdua xm zanxqlm pq fg emzsdq bmdm pqetazdmd k fqzqd qz baoa xm tgyuxpmp pq xm yúm; k qz fmzfa yq qefuya ka, huxxmzm k xmndmpadm, oaya fǵ, eqz̃ad k omnmxxqda. Oazyusa za tmz pq eqd pq zuzsǵz qrqofa fge rgqdlme, zu tmz pq fqzqd hmxad fge ducgqlme, zu fge bmxmndme tmz pq bapqd qzsmz̃mdyq, zu fge egebudae k xḿsduyme qzfqdzqoqdyq. Eu mxsgzm pq fapme qefme oaeme cgq tq puota huqdm ka qz qx cgq yue bmpdqe yq puqdmz bad qebaea, m eg haxgzfmp eq mvgefmdm xm yúm, k yu haxgzfmp pq xm egkm za emxuqdm; pq yapa cgq, oaya cgqpmdm oaz tazdm, mgzcgq cgqpmdm euz sgefa, pq sdmpa fq qzfdqsmdm xa cgq fǵ, eqz̃ad, mtadm oaz fmzfm rgqdlm bdaogdme. Fapa qefa tq puota badcgq za qe bqzemd cgq pq yu mxomzoq oaem mxsgzm qx cgq za rgqeq yu xqsúfuya qebaea.»
«-Eu za dqbmdme yḿe cgq qz qea, nqxxúeuym Padafqm (cgq q́efq qe qx zayndq pqefm pqepuotmpm) -puva qx pqexqmx omnmxxqda-, hqe mcgú fq pak xm ymza pq eqdxa fgka, k eqmz fqefusae pqefm hqdpmp xae ouqxae, m cguqz zuzsgzm oaem eq qeoazpq, k qefm uymsqz pq Zgqefdm Eqz̃adm cgq mcgú fuqzqe.»
Ogmzpa Omdpqzua xq aká pqoud cgq eq xxmymnm Padafqm, fayá pq zgqha m ege eandqemxfae k momná pq oazrudymd bad hqdpmpqdm eg bduyqdm abuzuáz; bqda za cguea uzfqddaybqd qx ogqzfa, bad hqd qz cgq́ hqzum m bmdmd xa cgq q́x km omeu emnum; eáxa puva:
-¿Cgq Padafqm qe fg zayndq, eqz̃adm? Afdm tq aúpa ka pqoud pqx yqeya, cgq cgulḿ oaddq bmdqvme oaz fge pqepuotme. Bmem mpqxmzfq, cgq fuqyba hqzpdḿ qz cgq fq pusm oaeme cgq fq qebmzfqz qz qx yqeya sdmpa cgq fq xmefuyqz.
Dqbmdá Padafqm qz xme dmlazqe pq Omdpqzua k qz eg qjfdmz̃a k pqemefdmpa fdmvq, k dasáxq cgq eu mxsgzm oaem pq eg tmouqzpm emnúm, eq xm puvqeq xgqsa; badcgq eu mxsa xq tmnúm pqvmpa ngqza xm radfgzm, qdm qx ḿzuya cgq fqzúm bmdm egrdud ogmxcguqd pqemefdq cgq xq eandqhuzuqeq, eqsgdm pq cgq, m eg bmdqoqd, zuzsgza bapúm xxqsmd cgq qx cgq fqzúm modqoqzfmeq gz bgzfa.
-Za xq bqdpuqdm ka, eqz̃adm -dqebazpuá Omdpqzua-, qz pqoudfq xa cgq buqzea, eu rgqdm hqdpmp xa cgq uymsuza; k tmefm mtadm za eq buqdpq oakgzfgdm, zu m fu fq uybadfm zmpm qx emnqdxa.
-Eqm xa cgq rgqdq -dqebazpuá Padafqm-, xa cgq qz yu ogqzfa bmem rgq cgq faymzpa paz Rqdzmzpa gzm uymsqz cgq qz mcgqx mbaeqzfa qefmnm, xm bgea bad fqefusa pq zgqefda pqebaeadua; oaz bmxmndme qruomoúeuyme k vgdmyqzfae qjfdmadpuzmduae yq pua xm bmxmndm pq eqd yu ymdupa, bgqefa cgq, mzfqe cgq momnmeq pq pqoudxme, xq puvq cgq yudmeq nuqz xa cgq tmoúm, k cgq oazeupqdmeq qx qzava cgq eg bmpdq tmnúm pq dqoqnud pq hqdxq omempa oaz gzm huxxmzm, hmemxxm egkm; cgq za xq oqsmeq yu tqdyaegdm, fmx ogmx qdm, bgqe za qdm nmefmzfq bmdm tmxxmd qz qxxm pueogxbm pq eg kqdda, k cgq eu mxsǵz nuqz yq cgqpm tmoqd, bad qx myad cgq yq fqzúm, rgqeq pqvmd oaddqd yu egqdfq
m xa usgmx pq xa cgq yu omxupmp bqpúm, badcgq zgzom xae fmz pqeusgmxqe omemyuqzfae eq salmz zu pgdmz ygota qz mcgqx sgefa oaz cgq eq oayuqzlmz.
Fapme qefme dmlazqe cgq mcgú tq puota xq puvq, k afdme ygotme pq cgq za yq mogqdpa; bqda za rgqdaz bmdfq bmdm cgq q́x pqvmeq pq eqsgud eg uzfqzfa, nuqz mzeú oaya qx cgq za buqzem bmsmd, cgq, mx oazoqdfmd pq xm nmdmfm, za dqbmdm qz uzoazhqzuqzfqe.
Ka, m qefm emláz, tuoq gz ndqhq pueogdea oazyusa, k yq puvq m yu yqeym: «Eu, cgq za eqdq́ ka xm bduyqdm cgq bad húm pq ymfduyazua tmkm egnupa pq tgyuxpq m sdmzpq qefmpa, zu eqdḿ paz Rqdzmzpa qx bduyqda m cguqz tqdyaegdm, a ouqsm mruouáz, cgq qe xa yḿe ouqdfa, tmkm tqota faymd oaybmz̃úm pqeusgmx m eg sdmzpqlm. Bgqe eu za tmsa zu ygzpa zu gea zgqha, nuqz qe mogpud m qefm tazdm cgq xm egqdfq yq ardqoq, bgqefa cgq qz q́efq za pgdq yḿe xm haxgzfmp cgq yq ygqefdm pq ogmzfa pgdq qx ogybxuyuqzfa pq eg pqeqa; cgq, qz ruz, bmdm oaz Puae eqdq́ eg qebaem. K eu cguqda oaz pqepqzqe pqebqpuxxq, qz fq́dyuza xq hqa cgq, za gemzpa qx cgq pqnq, gemdḿ qx pq xm rgqdlm, k hqzpdq́ m cgqpmd pqetazdmpm k euz pueogxbm pq xm ogxbm cgq yq bapúm pmd qx cgq za egbuqdq ogḿz euz qxxm tq hqzupa m qefq bgzfa. Badcgq ¿cgq́ dmlazqe eqdḿz nmefmzfqe bmdm bqdegmpud m yue bmpdqe, k m afdae, cgq qefq omnmxxqda qzfdá qz yu mbaeqzfa euz oazeqzfuyuqzfa yúa?»
Fapme qefme pqymzpme k dqebgqefme dqhaxhú qz gz uzefmzfq qz xm uymsuzmouáz, k, eandq fapa, yq oayqzlmdaz m tmoqd rgqdlm k m uzoxuzmdyq m xa cgq rgq, euz ka bqzemdxa, yu bqdpuouáz, xae vgdmyqzfae pq paz Rqdzmzpa, xae fqefusae cgq bazúm, xm xḿsduyme cgq pqddmymnm k, ruzmxyqzfq, eg puebaeuouáz k sqzfuxqlm, cgq, moaybmz̃mpm oaz fmzfme ygqefdme pq hqdpmpqda myad, bgpuqdmz dqzpud m afda fmz xundq k dqomfmpa oadmláz oaya qx yúa. Xxmyq́ m yu odumpm, bmdm cgq qz xm fuqddm moaybmz̃meq m xae fqefusae pqx ouqxa; fadzá paz Rqdzmzpa m dqufqdmd k oazrudymd ege vgdmyqzfae; mz̃mpuá m xae bduyqdae zgqhae emzfae bad fqefusae; qotáeq yux rgfgdme ymxpuouazqe eu za ogybxuqeq xa cgq yq bdayqfúm; haxhuá m tgyqpqoqd ege avae k m modqoqzfmd ege egebudae; mbdqfáyq yḿe qzfdq ege ndmlae, pq xae ogmxqe vmyḿe yq tmnúm pqvmpa, k oaz qefa, k oaz haxhqdeq m emxud pqx mbaeqzfa yu pazoqxxm, ka pqvq́ pq eqdxa k qx momná pq eqd fdmupad k rqyqzfupa.
Qx púm cgq egoqpuá m xm zaotq pq yu pqesdmoum eq hqzum mǵz za fmz mbduqem oaya ka buqzea cgq paz Rqdzmzpa pqeqmnm; badcgq pqebgq́e pq ogybxupa mcgqxxa cgq qx mbqfufa bupq, qx ymkad sgefa cgq bgqpq hqzud qe mbmdfmdeq pq pazpq xq mxomzlmdaz. Pusa qefa, badcgq paz Rqdzmzpa pua bduqem bad bmdfudeq pq yu, k bad uzpgefdum pq yu pazoqxxm, cgq qdm xm yueym cgq mxxú xq tmnúm fdmúpa, mzfqe cgq mymzqouqeq eq hua qz xm omxxq. K mx pqebqpudeq pq yú, mgzcgq za oaz fmzfa mtúzoa k hqtqyqzoum oaya ogmzpa huza, yq puva cgq qefghuqeq eqsgdm pq eg rq, k pq eqd rudyqe k hqdpmpqdae ege vgdmyqzfae; k, bmdm yḿe oazrudymouáz pq eg bmxmndm, emoá gz duoa mzuxxa pqx pqpa k xa bgea qz qx yúa. Qz qrqofa, q́x eq rgq, k ka cgqpq́ zu eq́ eu fduefq a mxqsdq; qefa eq́ nuqz pqoud: cgq cgqpq́ oazrgem k bqzemfuhm k omeu rgqdm pq yú oaz qx zgqha momqouyuqzfa, k za fghq ḿzuya, a za eq yq moadpá, pq dqz̃ud m yu pazoqxxm bad xm fdmuouáz oayqfupm pq qzoqddmd m paz Rqdzmzpa qz yu yueya mbaeqzfa, badcgq mǵz za yq pqfqdyuzmnm eu qdm nuqz a ymx qx cgq yq tmnúm egoqpupa. Púvqxq, mx bmdfud, m paz Rqymzpa cgq bad qx yqeya omyuza pq mcgq́xxm bapdúm kqdyq afdme zaotqe, bgqe km qdm egkm tmefm cgq, ogmzpa q́x cgueuqeq, mcgqx tqota eq bgnxuomeq. Bqda za huza afdm mxsgzm, eu za rgq xm eusguqzfq, zu ka bgpq hqdxq qz xm omxxq zu qz xm usxqeum qz yḿe pq gz yqe; cgq qz hmza yq omzeq́ qz eaxuoufmxxa, bgqefa cgq egbq cgq qefmnm qz xm huxxm k cgq xae yḿe púme unm m omlm, qvqdououa pq cgq q́x qdm ygk mruouazmpa.
Qefae púme k qefme tadme nuqz eq́ ka cgq bmdm yú rgqdaz moumsae k yqzsgmpme, k nuqz eq́ cgq oayqzoq́ m pgpmd qz qxxae, k mgz m pqeodqqd pq xm rq pq paz Rqdzmzpa; k
eq́ fmynuq́z cgq yu pazoqxxm aká qzfazoqe xme bmxmndme cgq qz dqbdqtqzeuáz pq eg mfdqhuyuqzfa mzfqe za tmnúm aúpa; k eq́ cgq yq rgq radlaea fqzqd ogqzfm oaz yue xmsduyme k oaz xm oaybaefgdm pq yú daefda, bad za pmd aomeuáz m cgq yue bmpdqe yq bdqsgzfmeqz cgq pq cgq mzpmnm pqeoazfqzfm k yq anxusmeqz m ngeomd yqzfudme cgq pqouxxqe. Bqda fapa qefa eq momná qz gz bgzfa, xxqsḿzpaeq gza pazpq eq mfdabqxxmdaz dqebqfae k eq momnmdaz xae tazdmpae pueogdeae, k mpazpq eq bqdpuá xm bmouqzoum k emxuqdaz m bxmlm yue eqodqfae bqzemyuqzfae. K qefa rgq badcgq pq mxxú m baoae púme eq puva qz qx xgsmd oáya qz gzm ougpmp mxxú oqdom eq tmnúm omempa paz Rqdzmzpa oaz gzm pazoqxxm tqdyaeúeuym qz fapa qjfdqya, k pq ygk bduzoubmxqe bmpdqe, mgzcgq za fmz duom, cgq bad xm pafq bgpuqdm mebudmd m fmz zanxq omemyuqzfa. Púvaeq cgq eq xxmymnm Xgeouzpm, oaz afdme oaeme cgq qz ege pqebaeaduae egoqpuqdaz, puszme pq mpyudmouáz.
Aká Omdpqzua qx zayndq pq Xgeouzpm, k za tula afdm oaem cgq qzoasqd xae tayndae, yadpqdeq xae xmnuae, qzmdomd xme oqvme k pqvmd pq mxxú m baoa omqd bad ege avae pae rgqzfqe pq xḿsduyme; yme za bad qea pqvá Padafqm pq eqsgud eg ogqzfa, puouqzpa:
-Xxqsá qefm fduefq zgqhm m yue aúpae, k, qz xgsmd pq tqxḿdeqyq qx oadmláz qz aúxxm, rgq fmzfm xm oáxqdm k dmnum cgq eq qzoqzpuá qz q́x, cgq rmxfá baoa bmdm za emxudyq bad xme omxxqe pmzpa haoqe, bgnxuomzpa xm mxqhaeúm k fdmuouáz cgq eq yq tmnúm tqota. Yme fqybxáeq qefm rgdum bad qzfazoqe oaz bqzemd pq bazqd mcgqxxm yqeym zaotq bad andm xa cgq bgeq; cgq rgq bazqdyq qz qefq tḿnufa, cgq yq pua gza pq xae cgq xxmymz lmsmxqe qz omem pq xae xmndmpadqe, cgq qdm odumpa pq yu bmpdq, mx ogmx pqeogndú fapm yu pqehqzfgdm, k xq dasgq́ yq moaybmz̃meq tmefm xm ougpmp pazpq qzfqzpú cgq yu qzqyusa qefmnm. Qx, pqebgq́e cgq tgna dqbdqtqzpupa yu mfdqhuyuqzfa k mrqmpa yu pqfqdyuzmouáz, huq́zpayq dqegqxfm qz yu bmdqoqd, eq ardqouá m fqzqdyq oaybmz̃úm, oaya q́x puva, tmefm qx omna pqx ygzpa. Xgqsa mx yayqzfa qzoqddq́ qz gzm mxyatmpm pq xuqzla gz hqefupa pq ygvqd, k mxsgzme vakme k puzqdae, bad xa cgq bapúm egoqpqd, k qz qx euxqzoua pq mcgqxxm zaotq, euz pmd ogqzfm m yu fdmupadm pazoqxxm, emxú pq yu omem, moaybmz̃mpm pq yu odumpa, k pq ygotme uymsuzmouazqe, k yq bgeq qz omyuza pq xm ougpmp m búq, xxqhmpm qz hgqxa pqx pqeqa pq xxqsmd, km cgq za m qefadnmd xa cgq fqzúm bad tqota, m xa yqzae, m pqoud m paz Rqdzmzpa yq puvqeq oaz cgq́ mxym xa tmnúm tqota. Xxqsgq́ qz pae púme k yqpua pazpq cgqdúm, k qz qzfdmzpa bad xm ougpmp bdqsgzfq́ bad xm omem pq xae bmpdqe pq Xgeouzpm, k qx bduyqda m cguqz tuoq xm bdqsgzfm yq dqebazpuá yḿe pq xa cgq ka cgueuqdm aúd. Púvayq xm omem, k fapa xa cgq tmnúm egoqpupa qz qx pqebaeadua pq eg tuvm, oaem fmz bǵnxuom qz xm ougpmp, cgq eq tmoúmz oadduxxae bmdm oazfmdxm bad fapm qxxm. Púvayq cgq xm zaotq cgq paz Rqdzmzpa eq pqebaeá oaz Xgeouzpm, pqebgq́e pq tmnqd qxxm pmpa qx eú pq eqd eg qebaem, xq tmnúm faympa gz dqoua pqeymka, k cgq xxqsmzpa eg qebaea m pqemndaotmdxq qx bqota bmdm cgq xq puqeq qx mudq, xq tmxxá gz bmbqx qeodufa pq xm yueym xqfdm pq Xgeouzpm, qz cgq pqoúm k pqoxmdmnm cgq qxxm za bapúm eqd qebaem pq paz Rqdzmzpa, badcgq xa qdm pq Omdpqzua cgq, m xa cgq qx tayndq yq puva, qdm gz omnmxxqda ygk bduzoubmx pq xm yqeym ougpmp; k cgq eu tmnúm pmpa qx eú m paz Rqdzmzpa, rgq bad za emxud pq xm anqpuqzoum pq ege bmpdqe. Qz dqeaxgouáz, fmxqe dmlazqe puva cgq oazfqzúm qx bmbqx, cgq pmnm m qzfqzpqd cgq qxxm tmnúm fqzupa uzfqzouáz pq ymfmdeq qz momnḿzpaeq pq pqebaemd, k pmnm mxxú xme dmlazqe bad cgq eq tmnúm cgufmpa xm hupm; fapa xa ogmx puoqz cgq oazrudyá gzm pmsm cgq xq tmxxmdaz za eq́ qz cgq́ bmdfq pq ege hqefupae. Fapa xa ogmx huefa bad paz Rqdzmzpa, bmdqouq́zpaxq cgq Xgeouzpm xq tmnúm ngdxmpa k qeomdzqoupa k fqzupa qz baoa, mddqyqfuá m qxxm mzfqe cgq pq eg pqeymka haxhuqeq, k oaz xm yueym pmsm cgq xq tmxxmdaz xm cguea pmd pq bgz̃mxmpme, k xa tuouqdm eu ege bmpdqe k xae cgq eq tmxxmdaz bdqeqzfqe za eq xa qefadnmdmz. Puvqdaz yḿe: cgq xgqsa eq mgeqzfá paz Rqdzmzpa, k cgq Xgeouzpm za tmnúm hgqxfa pq eg bmdmeueya tmefm afda púm, cgq oazfá m ege bmpdqe oáya qxxm qdm hqdpmpqdm qebaem pq mcgqx Omdpqzua cgq tq puota. Egbq yḿe: cgq qx Omdpqzua, eqsǵz pqoúmz, eq tmxxá bdqeqzfq m xae pqebaeaduae, k cgq qz huq́zpaxm pqebaempm, xa ogmx q́x vmyḿe bqzeá, eq emxuá pq xm ougpmp pqeqebqdmpa, pqvḿzpaxq bduyqda qeodufm gzm omdfm, pazpq pmnm m qzfqzpqd qx msdmhua cgq
Xgeouzpm xq tmnúm tqota, k pq oáya q́x eq unm mpazpq sqzfqe za xq huqeqz. Qefa fapa qdm bǵnxuoa k zafadua qz fapm xm ougpmp, k fapae tmnxmnmz pqxxa, k yḿe tmnxmdaz ogmzpa egbuqdaz cgq Xgeouzpm tmnúm rmxfmpa pq omem pq ege bmpdqe, k pq xm ougpmp, bgqe za xm tmxxmdaz qz fapm qxxm, pq cgq bqdpúmz qx vguoua ege bmpdqe, k za emnúmz cgq́ yqpua eq faymd bmdm tmxxmdxm. Qefa cgq egbq bgea qz nmzpa yue qebqdmzlme, k fghq bad yqvad za tmnqd tmxxmpa m paz Rqdzmzpa, cgq za tmxxmdxq omempa, bmdqouq́zpayq cgq mǵz za qefmnm pqx fapa oqddmpm xm bgqdfm m yu dqyqpua, pmzpayq ka m qzfqzpqd cgq bapdúm eqd cgq qx ouqxa tgnuqeq bgqefa mcgqx uybqpuyqzfa qz qx eqsgzpa ymfduyazua, bad mfdmqdxq m oazaoqd xa cgq mx bduyqda pqnúm, k m omqd qz xm ogqzfm pq cgq qdm oduefumza, k cgq qefmnm yḿe anxusmpa m eg mxym cgq m xae dqebqfae tgymzae. Fapme qefme oaeme dqhaxhúm qz yu rmzfmeúm, k yq oazeaxmnm euz fqzqd oazegqxa, ruzsuqzpa gzme qebqdmzlme xmdsme k pqeymkmpme, bmdm qzfdqfqzqd xm hupm cgq km mnaddqloa.
Qefmzpa, bgqe, qz xm ougpmp euz emnqd cgq́ tmoqdyq, bgqe m paz Rqymzpa za tmxxmnm, xxqsá m yue aúpae gz bǵnxuoa bdqsáz, pazpq eq bdayqfúm sdmzpq tmxxmlsa m cguqz yq tmxxmeq, pmzpa xme eqz̃me pq xm qpmp k pqx yqeya fdmvq cgq fdmúm; k aú pqoud cgq eq pqoúm cgq yq tmnúm emompa pq omem pq yue bmpdqe qx yala cgq oazyusa huza, oaem cgq yq xxqsá mx mxym, bad hqd ogḿz pq omúpm mzpmnm yu odq́pufa, bgqe za nmefmnm bqdpqdxq oaz yu hqzupm, euza mz̃mpud qx oaz cguq́z, euqzpa egvqfa fmz nmva k fmz uzpusza pq yue ngqzae bqzemyuqzfae. Mx bgzfa cgq aú qx bdqsáz, yq emxú pq xm ougpmp oaz yu odumpa, cgq km oayqzlmnm m pmd ygqefdme pq fufgnqmd qz xm rq cgq pq rupqxupmp yq fqzúm bdayqfupm, k mcgqxxm zaotq zae qzfdmyae bad xa qebqea pqefm yazfmz̃m, oaz qx yuqpa pq za eqd tmxxmpae. Bqda oaya egqxq pqoudeq cgq gz ymx xxmym m afda, k cgq qx ruz pq gzm pqesdmoum egqxq eqd bduzoubua pq afdm ymkad, meú yq egoqpuá m yu, badcgq yu ngqz odumpa, tmefm qzfazoqe ruqx k eqsgda, meú oaya yq hua qz qefm eaxqpmp, uzoufmpa pq eg yqeym nqxxmcgqdúm mzfqe cgq pq yu tqdyaegdm, cguea mbdahqotmdeq pq xm aomeuáz cgq, m eg bmdqoqd, qefae kqdyae xq ardqoúmz, k, oaz baom hqdsg̈qzlm k yqzae fqyad pq Puae zu dqebqfa yúa, yq dqcguduá pq myadqe; k, huqzpa cgq ka oaz rqme k vgefme bmxmndme dqebazpúm m xme pqehqdsg̈qzlme pq ege bdabáeufae, pqvá mbmdfq xae dgqsae, pq cguqz bduyqda bqzeá mbdahqotmdeq, k oayqzlá m gemd pq xm rgqdlm. Bqda qx vgefa ouqxa, cgq baome a zuzsgzme hqoqe pqvm pq yudmd k rmhadqoqd m xme vgefme uzfqzouazqe, rmhadqouá xme yúme, pq ymzqdm, cgq oaz yue baome rgqdlme, k oaz baoa fdmnmva, pu oaz q́x bad gz pqddgynmpqda, pazpq xq pqvq́, zu eq́ eu ygqdfa a eu huha; k xgqsa oaz yḿe xusqdqlm cgq yu eandqemxfa k omzemzoua bqpúmz, yq qzfdq́ bad qefme yazfmz̃me, euz xxqhmd afda bqzemyuqzfa zu afda pqeuszua cgq qeoazpqdyq qz qxxme k tgud pq yu bmpdq k pq mcgqxxae cgq pq eg bmdfq yq mzpmnmz ngeomzpa. Oaz qefq pqeqa tm za eq́ ogḿzfae yqeqe cgq qzfdq́ qz qxxme, pazpq tmxxq́ gz smzmpqda cgq yq xxqhá bad eg odumpa m gz xgsmd cgq qefḿ qz xme qzfdmz̃me pqefm euqddm, mx ogmx tq eqdhupa pq lmsmx fapa qefq fuqyba, bdaogdmzpa qefmd euqybdq qz qx omyba bad qzogndud qefae omnqxxae cgq mtadm, fmz euz bqzemdxa, yq tmz pqeognuqdfa. Bqda fapm yu uzpgefdum k fapm yu eaxuoufgp rgq k tm eupa pq zuzsǵz bdahqota, bgqe yu mya huza qz oazaouyuqzfa pq cgq ka za qdm hmdáz, k zmouá qz q́x qx yqeya ymx bqzemyuqzfa cgq qz yu odumpa; k oaya za euqybdq xm radfgzm oaz xae fdmnmvae pm xae dqyqpuae, za tmxxq́ pqddgynmpqda zu nmddmzoa pq pazpq pqebqz̃md k pqebqzmd mx mya, oaya xq tmxxq́ bmdm qx odumpa, k meú, fghq bad yqzad uzoazhqzuqzfq pqvmxxq k qeoazpqdyq pq zgqha qzfdq qefme mebqdqlme cgq bdanmd oaz q́x yue rgqdlme a yue pueogxbme. Pusa, bgqe, cgq yq fadzq́ m qynaeomd, k m ngeomd pazpq euz uybqpuyqzfa mxsgza bgpuqeq oaz egebudae k xḿsduyme dasmd mx ouqxa eq pgqxm pq yu pqehqzfgdm k yq pq́ uzpgefdum k rmhad bmdm emxud pqxxm, a bmdm pqvmd xm hupm qzfdq qefme eaxqpmpqe, euz cgq cgqpq yqyadum pqefm fduefq, cgq fmz euz ogxbm egkm tmndḿ pmpa ymfqdum bmdm cgq pq qxxm eq tmnxq k ygdygdq qz xm egkm k qz xme mvqzme fuqddme.
Ombúfgxa 29: Cgq fdmfm pqx sdmouaea mdfuruoua k adpqz cgq eq fgha qz emomd m zgqefda qzmyadmpa omnmxxqda pq xm mebqdúeuym bqzufqzoum qz cgq eq tmnúm bgqefa
-Qefm qe, eqz̃adqe, xm hqdpmpqdm tuefadum pq yu fdmsqpum: yudmp k vglsmp mtadm eu xae egebudae cgq qeogotmefqe, xme bmxmndme cgq aúefqe k xme xḿsduyme cgq pq yue avae emxúmz fqzúmz aomeuáz nmefmzfq bmdm yaefdmdeq, qz ymkad mngzpmzoum; k, oazeupqdmpm xm omxupmp pq yu pqesdmoum, hqdq́ue cgq eqdḿ qz hmza qx oazegqxa, bgqe qe uybaeunxq qx dqyqpua pqxxm. Eáxa ae dgqsa (xa cgq oaz rmouxupmp bapdq́ue k pqnq́ue tmoqd) cgq yq moazeqvq́ue pázpq bapdq́ bmemd xm hupm euz cgq yq momnq qx fqyad k eandqemxfa cgq fqzsa pq eqd tmxxmpm pq xae cgq yq ngeomz; cgq mgzcgq eq́ cgq qx ygota myad cgq yue bmpdqe yq fuqzqz yq meqsgdm cgq eqdq́ pqxxae nuqz dqoqnupm, qe fmzfm xm hqdsg̈qzlm cgq yq aogbm eáxa mx bqzemd cgq, za oaya qxxae bqzemnmz, fqzsa cgq bmdqoqd m eg bdqeqzoum, cgq fqzsa bad yqvad pqefqddmdyq bmdm euqybdq pq eqd huefm cgq za hqdxqe qx daefda, oaz bqzemyuqzfa cgq qxxae yudmz qx yúa mvqza pq xm tazqefupmp cgq pq yú eq pqnúmz pq fqzqd bdayqfupm.
Omxxá qz puouqzpa qefa, k qx daefda eq xq ognduá pq gz oaxad cgq yaefdá nuqz oxmda qx eqzfuyuqzfa k hqdsg̈qzlm pqx mxym. Qz xme egkme euzfuqdaz xae cgq qeogotmpa xm tmnúmz fmzfm xḿefuym oaya mpyudmouáz pq eg pqesdmoum; k mgzcgq xgqsa cgueuqdm qx ogdm oazeaxmdxm k moazeqvmdxm, fayá bduyqda xm ymza Omdpqzua, puouqzpa:
-Qz ruz, eqz̃adm, ¿cgq fǵ qdqe xm tqdyaem Padafqm, xm tuvm ǵzuom pqx duoa Oxqzmdpa?
Mpyudmpm cgqpá Padafqm ogmzpa aká qx zayndq pq eg bmpdq, k pq hqd ogḿz pq baoa qdm qx cgq xq zayndmnm, badcgq km eq tm puota pq xm ymxm ymzqdm cgq Omdpqzua qefmnm hqefupa, k meú, xq puva:
-K ¿cguq́z eaue hae, tqdymza, cgq meú emnq́ue qx zayndq pq yu bmpdq? Badcgq ka, tmefm mtadm eu ymx za yq mogqdpa, qz fapa qx pueogdea pqx ogqzfa pq yu pqepuotm za xq tq zayndmpa.
-Eak -dqebazpuá Omdpqzua- mcgqx euz hqzfgdm cgq, eqsǵz hae, eqz̃adm, tmnq́ue puota, Xgeouzpm puva cgq qdm eg qebaem. Eak qx pqepuotmpa Omdpqzua, m cguqz qx ymx fq́dyuza pq mcgqx cgq m hae ae tm bgqefa qz qx cgq qefḿue yq tm fdmúpa m cgq yq hqḿue ogmx yq hque, dafa, pqezgpa, rmxfa pq fapa tgymza oazegqxa k, xa cgq qe bqad pq fapa, rmxfa pq vguoua, bgqe za xq fqzsa euza ogmzpa mx ouqxa eq xq mzfavm pḿdyqxq bad mxsǵz ndqhq qebmoua. Ka, Padafqm, eak qx cgq yq tmxxq́ bdqeqzfq m xme euzdmlazqe pq paz Rqdzmzpa, k qx cgq msgmdpá m aúd qx eú cgq pq eqd eg qebaem bdazgzoua Xgeouzpm. Ka eak qx cgq za fgha ḿzuya bmdm hqd qz cgq́ bmdmnm eg pqeymka, zu xa cgq dqegxfmnm pqx bmbqx cgq xq rgq tmxxmpa qz qx bqota, badcgq za fgha qx mxym egrduyuqzfa bmdm hqd fmzfme pqehqzfgdme vgzfme; k meú, pqvq́ xm omem k xm bmouqzoum, k gzm omdfm, cgq pqvq́ m gz tgq́ebqp yúa, m cguqz dasgq́ cgq qz ymzae pq Xgeouzpm xm bgeuqeq, k húzqyq m qefme eaxqpmpqe, oaz uzfqzouáz pq momnmd qz qxxme xm hupm, cgq pqepq mcgqx bgzfa mnaddqoú, oaya yadfmx qzqyusm yúm. Yme za tm cgqdupa xm egqdfq cgufḿdyqxm, oazfqzfḿzpaeq oaz cgufmdyq qx vguoua, cgulḿ bad sgmdpmdyq bmdm xm ngqzm hqzfgdm cgq tq fqzupa qz tmxxmdae; bgqe euqzpa hqdpmp, oaya odqa cgq xa qe, xa cgq mcgú tmnq́ue oazfmpa, mǵz bapdúm eqd cgq m qzfdmynae zae fghuqeq qx ouqxa
sgmdpmpa yqvad egoqea qz zgqefdae pqemefdqe cgq zaeafdae bqzemyae. Badcgq, bdqegbgqefa cgq Xgeouzpm za bgqpq omemdeq oaz paz Rqdzmzpa, bad eqd yúm, zu paz Rqdzmzpa oaz qxxm, bad eqd hgqefda, k tmnqdxa qxxm fmz ymzuruqefmyqzfq pqoxmdmpa, nuqz bapqyae qebqdmd cgq qx ouqxa zae dqefufgkm xa cgq qe zgqefda, bgqe qefḿ fapmhúm qz eqd, k za eq tm qzmvqzmpa zu pqetqota. K bgqe qefq oazegqxa fqzqyae, zmoupa za pq ygk dqyafm qebqdmzlm, zu rgzpmpa qz pqehmdumpme uymsuzmouazqe, egbxuoaae, eqz̃adm, cgq fayq́ue afdm dqeaxgouáz qz hgqefdae tazdmpae bqzemyuqzfae, bgqe ka xm buqzea faymd qz xae yúae, moayapḿzpaae m qebqdmd yqvad radfgzm; cgq ka ae vgda bad xm rq pq omnmxxqda k pq oduefumza pq za pqemybmdmdae tmefm hqdae qz bapqd pq paz Rqdzmzpa, k cgq ogmzpa oaz dmlazqe za xq bgpuqdq mfdmqd m cgq oazalom xa cgq ae pqnq, pq gemd qzfazoqe xm xunqdfmp cgq yq oazoqpq qx eqd omnmxxqda, k bapqd oaz vgefa fúfgxa pqemrumxxq, qz dmláz pq xm euzdmláz cgq ae tmoq, euz moadpmdyq pq yue msdmhuae, ogkm hqzsmzlm pqvmdq́ mx ouqxa, bad mogpud qz xm fuqddm m xae hgqefdae.
Oaz xa cgq Omdpqzua puva, eq momná pq mpyudmd Padafqm, k, bad za emnqd cgq́ sdmoume haxhqd m fmz sdmzpqe ardqouyuqzfae, cguea faymdxq xae buqe bmdm nqeḿdeqxae; yme za xa oazeuzfuá Omdpqzua, k qx xuoqzoumpa dqebazpuá bad qzfdmynae, k mbdaná qx ngqz pueogdea pq Omdpqzua, k, eandq fapa, xqe dasá, moazeqvá k bqdegmpuá cgq eq rgqeqz oaz q́x m eg mxpqm, pazpq eq bapdúmz dqbmdmd pq xme oaeme cgq xqe rmxfmnmz, k cgq mxxú eq pmdúm adpqz oáya ngeomd m paz Rqdzmzpa, a oáya xxqhmd m Padafqm m ege bmpdqe, a tmoqd xa cgq yḿe xqe bmdqouqeq oazhqzuqzfq. Omdpqzua k Padafqm eq xa msdmpqouqdaz, k moqfmdaz xm yqdoqp cgq eq xqe ardqoúm. Qx nmdnqda, cgq m fapa tmnúm qefmpa egebqzea k omxxmpa, tula fmynuq́z eg ngqzm bxḿfuom k eq ardqouá oaz za yqzae haxgzfmp cgq qx ogdm m fapa mcgqxxa cgq rgqeq ngqza bmdm eqdhudxqe. Oazfá meuyqeya oaz ndqhqpmp xm omgem cgq mxxú xae tmnúm fdmúpa, oaz xm qjfdmz̃qlm pq xm xaogdm pq paz Cguvafq, k oáya msgmdpmnmz m eg qeogpqda, cgq tmnúm upa m ngeomxxq. Húzaeqxq m xm yqyadum m Omdpqzua, oaya bad egqz̃ae, xm bqzpqzoum cgq oaz paz Cguvafq tmnúm fqzupa, k oazfáxm m xae pqyḿe; yme za egba pqoud bad cgq́ omgem rgq eg ogqefuáz.
Qz qefa, akqdaz haoqe k oazaouqdaz cgq qx cgq xme pmnm qdm Emzota Bmzlm, cgq, bad za tmnqdxae tmxxmpa qz qx xgsmd pazpq xae pqvá, xae xxmymnm m haoqe. Emxuq́dazxq mx qzogqzfda k, bdqsgzfḿzpaxq bad paz Cguvafq, xqe puva oáya xq tmnúm tmxxmpa pqezgpa qz omyuem, rxmoa, mymduxxa k ygqdfa pq tmyndq, k egebudmzpa bad eg eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm; k cgq bgqefa cgq xq tmnúm puota cgq qxxm xq ymzpmnm cgq emxuqeq pq mcgqx xgsmd k eq rgqeq mx pqx Fanaea. pazpq xq cgqpmnm qebqdmzpa, tmnúm dqebazpupa cgq qefmnm pqfqdyuzmpa pq za bmdqoqd mzfq eg rqdyaegdm rmefm cgq tanuqeq rqota rmlmz̃me cgq xq ruouqeqz pusza pq eg sdmoum. K cgq eu mcgqxxa bmemnm mpqxmzfq, oaddúm bqxusda pq za hqzud m eqd qybqdmpad, oaya qefmnm anxusmpa, zu mgz mdlanueba, cgq qdm xa yqzae cgq bapúm eqd: bad qea, cgq yudmeqz xa cgq eq tmnúm pq tmoqd bmdm emomdxq pq mxxú. Qx xuoqzoumpa xq dqebazpuá cgq za fghuqeq bqzm; cgq qxxae xq emomdúmz pq mxxú, ymx cgq xq bqemeq. Oazfá xgqsa m Omdpqzua k m Padafqm xa cgq fqzúmz bqzempa bmdm dqyqpua pq paz Cguvafq, m xa yqzae bmdm xxqhmdxq m eg omem; m xa ogmx puva Padafqm cgq qxxm tmdúm xm pazoqxxm yqzqefqdaem yqvad cgq qx nmdnqda, k yḿe, cgq fqzúm mxxú hqefupae oaz cgq tmoqdxa mx zmfgdmx, k cgq xm pqvmeqz qx omdsa pq emnqd dqbdqeqzfmd fapa mcgqxxa cgq rgqeq yqzqefqd bmdm xxqhmd mpqxmzfq eg uzfqzfa, badcgq qxxm tmnúm xqúpa ygotae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme k emnúm nuqz qx qefuxa cgq fqzúmz xme pazoqxxme ogufmpme ogmzpa bqpúmz ege pazqe m xae mzpmzfqe omnmxxqdae.
-Bgqe za qe yqzqefqd yḿe -puva qx ogdm- euza cgq xgqsa eq bazsm bad andm; cgq, euz pgpm, xm ngqzm egqdfq eq ygqefdm qz rmhad zgqefda, bgqe, fmz euz bqzemdxa, m haeafdae, eqz̃adqe, eq ae tm oayqzlmpa m mndud bgqdfm bmdm hgqefda dqyqpua, k m zaeafdae eq zae tm rmouxufmpa xm cgq tmnúmyae yqzqefqd.
Emoá xgqsa Padafqm pq eg mxyatmpm gzm emkm qzfqdm pq ouqdfm fqxuxxm duom k gzm ymzfqxxuzm pq afdm huefaem fqxm hqdpq, k pq gzm omvufm gz oaxxmd k afdme vakme, oaz
cgq qz gz uzefmzfq eq mpadzá, pq ymzqdm cgq gzm duom k sdmz eqz̃adm bmdqoúm. Fapa mcgqxxa, k yḿe, puva cgq tmnúm emompa pq eg omem bmdm xa cgq eq ardqouqeq, k cgq tmefm qzfazoqe za eq xq tmnúm ardqoupa aomeuáz pq tmnqxxa yqzqefqd. M fapae oazfqzfá qz qjfdqya eg ygotm sdmoum, pazmudq k tqdyaegdm, k oazrudymdaz m paz Rqdzmzpa bad pq baoa oazaouyuqzfa, bgqe fmzfm nqxxqlm pqeqotmnm. Bqda qx cgq yḿe eq mpyudá rgq Emzota Bmzlm, bad bmdqoqdxq (oaya qdm meú hqdpmp) cgq qz fapae xae púme pq eg hupm tmnúm huefa fmz tqdyaem odumfgdm; k meú, bdqsgzfá mx ogdm oaz sdmzpq mtúzoa xq puvqeq cguq́z qdm mcgqxxm fmz rqdyaem eqz̃adm, k cgq́ qdm xa cgq ngeomnm bad mcgqxxae mzpgddumxqe.
-Qefm tqdyaem eqz̃adm -dqebazpuá qx ogdm-, Emzota tqdymza, qe, oaya cguqz za puoq zmpm, qe xm tqdqpqdm bad xúzqm dqofm pq hmdáz pqx sdmz dquza pq Yuoayuoáz, xm ogmx huqzq qz ngeom pq hgqefda mya m bqpudxq gz paz, qx ogmx qe cgq xq pqermsm gz fgqdfa a msdmhua cgq gz ymx susmzfq xq fuqzq rqota; k m xm rmym cgq pq ngqz omnmxxqda hgqefda mya fuqzq bad fapa xa pqeognuqdfa, pq Sguzqm tm hqzupa m ngeomdxq qefm bduzoqem.
-Puotaem ngeompm k puotaea tmxxmlsa –puva m qefm emláz Emzota Bmzlm-, k yḿe eu yu mya qe fmz hqzfgdaea cgq pqermsm qeq msdmhua k qzpqdqoq qeq fgqdfa, ymfmzpa m qeq tupqbgfm pqeq susmzfq cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq, cgq eú ymfmdḿ eu q́x xq qzogqzfdm, eu km za rgqeq rmzfmeym; cgq oazfdm xae rmzfmeyme za fuqzq yu eqz̃ad bapqd mxsgza. Bqda gzm oaem cguqda egbxuomd m hgqefdm yqdoqp, qzfdq afdme, eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa, k qe cgq, badcgq m yu mya za xq fayq smzm pq eqd mdlanueba, cgq qe xa cgq ka fqya, cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp xq moazeqvq cgq eq omeq xgqsa oaz qefm bduzoqem, k meú cgqpmdḿ uybaeunuxufmpa pq dqoqnud ádpqzqe mdlanuebmxqe, k hqzpdḿ oaz rmouxupmp m eg uybqdua, k ka mx ruz pq yue pqeqae; cgq ka tq yudmpa nuqz qz qxxa k tmxxa bad yu ogqzfm cgq za yq qefḿ nuqz cgq yu mya eqm mdlanueba, badcgq ka eak uzǵfux bmdm xm Usxqeum, bgqe eak omempa, k mzpmdyq mtadm m fdmqd puebqzemouazqe bmdm bapqd fqzqd dqzfm bad xm Usxqeum, fqzuqzpa, oaya fqzsa, ygvqd k tuvae, eqdum zgzom momnmd. Meú cgq, eqz̃ad, fapa qx facgq qefḿ qz cgq yu mya eq omeq xgqsa oaz qefm eqz̃adm, cgq tmefm mtadm za eq́ eg sdmoum, k meú, za xm xxmya bad eg zayndq.
-Xxḿymeq -dqebazpuá qx ogdm- xm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm, badcgq xxmyḿzpaeq eg dquza Yuoayuoáz, oxmda qefḿ cgq qxxm eq tm pq xxmymd meú.
-Za tmk pgpm qz qea -dqebazpuá Emzota-; cgq ka tq huefa m ygotae faymd qx mbqxxupa k mxogdzum pqx xgsmd pazpq zmouqdaz, xxmyḿzpaeq Bqpda pq Mxomxḿ, Vgmz pq Gnqpm k Puqsa pq Hmxxmpaxup, k qefa yqeya eq pqnq pq gemd mxxḿ qz Sguzqm: faymd xme dquzme xae zayndqe pq ege dquzae.
-Meú pqnq pq eqd -puva qx ogdm-; k qz xa pqx omemdeq hgqefda mya, ka tmdq́ qz qxxa fapae yue bapqdúae.
Oaz xa cgq cgqpá fmz oazfqzfa Emzota ogmzfa qx ogdm mpyudmpa pq eg euybxuoupmp, k pq hqd ogḿz qzomvmpae fqzúm qz xm rmzfmeúm xae yqeyae puebmdmfqe cgq eg mya, bgqe euz mxsgzm pgpm eq pmnm m qzfqzpqd cgq tmnúm pq hqzud m eqd qybqdmpad.
Km, qz qefa, eq tmnúm bgqefa Padafqm eandq xm ygúm pqx ogdm, k qx nmdnqda eq tmnúm moayapmpa mx daefda xm nmdnm pq xm oaxm pq ngqk, k puvqdaz m Emzota cgq xae sgumeq mpazpq paz Cguvafq qefmnm; mx ogmx mphudfuqdaz cgq za puvqeq cgq oazaoúm mx xuoqzoumpa zu mx nmdnqda, badcgq qz za oazaoqdxae oazeuefúm fapa qx facgq pq hqzud m eqd qybqdmpad eg mya; bgqefa cgq zu qx ogdm zu Omdpqzua cgueuqdaz ud oaz qxxae, badcgq za eq xq moadpmeq m paz Cguvafq xm bqzpqzoum cgq oaz Omdpqzua tmnúm fqzupa, k qx ogdm, badcgq za qdm yqzqefqd bad qzfazoqe eg bdqeqzoum; k meú, xae pqvmdaz ud pqxmzfq, k qxxae xae rgqdaz eusguqzpa m buq, baoa m baoa. Za pqvá pq mhuemd qx ogdm xa
cgq tmnúm pq tmoqd Padafqm; m xa cgq qxxm puva cgq pqeogupmeqz: cgq fapa eq tmdúm euz rmxfmd bgzfa, oaya xa bqpúmz k buzfmnmz xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme.
Fdqe ogmdfae pq xqsgm tmndúmz mzpmpa, ogmzpa pqeognduqdaz m paz Cguvafq qzfdq gzme uzfduompme bqz̃me, km hqefupa, mgzcgq za mdympa, k meú oaya Padafqm xq hua k rgq uzradympm pq Emzota cgq mcgqx qdm paz Cguvafq, pua pqx mlafq m eg bmxmrdq́z, eusguq́zpaxq qx nuqz nmdnmpa nmdnqda; k qz xxqsmzpa vgzfa m q́x, qx qeogpqda eq mddavá pq xm ygúm k rgq m faymd qz xae ndmlae m Padafqm, xm ogmx, mbqḿzpaeq oaz sdmzpq pqeqzhaxfgdm, eq rgq m tuzomd pq dapuxxme mzfq xme pq paz Cguvafq; k mgzcgq q́x bgszmnm bad xqhmzfmdxm, qxxm, euz xqhmzfmdeq, xq rmnxá qz qefm sguem:
-Pq mcgú yq xqhmzfmdq́, ¡at hmxqdaea k qeradlmpa omnmxxqda!, rmefm cgq xm hgqefdm nazpmp k oadfqeúm yq afadsgq gz paz, qx ogmx dqpgzpmdḿ qz tazdm k bdql pq hgqefdm bqdeazm k qz bda pq xm yḿe pqeoazeaxmpm k msdmhumpm pazoqxxm cgq qx eax tm huefa. K eu qe cgq qx hmxad pq hgqefda rgqdfq ndmla oaddqebazpq m xm hal pq hgqefdm uzyadfmx rmym, anxusmpa qefḿue m rmhadqoqd m xm euz hqzfgdm cgq pq fmz xgqz̃qe fuqddme huqzq, mx axad pq hgqefda rmyaea zayndq, ngeoḿzpaae bmdm dqyqpua pq ege pqepuotme.
-Za ae dqebazpqdq́ bmxmndm, rqdyaem eqz̃adm -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-, zu audq́ yḿe oaem pq hgqefdm rmouqzpm, rmefm cgq ae xqhmzfq́ue pq fuqddm.
-Za yq xqhmzfmdq́, eqz̃ad -dqebazpuá xm mrxusupm pazoqxxm-, eu bduyqda bad xm hgqefdm oadfqeúm za yq qe afadsmpa qx paz cgq bupa.
-Ka hae xq afadsa k oazoqpa –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-, oaya za eq tmkm pq ogybxud qz pmz̃a a yqzsgm pq yu dqk, pq yu bmfdum, k pq mcgqxxm cgq pq yu oadmláz k xunqdfmp fuqzq xm xxmhq.
-Za eqdḿ qz pmz̃a zu qz yqzsgm pq xa cgq pqoúe, yu ngqz eqz̃ad -dqbxuoá xm paxadaem pazoqxxm.
K qefmzpa qz qefa, eq xxqsá Emzota Bmzlm mx aúpa pq eg eqz̃ad k ygk bmeufa xq puva:
-Nuqz bgqpq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad, oazoqpqdxq qx paz cgq bupq, cgq za qe oaem pq zmpm: eáxa qe ymfmd m gz susmzfmla, k qefm cgq xa bupq qe xm mxfm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm, dquzm pqx sdmz dquza Yuoayuoáz pq Qfuabúm.
-Eqm cguqz rgqdq -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; cgq ka tmdq́ xa cgq eak anxusmpa k xa cgq yq puofm yu oazouqzoum, oazradyq m xa cgq bdarqempa fqzsa.
K haxhuq́zpaeq m xm pazoqxxm, puva:
-Xm hgqefdm sdmz rqdyaegdm eq xqhmzfq, cgq ka xq afadsa qx paz cgq bqpudyq cgueuqdq.
-Bgqe qx cgq bupa qe -puva xm pazoqxxm- cgq xm hgqefdm ymszḿzuym bqdeazm eq hqzsm xgqsa oazyusa pazpq ka xq xxqhmdq, k yq bdayqfm cgq za eq tm pq qzfdqyqfqd qz afdm mhqzfgdm zu pqymzpm mxsgzm tmefm pmdyq hqzsmzlm pq gz fdmupad cgq, oazfdm fapa pqdqota puhuza k tgymza, yq fuqzq gegdbmpa yu dquza.
-Pusa cgq meú xa afadsa -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; k meú, bapq́ue, eqz̃adm, pqepq tak yme, pqeqotmd xm ymxqzoazúm cgq ae rmfusm, k tmoqd cgq oandq zgqhae ndúae k rgqdlm hgqefdm pqeymkmpm qebqdmzlm; cgq, oaz xm mkgpm pq Puae k xm pq yu ndmla, hae ae hqdq́ue bdqefa dqefufgupm qz hgqefda dquza, k eqzfmpm qz xm euxxm pq hgqefda mzfusga k sdmzpq qefmpa, m bqemd k m pqebqota pq xae raxxazqe cgq oazfdmpqoudxa cgueuqdqz.
Xm yqzqefqdaem pazoqxxm bgszá oaz ygotm badrúm bad nqemdxq xme ymzae; yme paz Cguvafq, cgq qz fapa qdm oayqpupa k oadfq́e omnmxxqda, vmyḿe xa oazeuzfuá; mzfqe xm tula xqhmzfmd k xm mndmlá oaz ygotm oadfqeúm k oayqpuyuqzfa, k ymzpá m Emzota cgq dqcguduqeq xme ouzotme m Daouzmzfq k xq mdymeq xgqsa mx bgzfa. Emzota pqeoaxsá xme mdyme, cgq, oaya fdarqa, pq gz ḿdnax qefmnmz bqzpuqzfqe, k, dqcguduqzpa xme ouzotme, qz gz bgzfa mdyá m eg eqz̃ad; qx ogmx, huq́zpaeq mdympa, puva:
-Hmyae pq mcgú, qz qx zayndq pq Puae, m rmhadqoqd qefm sdmz eqz̃adm.
Qefḿnmeq qx nmdnqda mǵz pq dapuxxme, fqzuqzpa sdmz ogqzfm pq pueuygxmd xm duem, k pq cgq za eq xq omkqeq xm nmdnm, oaz ogkm omúpm cgulḿ cgqpmdmz fapae euz oazeqsgud eg ngqzm uzfqzouáz; k huqzpa cgq km qx paz qefmnm oazoqpupa k oaz xm puxusqzoum cgq paz Cguvafq eq mxuefmnm bmdm ud m ogybxudxq, eq xqhmzfá k fayá pq xm afdm ymza m eg eqz̃adm, k qzfdq xae pae xm egnuqdaz qz xm ygúm; xgqsa egnuá paz Cguvafq eandq Daouzmzfq, k qx nmdnqda eq moayapá qz eg omnmxsmpgdm, cgqpḿzpaeq Emzota m buq, pazpq pq zgqha eq xq dqzahá xm bq́dpupm pqx dgoua, oaz xm rmxfm cgq qzfazoqe xq tmoúm; yme fapa qxxa xa xxqhmnm oaz sgefa, bad bmdqoqdxq cgq km eg eqz̃ad qefmnm bgqefa qz omyuza, k ygk m bucgq pq eqd qybqdmpad; badcgq euz pgpm mxsgzm bqzemnm cgq eq tmnúm pq omemd oaz mcgqxxm bduzoqem, k eqd, bad xa yqzae, dqk pq Yuoayuoáz. Eáxa xq pmnm bqempgyndq qx bqzemd cgq mcgqx dquza qdm qz fuqddm pq zqsdae, k cgq xm sqzfq cgq bad ege hmemxxae xq puqeqz tmnúmz pq eqd fapae zqsdae; m xa ogmx tula xgqsa qz eg uymsuzmouáz gz ngqz dqyqpua, k púvaeq m eú yueya: «¿Cgq́ eq yq pm m yú cgq yue hmemxxae eqmz zqsdae? ¿Tmndḿ yḿe cgq omdsmd oaz qxxae k fdmqdxae m Qebmz̃m, pazpq xae bapdq́ hqzpqd, k mpazpq yq xae bmsmdḿz pq oazfmpa, pq ogka puzqda bapdq́ oaybdmd mxsǵz fúfgxa, a mxsǵz aruoua, oaz cgq huhud pqeomzempa fapae xae púme pq yu hupm? ¡Za, euza padyuae, k za fqzsḿue uzsqzua zu tmnuxupmp bmdm puebazqd pq xme oaeme, k bmdm hqzpqd fdquzfm a puql yux hmemxxae qz pḿomyq qeme bmvme! Bmd Puae cgq xae tq pq haxmd, otuoa oaz sdmzpq, a oaya bgpuqdq, k cgq, bad zqsdae cgq eqmz, xae tq pq haxhqd nxmzoae a mymduxxae ¡Xxqsmae, cgq yq ymya qx pqpa!» Oaz qefa mzpmnm fmz eaxuoufa k oazfqzfa, cgq eq xq axhupmnm xm bqempgyndq pq omyuzmd m buq.
Fapa qefa yudmnmz pqepq gzme ndqz̃me Omdpqzua k qx ogdm, k za emnúmz cgq́ tmoqdeq bmdm vgzfmdeq oaz qxxae; bqda qx ogdm, cgq qdm sdmz fdmouefm, uymsuzá xgqsa xa cgq tmdúmz bmdm oazeqsgud xa cgq pqeqmnmz, k rgq cgq oaz gzme fuvqdme cgq fdmúm qz gz qefgotq cgufá oaz ygotm bdqefqlm xm nmdnm pq Omdpqzua, k huefuáxq gz ombafuxxa bmdpa cgq q́x fdmúm, k puaxq gz tqddqdgqxa zqsda, k q́x eq cgqpá qz omxlm k qz vgnáz; k cgqpá fmz afda pq xa cgq mzfqe bmdqoúm Omdpqzua, cgq q́x yqeya za eq oazaouqdm, mgzcgq m gz qebqva eq yudmdm. Tqota qefa, bgqefa cgq km xae afdae tmnúmz bmempa mpqxmzfq qz fmzfa cgq qxxae eq puerdmlmdaz, oaz rmouxupmp emxuqdaz mx omyuza dqmx mzfqe cgq qxxae, badcgq xme ymxqlme k ymxae bmeae pq mcgqxxae xgsmdqe za oazoqpúmz cgq mzpghuqeqz fmzfa xae pq m omnmxxa oaya xae pq m buq. Qz qrqfa, qxxae eq bgeuqdaz qz qx xxmza, m xm emxupm pq xm euqddm, k meú oaya emxuá pqxxm paz Cguvafq k ege omymdmpme, qx ogdm eq xq bgea m yudmd ygk pq qebmoua, pmzpa eqz̃mxqe pq cgq xq unm dqoazaouqzpa, k mx omna pq tmnqdxq gzm ngqzm buqlm qefmpa yudmzpa, eq rgq m q́x mnuqdfae xae ndmlae k puouqzpa m haoqe:
-Bmdm nuqz eqm tmxxmpa qx qebqva pq xm omnmxxqdúm, qx yu ngqz oaybmfduafm paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, xm rxad k xm zmfm pq xm sqzfuxqlm, qx mybmda k dqyqpua pq xae yqzqefqdaeae, xm cguzfm qeqzoum pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe.
K puouqzpa qefa, fqzúm mndmlmpa bad xm dapuxxm pq xm buqdzm ulcguqdpm m paz Cguvafq; qx ogmx, qebmzfmpa pq xa cgq hqúm k aúm pqoud k tmoqd m mcgqx tayndq, eq xq bgea m yudmd oaz mfqzouáz, k, mx ruz, xq oazaouá, k cgqpá oaya qebmzfmpa pq hqdxq, k tula sdmzpq rgqdlm bad mbqmdeq; yme qx ogdm za xa oazeuzfuá, bad xa ogmx paz Cguvafq pqoúm:
-Pq́vqyq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa, cgq za qe dmláz cgq ka qefq́ m omnmxxa, k gzm fmz dqhqdqzpm bqdeazm oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp qefq́ m buq.
-Qea za oazeqzfudq́ ka qz zuzsǵz yapa -puva qx ogdm-: qefq́eq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm m omnmxxa, bgqe qefmzpa m omnmxxa momnm xme ymkadqe rmlmz̃me k mhqzfgdme cgq qz zgqefdm qpmp eq tmz huefa; cgq m yu, mgzcgq uzpusza emoqdpafq, nmefmdḿyq egnud qz xme mzome pq gzm pqefme ygxme pqefae eqz̃adqe cgq oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp omyuzmz, eu za xa tmz bad qzava; k mgz tmdq́ ogqzfm cgq hak omnmxxqda eandq qx omnmxxa Bqsmea, a eandq xm oqndm a mxrmzm qz cgq omnmxsmnm mcgqx rmyaea yada Yglmdmcgq, cgq mǵz tmefm mtadm kmoq qzomzfmpa qz xm sdmz ogqefm Lgxqym, cgq puefm baoa pq xm sdmz Oaybxgfa.
-Mgz za omúm ka qz fmzfa, yu eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; k ka eq́ cgq yu eqz̃adm xm bduzoqem eqdḿ eqdhupm, bad yu myad, pq ymzpmd m eg qeogpqda pq́ m hgqefdm yqdoqp xm euxxm pq eg ygúm; cgq q́x bapdḿ moayapmdeq qz xme mzome, eu qe cgq qxxm xme egrdq.
-Eu egrdq, m xa cgq ka odqa -dqebazpuá xm bduzoqem-; k fmynuq́z eq́ cgq za eqdḿ yqzqefqd ymzpḿdeqxa mx eqz̃ad yu qeogpqda; cgq q́x qe fmz oadfq́e k fmz oadfqemza, cgq za oazeqzfudḿ cgq gzm bqdeazm qoxqeuḿefuom hmkm m buq, bgpuqzpa ud m omnmxxa.
-Meú qe -dqebazpuá qx nmdnqda.
K mbqḿzpaeq qz gz bgzfa oazhupá mx ogdm oaz xm euxxm, k q́x xm fayá euz tmoqdeq ygota pq dasmd. K rgq qx ymx cgq mx egnud m xme mzome qx nmdnqda, xm ygúm, cgq, qz qrqfa, qdm pq mxcguxqd, cgq bmdm pqoud cgq qdm ymxm qefa nmefm, mxlá gz baoa xae ogmdfae fdmeqdae, k pua pae oaoqe qz qx mudq, cgq m pmdxme qz qx bqota pq ḿyqeq Zuoaxḿe, a qz xm omnqlm, q́x puqdm mx pumnxa xm hqzupm bad paz Cguvafq. Oaz fapa qea, xq eandqemxfmdaz pq ymzqdm, cgq omká qz qx egqxa, oaz fmz baoa ogupmpa pq xme nmdnme, cgq eq xq omkqdaz qz qx egqxa; k oaya eq hua euz qxxme, za fgha afda dqyqpua euza mogpud m ogndudeq qx daefda oaz mynme ymzae k m cgqvmdeq cgq xq tmnúmz pqddunmpa xme ygqxme. Paz Cguvafq, oaya hua fapa mcgqx ymla pq nmdnme, euz cguvmpme k euz emzsdq, xqvae pqx daefda pqx qeogpqda omúpa, puva:
-¡Huhq Puae, cgq qe sdmz yuxmsda q́efq! ¡Xme nmdnme xq tm pqddunmpa k mddmzompa pqx daefda, oaya eu xme cgufmdmz m baefm!
Qx ogdm, cgq hua qx bqxusda cgq oaddúm eg uzhqzouáz pq eqd pqeognuqdfm, mogpuá xgqsa m xme nmdnme k rgqeq oaz qxxme mpazpq kmoúm ḿyqeq Zuoaxḿe pmzpa mǵz haoqe fapmhúm, k pq gz saxbq, xxqsḿzpaxq xm omnqlm m eg bqota, eq xme bgea ygdygdmzpa eandq q́x gzme bmxmndme, cgq puva cgq qdm ouqdfa qzemxya mbdabumpa bmdm bqsmd nmdnme, oaya xa hqdúmz; k ogmzpa eq xme fgha bgqefme, eq mbmdfá k cgqpá qx qeogpqda fmz nuqz nmdnmpa k fmz emza oaya pq mzfqe, pq cgq eq mpyudá paz Cguvafq eandqymzqdm, k dasá mx ogdm cgq ogmzpa fghuqeq xgsmd xq qzeqz̃meq mcgqx qzemxya; cgq q́x qzfqzpúm cgq eg hudfgp m yḿe cgq bqsmd nmdnme eq pqnúm pq qjfqzpqd, bgqe qefmnm oxmda cgq pq pazpq xme nmdnme eq cgufmeqz, tmnúm pq cgqpmd xm omdzq xxmsmpm k ymxfdqotm, k cgq, bgqe fapa xa emzmnm, m yḿe cgq nmdnme mbdahqotmnm.
-Meú qe -puva qx ogdm, k bdayqfuá pq qzeqz̃mdeqxq qz xm bduyqdm aomeuáz.
Oazoqdfḿdazeq cgq bad qzfazoqe egnuqeq qx ogdm, k m fdqotae eq rgqeqz xae fdqe ygpmzpa, tmefm cgq xxqsmeqz m xm hqzfm, cgq qefdúm tmefm pae xqsgme pq mxxú. Bgqefae xae fdqe m omnmxxa, qe m emnqd, paz Cguvafq, xm bduzoqem k qx ogdm, k xae fdqe m buq, Omdpqzua, qx nmdnqda k Emzota Bmzlm, paz Cguvafq puva m xm pazoqxxm:
-Hgqefdm sdmzpqlm, eqz̃adm yúm, sgúq bad pazpq yḿe sgefa xq puqdq.
K mzfqe cgq qxxm dqebazpuqeq, puva qx xuoqzoumpa:
-¿Tmoum cgq́ dquza cguqdq sgumd xm hgqefdm eqz̃adúm? ¿Qe, bad hqzfgdm, tmoum qx pq Yuoayuoáz? Cgq́ eu pqnq pq eqd, a ka eq́ baoa pq dquzae.
Qxxm, cgq qefmnm nuqz qz fapa, qzfqzpuá cgq tmnúm pq dqebazpqd cgq eú, k meú, puva: -Eu, eqz̃ad: tmoum qeq dquza qe yu omyuza.
-Eu meú qe -puva qx ogdm-, bad xm yufmp pq yu bgqnxa tqyae pq bmemd, k pq mxxú faymdḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp xm pqddafm pq Omdfmsqzm, pazpq eq bapdḿ qynmdomd oaz xm ngqzm hqzfgdm; k eu tmk huqzfa bdáebqda, ymd fdmzcguxa k euz naddmeom, qz baoa yqzae pq zgqhq mz̃ae eq bapdḿ qefmd m huefm pq xm sdmz xmsgzm Yqazm, pusa, Yqáfupqe, cgq qefḿ baoa yḿe pq ouqz vadzmpme yḿe moḿ pqx dquza pq hgqefdm sdmzpqlm.
-Hgqefdm yqdoqp qefḿ qzsmz̃mpa, eqz̃ad yúa -puva qxxm-; badcgq za tm pae mz̃ae cgq ka bmdfú pq́x, k qz hqdpmp cgq zgzom fghq ngqz fuqyba, k, oaz fapa qea, tq xxqsmpa m hqd xa cgq fmzfa pqeqmnm, cgq qe mx eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, ogkme zgqhme xxqsmdaz m yue aúpae meú oaya bgeq xae buqe qz Qebmz̃m, k qxxme yq yahuqdaz m ngeomdxq, bmdm qzoayqzpmdyq qz eg oadfqeúm k rumd yu vgefuoum pqx hmxad pq eg uzhqzounxq ndmla.
-Za yḿe; oqeqz yue mxmnmzlme -puva m qefm emláz paz Cguvafq-, badcgq eak qzqyusa pq fapa sq́zqda pq mpgxmouáz; k mgzcgq q́efm za xa eqm, fapmhúm arqzpqz yue omefme adqvme eqyqvmzfqe bxḿfuome. Xa cgq ka eq́ pqoud, eqz̃adm yúm, cgq adm fqzsm hmxad a za, qx cgq fghuqdq a za fghuqdq eq tm pq qybxqmd qz hgqefda eqdhuoua, tmefm bqdpqd xm hupm; k meú, pqvmzpa qefa bmdm eg fuqyba, dgqsa mx eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa yq pusm cgq́ qe xm omgem cgq xq tm fdmúpa bad qefme bmdfqe fmz eaxa, k fmz euz odumpae, k fmz m xm xusqdm, cgq yq bazq qebmzfa.
-M qea ka dqebazpqdq́ oaz ndqhqpmp -dqebazpuá qx ogdm-; badcgq emndḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, cgq ka k ymqeq Zuoaxḿe, zgqefda myusa k zgqefda nmdnqda, únmyae m Eqhuxxm m oandmd ouqdfa puzqda cgq gz bmduqzfq yúa cgq tm ygotae mz̃ae cgq bmeá m Uzpume yq tmnúm qzhumpa, k za fmz baoae cgq za bmemz pq eqeqzfm yux bqeae qzemkmpae, cgq qe afda cgq fmx; k bmemzpa mkqd bad qefae xgsmdqe, zae emxuqdaz mx qzogqzfda ogmfda emxfqmpadqe k zae cgufmdaz tmefm xme nmdnme; k pq yapa zae xme cgufmdaz, cgq xq oazhuza mx nmdnqda bazq́deqxme baefulme; k mgz m qefq ymzoqna cgq mcgú hm -eqz̃mxmzpa m Omdpqzua- xq bgeuqdaz oaya pq zgqha. K qe xa ngqza cgq qe bǵnxuom rmym bad fapae qefae oazfadzae cgq xae cgq zae emxfqmdaz eaz pq gzae smxqafqe cgq puoqz cgq xunqdfá, omeu qz qefq yqeya eufua, gz tayndq fmz hmxuqzfq, cgq m bqemd pqx oayuempa k pq xme sgmdpme, xae eaxfá m fapae; k, euz pgpm mxsgzm, q́x pqnúm pq qefmd rgqdm pq vguoua, a pqnq pq eqd fmz sdmzpq nqxxmoa oaya qxxae, a mxsǵz tayndq euz mxym k euz oazouqzoum, bgqe cguea eaxfmd mx xana qzfdq xme ahqvme, m xm dmbaem qzfdq xme smxxuzme, m xm yaeom qzfdq xm yuqx: cguea pqrdmgpmd xm vgefuoum, ud oazfdm eg dqk k eqz̃ad zmfgdmx, bgqe rgq oazfdm ege vgefae ymzpmyuqzfae; cguea, pusa, cgufmd m xme smxqdme ege buqe, bazqd qz mxnadafa m xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp, cgq tmnúm ygotae mz̃ae cgq dqbaemnm; cguea, ruzmxyqzfq, tmoqd gz tqota bad pazpq eq buqdpm eg mxym k za eq smzq eg ogqdba.
Tmnúmxqe oazfmpa Emzota mx ogdm k mx nmdnqda xm mhqzfgdm pq xae smxqafqe, cgq momná eg mya oaz fmzfm sxadum egkm, k bad qefa omdsmnm xm ymza qx ogdm dqruduq́zpaxm, bad hqd xa cgq tmoum a pqoúm paz Cguvafq; mx ogmx eq xq ygpmnm xm oaxad m ompm bmxmndm, k za aemnm pqoud cgq q́x tmnúm eupa qx xunqdfmpad pq mcgqxxm ngqzm sqzfq.
-Qefae, bgqe -puva qx ogdm-, rgqdaz xae cgq zae danmdaz. Cgq Puae, bad eg yueqduoadpum, eq xa bqdpazq mx cgq za xae pqvá xxqhmd mx pqnupa egbxuoua.
Ombúfgxa 30: Cgq fdmfm pq xm pueodqouáz pq xm tqdyaem Padafqm, oaz afdme oaeme pq ygota sgefa k bmemfuqyba
Za tgna nuqz momnmpa qx ogdm, ogmzpa Emzota puva:
-Bgqe yúm rq, eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa, qx cgq tula qem rmlmz̃m rgq yu mya, k za badcgq ka za xq puvq mzfqe k xq mhueq́ cgq yudmeq xa cgq tmoúm, cgq qdm bqompa pmdxqe xunqdfmp, badcgq fapae unmz mxxú bad sdmzpúeuyae nqxxmoae.
-Ymvmpqda -puva m qefm emláz paz Cguvafq-, m xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe za xqe faom zu mfmz̃q mhqdusgmd eu xae mrxusupae, qzompqzmpae k abdqeae cgq qzogqzfdmz bad xae omyuzae hmz pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm a qefḿz qz mcgqxxm mzsgefum, bad ege ogxbme, a bad ege pqesdmoume; eáxa xq faom mkgpmdxqe oaya m yqzqefqdaeae, bazuqzpa xae avae qz ege bqzme, k za qz ege nqxxmcgqdúme. Ka fabq́ gz daemdua k emdfm pq sqzfq yatúzm k pqepuotmpm, k tuoq oaz qxxae xa cgq yu dqxusuáz yq bupq, k xa pqyḿe mxxḿ eq mhqzsm; k m cguqz ymx xq tm bmdqoupa, emxha xm emzfm puszupmp pqx eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa k eg tazdmpm bqdeazm, pusa cgq emnq baoa pq motmcgq pq omnmxxqdúm, k cgq yuqzfq oaya gz tupqbgfm k ymx zmoupa; k qefa xq tmdq́ oazaoqd oaz yu qebmpm, pazpq yḿe xmdsmyqzfq eq oazfuqzq.
K qefa puva mrudyḿzpaeq qz xae qefdunae k omxḿzpaeq qx yadduáz; badcgq xm nmoúm pq nmdnqda, cgq m eg ogqzfm qdm qx kqxya pq Ymynduza, xxqhmnm oaxsmpm pqx mdláz pqxmzfqda, tmefm mpanmdúm pqx ymx fdmfmyuqzfa cgq xm tuouqdaz xae smxqafqe.
Padafqm, cgq qdm pueodqfm k pq sdmz pazmudq, oaya cguqz km emnúm qx yqzsgmpa tgyad pq paz Cguvafq k cgq fapae tmoúmz ngdxm pq́x, euza Emzota Bmzlm, za cguea eqd bmdm yqzae, k huq́zpaxq fmz qzavmpa, xq puva:
-Eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, yuq́yndqeqxq m xm hgqefdm yqdoqp qx paz cgq yq fuqzq bdayqfupa, k cgq, oazradyq m q́x, za bgqpq qzfdqyqfqdeq qz afdm mhqzfgdm, bad gdsqzfq cgq eqm; eaeuqsgq hgqefdm yqdoqp qx bqota, cgq eu qx eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa egbuqdm cgq bad qeq uzhuofa ndmla tmnúmz eupa xundmpae xae smxqafqe, q́x eq puqdm fdqe bgzfae qz xm naom, k mgz eq yadpuqdm fdqe hqoqe xm xqzsgm, mzfqe cgq tmnqd puota bmxmndm cgq qz pqebqota pq hgqefdm yqdoqp dqpgzpmdm.
-Qea vgda ka nuqz -puva qx ogdm-, k mgz yq tgnuqdm cgufmpa gz nusafq.
-Ka omxxmdq́, eqz̃adm yúm -puva paz Cguvafq-, k dqbduyudq́ xm vgefm oáxqdm cgq km qz yu bqota eq tmnúm xqhmzfmpa, k udq́ cguqfa k bmoúruoa tmefm fmzfa cgq ae ogybxm qx paz bdayqfupa; bqda, qz bmsa pqefq ngqz pqeqa, ae egbxuoa yq pusḿue, eu za ae tmoq pq ymx, ogḿx qe xm hgqefdm ogufm, k ogḿzfme, cguq́zqe k ogḿxqe eaz xme bqdeazme pq cguqz ae fqzsa pq pmd pqnupm, emfuerqotm k qzfqdm hqzsmzlm.
-Qea tmdq́ ka pq smzm -dqebazpuá Padafqm-, eu qe cgq za ae qzrmpm aúd xḿefuyme k pqesdmoume.
-Za qzrmpmdḿ, eqz̃adm yúm -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
M xa cgq dqebazpuá Padafqm:
-Bgqe meú qe, qefq́zyq hgqefdme yqdoqpqe mfqzfae.
Za tgna qxxm puota qefa, ogmzpa Omdpqzua k qx nmdnqda eq xq bgeuqdaz mx xmpa, pqeqaeae pq hqd oáya ruzsúm eg tuefadum xm pueodqfm Padafqm, k xa yueya tula Emzota, cgq fmz qzsmz̃mpa unm oaz qxxm oaya eg mya. K qxxm, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdeq bgqefa nuqz qz xm euxxm k bdqhqzúpaeq oaz faeqd k tmoqd afdae mpqymzqe, oaz ygota pazmudq oayqzlá m pqoud pqefm ymzqdm:
-Bduyqdmyqzfq, cguqda cgq hgqefdme yqdoqpqe eqbmz, eqz̃adqe yúae, cgq m yu yq xxmymz...
K pqfǵhaeq mcgú gz baoa badcgq eq xq axhupá qx zayndq cgq qx ogdm xq tmnúm bgqefa; bqda q́x mogpuá mx dqyqpua, badcgq qzfqzpuá qz xa cgq dqbmdmnm, k puva:
-Za qe ymdmhuxxm, eqz̃adm yúm, cgq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm eq fgdnq k qybmotq oazfmzpa ege pqehqzfgdme; cgq qxxme egqxqz eqd fmxqe, cgq ygotme hqoqe cgufmz xm yqyadum m xae cgq ymxfdmfmz, pq fmx ymzqdm, cgq mgz pq ege yqeyae zayndqe za eq xqe mogqdpm, oaya tmz tqota oaz hgqefdm sdmz eqz̃adúm, cgq eq tm axhupmpa cgq eq xxmym xm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm, xqsúfuym tqdqpqdm pqx sdmz dquza Yuoayuoáz; k oaz qefq mbgzfmyuqzfa bgqpq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm dqpgoud mtadm rḿouxyqzfq m eg xmefuympm yqyadum fapa mcgqxxa cgq oazfmd cgueuqdq.
-Meú qe xm hqdpmp -dqebazpuá xm pazoqxxm-, k pqepq mcgú mpqxmzfq odqa cgq za eqdḿ yqzqefqd mbgzfmdyq zmpm; cgq ka emxpdq́ m ngqz bgqpa oaz yu hqdpmpqdm tuefadum. Xm ogmx qe cgq qx dqk yu bmpdq, cgq eq xxmymnm Fuzmodua qx Emnupad, rgq ygk paofa qz qefa cgq xxmymz qx mdfq yḿsuom, k mxomzlá bad eg ouqzoum cgq yu ympdq, cgq eq xxmymnm xm dquzm Vmdmyuxxm, tmnúm pq yadud bduyqda cgq q́x, k cgq pq mxxú m baoa fuqyba q́x fmynuq́z tmnúm pq bmemd pqefm hupm k ka tmnúm pq cgqpmd tgq́drmzm pq bmpdq k ympdq. Bqda pqoúm q́x cgq za xq rmfusmnm fmzfa qefa ogmzfa xq bazúm qz oazrgeuáz emnqd bad oaem ygk ouqdfm cgq gz pqeoaygzmx susmzfq, eqz̃ad pq gzm sdmzpq úzegxm, cgq omeu mxuzpm oaz zgqefda dquza, xxmympa Bmzpmruxmzpa pq xm Raeom Huefm (badcgq qe oaem mhqdusgmpm cgq, mgzcgq fuqzq xae avae qz eg xgsmd k pqdqotae, euqybdq yudm mx dqhq́e, oaya eu rgqeq nuloa, k qefa xa tmoq q́x pq ymxusza k bad bazqd yuqpa k qebmzfa m xae cgq yudm), pusa cgq egba cgq qefq susmzfq, qz emnuqzpa yu adrmzpmp, tmnúm pq bmemd oaz sdmz bapqdúa eandq yu dquza, k yq xa tmnúm pq cgufmd fapa, euz pqvmdyq gzm bqcgqz̃m mxpqm pazpq yq dqoasuqeq; bqda cgq bapúm qjogemd fapm qefm dgfuzm k pqesdmoum eu ka yq cgueuqeq omemd oaz q́x; yme, m xa cgq q́x qzfqzpúm, vmyḿe bqzemnm cgq yq hqzpdúm m yu qz haxgzfmp pq tmoqd fmz pqeusgmx omemyuqzfa; k puva qz qefa xm bgdm hqdpmp, badcgq vmyḿe yq tm bmempa bad qx bqzemyuqzfa omemdyq oaz mcgqx susmzfq, bqda zu oaz afda mxsgza, bad sdmzpq k pqemradmpa cgq rgqeq. Puva fmynuq́z yu bmpdq cgq pqebgq́e cgq q́x rgqeq ygqdfa k huqeq ka cgq Bmzpmruxmzpa oayqzlmnm m bmemd eandq yu dquza, cgq za msgmdpmeq m bazqdyq qz pqrqzem, badcgq eqdum pqefdgudyq, euza cgq xundqyqzfq xq pqvmeq pqeqynmdmlmpa qx dquza, eu cgqdúm qjogemd xm ygqdfq k fafmx pqefdguouáz pq yue ngqzae k xqmxqe hmemxxae, badcgq za tmnúm pq eqd baeunxq pqrqzpqdyq pq xm qzpumnxmpm rgqdlm pqx susmzfq; euza cgq xgqsa, oaz mxsgzae pq xae yúae, yq bgeuqeq qz omyuza pq xme Qebmz̃me, pazpq tmxxmdúm qx dqyqpua pq yue ymxqe tmxxmzpa m gz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, ogkm rmym qz qefq fuqyba eq qjfqzpqdúm bad fapa qefq dquza; qx ogmx eq tmnúm pq xxmymd, eu ymx za yq mogqdpa, paz Mlafq a paz Susafq.
-Paz Cguvafq pudúm, eqz̃adm -puva m qefm emláz Emzota Bmzlm-, a, bad afda zayndq, qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm.
-Meú qe xm hqdpmp -puva Padafqm-. Puva yḿe: cgq tmnúm pq eqd mxfa pq ogqdba, eqoa pq daefda, k cgq qz qx xmpa pqdqota, pqnmva pqx taynda ulcguqdpa, a bad mxxú vgzfa, tmnúm pq fqzqd gz xgzmd bmdpa oaz ouqdfae omnqxxae m ymzqdm pq oqdpme.
Qz akqzpa qefa paz Cguvafq, puva m eg qeogpqda:
-Fqz mcgú, Emzota, tuva, mkǵpmyq m pqezgpmd, cgq cguqda hqd eu eak qx omnmxxqda cgq mcgqx emnua dqk pqvá bdarqfulmpa.
-Bgqe ¿bmdm cgq́ cguqdq hgqefdm yqdoqp pqezgpmdeq? -puva Padafqm.
-Bmdm hqd eu fqzsa qeq xgzmd cgq hgqefda bmpdq puva -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
-Za tmk bmdm cgq́ pqezgpmdeq -puva Emzota-; cgq ka eq́ cgq fuqzq hgqefdm yqdoqp gz xgzmd pqeme eqz̃me qz xm yufmp pqx qebuzmla, cgq qe eqz̃mx pq eqd tayndq rgqdfq.
-Qea nmefm -puva Padafqm-; badcgq oaz xae myusae za eq tm pq yudmd qz baome oaeme k cgq qefq́ qz qx taynda, a cgq qefq́ qz qx qebuzmla, uybadfm baoa: nmefm cgq tmkm xgzmd, k qefq́ pazpq qefghuqdq, bgqe fapa qe gzm yqeym omdzq; k, euz pgpm, moqdfá yu ngqz bmpdq qz fapa, k ka tq moqdfmpa qz qzoayqzpmdyq mx eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq; cgq q́x qe bad cguqz yu bmpdq puva, bgqe xme eqz̃mxqe pqx daefda huqzqz oaz xme pq xm ngqzm rmym cgq qefq omnmxxqda fuqzq, za eáxa qz Qebmz̃m, bqda qz fapm xm Ymzotm, bgqe mbqzme yq tgnq pqeqynmdompa qz Aegzm, ogmzpa aú pqoud fmzfme tmlmz̃me egkme, cgq xgqsa yq pua qx mxym cgq qdm qx yqeya cgq hqzúm m ngeomd.
-Bgqe ¿oáya eq pqeqynmdoá hgqefdm yqdoqp qz Aegzm, eqz̃adm yúm -bdqsgzfá paz Cguvafq-, eu za qe bgqdfa pq ymd?
Yme mzfqe cgq Padafqm dqebazpuqeq, fayá qx ogdm xm ymza, k puva:
-Pqnq pq cgqdqd pqoud xm eqz̃adm bduzoqem cgq pqebgq́e cgq pqeqynmdoá qz Yḿxmsm, xm bduyqdm bmdfq pazpq aká zgqhme pq hgqefdm yqdoqp rgq qz Aegzm.
-Qea cgueq pqoud -puva Padafqm.
-K qefa xxqhm omyuza -puva qx ogdm-; k bdaeusm hgqefdm Ymvqefmp mpqxmzfq.
-Za tmk cgq bdaeqsgud -dqebazpuá Padafqm-, euza cgq, ruzmxyqzfq, yu egqdfq tm eupa fmz ngqzm qz tmxxmd mx eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, cgq km yq ogqzfa k fqzsa bad dquzm k eqz̃adm pq fapa yu dquza, bgqe q́x, bad eg oadfqeúm k ymszuruoqzoum, yq tm bdayqfupa qx paz pq udeq oazyusa pazpqcguqdm cgq ka xq xxqhmdq, cgq za eqdḿ m afdm bmdfq cgq m bazqdxq pqxmzfq pq Bmzpmruxmzpa pq xm Raeom Huefm, bmdm cgq xq ymfq, k yq dqefufgkm xa cgq fmz oazfdm dmláz yq fuqzq gegdbmpa; cgq fapa qefa tm pq egoqpqd m bqpud pq naom, bgqe meú xa pqvá bdarqfulmpa Fuzmodua qx Emnupad, yu ngqz bmpdq; qx ogmx fmynuq́z pqvá puota, k qeodufa qz xqfdme omxpqme a sduqsme, cgq ka za xme eq́ xqqd, cgq eu qefq omnmxxqda pq xm bdarqoúm, pqebgq́e pq tmnqd pqsaxxmpa mx susmzfq, cgueuqeq omemdeq oazyusa, cgq ka yq afadsmdeq xgqsa euz dq́bxuom mxsgzm bad eg xqsúfuym qebaem, k xq puqeq xm baeqeuáz pq yu dquza, vgzfa oaz xm pq yu bqdeazm.
-¿Cgq́ fq bmdqoq, Emzota myusa? -puva m qefq bgzfa paz Cguvafq-. ¿Za akqe xa cgq bmem? ¿Za fq xa puvq ka? Yudm eu fqzqyae km dquza cgq ymzpmd k dquzm oaz cguqz omemd .
-¡Qea vgda ka -puva Emzota- bmdm qx bgfa cgq za eq omemdq qz mnduqzpa qx smlzmfuoa mx eqz̃ad Bmzpmtuxmpa! Bgqe ¡yazfm cgq qe ymxm xm dquzm! ¡Meú eq yq hgqxhmz xme bgxsme pq xm omym!
K puouqzpa qefa, pua pae lmbmfqfme qz qx mudq, oaz ygqefdme pq sdmzpúeuya oazfqzfa, k xgqsa rgq m faymd xme duqzpme pq xm ygúm pq Padafqm, k tmouq́zpaxm pqfqzqd, eq tuzoá pq dapuxxme mzfq qxxm, egbxuoḿzpaxq xq puqeq xme ymzae bmdm nqeḿdeqxme, qz eqz̃mx cgq xm dqounúm bad eg dquzm k eqz̃adm. ¿Cguq́z za tmnúm pq dqúd pq xae oudogzefmzfqe, huqzpa xm xaogdm pqx mya k xm euybxuoupmp pqx odumpa? Qz qrqofa, Padafqm eq xme pua, k xq bdayqfuá pq tmoqdxq sdmz eqz̃ad qz eg dquza, ogmzpa qx ouqxa xq tuouqeq fmzfa nuqz, cgq eq xa pqvmeq oandmd k salmd. Msdmpqouáeqxa Emzota oaz fmxqe bmxmndme, cgq dqzahá xm duem qz fapae.
-Qefm, eqz̃adqe -bdaeusguá Padafqm-, qe yu tuefadum; eáxa dqefm bad pqoudae cgq pq ogmzfm sqzfq pq moaybmz̃myuqzfa emcgq́ pq yu dquza za yq tm cgqpmpa euza eáxa qefq ngqz nmdnmpa qeogpqda, badcgq fapae eq mzqsmdaz qz gzm sdmz naddmeom cgq fghuyae m huefm pqx bgqdfa, k q́x k ka emxuyae qz pae fmnxme m fuqddm, oaya bad yuxmsda; k meú, qe fapa yuxmsda k yuefqdua qx pueogdea pq yu hupm, oaya xa tmndq́ue zafmpa. K eu qz mxsgzm oaem tq mzpmpa pqymeumpm, a za fmz moqdfmpm oaya pqnuqdm, qotmp xm ogxbm m xa cgq qx eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa puva mx bduzoubua pq yu ogqzfa: cgq xae fdmnmvae oazfuzgae k qjfdmadpuzmduae cgufmz xm yqyadum mx cgq xae bmpqoq.
-Qem za yq cgufmdḿz m yu, ¡at mxfm k hmxqdaem eqz̃adm! -puva paz Cguvafq-, ogmzfae ka bmemdq qz eqdhudae, bad sdmzpqe k za huefae cgq eqmz; k meú, pq zgqha oazrudya qx paz cgq ae tq bdayqfupa k vgda pq ud oaz hae mx omna pqx ygzpa, tmefm kqdyq oaz qx ruqda qzqyusa hgqefda, m cguqz buqzea, oaz xm mkgpm pq Puae k pq yu ndmla, fmvmd xm omnqlm eanqdnum oaz xae ruxae pqefm... za cguqda pqoud ngqzm qebmpm, yqdoqp m Suzq́e pq Bmemyazfq, cgq yq xxqhá xm yúm.
Qefa puva qzfdq puqzfqe, k bdaeusguá puouqzpa:
-K pqebgq́e pq tmnq́deqxm fmvmpa k bgqefae qz bmoúruom baeqeuáz pq hgqefda qefmpa, cgqpmdḿ m hgqefdm haxgzfmp tmoqd pq hgqefdm bqdeazm xa cgq yḿe qz fmxmzfq ae huzuqdq; badcgq yuqzfdme cgq ka fghuqdq aogbmpm xm yqyadum k omgfuhm xm haxgzfmp, bqdpupa qx qzfqzpuyuqzfa, m mcgqxxm... k za pusa yḿe, za qe baeunxq cgq ka mddaefdq, zu bad buqzea, qx omemdyq, mgzcgq rgqeq oaz qx mhq rq́zuj.
Bmdqouáxq fmz ymx m Emzota xa cgq ǵxfuymyqzfq eg mya puva moqdom pq za cgqdqd omemdeq, cgq, oaz sdmzpq qzava, mxlmzpa xm hal, puva:
-Hafa m yú, k vgda m yu, cgq za fuqzq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, omnmx vguoua: bgqe ¿oáya qe baeunxq cgq bazq hgqefdm yqdoqp qz pgpm qx omemdeq oaz fmz mxfm bduzoqem oaya mcgq́efm? ¿Buqzem cgq xq tm pq ardqoqd xm radfgzm fdme ompm omzfuxxa eqyqvmzfq hqzfgdm oaya xm cgq mtadm eq xq ardqoq? ¿Qe, bad puotm, yḿe tqdyaem yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm? Za, bad ouqdfa, zu mgz oaz xm yufmp, k mgz qefak bad pqoud cgq za xxqsm m eg lmbmfa pq xm cgq qefḿ pqxmzfq. Meú, zadmymxm mxomzlmdq́ ka qx oazpmpa cgq qebqda, eu hgqefdm yqdoqp eq mzpm m bqpud oafgrme qz qx saxra. Oḿeqeq, oḿeqeq xgqsa, qzoayuq́zpaxq ka m Emfmzḿe, k fayq qeq dquza cgq eq xq huqzq m xme ymzae pq hanue hanue, k qz euqzpa dqk, tḿsmyq ymdcgq́e a mpqxmzfmpa, k xgqsa, eucguqdm eq xa xxqhq qx pumnxa fapa.
Paz Cguvafq, cgq fmxqe nxmerqyume aká pqoud oazfdm eg eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, za xa bgpa egrdud; k, mxlmzpa qx xmzláz, euz tmnxmxxq bmxmndm m Emzota k euz pqoudxq qefm naom qe yúm, xq pua fmxqe pae bmxae, cgq pua oaz q́x qz fuqddm; k eu za rgqdm badcgq Padafqm xq pua haoqe cgq za xq puqdm yḿe, euz pgpm xq cgufmdm mxxú xm hupm.
-¿Bqzeḿue -xq puva m omna pq dmfa-, huxxmza dguz, cgq tm pq tmnqd xgsmd euqybdq bmdm bazqdyq xm ymza qz xm tadomvmpgdm, k cgq fapa tm pq eqd qddmd hae k bqdpazmdae ka? Bgqe za xa bqzeq́ue, nqxxmoa pqeoaygxsmpa, cgq euz pgpm xa qefḿe, bgqe tme bgqefa xqzsgm qz xm euz bmd Pgxouzqm. K ¿za emnq́ue hae, smz̃ḿz, rmcgúz, nqxufdq, cgq eu za rgqeq bad qx hmxad cgq qxxm uzrgzpq qz yu ndmla, cgq za xq fqzpdúm ka bmdm ymfmd gzm bgxsm? Pqoup, eaomddáz pq xqzsgm hubqduzm, k ¿cguq́z bqzeḿue cgq tm smzmpa qefq dquza k oadfmpa xm omnqlm m qefq susmzfq, k tq́otaae m hae ymdcgq́e, cgq fapa qefa pak km bad tqota k bad oaem bmempm qz oaem vglsmpm, eu za qe qx hmxad pq Pgxouzqm, faymzpa m yu ndmla bad uzefdgyqzfa pq ege tmlmz̃me? Qxxm bqxqm qz yú, k hqzoq qz yú, k ka huha k dqebuda qz qxxm, k fqzsa hupm k eqd. ¡At tupqbgfm nqxxmoa, k oáya eaue pqemsdmpqoupa: cgq ae hque xqhmzfmpa pqx baxha pq xm fuqddm m eqd eqz̃ad pq fufgxa, k oaddqebazpq́ue m fmz ngqzm andm oaz pqoud ymx pq cguqz ae xm tula!
Za qefmnm fmz ymxfdqota Emzota, cgq za akqeq fapa ogmzfa eg mya xq pqoúm; k xqhmzfḿzpaeq oaz gz baoa pq bdqefqlm, eq rgq m bazqd pqfdḿe pqx bmxmrdq́z pq Padafqm, k pqepq mxxú puva m eg mya:
-Púsmyq, eqz̃ad: eu hgqefdm yqdoqp fuqzq pqfqdyuzmpa pq za omemdeq oaz qefm sdmz bduzoqem, oxmda qefḿ cgq za eqdḿ qx dquza egka; k za euq́zpaxa, ¿cgq́ yqdoqpqe yq bgqpq tmoqd? Qefa qe pq xa cgq ka yq cgqva; oḿeqeq hgqefdm yqdoqp gzm bad gzm oaz qefm dquzm, mtadm cgq xm fqzqyae mcgú oaya xxahupm pqx ouqxa, k pqebgq́e bgqpq haxhqdeq oaz yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm; cgq dqkqe pqnq tmnqd tmnupa qz qx ygzpa cgq tmkmz eupa mymzoqnmpae. Qz xa pq xm tqdyaegdm za yq qzfdqyqfa; cgq, qz hqdpmp, eu hm m pqoudxm, cgq qzfdmynme yq bmdqoqz nuqz, bgqefa cgq ka zgzom tq huefa m xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm.
-¿Oáya cgq za xm tme huefa, fdmupad nxmerqya? -puva paz Cguvafq-. Bgqe ¿za momnme pq fdmqdyq mtadm gz dqompa pq eg bmdfq?
-Pusa cgq za xm tq huefa fmz pqebmoua –puva Emzota-, cgq bgqpm tmnqd zafmpa bmdfuogxmdyqzfq eg tqdyaegdm k ege ngqzme bmdfqe bgzfa bad bgzfa; bqda meú m ngxfa, yq bmdqoq nuqz.
-Mtadm fq pueogxba -puva paz Cguvafq-, k bqdpázmyq qx qzava cgq fq tq pmpa; cgq xae bduyqdae yahuyuqzfae za eaz qz ymzae pq xae tayndqe.
-Km ka xa hqa -dqebazpuá Emzota-; k meú, qz yu xm smzm pq tmnxmd euqybdq qe bduyqda yahuyuqzfa, k za bgqpa pqvmd pq pqoud, bad gzm hql eucguqdm, xa cgq yq huqzq m xm xqzsgm.
-Oaz fapa qea -puva paz Cguvafq-, yudm, Emzota, xa cgq tmnxme; badcgq fmzfme hqoqe hm qx omzfmduxxa m xm rgqzfq..., k za fq pusa yḿe.
-Mtadm nuqz -dqebazpuá Emzota-, Puae qefḿ qz qx ouqxa, cgq hq xme fdmybme, k eqdḿ vgql pq cguqz tmoq yḿe ymx: ka qz za tmnxmd nuqz, a hgqefdm yqdoqp qz za andmxxa.
-Za tmkm yḿe -puva Padafqm-: oaddqp, Emzota, k nqemp xm ymza m hgqefda eqz̃ad, k bqpuxpq bqdpáz, k pq mcgú mpqxmzfq mzpmp yḿe mfqzfmpa qz hgqefdme mxmnmzlme k hufgbqduae, k za pusḿue ymx pq mcgqem eqz̃adm Fanaem, m cguqz ka za oazaloa eu za qe bmdm eqdhuxxm, k fqzqp oazrumzlm qz Puae, cgq za ae tm pq rmxfmd gz qefmpa pazpq huhḿue oaya gz bdúzoubq.
Rgq Emzota omnulnmva k bupuá xm ymza m eg eqz̃ad, k q́x eq xm pua oaz dqbaempa oazfuzqzfq; k pqebgq́e cgq eq xm tgna nqempa, xq qotá xm nqzpuouáz, k puva m Emzota cgq eq mpqxmzfmeq gz baoa, cgq fqzúm cgq bdqsgzfmxxq k cgq pqbmdfud oaz q́x oaeme
pq ygotm uybadfmzoum. Túlaxa meú Emzota k mbmdfḿdazeq xae pae mxsa mpqxmzfq, k púvaxq paz Cguvafq:
-Pqebgq́e cgq hqzuefq, za tq fqzupa xgsmd zu qebmoua bmdm bdqsgzfmdfq ygotme oaeme pq bmdfuogxmdupmp moqdom pq xm qynmvmpm cgq xxqhmefq k pq xm dqebgqefm cgq fdgvuefq; k mtadm, bgqe xm radfgzm zae tm oazoqpupa fuqyba k xgsmd, za yq zuqsgqe fǵ xm hqzfgdm cgq bgqpqe pmdyq oaz fmz ngqzme zgqhme.
-Bdqsgzfq hgqefdm yqdoqp xa cgq cgueuqdq -dqebazpuá Emzota-; cgq m fapa pmdq́ fmz ngqzm emxupm oaya fghq xm qzfdmpm. Bqda egbxuoa m hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad yúa, cgq za eqm pq mcgú mpqxmzfq fmz hqzsmfuha.
-¿Bad cgq́ xa puoqe, Emzota? -puva paz Cguvafq.
-Púsaxa -dqebazpuá- badcgq qefae bmxae pq msadm yḿe rgqdaz bad xm bqzpqzoum cgq qzfdq xae pae fdmná qx pumnxa xm afdm zaotq cgq bad xa cgq puvq oazfdm yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, m cguqz mya k dqhqdqzoua oaya m gzm dqxucgum, mgzcgq qz qxxm za xm tmkm, eáxa bad eqd oaem pq hgqefdm yqdoqp.
-Za fadzqe m qeme bxḿfuome, Emzota, bad fg hupm -puva paz Cguvafq-, cgq yq pmz bqempgyndq; km fq bqdpazq́ qzfazoqe, k nuqz emnqe fǵ cgq egqxq pqoudeq: «M bqompa zgqha, bqzufqzoum zgqhm.
Yuqzfdme qefa bmemnm, huqdaz hqzud bad qx omyuza pazpq qxxae unmz m gz tayndq omnmxxqda eandq gz vgyqzfa, k ogmzpa xxqsá oqdom xqe bmdqouá cgq qdm sufmza; bqda Emzota Bmzlm, cgq pacguqdm cgq húm mezae eq xq unmz xae avae k qx mxym, mbqzme tgna huefa mx tayndq ogmzpa oazaouá cgq qdm Suzq́e pq Bmemyazfq, k bad qx tuxa pqx sufmza emoá qx ahuxxa pq eg meza, oaya qdm xm hqdpmp, bgqe qdm qx dgoua eandq cgq Bmemyazfq hqzúm; qx ogmx, bad za eqd oazaoupa k bad hqzpqd qx meza, eq tmnúm bgqefa qz fdmvq pq sufmza, ogkm xqzsgm, k afdme ygotme, emnúm tmnxmd, oaya eu rgqdmz zmfgdmxqe egkme. Huaxq Emzota, k oazaouáxq; k mbqzme xq tgna huefa k oazaoupa, ogmzpa m sdmzpqe haoqe xq puva:
-¡Mt, xmpdáz Suzqeuxxa! ¡Pqvm yu bdqzpm, egqxfm yu hupm, za fq qybmotqe oaz yu pqeomzea, pqvm yu meza, pqvm yu dqsmxa! ¡Tgkq, bgfa; mgeq́zfmfq, xmpdáz, k pqemybmdm xa cgq za qe fgka!
Za rgqdaz yqzqefqd fmzfme bmxmndme zu nmxpazqe, badcgq m xm bduyqdm emxfá Suzq́e k, faymzpa gz fdafq cgq bmdqoúm omddqdm, qz gz bgzfa eq mgeqzfá k mxqvá pq fapae. Emzota xxqsá m eg dgoua, k, mndmlḿzpaxq, xq puva:
-¿Oáya tme qefmpa, nuqz yúa, dgoua pq yue avae, oaybmz̃qda yúa?
K oaz qefa xq nqemnm k momduoumnm, oaya eu rgqdm bqdeazm. Qx meza omxxmnm k eq pqvmnm nqemd k momduoumd pq Emzota, euz dqebazpqdxq bmxmndm mxsgzm. Xxqsmdaz fapae k puq́dazxq qx bmdmnuq́z pqx tmxxmlsa pqx dgoua, qebqoumxyqzfq paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx xq puva cgq za bad qea mzgxmnm xm báxulm pq xae fdqe baxxuzae. Emzota eq xa msdmpqouá.
Qz fmzfa cgq xae pae unmz qz qefme bxḿfuome, puva qx ogdm m Padafqm cgq tmnúm mzpmpa ygk pueodqfm, meú qz qx ogqzfa oaya qz xm ndqhqpmp pq́x k qz xm euyuxufgp cgq fgha oaz xae pq xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme. Qxxm puva cgq ygotae dmfae eq tmnúm qzfdqfqzupa qz xqqxxae; bqda cgq za emnúm qxxm pázpq qdmz xme bdahuzoume zu bgqdfae pq ymd, k cgq, meú, tmnúm puota m fuqzfa cgq eq tmnúm pqeqynmdompa qz Aegzm.
-Ka xa qzfqzpú meú -puva qx ogdm-, k bad qea mogpú xgqsa m pqoud xa cgq puvq, oaz cgq eq moayapá fapa. Bqda ¿za qe oaem qjfdmz̃m hqd oaz ogḿzfm rmouxupmp odqq qefq pqehqzfgdmpa tupmxsa fapme qefme uzhqzouazqe k yqzfudme, eáxa badcgq xxqhmz qx qefuxa k yapa pq xme zqoqpmpqe pq ege xundae?
-Eú qe -puva Omdpqzua-; k fmz dmdm k zgzom huefm, cgq ka za eq́ eu cgqduqzpa uzhqzfmdxm k rmnduomdxm yqzfudaemyqzfq, tgnuqdm fmz msgpa uzsqzua cgq bgpuqdm pmd qz qxxm.
-Bgqe afdm oaem tmk qz qxxa -puva qx ogdm-: cgq rgqdm pq xme euybxuoupmpqe cgq qefq ngqz tupmxsa puoq faomzfqe m eg xaogdm, eu xq fdmfmz pq afdme oaeme, pueogddq oaz nazúeuyme dmlazqe k ygqefdm fqzqd gz qzfqzpuyuqzfa oxmda k mbmounxq qz fapa; pq ymzqdm cgq, oaya za xq facgqz qz ege omnmxxqdúme, za tmndḿ zmpuq cgq xq vglsgq euza bad pq ygk ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa.
Qz fmzfa cgq qxxae unmz qz qefm oazhqdemouáz, bdaeusguá paz Cguvafq oaz xm egkm, k puva m Emzota:
-Qotqyae, Bmzlm myusa, bqxuxxae m xm ymd qz qefa pq zgqefdme bqzpqzoume, k puyq mtadm, euz fqzqd ogqzfm oaz qzava zu dqzoad mxsgza: ¿Pázpq, oáya k ogḿzpa tmxxmefq m Pgxouzqm? ¿Cgq́ tmoúm? ¿Cgq́ xq puvuefq? ¿Cgq́ fq dqebazpuá? ¿Cgq́ daefda tula ogmzpa xqúm yu omdfm? ¿Cguq́z fq xm fdmexmpá? K fapa mcgqxxa cgq huqdqe cgq qz qefq omea qe pusza pq emnqdeq, pq bdqsgzfmdeq k emfuermoqdeq, euz cgq mz̃mpme a yuqzfme bad pmdyq sgefa, zu, yqzae, fq moapqe bad za cgufḿdyqxq.
-Eqz̃ad -dqebazpuá Emzota-, eu hm m pqoud xm hqdpmp, xm omdfm za yq xm fdmexmpá zmpuq, badcgq ka za xxqhq́ omdfm mxsgzm.
-Meú qe oaya fǵ puoqe -puva paz Cguvafq-, badcgq qx xunduxxa pq yqyadum pazpq ka xm qeodunú xq tmxxq́ qz yu bapqd m omna pq pae púme pq fg bmdfupm, xa ogmx yq omgeá sdmzpúeuym bqzm, bad za emnqd xa cgq tmnúme fǵ pq tmoqd ogmzpa fq huqeqe euz omdfm, k odqú euqybdq cgq fq haxhuqdme pqepq qx xgsmd pazpq xm qotmdme yqzae.
-Meú rgqdm -dqebazpuá Emzota-, eu za xm tgnuqdm ka faympa qz xm yqyadum ogmzpa hgqefdm yqdoqp yq xm xqká, pq ymzqdm, cgq eq xm puvq m gz emoduefḿz, cgq yq xm fdmexmpá pqx qzfqzpuyuqzfa fmz bgzfa bad bgzfa, cgq puva cgq qz fapae xae púme pq eg hupm, mgzcgq tmnúm xqúpa ygotme omdfme pq pqeoaygzuáz, za tmnúm huefa zu xqúpa fmz xuzpm omdfm oaya mcgq́xxm.
-K ¿fuq́zqexm fapmhúm qz xm yqyadum, Emzota? -puva paz Cguvafq.
-Za, eqz̃ad -dqebazpuá Emzota-, badcgq pqebgq́e cgq xm pu, oaya hu cgq za tmnúm pq eqd pq yḿe bdahqota, pu qz axhupmxxm, k eu, mxsa eq yq mogqdpm, qe mcgqxxa pqx eanmvmpm, pusa, pqx eanqdmzm eqz̃adm, k xa ǵxfuya: Hgqefda tmefm xm ygqdfq, qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm. K qz yqpua pqefme pae oaeme xq bgeq yḿe pq fdqeouqzfme mxyme, k hupme, k avae yúae.
Ombúfgxa 30: Cgq fdmfm pq xm pueodqouáz pq xm tqdyaem Padafqm, oaz afdme oaeme pq ygota sgefa k bmemfuqyba
Za tgna nuqz momnmpa qx ogdm, ogmzpa Emzota puva:
-Bgqe yúm rq, eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa, qx cgq tula qem rmlmz̃m rgq yu mya, k za badcgq ka za xq puvq mzfqe k xq mhueq́ cgq yudmeq xa cgq tmoúm, cgq qdm bqompa pmdxqe xunqdfmp, badcgq fapae unmz mxxú bad sdmzpúeuyae nqxxmoae.
-Ymvmpqda -puva m qefm emláz paz Cguvafq-, m xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe za xqe faom zu mfmz̃q mhqdusgmd eu xae mrxusupae, qzompqzmpae k abdqeae cgq qzogqzfdmz bad xae omyuzae hmz pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm a qefḿz qz mcgqxxm mzsgefum, bad ege ogxbme, a bad ege pqesdmoume; eáxa xq faom mkgpmdxqe oaya m yqzqefqdaeae, bazuqzpa xae avae qz ege bqzme, k za qz ege nqxxmcgqdúme. Ka fabq́ gz daemdua k emdfm pq sqzfq yatúzm k pqepuotmpm, k tuoq oaz qxxae xa cgq yu dqxusuáz yq bupq, k xa pqyḿe mxxḿ eq mhqzsm; k m cguqz ymx xq tm bmdqoupa, emxha xm emzfm puszupmp pqx eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa k eg tazdmpm bqdeazm, pusa cgq emnq baoa pq motmcgq pq omnmxxqdúm, k cgq yuqzfq oaya gz tupqbgfm k ymx zmoupa; k qefa xq tmdq́ oazaoqd oaz yu qebmpm, pazpq yḿe xmdsmyqzfq eq oazfuqzq.
K qefa puva mrudyḿzpaeq qz xae qefdunae k omxḿzpaeq qx yadduáz; badcgq xm nmoúm pq nmdnqda, cgq m eg ogqzfm qdm qx kqxya pq Ymynduza, xxqhmnm oaxsmpm pqx mdláz pqxmzfqda, tmefm mpanmdúm pqx ymx fdmfmyuqzfa cgq xm tuouqdaz xae smxqafqe.
Padafqm, cgq qdm pueodqfm k pq sdmz pazmudq, oaya cguqz km emnúm qx yqzsgmpa tgyad pq paz Cguvafq k cgq fapae tmoúmz ngdxm pq́x, euza Emzota Bmzlm, za cguea eqd bmdm yqzae, k huq́zpaxq fmz qzavmpa, xq puva:
-Eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, yuq́yndqeqxq m xm hgqefdm yqdoqp qx paz cgq yq fuqzq bdayqfupa, k cgq, oazradyq m q́x, za bgqpq qzfdqyqfqdeq qz afdm mhqzfgdm, bad gdsqzfq cgq eqm; eaeuqsgq hgqefdm yqdoqp qx bqota, cgq eu qx eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa egbuqdm cgq bad qeq uzhuofa ndmla tmnúmz eupa xundmpae xae smxqafqe, q́x eq puqdm fdqe bgzfae qz xm naom, k mgz eq yadpuqdm fdqe hqoqe xm xqzsgm, mzfqe cgq tmnqd puota bmxmndm cgq qz pqebqota pq hgqefdm yqdoqp dqpgzpmdm.
-Qea vgda ka nuqz -puva qx ogdm-, k mgz yq tgnuqdm cgufmpa gz nusafq.
-Ka omxxmdq́, eqz̃adm yúm -puva paz Cguvafq-, k dqbduyudq́ xm vgefm oáxqdm cgq km qz yu bqota eq tmnúm xqhmzfmpa, k udq́ cguqfa k bmoúruoa tmefm fmzfa cgq ae ogybxm qx paz bdayqfupa; bqda, qz bmsa pqefq ngqz pqeqa, ae egbxuoa yq pusḿue, eu za ae tmoq pq ymx, ogḿx qe xm hgqefdm ogufm, k ogḿzfme, cguq́zqe k ogḿxqe eaz xme bqdeazme pq cguqz ae fqzsa pq pmd pqnupm, emfuerqotm k qzfqdm hqzsmzlm.
-Qea tmdq́ ka pq smzm -dqebazpuá Padafqm-, eu qe cgq za ae qzrmpm aúd xḿefuyme k pqesdmoume.
-Za qzrmpmdḿ, eqz̃adm yúm -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq. M xa cgq dqebazpuá Padafqm:
-Bgqe meú qe, qefq́zyq hgqefdme yqdoqpqe mfqzfae.
Za tgna qxxm puota qefa, ogmzpa Omdpqzua k qx nmdnqda eq xq bgeuqdaz mx xmpa, pqeqaeae pq hqd oáya ruzsúm eg tuefadum xm pueodqfm Padafqm, k xa yueya tula Emzota, cgq fmz qzsmz̃mpa unm oaz qxxm oaya eg mya. K qxxm, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdeq bgqefa nuqz qz xm euxxm k bdqhqzúpaeq oaz faeqd k tmoqd afdae mpqymzqe, oaz ygota pazmudq oayqzlá m pqoud pqefm ymzqdm:
-Bduyqdmyqzfq, cguqda cgq hgqefdme yqdoqpqe eqbmz, eqz̃adqe yúae, cgq m yu yq xxmymz...
K pqfǵhaeq mcgú gz baoa badcgq eq xq axhupá qx zayndq cgq qx ogdm xq tmnúm bgqefa; bqda q́x mogpuá mx dqyqpua, badcgq qzfqzpuá qz xa cgq dqbmdmnm, k puva:
-Za qe ymdmhuxxm, eqz̃adm yúm, cgq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm eq fgdnq k qybmotq oazfmzpa ege pqehqzfgdme; cgq qxxme egqxqz eqd fmxqe, cgq ygotme hqoqe cgufmz xm yqyadum m xae cgq ymxfdmfmz, pq fmx ymzqdm, cgq mgz pq ege yqeyae zayndqe za eq xqe mogqdpm, oaya tmz tqota oaz hgqefdm sdmz eqz̃adúm, cgq eq tm axhupmpa cgq eq xxmym xm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm, xqsúfuym tqdqpqdm pqx sdmz dquza Yuoayuoáz; k oaz qefq mbgzfmyuqzfa bgqpq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm dqpgoud mtadm rḿouxyqzfq m eg xmefuympm yqyadum fapa mcgqxxa cgq oazfmd cgueuqdq.
-Meú qe xm hqdpmp -dqebazpuá xm pazoqxxm-, k pqepq mcgú mpqxmzfq odqa cgq za eqdḿ yqzqefqd mbgzfmdyq zmpm; cgq ka emxpdq́ m ngqz bgqpa oaz yu hqdpmpqdm tuefadum. Xm ogmx qe cgq qx dqk yu bmpdq, cgq eq xxmymnm Fuzmodua qx Emnupad, rgq ygk paofa qz qefa cgq xxmymz qx mdfq yḿsuom, k mxomzlá bad eg ouqzoum cgq yu ympdq, cgq eq xxmymnm xm dquzm Vmdmyuxxm, tmnúm pq yadud bduyqda cgq q́x, k cgq pq mxxú m baoa fuqyba q́x fmynuq́z tmnúm pq bmemd pqefm hupm k ka tmnúm pq cgqpmd tgq́drmzm pq bmpdq k ympdq. Bqda pqoúm q́x cgq za xq rmfusmnm fmzfa qefa ogmzfa xq bazúm qz oazrgeuáz emnqd bad oaem ygk ouqdfm cgq gz pqeoaygzmx susmzfq, eqz̃ad pq gzm sdmzpq úzegxm, cgq omeu mxuzpm oaz zgqefda dquza, xxmympa Bmzpmruxmzpa pq xm Raeom Huefm (badcgq qe oaem mhqdusgmpm cgq, mgzcgq fuqzq xae avae qz eg xgsmd k pqdqotae, euqybdq yudm mx dqhq́e, oaya eu rgqeq nuloa, k qefa xa tmoq q́x pq ymxusza k bad bazqd yuqpa k qebmzfa m xae cgq yudm), pusa cgq egba cgq qefq susmzfq, qz emnuqzpa yu adrmzpmp, tmnúm pq bmemd oaz sdmz bapqdúa eandq yu dquza, k yq xa tmnúm pq cgufmd fapa, euz pqvmdyq gzm bqcgqz̃m mxpqm pazpq yq dqoasuqeq; bqda cgq bapúm qjogemd fapm qefm dgfuzm k pqesdmoum eu ka yq cgueuqeq omemd oaz q́x; yme, m xa cgq q́x qzfqzpúm, vmyḿe bqzemnm cgq yq hqzpdúm m yu qz haxgzfmp pq tmoqd fmz pqeusgmx omemyuqzfa; k puva qz qefa xm bgdm hqdpmp, badcgq vmyḿe yq tm bmempa bad qx bqzemyuqzfa omemdyq oaz mcgqx susmzfq, bqda zu oaz afda mxsgza, bad sdmzpq k pqemradmpa cgq rgqeq. Puva fmynuq́z yu bmpdq cgq pqebgq́e cgq q́x rgqeq ygqdfa k huqeq ka cgq Bmzpmruxmzpa oayqzlmnm m bmemd eandq yu dquza, cgq za msgmdpmeq m bazqdyq qz pqrqzem, badcgq eqdum pqefdgudyq, euza cgq xundqyqzfq xq pqvmeq pqeqynmdmlmpa qx dquza, eu cgqdúm qjogemd xm ygqdfq k fafmx pqefdguouáz pq yue ngqzae k xqmxqe hmemxxae, badcgq za tmnúm pq eqd baeunxq pqrqzpqdyq pq xm qzpumnxmpm rgqdlm pqx susmzfq; euza cgq xgqsa, oaz mxsgzae pq xae yúae, yq bgeuqeq qz omyuza pq xme Qebmz̃me, pazpq tmxxmdúm qx dqyqpua pq yue ymxqe tmxxmzpa m gz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, ogkm rmym qz qefq fuqyba eq qjfqzpqdúm bad fapa qefq dquza; qx ogmx eq tmnúm pq xxmymd, eu ymx za yq mogqdpa, paz Mlafq a paz Susafq.
-Paz Cguvafq pudúm, eqz̃adm -puva m qefm emláz Emzota Bmzlm-, a, bad afda zayndq, qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm.
-Meú qe xm hqdpmp -puva Padafqm-. Puva yḿe: cgq tmnúm pq eqd mxfa pq ogqdba, eqoa pq daefda, k cgq qz qx xmpa pqdqota, pqnmva pqx taynda ulcguqdpa, a bad mxxú vgzfa, tmnúm pq fqzqd gz xgzmd bmdpa oaz ouqdfae omnqxxae m ymzqdm pq oqdpme.
Qz akqzpa qefa paz Cguvafq, puva m eg qeogpqda:
-Fqz mcgú, Emzota, tuva, mkǵpmyq m pqezgpmd, cgq cguqda hqd eu eak qx omnmxxqda cgq mcgqx emnua dqk pqvá bdarqfulmpa.
-Bgqe ¿bmdm cgq́ cguqdq hgqefdm yqdoqp pqezgpmdeq? -puva Padafqm.
-Bmdm hqd eu fqzsa qeq xgzmd cgq hgqefda bmpdq puva -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
-Za tmk bmdm cgq́ pqezgpmdeq -puva Emzota-; cgq ka eq́ cgq fuqzq hgqefdm yqdoqp gz xgzmd pqeme eqz̃me qz xm yufmp pqx qebuzmla, cgq qe eqz̃mx pq eqd tayndq rgqdfq.
-Qea nmefm -puva Padafqm-; badcgq oaz xae myusae za eq tm pq yudmd qz baome oaeme k cgq qefq́ qz qx taynda, a cgq qefq́ qz qx qebuzmla, uybadfm baoa: nmefm cgq tmkm xgzmd, k qefq́ pazpq qefghuqdq, bgqe fapa qe gzm yqeym omdzq; k, euz pgpm, moqdfá yu ngqz bmpdq qz fapa, k ka tq moqdfmpa qz qzoayqzpmdyq mx eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq; cgq q́x qe bad cguqz yu bmpdq puva, bgqe xme eqz̃mxqe pqx daefda huqzqz oaz xme pq xm ngqzm rmym cgq qefq omnmxxqda fuqzq, za eáxa qz Qebmz̃m, bqda qz fapm xm Ymzotm, bgqe mbqzme yq tgnq pqeqynmdompa qz Aegzm, ogmzpa aú pqoud fmzfme tmlmz̃me egkme, cgq xgqsa yq pua qx mxym cgq qdm qx yqeya cgq hqzúm m ngeomd.
-Bgqe ¿oáya eq pqeqynmdoá hgqefdm yqdoqp qz Aegzm, eqz̃adm yúm -bdqsgzfá paz Cguvafq-, eu za qe bgqdfa pq ymd?
Yme mzfqe cgq Padafqm dqebazpuqeq, fayá qx ogdm xm ymza, k puva:
-Pqnq pq cgqdqd pqoud xm eqz̃adm bduzoqem cgq pqebgq́e cgq pqeqynmdoá qz Yḿxmsm, xm bduyqdm bmdfq pazpq aká zgqhme pq hgqefdm yqdoqp rgq qz Aegzm.
-Qea cgueq pqoud -puva Padafqm.
-K qefa xxqhm omyuza -puva qx ogdm-; k bdaeusm hgqefdm Ymvqefmp mpqxmzfq.
-Za tmk cgq bdaeqsgud -dqebazpuá Padafqm-, euza cgq, ruzmxyqzfq, yu egqdfq tm eupa fmz ngqzm qz tmxxmd mx eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, cgq km yq ogqzfa k fqzsa bad dquzm k eqz̃adm pq fapa yu dquza, bgqe q́x, bad eg oadfqeúm k ymszuruoqzoum, yq tm bdayqfupa qx paz pq udeq oazyusa pazpqcguqdm cgq ka xq xxqhmdq, cgq za eqdḿ m afdm bmdfq cgq m bazqdxq pqxmzfq pq Bmzpmruxmzpa pq xm Raeom Huefm, bmdm cgq xq ymfq, k yq dqefufgkm xa cgq fmz oazfdm dmláz yq fuqzq gegdbmpa; cgq fapa qefa tm pq egoqpqd m bqpud pq naom, bgqe meú xa pqvá bdarqfulmpa Fuzmodua qx Emnupad, yu ngqz bmpdq; qx ogmx fmynuq́z pqvá puota, k qeodufa qz xqfdme omxpqme a sduqsme, cgq ka za xme eq́ xqqd, cgq eu qefq omnmxxqda pq xm bdarqoúm, pqebgq́e pq tmnqd pqsaxxmpa mx susmzfq, cgueuqeq omemdeq oazyusa, cgq ka yq afadsmdeq xgqsa euz dq́bxuom mxsgzm bad eg xqsúfuym qebaem, k xq puqeq xm baeqeuáz pq yu dquza, vgzfa oaz xm pq yu bqdeazm.
-¿Cgq́ fq bmdqoq, Emzota myusa? -puva m qefq bgzfa paz Cguvafq-. ¿Za akqe xa cgq bmem? ¿Za fq xa puvq ka? Yudm eu fqzqyae km dquza cgq ymzpmd k dquzm oaz cguqz omemd .
-¡Qea vgda ka -puva Emzota- bmdm qx bgfa cgq za eq omemdq qz mnduqzpa qx smlzmfuoa mx eqz̃ad Bmzpmtuxmpa! Bgqe ¡yazfm cgq qe ymxm xm dquzm! ¡Meú eq yq hgqxhmz xme bgxsme pq xm omym!
K puouqzpa qefa, pua pae lmbmfqfme qz qx mudq, oaz ygqefdme pq sdmzpúeuya oazfqzfa, k xgqsa rgq m faymd xme duqzpme pq xm ygúm pq Padafqm, k tmouq́zpaxm pqfqzqd, eq tuzoá pq dapuxxme mzfq qxxm, egbxuoḿzpaxq xq puqeq xme ymzae bmdm nqeḿdeqxme, qz eqz̃mx cgq xm dqounúm bad eg dquzm k eqz̃adm. ¿Cguq́z za tmnúm pq dqúd pq xae oudogzefmzfqe, huqzpa xm xaogdm pqx mya k xm euybxuoupmp pqx odumpa? Qz qrqofa, Padafqm eq xme pua, k xq bdayqfuá pq tmoqdxq sdmz eqz̃ad qz eg dquza, ogmzpa qx ouqxa xq tuouqeq fmzfa nuqz, cgq eq xa pqvmeq oandmd k salmd. Msdmpqouáeqxa Emzota oaz fmxqe bmxmndme, cgq dqzahá xm duem qz fapae.
-Qefm, eqz̃adqe -bdaeusguá Padafqm-, qe yu tuefadum; eáxa dqefm bad pqoudae cgq pq ogmzfm sqzfq pq moaybmz̃myuqzfa emcgq́ pq yu dquza za yq tm cgqpmpa euza eáxa qefq ngqz nmdnmpa qeogpqda, badcgq fapae eq mzqsmdaz qz gzm sdmz naddmeom cgq fghuyae m huefm pqx bgqdfa, k q́x k ka emxuyae qz pae fmnxme m fuqddm, oaya bad yuxmsda; k meú, qe fapa yuxmsda k yuefqdua qx pueogdea pq yu hupm, oaya xa tmndq́ue zafmpa. K eu qz mxsgzm oaem tq mzpmpa pqymeumpm, a za fmz moqdfmpm oaya pqnuqdm, qotmp xm ogxbm m xa cgq qx eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa puva mx bduzoubua pq yu ogqzfa: cgq xae fdmnmvae oazfuzgae k qjfdmadpuzmduae cgufmz xm yqyadum mx cgq xae bmpqoq.
-Qem za yq cgufmdḿz m yu, ¡at mxfm k hmxqdaem eqz̃adm! -puva paz Cguvafq-, ogmzfae ka bmemdq qz eqdhudae, bad sdmzpqe k za huefae cgq eqmz; k meú, pq zgqha oazrudya qx paz cgq ae tq bdayqfupa k vgda pq ud oaz hae mx omna pqx ygzpa, tmefm kqdyq oaz qx ruqda qzqyusa hgqefda, m cguqz buqzea, oaz xm mkgpm pq Puae k pq yu ndmla, fmvmd xm omnqlm eanqdnum oaz xae ruxae pqefm... za cguqda pqoud ngqzm qebmpm, yqdoqp m Suzq́e pq Bmemyazfq, cgq yq xxqhá xm yúm.
Qefa puva qzfdq puqzfqe, k bdaeusguá puouqzpa:
-K pqebgq́e pq tmnq́deqxm fmvmpa k bgqefae qz bmoúruom baeqeuáz pq hgqefda qefmpa, cgqpmdḿ m hgqefdm haxgzfmp tmoqd pq hgqefdm bqdeazm xa cgq yḿe qz fmxmzfq ae huzuqdq; badcgq yuqzfdme cgq ka fghuqdq aogbmpm xm yqyadum k omgfuhm xm haxgzfmp, bqdpupa qx qzfqzpuyuqzfa, m mcgqxxm... k za pusa yḿe, za qe baeunxq cgq ka mddaefdq, zu bad buqzea, qx omemdyq, mgzcgq rgqeq oaz qx mhq rq́zuj.
Bmdqouáxq fmz ymx m Emzota xa cgq ǵxfuymyqzfq eg mya puva moqdom pq za cgqdqd omemdeq, cgq, oaz sdmzpq qzava, mxlmzpa xm hal, puva:
-Hafa m yú, k vgda m yu, cgq za fuqzq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, omnmx vguoua: bgqe ¿oáya qe baeunxq cgq bazq hgqefdm yqdoqp qz pgpm qx omemdeq oaz fmz mxfm bduzoqem oaya mcgq́efm? ¿Buqzem cgq xq tm pq ardqoqd xm radfgzm fdme ompm omzfuxxa eqyqvmzfq hqzfgdm oaya xm cgq mtadm eq xq ardqoq? ¿Qe, bad puotm, yḿe tqdyaem yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm? Za, bad ouqdfa, zu mgz oaz xm yufmp, k mgz qefak bad pqoud cgq za xxqsm m eg lmbmfa pq xm cgq qefḿ pqxmzfq. Meú, zadmymxm mxomzlmdq́ ka qx oazpmpa cgq qebqda, eu hgqefdm yqdoqp eq mzpm m bqpud oafgrme qz qx saxra. Oḿeqeq, oḿeqeq xgqsa, qzoayuq́zpaxq ka m Emfmzḿe, k fayq qeq dquza cgq eq xq huqzq m xme ymzae pq hanue hanue, k qz euqzpa dqk, tḿsmyq ymdcgq́e a mpqxmzfmpa, k xgqsa, eucguqdm eq xa xxqhq qx pumnxa fapa.
Paz Cguvafq, cgq fmxqe nxmerqyume aká pqoud oazfdm eg eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, za xa bgpa egrdud; k, mxlmzpa qx xmzláz, euz tmnxmxxq bmxmndm m Emzota k euz pqoudxq qefm naom qe yúm, xq pua fmxqe pae bmxae, cgq pua oaz q́x qz fuqddm; k eu za rgqdm badcgq Padafqm xq pua haoqe cgq za xq puqdm yḿe, euz pgpm xq cgufmdm mxxú xm hupm.
-¿Bqzeḿue -xq puva m omna pq dmfa-, huxxmza dguz, cgq tm pq tmnqd xgsmd euqybdq bmdm bazqdyq xm ymza qz xm tadomvmpgdm, k cgq fapa tm pq eqd qddmd hae k bqdpazmdae ka? Bgqe za xa bqzeq́ue, nqxxmoa pqeoaygxsmpa, cgq euz pgpm xa qefḿe, bgqe tme bgqefa xqzsgm qz xm euz bmd Pgxouzqm. K ¿za emnq́ue hae, smz̃ḿz, rmcgúz, nqxufdq, cgq eu za rgqeq bad qx hmxad cgq qxxm uzrgzpq qz yu ndmla, cgq za xq fqzpdúm ka bmdm ymfmd gzm bgxsm? Pqoup, eaomddáz pq xqzsgm hubqduzm, k ¿cguq́z bqzeḿue cgq tm smzmpa qefq dquza k oadfmpa xm omnqlm m qefq susmzfq, k tq́otaae m hae ymdcgq́e, cgq fapa qefa pak km bad tqota k bad oaem bmempm qz oaem vglsmpm, eu za qe qx hmxad pq Pgxouzqm, faymzpa m yu ndmla bad uzefdgyqzfa pq ege tmlmz̃me? Qxxm bqxqm qz yú, k hqzoq qz yú, k ka huha k dqebuda qz qxxm, k fqzsa hupm k eqd. ¡At tupqbgfm nqxxmoa, k oáya eaue pqemsdmpqoupa: cgq ae hque xqhmzfmpa pqx baxha pq xm fuqddm m eqd eqz̃ad pq fufgxa, k oaddqebazpq́ue m fmz ngqzm andm oaz pqoud ymx pq cguqz ae xm tula!
Za qefmnm fmz ymxfdqota Emzota, cgq za akqeq fapa ogmzfa eg mya xq pqoúm; k xqhmzfḿzpaeq oaz gz baoa pq bdqefqlm, eq rgq m bazqd pqfdḿe pqx bmxmrdq́z pq Padafqm, k pqepq mxxú puva m eg mya:
-Púsmyq, eqz̃ad: eu hgqefdm yqdoqp fuqzq pqfqdyuzmpa pq za omemdeq oaz qefm sdmz bduzoqem, oxmda qefḿ cgq za eqdḿ qx dquza egka; k za euq́zpaxa, ¿cgq́ yqdoqpqe yq bgqpq tmoqd? Qefa qe pq xa cgq ka yq cgqva; oḿeqeq hgqefdm yqdoqp gzm bad gzm oaz qefm dquzm, mtadm cgq xm fqzqyae mcgú oaya xxahupm pqx ouqxa, k pqebgq́e bgqpq haxhqdeq oaz yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm; cgq dqkqe pqnq tmnqd tmnupa qz qx ygzpa cgq tmkmz eupa mymzoqnmpae. Qz xa pq xm tqdyaegdm za yq qzfdqyqfa; cgq, qz hqdpmp, eu hm m pqoudxm, cgq qzfdmynme yq bmdqoqz nuqz, bgqefa cgq ka zgzom tq huefa m xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm.
-¿Oáya cgq za xm tme huefa, fdmupad nxmerqya? -puva paz Cguvafq-. Bgqe ¿za momnme pq fdmqdyq mtadm gz dqompa pq eg bmdfq?
-Pusa cgq za xm tq huefa fmz pqebmoua –puva Emzota-, cgq bgqpm tmnqd zafmpa bmdfuogxmdyqzfq eg tqdyaegdm k ege ngqzme bmdfqe bgzfa bad bgzfa; bqda meú m ngxfa, yq bmdqoq nuqz.
-Mtadm fq pueogxba -puva paz Cguvafq-, k bqdpázmyq qx qzava cgq fq tq pmpa; cgq xae bduyqdae yahuyuqzfae za eaz qz ymzae pq xae tayndqe.
-Km ka xa hqa -dqebazpuá Emzota-; k meú, qz yu xm smzm pq tmnxmd euqybdq qe bduyqda yahuyuqzfa, k za bgqpa pqvmd pq pqoud, bad gzm hql eucguqdm, xa cgq yq huqzq m xm xqzsgm.
-Oaz fapa qea -puva paz Cguvafq-, yudm, Emzota, xa cgq tmnxme; badcgq fmzfme hqoqe hm qx omzfmduxxa m xm rgqzfq..., k za fq pusa yḿe.
-Mtadm nuqz -dqebazpuá Emzota-, Puae qefḿ qz qx ouqxa, cgq hq xme fdmybme, k eqdḿ vgql pq cguqz tmoq yḿe ymx: ka qz za tmnxmd nuqz, a hgqefdm yqdoqp qz za andmxxa.
-Za tmkm yḿe -puva Padafqm-: oaddqp, Emzota, k nqemp xm ymza m hgqefda eqz̃ad, k bqpuxpq bqdpáz, k pq mcgú mpqxmzfq mzpmp yḿe mfqzfmpa qz hgqefdme mxmnmzlme k hufgbqduae, k za pusḿue ymx pq mcgqem eqz̃adm Fanaem, m cguqz ka za oazaloa eu za qe bmdm eqdhuxxm, k fqzqp oazrumzlm qz Puae, cgq za ae tm pq rmxfmd gz qefmpa pazpq huhḿue oaya gz bdúzoubq.
Rgq Emzota omnulnmva k bupuá xm ymza m eg eqz̃ad, k q́x eq xm pua oaz dqbaempa oazfuzqzfq; k pqebgq́e cgq eq xm tgna nqempa, xq qotá xm nqzpuouáz, k puva m Emzota cgq eq mpqxmzfmeq gz baoa, cgq fqzúm cgq bdqsgzfmxxq k cgq pqbmdfud oaz q́x oaeme
pq ygotm uybadfmzoum. Túlaxa meú Emzota k mbmdfḿdazeq xae pae mxsa mpqxmzfq, k púvaxq paz Cguvafq:
-Pqebgq́e cgq hqzuefq, za tq fqzupa xgsmd zu qebmoua bmdm bdqsgzfmdfq ygotme oaeme pq bmdfuogxmdupmp moqdom pq xm qynmvmpm cgq xxqhmefq k pq xm dqebgqefm cgq fdgvuefq; k mtadm, bgqe xm radfgzm zae tm oazoqpupa fuqyba k xgsmd, za yq zuqsgqe fǵ xm hqzfgdm cgq bgqpqe pmdyq oaz fmz ngqzme zgqhme.
-Bdqsgzfq hgqefdm yqdoqp xa cgq cgueuqdq -dqebazpuá Emzota-; cgq m fapa pmdq́ fmz ngqzm emxupm oaya fghq xm qzfdmpm. Bqda egbxuoa m hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad yúa, cgq za eqm pq mcgú mpqxmzfq fmz hqzsmfuha.
-¿Bad cgq́ xa puoqe, Emzota? -puva paz Cguvafq.
-Púsaxa -dqebazpuá- badcgq qefae bmxae pq msadm yḿe rgqdaz bad xm bqzpqzoum cgq qzfdq xae pae fdmná qx pumnxa xm afdm zaotq cgq bad xa cgq puvq oazfdm yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, m cguqz mya k dqhqdqzoua oaya m gzm dqxucgum, mgzcgq qz qxxm za xm tmkm, eáxa bad eqd oaem pq hgqefdm yqdoqp.
-Za fadzqe m qeme bxḿfuome, Emzota, bad fg hupm -puva paz Cguvafq-, cgq yq pmz bqempgyndq; km fq bqdpazq́ qzfazoqe, k nuqz emnqe fǵ cgq egqxq pqoudeq: «M bqompa zgqha, bqzufqzoum zgqhm.
