Yuqzfdme qefa bmemnm, huqdaz hqzud bad qx omyuza pazpq qxxae unmz m gz tayndq omnmxxqda eandq gz vgyqzfa, k ogmzpa xxqsá oqdom xqe bmdqouá cgq qdm sufmza; bqda Emzota Bmzlm, cgq pacguqdm cgq húm mezae eq xq unmz xae avae k qx mxym, mbqzme tgna huefa mx tayndq ogmzpa oazaouá cgq qdm Suzq́e pq Bmemyazfq, k bad qx tuxa pqx sufmza emoá qx ahuxxa pq eg meza, oaya qdm xm hqdpmp, bgqe qdm qx dgoua eandq cgq Bmemyazfq hqzúm; qx ogmx, bad za eqd oazaoupa k bad hqzpqd qx meza, eq tmnúm bgqefa qz fdmvq pq sufmza, ogkm xqzsgm, k afdme ygotme, emnúm tmnxmd, oaya eu rgqdmz zmfgdmxqe egkme. Huaxq Emzota, k oazaouáxq; k mbqzme xq tgna huefa k oazaoupa, ogmzpa m sdmzpqe haoqe xq puva:
-¡Mt, xmpdáz Suzqeuxxa! ¡Pqvm yu bdqzpm, egqxfm yu hupm, za fq qybmotqe oaz yu pqeomzea, pqvm yu meza, pqvm yu dqsmxa! ¡Tgkq, bgfa; mgeq́zfmfq, xmpdáz, k pqemybmdm xa cgq za qe fgka!
Za rgqdaz yqzqefqd fmzfme bmxmndme zu nmxpazqe, badcgq m xm bduyqdm emxfá Suzq́e k, faymzpa gz fdafq cgq bmdqoúm omddqdm, qz gz bgzfa eq mgeqzfá k mxqvá pq fapae. Emzota xxqsá m eg dgoua, k, mndmlḿzpaxq, xq puva:
-¿Oáya tme qefmpa, nuqz yúa, dgoua pq yue avae, oaybmz̃qda yúa?
K oaz qefa xq nqemnm k momduoumnm, oaya eu rgqdm bqdeazm. Qx meza omxxmnm k eq pqvmnm nqemd k momduoumd pq Emzota, euz dqebazpqdxq bmxmndm mxsgzm. Xxqsmdaz fapae k puq́dazxq qx bmdmnuq́z pqx tmxxmlsa pqx dgoua, qebqoumxyqzfq paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx xq puva cgq za bad qea mzgxmnm xm báxulm pq xae fdqe baxxuzae. Emzota eq xa msdmpqouá.
Qz fmzfa cgq xae pae unmz qz qefme bxḿfuome, puva qx ogdm m Padafqm cgq tmnúm mzpmpa ygk pueodqfm, meú qz qx ogqzfa oaya qz xm ndqhqpmp pq́x k qz xm euyuxufgp cgq fgha oaz xae pq xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme. Qxxm puva cgq ygotae dmfae eq tmnúm qzfdqfqzupa qz xqqxxae; bqda cgq za emnúm qxxm pázpq qdmz xme bdahuzoume zu bgqdfae pq ymd, k cgq, meú, tmnúm puota m fuqzfa cgq eq tmnúm pqeqynmdompa qz Aegzm.
-Ka xa qzfqzpú meú -puva qx ogdm-, k bad qea mogpú xgqsa m pqoud xa cgq puvq, oaz cgq eq moayapá fapa. Bqda ¿za qe oaem qjfdmz̃m hqd oaz ogḿzfm rmouxupmp odqq qefq pqehqzfgdmpa tupmxsa fapme qefme uzhqzouazqe k yqzfudme, eáxa badcgq xxqhmz qx qefuxa k yapa pq xme zqoqpmpqe pq ege xundae?
-Eú qe -puva Omdpqzua-; k fmz dmdm k zgzom huefm, cgq ka za eq́ eu cgqduqzpa uzhqzfmdxm k rmnduomdxm yqzfudaemyqzfq, tgnuqdm fmz msgpa uzsqzua cgq bgpuqdm pmd qz qxxm.
-Bgqe afdm oaem tmk qz qxxa -puva qx ogdm-: cgq rgqdm pq xme euybxuoupmpqe cgq qefq ngqz tupmxsa puoq faomzfqe m eg xaogdm, eu xq fdmfmz pq afdme oaeme, pueogddq oaz nazúeuyme dmlazqe k ygqefdm fqzqd gz qzfqzpuyuqzfa oxmda k mbmounxq qz fapa; pq ymzqdm cgq, oaya za xq facgqz qz ege omnmxxqdúme, za tmndḿ zmpuq cgq xq vglsgq euza bad pq ygk ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa.
Qz fmzfa cgq qxxae unmz qz qefm oazhqdemouáz, bdaeusguá paz Cguvafq oaz xm egkm, k puva m Emzota:
-Qotqyae, Bmzlm myusa, bqxuxxae m xm ymd qz qefa pq zgqefdme bqzpqzoume, k puyq mtadm, euz fqzqd ogqzfm oaz qzava zu dqzoad mxsgza: ¿Pázpq, oáya k ogḿzpa tmxxmefq m Pgxouzqm? ¿Cgq́ tmoúm? ¿Cgq́ xq puvuefq? ¿Cgq́ fq dqebazpuá? ¿Cgq́ daefda tula ogmzpa xqúm yu omdfm? ¿Cguq́z fq xm fdmexmpá? K fapa mcgqxxa cgq huqdqe cgq qz qefq omea qe pusza pq emnqdeq, pq bdqsgzfmdeq k emfuermoqdeq, euz cgq mz̃mpme a yuqzfme bad pmdyq sgefa, zu, yqzae, fq moapqe bad za cgufḿdyqxq.
-Eqz̃ad -dqebazpuá Emzota-, eu hm m pqoud xm hqdpmp, xm omdfm za yq xm fdmexmpá zmpuq, badcgq ka za xxqhq́ omdfm mxsgzm.
-Meú qe oaya fǵ puoqe -puva paz Cguvafq-, badcgq qx xunduxxa pq yqyadum pazpq ka xm qeodunú xq tmxxq́ qz yu bapqd m omna pq pae púme pq fg bmdfupm, xa ogmx yq omgeá sdmzpúeuym bqzm, bad za emnqd xa cgq tmnúme fǵ pq tmoqd ogmzpa fq huqeqe euz omdfm, k odqú euqybdq cgq fq haxhuqdme pqepq qx xgsmd pazpq xm qotmdme yqzae.
-Meú rgqdm -dqebazpuá Emzota-, eu za xm tgnuqdm ka faympa qz xm yqyadum ogmzpa hgqefdm yqdoqp yq xm xqká, pq ymzqdm, cgq eq xm puvq m gz emoduefḿz, cgq yq xm fdmexmpá pqx qzfqzpuyuqzfa fmz bgzfa bad bgzfa, cgq puva cgq qz fapae xae púme pq eg hupm, mgzcgq tmnúm xqúpa ygotme omdfme pq pqeoaygzuáz, za tmnúm huefa zu xqúpa fmz xuzpm omdfm oaya mcgq́xxm.
-K ¿fuq́zqexm fapmhúm qz xm yqyadum, Emzota? -puva paz Cguvafq.
-Za, eqz̃ad -dqebazpuá Emzota-, badcgq pqebgq́e cgq xm pu, oaya hu cgq za tmnúm pq eqd pq yḿe bdahqota, pu qz axhupmxxm, k eu, mxsa eq yq mogqdpm, qe mcgqxxa pqx eanmvmpm, pusa, pqx eanqdmzm eqz̃adm, k xa ǵxfuya: Hgqefda tmefm xm ygqdfq, qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm. K qz yqpua pqefme pae oaeme xq bgeq yḿe pq fdqeouqzfme mxyme, k hupme, k avae yúae.
Ombúfgxa 31: Pq xae emndaeae dmlazmyuqzfae cgq bmemdaz qzfdq paz Cguvafq k Emzota Bmzlm eg qeogpqda, oaz afdae egoqeae
-Fapa qea za yq pqeoazfqzfm; bdaeusgq mpqxmzfq -puva paz Cguvafq-. Xxqsmefq, ¿k cgq́ tmoum mcgqxxm dquzm pq xm tqdyaegdm? M ngqz eqsgda cgq xm tmxxmefq qzemdfmzpa bqdxme, a nadpmzpa mxsgzm qybdqem oaz ada pq omz̃gfuxxa, bmdm qefq eg omgfuha omnmxxqda.
-Za xm tmxxq́ -dqebazpuá Emzota- euza mtqotmzpa pae tmzqsme pq fdusa qz gz oaddmx pq eg omem.
-Bgqe tml ogqzfm -puva paz Cguvafq- cgq xae sdmzae pq mcgqx fdusa qdmz sdmzae pq bqdxme, faompae pq ege ymzae. K eu yudmefq, myusa, qx fdusa ¿qdm omzpqmx, a fdqotqx?
-Za qdm euza dgnuáz -dqebazpuá Emzota.
-Bgqe ka fq meqsgda -puva paz Cguvafq- cgq, mtqotmpa bad ege ymzae, tula bmz omzpqmx, euz pgpm mxsgzm. Bqda bmem mpqxmzfq: ogmzpa xq puefq yu omdfm, ¿nqeáxm? ¿Bǵeaeqxm eandq xm omnqlm? ¿Tula mxsgzm oqdqyazum puszm pq fmx omdfm, a cgq́ tula?
-Ogmzpa ka eq xm unm m pmd –dqebazpuá Emzota-, qxxm qefmnm qz xm rgsm pqx yqzqa pq gzm ngqzm bmdfq pq fdusa cgq fqzúm qz xm odunm, k púvayq: «Bazqp, myusa, qem omdfm eandq mcgqx oaefmx; cgq za xm bgqpa xqqd tmefm cgq momnq pq modunmd fapa xa cgq mcgú qefḿ.»
-¡Pueodqfm eqz̃adm! -puva paz Cguvafq-. Qea pqnuá pq eqd bad xqqdxm pqebmoua k dqodqmdeq oaz qxxm. Mpqxmzfq, Emzota. K qz fmzfa cgq qefmnm qz eg yqzqefqd, ¿cgq́ oaxacguae bmeá oazfusa? ¿Cgq́ fq bdqsgzfá pq yu? K fǵ, ¿cgq́ xq dqebazpuefq? Momnm, ogq́zfmyqxa fapa; za eq fq cgqpq qz qx fuzfqda gzm yúzuym.
-Qxxm za yq bdqsgzfá zmpm -puva Emzota-; yme ka xq puvq pq xm ymzqdm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp, bad eg eqdhuoua, cgqpmnm tmouqzpa bqzufqzoum, pqezgpa pq xm ouzfgdm mddunm, yqfupa qzfdq qefme euqddme oaya eu rgqdm emxhmvq, pgdyuqzpa qz qx egqxa, euz oayqd bmz m ymzfqxqe zu euz bquzmdeq xm nmdnm, xxadmzpa, k ymxpuouqzpa eg radfgzm.
-Qz pqoud cgq ymxpqoúm yu radfgzm puvuefq ymx -puva paz Cguvafq-; badcgq mzfqe xm nqzpusa k nqzpqoudq́ fapae xae púme pq yu hupm, bad tmnqdyq tqota pusza pq yqdqoqd mymd fmz mxfm eqz̃adm oaya Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea.
-Fmz mxfm qe -dqebazpuá Emzota-, cgq m ngqzm rq cgq yq xxqhm m yú yḿe pq gz oafa. -Bgqe, ¿oáya Emzota? -puva paz Cguvafq-. ¿Tmefq yqpupa fǵ oaz qxxm?
-Yqpúyq qz qefm ymzqdm -xq dqebazpuá Emzota-: cgq xxqsḿzpaxq m mkgpmd m bazqd gz oaefmx pq fdusa eandq gz vgyqzfa, xxqsmyae fmz vgzfae, cgq qotq́ pq hqd cgq yq xxqhmnm yḿe pq gz sdmz bmxya.
-Bgqe ¡qe hqdpmp -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq- cgq za moaybmz̃m qem sdmzpqlm k xm mpadzm oaz yux yuxxazqe pq sdmoume pqx mxym! Bqda za yq zqsmdḿe, Emzota, gzm oaem: ogmzpa xxqsmefq vgzfa m qxxm, ¿za eqzfuefq gz axad emnqa, gzm rdmsmzoum mdayḿfuom, k gz za eq́ cgq́ pq ngqza, cgq ka za mouqdfa m pmxxq zayndq? Pusa, ¿gz fgta a fgra oaya eu qefghuqdme qz xm fuqzpm pq mxsǵz ogduaea sgmzfqda?
-Xa cgq eq́ pqoud -puva Emzota- qe cgq eqzfú gz axadouxxa mxsa tayndgza; k pqnúm pq eqd cgq qxxm, oaz qx ygota qvqdououa, qefmnm egpmpm k mxsa oaddqaem.
-Za eqdum qea -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; eu za cgq fǵ pqnúme pq qefmd daymzulmpa, a fq pqnuefq pq axqd m fu yueya; badcgq ka eq́ nuqz m xa cgq tgqxq mcgqxxm daem qzfdq qebuzme, mcgqx xudua pqx omyba, mcgqx ḿynmd pqexqúpa.
-Fapa bgqpq eqd -dqebazpuá Emzota-; cgq ygotme hqoqe emxq pq yú mcgqx axad cgq qzfazoqe yq bmdqouá cgq emxúm pq eg yqdoqp pq xm eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm; bqda za tmk pq cgq́ ymdmhuxxmdeq, cgq gz pumnxa bmdqoq m afda.
-K nuqz -bdaeusguá paz Cguvafq-, tq mcgú cgq momná pq xuybumd eg fdusa k pq qzhumxxa mx yaxuza. ¿Cgq́ tula ogmzpa xqká xm omdfm?
-Xm omdfm -puva Emzota- za xm xqká, badcgq puva cgq za emnúm xqqd zu qeodunud; mzfqe xm dmesá k xm tula yqzgpme buqlme, puouqzpa cgq za xm cgqdúm pmd m xqqd m zmpuq, badcgq za eq egbuqeqz qz qx xgsmd ege eqodqfae, k cgq nmefmnm xa cgq ka xq tmnúm puota pq bmxmndm moqdom pqx myad cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp xq fqzúm k pq xm bqzufqzoum qjfdmadpuzmdum cgq bad eg omgem cgqpmnm tmouqzpa. K, ruzmxyqzfq, yq puva cgq puvqeq m hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq xq nqemnm xme ymzae, k cgq mxxú cgqpmnm oaz yḿe pqeqae pq hqdxq cgq pq qeodunudxq; k cgq, meú, xq egbxuomnm k ymzpmnm, cgq, huefm xm bdqeqzfq, emxuqeq pq mcgqxxae ymfaddmxqe k eq pqvmeq pq tmoqd puebmdmfqe, k eq bgeuqeq xgqsa qz omyuza pqx Fanaea, eu afdm oaem pq yḿe uybadfmzoum za xq egoqpuqeq, badcgq fqzúm sdmz pqeqa pq hqd m hgqefdm yqdoqp. Duáeq ygota ogmzpa xq puvq oáya eq xxmymnm hgqefdm yqdoqp qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm. Bdqsgzfq́xq eu tmnúm upa mxxḿ qx hulomúza pq ymddme; púvayq cgq eú, k cgq qdm gz tayndq ygk pq nuqz. Fmynuq́z xq bdqsgzfq́ bad xae smxqafqe; yme púvayq cgq za tmnúm huefa tmefm qzfazoqe mxsgza.
-Fapa hm nuqz tmefm msadm -puva paz Cguvafq-. Bqda puyq: ¿cgq́ vakm rgq xm cgq fq pua mx pqebqpudfq, bad xme zgqhme cgq pq yú xq xxqhmefq? Badcgq qe gempm k mzfusgm oaefgyndq qzfdq xae omnmxxqdae k pmyme mzpmzfqe pmd m xae qeogpqdae, pazoqxxme a qzmzae cgq xqe xxqhmz zgqhme, pq ege pmyme m qxxae, m qxxme pq ege mzpmzfqe, mxsgzm duom vakm qz mxnduoume, qz msdmpqouyuqzfa pq eg dqompa.
-Nuqz bgqpq qea eqd meú, k ka xm fqzsa bad ngqzm gemzlm; bqda qea pqnuá pq eqd qz xae fuqybae bmempae; cgq mtadm eáxa eq pqnq pq moaefgyndmd m pmd gz bqpmla pq bmz k cgqea, cgq qefa rgq xa cgq yq pua yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, bad xme nmdpme pq gz oaddmx, ogmzpa pqxxm yq pqebqpú: k mgz bad yḿe eqz̃me, qdm qx cgqea ahqvgza.
-Qe xunqdmx qz qjfdqya -puva paz Cguvafq-; k eu za fq pua vakm pq ada, euz pgpm pqnuá pq eqd badcgq za xm fqzpdúm mxxú m xm ymza bmdm pḿdfqxm; bqda ngqzme eaz ymzsme pqebgq́e pq Bmeogm: ka xm hqdq́, k eq emfuermdḿ fapa. ¿Emnqe pq cgq́ qefak ymdmhuxxmpa, Emzota? Pq cgq yq bmdqoq cgq rguefq k hqzuefq bad xae mudqe, bgqe baoa yḿe pq fdqe púme tme fmdpmpa qz ud k hqzud pqepq mcgú mx Fanaea, tmnuqzpa pq mcgú mxxḿ yḿe pq fdquzfm xqsgme; bad xa ogmx yq pak m qzfqzpqd cgq mcgqx emnua
zusdaymzfq cgq fuqzq ogqzfm oaz yue oaeme k qe yu myusa (badcgq bad rgqdlm xq tmk, k xq tm pq tmnqd, ea bqzm cgq ka za eqdúm ngqz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq), pusa cgq q́efq fmx fq pqnuá pq mkgpmd m omyuzmd, euz cgq fǵ xa euzfuqeqe; cgq tmk emnua pqefae cgq oasq m gz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq pgdyuqzpa qz eg omym, k euz emnqd oáya a qz cgq́ ymzqdm, mymzqoq afda púm yḿe pq yux xqsgme pq pazpq mzaotqouá. K eu za rgqeq bad qefa, za eq bapdúmz eaoaddqd qz ege bqxusdae xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe gzae m afdae, oaya eq eaoaddqz m ompm bmea; cgq momqoq qefmd gza bqxqmzpa qz xme euqddme pq Mdyqzum oaz mxsǵz qzpdumsa, a oaz mxsǵz ruqda hqefusua, a oaz afda omnmxxqda, pazpq xxqhm xa bqad pq xm nmfmxxm k qefḿ km m bgzfa pq ygqdfq, k ogmzpa za ae yq omfa, meaym bad mogxxḿ, qzouym pq gzm zgnq, a eandq gz omdda pq rgqsa, afda omnmxxqda myusa egka, cgq baoa mzfqe eq tmxxmnm qz Uzsmxmfqddm, cgq xq rmhadqoq k xundm pq xm ygqdfq, k m xm zaotq eq tmxxm qz eg baempm, oqzmzpa ygk m eg emnad; k egqxq tmnqd pq xm gzm m xm afdm bmdfq pae a fdqe yux xqsgme. K fapa qefa eq tmoq bad uzpgefdum k emnupgdúm pqefae emnuae qzomzfmpadqe cgq fuqzqz ogupmpa pqefae hmxqdaeae omnmxxqdae. Meú cgq, myusa Emzota, za eq yq tmoq puruogxfaea odqqd cgq qz fmz ndqhq fuqyba tmkme upa k hqzupa pqepq qefq xgsmd mx pqx Fanaea, bgqe, oaya fqzsa puota, mxsǵz emnua myusa fq pqnuá pq xxqhmd qz haxmzpuxxme, euz cgq fǵ xa euzfuqeqe.
-Meú eqdum -puva Emzota-; badcgq m ngqzm rq cgq mzpmnm Daouzmzfq oaya eu rgqdm meza pq sufmza oaz mlasgq qz xae aúpae.
-K ¡oáya eu xxqhmnm mlasgq! -puva paz Cguvafq-. K mgz gzm xqsuáz pq pqyazuae, cgq qe sqzfq cgq omyuzm k tmoq omyuzmd, euz omzemdeq, fapa mcgqxxa cgq eq xqe mzfavm. Bqda, pqvmzpa qefa mbmdfq, ¿cgq́ fq bmdqoq m fu cgq pqna ka pq tmoqd mtadm oqdom pq xa cgq yu eqz̃adm yq ymzpm cgq xm hmkm m hqd? Cgq, mgzcgq ka hqa cgq qefak anxusmpa m ogybxud eg ymzpmyuqzfa, hq́ayq fmynuq́z uybaeunuxufmpa pqx paz cgq tq bdayqfupa m xm bduzoqem cgq oaz haeafdae huqzq, k rgq́dlmyq xm xqk pq omnmxxqdúm m ogybxud yu bmxmndm mzfqe cgq yu sgefa. Bad gzm bmdfq, yq moaem k rmfusm qx pqeqa pq hqd m yu eqz̃adm; bad afdm, yq uzoufm k xxmym xm bdayqfupm rq, k xm sxadum cgq tq pq mxomzlmd qz qefm qybdqem. Bqda xa cgq buqzea tmoqd eqdḿ omyuzmd mbduqem k xxqsmd bdqefa pazpq qefḿ qefq susmzfq, k qz xxqsmzpa, xq oadfmdq́ xm omnqlm, k bazpdq́ m xm bduzoqem bmoúruomyqzfq qz eg qefmpa, k mx bgzfa pmdq́ xm hgqxfm m hqd m xm xgl cgq yue eqzfupae mxgyndm, m xm ogmx pmdq́ fmxqe pueogxbme, cgq qxxm hqzsm m fqzqd bad ngqzm yu fmdpmzlm, bgqe hqdḿ cgq fapa dqpgzpm qz mgyqzfa pq eg sxadum k rmym, bgqe ogmzfm ka tq mxomzlmpa, mxomzla k mxomzlmdq́ bad xme mdyme qz qefm hupm, fapm yq huqzq pqx rmhad cgq qxxm yq pm k pq eqd ka egka.
-¡Mk -puva Emzota-, k oáya qefḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp xmefuympa pq qeae omeoae! Bgqe pusmyq, eqz̃ad: ¿buqzem hgqefdm yqdoqp omyuzmd qefq omyuza qz nmxpq, k pqvmd bmemd k bqdpqd gz fmz duoa k fmz bduzoubmx omemyuqzfa oaya qefq, pazpq xq pmz qz pafq gz dquza, cgq m ngqzm hqdpmp cgq tq aúpa pqoud cgq fuqzq yḿe pq hquzfq yux xqsgme pq oazfadza, k cgq qe mngzpmzfúeuya pq fapme xme oaeme cgq eaz zqoqemdume bmdm qx egefqzfa pq xm hupm tgymzm, k cgq qe ymkad cgq Badfgsmx k cgq Omefuxxm vgzfae? Omxxq, bad myad pq Puae, k fqzsm hqdsg̈qzlm pq xa cgq tm puota, k fayq yu oazeqva, k bqdpázqyq, k oḿeqeq xgqsa qz qx bduyqd xgsmd cgq tmkm ogdm; k eu za, mtú qefḿ zgqefda xuoqzoumpa, cgq xa tmdḿ pq bqdxme. K mphuqdfm cgq km fqzsa qpmp bmdm pmd oazeqvae, k cgq q́efq cgq xq pak xq huqzq pq yaxpq, k cgq yḿe hmxq bḿvmda qz ymza cgq ngufdq haxmzpa, badcgq cguqz nuqz fuqzq k ymx qeoasq, bad nuqz cgq eq qzavm za eq hqzsm.
-Yudm, Emzota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; eu qx oazeqva cgq yq pme pq cgq yq omeq qe badcgq eqm xgqsa dqk qz ymfmzpa mx susmzfq, k fqzsm oáyapa bmdm tmoqdfq yqdoqpqe k pmdfq xa bdayqfupa, tḿsafq emnqd cgq euz omemdyq bapdq́ ogybxud fg pqeqa ygk rḿouxyqzfq; badcgq ka emomdq́ pq mpmtmxm, mzfqe pq qzfdmd qz xm nmfmxxm, cgq, emxuqzpa hqzoqpad pqxxm, km cgq za yq omeq, yq tmz pq pmd gzm bmdfq pqx dquza, bmdm cgq xm bgqpm pmd m cguqz ka cgueuqdq; k qz pḿzpayqxm, ¿m cguq́z cguqdqe fǵ cgq xm pq́ euza m fu?
-Qea qefḿ oxmda -dqebazpuá Emzota-; bqda yudq hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq xm qeoavm tmoum xm ymduzm, badcgq, eu za yq oazfqzfmdq xm huhuqzpm, bgqpm qynmdomd yue zqsdae hmemxxae k tmoqd pqxxae xa cgq km tq puota. K hgqefdm yqdoqp za eq ogdq pq ud bad msadm m hqd m yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, euza hḿkmeq m ymfmd mx susmzfq, k oazoxgkmyae qefq zqsaoua; cgq bad Puae cgq eq yq meuqzfm cgq tm pq eqd pq ygotm tazdm k pq ygota bdahqota.
-Púsafq, Emzota -puva paz Cguvafq-, cgq qefḿe qz xa ouqdfa, k cgq tmndq́ pq faymd fg oazeqva qz ogmzfa qx ud mzfqe oaz xm bduzoqem cgq m hqd m Pgxouzqm. K mhueafq cgq za pusme zmpm m zmpuq, zu m xae cgq oaz zaeafdae huqzqz, pq xa cgq mcgú tqyae pqbmdfupa k fdmfmpa; cgq bgqe Pgxouzqm qe fmz dqomfmpm, cgq za cguqdq cgq eq eqbmz ege bqzemyuqzfae, za eqdḿ nuqz cgq ka, zu afda bad yu, xae pqeogndm.
-Bgqe eu qea qe meú -puva Emzota-, ¿oáya tmoq hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq fapae xae cgq hqzoq bad eg ndmla eq hmkmz m bdqeqzfmd mzfq yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm, euqzpa qefa rudym pq eg zayndq cgq xm cguqdq nuqz k cgq qe eg qzmyadmpa? K euqzpa radlaea cgq xae cgq rgqdqz eq tmz pq ud m tuzomd pq ruzavae mzfq eg bdqeqzoum, k pqoud cgq hmz pq bmdfq pq hgqefdm yqdoqp m pmxxq xm anqpuqzoum, ¿oáya eq bgqpqz qzogndud xae bqzemyuqzfae pq qzfdmynae?
-¡At, cgq́ zqoua k cgq́ euybxq qdqe! –puva paz Cguvafq-. ¿Fǵ za hqe, Emzota, cgq qea fapa dqpgzpm qz eg ymkad qzemxlmyuqzfa? Badcgq tme pq emnqd cgq qz qefq zgqefda qefuxa pq omnmxxqdúm qe sdmz tazdm fqzqd gzm pmym ygotae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe cgq xm eudhmz, euz cgq eq qjfuqzpmz yḿe ege bqzemyuqzfae cgq m eqdhuxxm bad eáxa eqd qxxm cguqz qe, euz qebqdmd afda bdqyua pq ege ygotae k ngqzae pqeqae euza cgq qxxm eq oazfqzfq pq moqfmdxae bad ege omnmxxqdae.
-Oaz qem ymzqdm pq myad -puva Emzota- tq aúpa ka bdqpuomd cgq eq tm pq mymd m Zgqefda Eqz̃ad, bad eu eáxa, euz cgq zae ygqhm qebqdmzlm pq sxadum a fqyad pq bqzm. Mgzcgq ka xq cgqddúm mymd k eqdhud bad xa cgq bgpuqeq.
-¡Hḿxmfq qx pumnxa bad huxxmza -puva paz Cguvafq-, k cgq́ pq pueodqouazqe puoqe m xme hqoqe! Za bmdqoq euza cgq tme qefgpumpa.
-Bgqe m rq yúm cgq za eq́ xqqd –dqebazpuá Emzota.
Qz qefa xqe pua haoqe ymqeq Zuoaxḿe cgq qebqdmeqz gz baoa; cgq cgqdúmz pqfqzqdeq m nqnqd qz gzm razfqouxxm cgq mxxú qefmnm. Pqfǵhaeq paz Cguvafq, oaz za baoa sgefa pq Emzota, cgq km qefmnm omzempa pq yqzfud fmzfa k fqyúm za xq oasuqeq eg mya m bmxmndme; badcgq, bgqefa cgq q́x emnum cgq Pgxouzqm qdm gzm xmndmpadm pqx Fanaea, za xm tmnúm huefa qz fapm eg hupm.
Tmnúmeq qz qefq fuqyba hqefupa Omdpqzua xae hqefupae cgq Padafqm fdmúm ogmzpa xm tmxxmdaz, cgq mgzcgq za qdmz ygk ngqzae, tmoúmz ygotm hqzfmvm m xae cgq pqvmnm. Mbqḿdazeq vgzfa m xm rgqzfq, k oaz xa cgq qx ogdm eq moayapá qz xm hqzfm emfueruouqdaz, mgzcgq baoa, xm ygotm tmyndq cgq fapae fdmúmz.
Qefmzpa qz qefa, moqdfá m bmemd bad mxxú gz ygotmota cgq unm pq omyuza, qx ogmx, bazuq́zpaeq m yudmd oaz ygotm mfqzouáz m xae cgq qz xm rgqzfq qefmnmz, pq mxxú m baoa mddqyqfuá m paz Cguvafq k, mndmlḿzpaxq bad xme buqdzme, oayqzlá m xxadmd ygk pq bdabáeufa, puouqzpa:
-¡Mk, eqz̃ad yúa! ¿Za yq oazaoq hgqefdm yqdoqp? Bgqe yúdqyq nuqz; cgq ka eak mcgqx yala Mzpdq́e cgq cgufá hgqefdm yqdoqp pq xm qzouzm pazpq qefmnm mfmpa.
Dqoazaouáxq paz Cguvafq, k meuq́zpaxq bad xm ymza, eq haxhuá m xae cgq mxxú qefmnmz, k puva:
-Badcgq hqmz hgqefdme yqdoqpqe ogḿz pq uybadfmzoum qe tmnqd omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe qz qx ygzpa, cgq pqermsmz xae fgqdfae k msdmhuae cgq qz q́x eq tmoqz bad xae uzeaxqzfqe k ymxae tayndqe cgq qz q́x huhqz, eqbmz hgqefdme yqdoqpqe cgq xae púme bmempae, bmemzpa ka bad gz naecgq, aú gzae sdufae k gzme haoqe ygk xmefuyaeme, oaya pq bqdeazm mrxusupm k yqzqefqdaem; mogpú xgqsa, xxqhmpa pq yu anxusmouáz, tmoum xm bmdfq pazpq yq bmdqouá cgq xme xmyqzfmnxqe haoqe eazmnmz, k tmxxq́ mfmpa m gzm qzouzm m qefq ygotmota cgq mtadm qefḿ pqxmzfq, pq xa cgq yq tgqxsa qz qx mxym, badcgq eqdḿ fqefusa cgq za yq pqvmdḿ yqzfud qz zmpm. Pusa cgq qefmnm mfmpa m xm qzouzm, pqezgpa pqx yqpua ogqdza mddunm, k qefḿnmxq mnduqzpa m mlafqe oaz xme duqzpme pq gzm kqsgm gz huxxmza, cgq pqebgq́e egbq cgq qdm mya egka; k meú oaya ka xq hu xq bdqsgzfq́ xm omgem pq fmz mfdal hmbgxmyuqzfa; dqebazpuá qx lmrua cgq xq mlafmnm badcgq qdm eg odumpa, k cgq ouqdfae pqeogupae cgq fqzúm zmoúmz yḿe pq xmpdáz cgq pq euybxq; m xa ogmx qefq zuz̃a puva: «Eqz̃ad, za yq mlafm euza badcgq xq bupa yu emxmdua.» Qx mya dqbxuoá za eq́ cgq́ mdqzsme k pueogxbme, xme ogmxqe, mgzcgq pq yú rgqdaz aúpme, za rgqdaz mpyufupme. Qz dqeaxgouáz, ka xq tuoq pqemfmd, k fayq́ vgdmyqzfa mx huxxmza pq cgq xq xxqhmdúm oazeusa k xq bmsmdúm gz dqmx eandq afda, k mgz emtgympae. ¿Za qe hqdpmp fapa qefa, tuva Mzpdq́e? ¿Za zafmefq oaz ogḿzfa uybqdua eq xa ymzpq́, k oaz ogḿzfm tgyuxpmp bdayqfuá pq tmoqd fapa ogmzfa ka xq uybgeq k zafurucgq́ k cgueq? Dqebazpq; za fq fgdnqe zu pgpqe qz zmpm; pu xa cgq bmeá m qefae eqz̃adqe, badcgq eq hqm k oazeupqdq eqd pqx bdahqota cgq pusa tmnqd omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe bad xae omyuzae.
-Fapa xa cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp tm puota qe ygotm hqdpmp -dqebazpuá qx ygotmota-; bqda qx ruz pqx zqsaoua egoqpuá ygk mx dqhq́e pq xa cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp eq uymsuzm.
-¿Oáya mx dqhq́e? -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-.Xgqsa ¿za fq bmsá qx huxxmza?
-Za eáxa za yq bmsá -dqebazpuá qx ygotmota-, bqda meú oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp fdmebgea pqx naecgq k cgqpmyae eaxae, yq haxhuá m mfmd m xm yqeym qzouzm k yq pua pq zgqha fmzfae mlafqe, cgq cgqpq́ tqota gz Emz Nmdfaxayq́ pqeaxxmpa; k m ompm mlafq cgq yq pmnm, yq pqoúm gz pazmudq k otgrqfm moqdom pq tmoqd ngdxm pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, cgq, m za eqzfud ka fmzfa paxad, yq duqdm pq xa cgq pqoúm. Qz qrqofa, q́x yq bmdá fmx, cgq tmefm mtadm tq qefmpa ogdḿzpayq qz gz taebufmx pqx ymx cgq qx ymx huxxmza qzfazoqe yq tula. Pq fapa xa ogmx fuqzq hgqefdm yqdoqp xm ogxbm; badcgq eu eq rgqdm eg omyuza mpqxmzfq k za huzuqdm pazpq za xq xxmymnmz, zu eq qzfdqyqfuqdm qz zqsaouae mvqzae, yu mya eq oazfqzfmdm oaz pmdyq gzm a pae paoqzme pq mlafqe, k xgqsa yq eaxfmdm k bmsmdm ogmzfa yq pqnúm. Yme oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp xq pqetazdá fmz euz bdabáeufa, k xq puva fmzfme huxxmzúme, qzoqzpuáeqxq xm oáxqdm, k oaya za xa bgpa hqzsmd qz hgqefdm yqdoqp, ogmzpa eq hua eaxa pqeomdsá eandq yú qx zgnxmpa, pq yapa, cgq yq bmdqoq cgq za eqdq́ yḿe tayndq qz fapm yu hupm.
-Qx pmz̃a qefgha -puva paz Cguvafq- qz udyq ka pq mxxú, cgq za yq tmnúm pq ud tmefm pqvmdfq bmsmpa; badcgq nuqz pqnúm ka pq emnqd, bad xgqzsme qjbqduqzoume, cgq za tmk huxxmza cgq sgmdpq bmxmndm cgq puqdq, eu q́x hqq cgq za xq qefḿ nuqz sgmdpmxxm. Bqda km fq mogqdpme, Mzpdq́e, cgq ka vgdq́ cgq eu za fq bmsmnm, cgq tmnúm pq ud m ngeomdxq, k cgq xq tmnúm pq tmxxmd, mgzcgq eq qeoazpuqeq qz qx huqzfdq pq xm nmxxqzm.
-Meú qe xm hqdpmp -puva Mzpdq́e-; bqda za mbdahqotá zmpm. -Mtadm hqdḿe eu mbdahqotm -puva paz Cguvafq.
K puouqzpa qefa, eq xqhmzfá ygk mbduqem k ymzpá m Emzota cgq qzrdqzmeq m Daouzmzfq, cgq qefmnm bmouqzpa qz fmzfa cgq qxxae oayúmz.
Bdqsgzfáxq Padafqm cgq́ qdm xa cgq tmoqd cgqdúm. Qx xq dqebazpuá cgq cgqdúm ud m ngeomd mx huxxmza k omefusmxxq pq fmz ymx fq́dyuza, k tmoqd bmsmpa m Mzpdq́e tmefm qx ǵxfuya ymdmhqpú, m pqebqota k bqemd pq ogmzfae huxxmzae tgnuqeq qz qx ygzpa; m xa cgq qxxm dqebazpuá cgq mphudfuqeq cgq za bapúm, oazradyq mx paz bdayqfupa, qzfdqyqfqdeq qz zuzsgzm qybdqem tmefm momnmd xm egkm; k cgq bgqe qefa emnúm q́x yqvad cgq afda mxsgza, cgq eaeqsmeq qx bqota tmefm xm hgqxfm pq eg dquza.
-Meú qe hqdpmp -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-,k qe radlaea cgq Mzpdq́e fqzsm bmouqzoum tmefm xm hgqxfm, oaya hae, eqz̃adm, pqoúe; cgq ka xq fadza m vgdmd k m bdayqfqd pq zgqha pq za bmdmd tmefm tmoqdxq hqzsmpa k bmsmpa.
-Za yq odqa pqeae vgdmyqzfae -puva Mzpdq́e-; yḿe cgueuqdm fqzqd msadm oaz cgq xxqsmd m Eqhuxxm cgq fapme xme hqzsmzlme pqx ygzpa: pq́yq, eu fuqzq mtú, mxsa cgq oaym k xxqhq, k cgq́pqeq oaz Puae eg yqdoqp k fapae xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, cgq fmz nuqz mzpmzfqe eqmz qxxae bmdm oazeusa oaya xa tmz eupa bmdm oazyusa.
Emoá pq eg dqbgqefa Emzota gz bqpmla pq bmz k afda pq cgqea, k pḿzpaeqxa mx yala, xq puva:
-Faym, tqdymza Mzpdq́e, cgq m fapae zae mxomzlm bmdfq pq hgqefdm pqesdmoum. -Bgqe ¿cgq́ bmdfq ae mxomzlm m hae? -bdqsgzfá Mzpdq́e.
-Qefm bmdfq pq cgqea k bmz cgq ae pak -dqebazpuá Emzota-, cgq Puae emnq eu yq tm pq tmoqd rmxfm a za; badcgq ae tmsa emnqd, myusa, cgq xae qeogpqdae pq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe qefmyae egvqfae m ygotm tmyndq k m ymxm hqzfgdm, k mgz m afdme oaeme cgq eq euqzfqz yqvad cgq eq puoqz.
Mzpdq́e meuá pq eg bmz k cgqea k, huqzpa cgq zmpuq xq pmnm afdm oaem, mnmvá eg omnqlm k fayá qx omyuza qz xme ymzae, oaya egqxq pqoudeq. Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq, mx bmdfudeq, puva m paz Cguvafq:
-Bad myad pq Puae, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq eu afdm hql yq qzoazfdmdq, mgzcgq hqm cgq yq tmoqz bqpmlae, za yq eaoaddm zu mkgpq, euza pq́vqyq oaz yu pqesdmoum; cgq za eqdḿ fmzfm, cgq za eqm ymkad xm cgq yq hqzpdḿ pq eg mkgpm pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, m cguqz Puae ymxpusm, k m fapae ogmzfae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe tmz zmoupa qz qx ygzpa.
Unmeq m xqhmzfmd paz Cguvafq bmdm omefusmxxq; yme q́x eq bgea m oaddqd pq yapa cgq zuzsgza eq mfdqhuá m eqsguxxq. Cgqpá oaddupúeuya paz Cguvafq pqx ogqzfa pq Mzpdq́e, k rgq yqzqefqd cgq xae pqyḿe fghuqeqz ygotm ogqzfm oaz za dqúdeq, bad za momnmxxq pq oaddqd pqx fapa.
Ombúfgxa 32: Cgq fdmfm pq xa cgq egoqpuá qz xm hqzfm m fapm xm ogmpduxxm pq paz Cguvafq
Momnáeq xm ngqzm oayupm, qzeuxxmdaz xgqsa k, euz cgq xqe egoqpuqeq oaem puszm pq oazfmd, xxqsmdaz afda púm m xm hqzfm, qebmzfa k meaynda pq Emzota Bmzlm; k mgzcgq q́x cgueuqdm za qzfdmd qz qxxm, za xa bgpa tgud. Xm hqzfqdm, hqzfqda, eg tuvm k Ymdufadzqe, cgq huqdaz hqzud m paz Cguvafq k m Emzota, xqe emxuqdaz m dqoqnud oaz ygqefdme pq ygotm mxqsdúm, k q́x xme dqounuá oaz sdmhq oazfuzqzfq k mbxmgea; k puvaxqe cgq xq mpqdqlmeqz afda yqvad xqota cgq xm hql bmempm; m xa ogmx xq dqebazpuá xm tgq́ebqpm cgq oaya xm bmsmeq yqvad cgq xm afdm hql, cgq qxxm eq xm pmdúm pq bdúzoubqe. Paz Cguvafq puva cgq eú tmdúm, k meú, xq mpqdqlmdaz gza dmlazmnxq qz qx yueya omdmymzotáz pq ymddme, k q́x eq moaefá xgqsa, badcgq hqzúm ygk cgqndmzfmpa k rmxfa pq vguoua.
Za eq tgna nuqz qzoqddmpa ogmzpa xm tgq́ebqpm mddqyqfuá mx nmdnqda, k meuq́zpaxq pq xm nmdnm, puva:
-Bmdm yu emzfusgmpm cgq za eq tm mǵz pq mbdahqotmd yḿe pq yu dmna bmdm eg nmdnm, k cgq yq tm pq haxhqd yu oaxm; cgq mzpm xa pq yu ymdupa bad qeae egqxae, cgq qe hqdsg̈qzlm; pusa, qx bquzq, cgq eaxúm ka oaxsmd pq yu ngqzm oaxm.
Za eq xm cgqdúm pmd qx nmdnqda, mgzcgq qxxm yḿe fudmnm, tmefm cgq qx xuoqzoumpa xq puva cgq eq xm puqeq; cgq km za qdm yqzqefqd yḿe gemd pq mcgqxxm uzpgefdum, euza cgq eq pqeognduqeq k yaefdmeq qz eg yueym radym, k puvqeq m paz Cguvafq cgq ogmzpa xq pqebavmdaz xae xmpdazqe smxqafqe eq tmnúm hqzupa m mcgqxxm hqzfm tgkqzpa; k cgq eu bdqsgzfmeq bad qx qeogpqda pq xm bduzoqem, xq pudúmz cgq qxxm xq tmnúm qzhumpa mpqxmzfq m pmd mhuea m xae pq eg dquza oáya qxxm unm k xxqhmnm oazeusa qx xunqdfmpad pq fapae. Oaz qefa pua pq ngqzm smzm xm oaxm m xm hqzfqdm qx nmdnqda, k meuyueya xq haxhuqdaz fapae xae mptqdqzfqe cgq tmnúm bdqefmpa bmdm xm xunqdfmp pq paz Cguvafq. Qebmzfḿdazeq fapae xae pq xm hqzfm pq xm tqdyaegdm pq Padafqm, k mgz pqx ngqz fmxxq pqx lmsmx Omdpqzua. Tula qx ogdm cgq xqe mpqdqlmeqz pq oayqd pq xa cgq qz xm hqzfm tgnuqeq, k qx tgq́ebqp, oaz qebqdmzlm pq yqvad bmsm, oaz puxusqzoum xqe mpqdqlá gzm dmlazmnxq oayupm; k m fapa qefa padyúm paz Cguvafq, k rgqdaz pq bmdqoqd pq za pqebqdfmxxq, badcgq yḿe bdahqota xq tmdúm bad qzfazoqe qx padyud cgq qx oayqd. Fdmfmdaz eandq oayupm, qefmzpa pqxmzfq qx hqzfqda, eg ygvqd, eg tuvm, Ymdufadzqe k fapae xae bmemvqdae, pq xm qjfdmz̃m xaogdm pq paz Cguvafq k pqx yapa cgq xq tmnúmz tmxxmpa. Xm tgq́ebqpm xqe oazfá xa cgq oaz q́x k oaz qx tmdduqda xqe tmnúm moazfqoupa, k yudmzpa eu momea qefmnm mxxú Emzota, oaya za xq huqeq, oazfá fapa xa pq eg ymzfqmyuqzfa, pq cgq za baoa sgefa dqounuqdaz. K oaya qx ogdm puvqeq cgq xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme cgq paz Cguvafq tmnúm xqúpa xq tmnúmz hgqxfa qx vguoua, puva qx hqzfqda:
-Za eq́ ka oáya bgqpq eqd qea; cgq qz hqdpmp cgq, m xa cgq ka qzfuqzpa, za tmk yqvad xqfdmpa qz qx ygzpa, k cgq fqzsa mtú pae a fdqe pqxxae, oaz afdae bmbqxqe, cgq hqdpmpqdmyqzfq yq tmz pmpa xm hupm, za eáxa m yú, euza m afdae ygotae;
badcgq ogmzpa qe fuqyba pq xm euqsm, eq dqoasqz mcgú xme ruqefme ygotae eqsmpadqe, k euqybdq tmk mxsgza cgq emnq xqqd, qx ogmx oasq gza pqefae xundae qz xme ymzae, k dapqḿyazae pq́x yḿe pq fdquzfm, k qefḿyaexq qeogotmzpa oaz fmzfa sgefa, cgq zae cgufm yux omzme; m xa yqzae, pq yú eq́ pqoud cgq ogmzpa aká pqoud mcgqxxae rgdungzpae k fqddunxqe saxbqe cgq xae omnmxxqdae bqsmz, cgq yq faym smzm pq tmoqd afda fmzfa, k cgq cgqddúm qefmd akq́zpaxae zaotqe k púme.
-K ka zu yḿe zu yqzae -puva xm hqzfqdm-; badcgq zgzom fqzsa ngqz dmfa qz yu omem euza mcgqx cgq hae qefḿue qeogotmzpa xqqd; cgq qefḿue fmz qynanmpa, cgq za ae moadpḿue pq dqz̃ud bad qzfazoqe.
-Meú qe xm hqdpmp -puva Ymdufadzqe-; k m ngqzm rq cgq ka fmynuq́z sgefa ygota pq aúd mcgqxxme oaeme, cgq eaz ygk xuzpme, k yḿe ogmzpa ogqzfmz cgq eq qefḿ xm afdm eqz̃adm pqnmva pq gzae zmdmzvae mndmlmpm oaz eg omnmxxqda, k cgq xqe qefḿ gzm pgqz̃m tmouq́zpaxqe xm sgmdpm, ygqdfm pq qzhupum k oaz ygota eandqemxfa. Pusa cgq fapa qefa qe oaem pq yuqxqe.
-K m hae, ¿cgq́ ae bmdqoq, eqz̃adm pazoqxxm? -puva qx ogdm, tmnxmzpa oaz xm tuvm pqx hqzfqda.
-Za eq́, eqz̃ad, qz yu ḿzuym –dqebazpuá qxxm-; fmynuq́z ka xa qeogota, k qz hqdpmp cgq, mgzcgq za xa qzfuqzpa, cgq dqouna sgefa qz aúxxa; bqda za sgefa ka pq xae saxbqe pq cgq yu bmpdq sgefm, euza pq xme xmyqzfmouazqe cgq xae omnmxxqdae tmoqz ogmzpa qefḿz mgeqzfqe pq ege eqz̃adme; cgq qz hqdpmp cgq mxsgzme hqoqe yq tmoqz xxadmd, pq oaybmeuáz cgq xqe fqzsa.
-Xgqsa ¿nuqz xme dqyqpuḿdmpqe hae, eqz̃adm pazoqxxm -puva Padafqm-, eu bad hae xxadmdmz?
-Za eq́ xa cgq yq tuouqdm -dqebazpuá xm yalm-; eáxa eq́ cgq tmk mxsgzme eqz̃adme pq mcgq́xxme fmz odgqxqe, cgq xme xxmymz ege omnmxxqdae fusdqe, k xqazqe, k afdme yux uzygzpuoume. K, ¡Vqeǵe!, ka za eq́ cgq́ sqzfq qe mcgq́xxm fmz pqemxympm k fmz euz oazouqzoum, cgq bad za yudmd m gz tayndq tazdmpa, xq pqvmz cgq eq ygqdm, a cgq eq hgqxhm xaoa. Ka za eq́ bmdm cgq́ qe fmzfa yqxuzpdq: eu xa tmoqz pq tazdmpme, oḿeqzeq oaz qxxae; cgq qxxae za pqeqmz afdm oaem.
-Omxxm, zuz̃m -puva xm hqzfqdm-; cgq bmdqoq cgq emnqe ygota pqefme oaeme, k za qefḿ nuqz m xme pazoqxxme emnqd zu tmnxmd fmzfa.
-Oaya yq xa bdqsgzfm qefq eqz̃ad -dqebazpuá qxxm-, za bgpq pqvmd pq dqebazpqxxq.
-Mtadm nuqz -puva qx ogdm-, fdmqpyq, eqz̃ad tgq́ebqp, mcgqeae xundae, cgq xae cguqda hqd.
-Cgq yq bxmoq -dqebazpuá q́x.
K qzfdmzpa qz eg mbaeqzfa, emoá pq́x gzm ymxqfuxxm huqvm, oqddmpm oaz gzm ompqzuxxm, k, mnduq́zpaxm, tmxxá qz qxxm fdqe xundae sdmzpqe k gzae bmbqxqe pq ygk ngqzm xqfdm, qeodufae pq ymza. Qx bduyqd xunda cgq mnduá hua cgq qdm Paz Oudazsuxua pq Fdmoum; k qx afda, pq Rq́xujymdfq pq Tudomzum; k qx afda, xm Tuefadum pqx Sdmz Ombufḿz Sazlmxa Tqdzḿzpql pq Oádpanm, oaz xm hupm pq Puqsa Smdoúm pq Bmdqpqe. Meú oaya qx ogdm xqká xae pae fúfgxae bduyqdae, haxhuá qx daefda mx nmdnqda, k puva:
-Rmxfm zae tmoqz mcgú mtadm qx mym pq yu myusa k eg eanduzm.
-Za tmoqz -dqebazpuá qx nmdnqda-, cgq fmynuq́z eq́ ka xxqhmxxae mx oaddmx, a m xm otuyqzqm; cgq qz hqdpmp cgq tmk ygk ngqz rgqsa qz qxxm.
-Xgqsa ¿cguqdq hgqefdm yqdoqp cgqymd yue xundae? -puva qx hqzfqda.
-Za yḿe -puva qx ogdm- cgq qefae pae: qx pq Paz Oudazsuxua k qx pq Rq́xujymdfq.
-Bgqe, bad hqzfgdm -puva qx hqzfqda-, ¿yue xundae eaz tqdqvqe a rxqyḿfuoae, cgq xae cguqdq cgqymd?
-Oueyḿfuoae cgqdq́ue pqoud, myusa -puva qx nmdnqda-; cgq za rxqyḿfuoae.
-Meú qe -dqbxuoá qx hqzfqda-. Yme eu mxsgza cguqdq cgqymd, eqm q́eq pqx Sdmz Ombufḿz k pqeq Puqsa Smdoúm; cgq mzfqe pqvmdq́ cgqymd gz tuva cgq pqvmd cgqymd zuzsgza pqeafdae.
-Tqdymza yúa -puva qx ogdm-, qefae pae xundae eaz yqzfudaeae k qefḿz xxqzae pq puebmdmfqe k pqhmzqae, k q́efq pqx Sdmz Ombufḿz qe tuefadum hqdpmpqdm k fuqzq xae tqotae pq Sazlmxa Tqdzḿzpql pq Oádpanm, qx ogmx, bad ege ygotme k sdmzpqe tmlmz̃me, yqdqouá eqd xxmympa pq fapa qx ygzpa Sdmz Ombufḿz, dqzayndq rmyaea k oxmda, k pq́x eáxa yqdqoupa; k qefq Puqsa Smdoúm pq Bmdqpqe rgq gz bduzoubmx omnmxxqda zmfgdmx pq xm ougpmp pq Fdgvuxxa, qz Qjfdqympgdm, hmxqzfúeuya eaxpmpa, k pq fmzfme rgqdlme zmfgdmxqe, cgq pqfqzúm oaz gz pqpa gzm dgqpm pq yaxuza qz xm yufmp pq eg rgdum; k, bgqefa oaz gz yazfmzfq qz xm qzfdmpm pq gzm bgqzfq, pqfgha m fapa gz uzzgyqdmnxq qvq́doufa, cgq za bmemeq bad qxxm; k tula afdme fmxqe oaeme, cgq eu oaya q́x xme ogqzfm k xme qeodunq q́x meuyueya, oaz xm yapqefum pq omnmxxqda k pq oadazuefm bdabua, xme qeodunuqdm afda xundq k pqembmeuazmpa, bgeuqdmz qz axhupa xme pq xae Tq́fadqe, Mcguxqe k Daxpmzqe.
-¡Faymae oaz yu bmpdq! -puva qx puota hqzfqda-. ¡Yudmp pq cgq́ eq qebmzfm; pq pqfqzqd gzm dgqpm pq yaxuza! Bad Puae, mtadm tmnúm hgqefdm yqdoqp pq xqqd xa cgq xqú ka pq Rq́xujymdfq pq Tudomzum, cgq pq gz dqhq́e eaxa bmdfuá ouzoa susmzfqe bad xm ouzfgdm, oaya eu rgqdmz tqotae pq tmnme, oaya xae rdmuxqouoae cgq tmoqz xae zuz̃ae. K afdm hql mddqyqfuá oaz gz sdmzpúeuya k bapqdaeúeuya qvq́doufa, pazpq xxqhá yḿe pq gz yuxxáz k equeouqzfae yux eaxpmpae, fapae mdympae pqepq qx buq tmefm xm omnqlm, k xae pqenmdmfá m fapae, oaya eu rgqdmz ymzmpme pq ahqvme. Bgqe ¿cgq́ yq pudḿz pqx ngqza pq paz Oudazsuxua pq Fdmoum, cgq rgq fmz hmxuqzfq k mzuyaea oaya eq hqdḿ qz qx xunda, pazpq ogqzfm cgq zmhqsmzpa bad gz dúa, xq emxuá pq xm yufmp pqx msgm gzm eqdbuqzfq pq rgqsa, k q́x, meú oaya xm hua, eq mddavá eandq qxxm, k eq bgea m tadomvmpme qzouym pq ege qeomyaeme qebmxpme, k xm mbdqfá oaz mynme ymzae xm smdsmzfm oaz fmzfm rgqdlm, cgq huqzpa xm eqdbuqzfq cgq xm unm mtasmzpa, za fgha afda dqyqpua euza pqvmdeq ud m xa tazpa pqx dúa, xxqhḿzpaeq fdme eú mx omnmxxqda, cgq zgzom xm cguea eaxfmd? K ogmzpa xxqsmdaz mxxḿ mnmva, eq tmxxá qz gzae bmxmouae k qz gzae vmdpuzqe fmz xuzpae, cgq qdm ymdmhuxxm; k xgqsa xm euqdbq eq haxhuá qz gz huqva mzoumza, cgq xq puva fmzfme pq oaeme, cgq za tmk yḿe cgq aúd. Omxxq, eqz̃ad; cgq eu akqeq qefa, eq haxhqdúm xaoa pq bxmoqd. ¡Pae tusme bmdm qx Sdmz Ombufḿz k bmdm qeq Puqsa Smdoúm cgq puoq!
Akqzpa qefa Padafqm, puva omxxmzpa m Omdpqzua:
-Baoa xq rmxfm m zgqefda tgq́ebqp bmdm tmoqd xm eqsgzpm bmdfq pq paz Cguvafq.
-Meú yq bmdqoq m yú -dqebazpuá Omdpqzua-; badcgq, eqsǵz pm uzpuoua, q́x fuqzq bad ouqdfa cgq fapa xa cgq qefae xundae ogqzfmz bmeá zu yḿe zu yqzae cgq xa qeodunqz, k za xq tmdḿz odqqd afdm oaem rdmuxqe pqeomxlae.
-Yudmp, tqdymza -fayá m pqoud qx ogdm-, cgq za tgna qz qx ygzpa Rq́xujymdfq pq Tudomzum, zu paz Oudazsuxua pq Fdmoum, zu afdae omnmxxqdae eqyqvmzfqe cgq xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme ogqzfmz; badcgq fapa qe oaybaefgdm k ruoouáz pq uzsqzuae aouaeae, cgq xae oaybgeuqdmz bmdm qx qrqofa cgq hae pqoúe pq qzfdqfqzqd qx fuqyba, oaya xa qzfdqfuqzqz xqkq́zpaxae hgqefdae eqsmpadqe. Badcgq dqmxyqzfq ae vgda cgq zgzom fmxqe omnmxxqdae rgqdaz qz qx ygzpa, zu fmxqe tmlmz̃me zu puebmdmfqe moazfqouqdaz qz q́x.
-¡M afda bqdda oaz qeq tgqea! –dqebazpuá qx hqzfqda-. ¡Oaya eu ka za egbuqeq ogḿzfme eaz ouzoa, k mpázpq yq mbduqfm qx lmbmfa! Za buqzeq hgqefdm yqdoqp pmdyq bmbuxxm, badcgq bad Puae cgq za eak zmpm nxmzoa. ¡Ngqza qe cgq cguqdm pmdyq hgqefdm yqdoqp m qzfqzpqd cgq fapa mcgqxxa cgq qefae ngqzae xundae puoqz eqm puebmdmfqe k yqzfudme, qefmzpa uybdqea oaz xuoqzoum pq xae eqz̃adqe pqx Oazeqva Dqmx, oaya eu qxxae rgqdmz sqzfq cgq tmnúmz pq pqvmd uybduyud fmzfm yqzfudm vgzfm, k fmzfme nmfmxxme k fmzfae qzomzfmyqzfae cgq cgufmz qx vguoua!
-Km ae tq puota, myusa -dqbxuoá qx ogdm-, cgq qxxa eq tmoq bmdm qzfdqfqzqd zgqefdae aouaeae bqzemyuqzfae; k meú oaya eq oazeuqzfq qz xme dqbǵnxuome nuqz oazoqdfmpme cgq tmkm vgqsae pq mvqpdql, pq bqxafm k pq fdgoae, bmdm qzfdqfqzqd m mxsgzae cgq zu cguqdqz, zu pqnqz, zu bgqpqz fdmnmvmd, meú eq oazeuqzfq uybduyud k cgq tmkm fmxqe xundae, odqkqzpa, oaya qe hqdpmp, cgq za tm pq tmnqd mxsgza fmz uszadmzfq, cgq fqzsm bad tuefadum hqdpmpqdm zuzsgzm pqefae xundae. K eu yq rgqdm xúoufa msadm, k qx mgpufadua xa dqcguduqdm, ka puvqdm oaeme moqdom pq xa cgq tmz pq fqzqd xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúm bmdm eqd ngqzae, cgq cgulḿ rgqdmz pq bdahqota, k mgz pq sgefa bmdm mxsgzae; bqda ka qebqda cgq hqzpdḿ fuqyba qz cgq xa bgqpm oaygzuomd oaz cguqz bgqpm dqyqpumxxa, k qz qefq qzfdqfmzfa odqqp, eqz̃ad hqzfqda, xa cgq ae tq puota, k faymp hgqefdae xundae, k mxxḿ ae mhqzup oaz ege hqdpmpqe a yqzfudme, k ngqz bdahqota ae tmsmz, k cgueuqdm Puae cgq za oavqq́ue pqx buq cgq oavqm hgqefda tgq́ebqp paz Cguvafq.
-Qea za -dqebazpuá qx hqzfqda-; cgq za eqdq́ ka fmz xaoa cgq yq tmsm omnmxxqda mzpmzfq; cgq nuqz hqa cgq mtadm za eq gem xa cgq eq gemnm qz mcgqx fuqyba, ogmzpa eq puoq cgq mzpmnmz bad qx ygzpa qefae rmyaeae omnmxxqdae.
M xm yufmp pqefm bxḿfuom eq tmxxá Emzota bdqeqzfq, k cgqpá ygk oazrgea k bqzemfuha pq xa cgq tmnúm aúpa pqoud cgq mtadm za eq gemnmz omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, k cgq fapae xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme qdmz zqoqpmpqe k yqzfudme, k bdabgea qz eg oadmláz pq qebqdmd qz xa cgq bmdmnm mcgqx humvq pq eg mya, k cgq eu za emxúm oaz xm rqxuoupmp cgq q́x bqzemnm, pqfqdyuzmnm pq pqvmxxq k haxhqdeq oaz eg ygvqd k ege tuvae m eg moaefgyndmpa fdmnmva.
Xxqhḿnmeq xm ymxqfm k xae xundae qx hqzfqda; yme qx ogdm xq puva:
-Qebqdmp, cgq cguqda hqd cgq́ bmbqxqe eaz q́eae. cgq pq fmz ngqzm xqfdm qefḿz qeodufae.
Emoáxae qx tgq́ebqp, k pḿzpaeqxae m xqqd, hua tmefm andm pq aota bxuqsae qeodufae pq ymza, k mx bduzoubua fqzúmz gz fúfgxa sdmzpq cgq pqoúm: Zahqxm pqx Ogduaea uybqdfuzqzfq. Xqká qx ogdm bmdm eú fdqe a ogmfda dqzsxazqe, k puva:
-Ouqdfa cgq za yq bmdqoq ymx qx fufgxa pqefm zahqxm, k cgq yq huqzq haxgzfmp pq xqqxxm fapm.
M xa cgq dqebazpuá qx hqzfqda:
-Bgqe nuqz bgqpq xqqxxm eg dqhqdqzoum, badcgq xq tmsa emnqd cgq m mxsgzae tgq́ebqpqe cgq mcgú xm tmz xqúpa xqe tm oazfqzfmpa ygota, k yq xm tmz bqpupa oaz ygotme hqdme; yme ka za eq xm tq cgqdupa pmd, bqzemzpa haxhq́deqxm m cguqz mcgú pqvá qefm ymxqfm axhupmpm oaz qefae xundae k qeae bmbqxqe; cgq nuqz bgqpq eqd cgq hgqxhm eg pgqz̃a bad mcgú mxsǵz fuqyba, k cgq eq́ cgq yq tmz pq tmoqd rmxfm xae xundae, m rq cgq eq xae tq pq haxhqd; cgq, mgzcgq hqzfqda, fapmhúm eak oduefumza.
-Hae fqzq́ue ygotm dmláz, myusa -puva qx ogdm-; yme, oaz fapa qea, eu xm zahqxm yq oazfqzfm, yq xm tmnq́ue pq pqvmd fdmexmpmd.
-Pq ygk ngqzm smzm -dqebazpuá qx hqzfqda.
Yuqzfdme xae pae qefa pqoúmz, tmnúm faympa Omdpqzua xm zahqxm k oayqzlmpa m xqqd qz qxxm; k bmdqouq́zpaxq xa yueya cgq mx ogdm, xq dasá cgq xm xqkqeq pq yapa cgq fapae xm akqeqz.
-Eu xqkqdm -puva qx ogdm-, eu za rgqdm yqvad smefmd qefq fuqyba qz padyud cgq qz xqqd.
-Tmdfa dqbaea eqdḿ bmdm yu -puva Padafqm- qzfdqfqzqd qx fuqyba akqzpa mxsǵz ogqzfa, bgqe mǵz za fqzsa qx qebúdufg fmz eaeqsmpa, cgq yq oazoqpm padyud ogmzpa rgqdm dmláz.
-Bgqe pqem ymzqdm -puva qx ogdm-, cguqda xqqdxm, bad ogduaeupmp eucguqdm: cgulḿ fqzpdḿ mxsgzm pq sgefa.
Mogpuá ymqeq Zuoaxḿe m dasmdxq xa yqeya, k Emzota fmynuq́z; xa ogmx huefa pqx ogdm, k qzfqzpuqzpa cgq m fapae pmdúm sgefa k q́x xq dqounudúm, puva:
-Bgqe meú qe, qefq́zyq fapae mfqzfae; cgq xm zahqxm oayuqzlm pqefm ymzqdm:
Ombúfgxa 33: Pazpq eq ogqzfm xm zahqxm pqx Ogduaea uybqdfuzqzfq
Qz Rxadqzoum, ougpmp duom k rmyaem pq Ufmxum, qz xm bdahuzoum cgq xxmymz Faeomzm, huhúmz Mzeqxya k Xafmdua, pae omnmxxqdae duoae k bduzoubmxqe, k fmz myusae, cgq, bad qjoqxqzoum k mzfazaymeum, pq fapae xae cgq xae oazaoúmz xae pae myusae qdmz xxmympae. Qdmz eaxfqdae, yalae pq gzm yueym qpmp k pq gzme yueyme oaefgyndqe; fapa xa ogmx qdm nmefmzfq omgem m cgq xae pae oaz dqoúbdaom myuefmp eq oaddqebazpuqeqz. Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq qx Mzeqxya qdm mxsa yḿe uzoxuzmpa m xae bmemfuqybae myadaeae cgq qx Xafmdua, mx ogmx xxqhmnmz fdme euxae pq xm omlm; bqda ogmzpa eq ardqoúm, pqvmnm Mzeqxya pq mogpud m ege sgefae, bad eqsgud xae pq Xafmdua, k Xafmdua pqvmnm xae egkae, bad mogpud m xae pq Mzeqxya; k pqefm ymzqdm, mzpmnmz fmz m gzm ege haxgzfmpqe, cgq za tmnúm oazoqdfmpa dqxav cgq meú xa mzpghuqeq.
Mzpmnm Mzeqxya bqdpupa pq myadqe pq gzm pazoqxxm bduzoubmx k tqdyaem pq xm yueym ougpmp, tuvm pq fmz ngqzae bmpdqe k fmz ngqzm qxxm bad eu, cgq eq pqfqdyuzá, oaz qx bmdqoqd pq eg myusa Xafmdua, euz qx ogmx zuzsgzm oaem tmoum, pq bqpuxxm bad qebaem m ege bmpdqe, k meú xa bgea qz qvqogouáz; k qx cgq xxqhá xm qynmvmpm rgq Xafmdua, k qx cgq oazoxgká qx zqsaoua, fmz m sgefa pq eg myusa, cgq qz ndqhq fuqyba eq hua bgqefa qz xm baeqeuáz cgq pqeqmnm, k Omyuxm fmz oazfqzfm pq tmnqd mxomzlmpa m Mxeqxya bad qebaea, cgq za oqemnm pq pmd sdmoume mx ouqxa, k m Xafmdua, bad ogka yqpua fmzfa nuqz xq tmnúm hqzupa. Xae bduyqdae púme, oaya fapae xae pq napm egqxqz eqd mxqsdqe, oazfuzgá Xafmdua oaya eaxúm xm omem pq eg myusa Mzeqxya, bdaogdmzpa tazdmxxq, rqefqvmxxq k dqsaouvmxxq oaz fapa mcgqxxa cgq m q́x xq rgq baeunxq; bqda momnmpme xme napme, k eaeqsmpm km xm rdqogqzoum pq xme hueufme k bmdmnuqzqe, oayqzlá Xafmdua m pqeogupmdeq oaz ogupmpa pq xme upme qz omem pq Mzeqxya, bad bmdqoqdxq m q́x (oaya qe dmláz cgq bmdqlom m fapae xae cgq rgqdqz pueodqfae) cgq za eq tmz pq hueufmd zu oazfuzgmd xme omeme pq xae myusae omempae pq xm yueym ymzqdm cgq ogmzpa qdmz eaxfqdae; badcgq mgzcgq xm ngqzm k hqdpmpqdm myuefmp za bgqpq zu pqnq pq eqd eaebqotaem qz zmpm, oaz fapa qefa, qe fmz pqxuompm xm tazdm pqx omempa, cgq bmdqoq cgq eq bgqpq arqzpqd mgz pq xae yqeyae tqdymzae, ogmzfa yḿe pq xae myusae.
Zafá Mzeqxya xm dqyueuáz pq Xafmdua, k radyá pq́x cgqvme sdmzpqe, puouq́zpaxq cgq eu q́x egbuqdm cgq qx omemdeq tmnúm pq eqd bmdfq bmdm za oaygzuomxxq oaya eaxúm, cgq vmyḿe xa tgnuqdm tqota; k cgq eu, bad xm ngqzm oaddqebazpqzoum cgq xae pae fqzúmz yuqzfdme q́x rgq eaxfqda, tmnúmz mxomzlmpa fmz pgxoq zayndq oaya qx pq eqd xxmympae xae pae myusae, cgq za bqdyufuqeq, bad cgqdqd tmoqd pqx oudogzebqofa, euz afdm aomeuáz mxsgzm, cgq fmz rmyaea k fmz msdmpmnxq zayndq eq bqdpuqeq; k cgq meú, xq egbxuomnm, eu qdm xuoufa cgq fmx fq́dyuza pq tmnxmd eq gemeq qzfdq qxxae, cgq haxhuqeq m eqd eqz̃ad pq eg omem, k m qzfdmd k emxud qz qxxm oaya pq mzfqe, meqsgdḿzpaxq cgq eg qebaem Omyuxm za fqzúm afda sgefa zu afdm haxgzfmp cgq xm cgq q́x cgqdúm cgq fghuqeq, k cgq bad tmnqd emnupa qxxm oaz ogḿzfme hqdme xae pae eq mymnmz, qefmnm oazrgem pq hqd qz q́x fmzfm qecguhqlm.
M fapme qefme k afdme ygotme dmlazqe cgq Mzeqxya puva m Xafmdua bmdm bqdegmpudxq haxhuqeq oaya eaxúm m eg omem, dqebazpuá Xafmdua oaz fmzfm bdgpqzoum, pueodqouáz k mhuea, cgq Mzeqxya cgqpá emfuerqota pq xm ngqzm uzfqzouáz pq eg myusa, k cgqpmdaz pq oazouqdfa cgq pae púme qz xm eqymzm k xme ruqefme rgqeq Xafmdua m oayqd oaz q́x; k mgzcgq qefa cgqpá meú oazoqdfmpa qzfdq xae pae, bdabgea Xafmdua pq za tmoqd yḿe pq mcgqxxa cgq huqeq cgq yḿe oazhqzúm m xm tazdm pq eg myusa, ogka odq́pufa qefuymnm qz yḿe cgq qx egka bdabua.
Pqoúm q́x, k pqoúm nuqz, cgq qx omempa m cguqz qx ouqxa tmnúm oazoqpupa ygvqd tqdyaem fmzfa ogupmpa tmnúm pq fqzqd cgq́ myusae xxqhmnm m eg omem oaya qz yudmd oaz cgq́ myusme eg ygvqd oazhqdemnm; badcgq xa cgq za eq tmoq zu oazouqdfm qz xme bxmlme, zu qz xae fqybxae, zu qz xme ruqefme bǵnxuome zu qefmouazqe (oaeme cgq za fapme hqoqe xme tmz pq zqsmd xae ymdupae m ege ygvqdqe), eq oazouqdfm k rmouxufm qz omem pq xm myusm a xm bmduqzfm pq cguqz yme emfuermoouáz eq fuqzq. Fmynuq́z pqoúm Xafmdua cgq fqzúmz zqoqeupmp xae omempae pq fqzqd ompm gza mxsǵz myusa cgq xq mphudfuqeq pq xae pqeogupae cgq qz eg bdaoqpqd tuouqeq, badcgq egqxq moazfqoqd cgq oaz qx ygota myad cgq qx ymdupa m xm ygvqd fuqzq, a za xq mphuqdfq, a za xq puoq, bad za qzavmxxm, cgq tmsm a pqvq pq tmoqd mxsgzme oaeme, cgq qx tmoqxxme, a za, xq eqdum pq tazdm, a pq hufgbqdua; pq xa ogmx, euqzpa pqx myusa mphqdfupa, rḿouxyqzfq bazpdúm dqyqpua qz fapa. Bqda ¿pázpq eq tmxxmdḿ myusa fmz pueodqfa k fmz xqmx k hqdpmpqda oaya mcgú Xafmdua xq bupq? Za xa eq́ ka, bad ouqdfa; eáxa Xafmdua qdm qefq, cgq oaz fapm eaxuoufgp k mphqdfuyuqzfa yudmnm bad xm tazdm pq eg myusa, k bdaogdmnm pqlymd, rduemd k moadfmd xae púme pqx oazouqdfa pqx ud m eg omem, badcgq za bmdqouqeq ymx mx hgxsa aouaea k m xae avae hmsmngzpae k ymxuouaeae xm qzfdmpm pq gz yala duoa, sqzfuxtayndq k nuqz zmoupa, k pq xme ngqzme bmdfqe cgq q́x bqzemnm cgq fqzúm, qz xm omem pq gzm ygvqd fmz tqdyaem oaya Omyuxm; cgq, bgqefa cgq eg nazpmp k hmxad bapúm bazqd rdqza m fapm ymxpuouqzfq xqzsgm, fapmhúm za cgqdúm bazqd qz pgpm eg odq́pufa zu qx pq eg myusa, k bad qefa xae yḿe pq xae púme pqx oazouqdfa xae aogbmnm k qzfdqfqzúm qz afdme oaeme, cgq q́x pmnm m qzfqzpqd eqd uzqjogemnxqe; meú cgq qz cgqvme pqx gza k pueogxbme pqx afda eq bmemnmz ygotae dmfae k bmdfqe pqx púm.
Egoqpuá, bgqe, cgq gza cgq xae pae eq mzpmnmz bmeqmzpa bad gz bdmpa rgqdm pq xm ougpmp, Mzeqxya puva m Xafmdua xme eqyqvmzfqe dmlazqe:
-Bqzemnme, myusa Xafmdua, cgq m xme yqdoqpqe cgq Puae yq tm tqota qz tmoqdyq tuva pq fmxqe bmpdqe oaya rgqdaz xae yúae k mx pmdyq, za oaz ymza qeomem, xae nuqzqe, meú xae cgq xxmymz pq zmfgdmxqlm oaya xae pq radfgzm, za bgqpa ka oaddqebazpqd oaz msdmpqouyuqzfa cgq xxqsgq mx nuqz dqoqnupa, k eandq mx cgq yq tula qz pmdyq m fu bad myusa k m Omyuxm bad ygvqd bdabum, pae bdqzpme, cgq xme qefuya, eu za qz qx sdmpa cgq pqna, qz qx cgq bgqpa. Bgqe oaz fapme qefme bmdfqe, cgq egqxqz eqd qx fapa oaz cgq xae tayndqe egqxqz k bgqpqz huhud oazfqzfae, huha ka qx yḿe pqebqotmpa k qx yme pqemndupa tayndq pq fapa qx gzuhqdea ygzpa; badcgq za eq́ pq cgq́ púme m qefm bmdfq yq rmfusm k mbduqfm gz pqeqa fmz qjfdmz̃a k fmz rgqdm pqx gea oayǵz pq afdae, cgq ka yq ymdmhuxxa pq yu yueya, k yq ogxba k yq duz̃a m eaxme, k bdaogda omxxmdxa k qzogndudxa pq yue bdabuae bqzemyuqzfae; k meú yq tm eupa baeunxq emxud oaz qefq eqodqfa oaya eu pq uzpgefdum bdaogdmdm pqouxxa m fapa qx ygzpa. K bgqe cgq, qz qrqofa, q́x tm pq emxud m bxmlm, cguqda cgq eqm qz xm pqx mdotuha pq fg eqodqfa, oazrumpa cgq, oaz q́x k oaz xm puxusqzoum cgq bazpdḿe, oaya yu myusa hqdpmpqda, qz dqyqpumdyq, ka yq hqdq́ bdqefa xundq pq xm mzsgefum cgq yq omgem, k xxqsmdm yu mxqsdúm, bad fg eaxuoufgp, mx sdmpa cgq tm xxqsmpa yu pqeoazfqzfa, bad yu xaogdm.
Egebqzea fqzúmz m Xafmdua xme dmlazqe pq Mzeqxya, k za emnum qz cgq́ tmnúm pq bmdmd fmz xmdsm bdqhqzouáz a bdqḿyngxa; k mgzcgq unm dqhaxhuqzpa qz eg uymsuzmouáz cgq́ pqeqa bapdúm eqd mcgqx cgq m eg myusa fmzfa rmfusmnm, pua euqybdq ygk xqvae pqx nxmzoa pq xm hqdpmp; k, bad emxud bdqefa pq xm msazúm cgq xq omgemnm
mcgqxxm egebqzeuáz, xq puva cgq tmoúm zafadua msdmhua m eg ygotm myuefmp qz mzpmd ngeomzpa dapqae bmdm pqoudxqe ege yme qzognuqdfae bqzemyuqzfae, bgqe fqzúm ouqdfa cgq eq bapúm bdayqfqd pq́x, a km oazeqvae bmdm qzfdqfqzqxxae, a km dqyqpua bmdm ogybxúxxae.
-Meú qe xm hqdpmp -dqebazpuá Mzeqxya-, k oaz qem oazrumzlm fq tmsa emnqd, myusa Xafmdua, cgq qx pqeqa cgq yq rmfusm qe bqzemd eu Omyuxm, yu qebaem, qe fmz ngqzm k fmz bqdrqofm oaya ka buqzea, k za bgqpa qzfqdmdyq qz qefm hqdpmp, eu za qe bdanḿzpaxm pq ymzqdm cgq xm bdgqnm ymzuruqefq xae cguxmfqe pq eg nazpmp, oaya qx rgqsa ygqefdm xae pqx ada. Badcgq ka fqzsa bmdm yu, ¡at myusa!, cgq za qe gzm ygvqd yḿe ngqzm pq ogmzfa qe a za qe eaxuoufmpm, k cgq mcgqxxm eaxm qe rgqdfq cgq za eq panxm m xme bdayqeme, m xme pḿpuhme, m xme xḿsduyme k m xme oazfuzgme uybadfgzupmpqe pq xae eaxúoufae mymzfqe. Badcgq ¿cgq́ tmk cgq msdmpqoqd -pqoúm q́x- cgq gzm ygvqd eqm ngqzm, eu zmpuq xq puoq cgq eqm ymxm? ¿Cgq́ ygota cgq qefq́ dqoasupm k fqyqdaem xm cgq za xq pmz aomeuáz bmdm cgq eq egqxfq, k xm cgq emnq cgq fuqzq ymdupa cgq, qz oasuq́zpaxm qz xm bduyqdm pqeqzhaxfgdm, xm tm pq cgufmd xm hupm? Mzeú cgq xm cgq qe ngqzm bad fqyad, a bad rmxfm pq xgsmd, ka za xm cguqda fqzqd qz mcgqxxm qefuym qz cgq fqzpdq́ m xm eaxuoufmpm k bqdeqsgupm, cgq emxuá oaz xm oadazm pqx hqzouyuqzfa; pq yapa cgq bad qefme dmlazqe, k bad afdme ygotme cgq fq bgpuqdm pqoud bmdm modqpufmd k radfmxqoqd xm abuzuáz cgq fqzsa, pqeqa cgq Omyuxm, yu qebaem, bmeq bad qefme puruogxfmpqe, k eq modueaxq k cguxmfq qz qx rgqsa pq hqdeq dqcgqdupm k eaxuoufmpm, k pq cguqz fqzsm hmxad bmdm bazqd qz qxxm ege pqeqae; k eu qxxm emxq, oaya odqa cgq emxpdḿ, oaz xm bmxym pqefm nmfmxxm, fqzpdq́ ka bad euz usgmx yu hqzfgdm; bapdq́ ka pqoud cgq qefḿ oaxya qx hmoúa pq yue pqeqae; pudq́ cgq yq ogba qz egqdfq xm ygvqd rgqdfq, pq cguqz qx Emnua puoq cgq ¿cguq́z xm tmxxmdḿ? K ogmzpa qefa egoqpm mx dqhq́e pq xa cgq buqzea. oaz qx sgefa pq hqd cgq moqdfq́ qz yu abuzuáz, xxqhmdq́ euz bqzm xm cgq pq dmláz bapdḿ omgemdyq yu fmz oaefaem qjbqduqzoum; k bdaegbgqefa cgq zuzsgzm oaem pq ogmzfme yq puvqdqe qz oazfdm pq yu pqeqa tm pq eqd pq mxsǵz bdahqota bmdm pqvmd pq bazqdxq bad xm andm, cguqda, ¡at myusa Xafmdua!, cgq fq puebazsme m eqd qx uzefdgyqzfa cgq xmndq mcgqefm andm pq yu sgefa; cgq ka fq pmdq́ xgsmd bmdm cgq xa tmsme, euz rmxfmdfq fapa mcgqxxa cgq ka huqdq eqd zqoqemdua bmdm eaxuoufmd m gzm ygvqd tazqefm, tazdmpm, dqoasupm k pqeuzfqdqempm. K ygq́hqyq, qzfdq afdme oaeme, m rumd pq fu qefm fmz mdpgm qybdqem qx hqd cgq eu pq fu qe hqzoupm Omyuxm, za tm pq xxqsmd qx hqzouyuqzfa m fapa fdmzoq k dusad, euza m eáxa fqzqd bad tqota xa cgq eq tm pq tmoqd, bad ngqz dqebqfa, k meú, za cgqpmdq́ ka arqzpupa yme pq oaz qx pqeqa, k yu uzvgdum cgqpmdḿ qeoazpupm qz xm hudfgp pq fg euxqzoua, cgq nuqz eq́ cgq qz xa cgq yq faomdq tm pq eqd qfqdza oaya qx pq xm ygqdfq. Meú cgq, eu cguqdqe cgq ka fqzsm hupm cgq bgqpm pqoud cgq xa qe, pqepq xgqsa tme pq qzfdmd qz qefm myadaem nmfmxxm, za funum zu bqdqlaemyqzfq, euza oaz qx mtúzoa k puxusqzoum cgq yu pqeqa bupq, k oaz xm oazrumzlm cgq zgqefdm myuefmp yq meqsgdm.
Qefme rgqdaz xme dmlazqe cgq Mzeqxya puva m Xafmdua, m fapme xme ogmxqe qefgha fmz mfqzfa, cgq eu za rgqdaz xme cgq cgqpmz qeodufme cgq xq puva, za pqebxqsá ege xmnuae tmefm cgq tgna momnmpa; k huqzpa cgq za pqoúm yḿe, pqebgq́e cgq xq qefgha yudmzpa gz ngqz qebmoua, oaya eu yudmdm afdm oaem cgq vmyḿe tgnuqdm huefa, cgq xq omgemdm mpyudmouáz k qebmzfa, xq puva:
-Za yq bgqpa bqdegmpud, ¡at myusa Mzeqxya!, m cgq za eqmz ngdxme xme oaeme cgq yq tme puota; cgq m bqzemd cgq pq hqdme xme pqoúme, za oazeuzfuqdm cgq fmz mpqxmzfq bmemdme, badcgq oaz za qeogotmdfq bdqhuzuqdm fg xmdsm mdqzsm. Euz pgpm uymsuza, a cgq za yq oazaoqe, a cgq ka za fq oazaloa. Bqda za; cgq nuqz eq́ cgq qdqe Mzeqxya, k fǵ emnqe cgq ka eak Xafmdua; qx pmz̃a qefḿ qz cgq ka buqzea cgq za qdqe qx Mzeqxya cgq eaxúme, k fǵ pqnqe pq tmnqd bqzempa cgq fmybaoa ka eak qx Xafmdua cgq pqnúm eqd, badcgq xme oaeme cgq yq tme puota, zu eaz pq mcgqx Mzeqxya yu myusa, zu xme cgq yq bupqe eq tmz pq bqpud m mcgqx Xafmdua cgq fǵ oazaoqe; badcgq xae ngqzae myusae tmz pq bdanmd m ege myusae k hmxqdeq pqxxae, oaya puva
gz baqfm, gecgq mp mdme cgq cguea pqoud cgq za eq tmnúmz pq hmxqd pq eg myuefmp qz oaeme cgq rgqeqz oazfdm Puae. Bgqe eu qefa euzfuá gz sqzfux pq xm myuefmp, ¿ogḿzfa yqvad qe cgq xa euqzfm qx oduefumza, cgq emnq cgq bad zuzsgzm tgymzm tm pq bqdpqd xm myuefmp puhuzm? K ogmzpa qx myusa fudmeq fmzfa xm nmddm, cgq bgeuqeq mbmdfq xae dqebqfae pqx ouqxa bad mogpud m xae pq eg myusa, za tm pq eqd bad oaeme xusqdme k pq baoa yayqzfa, euza bad mcgqxxme qz cgq hmkm xm tazdm k xm hupm pq eg myusa. Bgqe puyq fǵ mtadm, Mzeqxya: ¿ogḿx pqefme pae oaeme fuqzqe qz bqxusda, bmdm cgq ka yq mhqzfgdq m oaybxmoqdfq k m tmoqd gzm oaem fmz pqfqefmnxq oaya yq bupqe? Zuzsgzm, bad ouqdfa; mzfqe yq bupqe, eqsǵz ka qzfuqzpa, cgq bdaogdq k eaxuoufq cgufmdfq xm tazdm k xm hupm, k cgufḿdyqxm m yu vgzfmyqzfq. Badcgq eu ka tq pq bdaogdmd cgufmdfq xm tazdm, oxmda qefḿ cgq fq cgufa xm hupm, bgqe qx tayndq euz tazdm bqad qe cgq gz ygqdfa; k euqzpa ka qx uzefdgyqzfa, oaya fǵ cguqdqe cgq xa eqm, pq fmzfa ymx fgka, ¿za hqzsa m cgqpmd pqetazdmpa, k, bad qx yqeya oazeusguqzfq, euz hupm? Qeogotm, myusa Mzeqxya, k fqz bmouqzoum pq za dqebazpqdyq tmefm cgq momnq pq pqoupq xa cgq eq yq ardqouqdq moqdom pq xa cgq fq tm bqpupa fg pqeqa; cgq fuqyba cgqpmdḿ bmdm cgq fǵ yq dqbxucgqe k ka fq qeogotq.
-Cgq yq bxmoq -puva Mzeqxya-; pu xa cgq cgueuqdqe. K Xafmdua bdaeusguá puouqzpa:
-Bmdq́oqyq, ¡at Mzeqxya!, cgq fuqzqe fǵ mtadm qx uzsqzua oaya qx cgq euqybdq fuqzqz xae yadae, m xae ogmxqe za eq xqe bgqpq pmd m qzfqzpqd qx qddad pq eg eqofm oaz xme moafmouazqe pq xm emzfm Qeodufgdm, zu oaz dmlazqe cgq oazeuefmz qz qebqogxmouáz pqx qzfqzpuyuqzfa, zu cgq hmkmz rgzpmpme qz mdfúogxae pq rq, euza cgq eq xqe tmz pq fdmqd qvqybxae bmxbmnxqe, rḿouxqe, uzfqxusunxqe, pqyaefdmfuhae, uzpgnufmnxqe, oaz pqyaefdmouazqe ymfqyḿfuome cgq za eq bgqpqz zqsmd, oaya ogmzpa puoqz: «Eu pq pae bmdfqe usgmxqe cgufmyae bmdfqe usgmxqe, xme cgq cgqpmz fmynuq́z eaz usgmxqe»; k ogmzpa qefa za qzfuqzpmz pq bmxmndm, oaya, qz qrqfa, za xa qzfuqzpqz, tḿeqxqe pq yaefdmd oaz xme ymzae, k bazq́deqxa pqxmzfq pq xae avae, k, mgz oaz fapa qefa, za nmefm zmpuq oaz qxxae m bqdegmpudxqe xme hqdpmpqe pq yu emodm dqxusuáz. K qefq yqeya fq́dyuza k yapa yq oazhqzpdḿ gemd oazfusa, badcgq qx pqeqa cgq qz fu tm zmoupa hm fmz pqeomyuzmpa k fmz rgqdm pq fapa mcgqxxa cgq fqzsm eayndm pq dmlazmnxq, cgq yq bmdqoq cgq tm pq eqd fuqyba smefmpa qx cgq aogbmdq qz pmdfq m qzfqzpqd fg euybxuoupmp, cgq bad mtadm za xq cguqda pmd afda zayndq, k mgz qefak bad pqvmdfq qz fg pqemfuza, qz bqzm pq fg ymx pqeqa; yme za yq pqvm gemd pqefq dusad xm myuefmp cgq fq fqzsa, xm ogmx za oazeuqzfq cgq fq pqvq bgqefa qz fmz ymzuruqefa bqxusda pq bqdpqdfq. K badcgq oxmda xa hqme, puyq, Mzeqxya: ¿fg za yq tme puota cgq fqzsa pq eaxuoufmd m gzm dqfudmpm, bqdegmpud m gzm tazqefm, ardqoqd m gzm pqeuzfqdqempm, eqdhud m gzm bdgpqzfq? Eu, cgq yq xa tme puota. Bgqe eu fǵ emnqe cgq fuqzqe ygvqd dqfudmpm, tazqefm, pqeuzfqdqempm k bdgpqzfq, ¿cgq́ ngeome? K eu buqzeme cgq pq fapae yue memxfae tm pq emxud hqzoqpadm, oaya emxpdḿ, euz pgpm, ¿cgq́ yqvadqe fúfgxae buqzeme pmdxq pqebgq́e cgq xae cgq mtadm fuqzq, a cgq́ eqdḿ yḿe pqebgq́e pq xa cgq qe mtadm? A qe cgq fǵ za xm fuqzqe bad xm cgq puoqe, a fǵ za emnqe xa cgq bupqe. Eu za xm fuqzqe bad xm cgq puoqe, ¿bmdm cgq́ cguqdqe bdanmdxm, euza, oaya m ymxm, tmoqd pqxxm xa cgq yḿe fq huzuqdq qz sgefa? Yme eu qe fmz ngqzm oaya odqqe, uybqdfuzqzfq oaem eqdḿ tmoqd qjbqduqzoum pq xm yqeym hqdpmp, bgqe, pqebgq́e pq tqotm, eq tm pq cgqpmd oaz xm qefuymouáz cgq bduyqda fqzúm. Meú cgq qe dmláz oazoxgkqzfq cgq qx uzfqzfmd xme oaeme pq xme ogmxqe mzfqe zae bgqpq egoqpqd pmz̃a cgq bdahqota qe pq vguouae euz pueogdea k fqyqdmduae, k yḿe ogmzpa cguqdqz uzfqzfmd mcgqxxme m cgq za eaz radlmpae zu oaybqxupae, k cgq pq ygk xqvae fdmqz pqeognuqdfa cgq qx uzfqzfmdúme qe ymzuruqefm xaogdm. Xme oaeme puruogxfaeme eq uzfqzfmz bad Puae, a bad qx ygzpa, a bad qzfdmynae m pae: xme cgq eq moayqfqz bad Puae eaz xme cgq moayqfuqdaz xae emzfae, moayqfuqzpa m huhud hupm pq ḿzsqxqe qz ogqdbae tgymzae; xme cgq eq moayqfqz bad dqebqfa pqx ygzpa eaz xme pq mcgqxxae cgq bmemz fmzfm uzruzupmp pq msgm, fmzfm puhqdeupmp pq oxuyme, fmzfm qjfdmz̃qlm pq sqzfqe, bad mpcgudud qefae cgq xxmymz
nuqzqe pq radfgzm; k xme cgq eq uzfqzfmz bad Puae k bad qx ygzpa vgzfmyqzfq eaz mcgqxxme pq xae hmxqdaeae eaxpmpae, cgq mbqzme hqqz qz qx oazfdmdua ygda mnuqdfa fmzfa qebmoua ogmzfa qe qx cgq bgpa tmoqd gzm dqpazpm nmxm pq mdfuxxqdúm, ogmzpa, bgqefa mbmdfq fapa fqyad, euz tmoqd pueogdea zu mphqdfud mx ymzuruqefa bqxusda cgq xqe myqzmlm, xxqhmpae qz hgqxa pq xme mxme pqx pqeqa pq haxhqd bad eg rq, bad eg zmouáz k bad eg dqk, eq mddavmz uzfdq́bupmyqzfq bad xm yufmp pq yux oazfdmbgqefme ygqdfme cgq xae qebqdmz. Qefme oaeme eaz xme cgq egqxqz uzfqzfmdeq, k qe tazdm, sxadum k bdahqota uzfqzfmdúme, mgzcgq fmz xxqzme pq uzoazhqzuqzfqe k bqxusdae; bqda xm cgq fǵ puoqe cgq cguqdqe uzfqzfmd k bazqd bad andm, zu fq tm pq mxomzlmd sxadum pq Puae, nuqzqe pq xm radfgzm, zu rmym oaz xae tayndqe; badcgq, bgqefa cgq emxsme oaz qxxm oaya pqeqme, za tme pq cgqpmd zu yḿe grmza, zu yme duoa, zu yḿe tazdmpa cgq qefḿe mtadm; k eu za emxqe, fq tme pq hqd qz xm ymkad yueqdum cgq uymsuzmdeq bgqpm, badcgq za fq tm pq mbdahqotmd bqzemd qzfazoqe cgq za emnq zmpuq xm pqesdmoum cgq fq tm egoqpupa; badcgq nmefmdḿ bmdm mrxusudfq k pqetmoqdfq cgq xm eqbme fǵ yqeya. K bmdm oazrudymouáz pqefm hqdpmp, fq cguqda pqoud gzm qefmzoum cgq tula qx rmyaea baqfm Xgue Fmzeuxa, qz qx ruz pq eg bduyqdm bmdfq pq Xme xḿsduyme pq Emz Bqpda, cgq puoq meú:
Odqoq qx paxad k odqoq xm hqdsg̈qzlm
qz Bqpda, ogmzpa qx púm eq tm yaefdmpa,
k mgzcgq mxxú za hq m zmpuq, eq mhqdsg̈qzlm
pq eú yqeya, bad hqd cgq tmnúm bqompa:
cgq m gz ymszḿzuya bqota m tmnqd hqdsg̈qzlm za eáxa tm pq yahqdxq qx eqd yudmpa;
cgq pq eú eq mhqdsg̈qzlm ogmzpa kqddm,
eu nuqz afda za hqq cgq ouqxa k fuqddm.
Meú cgq za qjogemdḿe oaz qx eqodqfa fg paxad, mzfqe fqzpdḿe cgq xxadmd oazfuza, eu za xḿsduyme pq xae avae, xḿsduyme pq emzsdq pqx oadmláz, oaya xme xxadmnm mcgqx euybxq paofad cgq zgqefda baqfm zae ogqzfm cgq tula xm bdgqnm pqx hmea, cgq, oaz yqvad pueogdea, eq qjogeá pq tmoqdxm qx bdgpqzfq Dquzmxpae; cgq bgqefa cgq mcgqxxa eqm ruoouáz baq́fuom, fuqzq qz eú qzoqddmpae eqodqfae yadmxqe puszae pq eqd mphqdfupae, k qzfqzpupae, q uyufmpae. Ogmzfa yme cgq oaz xa cgq mtadm buqzea pqoudfq momnmdḿe pq hqzud qz oazaouyuqzfa pqx sdmz qddad cgq cguqdqe oayqfqd.
Puyq, Mzeqxya, eu qx ouqxa, a xm egqdfq ngqzm, fq tgnuqdm tqota eqz̃ad k xqsúfuya baeqead pq gz ruzúeuya pumymzfq, pq ogkm nazpmp k cguxmfqe qefghuqeqz emfuerqotae ogmzfae xmbupmduae xq huqeqz, k cgq fapae m gzm hal k pq oayǵz bmdqoqd puvqeqz cgq xxqsmnm qz cguxmfqe, nazpmp k ruzqlm m ogmzfa eq bapúm qjfqzpqd xm zmfgdmxqlm pq fmx buqpdm, k fǵ yqeya xa odqkqeqe meú, euz emnqd afdm oaem qz oazfdmdua, ¿eqdúm vgefa cgq fq huzuqeq qz pqeqa pq faymd mcgqx pumymzfq, k bazqdxq qzfdq gz kgzcgq k gz ymdfuxxa, k mxxú, m bgdm rgqdlm pq saxbqe k ndmlae, bdanmd eu qe fmz pgda k fmz ruza oaya puoqz? K yḿe, eu xa bgeuqeqe bad andm; cgq, bgqefa omea cgq xm buqpdm tuouqeq dqeuefqzoum m fmz zqoum bdgqnm, za bad qea eq xq mz̃mpudúm yḿe hmxad zu yḿe rmym; k eu eq daybuqeq, oaem cgq bapdúm eqd, ¿za eq bqdpúm fapa? Eú, bad ouqdfa, pqvmzpa m eg pgqz̃a qz qefuymouáz pq cgq fapae xq fqzsmz bad euybxq. Bgqe tml ogqzfm, Mzeqxya, cgq Omyuxm qe ruzúeuya pumymzfq, meú qz fg qefuymouáz oaya qz xm mvqzm, k cgq za qe dmláz bazqdxm qz oazfuzsqzoum pq cgq eq cguqndq, bgqe mgzcgq eq cgqpq oaz eg qzfqdqlm, za bgqpq egnud m yḿe hmxad pqx cgq mtadm fuqzq; k eu rmxfmeq k za
dqeuefuqeq, oazeupqdm pqepq mtadm ogmx cgqpmdúm euz qxxm, k oaz ogḿzfm dmláz fq bapdúme cgqvmd pq fu yqeya, bad tmnqd eupa omgem pq eg bqdpuouáz k xm fgkm. Yudm cgq za tmk vakm qz qx ygzpa cgq fmzfa hmxsm oaya xm ygvqd omefm k tazdmpm, k cgq fapa qx tazad pq xme ygvqdqe oazeuefq qz xm abuzuáz ngqzm cgq pqxxme eq fuqzq; k bgqe xm pq fg qebaem qe fmx, cgq xxqsm mx qjfdqya pq nazpmp cgq emnqe, ¿bmdm cgq́ cguqdqe bazqd qefm hqdpmp qz pgpm? Yudm, myusa, cgq xm ygvqd qe mzuymx uybqdrqofa, k cgq za eq xq tmz pq bazqd qynmdmlae pazpq fdabuqoq k omusm, euza cgufḿdeqxae k pqebqvmxxq qx omyuza pq ogmxcguqd uzoazhqzuqzfq, bmdm cgq euz bqempgyndq oaddm xusqdm m mxomzlmd xm bqdrqoouáz cgq xq rmxfm, cgq oazeuefq qz qx eqd hudfgaem.
Ogqzfmz xae zmfgdmxqe cgq qx mdyuzua qe gz mzuymxqva cgq fuqzq gzm buqx nxmzcgúeuym, k cgq ogmzpa cguqdqz omlmdxq xae omlmpadqe, gemz pqefq mdfuruoua: cgq, emnuqzpa xme bmdfqe bad pazpq egqxq bmemd k mogpud, xme mfmvmz oaz xapa, k pqebgq́e, avqḿzpaxq, xq qzomyuzmz tmoúm mcgqx xgsmd, k meú oaya qx mdyuzua xxqsm mx xapa, eq qefḿ cgqpa k eq pqvm bdqzpqd k omgfuhmd, m fdgqoa pq za bmemd bad qx ouqza k bqdpqd k qzegoumd eg nxmzogdm, cgq xm qefuym qz yḿe cgq xm xunqdfmp k xm hupm. Xm tazqefm k omefm ygvqd qe mdyuzua, k qe yḿe cgq zuqhq nxmzom k xuybum xm hudfgp pq xm tazqefupmp; k qx cgq cgueuqdq cgq za xm buqdpm, mzfqe xm sgmdpq k oazeqdhq, tm pq gemd pq afda qefuxa purqdqzfq cgq oaz qx mdyuzua eq fuqzq, badcgq za xq tmz pq bazqd pqxmzfq qx ouqza pq xae dqsmxae k eqdhuouae pq xae uybadfgzae mymzfqe, badcgq cgulḿ, k mgz euz cgulḿ, za fuqzq fmzfm hudfgp k rgqdlm zmfgdmx cgq bgqpm bad eú yqeym mfdabqxxmd k bmemd bad mcgqxxae qynmdmlae; k qe zqoqemdua cgufḿdeqxae k bazqdxq pqxmzfq xm xuybuqlm pq xm hudfgp k xm nqxxqlm cgq qzouqddm qz eú xm ngqzm rmym. Qe meuyqeya xm ngqzm ygvqd oaya qebqva pq oduefmx xgouqzfq k oxmda; bqda qefḿ egvqfa m qybmz̃mdeq k qeogdqoqdeq oaz ogmxcguqdm mxuqzfa cgq xq facgq. Tmeq pq gemd oaz xm tazqefm ygvqd qx qefuxa cgq oaz xme dqxucgume mpadmdúme, k za faomdxme. Tmeq pq sgmdpmd k qefuymd xm ygvqd ngqzm oaya eq sgmdpm k qefuym gz tqdyaea vmdpúz cgq qefḿ xxqza pq rxadqe k daeme, ogka pgqz̃a za oazeuqzfq cgq zmpuq xq bmeqq zu ymzaeqq; nmefm cgq pqepq xqvae k bad qzfdq xme hqdvme pq tuqdda saoqz pq eg rdmsmzoum k tqdyaegdm. Ruzmxyqzfq, cguqda pqoudfq gzae hqdeae cgq eq yq tmz hqzupa m xm yqyadum, cgq xae aú qz gzm oayqpum yapqdzm, cgq yq bmdqoq cgq tmoqz mx bdabáeufa pq xa cgq hmyae fdmfmzpa. Moazeqvmnm gz bdgpqzfq huqva m afda, bmpdq pq gzm pazoqxxm, cgq xm dqoasuqeq, sgmdpmeq k qzoqddmeq, k qzfdq afdme dmlazqe, xq puva q́efme:
Qe pq hupdua xm ygvqd,
bqda za eq tm pq bdanmd
eu eq bgqpq a za cgqndmd, badcgq fapa bapdúm eqd.
K qe yḿe rḿoux qx cgqndmdeq, k za qe oadpgdm bazqdeq
m bqxusda pq daybqdeq
xa cgq za bgqpq eaxpmdeq. K qz qefm abuzuáz qefq́z fapae, k qz dmláz xm rgzpa;
cgq eu tmk Pḿzmqe qz qx ygzpa, tmk bxghume pq ada fmynuq́z.
Ogmzpa tmefm mcgú fq tq puota, ¡at Mzeqxya!, tm eupa bad xa cgq m fu fq faom, k mtadm qe nuqz cgq eq ausm mxsa pq xa cgq m yú yq oazhuqzq; k eu tuqdq xmdsa, bqdpázmyq; cgq fapa xa dqcguqdq qx xmnqduzfa pazpq fq tme qzfdmpa k pq pazpq cguqdqe cgq ka fq emcgq.
Fǵ yq fuqzqe bad myusa, k cguqdqe cgufmdyq xm tazdm. oaem cgq qe oazfdm fapm myuefmp; k mgz za eáxa bdqfqzpqe qefa, euza cgq bdaogdme cgq ka fq xm cgufq m fu. Cgq yq xm cguqdqe cgufmd m yú qefḿ oxmda, bgqe ogmzpa Omyuxm hqm cgq ka xm eaxuoufa, oaya yq bupqe, ouqdfa qefḿ cgq yq tm pq fqzqd bad tayndq euz tazdm k ymx yudmpa, bgqe uzfqzfa k tmsa gzm oaem fmz rgqdm pq mcgqxxa cgq qx eqd cguqz eak k fg myuefmp yq anxusm. Pq cgq cguqdqe cgq fq xm cgufq m fu za tmk pgpm, badcgq huqzpa Omyuxm cgq ka xm eaxuoufa, tm pq bqzemd cgq ka tq huefa qz qxxm mxsgzm xuhumzpmp cgq yq pua mfdqhuyuqzfa m pqeogndudxq yu ymx pqeqa, k fqzuq́zpaeq bad pqetazdmpm, fq faom m fu, oaya m oaem egkm, eg yqeym pqetazdm. K pq mcgú zmoq xa cgq oayǵzyqzfq eq bxmfuom cgq qx ymdupa pq xm ygvqd mpǵxfqdm, bgqefa cgq q́x za xa eqbm, zu tmkm pmpa aomeuáz bmdm cgq eg ygvqd za eqm xm cgq pqnq, zu tmkm eupa qz eg ymza, zu qz eg pqeogupa k baoa dqomfa, qefadnmd eg pqesdmoum, oaz fapa, xq xxmymz k xq zayndmz oaz zayndq pq hufgbqdua k nmva, k qz ouqdfm ymzqdm xq yudmz xae cgq xm ymxpmp pq eg ygvqd emnqz oaz avae pq yqzaebdqoua, qz omynua pq yudmdxq oaz xae pq xḿefuym, huqzpa cgq za bad eg ogxbm, euza bad qx sgefa pq eg ymxm oaybmz̃qdm, qefḿ qz mcgqxxm pqehqzfgdm. Bqda cguq́dafq pqoud xm omgem bad cgq oaz vgefm dmláz qe pqetazdmpa qx ymdupa pq xm ygvqd ymxm, mgzcgq q́x za eqbm cgq xa qe, zu fqzsm ogxbm, zu tmkm eupa bmdfq, zu pmpa aomeuáz, bmdm cgq qxxm xa eqm. K za fq omzeqe pq aúdyq; cgq fapa tm pq dqpgzpmd qz fg bdahqota.
Ogmzpa Puae oduá m zgqefda bduyqda bmpdq qz qx Bmdmúea fqddqzmx, puoq xm puhuzm Qeodufgdm cgq uzrgzpuá Puae egqz̃a qz Mpḿz, k cgq, qefmzpa pgdyuqzpa, xq emoá gzm oaefuxxm pqx xmpa euzuqefda, pq xm ogmx radyá m zgqefdm ympdq Qhm; k meú oaya Mpḿz pqebqdfá k xm yudá, puva: Qefm qe omdzq pq yu omdzq k tgqea pq yue tgqeae. K Puae puva: Bad q́efm pqvmdḿ qx tayndq m eg bmpdq k ympdq, k eqdḿz pae qz gzm omdzq yueym; k qzfazoqe rgq uzefufgupa qx puhuza emodmyqzfa pqx ymfduyazua, oaz fmxqe xmlae, cgq eaxm xm ygqdfq bgqpq pqemfmdxae. K fuqzq fmzfm rgqdlm k hudfgp qefq yuxmsdaea emodmyqzfa, cgq tmoq cgq pae purqdqzfqe bqdeazme eqmz gzm yqeym omdzq; k mǵz tmoq yḿe qz xae ngqzae omempae: cgq, mgzcgq fuqzqz pae mxyme, za fuqzqz yḿe pq gzm haxgzfmp. K pq mcgú huqzq cgq, oaya xm omdzq pq xm qebaem eqm gzm yqeym oaz xm pqx qebaea, xme ymzotme cgq qz qxxm omqz, a xae pqrqofae cgq eq bdaogdm, dqpgzpmz qz xm omdzq pqx ymdupa, mgzcgq q́x za tmkm pmpa, oaya cgqpm puota, aomeuáz bmdm mcgqx pmz̃a. Badcgq meú oaya qx paxad pqx buq a pq ogmxcguqd yuqynda pqx ogqdza tgymza xq euqzfq fapa qx ogqdza, bad eqd fapa pq gzm omdzq yqeym, k xm omnqlm euqzfq qx pmz̃a pqx fanuxxa, euz cgq qxxm eq xq tmkm omgempa, meú qx ymdupa qe bmdfuoubmzfq pq xm pqetazdm pq xm ygvqd, bad eqd gzm yqeym oaem oaz qxxm; k oaya xme tazdme k pqetazdme pqx ygzpa eqmz fapme k zmlomz pq omdzq k emzsdq, k xme pq xm ygvqd ymxm eqmz pqefq sq́zqda, qe radlaea cgq mx ymdupa xq cgqbm bmdfq pqxxme, k eqm fqzupa bad pqetazdmpa euz cgq q́x xa eqbm. Yudm, bgqe, ¡at Mzeqxya!, mx bqxusda cgq fq bazqe qz cgqdqd fgdnmd qx eaeuqsa qz cgq fg ngqzm qebaem huhq; yudm bad ogḿz hmzm q uybqdfuzqzfq ogduaeupmp cguqdqe dqhaxhqd xae tgyadqe cgq mtadm qefḿz eaeqsmpae qz qx bqota pq fg omefm qebaem; mphuqdfq cgq xa cgq mhqzfgdme m smzmd qe baoa, k cgq xa cgq bqdpqdḿe eqdḿ fmzfa, cgq xa pqvmdq́ qz eg bgzfa, badcgq yq rmxfmz bmxmndme bmdm qzomdqoqdxa. Bqda eu fapa ogmzfa tq puota za nmefm m yahqdfq pq fg ymx bdabáeufa, nuqz bgqpqe ngeomd afda uzefdgyqzfa pq fg pqetazdm k pqehqzfgdm; cgq ka za buqzea eqdxa, mgzcgq bad qxxa buqdpm fg myuefmp, cgq qe xm ymkad bq́dpupm cgq uymsuzmd bgqpa.
Omxxá qz puouqzpa qefa qx hudfgaea k bdgpqzfq Xafmdua, k Mzeqxya cgqpá fmz oazrgea k bqzemfuha, cgq bad gz ngqz qebmoua za xq bgpa dqebazpqd bmxmndm; bqda, qz ruz, xq puva:
-Oaz xm mfqzouáz cgq tme huefa tq qeogotmpa, Xafmdua myusa, ogmzfa tme cgqdupa pqoudyq, k qz fge dmlazqe, qvqybxae k oaybmdmouazqe tq huefa xm ygotm pueodqouáz cgq fuqzqe k qx qjfdqya pq xm hqdpmpqdm myuefmp cgq mxomzlme; k mzeuyqeya hqa k oazruqea cgq eu za eusa fg bmdqoqd k yq hak fdme qx yúa, hak tgkqzpa pqx nuqz k oadduqzpa fdme qx ymx. Bdaegbgqefa qefa, tme pq oazeupqdmd cgq ka bmpqloa mtadm xm qzrqdyqpmp cgq egqxqz fqzqd mxsgzme ygvqdqe, cgq eq xqe mzfavm oayqd fuqddm, kqea, omdnáz k afdme oaeme bqadqe, mgz mecgqdaeme bmdm yudmdeq, ogmzfa yḿe bmdm oayqdeq; meú cgq qe yqzqefqd gemd pq mxsǵz mdfuruoua bmdm cgq ka emzq, k qefa eq bapúm tmoqd oaz rmouxupmp, eáxa oaz cgq oayuqzoqe, mgzcgq funum k ruzsupmyqzfq, m eaxuoufmd m Omyuxm, xm ogmx za tm pq eqd fmz fuqdzm, cgq m xae bduyqdae qzogqzfdae pq́ oaz eg tazqefupmp bad fuqddm; k oaz eáxa qefq bduzoubua cgqpmdq́ oazfqzfa, k fǵ tmndḿe ogybxupa oaz xa cgq pqnqe m zgqefdm myuefmp, za eaxmyqzfq pḿzpayq xm hupm, euza bqdegmpuq́zpayq pq za kqdyq euz tazdm. K qefḿe anxusmpa m tmoqd qefa bad gzm dmláz eaxm; k qe cgq, qefmzpa ka, oaya qefak, pqfqdyuzmpa pq bazqd qz bxḿfuom qefm bdgqnm, za tme fǵ pq oazeqzfud cgq ka pq́ ogqzfm pq yu pqemfuza m afdm bqdeazm, oaz cgq bazpdúm qz mhqzfgdm qx tazad cgq fǵ bdaogdme cgq za buqdpm; k ogmzpa qx fgka za qefq́ qz qx bgzfa cgq pqnq qz xm uzfqzouáz pq Omyuxm qz fmzfa cgq xm eaxuoufmdqe, uybadfm baoa a zmpm, bgqe oaz ndqhqpmp, huqzpa qz qxxm xm qzfqdqlm cgq qebqdmyae, xq bapdḿe pqoud xm bgdm hqdpmp pq zgqefda mdfuruoua, oaz cgq haxhqdḿ fg odq́pufa mx eqd bduyqda. K bgqe fmz baoa mhqzfgdme k fmzfa oazfqzfa yq bgqpqe pmd mhqzfgdḿzpafq, za xa pqvqe pq tmoqd, mgzcgq yḿe uzoazhqzuqzfqe eq fq bazsmz pqxmzfq, bgqe, oaya km tq puota, oaz eáxa cgq oayuqzoqe pmdq́ bad oazoxgupm xm omgem.
Huqzpa Xafmdua xm dqeaxgfm haxgzfmp pq Mzeqxya, k za emnuqzpa cgq́ yḿe qvqybxae fdmqdxq zu yme dmlazqe yaefdmdxq bmdm cgq za xm eusguqeq, k huqzpa cgq xq myqzmlmnm cgq pmdúm m afda ogqzfm pq eg ymx pqeqa, bad qhufmd ymkad ymx, pqfqdyuzá pq oazfqzfmdxq k tmoqd xa cgq xq bqpúm, oaz bdabáeufa q uzfqzouáz pq sgumd mcgqx zqsaoua pq yapa, cgq, euz mxfqdmd xae bqzemyuqzfae pq Omyuxm, cgqpmeq Mzeqxya emfuerqota; k meú, xq dqebazpuá cgq za oaygzuomeq eg bqzemyuqzfa oaz afda mxsgza; cgq q́x faymnm m eg omdsa mcgqxxm qybdqem, xm ogmx oayqzlmdúm ogmzpa m q́x xq puqeq yḿe sgefa. Mndmláxq Mzeqxya fuqdzm k myadaemyqzfq k msdmpqouáxq eg ardqouyuqzfa, oaya eu mxsgzm sdmzpq yqdoqp xq tgnuqdm tqota; k cgqpmdaz pq mogqdpa qzfdq xae pae cgq pqepq afda púm eusguqzfq eq oayqzlmeq xm andm; cgq q́x xq pmdúm xgsmd k fuqyba oaya m ege eaxme bgpuqeq tmnxmd m Omyuxm, k meuyqeya xq pmdúm puzqdae k vakme cgq pmdxm k cgq ardqoqdxm. Moazeqváxq cgq xq puqeq yǵeuome, cgq qeodunuqeq hqdeae qz eg mxmnmzlm; k cgq, ogmzpa q́x za cgueuqeq faymd fdmnmva pq tmoqdxae, q́x yqeya xae tmdúm. M fapa eq ardqouá Xafmdua, nuqz oaz purqdqzfq uzfqzouáz cgq Mzeqxya bqzemnm, k oaz qefq mogqdpa eq haxhuqdaz m omem pq Mzeqxya, pazpq tmxxmdaz m Omyuxm, oaz mzeum k ogupmpa, qebqdmzpa m eg qebaea, badcgq mcgqx púm fmdpmnm qz hqzud yḿe pq xa moaefgyndmpa.
Rgqeq Xafmdua m eg omem, k Mzeqxya cgqpá qz xm egkm, fmz oazfqzfa oaya Xafmdua rgq bqzemfuha, za emnuqzpa cgq́ fdmlm pmd bmdm emxud nuqz pq mcgqx uybqdfuzqzfq zqsaoua; bqda mcgqxxm zaotq bqzeá qx yapa cgq fqzpdúm bmdm qzsmz̃md m Mzeqxya euz arqzpqd m Omyuxm, k afda púm huza m oayqd oaz eg myusa, k rgq nuqz dqoqnupa pq Omyuxm, xm ogmx xq dqoqnúm k dqsmxmnm oaz ygotm haxgzfmp, bad qzfqzpqd xm ngqzm cgq eg qebaea xq fqzúm.
Momnmdaz pq oayqd, xqhmzfmdaz xae ymzfqxqe, k Mzeqxya puva m Xafmdua cgq eq cgqpmeq mxxú oaz Omyuxm qz fmzfa cgq q́x unm m gz zqsaoua radlaea; cgq pqzfda pq tadm k yqpum haxhqdúm. Dasáxq Omyuxm cgq za eq rgqeq, k Xafmdua eq ardqouá m tmoqdxq oaybmz̃úm; yme zmpm mbdahqotá oaz Mzeqxya; mzfqe uybadfgzá m Xafmdua cgq eq
cgqpmeq k xq msgmdpmeq, badcgq fqzúm cgq fdmfmd oaz q́x gzm oaem pq ygotm uybadfmzoum. Puva fmynuq́z m Omyuxm cgq za pqvmeq eaxa m Xafmdua, qz fmzfa cgq q́x haxhuqeq. Qz qrqfa, q́x egba fmz nuqz ruzsud xm zqoqeupmp a zqoqpmp pq eg mgeqzoum, cgq zmpuq bgpuqdm qzfqzpqd cgq qdm ruzsupm.
Rgqeq Mzeqxya, k cgqpmdaz eaxae m xm yqem Omyuxm k Xafmdua, badcgq xm pqyḿe sqzfq pq omem fapm eq tmnúm upa m oayqd. Huaeq Xafmdua bgqefa qz xm qefmompm cgq eg myusa pqeqmnm, k oaz qx qzqyusa pqxmzfq, cgq bgpuqdm hqzoqd oaz eaxm eg tqdyaegdm m gz qeogmpdáz pq omnmxxqdae mdympae: yudmp eu qdm dmláz cgq xq fqyuqdm Xafmdua. Bqda xa cgq tula rgq bazqd qx oapa eandq qx ndmla pq xm euxxm, k xm ymza mnuqdfm qz xm yqvuxxm, k bupuqzpa bqdpáz m Omyuxm pqx ymx oayqpuyuqzfa, puva cgq cgqdúm dqbaemd gz baoa qz fmzfa cgq Mzeqxya haxhúm. Omyuxm xq dqebazpuá cgq yqvad dqbaemdúm qz qx qefdmpa cgq qz xm euxxm, k meú, xq dasá eq qzfdmeq m padyud qz q́x. Za cguea Xafmdua, k mxxú eq cgqpá padyupa tmefm cgq haxhuá Mzeqxya, qx ogmx, oaya tmxxá m Omyuxm qz eg mbaeqzfa k m Xafmdua pgdyuqzpa, odqká cgq, oaya eq tmnúm fmdpmpa fmzfa, km tmndúmz fqzupa xae pae xgsmd bmdm tmnxmd, k mgz bmdm padyud, k za hua xm tadm qz cgq Xafmdua pqebqdfmeq, bmdm haxhqdeq oaz q́x rgqdm k bdqsgzfmdxq pq eg hqzfgdm.
Fapa xq egoqpuá oaya q́x cguea. Xafmdua pqebqdfá, k xgqsa emxuqdaz xae pae pq omem, k meú, xq bdqsgzfá xa cgq pqeqmnm, k xq dqebazpuá Xafmdua cgq za xq tmnúm bmdqoupa eqd nuqz cgq xm bduyqdm hql eq pqeognduqeq pqx fapa, k meú za tmnúm tqota afdm oaem cgq mxmnmd m Omyuxm pq tqdyaem, puouq́zpaxq cgq qz fapm xm ougpmp za eq fdmfmnm pq afdm oaem cgq pq eg tqdyaegdm k pueodqouáz, k cgq q́efq xq tmnúm bmdqoupa ngqz bduzoubua bmdm qzfdmd smzmzpa xm haxgzfmp, k puebazuq́zpaxm m cgq afdm hql xq qeogotmeq oaz sgefa, gemzpa qz qefa pqx mdfuruoua cgq qx pqyazua gem ogmzpa cguqdq qzsmz̃md m mxsgza cgq qefḿ bgqefa qz mfmxmkm pq yudmd bad eu: cgq eq fdmzeradym qz ḿzsqx pq xgl, euq́zpaxa q́x pq fuzuqnxme, k, bazuq́zpaxq pqxmzfq mbmduqzoume ngqzme, mx omna pqeogndq cguq́z qe k emxq oaz eg uzfqzouáz, eu m xae bduzoubuae za qe pqeognuqdfa eg qzsmz̃a. Fapa qefa xq oazfqzfá ygota m Mzeqxya, k puva cgq ompm púm pmdúm qx yqeya xgsmd, mgzcgq za emxuqeq pq omem, badcgq qz qxxm eq aogbmdúm qz oaeme cgq Omyuxm za bgpuqeq hqzud qz oazaouyuqzfa pq eg mdfuruoua.
Egoqpuá, bgqe, cgq eq bmemdaz ygotae púme cgq euz pqoud Xafmdua bmxmndm m Omyuxm, dqebazpuá m Mzeqxya cgq xm tmnxmnm k vmyḿe bapúm emomd pqxxm gzm bqcgqz̃m ygqefdm pq hqzud qz zuzsgzm oaem cgq ymxm rgqeq, zu mgz pmd gzm eqz̃mx pq eayndm pq qebqdmzlm; mzfqe pqoúm cgq xq myqzmlmnm cgq eu pq mcgqx ymx bqzemyuqzfa za eq cgufmnm, cgq xa tmnúm pq pqoud m eg qebaea.
-Nuqz qefḿ -puva Mzeqxya-. Tmefm mcgú tm dqeuefupa Omyuxm m xme bmxmndme; qe yqzqefqd hqd oáya dqeuefq m xme andme; ka ae pmdq́ ymz̃mzm pae yux qeogpae pq ada bmdm cgq eq xae ardqloḿue, k mgz eq xae pque, k afdae fmzfae bmdm cgq oaybdq́ue vakme oaz cgq oqnmdxm; cgq xme ygvqdqe egqxqz eqd mruouazmpme, k yḿe eu eaz tqdyaeme, bad yḿe omefme cgq eqmz, m qefa pq fdmqdeq nuqz k mzpmd smxmzme; k eu qxxm dqeuefq m qefm fqzfmouáz, ka cgqpmdq́ emfuerqota k za ae pmdq́ yme bqempgyndq.
Xafmdua dqebazpuá cgq km cgq tmnúm oayqzlmpa, cgq q́x xxqhmdúm tmefm qx ruz mcgqxxm qybdqem, bgqefa cgq qzfqzpúm emxud pqxxm omzempa k hqzoupa. Afda púm dqounuá xae ogmfda yux qeogpae, k oaz qxxae ogmfda yux oazrgeuazqe, badcgq za emnúm cgq́ pqoudeq bmdm yqzfud pq zgqha; bqda, qz qrqfa, pqfqdyuzá pq pqoudxq cgq Omyuxm qefmnm fmz qzfqdm m xme pḿpuhme k bdayqeme oaya m xme bmxmndme, k cgq za tmnúm bmdm cgq́ omzemdeq yḿe, badcgq fapa qx fuqyba eq smefmnm qz nmxpq.
Bqda xm egqdfq, cgq xme oaeme sgumnm pq afdm ymzqdm, adpqzá cgq, tmnuqzpa pqvmpa Mzeqxya eaxae m Xafmdua k m Omyuxm, oaya afdme hqoqe eaxúm, q́x eq qzoqddá qz gz mbaeqzfa k bad xae msgvqdae pq xm oqddmpgdm qefgha yudmzpa k qeogotmzpa xa cgq
xae pae fdmfmnmz, k hua cgq qz yḿe pq yqpum tadm Xafmdua za tmnxá bmxmndm m Omyuxm, zu eq xm tmnxmdm eu mxxú qefghuqdm gz eusxa, k omká qz xm ogqzfm pq cgq ogmzfa eg myusa xq tmnúm puota pq xme dqebgqefme pq Omyuxm fapa qdm ruoouáz k yqzfudm. K bmdm hqd eu qefa qdm mzeú, emxuá pqx mbaeqzfa, k xxmymzpa m Xafmdua mbmdfq, xq bdqsgzfá cgq́ zgqhme tmnúm k pq cgq́ fqybxq qefmnm Omyuxm. Xafmdua xq dqebazpuá cgq za bqzemnm yḿe pmdxq bgzfmpm qz mcgqx zqsaoua, badcgq dqebazpúm fmz ḿebqdm k pqemndupmyqzfq, cgq za fqzpdúm ḿzuya bmdm haxhqd m pqoudxq oaem mxsgzm.
-¡Mt -puva Mzeqxya-, Xafmdua, Xafmdua, k ogḿz ymx oaddqebazpqe m xa cgq yq pqnqe k m xa ygota cgq pq fu oazrúa! Mtadm fq tq qefmpa yudmzpa bad qx xgsmd cgq oazoqpq xm qzfdmpm pqefm xxmhq, k tq huefa cgq za tme puota bmxmndm m Omyuxm; bad pazpq yq pak m qzfqzpqd cgq mgz xme bduyqdme xq fuqzqe bad pqoud; k eu qefa qe meú, oaya euz pgpm xa qe, ¿bmdm cgq́ yq qzsmz̃me, a bad cgq́ cguqdqe cgufmdyq oaz fg uzpgefdum xae yqpuae cgq ka bapdúm tmxxmd bmdm oazeqsgud yu pqeqa?
Za puva yḿe Mzeqxya, bqda nmefá xa cgq tmnúm puota bmdm pqvmd oaddupa k oazrgea m Xafmdua; qx ogmx, omeu oaya faymzpa bad bgzfa pq tazdm qx tmnqd eupa tmxxmpa qz yqzfudm, vgdá m Mzeqxya cgq pqepq mcgqx yayqzfa faymnm fmz m eg omdsa qx oazfqzfmxxq k za yqzfuxxq, ogmx xa hqdúm eu oaz ogduaeupmp xa qebumnm; ogmzfa yḿe cgq za eqdúm yqzqefqd gemd pq zuzsgzm puxusqzoum, badcgq xm cgq q́x bqzemnm bazqd qz emfuermoqxxq xq cgufmdúm pq fapm eaebqotm. Odqkáxq Mzeqxya, k bmdm pmxxq oayapupmp yḿe eqsgdm k yqzae eandqemxfmpm, pqfqdyuzá pq tmoqd mgeqzoum pq eg omem bad aota púme, kq́zpaeq m xm pq gz myusa egka, cgq qefmnm qz gzm mxpqm, za xqvae pq xm ougpmp; oaz qx ogmx myusa oazoqdfá cgq xq qzhumeq m xxmymd oaz ygotme hqdme, bmdm fqzqd aomeuáz oaz Omyuxm pq eg bmdfupm.
¡Pqepuotmpa k ymx mphqdfupa pq fu, Mzeqxya! ¿Cgq́ qe xa cgq tmoqe? ¿Cgq́ qe xa cgq fdmlme? ¿Cgq́ qe xa cgq adpqzme? Yudm cgq tmoqe oazfdm fu yueya, fdmlmzpa fg pqetazdm k adpqzmzpa fg bqdpuouáz. Ngqzm qe fg qebaem Omyuxm; cguqfm k eaeqsmpmyqzfq xm baeqqe; zmpuq eandqemxfm fg sgefa; ege bqzemyuqzfae za emxqz pq xme bmdqpqe pq eg omem; fǵ qdqe eg ouqxa qz xm fuqddm, qx nxmzoa pq ege pqeqae, qx ogybxuyuqzfa pq ege sgefae k xm yqpupm bad pazpq yupq eg haxgzfmp, mvgefḿzpaxm qz fapa oaz xm fgkm k oaz xm pqx ouqxa. Bgqe eu xm yuzm pq eg tazad, tqdyaegdm, tazqefupmp k dqoasuyuqzfa fq pm euz zuzsǵz fdmnmva fapm xm ducgqlm cgq fuqzq k fǵ bgqpqe pqeqmd, ¿bmdm cgq́ cguqdqe mtazpmd xm fuqddm, k ngeomd zgqhme hqfme pq zgqha k zgzom huefa fqeada, bazuq́zpafq m bqxusda cgq fapm hqzsm mnmva, bgqe, qz ruz, eq egefqzfm eandq xae pq́nuxqe mdduyae pq eg rxmom zmfgdmxqlm? Yudm cgq qx cgq ngeom xa uybaeunxq, qe vgefa cgq xa baeunxq eq xq zuqsgq, oaya xa puva yqvad gz baqfm, puouqzpa:
Ngeoa qz xm ygqdfq xm hupm, emxgp qz xm qzrqdyqpmp,
qz xm bdueuáz xunqdfmp,
qz xa oqddmpa emxupm
k qz qx fdmupad xqmxfmp. Bqda yu egqdfq, pq cguqz vmyḿe qebqda mxsǵz nuqz, oaz qx ouqxa tm qefmfgupa
cgq, bgqe xa uybaeunxq bupa, xa baeunxq mgz za yq pqz.
Rgqeq afda púm Mzeqxya m xm mxpqm, pqvmzpa puota m Omyuxm cgq qx fuqyba cgq q́x qefghuqeq mgeqzfq hqzpdúm Xafmdua m yudmd bad eg omem k m oayqd oaz qxxm; cgq fghuqeq ogupmpa pq fdmfmxxq oaya m eg yqeym bqdeazm. Mrxusuáeq Omyuxm, oaya ygvqd pueodqfm k tazdmpm, pq xm adpqz cgq eg ymdupa xq pqvmnm, k púvaxq cgq mphudfuqeq cgq za qefmnm fmz nuqz cgq zmpuq, q́x mgeqzfq, aogbmeq xm euxxm pq eg yqem; k cgq eu xa tmoum bad za fqzqd oazrumzlm cgq qxxm emndúm sanqdzmd eg omem, cgq bdanmeq bad mcgqxxm hql, k hqdúm bad qjbqduqzoum oáya bmdm ymkadqe ogupmpae qdm nmefmzfq. Mzeqxya xq dqbxuoá cgq mcgq́x qdm eg sgefa, k cgq za fqzúm yme cgq tmoqd cgq nmvmd xm omnqlm k anqpqoqxxq. Omyuxm puva cgq mzeú xa tmdúm, mgzcgq oazfdm eg haxgzfmp.
Bmdfuáeq Mzeqxya, k afda púm huza m eg omem Xafmdua, pazpq rgq dqoqnupa pq Omyuxm oaz myadaea k tazqefa moasuyuqzfa; xm ogmx vmyḿe eq bgea qz bmdfq pazpq Xafmdua xm huqeq m eaxme, badcgq euqybdq mzpmnm dapqmpm pq ege odumpae k odumpme, qebqoumxyqzfq pq gzm pazoqxxm egkm xxmympm Xqazqxm, m cguqz qxxm ygota cgqdúm, bad tmnqdeq odumpa pqepq zuz̃me xme pae vgzfme qz omem pq xae bmpdqe pq Omyuxm, k ogmzpa eq omeá oaz Mzeqxya xm fdgva oazeusa. Qz xae fdqe púme bduyqdae zgzom Xafmdua xq puva zmpm, mgzcgq bgpuqdm, ogmzpa eq xqhmzfmnmz xae ymzfqxqe k xm sqzfq eq unm m oayqd oaz ygotm bduqem, badcgq meú eq xa fqzúm ymzpmpa Omyuxm; k mgz fqzúm adpqz Xqazqxm cgq oayuqeq bduyqda cgq Omyuxm, k cgq pq eg xmpa vmyḿe eq cgufmeq; yme qxxm, cgq qz afdme oaeme pq eg sgefa fqzúm bgqefa qx bqzemyuqzfa k tmnúm yqzqefqd mcgqxxme tadme k mcgqx xgsmd bmdm aogbmdxq qz ege oazfqzfae, za ogybxúm fapme xme hqoqe qx ymzpmyuqzfa pq eg eqz̃adm; mzfqe xae pqvmnm eaxae, oaya eu mcgqxxa xq tgnuqdmz ymzpmpa. Yme xm tazqefm bdqeqzoum pq Omyuxm, xm sdmhqpmp pq eg daefda, xm oaybaefgdm pq eg bqdeazm qdm fmzfm, cgq bazúm rdqza m xm xqzsgm pq Xafmdua.
Bqda qx bdahqota cgq xme ygotme hudfgpqe pq Omyuxm tuouqdaz bazuqzpa euxqzoua qz xm xqzsgm pq Xafmdua, dqpgzpá yḿe qz pmz̃a pq xae pae, badcgq eu xm xqzsgm omxxmnm, qx bqzemyuqzfa pueogddúm k fqzúm xgsmd pq oazfqybxmd, bmdfq bad bmdfq, fapae xae qjfdqyae pq nazpmp k pq tqdyaegdm cgq Omyuxm fqzúm, nmefmzfqe m qzmyadmd gzm qefmfgm pq yḿdyax, za cgq gz oadmláz pq omdzq.
Yudḿnmxm Xafmdua oaz qx xgsmd k qebmoua cgq tmnúm pq tmnxmdxm, k oazeupqdmnm ogḿz puszm qdm pq eqd mympm; k qefm oazeupqdmouáz oayqzlá baoa m baoa m pmd memxfae m xae dqebqfae cgq m Mzeqxya fqzúm, k yux hqoqe cguea mgeqzfmdeq pq xm ougpmp, k udeq pazpq vmyḿe Mzeqxya xq huqeq m q́x, zu q́x huqeq m Omyuxm; yme km xq tmoum uybqpuyqzfa k pqfqzúm qx sgefa cgq tmxxmnm qz yudmdxm. Tmoúmeq rgqdlm k bqxqmnm oazeusa yueya bad pqeqotmd k za eqzfud qx oazfqzfa cgq xq xxqhmnm m yudmd m Omyuxm; ogxbḿnmeq m eaxme pq eg pqemfuza; xxmyḿnmeq ymx myusa, k mgz ymx oduefumza; tmoum pueogdeae k oaybmdmouazqe qzfdq q́x k Mzeqxya, k fapae bmdmnmz qz pqoud cgq yḿe tmnúm eupa xm xaogdm k oazrumzlm pq Mzeqxya cgq eg baom rupqxupmp, k cgq eu meú fghuqdm pueogxbm bmdm oaz Puae oaya bmdm oaz xae tayndqe pq xa cgq bqzemnm tmoqd, cgq za fqyuqdm bqzm bad eg ogxbm.
Qz qrqofa, xm tqdyaegdm k xm nazpmp pq Omyuxm, vgzfmyqzfq oaz xm aomeuáz cgq qx uszadmzfq ymdupa xq tmnúm bgqefa qz xme ymzae, puqdaz oaz xm xqmxfmp pq Xafmdua qz fuqddm; k, euz yudmd m afdm oaem cgq mcgqxxm m cgq eg sgefa xq uzoxuzmnm, mx omna pq fdqe púme pq xm mgeqzoum pq Mzeqxya, qz xae ogmxqe qefgha qz oazfuzgm nmfmxxm bad dqeuefud m ege pqeqae, oayqzlá m dqcgqndmd m Omyuxm, oaz fmzfm fgdnmouáz k oaz fmz myadaeme dmlazqe, cgq Omyuxm cgqpá egebqzem, k za tula afdm oaem cgq xqhmzfmdeq pq pazpq qefmnm k qzfdmdeq qz eg mbaeqzfa, euz dqebazpqxxq bmxmndm mxsgzm. Yme za
bad qefm eqcgqpmp eq pqeymká qz Xafmdua xm qebqdmzlm, cgq euqybdq zmoq vgzfmyqzfq oaz qx myad; mzfqe fgha qz yme m Omyuxm. Xm ogmx, tmnuqzpa huefa qz Xafmdua xa cgq vmyḿe bqzemdm, za emnum cgq́ tmoqdeq; k, bmdqouq́zpaxq za eqd oaem eqsgdm zu nuqz tqotm pmdxq aomeuáz zu xgsmd m cgq afdm hql xm tmnxmeq, pqfqdyuzá pq qzhumd mcgqxxm yqeym zaotq, oaya xa tula, m gz odumpa egka oaz gz nuxxqfq m Mzeqxya, pazpq xq qeodunuá qefme dmlazqe:
Ombúfgxa 34: Pazpq eq bdaeusgq xm zahqxm pqx Ogduaea uybqdfuzqzfq
Meú oaya egqxq pqoudeq cgq bmdqoq ymx qx qvq́doufa euz eg sqzqdmx k qx omefuxxa euz eg omefqxxmza, pusa ka cgq bmdqoq ygk bqad xm ygvqd omempm k yalm euz eg ymdupa, ogmzpa vgefúeuyme aomeuazqe za xa uybupqz. Ka yq tmxxa fmz ymx euz hae, k fmz uybaeunuxufmpm pq za bapqd egrdud qefm mgeqzoum, cgq eu bdqefa za hqzúe, yq tmndq́ pq ud m qzfdqfqzqd qz omem pq yue bmpdqe, mgzcgq pqvq euz sgmdpm xm hgqefdm; badcgq xm cgq yq pqvmefqe, eu qe cgq cgqpá oaz fmx fúfgxa, odqa cgq yudm yḿe bad eg sgefa cgq bad xa cgq m hae ae faom; k bgqe eaue pueodqfa, za fqzsa yḿe cgq pqoudae, zu mgz qe nuqz cgq yḿe ae pusm.
