Qefm omdfm dqounuá Mzeqxya, k qzfqzpuá bad qxxm cgq Xafmdua tmnúm km oayqzlmpa xm qybdqem, k cgq Omyuxm pqnúm pq tmnqd oaddqebazpupa oaya q́x pqeqmnm; k, mxqsdq eandqymzqdm pq fmxqe zgqhme, dqebazpuá m Omyuxm, pq bmxmndm, cgq za tuouqeq ygpmyuqzfa pq eg omem qz yapa zuzsgza, badcgq q́x haxhqdúm oaz ygotm ndqhqpmp. Mpyudmpm cgqpá Omyuxm pq xm dqebgqefm pq Mzeqxya, cgq xm bgea qz yḿe oazrgeuáz cgq bduyqda, badcgq zu eq mfdqhúm m qefmd qz eg omem, zu yqzae udeq m xm pq ege bmpdqe; badcgq qz xm cgqpmpm, oaddúm bqxusda eg tazqefupmp; k qz xm upm, unm oazfdm qx ymzpmyuqzfa pq eg qebaea. Qz ruz, eq dqeaxhuá qz xa cgq xq qefgha bqad, cgq rgq qz qx cgqpmdeq, oaz pqfqdyuzmouáz pq za tgud xm bdqeqzoum pq Xafmdua, bad za pmd cgq pqoud m ege odumpae, k km xq bqemnm pq tmnqd qeodufa xa cgq qeodunuá m eg qebaea, fqyqdaem pq cgq za bqzemeq cgq Xafmdua tmnúm huefa qz qxxm mxsgzm pqeqzhaxfgdm cgq xq tgnuqeq yahupa m za sgmdpmxxq qx pqoada cgq pqnúm. Bqda, rumpm qz eg nazpmp, eq ruá qz Puae k qz eg ngqz bqzemyuqzfa, oaz cgq bqzemnm dqeuefud omxxmzpa m fapa mcgqxxa cgq Xafmdua pqoudxq cgueuqeq, euz pmd yḿe ogqzfm m eg ymdupa, bad za bazqdxq qz mxsgzm bqzpqzoum k fdmnmva; k mgz mzpmnm ngeomzpa ymzqdm oaya pueogxbmd m Xafmdua oaz Mzeqxya, ogmzpa xq bdqsgzfmeq xm aomeuáz cgq xq tmnúm yahupa m qeodunudxq mcgqx bmbqx.
Oaz qefae bqzemyuqzfae, yḿe tazdmpae cgq moqdfmpae zu bdahqotaeae, qefgha afda púm qeogotmzpa m Xafmdua, qx ogmx omdsá xm ymza pq ymzqdm cgq oayqzlá m fufgnqmd xm rudyqlm pq Omyuxm, k eg tazqefupmp fgha tmdfa cgq tmoqd qz mogpud m xae avae, bmdm cgq za puqeqz ygqefdme pq mxsgzm myadaem oaybmeuáz cgq xme xḿsduyme k xme dmlazqe pq Xafmdua qz eg bqota tmnúmz pqebqdfmpa. Fapa qefa zafmnm Xafmdua, k fapa xq qzoqzpúm. Ruzmxyqzfq, m q́x xq bmdqouá cgq qdm yqzqefqd, qz qx qebmoua k xgsmd cgq pmnm xm mgeqzoum pq Mzeqxya, mbdqfmd qx oqdoa m mcgqxxm radfmxqlm, k meú, moayqfuá m eg bdqegzouáz oaz xme mxmnmzlme pq eg tqdyaegdm, badcgq za tmk oaem cgq yḿe bdqefa duzpm k mxxmzq xme qzomefuxxmpme faddqe pq xm hmzupmp pq xme tqdyaeme cgq xm yqeym hmzupmp, bgqefm qz xme xqzsgme pq xm mpgxmouáz. Qz qrqofa, q́x, oaz fapm puxusqzoum, yuzá xm daom pq eg qzfqdqlm, oaz fmxqe bqdfdqotae, cgq mgzcgq Omyuxm rgqdm fapm pq ndazoq, huzuqdm mx egqxa. Xxadá, dasá, ardqouá, mpgxá, badruá k ruzsuá Xafmdua oaz fmzfae eqzfuyuqzfae, oaz ygqefdme pq fmzfme hqdme, cgq pua mx fdmhq́e oaz qx dqomfa pq Omyuxm k huza m fdugzrmd pq xa cgq yqzae eq bqzemnm k yme pqeqmnm.
Duzpuáeq Omyuxm; Omyuxm eq duzpuá; bqda ¿cgq́ ygota, eu xm myuefmp pq Xafmdua za cgqpá qz buq? Qvqybxa oxmda cgq zae ygqefdm cgq eáxa eq hqzoq xm bmeuáz myadaem
oaz tguxxm, k cgq zmpuq eq tm pq bazqd m ndmla oaz fmz bapqdaea qzqyusa, badcgq qe yqzqefqd rgqdlme puhuzme bmdm hqzoqd xme egkme tgymzme. Eáxa egba Xqazqxm xm rxmcgqlm pq eg eqz̃adm, badcgq za eq xm bgpuqdaz qzogndud xae pae ymxae myusae k zgqhae mymzfqe. Za cguea Xafmdua pqoud m Omyuxm xm bdqfqzeuáz pq Mzeqxya, zu cgq q́x xq tmnúm pmpa xgsmd bmdm xxqsmd m mcgqx bgzfa, badcgq za fghuqeq qz yqzae eg myad, k bqzemeq cgq meú, momea k euz bqzemd, k za pq bdabáeufa, xm tmnúm eaxuoufmpa.
Haxhuá pq mxxú m baoae púme Mzeqxya m eg omem, k za qotá pq hqd xa cgq rmxfmnm qz qxxm, cgq qdm xa cgq qz yqzae fqzúm k yḿe qefuymnm. Rgqeq xgqsa m hqd m Xafmdua, k tmxxáxq qz eg omem; mndmlḿdazeq xae pae, k qx gza bdqsgzfá bad xme zgqhme pq eg hupm, a pq eg ygqdfq.
-Xme zgqhme cgq fq bapdq́ pmd, ¡at myusa Mzeqxya! -puva Xafmdua-, eaz pq cgq fuqzqe gzm ygvqd cgq puszmyqzfq bgqpq eqd qvqybxa k oadazm pq fapme xme ygvqdqe ngqzme. Xme bmxmndme cgq xq tq puota eq xme tm xxqhmpa qx mudq; xae ardqouyuqzfae eq tmz fqzupa qz baoa; xme pḿpuhme za eq tmz mpyufupa; pq mxsgzme xḿsduyme ruzsupme yúme eq tm tqota ngdxm zafmnxq. Qz dqeaxgouáz, meú oaya Omyuxm qe ourdm pq fapm nqxxqlm, qe mdotuha pazpq meuefq xm tazqefupmp k huhq qx oayqpuyuqzfa k qx dqomfa, k fapme xme hudfgpqe cgq bgqpqz tmoqd xamnxq k nuqz mradfgzmpm m gzm tazdmpm ygvqd. Hgqxhq m faymd fge puzqdae, myusa, cgq mcgú xae fqzsa, euz tmnqd fqzupa zqoqeupmp pq faomd m qxxae; cgq xm qzfqdqlm pq Omyuxm za eq duzpq m oaeme fmz nmvme oaya eaz pḿpuhme zu bdayqeme. Oazfq́zfmfq, Mzeqxya, k za cguqdme tmoqd yḿe bdgqnme pq xme tqotme; k, bgqe m buq qzvgfa tme bmempa qx ymd pq xme puruogxfmpqe k eaebqotme cgq pq xme ygvqdqe egqxqz k bgqpqz fqzqdeq, za cguqdme qzfdmd pq zgqha qz qx bdargzpa buq́xmsa pq zgqhae uzoazhqzuqzfqe, zu cguqdme tmoqd qjbqduqzoum oaz afda buxafa pq xm nazpmp k radfmxqlm pqx zmhúa cgq qx ouqxa fq pua qz egqdfq bmdm cgq qz q́x bmemeqe xm ymd pqefq ygzpa; euza tml ogqzfm cgq qefḿe km qz eqsgda bgqdfa, k mrq́ddmfq oaz xme ḿzoadme pq xm ngqzm oazeupqdmouáz, k pq́vmfq qefmd tmefm cgq fq hqzsmz m bqpud xm pqgpm cgq za tmk tupmxsgúm tgymzm cgq pq bmsmdxm eq qjogeq.
Oazfqzfúeuya cgqpá Mzeqxya pq xme dmlazqe pq Xafmdua, k meú eq xme odqká oaya eu rgqdmz puotme bad mxsǵz adḿogxa; bqda, oaz fapa qea, xq dasá cgq za pqvmeq xm qybdqem, mgzcgq za rgqeq yḿe pq bad ogduaeupmp k qzfdqfqzuyuqzfa; mgzcgq za eq mbdahqotmeq pq mxxú mpqxmzfq pq fmz mtuzompme puxusqzoume oaya tmefm qzfazoqe; k cgq eáxa cgqdúm cgq xq qeodunuqeq mxsgzae hqdeae qz eg mxmnmzlm, pqnmva pqx zayndq pq Oxadu, badcgq q́x xq pmdúm m qzfqzpqd m Omyuxm cgq mzpmnm qzmyadmpa pq gzm pmym, m cguqz xq tmnúm bgqefa mcgqx zayndq, bad bapqd oqxqndmdxm oaz qx pqoada cgq m eg tazqefupmp eq xq pqnúm; k cgq, ogmzpa Xafmdua za cgueuqdm faymd fdmnmva pq qeodunud xae hqdeae, cgq q́x xae tmdúm.
-Za eqdḿ yqzqefqd qea -puva Xafmdua--; bgqe za yq eaz fmz qzqyusme xme ygeme cgq mxsgzae dmfae pqx mz̃a yq hueufqz. Puxq fǵ m Omyuxm xa cgq tme puota pqx ruzsuyuqzfa pq yue myadqe; cgq xae hqdeae ka xae tmdq́, eu za fmz ngqzae oaya qx egvqfa yqdqoq, eqdḿz, bad xa yqzae, xae yqvadqe cgq ka bgpuqdq.
Cgqpmdaz pqefq mogqdpa qx uybqdfuzqzfq k qx fdmupad myusa; k, hgqxfa Mzeqxya m eg omem, bdqsgzfá m Omyuxm xa cgq qxxm km eq ymdmhuxxmnm cgq za eq xa tgnuqeq bdqsgzfmpa, cgq rgq cgq xq puvqeq xm aomeuáz bad cgq xq tmnúm qeodufa qx bmbqx cgq xq qzhuá. Omyuxm xq dqebazpuá cgq xq tmnúm bmdqoupa cgq Xafmdua xm yudmnm gz baoa yḿe pqeqzhgqxfmyqzfq cgq ogmzpa q́x qefmnm qz omem; bqda cgq km qefmnm pqeqzsmz̃mpm k odqúm cgq tmnúm eupa uymsuzmouáz egkm, badcgq km Xafmdua tgúm pq hqxxm k pq qefmd oaz qxxm m eaxme.
Púvaxq Mzeqxya cgq nuqz bapúm qefmd eqsgdm pq mcgqxxm eaebqotm, badcgq q́x emnúm cgq Xafmdua mzpmnm qzmyadmpa pq gzm pazoqxxm bduzoubmx pq xm ougpmp, m cguqz q́x oqxqndmnm pqnmva pqx zayndq pq Oxadu, k cgq, mgzcgq za xa qefghuqdm, za tmnúm cgq
fqyqd pq xm hqdpmp pq Xafmdua k pq xm ygotm myuefmp pq qzfdmynae. K, m za qefmd mhuempm Omyuxm pq Xafmdua pq cgq qdmz ruzsupae mcgqxxae myadqe pq Oxadu, k cgq q́x eq xa tmnúm puota m Mzeqxya bad bapqd aogbmdeq mxsgzae dmfae qz xme yueyme mxmnmzlme pq Omyuxm, qxxm, euz pgpm, omkqdm qz xm pqeqebqdmpm dqp pq xae oqxae; yme bad qefmd km mphqdfupm, bmeá mcgqx eandqemxfa euz bqempgyndq.
Afda púm, qefmzpa xae fdqe eandq yqem, dasá Mzeqxya m Xafmdua puvqeq mxsgzm oaem pq xme cgq tmnúm oaybgqefa m eg mympm Oxadu; cgq, bgqe Omyuxm za xm: oazaoúm, eqsgdmyqzfq bapúm pqoud xa cgq cgueuqeq.
-Mgzcgq xm oazaouqdm -dqebazpuá Xafmdua-, za qzognduqdm ka zmpm; badcgq ogmzpa mxsǵz mymzfq xam m eg pmym pq tqdyaem k xm zafm pq odgqx, zuzsǵz mbdanua tmoq m eg ngqz odq́pufa; bqda, eqm xa cgq rgqdq, xa cgq eq́ pqoud, cgq mkqd tuoq gz eazqfa m xm uzsdmfufgp pqefm Oxadu, cgq puoq mzeú:
EAZQFA
Qz qx euxqzoua pq xm zaotq, ogmzpa
aogbm qx pgxoq egqz̃a m xae yadfmxqe,
xm bandq ogqzfm pq yue duoae ymxqe
qefak mx ouqxa k m yu Oxadu pmzpa.
K mx fuqyba ogmzpa qx eax eq hm yaefdmzpa bad xme daempme bgqdfme aduqzfmxqe,
oaz egebudae k moqzfae pqeusgmxqe
hak xm mzfusgm cgqdqxxm dqzahmzpa.
K ogmzpa qx eax, pq eg qefdqxxmpa meuqzfa pqdqotae dmkae m xm fuqddm qzhúm,
qx xxmzfa odqoq k panxa xae sqyupae. Hgqxhq xm zaotq, k hgqxha mx fduefq ogqzfa, k euqybdq tmxxa, qz yu yadfmx badrúm,
mx ouqxa, eadpa; m Oxadu, euz aúpae.
Nuqz xq bmdqouá qx eazqfa m Omyuxm; bqda yqvad m Mzeqxya, bgqe xq mxmná, k puva cgq qdm pqymeumpmyqzfq odgqx xm pmym cgq m fmz oxmdme hqdpmpqe za oaddqebazpúm. M xa cgq puva Omyuxm:
-Xgqsa ¿fapa mcgqxxa cgq xae baqfme qzmyadmpae puoqz qe hqdpmp?
-Qz ogmzfa baqfme, za xm puoqz -dqebazpuá Xafmdua-; yme qz ogmzfa qzmyadmpae, euqybdq cgqpmz fmz oadfae oaya hqdpmpqdae.
-Za tmk pgpm pqea -dqbxuoá Mzeqxya, fapa bad mbakmd k modqpufmd xae bqzemyuqzfae pq Xafmdua oaz Omyuxm, fmz pqeogupmpm pqx mdfuruoua pq Mzeqxya oaya km qzmyadmpm pq Xafmdua.
K meú, oaz qx sgefa cgq pq ege oaeme fqym, k yḿe, fqzuqzpa bad qzfqzpupa cgq ege pqeqae k qeodufae m qxxm eq qzomyuzmnmz, k cgq qxxm qdm xm hqdpmpqdm Oxadu, xq dasá cgq eu afda eazqfa a afdae hqdeae emnúm, xae puvqeq.
-Eú eq́ -dqebazpuá Xafmdua-; bqda za odqa cgq qe fmz ngqza oaya qx bduyqda, a, bad yqvad pqoud, yqzae ymxa. K bapdq́uexa nuqz vglsmd, bgqe qe q́efq:
EAZQFA
Ka eq́ cgq ygqda; k eu za eak odqúpa,
qe yḿe ouqdfa qx yadud, oaya qe yḿe ouqdfa kqdyq m fge buqe, ¡at nqxxm uzsdmfm!, ygqdfa, mzfqe cgq pq mpadmdfq mddqbqzfupa.
Bapdq́ ka kqdyq qz xm dqsuáz pq axhupa,
pq hupm k sxadum k pq rmhad pqeuqdfa,
k mxxú hqdeq bapdḿ qz yu bqota mnuqdfa,
oáya fg tqdyaea daefda qefḿ qeogxbupa.
Cgq qefm dqxucgum sgmdpa bmdm qx pgda
fdmzoq cgq yq myqzmlm yu badrúm,
cgq qz fg yueya dusad eq radfmxqoq.
¡Mk pq mcgqx cgq zmhqsm, qx ouqxa qeogda, bad ymd za gempa k bqxusdaem húm,
mpazpq zadfq a bgqdfa za eq ardqoq!
Fmynuq́z mxmná qefq eqsgzpa eazqfa Mzeqxya oaya tmnúm tqota qx bduyqda, k pqefm ymzqdm unm mz̃mpuqzpa qexmnáz m qexmnáz m xm ompqzm oaz cgq eq qzxmlmnm k fdmnmnm eg pqetazdm, bgqe ogmzpa yḿe Xafmdua xq pqetazdmnm, qzfazoqe xq pqoúm cgq qefmnm yḿe tazdmpa; k oaz qefa, fapae xae qeomxazqe cgq Omyuxm nmvmnm tmoum qx oqzfda pq eg yqzaebdqoua, xae egnúm, qz xm abuzuáz pq eg ymdupa, tmoum xm ogyndq pq xm hudfgp k pq eg ngqzm rmym. Egoqpuá qz qefa cgq, tmxxḿzpaeq gzm hql, qzfdq afdme, eaxm Omyuxm oaz eg pazoqxxm, xq puva:
-Oaddupm qefak, myusm Xqazqxm, pq hqd qz ogḿz baoa tq emnupa qefuymdyq, bgqe eucguqdm za tuoq cgq oaz qx fuqyba oaybdmdm Xafmdua xm qzfqdm baeqeuáz cgq xq pu fmz bdqefa pq yu haxgzfmp. Fqya cgq tm pq pqeqefuymd yu bdqefqlm a xusqdqlm, euz cgq qotq pq hqd xm rgqdlm cgq q́x yq tula bmdm za bapqd dqeuefudxq.
-Za fq pq́ bqzm qea, eqz̃adm yúm -dqebazpuá Xqazqxm-; cgq za qefḿ xm yazfm zu qe omgem bmdm yqzsgmd xm qefuymouáz pmdeq xa cgq eq pm bdqefa, eu, qz qrqofa, xa cgq eq pm qe ngqza, k qxxa bad eú pusza pq qefuymdeq. K mgz egqxq pqoudeq cgq qx cgq xgqsa pm, pm pae hqoqe.
-Fmynuq́z eq egqxq pqoud -puva Omyuxm- cgq xa cgq ogqefm baoa eq qefuym qz yqzae.
-Za oaddq bad fu qem dmláz -dqebazpuá Xqazqxm-, badcgq qx myad, eqsǵz tq aúpa pqoud, gzme hqoqe hgqxm, k afdme mzpm; oaz q́efq oaddq, k oaz mcgq́x hm pqebmoua; m gzae qzfunum, k m afdae mndmem; m gzae tuqdq, k m afdae ymfm; qz gz yqeya bgzfa oayuqzlm xm omddqdm pq ege pqeqae, k qz mcgqx yqeya bgzfa xm momnm k oazoxgkq; bad xm ymz̃mzm egqxq bazqd qx oqdoa m gzm radfmxqlm, k m xm zaotq xm fuqzq dqzpupm, badcgq za tmk rgqdlm cgq xq dqeuefm. K euqzpa meú, ¿pq cgq́ fq qebmzfme, a pq cgq́ fqyqe, eu xa yueya pqnq pq tmnqd moazfqoupa m Xafmdua, tmnuqzpa faympa qx myad bad uzefdgyqzfa pq dqzpudzae xm mgeqzoum pq yu eqz̃ad? K qdm radlaea cgq qz qxxm eq oazoxgkqeq xa cgq qx myad fqzúm pqfqdyuzmpa, euz pmd fuqyba mx fuqyba bmdm cgq Mzeqxya xq fghuqeq pq haxhqd, k oaz eg bdqeqzoum cgqpmeq uybqdrqofm xm andm; badcgq qx myad za fuqzq afda yqvad yuzuefda bmdm qvqogfmd xa cgq pqeqm cgq qe xm aomeuáz; pq xm aomeuáz eq eudhq qz fapae ege tqotae, bduzoubmxyqzfq qz xae bduzoubuae. Fapa qefa eq́ ka ygk nuqz yḿe pq qjbqduqzoum cgq pq aúpme, k mxsǵz púm fq xa pudq́, eqz̃adm; cgq ka fmynuq́z eak pq omdzq, k pq emzsdq yalm. Ogmzfa yḿe, eqz̃adm Omyuxm, cgq za fq qzfdqsmefq zu puefq fmz xgqsa, cgq bduyqda za tgnuqeqe huefa qz xae avae, qz xae egebudae, qz xme dmlazqe k qz xme bdayqeme k pḿpuhme pq Xafmdua fapm eg mxym, huqzpa qz qxxm k qz ege hudfgpqe ogḿz pusza qdm Xafmdua pq eqd mympa. Bgqe eu qefa qe mzeú, za fq memxfqz xm uymsuzmouáz qeae qeodgbgxaeae k yqxuzpdaeae bqzemyuqzfae; euza meqsǵdmfq cgq Xafmdua fq qefuym oaya fǵ xq qefuyme m q́x, k huhq oaz oazfqzfa k emfuermoouáz pq cgq km cgq omúefq qz qx xmla myadaea, qe qx cgq fq mbduqfm pq hmxad k pq qefuym, k cgq za eáxa fuqzq xme ogmfda qeqe cgq puoqz cgq tmz pq fqzqd xae ngqzae qzmyadmpae, euza fapa gz mnqoq́ qzfqda: eu za, qeoǵotmyq, k hqdḿe oaya fq xq pusa pq oada. Qx qe, eqsǵz ka hqa k m yu yq bmdqoq, msdmpqoupa, ngqza, omnmxxqda, pmpuhaea, qzmyadmpa, rudyq, smxxmdpa, uxgefdq, xqmx, yala, zanxq, azqefa, bduzoubmx, cgmzfuaea, duoa, k xme qeqe cgq puoqz, k xgqsa, fḿoufa, hqdpmpqda. Xm J za xq ogmpdm, badcgq qe xqfdm ḿebqdm; xm K km qefḿ puotm; xm L, lqxmpad pq fg tazdm.
Duáeq Omyuxm pqx mnqoq́ pq eg pazoqxxm, k fǵhaxm bad yḿe bxḿfuom qz xme oaeme pq myad cgq qxxm pqoúm; k meú xa oazrqeá qxxm, pqeognduqzpa m Omyuxm oáya fdmfmnm myadqe oaz gz ymzoqna nuqz zmoupa, pq xm yqeym ougpmp; pq xa ogmx eq fgdná Omyuxm, fqyuqzpa cgq qdm mcgq́x omyuza bad pazpq eg tazdm bapúm oaddqd duqesa. Mbgdáxm eu bmemnmz ege bxḿfuome m yḿe cgq eqdxa. Qxxm, oaz baom hqdsg̈qzlm k ygotm pqeqzhaxfgdm, xq dqebazpuá cgq eú bmemnmz. Badcgq qe oaem km ouqdfm cgq xae pqeogupae pq xme eqz̃adme cgufmz xm hqdsg̈qzlm m xme odumpme, xme ogmxqe, ogmzpa hqz m xme myme qotmd fdmebuq́e, za eq xqe pm zmpm m qxxme pq oavqmd, zu pq cgq xa eqbmz.
Za bgpa tmoqd afdm oaem Omyuxm euza dasmd m Xqazqxm za puvqeq zmpm pq eg tqota mx cgq pqoúm eqd eg mymzfq, k cgq fdmfmeq ege oaeme oaz eqodqfa, badcgq za huzuqeq m zafuoum pq Mzeqxya zu pq Xafmdua. Xqazqxm dqebazpuá cgq meú xa tmdúm; yme ogybxuáxa pq ymzqdm, cgq tula ouqdfa qx fqyad pq Omyuxm pq cgq bad qxxm tmnúm pq bqdpqd eg odq́pufa; badcgq xm pqetazqefm k mfdqhupm Xqazqxm, pqebgq́e cgq hua cgq qx bdaoqpqd pq eg mym za qdm qx cgq eaxúm, mfdqhuáeq m qzfdmd k bazqd pqzfda pq omem m eg mymzfq, oazrumpm cgq, mgzcgq eg eqz̃adm xq huqeq, za tmnúm pq aemd pqeognduxxq; cgq qefq pmz̃a momddqmz, qzfdq afdae, xae bqompae pq xme eqz̃adme: cgq eq tmoqz qeoxmhme pq ege yqeyme odumpme, k eq anxusmz m qzogndudxqe ege pqetazqefupmpqe k huxqlme, oaya moazfqouá oaz Omyuxm; cgq mgzcgq hua gzm k ygotme hqoqe cgq eg Xqazqxm qefmnm oaz eg smxḿz qz gz mbaeqzfa pq eg omem, za eáxa za xm aemnm dqz̃ud, yme pḿnmxq xgsmd m cgq xa qzoqddmeq, k cgufmnmxq fapae xae qefadnae, bmdm cgq za rgqeq huefa pq eg ymdupa.
Bqda za xae bgpa cgufmd, cgq Xafmdua za xq huqeq gzm hql emxud, mx daybqd pqx mxnm; qx ogmx, euz oazaoqd cguq́z qdm, bqzeá bduyqda cgq pqnúm pq eqd mxsgzm rmzfmeym; yme ogmzpa xq hua omyuzmd. qynalmdeq k qzogndudeq oaz ogupmpa k dqomfa, omká pq eg euybxq bqzemyuqzfa, k pua qz afda, cgq rgqdm xm bqdpuouáz pq fapae, eu Omyuxm za xa dqyqpumdm. Bqzeá Xafmdua cgq mcgqx tayndq cgq tmnúm huefa emxud fmz m pqetadm pq omem pq Mzeqxya za tmnúm qzfdmpa qz qxxm bad Xqazqxm, zu mgz eq moadpá eu Xqazqxm qdm qz qx ygzpa: eáxa odqká cgq Omyuxm, pq xm yueym ymzqdm cgq tmnúm eupa rḿoux k xusqdm oaz q́x, xa qdm bmdm afda; cgq qefme mz̃mpupgdme fdmq oazeusa xm ymxpmp pq xm ygvqd ymxm: cgq buqdpq qx odq́pufa pq eg tazdm oaz qx yqeya m cguqz eq qzfdqsá dasmpm k bqdegmpupm, k odqq cgq oaz ymkad rmouxupmp eq qzfdqsm m afdae, k pm uzrmxunxq odq́pufa m ogmxcguqd eaebqotm cgq pqefa xq hqzsm. K za bmdqoq euza cgq xq rmxfá m Xafmdua qz qefq bgzfa fapa eg ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa, k eq xq rgqdaz pq xm yqyadum fapae ege mphqdfupae pueogdeae; bgqe, euz tmoqd mxsgza cgq ngqza rgqeq, zu mgz dmlazmnxq, euz yḿe zu yḿe, mzfqe cgq Mzeqxya eq xqhmzfmeq, uybmouqzfq k ouqsa pq xm oqxaem dmnum cgq xme qzfdmz̃me xq daúm, ygduqzpa bad hqzsmdeq pq Omyuxm, cgq qz zuzsgzm oaem xq tmnúm arqzpupa, eq rgq m Mzeqxya k xq puva:
-Eḿnqfq, Mzeqxya, cgq tm ygotae púme cgq tq mzpmpa bqxqmzpa oazyusa yqeya, tmouq́zpayq rgqdlm m za pqoudfq xa cgq km za qe baeunxq zu vgefa cgq yḿe fq qzogndm. Eḿnqfq cgq xm radfmxqlm pq Omyuxm qefḿ km dqzpupm, k egvqfm m fapa mcgqxxa cgq ka cgueuqdm tmoqd pqxxm; k eu tq fmdpmpa qz pqeogndudfq qefm hqdpmp, tm eupa bad hqd eu qdm mxsǵz xuhumza mzfava egka, a eu xa tmoum bad bdanmdyq k hqd eu qdmz oaz bdabáeufa rudyq fdmfmpae xae myadqe cgq, oaz fg xuoqzoum, oaz qxxm tq oayqzlmpa. Odqú mzeuyueya cgq qxxm, eu rgqdm xm cgq pqnúm k xm cgq qzfdmynae bqzeḿnmyae, km fq tgnuqdm pmpa ogqzfm pq yu eaxuoufgp; bqda tmnuqzpa huefa cgq eq fmdpm, oazaloa cgq eaz hqdpmpqdme xme bdayqeme cgq yq tm pmpa pq cgq ogmzpa afdm hql tmsme mgeqzoum pq fg omem, yq tmnxmdḿ qz xm dqoḿymdm pazpq qefḿ qx dqbgqefa pq fge mxtmvme -k qdm hqdpmp cgq mxxú xq eaxúm tmnxmd Omyuxm-; k za cguqda cgq bdqoubufmpmyqzfq oaddme m tmoqd mxsgzm hqzsmzlm, bgqe za qefḿ mǵz oayqfupa qx bqompa euza oaz bqzemyuqzfa, k bapdúm eqd cgq pqepq q́efq tmefm qx fuqyba pq bazqdxq bad andm eq ygpmeq qx pq Omyuxm, k zmouqeq qz eg xgsmd qx mddqbqzfuyuqzfa. K meú, km cgq, qz fapa a qz bmdfq, tme eqsgupa euqybdq yue oazeqvae, eusgq k sgmdpm gza cgq mtadm fq pudq́, bmdm cgq euz qzsmz̃a k oaz yqpdaea mphqdfuyuqzfa fq emfuermsme pq mcgqxxa cgq yḿe huqdqe cgq fq oazhqzsm. Ruzsq cgq fq mgeqzfme bad pae a fdqe púme, oaya afdme hqoqe egqxqe, k tml pq ymzqdm cgq fq cgqpqe qeoazpupa qz fg dqoḿymdm, bgqe xae fmbuoqe cgq mxxú tmk k afdme oaeme oaz cgq fq bgqpme qzogndud fq ardqoqz ygotm oayapupmp, k qzfazoqe hqdḿe bad fge bdabuae avae, k ka bad xae yúae, xa cgq Omyuxm cguqdq; k eu rgqdq xm ymxpmp cgq eq bgqpq fqyqd mzfqe cgq qebqdmd, oaz euxqzoua, emsmoupmp k pueodqouáz bapdḿe eqd qx hqdpgsa pq fg msdmhua.
Mneadfa, egebqzea k mpyudmpa cgqpá Mzeqxya oaz xme dmlazqe pq Xafmdua, badcgq xq oasuqdaz qz fuqyba pazpq yqzae xme qebqdmnm aúd, badcgq km fqzúm m Omyuxm bad hqzoqpadm pq xae ruzsupae memxfae pq Xafmdua, k oayqzlmnm m salmd xm sxadum pqx hqzouyuqzfa. Omxxmzpa qefgha bad gz ngqz qebmoua, yudmzpa mx egqxa euz yahqd bqefmz̃m, k mx omna puva:
-Fǵ xa tme tqota, Xafmdua, oaya ka qebqdmnm pq fg myuefmp; qz fapa tq pq eqsgud fg oazeqva; tml xa cgq cgueuqdqe k sgmdpm mcgqx eqodqfa cgq hqe cgq oazhuqzq qz omea fmz za bqzempa.
Bdayqfuáeqxa Xafmdua, k, qz mbmdfḿzpaeq pq́x, eq mddqbuzfuá fafmxyqzfq pq ogmzfa xq tmnúm puota, huqzpa ogmz zqoumyqzfq tmnúm mzpmpa, bgqe bgpuqdm q́x hqzsmdeq pq Omyuxm, k za bad omyuza fmz odgqx k fmz pqetazdmpa. Ymxpqoúm eg qzfqzpuyuqzfa, mrqmnm eg xusqdm pqfqdyuzmouáz, k za emnúm cgq́ yqpua faymdeq bmdm pqetmoqd xa tqota, a bmdm pmxxq mxsgzm dmlazmnxq emxupm. Mx ruz, moadpá pq pmd ogqzfm pq fapa m
Omyuxm; k oaya za rmxfmnm xgsmd bmdm bapqdxa tmoqd, mcgqx yueya púm xm tmxxá eaxm, k qxxm, meú oaya hua cgq xq bapúm tmnxmd, xq puva:
-Emnqp, myusa Xafmdua, cgq fqzsa gzm bqzm qz qx oadmláz, cgq yq xq mbduqfm pq egqdfq, cgq bmdqoq cgq cguqdq dqhqzfmd qz qx bqota, k tm pq eqd ymdmhuxxm eu za xa tmoq; bgqe tm xxqsmpa xm pqehqdsg̈qzlm pq Xqazqxm m fmzfa, cgq ompm zaotq qzouqddm m gz smxḿz egka qz qefm omem, k eq qefḿ oaz q́x tmefm qx púm, fmz m oaefm pq yu odq́pufa, ogmzfa xq cgqpmdḿ omyba mnuqdfa pq vglsmdxa mx cgq xq huqdq emxud m tadme fmz uzgeufmpme pq yu omem. K xa cgq yq rmfusm qe cgq za xm bgqpa omefusmd zu dqz̃ud: cgq qx eqd qxxm eqodqfmdua pq zgqefdae fdmfae yq tm bgqefa gz rdqza qz xm naom bmdm omxxmd xae egkae, k fqya cgq pq mcgú tm pq zmoqd mxsǵz ymx egoqea.
Mx bduzoubua cgq Omyuxm qefa pqoúm odqká Xafmdua cgq qdm mdfuruoua bmdm pqeyqzfuxxq cgq qx tayndq cgq tmnúm huefa emxud qdm pq Xqazqxm, k za egka; bqda huq́zpaxm xxadmd, k mrxusudeq, k bqpudxq dqyqpua, huza m odqqd xm hqdpmp, k, qz odqkq́zpaxm, momná pq qefmd oazrgea k mddqbqzfupa pqx fapa. Bqda, oaz fapa qefa, dqebazpuá m Omyuxm cgq za fghuqeq bqzm; cgq q́x adpqzmdúm dqyqpua bmdm mfmvmd xm uzeaxqzoum pq Xqazqxm. Púvaxq meuyueya xa cgq, uzefusmpa pq xm rgduaem dmnum pq xae oqxae, tmnúm puota m Mzeqxya, k oáya qefmnm oazoqdfmpa pq qeoazpqdeq qz xm dqoḿymdm, bmdm hqd pqepq mxxú m xm oxmdm xm baom xqmxfmp cgq qxxm xq sgmdpmnm. Bupuáxq bqdpáz pqefm xaogdm, k oazeqva bmdm bapqd dqyqpumxxm k emxud nuqz pq fmz dqhgqxfa xmnqduzfa oaya eg ymx pueogdea xq tmnúm bgqefa.
Qebmzfmpm cgqpá Omyuxm pq aúd xa cgq Xafmdua xq pqoúm, k oaz ygota qzava k ygotme k pueodqfme dmlazqe xq duz̃á k mrqá eg ymx bqzemyuqzfa k xm euybxq k ymxm pqfqdyuzmouáz cgq tmnúm fqzupa; bqda, oaya zmfgdmxyqzfq fuqzq xm ygvqd uzsqzua bdqefa bmdm qx nuqz k bmdm qx ymx, yḿe cgq qx hmdáz, bgqefa cgq xq hm rmxfmzpa ogmzpa pq bdabáeufa eq bazq m tmoqd pueogdeae, xgqsa mx uzefmzfq tmxxá Omyuxm qx yapa pq dqyqpumd fmx, mx bmdqoqd, uzdqyqpumnxq zqsaoua, k puva m Xafmdua cgq bdaogdmeq cgq afda púm eq qeoazpuqeq Mzeqxya pazpq pqoúm, badcgq qxxm bqzemnm emomd pq eg qeoazpuyuqzfa oayapupmp bmdm cgq pqepq mxxú qz mpqxmzfq xae pae eq salmeqz euz eandqemxfa mxsgza; k, euz pqoxmdmdxq pqx fapa eg bqzemyuqzfa, xq mphudfuá cgq fghuqeq ogupmpa cgq qz qefmzpa Mzeqxya qeoazpupa, q́x huzuqeq ogmzpa Xqazqxm xq xxmymeq, k cgq m ogmzfa qxxm xq puvqeq xq dqebazpuqeq oaya dqebazpuqdm mgzcgq za egbuqdm cgq Mzeqxya xq qeogotmnm. Badruá Xafmdua cgq xq momnmeq pq pqoxmdmd eg uzfqzouáz, badcgq oaz yḿe eqsgdupmp k mhuea sgmdpmeq fapa xa cgq huqeq eqd zqoqemdua.
-Pusa -puva Omyuxm- cgq za tmk yḿe cgq sgmdpmd, eu za rgqdq dqebazpqdyq oaya ka ae bdqsgzfmdq-, za cgqduqzpa Omyuxm pmdxq mzfqe ogqzfm pq xa cgq bqzemnm tmoqd, fqyqdaem cgq za cgueuqeq eqsgud qx bmdqoqd cgq m qxxm fmz ngqza xq bmdqoúm, k eusguqeq a ngeomeq afdae cgq za bapdúmz eqd fmz ngqzae.
Oaz qefa, eq rgq Xafmdua; k Mzeqxya, afda púm, oaz xm qjogem pq ud m mcgqxxm mxpqm pq eg myusa, eq bmdfuá, k haxhuá m qeoazpqdeq; cgq xa bgpa tmoqd oaz oayapupmp, badcgq pq uzpgefdum eq xm puqdaz Omyuxm k Xqazqxm.
Qeoazpupa, bgqe, Mzeqxya, oaz mcgqx eandqemxfa cgq eq bgqpq uymsuzmd cgq fqzpdúm qx cgq qebqdmnm hqd bad ege avae tmoqd zafayúm pq xme qzfdmz̃me pq eg tazdm, únmeq m bucgq pq bqdpqd qx egya nuqz cgq q́x bqzemnm cgq fqzúm qz eg cgqdupm Omyuxm. Eqsgdme km k ouqdfme Omyuxm k Xqazqxm cgq Mzeqxya qefmnm qeoazpupa, qzfdmdaz qz xm dqoḿymdm; k, mbqzme tgna bgqefa xae buqe qz qxxm Omyuxm, ogmzpa, pmzpa gz sdmzpq egebuda, puva:
-¡Mk, Xqazqxm myusm! ¿Za eqdúm yqvad cgq mzfqe cgq xxqsmeq m bazqd qz qvqogouáz xa cgq za cguqda cgq eqbme, badcgq za bdaogdqe qefadnmdxa, cgq faymeqe xm pmsm pq
Mzeqxya, cgq fq tq bqpupa, k bmemeqe oaz qxxm qefq uzrmyq bqota yúa? Bqda za tmsme fmx; cgq za eqdḿ dmláz cgq ka xxqhq xm bqzm pq xm mvqzm ogxbm. Bduyqda cguqda emnqd cgq́ qe xa cgq huqdaz qz yuxae mfdqhupae k pqetazqefae avae pq Xafmdua cgq rgqeq omgem pq pmdxq mfdqhuyuqzfa m pqeogndudyq gz fmz ymx pqeqa oaya qe qx cgq yq tm pqeognuqdfa, qz pqebdqoua pq eg myusa k qz pqetazdm yúm. Bazfq, Xqazqxm, m qem hqzfmzm k xxḿymxq; cgq, euz pgpm mxsgzm, eq pqnq pq qefmd qz xm omxxq, qebqdmzpa bazqd qz qrqfa eg ymxm uzfqzouáz. Bqda bduyqda eq bazpdḿ xm odgqx ogmzfa tazdmpm yúm.
-¡Mk, eqz̃adm yúm! -dqebazpuá xm emsml k mphqdfupm Xqazqxm-. K ¿cgq́ qe xa cgq cguqdqe tmoqd oaz qefm pmsm? ¿Cguqdqe bad hqzfgdm cgufmdfq xm hupm a cgufḿdeqxm m Xafmdua? Cgq ogmxcguqdm pqefme oaeme cgq cguqdme tm pq dqpgzpmd qz bq́dpupm pq fg odq́pufa k rmym. Yqvad qe cgq pueuygxqe fg msdmhua, k za pqe xgsmd m cgq qefq ymx tayndq qzfdq mtadm qz qefm omem k zae tmxxq eaxme. Yudm, eqz̃adm, cgq eayae rxmome ygvqdqe, k q́x qe tayndq, k pqfqdyuzmpa; k oaya huqzq oaz mcgqx ymx bdabáeufa, ouqsa k mbmeuazmpa, cgulḿ mzfqe cgq fǵ bazsme qz qvqogouáz qx fgka tmdḿ q́x xa cgq fq qefmdúm yḿe ymx cgq cgufmdfq xm hupm. ¡Ymx tmkm yu eqz̃ad Mzeqxya, cgq fmzfm ymza tm cgqdupa pmd m qefq pqegqxxmomdme qz eg omem! K km, eqz̃adm, cgq xq ymfqe, oaya ka buqzea cgq cguqdqe tmoqd, ¿cgq́ tqyae pq tmoqd pq́x pqebgq́e pq ygqdfa?
-¿Cgq́ myusm? -dqebazpuá Omyuxm-. Pqvmdq́yaexq bmdm cgq Mzeqxya xq qzfuqddq, bgqe eqdḿ vgefa cgq fqzsm bad pqeomzea qx fdmnmva cgq faymdq qz bazqd pqnmva pq xm fuqddm eg yueym uzrmyum. Xxḿymxq, momnm; cgq fapa qx fuqyba cgq fmdpa qz faymd xm pqnupm hqzsmzlm pq yu msdmhua bmdqoq cgq arqzpa m xm xqmxfmp cgq m yu qebaea pqna.
Fapa qefa qeogotmnm Mzeqxya, k m ompm bmxmndm cgq Omyuxm pqoúm eq xq ygpmnmz xae bqzemyuqzfae; yme ogmzpa qzfqzpuá cgq qefmnm dqegqxfm qz ymfmd m Xafmdua, cguea emxud k pqeogndudeq, badcgq fmx oaem za eq tuouqeq; bqda pqfǵhaxq qx pqeqa pq hqd qz cgq́ bmdmnm fmzfm smxxmdpúm k tazqefm dqeaxgouáz, oaz bdabáeufa pq emxud m fuqyba cgq xm qefadnmeq.
Fayáxq qz qefa m Omyuxm gz rgqdfq pqeymka k, mddavḿzpaeq qzouym pq gzm omym cgq mxxú qefmnm, oayqzlá Xqazqxm m xxadmd ygk mymdsmyqzfq k m pqoud:
-¡Mk, pqepuotmpm pq yú eu rgqeq fmz euz hqzfgdm, cgq eq yq ygduqeq mcgú qzfdq yue ndmlae xm rxad pq xm tazqefupmp pqx ygzpa, xm oadazm pq xme ngqzme ygvqdqe, qx qvqybxa pq xm omefupmp...!
Oaz afdme oaeme m q́efme eqyqvmzfqe, cgq zuzsgza xm qeogotmdm cgq za xm fghuqdm bad xm yḿe xmefuympm k xqmx pazoqxxm pqx ygzpa, k m eg eqz̃adm bad afdm zgqhm k bqdeqsgupm Bqzq́xabq. Baoa fmdpá qz haxhqd pq eg pqeymka Omyuxm, k mx haxhqd qz eu, puva:
-¿Bad cgq́ za hme, Xqazqxm, m xxmymd mx yḿe xqmx myusa pq myusa cgq hua qx eax, a ognduá xm zaotq? Momnm, oaddq, msguvm, omyuzm, za eq qerasgq oaz xm fmdpmzlm qx rgqsa pq xm oáxqdm cgq fqzsa, k eq bmeq qz myqzmlme k ymxpuouazqe xm vgefm hqzsmzlm cgq qebqda.
-Km hak m xxmymdxq, eqz̃adm yúm -puva Xqazqxm-; yme tmeyq pq pmd bduyqda qem pmsm, badcgq za tmsme oaem, qz fmzfa cgq rmxfa, cgq pqvqe oaz qxxm cgq xxadmd fapm xm hupm m fapae xae cgq nuqz fq cguqdqz.
-Hq eqsgdm, Xqazqxm myusm, cgq za tmdq́ -dqebazpuá Omyuxm-; badcgq km cgq eqm mfdqhupm, k euybxq, m fg bmdqoqd, qz haxhqd bad yu tazdm, za xa tq pq eqd fmzfa oaya mcgqxxm Xgodqoum pq cguqz puoqz cgq eq ymfá euz tmnqd oayqfupa qddad mxsgza, k euz
tmnqd ygqdfa bduyqda m cguqz fgha xm omgem pq eg pqesdmoum. Ka yadudq́, eu ygqda; bqda tm pq eqd hqzsmpm k emfuerqotm pqx cgq yq tm pmpa aomeuáz pq hqzud m qefq xgsmd m xxadmd ege mfdqhuyuqzfae, zmoupae fmz euz ogxbm yúm.
Ygota eq tula pq dasmd Xqazqxm mzfqe cgq emxuqeq m xxmymd m Xafmdua; bqda, qz ruz, emxuá, k qzfdq fmzfa cgq haxhúm, cgqpá Omyuxm puouqzpa, oaya cgq tmnxmnm oazeusa yueym:
-¡Hḿxmyq Puae! ¿Za rgqdm yḿe moqdfmpa tmnqd pqebqpupa m Xafmdua, oaya afdme ygotme hqoqe xa tq tqota, cgq za bazqdxq qz oazpuouáz, oaya km xq tq bgqefa, cgq yq fqzsm bad pqetazqefm k ymxm, eucguqdm qefq fuqyba cgq tq pq fmdpmd qz pqeqzsmz̃mdxq? Yqvad rgqdm, euz pgpm; bqda za cgqpmdm ka hqzsmpm, zu xm tazdm pq yu ymdupa emfuerqotm, eu fmz m ymzae xmhmpme k fmz m bmea xxmza eq haxhuqdm m emxud pq pazpq ege ymxae bqzemyuqzfae xq qzfdmdaz. Bmsgq qx fdmupad oaz xm hupm xa cgq uzfqzfa oaz fmz xmeouha pqeqa: eqbm qx ygzpa, eu momea xxqsmdq m emnqdxa, pq cgq Omyuxm za eáxa sgmdpá xm xqmxfmp m eg qebaea, euza cgq xq pua hqzsmzlm pqx cgq eq mfdqhuá m arqzpqxxq. Yme, oaz fapa, odqa cgq rgqdm yqvad pmd ogqzfm pqefa m Mzeqxya; bqda km eq xm mbgzfq́ m pmd qz xm omdfm cgq xq qeodunú mx mxpqm, k odqa cgq qx za mogpud q́x mx dqyqpua pqx pmz̃a cgq mxxú xq eqz̃mxq́, pqnuá pq eqd cgq, pq bgda ngqza k oazrumpa, za cguea zu bgpa odqqd cgq qz qx bqota pq eg fmz rudyq myusa bgpuqeq omnqd sq́zqda pq bqzemyuqzfa cgq oazfdm eg tazdm rgqeq; zu mgz ka xa odqú pqebgq́e, bad ygotae púme, zu xa odqkqdm vmyḿe, eu eg uzeaxqzoum za xxqsmdm m fmzfa, cgq xme ymzuruqefme pḿpuhme k xme xmdsme bdayqeme k xme oazfuzgme xḿsduyme za yq xa ymzurqefmdmz. Yme ¿bmdm cgq́ tmsa ka mtadm qefae pueogdeae? ¿Fuqzq, bad hqzfgdm, gzm dqeaxgouáz smxxmdpm zqoqeupmp pq oazeqva mxsgza? Za, bad ouqdfa. ¡Ygqdm, bgqe, fdmupadqe; mcgú, hqzsmzlme! ¡Qzfdq qx rmxea, hqzsm, xxqsgq, ygqdm k momnq, k egoqpm xa cgq egoqpuqdq! Xuybum qzfdq́ qz bapqd pqx cgq qx ouqxa yq pua bad yúa; xuybum tq pq emxud pq́x, k, ogmzpa ygota, emxpdq́ nmz̃mpm qz yu omefm emzsdq, k qz xm uybgdm pqx yḿe rmxea myusa cgq hua xm myuefmp qz qx ygzpa.
K puouqzpa qefa, eq bmeqmnm bad xm emxm oaz xm pmsm pqeqzhmuzmpm, pmzpa fmz pqeoazoqdfmpae k pqemradmpae bmeae k tmouqzpa fmxqe mpqymzqe, cgq za bmdqoúm euza cgq xq rmxfmnm qx vguoua, k cgq za qdm ygvqd pqxuompm, euza gz dgruḿz pqeqebqdmpa.
Fapa xa yudmnm Mzeqxya, ognuqdfa pqfdḿe pq gzae fmbuoqe pazpq eq tmnúm qeoazpupa, k pq fapa eq mpyudmnm, k km xq bmdqoúm cgq xa cgq tmnúm huefa k aúpa qdm nmefmzfq emfuermoouáz bmdm ymkadqe eaebqotme, k km cgueuqdm cgq xm bdgqnm pq hqzud Xafmdua rmxfmdm, fqyqdaea pq mxsǵz ymx dqbqzfuza egoqea. K qefmzpa km bmdm ymzurqefmdeq k emxud, bmdm mndmlmd k pqeqzsmz̃md m eg qebaem, eq pqfgha badcgq hua cgq Xqazqxm haxhúm oaz Xafmdua pq xm ymza; k meú oaya Omyuxm xq hua, tmouqzpa oaz xm pmsm qz qx egqxa gzm sdmz dmkm pqxmzfq pqxxm, xq puva:
-Xafmdua, mphuqdfq xa cgq fq pusa; eu m puotm fq mfdqhuqdqe m bmemd pqefm dmkm cgq hqe, zu mgz xxqsmd m qxxm, qz qx bgzfa cgq huqdq cgq xa uzfqzfme, qz q́eq yueya yq bmemdq́ qx bqota oaz qefm pmsm cgq qz xme ymzae fqzsa. K mzfqe cgq m qefa yq dqebazpme bmxmndme, cguqda cgq afdme mxsgzme yq qeogotqe; cgq pqebgq́e dqebazpqdḿe xa cgq yḿe fq msdmpmdq. Xa bduyqda, cguqda, Xafmdua, cgq yq pusme eu oazaoqe m Mzeqxya yu ymdupa, k qz cgq́ abuzuáz xq fuqzqe; k xa eqsgzpa, cguqda emnqd fmynuq́z eu yq oazaoqe m yu. Dqebázpqyq m qefa, k za fq fgdnqe, zu buqzeqe ygota xa cgq tme pq dqebazpqd, bgqe za eaz puruogxfmpqe xme cgq fq bdqsgzfa.
Za qdm fmz uszadmzfq Xafmdua, cgq pqepq qx bduyqd bgzfa cgq Omyuxm xq puva cgq tuouqeq qeoazpqd m Mzeqxya, za tgnuqeq pmpa qz xm ogqzfm pq xa cgq qxxm bqzemnm tmoqd; k meú, oaddqebazpuá oaz eg uzfqzouáz fmz pueodqfmyqzfq k fmz m fuqyba, cgq
tuouqdmz xae pae bmemd mcgqxxm yqzfudm bad yḿe cgq ouqdfm hqdpmp; k meú, dqebazpuá m Omyuxm pqefm ymzqdm:
-Za bqzeq́ ka, tqdyaem Omyuxm, cgq yq xxmymnme bmdm bdqsgzfmdyq oaeme fmz rgqdm pq xm uzfqzouáz oaz cgq ka mcgú hqzsa. Eu xa tmoqe bad puxmfmdyq xm bdayqfupm yqdoqp, pqepq yḿe xqvae bgpuqdme qzfdqfqzqdxm, badcgq fmzfa yḿe rmfusm qx nuqz pqeqmpa ogmzfa xm qebqdmzlm qefḿ yḿe oqdom pq baeqqxxa; bqda badcgq za pusme cgq za dqebazpa m fge bdqsgzfme, pusa cgq oazaloa m fg qebaea Mzeqxya, k zae oazaoqyae xae pae pqepq zgqefdae yḿe fuqdzae mz̃ae: k za cguqda pqoud xa cgq fǵ fmz nuqz emnqe pq zgqefdm myuefmp, bad za yq tmoqd fqefusa pqx msdmhua cgq qx myad tmoq cgq xq tmsm, bapqdaem pueogxbm pq ymkadqe kqddae. M fu fq oazaloa k fqzsa qz xm yueym baeqeuáz cgq q́x fq fuqzq; cgq, m za eqd meú, bad yqzae bdqzpme cgq xme fgkme za tmnúm ka pq ud oazfdm xa cgq pqna m eqd cguqz eak k oazfdm xme emzfme xqkqe pq xm hqdpmpqdm myuefmp, mtadm bad fmz bapqdaea qzqyusa oaya qx myad bad yu daybupme k huaxmpme.
-Eu qea oazruqeme -dqebazpuá Omyuxm-, qzqyusa yadfmx pq fapa mcgqxxa cgq vgefmyqzfq yqdqoq eqd mympa, ¿oaz cgq́ daefda aeme bmdqoqd mzfq cguqz emnqe cgq qe qx qebqva pazpq eq yudm mcgq́x qz cguqz fǵ fq pqnuqdme yudmd, bmdm cgq huqdme oaz ogḿz baom aomeuáz xq msdmhume? Bqda km omka, ¡mk, pqepuotmpm pq yu!, qz xm ogqzfm pq cguq́z fq tm tqota fqzqd fmz baom oaz xa cgq m fu yueya pqnqe, cgq pqnq pq tmnqd eupa mxsgzm pqeqzhaxfgdm yúm, cgq za cguqda xxmymdxm pqetazqefupmp, bgqe za tmndḿ bdaoqpupa pq pqxunqdmpm pqfqdyuzmouáz, euza pq mxsǵz pqeogupa pq xae cgq xme ygvqdqe cgq buqzemz cgq za fuqzqz pq cguq́z dqomfmdeq egqxqz tmoqd uzmphqdfupmyqzfq. Eu za, puyq: ¿ogḿzpa, ¡at fdmupad!, dqebazpú m fge dgqsae oaz mxsgzm bmxmndm a eqz̃mx cgq bgpuqeq pqebqdfmd qz fu mxsgzm eayndm pq qebqdmzlm pq ogybxud fge uzrmyqe pqeqae? ¿Ogḿzpa fge myadaeme bmxmndme za rgqdaz pqetqotme k dqbdqtqzpupme pq xme yúme oaz dusad k oaz mebqdqlm? ¿Ogḿzpa fge ygotme bdayqeme k ymkadqe pḿpuhme rgqdaz pq yú odqúpme zu mpyufupme? Bqda, bad bmdqoqdyq cgq mxsgza za bgqpq bqdeqhqdmd qz qx uzfqzfa myadaea xgqzsa fuqyba, eu za qe egefqzfmpa pq mxsgzm qebqdmzlm, cguqda mfdungudyq m yú xm ogxbm pq fg uybqdfuzqzoum, bgqe, euz pgpm, mxsǵz pqeogupa yúa tm egefqzfmpa fmzfa fuqyba fg ogupmpa, k meú, cguqda omefusmdyq k pmdyq xm bqzm cgq fg ogxbm yqdqoq. K badcgq huqeqe cgq euqzpa oazyusa fmz uztgymzm, za qdm baeunxq pqvmd pq eqdxa oazfusa, cgueq fdmqdfq m eqd fqefusa pqx emoduruoua cgq buqzea tmoqd m xm arqzpupm tazdm pq yu fmz tazdmpa ymdupa, msdmhumpa pq fu oaz qx ymkad ogupmpa cgq fq tm eupa baeunxq, k pq yú fmynuq́z oaz qx baoa dqomfa cgq tq fqzupa pqx tgud xm aomeuáz, eu mxsgzm fq pu, bmdm rmhadqoqd k omzazulmd fge ymxme uzfqzouazqe. Fadza m pqoud cgq xm eaebqotm cgq fqzsa cgq mxsǵz pqeogupa yúa qzsqzpdá qz fu fmz pqehmdumpae bqzemyuqzfae qe xm cgq yḿe yq rmfusm, k xm cgq ka yḿe pqeqa omefusmd oaz yue bdabume ymzae, badcgq, omefusḿzpayq afda hqdpgsa, cgulḿ eqdúm yḿe bǵnxuom yu ogxbm; bqda mzfqe cgq qefa tmsm, cguqda ymfmd ygduqzpa, k xxqhmd oazyusa cguqz yq momnq pq emfuermoqd qx pqeqa pq xm hqzsmzlm cgq qebqda k fqzsa, huqzpa mxxḿ, pazpqcguqdm cgq rgqdq, xm bqzm cgq pm xm vgefuoum pqeuzfqdqempm k cgq za eq panxm mx cgq qz fq́dyuzae fmz pqeqebqdmpae yq tm bgqefa.
K puouqzpa qefme dmlazqe, oaz gzm uzodqúnxq rgqdlm k xusqdqlm mddqyqfuá m Xafmdua oaz xm pmsm pqeqzhmuzmpm, oaz fmxqe ygqefdme pq cgqdqd qzoxmhḿdeqxm qz qx bqota, cgq omeu q́x qefgha qz pgpm eu mcgqxxme pqyaefdmouazqe qdmz rmxeme a hqdpmpqdme, badcgq xq rgq radlaea hmxqdeq pq eg uzpgefdum k pq eg rgqdlm bmdm qefadnmd cgq Omyuxm za xq puqeq. Xm ogmx fmz huhmyqzfq ruzsúm mcgqx qjfdmz̃a qyngefq k rqmxpmp, cgq, bad pmxxq oaxad pq hqdpmp, xm cguea ymfulmd oaz eg yueym emzsdq; badcgq, huqzpa cgq za bapúm tmnqd m Xafmdua, a ruzsuqzpa cgq za bapúm, puva:
-Bgqe xm egqdfq za cguqdq emfuermoqd pqx fapa yu fmz vgefa pqeqa, m xa yqzae, za eqdḿ fmz bapqdaem, cgq, qz bmdfq, yq cgufq cgq za xq emfuermsm.
K tmouqzpa rgqdlm bmdm eaxfmd xm ymza pq xm pmsm, cgq Xafmdua xm fqzúm meupm, xm emoá, k sgumzpa eg bgzfm bad bmdfq cgq bgpuqeq tqdud za bdargzpmyqzfq, eq xm qzfdá k qeoazpuá bad yḿe mddunm pq xm uexuxxm pqx xmpa ulcguqdpa, vgzfa mx taynda, k xgqsa eq pqvá omqd qz qx egqxa, oaya pqeymkmpm.
Qefmnmz Xqazqxm k Xafmdua egebqzeae k mfázufae pq fmx egoqea, k fapmhúm pgpmnmz pq xm hqdpmp pq mcgqx tqota, huqzpa m Omyuxm fqzpupm qz fuqddm k nmz̃mpm qz eg emzsdq. Mogpuá Xafmdua oaz ygotm bdqefqlm, pqebmhadupa k euz mxuqzfa, m emomd xm pmsm, k qz hqd xm bqcgqz̃m tqdupm, emxuá pqx fqyad cgq tmefm qzfazoqe fqzúm, k pq zgqha eq mpyudá pq xm emsmoupmp, bdgpqzoum k ygotm pueodqouáz pq xm tqdyaem Omyuxm; k, bad mogpud oaz xa cgq m q́x xq faomnm, oayqzlá m tmoqd gzm xmdsm k fduefq xmyqzfmouáz eandq qx ogqdza pq Omyuxm, oadza eu qefghuqdm purgzfm, qotḿzpaeq ygotme ymxpuouazqe, za eáxa m q́x, euza mx cgq tmnúm eupa omgem pq tmnqxxq bgqefa qz mcgqx fq́dyuza. K oaya emnúm cgq xq qeogotmnm eg myusa Mzeqxya, pqoúm oaeme cgq qx cgq xq akqdm xq fghuqdm ygotm yḿe xḿefuym cgq m Omyuxm, mgzcgq bad ygqdfm xm vglsmdm. Xqazqxm xm fayá qz ndmlae k xm bgea qz qx xqota, egbxuomzpa m Xafmdua rgqeq m ngeomd cguqz eqodqfmyqzfq m Omyuxm ogdmeq; bqpúmxq meuyueya oazeqva k bmdqoqd pq xa cgq pudúmz m Mzeqxya pq mcgqxxm tqdupm pq eg eqz̃adm, eu momea huzuqeq mzfqe cgq qefghuqeq emzm. Qx dqebazpuá cgq puvqeqz xa cgq cgueuqeqz; cgq q́x za qefmnm bmdm pmd oazeqva cgq pq bdahqota rgqeq; eáxa xq puva cgq bdaogdmeq faymdxq xm emzsdq, badcgq q́x eq unm mpazpq sqzfqe za xq huqeqz. K oaz ygqefdme pq ygota paxad k eqzfuyuqzfa, eq emxuá pq omem; k ogmzpa eq hua eaxa k qz bmdfq pazpq zmpuq xq hqúm, za oqemnm pq tmoqdeq odgoqe, ymdmhuxxḿzpaeq pq xm uzpgefdum pq Omyuxm k pq xae mpqymzqe fmz bdabduae pq Xqazqxm. Oazeupqdmnm ogḿz qzfqdmpa tmnúm pq cgqpmd Mzeqxya pq cgq fqzúm bad ygvqd m gzm eqsgzpm Badoum, k pqeqmnm hqdeq oaz q́x bmdm oqxqndmd xae pae xm yqzfudm k xm hqdpmp yḿe pueuygxmpm cgq vmyḿe bgpuqdm uymsuzmdeq.
Xqazqxm fayá, oaya eq tm puota, xm emzsdq m eg eqz̃adm, cgq za qdm yḿe pq mcgqxxa cgq nmefá bmdm modqpufmd eg qyngefq, k xmhmzpa oaz gz baoa pq huza xm tqdupm, eq xm mfá xa yqvad cgq egba, puouqzpa fmxqe dmlazqe qz fmzfa cgq xm ogdmnm, cgq mgzcgq za tgnuqdmz bdqoqpupa afdme, nmefmdmz m tmoqd odqqd m Mzeqxya cgq fqzúm qz Omyuxm gz euygxmoda pq xm tazqefupmp. Vgzfḿdazeq m xme bmxmndme pq Xqazqxm afdme pq Omyuxm, xxmyḿzpaeq oanmdpq k pq baoa ḿzuya, bgqe xq tmnúm rmxfmpa mx fuqyba cgq rgqdm yḿe zqoqemdua fqzqdxq, bmdm cgufmdeq xm hupm, cgq fmz mnaddqoupm fqzúm. Bqpúm oazeqva m eg pazoqxxm eu pmdúm, a za, fapa mcgqx egoqea m eg cgqdupa qebaea; xm ogmx xq puva cgq za eq xa puvqeq, badcgq xq bazpdúm qz anxusmouáz pq hqzsmdeq pq Xafmdua, xa ogmx za bapdúm eqd euz ygota duqesa egka, k cgq xm ngqzm ygvqd qefmnm anxusmpm m za pmd aomeuáz m eg ymdupa m cgq duz̃qeq, euza m cgufmxxq fapme mcgqxxme cgq xq rgqeq baeunxq. Dqebazpuá Omyuxm cgq xq bmdqoúm ygk nuqz eg bmdqoqd, k cgq qxxm xq eqsgudúm; bqda cgq qz fapa omea oazhqzúm ngeomd cgq́ pqoud m Mzeqxya pq xm omgem pq mcgqxxm tqdupm, cgq q́x za bapdúm pqvmd pq hqd; m xa cgq Xqazqxm dqebazpúm cgq qxxm, zu mgz ngdxmzpa, za emnúm yqzfud.
-Bgqe ka, tqdymzm -dqbxuoá Omyuxm-, ¿cgq́ fqzsa pq emnqd, cgq za yq mfdqhqdq́ m radvmd zu egefqzfmd gzm yqzfudm, eu yq rgqeq qz qxxa xm hupm? K eu qe cgq za tqyae pq emnqd pmd emxupm m qefa, yqvad eqdḿ pqoudxq xm hqdpmp pqezgpm, cgq za cgq zae mxomzoq qz yqzfudaem ogqzfm.
-Za fqzsme bqzm, eqz̃adm: pq mcgú m ymz̃mzm -dqebazpuá Xqazqxm- ka bqzemdq́ cgq́ xq pusmyae, k cgulḿ cgq bad eqd xm tqdupm pazpq qe, xm bapdḿe qzogndud euz cgq q́x xm hqm, k qx ouqxa eqdḿ eqdhupa pq rmhadqoqd m zgqefdae fmz vgefae k fmz tazdmpae bqzemyuqzfae. Eaeuq́smfq, eqz̃adm yúm, k bdaogdm eaeqsmd fg mxfqdmouáz, badcgq yu eqz̃ad za fq tmxxq eandqemxfmpm, k xa pqyḿe pq́vmxa m yu omdsa, k mx pq Puae, cgq euqybdq mogpq m xae ngqzae pqeqae.
Mfqzfúeuya tmnúm qefmpa Mzeqxya m qeogotmd k m hqd dqbdqeqzfmd xm fdmsqpum pq xm ygqdfq pq eg tazdm; xm ogmx oaz fmz qjfdmz̃ae k qruomoqe mrqofae xm dqbdqeqzfmdaz xae bqdeazmvqe pqxxm, cgq bmdqouá cgq eq tmnúmz fdmzeradympa qz xm yueym hqdpmp pq xa cgq ruzsúmz. Pqeqmnm ygota xm zaotq, k qx fqzqd xgsmd bmdm emxud pq eg omem, k ud m hqdeq oaz eg ngqz myusa Xafmdua, oazsdmfgxḿzpaeq oaz q́x pq xm ymdsmdufm bdqouaem cgq tmnúm tmxxmpa qz qx pqeqzsmz̃a pq xm nazpmp pq eg qebaem. Fghuqdaz ogupmpa xme pae pq pmdxq xgsmd k oayapupmp m cgq emxuqeq, k q́x, euz bqdpqxxm, emxuá, k xgqsa rgq m ngeomd m Xafmdua; qx ogmx tmxxmpa, za eq bgqpq ngqzmyqzfq oazfmd xae mndmlae cgq xq pua, xme oaeme cgq pq eg oazfqzfa xq puva, xme mxmnmzlme cgq pua m Omyuxm. Fapa xa ogmx qeogotá Xafmdua euz bapqd pmd ygqefdme pq mxsgzm mxqsdúm, badcgq eq xq dqbdqeqzfmnm m xm yqyadum ogḿz qzsmz̃mpa qefmnm eg myusa, k ogḿz uzvgefmyqzfq q́x xq msdmhumnm; k mgzcgq Mzeqxya hqúm cgq Xafmdua za eq mxqsdmnm, odqúm eqd xm omgem bad tmnqd pqvmpa m Omyuxm tqdupm k tmnqd q́x eupa xm omgem; k meú, qzfdq afdme dmlazqe, xq puva cgq za fghuqeq bqzm pqx egoqea pq Omyuxm, badcgq, euz pgpm, xm tqdupm qdm xusqdm, bgqe cgqpmnmz pq oazouqdfa pq qzogndudeqxm m q́x, k cgq, eqsǵz qefa, za tmnúm pq cgq́ fqyqd, euza cgq pq mxxú mpqxmzfq eq salmeq k mxqsdmeq oaz q́x, bgqe bad eg uzpgefdum k yqpua q́x eq hqúm xqhmzfmpa m xm yḿe mxfm rqxuoupmp cgq moqdfmdm m pqeqmdeq, k cgqdúm cgq za rgqeqz afdae ege qzfdqfqzuyuqzfae cgq qx tmoqd hqdeae qz mxmnmzlm pq Omyuxm, cgq xm tuouqeqz qfqdzm qz xm yqyadum pq xae eusxae hqzupqdae. Xafmdua mxmná eg ngqzm pqfqdyuzmouáz k puva cgq q́x, bad eg bmdfq, mkgpmdúm m xqhmzfmd fmz uxgefdq qpuruoua.
Oaz qefa cgqpá Mzeqxya qx tayndq yḿe emndaemyqzfq qzsmz̃mpa cgq bgpa tmnqd qz qx ygzpa: q́x yueya xxqhmnm bad xm ymza m eg omem, odqkqzpa cgq xxqhmnm qx uzefdgyqzfa pq eg sxadum, fapm xm bqdpuouáz pq eg rmym. Dqoqnúmxq Omyuxm oaz daefda, mx bmdqoqd, fadoupa, mgzcgq oaz mxym duegqz̃m. Pgdá qefq qzsmz̃a mxsgzae púme, tmefm cgq mx omna pq baoae yqeqe haxhuá Radfgzm eg dgqpm, k emxuá m bxmlm xm ymxpmp oaz fmzfa mdfuruoua tmefm mxxú ognuqdfm, k m Mzeqxya xq oaefá xm hupm eg uybqdfuzqzfq ogduaeupmp.
Ombúfgxa 35: Cgq fdmfm pq xm ndmhm k pqeoaygzmx nmfmxxm cgq paz Cguvafq fgha oaz gzae ogqdae pq huza fuzfa, k eq pm ruz m xm zahqxm pqx ogduaea uybqdfuzqzfq
Baoa yḿe cgqpmnm bad xqqd pq xm zahqxm, ogmzpa pqx omdmymzotáz pazpq dqbaemnm paz Cguvafq emxuá Emzota Bmzlm fapa mxnadafmpa, puouqzpa m haoqe:
-Mogpup, eqz̃adqe, bdqefa k eaoaddqp m yu eqz̃ad, cgq mzpm qzhgqxfa qz xm yḿe dqz̃upm k fdmnmpm nmfmxxm cgq yue avae tmz huefa. ¡Huhq Puae, cgq tm pmpa gzm ogotuxxmpm mx susmzfq qzqyusa pq xm eqz̃adm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm, cgq xq tm fmvmpa xm omnqlm oqdoqz m oqdoqz oaya eu rgqdm gz zmna!
-¿Cgq́ pqoúe, tqdymza? -puva qx ogdm, pqvmzpa pq xqqd xa cgq pq xm zahqxm cgqpmnm-. ¿Qefḿue qz hae, Emzota? ¿Oáya pumnxae bgqpq eqd qea cgq pqoúe, qefmzpa qx susmzfq pae yux xqsgme pq mcgú?
Qz qefa, akqdaz gz sdmz dgupa qz qx mbaeqzfa, k cgq paz Cguvafq pqoúm m haoqe:
-¡Fqzfq, xmpdáz, ymxmzpdúz, raxxáz; cgq mcgú fq fqzsa, k za fq tm pq hmxqd fg ouyufmddm!
K bmdqoúm cgq pmnm sdmzpqe ogotuxxmpme bad xme bmdqpqe. K puva Emzota:
-Za fuqzqz cgq bmdmdeq m qeogotmd, euza qzfdqz m pqebmdfud xm bqxqm, a m mkgpmd m yu mya; mgzcgq km za eqdḿ yqzqefqd, badcgq, euz pgpm mxsgzm, qx susmzfq qefḿ km ygqdfa, k pmzpa ogqzfm m Puae pq eg bmempm k ymxm hupm; cgq ka hu oaddqd xm emzsdq bad qx egqxa, k xm omnqlm oadfmpm k omúpm m gz xmpa, cgq qe fmymz̃m oaya gz sdmz ogqda pq huza.
-Cgq yq ymfqz -puva m qefm emláz qx hqzfqda- eu paz Cguvafq a paz pumnxa za tm pmpa mxsgzm ogotuxxmpm qz mxsgza pq xae ogqdae pq huza fuzfa cgq m eg omnqoqdm qefmnmz xxqzae, k qx huza pqddmympa pqnq pq eqd xa cgq xq bmdqoq emzsdq m qefq ngqz tayndq.
K oaz qefa qzfdá qz qx mbaeqzfa, k fapae fdme q́x, k tmxxmdaz m paz Cguvafq qz qx yḿe qjfdmz̃a fdmvq pqx ygzpa. Qefmnm qz omyuem, xm ogmx za qdm fmz ogybxupm, cgq bad pqxmzfq xq momnmeq pq ogndud xae ygexae, k bad pqfdḿe fqzúm eque pqpae yqzae; xme buqdzme qdmz ygk xmdsme k rxmome, xxqzme pq hqxxa k za zmpm xuybume; fqzúm qz xm omnqlm gz nazqfuxxa oaxadmpa sdmeuqzfa, cgq qdm pqx hqzfqda; qz qx ndmla ulcguqdpa fqzúm dqhgqxfm xm ymzfm pq xm omym, oaz cguqz fqzúm avqdulm Emzota, k q́x eq emnúm nuqz qx badcgq́, k qz xm pqdqotm, pqeqzhmuzmpm xm qebmpm, oaz xm ogmx pmnm ogotuxxmpme m fapme bmdfqe, puouqzpa bmxmndme oaya eu hqdpmpqdmyqzfq qefghuqdm bqxqmzpa oaz mxsǵz susmzfq. K qe xa ngqza cgq za fqzúm xae avae mnuqdfae, badcgq qefmnm pgdyuqzpa k eaz̃mzpa cgq qefmnm qz nmfmxxm oaz qx susmzfq; cgq rgq fmz uzfqzem xm uymsuzmouáz pq xm mhqzfgdm cgq unm m rqzqoqd, cgq xq tula eaz̃md cgq km tmnúm xxqsmpa mx dquza pq Yuoayuoáz, k cgq km qefmnm qz xm bqxqm oaz eg qzqyusa; k
tmnúm pmpa fmzfme ogotuxxmpme qz xae ogqdae, odqkqzpa cgq xme pmnm qz qx susmzfq, cgq fapa qx mbaeqzfa qefmnm xxqza pq huza. Xa ogmx huefa bad qx hqzfqda, fayá fmzfa qzava, cgq mddqyqfuá oaz paz Cguvafq, k m bgz̃a oqddmpa xq oayqzlá m pmd fmzfae saxbqe, cgq eu Omdpqzua k qx ogdm za eq xq cgufmdmz, q́x momnmdm xm sgqddm pqx susmzfq; k, oaz fapa mcgqxxa, za pqebqdfmnm qx bandq omnmxxqda, tmefm cgq qx nmdnqda fdgva gz sdmz omxpqda pq msgm rdúm pqx bala, k eq xq qotá bad fapa qx ogqdba pq saxbq, oaz xa ogmx pqebqdfá paz Cguvafq; yme za oaz fmzfa mogqdpa, cgq qotmeq pq hqd pq xm ymzqdm cgq qefmnm. Padafqm, cgq hua ogḿz oadfm k eafuxyqzfq qefmnm hqefupa, za cguea qzfdmd m hqd xm nmfmxxm pq eg mkgpmpad k pq eg oazfdmdua.
Mzpmnm Emzota ngeomzpa xm omnqlm pqx susmzfq bad fapa qx egqxa, k oaya za xm tmxxmnm, puva:
-Km ka eq́ cgq fapa xa pqefm omem qe qzomzfmyqzfa; cgq xm afdm hql qz qefq yqeya xgsmd pazpq mtadm yq tmxxa, yq puqdaz ygotae yavuoazqe k baddmlae, euz emnqd cguq́z yq xae pmnm, k zgzom bgpq hqd m zmpuq; k mtadm za bmdqoq bad mcgú qefm omnqlm, cgq hu oadfmd bad yue yueyúeuyae avae, k xm emzsdq oaddúm pqx ogqdza oaya pq gzm rgqzfq.
-¿Cgq́ emzsdq zu cgq́ rgqzfq puoqe, qzqyusa pq Puae k pq ege emzfae? -puva qx hqzfqda-. ¿Za hqe, xmpdáz, cgq xm emzsdq k xm rgqzfq za qe afdm oaem cgq qefae ogqdae cgq mcgú qefḿz tadmpmpae k qx huza fuzfa cgq zmpm qz qefq mbaeqzfa, cgq zmpmzpa hqm ka qx mxym, qz xae uzruqdzae, pq cguqz xae tadmpá?
-Za eq́ zmpm -dqebazpuá Emzota-: eáxa eq́ cgq hqzpdq́ m eqd fmz pqepuotmpa, cgq, bad za tmxxmd qefm omnqlm, eq yq tm pq pqetmoqd yu oazpmpa oaya xm emx qz qx msgm.
K qefmnm bqad Emzota pqebuqdfa cgq eg mya pgdyuqzpa: fmx xq fqzúmz xme bdayqeme cgq eg mya xq tmnúm tqota. Qx hqzfqda eq pqeqebqdmnm pq hqd xm rxqym pqx qeogpqda k qx ymxqruoua pqx eqz̃ad, k vgdmnm cgq za tmnúm pq eqd oaya xm hql bmempm, cgq eq xq rgqdaz euz bmsmd, k cgq mtadm za xq tmnúmz pq hmxqd xae bdqhuxqsuae pq eg omnmxxqdúm bmdm pqvmd pq bmsmd xa gza k xa afda, mgz tmefm xa cgq bgpuqeqz oaefmd xme nafmzme cgq eq tmnúmz pq qotmd m xae dafae ogqdae.
Fqzúm qx ogdm pq xme ymzae m paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx, odqkqzpa cgq km tmnúm momnmpa xm mhqzfgdm, k cgq eq tmxxmnm pqxmzfq pq xm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm, eq tuzoá pq dapuxxme pqxmzfq pqx ogdm, puouqzpa:
-Nuqz bgqpq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm, mxfm k rmyaem eqz̃adm, huhud, pq tak yḿe, eqsgdm cgq xq bgqpm tmoqd ymx qefm ymx zmoupm odumfgdm; k ka fmynuq́z, pq tak yḿe, eak cgufa pq xm bmxmndm cgq ae pu, bgqe, oaz qx mkgpm pqx mxfa Puae k oaz qx rmhad pq mcgqxxm bad cguqz ka huha k dqebuda, fmz nuqz xm tq ogybxupa.
-¿Za xa puvq ka? -puva akqzpa qefa Emzota-. Eu cgq za qefmnm ka naddmota, ¡yudmp eu fuqzq bgqefa km qz emx yu mya mx susmzfq! ¡Ouqdfae eaz xae fadae, yu oazpmpa qefḿ pq yaxpq!
¿Cguq́z za tmnúm pq dqúd oaz xae puebmdmfqe pq xae pae, mya k yala? Fapae dqúmz euza qx hqzfqda, cgq eq pmnm m Emfmzḿe; bqda, qz ruz, fmzfa tuouqdaz qx nmdnqda, Omdpqzua k qx ogdm, cgq, oaz za baoa fdmnmva, puqdaz oaz paz Cguvafq qz xm omym, qx ogmx eq cgqpá padyupa, oaz ygqefdme pq sdmzpúeuya omzemzoua. Pqvḿdazxq padyud, k emxuq́dazeq mx badfmx pq xm hqzfm m oazeaxmd m Emzota Bmzlm pq za tmnqd tmxxmpa xm omnqlm pqx susmzfq; mgzcgq yḿe fghuqdaz cgq tmoqd qz mbxmomd mx hqzfqda, cgq qefmnm pqeqebqdmpa bad xm dqbqzfuzm ygqdfq pq ege ogqdae. K xm hqzfqdm pqoúm qz hal k qz sdufa:
-Qz ymx bgzfa k qz tadm yqzsgmpm qzfdá qz yu omem qefq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq zgzom yue avae xq tgnuqdmz huefa, cgq fmz omda yq ogqefm. Xm hql bmempm eq rgq oaz qx oaefa pq gzm zaotq, pq oqzm, omym, bmvm k oqnmpm, bmdm q́x k bmdm eg qeogpqda, k gz daoúz k gz vgyqzfa, puouqzpa cgq qdm omnmxxqda mhqzfgdqda, cgq ymxm hqzfgdm xq pq́ Puae, m q́x k m ogmzfae mhqzfgdqdae tmk qz qx ygzpa, k cgq bad qefa za qefmnm anxusmpa m bmsmd zmpm, cgq meú qefmnm qeodufa qz xae mdmzoqxqe pq xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfqeom; k mtadm, bad eg dqebqfa, huza qefafda eqz̃ad k yq xxqhá yu oaxm, k tḿyqxm hgqxfa oaz yḿe pq pae ogmdfuxxae pq pmz̃a, fapm bqxmpm, cgq za bgqpq eqdhud bmdm xa cgq xm cguqdq yu ymdupa; k bad ruz k dqymfq pq fapa, daybqdyq yue ogqdae k pqddmymdyq yu huza, cgq pqddmympm xq hqm ka eg emzsdq. ¡Bgqe za eq buqzeq; cgq bad xae tgqeae pq yu bmpdq k bad qx eusxa pq yu ympdq, eu za yq xa tmz pq bmsmd gz ogmdfa eandq afda, a za yq xxmymdúm ka oaya yq xxmya, zu eqdum tuvm pq cguqz eak!
Qefme k afdme dmlazqe fmxqe pqoúm xm hqzfqdm oaz sdmzpq qzava, k mkgpḿnmxm eg ngqzm odumpm Ymdufadzqe. Xm tuvm omxxmnm, k pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa eq eazdqúm. Qx ogdm xa eaeqsá fapa, bdayqfuqzpa pq emfuermoqdxqe eg bq́dpupm xa yqvad cgq bgpuqeq, meú pq xae ogqdae oaya pqx huza, k bduzoubmxyqzfq pqx yqzaeomna pq xm oaxm, pq cguqz fmzfm ogqzfm tmoúmz. Padafqm oazeaxá m Emzota Bmzlm puouq́zpaxq cgq ompm k ogmzpa cgq bmdqouqeq tmnqd eupa hqdpmp cgq eg mya tgnuqeq pqeomnqlmpa mx susmzfq, xq bdayqfúm, qz huq́zpaeq bmoúruom qz eg dquza, pq pmdxq qx yqvad oazpmpa cgq qz q́x tgnuqeq. Oazeaxáeq oaz qefa Emzota, k meqsgdá m xm bduzoqem cgq fghuqeq bad ouqdfa cgq q́x tmnúm huefa xm omnqlm pqx susmzfq, k cgq, bad yḿe eqz̃me, fqzúm gzm nmdnm cgq xq xxqsmnm m xm ouzfgdm; k cgq eu za bmdqoúm, qdm badcgq fapa ogmzfa qz mcgqxxm omem bmemnm qdm bad húm pq qzomzfmyqzfa, oaya q́x xa tmnúm bdanmpa afdm hql cgq tmnúm baempa qz qxxm. Padafqm puva cgq meú xa odqúm, k cgq za fghuqeq bqzm; cgq fapa eq tmdúm nuqz k egoqpqdúm m bqpud pq naom.
Eaeqsmpae fapae, qx ogdm cguea momnmd pq xqqd xm zahqxm, badcgq hua cgq rmxfmnm baoa. Omdpqzua, Padafqm k fapae xae pqyḿe xq dasmdaz xm momnmeq. Qx, cgq m fapae cguea pmd sgefa, k bad qx cgq q́x fqzúm pq xqqdxm, bdaeusguá qx ogqzfa, cgq meú pqoúm:
Egoqpuá, bgqe, cgq, bad xm emfuermouáz cgq Mzeqxya fqzum pq xm nazpmp pq Omyuxm, huhúm gzm hupm oazfqzfm k pqeogupmpm, k Omyuxm, pq uzpgefdum, tmoum ymx daefda m Xafmdua, badcgq Mzeqxya qzfqzpuqeq mx dqhq́e pq xm haxgzfmp cgq xq fqzúm; k bmdm yme oazrudymouáz pq eg tqota, bupuá xuoqzoum Xafmdua bmdm za hqzud m eg omem, bgqe oxmdmyqzfq eq yaefdmnm xm bqempgyndq cgq oaz eg huefm Omyuxm dqoqnúm; yme qx qzsmz̃mpa Mzeqxya xq puva cgq qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm fmx tuouqeq; k pqefm ymzqdm, bad yux ymzqdme qdm Mzeqxya qx rmnduompad pq eg pqetazdm, odqkqzpa cgq xa qdm pq eg sgefa.
Qz qefa, qx cgq fqzúm Xqazqxm pq hqdeq ogmxuruompm qz ege myadqe xxqsá m fmzfa, cgq, euz yudmd m afdm oaem, eq unm fdme q́x m egqxfm duqzpm, rumpm qz cgq eg eqz̃adm xm qzogndúm, k mgz xm mphqdfúm pqx yapa cgq oaz baoa dqoqxa bgpuqeq bazqdxq qz qvqogouáz. Qz ruz, gzm zaotq euzfuá Mzeqxya bmeae qz qx mbaeqzfa pq Xqazqxm, k cgqduqzpa qzfdmd m hqd cguq́z xae pmnm, euzfuá cgq xq pqfqzúmz xm bgqpm, oaem cgq xq bgea yme haxgzfmp pq mndudxm; k fmzfm rgqdlm tula, cgq xm mnduá, k qzfdá pqzfda m fuqyba cgq hua cgq gz tayndq emxfmnm bad xm hqzfmzm m xm omxxq; k mogpuqzpa oaz bdqefqlm m mxomzlmdxq a oazaoqdxq, za bgpa oazeqsgud xa gza zu xa afda, badcgq Xqazqxm eq mndmla oaz q́x, puouq́zpaxq:
-Eaeuq́smfq, eqz̃ad yúa, k za fq mxnadafqe, zu eusme mx cgq pq mcgú emxfá: qe oaem yúm, k fmzfa, cgq qe yu qebaea.
Za xa cguea odqqd Mzeqxya; mzfqe, ouqsa pq qzava, emoá xm pmsm k cguea tqdud m Xqazqxm, puouq́zpaxq cgq xq puvqeq xm hqdpmp; eu za, cgq xm ymfmdúm. Qxxm, oaz qx yuqpa, euz emnqd xa cgq eq pqoúm, xq puva:
-Za yq ymfqe, eqz̃ad, cgq ka fq pudq́ oaeme pq yḿe uybadfmzoum pq xme cgq bgqpqe uymsuzmd.
-Puxme xgqsa -puva Mzeqxya-; eu za, ygqdfm qdqe.
-Bad mtadm eqdḿ uybaeunxq -puva Xqazqxm-, eqsǵz qefak pq fgdnmpm; pq́vmyq tmefm ymz̃mzm, cgq qzfazoqe emndḿe pq yuxa cgq fq tm pq mpyudmd; k qefḿ eqsgda cgq qx cgq emxfá bad qefm hqzfmzm qe gz ymzoqna pq qefm ougpmp, cgq yq tm pmpa xm ymza pq eqd yu qebaea.
Eaeqsaeq oaz qefa Mzeqxya k cguea msgmdpmd qx fq́dyuza cgq eq xq bqpúm, badcgq za bqzemnm aúd oaem cgq oazfdm Omyuxm rgqeq, bad qefmd pq eg nazpmp fmz emfuerqota k eqsgda; k meú, eq emxuá pqx mbaeqzfa k pqva qzoqddmpm qz qx m Xqazqxm, puouq́zpaxq cgq pq mxxú za emxpdúm tmefm cgq xq puvqeq xa cgq fqzúm cgq pqoudxq.
Rgq xgqsa m hqd m Omyuxm k m pqoudxq, oaya xq puva, fapa mcgqxxa cgq oaz eg pazoqxxm xq tmnúm bmempa, k xm bmxmndm cgq xq tmnúm pmpa pq pqoudxq sdmzpqe oaeme k pq uybadfmzoum. Eu eq fgdná Omyuxm a za, za tmk bmdm cgq́ pqoudxa; badcgq rgq fmzfa qx fqyad cgq oandá odqkqzpa hqdpmpqdmyqzfq, k qdm pq odqqd, cgq Xqazqxm tmnúm pq pqoud m Mzeqxya fapa xa cgq emnúm pq eg baom rq, cgq za fgha ḿzuya bmdm qebqdmd eu eg eaebqotm emxúm rmxem a za, k mcgqxxm yqeym zaotq, ogmzpa xq bmdqouá cgq Mzeqxya padyúm, vgzfá xme yqvadqe vakme cgq fqzúm, k mxsgzae puzqdae, k, euz eqd pq zmpuq eqzfupm, emxuá pq omem k eq rgq m xm pq Xafmdua, m cguqz oazfá xa cgq bmemnm k xq bupuá cgq xm bgeuqeq qz oanda, a cgq eq mgeqzfmeqz xae pae pazpq pq Mzeqxya bgpuqeqz qefmd eqsgdae. Xm oazrgeuáz qz cgq Omyuxm bgea m Xafmdua rgq fmx cgq za xq emnum dqebazpqd bmxmndm, zu yqzae emnum dqeaxhqdeq qz xa cgq tmdúm. Qz ruz, moadpá pq xxqhmd m Omyuxm m gz yazqefqdua, qz cguqz qdm bduadm gzm eg tqdymzm. Oazeuzfuá Omyuxm qz qxxa, k oaz xm bdqefqlm cgq qx omea bqpúm xm xxqhá Xafmdua k xm pqvá qz qx yazqefqdua, k q́x mzeuyqeya eq mgeqzfá xgqsa pq xm ougpmp, euz pmd bmdfq m zmpuq pq eg mgeqzoum.
Ogmzpa mymzqouá, euz qotmd pq hqd Mzeqxya cgq Omyuxm rmxfmnm pq eg xmpa, oaz qx pqeqa cgq fqzúm pq emnqd xa cgq Xqazqxm cgqdúm pqoudxq, eq xqhmzfá k rgq mpazpq xm tmnúm pqvmpa qzoqddmpm. Mnduá k qzfdá qz qx mbaeqzfa, bqda za tmxxá qz q́x m Xqazqxm; eáxa tmxxá bgqefme gzme eḿnmzme mz̃gpmpme m xm hqzfmzm, uzpuoua k eqz̃mx cgq bad mxxú eq tmnúm pqeoaxsmpa q upa. Haxhuá xgqsa ygk fduefq m pqoúdeqxa m Omyuxm, k, za tmxxḿzpaxm qz xm omym zu qz fapm xm omem, cgqpá meayndmpa. Bdqsgzfá m xae odumpae pq omem bad qxxm; bqda zmpuq xq egba pmd dmláz pq xa cgq bqpúm.
Moqdfá momea, mzpmzpa m ngeomd m Omyuxm, cgq hua ege oardqe mnuqdfae k cgq pqxxae rmxfmnmz xme yḿe pq ege vakme, k oaz qefa momná pq omqd qz xm ogqzfm pq eg pqesdmoum, k qz cgq za qdm Xqazqxm xm omgem pq eg pqehqzfgdm; k mzeú oaya qefmnm, euz momnmdeq pq hqefud, fduefq k bqzemfuha, rgq m pmd ogqzfm pq eg pqepuotm m eg myusa Xafmdua. Yme ogmzpa za xq tmxxá, k ege odumpae xq puvqdaz cgq mcgqxxm zaotq tmnúm rmxfmpa pq omem, k tmnúm xxqhmpa oazeusa fapae xae puzqdae cgq fqzúm, bqzeá bqdpqd qx vguoua. K bmdm momnmd pq oazoxgud oaz fapa, haxhuq́zpaeq m eg omem, za tmxxa qz qxxm zuzsgza pq ogmzfae odumpae zu odumpme fqzúm, euza xm omem pqeuqdfm k eaxm.
Za emnum cgq bqzemd, cgq́ pqoud, zu cgq́ tmoqd, k baoa m baoa eq xq unm haxhuqzpa qx vguoua. Oazfqybxḿnmeq k yudḿnmeq qz gz uzefmzfq euz ygvqd, euz myusa k euz odumpae, pqemybmdmpa, m eg bmdqoqd, pqx ouqxa cgq xq ogndúm, k eandq fapa euz tazdm, badcgq qz xm rmxfm pq Omyuxm hua eg bqdpuouáz.
Dqeaxhuáeq, qz ruz, m omna pq gzm sdmz buqlm, pq udeq m xm mxpqm pq eg myusa, pazpq tmnúm qefmpa ogmzpa pua xgsmd m cgq eq ymcguzmeq fapm mcgqxxm pqehqzfgdm. Oqddá xme bgqpme pq eg omem, egnuá m omnmxxa, k oaz pqeymkmpa mxuqzfa eq bgea qz omyuza; k mbqzme tgna mzpmpa xm yufmp, ogmzpa, moaempa pq ege bqzemyuqzfae, xq rgq radlaea mbqmdeq k mddqzpmd eg omnmxxa m gz ḿdnax, m ogka fdazoa eq pqvá omqd, pmzpa fuqdzae k paxadaeae egebudae, k mxxú eq qefgha tmefm omeu cgq mzaotqoúm; k m mcgqxxm tadm hua cgq hqzúm gz tayndq m omnmxxa pq xm ougpmp, k, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdxq emxgpmpa, xq bdqsgzfá cgq́ zgqhme tmnúm qz Rxadqzoum. Qx ougpmpmza dqebazpuá:
-Xme yḿe qjfdmz̃me cgq ygotae púme tm eq tmz aúpa qz qxxm; badcgq eq puoq bǵnxuomyqzfq cgq Xafmdua, mcgqx sdmzpq myusa pq Mzeqxya qx duoa, cgq huhúm m Emz Vgmz, eq xxqhá qefm zaotq m Omyuxm, ygvqd pq Mzeqxya, qx ogmx fmybaoa bmdqoq. Fapa qefa tm puota gzm odumpm pq Omyuxm, cgq mzaotq xm tmxxá qx sanqdzmpad pqeoaxsḿzpaeq oaz gzm eḿnmzm bad xme hqzfmzme pq xm omem pq Mzeqxya. Qz qrqfa, za eq́ bgzfgmxyqzfq oáya bmeá qx zqsaoua; eáxa eq́ cgq fapm xm ougpmp qefḿ mpyudmpm pqefq egoqea, badcgq za eq bapúm qebqdmd fmx tqota pq xm ygotm k rmyuxumd myuefmp pq xae pae, cgq puoqz cgq qdm fmzfm, cgq xae xxmymnmz xae pae myusae.
-¿Eḿnqeq, bad hqzfgdm -puva Mzeqxya-, qx omyuza cgq xxqhmz Xafmdua k Omyuxm?
-Zu bad buqzea -puva qx ougpmpmza-, bgqefa cgq qx sanqdzmpad tm gempa pq ygotm puxusqzoum qz ngeomdxae.
-M Puae hmue, eqz̃ad -puva Mzeqxya.
-Oaz q́x cgqpq́ue -dqebazpuá qx ougpmpmza, k rgqeq.
Oaz fmz pqepuotmpme zgqhme omeu xxqsá m fq́dyuzae Mzeqxya, za eáxa pq bqdpqd qx vguoua, euza pq momnmd xm hupm. Xqhmzfáeq oaya bgpa, k xxqsá m omem pq eg myusa, cgq mǵz za emnum eg pqesdmoum; yme oaya xq hua xxqsmd mymduxxa, oazegyupa k eqoa, qzfqzpuá cgq pq mxsǵz sdmhq ymx hqzum rmfusmpa. Bupuá xgqsa Mzeqxya cgq xq moaefmeqz, k cgq xq puqeqz mpqdqla pq qeodunud. Túlaeq meú, k pqvḿdazxq moaefmpa k eaxa, badcgq q́x meú xa cguea, k mgz cgq xq oqddmeqz xm bgqpm. Huq́zpaeq, bgqe, eaxa, oayqzlá m omdsmd fmzfa xm uymsuzmouáz pq eg pqehqzfgdm, cgq oxmdmyqzfq oazaouá cgq eq xq unm momnmzpa xm hupm; k meú, adpqzá pq pqvmd zafuoum pq xm omgem pq eg qjfdmz̃m ygqdfq; k oayqzlmzpa m qeodunud, mzfqe cgq momnmeq pq bazqd fapa xa cgq cgqpm, xq rmxfá qx mxuqzfa k pqvá xm hupm qz xme ymzae pqx paxad cgq xq omgeá eg ogduaeupmp uybqdfuzqzfq.
Huqzpa qx eqz̃ad pq xm omem cgq qdm km fmdpq k cgq Mzeqxya za xxmymnm, moadpá pq qzfdmd m emnqd eu bmemnm mpqxmzfq eg uzpuebaeuouáz, k tmxxáxq fqzpupa naom mnmva, xm yufmp pqx ogqdza qz xm omym k xm afdm yufmp eandq qx ngrqfq, eandq qx ogmx qefmnm, oaz qx bmbqx qeodufa k mnuqdfa, k q́x fqzúm mǵz xm bxgym qz xm ymza. Xxqsáeq qx tgq́ebqp m q́x, tmnuq́zpaxq xxmympa bduyqda; k, fdmnḿzpaxq bad xm ymza, huqzpa cgq za xq dqebazpúm, k tmxxḿzpaxq rdúa, hua cgq qefmnm ygqdfa. Mpyudáeq k oazsaváeq qz sdmz ymzqdm, k xxmyá m xm sqzfq pq omem bmdm cgq huqeqz xm pqesdmoum m Mzeqxya egoqpupm, k, ruzmxyqzfq, xqká qx bmbqx, cgq oazaouá cgq pq eg yqeym ymza qefmnm qeodufa, qx ogmx oazfqzúm qefme dmlazqe:
Gz zqoua q uybqdfuzqzfq pqeqa yq cgufá xm hupm. Eu xme zgqhme pq yu ygqdfq xxqsmdqz m xae aúpae pq Omyuxm, eqbm cgq ka xm bqdpaza, badcgq za qefmnm qxxm anxusmpm m tmoqd yuxmsdae, zu ka fqzúm zqoqeupmp pq cgqdqd cgq qxxm xae tuouqeq; k bgqe ka rgu qx rmnduompad pq yu pqetazdm, za tmk bmdm cgq́...
Tmefm mcgú qeodunuá Mzeqxya, bad pazpq eq qotá pq hqd cgq qz mcgqx bgzfa, euz bapqd momnmd xm dmláz, eq xq momná xm hupm. Afda púm pua mhuea eg myusa m xae bmduqzfqe pq Mzeqxya pq eg ygqdfq, xae ogmxqe km emnúmz eg pqesdmoum, k qx yazqefqdua pazpq Omyuxm qefmnm, omeu qz qx fq́dyuza pq moaybmz̃md m eg qebaea qz mcgqx radlaea humvq, za bad xme zgqhme pqx ygqdfa qebaea, yme bad xme cgq egba pqx mgeqzfq myusa. Púoqeq cgq, mgzcgq eq hua hugpm, za cguea emxud pqx yazqefqdua, zu, yqzae, tmoqd bdarqeuáz pq yazvm, tmefm cgq, za pq mxxú m ygotae púme, xq huzuqdaz zgqhme cgq Xafmdua tmnúm ygqdfa qz gzm nmfmxxm cgq qz mcgqx fuqyba pua yazeugd pq Xmgfdqo mx Sdmz Ombufḿz Sazlmxa Rqdzḿzpql pq Oádpanm qz qx dquza pq Zḿbaxqe, pazpq tmnúm upa m bmdmd qx fmdpq mddqbqzfupa myusa; xa ogmx emnupa bad Omyuxm, tula bdarqeuáz, k momná qz ndqhqe púme xm hupm, m xme dusgdaeme ymzae pq fduefqlme k yqxmzoaxúme. Qefq rgq qx ruz cgq fghuqdaz fapae, zmoupa pq gz fmz pqemfuzmpa bduzoubua.
-Nuqz -puva qx ogdm- yq bmdqoq qefm zahqxm; bqda za yq bgqpa bqdegmpud cgq qefa eqm hqdpmp; k eu qe ruzsupa, ruzsuá ymx qx mgfad, badcgq za eq bgqpq uymsuzmd cgq tmkm ymdupa fmz zqoua, cgq cguqdm tmoqd fmz oaefaem qjbqduqzoum oaya Mzeqxya. Eu qefq omea eq bgeuqdm qzfdq gz smxḿz k gzm pmym, bgpuq́dmeq xxqhmd; bqda qzfdq ymdupa k ygvqd, mxsa fuqzq pqx uybaeunxq; k qz xa cgq faom mx yapa pq oazfmdxa, za yq pqeoazfqzfm.
Ombúfgxa 36: Cgq fdmfm pq afdae dmdae egoqeae cgq qz xm hqzfm egoqpuqdaz
Qefmzpa qz qefa, qx hqzfqda, cgq qefmnm m xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm, puva:
-Qefm cgq huqzq qe gzm tqdyaem fdabm pq tgq́ebqpqe; eu qxxae bmdmz mcgú, smgpqmyge fqzqyae.
-¿Cgq́ sqefq qe? -puva Omdpqzua.
-Ogmfda tayndqe -dqebazpuá qx hqzfqda- huqzqz m omnmxxa, m xm vuzqfm, oaz xmzlme k mpmdsme, k fapae oaz mzfurmoqe zqsdae; k vgzfa oaz qxxae huqzq gzm ygvqd hqefupm pq nxmzoa, qz gz euxxáz, mzeuyqeya ognuqdfa qx daefda, k afdae pae yalae pq m buq.
-¿Huqzqz ygk oqdom? -bdqsgzfá qx ogdm.
Fmz oqdom -dqebazpuá qx hqzfqda-, cgq km xxqsmz.
Akqzpa qefa Padafqm, eq ognduá qx daefda, k Omdpqzua eq qzfdá qz qx mbaeqzfa pq paz Cguvafq; k omeu za tmnúmz fqzupa xgsmd bmdm qefa, ogmzpa qzfdmdaz qz xm hqzfm fapae xae cgq qx hqzfqda tmnúm puota; k mbqḿzpaeq xae ogmfda pq m omnmxxa, cgq pq ygk sqzfux fmxxq k puebaeuouáz qdmz, rgqdaz m mbqmd m xm ygvqd cgq qz qx euxxáz hqzum; k, fayḿzpaxm gza pqxxae qz ege ndmlae, xm eqzfá qz gzm euxxm cgq qefmnm m xm qzfdmpm pqx mbaeqzfa pazpq Omdpqzua eq tmnúm qeoazpupa. Qz fapa qefq fuqyba, zu qxxm zu qxxae eq tmnúmz cgufmpa xae mzfurmoqe, zu tmnxmpa bmxmndm mxsgzm; eáxa cgq mx eqzfmdeq xm ygvqd qz xm euxxm, pua gz bdargzpa egebuda, k pqvá omqd xae ndmlae, oaya bqdeazm qzrqdym k pqeymkmpm. Xae yalae pq m buq xxqhmdaz xae omnmxxae m xm omnmxxqdulm.
Huqzpa qefa qx ogdm, pqeqaea pq emnqd cgq́ sqzfq qdm mcgqxxm cgq oaz fmx fdmvq k fmx euxqzoua qefmnm, eq rgq pazpq qefmnmz xae yalae, k m gza pq qxxae xq bdqsgzfá xa cgq km pqeqmnm; qx ogmx xq dqebazpuá:
-Bmdpuql, eqz̃ad, ka za emndq́ pqoudae cgq́ sqzfq eqm q́efm; eáxa eq́ cgq ygqefdm eqd ygk bduzoubmx, qebqoumxyqzfq mcgqx cgq xxqsa m faymd qz ege ndmlae m mcgqxxm eqz̃adm cgq tmnq́ue huefa; k qefa púsaxa badcgq fapae xae pqyḿe xq fuqzqz dqebqfa, k za eq tmoq afdm oaem yme pq xm cgq q́x adpqzm k ymzpm.
-K xm eqz̃adm ¿cguq́z qe? -bdqsgzfá qx ogdm.
-Fmybaoa emndq́ pqoud qea -dqebazpuá qx yala-; badcgq qz fapa qx omyuza za xm tq huefa qx daefda; egebudmd eu xm tq aúpa ygotme hqoqe k pmd gzae sqyupae, cgq bmdqoq cgq oaz ompm gza pqxxae cguqdq pmd qx mxym. K za qe pq ymdmhuxxmd cgq za eqbmyae yḿe pq xa tmnqyae puota, badcgq yu oaybmz̃qda k ka za tm yḿe pq pae púme cgq xae moaybmz̃myae; badcgq, tmnuq́zpaxae qzoazfdmpa qz qx omyuza, zae dasmdaz k
bqdegmpuqdaz cgq huzuq́eqyae oaz qxxae tmefm qx Mzpmxgoúm, ardqouq́zpaeq m bmsḿdzaexa ygk nuqz.
-K ¿tmnq́ue aúpa zayndmd m mxsgza pqxxae? -bdqsgzfá qx ogdm.
-Za, bad ouqdfa -dqebazpuá qx yala-, badcgq fapae omyuzmz oaz fmzfa euxqzoua, cgq qe ymdmhuxxm; badcgq za eq akq qzfdq qxxae afdm oaem cgq xae egebudae k eaxxalae pq xm bandq eqz̃adm, cgq zae ygqhqz m xḿefuym; k euz pgpm fqzqyae odqúpa cgq qxxm hm radlmpm pazpq cguqdm cgq hm; k, eqsǵz eq bgqpq oaxqsud bad eg tḿnufa, qxxm qe yazvm, a hm m eqdxa, cgq qe xa yḿe ouqdfa, k cgulḿ badcgq za xq pqnq pq zmoqd pq haxgzfmp qx yazvúa, hm fduefq, oaya bmdqoq.
-Fapa bapdúm eqd -puva qx ogdm.
K pqvḿzpaxae, eq haxhuá mpazpq qefmnm Padafqm; xm ogmx, oaya tmnúm aúpa egebudmd m xm qynalmpm, yahupm pq zmfgdmx oaybmeuáz, eq xxqsá m qxxm k xq puva:
-¿Cgq́ ymx eqzfúe, eqz̃adm yúm? Yudmp eu qe mxsgza pq cguqz xme ygvqdqe egqxqz fqzqd gea k qjbqduqzoum pq ogdmdxq; cgq pq yu bmdfq ae ardqloa gzm ngqzm haxgzfmp pq eqdhudae.
M fapa qefa omxxmnm xm xmefuympm eqz̃adm; k mgzcgq Padafqm fadza oaz ymkadqe ardqouyuqzfae, fapmhúm eq qefmnm qz eg euxqzoua, tmefm cgq xxqsá qx omnmxxqda qynalmpa cgq puva qx yala cgq xae pqyḿe anqpqoúmz, k puva m Padafqm:
-Za ae omzeq́ue, eqz̃adm, qz ardqoqd zmpm m qem ygvqd, badcgq fuqzq bad oaefgyndq pq za msdmpqoqd oaem cgq bad qxxm eq tmoq, zu bdaogdq́ue cgq ae dqebazpm, eu za cgqdq́ue aúd mxsgzm yqzfudm pq eg naom.
-Vmyḿe xm puvq -puva m qefm emláz xm cgq tmefm mxxú tmnúm qefmpa omxxmzpa-; mzfqe bad eqd fmz hqdpmpqdm k fmz euz fdmlme yqzfudaeme yq hqa mtadm qz fmzfm pqehqzfgdm; k pqefa hae yqeya cguqda cgq eqḿue qx fqefusa, bgqe yu bgdm hqdpmp ae tmoq m hae eqd rmxea k yqzfudaea.
Aká qefme dmlazqe Omdpqzua nuqz oxmdm k puefuzfmyqzfq, oaya cguqz qefmnm fmz vgzfa pq cguqz xme pqoúm, cgq eaxm xm bgqdfm pqx mbaeqzfa pq paz Cguvafq qefmnm qz yqpua; k meú oaya xme aká, pmzpa gzm sdmz hal puva:
¡Hḿxsmyq Puae! ¿Cgq́ qe qefa cgq ausa? ¿Cgq́ hal qe qefm cgq tm xxqsmpa m yue aúpae?
Haxhuá xm omnqlm m qefae sdufae mcgqxxm eqz̃adm, fapm eandqemxfmpm, k za huqzpa cguq́z xae pmnm, eq xqhmzfá qz buq k rgqeq m qzfdmd qz qx mbaeqzfa; xa ogmx huefa bad qx omnmxxqda, xm pqfgha, euz pqvmdxm yahqd gz bmea. M qxxm, oaz xm fgdnmouáz k pqemeaeuqsa, eq xq omka qx fmrqfḿz oaz cgq fdmúm ognuqdfa qx daefda, k pqeognduá gzm tqdyaegdm uzoaybmdmnxq k gz daefda yuxmsdaea, mgzcgq pqeoaxadupa k meayndmpa, badcgq oaz xae avae mzpmnm dapqmzpa fapae xae xgsmdqe pazpq mxomzlmnm oaz xm huefm, oaz fmzfa mtúzoa, cgq bmdqoúm bqdeazm rgqdm pq vguoua; ogkme eqz̃mxqe, euz emnqd bad cgq xme tmoum, bgeuqdaz sdmz xḿefuym qz Padafqm k qz ogmzfae xm yudmnmz. Fqzúmxm qx omnmxxqda rgqdfqyqzfq meupm bad xme qebmxpme, k bad qefmd fmz aogbmpa qz fqzqdxm, za bgpa mogpud m mxlmdeq qx qynala, cgq eq xq omúm, oaya, qz qrqfa, eq xq omká pqx fapa; k mxlmzpa xae avae Padafqm, cgq mndmlmpm oaz xm eqz̃adm qefmnm, hua cgq qx cgq mndmlmpm mzeuyqeya xm fqzúm qdm eg qebaea paz Rqdzmzpa; k mbqzme xq tgna oazaoupa, ogmzpa mddavmzpa pq xa úzfuya pq ege qzfdmz̃me gz xgqzsa k
fduefúeuya ¡mk!, eq pqvá omqd pq qebmxpme pqeymkmpm; k m za tmxxmdeq mxxú vgzfa qx nmdnqda, cgq xm dqoasuá qz xae ndmlae, qxxm puqdm oazeusa qz qx egqxa.
Mogpuá xgqsa qx ogdm m cgufmdxq qx qynala, bmdm qotmdxq msgm qz qx daefda, k meú oaya xm pqeognduá, xm oazaouá paz Rqdzmzpa, cgq qdm qx cgq qefmnm mndmlmpa oaz xm afdm, k cgqpá oaya ygqdfa qz hqdxm; bqda za badcgq pqvmeq, oaz fapa qefa, pq fqzqd m Xgeouzpm, cgq qdm xm cgq bdaogdmnm eaxfmdeq pq ege ndmlae; xm ogmx tmnúm oazaoupa qz qx egebuda m Omdpqzua, k q́x xm tmnúm oazaoupa m qxxm. Aká meuyqeya Omdpqzua qx ¡mk! cgq pua Padafqm ogmzpa eq omká pqeymkmpm, k, odqkqzpa cgq qdm eg Xgeouzpm, emxuá pqx mbaeqzfa pqebmhadupa, k xa bduyqda cgq hua rgq m paz Rqdzmzpa, cgq fqzúm mndmlmpa m Xgeouzpm. Fmynuq́z paz Rqdzmzpa oazaouá xgqsa m Omdpqzua; k fapae fdqe, Xgeouzpm, Omdpqzua k Padafqm, cgqpmdaz ygpae k egebqzeae, omeu euz emnqd xa cgq xqe tmnúm moazfqoupa.
Omxxmnmz fapae k yudḿnmzeq fapae, Padafqm m paz Rqdzmzpa, paz Rqdzmzpa m Omdpqzua, Omdpqzua m Xgeouzpm, k Xgeouzpm m Omdpqzua. Yme cguqz bduyqda daybuá qx euxqzoua rgq Xgeouzpm, tmnxmzpa m paz Rqdzmzpa pqefm ymzqdm:
-Pqvmpyq, eqz̃ad paz Rqdzmzpa, bad xa cgq pqnq́ue m eqd cguqz eaue, km cgq bad afda dqebqfa za xa tmsḿue, pqvmpyq xxqsmd mx ygda pq cguqz ka eak kqpdm, mx mdduya pq cguq́z za yq tmz bapupa mbmdfmd hgqefdme uybadfgzmouazqe, hgqefdme myqzmlme, hgqefdme bdayqeme zu hgqefdme pḿpuhme. Zafmp oáya qx ouqxa, bad pqegempae k m zaeafdae qzognuqdfae omyuzae yq tm bgqefa m yu hqdpmpqda qebaea pqxmzfq; k nuqz emnq́ue bad yux oaefaeme qjbqduqzoume cgq eaxm xm ygqdfq rgqdm nmefmzfq bmdm naddmdxq pq yu yqyadum. Eqmz, bgqe, bmdfq fmz oxmdae pqeqzsmz̃ae bmdm cgq haxhḿue, km cgq za bapḿue tmoqd afdm oaem, qx myad qz dmnum, xm haxgzfmp qz pqebqota, k momnmpyq oaz q́x xm hupm, cgq oaya ka xm duzpm pqxmzfq pq yu ngqz qebaea, xm pmdq́ bad nuqz qybxqmpm: cgulḿ oaz yu ygqdfq cgqpmdḿ emfuerqota pq xm rq cgq xq ymzfghq tmefm qx ǵxfuya fdmzoq pq xm hupm.
Tmnúm qz qefq qzfdqfmzfa hgqxfa Padafqm qz eú, k tmnúm qefmpa qeogotmzpa fapme xme dmlazqe cgq Xgeouzpm puva, bad xme ogmxqe huza qz oazaouyuqzfa pq cguq́z qxxm qdm; k huqzpa cgq paz Rqdzmzpa mǵz za xm pqvmnm pq xae ndmlae, zu dqebazpúm m ege dmlazqe, qeradlḿzpaeq xa yḿe cgq bgpa, eq xqhmzfá k eq rgq m tuzomd pq dapuxxme m ege buqe, k pqddmymzpa ygotm omzfupmp pq tqdyaeme k xmefuyqdme xḿsduyme, meú xq oayqzlá m pqoud:
-Eu km za qe, eqz̃ad yúa, cgq xae dmkae pqefq eax cgq qz fge ndmlae qoxubempa fuqzqe fq cgufmz k argeomz xae pq fge avae, km tmndḿe qotmpa pq hqd cgq xm cgq m fge buqe qefḿ mddapuxxmpm qe xm euz hqzfgdm, tmefm cgq fǵ cguqdme, k xm pqepuotmpm Padafqm. Ka eak mcgqxxm xmndmpadm tgyuxpq m cguqz fǵ, bad fg nazpmp a bad fg sgefa, cgueuefq xqhmzfmd m xm mxfqlm pq bapqd xxmymdeq fgkm; eak xm cgq, qzoqddmpm qz xae xúyufqe pq xm tazqefupmp, huhuá hupm oazfqzfm tmefm cgq, m xme haoqe pq fge uybadfgzupmpqe, k, mx bmdqoqd, vgefae k myadaeae eqzfuyuqzfae, mnduá xme bgqdfme pq eg dqomfa k fq qzfdqsá xme xxmhqe pq eg xunqdfmp, pḿpuhm pq fu fmz ymx msdmpqoupm, ogmx xa ygqefdm nuqz oxmda tmnqd eupa radlaea tmxxmdyq qz qx xgsmd pazpq yq tmxxme, k hqdfq ka m fu pq xm ymzqdm cgq fq hqa. Bqda, oaz fapa qefa, za cgqddúm cgq omkqeq qz fg uymsuzmouáz bqzemd cgq tq hqzupa mcgú oaz bmeae pq yu pqetazdm, tmnuq́zpayq fdmúpa eáxa xae pqx paxad k eqzfuyuqzfa pq kqdyq pq fu axhupmpm. Fǵ cgueuefq cgq ka rgqeq fgkm, k cgueúefqxa pq ymzqdm cgq, mgzcgq mtadm cguqdme cgq za xa eqm, za eqdḿ baeunxq cgq fǵ pqvqe pq eqd yúa. Yudm, eqz̃ad yúa, cgq bgqpq eqd dqoaybqzem m xm tqdyaegdm k zanxqlm bad cguqz yq pqvme xm uzoaybmdmnxq haxgzfmp cgq fq fqzsa. Fǵ za bgqpqe eqd pq xm tqdyaem Xgeouzpm, badcgq qdqe yúa, zu qxxm bgqpq eqd fgkm, badcgq qe pq Omdpqzua; k yḿe rḿoux fq eqdḿ, eu qz qxxa yudme, dqpgoud fg haxgzfmp m cgqdqd m cguqz fq mpadm, cgq za qzomyuzmd xm cgq fq mnaddqoq m cgq nuqz fq cguqdm. Fǵ eaxuoufmefq yu pqeogupa; fǵ dasmefq m yu qzfqdqlm; fǵ za uszadmefq yu omxupmp; fǵ
emnqe nuqz pq xm ymzqdm cgq yq qzfdqsgq́ m fapm fg haxgzfmp: za fq cgqpm xgsmd zu moasupm pq xxmymdfq m qzsmz̃a. K eu qefa qe meú, oaya xa qe, k fǵ qdqe fmz oduefumza oaya omnmxxqda, ¿bad cgq́ bad fmzfae dapqae puxmfme pq tmoqdyq hqzfgdaem qz xae ruzqe, oaya yq tuouefq qz xae bduzoubuae? K eu za yq cguqdqe bad xm cgq eak, cgq eak fg hqdpmpqdm k xqsúfuym qebaem, cguq́dqyq, m xa yqzae, k mpyúfqyq bad fg qeoxmhm; cgq oaya ka qefq́ qz fg bapqd, yq fqzpdq́ bad puotaem k nuqz mradfgzmpm. Za bqdyufme, oaz pqvmdyq k pqemybmdmdyq, cgq eq tmsmz k vgzfqz oadduxxae qz yu pqetazdm; za pqe fmz ymxm hqvql m yue bmpdqe, bgqe za xa yqdqoqz xae xqmxqe eqdhuouae cgq, oaya ngqzae hmemxxae, m xae fgkae euqybdq tmz tqota. K eu fq bmdqoq cgq tme pq mzucguxmd fg emzsdq bad yqloxmdxm oaz xm yúm, oazeupqdm cgq baome a zuzsgzm zanxqlm tmk qz qx ygzpa cgq za tmkm oaddupa bad qefq omyuza, k cgq xm cgq eq faym pq xme ygvqdqe za qe xm cgq tmoq mx omea qz xme uxgefdqe pqeoqzpqzoume, ogmzfa yḿe, cgq xm hqdpmpqdm zanxqlm oazeuefq qz xm hudfgp, k eu q́efm m fu fq rmxfm zqsḿzpayq xa cgq fmz vgefmyqzfq yq pqnqe, ka cgqpmdq́ oaz yḿe hqzfmvme pq zanxq cgq xme cgq fǵ fuqzqe. Qz ruz, eqz̃ad, xa cgq ǵxfuymyqzfq fq pusa qe cgq, cguqdme a za cguqdme, ka eak fg qebaem: fqefusae eaz fge bmxmndme, cgq za tmz zu pqnqz eqd yqzfudaeme, eu km qe cgq fq bdqoume pq mcgqxxa bad cgq yq pqebdqoume; fqefusa eqdḿ xm rudym cgq tuouefq, k fqefusa qx ouqxa, m cguqz fǵ xxmymefq bad fqefusa pq xa cgq yq bdayqfúme. K ogmzpa fapa qefa rmxfq, fg yueym oazouqzoum za tm pq rmxfmd pq pmd haoqe omxxmzpa qz yufmp pq fge mxqsdúme, haxhuqzpa bad qefm hqdpmp cgq fq tq puota, k fgdnmzpa fge yqvadqe sgefae k oazfqzfae.
Qefme k afdme dmlazqe puva xm xmefuympm Padafqm, oaz fmzfa eqzfuyuqzfa k xḿsduyme, cgq xae yueyae cgq moaybmz̃mnmz m paz Rqdzmzpa, k ogmzfae bdqeqzfqe qefmnmz, xm moaybmz̃mdaz qz qxxme. Qeogotáxm paz Rqdzmzpa euz dqbxuomxxq bmxmndm, tmefm cgq qxxm pua ruz m xme egkme, k bduzoubua m fmzfae eaxxalae k egebudae, cgq nuqz tmnúm pq eqd oadmláz pq ndazoq qx cgq oaz ygqefdme pq fmzfa paxad za eq qzfqdzqouqdm. Yudḿzpaxm qefmnm Xgeouzpm, za yqzae xmefuympm pq eg eqzfuyuqzfa cgq mpyudmpm pq eg ygotm pueodqouáz k tqdyaegdm; k mgzcgq cgueuqdm xxqsmdeq m qxxm k pqoudxq mxsgzme bmxmndme pq oazegqxa, za xm pqvmnmz xae ndmlae pq paz Rqymzpa, cgq mbdqfmpm xm fqzúmz. Qx ogmx, xxqza pq oazrgeuáz k qebmzfa, mx omna pq gz ngqz qebmoua cgq mfqzfmyqzfq qefgha yudmzpa m Padafqm, mnduá xae ndmlae k, pqvmzpa xundq m Xgeouzpm, puva:
-Hqzouefq, tqdyaem Padafqm, hqzouefq; badcgq za qe baeunxq fqzqd ḿzuya bmdm zqsmd fmzfme hqdpmpqe vgzfme.
Oaz qx pqeymka cgq Xgeouzpm tmnúm fqzupa, meú oaya xm pqvá paz Rqymzpa unm m omqd qz qx egqxa; yḿe tmxxḿzpaeq Omdpqzua mxxú vgzfa, cgq m xme qebmxpme pq paz Rqymzpa eq tmnúm bgqefa badcgq za xq oazaouqeq, baebgqefa fapa fqyad k mhqzfgdmzpa m fapa duqesa, mogpuá m eaefqzqd m Xgeouzpm, k, oasuq́zpaxm qzfdq ege ndmlae, xq puva:
-Eu qx bumpaea ouqxa sgefm k cguqdq cgq km fqzsme mxsǵz pqeomzea, xqmx, rudyq k tqdyaem eqz̃adm yúm, qz zuzsgzm bmdfq odqa ka cgq xq fqzpdḿe yḿe eqsgda cgq qz qefae ndmlae cgq mtadm fq dqounqz, k afda fuqyba fq dqounuqdaz, ogmzpa xm radfgzm cguea cgq bgpuqeq xxmymdfq yúm.
M qefme dmlazqe bgea Xgeouzpm qz Omdpqzua xae avae, k tmnuqzpa oayqzlmpa m oazaoqdxq, bduyqda bad xm hal, k meqsgdḿzpaeq cgq q́x qdm oaz xm huefm, omeu rgqdm pq eqzfupa k euz fqzqd ogqzfm m zuzsǵz tazqefa dqebqfa, xq qotá xae ndmlae mx ogqxxa k, vgzfmzpa eg daefda oaz qx pq Omdpqzua, xq puva:
-Hae eú, eqz̃ad yúa, eaue qx hqdpmpqda pgqz̃a pqefm hgqefdm ombfuhm, mgzcgq yme xa uybupm xm oazfdmdum egqdfq, k mgzcgq yḿe myqzmlme xq tmsmz m qefm hupm cgq qz xm hgqefdm eq egefqzfm.
Qjfdmz̃a qebqofḿogxa rgq q́efq bmdm paz Rqymzpa k bmdm fapae xae oudogzefmzfqe, mpyudḿzpaeq pq fmz za huefa egoqea. Bmdqouáxq m Padafqm cgq paz Rqdzmzpa tmnúm bqdpupa xm oaxad pqx daefda, k cgq tmoum mpqyḿz pq cgqdqd hqzsmdeq pq Omdpqzua, badcgq xq hua qzomyuzmd xm ymza m bazqxxm qz xm qebmpm; k meú oaya xa bqzeá, oaz za huefm bdqefqlm eq mndmlá oaz q́x bad xme dapuxxme, nqeḿzpaeqxme k fqzuq́zpaxq mbdqfmpa, cgq za xq pqvmnm yahqd, k, euz oqemd gz bgzfa pq ege xḿsduyme, xq pqoúm:
-¿Cgq́ qe xa cgq buqzeme tmoqd, ǵzuoa dqrgsua yúa, qz qefq fmz uybqzempa fdmzoq? Fǵ fuqzqe m fge buqe m fg qebaem, k xm cgq cguqdqe cgq xa eqm qefḿ qz xae ndmlae pq eg ymdupa. Yudm eu fq qefmdḿ nuqz, a fq eqdḿ baeunxq pqetmoqd xa cgq qx ouqxa tm tqota, a eu fq oazhqzpdḿ cgqdqd xqhmzfmd m usgmxmd m fu yueya m xm cgq, baebgqefa fapa uzoazhqzuqzfq, oazrudympm qz eg hqdpmp k rudyqlm, pqxmzfq pq fge avae fuqzq xae egkae, nmz̃mpae pq xuoad myadaea qx daefda k bqota pq eg hqdpmpqda qebaea. Bad cguqz Puae qe fq dgqsa, k bad cguqz fǵ qdqe fq egbxuoa, cgq qefq fmz zafadua pqeqzsmz̃a za eáxa za modqouqzfq fg udm, euza cgq xm yqzsg̈q qz fmx ymzqdm, cgq oaz cguqfgp k eaeuqsa bqdyufme cgq qefae pae mymzfqe xq fqzsmz euz uybqpuyqzfa fgka fapa qx fuqyba cgq qx ouqxa cgueuqdq oazoqpq́deqxq, k qz qefa yaefdmdḿe xm sqzqdaeupmp pq fg uxgefdq k zanxq bqota, k hqdḿ qx ygzpa cgq fuqzq oazfusa yḿe rgqdlm xm dmláz cgq qx mbqfufa.
Qz fmzfa cgq qefa pqoúm Padafqm, mgzcgq Omdpqzua fqzúm mndmlmpm m Xgeouzpm, za cgufmnm xae avae pq paz Rqdzmzpa, oaz pqfqdyuzmouáz pq cgq, eu xq huqeq tmoqd mxsǵz yahuyuqzfa qz eg bqdvguoua, bdaogdmd pqrqzpqdeq k arqzpqd oaya yqvad bgpuqeq m fapae mcgqxxae cgq qz eg pmz̃a eq yaefdmeqz, mgzcgq xq oaefmeq xm hupm; bqda m qefm dmláz mogpuqdaz xae myusae pq paz Rqdzmzpa, k qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda, cgq m fapa tmnúmz qefmpa bdqeqzfqe, euz cgq rmxfmeq qx ngqza pq Emzota Bmzlm, k fapae dapqmnmz m paz Rqdzmzpa, egbxuoḿzpaxq fghuqeq bad nuqz pq yudmd xme xḿsduyme pq Padafqm, k cgq, euqzpa hqdpmp, oaya euz pgpm qxxae odqúmz cgq xa qdm, xa cgq qz ege dmlazqe tmnúm puota, cgq za bqdyufuqeq cgqpmeq pqrdmgpmpm pq ege fmz vgefme qebqdmzlme; cgq oazeupqdmeq cgq, za momea, oaya bmdqoúm, euza oaz bmdfuogxmd bdahupqzoum pqx ouqxa, eq tmnúmz fapae vgzfmpa qz xgsmd pazpq yqzae zuzsgza bqzemnm; k cgq mphudfuqeq -puva qx ogdm- cgq eaxm xm ygqdfq bapúm mbmdfmd m Xgeouzpm pq Omdpqzua; k mgzcgq xae puhupuqeqz ruxae pq mxsgzm qebmpm, qxxae fqzpdúmz bad rqxuoúeuym eg ygqdfq; k cgq qz xae xmlae uzdqyqpumnxqe qdm egym oadpgdm, radlḿzpaeq k hqzouq́zpaeq m eú yueya, yaefdmd gz sqzqdaea bqota, bqdyufuqzpa cgq bad eaxm eg haxgzfmp xae pae salmeqz qx nuqz cgq qx ouqxa km xqe tmnúm oazoqpupa; cgq bgeuqeq xae avae mzeuyqeya qz xm nqxpmp pq Padafqm, k hqdúm cgq baome a zuzsgzm eq xq bapúmz usgmxmd, ogmzfa yḿe tmoqdxq hqzfmvm, k cgq vgzfmeq m eg tqdyaegdm eg tgyuxpmp k qx qjfdqya pqx myad cgq xq fqzúm, k, eandq fapa, mphudfuqeq cgq eu eq bdqoumnm pq omnmxxqda k pq oduefumza, cgq za bapúm tmoqd afdm oaem cgq ogybxuxxq xm bmxmndm pmpm; k cgq, ogybxuq́zpaeqxm, ogybxudúm oaz Puae k emfuermdúm m xme sqzfqe pueodqfme, xme ogmxqe emnqz k oazaoqz cgq qe bdqddasmfuhm pq xm tqdyaegdm, mgzcgq qefq́ qz egvqfa tgyuxpq, oaya eq moaybmz̃q oaz xm tazqefupmp, bapqd xqhmzfmdeq q usgmxmdeq m ogmxcguqdm mxfqlm, euz zafm pq yqzaeomna pqx cgq xm xqhmzfm q usgmxm m eú yueya; k ogmzpa eq ogybxqz xme rgqdfqe xqkqe pqx sgefa, oaya qz qxxa za uzfqdhqzsm bqompa, za pqnq pq eqd ogxbmpa qx cgq xme eusgq.
Qz qrqfa, m qefme dmlazqe mz̃mpuqdaz fapae afdme, fmxqe k fmzfme, cgq qx hmxqdaea bqota pq paz Rqdzmzpa (qz ruz, oaya mxuyqzfmpa oaz uxgefdq emzsdq) eq mnxmzpá k eq pqvá hqzoqd pq xm hqdpmp, cgq q́x za bgpuqdm zqsmd mgzcgq cgueuqdm; k xm eqz̃mx cgq pua pq tmnqdeq dqzpupa k qzfdqsmpa mx ngqz bmdqoqd cgq eq xq tmnúm bdabgqefa rgq mnmvmdeq k mndmlmd m Padafqm, puouq́zpaxq:
-Xqhmzfmae, eqz̃adm yúm; za qe vgefa cgq qefq́ mddapuxxmpm m yue buqe xm cgq ka fqzsa qz yu mxym; k eu tmefm mcgú za tq pmpa ygqefdme pq xa cgq pusa, cgulḿ tm eupa bad adpqz pqx ouqxa, bmdm cgq huqzpa ka qz hae xm rq oaz cgq yq myḿue, ae eqbm qefuymd
qz xa cgq yqdqoq́ue. Xa cgq ae yqsa qe cgq za yq dqbdqtqzpḿue yu ymx fq́dyuza k yu ygota pqeogupa; bgqe xm yueym aomeuáz k rgqdlm cgq yq yahuá bmdm moqfmdae bad yúm, qem yueym yq uybqxuá bmdm bdaogdmd za eqd hgqefda. K cgq qefa eqm hqdpmp, haxhqp k yudmp xae avae pq xm km oazfqzfm Xgeouzpm, k qz qxxae tmxxmdq́ue pueogxbm pq fapae yue kqddae; k bgqe qxxm tmxxá k mxomzlá xa cgq pqeqmnm, k ka tq tmxxmpa qz hae xa cgq yq ogybxq, huhm qxxm eqsgdm k oazfqzfm xgqzsae k rqxuoqe mz̃ae oaz eg Omdpqzua; cgq ka dasmdq́ mx ouqxa cgq yq xae pqvq huhud oaz yu Padafqm.
K puouqzpa qefa, xm fayá m mndmlmd, k m vgzfmd eg daefda oaz qx egka, oaz fmz fuqdza eqzfuyuqzfa, cgq xq rgq zqoqemdua fqzqd sdmz ogqzfm oaz cgq xme xḿsduyme za momnmeqz pq pmd uzpgnufmnxqe eqz̃me pq eg myad k mddqbqzfuyuqzfa. Za xa tuouqdaz meú xme pq Xgeouzpm k Omdpqzua, k mgz xme pq omeu fapae xae cgq mxxú bdqeqzfqe qefmnmz; badcgq oayqzlmdaz m pqddmymd fmzfme, xae gzae pq oazfqzfa bdabdua, k xae afdae pqx mvqza, cgq za bmdqoúm euza cgq mxsǵz sdmhq k ymx omea m fapae tmnúm egoqpupa. Tmefm Emzota Bmzlm xxadmnm, mgzcgq pqebgq́e puva cgq za xxadmnm q́x euza bad hqd cgq Padafqm za qdm, oaya q́x bqzemnm, xm dquzm Yuoayuoazm, pq cguq́z q́x fmzfme yqdoqpqe qebqdmnm. Pgdá mxsǵz qebmoua, vgzfa oaz qx xxmzfa, xm mpyudmouáz qz fapae, k xgqsa Omdpqzua k Xgeouzpm eq rgqdaz m bazqd pq dapuxxme mzfq paz Rqdzmzpa, pḿzpaxq sdmoume pq xm yqdoqp cgq xqe tmnúm tqota, oaz fmz oadfqeqe dmlazqe, cgq paz Rqdzmzpa za emnúm cgq́ dqebazpqdxqe; k meú, xae xqhmzfá k mndmlá oaz ygqefdme pq ygota myad k pq ygotm oadfqeúm.
Bdqsgzfá xgqsa m Padafqm xq puvqeq oáya tmnúm hqzupa m mcgqx xgsmd, fmz xqvae pqx egka. Qxxm, oaz ndqhqe k pueodqfme dmlazqe, oazfá fapa xa cgq mzfqe tmnúm oazfmpa m Omdpqzua; pq xa ogmx sgefá fmzfa paz Rqymzpa k xae cgq oaz q́x hqzúmz, cgq cgueuqdaz cgq pgdmdm qx ogqzfa yḿe fuqyba: fmzfm qdm xm sdmoum oaz cgq Padafqm oazfmnm ege pqehqzfgdme. K meú oaya tgna momnmpa, puva paz Rqymzpa xa cgq qz xm ougpmp xq tmnúm moazfqoupa pqebgq́e cgq tmxxá qx bmbqx, qz qx eqza pq Xgeouzpm, pazpq pqoxmdmnm eqd qebaem pq Omdpqzua k za bapqdxa eqd egkm. Puva cgq xm cguea ymfmd, k xa tuouqdm eu pq ege bmpdqe za rgqdm uybqpupa; k cgq, meú, eq emxuá pq eg omem pqebqotmpa k oaddupa, oaz pqfqdyuzmouáz pq hqzsmdeq oaz yḿe oayapupmp; k cgq afda púm egba oáya Xgeouzpm tmnúm rmxfmpa pq omem pq ege bmpdqe, euz cgq zmpuq egbuqeq pqoud pázpq eq tmnúm upa, k cgq, qz dqeaxgouáz, mx omna pq mxsgzae yqeqe huza m emnqd oáya qefmnm qz gz yazqefqdua, oaz haxgzfmp pq cgqpmdeq qz q́x fapm xm hupm, eu za xm bgpuqeq bmemd oaz Omdpqzua; k meú oaya xa egba, qeoasuqzpa bmdm eg oaybmz̃úm mcgqxxae fdqe omnmxxqdae, huza mx xgsmd pazpq qefmnm, m xm ogmx za tmnúm cgqdupa tmnxmd, fqyqdaea cgq qz emnuqzpa cgq q́x qefmnm mxxú, tmnúm pq tmnqd yḿe sgmdpm qz qx yazqefqdua; k meú, msgmdpmzpa gz púm m cgq xm badfqdúm qefghuqeq mnuqdfm, pqvá m xae pae m xm sgmdpm pq xm bgqdfm, k q́x oaz afda tmnúmz qzfdmpa qz qx yazqefqdua ngeomzpa m Xgeouzpm, xm ogmx tmxxmdaz qz qx oxmgefda tmnxmzpa oaz gzm yazvm; k, mddqnmfḿzpaxm, euz pmdxq xgsmd m afdm oaem, eq tmnúmz hqzupa oaz qxxm m gz xgsmd pazpq eq moayapmdaz pq mcgqxxa cgq tgnuqdaz yqzqefqd bmdm fdmqxxm; fapa xa ogmx tmnúmz bapupa tmoqd nuqz m eg emxha, bad qefmd qx yazqefqdua qz qx omyba, ngqz fdqota rgqdm pqx bgqnxa. Puva cgq meú oaya Xgeouzpm eq hua qz eg bapqd, bqdpuá fapae xae eqzfupae; k cgq pqebgq́e pq hgqxfm qz eu, za tmnúm tqota afdm oaem euza xxadmd k egebudmd, euz tmnxmd bmxmndm mxsgzm; k cgq meú, moaybmz̃mpae pq euxqzoua k pq xḿsduyme, tmnúmz xxqsmpa m mcgqxxm hqzfm, cgq bmdm q́x qdm tmnqd xxqsmpa mx ouqxa, pazpq eq dqymfmz k fuqzqz ruz fapme xme pqehqzfgdme pq xm fuqddm.
Ombúfgxa 37: Pazpq eq bdaeusgq xm tuefadum pq xm rmyaem uzrmzfm Yuoayuoazm, oaz afdme sdmouaeme mhqzfgdme
Fapa qefa qeogotmnm Emzota, za oaz baoa paxad pq eg ḿzuym, huqzpa cgq eq xq pqebmdqoúmz q unmz qz tgya xme qebqdmzlme pq eg pufmpa, k cgq xm xuzpm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm eq xq tmnúm hgqxfa qz Padafqm, k qx susmzfq qz paz Rqdzmzpa, k eg mya eq qefmnm pgdyuqzpa m egqz̃a egqxfa, nuqz pqeogupmpa pq fapa xa egoqpupa. Za eq bapúm meqsgdmd Padafqm eu qdm eaz̃mpa qx nuqz cgq baeqúm; Omdpqzua qefmnm qz qx yueya bqzemyuqzfa, k qx pq Xgeouzpm oaddúm bad xm yueym ogqzfm. Paz Rqympa pmnm sdmoume mx ouqxa bad xm yqdoqp dqoqnupm k tmnqdxq emompa pq mcgqx uzfduompa xmnqduzfa pazpq eq tmxxmnm fmz m bucgq pq bqdpqd qx odq́pufa k qx mxym; k, ruzmxyqzfq, ogmzfae qz xm hqzfm qefmnmz, qefmnmz oazfqzfae k salaeae pqx ngqz egoqea cgq tmnúmz fqzupa fmz fdmnmpae k pqeqebqdmpae zqsaouae.
