Fapa xa bazúm qz eg bgzfa qx ogdm, oaya pueodqfa, k m ompm gza pmnm qx bmdmnuq́z pqx nuqz mxomzlmpa; bqda cguqz yḿe vgnuxmnm k eq oazfqzfmnm qdm xm hqzfqdm, bad xm bdayqem cgq Omdpqzua k qx ogdm xq tmnúmz tqota pq bmsmxxq fapae xae pmz̃ae q uzfqdqeqe cgq bad ogqzfm pq paz Cguvafq xq tgnuqeqz hqzupa. Eáxa Emzota, oaya km eq tm puota, qdm qx mrxusupa, qx pqehqzfgdmpa k qx fduefq; k meú, oaz ymxqzoázuoa eqynxmzfq, qzfdá m eg mya, qx ogmx momnmnm pq pqebqdfmd, m cguqz puva:
-Nuqz bgqpq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad Fduefq Rusgdm, padyud fapa xa cgq cgueuqdq, euz ogupmpa pq ymfmd m zuzsǵz susmzfq, zu pq haxhqd m xm bduzoqem eg dquza; cgq km fapa qefḿ tqota k oazoxgupa.
-Qea odqa ka nuqz -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-, badcgq tq fqzupa oaz qx susmzfq xm yḿe pqeoaygzmx k pqemradmpm nmfmxxm cgq buqzea fqzqd qz fapae xae púme pq yu hupm, k pq gz dqhq́e, ¡lme!, xq pqddunq́ xm omnqlm qz qx egqxa, k rgq fmzfm xm emzsdq cgq xq emxuá, cgq xae mddakae oaddúmz bad xm fuqddm, oaya eu rgqdmz pq msgm.
-Oaya eu rgqdmz pq huza fuzfa, bgpuqdm hgqefdm yqdoqp pqoud yqvad -dqebazpuá Emzota-; badcgq cguqda cgq eqbm hgqefdm yqdoqp, eu qe cgq za xa emnq, cgq qx susmzfq ygqdfa qe gz ogqda tadmpmpa; k xm emzsdq, eque mddanme pq huza fuzfa cgq qzoqddmnm qz eg huqzfdq; k xm omnqlm oadfmpm qe... xm bgfm cgq yq bmduá, k xxq́hqxa fapa Emfmzḿe.
-K ¿cgq́ qe xa cgq puoqe, xaoa? -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-. ¿Qefḿe qz fg eqea?
-Xqhḿzfqeq hgqefdm yqdoqp -puva Emzota-, k hqdḿ qx ngqz dqompa cgq tm tqota, k xa cgq fqzqyae cgq bmsmd, k hqdḿ m xm dquzm oazhqdfupm qz gzm pmym bmdfuogxmd, xxmympm Padafqm, oaz afdae egoqeae, cgq, eu omq qz qxxae, xq tmz pq mpyudmd.
-Za yq ymdmhuxxmdúm pq zmpm pqea –dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-; badcgq eu nuqz fq mogqdpme, xm afdm hql cgq mcgú qefghuyae fq puvq ka cgq fapa ogmzfa mcgú egoqpúm qdmz oaeme pq qzomzfmyqzfa, k za eqdum ygota cgq mtadm rgqeq xa yqeya.
-Fapa xa odqkqdm ka -dqebazpuá Emzota-, eu fmynuq́z yu ymzfqmyuqzfa rgqdm oaem pqeq vmql; yme za xa rgq, euza dqmx k hqdpmpqdmyqzfq; k hu ka cgq qx hqzfqda cgq mcgú qefḿ tak púm fqzúm pqx gz omna pq xm ymzfm, k yq qybgvmnm tmoum qx ouqxa oaz ygota pazmudq k ndúa, k oaz fmzfm duem oaya rgqdlm; k pazpq uzfqdhuqzq oazaoqdeq xme bqdeazme, fqzsa bmdm yu, mgzcgq euybxq k bqompad, cgq za tmk qzomzfmyqzfa mxsgza, euza ygota yaxuyuqzfa k ygotm ymxm hqzfgdm.
-Mtadm nuqz, Puae xa dqyqpumdḿ -puva paz Cguvafq-. Pmyq pq hqefud, k pq́vmyq emxud mxxḿ rgqdm; cgq cguqda hqd xae egoqeae k fdmzeradymouazqe cgq puoqe.
Puaxq pq hqefud Emzota, k qz qx qzfdqfmzfa cgq eq hqefúm oazfá qx ogdm m paz Rqdzmzpa k m xae pqyḿe xme xaogdme pq paz Cguvafq, k pqx mdfuruoua cgq tmnúm gempa bmdm emomdxq pq xm Bqz̃m Bandq, pazpq q́x eq uymsuzmnm qefmd, bad pqepqzqe pq eg eqz̃adm. Oazfáxqe meuyueya omeu fapme xme mhqzfgdme cgq Emzota tmnúm oazfmpa, pq cgq za baoa eq mpyudmdaz k duqdaz, bad bmdqoqdxqe xa cgq m fapae bmdqoúm; eqd qx yḿe qjfdmz̃a sq́zqda pq xaogdm cgq bapúm omnqd qz bqzemyuqzfa puebmdmfmpa. Puva yḿe qx ogdm: cgq bgqe km qx ngqz egoqea pq xm eqz̃adm Padafqm uybqpúm bmemd oaz eg pqeuszua mpqxmzfq, cgq qdm yqzqefqd uzhqzfmd k tmxxmd afda bmdm bapqdxq xxqhmd m eg fuqddm. Ardqouáeq Omdpqzua pq bdaeqsgud xa oayqzlmpa, k cgq Xgeouzpm tmdúm k dqbdqeqzfmdúm xm bqdeazm pq Padafqm.
-Za -puva paz Rqdzmzpa-, za tm pq eqd meú: cgq ka cguqda cgq Padafqm bdaeusm eg uzhqzouáz; cgq oaya za eqm ygk xqvae pq mcgú qx xgsmd pqefq ngqz omnmxxqda, ka taxsmdq́ pq cgq eq bdaogdq eg dqyqpua.
-Za qefḿ yḿe pq pae vadzmpme pq mcgú.
-Bgqe mgzcgq qefghuqdm yḿe, sgefmdm ka pq omyuzmxxme, m fdgqoa pq tmoqd fmz ngqzm andm.
Emxuá, qz qefa, paz Cguvafq, mdympa pq fapae ege bqdfdqotae, oaz qx kqxya, mgzcgq mnaxxmpa, pq Ymynduza qz xm omnqlm, qyndmlmpa pq eg dapqxm k mdduympa m eg fdazoa a xmzláz. Egebqzpuá m paz Rqdzmzpa k m xae pqyḿe xm qjfdmz̃m bdqeqzoum pq paz Cguvafq, huqzpa eg daefda pq yqpum xqsgm pq mzpmpgdm, eqoa k mymduxxa, xm pqeusgmxpmp pq ege mdyme k eg yqegdmpa oazfuzqzfq, k qefghuqdaz omxxmzpa, tmefm hqd xa cgq q́x pqoúm; qx ogmx, oaz ygotm sdmhqpmp k dqbaea, bgqefae xae avae qz xm tqdyaem Padafqm, puva:
-Qefak uzradympa, tqdyaem eqz̃adm, pqefq yu qeogpqda cgq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm eq tm mzucguxmpa, k hgqefda eqd eq tm pqetqota, badcgq pq dquzm k sdmz eqz̃adm cgq eaxúmpqe eqd ae tmnq́ue hgqxfa qz gzm bmdfuogxmd pazoqxxm. Eu qefa tm eupa bad adpqz pqx dqk zusdaymzfq pq hgqefda bmpdq, fqyqdaea cgq ka za ae puqeq xm zqoqemdum k pqnupm mkgpm, pusa cgq za egba zu emnq pq xm yuem xm yqpum, k cgq rgq baoa hqdempa qz xme tuefadume omnmxxqdqeome; badcgq eu q́x xme tgnuqdm xqúpa k bmempa fmz mfqzfmyqzfq k oaz fmzfa qebmoua oaya ka xme bmeq́ k xqú, tmxxmdm m ompm bmea oáya afdae omnmxxqdae pq yqzad rmym cgq xm yúm tmnúmz momnmpa oaeme yḿe puruogxfaeme, za euq́zpaxa ygota ymfmd m gz susmzfuxxa, bad mddasmzfq cgq eqm; badcgq za tm ygotme tadme cgq ka yq hu oaz q́x, k... cguqda omxxmd, badcgq za yq pusmz cgq yuqzfa; bqda qx fuqyba, pqeogndupad pq fapme xme oaeme, xa pudḿ ogmzpa yqzae xa bqzeqyae.
-Húefqeae hae oaz pae ogqdae; cgq za oaz gz susmzfq -puva m qefm emláz qx hqzfqda.
Mx ogmx ymzpá paz Rqdzmzpa cgq omxxmeq k za uzfqddgybuqeq xm bxḿfuom pq paz Cguvafq qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm; k paz Cguvafq bdaeusguá puouqzpa:
-Pusa, qz ruz, mxfm k pqetqdqpmpm eqz̃adm, cgq eu bad xm omgem cgq tq puota hgqefda bmpdq tm tqota qefq yqfmyadráeqa qz hgqefdm bqdeazm, cgq za xq pque odq́pufa mxsgza; badcgq za tmk zuzsǵz bqxusda qz xm fuqddm bad cguqz za eq mndm omyuza yu qebmpm, oaz xm ogmx, bazuqzpa xm omnqlm pq hgqefda qzqyusa qz fuqddm, ae bazpdq́ m hae xm oadazm pq xm hgqefdm qz xm omnqlm, qz ndqhqe púme.
Za puva yḿe paz Cguvafq, k qebqdá m cgq xm bduzoqem xq dqebazpuqeq; xm ogmx, oaya km emnúm xm pqfqdyuzmouáz pq paz Rqdzmzpa pq cgq eq bdaeusguqeq mpqxmzfq qz qx qzsmz̃a tmefm xxqhmd m eg fuqddm m paz Cguvafq, oaz ygota pazmudq k sdmhqpmp xq dqebazpuá:
-Cguqzcguqdm cgq ae puva, hmxqdaea omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm, cgq ka yq tmnúm ygpmpa k fdaompa pq yu eqd, za ae puva xa ouqdfa, badcgq xm yueym cgq mkqd rgu yq eak tak. Hqdpmp qe cgq mxsgzm ygpmzlm tmz tqota qz yú ouqdfae momqouyuqzfae pq ngqzm hqzfgdm, cgq yq tmz pmpa xm yqvad cgq ka bgpuqdm pqeqmdyq; bqda za bad qea tq pqvmpa pq eqd xm cgq mzfqe, k pq fqzqd xae yqeyae bqzemyuqzfae pq hmxqdyq pqx hmxad pq hgqefda hmxqdaea q uzhqzqdmnxq ndmla cgq euqybdq tq fqzupa. Meú cgq, eqz̃ad yúa, hgqefdm nazpmp hgqxhm xm tazdm mx bmpdq cgq yq qzsqzpdá, k fq́zsmxq bad tayndq mphqdfupa k bdgpqzfq, bgqe oaz eg ouqzoum tmxxá omyuza fmz rḿoux k fmz hqdpmpqda bmdm dqyqpumd yu pqesdmoum; cgq ka odqa cgq eu bad hae, eqz̃ad, za rgqdm, vmyḿe moqdfmdm m fqzqd xm hqzfgdm cgq fqzsa; k qz qefa pusa fmzfm hqdpmp oaya eaz ngqzae fqefusae pqxxm xae yḿe pqefae eqz̃adqe cgq qefḿz bdqeqzfqe. Xa cgq dqefm qe cgq ymz̃mzm zae bazsmyae qz omyuza, badcgq km tak eq bapdḿ tmoqd baom vadzmpm, k qz xa pqyḿe pqx ngqz egoqea cgq qebqda, xa pqvmdq́ m Puae k mx hmxad pq hgqefda bqota.
Qefa puva xm pueodqfm Padafqm, k qz akq́zpaxa paz Cguvafq, eq haxhuá m Emzota, k oaz ygqefdme pq ygota qzava, xq puva:
-Mtadm fq pusa, Emzotgqxa, cgq qdqe qx ymkad nqxxmogqxa cgq tmk qz Qebmz̃m. Puyq, xmpdáz hmsmygzpa, ¿za yq momnmefq pq pqoud mtadm cgq qefm bduzoqem eq tmnúm hgqxfa qz gzm pazoqxxm cgq eq xxmymnm Padafqm, k cgq xm omnqlm cgq qzfuqzpa cgq oadfq́ m gz susmzfq qdm xm bgfm cgq fq bmduá, oaz afdae puebmdmfqe cgq yq bgeuqdaz qz xm ymkad oazrgeuáz cgq vmyḿe tq qefmpa qz fapae xae púme pq yu hupm? ¡Hafa... -k yudá mx ouqxa k mbdqfá xae puqzfqe-, cgq qefak bad tmoqd gz qefdmsa qz fu, cgq bazsm emx qz xm yaxxqdm m fapae ogmzfae yqzfudaeae qeogpqdae tgnuqdq pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, pq mcgú mpqxmzfq, qz qx ygzpa!
-Hgqefdm yqdoqp eq eaeuqsgq, eqz̃ad yúa -dqebazpuá Emzota-, cgq nuqz bapdúm eqd cgq ka yq tgnuqeq qzsmz̃mpa qz xa cgq faom m xm ygfmouáz pq xm eqz̃adm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm; bqda qz xa cgq faom m xm omnqlm pqx susmzfq, a, m xa yqzae, m xm tadmpmouáz pq xae ogqdae k m xa pq eqd huza fuzfa xm emzsdq, za yq qzsmz̃a, huhq Puae, badcgq xae ogqdae mxxú qefḿz tqdupae, m xm omnqoqdm pqx xqota pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, k qx huza fuzfa fuqzq tqota gz xmsa qx mbaeqzfa; k eu za, mx rdqúd pq xae tgqhae xa hqdḿ; cguqda pqoud cgq xa hqdḿ ogmzpa mcgú eg yqdoqp pqx eqz̃ad hqzfqda xq bupm qx yqzaeomna pq fapa. Pq xa pqyḿe, pq cgq xm eqz̃adm dquzm eq qefq́ oaya eq qefmnm, yq dqsaouva qz qx mxym. badcgq yq hm yu bmdfq, oaya m ompm tuva pq hqouza.
-Mtadm ka fq pusa, Emzota -puva paz Cguvafq-, cgq qdqe gz yqzfqomfa, k bqdpázmyq, k nmefm.
-Nmefm -puva paz Rqdzmzpa-, k za eq tmnxq yḿe qz qefa; k bgqe xm eqz̃adm bduzoqem puoq cgq eq omyuzq ymz̃mzm, badcgq km tak qe fmdpq, tḿsmeq meú, k qefm zaotq xm bapdqyae bmemd qz ngqzm oazhqdemouáz tmefm qx hqzupqda púm, pazpq fapae moaybmz̃mdqyae mx eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, badcgq cgqdqyae eqd fqefusae pq xme hmxqdaeme q uzmgpufme tmlmz̃me cgq tm pq tmoqd qz qx pueogdea pqefm sdmzpq qybdqem cgq m eg omdsa xxqhm.
-Ka eak qx cgq fqzsa pq eqdhudae k moaybmz̃mdae -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-, k msdmpqloa ygota xm yqdoqp cgq eq yq tmoq k xm ngqzm abuzuáz cgq pq yu eq fuqzq, xm ogmx bdaogdmdq́ cgq emxsm hqdpmpqdm, a yq oaefmdḿ xm hupm, k mǵz yḿe, eu yḿe oaefmdyq bgqpq.
Ygotme bmxmndme pq oayqpuyuqzfa k ygotae ardqouyuqzfae bmemdaz qzfdq paz Cguvafq k paz Rqdzmzpa; bqda m fapa bgea euxqzoua gz bmemvqda cgq qz mcgqxxm emláz qzfdá qz xm hqzfm, qx ogmx qz eg fdmvq yaefdmnm eqd oduefumza dqouq́z hqzupa pq fuqddm pq yadae, badcgq hqzum hqefupa oaz gzm omemom pq bmz̃a mlgx, oadfm pq rmxpme, oaz yqpume ymzsme k euz ogqxxa; xae omxlazqe qdmz meuyueya pq xuqzla mlgx, oaz nazqfq pq xm yueym oaxad; fdmúm gzae nadoqsgúqe pmfuxmpae k gz mxrmzvq yadueoa, bgqefa qz gz fmtqxú cgq xq mfdmhqemnm qx bqota. Qzfdá xgqsa fdme q́x, qzouym pq gz vgyqzfa, gzm ygvqd m xm yadueom hqefupm, ognuqdfa qx daefda, oaz gzm faom qz xm omnqlm; fdmúm gz nazqfuxxa pq ndaompa, k hqefupm gzm mxymxmrm, cgq pqepq xae tayndae m xae buqe xm ogndúm.
Qdm qx tayndq pq dangefa k msdmoumpa fmxxq, pq qpmp pq baoa yḿe pq ogmdqzfm mz̃ae, mxsa yadqza pq daefda, xmdsa pq nusafqe k xm nmdnm ygk nuqz bgqefm; qz dqeaxgouáz, q́x yaefdmnm qz eg mbaefgdm cgq eu qefghuqdm nuqz hqefupa, xq vglsmdmz bad bqdeazm pq omxupmp k nuqz zmoupm. Bupuá, qz qzfdmzpa, gz mbaeqzfa, k oaya xq puvqdaz cgq qz xm hqzfm za xq tmnúm, yaefdá dqoqnud bqempgyndq; k xxqsḿzpaeq m xm cgq qz qx fdmvq bmdqoúm yadm, xm mbqá qz ege ndmlae. Xgeouzpm, Padafqm, xm hqzfqdm, eg tuvm k Ymdufadzqe, xxqhmpae pqx zgqha k bmdm qxxae zgzom huefa fdmvq, dapqmdaz m xm yadm, k Padafqm, cgq euqybdq rgq msdmoumpm, oayqpupm k pueodqfm, bmdqouq́zpaxq cgq meú qxxm oaya qx cgq xm fdmúm eq oazsavmnmz bad xm rmxfm pqx mbaeqzfa, xq puva:
-Za ae pq́ ygotm bqzm, eqz̃adm yúm, xm uzoayapupmp pq dqsmxa cgq mcgú rmxfm, bgqe qe bdabdua pq hqzfme za tmxxmdeq qz qxxme; bqda, oaz fapa qefa, eu sgefḿdqpqe pq baemd oaz zaeafdme -eqz̃mxmzpa m Xgeouzpm-, cgulḿ qz qx pueogdea pqefq omyuza tmndq́ue tmxxmpa afdae za fmz ngqzae moasuyuqzfae.
Za dqebazpuá zmpm m qefa xm qynalmpm, za tula afdm oaem cgq xqhmzfmdeq pq pazpq eqzfmpa eq tmnúm, k bgqefme qzfdmynme ymzae odglmpme eandq qx bqota, uzoxuzmpm xm omnqlm, panxá qx ogqdza qz eqz̃mx pq cgq xa msdmpqoúm. Bad eg euxqzoua uymsuzmdaz cgq, euz pgpm mxsgzm, pqnúm pq eqd yadm k cgq za emnum tmnxmd oduefumza. Xxqsá, qz qefa, qx omgfuha, cgq qzfqzpuqzpa qz afdm oaem tmefm qzfazoqe tmnúm qefmpa, k huqzpa cgq fapme fqzúmz oqdompm m xm cgq oaz q́x hqzum, k cgq qxxm m ogmzfa xq pqoúmz omxxmnm, puva:
-Eqz̃adme yúme, qefm pazoqxxm mbqzme qzfuqzpq yu xqzsgm, zu emnq tmnxmd afdm zuzsgzm euza oazradyq m eg fuqddm, k bad qefa za pqnq pq tmnqd dqebazpupa, zu dqebazpq, m xa cgq eq xq tm bdqsgzfmpa.
-Za eq xq bdqsgzfm afdm oaem zuzsgzm -dqebazpuá Xgeouzpm- euza ardqoqxxq bad qefm zaotq zgqefdm oaybmz̃úm k bmdfq pqx xgsmd pazpq zae moayapḿdqyae, pazpq eq xq tmdḿ qx dqsmxa cgq xm oayapupmp ardqouqdq, oaz xm haxgzfmp cgq anxusm m eqdhud m fapae xae qjfdmzvqdae cgq pqxxa fghuqdqz zqoqeupmp, qebqoumxyqzfq euqzpa ygvqd m cguqz eq eudhq.
-Bad qxxm k bad yu -dqebazpuá qx omgfuha- ae nqea, eqz̃adm yúm, xme ymzae, k qefuya ygota k qz xa cgq qe dmláz xm yqdoqp ardqoupm, cgq qz fmx aomeuáz, k pq fmxqe bqdeazme oaya hgqefda bmdqoqd ygqefdm, nuqz eq qotm pq hqd cgq tm pq eqd ygk sdmzpq.
-Pqoupyq, eqz̃ad -puva Padafqm-: ¿qefm eqz̃adm qe oduefumzm, a yadm? Badcgq qx fdmvq k qx euxqzoua zae tmoq bqzemd cgq qe xa cgq za cgqddúmyae cgq rgqeq.
-Yadm qe qz qx fdmvq k qz qx ogqdza; bqda qz qx mxym qe ygk sdmzpq oduefumzm, badcgq fuqzq sdmzpúeuyae pqeqae pq eqdxa.
-Xgqsa ¿za qe nmbfulmpm? -dqbxuoá Xgeouzpm.
-Za tm tmnupa xgsmd bmdm qxxa -dqebazpuá qx omgfuha- pqebgq́e cgq emxuá pq Mdsqx, eg bmfdum k fuqddm, k tmefm msadm za eq tm huefa qz bqxusda pq ygqdfq fmz oqdomzm, cgq anxusmeq m nmbfulmxxm euz cgq egbuqeq bduyqda fapme xme oqdqyazume cgq zgqefdm Ympdq xm Emzfm Usxqeum ymzpm; bqda Puae eqdḿ eqdhupa cgq bdqefa eq nmgfuoq, oaz xm pqoqzoum cgq xm omxupmp pq eg bqdeazm yqdqoq, cgq qe yḿe pq xa cgq ygqefdm eg tḿnufa k qx yúa.
Oaz qefme dmlazqe bgea smzm qz fapae xae cgq qeogotḿzpaxq qefmnmz pq emnqd cguq́z rgqeq xm yadm k qx omgfuha; bqda zmpuq eq xa cguea bdqsgzfmd bad qzfazoqe, bad hqd cgq mcgqxxm emláz qdm yḿe bmdm bdaogdmdxqe pqeomzea cgq bmdm bdqsgzfmdxqe ege hupme. Padafqm xm fayá bad xm ymza, k xm xxqhá m eqzfmd vgzfa m eú, k xq dasá cgq eq cgufmeq qx qynala. Qxxm yudá mx omgfuha, oaya eu xq bdqsgzfmdm xq puvqeq xa cgq pqoúmz k xa cgq qxxm tmdúm. Qx, qz xqzsgm mdḿnusm, xq puva cgq xq bqpúmz eq cgufmeq qx qynala, k cgq xa tuouqeq; k meú, eq xa cgufá, k pqeognduá gz daefda fmz tqdyaea, cgq Padafqm xm fgha bad yḿe tqdyaem cgq m Xgeouzpm, k Xgeouzpm bad yḿe tqdyaem cgq m Padafqm, k fapae xae oudogzefmzfqe oazaouqdaz cgq eu mxsgza eq bapdúm usgmxmd mx pq xme pae, qdm qx pq xm yadm, k mgz tgna mxsgzae cgq xq mhqzfmvmdaz qz mxsgzm oaem. K oaya xm tqdyaegdm fqzsm bdqddasmfuhm k sdmoum pq dqoazouxumd xae ḿzuyae k mfdmqd xme haxgzfmpqe, xgqsa eq duzpuqdaz fapae mx pqeqa pq eqdhud k momduoumd m xm tqdyaem yadm.
Bdqsgzfá paz Rqdzmzpa mx omgfuha oáya eq xxmymnm xm yadm, qx ogmx dqebazpuá cgq Xqxm Ladmupm; k meú oaya qefa aká qxxm, qzfqzpuá xa cgq xq tmnúmz bdqsgzfmpa mx oduefumza, k puva oaz ygotm bduqem, xxqzm pq oazsavm k pazmudq:
-¡Za, za Ladmupm; Ymdúm, Ymdúm! -pmzpa m qzfqzpqd cgq eq xxmymnm Ymdúm k za Ladmupm.
Qefme bmxmndme k qx sdmzpq mrqofa oaz cgq xm yadm xme puva tuouqdaz pqddmymd yḿe pq gzm xḿsduym m mxsgzae pq xae cgq xm qeogotmdaz, qebqoumxyqzfq m xme ygvqdqe, cgq pq eg zmfgdmxqlm eaz fuqdzme k oaybmeuhme. Mndmláxm Xgeouzpm oaz ygota myad, puouq́zpaxq:
-Eu, eu, Ymdum, Ymdum.
M xa ogmx dqebazpuá xm yadm:
- Eú, eu, Ymdúm; Ladmupm ymomzsq, cgq cguqdq pqoud za.
Km qz qefa xxqsmnm xm zaotq, k bad adpqz pq xae cgq hqzúmz oaz paz Rqdzmzpa tmnúm qx hqzfqda bgqefa puxusqzoum k ogupmpa qz mpqdqlmdxqe pq oqzmd xa yqvad cgq m q́x xq rgqeq baeunxq. Xxqsmpm, bgqe, xm tadm, eqzfḿdazeq fapae m gzm xmdsm yqem oaya pq
fuzqxa, badcgq za xm tmnúm dqpazpm zu ogmpdmpm qz xm hqzfm, k puqdaz xm omnqoqdm k bduzoubmx meuqzfa, bgqefa cgq q́x xa dqtgemnm, m paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx cguea cgq qefghuqeq m eg xmpa xm eqz̃adm Yuoayuoazm, bgqe q́x qdm eg sgmdpmpad. Xgqsa eq eqzfmdaz Xgeouzpm k Ladmupm, k rdazfqda pqxfme paz Rqdzmzpa k Omdpqzua, k xgqsa qx omgfuha k xae pqyḿe omnmxxqdae, k mx xmpa pq xme eqz̃adme qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda. K meú, oqzmdaz oaz ygota oazfqzfa, k modqoqzfáeqxqe yḿe huqzpa cgq, pqvmzpa pq oayqd paz Cguvafq, yahupa pq afda eqyqvmzfq qebúdufg cgq qx cgq xq yahuá m tmnxmd fmzfa oaya tmnxá ogmzpa oqzá oaz xae omndqdae, oayqzlá m pqoud:
-Hqdpmpqdmyqzfq, eu nuqz eq oazeupqdm, eqz̃adqe yúae, sdmzpqe q uzmgpufme oaeme hqz xae cgq bdarqemz xm adpqz pq xm mzpmzfq omnmxxqdúm. Eu za, ¿ogḿx pq xae huhuqzfqe tmndḿ qz qx ygzpa cgq mtadm bad xm bgqpm pqefq omefuxxa qzfdmdm, k pq xm egqdfq cgq qefmyae zae huqdm, cgq vglsgq k odqm cgq zaeafdae eayae cguqz eayae? ¿Cguq́z bapdḿ pqoud cgq qefm eqz̃adm cgq qefm m yu xmpa qe xm sdmz dquzm cgq fapae emnqyae, k cgq ka eak mcgqx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm cgq mzpm bad mtú qz naom pq xm rmym? Mtadm za tmk cgq pgpmd, euza cgq qefm mdfq k qvqdououa qjoqpq m fapme mcgqxxme k mcgqxxae cgq xae tayndqe uzhqzfmdaz, k fmzfa yḿe eq tm pq fqzqd qz qefuym ogmzfa m yḿe bqxusdae qefḿ egvqfa. Cgúfqzeqyq pq pqxmzfq xae cgq puvqdqz cgq xme xqfdme tmoqz hqzfmvm m xme mdyme; cgq xqe pudq́, k eqmz cguqz eq rgqdqz, cgq za emnqz xa cgq puoqz. Badcgq xm dmláz cgq xae fmxqe egqxqz pqoud k m xa cgq qxxae yḿe eq mfuqzqz, qe cgq xae fdmnmvae pqx qebúdufg qjoqpqz m xae pqx ogqdba, k cgq xme mdyme eáxa oaz qx ogqdza eq qvqdoufmz, oaya eu rgqeq eg qvqdououa aruoua pq smzmbmzqe, bmdm qx ogmx za qe yqzqefqd yḿe pq ngqzme rgqdlme, a oaya eu qz qefa cgq xxmymyae mdyme xae cgq xme bdarqemyae za eq qzoqddmeqz xae mofae pq xm radfmxqlm, xae ogmxqe bupqz bmdm qvqogfmxxae ygota qzfqzpuyuqzfa, a oaya eu za fdmnmvmeq qx ḿzuya pqx sgqddqda cgq fuqzq m eg omdsa gz qvq́doufa, a xm pqrqzem pq gzm ougpmp eufumpm, meú oaz qx qebúdufg oaya oaz qx ogqdba. Eu za, hq́meq eu eq mxomzlm oaz xme rgqdlme oadbadmxqe m emnqd k oazvqfgdmd qx uzfqzfa pqx qzqyusa, xae pueuszuae, xme qefdmfmsqyme, xme puruogxfmpqe, qx bdqhqzud xae pmz̃ae cgq eq fayqz; cgq fapme qefme oaeme eaz moouazqe pqx qzfqzpuyuqzfa, qz cguqz za fuqzq bmdfq mxsgzm qx ogqdba. Euqzpa, bgqe, mzeú cgq xme mdyme dqcguqdqz qebúdufg, oaya xme xqfdme, hqmyae mtadm ogḿx pq xae pae qebúdufge, qx pqx xqfdmpa a qx pqx sgqddqda, fdmnmvm yḿe; k qefa eq hqzpdḿ m oazaoqd bad qx ruz k bmdmpqda m cgq ompm gza eq qzomyuzm; badcgq mcgqxxm uzfqzouáz eq tm pq qefuymd qz yḿe cgq fuqzq bad anvqfa yḿe zanxq ruz. Qe qx ruz k bmdmpqda pq xme xqfdme..., k za tmnxa mtadm pq xme puhuzme, cgq fuqzqz bad nxmzoa xxqhmd k qzomyuzmd xme mxyme mx ouqxa; cgq m gz ruz fmz euz ruz oaya q́efq zuzsgza afda eq xq bgqpq usgmxmd: tmnxa pq xme xqfdme tgymzme, cgq qe eg ruz bazqd qz eg bgzfa xm vgefuoum puefdungfuhm k pmd m ompm gza xa cgq qe egka, k qzfqzpqd k tmoqd cgq xme ngqzme xqkqe eq sgmdpqz. Ruz, bad ouqdfa, sqzqdaea k mxfa, k pusza pq sdmzpq mxmnmzlm; bqda za pq fmzfm oaya yqdqoq mcgqx m cgq xme mdyme mfuqzpqz, xme ogmxqe fuqzqz bad anvqfa k ruz xm bml, cgq qe qx ymkad nuqz cgq xae tayndqe bgqpqz pqeqmd qz qefm hupm. K meú, xme bduyqdme ngqzme zgqhme cgq fgha qx ygzpa k fghuqdaz xae tayndqe rgqdaz xme cgq puqdaz xae ḿzsqxqe xm zaotq cgq rgq zgqefda púm, ogmzpa omzfmdaz qz xae mudqe: «Sxadum eqm qz xme mxfgdme, k bml qz xm fuqddm m xae tayndqe pq ngqzm haxgzfmp»; k xm emxgfmouáz cgq qx yqvad ymqefda pq xm fuqddm k pqx ouqxa qzeqz̃á m ege mxxqsmpae k rmhadqoupae rgq pqoudxqe cgq ogmzpa qzfdmeqz qz mxsgzm omem puvqeqz: «Bml eqm qz qefm omem»; k afdme ygotme hqoqe xqe puva: «Yu bml ae pak; yu bml ae pqva; bml eqm oaz haeafdae», nuqz oaya vakm k bdqzpm pmpm k pqvmpm pq fmx ymza; vakm, cgq euz qxxm, qz xm fuqddm zu qz qx ouqxa bgqpq tmnqd nuqz mxsgza. Qefm bml qe qx hqdpmpqda ruz pq xm sgqddm; cgq xa yqeya qe pqoud mdyme cgq sgqddm. Bdaegbgqefm, bgqe, qefm hqdpmp, cgq qx ruz pq xm sgqddm qe xm bml, k cgq qz qefa tmoq hqzfmvm mx ruz pq xme xqfdme, hqzsmyae mtadm m xae fdmnmvae pqx ogqdba pqx xqfdmpa k m xae pqx bdarqead pq xme mdyme, k hq́meq ogḿxqe eaz ymkadqe.
Pq fmx ymzqdm k bad fmz ngqzae fq́dyuzae unm bdaeusguqzpa qz eg bxḿfuom paz Cguvafq, cgq anxusá m cgq, bad qzfazoqe, zuzsgza pq xae cgq qeogotḿzpaxq qefmnmz
xq fghuqeq bad xaoa; mzfqe, oaya fapae xae yḿe qdmz omnmxxqdae, m cguqz eaz mzqvme xme mdyme, xq qeogotmnmz pq ygk ngqzm smzm; k q́x bdaeusguá puouqzpa:
-Pusa, bgqe, cgq xae fdmnmvae pqx qefgpumzfq eaz q́efae: bduzoubmxyqzfq bandqlm za badcgq fapae eqmz bandqe, euza bad bazqd qefq omea qz fapa qx qjfdqya cgq bgqpm eqd; k qz tmnqd puota cgq bmpqoq bandqlm yq bmdqoq cgq za tmnúm cgq pqoud yḿe pq eg ymxm hqzfgdm; badcgq cguqz qe bandq za fuqzq oaem ngqzm. Qefm bandqlm xm bmpqoq bad ege bmdfqe, km qz tmyndq, km qz rdúa, km qz pqezgpql, km qz fapa vgzfa; bqda, oaz fapa qea, za qe fmzfm, cgq za oaym, mgzcgq eqm gz baoa yḿe fmdpq pq xa cgq eq gem; eqm pq xme eandme pq xae duoae, cgq qe xm ymkad yueqdum pqx qefgpumzfq qefq cgq qzfdq qxxae xxmymz mzpmd m xm eabm; k za xqe rmxfm mxsǵz mvqza ndmeqda a otuyqzqm, cgq, eu za omxuqzfm, m xa yqzae, qzfunuq eg rdúa, k, qz ruz, xm zaotq pgqdyqz pqnmva pq ognuqdfm. Za cguqda xxqsmd m afdme yqzgpqzoume, oazhuqzq m emnqd, pq xm rmxfm pq omyueme k za eandm pq lmbmfae, xm dmdupmp k baoa bqxa pqx hqefupa, zu mcgqx mtufmdeq oaz fmzfa sgefa, ogmzpa xm ngqzm egqdfq xqe pqbmdm mxsǵz nmzcgqfq. Bad qefq omyuza cgq tq buzfmpa, ḿebqda k puruogxfaea, fdabqlmzpa mcgú, omkqzpa mxxú, xqhmzfḿzpaeq mogxxḿ, fadzmzpa m omqd moḿ, xxqsmz mx sdmpa cgq pqeqmz; qx ogmx mxomzlmpa, m ygotae tqyae huefa cgq, tmnuqzpa bmempa bad qefme eudfqe k bad qefme Eouxme k Omdunpue oaya xxqhmpae qz hgqxa pq xm rmhadmnxq radfgzm, pusa cgq xae tqyae huefa ymzpmd k sanqdzmd qx ygzpa pqepq gzm euxxm, fdaompm eg tmyndq qz tmdfgdm, eg rdúa qz dqrdusqdua, eg pqezgpql qz smxme k eg padyud qz gzm qefqdm qz dqbaemd qz taxmzpme k pmymeoae, bdqyua vgefmyqzfq yqdqoupa pq eg hudfgp. Bqda oazfdmbgqefae k oaybmdmpae ege fdmnmvae oaz xae pqx yuxufq sgqddqda, eq cgqpmz ygk mfdḿe qz fapa, oaya mtadm pudq́.
Ombúfgxa 38: Cgq fdmfm pqx ogduaea pueogdea cgq tula paz Cguvafq pq xme mdyme k xme xqfdme
Bdaeusguqzpa paz Cguvafq puva:
-Bgqe oayqzlmyae qz qx qefgpumzfq bad xm bandqlm k ege bmdfqe, hqmyae eu qe yḿe duoa qx eaxpmpa. K hqdqyae cgq za tmk zuzsgza yḿe bandq qz xm yueym bandqlm, badcgq qefḿ mfqzupa m xm yueqdum pq eg bmsm, cgq huqzq a fmdpq a zgzom, a m xa cgq smdnqmdq bad ege ymzae, oaz zafmnxq bqxusda pq eg hupm k pq eg oazouqzoum. K m hqoqe egqxq eqd eg pqezgpql fmzfm, cgq gz oaxqfa mogotuxxmpa xq eudhq pq smxm k pq omyuem, k qz xm yufmp pqx uzhuqdza eq egqxq dqbmdmd pq xme uzoxqyqzoume pqx ouqxa, qefmzpa qz xm omybmz̃m dmem, oaz eáxa qx mxuqzfa pq eg naom, cgq, oaya emxq pq xgsmd hmoúa, fqzsa bad mhqdusgmpa cgq pqnq pq emxud rdúa, oazfdm fapm zmfgdmxqlm. Bgqe qebqdmp cgq qebqdq cgq xxqsgq xm zaotq, bmdm dqefmgdmdeq pq fapme qefme uzoayapupmpqe qz xm omym cgq xq msgmdpm, xm ogmx, eu za qe bad eg ogxbm, vmyḿe bqomdḿ pq qefdqotm; cgq nuqz bgqpq yqpud qz xm fuqddm xae buqe cgq cgueuqdq, k dqhaxhqdeq qz qxxm m eg emnad, euz fqyad cgq eq xq qzoavmz xme eḿnmzme. Xxq́sgqeq, bgqe, m fapa qefa, qx púm k xm tadm pq dqoqnud qx sdmpa pq eg qvqdououa; xxq́sgqeq gz púm pq nmfmxxm; cgq mxxú xq bazpdḿz xm nadxm qz xm omnqlm, tqotm pq tuxme, bmdm ogdmdxq mxsǵz nmxmla, cgq cgulḿ xq tmndḿ bmempa xme euqzqe, a xq pqvmdḿ qefdabqmpa pq ndmla a buqdzm. K ogmzpa qefa za egoqpm, euza cgq qx ouqxa bumpaea xq sgmdpq k oazeqdhq emza k huha, bapdḿ eqd cgq eq cgqpq qz xm yqeym bandqlm cgq mzfqe qefmnm, k cgq eqm yqzqefqd cgq egoqpm gza k afda dqzogqzfda, gzm k afdm nmfmxxm, k cgq pq fapme emxsm hqzoqpad, bmdm yqpdmd qz mxsa; bqda qefae yuxmsdae hqzeq dmdme hqoqe. Bqda, pqoupyq, eqz̃adqe, eu tmnq́ue yudmpa qz qxxa: ¿ogḿz yqzae eaz xae bdqyumpae bad xm sgqddm cgq xae cgq tmz bqdqoupa qz qxxm? Euz pgpm, tmnq́ue pq dqebazpqd, cgq za fuqzqz oaybmdmouáz, zu eq bgqpqz dqpgoud m ogqzfm Xae ygqdfae, k cgq eq bapdḿz oazfmd xae bdqyumpae huhae oaz fdqe xqfdme pq sgmdueya. Fapa qefa qe mx dqhq́e qz xae
xqfdmpae; badcgq pq rmxpme, cgq za cguqda pqoud pq ymzsme, fapae fuqzqz qz cgq́ qzfdqfqzqdeq; meú cgq, mgzcgq qe ymkad qx fdmnmva pqx eaxpmpa, qe ygota yqzad qx bdqyua.
Bqda m qefa eq bgqpq dqebazpqd cgq qe yḿe rḿoux bdqyumd m pae yux xqfdmpae cgq m fdquzfm yux eaxpmpae, badcgq m mcgqxxae eq bdqyumz oaz pmdxqe aruouae cgq bad rgqdlm eq tmz pq pmd m xae pq eg bdarqeuáz, k m q́efae za eq bgqpqz bdqyumd euza oaz xm yqeym tmouqzpm pqx eqz̃ad m cguqz eudhqz; k qefm uybaeunuxupmp radfuruom yḿe xm dmláz cgq fqzsa. Bqda pqvqyae qefa mbmdfq, cgq qe xmnqduzfa pq ygk puruogxfaem emxupm, euza haxhmyae m xm bdqqyuzqzoum pq xme mdyme oazfdm xme xqfdme, ymfqdum cgq tmefm mtadm qefḿ bad mhqdusgmd, eqsǵz eaz xme dmlazqe cgq ompm gzm pq eg bmdfq mxqsm; k qzfdq xme cgq tq puota, puoqz xme xqfdme cgq euz qxxme za eq bapdúmz egefqzfmd xme mdyme, badcgq xm sgqddm fmynuq́z fuqzq ege xqkqe k qefḿ egvqfm m qxxme, k cgq xme xqkqe omqz pqnmva pq xa cgq eaz xqfdme k xqfdmpae.
M qefa dqebazpqz xme mdyme cgq xme xqkqe za eq bapdḿz egefqzfmd euz qxxme, badcgq oaz xme mdyme eq pqruqzpqz xme dqbǵnxuome, eq oazeqdhmz xae dquzae, eq sgmdpmz xme ougpmpqe, eq meqsgdmz xae omyuzae, eq pqebqvmz xae ymdqe pq oaemduae, k, ruzmxyqzfq, eu bad qxxme za rgqeq, xme dqbǵnxuome, xae dquzae, xme yazmdcgúme, xme ougpmpqe, xae omyuzae pq ymd k fuqddm qefmdúmz egvqfae mx dusad k m xm oazrgeuáz cgq fdmq oazeusa xm sgqddm qx fuqyba cgq pgdm k fuqzq xuoqzoum pq gemd pq ege bdqhuxqsuae k pq ege rgqdlme. K qe dmláz mhqdusgmpm cgq mcgqxxa cgq yḿe ogqefm eq qefuym k pqnq pq qefuymd qz yḿe. Mxomzlmd mxsgza m eqd qyuzqzfq qz xqfdme xq ogqefm fuqyba, husuxume, tmyndq, pqezgpql, hmsgupae pq omnqlm, uzpusqefuazqe pq qefáymsa, k afdme oaeme m q́efme mptqdqzfqe, cgq, qz bmdfq, km xme fqzsa dqrqdupme; yme xxqsmd gza bad ege fq́dyuzae m eqd ngqz eaxpmpa xq ogqefm fapa xa cgq mx qefgpumzfq qz fmzfa ymkad sdmpa, cgq za fuqzq oaybmdmouáz, badcgq m ompm bmea qefḿ m bucgq pq bqdpqd xm hupm. K ¿cgq́ fqyad pq zqoqeupmp k bandqlm bgqpq xxqsmd zu rmfusmd mx qefgpumzfq, cgq xxqsgq mx cgq fuqzq gz eaxpmpa, cgq, tmxxḿzpaeq oqdompa qz mxsgzm rgqdlm, k qefmzpa pq baefm a sgmdpm qz mxsǵz dqnqxxúz a omnmxxqda, euqzfq cgq xae qzqyusae qefḿz yuzmzpa tmoum xm bmdfq pazpq q́x qefḿ, k za bgqpq mbmdfmdeq pq mxxú bad zuzsǵz omea, zu tgud qx bqxusda cgq pq fmz oqdom xq myqzmlm? Eáxa xa cgq bgqpq tmoqd qe pmd zafuoum m eg ombufḿz pq xa cgq bmem, bmdm cgq xa dqyqpuq oaz mxsgzm oazfdmyuzm, k q́x qefmdeq cgqpa, fqyuqzpa k qebqdmzpa ogḿzpa uybdahuemyqzfq tm pq egnud m xme zgnqe euz mxme, k nmvmd mx bdargzpa euz eg haxgzfmp. K eu q́efq bmdqoq bqcgqz̃a bqxusda, hqmyae eu xq usgmxm a tmoq hqzfmvm qx pq qynqefudeq pae smxqdme bad xme bdame qz yufmp pqx ymd qebmouaea, xme ogmxqe qzoxmhuvmpme k fdmnmpme, za xq cgqpm mx eaxpmpa yḿe qebmoua pqx cgq oazoqpq pae buqe pq fmnxm pqx qebaxáz; k, oaz fapa qefa, huqzpa cgq fuqzq pqxmzfq pq eú fmzfae yuzuefdae pq xm ygqdfq cgq xq myqzmlmz ogmzfae omz̃azqe pq mdfuxxqdúm eq meqefmz pq xm bmdfq oazfdmdum, cgq za puefmz pq eg ogqdba gzm xmzlm, k huqzpa cgq mx bduyqd pqeogupa pq xae buqe udúm m hueufmd xae bdargzpae eqzae pq Zqbfgza, k, oaz fapa qefa, oaz uzfdq́bupa oadmláz, xxqhmpa pq xm tazdm cgq xq uzoufm, eq bazq m eqd nxmzoa pq fmzfm mdomngoqdúm, k bdaogdm bmemd bad fmz qefdqota bmea mx nmvqx oazfdmdua. K xa cgq yḿe qe pq mpyudmd, cgq mbqzme gza tm omúpa pazpq za eq bapdḿ xqhmzfmd tmefm xm ruz pqx ygzpa, ogmzpa afda aogbm eg yqeya xgsmd; k eu q́efq fmynuq́z omq qz qx ymd, cgq oaya m qzqyusa xq msgmdpm, afda k afda xq egoqpq euz pmd fuqyba mx fuqyba pq ege ygqdfqe: hmxqzfúm k mfdqhuyuqzfa qx ymkad cgq eq bgqpq tmxxmd qz fapae xae fdmzoqe pq xm sgqddm.
¡Nuqz tmkmz mcgqxxae nqzpufae eusxae cgq omdqouqdaz pq xm qebmzfmnxq rgdum pq mcgqefae qzpqyazumpae uzefdgyqzfae pq xm mdfuxxqdúm¡ m ogka uzhqzfad fqzsa bmdm yú cgq qz qx uzruqdza eq xq qefḿ pmzpa qx bdqyua pq eg pumnáxuom uzhqzouáz, oaz xm ogmx pua omgem cgq gz uzrmyq k oanmdpq ndmla cgufq xm hupm m gz hmxqdaea omnmxxqda, k cgq, euz emnqd oáya a bad pázpq, qz xm yufmp pqx oadmvq k ndúa cgq qzouqzpq k mzuym m xae hmxuqzfqe bqotae, xxqsm gzm pqeymzpmpm nmxm, puebmdmpm pq cguqz cgulḿ tgká k eq qebmzfá pqx dqebxmzpad cgq tula qx rgqsa mx puebmdmd pq xm ymxpufm
yḿcguzm, k oadfm k momnm qz gz uzefmzfq xae bqzemyuqzfae k hupm pq cguqz xm yqdqoúm salmd xgqzsae eusxae. K meú, oazeupqdmzpa qefa, qefak bad pqoud cgq qz qx mxym yq bqem pq tmnqd faympa qefq qvqdououa pq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq qz qpmp fmz pqfqefmnxq oaya qe qefm qz cgq mtadm huhuyae; badcgq mgzcgq m yú zuzsǵz bqxusda yq bazq yuqpa, fapmhúm yq bazq dqoqxa bqzemd eu xm báxhadm k qx qefmz̃a yq tmz pq cgufmd xm aomeuáz pq tmoqdyq rmyaea k oazaoupa bad qx hmxad pq yu ndmla k ruxae pq yu qebmpm, bad fapa xa pqeognuqdfa pq xm fuqddm. Bqda tmsm qx ouqxa xa cgq rgqdq eqdhupa; cgq fmzfa eqdq́ yḿe qefuympa, eu emxsa oaz xa cgq bdqfqzpa, ogmzfa m ymkadqe bqxusdae yq tq bgqefa cgq eq bgeuqdaz xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe pq xae bmempae eusxae.
Fapa qefq xmdsa bdqḿyngxa puva paz Cguvafq qz fmzfa cgq xae pqyḿe oqzmnmz, axhupḿzpaeq pq xxqhmd naompa m xm naom, bgqefa cgq mxsgzme hqoqe xq tmnúm puota Emzota Bmzlm cgq oqzmeq; cgq pqebgq́e tmndúm xgsmd bmdm pqoud fapa xa cgq cgueuqdq. Qz xae cgq qeogotmpa xq tmnúmz eandqhuza zgqhm xḿefuym, pq hqd cgq tayndq cgq, mx bmdqoqd, fqzúm ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa k ngqz pueogdea qz fapme xme oaeme cgq fdmfmnm, xq tgnuqeq bqdpupa fmz dqymfmpmyqzfq qz fdmfḿzpaxq pq eg zqsdm k bulyuqzfm omnmxxqdúm. Qx ogdm xq puva cgq fqzúm ygotm dmláz qz fapa ogmzfa tmnúm puota qz rmhad pq xme mdyme, k cgq q́x, mgzcgq xqfdmpa k sdmpgmpa, qefmnm pq eg yqeya bmdqoqd.
Momnmdaz pq oqzmd, xqhmzfmdaz xae ymzfqxqe, k qz fmzfa cgq xm hqzfqdm, eg tuvm k Ymdufadzqe mpqdqlmnmz qx omymdmzotáz pq paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, pazpq tmnúmz pqfqdyuzmpa cgq mcgqxxm zaotq xme ygvqdqe eaxme qz q́x eq dqoasuqeqz, paz Rqdzmzpa dasá mx omgfuha xqe oazfmeq qx pueogdea pq eg hupm, badcgq za bapdúm eqd euza cgq rgqeq bqdqsduza k sgefaea, eqsǵz xme ygqefdme cgq tmnúm oayqzlmpa m pmd, huzuqzpa qz oaybmz̃úm pq Ladmupm. M xa ogmx dqebazpuá qx omgfuha cgq pq ygk ngqzm smzm tmdúm xa cgq eq xq ymzpmnm, k cgq eáxa fqyúm cgq qx ogqzfa za tmnúm pq eqd fmx, cgq xqe puqeq qx sgefa cgq q́x pqeqmnm; bqda cgq, oaz fapa qea, bad za rmxfmd qz anqpqoqxxq, xq oazfmdúm. Qx ogdm k fapae xae pqyḿe eq xa msdmpqouqdaz, k pq zgqha eq xa dasmdaz; k q́x, huq́zpaeq dasmd pq fmzfae, puva cgq za qdmz yqzqefqd yqsae mpazpq qx ymzpmd fqzúm fmzfm rgqdlm.
-K meú, qefq́z hgqefdme yqdoqpqe mfqzfae, k audḿz gz pueogdea hqdpmpqda m cguqz bapdúm eqd cgq za xxqsmeqz xae yqzfudaeae cgq oaz ogduaea k bqzempa mdfuruoua egqxqz oaybazqdeq.
Oaz qefa cgq puva tula cgq fapae eq moayapmeqz k xq bdqefmeqz gz sdmzpq euxqzoua; k q́x, huqzpa cgq km omxxmnmz k qebqdmnmz xa cgq pqoud cgueuqeq, oaz hal msdmpmnxq k dqbaempm oayqzlá m pqoud pqefm ymzqdm:
Ombúfgxa 39: Pazpq qx omgfuha ogqzfm eg hupm k egoqeae
-Qz gz xgsmd pq xme yazfmz̃me pq Xqáz fgha bduzoubua yu xuzmvq, oaz cguqz rgq yḿe msdmpqoupm k xunqdmx xm zmfgdmxqlm cgq xm radfgzm, mgzcgq qz xm qefdqotqlm pq mcgqxxae bgqnxae fapmhúm mxomzlmnm yu bmpdq rmym pq duoa, k hqdpmpqdmyqzfq xa rgqdm eu meú eq puqdm ymz̃m m oazeqdhmd eg tmouqzpm oaya eq xm pmnm qz smefmxxm. K xm oazpuouáz cgq fqzúm pq eqd xunqdmx k smefmpad xq bdaoqpuá pq tmnqd eupa eaxpmpa xae mz̃ae pq eg vghqzfgp; cgq qe qeogqxm xm eaxpmpqeom pazpq qx yqlcguza eq tmoq rdmzoa, k qx rdmzoa, bdápusa; k eu mxsgzae eaxpmpae eq tmxxmz yueqdmnxqe, eaz oaya yazefdgae cgq eq hqz dmdme hqoqe. Bmemnm yu bmpdq xae fq́dyuzae pq xm xunqdmxupmp k dmkmnm qz xae pq eqd bdápusa, oaem cgq za xq qe pq zuzsǵz bdahqota mx tayndq omempa k cgq fuqzq tuvae cgq xq tmz pq egoqpqd qz qx zayndq k qz qx eqd. Xae cgq yu bmpdq fqzúm qdmz fdqe, fapae hmdazqe k fapae pq qpmp pq bapqd qxqsud qefmpa. Huqzpa, bgqe, yu bmpdq cgq, eqsǵz q́x pqoúm, za bapúm udeq m xm ymza oazfdm eg oazpuouáz, cguea bduhmdeq pqx uzefdgyqzfa k omgem cgq xq tmoum smefmpad k pmpuhaea, cgq rgq bduhmdeq pq xm tmouqzpm, euz xm ogmx qx yueya Mxqvmzpda bmdqouqdm qefdqota. K meú, xxmyḿzpazae gz púm m fapae fdqe m eaxme qz gz mbaeqzfa, zae puva gzme dmlazqe eqyqvmzfqe m xme cgq mtadm pudq́:
«-Tuvae, bmdm pqoudae cgq ae cguqda nuqz nmefm emnqd k pqoud cgq eaue yue tuvae; k bmdm qzfqzpqd cgq ae cguqda ymx nmefm emnqd cgq za yq hak m xm ymza qz xa cgq faom m oazeqdhmd hgqefdm tmouqzpm. Bgqe bmdm cgq qzfqzpḿue pqepq mcgú mpqxmzfq cgq ae cguqda oaya bmpdq, k cgq za ae cguqda pqefdgud oaya bmpdmefda, cguqda tmoqd gzm oaem oaz haeafdae cgq tm ygotae púme cgq xm fqzsa bqzempm k oaz ympgdm oazeupqdmouáz puebgqefm. Haeafdae qefḿue km qz qpmp pq faymd qefmpa, a, m xa yqzae, pq qxqsud qvqdououa, fmx, cgq, ogmzpa ymkadqe, ae tazdq k mbdahqotq. K xa cgq tq bqzempa qe tmoqd pq yu tmouqzpm ogmfda bmdfqe: xme fdqe ae pmdq́ m haeafdae,
m ompm gza xa cgq xq faomdq, euz qjoqpqd qz oaem mxsgzm, k oaz xm afdm yq cgqpmdq́ ka bmdm huhud k egefqzfmdyq xae púme cgq qx ouqxa rgqdq eqdhupa pq pmdyq pq hupm. Bqda cgqddúm cgq pqebgq́e cgq ompm gza fghuqeq qz eg bapqd xm bmdfq cgq xq faom pq eg tmouqzpm, eusguqeq gza pq xae omyuzae cgq xq pudq́. Tmk gz dqrdḿz qz zgqefdm Qebmz̃m, m yu bmdqoqd, ygk hqdpmpqda, oaya fapae xa eaz, bad eqd eqzfqzoume ndqhqe emompme pq xm xgqzsm k pueodqfm qjbqduqzoum; k qx cgq ka pusa puoq: «Usxqeum, a ymd, a omem dqmx», oaya eu yḿe oxmdmyqzfq puvqdm: «Cguqz cgueuqdq hmxqd k eqd duoa, eusm, a xm Usxqeum, a zmhqsgq, qvqdoufmzpa qx mdfq pq xm yqdomzoúm, a qzfdq m eqdhud m xae dqkqe qz ege omeme»; badcgq puoqz: «Yḿe hmxq yusmvm pq dqk cgq yqdoqp pq eqz̃ad». Pusa qefa badcgq cgqddúm, k qe yu haxgzfmp, cgq gza pq haeafdae eusguqeq xme xqfdme, qx afda xm yqdomzoúm, k qx afda eudhuqeq mx dqk qz xm sgqddm, bgqe qe puruogxfaea qzfdmd m eqdhudxq qz eg omem; cgq km cgq xm sgqddm za pq́ ygotme ducgqlme, egqxq pmd ygota hmxad k ygotm rmym. Pqzfda pq aota púme ae pmdq́ fapm hgqefdm bmdfq qz puzqdae, euz pqrdmgpmdae qz gz mdpufq, oaya xa hqdq́ue bad xm andm. Pqoupyq mtadm eu cgqdq́ue eqsgud yu bmdqoqd k oazeqva qz xa cgq ae tq bdabgqefa».
K ymzpḿzpayq m yu, bad eqd qx ymkad, cgq dqebazpuqeq, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdxq puota cgq za eq pqetuouqeq pq xm tmouqzpm, euza cgq smefmeq fapa xa cgq rgqeq eg haxgzfmp, cgq zaeafdae q́dmyae yalae bmdm emnqd smzmdxm, huzq m oazoxgud qz cgq ogybxudúm eg sgefa, k cgq qx yúa qdm eqsgud qx qvqdououa pq xme mdyme, eudhuqzpa qz q́x m Puae k m yu dqk. Qx eqsgzpa tqdymza tula xae yqeyae ardqouyuqzfae, k qeoasuá qx udeq m xme Uzpume, xxqhmzpa qybxqmpm xm tmouqzpm cgq xq ogbuqeq. Qx yqzad, k, m xa cgq ka odqa, qx yḿe pueodqfa, puva cgq cgqdúm eqsgud xm Usxqeum, a udeq m momnmd ege oayqzlmpae qefgpuae m Emxmymzom.
Meú oaya momnmyae pq oazoadpmdzae k qeoasqd zgqefdae qvqdououae, yu bmpdq zae mndmlá m fapae, k oaz xm ndqhqpmp cgq puva bgea bad andm ogmzfa zae tmnúm bdayqfupa; k pmzpa m ompm gza eg bmdfq, cgq, m xa cgq eq yq mogqdpm, rgqdaz ompm fdqe yux pgompae qz puzqdae (badcgq gz zgqefda fúa oaybdá fapm xm tmouqzpm k xm bmsá pq oazfmpa, badcgq za emxuqeq pqx fdazoa pq xm omem), qz gz yqeya púm zae pqebqpuyae fapae fdqe pq zgqefda ngqz bmpdq, k qz mcgqx yqeya, bmdqouq́zpayq m yú eqd uztgymzupmp cgq yu bmpdq cgqpmeq huqva k oaz fmz baom tmouqzpm, tuoq oaz q́x cgq pq yue fdqe yux faymeq xae pae yux pgompae, badcgq m yú yq nmefmnm qx dqefa bmdm moayapmdyq pq xa cgq tmnúm yqzqefqd gz eaxpmpa. Yue pae tqdymzae, yahupae pq yu qvqybxa, ompm gza xq pua yux pgompae; pq yapa cgq m yu bmpdq xq cgqpmdaz ogmfda yux qz puzqdae, k yḿe fdqe yux, cgq, m xa cgq bmdqoq, hmxúm xm tmouqzpm cgq xq ogba, cgq za cguea hqzpqd, euza cgqpmdeq oaz qxxm qz dmúoqe. Pusa, qz ruz, cgq zae pqebqpuyae pq́x, k pq mcgqx zgqefda fúa cgq tq puota, za euz ygota eqzfuyuqzfa k xḿsduyme pq fapae, qzomdsḿzpazae cgq xqe tuouq́eqyae emnqd, fapme xme hqoqe cgq tgnuqeq oayapupmp bmdm qxxa, pq zgqefdae egoqeae, bdáebqdae a mphqdeae. Bdayqfúyaeeqxa k mndmlḿzpazae k qotḿzpazae eg nqzpuouáz, qx gza fayá qx humvq pq Emxmymzom, qx afda pq Eqhuxxm, k ka qx pq Mxuomzfq, mpazpq fghq zgqhme cgq tmnúm gzm zmhq suzahqem cgq omdsmnm mxxú xmzm bmdm Sq́zahm.
Qefq tmdḿ hquzfq k pae mz̃ae cgq emxú pq omem pq yu bmpdq, k qz fapae qxxae, bgqefa cgq tq qeodufa mxsgzme omdfme, za tq emnupa pq́x zu pq yue tqdymzae zgqhm mxsgzm; k xa cgq qz qefq pueogdea pq fuqyba tq bmempa xa pudq́ ndqhqyqzfq. Qynmdcgq́yq qz Mxuomzfq, xxqsgq́ oaz bdáebqda humvq m Sq́zahm, rgu pqepq mxxú m Yuxḿz, pazpq yq moayapq́ pq mdyme k pq mxsgzme smxme pq eaxpmpa, pq pazpq cgueq ud m eqzfmd yu bxmlm mx Bumyazfq; k qefmzpa km pq omyuza bmdm Mxqvmzpdúm pq xm Bmxúm, fghq zgqhme cgq qx sdmz pgcgq pq Mxnm bmemnm m Rxmzpqe. Ygpq́ bdabáeufa, rgúyq oaz q́x, eqdhúxq qz xme vadzmpme cgq tula, tmxxq́yq qz xm ygqdfq pq xae oazpqe pq Qsgqyáz k pq Tadzae, mxomzoq́ m eqd mxrq́dql pq gz rmyaea ombufḿz pq Sgmpmxmvmdm, xxmympa Puqsa pq Gdnuzm, k m omna pq mxsǵz fuqyba cgq xxqsgq́ m Rxmzpqe, eq fgha zgqhme pq xm xusm cgq xm Emzfupmp pqx Bmbm Búa Cguzfa, pq rqxuoq dqoadpmouáz, tmnúm tqota oaz Hqzqoum k oaz Qebmz̃m, oazfdm qx qzqyusa oayǵz, cgq qe qx Fgdoa; qx ogmx qz mcgqx yqeya
fuqyba tmnúm smzmpa oaz eg mdympm xm rmyaem uexm pq Otubdq, cgq qefmnm pqnmva pqx payuzua pqx Hqzqoumza: bq́dpupm xmyqzfmnxq k pqepuotmpm.
Eǵbaeq ouqdfa cgq hqzum bad sqzqdmx pqefm xusm qx eqdqzúeuya paz Vgmz pq Mgefdum, tqdymza zmfgdmx pq zgqefda ngqz dqk paz Rqxubq; puhgxsáeq qx sdmzpúeuya mbmdmfa pq sgqddm cgq eq tmoúm; fapa xa ogmx yq uzoufá k oazyahuá qx ḿzuya k qx pqeqa pq hqdyq qz xm vadzmpm cgq eq qebqdmnm; k mgzcgq fqzúm nmddgzfae, k omeu bdayqeme ouqdfme, pq cgq qz xm bduyqdm aomeuáz cgq eq ardqouqeq eqdúm bdayahupa m ombufḿz, xa cgueq pqvmd fapa k hqzudyq, oaya yq huzq m Ufmxum. K cguea yu ngqzm egqdfq cgq qx eqz̃ad paz Vgmz pq Mgefdum momnmnm pq xxqsmd m Sq́zahm; cgq bmemnm m Zḿbaxqe m vgzfmdeq oaz xm mdympm pq Hqzqoum, oaya pqebgq́e xa tula qz Yqouzm. Pusa, qz ruz, cgq ka yq tmxxq́ qz mcgqxxm rqxuoúeuym vadzmpm, km tqota ombufḿz pq uzrmzfqdúm, m ogka tazdaea omdsa yq egnuá yu ngqzm egqdfq, yḿe cgq yue yqdqouyuqzfae. K mcgqx púm, cgq rgq bmdm xm oduefumzpmp fmz puotaea, badcgq qz q́x eq pqeqzsmz̃á qx ygzpa k fapme xme zmouazqe pqx qddad qz cgq qefmnmz, odqkqzpa cgq xae fgdoae qdmz uzhqzounxqe bad xm ymd, qz mcgqx púm, pusa, pazpq cgqpá qx adsgxxa k eanqdnum afaymzm cgqndmzfmpm, qzfdq fmzfae hqzfgdaeae cgq mxxú tgna (badcgq yḿe hqzfgdm fghuqdaz xae oduefumzae cgq mxxú ygduqdaz cgq xae cgq huhae k hqzoqpadqe cgqpmdaz), ka eáxa rgu qx pqepuotmpa; bgqe, qz omynua pq cgq bgpuqdm qebqdmd, eu rgqdm qz xae daymzae eusxae, mxsgzm zmhmx oadazm, yq hu mcgqxxm zaotq cgq eusguá m fmz rmyaea púm oaz ompqzme m xae buqe k qebaeme m xme ymzae. K rgq pqefm egqdfq: cgq tmnuqzpa qx Gotmxú, dqk pq Mdsqx, mfdqhupa k hqzfgdaea oaemdua, qynqefupa k dqzpupa xm ombufmzm pq Ymxfm, cgq eaxae fdqe omnmxxqdae cgqpmdaz huhae qz qxxm, k q́efae ymx tqdupae, mogpuá xm ombufmzm pq Vgmz Mzpdqm m eaoaddqxxm, qz xm ogmx ka unm oaz yu oaybmz̃úm; k tmouqzpa xa cgq pqnúm qz aomeuáz eqyqvmzfq, emxfq́ qz xm smxqdm oazfdmdum, xm ogmx pqehuḿzpaeq pq xm cgq xm tmnúm qynqefupa, qefadná cgq yue eaxpmpae yq eusguqeqz, k meú, yq tmxxq́ eaxa qzfdq yue qzqyusae, m cguqz za bgpq dqeuefud, bad eqd fmzfae; qz ruz yq duzpuqdaz xxqza pq tqdupme. K oaya km tmndq́ue, eqz̃adqe, aúpa pqoud cgq qx Gotmxú eq emxhá oaz fapm eg qeogmpdm, huzq ka m cgqpmd omgfuha qz eg bapqd, k eáxa rgu qx fduefq qzfdq fmzfae mxqsdqe k qx omgfuha qzfdq fmzfae xundqe; badcgq rgqdaz cguzoq yux oduefumzae xae cgq mcgqx púm mxomzlmdaz xm pqeqmpm xunqdfmp, cgq fapae hqzúmz mx dqya qz xm fgdcgqeom mdympm.
Xxqhḿdazyq m Oazefmzfuzabxm, pazpq qx Sdmz Fgdoa Eqxuy tula sqzqdmx pq xm ymd m yu mya, badcgq tmnúm tqota eg pqnqd qz xm nmfmxxm, tmnuqzpa xxqhmpa bad ygqefdm pq eg hmxad qx qefmzpmdfq pq xm dqxusuáz pq Ymxfm. Tmxxq́yq qx eqsgzpa mz̃a, cgq rgq qx pq eqfqzfm k pae, qz Zmhmduza nasmzpa qz xm ombufmzm pq xae fdqe rmzmxqe. Hu k zafq́ xm aomeuáz cgq mxxú eq bqdpuá pq za oasqd qz qx bgqdfa fapm qx mdympm fgdcgqeom; badcgq fapae xae xqhqzfqe k sqzúlmdae cgq qz qxxm hqzúmz fghuqdaz bad ouqdfa cgq xqe tmnúmz pq qynqefud pqzfda pqx yqeya bgqdfa, k fqzúmz m bgzfa eg dabm k bmemymcgqe, cgq eaz ege lmbmfae, bmdm tgudeq xgqsa bad fuqddm, euz qebqdmd eqd oaynmfupae; fmzfa qdm qx yuqpa cgq tmnúmz oandmpa m zgqefdm mdympm. Bqda qx ouqxa xa adpqzá pq afdm ymzqdm, za bad ogxbm zu pqeogupa pqx sqzqdmx cgq m xae zgqefdae dqsum, euza bad xae bqompae pq xm oduefumzpmp, k badcgq cguqdq k bqdyufq Puae cgq fqzsmyae euqybdq hqdpgsae cgq zae omefusgqz. Qz qrqfa, qx Gotmxú eq dqoasuá m Yapáz, cgq qe gzm uexm cgq qefm vgzfa m Zmhmduza, k qotmzpa xm sqzfq qz fuqddm, radfuruoá xm naom pqx bgqdfa, k qefǵhaeq cgqpa tmefm cgq qx eqz̃ad paz Vgmz eq haxhuá. Qz qefq humvq eq fayá xm smxqdm cgq eq xxmymnm Xm Bdqem, pq cguqz qdm ombufḿz gz tuva pq mcgqx rmyaea oaemdua Nmdnmddavm. Fayáxm xm ombufmzm pq Zḿbaxqe, xxmympm Xm Xanm, dqsupm bad mcgqx dmka pq xm sgqddm, bad qx bmpdq pq xae eaxpmpae, bad mcgqx hqzfgdaea k vmyḿe hqzoupa ombufḿz paz Mxhmda pq Nmlḿz, ymdcgq́e pq Emzfm Odgl. K za cguqda pqvmd pq pqoud xa cgq egoqpuá qz xm bdqem pq Xm Bdqem. Qdm fmz odgqx qx tuva pq Nmdnmddavm, k fdmfmnm fmz ymx m ege omgfuhae, cgq meú oaya xae cgq hqzúmz mx dqya huqdaz cgq xm smxqdm Xanm xqe unm qzfdmzpa k cgq xae mxomzlmnm, eaxfmdaz fapae m gz fuqyba xae dqyae, k meuqdaz pq eg ombufḿz, cgq qefmnm eandq qx qefmzfqdax sdufmzpa cgq nasmeqz mbduqem, k bmeḿzpaxq pq nmzoa qz nmzoa, pq babm m bdam, xq puqdaz naompae, cgq m baoa yme cgq bmeá pqx ḿdnax km tmnúm bmempa eg
ḿzuym mx uzruqdza: fmx qdm, oaya tq puota, xm odgqxpmp oaz cgq xae fdmfmnm, k qx apua cgq qxxae xq fqzúmz. Haxhuyae m Oazefmzfuzabxm, k qx mz̃a eusguqzfq, cgq rgq qx pq eqfqzfm k fdqe, eq egba qz qxxm oaya qx eqz̃ad paz Vgmz tmnúm smzmpa m Fǵzql, k cgufmpa mcgqx dquza m xae fgdoae, k bgqefa qz baeqeuáz pq́x m Ygxqk Tmyqf, oadfmzpa xme qebqdmzlme cgq pq haxhqd m dquzmd qz q́x fqzúm Ygxqk Tmyupm, qx yada yḿe odgqx k yḿe hmxuqzfq cgq fgha qx ygzpa. Euzfuá ygota qefm bq́dpupm qx Sdmz Fgdoa, k, gemzpa pq xm emsmoupmp cgq fapae xae pq eg omem fuqzqz, tula bml oaz hqzqoumzae, cgq ygota yḿe cgq q́x xm pqeqmnmz, k qx mz̃a eusguqzfq pq eqfqzfm k ogmfda moayqfuá m xm Saxqfm, k mx rgqdfq cgq vgzfa m Fǵzql tmnúm pqvmpa yqpua xqhmzfmpa qx eqz̃ad paz Vgmz. Qz fapae qefae fdmzoqe mzpmnm ka mx dqya, euz qebqdmzlm pq xunqdfmp mxsgzm; m xa yqzae, za qebqdmnm fqzqdxm bad dqeomfq, badcgq fqzúm pqfqdyuzmpa pq za qeodunud xme zgqhme pq yu pqesdmoum m yu bmpdq.
Bqdpuáeq, qz ruz, xm Saxqfm, bqdpuáeq qx rgqdfq, eandq xme ogmxqe bxmlme tgna pq eaxpmpae fgdoae bmsmpae eqfqzfm k ouzoa yux, k pq yadae k mxḿdmnqe pq fapm xm Ḿrduom, yḿe pq ogmfdaouqzfae yux, moaybmz̃mpa qefq sdmz zǵyqda pq sqzfq oaz fmzfme ygzuouazqe k bqdfdqotae pq sgqddm, k oaz fmzfae smefmpadqe, cgq oaz xme ymzae k m bgz̃mpae pq fuqddm bgpuqdmz ogndud xm Saxqfm k qx rgqdfq. Bqdpuáeq bduyqda xm Saxqfm, fqzupm tmefm qzfazoqe bad uzqjbgszmnxq, k za eq bqdpuá bad ogxbm pq ege pqrqzeadqe (xae ogmxqe tuouqdaz qz eg pqrqzem fapa mcgqxxa cgq pqnúmz k bapúmz), euza badcgq xm qjbqduqzoum yaefdá xm rmouxupmp oaz cgq eq bapúmz xqhmzfmd fduzotqme qz mcgqxxm pqeuqdfm mdqzm, badcgq m pae bmxyae eq tmxxmnm msgm, k xae fgdoae za xm tmxxmdaz m pae hmdme; k meú, oaz ygotae emoae pq mdqzm xqhmzfmdaz xme fduzotqme fmz mxfme, cgq eandqbgvmdmz xme ygdmxxme pq xm rgqdlm; k fudḿzpaxqe m omnmxxqda, zuzsgza bapúm bmdmd, zu meuefud m xm pqrqzem.
Rgq oayǵz abuzuáz cgq za eq tmnúmz pq qzoqddmd xae zgqefdae qz xm Saxqfm, euza qebqdmd qz omybmz̃m mx pqeqynmdompqda, k xae cgq qefa puoqz tmnxmz pq xqvae k oaz baom qjbqduqzoum pq omeae eqyqvmzfqe; badcgq eu qz xm Saxqfm k qz qx rgqdfq mbqzme tmnúm euqfq yux eaxpmpae, ¿oáya bapúm fmz baoa zǵyqda, mgzcgq yḿe qeradlmpae rgqeqz, emxud m xm omybmz̃m k cgqpmd qz xme rgqdlme, oazfdm fmzfa oaya qdm qx pq xae qzqyusae? K ¿oáya qe baeunxq pqvmd pq bqdpqdeq rgqdlm cgq za qe eaoaddupm, k yḿe ogmzpa xm oqdomz qzqyusae ygotae k badrumpae, k qz eg yqeym fuqddm? Bqda m ygotae xqe bmdqouá, k meú yq bmdqouá m yu, cgq rgq bmdfuogxmd sdmoum k yqdoqp cgq qx ouqxa tula m Qebmz̃m qz bqdyufud cgq eq meaxmeq mcgqxxm aruouzm k ombm pq ymxpmpqe, k mcgqxxm sayum a qebazvm k baxuxxm pq xm uzruzupmp pq puzqdae cgq mxxú euz bdahqota eq smefmnmz, euz eqdhud pq afdm oaem cgq pq oazeqdhmd xm yqyadum pq tmnqdxm smzmpa xm rqxuoúeuym pqx uzhuofúeuya Omdxae H, oaya eu rgqdm yqzqefqd bmdm tmoqdxm qfqdzm, oaya xa qe k eqdḿ, cgq mcgqxxme buqpdme xm egefqzfmdmz. Bqdpuáeq fmynuq́z qx rgqdfq; bqda rgq́dazxq smzmzpa xae fgdoae bmxya m bmxya, badcgq xae eaxpmpae cgq xa pqrqzpúmz bqxqmdaz fmz hmxqdaem k rgqdfqyqzfq, cgq bmemdaz pq hquzfq k ouzoa yux qzqyusae xae cgq ymfmdaz qz hquzfq k pae memxfae sqzqdmxqe cgq xqe puqdaz. Zuzsgza omgfuhmdaz emza pq fdqeouqzfae cgq cgqpmdaz huhae, eqz̃mx ouqdfm k oxmdm pq eg qergqdla k hmxad, k pq xa nuqz cgq eq tmnúmz pqrqzpupa, k sgmdpmpa ege bxmlme. Duzpuáeq m bmdfupa gz bqcgqz̃a rgqdfq a faddq cgq qefmnm qz yufmp pqx qefmz̃a, m omdsa pq paz Vgmz Lmzasgqdm, omnmxxqda hmxqzoumza k rmyaea eaxpmpa. Omgfuhmdaz m paz Bqpda Bgqdfaomddqda, sqzqdmx pq xm Saxqfm, qx ogmx tula ogmzfa rgq baeunxq bad pqrqzpqd eg rgqdlm; k euzfuá fmzfa qx tmnqdxm bqdpupa, cgq pq bqemd ygduá qz qx omyuza pq Oazefmzfuzabxm, pazpq xq xxqhmnmz omgfuha. Omgfuhmdaz mzeuyqeya mx sqzqdmx pqx rgqdfq, cgq eq xxmymnm Smndua Oqdhqxxáz, omnmxxqda yuxmzq́e, sdmzpq uzsqzuqda k hmxqzfúeuya eaxpmpa. Ygduqdaz qz qefme pae rgqdlme ygotme bqdeazme pq ogqzfm, pq xme ogmxqe rgq gzm Bmsḿz pq Adum, omnmxxqda pqx tḿnufa pq Emz Vgmz, pq oazpuouáz sqzqdaea, oaya xa yaefdá xm egym xunqdmxupmp cgq geá oaz eg tqdymza qx rmyaea Vgmz Mzpdqm pq Adum; k xa cgq yḿe tula xmefuyaem eg ygqdfq rgq tmnqd ygqdfa m ymzae pq gzae mxḿdmnqe pq cguqz eq ruá, huqzpa km bqdpupa qx rgqdfq, cgq eq ardqouqdaz pq xxqhmdxq qz tḿnufa pq yada m Fmnmdom, cgq qe gz badfqlgqxa a omem cgq qz mcgqxxme dunqdme fuqzqz xae suzahqeqe cgq eq qvqdoufmz
qz xm bqecgqdúm pqx oadmx; xae ogmxqe mxḿdmnqe xq oadfmdaz xm omnqlm k eq xm fdgvqdaz mx sqzqdmx pq xm mdympm fgdcgqeom, qx ogmx ogybxuá oaz qxxae zgqefda dqrdḿz omefqxxmza: «cgq mgzcgq xm fdmuouáz mbxmoq, qx fdmupad eq mnaddqoq»; k meú, eq puoq cgq ymzpá qx sqzqdmx mtadomd m xae cgq xq fdgvqdaz qx bdqeqzfq, badcgq za eq xq tmnúmz fdmúpa huha.
Qzfdq xae oduefumzae cgq qz qx rgqdfq eq bqdpuqdaz, rgq gza xxmympa paz Bqpda pq Msguxmd, zmfgdmx za eq́ pq cgq́ xgsmd pqx Mzpmxgoúm, qx ogmx tmnúm eupa mxrq́dql qz qx rgqdfq, eaxpmpa pq ygotm ogqzfm k pq dmda qzfqzpuyuqzfa; qebqoumxyqzfq fqzúm bmdfuogxmd sdmoum qz xa cgq xxmymz baqeúm. Púsaxa badcgq eg egqdfq xq fdgva m yu smxqdm k m yu nmzoa, k m eqd qeoxmha pq yu yqeya bmfdáz; k mzfqe cgq zae bmdfuq́eqyae pq mcgqx bgqdfa tula qefq omnmxxqda pae eazqfae m ymzqdm pq qbufmruae, qx gza m xm Saxqfm k qx afda mx rgqdfq. K qz hqdpmp cgq xae fqzsa pq pqoud, badcgq xae eq́ pq yqyadum k odqa cgq mzfqe omgemdḿz sgefa cgq bqempgyndq.
Qz qx bgzfa cgq qx omgfuha zayndq́ m paz Bqpda pq Msguxmd, paz Rqdzmzpa yudá m ege omymdmpme, k fapae fdqe eq eazduqdaz; k ogmzpa xxqsá m pqoud pq xae eazqfae, puva qx gza:
-Mzfqe cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp bmeq mpqxmzfq, xq egbxuoa yq pusm cgq́ eq tula qeq paz Bqpda pq Msguxmd cgq tm puota.
-Xa cgq eq́ qe -dqebazpuá qx omgfuha- cgq mx omna pq pae mz̃ae cgq qefgha qz Oazefmzfuzabxm, eq tgká qz fdmvq pq mdzmǵfq oaz gz sduqsa qebúm, k za eq́ eu huza qz xunqdfmp, bgqefa cgq odqa cgq eu, badcgq pq mxxú m gz mz̃a hu ka mx sduqsa qz Oazefmzfuzabxm k za xq bgpq bdqsgzfmd qx egoqea pq mcgqx humvq.
-Bgqe xa rgq -dqebazpuá qx omnmxxqda-, badcgq qeq paz Bqpda qe yu tqdymza, k qefḿ mtadm qz zgqefda xgsmd, ngqza k duoa, omempa k oaz fdqe tuvae.
-Sdmoume eqmz pmpme m Puae -puva qx omgfuha- bad fmzfme yqdoqpqe oaya xq tula; badcgq za tmk qz xm fuqddm, oazradyq yu bmdqoqd, oazfqzfa cgq eq usgmxq m mxomzlmd xm xunqdfmp bqdpupm.
-K yḿe -dqbxuoá qx omnmxxqda-, cgq ka eq́ xae eazqfae cgq yu tqdymza tula. -Pusmxae, bgqe, hgqefdm yqdoqp -puva qx omgfuha-, cgq xae emndḿ pqoud yqvad cgq ka. -Cgq yq bxmoq -dqebazpuá qx omnmxxqda-; k qx pq xm Saxqfm pqoúm meú:
Ombúfgxa 40: Pazpq eq bdaeusgq xm tuefadum pqx omgfuha

k, mdpuqzpa qz udm k qz tazdaea oqxa,

bduyqda cgq qx hmxad rmxfá xm hupm
qz xae omzempae ndmlae, cgq, ygduqzpa, oaz eqd hqzoupae, xxqhmz xm hufadum.

qzfdq qx ygda k qx tuqdda, ae hm mpcguduqzpa

-Pqem yqeym ymzqdm xq eq́ ka -puva qx omgfuha.
-Bgqe qx pqx rgqdfq, eu ymx za yq mogqdpa –puva qx omnmxxqda-, puoq meú:
Eazqfa
Pq qzfdq qefm fuqddm qefq́dux, pqddunmpm,
pqefae fqddazqe bad qx egqxa qotmpae,
xme mxyme emzfme pq fdqe yux eaxpmpae
egnuqdaz huhme m yqvad yadmpm,

qz xae bmempae eusxae k bdqeqzfqe.

Za bmdqouqdaz ymx xae eazqfae, k qx omgfuha eq mxqsdq́ oaz xme zgqhme cgq pq eg omymdmpm xq puqdaz, k, bdaeusguqzpa eg ogqzfa, puva:
-Dqzpupae, bgqe, xm Saxqfm k qx rgqdfq, xae fgdoae puqdaz adpqz qz pqeymzfqxmd xm Saxqfm (badcgq qx rgqdfq cgqpá fmx, cgq za tgna cgq́ bazqd bad fuqddm), k bmdm tmoqdxa oaz yḿe ndqhqpmp k yqzae fdmnmva, xm yuzmdaz bad fdqe bmdfqe; bqda oaz zuzsgzm eq bgpa haxmd xa cgq bmdqoúm yqzae rgqdfq, cgq qdmz xme ygdmxxme huqvme, k fapa mcgqxxa cgq tmnúm cgqpmpa qz buq pq xm radfuruomouáz zgqhm cgq tmnúm tqota qx Rdmfúz, oaz ygotm rmouxupmp huza m fuqddm. Qz dqeaxgouáz, xm mdympm haxhuá m Oazefmzfuzabxm fdugzrmzfq k hqzoqpadm, k pq mxxú m baoae yqeqe ygduá yu mya qx Gotmxú, mx ogmx xxmymnmz Gotmxú Rmdfmj, cgq cguqdq pqoud qz xqzsgm fgdcgqeom qx dqzqsmpa fuz̃aea, badcgq xa qdm, k qe oaefgyndq qzfdq xae fgdoae bazqdeq zayndqe pq mxsgzm rmxfm cgq fqzsmz, a pq mxsgzm hudfgp cgq qz qxxae tmkm; k qefa qe badcgq za tmk qzfdq qxxae euza ogmfda mbqxxupae pq xuzmvqe cgq pqouqzpqz pq xm omem
Afaymzm, k xae pqyḿe, oaya fqzsa puota, faymz zayndq k mbqxxupa km pq xme fmotme pqx ogqdza, k km pq xme hudfgpqe pqx ḿzuya. K qefq Fuz̃aea nasá qx dqya, euqzpa qeoxmha pqx Sdmz Eqz̃ad, omfadoq mz̃ae, k m yme pq xae fdquzfm k ogmfda pq eg qpmp dqzqsá, pq pqebqota pq cgq gz fgdoa, qefmzpa mx dqya, xq pua gz narqfáz, k bad bapqdeq hqzsmd pqvá eg rq; k rgq fmzfa eg hmxad, cgq, euz egnud bad xae fadbqe yqpuae k omyuzae cgq xae yḿe bduhmpae pqx Sdmz Fgdoa egnqz, huza m eqd dqk pq Mdsqx, k pqebgq́e, m eqd sqzqdmx pq xm ymd, cgq qe qx fqdoqda omdsa cgq tmk qz mcgqx eqz̃adúa. Qdm omxmndq́e pq zmouáz, k yadmxyqzfq rgq tayndq pq nuqz, k fdmfmnm oaz ygotm tgymzupmp m ege omgfuhae, cgq xxqsa m fqzqd fdqe yux, xae ogmxqe, pqebgq́e pq eg ygqdfq, eq dqbmdfuqdaz, oaya q́x xa pqvá qz eg fqefmyqzfa, qzfdq qx Sdmz Eqz̃ad (cgq fmynuq́z qe tuva tqdqpqda pq ogmzfae ygqdqz k qzfdm m xm bmdfq oaz xae yḿe tuvae cgq pqvm qx purgzfa) k qzfdq ege dqzqsmpae; k ka ogbq m gz dqzqsmpa hqzqoumza cgq, euqzpa sdgyqfq pq gzm zmhq, xq omgfuhá qx Gotmxú, k xq cguea fmzfa, cgq rgq gza pq xae yḿe dqsmxmpae smdlazqe egkae, k q́x huza m eqd qx yḿe odgqx dqzqsmpa cgq vmyḿe eq tm huefa. Xxmyḿnmeq Mlḿz Msḿ, k xxqsá m eqd ygk duoa, k m eqd dqk pq Mdsqx; oaz qx ogmx ka huzq pq Oazefmzfuzabxm, mxsa oazfqzfa, bad qefmd fmz oqdom pq Qebmz̃m, za badcgq bqzemeq qeodunud m zmpuq qx pqepuotmpa egoqea yúa, euza bad hqd eu yq qdm yḿe rmhadmnxq xm egqdfq qz Mdsqx cgq qz Oazefmzfuzabxm, pazpq km tmnúm bdanmpa yux ymzqdme pq tgudyq, k zuzsgzm fgha emláz zu hqzfgdm; k bqzemnm qz Mdsqx ngeomd afdae yqpuae pq mxomzlmd xa cgq fmzfa pqeqmnm, badcgq vmyḿe yq pqemybmdá xm qebqdmzlm pq fqzqd xunqdfmp; k ogmzpa qz xa cgq rmnduomnm, bqzemnm k bazúm bad andm za oaddqebazpúm qx egoqea m xm uzfqzouáz, xgqsa, euz mnmzpazmdyq, ruzsúm k ngeomnm afdm qebqdmzlm cgq yq egefqzfmeq, mgzcgq rgqeq pq́nux k rxmom. Oaz qefa qzfdqfqzúm xm hupm, qzoqddmpa qz gzm bdueuáz a omem cgq xae fgdoae xxmymz nmz̃a, pazpq qzouqddmz xae omgfuhae oduefumzae, meú xae cgq eaz pqx dqk oaya pq mxsgzae bmdfuogxmdqe, k xae cgq xxmymz pqx mxymoq́z, cgq qe oaya pqoud omgfuhae pqx oazoqva, cgq eudhqz m xm ougpmp qz xme andme bǵnxuome cgq tmoq k qz afdae aruouae, k qefae fmxqe omgfuhae fuqzqz ygk puruogxfaem eg xunqdfmp; cgq, oaya eaz pqx oayǵz k za fuqzqz mya bmdfuogxmd, za tmk oaz cguqz fdmfmd eg dqeomfq, mgzcgq xq fqzsmz. Qz qefae nmz̃ae, oaya fqzsa puota, egqxqz xxqhmd m ege omgfuhae mxsgzae bmdfuogxmdqe pqx bgqnxa, bduzoubmxyqzfq ogmzpa eaz pq dqeomfq, badcgq mxxú xae fuqzqz taxsmpae k eqsgdae tmefm cgq hqzsm eg dqeomfq. Fmynuq́z xae omgfuhae pqx dqk cgq eaz pq dqeomfq za emxqz mx fdmnmva oaz xm pqyḿe otgeym, eu za qe ogmzpa eq fmdpm eg dqeomfq; cgq qzfazoqe, bad tmoqdxqe cgq qeodunmz bad q́x oaz yḿe mtúzoa, xqe tmoqz fdmnmvmd k ud bad xqz̃m oaz xae pqyḿe, cgq qe gz za bqcgqz̃a fdmnmva.
Ka, bgqe, qdm gza pq xae pq dqeomfq; cgq oaya eq egba cgq qdm ombufḿz, bgqefa cgq puvq yu baom baeunuxupmp k rmxfm pq tmouqzpm, za mbdahqotá zmpm bmdm cgq za yq bgeuqeqz qz qx zǵyqda pq xae omnmxxqdae k sqzfq pq dqeomfq. Bgeuq́dazyq gzm ompqzm, yḿe bad eqz̃mx pq dqeomfq cgq bad sgmdpmdyq oaz qxxm, k meú bmemnm xm hupm qz mcgqx nmz̃a, oaz afdae ygotae omnmxxqdae k sqzfq bduzoubmx, eqz̃mxmpae k fqzupae bad pq dqeomfq; k mgzcgq xm tmyndq k pqezgpql bgpuqdm rmfusmdzae m hqoqe, k mgz omeu euqybdq, zuzsgzm oaem zae rmfusmnm fmzfa oaya aúd k hqd m ompm bmea xme vmyḿe huefme zu aúpme odgqxpmpqe cgq yu mya gemnm oaz xae oduefumzae. Ompm púm mtadomnm qx egka, qybmxmnm m q́efq, pqeadqvmnm m mcgq́x; k qefa, bad fmz baom aomeuáz, k fmz euz qxxm, cgq xae fgdoae oazaoúmz cgq xa tmoum za yḿe pq bad tmoqdxa, k bad eqd zmfgdmx oazpuouáz egkm eqd tayuoupm pq fapa qx sq́zqda tgymza. Eaxa xundá nuqz oaz q́x gz eaxpmpa qebmz̃ax xxmympa fmx pq Emmhqpdm, qx ogmx, oaz tmnqd tqota oaeme cgq cgqpmdḿz qz xm yqyadum pq mcgqxxme sqzfqe bad ygotae mz̃ae, k fapme bad mxomzlmd xunqdfmp, vmyḿe xq pua bmxa, zu eq xa ymzpá pmd, zu xq puva ymxm bmxmndm; k bad xm yqzad oaem pq ygotae cgq tula fqyúmyae fapae cgq tmnúm pq eqd qybmxmpa, k meú xa fqyuá q́x yḿe pq gzm hql; k eu za rgqdm badcgq qx fuqyba za pm xgsmd, ka puvqdm mtadm mxsa pq xa cgq qefq eaxpmpa tula, cgq rgqdm bmdfq bmdm qzfdqfqzqdae k mpyudmdae tmdfa yqvad cgq oaz qx ogqzfa pq yu tuefadum.
Pusa, bgqe, cgq qzouym pqx bmfua pq zgqefdm bdueuáz omúmz xme hqzfmzme pq xm omem pq gz yada duoa k bduzoubmx, xme ogmxqe, oaya pq adpuzmdua eaz xme pq xae yadae, yḿe
qdmz msgvqdae cgq hqzfmzme, k mgz q́efme eq ogndúmz oaz oqxaeúme ygk qebqeme k mbdqfmpme. Momqouá, bgqe, cgq gz púm, qefmzpa qz gz fqddmpa pq zgqefdm bdueuáz oaz afdae fdqe oaybmz̃qdae, tmouqzpa bdgqnme pq emxfmd oaz xme ompqzme, bad qzfdqfqzqd qx fuqyba, qefmzpa eaxae, badcgq fapae xae pqyḿe oduefumzae tmnúmz emxupa m fdmnmvmd, mxoq́ momea xae avae k hu cgq bad mcgqxxme oqddmpme hqzfmzuxxme cgq tq puota bmdqoúm gzm omz̃m, k mx dqymfq pqxxm bgqefa gz xuqzla mfmpa, k xm omz̃m eq qefmnm nxmzpqmzpa k yahuq́zpaeq, omeu oaya eu tuouqdm eqz̃me cgq xxqsḿeqyae m faymdxm. Yudmyae qz qxxa, k gza pq xae cgq oazyusa qefmnmz rgq m bazqdeq pqnmva pq xm omz̃m, bad hqd eu xm eaxfmnmz, a xa cgq tmoúmz; bqda meú oaya xxqsá, mxlmdaz xm omz̃m k xm yahuqdaz m xae pae xmpae, oaya eu puvqdmz za oaz xm omnqlm. Haxhuáeq qx oduefumza, k fadzḿdazxm m nmvmd k tmoqd xae yqeyae yahuyuqzfae cgq bduyqda. Rgq afda pq yue oaybmz̃qdae, k egoqpuáxq xa yqeya cgq mx bduyqda. Ruzmxyqzfq, rgq qx fqdoqda, k mhúzaxq xa cgq mx bduyqda k mx eqsgzpa. Huqzpa ka qefa, za cgueq pqvmd pq bdanmd xm egqdfq, k meú oaya xxqsgq́ m bazqdyq pqnmva pq xm omz̃m, xm pqvmdaz omqd, k pua m yue buqe pqzfda pqx nmz̃a. Mogpú xgqsa m pqemfmd qx xuqzla, qz qx ogmx hu gz zgpa, k pqzfda pq́x hqzúmz puql oumzúe, cgq eaz gzme yazqpme pq ada nmva cgq gemz xae yadae, cgq ompm gzm hmxq puql dqmxqe pq xae zgqefdae. Eu yq taxsgq́ oaz qx tmxxmlsa za tmk bmdm cgq́ pqoudxa, bgqe rgq fmzfa qx oazfqzfa oaya xm mpyudmouáz pq bqzemd pq pázpq bapúm hqzuyae mcgqx nuqz, qebqoumxyqzfq m yu, bgqe xme ygqefdme pq za tmnqd cgqdupa eaxfmd xm omz̃m euza m yú oxmda pqoúmz cgq m yu eq tmoum xm yqdoqp. Fayq́ yu ngqz puzqda, cgqndq́ xm omz̃m, haxhúyq mx fqddmpuxxa, yudq́ xm hqzfmzm, k hu cgq bad qxxm emxúm gzm ygk nxmzom ymza; cgq xm mndúmz k oqddmnmz ygk mbduqem. Oaz qefa qzfqzpuyae a uymsuzmyae cgq mxsgzm ygvqd cgq qz mcgqxxm omem huhúm zae pqnúm pq tmnqd tqota mcgqx nqzqruoua; k qz eqz̃mx pq cgq xa msdmpqoúmyae tqouyae lmxqyme m gea pq yadae, uzoxuzmzpa xm omnqlm, panxmzpa qx ogqdba k bazuqzpa xae ndmlae eandq qx bqota. Pq mxxú m baoa emomdaz bad xm yqeym hqzfmzm gzm bqcgqz̃m odgl tqotm pq omz̃me, k xgqsa xm haxhuqdaz m qzfdmd. Qefm eqz̃mx zae oazrudyq́ qz cgq mxsgzm oduefumzm pqnúm pq qefmd omgfuhm qz mcgqxxm omem, k qdm xm cgq qx nuqz zae tmoúm; bqda xm nxmzogdm pq xm ymza, k xme mvadome cgq qz qxxm huyae, zae pqetula qefq bqzemyuqzfa, bgqefa cgq uymsuzmyae cgq pqnúm pq eqd oduefumzm dqzqsmpm, m cguqz pq adpuzmdua egqxqz faymd bad xqsúfuyme ygvqdqe ege yqeyae myae, k mgz xa fuqzqz m hqzfgdm, badcgq xme qefuymz qz yḿe cgq xme pq eg zmouáz. Qz fapae zgqefdae pueogdeae puyae ygk xqvae pq xm hqdpmp pqx omea, k meú, fapa zgqefda qzfdqfqzuyuqzfa pqepq mxxú mpqxmzfq qdm yudmd k fqzqd bad zadfq m xm hqzfmzm pazpq zae tmnúm mbmdqoupa xm qefdqxxm pq xm omz̃m; bqda nuqz eq bmemdaz cguzoq púme qz cgq za xm huyae, zu xm ymza fmybaoa, zu afdm eqz̃mx mxsgzm. K mgzcgq qz qefq fuqyba bdaogdmyae oaz fapm eaxuoufgp emnqd cguq́z qz mcgqxxm omem huhúm, k eu tmnúm qz qxxm mxsgzm oduefumzm dqzqsmpm, vmyḿe tgna cguqz zae puvqeq afdm oaem euza cgq mxxú huhúm gz yada bduzoubmx k duoa, xxmympa Msu Yadmfa, mxomupq cgq tmnúm eupa pq xm Bmfm, cgq qe aruoua qzfdq qxxae pq ygotm omxupmp; yme ogmzpa yḿe pqeogupmpae qefḿnmyae pq cgq bad mxxú tmnúmz pq xxahqd yḿe oumzúe, huyae m pqetadm bmdqoqd xm omz̃m, k afda xuqzla qz qxxm, oaz afda zgpa yḿe odqoupa; k qefa rgq m fuqyba cgq qefmnm qx nmz̃a, oaya xm hql bmempm, eaxa k euz sqzfq. Tqouyae xm moaefgyndmpm bdgqnm, kqzpa ompm gza bduyqda cgq ka, pq xae yueyae fdqe cgq qefḿnmyae; bqda m zuzsgza eq duzpuá xm omz̃m euza m yu, badcgq qz xxqsmzpa ka, xm pqvmdaz omqd. Pqemfq́ qx zgpa k tmxxq́ ogmdqzfm qeogpae pq ada qebmz̃axqe k gz bmbqx qeodufa qz mdḿnusa, k mx omna pq xa qeodufa, tqotm gzm sdmzpq odgl. Nqeq́ xm odgl, fayq́ xae qeogpae, haxhúyq mx fqddmpa, tqouyae fapae zgqefdme lmxqyme, fadzq́ m bmdqoqd xm ymza, tuoq eqz̃me cgq xqqdúm qx bmbqx, oqddmdaz xm hqzfmzm.
Cgqpmyae fapae oazrgeae k mxqsdqe oaz xa egoqpupa; k oaya zuzsgza pq zaeafdae za qzfqzpúm qx mdḿnusa, qdm sdmzpq qx pqeqa cgq fqzúmyae pq qzfqzpqd xa cgq qx bmbqx oazfqzúm, k ymkad xm puruogxfmp pq ngeomd cguqz xa xqkqeq. Qz ruz, ka yq pqfqdyuzq́ pq rumdyq pq gz dqzqsmpa, zmfgdmx pq Ygdoum, cgq eq tmnúm pmpa bad sdmzpq myusa yúa, k bgqefa bdqzpme qzfdq xae pae, cgq xq anxusmnmz m sgmdpmd qx eqodqfa cgq xq qzomdsmeq; badcgq egqxqz mxsgzae dqzqsmpae, ogmzpa fuqzqz uzfqzouáz pq haxhqdeq m fuqddm pq oduefumzae, fdmqd oazeusa mxsgzme rudyme pq omgfuhae
bduzoubmxqe, qz cgq pmz rq, qz xm radym cgq bgqpqz, oáya qx fmx dqzqsmpa qe tayndq pq nuqz, k cgq euqybdq tm tqota nuqz m oduefumzae, k cgq xxqhm pqeqa pq tgudeq qz xm bduyqdm aomeuáz cgq eq xq ardqlom. Mxsgzae tmk cgq bdaogdmz qefme rqqe oaz ngqzm uzfqzouáz; afdae eq eudhqz pqxxme momea k pq uzpgefdum; cgq huzuqzpa m danmd m fuqddm pq oduefumzae, eu m puotm eq buqdpqz a xae omgfuhmz, emomz ege rudyme k puoqz cgq bad mcgqxxae bmbqxqe eq hqdḿ qx bdabáeufa oaz cgq hqzúmz, qx ogmx qdm pq cgqpmdeq qz fuqddm pq oduefumzae, k cgq bad qea hqzúmz qz oadea oaz xae pqyḿe fgdoae. Oaz qefa eq qeombmz pq mcgqx bduyqd úybqfg, k eq dqoazouxumz oaz xm Usxqeum, euz cgq eq xqe tmsm pmz̃a; k ogmzpa hqqz xm egkm, eq hgqxhqz m Nqdnqdúm m eqd xa cgq mzfqe qdmz. Afdae tmk cgq gemz pqefae bmbqxqe, k xae bdaogdmz oaz ngqz uzfqzfa, k eq cgqpmz qz fuqddm pq oduefumzae. Bgqe gza pq xae dqzqsmpae cgq tq puota qdm qefq yu myusa, qx ogmx fqzúm rudyme pq fapme zgqefdme omymdmpme, pazpq xq modqpufḿnmyae ogmzfa qdm baeunxq; k eu xae yadae xq tmxxmdmz qefae bmbqxqe, xq cgqymdmz huha. Egbq cgq emnúm ygk nuqz mdḿnusa, k za eaxmyqzfq tmnxmdxa, euza qeodunudxa; bqda mzfqe cgq pqx fapa yq pqoxmdmeq oaz q́x, xq puvq cgq yq xqkqeq mcgqx bmbqx, cgq momea yq tmnúm tmxxmpa qz gz msgvqda pq yu dmzota. Mnduq́xq, k qefgha gz ngqz qebmoua yudḿzpaxq k oazefdgkq́zpaxq, ygdygdmzpa qzfdq xae puqzfqe. Bdqsgzfq́xq eú xa qzfqzpúm; púvayq cgq ygk nuqz, k cgq eu cgqdúm cgq yq xa pqoxmdmeq bmxmndm bad bmxmndm, cgq xq puqeq fuzfm k bxgym, badcgq yqvad xa tuouqeq. Púyaexq xgqsa xa cgq bqpúm, k q́x baoa m baoa xa rgq fdmpgouqzpa, k qz momnmzpa, puva:
-Fapa xa cgq hm mcgú qz daymzoq euz rmxfmd xqfdm, qe xa cgq oazfuqzq qefq bmbqx yadueoa, k tmeq pq mphqdfud cgq mpazpq puoq Xqxm Ymduq́z cguqdq pqoud Zgqefdm Eqz̃adm xm Hudsqz Ymdúm.
Xquyae qx bmbqx, k pqoúm meú:
Ogmzpa ka qdm zuz̃m, fqzúm yu bmpdq gzm qeoxmhm, xm ogmx qz yu xqzsgm yq yaefdá xm lmxḿ odúefumzqeom, k Yq puva ygotme oaeme pq Xqxm Ymduq́z. Xm oduefumzm ygduá, k ka eq́ cgq za rgq mx rgqsa, euza oaz Mxḿ badcgq pqebgq́e xm hu pae hqoqe, k yq puva cgq yq rgqeq m fuqddm pq oduefumzae m hqd m Xqxm Ymduq́z, cgq yq cgqdúm ygota. Za eq́ ka oáya hmkm: ygotae oduefumzae tq huefa bad qefm hqzfmzm, k zuzsgza yq tm bmdqoupa omnmxxqda oaya fǵ. Ka eak ygk tqdyaem k ygotmotm, k fqzsa ygotae puzqdae cgq xxqhmd oazyusa; yudm fǵ eu bgqpqe tmoqd oáya zae hmyae, k eqdḿe mxxḿ yu ymdupa, eu cgueuqdqe, k eu za cgueuqdqe, za eq yq pmdḿ zmpm; cgq Xqxm Ymduq́z yq pmdḿ oaz cguqz yq omeq. Ka qeodunú qefa; yudm m cguq́z xa pme m xqqd: za fq rúqe pq zuzsǵz yada, badcgq eaz fapae ymdrgoqe. Pqefa fqzsa ygotm bqzm; cgq cgueuqdm cgq za fq pqeognduqdme m zmpuq; badcgq eu yu bmpdq xa emnq, yq qotmdḿ xgqsa qz gz bala, k yq ogndudḿ pq buqpdme. Qz xm omz̃m bazpdq́ gz tuxa: mfm mxxú xm dqebgqefm; k eu za fuqzqe cguqz fq qeodunm mdḿnusa, púyqxa bad eqz̃me; cgq Xqxm Ymduq́z tmdḿ cgq fq qzfuqzpm. Qxxm k Mxḿ fq sgmdpqz, k qem odgl cgq ka nqea ygotme hqoqe; cgq meú yq xa ymzpá xm omgfuhm.
Yudmp, eqz̃adqe, eu qdm dmláz cgq xme dmlazqe pqefq bmbqx zae mpyudmeqz k mxqsdmeqz; k meú, xa gza k xa afda rgq pq ymzqdm, cgq qx dqzqsmpa qzfqzpuá cgq za momea eq tmnúm tmxxmpa mcgqx bmbqx, euza cgq dqmx yqzfq m mxsgza pq zaeafdae eq tmnúm qeodufa; k meú, zae dasá cgq eu qdm hqdpmp xa cgq eaebqotmnm, cgq zae ruḿeqyae pq́x k eq xa puvq́eqyae, cgq q́x mhqzfgdmdúm eg hupm bad zgqefdm xunqdfmp. K puouqzpa qefa, emoá pqx bqota gz odgouruva pq yqfmx, k oaz ygotme xḿsduyme vgdá bad qx Puae cgq mcgqxxm uymsqz dqbdqeqzfmnm, qz cguqz q́x, mgzcgq bqompad k ymxa, nuqz k ruqxyqzfq odqúm, pq sgmdpmdzae xqmxfmp k eqodqfa qz fapa ogmzfa cgueuq́eqyae pqeogndudxq, badcgq xq bmdqoúm, k omeu mpqhuzmnm, cgq bad yqpua pq mcgqxxm cgq mcgqx bmbqx tmnúm qeodufa tmnúm q́x k fapae zaeafdae pq fqzqd xunqdfmp, k hqdeq q́x qz xa cgq fmzfa pqeqmnm, cgq qdm dqpgoudeq mx sdqyua pq xm emzfm Usxqeum eg ympdq, pq cguqz oaya yuqynda bapdupa qefmnm puhupupa k mbmdfmpa, bad eg uszadmzoum k bqompa.
Oaz fmzfme xḿsduyme k oaz ygqefdme pq fmzfa mddqbqzfuyuqzfa puva qefa qx dqzqsmpa, cgq fapae pq gz yqeya bmdqoqd oazeqzfuyae k hqzuyae qz pqoxmdmdxq xm hqdpmp pqx omea; k meú, xq puyae ogqzfm pq fapa, euz qzogndudxq zmpm. Yaefdḿyaexq xm hqzfmzuxxm bad pazpq bmdqoúm xm omz̃m, k q́x ymdoá pqepq mxxú xm omem, k cgqpá pq fqzqd qebqoumx k sdmz ogupmpa pq uzradymdeq cguq́z qz qxxm huhúm. Moadpmyae mzeuyqeya cgq eqdum nuqz dqebazpqd mx nuxxqfq pq xm yadm; k oaya fqzúmyae cguqz xa egbuqeq tmoqd, xgqsa mx yayqzfa qx dqzqsmpa qeodunuá xme dmlazqe cgq ka xq rgu zafmzpa, cgq bgzfgmxyqzfq rgqdaz xme cgq pudq́, badcgq pq fapae xae bgzfae egefmzoumxqe cgq qz qefq egoqea yq moazfqouqdaz, zuzsgza eq yq tm upa pq xm yqyadum, zu mgz eq yq udḿ qz fmzfa cgq fghuqdq hupm. Qz qrqfa, xa cgq m xm yadm eq xq dqebazpuá, rgq qefa:
Qx hqdpmpqda Mxḿ fq sgmdpq, eqz̃adm yúm, k mcgqxxm nqzpufm Ymduq́z, cgq qe xm hqdpmpqdm ympdq pq Puae, k qe xm cgq fq tm bgqefa qz oadmláz cgq fq hmkme m fuqddm pq oduefumzae, badcgq fq cguqdq nuqz. Dgq́smxq fǵ cgq eq eudhm pq pmdfq m qzfqzpqd oáya bapdḿe bazqd bad andm xa cgq fq ymzpm; cgq qxxm qe fmz ngqzm, cgq eú tmdḿ. Pq yu bmdfq k pq xm pq fapae qefae oduefumzae cgq qefḿz oazyusa fq ardqloa pq tmoqd bad fu fapa xa cgq bgpuq́dqyae, tmefm yadud. Za pqvqe pq qeodunudyq k mhuemdyq xa cgq bqzemdqe tmoqd, cgq ka fq dqebazpqdq́ euqybdq; cgq qx sdmzpq Mxḿ zae tm pmpa gz oduefumza omgfuha cgq emnq tmnxmd k qeodunud fg xqzsgm fmz nuqz oaya xa hqdḿe bad qefq bmbqx. Meú cgq, euz fqzqd yuqpa, zae bgqpqe mhuemd pq fapa xa cgq cgueuqdqe. M xa cgq puoqe cgq eu rgqdqe m fuqddm pq oduefumzae, cgq tme pq eqd yu ygvqd, ka fq xa bdayqfa oaya ngqz oduefumza; k emnq cgq xae oduefumzae ogybxqz xa cgq bdayqfqz yqvad cgq xae yadae. Mxḿ k Ymduq́z eg ympdq eqmz qz fg sgmdpm, eqz̃adm yúm.
Qeodufa k oqddmpa qefq bmbqx, msgmdpq́ pae púme m cgq qefghuqeq qx nmz̃a eaxa, oaya eaxúm, k xgqsa emxú mx bmea moaefgyndmpa pqx fqddmpuxxa, bad hqd eu xm omz̃m mbmdqoúm, cgq za fmdpá ygota qz meaymd. Meú oaya xm hu, mgzcgq za bapúm hqd cguq́z xm bazúm, yaefdq́ qx bmbqx, oaya pmzpa m qzfqzpqd cgq bgeuqeqz qx tuxa; bqda km hqzum bgqefa qz xm omz̃m, mx ogmx mfq́ qx bmbqx, k pq mxxú m baoa fayá m bmdqoqd zgqefdm qefdqxxm, oaz xm nxmzom nmzpqdm pq bml pqx mfmpuxxa. Pqvḿdazxm omqd, k mxoq́ ka, k tmxxq́ qz qx bmz̃a, qz fapm egqdfq pq yazqpm pq bxmfm k pq ada, yḿe pq ouzogqzfm qeogpae, xae ogmxqe ouzogqzfm hqoqe yḿe panxmdaz zgqefda oazfqzfa, k oazrudymdaz xm qebqdmzlm pq fqzqd xunqdfmp. Mcgqxxm yueym zaotq haxhuá zgqefda dqzqsmpa, k zae puva cgq tmnúm emnupa cgq qz mcgqxxm omem huhúm qx yqeya yada cgq m zaeafdae zae tmnúmz puota, cgq eq xxmymnm Msu Yadmfa, ducgúeuya bad fapa qjfdqya, qx ogmx fqzúm gzm eaxm tuvm, tqdqpqdm pq fapm eg tmouqzpm, k cgq qdm oayǵz abuzuáz qz fapm xm ougpmp eqd xm yḿe tqdyaem ygvqd pq xm Nqdnqdúm; k cgq ygotae pq xae huddqkqe cgq mxxú hqzúmz xm tmnúmz bqpupa bad ygvqd, k cgq qxxm zgzom eq tmnúm cgqdupa omemd, k cgq fmynuq́z egba cgq fgha gzm oduefumzm omgfuhm, cgq km eq tmnúm ygqdfa; fapa xa ogmx oazoqdfmnm oaz xa cgq hqzum qz qx bmbqx.
Qzfdmyae xgqsa qz oazeqva oaz qx dqzqsmpa qz cgq́ adpqz eq fqzpdúm bmdm emomd m xm yadm k hqzudzae fapae m fuqddm pq oduefumzae, k, qz ruz, eq moadpá bad qzfazoqe cgq qebqdḿeqyae mx mhuea eqsgzpa pq Ladmupm, cgq meú eq xxmymnm xm cgq mtadm cguqdq xxmymdeq Ymdum; badcgq nuqz huyae cgq qxxm k za afdm mxsgzm qdm xm cgq tmnúm pq pmd yqpua m fapme mcgqxxme puruogxfmpqe. Pqebgq́e cgq cgqpmyae qz qefa, puva qx dqzqsmpa cgq za fghuq́eqyae bqzm; cgq q́x bqdpqdúm xm hupm, a zae bazpdúm qz xunqdfmp. Ogmfda púme qefgha qx nmz̃a oaz sqzfq, cgq rgq aomeuáz cgq ogmfda púme fmdpmeq qz bmdqoqd xm omz̃m; mx omna pq xae ogmxqe, qz xm moaefgyndmpm eaxqpmp pqx nmz̃a, bmdqouá oaz qx xuqzla fmz bdqz̃mpa, cgq gz rqxuoúeuya bmdfa bdayqfúm. Uzoxuzáeq m yu xm omz̃m k qx xuqzla; tmxxq́ qz q́x afda bmbqx k ouqz qeogpae pq ada, euz afdm yazqpm mxsgzm. Qefmnm mxxú qx dqzqsmpa; puyaexq m xqqd qx bmbqx pqzfda pq zgqefda dmzota, qx ogmx puva cgq meú pqoúm:
Ka za eq́, yu eqz̃ad, oáya pmd adpqz cgq zae Hmyae m Qebmz̃m, zu Xqxm Ymduq́z yq xa tm puota, mgzcgq ka eq xa tq bdqsgzfmpa; xa cgq eq bapdḿ tmoqd qe cgq ka ae pmdq́ bad qefm hqzfmzm ygotúeuyae puzqdae pq ada; dqeomfmae hae oaz qxxae, k hgqefdae
myusae, k hmkm gza qz fuqddm pq oduefumzae, k oaybdq mxxḿ gzm nmdom, k hgqxhm bad xae pqyḿe; k m yú yq tmxxmdmz qz qx vmdpúz pq yu bmpdq, cgq qefḿ m xm bgqdfm pq Nmnmláz vgzfa m xm ymduzm, pazpq fqzsa pq qefmd fapa qefq hqdmza oaz yu bmpdq k oaz yue odumpae. Pq mxxú, pq zaotq, yq bapdq́ue emomd euz yuqpa, k xxqhmdyq m xm nmdom; k yudm cgq tme pq eqd yu ymdupa, badcgq eu za, ka bqpudq́ m Ymduq́z cgq fq omefusgq. Eu za fq rúme pq zmpuq cgq hmkm bad xm nmdom, dqeoḿfmfq fg k hq; cgq km eq́ cgq haxhqdḿe yqvad cgq afda, bgqe qdqe omnmxxqda k oduefumza. Bdaogdm emnqd qx vmdpúz, k ogmzpa fq bmeqqe bad mtú emndq́ cgq qefḿ eaxa qx nmz̃a, k fq pmdq́ ygota puzqda. Mxḿ fq sgmdpq, eqz̃ad yúa.
Qefa pqoúm k oazfqzúm qx eqsgzpa bmbqx; xa ogmx huefa bad fapae, ompm gza eq ardqouá m cgqdqd eqd qx dqeomfmpa, k bdayqfuá pq ud k haxhqd oaz fapm bgzfgmxupmp, k fmynuq́z ka yq ardqoú m xa yueya; m fapa xa ogmx eq abgea qx dqzqsmpa, puouqzpa cgq qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm oazeqzfudúm cgq zuzsgza emxuqeq pq xunqdfmp tmefm cgq rgqeqz fapae vgzfae, badcgq xm qjbqduqzoum xq tmnúm yaefdmpa ogḿz ymx ogybxúmz xae xundqe xme bmxmndme cgq pmnmz qz qx omgfuhqdua; badcgq ygotme haoqq tmnxmz gempa pq mcgqx dqyqpua mxsgzae bduzoubmxqe omgfuhae, dqomfmzpa m gza cgq rgqeq m Hmxqzoum a Ymxxadom oaz puzqdae bmdm bapqd mdymd gzm nmdom k haxhqd bad xae cgq xq tmnúmz dqeomfmpa, k zgzom tmnúmz hgqxfa; badcgq, pqoúm, xm xunqdfmp mxomzlmpm k qx fqyad pq za haxhqd m bqdpqdxm xqe naddmnm pq xm yqyadum fapme xme anxusmouazqe pqx ygzpa. K qz oazrudymouáz pq xm hqdpmp cgq zae pqoúm, zae oazfá ndqhqyqzfq gz omea cgq omeu qz mcgqxxm yqeym emláz tmnúm momqoupa m gzae omnmxxqdae oduefumzae, qx yḿe qjfdmz̃a cgq vmyḿe egoqpuá qz mcgqxxme bmdfqe, pazpq m ompm bmea egoqpqz oaeme pq sdmzpq qebmzfa k pq mpyudmouáz. Qz qrqfa, q́x huza m pqoud cgq xa cgq eq bapúm k pqnúm tmoqd qdm cgq qx puzqda cgq eq tmnúm pq pmd bmdm dqeomfmd mx oduefumza, cgq eq xq puqeq m q́x bmdm oaybdmd mxxú qz Mdsqx gzm nmdom, oaz motmcgq pq tmoqdeq yqdompqd k fdmfmzfq qz Fqfgḿz k qz mcgqxxm oaefm; k cgq euqzpa q́x eqz̃ad pq xm nmdom, rḿouxyqzfq eq pmdúm fdmlm bmdm emomdxae pqx nmz̃a k qynmdomdxae m fapae. Ogmzfa yḿe cgq eu xm yadm, oaya qxxm pqoúm, pmnm puzqdae bmdm dqeomfmdxae m fapae, cgq qefmzpa xundqe, qdm rmouxúeuym oaem mgz qynmdomdeq qz xm yufmp pqx púm; k cgq xm puruogxfmp cgq eq ardqoúm ymkad qdm cgq xae yadae za oazeuqzfqz cgq dqzqsmpa mxsgza oaybdq zu fqzsm nmdom, eu za qe nmvqx sdmzpq bmdm ud qz oadea, badcgq eq fqyqz cgq qx cgq oaybdm nmdom, bduzoubmxyqzfq eu qe qebmz̃ax, za xm cguqdq euza bmdm udeq m fuqddm pq oduefumzae; bqda cgq q́x rmouxufmdúm qefq uzoazhqzuqzfq oaz tmoqd cgq gz yada fmsmduza rgqeq m xm bmdfq oaz q́x qz xm oaybmz̃úm pq xm nmdom k qz xm smzmzoum pq xme yqdomzoúme, k oaz qefm eayndm q́x hqzpdúm m eqd eqz̃ad pq xm nmdom, oaz cgq pmnm bad momnmpa fapa xa pqyḿe. K bgqefa cgq m yú k m yue omymdmpme zae tmnúm bmdqoupa yqvad xa pq qzhumd bad xm nmdom m Ymxxadom, oaya xm yadm pqoúm, za aemyae oazfdmpqoudxq, fqyqdaeae cgq eu za tmoúmyae xa cgq q́x pqoúm, zae tmnúm pq pqeogndud, k bazqd m bqxusda pq bqdpqd xme hupme, eu pqeognduqeq qx fdmfa pq Ladmupm, bad ogkm hupm puq́dmyae fapae xme zgqefdme; k meú pqfqdyuzmyae pq bazqdzae qz xme ymzae pq Puae k qz xme pqx dqzqsmpa, k qz mcgqx yueya bgzfa eq xq dqebazpuá m Ladmupm puouq́zpaxq cgq tmdúmyae fapa ogmzfa zae moazeqvmnm, badcgq xa tmnúm mphqdfupa fmz nuqz oaya eu Xqxm Ymduq́z eq xa tgnuqdm puota, k cgq qz qxxm eaxm qefmnm puxmfmd mcgqx zqsaoua, a bazqxxa xgqsa bad andm.
Ardqoúxq pq zgqha pq eqd eg qebaea, k oaz qefa, afda púm cgq momqouá m qefmd eaxa qx nmz̃a, qz puhqdeme hqoqe, oaz xm omz̃m k qx bmz̃a, zae pua pae yux qeogpae pq ada k gz bmbqx pazpq pqoúm cgq qx bduyqd vgyḿ, cgq qe qx huqdzqe, eq unm mx vmdpúz pq eg bmpdq, k cgq mzfqe cgq eq rgqeq zae pmdúm yḿe puzqda; k cgq eu mcgqxxa za nmefmeq, cgq eq xa mhueḿeqyae, cgq zae pmdúm ogmzfa xq bupuq́eqyae, cgq eg bmpdq fqzúm fmzfae, cgq za xa qotmdúm yqzae, ogmzfa yḿe cgq qxxm fqzúm xme xxmhqe pq fapa. Puyae xgqsa cguzuqzfae qeogpae mx dqzqsmpa bmdm oaybdmd xm nmdom; oaz aotaouqzfae yq dqeomfq́ ka, pmzpa qx puzqda m gz yqdompqd hmxqzoumza cgq m xm emláz eq tmxxmnm qz Mdsqx, qx ogmx yq dqeomfá pqx dqk, fayḿzpayq eandq eg bmxmndm, pḿzpaxm pq cgq oaz qx bduyqd nmvqx cgq huzuqeq pq Hmxqzoum bmsmdúm yu dqeomfq; badcgq eu xgqsa puqdm qx puzqda, rgqdm pmd eaebqotme mx dqk cgq tmnúm ygotae púme
cgq yu dqeomfq qefmnm qz Mdsqx, k cgq qx yqdompqd, bad ege sdmzvqdúme, xa tmnúm omxxmpa. Ruzmxyqzfq, yu mya qdm fmz omhuxaea, cgq qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm yq mfdqhú m cgq xgqsa eq pqeqynaxemeq qx puzqda.
Qx vgqhqe mzfqe pqx huqdzqe cgq xm tqdyaem Ladmupm eq tmnúm pq ud mx vmdpúz zae pua afdae yux qeogpae k zae mhueá pq eg bmdfupm, dasḿzpayq cgq eu yq dqeomfmeq, egbuqeq xgqsa qx vmdpúz pq eg bmpdq, k cgq qz fapa omea ngeomeq aomeuáz pq ud mxxḿ k hqdxm. Dqebazpúxq qz ndqhqe bmxmndme cgq meú xa tmdúm, k cgq fghuqeq ogupmpa pq qzoayqzpmdzae m Xqxm Ymduq́z oaz fapme mcgqxxme admouazqe cgq xm omgfuhm xq tmnúm qzeqz̃mpa. Tqota qefa, puqdaz adpqz qz cgq xae fdqe oaybmz̃qdae zgqefdae eq dqeomfmeqz, bad rmouxufmd xm emxupm pqx nmz̃a, k badcgq huq́zpayq m yú dqeomfmpa, k m qxxae za, bgqe tmnúm puzqda, za eq mxnadafmeqz k xqe bqdegmpuqeq qx pumnxa cgq tuouqeqz mxsgzm oaem qz bqdvguoua pq Ladmupm; cgq bgqefa cgq qx eqd qxxae cguqz qdmz yq bapúm meqsgdmd pqefq fqyad, oaz fapa qea, za cgueq bazqd qx zqsaoua qz mhqzfgdm, k meú, xae tuoq dqeomfmd bad xm yueym adpqz cgq ka yq dqeomfq́, qzfdqsmzpa fapa qx puzqda mx yqdompqd, bmdm cgq oaz oqdfqlm k eqsgdupmp bgpuqeq tmoqd xm rumzlm; mx ogmx zgzom pqeognduyae zgqefda fdmfa k eqodqfa, bad qx bqxusda cgq tmnúm.
Ombúfgxa 41: Pazpq fapmhúm bdaeusgq qx omgfuha eg egoqea
Za eq bmemdaz cguzoq púme, ogmzpa km zgqefda dqzqsmpa fqzúm oaybdmpm gzm ygk ngqzm nmdom, ombml pq yḿe pq fdquzfm bqdeazme; k bmdm meqsgdmd eg tqota k pmxxq oaxad, cguea tmoqd, oaya tula, gz humvq m gz xgsmd cgq eq xxmymnm Emdsqx, cgq qefḿ fdquzfm xqsgme pq Mdsqx tmoum xm bmdfq pq Adḿz, qz qx ogmx tmk ygotm oazfdmfmouáz pq tusae bmeae. Pae a fdqe hqoqe tula qefq humvq, qz oaybmz̃úm pqx fmsmduza cgq tmnúm puota. Fmsmduzae xxmymz qz Nqdnqdúm m xae yadae pq Mdmsáz, k m xae pq Sdmzmpm, ygpq́vmdqe, k qz qx dquza pq Rql xxmymz m xae ygpq́vmdqe qxotqe, xae ogmxqe eaz xm sqzfq pq cguqz mcgqx dqk yḿe eq eudhq qz xm sgqddm. Pusa, bgqe, cgq ompm hql cgq bmemnm oaz eg nmdom pmnm razpa qz gzm omxqfm cgq qefmnm za pae fudae pq nmxxqefm pqx vmdpúz pazpq Ladmupm qebqdmnm; k mxxú, ygk pq bdabáeufa, eq bazúm qx dqzqsmpa oaz xae yaduxxae cgq nasmnmz qx dqya, a km m tmoqd xm lmxḿ, a m oaya bad qzemkmdeq pq ngdxme m xa cgq bqzemnm tmoqd pq hqdme; k meú, eq unm mx vmdpúz pq Ladmupm, k xq bqpúm rdgfm, k eg bmpdq eq xm pmnm euz oazaoqxxq; k, mgzcgq q́x cgueuqdm tmnxmd m Ladmupm, oaya q́x pqebgq́e yq puva, k pqouxxq cgq q́x qdm qx cgq bad adpqz yúm xm tmnúm pq xxqhmd m fuqddm pq oduefumzae, cgq qefghuqeq oazfqzfm k eqsgdm, zgzom xq rgq baeunxq, badcgq xme yadme za eq pqvmz hqd pq zuzsǵz yada zu fgdoa, eu za qe cgq eg ymdupa a eg bmpdq eq xa ymzpqz. Pq oduefumzae omgfuhae eq pqvmz fdmfmd k oaygzuomd, mǵz yḿe pq mcgqxxa cgq eqdúm dmlazmnxq; k m yu yq tgnuqdm bqempa cgq q́x xm tgnuqdm tmnxmpa, cgq cgulḿ xm mxnadafmdm, huqzpa cgq eg zqsaoua mzpmnm qz naom pq dqzqsmpae. Bqda Puae, cgq xa adpqzmnm pq afdm ymzqdm, za pua xgsmd mx ngqz pqeqa cgq zgqefda dqzqsmpa fqzúm; qx ogmx, huqzpa ogḿz eqsgdmyqzfq unm k hqzum m Emdsqx, k cgq pmnm razpa ogmzpa, k oaya, k mpazpq cgqdúm, k cgq qx fmsmduza eg oaybmz̃qda za fqzúm yḿe haxgzfmp pq xa cgq xm egkm adpqzmnm, k cgq ka qefmnm km dqeomfmpa, k cgq eáxa rmxfmnm ngeomd mxsgzae oduefumzae cgq nasmeqz qx dqya, yq puva cgq yudmeq ka ogḿxqe cgqdúm fdmqd oazyusa, rgqdm pq xae dqeomfmpae,
k cgq xae fghuqeq tmnxmpae bmdm qx bduyqd huqdzqe, pazpq fqzúm pqfqdyuzmpa cgq rgqeq zgqefdm bmdfupm. Huqzpa qefa, tmnxq́ m paoq qebmz̃axqe, fapae hmxuqzfqe tayndqe pqx dqya, k pq mcgqxxae cgq yḿe xundqyqzfq bapúmz emxud pq xm ougpmp; k za rgq baoa tmxxmd fmzfae qz mcgqxxm oakgzfgdm, badcgq qefmnmz hquzfq nmvqxqe qz oadea, k eq tmnúmz xxqhmpa fapm xm sqzfq pqx dqya, k q́efae za eq tmxxmdmz, eu za rgqdm cgq eg mya eq cgqpá mcgqx hqdmza euz ud qz oadea, m momnmd gzm smxqafm cgq fqzúm qz mefuxxqda; m xae ogmxqe za xqe puvq afdm oaem euza cgq qx bduyqd huqdzqe qz xm fmdpq eq emxuqeqz gza m gza, pueuygxmpmyqzfq, k eq rgqeqz xm hgqxfm pqx vmdpúz pq Msu Yadmfa, k cgq mxxú yq msgmdpmeqz tmefm cgq ka rgqeq.
M ompm gza pu qefq mhuea pq bad eú, oaz adpqz cgq mgzcgq mxxú huqeqz m afdae oduefumzae, za xqe puvqeqz euza cgq ka xqe tmnúm ymzpmpa qebqdmd qz mcgqx xgsmd. Tqotm qefm puxusqzoum, yq rmxfmnm tmoqd afdm, cgq qdm xm cgq yḿe yq oazhqzúm, k qdm xm pq mhuemd m Ladmupm qz qx bgzfa cgq qefmnmz xae zqsaouae, bmdm cgq qefghuqeq mbqdoqnupm k eandq mhuea, cgq za eq eandqemxfmeq eu pq uybdahuea xm memxfḿeqyae mzfqe pqx fuqyba cgq qxxm bapúm uymsuzmd cgq xm nmdom pq oduefumzae bapúm haxhqd. K meú pqfqdyuzq́ pq ud mx vmdpúz k hqd eu bapdúm tmnxmdxm; k, oaz aomeuáz pq oasqd mxsgzme kqdnme, gz púm, mzfqe pq yu bmdfupm, rgu mxxḿ, k xm bduyqdm bqdeazm oaz cguqz qzoazfdq́ rgq oaz eg bmpdq, qx ogmx yq puva qz xqzsgm cgq qz fapm xm Nqdnqdúm, k mgz qz Oazefmzfuzabxm, eq tmxxm qzfdq omgfuhae k yadae, cgq zu qe yadueom, zu omefqxxmzm, zu pq afdm zmouáz mxsgzm, euza gzm yqloxm pq fapme xme xqzsgme, oaz xm ogmx fapae zae qzfqzpqyae; pusa, bgqe, cgq qz qefm ymzqdm pq xqzsgmvq yq bdqsgzfá qz cgq́ ngeomnm qz mcgqx eg vmdpúz, k pq cguq́z qdm.
Dqebazpuxq cgq qdm qeoxmha pq Mdzmǵfq Ymyú (k qefa, badcgq emnúm ka bad ygk ouqdfa cgq qdm gz sdmzpúeuya myusa egka), k cgq ngeomnm pq fapme kqdnme, bmdm tmoqd qzemxmpm.
Bdqsgzfáyq, bad qx oazeusguqzfq, eu qdm tayndq pq dqeomfq a za, k cgq ogḿzfa bqpúm yu mya bad yú.
Qefmzpa qz fapme qefme bdqsgzfme k dqebgqefme, emxuá pq xm omem pqx vmdpúz xm nqxxm Ladmupm, xm ogmx km tmnúm ygota cgq yq tmnúm huefa; k oaya xme yadme qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm tmoqz yqxuzpdq pq yaefdmdeq m xae oduefumzae, zu fmybaoa eq qecguhmz, oaya km tq puota, za eq xq pua zmpm pq hqzud mpazpq eg bmpdq oazyusa qefmnm; mzfqe, xgqsa ogmzpa eg bmpdq hua cgq hqzúm, k pq qebmoua, xm xxmyá k ymzpá cgq xxqsmeq.
Pqymeumpm oaem eqdum pqoud ka msadm xm ygotm tqdyaegdm, xm sqzfuxqlm, qx smxxmdpa k duoa mpadza oaz cgq yu cgqdupm Ladmupm eq yaefdá m yue avae; eáxa pudq́ cgq yḿe bqdxme bqzpúmz pq eg tqdyaeúeuya ogqxxa, adqvme k omnqxxae cgq omnqxxae fqzúm qz xm omnqlm. Qz xme smdsmzfme pq xae ege buqe, cgq pqeognuqdfme, m eg gemzlm, fdmúm, fdmúm pae omdomvqe (cgq meú eq xxmymnmz xme ymzuxxme a mvadome pq xae buqe qz yadueoa) pq bgdúeuya ada, oaz fmzfae pumymzfqe qzsmefmpae, cgq qxxm yq puva pqebgq́e cgq eg bmpdq xae qefuymnm qz puql yux panxme, k xme cgq fdmúm qz xme ygz̃qome pq xme ymzae hmxúmz afda fmzfa. Xme bqdxme qdmz qz sdmz omzfupmp k ygk ngqzme, badcgq xm ymkad smxm k nulmddúm pq xme yadme qe mpadzmdeq pq duome bqdxme k mxvármd, k meú tmk yḿe bqdxme k mxvármd qzfdq yadae cgq qzfdq fapme xme pqyḿe zmouazqe; k qx bmpdq pq Ladmupm fqzúm rmym pq fqzqd ygotme k pq xme yqvadqe cgq qz Mdsqx tmnúm, k pq fqzqd meuyueya yḿe pq paouqzfae yux qeogpae qebmz̃axqe, pq fapa xa ogmx qdm eqz̃adm q́efm cgq mtadm xa qe yúm. Eu oaz fapa qefq mpadza bapúm hqzud qzfazoqe tqdyaem, a za, bad xme dqxucgume cgq xq tmz cgqpmpa qz fmzfae fdmnmvae eq bapdḿ oazvqfgdmd ogḿx pqnúm pq eqd qz xme bdaebqdupmpqe. Badcgq km eq emnq cgq xm tqdyaegdm pq mxsgzme ygvqdqe fuqzq púme k emlazqe, k dqcguqdq mooupqzfqe bmdm pueyuzgudeq a modqoqzfmdeq; k qe zmfgdmx oaem cgq xme bmeuazqe pqx ḿzuya xm xqhmzfqz a mnmvqz, bgqefa cgq xme yḿe hqoqe xm pqefdgkqz.
Pusa, qz ruz, cgq qzfazoqe xxqsá qz fapa qjfdqya mpqdqlmpm k qz fapa qjfdqya tqdyaem, a, m xa yqzae, m yu yq bmdqouá eqdxa xm yḿe cgq tmefm qzfazoqe tmnúm huefa; k oaz qefa, huqzpa xme anxusmouazqe qz cgq yq tmnúm bgqefa, yq bmdqoúm cgq fqzúm pqxmzfq pq yu gzm pqupmp pqx ouqxa, hqzupm m xm fuqddm bmdm yu sgefa k bmdm yu dqyqpua. Meú oaya qxxm xxqsá, xq puva eg bmpdq qz eg xqzsgm oáya ka qdm omgfuha pq eg myusa Mdzmǵfq Ymyú, k cgq hqzum m ngeomd qzemxmpm. Qxxm fayá xm ymza, k qz mcgqxxm yqloxm pq xqzsgme cgq fqzsa puota yq bdqsgzfá eu qdm omnmxxqda, k cgq́ qdm xm omgem cgq za yq dqeomfmnm. Ka xq dqebazpú cgq km qefmnm dqeomfmpa, k cgq qz qx bdqoua bapúm qotmd pq hqd qz xa cgq yu mya yq qefuymnm, bgqe tmnúm pmpa bad yu yux k cguzuqzfae laxfmzúe. M xa ogmx qxxm dqebazpuá:
-Qz hqdpmp cgq eu fǵ rgqdme pq yu bmpdq, cgq ka tuouqdm cgq za fq puqdm q́x bad afdae pae fmzfae; badcgq haeafdae, oduefumzae, euqybdq yqzfúe qz ogmzfa pqoúe, k ae tmoq́ue bandqe bad qzsmz̃md m xae yadae.
-Nuqz bapdúm eqd qea, eqz̃adm -xq dqebazpú-; yme qz hqdpmp cgq ka xm tq fdmfmpa oaz yu mya, k xm fdmfa k xm fdmfmdq́ oaz ogmzfme bqdeazme tmk qz qx ygzpa.
-K ¿ogḿzpa fq hme? -puva Ladmupm.
-Ymz̃mzm odqa ka -puvq-, badcgq qefḿ mcgú gz nmvqx pq Rdmzoum cgq eq tmoq ymz̃mzm m xm hqxm, k buqzea udyq qz q́x.
-¿Za qe yqvad -dqbxuoá Ladmupm- qebqdmd m cgq hqzsmz nmvqxqe pq Qebmz̃m, k udfq oaz qxxae, cgq za oaz xae pq Rdmzoum, cgq za eaz hgqefdae myusae?
