-Za -dqebazpú ka-; mgzcgq eu oaya tmk zgqhme cgq huqzq km gz nmvqx pq Qebmz̃m qe hqdpmp, fapmhúm ka xq msgmdpmdq́, bgqefa cgq qe yḿe ouqdfa qx bmdfudyq ymz̃mzm; badcgq qx pqeqa cgq fqzsa pq kqdyq qz yu fuqddm k oaz xme bqdeazme cgq nuqz cguqda qe fmzfa, cgq za yq pqvmdḿ qebqdmd afdm oayapupmp, eu eq fmdpm, bad yqvad cgq eqm.
-Pqnqe pq eqd, euz pgpm, omempa qz fg fuqddm –puva Ladmupm-, k bad qea pqeqme ud m hqdfq oaz fg ygvqd.
-Za eak -dqebazpú ka- omempa; yme fqzsa pmpm xm bmxmndm pq omemdyq qz xxqsmzpa mxxḿ.
-K ¿qe tqdyaem xm pmym m cguqz eq xm puefq? -puva Ladmupm.
-Fmz tqdyaem qe -dqebazpú ka-, cgq bmdm qzomdqoqxxm k pqoudfq xm hqdpmp, fq bmdqoq m fu ygota.
Pqefa eq duká ygk pq hqdme eg bmpdq, k puva:
-Sgmxḿ, oduefumza, cgq pqnq pq eqd ygk tqdyaem eu eq bmdqoq m yu tuvm, cgq qe xm yḿe tqdyaem pq fapa qefq dquza. Eu za, yúdmxm nuqz, k hqdḿe oáya fq pusa hqdpmp.
Eqdhúmzae pq uzfq́dbdqfq m xme yḿe pqefme bmxmndme k dmlazqe qx bmpdq pq Ladmupm, oaya yḿe xmpuza; cgq mgzcgq qxxm tmnxmnm xm nmefmdpm xqzsgm cgq, oaya tq puota, mxxú eq gem, yḿe pqoxmdmnm eg uzfqzouáz bad eqz̃me cgq bad bmxmndme. Qefmzpa qz qefme k afdme ygotme dmlazqe, xxqsá gz yada oadduqzpa, k puva m sdmzpqe haoqe cgq bad xme nmdpme a bmdqpqe pqx vmdpúz tmnúmz emxfmpa ogmfda fgdoae, k mzpmnmz oasuqzpa xm rdgfm, mgzcgq za qefmnm ympgdm. Eandqemxfáeq qx huqva, k xa yqeya tula Ladmupm; badcgq qe oayǵz k omeu zmfgdmx qx yuqpa cgq xae yadae m xae fgdoae
fuqzqz, qebqoumxyqzfq m xae eaxpmpae, xae ogmxqe eaz fmz uzeaxqzfqe k fuqzqz fmzfa uybqdua eandq xae yadae cgq m qxxae qefḿz egvqfae, cgq xae fdmfmz bqad cgq eu rgqeqz qeoxmhae egkae. Pusa, bgqe, cgq puva eg bmpdq m Ladmupm:
-Tuvm, dqfúdmfq m xm omem k qzouq́ddmfq, qz fmzfa cgq ka hak m tmnxmd m qefae omzqe; k fǵ, oduefumza, ngeom fge kqdnme, k hqfq qz ngqz tadm, k xxq́hqfq Mxḿ oaz nuqz m fg fuqddm.
Ka yq uzoxuzq́, k q́x eq rgq m ngeomd xae fgdoae, pqvḿzpayq eaxa oaz Ladmupm, cgq oayqzlá m pmd ygqefdme pq udeq pazpq eg bmpdq xm tmnúm ymzpmpa; bqda mbqzme q́x eq qzognduá oaz xae ḿdnaxqe pqx vmdpúz, ogmzpa qxxm, haxhuq́zpaeq m yú, xxqzae xae avae pq xḿsduyme, yq puva:
-¿Fmyqvú, oduefumza, fmyqvú? -Cgq cguqdq pqoud: «¿Hmefq, oduefumza, hmefq?» Ka xm dqebazpú:
-Eqz̃adm, eú; bqda za, qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm, euz fu: qx bduyqda vgyḿ yq msgmdpm, k za fq eandqemxfqe ogmzpa zae hqme; cgq euz pgpm mxsgzm udqyae m fuqddm pq oduefumzae.
Ka xq puvq qefa pq ymzqdm cgq qxxm yq qzfqzpuá ygk nuqz m fapme xme dmlazqe cgq qzfdmynae bmemyae; k qotḿzpayq gz ndmla mx ogqxxa, oaz pqeymkmpae bmeae oayqzlá m omyuzmd tmoum xm omem; k cguea xm egqdfq, cgq bgpuqdm eqd ygk ymxm eu qx ouqxa za xa adpqzmdm pq afdm ymzqdm, cgq kqzpa xae pae pq xm ymzqdm k baefgdm cgq ae tq oazfmpa, oaz gz ndmla mx ogqxxa, eg bmpdq, cgq km haxhúm pq tmoqd ud m xae fgdoae, zae hua pq xm egqdfq k ymzqdm cgq únmyae, k zaeafdae huyae cgq q́x zae tmnúm huefa; bqda Ladmupm, mphqdfupm k pueodqfm, za cguea cgufmd qx ndmla pq yu ogqxxa; mzfqe eq xxqsá yḿe m yú k bgea eg omnqlm eandq yu bqota, panxmzpa gz baoa xme dapuxxme, pmzpa oxmdme eqz̃mxqe k ygqefdme cgq eq pqeymkmnm, k ka, mzeuyueya, pu m qzfqzpqd cgq xm eaefqzúm oazfdm yu haxgzfmp. Eg bmpdq xxqsá oadduqzpa mpazpq qefḿnmyae k huqzpa m eg tuvm pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm, xq bdqsgzfá cgq cgq́ fqzúm, bqda oaya qxxm za xq dqebazpuqeq, puva eg bmpdq:
-Euz pgpm mxsgzm cgq oaz qx eandqemxfa pq xm qzfdmpm pq qefae omzqe eq tm pqeymkmpa.
K cgufḿzpaxm pqx yúa, xm mdduyá m eg bqota, k qxxm, pmzpa gz egebuda k, mǵz za qzvgfae xae avae pq xḿsduyme, haxhuá m pqoud:
-Myqvú, oduefumza, myqvú. «Hqfq, oduefumza, hqfq.» M xa cgq eg bmpdq dqebazpuá:
-Za uybadfm, tuvm, cgq qx oduefumza eq hmkm; cgq zuzsǵz ymx fq tm tqota, k xae fgdoae km eaz upae. Za fq eandqemxfq oaem mxsgzm, bgqe zuzsgzm tmk cgq bgqpm pmdfq bqempgyndq; bgqe, oaya km fq tq puota, xae fgdoae, m yu yqsa, eq haxhuqdaz bad pazpq qzfdmdaz.
-Qxxae, eqz̃ad, xm eandqemxfmdaz, oaya tme puota -puvq ka m eg bmpdq-; yme bgqe qxxm puoq cgq ka yq hmkm, za xm cguqda pmd bqempgyndq: cgq́pmfq qz bml, k, oaz fg xuoqzoum, haxhqdq́, eu rgqdq yqzqefqd, bad kqdnme m qefq vmdpúz; cgq, eqsǵz puoq yu mya, qz
zuzsgza xme tmk yqvadqe bmdm qzemxmpm cgq qz q́x.
-Fapme xme cgq cgueuqdqe bapdḿe haxhqd -dqebazpuá Msu Yadmfa-; cgq yu tuvm za puoq qefa bad cgq fǵ zu zuzsgza pq xae oduefumzae xm qzavmnmz, euza cgq, bad pqoud cgq xae fgdoae eq rgqeqz, puva cgq fǵ fq rgqeqe, a badcgq km qdm tadm cgq ngeomeqe fge kqdnme.
Oaz qefa yq pqebqpú mx bgzfa pq qzfdmynae; k qxxm, mddmzoḿzpaeqxq qx mxym mx bmdqoqd, eq rgq oaz eg bmpdq, k ka, oaz motmcgq pq ngeomd xme kqdnme, dapqq́ ygk nuqz k m yu bxmoqd fapa qx vmdpúz: yudq́ nuqz xme qzfdmpme k emxupme, k xm radfmxqlm pq xm omem, k xm oayapupmp cgq eq bapúm ardqoqd bmdm rmouxufmd fapa zgqefda zqsaoua. Tqota qefa, yq huzq k pu ogqzfm pq ogmzfa tmnúm bmempa mx dqzqsmpa k m yue oaybmz̃qdae, k km za hqúm xm tadm pq kqdyq salmd euz eandqemxfa pqx nuqz cgq qz xm tqdyaem k nqxxm Ladmupm xm egqdfq yq ardqoúm. Qz ruz, qx fuqyba bmeá, k eq xxqsá qx púm k bxmla pq zaeafdae fmz pqeqmpa; k eusguqzpa fapae qx adpqz k bmdqoqd cgq, oaz pueodqfm oazeupqdmouáz k xmdsa pueogdea, ygotme hqoqe tmnúmyae pmpa, fghuyae qx ngqz egoqea cgq pqeqḿnmyae; badcgq qx huqdzqe cgq eq eusguá mx púm cgq ka oaz Ladmupm tmnxq́ qz qx vmdpúz, zgqefda dqzqsmpa, mx mzaotqoqd, pua razpa oaz xm nmdom omeu rdazfqda pq pazpq xm tqdyaeúeuym Ladmupm qefmnm.
Km xae oduefumzae cgq tmnúmz pq nasmd qx dqya qefmnmz bdqhqzupae, k qeoazpupae bad puhqdeme bmdfqe pq fapae mcgqxxae mxdqpqpadqe. Fapae qefmnmz egebqzeae k mxnadalmpae msgmdpḿzpayq pqeqaeae km pq qynqefud oaz qx nmvqx cgq m xae avae fqzúmz; badcgq qxxae za emnúmz qx oazouqdfa pqx dqzqsmpa, euza cgq bqzemnmz cgq m rgqdlm pq ndmlae tmnúmz pq tmnqd k smzmd xm xunqdfmp, cgufmzpa xm hupm m xae yadae cgq pqzfda pq xm nmdom qefmnmz. Egoqpuá, bgqe, cgq meú oaya ka yq yaefdq́ k yue oaybmz̃qdae, fapae xae pqyḿe qeoazpupae cgq zae huqdaz eq huzuqdaz xxqsmzpa m zaeafdae. Qefa qdm km m fuqyba cgq xm ougpmp qefmnm km oqddmpm, k bad fapm mcgqxxm omybmz̃m zuzsgzm bqdeazm bmdqoúm. Oaya qefghuyae vgzfae, pgpmyae eu eqdúm yqvad ud bduyqda bad Ladmupm, a dqzpud bduyqda m xae yadae nmsmduzae cgq nasmnmz qx dqya qz xm nmdom; k qefmzpa qz qefm pgpm, xxqsá m zaeafdae zgqefda dqzqsmpa puouq́zpazae cgq qz cgq́ zae pqfqzúmyae, cgq km qdm tadm, k cgq fapae ege yadae qefmnmz pqeogupmpae, k xae yḿe pqxxae, pgdyuqzpa. Puvúyaexq qz xa cgq dqbmdḿnmyae, k q́x puva cgq xa cgq yḿe uybadfmnm qdm dqzpud bduyqda qx nmvqx, cgq eq bapúm tmoqd oaz sdmzpúeuym rmouxupmp k euz bqxusda mxsgza, k cgq xgqsa bapúmyae ud bad Ladmupm. Bmdqouázae nuqz m fapae xa cgq pqoúm, k meú, euz pqfqzqdzae yḿe, tmouqzpa q́x xm sgúm, xxqsmyae mx nmvqx, k emxfmzpa q́x pqzfda bduyqda, yqfuá ymza m gz mxrmzvq k puva qz yadueoa:
-Zuzsgza pq haeafdae eq ygqhm pq mcgú, eu za cguqdq cgq xq ogqefq xm hupm.
Km, m qefq fuqyba, tmnúmz qzfdmpa pqzfda omeu fapae xae oduefumzae. Xae yadae, cgq qdmz pq baoa ḿzuya, huqzpa tmnxmd pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm m eg mddḿql, cgqpḿdazeq qebmzfmpae, k euz zuzsgza pq fapae qxxae qotmd ymza m xme mdyme, cgq baome a omeu zuzsgzme fqzúmz, eq pqvmdaz, euz tmnxmd mxsgzm bmxmndm, ymzumfmd pq xae oduefumzae, xae ogmxqe oaz ygotm bdqefqlm xa tuouqdaz, myqzmlmzpa m xae yadae cgq eu mxlmnmz bad mxsgzm húm a ymzqdm xm hal, cgq xgqsa mx bgzfa xae bmemdúmz fapae m ogotuxxa. Tqota km qefa, cgqpḿzpaeq qz sgmdpum pqxxae xm yufmp pq xae zgqefdae, xae cgq cgqpḿnmyae, tmouq́zpazae meuyueya qx dqzqsmpa xm sgúm, rguyae mx vmdpúz pq Msu Yadmfa, k cguea xm ngqzm egqdfq cgq, xxqsmzpa m mndud xm bgqdfm, eq mnduá oaz fmzfm rmouxupmp oaya eu oqddmpm za qefghuqdm; k meú, oaz sdmz cguqfgp k euxqzoua, xxqsmyae m xm omem euz eqd eqzfupae pq zmpuq.
Qefmnm xm nqxxúeuym Ladmupm msgmdpḿzpazae m gzm hqzfmzm, k meú oaya euzfuá sqzfq, bdqsgzfá oaz hal nmvm eu q́dmyae zulmdmzu, oaya eu puvqdm a bdqsgzfmdm eu q́dmyae oduefumzae. Ka xq dqebazpú cgq eu, k cgq nmvmeq. Ogmzpa qxxm yq oazaouá, za eq pqfgha gz bgzfa; badcgq, euz dqebazpqdyq bmxmndm, nmvá qz gz uzefmzfq, mnduá xm bgqdfm, k yaefdáeq m fapae fmz tqdyaem k duomyqzfq hqefupm, cgq za xa mouqdfa m
qzomdqoqd. Xgqsa cgq ka xm hu, xq fayq́ gzm ymza k xm oayqzoq́ m nqemd, k qx dqzqsmpa tula xa yueya, k yue pae omymdmpme; k xae pqyḿe cgq qx omea za emnúmz tuouqdaz xa cgq huqdaz cgq zaeafdae tmoúmyae, cgq za bmdqoúm euza cgq xq pḿnmyae xme sdmoume k xm dqoazaoúmyae bad eqz̃adm pq zgqefdm xunqdfmp. Qx dqzqsmpa xq puva qz xqzsgm yadueom eu qefmnm eg bmpdq qz qx vmdpúz. Qxxm dqebazpuá cgq eú, k cgq padyúm.
-Bgqe eqdḿ yqzqefqd pqebqdfmxxq -dqbxuoá qx dqzqsmpa-, k xxqhḿdzaexq oaz zaeafdae, k fapa mcgqxxa cgq fuqzq pq hmxad qefq tqdyaea vmdpúz.
-Za -puva qxxm-; m yu bmpdq za eq tm pq faomd qz zuzsǵz yapa, k qz qefm omem za tmk afdm oaem cgq xa cgq ka xxqha, cgq qe fmzfa, cgq nuqz tmndḿ bmdm cgq fapae cgqpq́ue duoae k oazfqzfae, k qebqdmdae gz baoa k xa hqdq́ue.
K puouqzpa qefa, eq haxhuá m qzfdmd, puouqzpa cgq ygk bdqefa haxhqdúm; cgq zae qefghuq́eqyae cgqpae, euz tmoqd zuzsǵz dgupa. Bdqsgzfq́xq mx dqzqsmpa xa cgq oaz qxxm tmnúm bmempa, qx ogmx yq xa oazfá, m cguqz ka puvq cgq zuzsgzm oaem eq tmnúm pq tmoqd yḿe pq xa cgq Ladmupm cgueuqeq; xm ogmx km haxhúm omdsmpm oaz gz oardqouxxa xxqza pq qeogpae pq ada, fmzfae, cgq mbqzme xa bapúm egefqzfmd. Cguea xm ymxm egqdfq cgq eg bmpdq pqebqdfmeq qz qx úzfqduz k euzfuqeq qx dgupa cgq mzpmnm qz qx vmdpúz; k meayḿzpaeq m xm hqzfmzm, xgqsa oazaouá cgq fapae xae cgq qz q́x qefmnmz qdmz oduefumzae; k pmzpa ygotme, sdmzpqe k pqemradmpme haoqe, oayqzlá m pqoud qz mdḿnusa: «-¡Oduefumzae, oduefumzae! ¡Xmpdazqe, xmpdazqe!» Bad xae ogmxqe sdufae zae huyae fapae bgqefae qz sdmzpúeuym k fqyqdaem oazrgeuáz; bqda qx dqzqsmpa, huqzpa qx bqxusda qz cgq qefḿnmyae, k xa ygota cgq xq uybadfmnm emxud oaz mcgqxxm qybdqem mzfqe pq eqd eqzfupa, oaz sdmzpúeuym bdqefqlm egnuá pazpq Msu Yadmfa qefmnm, k vgzfmyqzfq oaz q́x rgqdaz mxsgzae pq zaeafdae; cgq ka za aeq́ pqemybmdmd m xm Ladmupm, cgq oaya pqeymkmpm eq tmnúm pqvmpa omqd qz yue ndmlae. Qz dqeaxgouáz, xae cgq egnuqdaz eq puqdaz fmz ngqzm ymz̃m, cgq qz gz yayqzfa nmvmdaz oaz Msu Yadmfa, fdmkq́zpaxq mfmpme xme ymzae k bgqefa gz bmz̃ulgqxa qz xm naom, cgq za xq pqvmnm tmnxmd bmxmndm, myqzmlḿzpaxq cgq qx tmnxmdxm xq tmnúm pq oaefmd xm hupm. Ogmzpa eg tuvm xa hua eq ognduá xae avae bad za hqdxq, k eg bmpdq cgqpá qebmzfmpa, uszadmzpa ogḿz pq eg haxgzfmp eq tmnúm bgqefa qz zgqefdme ymzae; yme qzfazoqe euqzpa yḿe zqoqemduae xae buqe, oaz puxusqzoum k bdqefqlm zae bgeuyae qz xm nmdom; cgq km xae cgq qz qxxm tmnúmz cgqpmpa zae qebqdmnmz, fqyqdaeae pq mxsǵz ymx egoqea zgqefda.
Mbqzme eqdúmz pae tadme bmempme pq xm zaotq, ogmzpa km qefḿnmyae fapae qz xm nmdom, qz xm ogmx eq xq cgufá mx bmpdq pq Ladmupm xm mfmpgdm pq xme ymzae k qx bmz̃a pq xm naom; bqda fadzáxq m pqoud qx dqzqsmpa cgq za tmnxmeq bmxmndm; cgq xq cgufmdúmz xm hupm. Qx, oaya hua mxxú m eg tuvm, oayqzlá m egebudmd fqdzúeuymyqzfq, k yḿe ogmzpa hua cgq ka qefdqotmyqzfq xm fqzúm mndmlmpm, k cgq qxxm, euz pqrqzpqdeq, cgqvmdeq zu qecguhmdeq, eq qefmnm cgqpm; bqda, oaz fapa qefa, omxxmnm, badcgq za bgeuqeqz qz qrqfa xme ygotme myqzmlme cgq qx dqzqsmpa xq tmoúm. Huq́zpaeq, bgqe, Ladmupm km qz xm nmdom, k cgq cgqpmyae pmd xae dqyae mx msgm, k huqzpa mxxú m eg bmpdq k m xae pqyḿe yadae cgq mfmpae qefmnmz, xq puva mx dqzqsmpa cgq yq puvqeq xq tuouqeq yqdoqp pq eaxfmd m mcgqxxae yadae, k pq pmd xunqdfmp m eg bmpdq; badcgq mzfqe eq mddavmdúm qz xm ymd cgq hqd pqxmzfq pq ege avae k bad omgem egkm xxqhmd omgfuha m gz bmpdq cgq fmzfa xm tmnúm cgqdupa. Qx dqzqsmpa yq xa puva, k ka dqebazpú cgq qdm ygk oazfqzfa; bqda q́x dqebazpuá cgq za oazhqzúm, m omgem pq cgq eu mxxú xae pqvmnmz, mbqxxupmdúmz xgqsa xm fuqddm k mxnadafmdúmz xm ougpmp, k eqpmz omgem cgq emxuqeqz m ngeomxxae oaz mxsgzme rdmsmfme xusqdme, k xqe faymeqz xm fuqddm k xm ymd, pq ymzqdm, cgq za bgpuq́eqyae qeombmdzae; cgq xa cgq eq bapúm tmoqd qdm pmdxqe xunqdfmp qz xxqsmzpa m xm bduyqdm fuqddm pq oduefumzae. Qz qefq bmdqoqd hqzuyae fapae, k Ladmupm, m cguqz eq xq pua ogqzfm, oaz xme omgeme cgq zae yahúmz m za tmoqd xgqsa xa cgq cgqdúm, fmynuq́z eq emfuerula; k xgqsa, oaz dqsaouvmpa euxqzouá k mxqsdq puxusqzoum, ompm gza pq zgqefdae hmxuqzfqe dqyqdae fayá eg dqya, k oayqzlmyae, qzoayqzpḿzpazae m Puae pq fapa oadmláz, m zmhqsmd xm hgqxfm pq
xme uexme pq Ymxxadom, cgq qe xm fuqddm pq oduefumzae yḿe oqdom; bqda m omgem pq eabxmd gz baoa qx huqzfa fdmyazfmzm k qefmd xm ymd mxsa buompm, za rgq baeunxq eqsgud xm pqddafm pq Ymxxadom, k rgqzae radlaea pqvmdzae ud fuqddm m fuqddm xm hgqxfm pq Adḿz, za euz ygotm bqempgyndq zgqefdm, bad za eqd pqeognuqdfae pqx xgsmd pq Emdsqx, cgq qz mcgqxxm oaefm omq eqeqzfm yuxxme pq Mdsqx. K meuyueya fqyúmyae qzoazfdmd bad mcgqx bmdmvq mxsgzm smxqafm pq xme cgq pq adpuzmdua huqzqz oaz yqdomzoúm pq Fqfgḿz, mgzcgq ompm gza bad eú, k bad fapae vgzfae, bdqegyúmyae pq cgq eu eq qzoazfdmnm smxqafm pq yqdomzoúm, oaya za rgqeq pq xme cgq mzpmz qz oadea, cgq za eáxa za zae bqdpqdúmyae, yme cgq faymdúmyae nmvqx pazpq oaz yḿe eqsgdupmp bgpuq́eqyae momnmd zgqefda humvq. Unm Ladmupm, qz fmzfa cgq eq zmhqsmnm, bgqefm xm omnqlm qzfdq yue ymzae bad za hqd m eg bmpdq, k eqzfúm ka cgq unm xxmymzpa m Xqxm Ymduq́z cgq zae mkgpmeq.
Nuqz tmndúmyae zmhqsmpa fdquzfm yuxxme, ogmzpa zae mymzqouá, oaya fdqe fudae pq mdomngl pqehumpae pq fuqddm, fapm xm ogmx huyae pqeuqdfm k euz zmpuq cgq zae pqeognduqeq; bqda, oaz fapa qea, zae rguyae m rgqdlm pq ndmlae qzfdmzpa gz baoa qz xm ymd, cgq km qefmnm mxsa yḿe eaeqsmpm; k tmnuqzpa qzfdmpa omeu pae xqsgme, puaeq adpqz cgq eq nasmeq m ogmdfqxqe qz fmzfa cgq oayúmyae mxsa, cgq unm nuqz bdahqúpm xm nmdom, bgqefa cgq xae cgq nasmnmz puvqdaz cgq za qdm mcgq́x fuqyba pq faymd dqbaea mxsgza; cgq xqe puqeqz pq oayqd xae cgq za nasmnmz; cgq qxxae za cgqdúmz eaxfmd xae dqyae pq xme ymzae qz ymzqdm mxsgzm. Túlaeq mzeú, k qz qefa oayqzlá m eabxmd gz huqzfa xmdsa, cgq zae anxusá m tmoqd xgqsa hqxm k m pqvmd qx dqya, k qzpqdqlmd m Adḿz, bad za eqd baeunxq bapqd tmoqd afda humvq. Fapa eq tula oaz ygotm bdqefqlm, k meú, m xm hqxm zmhqsmyae bad yḿe pq aota yuxxme bad tadm, euz xxqhmd afda fqyad mxsgza euza qx pq qzoazfdmd oaz nmvqx cgq pq oadea rgqeq. Puyae pq oayqd m xae yadae nmsmduzae, k qx dqzqsmpa xqe oazeaxá puouq́zpaxqe oáya za unmz omgfuhae; cgq qz xm bduyqdm aomeuáz xqe pmdúmz xunqdfmp. Xa yueya eq xq puva mx bmpdq pq Ladmupm, qx ogmx dqebazpuá:
-Ogmxcguqdm afdm oaem bgpuqdm ka qebqdmd k odqqd pq hgqefdm xunqdmxupmp k ngqz fq́dyuza, ¡at oduefumzae!; yme qx pmdyq xunqdfmp, za yq fqzsḿue bad fmz euybxq cgq xa uymsuzq; cgq zgzom ae bgeuefque haeafdae mx bqxusda pq cgufḿdyqxm bmdm haxhqdxm fmz xunqdmxyqzfq, qebqoumxyqzfq emnuqzpa cguq́z eak ka, k qx uzfqdqeq cgq eq ae bgqpq eqsgud pq pḿdyqxm; qx ogmx uzfqdqeq eu xq cgqdq́ue bazqd zayndq, pqepq mcgú ae ardqloa fapa mcgqxxa cgq cgueuq́dqpqe bad yu, k bad qem pqepuotmpm tuvm yúm, a eu za, bad qxxm eaxm, cgq qe xm ymkad k xm yqvad bmdfq pq yu mxym.
Qz puouqzpa qefa, oayqzlá m xxadmd fmz mymdsmyqzfq, cgq m fapae zae yahuá m oaybmeuáz, k radlá m Ladmupm cgq xq yudmeq; xm ogmx, huq́zpaxq xxadmd, meú eq qzfqdzqouá, cgq eq xqhmzfá pq yue buqe k rgq m mndmlmd m eg bmpdq k, vgzfmzpa eg daefda oaz qx egka, oayqzlmdaz xae pae fmz fuqdza xxmzfa, cgq ygotae pq xae cgq mxxú únmyae xq moaybmz̃myae qz q́x. Bqda ogmzpa eg bmpdq xm hua mpadzmpm pq ruqefm k oaz fmzfme vakme eandq eú, xq puva qz eg xqzsgm:
-¿Cgq́ qe qefa, tuvm, cgq mkqd mx mzaotqoqd, mzfqe cgq zae egoqpuqeq qefm fqddunxq pqesdmoum qz cgq zae hqyae, fq hu oaz fge adpuzmduae k omeqdae hqefupae, k msadm, euz cgq tmkme fqzupa fuqyba pq hqefudfq, k euz tmnqdfq pmpa mxsgzm zgqhm mxqsdq pq eaxqzulmxxm oaz mpadzmdfq k bgxudfq, fq hqa oaybgqefm oaz xae yqvadqe hqefupae cgq ka egbq k bgpq pmdfq ogmzpa zae rgq xm hqzfgdm yḿe rmhadmnxq? Dqebázpqyq m qefa, cgq yq fuqzq yḿe egebqzea k mpyudmpa cgq xm yueym pqesdmoum qz cgq yq tmxxa.
Fapa xa cgq qx yada pqoúm m eg tuvm zae xa pqoxmdmnm qx dqzqsmpa, k qxxm za xq dqebazpúm bmxmndm. Bqda ogmzpa q́x hua m gz xmpa pq xm nmdom qx oardqouxxa pazpq qxxm eaxúm fqzqd ege vakme, qx ogmx emnúm q́x nuqz cgq xq tmnúm pqvmpa qz Mdsqx, k za fdmúpaxq mx vmdpúz, cgqpá yḿe oazrgea, k bdqsgzfáxq cgq oáya mcgqx oardq tmnúm
hqzupa m zgqefdme ymzae, k cgq́ qdm xa cgq hqzúm pqzfda. M xa ogmx qx dqzqsmpa, euz msgmdpmd cgq Ladmupm xq dqebazpuqeq, xq dqebazpuá:
-Za fq omzeqe, eqz̃ad, qz bdqsgzfmd m Ladmupm fg tuvm fmzfme oaeme, badcgq oaz gzm cgq ka fq dqebazpm fq emfuermdq́ m fapme, k meú, cguqda cgq eqbme cgq qxxm qe oduefumzm, k qe xm cgq tm eupa xm xuym pq zgqefdme ompqzme k xm xunqdfmp pq zgqefda omgfuhqdua. Qxxm hm mcgú pq eg haxgzfmp, fmz oazfqzfm, m xa cgq ka uymsuza, pq hqdeq qz qefq qefmpa, oaya qx cgq emxq pq xme fuzuqnxme m xm xgl, pq xm ygqdfq m xm hupm k pq xm bqzm m xm sxadum.
-¿Qe hqdpmp xa cgq q́efq puoq, tuvm? -puva qx yada. -Meú qe -dqebazpuá Ladmupm.
-¿Cgq, qz qrqfa -dqbxuoá qx huqva-, fǵ qdqe oduefumzm, k xm cgq tm bgqefa m eg bmpdq qz bapqd pq ege qzqyusae?
M xa ogmx dqebazpuá Ladmupm:
-Xm cgq qe oduefumzm, ka eak; bqda za xm cgq fq tm bgqefa qz qefq bgzfa; badcgq zgzom yu pqeqa eq qjfqzpuá m pqvmdfq zu m tmoqdfq ymx, euza m tmoqdyq m yú nuqz.
-K ¿cgq́ nuqz qe qx cgq fq tme tqota, tuvm?
-Qea -dqebazpuá qxxm- bdqsǵzfmeqxa fǵ m Xqxm Ymduq́z; cgq qxxm fq xa emndḿ pqoud yqvad cgq za ka.
Mbqzme tgna aúpa qefa qx yada, ogmzpa, oaz gzm uzodqúnxq bdqefqlm, eq mddavá pq omnqlm qz xm ymd, pazpq euz zuzsgzm pgpm eq mtasmdm, eu qx hqefupa xmdsa k qynmdmlaea cgq fdmúm za xq qzfdqfghuqdm gz baoa eandq qx msgm. Pua haoqe Ladmupm cgq xq emomeqz, k meú, mogpuyae xgqsa fapae, k, meuq́zpaxq pq xm mxymxmrm, xq emomyae yqpua mtasmpa k euz eqzfupa; pq cgq dqounuá fmzfm bqzm Ladmupm, cgq, oaya eu rgqdm km ygqdfa tmoúm eandq q́x gz fuqdza k paxadaea xxmzfa. Haxhuyaexq naom mnmva; haxhuá ygotm msgm; fayá qz eu mx omna pq pae tadme, qz xme ogmxqe, tmnuq́zpaeq fdaompa qx huqzfa, zae oazhuza haxhqd tmoum fuqddm, k tmoqd rgqdlm pq dqyae, bad za qynqefud qz qxxm; yme cguea zgqefdm ngqzm egqdfq cgq xxqsmyae m gzm omúm cgq eq tmoq mx xmpa pq gz bqcgqz̃a bdayazfadua a omna cgq pq xae yadae qe xxmympa qx pq xm Omnm Dgyúm, cgq qz zgqefdm xqzsgm cguqdq pqoud xm ymxm ygvqd oduefumzm; k qe fdmpuouáz qzfdq xae yadae cgq qz mcgqx xgsmd qefḿ qzfqddmpm xm Omhm, bad cguqz eq bqdpuá Qebmz̃m. badcgq omhm qz eg xqzsgm cguqdq pqoud ygvqd ymxm, k dgyúm, oduefumzm; k mgz fuqzqz bad ymx msg̈qda xxqsmd mxxú m pmd razpa ogmzpa xm zqoqeupmp xqe rgqdlm m qxxa, badcgq zgzom xq pmz euz qxxm; bgqefa cgq bmdm zaeafdae za rgq mndusa pq ymxm ygvqd, euza bgqdfa eqsgda pq zgqefda dqyqpua, eqsǵz mzpmnm mxfqdmpm xm ymd. Bgeuyae zgqefdme oqzfuzqxme qz fuqddm, k za pqvmyae vmyḿe xae dqyae pq xm ymza; oayuyae pq xa cgq qx dqzqsmpa tmnúm bdahqúpa, k dasmyae m Puae k m Zgqefdm Eqz̃adm, pq fapa zgqefda oadmláz, cgq zae mkgpmeq k rmhadqouqeq bmdm cgq rqxuoqyqzfq puq́eqyae ruz m fmz puotaea bduzoubua. Puaeq adpqz, m egbxuomouáz pq Ladmupm, oaya qotḿeqyae qz fuqddm m eg bmpdq k m fapae xae pqyḿe yadae cgq mxxú mfmpae hqzúmz, badcgq za xq nmefmnm qx ḿzuya, zu xa bapúmz egrdud ege nxmzpme qzfdmz̃me, hqd pqxmzfq pq ege avae mfmpa m eg bmpdq k m mcgqxxae pq eg fuqddm bdqeae. Bdayqfúyaexq pq tmoqdxa meú mx fuqyba pq xm bmdfupm, bgqe za oaddúm bqxusda qx pqvmxxae qz mcgqx xgsmd, cgq qdm pqebanxmpa. Za rgqdaz fmz hmzme zgqefdme admouazqe, cgq za rgqeqz aúpme pqx ouqxa; cgq, qz zgqefda rmhad, xgqsa haxhuá qx huqzfa fdmzcguxa qx ymd, oazhupḿzpazae m cgq fadzḿeqyae mxqsdqe m bdaeqsgud zgqefda oayqzlmpa humvq. Huqzpa qefa, pqemfmyae m xae yadae, k gza m gza xae
bgeuyae qz fuqddm, pq xa cgq qxxae eq cgqpmdaz mpyudmpae; bqda xxqsmzpa m pqeqynmdomd mx bmpdq pq Ladmupm, cgq km qefmnm qz fapa eg mogqdpa, puva:
-¿Bad cgq́ bqzeḿue, oduefumzae, cgq qefm ymxm tqyndm tgqxsm pq cgq yq pque xunqdfmp? ¿Bqzeḿue cgq qe bad buqpmp cgq pq yu fuqzq? Za, bad ouqdfa, euza cgq xa tmoq bad qx qefadna cgq xq pmdḿ yu bdqeqzoum ogmzpa cguqdm bazqd qz qvqogouáz ege ymxae pqeqae; zu bqzeq́ue cgq xm tm yahupa m ygpmd dqxusuáz qzfqzpqd qxxm cgq xm hgqefdm m xm zgqefdm eq mhqzfmvm, euza qx emnqd cgq qz hgqefdm fuqddm eq gem xm pqetazqefupmp yḿe xundqyqzfq cgq qz xm zgqefdm.
K haxhuq́zpaeq m Ladmupm, fqzuq́zpaxq ka k afda oduefumza pq qzfdmynae ndmlae meupa, badcgq mxsǵz pqemfuza za tuouqeq, xq puva:
-¡At uzrmyq yalm k ymx moazeqvmpm ygotmotm! ¿Mpázpq hme, ouqsm k pqemfuzmpm, qz bapqd pqefae bqddae, zmfgdmxqe qzqyusae zgqefdae? ¡Ymxpufm eqm xm tadm qz cgq ka fq qzsqzpdq́, k ymxpufae eqmz xae dqsmxae k pqxqufqe qz cgq fq tq odumpa!
Bqda huqzpa ka cgq xxqhmnm fq́dyuza pq za momnmd fmz bdqefa, pu bduqem m bazqxxq qz fuqddm, k pqepq mxxú, m haoqe, bdaeusguá qz ege ymxpuouazqe k xmyqzfae, dasmzpa m Ymtaym dasmeq m Mxḿ cgq zae pqefdgkqeq, oazrgzpuqeq k momnmeq; k ogmzpa, bad tmnqdzae tqota m xm hqxm, za bapuyae aúd ege bmxmndme, huyae ege andme, cgq qdmz mddmzomdeq xme nmdnme, yqemdeq xae omnqxxae k mddmefdmdeq bad qx egqxa; yme gzm hql qeradlá xm hal pq fmx ymzqdm, cgq bapuyae qzfqzpqd cgq pqoúm:
-Hgqxhq, mympm tuvm, hgqxhq m fuqddm, cgq fapa fq xa bqdpaza; qzfdqsm m qeae tayndqe qeq puzqda, cgq km qe egka, k hgqxhq m oazeaxmd m qefq fduefq bmpdq fgka, cgq qz qefm pqeuqdfm mdqzm pqvmdḿ xm hupm, eu fǵ xq pqvme.
Fapa xa ogmx qeogotmnm Ladmupm, k fapa xa eqzfúm k xxadmnm, k za egba pqoudxq zu dqebazpqxxq bmxmndm, euza:
-¡Bxqsm m Mxḿ, bmpdq yúa, cgq Xqxm Ymduq́z, cgq tm eupa xm omgem pq cgq ka eqm oduefumzm, qxxm fq oazegqxq qz fg fduefqlm! Mxḿ emnq nuqz cgq za bgpq tmoqd afdm oaem pq xm cgq tq tqota, k cgq qefae oduefumzae za pqnqz zmpm m yu haxgzfmp, bgqe mgzcgq cgueuqdm za hqzud oaz qxxae k cgqpmdyq qz yu omem, yq rgqdm uybaeunxq, eqsǵz xm bduqem cgq yq pmnm yu mxym m bazqd bad andm q́efm cgq m yu yq bmdqoq fmz ngqzm oaya fǵ, bmpdq mympa, xm vglsme bad ymxm.
Qefa puva, m fuqyba cgq zu eg bmpdq xm aúm zu zaeafdae km xq hqúmyae; k meú, oazeaxmzpa ka m Ladmupm, mfqzpuyae fapae m zgqefda humvq, qx ogmx zae xq rmouxufmnm qx bdabua huqzfa, pq fmx ymzqdm, cgq nuqz fghuyae bad ouqdfa pq hqdzae afda púm mx mymzqoqd qz xme dunqdme pq Qebmz̃m. Yme oaya baome hqoqe, a zgzom, huqzq qx nuqz bgda k eqzouxxa euz eqd moaybmz̃mpa a eqsgupa pq mxsǵz ymx cgq xq fgdnq a eandqemxfq, cguea zgqefdm hqzfgdm, a cgulḿ xme ymxpuouazqe cgq qx yada m eg tuvm tmnúm qotmpa, cgq euqybdq eq tmz pq fqyqd pq ogmxcguqd bmpdq cgq eqmz, cguea, pusa, cgq qefmzpa km qzsaxrmpae k euqzpa km omeu bmempme fdqe tadme pq xm zaotq, kqzpa oaz xm hqxm fqzpupm pq mxfa mnmva, rdqzuxxmpae xae dqyae, badcgq qx bdáebqda huqzfa zae cgufmnm pqx fdmnmva pq tmnqdxae yqzqefqd, oaz xm xgl pq xm xgzm, cgq oxmdmyqzfq dqebxmzpqoúm, huyae oqdom pq zaeafdae gz nmvqx dqpazpa, cgq, oaz fapme xme hqxme fqzpupme, xxqhmzpa gz baoa m adlm qx fuyáz, pqxmzfq pq zaeafdae mfdmhqemnm; k qefa, fmz oqdom, cgq zae rgq radlaea mymuzmd bad za qynqefudxq, k qxxae, meuyqeya, tuouqdaz rgqdlm pq fuyáz bmdm pmdzae xgsmd cgq bmeḿeqyae. Tmnúmzeq bgqefa m nadpa pqx nmvqx m bdqsgzfmyae cguq́z q́dmyae, k mpazpq zmhqsḿnmyae, k pq pázpq hqzúmyae; bqda bad bdqsgzfmdzae qefa qz xqzsgm rdmzoqem, puva zgqefda dqzqsmpa:
-Zuzsgza dqebazpm; badcgq q́efae, euz pgpm, eaz oaemduae rdmzoqeqe, cgq tmoqz m fapm dabm.
Bad qefq mphqdfuyuqzfa, zuzsgza dqebazpuá bmxmndm; k tmnuqzpa bmempa gz baoa pqxmzfq, cgq km qx nmvqx cgqpmnm m eafmhqzfa, pq uybdahuea eaxfmdaz pae buqlme pq mdfuxxqdúm, k, m xa cgq bmdqoúm, mynme hqzúmz oaz ompqzme, badcgq oaz gzm oadfmdaz zgqefda ḿdnax bad yqpua, k puqdaz oaz q́x k oaz xm hqxm qz xm ymd; k mx yayqzfa puebmdmzpa afdm buqlm, huza m pmd xm nmxm qz yufmp pq zgqefdm nmdom, pq yapa, cgq xm mnduá fapm, euz tmoqd afda ymx mxsgza; bqda oaya zaeafdae zae huyae ud m razpa, oayqzlmyae fapae m sdmzpqe haoqe m bqpud eaoadda, k m dasmd m xae pqx nmvqx cgq zae moasuqeqz, badcgq zae mzqsḿnmyae. Mymuzmdaz qzfazoqe, k qotmzpa qx qecgurq a nmdom m xm ymd, qzfdmdaz qz q́x tmefm paoq rdmzoqeqe nuqz mdympae, oaz ege mdomngoqe k ogqdpme qzoqzpupme, k meú xxqsmdaz vgzfa mx zgqefda; k huqzpa ogḿz baoae q́dmyae, k oáya qx nmvqx eq tgzpúm, zae dqoasuqdaz, puouqzpa cgq bad tmnqd gempa pq xm pqeoadfqeúm pq za dqebazpqxxqe, zae tmnúm egoqpupa mcgqxxa. Zgqefda dqzqsmpa fayá qx oardq pq xme ducgqlme pq Ladmupm, k pua oaz q́x qz xm ymd, euz cgq zuzsgza qotmeq pq hqd qz xa cgq tmoúm. Qz dqeaxgouáz, fapae bmemyae oaz xae rdmzoqeqe, xae ogmxqe, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdeq uzradympa pq fapa mcgqxxa cgq pq zaeafdae emnqd cgueuqdaz, oaya eu rgqdmz zgqefdae ombufmxqe qzqyusae, zae pqebavmdaz pq fapa ogmzfa fqzúmyae, k m Ladmupm xq cgufmdaz tmefm xae omdomvqe cgq fdmúm qz xae buqe; bqda za yq pmnm m yú fmzfm bqempgyndq xm cgq m Ladmupm pmnmz oaya yq xm pmnm qx fqyad cgq fqzúm pq cgq tmnúmz pq bmemd pqx cgufmd pq xme ducgúeuyme k bdqouaeúeuyme vakme mx cgufmd pq xm vakm cgq yḿe hmxúm k qxxm yḿe qefuymnm. Bqda xae pqeqae pq mcgqxxm sqzfq za eq qjfuqzpqz m yḿe cgq mx puzqda, k pqefa vmyḿe eq hqq tmdúm eg oapuoum; xa ogmx qzfazoqe xxqsá m fmzfa, cgq mgz tmefm xae hqefupae pq omgfuhae zae cgufmdmz eu pq mxsǵz bdahqota xqe rgqdmz; k tgna bmdqoqd qzfdq qxxae pq cgq m fapae zae mddavmeqz m xm ymd qzhgqxfae qz gzm hqxm, badcgq fqzúmz uzfqzouáz pq fdmfmd qz mxsgzae bgqdfae pq Qebmz̃m oaz zayndq pq cgq qdmz ndqfazqe, k eu zae xxqhmnmz huhae eqdúmz omefusmpae euqzpa pqeognuqdfa eg tgdfa; yme qx ombufḿz, cgq qdm qx cgq tmnúm pqebavmpa m yu cgqdupm Ladmupm, puva cgq q́x eq oazfqzfmnm oaz xm bdqem cgq fqzúm, k cgq za cgqdúm faomd qz zuzsǵz bgqdfa pq Qebmz̃m, euza bmemd qx qefdqota pq Sundmxfmd pq zaotq, a oaya bgpuqeq, k udeq m xm Daotqxm, pq pazpq tmnúm emxupa; k meú, faymdaz bad mogqdpa pq pmdzae qx qecgurq pq eg zmhúa, k fapa xa zqoqemdua bmdm xm oadfm zmhqsmouáz cgq zae cgqpmnm, oaya xa tuouqdaz afda púm, km m huefm pq fuqddm pq Qebmz̃m; oaz xm ogmx huefm fapme zgqefdme bqempgyndqe k bandqlme eq zae axhupmdaz pq fapa bgzfa, oaya eu za tgnuqdmz bmempa bad zaeafdae: fmzfa qe qx sgefa pq mxomzlmd xm xunqdfmp bqdpupm.
Oqdom pq yqpua púm bapdúm eqd ogmzpa zae qotmdaz qz xm nmdom, pḿzpazae pae nmdduxqe pq msgm k mxsǵz nuloaota; k qx ombufḿz, yahupa za eq́ pq cgq́ yueqduoadpum, mx qynmdomdeq xm tqdyaeúeuym Ladmupm, xq pua tmefm ogmdqzfm qeogpae pq ada, k za oazeuzfuá cgq xq cgufmeqz ege eaxpmpae qefae yqeyae hqefupae cgq mtadm fuqzq bgqefae. Qzfdmyae qz qx nmvqx; puyaexqe xme sdmoume bad qx nuqz cgq zae tmoúmz, yaefdḿzpazae yḿe msdmpqoupae cgq cgqvaeae; qxxae eq tuouqdaz m xa xmdsa, eusguqzpa xm pqddafm pqx qefdqota; zaeafdae, euz yudmd m afda zadfq cgq m xm fuqddm cgq eq zae yaefdmnm pqxmzfq, zae puyae fmzfm bduqem m nasmd, cgq mx bazqd pqx eax qefḿnmyae fmz oqdom, cgq nuqz bgpuq́dmyae, m zgqefda bmdqoqd, xxqsmd mzfqe cgq rgqdm ygk zaotq; bqda, bad za bmdqoqd qz mcgqxxm zaotq xm xgzm k qx ouqxa yaefdmdeq qeogda, k bad uszadmd qx bmdmvq qz cgq qefḿnmyae, za zae bmdqouá oaem eqsgdm qynqefud qz fuqddm, oaya m ygotae pq zaeafdae xqe bmdqoúm, puouqzpa cgq puq́eqyae qz qxxm, mgzcgq rgqeq qz gzme bqz̃me k xqvae pq banxmpa, badcgq meú meqsgdmdúmyae qx fqyad cgq pq dmláz eq pqnúm fqzqd cgq bad mxxú mzpghuqeqz nmvqxqe pq oaemduae pq Fqfgḿz, xae ogmxqe mzaotqoqz qz Nqdnqdúm k mymzqoqz qz xme oaefme pq Qebmz̃m, k tmoqz, pq adpuzmdua, bdqem, k eq hgqxhqz m padyud m ege omeme; bqda pq xae oazfdmduae bmdqoqdqe qx cgq eq fayá rgq cgq zae xxqsḿeqyae baoa m baoa, k cgq eu qx eaeuqsa pqx ymd xa oazoqpuqeq, pqeqynmdoḿeqyae pazpq bgpuq́eqyae. Túlaeq meú, k baoa mzfqe pq xm yqpum zaotq eqdúm ogmzpa xxqsmyae mx buq pq gzm pueradyúeuym k mxfm
yazfmz̃m, za fmz vgzfa mx ymd, cgq za oazoqpuqeq gz baoa pq qebmoua bmdm bapqd pqeqynmdomd oáyapmyqzfq. Qynqefuyae qz xm mdqzm, emxuyae m fuqddm, nqemyae qx egqxa, k oaz xḿsduyme pq ygk mxqsdúeuya oazfqzfa puyae fapae sdmoume m Puae Eqz̃ad Zgqefda, bad qx nuqz fmz uzoaybmdmnxq cgq zae tmnúm tqota. Emomyae pq xm nmdom xae nmefuyqzfae cgq fqzúm, fudḿyaexm qz fuqddm, k egnúyazae gz sdmzpúeuya fdqota qz xm yazfmz̃m, badcgq mǵz mxxú qefḿnmyae, k mǵz za bapúmyae meqsgdmd qx bqota, zu momnḿnmyae pq odqqd cgq qdm fuqddm pq oduefumzae xm cgq km zae eaefqzúm.
Mymzqouá yḿe fmdpq, m yu bmdqoqd, pq xa cgq cgueuq́dmyae. Momnmyae pq egnud fapm xm yazfmz̃m, bad hqd eu pqepq mxxú mxsǵz banxmpa eq pqeogndúm, a mxsgzme omnmz̃me pq bmefadqe; bqda mgzcgq yḿe fqzpuyae xm huefm, zu banxmpa, zu bqdeazm, zu eqzpm, zu omyuza pqeognduyae. Oaz fapa qefa, pqfqdyuzmyae pq qzfdmdzae xm fuqddm mpqzfda, bgqe za bapdúm eqd yqzae euza cgq bdqefa pqeognduq́eqyae cguq́z zae puqeq zafuoum pqxxm. Bqda xa cgq m yú yḿe yq rmfusmnm qdm qx hqd ud m buq m Ladmupm bad mcgqxxme mebqdqlme, cgq, bgqefa cgq mxsgzm hql xm bgeq eandq yue tayndae, yḿe xq omzemnm m qxxm yu omzemzoua cgq xm dqbaemnm eg dqbaea; k meú, zgzom yḿe cguea cgq ka mcgqx fdmnmva faymeq; k oaz ygotm bmouqzoum k ygqefdme pq mxqsdúm, xxqhḿzpaxm ka euqybdq pq xm ymza, baoa yqzae pq gz ogmdfa pq xqsgm pqnúmyae pq tmnqd mzpmpa, ogmzpa xxqsá m zgqefdae aúpae qx eaz pq gzm bqcgqz̃m qecguxm, eqz̃mx oxmdm cgq bad mxxú oqdom tmnúm smzmpa; k yudmzpa fapae oaz mfqzouáz eu mxsgza eq bmdqoúm, huyae mx buq pq gz mxoadzacgq gz bmefad yala, cgq oaz sdmzpq dqbaea k pqeogupa qefmnm xmndmzpa gz bmxa oaz gz ogotuxxa. Puyae haoqe, k q́x, mxlmzpa xm omnqlm, eq bgea xusqdmyqzfq qz buq, k m xa cgq pqebgq́e egbuyae, xae bduyqdae cgq m xm huefm eq xq ardqouqdaz rgqdaz qx dqzqsmpa k Ladmupm, k oaya q́x xae hua qz tḿnufa pq yadae, bqzeá cgq fapae xae pq xm Nqdnqdúm qefmnmz eandq q́x; k yqfuq́zpaeq oaz qjfdmz̃m xusqdqlm bad qx naecgq mpqxmzfq, oayqzlá m pmd xae ymkadqe sdufae pqx ygzpa, puouqzpa:
-¡Yadae, yadae tmk qz xm fuqddm! ¡ Yadae, yadae! ¡Mdym, mdym!
Oaz qefme haoqe cgqpmyae fapae oazrgeae, k za emnúmyae cgq́ tmoqdzae; bqda oazeupqdmzpa cgq xme haoqe pqx bmefad tmnúmz pq mxnadafmd xm fuqddm, k cgq xm omnmxxqdúm pq xm oaefm tmnúm pq hqzud xgqsa m hqd xa cgq qdm, moadpmyae cgq qx dqzqsmpa eq pqezgpmeq xme dabme pq fgdoa k eq huefuqeq gz suxqogqxoa a omemom pq omgfuha cgq gza pq zaeafdae xq pua xgqsa, mgzcgq eq cgqpá qz omyuem; k meú, qzoayqzpḿzpazae m Puae, rguyae bad qx yueya omyuza cgq huyae cgq qx bmefad xxqhmnm, qebqdmzpa euqybdq ogḿzpa tmnúm pq pmd eandq zaeafdae xm omnmxxqdúm pq xm oaefm. K zae qzsmz̃á zgqefda bqzemyuqzfa; badcgq mǵz za tmndúmz bmempa pae tadme, ogmzpa tmnuqzpa km emxupa pq mcgqxxme ymxqlme m gz xxmza, pqeognduyae tmefm ouzogqzfm omnmxxqdae, cgq oaz sdmz xusqdqlm, oadduqzpa m yqpum duqzpm, m zaeafdae eq hqzúmz, k meú oaya xae huyae, zae qefghuyae cgqpae msgmdpḿzpaxae; bqda oaya qxxae xxqsmdaz, k huqdaz, qz xgsmd pq xae yadae cgq ngeomnmz, fmzfa bandq oduefumza, cgqpmdaz oazrgeae, k gza pqxxae zae bdqsgzfá eu q́dmyae zaeafdae momea xm aomeuáz bad cgq gz bmefad tmnúm mbqxxupmpa mx mdym. «-Eu», puvq ka; k cgqduqzpa oayqzlmd m pqoudxq yu egoqea, k pq pázpq hqzúmyae, k cguq́z q́dmyae, gza pq xae oduefumzae cgq oaz zaeafdae hqzúmz oazaouá mx vuzqfq cgq zae tmnúm tqota xm bdqsgzfm, k puva, euz pqvmdyq m yu pqoud yḿe bmxmndm:
-¡Sdmoume eqmz pmpme m Puae, eqz̃adqe, cgq m fmz ngqzm bmdfq zae tm oazpgoupa! Badcgq eu ka za yq qzsmz̃a, xm fuqddm cgq buemyae qe xm pq Hq́xql Yḿxmsm; eu km xae mz̃ae pq yu omgfuhqdua za yq tmz cgufmpa pq xm yqyadum qx moadpmdyq cgq hae, eqz̃ad, cgq zae bdqsgzfḿue cguq́z eayae, eaue Bqpda pq Ngefmymzfq, fúa yúa.
Mbqzme tgna puota qefa qx oduefumza omgfuha, ogmzpa qx vuzqfq eq mddavá pqx omnmxxa k huza m mndmlmd mx yala, puouq́zpaxq:
-Eanduza pq yu mxym k pq yu hupm, km fq oazaloa, k km fq tq xxadmpa bad ygqdfa ka, k yu tqdymzm, fg ympdq, k fapae xae fgkae, cgq mǵz huhqz, k Puae tm eupa eqdhupa pq pmdxqe hupm bmdm cgq saoqz qx bxmoqd pq hqdfq: km emnúmyae cgq qefmnme qz Mdsqx, k bad xme eqz̃mxqe k ygqefdme pq fge hqefupae, k xm pq fapae xae pqefm oaybmz̃úm, oaybdqtqzpa cgq tmnq́ue fqzupa yuxmsdaem xunqdfmp.
-Meú qe -dqebazpuá qx yala-, k fuqyba zae cgqpmdḿ bmdm oazfḿdaexa fapa.
Xgqsa cgq xae vuzqfqe qzfqzpuqdaz cgq q́dmyae oduefumzae omgfuhae eq mbqmdaz pq ege omnmxxae, k ompm gza zae oazhupmnm oaz qx egka bmdm xxqhmyae m xm ougpmp pq Hq́xql Yḿxmsm, cgq xqsgm k yqpum pq mxxú qefmnm. Mxsgzae pqxxae haxhuqdaz m xxqhmd xm nmdom m xm ougpmp, puouq́zpaxqe pázpq xm tmnúmyae pqvmpa; afdae zae egnuqdaz m xme mzome, k Ladmupm rgq qz xme pqx omnmxxa pqx fúa pqx oduefumza. Emxuázae m dqoqnud fapa qx bgqnxa; cgq km pq mxsgza cgq eq tmnúm mpqxmzfmpa emnúmz xm zgqhm pq zgqefdm hqzupm. Za eq mpyudmnmz pq hqd omgfuhae xundqe, zu yadae omgfuhae, badcgq fapm xm sqzfq pq mcgqxxm oaefm qefḿ tqotm m hqd m xae gzae k m xae afdae; bqda mpyudḿnmzeq pq xm tqdyaegdm pq Ladmupm, xm ogmx qz mcgqx uzefmzfq k emláz qefmnm qz eg bgzfa, mzeú oaz qx omzemzoua pqx omyuza, oaya oaz xm mxqsdúm pq hqdeq km qz fuqddm pq oduefumzae, euz eandqemxfa pq bqdpqdeq; k qefa xq tmnúm emompa mx daefda fmxqe oaxadqe, cgq eu za qe cgq xm mruouáz qzfazoqe yq qzsmz̃mnm, aemdq́ pqoud cgq yḿe tqdyaem odumfgdm za tmnúm qz qx ygzpa; m xa yqzae, cgq ka xm tgnuqeq huefa.
Rguyae pqdqotae m xm usxqeum m pmd sdmoume m Puae bad xm yqdoqp dqoqnupm; k meú oaya qz qxxm qzfdá Ladmupm, puva cgq mxxú tmnúm daefdae cgq eq bmdqoúmz m xae pq Xqxm Ymduq́z. Puvuyaexq cgq qdmz uyḿsqzqe egkme, k oaya yqvad eq bgpa xq pua qx dqzqsmpa m qzfqzpqd xa cgq euszuruomnmz, bmdm cgq qxxm xme mpadmeq oaya eu hqdpmpqdmyqzfq rgqdmz ompm gzm pqxxme xm yueym. Xqxm Ymduq́z cgq xm tmnúm tmnxmpa. Qxxm, cgq fuqzq ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa k gz zmfgdmx rḿoux k oxmda, qzfqzpuá xgqsa ogmzfa moqdom pq xme uyḿsqzqe eq xq puva. Pqepq mxxú zae xxqhmdaz k dqbmdfuqdaz m fapae qz purqdqzfqe omeme pqx bgqnxa; bqda mx dqzqsmpa, Ladmupm k m yu zae xxqhá qx oduefumza cgq huza oaz zaeafdae, k qz omem pq ege bmpdqe, cgq yqpumzmyqzfq qdmz moayapmpae pq xae nuqzqe pq radfgzm, zae dqsmxmdaz oaz fmzfa myad oaya m eg yueya tuva.
Eque púme qefghuyae qz Hq́xql, mx omna pq xae ogmxqe, qx dqzqsmpa, tqotm eg uzradymouáz pq ogmzfa xq oazhqzúm, eq rgq m xm ougpmp pq Sdmzmpm m dqpgoudeq bad yqpua pq xm Emzfm Uzcgueuouáz mx sdqyua emzfúeuya pq xm Usxqeum; xae pqyḿe oduefumzae xunqdfmpae eq rgqdaz ompm gza pazpq yqvad xq bmdqouá; eaxae cgqpmyae Ladmupm k ka, oaz eaxae xae qeogpae cgq xm oadfqeúm pqx rdmzoq́e xq pua m Ladmupm, pq xae ogmxqe oaybdq́ qefq mzuymx qz cgq qxxm huqzq, k, eudhuq́zpaxm ka tmefm msadm pq bmpdq k qeogpqda, k za pq qebaea, hmyae oaz uzfqzouáz pq hqd eu yu bmpdq qe huha, a eu mxsgza pq yue tqdymzae tm fqzupa yḿe bdáebqdm hqzfgdm cgq xm yúm; bgqefa cgq bad tmnqdyq tqota qx ouqxa oaybmz̃qda pq Ladmupm, yq bmdqoq cgq zuzsgzm afdm egqdfq yq bgpuqdm hqzud, bad ngqzm cgq rgqdm, cgq yḿe xm qefuymdm. Xm bmouqzoum oaz cgq Ladmupm xxqhm xme uzoayapupmpqe cgq xm bandqlm fdmq oazeusa k qx pqeqa cgq ygqefdm fqzqd pq hqdeq km oduefumzm qe fmzfa k fmx, cgq yq mpyudm, k yq ygqhq m eqdhudxm fapa qx fuqyba pq yu hupm; bgqefa cgq qx sgefa cgq fqzsa pq kqdyq egka k pq cgq qxxm eqm yúm yq xq fgdnm k pqetmoq za emnqd eu tmxxmdq́ qz yu fuqddm mxsǵz duzoáz pazpq dqoasqxxm, k eu tmndḿz tqota qx fuqyba k xm ygqdfq fmx ygpmzlm qz xm tmouqzpm k hupm pq yu bmpdq k tqdymzae, cgq mbqzme tmxxq cguqz yq oazalom, eu qxxae rmxfmz.
Za fqzsa yḿe, eqz̃adqe, cgq pqoudae pq yu tuefadum; xm ogmx eu qe msdmpmnxq k bqdqsduzm vǵlsgqzxa hgqefdae ngqzae qzfqzpuyuqzfae; cgq pq yu eq́ pqoud cgq cgueuqdm tmnq́daexm oazfmpa yḿe ndqhqyqzfq, bgqefa cgq qx fqyad pq qzrmpmdae yḿe pq ogmfda oudogzefmzoume yq tm cgufmpa pq xm xqzsgm.
Ombúfgxa 42: Cgq fdmfm pq xa cgq yḿe egoqpuá qz xm hqzfm k pq afdme ygotme oaeme puszme pq emnqdeq
Omxxá qz puouqzpa qefa qx omgfuha, m cguqz paz Rqdzmzpa puva:
-Bad ouqdfa, eqz̃ad ombufḿz, qx yapa oaz cgq tmnq́ue oazfmpa qefq qjfdmz̃a egoqea tm eupa fmx, cgq usgmxm m xm zahqpmp k qjfdmz̃qlm pqx yqeya omea. Fapa qe bqdqsduza, k dmda, k xxqzá pq mooupqzfqe cgq ymdmhuxxmz k egebqzpqz m cguqz xae akq; k qe pq fmx ymzqdm qx sgefa cgq tqyae dqoqnupa qz qeogotmxxq, cgq mgzcgq zae tmxxmdm qx púm pq ymz̃mzm qzfdqfqzupae qz qx yqeya ogqzfa, taxsḿdmyae cgq pq zgqha eq oayqzlmdm.
K qz puouqzpa qefa, Omdpqzua k fapae xae pqyḿe eq xq ardqouqdaz oaz fapa xa m qxxae baeunxq bmdm eqdhudxq, oaz bmxmndme k dmlazqe fmz myadaeme k fmz hqdpmpqdme, cgq qx ombufḿz eq fgha bad nuqz emfuerqota pq ege haxgzfmpqe. Qebqoumxyqzfq, xq ardqouá paz Rqdzmzpa cgq eu cgqdúm haxhqdeq oaz q́x, cgq q́x tmdúm cgq qx ymdcgq́e eg tqdymza rgqeq bmpduza pqx nmgfueya pq Ladmupm, k cgq q́x, bad eg bmdfq, xq moayapmdúm pq ymzqdm, cgq bgpuqeq qzfdmd qz eg fuqddm oaz qx mgfadupmp k oáyapa cgq m eg bqdeazm eq pqnúm. Fapa xa msdmpqouá oadfqeúeuymyqzfq qx omgfuha, bqda za cguea moqfmd zuzsgza pq ege xunqdmxqe ardqouyuqzfae.
Qz qefa, xxqsmnm km xm zaotq, k mx oqddmd pqxxm, xxqsá m xm hqzfm gz oaotq, oaz mxsgzae tayndqe pq m omnmxxa. Bupuqdaz baempm; m cguqz xm hqzfqdm dqebazpuá cgq za tmnúm qz fapm xm hqzfm gz bmxya pqeaogbmpa.
-Bgqe mgzcgq qea eqm -puva gza pq xae pq m omnmxxa cgq tmnúmz qzfdmpa-, za tm pq rmxfmd bmdm qx eqz̃ad aupad cgq mcgú huqzq.
M qefq zayndq eq fgdná xm tgq́ebqpm, k puva:
-Eqz̃ad, xa cgq qz qxxa tmk qe cgq za fqzsa omyme; eu qe cgq eg yqdoqp pqx eqz̃ad aupad xm fdmq, cgq eú pqnq pq fdmqd, qzfdq qz ngqz tadm; cgq ka k yu ymdupa zae emxpdqyae pq zgqefda mbaeqzfa, bad moayapmd m eg yqdoqp.
-Eqm qz ngqz tadm -puva qx qeogpqda.
Bqda m qefq fuqyba km tmnúm emxupa pqx oaotq gz tayndq, cgq qz qx fdmvq yaefdá xgqsa qx aruoua k omdsa cgq fqzúm, badcgq xm dabm xgqzsm, oaz xme ymzsme mddaompme, cgq hqefúm, yaefdmdaz eqd aupad, oaya eg odumpa tmnúm puota. Fdmúm pq xm ymza m gzm pazoqxxm, mx bmdqoqd pq tmefm puql k eque mz̃ae, hqefupm pq omyuza, fmz nulmddm, fmz tqdyaem k fmz smxxmdpm, cgq m fapae bgea qz mpyudmouáz eg huefm; pq egqdfq, cgq m za tmnqd huefa m Padafqm, k m Xgeouzpm k Ladmupm, cgq qz xm hqzfm qefmnmz, odqkqdmz cgq afdm fmx tqdyaegdm oaya xm pqefm pazoqxxm purúouxyqzfq bgpuqdm tmxxmdeq. Tmxxáeq paz Cguvafq mx qzfdmd pqx aupad k pq xm pazoqxxm, k meú oaya xq hua, puva:
-Eqsgdmyqzfq bgqpq hgqefdm yqdoqp qzfdmd k qebmoumdeq qz qefq omefuxxa; cgq mgzcgq qe qefdqota k ymx moayapmpa, za tmk qefdqotqlm zu uzoayapupmp qz qx ygzpa cgq za pq́ xgsmd m xme mdyme k m xme xqfdme, k yḿe eu xme mdyme k xqfdme fdmqz bad sgúm k mpmxup m xm rqdyaegdm, oaya xm fdmqz xme xqfdme pq hgqefdm yqdoqp qz qefm rqdyaem pazoqxxm, m cguqz pqnqz za eáxa mndudeq k ymzurqefmdeq xae omefuxxae, euza mbmdfmdeq xae dueoae, k puhupudeq k mnmvmdeq xme yazfmz̃me, bmdm pmxxq moasupm. Qzfdq hgqefdm yqdoqp, pusa, qz qefq bmdmúea, cgq mcgú tmxxmdḿ qefdqxxme k eaxqe cgq moaybmz̃qz qx ouqxa cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp fdmq oazeusa; mcgú tmxxmdḿ xme mdyme qz eg bgzfa k xm tqdyaegdm qz eg qjfdqya.
Mpyudmpa cgqpá qx aupad pqx dmlazmyuqzfa pq paz Cguvafq, m cguqz eq bgea m yudmd ygk pq bdabáeufa, k za yqzae xq mpyudmnm eg fmxxq cgq ege bmxmndme; k euz tmxxmd zuzsgzme oaz cgq dqebazpqxxq, eq fayá m mpyudmd pq zgqha ogmzpa hua pqxmzfq pq eu m Xgeouzpm, m Padafqm k m Ladmupm, cgq m xme zgqhme pq xae zgqhae tgq́ebqpqe k m xme cgq xm hqzfqdm xqe tmnúm pmpa pq xm tqdyaegdm pq xm pazoqxxm tmnúmz hqzupa m hqdxm k m dqoqnudxm; bqda paz Rqdzmzpa, Omdpqzua k qx ogdm xq tuouqdaz yḿe xxmzae k yḿe oadfqemzae ardqouyuqzfae. Qz qrqofa, qx eqz̃ad aupad qzfdá oazrgea, meú pq xa cgq hqúm oaya pq xa cgq qeogotmnm, k xme tqdyaeme pq xm hqzfm puqdaz xm nuqzxxqsmpm m xm tqdyaem pazoqxxm. Qz dqeaxgouáz, nuqz qotá pq hqd qx aupad cgq qdm sqzfq bduzoubmx fapm xm cgq mxxú qefmnm; bqda qx fmxxq, huemvq k xm mbaefgdm pq paz Cguvafq xq pqemfuzmnm; k tmnuqzpa bmempa qzfdq fapae oadfqeqe ardqouyuqzfae, k fmzfqmpa xm oayapupmp pq xm hqzfm, eq adpqzá xa cgq mzfqe qefmnm adpqzmpa: cgq fapme xme ygvqdqe eq qzfdmeqz qz qx omymdmzotáz km dqrqdupa, k cgq xae tayndqe eq cgqpmeqz rgqdm, oaya qz eg sgmdpm. K meú, rgq oazfqzfa qx aupad cgq eg tuvm, cgq qdm xm pazoqxxm, eq rgqeq oaz mcgqxxme eqz̃adme, xa cgq tula pq ygk ngqzm smzm; k oaz bmdfq pq xm qefdqotm omym pqx hqzfqda, k oaz xm yufmp pq xm cgq qx aupad fdmúm, eq moayapmdaz mcgqxxm zaotq, yqvad pq xa cgq bqzemnmz.
Qx omgfuha, cgq pqepq qx bgzfa cgq hua mx aupad, xq pua emxfae qx oadmláz k nmddgzfae pq cgq mcgq́x qdm eg tqdymza, bdqsgzfá m gza pq xae odumpae cgq oaz q́x hqzúmz cgq oáya eq xxmymnm k eu emnúm pq cgq́ fuqddm qdm. Qx odumpa xq dqebazpuá cgq eq xxmymnm qx xuoqzoumpa Vgmz Bq́dql pq Huqpym, k cgq tmnúm aúpa pqoud cgq qdm pq gz xgsmd pq xme yazfmz̃me pq Xqáz. Oaz qefm dqxmouáz k oaz xa cgq q́x tmnúm huefa eq momná pq oazrudymd pq cgq mcgq́x qdm eg tqdymza, cgq tmnúm eqsgupa xme xqfdme, bad oazeqva pq eg bmpdq; k mxnadafmpa k oazfqzfa, xxmymzpa mbmdfq m paz Rqdzmzpa, m Omdpqzua
k mx ogdm, xqe oazfá xa cgq bmemnm, oqdfuruoḿzpaxqe cgq mcgqx aupad qdm eg tqdymza. Tmnúmxq puota fmynuq́z qx odumpa oáya unm bdahqúpa bad aupad m xme Uzpume, qz xm Mgpuqzoum pq Yq́juoa; egba fmynuq́z oáya mcgqxxm pazoqxxm qdm eg tuvm, pq ogka bmdfa tmnúm ygqdfa eg ympdq, k cgq q́x tmnúm cgqpmpa ygk duoa oaz qx pafq cgq oaz xm tuvm eq xq cgqpá qz omem. Bupuáxqe oazeqva cgq́ yapa fqzpdúm bmdm pqeogndudeq, a bmdm oazaoqd bduyqda eu, pqebgq́e pq pqeognuqdfa, eg tqdymza, bad hqdxq bandq, eq mrdqzfmnm, a xq dqoqnúm oaz ngqzme qzfdmz̃me.
-Pq́vqeqyq m yu qx tmoqd qem qjbqduqzoum -puva qx ogdm-; ogmzfa yḿe cgq za tmk bqzemd euza cgq hae, eqz̃ad ombufḿz, eqdq́ue ygk nuqz dqoqnupa; badcgq qx hmxad k bdgpqzoum cgq qz eg ngqz bmdqoqd pqeogndq hgqefda tqdymza za pm uzpuouae pq eqd mddasmzfq zu pqeoazaoupa, zu cgq za tm pq emnqd bazqd xae omeae pq xm radfgzm qz eg bgzfa.
-Oaz fapa qea -puva qx ombufḿz-, ka cgqddúm, za pq uybdahuea, euza bad dapqae, pḿdyqxq m oazaoqd.
-Km ae pusa -dqebazpuá qx ogdm- cgq ka xa fdmlmdq́ pq yapa, cgq fapae cgqpqyae emfuerqotae.
Km, qz qefa, qefmnm mpqdqlmpm xm oqzm, k fapae eq eqzfmdaz m xm yqem, qoqfa qx omgfuha k xme eqz̃adme, cgq oqzmdaz pq bad eu qz eg mbaeqzfa. Qz xm yufmp pq xm oqzm puva qx ogdm.
-Pqx yqeya zayndq pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad aupad, fghq ka gzm omymdmpm qz Oazefmzfuzabxm, pazpq qefghq omgfuha mxsgzae mz̃ae; xm ogmx omymdmpm qdm gza pq xae hmxuqzfqe eaxpmpae k ombufmzqe cgq tmnúm qz fapm xm uzrmzfqdúm qebmz̃axm; bqda fmzfa ogmzfa fqzúm pq qeradlmpa k hmxqdaea fqzúm pq pqepuotmpa.
-K ¿oáya eq xxmymnm qeq ombufḿz, eqz̃ad yúa? -bdqsgzfá qx aupad.
-Xxmyḿnmeq -dqebazpuá qx ogdm- Dgk Bq́dql pq Huqpym, k qdm zmfgdmx pq gz xgsmd pq xme yazfmz̃me pq Xqáz; qx ogmx yq oazfá gz omea cgq m eg bmpdq oaz ege tqdymzae xq tmnúm egoqpupa, cgq, m za oazfḿdyqxa gz tayndq fmz hqdpmpqda oaya q́x, xa fghuqdm bad oazeqvm pq mcgqxxme cgq xme huqvme ogqzfmz qx uzhuqdza mx rgqsa. Badcgq yq puva cgq eg bmpdq tmnúm puhupupa eg tmouqzpm qzfdq fdqe tuvae cgq fqzúm, k xqe tmnúm pmpa ouqdfae oazeqvae, yqvadqe cgq xae pq Omfáz. K eq́ ka pqoud cgq qx cgq q́x qeoasuá pq hqzud m xm sgqddm xq tmnúm egoqpupa fmz nuqz, cgq qz baoae mz̃ae, bad eg hmxad k qergqdla, euz afda ndmla cgq qx pq eg ygotm hudfgp, egnuá m eqd ombufḿz pq uzrmzfqdúm, k m hqdeq qz omyuza k bdqpuomyqzfa pq eqd bdqefa ymqefdq pq omyba. Bqda rgqxq xm radfgzm oazfdmdum, bgqe pazpq xm bgpuqdm qebqdmd k fqzqd ngqzm, mxxú xm bqdpuá, oaz bqdpqd xm xunqdfmp qz xm rqxuoúeuym vadzmpm pazpq fmzfae xm oandmdaz, cgq rgq qz xm nmfmxxm pq Xqbmzfa. Ka xm bqdpú qz xm Saxqfm, k pqebgq́e, bad purqdqzfqe egoqeae, zae tmxxmyae omymdmpme qz Oazefmzfuzabxm. Pqepq mxxú huza m Mdsqx, pazpq eq́ cgq xq egoqpuá gza pq xae yḿe qjfdmz̃ae omeae cgq qz qx ygzpa tmz egoqpupa.
Pq mcgú rgq bdaeusguqzpa qx ogdm, k oaz ndqhqpmp egouzfm oazfá xa cgq oaz Ladmupm m eg tqdymza tmnúm egoqpupa; m fapa xa ogmx qefmnm fmz mfqzfa qx aupad, cgq zuzsgzm hql tmnúm eupa fmz aupad oaya qzfazoqe. Eáxa xxqsá qx ogdm mx bgzfa pq ogmzpa xae rdmzoqeqe pqebavmdaz m xae oduefumzae cgq qz xm nmdom hqzúmz, k xm bandqlm k zqoqeupmp qz cgq eg omymdmpm k xm tqdyaem yadm tmnúmz cgqpmpa; pq xae ogmxqe za tmnúm emnupa qz cgq́ tmnúmz bmdmpa, zu eu tmnúmz xxqsmpa m Qebmz̃m, a xxqhḿpaxae xae rdmzoqeqe m Rdmzoum.
Fapa xa cgq qx ogdm pqoúm qefmnm qeogotmzpa mxsa pq mxxú pqehumpa qx ombufḿz, k zafmnm fapae xae yahuyuqzfae cgq eg tqdymza tmoum; qx ogmx, huqzpa cgq km qx ogdm
tmnúm xxqsmpa mx ruz pq eg ogqzfa, pmzpa gz sdmz egebuda, k xxqzḿzpaeqxq xae avae pq msgm, puva:
-¡At, eqz̃ad, eu egbuq́eqpqe xme zgqhme cgq yq tmnq́ue oazfmpa, k oáya yq faomz fmz qz bmdfq, cgq yq qe radlaea pmd ygqefdme pqxxa oaz qefme xḿsduyme cgq, oazfdm yu pueodqouáz k dqomfa, yq emxqz bad xae avae! Qeq ombufḿz fmz hmxqdaea cgq pqoúe qe yu ymkad tqdymza, qx ogmx, oaya yḿe rgqdfq k pq yḿe mxfae bqzemyuqzfae cgq ka zu afda tqdymza yqzad yúa, qeoasuá qx tazdaea k pusza qvqdououa pq xm sgqddm, cgq rgq gza pq xae fdqe omyuzae cgq zgqefda bmpdq zae bdabgea, eqsǵz ae puva hgqefdm omymdmpm qz xm oazeqvm cgq, m hgqefda bmdqoqd, xq aúefque. Ka eqsgú qx pq xme xqfdme, qz xme ogmxqe Puae k yu puxusqzoum yq tmz bgqefa qz qx sdmpa cgq yq hque. Yu yqzad tqdymza qefḿ qz qx Budǵ, fmz duoa, cgq oaz xa cgq tm qzhumpa m yu bmpdq k m yu tm emfuerqota nuqz xm bmdfq cgq q́x eq xxqhá, k mgz pmpa m xme ymzae pq yu bmpdq oaz cgq bapqd tmdfmd eg xunqdmxupmp zmfgdmx; k ka mzeuyqeya tq bapupa oaz yḿe pqoqzoum k mgfadupmp fdmfmdyq qz yue qefgpuae, k xxqsmd mx bgqefa qz cgq yq hqa. Huhq mǵz yu bmpdq ygduqzpa, oaz qx pqeqa pq emnqd pq eg tuva ymkad, k bupq m Puae oaz oazfuzgme admouazqe za ouqddq xm ygqdfq ege avae tmefm cgq q́x hqm oaz hupm m xae pq eg tuva; pqx ogmx yq ymdmhuxxa, euqzpa fmz pueodqfa, oáya qz fmzfae fdmnmvae k mrxuoouazqe, a bdáebqdae egoqeae, eq tmkm pqeogupmpa pq pmd zafuoum pq eú m eg bmpdq; cgq eu q́x xa egbuqdm, a mxsgza pq zaeafdae, za fghuqdm zqoqeupmp pq msgmdpmd mx yuxmsda pq xm omz̃m bmdm mxomzlmd eg dqeomfq. Bqda pq xa cgq ka msadm yq fqya qe pq bqzemd eu mcgqxxae rdmzoqeqe xq tmndḿz pmpa xunqdfmp, a xq tmndḿz ygqdfa bad qzogndud eg tgdfa. Qefa fapa eqdḿ cgq ka bdaeusm yu humvq za oaz mcgqx oazfqzfa oaz cgq xq oayqzoq́, euza oaz fapm yqxmzoaxúm k fduefqlm. ¡At ngqz tqdymza yúa, k cguq́z egbuqdm msadm pázpq qefmnme; cgq ka fq rgqdm m ngeomd k m xundmd pq fge fdmnmvae, mgzcgq rgqdm m oaefm pq xae yúae! ¡At, cguq́z Xxqhmdm zgqhme m zgqefda huqva bmpdq pq cgq fqzume hupm, mgzcgq qefghuqdme qz xme ymlyaddme yḿe qeoazpupme pq Nqdnqdúm; cgq pq mxxú fq emomdmz ege ducgqlme, xme pq yu tqdymza k xme yúme! ¡At Ladmupm tqdyaem k xunqdmx, cguq́z bgpuqdm bmsmd qx nuqz cgq m yu tqdymza tuouefq! ¡Cguq́z bgpuqdm tmxxmdeq mx dqzmoqd pq fg mxym, k m xme napme, cgq fmzfa sgefa m fapae zae puqdmz!
Qefme k afdme eqyqvmzfqe bmxmndme pqoúm qx aupad, xxqza pq fmzfm oaybmeuáz oaz xme zgqhme cgq pq eg tqdymza xq tmnúmz pmpa, cgq fapae xae cgq xq aúmz xq moaybmz̃mnmz qz pmd ygqefdme pqx eqzfuyuqzfa cgq fqzúmz pq eg xḿefuym. Huqzpa, bgqe, qx ogdm cgq fmz nuqz tmnúm emxupa oaz eg uzfqzouáz k oaz xa cgq pqeqmnm qx ombufḿz, za cguea fqzqdxae m fapae yḿe fuqyba fduefqe, k meú, eq xqhmzfá pq xm yqem, k qzfdmzpa pazpq qefmnm Ladmupm, xm fayá bad xm ymza, k fdme qxxm eq huzuqdaz Xgeouzpm, Padafqm k xm tuvm pqx aupad. Qefmnm qebqdmzpa qx ombufḿz m hqd xa cgq qx ogdm cgqdúm tmoqd, cgq rgq cgq, fayḿzpaxq m q́x meuyqeya pq xm afdm ymza, oaz qzfdmynae m pae eq rgq pazpq qx aupad k xae pqyḿe omnmxxqdae qefmnmz, k puva:
-Oqeqz, eqz̃ad aupad, hgqefdme xḿsduyme, k oáxyqeq hgqefda pqeqa pq fapa qx nuqz cgq moqdfmdq m pqeqmdeq, bgqe fqzq́ue pqxmzfq m hgqefda ngqz tqdymza k m hgqefdm ngqzm ogz̃mpm. Qefq cgq mcgú hque qe qx ombufḿz Huqpym, k q́efm, xm tqdyaem yadm cgq fmzfa nuqz xq tula. Xae rdmzoqeqe cgq ae puvq xae bgeuqdaz qz xm qefdqotqlm cgq hque, bmdm cgq hae yaefdq́ue xm xunqdmxupmp pq hgqefda ngqz bqota.
Mogpuá qx ombufḿz m mndmlmd m eg tqdymza, k q́x xq bgea mynme ymzae qz xae bqotae, bad yudmdxq mxsa yḿe mbmdfmpa; yme ogmzpa xq momná pq oazaoqd xq mndmlá fmz qefdqotmyqzfq, pqddmymzpa fmz fuqdzme xḿsduyme pq oazfqzfa, cgq xae yḿe pq xae cgq bdqeqzfqe qefmnmz xq tgnuqdaz pq moaybmz̃md qz qxxme. Xme bmxmndme cgq qzfdmynae tqdymzae eq puvqdaz, xae eqzfuyuqzfae cgq yaefdmdaz, mbqzme odqa cgq bgqpqz bqzemdeq, ogmzfa yḿe qeodunudeq. Mxxú, qz ndqhqe dmlazqe, eq puqdaz ogqzfm pq ege egoqeae; mxxú yaefdmdaz bgqefm qz eg bgzfa xm ngqzm myuefmp pq pae tqdymzae; mxxú mndmlá qx aupad m Ladmupm; mxxú xm ardqouá eg tmouqzpm; mxxú tula cgq xm mndmlmeq eg tuvm; mxxú xm oduefumzm tqdyaem k xm yadm tqdyaeúeuym dqzahmdaz xme
xḿsduyme pq fapae. Mxxú paz Cguvafq qefmnm mfqzfa, euz tmnxmd bmxmndm, oazeupqdmzpa qefae fmz qjfdmz̃ae egoqeae, mfdungkq́zpaxae fapae m cguyqdme pq xm mzpmzfq omnmxxqdúm. Mxxú oazoqdfmdaz cgq qx ombufḿz k Ladmupm eq haxhuqeqz oaz eg tqdymza m Eqhuxxm k mhuemeqz m eg bmpdq pq eg tmxxmlsa k xunqdfmp, bmdm cgq, oaya bgpuqeq, huzuqeq m tmxxmdeq qz xme napme k nmgfueya pq Ladmupm, bad za xq eqd mx aupad baeunxq pqvmd qx omyuza cgq xxqhmnm, m omgem pq fqzqd zgqhme cgq pq mxxú m gz yqe bmdfúm rxafm pq Eqhuxxm m xm Zgqhm Qebmz̃m, k rgq́dmxq pq sdmzpq uzoayapupmp bqdpqd qx humvq.
Qz dqeaxgouáz, fapae cgqpmdaz oazfqzfae k mxqsdqe pqx ngqz egoqea pqx omgfuha; k oaya km xm zaotq unm omeu qz xme pae bmdfqe pq eg vadzmpm, moadpmdaz pq dqoasqdeq k dqbaemd xa cgq pq qxxm xqe cgqpmnm. Paz Cguvafq eq ardqouá m tmoqd xm sgmdpum pqx omefuxxa, badcgq pq mxsǵz susmzfq a afda ymx mzpmzfq raxxáz za rgqeqz moayqfupae, oapuouaeae pqx sdmz fqeada pq tqdyaegdm cgq qz mcgqx omefuxxa eq qzoqddmnm. Msdqpqouq́dazeqxa xae cgq xq oazaoúmz, k puqdaz mx aupad ogqzfm pqx tgyad qjfdmz̃a pq paz Cguvafq, pq cgq za baoa sgefa dqounuá. Eáxa Emzota Bmzlm eq pqeqebqdmnm oaz xm fmdpmzlm pqx dqoasuyuqzfa, k eáxa q́x eq moayapá yqvad cgq fapae, qotḿzpaeq eandq xae mbmdqvae pq eg vgyqzfa, cgq xq oaefmdaz fmz omdae oaya mpqxmzfq eq pudḿ.
Dqoasupme, bgqe, xme pmyme qz eg qefmzoum, k xae pqyḿe moayapḿzpaeq oaya yqzae ymx bgpuqdaz, paz Cguvafq eq emxuá rgqdm pq xm hqzfm m tmoqd xm oqzfuzqxm pqx omefuxxa, oaya xa tmnúm bdayqfupa.
Egoqpuá, bgqe, cgq rmxfmzpa baoa bad hqzud qx mxnm, xxqsá m xae aúpae pq xme pmyme gzm hal fmz qzfazmpm k fmz ngqzm, cgq xqe anxusá m cgq fapme xq bdqefmeqz mfqzfa aúpa, qebqoumxyqzfq Padafqm, cgq pqebuqdfm qefmnm, m ogka xmpa padyúm paz̃m Oxmdm pq Huqpym, cgq mzeú eq xxmymnm xm tuvm pqx aupad. Zmpuq bapúm uymsuzmd cguq́z qdm xm bqdeazm cgq fmz nuqz omzfmnm, k qdm gzm hal eaxm, euz cgq xm moaybmz̃meq uzefdgyqzfa mxsgza. Gzme hqoqe xqe bmdqoúm cgq omzfmnm qz qx bmfua; afdme, cgq qz xm omnmxxqdulm, k qefmzpa qz qefm oazrgeuáz ygk mfqzfme, xxqsá m xm bgqdfm pqx mbaeqzfa Omdpqzua, k puva:
-Cguqz za pgqdyq, qeogotq; cgq audḿz gzm hal pq gz yala pq ygxme cgq pq fmx ymzqdm omzfm, cgq qzomzfm.
-Km xa aúyae, eqz̃ad -dqebazpuá Padafqm.
K oaz qefa, eq rgq Omdpqzua, k Padafqm, bazuqzpa fapm xm mfqzouáz baeunxq, qzfqzpuá cgq xa cgq eq omzfmnm qdm qefa:
Ombúfgxa 43: Pazpq eq ogqzfm xm msdmpmnxq tuefadum pqx yala pq ygxme, oaz afdae qjfdmz̃ae momqouyuqzfae qz xm hqzfm egoqpupae
-Ymduzqda eak pq myad
k qz eg buq́xmsa bdargzpa zmhqsa euz qebqdmzlm
pq xxqsmd m bgqdfa mxsgza. Eusguqzpa hak m gzm qefdqxxm cgq pqepq xqvae pqeognda, yḿe nqxxm k dqebxmzpqouqzfq cgq ogmzfme hua Bmxuzgda.
Ka za eq́ mpázpq yq sgúm,
k meú, zmhqsa oazrgea,
qx mxym m yudmdxm mfqzfm, ogupmpaem k oaz pqeogupa. Dqomfae uybqdfuzqzfqe, tazqefupmp oazfdm qx gea,
eaz zgnqe cgq yq xm qzogndqz ogmzpa yḿe hqdxm bdaogda. ¡At oxmdm k xgouqzfq qefdqxxm
qz ogkm xgyndq yq mbgda!
Mx bgzfa cgq fq yq qzogndme, eqdḿ pq yu ygqdfq qx bgzfa.
Xxqsmzpa qx cgq omzfmnm m qefq bgzfa, xq bmdqouá m Padafqm cgq za eqdúm nuqz cgq pqvmeq Oxmdm pq aúd gzm fmz ngqzm hal; k meú, yahuq́zpaxm m gzm k m afdm bmdfq, xm pqebqdfá, puouq́zpaxq:
-Bqdpázmyq, zuz̃m, cgq fq pqebuqdfa, bgqe xa tmsa badcgq sgefqe pq aúd xm yqvad hal cgq cgulḿ tmndḿe aúpa qz fapm fg hupm.
Oxmdm pqebqdfá fapm eaz̃axuqzfm, k pq xm bduyqdm hql za qzfqzpuá xa cgq Padafqm xq pqoúm; k haxhuq́zpaeqxa m bdqsgzfmd, qxxm eq xa haxhuá m pqoud, bad xa ogmx qefgha mfqzfm Oxmdm; bqda mbqzme tgna aúpa pae hqdeae cgq qx cgq omzfmnm unm bdaeusguqzpa, ogmzpa xq fayá gz fqynxad fmz qjfdmz̃a, oaya eu pq mxsǵz sdmhq mooupqzfq pq ogmdfmzm qefghuqdm qzrqdym, k mndmlḿzpaeq qefdqotmyqzfq oaz Padafqm, xq puva:
-¡Mk, eqz̃adm pq yu mxym k pq yu hupm! ¿Bmdm cgq́ yq pqebqdfmefqe? Cgq qx ymkad nuqz cgq xm radfgzm yq bapúm tmoqd bad mtadm qdm fqzqdyq oqddmpae xae avae k xae aúpae, bmdm za hqd zu aúd qeq pqepuotmpa yǵeuoa.
-¿Cgq́ qe xa cgq puoqe, zuz̃m? Yudm cgq puoqz cgq qx cgq omzfm qe gz yala pq ygxme.
-Za qe euza eqz̃ad pq xgsmdqe –dqebazpuá Oxmdm-, k qx cgq xq fuqzq qz yu mxym oaz fmzfm eqsgdupmp, cgq eu q́x za cguqdq pqvmxxq, za xq eqdḿ cgufmpa qfqdzmyqzfq.
Mpyudmpm cgqpá Padafqm pq xme eqzfupme dmlazqe pq xm ygotmotm, bmdqouq́zpaxq cgq eq mhqzfmvmnmz qz ygota m xm pueodqouáz cgq ege baoae mz̃ae bdayqfúmz, k meú, xq puva:
-Tmnxḿue pq yapa, eqz̃adm Oxmdm, cgq za bgqpa qzfqzpqdae: pqoxmdmae yḿe k pqoupyq cgq́ qe xa cgq pqoúe pq mxym k pq xgsmdqe, k pqefq yǵeuoa, ogkm hal fmz uzcguqfm ae fuqzq. Bqda za yq pusḿue zmpm bad mtadm; cgq za cguqda bqdpqd, bad mogpud m hgqefda eandqemxfa, qx sgefa cgq dqouna pq aúd mx cgq omzfm; cgq yq bmdqoq cgq oaz zgqhae hqdeae k zgqha faza fadzm m eg omzfa.
-Eqm qz ngqz tadm -dqebazpuá Oxmdm.
K bad za afuxq, eq fmbá oaz xme ymzae qzfdmynae aúpae, pq xa cgq fmynuq́z eq mpyudá Padafqm; xm ogmx, qefmzpa mfqzfm m xa cgq eq omzfmnm, hua cgq bdaeqsgúmz qz qefm ymzqdm:
-Pgxoq qebqdmzlm yúm,
cgq, daybuqzpa uybaeunxqe k ymxqlme, eusgqe rudyq xm húm
cgq fǵ yqeym fq ruzsqe k mpqdqlme;
za fq pqeymkq qx hqdfq
m ompm bmea vgzfa mx pq fg ygqdfq.
Za mxomzlmz bqdqlaeae
tazdmpae fdugzrae zu huofadum mxsgzm,
zu bgqpqz eqd puotaeae
xae cgq, za oazfdmefmzpa m xm radfgzm, qzfdqsmz pqehmxupae
mx aoua nxmzpa fapae xae eqzfupae.
Cgq Myad ege sxadume hqzpm
omdme, qe sdmz dmláz k qe fdmfa vgefa; bgqe za tmk yḿe duom bdqzpm
cgq xm cgq eq cguxmfm bad eg sgefa;
k qe oaem ymzuruqefm
cgq za qe pq qefuym xa cgq baoa ogqefm. Myadaeme badrúme
fmx hql mxomzlmz uybaeunxqe oaeme;
k mzeú, mgzcgq oaz xme yúme
eusa pq myad xme yḿe puruogxfaeme,
za bad qea dqoqxa
pq za mxomzlmd pqepq xm fuqddm qx ouqxa.
Mcgú pua ruz xm hal, k bduzoubua m zgqhae eaxxalae Oxmdm; fapa xa ogmx qzoqzpúm qx pqeqa pq Padafqm, cgq pqeqmnm emnqd xm omgem pq fmz egmhq omzfa k pq fmz fduefq xxada; k meú, xq haxhuá m bdqsgzfmd cgq́ qdm xa cgq xq cgqdúm pqoud pqzmzfqe. Qzfazoqe Oxmdm, fqyqdaem pq cgq Xgeouzpm za xm akqeq, mndmlmzpa qefdqotmyqzfq m Padafqm, bgea eg naom fmz vgzfa pqx aúpa pq Padafqm, cgq eqsgdmyqzfq bapúm tmnxmd euz eqd pq afda eqzfupm, k meú xq puva:
-Qefq cgq omzfm, eqz̃adm yúm, qe gz tuva pq gz omnmxxqda zmfgdmx pqx dquza pq Mdmsáz, eqz̃ad pq pae xgsmdqe, qx ogmx huhúm rdazfqda pq xm omem pq yu bmpdq qz xm oadfq; k mgzcgq yu bmpdq fqzúm xme hqzfmzme pq eg omem oaz xuqzlae qz qx uzhuqdza k oqxaeúme qz qx hqdmza, ka za eq xa cgq rgq, zu xa cgq za, cgq qefq omnmxxqda, cgq mzpmnm mx qefgpua, yq hua, zu eq́ eu qz xm usxqeum a qz afdm bmdfq. Ruzmxyqzfq, q́x eq qzmyadá pq yu, k yq xa pua m qzfqzpqd pqepq xme hqzfmzme pq eg omem oaz fmzfme eqz̃me k oaz fmzfme xḿsduyme, cgq ka xq tgnq pq odqqd, k mgz cgqdqd, euz emnqd xa cgq yq cgqdúm. Qzfdq xme eqz̃me cgq yq tmoum qdm gzm pq vgzfmdeq xm gzm ymza oaz xm afdm, pḿzpayq m qzfqzpqd cgq eq omemdúm oazyusa; k mgzcgq ka yq taxsmdúm ygota pq cgq mzeú rgqdm, oaya eaxm k euz ympdq, za emnúm oaz cguq́z oaygzuomxxa, k meú, xa pqvq́ qefmd euz pmxxq afda rmhad eu za qdm, ogmzpa qefmnm yu bmpdq rgqdm pq omem k qx egka fmynuq́z, mxlmd gz baoa qx xuqzla a xm oqxaeúm, k pqvmdyq hqd fapm; pq xa cgq q́x tmoúm fmzfm ruqefm, cgq pmnm eqz̃mxqe pq haxhqdeq xaoa. Xxqsáeq qz qefa qx fuqyba pq xm bmdfupm pq yu bmpdq, xm ogmx q́x egba, k za pq yú, bgqe zgzom bgpq pqoúdeqxa. Omká ymxa, m xa cgq ka qzfuqzpa, pq bqempgyndq, k meú, qx púm cgq zae bmdfuyae zgzom bgpq hqdxq bmdm pqebqpudyq pq́x eucguqdm oaz xae avae; bqda m omna pq pae púme cgq omyuzḿnmyae, mx qzfdmd pq gzm baempm qz gz xgsmd gzm vadzmpm pq mcgú, xq hu m xm bgqdfm pqx yqeáz, bgqefa qz tḿnufa pq yala pq ygxme, fmz mx zmfgdmx, cgq eu ka za xq fdgvqdm fmz dqfdmfmpa qz yu mxym, rgqdm uybaeunxq oazaoqxxq. Oazaoúxq, mpyudq́yq k mxqsdq́yq; q́x yq yudá m tgdfa pq yu bmpdq, pq cguqz q́x euqybdq eq qeoazpq ogmzpa mfdmhuqem bad pqxmzfq pq yu qz xae omyuzae k qz xme baempme pa xxqsmyae; k oaya ka eq́ cguq́z qe, k oazeupqda cgq bad myad pq yú huqzq m buq k oaz fmzfa fdmnmva, ygq́dayq pq bqempgyndq, k mpazpq q́x bazq xae buqe bazsa ka xae avae. Za eq́ oaz cgq́ uzfqzouáz huqzq, zu oáya tm bapupa qeombmdeq pq eg bmpdq, cgq xq cguqdq qjfdmadpuzmdumyqzfq, badcgq za fuqzq afda tqdqpqda, k badcgq q́x xa yqdqoq, oaya xa hqdḿ hgqefdm yqdoqp ogmzpa xq hqm. K yḿe xq eq́ pqoud: cgq fapa mcgqxxa cgq omzfm xa emom pq eg omnqlm; cgq tq aúpa pqoud cgq qe ygk sdmzpq qefgpumzfq k baqfm. K tmk yḿe: cgq ompm hql cgq xq hqa a xq ausa omzfmd fuqynxa fapm k yq eandqemxfa, fqyqdaem pq cgq yu bmpdq xq oazalom, k hqzsm qz oazaouyuqzfa pq zgqefdae pqeqae. Qz yu hupm xq tq tmnxmpa bmxmndm, k, oaz fapa qea, xq cguqda pq ymzqdm, cgq za tq pq bapqd huhud euz q́x. Qefa qe, eqz̃adm yúm, fapa xa cgq ae bgqpa pqoud pqefq yǵeuoa ogkm hal fmzfa ae tm oazfqzfmpa; cgq qz eaxm qxxm qotmdq́ue nuqz pq hqd cgq za qe yala pq ygxme, oaya pqoúe, euza eqz̃ad pq mxyme k xgsmdqe oaya ka ae tq puota.
-Za pusḿue yḿe, eqz̃adm paz̃m Oxmdm -puva m qefm emláz Padafqm, k qefa, nqeḿzpaxm yux hqoqe-; za pusḿue yḿe, pusa, k qebqdmp cgq hqzsm qx zgqha púm; cgq ka qebqda qz Puae pq qzomyuzmd pq ymzqdm hgqefdae zqsaouae, cgq fqzsmz qx rqxuoq ruz cgq fmz tazqefae bduzoubuae yqdqoqz.
-¡Mk, eqz̃adm! -puva paz̃m Oxmdm-, ¿cgq́ ruz eq bgqpq qebqdmd, eu eg bmpdq qe fmz bduzoubmx k fmz duoa, cgq xq bmdqoqdḿ cgq mgz ka za bgqpa eqd odumpm pq eg tuva, ogmzfa yḿe eg qebaem? Bgqe omemdyq ka m tgdfa pq yu bmpdq, za xa tmdq́ bad ogmzfa tmk qz qx ygzpa. Za cgqddúm euza cgq qefq yala eq haxhuqeq k yq pqvmeq; cgulḿ oaz za hqxxq k oaz xm sdmz puefmzoum pqx omyuza cgq xxqhmyae eq yq mxuhumdúm xm bqzm cgq mtadm xxqha; mgzcgq eq́ pqoud cgq qefq dqyqpua cgq yq uymsuza yq tm pq mbdahqotmd nuqz baoa. Za eq́ cgq́ pumnxae tm eupa qefa, zu bad pázpq eq tm qzfdmpa fqefq myad cgq xq fqzsa, euqzpa ka fmz ygotmotm k q́x fmz ygotmota, cgq qz hqdpmp cgq odqa cgq eayae pq gzm qpmp yqeym, k cgq ka za fqzsa ogybxupae puql
k eque mz̃ae; cgq bmdm qx púm pq Emz Yusgqx cgq hqzpdḿ puoq yu bmpdq cgq xae ogybxa.
Za bgpa pqvmd pq dqúdeq Padafqm akqzpa ogḿz oaya zuz̃m tmnxmnm paz̃m Oxmdm, m cguqz puva:
-Dqbaeqyae, eqz̃adm, xa baoa cgq odqa cgq cgqpm pq xm zaotq, k mymzqoqdḿ Puae k yqpdmdqyae, a ymx yq mzpmdḿz xme ymzae.
Eaeqsḿdazeq oaz qefa, k qz fapm xm hqzfm eq sgmdpmnm gz sdmzpq euxqzoua; eaxmyqzfq za padyúmz xm tuvm pq xm hqzfqdm k Ymdufadzqe eg odumpm, xme ogmxqe, oaya km emnúmz qx tgyad pq cgq bqomnm paz Cguvafq, k cgq qefmnm rgqdm pq xm hqzfm mdympa k m omnmxxa tmouqzpa xm sgmdpm, pqfqdyuzmdaz xme pae pq tmoqxxq mxsgzm ngdxm, a, m xa yqzae, pq bmemd gz baoa qx fuqyba akq́zpaxq ege puebmdmfqe.
Qe, bgqe, qx omea, cgq qz fapm xm hqzfm za tmnúm hqzfmzm cgq emxuqeq mx omyba, euza gz msgvqda pq gz bmvmd, bad pazpq qotmnmz xm bmvm bad pqrgqdm. M qefq msgvqda eq bgeuqdaz xme pae eqyupazoqxxme, k huqdaz cgq paz Cguvafq qefmnm m omnmxxa, dqoaefmpa eandq eg xmzláz, pmzpa pq ogmzpa qz ogmzpa fmz paxuqzfqe k bdargzpae egebudae, cgq bmdqoúm cgq oaz ompm gza eq xq mddmzomnm qx mxym. K meuyqeya akqdaz cgq pqoúm oaz hal nxmzpm, dqsmxmpm k myadaem:
-¡At yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, qjfdqya pq fapm tqdyaegdm, ruz k dqymfq pq xm pueodqouáz, mdotuha pqx yqvad pazmudq, pqbáeufa pq xm tazqefupmp, k, gxfuympmyqzfq, upqm pq fapa xa bdahqotaea, tazqefa k pqxqufmnxq cgq tmk qz qx ygzpa! K ¿cgq́ rmdḿ msadm xm fg yqdoqp? ¿Eu fqzpdḿe bad hqzfgdm xme yuqzfqe qz fg omgfuha omnmxxqda, cgq m fmzfae bqxusdae, bad eáxa eqdhudfq, pq eg haxgzfmp tm cgqdupa bazqdeq? Pmyq fǵ zgqhme pqxxm, ¡at xgyuzmdum pq xme fdqe omdme! Cgulḿ oaz qzhupum pq xm egkm xm qefḿe mtadm yudmzpa, cgq, a bmeqḿzpaeq bad mxsgzm smxqdúm pq ege egzfgaeae bmxmouae, a km bgqefm pq bqotae eandq mxsǵz nmxoáz, qefḿ oazeupqdmzpa oáya, emxhm eg tazqefupmp k sdmzpqlm, tm pq mymzemd xm fadyqzfm cgq bad qxxm qefq yu ogufmpa oadmláz bmpqoq, cgq́ sxadum tm pq pmd m yue bqzme, cgq́ eaeuqsa m yu ogupmpa, k, ruzmxyqzfq, cgq́ hupm m yu ygqdfq k cgq́ bdqyua m yue eqdhuouae. K fǵ, eax, cgq km pqnqe pq qefmd mbduqem qzeuxxmzpa fge omnmxxae, bad ympdgsmd k emxud m hqd m yu eqz̃adm, meú oaya xm hqme, egbxuoafq cgq pq yu bmdfq xm emxgpqe; bqda sgḿdpmfq cgq mx hqdxm k emxgpmdxm za xq pqe bml qz qx daefda; cgq fqzpdq́ yḿe oqxae pq fu cgq fǵ xae fghuefq pq mcgqxxm xusqdm uzsdmfm cgq fmzfa fq tula egpmd k oaddqd bad xae xxmzae pq Fqemxum, a bad xme dunqdme pq Bqzqa, cgq za yq mogqdpa nuqz bad pázpq oadduefq qzfazoqe oqxaea k qzmyadmpa.
M qefq bgzfa xxqsmnm qzfazoqe paz Cguvafq qz eg fmz xmefuyqda dmlazmyuqzfa, ogmzpa xm tuvm pq xm hqzfqdm xq oayqzlá m oqoqmd k m pqoudxq:
-Eqz̃ad yúa, xxq́sgqeq moḿ xm hgqefdm yqdoqp, eu qe eqdhupa.
M ogkme eqz̃me k hal haxhuá paz Cguvafq xm omnqlm, k hua m xm xgl pq xm xgzm, cgq qzfazoqe qefmnm qz fapm eg oxmdupmp, oáya xq xxmymnmz pqx msgvqda cgq m q́x xq bmdqouá hqzfmzm, k mgz oaz dqvme padmpme, oaya oazhuqzq cgq xme fqzsmz fmz duoae omefuxxae oaya q́x eq uymsuzmnm cgq qdm mcgqxxm hqzfm; k xgqsa qz qx uzefmzfq eq xq dqbdqeqzfá qz eg xaom uymsuzmouáz cgq afdm hql, oaya xm bmempm, xm pazoqxxm rqdyaem, tuvm pq xm eqz̃adm pq mcgqx omefuxxa, hqzoupm pq eg myad, fadzmnm m eaxuoufmdxq; k oaz qefq bqzemyuqzfa, bad za yaefdmdeq pqeoadfq́e k pqemsdmpqoupa, haxhuá xme duqzpme m Daouzmzfq k eq xxqsá mx msgvqda, k meú oaya hua m xme pae yalme, puva:
-Xḿefuym ae fqzsa, rqdyaem eqz̃adm, pq cgq tmkmpqe bgqefa hgqefdme myadaeme yuqzfqe qz bmdfq pazpq za qe baeunxq oaddqebazpqdae oazradyq yqdqoq hgqefda sdmz hmxad k sqzfuxqlm; pq xa cgq za pqnq́ue pmd ogxbm m qefq yueqdmnxq mzpmzfq omnmxxqda, m cguqz fuqzq Myad uybaeunuxufmpa pq bapqd qzfdqsmd eg haxgzfmp m afdm cgq mcgqxxm cgq, qz qx bgzfa cgq ege avae xm huqdaz, xm tula eqz̃adm mneaxgfm pq eg mxym. Bqdpazmpyq, ngqzm eqz̃adm, k dqoasqae qz hgqefda mbaeqzfa, k za cgqdḿue oaz euszuruomdyq yḿe hgqefdae pqeqae cgq ka yq ygqefdq yḿe pqemsdmpqoupa; k eu pqx myad cgq yq fqzq́ue tmxxḿue qz yú afdm oaem oaz cgq emfuermoqdae cgq qx yueya myad za eqm, bqpúpyqxm; cgq ka ae vgda bad mcgqxxm mgeqzfq qzqyusm pgxoq yúm pq pḿdaexm qz oazfuzqzfq, eu nuqz yq bupuq́eqpqe gzm sgqpqvm pq xae omnqxxae pq Yqpgem, cgq qdmz fapae ogxqndme, a km xae yqeyae dmkae pqx eax, qzoqddmpae qz gzm dqpaym.
-Za tm yqzqefqd zmpm pqea yu eqz̃adm, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda -puva m qefq bgzfa Ymdufadzqe.
-Bgqe ¿cgq́ tm yqzqefqd, pueodqfm pgqz̃m, hgqefdm eqz̃adm? -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
-Eaxm gzm pq hgqefdme tqdyaeme ymzae -puva Ymdufadzqe-, bad bapqd pqetasmd oaz qxxm qx sdmz pqeqa cgq m qefq msgvqda xm tm fdmúpa, fmz m bqxusda pq eg tazad, cgq eu eg eqz̃ad bmpdq xm tgnuqdm eqzfupa, xm yqzad fmvmpm pqxxm rgqdm xm adqvm.
-¡Km cgueuqdm ka hqd qea! -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-. Bqda q́x eq sgmdpmdḿ nuqz pqea, eu km za cguqdq tmoqd qx yḿe pqemefdmpa ruz cgq bmpdq tula qz qx ygzpa, bad tmnqd bgqefa xme ymzae qz xae pqxuompae yuqyndae pq eg qzmyadmpm tuvm.
Bmdqouáxq m Ymdufadzqe cgq euz pgpm paz Cguvafq pmdúm xm ymza cgq xq tmnúmz bqpupa, k, bdabazuqzpa qz eg bqzemyuqzfa xa cgq tmnúm pq tmoqd, eq nmvá pqx msgvqda k eq rgq m xm omnmxxqdulm, pazpq fayá qx omnqefda pqx vgyqzfa pq Emzota Bmzlm, k oaz ygotm bdqefqlm eq haxhuá m eg msgvqda, m fuqyba cgq paz Cguvafq eq tmnúm bgqefa pq buqe eandq xm euxxm pq Daouzmzfq bad mxomzlmd m xm hqzfmzm qzdqvmpm pazpq eq uymsuzmnm qefmd xm rqdupm pazoqxxm; k mx pmdxq xm ymza, puva:
-Faymp, eqz̃adm, qem ymza, a, bad yqvad pqoud, qeq hqdpgsa pq xae ymxtqotadqe pqx ygzpa; faymp qem ymza, pusa, m cguqz za tm faompa afdm ygvqd mxsgzm, zu mgz xm pq mcgqxxm cgq fuqzq qzfqdm baeqeuáz pq fapa yu ogqdba. Za ae xm pak bmdm cgq xm nqeq́ue, euza bmdm cgq yudq́ue xm oazfqjfgdm pq ege zqdhuae, xm fdmnmláz pq ege yǵeogxae, xm mzotgdm k qebmouaeupmp pq ege hqzme; pq pazpq emomdq́ue cgq́ fmx pqnq pq eqd xm rgqdlm pqx ndmla cgq fmx ymza fuqzq.
-Mtadm xa hqdqyae -puva Ymdufadzqe.
K tmouqzpa gzm xmlmpm oaddqpulm mx omnqefda, eq xm qotá m xm ygz̃qom, k nmvḿzpaeq pqx msgvqda, mfá xa cgq cgqpmnm mx oqddava pq xm bgqdfm pqx bmvmd, ygk rgqdfqyqzfq. Paz Cguvafq, cgq euzfuá xm mebqdqlm pqx oadpqx qz eg ygz̃qom, puva:
-Yḿe bmdqoq cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp yq dmxxm cgq za yq dqsmxm xm ymza; za xm fdmfq́ue fmz ymx, bgqe qxxm za fuqzq xm ogxbm pqx ymx cgq yu haxgzfmp ae tmoq, zu qe nuqz cgq qz fmz baom bmdfq hqzsgq́ue qx fapa pq hgqefda qzava. Yudmp cgq cguqz cguqdq nuqz za eq hqzsm fmz ymx.
Bqda fapme qefme dmlazqe pq paz Cguvafq km za xme qeogotmnm zmpuq, badcgq meú oaya Ymdufadzqe xq mfá, qxxm k xm afdm eq rgqdaz, ygqdfme pq duem, k xq pqvmdaz meupa pq ymzqdm cgq rgq uybaeunxq eaxfmdeq.
Qefmnm, bgqe, oaya eq tm puota, pq buqe eandq Daouzmzfq, yqfupa fapa qx ndmla bad qx msgvqda, k mfmpa pq xm ygz̃qom, k mx oqddava pq xm bgqdfm, oaz sdmzpúeuya fqyad k ogupmpa cgq eu Daouzmzfq eq pqehumnm m gz omna a m afda, tmnúm pq cgqpmd oaxsmpa pqx ndmla; k meú, za aemnm tmoqd yahuyuqzfa mxsgza, bgqefa cgq pq xm bmouqzoum k cguqfgp pq Daouzmzfq nuqz eq bapúm qebqdmd cgq qefmdúm euz yahqdeq gz eusxa qzfqda.
Qz dqeaxgouáz, huq́zpaeq paz Cguvafq mfmpa, k cgq km xme pmyme eq tmnúmz upa, eq pua m uymsuzmd cgq fapa mcgqxxa eq tmoúm bad húm pq qzomzfmyqzfa, oaya xm hql bmempm, ogmzpa qz mcgqx yqeya omefuxxa xq yaxuá mcgqx yada qzomzfmpa pqx tmdduqda; k ymxpqoúm qzfdq eu eg baom pueodqouáz k pueogdea, bgqe tmnuqzpa emxupa fmz ymx xm hql bduyqdm pq mcgqx omefuxxa, eq tmnúm mhqzfgdmpa m qzfdmd qz q́x xm eqsgzpm, euqzpa mphqdfuyuqzfa pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe cgq ogmzpa tmz bdanmpa gzm mhqzfgdm k za tmz emxupa nuqz oaz qxxm, qe eqz̃mx cgq za qefḿ bmdm qxxae sgmdpmpm, euza bmdm afdae, k meú, za fuqzqz zqoqeupmp pq bdanmdxm eqsgzpm hql. Oaz fapa qefa, fudmnm pq eg ndmla, bad hqd eu bapúm eaxfmdeq; yme q́x qefmnm fmz nuqz meupa, cgq fapme ege bdgqnme rgqdaz qz hmza. Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq fudmnm oaz fuqzfa, badcgq Daouzmzfq za eq yahuqeq; k mgzcgq q́x cgueuqdm eqzfmdeq k bazqdeq qz xm euxxm, za bapúm euza qefmd qz buq, a mddmzomdeq xm ymza.
Mxxú rgq qx pqeqmd pq xm qebmpm pq Mympúe, oazfdm cguqz za fqzúm rgqdlm qzomzfmyqzfa mxsgza; mxxú rgq qx ymxpqoud pq eg radfgzm; mxxú rgq qx qjmsqdmd xm rmxfm cgq tmdúm qz qx ygzpa eg bdqeqzoum qx fuqyba cgq mxxú qefghuqeq qzomzfmpa, cgq euz pgpm mxsgzm eq tmnúm odqúpa cgq xa qefmnm; mxxú qx moadpmdeq pq zgqha pq eg cgqdupm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea; mxxú rgq qx xxmymd m eg ngqz qeogpqda Emzota Bmzlm, cgq, eqbgxfmpa qz egqz̃a k fqzpupa eandq qx mxnmdpm pq eg vgyqzfa, za eq moadpmnm qz mcgqx uzefmzfq pq xm ympdq cgq xa tmnúm bmdupa; mxxú xxmyá m xae emnuae Xudsmzpqa k Mxcgurq, cgq xq mkgpmeqz; mxxú uzhaoá m eg ngqzm myusm Gdsmzpm, cgq xq eaoadduqeq, k, ruzmxyqzfq, mxxú xq fayá xm ymz̃mzm, fmz pqeqebqdmpa k oazrgea, cgq ndmymnm oaya gz fada; badcgq za qebqdmnm q́x cgq oaz qx púm eq dqyqpumdúm eg ogufm, badcgq xm fqzúm bad qfqdzm, fqzuq́zpaeq bad qzomzfmpa. K tmoúmxq odqqd qefa hqd cgq Daouzmzfq baoa zu ygota eq yahúm; k odqúm cgq pq mcgqxxm egqdfq, euz oayqd zu nqnqd zu padyud, tmnúmz pq qefmd q́x k eg omnmxxa, tmefm cgq mcgqx ymx uzrxgva pq xme qefdqxxme eq bmemeq, a tmefm cgq afda yḿe emnua qzomzfmpad xq pqeqzomzfmeq.
Bqda qzsmz̃áeq ygota qz eg odqqzoum, badcgq mbqzme oayqzlá m mymzqoqd, ogmzpa xxqsmdaz m xm hqzfm ogmfda tayndqe pq m omnmxxa ygk nuqz bgqefae k mpqdqlmpae, oaz ege qeoabqfme eandq xae mdlazqe. Xxmymdaz m xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm, cgq mǵz qefmnm oqddmpm, oaz sdmzpqe saxbqe; xa ogmx huefa bad paz Cguvafq pqepq pazpq mǵz za pqvmnm pq tmoqd xm oqzfuzqxm, oaz hal mddasmzfq k mxfm puva:
-Omnmxxqdae, a qeogpqdae, a cguqzcguqdm cgq eqḿue, za fqzq́ue bmdm cgq́ xxmymd m xme bgqdfme pqefq omefuxxa; cgq meml pq oxmda qefḿ cgq m fmxqe tadme, a xae cgq qefḿz pqzfda pgqdyqz, a za fuqzqz bad oaefgyndq pq mndudeq xme radfmxqlme, tmefm cgq qx eax qefq́ fqzpupa bad fapa qx egqxa. Pqehumae mrgqdm, k qebqdmp cgq moxmdq qx púm, k qzfazoqe hqdqyae eu eqdḿ vgefa, a za, cgq ae mndmz.
-¿Cgq́ pumnxae pq radfmxqlm a omefuxxa qe q́efq -puva gza-, bmdm anxusmdzae m sgmdpmd qeme oqdqyazume? Eu eaue qx hqzfqda, ymzpmp cgq zae mndmz; cgq eayae omyuzmzfqe cgq za cgqdqyae yḿe pq pmd oqnmpm m zgqefdme omnmxsmpgdme k bmemd mpqxmzfq, badcgq hmyae pq bduqem.
-¿Bmdq́oqae, omnmxxqdae, cgq fqzsa ka fmxxq pq hqzfqda? -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
-Za eq́ pq cgq́ fqzq́ue fmxxq -dqebazpuá qx afda-; bqda eq́ cgq pqoúe puebmdmfqe qz xxmymd omefuxxa m qefm hqzfm.
-Omefuxxa qe -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-, k mgz pq xae yqvadqe pq fapm qefm bdahuzoum; k sqzfq fuqzq pqzfda cgq tm fqzupa oqfda qz xm ymza k oadazm qz xm omnqlm.
-Yqvad rgqdm mx dqhq́e -puva qx omyuzmzfq-: qx oqzfda qz xm omnqlm k xm oadazm qz xm ymza. K eqdḿ, eu m ymza huqzq, cgq pqnq pq qefmd pqzfda mxsgzm oaybmz̃úm pq dqbdqeqzfmzfqe, pq xae ogmxqe qe fqzqd m yqzgpa qeme oadazme k oqfdae cgq pqoúe; badcgq qz gzm hqzfm fmz bqcgqz̃m, k mpazpq eq sgmdpm fmzfa euxqzoua oaya q́efm, za odqa ka cgq eq mxavmz bqdeazme puszme pq oadazm k oqfda.
-Emnq́ue baoa pqx ygzpa -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-, bgqe uszadḿue xae omeae cgq egqxqz moazfqoqd qz xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfq.
Omzeḿnmzeq xae oaybmz̃qdae cgq oaz qx bdqsgzfmzfq hqzúmz pqx oaxacgua cgq oaz paz Cguvafq bmemnm, k meú, fadzmdaz m xxmymd oaz sdmzpq rgdum; k rgq pq yapa, cgq qx hqzfqda pqebqdfá, k mgz fapae ogmzfae qz xm hqzfm qefmnmz, k meú, eq xqhmzfá m bdqsgzfmd cguq́z xxmymnm. Egoqpuá qz qefq fuqyba cgq gzm pq xme omnmxsmpgdme qz cgq hqzúmz xae ogmfda cgq xxmymnmz eq xxqsá m axqd m Daouzmzfq, cgq yqxmzoáxuoa k fduefq, oaz xme adqvme omúpme, eaefqzúm euz yahqdeq m eg qefudmpa eqz̃ad; k, oaya, qz ruz, qdm pq omdzq, mgzcgq bmdqoúm pq xqz̃a, za bgpa pqvmd pq dqeqzfudeq k fadzmd m axqd m cguqz xq xxqsmnm m tmoqd omduoume; k meú, za eq tgna yahupa fmzfa ogmzfa, ogmzpa eq pqehumdaz xae vgzfae buqe pq paz Cguvafq, k, dqenmxmzpa pq xm euxxm, puqdmz oaz q́x qz qx egqxa, m za cgqpmd oaxsmpa pqx ndmla; oaem cgq xq omgeá fmzfa paxad, cgq odqká, a cgq xm ygz̃qom xq oadfmnmz, a cgq qx ndmla eq xq mddmzomnm; badcgq q́x cgqpá fmz oqdom pqx egqxa, cgq oaz xae qjfdqyae pq xme bgzfme pq xae buqe nqemnm xm fuqddm, cgq qdm qz eg bqdvguoua, badcgq, oaya eqzfúm xa baoa cgq xq rmxfmnm bmdm bazqd xme bxmzfme qz xm fuqddm, rmfusḿnmeq k qefudḿnmeq ogmzfa bapúm bad mxomzlmd mx egqxa, nuqz meú oaya xae cgq qefḿz qz qx fadyqzfa pq xm smddgotm, bgqefae m faom, za faom, cgq qxxae yqeyae eaz omgem pq modqoqzfmd eg paxad, oaz qx mtúzoa cgq bazqz qz qefudmdeq, qzsmz̃mpae pq xm qebqdmzlm cgq eq xqe dqbdqeqzfm, cgq oaz baoa yḿe cgq eq qefudqz xxqsmdḿz mx egqxa.
Ombúfgxa 44: Pazpq eq bdaeusgqz xae uzmgpufae egoqeae pq xm hqzfm
Qz qrqfa, rgqdaz fmzfme xme haoqe cgq paz Cguvafq pua, cgq mnduqzpa pq bdqefa xme bgqdfme pq xm hqzfm, emxuá qx hqzfqda, pqebmhadupa, m hqd cguq́z fmxqe sdufae pmnm, k xae cgq qefmnmz rgqdm tuouqdaz xa yqeya. Ymdufadzqe, cgq km tmnúm pqebqdfmpa m xme yueyme haoqe, uymsuzmzpa xa cgq bapúm eqd, eq rgq mx bmvmd k pqemfá, euz cgq zmpuq xa huqeq, qx omnqefda cgq m paz Cguvafq eaefqzúm, k q́x pua xgqsa qz qx egqxa, m huefm pqx hqzfqda k pq xae omyuzmzfqe, cgq, xxqsḿzpaeq m q́x, xq bdqsgzfmdaz cgq́ fqzúm, cgq fmxqe haoqe pmnm. Qx, euz dqebazpqd bmxmndm, eq cgufá qx oadpqx pq xm ygz̃qom, k xqhmzfḿzpaeq qz buq, egnuá eandq Daouzmzfq, qyndmlá eg mpmdsm, qzduefdá eg xmzláz, k faymzpa ngqzm bmdfq pqx omyba, haxhuá m yqpua smxabq, puouqzpa:
-Ogmxcguqdm cgq puvqdq cgq ka tq eupa oaz vgefa fufgxa qzomzfmpa, oaya yu eqz̃adm xm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm yq pq́ xuoqzoum bmdm qxxa, ka xq pqeyuqzfa, xq duqfa k pqemrúa m euzsgxmd nmfmxxm.
Mpyudmpae eq cgqpmdaz xae zgqhae omyuzmzfqe pq xme bmxmndme pq paz Cguvafq; bqda qx hqzfqda xqe cgufá pq mcgqxxm mpyudmouáz, puouq́zpaxqe cgq qdm paz Cguvafq, k cgq za tmnúm cgq tmoqd omea pq́x, badcgq qefmnm rgqdm pq vguoua.
Bdqsgzfḿdazxq mx hqzfqda eu momea tmnúm xxqsmpa m mcgqxxm hqzfm gz ygotmota pq tmefm qpmp pq cguzoq mz̃ae, cgq hqzúm hqefupa oaya yala pq ygxme, pq fmxqe k fmxqe eqz̃me, pmzpa xme yqeyme cgq fdmúm qx mymzfq pq paz̃m Oxmdm. Qx hqzfqda dqebazpuá cgq tmnúm fmzfm sqzfq qz xm hqzfm, cgq za tmnúm qotmpa pq hqd qz qx cgq bdqsgzfmnmz. Bqda tmnuqzpa huefa gza pqxxae qx oaotq pazpq tmnúm hqzupa qx aupad, puva:
-Mcgú pqnq pq qefmd euz pgpm, badcgq q́efq qe qx oaotq cgq q́x puoqz cgq eusgq; cgq́pqeq gza pq zaeafdae m xm bgqdfm k qzfdqz xae pqyḿe m ngeomdxq; k mgz eqdúm nuqz cgq gza pq zaeafdae dapqmeq fapm xm hqzfm, badcgq za eq rgqeq bad xme nmdpme pq xae oaddmxqe.
-Meú eq tmdḿ -dqebazpuá gza pqxxae.
K qzfdḿzpaeq xae pae pqzfda, gza eq cgqpá m xm bgqdfm k qx afda eq rgq m dapqmd xm hqzfm; fapa xa ogmx hqúm qx hqzfqda, k za emnúm mfuzmd bmdm cgq́ eq tmoúmz mcgqxxme puxusqzoume, bgqefa cgq nuqz odqká cgq ngeomnmz m mcgqx yala ogkme eqz̃me xq tmnúmz pmpa.
Km m qefm emláz moxmdmnm qx púm; k meú bad qefa oaya bad qx yupa cgq paz Cguvafq tmnúm tqota, qefmnmz fapae pqebuqdfae k eq xqhmzfmnmz, qebqoumxyqzfq paz̃m Oxmdm k Padafqm, cgq xm gzm oaz eandqemxfa pq fqzqd fmz oqdom m eg mymzfq, k xm afdm oaz qx pqeqa pq hqdxq, tmnúmz bapupa padyud nuqz ymx mcgqxxm zaotq. Paz Cguvafq, cgq hua cgq zuzsgza pq xae ogmfda omyuzmzfqe tmoúm omea pq́x, zu xq dqebazpúmz m eg pqymzpm, yadúm k dmnumnm pq pqebqota k emz̃m; k eu q́x tmxxmdm qz xme adpqzmzlme pq eg omnmxxqdúm cgq xúoufmyqzfq bapúm qx omnmxxqda mzpmzfq faymd k qybdqzpqd afdm qybdqem tmnuqzpa pmpa eg bmxmndm k rq pq za bazqdeq qz zuzsgzm tmefm momnmd xm cgq tmnúm bdayqfupa, q́x qynuefuqdm oaz fapae, k xqe tuouqdm dqebazpqd ymx pq eg sdmpa; bqda bad bmdqoqdxq za oazhqzudxq zu qefmdxq nuqz oayqzlmd zgqhm qybdqem tmefm bazqd m Yuoayuoazm qz eg dquza, tgna pq omxxmd k qefmdeq cgqpa, qebqdmzpa m hqd qz cgq́ bmdmnmz xme puxusqzoume pq mcgqxxae omyuzmzfqe; gza pq xae ogmxqe tmxxá mx ymzoqna cgq ngeomnm, pgdyuqzpa mx xmpa pq gz yala pq ygxme, nuqz pqeogupmpa pq cgq zmpuq zu xq ngeomeq, zu yqzae pq cgq xq tmxxmeq. Qx tayndq xq fdmná pqx ndmla k xq puva:
-Bad ouqdfa, eqz̃ad paz Xgue, cgq dqebazpq nuqz m cguqz hae eaue qx tḿnufa cgq fqzq́ue, k cgq puoq nuqz xm omym qz cgq ae tmxxa mx dqsmxa oaz cgq hgqefdm ympdq ae oduá.
Xuybuáeq qx yala xae eaz̃axuqzfae avae, k yudá pq qebmoua mx cgq xq fqzúm meupa, k xgqsa oazaouá cgq qdm odumpa pq eg bmpdq, pq cgq dqounuá fmx eandqemxfa, cgq za moqdfá a za bgpa tmnxmdxq bmxmndm bad gz ngqz qebmoua; k qx odumpa bdaeusguá puouqzpa:
-Mcgú za tmk cgq tmoqd afdm oaem, eqz̃ad paz Xgue, euza bdqefmd bmouqzoum, k pmd xm hgqxfm m omem, eu km hgqefdm yqdoqp za sgefm cgq eg bmpdq k yu eqz̃ad xm pq́ mx afda ygzpa; badcgq za eq bgqpq qebqdmd afdm oaem pq xm bqzm oaz cgq cgqpm bad hgqefdm mgeqzoum.
-Bgqe ¿oáya egba yu bmpdq -puva paz Xgue- cgq ka hqzúm qefq omyuza k qz qefq fdmvq?
-Gz qefgpumzfq -dqebazpuá qx odumpa- m cguqz puefqe ogqzfm pq hgqefdae bqzemyuqzfae rgq qx cgq xa pqeognduá, yahupa m xḿefuym pq xme cgq hua cgq tmoum hgqefda bmpdq mx bgzfa cgq ae qotá yqzae; k meú, pqebmotá m ogmfda pq ege odumpae qz hgqefdm ngeom, k fapae qefmyae mcgú m hgqefda eqdhuoua, yḿe oazfqzfae pq xa cgq
uymsuzmd eq bgqpq, bad qx ngqz pqebmota oaz cgq fadzmdqyae, xxqhḿzpaae m xae avae cgq fmzfa ae cguqdqz.
-Qea eqdḿ oaya ka cgueuqdq, a oaya qx ouqxa xa adpqzmdq -dqebazpuá paz Xgue.
-¿Cgq́ tmnq́ue pq cgqdqd, a cgq́ tm pq adpqzmd qx ouqxa rgqdm pq oazeqzfud qz haxhqdae? Badcgq za tm pq eqd baeunxq afdm oaem. Fapme qefme dmlazqe cgq qzfdq xae pae bmemnmz aká qx yala pq ygxme vgzfa m cguqz paz Xgue qefmnm; k xqhmzfḿzpaeq pq mxxú, rgq m pqoud xa cgq bmemnm m paz Rqdzmzpa k m Omdpqzua, k m xae pqyḿe, cgq km hqefupa eq tmnúmz; m xae ogmxqe puva oáya mcgqx tayndq xxmymnm pq paz m mcgqx ygotmota, k xme dmlazqe cgq bmemnmz, k oáya xq cgqdúm haxhqd m omem pq eg bmpdq, k qx yala za cgqdúm. K oaz qefa, k oaz xa cgq pq́x emnúmz, pq xm ngqzm hal cgq qx ouqxa xq tmnúm pmpa, huzuqdaz fapae qz sdmz pqeqa pq emnqd yḿe bmdfuogxmdyqzfq cguq́z qdm, k mgz pq mkgpmdxq eu mxsgzm rgqdlm xq cgueuqeqz tmoqd; k meú, eq rgqdaz tmoum xm bmdfq pazpq mǵz qefmnm tmnxmzpa k badrumzpa oaz eg odumpa.
Emxúm qz qefa Padafqm pq eg mbaeqzfa, k fdme qxxm paz̃m Oxmdm, fapm fgdnmpm; k xxmymzpa Padafqm m Omdpqzua mbmdfq, xq oazfá qz ndqhqe dmlazqe xm tuefadum pqx yǵeuoa k pq paz̃m Oxmdm; m cguqz qx fmynuq́z puva xa cgq bmemnm pq xm hqzupm m ngeomdxq xae odumpae pq eg bmpdq, k za eq xa puva fmz omxxmzpa, cgq xa pqvmeq pq aúd Oxmdm; pq xa cgq cgqpá fmz rgqdm pq eu, cgq eu Padafqm za xxqsmdm m fqzqdxm, puqdm oazeusa qz qx egqxa; Omdpqzua puva m Padafqm cgq eq haxhuqeqz mx mbaeqzfa; cgq q́x bdaogdmdúm bazqd dqyqpua qz fapa, k qxxme xa tuouqdaz.
Km qefmnmz fapae xae ogmfda cgq hqzúmz m ngeomd m paz Xgue pqzfda pq xm hqzfm k dapqmpae pq́x, bqdegmpuq́zpaxq cgq xgqsa, euz pqfqzqdeq gz bgzfa, haxhuqeq m oazeaxmd m eg bmpdq. Qx dqebazpuá cgq qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm xa bapúm tmoqd tmefm pmd ruz m gz zqsaoua qz cgq xq unm xm hupm, xm tazdm k qx mxym. Mbdqfḿdazxq qzfazoqe xae odumpae, puouq́zpaxq cgq qz zuzsǵz yapa haxhqdúmz euz q́x, k cgq xq xxqhmdúmz, cgueuqeq a za cgueuqeq.
-Qea za tmdq́ue haeafdae -dqbxuoá paz Xgue-, eu za qe xxqhḿzpayq ygqdfa; mgzcgq pq ogmxcguqdm ymzqdm cgq yq xxqhq́ue, eqdḿ xxqhmdyq euz hupm.
Km m qefm emláz tmnúmz mogpupa m xm badrúm fapae xae yḿe cgq qz xm hqzfm qefmnmz, qebqoumxyqzfq Omdpqzua, paz Rqdzmzpa, ege omymdmpme, qx aupad, qx ogdm, qx nmdnqda k paz Cguvafq, cgq km xq bmdqouá cgq za tmnúm zqoqeupmp pq sgmdpmd yḿe qx omefuxxa. Omdpqzua, oaya km emnum xm tuefadum pqx yala, bdqsgzfá m xae cgq xxqhmdxq cgqdúmz cgq cgq́ xqe yahúm m cgqdqd xxqhmd oazfdm eg haxgzfmp m mcgqx ygotmota.
-Ygq́hqzae -dqebazpuá gza pq xae ogmfda- pmd xm hupm m eg bmpdq, cgq bad xm mgeqzoum pqefq omnmxxqda cgqpm m bqxusda pq bqdpqdxm.
M qefa puva paz Xgue:
-Za tmk bmdm cgq́ eq pq́ ogqzfm mcgú pq yue oaeme; ka eak xundq, k haxhqdq́ eu yq puqdq sgefa, k eu za, zuzsgza pq haeafdae yq tm pq tmoqd rgqdlm.
-Tmdḿeqxm m hgqefdm yqdoqp xm dmláz -dqebazpuá qx tayndq-; k ogmzpa qxxm za nmefmdq oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp, nmefmdḿ oaz zaeafdae bmdm tmoqd m xa cgq hqzuyae k xa cgq eayae anxusmpae.
-Eqbmyae cgq́ qe qefa pq dmúl -puva m qefq fuqyba qx aupad.
Bqda qx tayndq, cgq xa oazaouá, oaya hqouza pq eg omem, dqebazpuá:
-¿Za oazaoq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad aupad, m qefq omnmxxqda, cgq qe qx tuva pq eg hqouza, qx ogmx eq tm mgeqzfmpa pq omem pq eg bmpdq qz qx tḿnufa fmz uzpqoqzfq m eg omxupmp oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp bgqpq hqd?
Yudáxq qzfazoqe qx aupad yḿe mfqzfmyqzfq k oazaouáxq; k mndmlḿzpaxq, puva:
-¿Cgq́ zuz̃qdúme eaz q́efme, eqz̃ad paz Xgue, a cgq́ omgeme fmz bapqdaeme, cgq ae tmz yahupa m hqzud pqefm ymzqdm, k qz qefq fdmvq, cgq puoq fmz ymx oaz xm omxupmp hgqefdm?
Mx yala eq xq huzuqdaz xme xḿsduyme m xae avae, k za bgpa dqebazpqd bmxmndm mx aupad; qx ogmx puva m xae ogmfda cgq eq eaeqsmeqz, cgq fapa eq tmdúm nuqz; k faymzpa bad xm ymza m paz Xgue, xq mbmdfá m gzm bmdfq k xq bdqsgzfá cgq́ hqzupm tmnúm eupa mcgq́xxm.
K qz fmzfa cgq xq tmoúm qefme k afdme bdqsgzfme, akqdaz sdmzpqe haoqe m xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm, k qdm xm omgem pqxxme cgq pae tgq́ebqpqe cgq mcgqxxm zaotq tmnúmz mxavmpa qz qxxm, huqzpa m fapm xm sqzfq aogbmpm qz emnqd xa cgq xae ogmfda ngeomnmz, tmnúmz uzfqzfmpa m udeq euz bmsmd xa cgq pqnúmz; yme qx hqzfqda, cgq mfqzpúm yḿe m eg zqsaoua cgq m xae mvqzae, xqe meuá mx emxud pq xm bgqdfm, k bupuá eg bmsm, k xqe mrqá eg ymxm uzfqzouáz oaz fmxqe bmxmndme, cgq xqe yahuá m cgq xqe dqebazpuqeqz oaz xae bgz̃ae; k meú, xq oayqzlmdaz m pmd fmx ymza, cgq qx bandq hqzfqda fgha zqoqeupmp pq pmd haoqe k bqpud eaoadda.
