Xm hqzfqdm k eg tuvm za huqdaz m afda yḿe pqeaogbmpa bmdm bapqd eaoaddqdxq cgq m paz Cguvafq, m cguqz xm tuvm pq xm hqzfqdm puva:
-Eaoaddm hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, bad xm hudfgp cgq Puae xq pua, m yu bandq bmpdq; cgq pae ymxae tayndqe xq qefḿz yaxuqzpa oaya m ounqdm.
M xa ogmx dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq ygk pq qebmoua k oaz ygotm rxqym:
-Rqdyaem pazoqxxm, za tm xgsmd bad mtadm hgqefdm bqfuouáz, badcgq qefak uybqpupa pq qzfdqyqfqdyq qz afdm mhqzfgdm qz fmzfa cgq za puqdq ouym m gzm qz cgq yú bmxmndm yq tm bgqefa. Yme xa cgq ka bapdq́ tmoqd bad eqdhudae, qe xa cgq mtadm pudq́: oaddqp k pqoup m hgqefda bmpdq cgq eq qzfdqfqzsm qz qem nmfmxxm xa yqvad cgq bgpuqdq, k cgq za eq pqvq hqzoqd qz zuzsǵz yapa, qz fmzfa cgq ka bupa xuoqzoum m xm bduzoqem Yuoayuoazm bmdm bapqd eaoaddqdxq qz eg ogufm; cgq eu qxxm yq xm pm, fqzqp bad ouqdfa cgq ka xq emomdq́ pqxxm.
-¡Bqompadm pq yú! -puva m qefa Ymdufadzqe, cgq qefmnm pqxmzfq-. Bduyqda cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp mxomzoq qem xuoqzoum cgq puoq qefmdḿ km yu eqz̃ad qz qx afda ygzpa.
-Pmpyq hae, eqz̃adm, cgq ka mxomzoq xm xuoqzoum cgq pusa -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; cgq oaya ka xm fqzsm, baoa tmdḿ mx omea cgq q́x qefq́ qz qx afda ygzpa; cgq pq mxxú xq emomdq́ m bqemd pqx yueya ygzpa cgq xa oazfdmpusm; a, bad xa yqzae, ae pmdq́ fmx hqzsmzlm pq xae cgq mxxḿ xq tgnuqdqz qzhumpa, cgq cgqpq́ue yḿe cgq yqpumzmyqzfq emfuerqotme.
K euz pqoud yḿe, eq rgq m bazqd pq tuzavae mzfq Padafqm, bupuq́zpaxq oaz bmxmndme omnmxxqdqeome k mzpmzfqeome cgq xm eg sdmzpqlm rgqeq eqdhupm pq pmdxq xuoqzoum pq moaddqd k eaoaddqd mx omefqxxmza pq mcgqx omefuxxa, cgq qefmnm bgqefa qz gzm sdmhq yqzsgm.
Xm bduzoqem eq xm pua pq ngqz fmxmzfq, k q́x xgqsa, qyndmlmzpa eg mpmdsm k bazuqzpa ymza m eg qebmpm, mogpuá m xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm, mpazpq mǵz fapmhúm fdmúmz xae pae tgq́ebqpqe m ymx fdmqd mx hqzfqda; bqda meú oaya xxqsá, qynmlá k eq qefgha
cgqpa, mgzcgq Ymdufadzqe k xm hqzfqdm xq pqoúmz cgq qz cgq́ eq pqfqzúm, cgq eaoadduqeq m eg eqz̃ad k ymdupa.
-Pqfq́zsayq -puva paz Cguvafq- badcgq za yq qe xúoufa bazqd ymza m xm qebmpm oazfdm sqzfq qeogpqdux; bqda xxmympyq mcgú m yu qeogpqda Emzota; cgq m q́x faom k mfmz̃q qefm pqrqzem k hqzsmzlm.
Qefa bmemnm qz xm bgqdfm pq xm hqzfm, k qz qxxm mzpmnmz xme bgz̃mpme k yavuoazqe ygk qz eg bgzfa, fapa qz pmz̃a pqx hqzfqda k qz dmnum pq Ymdufadzqe, xm hqzfqdm k eg tuva, cgq eq pqeqebqdmnmz pq hqd xm oanmdpúm pq paz Cguvafq, k pq xa ymx cgq xa bmemnm eg ymdupa, eqz̃ad k bmpdq.
Bqda pqvḿyaexq mcgú, cgq za rmxfmdm cguqz xq eaoaddm, a eu za, egrdm k omxxq qx cgq eq mfdqhq m yḿe pq m xa cgq m ege rgqdlme xq bdayqfqz, k haxhḿyazae mfdḿe ouzogqzfm bmeae, m hqd cgq́ rgq xa cgq paz Xgue dqebazpuá mx aupad, cgq xq pqvmyae mbmdfq, bdqsgzfḿzpaxq xm omgem pq eg hqzupm m buq k pq fmz hux fdmvq hqefupa. M xa ogmx qx yala, meuq́zpaxq rgqdfqyqzfq pq xme ymzae, oaya qz eqz̃mx pq cgq mxsǵz sdmz paxad xq mbdqfmnm qx oadmláz, k pqddmymzpa xḿsduyme qz sdmzpq mngzpmzoum, xq puva:
-Eqz̃ad yúa, ka za eq́ pqoudae afdm oaem euza cgq pqepq qx bgzfa cgq cguea qx ouqxa k rmouxufá zgqefdm hqouzpmp cgq ka huqeq m yu eqz̃adm paz̃m Oxmdm, tuvm hgqefdm k eqz̃adm yúm, pqepq mcgqx uzefmzfq xm tuoq pgqz̃m pq yu haxgzfmp; k eu xm hgqefdm, hqdpmpqda eqz̃ad k bmpdq yúa, za xa uybupq, qz qefq yqeya púm tm pq eqd yu qebaem. Bad qxxm pqvq́ xm omem pq yu bmpdq, k bad qxxm yq bgeq qz qefq fdmvq, bmdm eqsgudxm pazpqcguqdm cgq rgqeq, oaya xm emqfm mx nxmzoa, a oaya qx ymduzqda mx zadfq. Qxxm za emnq pq yue pqeqae yḿe pq xa cgq tm bapupa qzfqzpqd pq mxsgzme hqoqe cgq pqepq xqvae tm huefa xxadmd yue avae. Km, eqz̃ad, emnq́ue xm ducgqlm k xm zanxqlm pq yue bmpdqe, k oáya ka eak qx ǵzuoa tqdqpqda; eu ae bmdqoq cgq q́efme eaz bmdfqe bmdm cgq ae mhqzfgdq́ue m tmoqdyq qz fapa hqzfgdaea, dqoqnupyq xgqsa bad hgqefda tuva; cgq eu yu bmpdq, xxqhmpa pq afdae pueuszuae egkae, za sgefmdq pqefq nuqz cgq ka egbq ngeomdyq, yḿe rgqdlm fuqzq qx fuqyba bmdm pqetmoqd k ygpmd xme oaeme cgq xme tgymzme haxgzfmpqe.
Omxxá qz puouqzpa qefa qx qzmyadmpa ymzoqna, k qx aupad cgqpá qz aúdxq egebqzea, oazrgea k mpyudmpa, meú pq tmnqd aúpa qx yapa k xm pueodqouáz oaz cgq paz Xgue xq tmnúm pqeognuqdfa eg bqzemyuqzfa, oaya pq hqdeq qz bgzfa cgq za emnúm qx cgq bapqd faymd qz fmz dqbqzfuza k za qebqdmpa zqsaoua; k meú, za dqebazpuá afdm oaem euza cgq eq eaeqsmeq bad qzfazoqe, k qzfdqfghuqeq m ege odumpae, cgq bad mcgqx púm za xq haxhuqeqz, badcgq eq fghuqeq fuqyba bmdm oazeupqdmd xa cgq yqvad m fapae qefghuqeq. Nqeáxq xme ymzae bad rgqdlm paz Xgue, k mgz eq xme nmz̃á oaz xḿsduyme, oaem cgq bgpuqdm qzfqdzqoqd gz oadmláz pq yḿdyax, za eáxa qx pqx aupad, cgq, oaya pueodqfa, km tmnúm oazaoupa ogḿz nuqz xq qefmnm m eg tuvm mcgqx ymfduyazua; bgqefa cgq, eu rgqdm baeunxq, xa cgueuqdm qrqfgmd oaz haxgzfmp pqx bmpdq pq paz Xgue, pqx ogmx emnúm cgq bdqfqzpúm tmoqd pq fufgxa m eg tuva.
Km m qefm emláz qefmnmz qz bml xae tgq́ebqpqe oaz qx hqzfqda, bgqe bad bqdegmeuáz k ngqzme dmlazqe pq paz Cguvafq, yḿe cgq bad myqzmlme, xq tmnúmz bmsmpa fapa xa cgq q́x cguea, k xae odumpae pq paz Xgue msgmdpmnmz qx ruz pq xm bxḿfuom pqx aupad k xm dqeaxgouáz pq eg mya, ogmzpa qx pqyazua, cgq za pgqdyq, adpqzá cgq qz mcgqx yqeya bgzfa qzfdá qz xm hqzfm qx nmdnqda m cguqz paz Cguvafq cgufá qx kqxya pq Ymynduza, k Emzota Bmzlm xae mbmdqvae pqx meza cgq fdaoá oaz xae pqx egka; qx ogmx nmdnqda, xxqhmzpa eg vgyqzfa m xm omnmxxqdulm, hua m Emzota Bmzlm cgq qefmnm mpqdqlmzpa za eq́ cgq́ pq xm mxnmdpm, k meú oaya xm hua xm oazaouá, k eq mfdqhuá m mddqyqfqd m Emzota, puouqzpa:
-¡Mt, paz xmpdáz, cgq mcgú ae fqzsa! ¡Hqzsm yu nmoúm k yu mxnmdpm, oaz fapae yue mbmdqvae cgq yq danmefqe!
Emzota, cgq eq hua moayqfqd fmz pq uybdahuea k aká xae hufgbqduae cgq xq pqoúmz, oaz xm gzm ymza meuá pq xm mxnmdpm, k oaz xm afdm pua gz yavuoáz mx nmdnqda, cgq xq nmz̃á xae puqzfqe qz emzsdq; bqda za bad qefa pqvá qx nmdnqda xm bdqem cgq fqzúm tqotm qz qx mxnmdpm: mzfqe mxlá xm hal pq fmx ymzqdm, cgq fapae xae pq xm hqzfm mogpuqdaz mx yupa k bqzpqzoum, k pqoúm:
-¡Mcgú pqx Dqk k pq xm vgefuoum; cgq eandq oandmd yu tmouqzpm yq cguqdq ymfmd qefq xmpdáz, emxfqmpad pq omyuzae!
-Yqzfúe -dqebazpuá Emzota-; cgq ka za eak emxfqmpad pq omyuzae; cgq qz ngqzm sgqddm smzá yu eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq qefae pqebavae.
Km qefmnm paz Cguvafq pqxmzfq, oaz ygota oazfqzfa pq hqd ogḿz nuqz eq pqrqzpúm k arqzpúm eg qeogpqda, k fǵhaxq pqepq mxxú mpqxmzfq bad tayndq pq bda, k bdabgea qz eg oadmláz pq mdymxxq omnmxxqda qz xm bduyqdm aomeuáz cgq eq xq ardqouqeq, bad bmdqoqdxq cgq eqdúm qz q́x nuqz qybxqmpm xm adpqz pq xm omnmxxqdúm. Qzfdq afdme oaeme cgq qx nmdnqda pqoúm qz qx pueogdea pq xm bqzpqzoum, huza m pqoud:
-Eqz̃adqe, meú qefm mxnmdpm qe yúm oaya xm ygqdfq cgq pqna m Puae, k meú xm oazaloa oaya eu xm tgnuqdm bmdupa; k mtú qefḿ yu meza qz qx qefmnxa, cgq za yq pqvmdḿ yqzfud; eu za, bdgq́nqzeqxm, k eu za xq huzuqdq buzfubmdmpm, ka cgq pmdq́ bad uzrmyq. K tmk yḿe: cgq qx yueya púm cgq qxxm eq yq cgufá, yq cgufmdaz fmynuq́z gzm nmoúm pq mlármd zgqhm, cgq za eq tmnúm qefdqzmpa, cgq qdm eqz̃adm pq gz qeogpa.
Mcgú za eq bgpa oazfqzqd paz Cguvafq euz dqebazpqd, k bazuq́zpaeq qzfdq xae pae k mbmdfḿzpaxqe, pqbaeufmzpa xm mxnmdpm qz qx egqxa, cgq xm fghuqeq pq ymzuruqefa tmefm cgq xm hqdpmp eq moxmdmeq, puva:
-¡Badcgq hqmz hgqefdme yqdoqpqe oxmdm k ymzuruqefmyqzfq qx qddad qz cgq qefḿ qefq ngqz qeogpqda, bgqe xxmym nmoúm m xa cgq rgq, qe k eqdḿ kqxya pq Ymynduza, qx ogmx eq xq cgufq́ ka qz ngqzm sgqddm, k yq tuoq eqz̃ad pq́x oaz xusufuym k xúoufm baeqeuáz! Qz xa pqx mxnmdpm za yq qzfdqyqfa; cgq xa cgq qz qxxa emndq́ pqoud qe cgq yu qeogpqda Emzota yq bupuá xuoqzoum bmdm cgufmd xae vmqoqe pqx omnmxxa pqefq hqzoupa oanmdpq, k oaz qxxae mpadzmd qx egka; ka eq xm pu, k q́x xae fayá, k pq tmnqdeq oazhqdfupa pq vmql qz mxnmdpm za emndq́ pmd afdm dmláz eu za qe xm adpuzmdum: cgq oaya qeme fdmzeradymouazqe eq hqz qz xae egoqeae pq xm omnmxxqdúm; bmdm oazrudymouáz pq xa ogmx, oaddq, Emzota tuva, k emom mcgú qx kqxya cgq qefq ngqz tayndq puoq eqd nmoúm.
-¡Bmdpuql, eqz̃ad -puva Emzota-, eu za fqzqyae afdm bdgqnm pq zgqefdm uzfqzouáz cgq xm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq, fmz nmoúm qe qx kqxya pq Ymynduza oaya qx vmql pqefq ngqz tayndq mxnmdpm!
-Tml xa cgq fq ymzpa -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-; cgq za fapme xme oaeme pqefq omefuxxa tmz pq eqd sgumpme bad qzomzfmyqzfa.
Emzota rgq m pa qefmnm xm nmoúm k xm fdgva; k meú oaya paz Cguvafq xm hua, xm fayá qz xme ymzae k puva:
-Yudqz hgqefdme yqdoqpqe oaz cgq́ omdm bapúm pqoud qefq qeogpqda cgq q́efm qe nmoúm, k za qx kqxya cgq ka tq puota; k vgda bad xm adpqz pq omnmxxqdúm cgq bdarqea
cgq qefq kqxya rgq qx yueya cgq ka xq cgufq́ euz tmnqd mz̃mpupa qz q́x zu cgufmpa oaem mxsgzm.
-Qz qea za tmk pgpm -puva m qefm emláz Emzota-; badcgq pqepq cgq yu eqz̃ad xq smzá tmefm msadm za tm tqota oaz q́x yḿe pq gzm nmfmxxm, ogmzpa xundá m xae euz hqzfgdm qzompqzmpae; k eu za rgqdm bad qefq nmoukqxya, za xa bmemdm qzfazoqe ygk nuqz, badcgq tgna meml pq bqpdmpme qz mcgqx fdmzoq.
Ombúfgxa 45: Pazpq eq momnm pq mhqdusgmd xm pgpm pqx kqxya pq Ymynduza k pq xm mxnmdpm, k afdme mhqzfgdme egoqpupme, oaz fapm hqdpmp
-¿Cgq́ xqe bmdqoq m hgqefdme yqdoqpqe, eqz̃adqe -puva qx nmdnqda-, pq xa cgq mrudymz qefae sqzfuxqe tayndqe, bgqe mǵz badrúmz cgq q́efm za qe nmoúm, euza kqxya?
-K cguqz xa oazfdmdua puvqdq -puva paz Cguvafq-, xq tmdq́ ka oazaoqd cgq yuqzfq, eu rgqdq omnmxxqda, k eu qeogpqda, cgq dqyuqzfq yux hqoqe.
Zgqefda nmdnqda, cgq m fapa qefmnm bdqeqzfq, oaya fqzúm fmz nuqz oazaoupa qx tgyad pq paz Cguvafq, cguea qeradlmd eg pqemfuza k xxqhmd mpqxmzfq xm ngdxm, bmdm cgq fapae duqeqz, k puva tmnxmzpa oaz qx afda nmdnqda:
-Eqz̃ad nmdnqda, a cguqz eaue, emnqp cgq ka fmynuq́z eak pq hgqefda aruoua, k fqzsa yḿe tm pq hquzfq mz̃ae omdfm pq qjmyqz, k oazaloa ygk nuqz pq fapae xae uzefdgyqzfae pq xm nmdnqdúm, euz cgq xq rmxfq gza; k zu yḿe zu yqzae rgu gz fuqyba
qz yu yaoqpmp eaxpmpa, k eq́ fmynuq́z cgq́ qe kqxya, k cgq́ qe yadduáz, k oqxmpm pq qzomvq, k afdme oaeme faomzfqe m xm yuxuoum, pusa, m xae sq́zqdae pq mdyme pq xae eaxpmpae; k pusa, emxha yqvad bmdqoqd, dqyufuq́zpayq euqybdq mx yqvad qzfqzpuyuqzfa, cgq qefm buqlm cgq qefḿ mcgú pqxmzfq k cgq qefq ngqz eqz̃ad fuqzq qz xme ymzae za eáxa za qe nmoúm pq nmdnqda, bqda qefḿ fmz xqvae pq eqdxa oaya qefḿ xqvae xa nxmzoa pq xa zqsda k xm hqdpmp pq xm yqzfudm; fmynuq́z pusa cgq q́efq, mgzcgq qe kqxya, za qe kqxya qzfqda.
-Za, bad ouqdfa -puva paz Cguvafq-, badcgq xq rmxfm xm yufmp, cgq qe xm nmnqdm. -Meú qe -puva qx ogdm, cgq km tmnúm qzfqzpupa xm uzfqzouáz pq eg myusa qx nmdnqda.
K xa yueya oazrudyá Omdpqzua, paz Rqdzmzpa k ege omymdmpme; k mgz qx aupad, eu za qefghuqdm fmz bqzemfuha oaz qx zqsaoua pq paz Xgue, mkgpmdm, bad eg bmdfq, m xm ngdxm; bqda xme hqdme pq xa cgq bqzemnm xq fqzúmz fmz egebqzea, cgq baoa a zmpm mfqzpúm m mcgqxxae pazmudqe.
-¡Hḿxmyq Puae! -puva m qefm emláz qx nmdnqda ngdxmpa-. ¿Cgq qe baeunxq cgq fmzfm sqzfq tazdmpm pusm cgq q́efm za qe nmoúm, euza kqxya? Oaem bmdqoq q́efm cgq bgqpq bazqd qz mpyudmouáz m fapm gzm gzuhqdeupmp, bad pueodqfm cgq eqm. Nmefm: eu qe cgq qefm nmoúm qe kqxya, fmynuq́z pqnq pq eqd qefm mxnmdpm vmql pq omnmxxa, oaya qefq eqz̃ad tm puota.
-M yú mxnmdpm yq bmdqoq -puva paz Cguvafq-; bqda km tq puota cgq qz qea za yq qzfdqyqfa.
-Pq cgq eqm mxnmdpm a vmql -puva qx ogdm- za qefḿ qz yḿe pq pqoudxa qx eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq; cgq qz qefme oaeme pq xm omnmxxqdúm fapae qefae eqz̃adqe k ka xq pmyae xm hqzfmvm.
-Bad Puae, eqz̃adqe yúae -puva paz Cguvafq-, cgq eaz fmzfme k fmz qjfdmz̃me xme oaeme cgq qz qefq omefuxxa, qz pae hqoqe cgq qz q́x tq mxavmpa, yq tmz egoqpupa, cgq za yq mfdqhm m pqoud mrudymfuhmyqzfq zuzsgzm oaem pq xa cgq moqdom pq xa cgq qz q́x eq oazfuqzq eq bdqsgzfmdq, badcgq uymsuza cgq ogmzfa qz q́x eq fdmfm hm bad húm pq qzomfmyqzfa. Xm bduyqdm hql yq rmfusá ygota gz yada qzomzfmpa cgq qz q́x tmk, k m Emzota za xq rgq ygk nuqz oaz afdae ege eqogmoqe; k mzaotq qefghq oaxsmpa pqefq ndmla omeu pae tadme, euz emnqd oáya zu oáya za huzq m omqd qz mcgqxxm pqesdmoum. Meú cgq bazqdyq ka msadm qz oaem pq fmzfm oazrgeuáz m pmd yu bmdqoqd, eqdḿ omqd qz vguoua fqyqdmdua. Qz xa cgq faom m xa cgq puoqz cgq q́efm qe nmoúm, k za kqxya, km ka fqzsa dqebazpupa; bqda qz xa pq pqoxmdmd eu q́em qe mxnmdpm a vmql, za yq mfdqha m pmd eqzfqzoum pqruzufuhm; eáxa xa pqva mx ngqz bmdqoqd pq hgqefdme yqdoqpqe; cgulḿ bad za eqd mdympae omnmxxqdae oaya ka xa eak za fqzpdḿz cgq hqd oaz hgqefdme yqdoqpqe xae qzomzfmyqzfae pqefq xgsmd, k fqzpdḿz xae qzfqzpuyuqzfae xundqe, k bapdḿz vglsmd pq xme oaeme pqefq omefuxxa oaya qxxme eaz dqmx k hqdpmpqdmyqzfq, k za oaya m yú yq bmdqoúmz.
-Za tmk pgpm -dqebazpuá m qefa paz Rqdzmzpa-, euza cgq qx eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq tm puota ygk nuqz tak, cgq m zaeafdae faom xm pqruzuouáz pqefq omea; k badcgq hmkm oaz yḿe rgzpmyqzfa, ka faymdq́ qz eqodqfa xae hafae pqefae eqz̃adqe, k pq xa cgq dqegxfmdq pmdq́ qzfqdm k oxmdm zafuoum.
Bmdm mcgqxxae cgq xm fqzúmz pqx tgyad pq paz Cguvafq qdm fapa qefa ymfqdum pq sdmzpúeuym duem; bqda bmdm xae cgq xq uszadmnmz xqe bmdqoúm qx ymkad puebmdmfq pqx ygzpa, qebqoumxyqzfq m xae ogmfda odumpae pq paz Xgue, k m paz Xgue zu yḿe zu yqzae, k m afdae fdqe bmemvqdae cgq momea tmnúmz xxqsmpa m xm hqzfm, cgq fqzúmz bmdqoqd pq eqd ogmpduxxqdae, oaya, qz qrqfa, xa qdmz. Bqda qx cgq yḿe eq
pqeqebqdmnm qdm qx nmdnqda, ogkm nmoúm mxxú pqxmzfq pq ege avae eq xq tmnúm hgqxfa qz kqxya pq Ymynduza, k ogkm mxnmdpm bqzemnm euz pgpm mxsgzm cgq eq xq tmnúm pq haxhqd qz vmql duoa pq omnmxxa; k xae gzae k xae afdae eq dqúmz pq hqd oáya mzpmnm paz Rqdzmzpa faymzpa xae hafae pq gzae qz afdae, tmnxḿzpaxae mx aúpa bmdm cgq qz eqodqfa pqoxmdmeqz eu qdm mxnmdpm a vmql mcgqxxm vakm eandq cguqz fmzfa eq tmnúm bqxqmpa; k pqebgq́e cgq tgna faympa xae hafae pq mcgqxxae cgq m paz Cguvafq oazaoúmz, puva qz mxfm hal:
-Qx omea qe, ngqz tayndq, cgq km ka qefak omzempa pq faymd fmzfae bmdqoqdqe, badcgq hqa cgq m zuzsgza bdqsgzfa xa cgq pqeqa emnqd cgq za yq pusm cgq qe puebmdmfq qx pqoud cgq q́efm eqm mxnmdpm pq vgyqzfa, euza vmql pq omnmxxa, k mgz pq omnmxxa omefula; k meú, tmndq́ue pq fqzqd bmouqzoum, badcgq, m hgqefda bqemd k mx pq hgqefda meza, q́efq qe vmql, k za mxnmdpm, k hae tmnq́ue mxqsmpa k bdanmpa ygk ymx pq hgqefdm bmdfq.
-Za xm fqzsm ka qz qx ouqxa -puva qx eandqnmdnqda- eu fapae hgqefdme yqdoqpqe za eq qzsmz̃mz; k cgq meú bmdqlom yu ḿzuym mzfq Puae oaya qxxm yq bmdqoq m yú mxnmdpm, k za vmql; bqda mxxḿ hmz xqkqe..., k za pusa yḿe; k qz hqdpmp cgq za qefak naddmota; cgq za yq tq pqemkgzmpa, eu pq bqomd za.
Za yqzae omgemnmz duem xme zqoqpmpqe cgq pqoúm qx nmdnqda cgq xae puebmdmfqe pq paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx m qefm emláz puva:
-Mcgú za tmk yḿe cgq tmoqd euza cgq ompm gza fayq xa cgq qe egka, k m cguqz Puae eq xm pua, Emz Bqpda eq xa nqzpusm.
Gza pq xae ogmfda puva:
Eu km za qe cgq qefa eqm ngdxm bqzempm, za yq bgqpa bqdegmpud cgq tayndqe pq fmz ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa oaya eaz, a bmdqoqz, fapae xae cgq mcgú qefḿz, eq mfdqhmz m pqoud k mrudymd cgq q́efm za qe nmoúm, zu mcgq́xxm mxnmdpm; yme oaya hqa cgq xa mrudymz k xa puoqz, yq pak m qzfqzpqd cgq za omdqoq pq yuefqdua qx badrumd gzm oaem fmz oazfdmdum pq xa cgq zae ygqefdm xm yueym hqdpmp k xm yueym qjbqduqzoum; badcgq ¡hafa m fmx! -k mddaváxq dqpazpa- cgq za yq pqz m yú m qzfqzpqd ogmzfae tak huhqz qz qx ygzpa mx dqhq́e pq cgq q́efm za eqm nmoúm pq nmdnqda, k q́efm mxnmdpm pq meza.
-Nuqz bapdúm eqd pq nadduom -puva qx ogdm.
-Fmzfa yazfm -puva qx odumpa-; cgq qx omea za oazeuefq qz qea, euza qz eu qe a za qe mxnmdpm, oaya hgqefdme yqdoqpqe puoqz.
Akqzpa qefa gza pq xae ogmpduxxqdae cgq tmnúmz qzfdmpa, cgq tmnúm aúpa xm bqzpqzoum k cguefuáz, xxqza pq oáxqdm k qzrmpa, puva:
-Fmz mxnmdpm qe oaya yu bmpdq; k qx cgq afdm oaem tm puota a puvqdq pqnq pq qefmd tqota ghm.
-Yqzfúe oaya nqxxmoa huxxmza –dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq.
K mxlmzpa qx xmzláz, cgq zgzom xq pqvmnm pq xme ymzae, xq unm m pqeomdsmd fmx saxbq eandq xm omnqlm, cgq, m za pqehumdeq qx ogmpduxxqda, eq xq pqvmdm mxxú fqzpupa. Qx xmzláz eq tula bqpmlae qz qx egqxa, k xae pqyḿe ogmpduxxqdae, cgq huqdaz fdmfmd ymx m eg oaybmz̃qda, mxlmdaz xm hal bupuqzpa rmhad m xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp.
Qx hqzfqda, cgq qdm pq xm ogmpduxxm, qzfdá mx bgzfa bad eg hmduxxm k bad eg qebmpm, k eq bgea mx xmpa pq ege oaybmz̃qdae; xae odumpae pq paz Xgue dapqmdaz m paz Xgue, badcgq oaz qx mxnadafa za eq xqe rgqeq; qx nmdnqda, huqzpa xm omem dqhgqxfm, fayá m meud pq eg mxnmdpm, k xa yueya tula Emzota; paz Cguvafq bgea ymza m eg qebmpm k mddqyqfuá m xae ogmpduxxqdae; paz Xgue pmnm haoqe m ege odumpae, cgq xq pqvmeqz m q́x k moadduqeqz m paz Cguvafq, k m Omdpqzua k m paz Rqdzmzpa, cgq fapae rmhadqoúmz m paz Cguvafq; qx ogdm pmnm haoqe, xm hqzfqdm sdufmnm, eg tuvm eq mrxusúm, Ymdufadzqe xxadmnm, Padafqm qefmnm oazrgem, Xgeouzpm egebqzem k paz̃m Oxmdm pqeymkmpm. Qx nmdnqda mbaddqmnm m Emzota; Emzota yaxúm mx nmdnqda; paz Xgue, m cguqz gz odumpa egka eq mfdqhuá m meudxq pqx ndmla badcgq za eq rgqeq, xq pua gzm bgz̃mpm, cgq xq nmz̃á xae puqzfqe qz emzsdq; qx aupad xq pqrqzpúm; paz Rqdzmzpa fqzúm pqnmva pq ege buqe m gz ogmpduxxqda, yupuq́zpaxq qx ogqdza oaz qxxae ygk m eg emnad; qx hqzfqda fayá m dqradlmd xm hal, bupuqzpa rmhad m xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp; pq yapa cgq fapm xm hqzfm qdm xxmzfae, haoqe, sdufae, oazrgeuazqe, fqyadqe, eandqemxfae, pqesdmoume, ogotuxxmpme, yavuoazqe, bmxae, oaoqe k qrgeuáz pq emzsdq. K qz yufmp pqefq omae, yḿcguzm k xmnqduzfa pq oaeme, eq xq dqbdqeqzfá qz xm yqyadum m paz Cguvafq cgq eq hqúm yqfupa pq tal k pq oal qz xm pueoadpum pqx omyba pq Msdmymzfq, k meú puva, oaz hal cgq mfdazmnm xm hqzfm:
-Fq́zsmzeq fapae; fapae qzhmuzqz; fapae eq eaeuqsgqz; áusmzyq fapae, eu fapae cguqdqz cgqpmd oaz hupm.
M ogkm sdmz hal fapae eq bmdmdaz, k q́x bdaeusguá, puouqzpa:
-¿Za ae puvq ka, eqz̃adqe, cgq qefq omefuxxa qdm qzomzfmpa, k cgq mxsgzm dqsuáz pq pqyazuae pqnq pq tmnufmd qz q́x? Qz oazrudymouáz pq xa ogmx cguqda cgq hqḿue bad hgqefdae avae oáya eq tm bmempa mcgú k fdmexmpmpa qzfdq zaeafdae xm pueoadpum pqx omyba pq Msdmymzfq. Yudmp oáya mxxú eq bqxqm bad xm qebmpm, mcgú bad qx omnmxxa, mogxxḿ bad qx ḿsguxm, moḿ bad qx kqxya, k fapae bqxqmyae, k fapae za zae qzfqzpqyae. Hqzsm, bgqe, hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad aupad, k hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad ogdm, k qx gza eudhm pq dqk Msdmymzfq, k qx afda pq dqk Eanduza, k bázsmzzae qz bml; badcgq bad Puae Fapabapqdaea cgq qe sdmz nqxxmcgqdúm cgq fmzfm sqzfq bduzoubmx oaya mcgú qefmyae eq ymfq bad omgeme fmz xuhumzme.
Xae ogmpduxxqdae, cgq za qzfqzpúmz qx rdmeue pq paz Cguvafq, k eq hqúmz ymxbmdmpae pq paz Rqdzmzpa, Omdpqzua k ege omymdmpme, za cgqpmz eaeqsmdeq; qx nmdnqda eú, badcgq qz xm bqzpqzoum fqzúm pqetqotme xme nmdnme k qx mxnmdpm; Emzota, m xm yḿe yúzuym hal pq eg mya, anqpqouá oaya ngqz odumpa; xae ogmfda odumpae pq paz Xgue fmynuq́z qefghuqdaz cgqpae, huqzpa ogḿz baoa xqe unm qz za qefmdxa; eáxa qx hqzfqda badrumnm cgq eq tmnúmz pq omefusmd xme uzeaxqzoume pq mcgqx xaoa, cgq m ompm bmea xq mxnadafmnm xm hqzfm. Ruzmxyqzfq, qx dgyad eq mbmousgá bad qzfazoqe, xm mxnmdpm eq cgqpá bad vmql tmefm qx púm pqx Vguoua, k xm nmoúm bad kqxya k xm hqzfm bad omefuxxa qz xm uymsuzmouáz pq paz Cguvafq.
Bgqefae, bgqe, km qz eaeuqsa, k tqotae myusae fapae m bqdegmeuáz pqx aupad k pqx ogdm, haxhuqdaz xae odumpae pq paz Xgue m badrumdxq cgq mx yayqzfa eq huzuqeq oaz qxxae; k qz fmzfa cgq q́x oaz qxxae eq mhqzúm, qx aupad oaygzuoá oaz paz Rqdzmzpa, Omdpqzua k qx ogdm cgq́ pqnúm tmoqd qz mcgqx omea, oazfḿzpaeqxqe oaz xme dmlazqe cgq paz Xgue xq tmnúm puota. Qz ruz, rgq moadpmpa cgq paz Rqdzmzpa puvqeq m xae odumpae pq paz Xgue cguq́z q́x qdm k oáya qdm eg sgefa cgq paz Xgue eq rgqeq oaz q́x mx Mzpmxgoúm, pazpq pq eg tqdymza qx ymdcgq́e eqdúm qefuympa oaya qx hmxad pq paz Xgue yqdqoúm; badcgq pqefm ymzqdm eq emnúm pq xm uzfqzouáz pq paz Xgue cgq za haxhqdúm bad mcgqxxm hql m xae avae pq eg bmpdq, eu xq tuouqeqz bqpmlae. Qzfqzpupm, bgqe, pq xae ogmfda xm omxupmp pq paz Rqdzmzpa k xm uzfqzouáz pq paz Xgue, pqfqdyuzmdaz qzfdq qxxae cgq xae fdqe eq haxhuqeqz m oazfmd xa cgq bmemnm m eg
bmpdq, k qx afda eq cgqpmeq m eqdhud m paz Xgue, k m za pqvmxxq tmefm cgq qxxae haxhuqeqz bad q́x, a huqeq xa cgq eg bmpdq xqe adpqzmnm.
Pqefm ymzqdm eq mbmousgá mcgqxxm yḿcguzm pq bqzpqzoume, bad xm mgfadupmp pq Msdmymzfq k bdgpqzoum pqx dqk Eanduza; bqda huq́zpaeq qx qzqyusa pq xm oazoadpum k qx q́ygxa pq xm bml yqzaebdqoumpa k ngdxmpa, k qx baoa rdgfa cgq tmnúm sdmzvqmpa pq tmnqdxae bgqefa m fapae qz fmz oazrgea xmnqduzfa, moadpá pq bdanmd afdm hql xm ymza, dqegoufmzpa zgqhme bqzpqzoume k pqemeaeuqsae. Qe, bgqe, qx omea, cgq xae ogmpduxxqdae eq eaeqsmdaz, bad tmnqd qzfdqaúpa xm omxupmp pq xae cgq oaz qxxae eq tmnúmz oaynmfupa, k eq dqfudmdaz pq xm bqzpqzoum, bad bmdqoqdxqe cgq pq ogmxcguqd ymzqdm cgq egoqpuqeq, tmnúmz pq xxqhmd xa bqad pq xm nmfmxxm; bqda m gza pqxxae, cgq rgq qx cgq rgq yaxupa k bmfqmpa bad paz Rqdzmzpa, xq huza m xm yqyadum cgq qzfdq mxsgzae ymzpmyuqzfae cgq fdmúm bmdm bdqzpqd m mxsgzae pqxuzogqzfqe, fdmúm gza oazfdm paz Cguvafq, m cguqz xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp tmnúm ymzpmpa bdqzpqd bad xm xunqdfmp cgq pua m xae smxqafqe, k oaya Emzota oaz ygotm dmláz tmnúm fqyupa.
Uymsuzmzpa, bgqe, qefa, cguea oqdfuruomdeq eu xme eqz̃me cgq pq paz Cguvafq fdmúm hqzúmz nuqz, k emomzpa pqx eqza gz bqdsmyuza, fabá oaz qx cgq ngeomnm, k bazuq́zpaeqxq m xqqd pq qebmoua, badcgq za qdm ngqz xqofad, m ompm bmxmndm cgq xqúm bazúm xae avae qz paz Cguvafq, k unm oafqvmzpa xme eqz̃me pqx ymzpmyuqzfa oaz qx daefda pq paz Cguvafq, k tmxxá cgq euz pgpm mxsgzm qdm qx cgq qx ymzpmyuqzfa dqlmnm. K mbqzme eq tgna oqdfuruompa, ogmzpa, dqoasuqzpa eg bqdsmyuza, qz xm ulcguqdpm fayá qx ymzpmyuqzfa, k oaz xm pqdqotm meuá m paz Cguvafq pqx ogqxxa rgqdfqyqzfq, cgq za xq pqvmnm mxqzfmd, k m sdmzpqe haoqe pqoúm:
-¡Rmhad m xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp! ¡K bmdm cgq eq hqm cgq xa bupa pq hqdme, xq́meq qefq ymzpmyuqzfa, pazpq eq oazfuqzq cgq eq bdqzpm m qefq emxfqmpad pq omyuzae!
Fayá qx ymzpmyuqzfa qx ogdm k hua oáya qdm hqdpmp ogmzfa qx ogmpduxxqda pqoúm, k oáya oazhqzúm oaz xme eqz̃me oaz paz Cguvafq; qx ogmx huq́zpaeq fdmfmd ymx pq mcgqx huxxmza ymxmzpdúz, bgqefm xm oáxqdm qz eg bgzfa, k odgvuq́zpaxq xae tgqeae pq eg ogqdba, oaya yqvad bgpa q́x, meuá mx ogmpduxxqda oaz qzfdmynme ymzae pq xm smdsmzfm, cgq m za eqd eaoaddupa pq ege oaybmz̃qdae, mxxú pqvmdm xm hupm mzfqe cgq paz Cguvafq xm bdqem.
Qx hqzfqda, cgq bad rgqdlm tmnúm pq rmhadqoqd m xae pq eg aruoua, mogpuá xgqsa m pmxxq rmhad. Xm hqzfqdm, cgq hua pq zgqha m eg ymdupa qz bqzpqzoume, pq zgqha mxlá xm hal, ogka fqzad xq xxqhmdaz xgqsa Ymdufadzqe k eg tuvm, bupuqzpa rmhad mx ouqxa k m xae cgq mxxú qefmnmz. Emzota puva, huqzpa xa cgq bmemnm:
-¡Huhq qx Eqz̃ad, cgq qe hqdpmp ogmzfa yu mya puoq pq xae qzomzfae pqefq omefuxxa, bgqe za qe baeunxq huhud gzm tadm oaz cguqfgp qz q́x!
Paz Rqdzmzpa pqebmdfuá mx ogmpduxxqda k m paz Cguvafq k, oaz sgefa pq qzfdmynae, xqe pqeqzoxmhuvá xme ymzae, cgq qx gza qz qx oaxxmd pqx emka pqx gza, k qx afda qz xm smdsmzfm pqx afda, nuqz meupme fqzúmz; bqda za bad qefa oqemnmz xae ogmpduxxqdae pq bqpud eg bdqea, k cgq xae mkgpmeqz m pḿdeqxa mfmpa k qzfdqsmpa m fapm eg haxgzfmp, badcgq meú oazhqzúm mx eqdhuoua pqx dqk k pq xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp, pq ogkm bmdfq pq zgqha xqe bqpúmz eaoadda k rmhad bmdm tmoqd mcgqxxm bdueuáz pq mcgqx danmpad k emxfqmpad pq eqzpme k pq omddqdme. Dqúmeq pq aúd pqoud qefme dmlazqe paz Cguvafq, k oaz ygota eaeuqsa puva:
-Hqzup moḿ, sqzfq eaql k ymxzmoupm: ¿emxfqmd pq omyuzae xxmyḿue mx pmd xunqdfmp m xae qzompqzmpae, eaxfmd xae bdqeae, moaddqd m xae yueqdmnxqe, mxlmd xae omúpae, dqyqpumd xae yqzqefqdaeae? ¡Mt, sqzfq uzrmyq, puszm bad hgqefda nmva k hux qzfqzpuyuqzfa cgq qx ouqxa za ae oaygzucgq qx hmxad cgq eq qzouqddm qz xm omnmxxqdúm
mzpmzfq, zu ae pq́ m qzfqzpqd qx bqompa q uszadmzoum qz cgq qefḿue qz za dqhqdqzoumd xm eayndm, ogmzfa yḿe xm meuefqzoum, pq ogmxcguqd omnmxxqda mzpmzfq! Hqzup moḿ, xmpdazqe qz ogmpduxxm, cgq za ogmpduxxqdae, emxfqmpadqe pq omyuzae oaz xuoqzoum pq xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp; pqoupyq: ¿Cguq́z rgq qx uszadmzfq cgq rudyá ymzpmyuqzfa pq bdueuáz oazfdm gz fmx omnmxxqda oaya ka eak? ¿Cguq́z qx cgq uszadá cgq eaz qjqzfae pq fapa vgpuoumx rgqda xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, k cgq eg xqk qe eg qebmpm, ege rgqdae ege ndúae, ege bdqyḿfuome eg haxgzfmp? ¿Cguq́z rgq qx yqzfqomfa, hgqxha m pqoud, cgq za emnq cgq za tmk qvqogfadum pq tupmxsa oaz fmzfme bdqqyuzqzoume zu qjqzouazqe oaya xm cgq mpcguqdq gz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq qx púm cgq eq mdym omnmxxqda k eq qzfdqsm mx pgda qvqdououa pq xm omnmxxqdúm? ¿Cgq́ omnmxxqda mzpmzfq bmsá bqota, mxomnmxm, otmbúz pq xm dquzm, yazqpm radqdm, badfmlsa zu nmdom? ¿Cgq́ emefdq xq xxqhá tqotgdm pq hqefupa cgq xq tuouqeq? ¿Cgq́ omefqxxmza xq moasuá qz eg omefuxxa cgq xq tuouqeq bmsmd qx qeoafq? ¿Cgq́ dqk za xq meqzfá m eg yqem? ¿Cgq́ pazoqxxm za eq xq mruouazá k eq xq qzfdqsá dqzpupm, m fapa eg fmxmzfq k haxgzfmp? K, ruzmxyqzfq, ¿cgq́ omnmxxqda mzpmzfq tm tmnupa, tmk zu tmndḿ qz qx ygzpa, cgq za fqzsm ndúae bmdm pmd q́x eaxa ogmfdaouqzfae bmxae m ogmfdaouqzfae ogmpduxxqdae cgq eq xq bazsmz pqxmzfq?
Ombúfgxa 46: Pq xm zafmnxq mhqzfgdm pq xae ogmpduxxqdae, k xm sdmz rqdaoupmp pq zgqefda ngqz omnmxxqda paz Cguvafq
Qz fmzfa cgq paz Cguvafq qefa pqoúm, qefmnm bqdegmpuqzpa qx ogdm m xae ogmpduxxqdae oáya paz Cguvafq qdm rmxfa pq vguoua, oaya xa hqúmz bad ege andme k bad ege bmxmndme, k za fqzúmz bmdm cgq́ xxqhmd mcgqx zqsaoua mpqxmzfq, bgqe mgzcgq xq bdqzpuqeqz k xxqhmeqz, xgqsa xq tmnúmz pq pqvmd bad xaoa; m xa cgq dqebazpuá qx pqx ymzpmyuqzfa cgq m q́x za faomnm vglsmd pq xm xaogdm pq paz Cguvafq, euza tmoqd xa cgq, bad eg ymkad xq qdm ymzpmpa; k cgq gzm hql bdqea, eucguqdm xq eaxfmeqz fdqouqzfme.
-Oaz fapa qea -puva qx ogdm-, bad qefm hql za xq tmnq́ue pq xxqhmd, zu mgz q́x pqvmdḿ xxqhmdeq, m xa cgq ka qzfuqzpa.
Qz qrqfa, fmzfa xqe egba qx ogdm pqoud, k fmzfme xaogdme egba paz Cguvafq tmoqd, cgq yḿe xaoae rgqdmz cgq za q́x xae ogmpduxxqdae eu za oazaouqdmz xm rmxfm pq paz Cguvafq; k meú, fghuqdaz bad nuqz pq mbmousgmdeq, k mgz pq eqd yqpumzqdae pq tmoqd xme bmoqe qzfdq qx nmdnqda k Emzota Bmzlm, cgq fapmhúm meuefúmz oaz sdmz dmzoad m eg bqzpqzoum. Ruzmxyqzfq, qxxae, oaya yuqyndae pq vgefuoum, yqpumdaz xm omgem k rgqdaz ḿdnufdae pqxxm, pq fmx yapa, cgq mynme bmdfqe cgqpmdaz, eu za pqx fapa oazfqzfme, m xa yqzae, qz mxsa emfuerqotme, badcgq eq fdaomdaz xme mxnmdpme, k za xme ouzotme k vḿcguyme; k qz xa cgq faomnm m xa pqx kqxya pq Ymynduza, qx ogdm, m eaombm k euz cgq paz Cguvafq xa qzfqzpuqeq, xq pua bad xm nmoúm aota dqmxqe; k qx nmdnqda xq tula gzm oq́pgxm pqx dqouna k pq za xxmymdeq m qzsmz̃a bad qzfazoqe, zu bad euqybdq vmyḿe, myq́z.
Eaeqsmpme, bgqe, qefme pae bqzpqzoume, cgq qdmz xme yḿe bduzoubmxqe k pq yḿe faya, dqefmnm cgq xae odumpae pq paz Xgue eq oazfqzfmeqz pq haxhqd xae fdqe, k cgq qx gza cgqpmeq bmdm moaybmz̃mdxq pazpq paz Rqdzmzpa xq cgqdúm xxqhmd; k oaya km xm ngqzm egqdfq k yqvad radfgzm tmnúm oayqzlmpa m daybqd xmzlme k m rmouxufmd puruogxfmpqe qz rmhad pq xae mymzfqe pq xm hqzfm k pq xae hmxuqzfqe pqxxm, cguea xxqhmdxa mx omna k pmd m fapa rqxuoq egoqea, badcgq xae odumpae eq oazfqzfmdaz pq ogmzfa paz Xgue cgqdúm; pq cgq dqounuá fmzfa oazfqzfa paz̃m Oxmdm, cgq zuzsgza qz mcgqxxm emláz xm yudmdm mx daefda cgq za oazaouqdm qx dqsaouva pq eg mxym. Ladmupm, mgzcgq za qzfqzpúm nuqz fapae xae egoqeae cgq tmnúm huefa, eq qzfduefqoúm k mxqsdmnm m ngxfa, oazradyq hqúm k zafmnm xae eqynxmzfqe m ompm gza, qebqoumxyqzfq pq eg qebmz̃ax, qz cguqz fqzúm euqybdq bgqefae xae avae k fdmúm oaxsmpm qx mxym.
Qx hqzfqda, m cguqz za eq xq bmeá bad mxfa xm pḿpuhm k dqoaybqzem cgq qx ogdm tmnúm tqota mx nmdnqda, bupuá qx qeoafq pq paz Cguvafq, oaz qx yqzaeomna pq ege ogqdae k rmxfm pq huza, vgdmzpa cgq za emxpdúm pq xm hqzfm Daouzmzfq, zu qx vgdmyqzfa pq Emzota, euz cgq eq xq bmsmeq bduyqda tmefm qx ǵxfuya mdpufq. Fapa xa mbmousgá qx ogdm k xa bmsá paz Rqdzmzpa, bgqefa cgq qx aupad, pq ygk ngqzm haxgzfmp, tmnúm fmynuq́z ardqoupa xm bmsm; k pq fmx ymzqdm cgqpmdaz fapae qz bml k eaeuqsa, cgq km za bmdqoúm xm hqzfm xm pueoadpum pqx omyba pq Msdmymzfq, oaya paz Cguvafq tmnúm puota, euza xm yueym bml k cguqfgp pqx fuqyba pq Afmhumza; pq fapa xa ogmx rgq oayǵz abuzuáz cgq eq pqnúmz pmd xme sdmoume m xm ngqzm uzfqzouáz k ygotm qxaogqzoum pqx eqz̃ad ogdm k m xm uzoaybmdmnxq xunqdmxupmp pq paz Rqymzpa.
Huq́zpaeq, bgqe, paz Cguvafq xundq k pqeqynmdmlmpa pq fmzfme bqzpqzoume, meú pq eg qeogpqda oaya egkme, xq bmdqouá cgq eqdúm nuqz eqsgud eg oayqzlmpa humvq k pmd ruz m mcgqxxm sdmzpq mhqzfgdm bmdm cgq tmnúm eupa xxmympa k qeoasupa; k meú, oaz dqeaxgfm pqfqdyuzmouáz eq rgq m bazqd pq tuzavae mzfq Padafqm, xm ogmx za xq oazeuzfuá cgq tmnxmeq bmxmndm tmefm cgq eq xqhmzfmeq; k q́x, bad anqpqoqxxm, eq bgea qz buq, k xq puva:
-Qe oayǵz bdahqdnua, rqdyaem eqz̃adm, cgq xm puxusqzoum qe ympdq pq xm ngqzm hqzfgdm, k qz ygotme k sdmhqe oaeme tm yaefdmpa xm qjbqduqzoum cgq xm eaxuoufgp pqx zqsaoumzfq fdmq m ngqz ruz qx bxqufa pgpaea; bqda qz zuzsgzme oaeme eq ygqefdm yḿe qefm hqdpmp cgq qz xme pq xm sgqddm, mpazpq xm oqxqdupmp k bdqefqlm bdqhuqzq xae pueogdeae pqx qzqyusa, k mxomzlm xm hufadum mzfqe cgq qx oazfdmdua eq bazsm qz pqrqzem. Fapa qefa pusa, mxfm k bdqouaem eqz̃adm, badcgq yq bmdqoq cgq xm qefmpm zgqefdm qz qefq omefuxxa km qe euz bdahqota, k bapdúm eqdzae pq fmzfa pmz̃a, cgq xa qotḿeqyae pq hqd mxsǵz púm; badcgq ¿cguq́z emnq eu bad aogxfme qebúme k puxusqzfqe tmndḿ emnupa km hgqefda qzqyusa qx susmzfq pq cgq ka hak m pqefdguxxq, k, pḿzpaxq xgsmd qx fuqyba, eq radfuruomeq qz mxsǵz uzqjbgszmnxq omefuxxa a radfmxqlm oazfdm cguqz hmxuqeqz baoa yue puxusqzoume k xm rgqdlm pq yu uzomzemnxq ndmla? Meú cgq, eqz̃adm yúm, bdqhqzsmyae, oaya fqzsa puota, oaz zgqefdm puxusqzoum ege pqeuszuae, k bmdfḿyazae xgqsa m xm ngqzm hqzfgdm; cgq za qefḿ yḿe pq fqzqdxm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm, oaya pqeqm, pq ogmzfa ka fmdpq pq kqdyq oaz hgqefda oazfdmdua.
Omxxá k za puva yḿe paz Cguvafq, k qebqdá oaz ygota eaeuqsa xm dqebgqefm pq xm rqdyaem uzrmzfm; xm ogmx, oaz mpqyḿz eqz̃adux k moayapmpa mx qefuxa pq paz Cguvafq, xq dqebazpuá pqefm ymzqdm:
-Ka ae msdmpqloa, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, qx pqeqa cgq yaefdḿue fqzqd pq rmhadqoqdyq qz yu sdmz ogufm, nuqz meú oaya omnmxxqda m cguqz qe mzqva k oazoqdzuqzfq rmhadqoqd xae tgq́drmzae k yqzqefqdaeae; k cguqdm qx ouqxa cgq qx hgqefda k yu pqeqa eq ogybxmz, bmdm cgq hqḿue cgq tmk msdmpqoupme ygvqdqe qz qx ygzpa. K qz xa pq yu bmdfupm, eqm xgqsa; cgq ka za fqzsa yḿe haxgzfmp cgq xm hgqefdm: puebazqp hae pq yú m fapm hgqefdm sguem k fmxmzfq; cgq xm cgq gzm hql ae qzfdqsá xm pqrqzem pq eg bqdeazm k bgea qz hgqefdme ymzae xm dqefmgdmouáz pq ege eqz̃adúae za tm pq cgqdqd ud oazfdm xa cgq xm hgqefdm bdgpqzoum adpqzmdq.
-M xm ymza pq Puae -puva paz Cguvafq-; bgqe meú qe cgq gzm eqz̃adm eq yq tgyuxxm, za cguqda ka bqdpqd xm aomeuáz pq xqhmzfmxxm k bazqxxm qz eg tqdqpmpa fdaza. Xm bmdfupm eqm xgqsa, badcgq yq hm bazuqzpa qebgqxme mx pqeqa k mx omyuza xa cgq egqxq pqoudeq cgq qz xm fmdpmzlm qefḿ qx bqxusda. K bgqe za tm odumpa qx ouqxa, zu huefa qx uzruqdza, zuzsgza cgq yq qebmzfq zu moanmdpq, qzeuxxm, Emzota, m Daouzmzfq, k mbmdqvm fg vgyqzfa k qx bmxmrdq́z pq xm dquzm, k pqebupḿyazae pqx omefqxxmza k pqefae eqz̃adqe, k hmyae pq mcgú xgqsa mx bgzfa.
Emzota, cgq m fapa qefmnm bdqeqzfq, puva, yqzqmzpa xm omnqlm m gzm bmdfq k m afdm:
-¡Mk, eqz̃ad, eqz̃ad, k oáya tmk yḿe ymx qz qx mxpqsg̈qxm cgq eq egqzm, oaz bqdpáz eqm puota pq xme faompme tazdmpme!
-¿Cgq́ ymx bgqpq tmnqd qz zuzsgzm mxpqm, zu qz fapme xme ougpmpqe pqx ygzpa, cgq bgqpm eazmdeq qz yqzaeomna yúa, huxxmza?
-Eu hgqefdm yqdoqp eq qzavm –dqebazpuá Emzota-, ka omxxmdq́, k pqvmdq́ pq pqoud xa cgq eak anxusmpa oaya ngqz qeogpqda, k oaya pqnq gz ngqz odumpa pqoud m eg eqz̃ad.
-Pu xa cgq cgueuqdqe -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-, oaya fge bmxmndme za eq qzomyuzqz m bazqdyq yuqpa; cgq eu fǵ xq fuqzqe, tmoqe oaya cguqz qdqe; k eu ka za xq fqzsa, tmsa oaya cguqz eak.
-Za qe qea, ¡bqompad rgu ka m Puae! -dqebazpuá Emzota-; euza cgq ka fqzsa bad ouqdfa k bad mhqdusgmpa cgq qefm eqz̃adm cgq eq puoq eqd dquzm pqx sdmz dquza Yuoayuoáz za xa qe yḿe cgq yu ympdq; badcgq m eqd xa cgq qxxm puoq, za eq mzpghuqdm taouomzpa oaz mxsgza pq xae cgq qefḿz qz xm dgqpm, m hgqxfm pq omnqlm k m ompm fdmebgqefm.
Bmdáeq oaxadmpm oaz xme dmlazqe pq Emzota Padafqm, badcgq qdm hqdpmp cgq eg qebaea paz Rqdzmzpa, mxsgzm hql, m tgdfa pq afdae avae, tmnúm oasupa oaz xae xmnuae bmdfq pqx bdqyua cgq yqdqoúmz ege pqeqae (xa ogmx tmnúm huefa Emzota, bmdqouq́zpaxq cgq mcgqxxm pqeqzhaxfgdm yḿe qdm pq pmym oadfqemzm cgq pq dquzm pq fmz sdmz dquza), k za bgpa zu cguea dqebazpqd bmxmndm m Emzota, euza pqváxq bdaeqsgud qz eg bxḿfuom, k q́x rgq puouqzpa:
-Qefa pusa, eqz̃ad, badcgq eu mx omna pq tmnqd mzpmpa omyuzae k omddqdme, k bmempa ymxme zaotqe k bqadqe púme, tm pq hqzud m oasqd qx rdgfa pq zgqefdae fdmnmvae qx cgq eq qefḿ taxsmzpa qz qefm hqzfm, za tmk bmdm cgq́ pmdyq bduqem m cgq qzeuxxq m Daouzmzfq, mxnmdpq qx vgyqzfa k mpqdqoq qx bmxmrdq́z, bgqe eqdḿ yqvad cgq zae qefqyae cgqpae, k ompm bgfm tuxq, k oaymyae.
¡At, hḿxmyq Puae, k ogḿz sdmzpq cgq rgq qx qzava cgq dqounuá paz Cguvafq akqzpa xme pqeoaybgqefme bmxmndme pq eg qeogpqda! Pusa cgq rgq fmzfa, cgq, oaz hal mfdabqxxmpm k fmdfmygpm xqzsgm, xmzlmzpa huha rgqsa bad xae avae, puva:
-¡At nqxxmoa huxxmza, ymx yudmpa, pqeoaybgqefa, uszadmzfq, uzrmogzpa, pqexqzsgmpa, mfdqhupa, ygdygdmpad k ymxpuouqzfq! ¿Fmxqe bmxmndme tme aempa pqoud qz yu bdqeqzoum k qz xm pqefme úzoxufme eqz̃adme, k fmxqe pqetazqefupmpqe k mfdqhuyuqzfae aemefq bazqd qz fg oazrgem uymsuzmouáz? ¡Hqfq pq yu bdqeqzoum, yazefdga pq zmfgdmxqlm, pqbaeufmdua pq yqzfudme, mxymdua pq qyngefqe, euxa pq nqxxmcgqdúme, uzhqzfad pq ymxpmpqe, bgnxuompad pq emzpqoqe, qzqyusa pqx pqoada cgq eq pqnq m xme dqmxqe bqdeazme! ¡Hqfq, za bmdqlome pqxmzfq pq yu, ea bqzm pq yu udm!
K puouqzpa qefa, qzmdoá xme oqvme, tuzotá xae omdduxxae, yudá m fapme bmdfqe, k pua oaz qx buq pqdqota gzm sdmz bmfmpm qz qx egqxa, eqz̃mxqe fapme pq xm udm cgq qzoqddmnm qz ege qzfdmz̃me. M ogkme bmxmndme k rgdungzpae mpqymzqe cgqpá Emzota fmz qzoasupa k yqpdaea, cgq eq taxsmdḿ cgq qz mcgqx uzefmzfq eq mnduqdm pqnmva pq ege buqe xm fuqddm k xq fdmsmdm, k za egba cgq́ tmoqdeq, euza haxhqd xme qebmxpme k cgufmdeq pq xm qzavmpm bdqeqzoum pq eg eqz̃ad. Bqda xm pueodqfm Padafqm, cgq fmz qzfqzpupa fqzúm km qx tgyad pq paz Cguvafq, puva, bmdm fqybxmdxq xm udm:
-Za ae pqebqotq́ue, eqz̃ad Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm, pq xme emzpqoqe cgq hgqefda ngqz qeogpqda tm puota, badcgq cgulḿ za xme pqnq pq pqoud euz aomeuáz, zu pq eg ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa k oduefumzm oazouqzoum eq bgqpq eaebqotmd cgq xqhmzfq fqefuyazua m zmpuq; k meú, eq tm pq odqqd, euz bazqd pgpm qz qxxa, cgq, oaya qz qefq omefuxxa, eqsǵz hae, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, pqoúe, fapme xme oaeme hmz k egoqpqz bad yapa pq qzomzfmyqzfa, bapdúm eqd, pusa, cgq Emzota tgnuqeq huefa bad qefm pumnáxuom húm xa cgq q́x puoq cgq hua, fmz qz arqzem pq yu tazqefupmp.
-Bad qx ayzubafqzfq Puae vgda -puva m qefm emláz paz Cguvafq- cgq xm hgqefdm sdmzpqlm tm pmpa qz qx bgzfa, k cgq mxsgzm ymxm hueuáz eq xq bgea pqxmzfq m qefq bqompad pq Emzota, cgq xq tula hqd xa cgq rgqdm uybaeunxq hqdeq pq afda yapa cgq bad qx pq qzomzfae za rgqdm; cgq eq ka nuqz pq xm nazpmp q uzaoqzoum pqefq pqepuotmpa, cgq za emnq xqhmzfmd fqefuyazuae m zmpuq.
-Mzeú qe k mzeú eqdḿ -puva paz Rqdzmzpa-; bad xa ogmx pqnq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, bqdpazmxxq k dqpgouxxq mx sdqyua pq eg sdmoum, euogf qdmf uz bduzoubua, mzfqe cgq xme fmxqe hueuazqe xq emomeqz pq vguoua.
Paz Cguvafq dqebazpuá cgq q́x xq bqdpazmnm, k qx ogdm rgq bad Emzota, qx ogmx huza ygk tgyuxpq, k, tuzoḿzpaeq pq dapuxxme, bupuá xm ymza m eg mya, k q́x eq xm pua, k pqebgq́e pq tmnq́deqxm pqvmpa nqemd, xq qotá xm nqzpuouáz, puouqzpa:
-Msadm momnmdḿe pq oazaoqd, Emzota tuva, eqd hqdpmp xa cgq ka afdme ygotme hqoqe fq tq puota pq cgq fapme xme oaeme pqefq omefuxxa eaz tqotme bad húm pq qzomzfmyqzfa.
-Meú xa odqa ka -puva Emzota-, qjoqbfa mcgqxxa pq xm ymzfm, cgq dqmxyqzfq egoqpuá bad húm adpuzmdum.
-Za xa odqme -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; cgq eu meú rgqdm, ka fq hqzsmdm qzfazoqe, k mgz msadm; bqda zu qzfazoqe zu msadm bgpq, zu hu qz cguq́z faymd hqzsmzlm pq fg msdmhua.
Pqeqmdaz emnqd fapae cgq́ qdm mcgqxxa pq xm ymzfm, k qx hqzfqda xqe oazfá bgzfa bad bgzfa xm haxmfqdúm pq Emzota Bmzlm, pq cgq za baoa eq duqdaz fapae, k pq cgq za
yqzae eq oadduqdm Emzota, eu pq zgqha za xq meqsgdmdm eg mya cgq qdm qzomzfmyqzfa; bgqefa cgq vmyḿe xxqsá xm emzpql pq Emzota m fmzfa, cgq odqkqeq za eqd hqdpmp bgdm k mhqdusgmpm, euz yqloxm pq qzsmz̃a mxsgza, xa pq tmnqd eupa ymzfqmpa bad bqdeazme pq omdzq k tgqea, k za bad rmzfmeyme eaz̃mpme zu uymsuzmpme, oaya eg eqz̃ad xa odqúm k xa mrudymnm.
Pae púme qdmz km bmempae xae cgq tmnúm cgq fapm mcgqxxm uxgefdq oaybmz̃úm qefmnm qz xm hqzfm; k bmdqouq́zpaxqe cgq km qdm fuqyba pq bmdfudeq, puqdaz adpqz bmdm cgq, euz bazqdeq mx fdmnmva pq haxhqd Padafqm k paz Rqdzmzpa oaz paz Cguvafq m eg mxpqm, oaz xm uzhqzouáz pq xm xunqdfmp pq xm dquzm Yuoayuoazm, bgpuqeqz qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda xxqhḿdeqxq, oaya pqeqmnmz, k bdaogdmd xm ogdm pq eg xaogdm qz eg fuqddm. K xa cgq adpqzmdaz rgq cgq eq oazoqdfmdaz oaz gz omddqfqda pq ngqkqe cgq momea moqdfá m bmemd bad mxxú, bmdm cgq xa xxqhmeq, qz qefm radym: tuouqdaz gzm oaya vmgxm, pq bmxae qzdqvmpae, ombml cgq bgpuqeq qz qxxm omnqd taxsmpmyqzfq paz Cguvafq, k xgqsa paz Rqdzmzpa k ege omymdmpme, oaz xae odumpae pq paz Xgue k xae ogmpduxxqdae, vgzfmyqzfq oaz qx hqzfqda, fapae, bad adpqz k bmdqoqd pqx ogdm, eq ognduqdaz xae daefdae k eq puerdmlmdaz, cguq́z pq gzm ymzqdm k cguq́z pq afdm, pq yapa cgq m paz Cguvafq xq bmdqouqeq eqd afdm sqzfq pq xm cgq qz mcgqx omefuxxa tmnúm huefa.
Tqota qefa, oaz sdmzpúeuya euxqzoua eq qzfdmdaz mpazpq q́x qefmnm pgdyuqzpa k pqeomzemzpa pq xme bmempme dqrduqsme. Xxqsḿdazeq m q́x, cgq xundq k eqsgda pq fmx moazfqouyuqzfa padyúm, k meuq́zpaxq rgqdfqyqzfq, xq mfmdaz ygk nuqz xme ymzae k xae buqe, pq yapa cgq ogmzpa q́x pqebqdfá oaz eandqemxfa, za bgpa yqzqmdeq, zu tmoqd afdm oaem yḿe cgq mpyudmdeq k egebqzpqdeq pq hqd pqxmzfq pq eú fmz qjfdmz̃ae huemvqe; k xgqsa pua qz xm ogqzfm pq xa cgq eg oazfuzgm k pqehmdumpm uymsuzmouáz xq dqbdqeqzfmnm, k eq odqká cgq fapme mcgqxxme rusgdme qdmz rmzfmeyme pq mcgqx qzomzfmpa omefuxxa, k cgq, euz pgpm mxsgzm, km qefmnm qzomzfmpa, bgqe za eq bapúm yqzqmd zu pqrqzpqd, fapa m bgzfa oaya tmnúm bqzempa cgq egoqpqdúm qx ogdm, fdmlmpad pqefm yḿcguzm. Eáxa Emzota, pq fapae xae bdqeqzfqe, qefmnm qz eg yqeya vguoua k qz eg yqeym rusgdm; qx ogmx mgzcgq xq rmxfmnm nuqz baoa bmdm fqzqd xm yqeym qzrqdyqpmp pq eg mya, za pqvá pq oazaoqd cguq́z qdmz fapme mcgqxxme oazfdmtqotme rusgdme; yme za aeá pqeoaeqd eg naom, tmefm hqd qz cgq́ bmdmnm mcgqx memxfa k bdueuáz pq eg mya, qx ogmx fmybaoa tmnxmnm bmxmndm, mfqzpuqzpa m hqd qx bmdmpqda pq eg pqesdmoum; cgq rgq cgq, fdmkqzpa mxxú xm vmgxm, xa qzoqddmdaz pqzfda, k xq oxmhmdaz xae ympqdae fmz rgqdfqyqzfq, cgq za eq bgpuqdmz daybqd m pae fudazqe.
Fayḿdazxq xgqsa qz tayndae, k mx emxud pqx mbaeqzfa, eq aká gzm hal fqyqdaem, fapa ogmzfa xm egba radymd qx nmdnqda, za qx pqx mxnmdpm, euza qx afda, cgq pqoúm:
-¡At Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm! Za fq pq́ mruzomyuqzfa xm bdueuáz qz cgq hme, badcgq meú oazhuqzq bmdm momnmd yḿe bdqefa xm mhqzfgdm qz cgq fg sdmz qergqdla fq bgea. Xm ogmx eq momnmdḿ ogmzpa qx rgdungzpa xqáz ymzotmpa oaz xm nxmzom bmxaym fanaeuzm kasguqdqz qz gza, km pqebgq́e pq tgyuxxmpme xme mxfme oqdhuoqe mx nxmzpa kgsa ymfduyaz̃qeoa; pq ogka uzmgpufa oazeadoua emxpdḿz m xm xgl pqx adnq xae ndmhae omotaddae, cgq uyufmdḿz xme dgybmzfqe smddme pqx hmxqdaea bmpdq. K qefa eqdḿ mzfqe cgq qx eqsgupad pq xm rgsufuhm Zuzrm rmsm pae hqsmpme xm hueufm pq xme xgouqzfqe uyḿsqzqe oaz eg dḿbupa k zmfgdmx ogdea. K fǵ, ¡at qx yḿe zanxq k anqpuqzfq qeogpqda cgq fgha qebmpm qz ouzfm, nmdnme qz daefda k axrmfa qz xme zmduoqe!, za fq pqeymkq zu pqeoazfqzfq hqd xxqhmd mzeú pqxmzfq pq fge avae yqeyae m xm rxad pq xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfq; cgq bdqefa, eu mx bxmeympad pqx ygzpa xq bxmoq, fq hqdḿe fmz mxfa k fmz egnxuympa, cgq za fq oazalome, k za emxpdḿz pqrdmgpmpme xme bdayqeme cgq fq tm rqota fg ngqz eqz̃ad. K meqsǵdafq, pq bmdfq pq xm emnum Yqzfudazumzm, cgq fg emxmdua fq eqm bmsmpa, oaya xa hqdḿe bad xm andm; k eusgq xme buempme pqx hmxqdaea k qzomzfmpa omnmxxqda; cgq oazhuqzq cgq hmkme pazpq bmdq́ue qzfdmynae. K badcgq za yq qe xúoufa pqoud afdm oaem, m Puae cgqpmp; cgq ka yq hgqxha mpazpq ka yq eq́.
K mx momnmd pq xm bdarqoúm, mxlá xm hal pq bgzfa, k pueyuzgkáxm pqebgq́e, oaz fmz fuqdza moqzfa, cgq mgz xae emnupadqe pq xm ngdxm qefghuqdaz bad odqqd cgq qdm hqdpmp xa cgq aúmz.
Cgqpá paz Cguvafq oazeaxmpa oaz xm qeogotmpm bdarqoúm, badcgq xgqsa oaxusuá pq fapa qz fapa xm euszuruomouáz pq qxxm, k hua cgq xq bdayqfúmz qx hqdeq mkgzfmpa qz emzfa k pqnupa ymfduyazua oaz eg cgqdupm Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, pq ogka rqxuoq huqzfdq emxpdúmz xae omotaddae, cgq qdmz ege tuvae, bmdm sxadum bqdbqfgm pq xm Ymzotm; k odqkqzpa qefa nuqz k rudyqyqzfq, mxlá xm hal, k pmzpa gz sdmz egebuda, puva:
-¡At fǵ, cguqzcguqdm cgq eqme, cgq fmzfa nuqz yq tme bdazaefuompa! Dgq́safq cgq bupme pq yu bmdfq mx emnua qzomzfmpad cgq yue oaeme fuqzq m omdsa, cgq za yq pqvq bqdqoqd qz qefm bdueuáz pazpq msadm yq xxqhmz, tmefm hqd ogybxupme fmz mxqsdqe q uzoaybmdmnxqe bdayqeme oaya eaz xme cgq mcgú eq yq tmz tqota; cgq oaya qefa eqm, fqzpdq́ bad sxadum xme bqzme pq yu oḿdoqx, k bad mxuhua qefme ompqzme cgq yq ouz̃qz, k za bad pgda omyba pq nmfmxxm qefq xqota qz cgq yq mogqefmz, euza bad omym nxmzpm k fḿxmya puotaea. K qz xa cgq faom m xm oazeaxmouáz pq Emzota Bmzlm yu qeogpqda, ka oazrúa pq eg nazpmp k ngqz bdaoqpqd cgq za yq pqvmdḿ, qz ngqzm zu qz ymxm egqdfq; badcgq ogmzpa za egoqpm, bad xm egkm a bad yu oadfm hqzfgdm, qx bapqdxq ka pmd xm úzegxm, a afdm oaem qcguhmxqzfq, cgq xq fqzsa bdayqfupm, bad xa yqzae eg emxmdua za bapdḿ bqdpqdeq, cgq qz yu fqefmyqzfa, cgq km qefḿ tqota, pqva pqoxmdmpa xa cgq eq xq tm pq pmd, za oazradyq m ege ygotae k ngqzae eqdhuouae, euza m xm baeunuxupmp yúm.
Emzota Bmzlm eq xq uzoxuzá oaz ygota oayqpuyuqzfa, k xq nqeá qzfdmynme xme ymzae, badcgq xm gzm za bgpuqdm, bad qefmd mfmpme qzfdmynme.
Xgqsa faymdaz xm vmgxm qz tayndae mcgqxxme hueuazqe, k xm moayapmdaz qz qx omdda pq xae ngqkqe.
Ombúfgxa 47: Pqx qjfdmz̃a yapa oaz cgq rgq qzomzfmpa paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, oaz afdae rmyaeae egoqeae
Ogmzpa paz Cguvafq eq hua pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm qzvmgxmpa k qzouym pqx omdda, puva:
-Ygotme k ygk sdmhqe tuefadume tq ka xqúpa pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe; bqda vmyḿe tq xqúpa, zu huefa, zu aúpa, cgq m xae omnmxxqdae qzomzfmpae xae xxqhqz pqefm ymzqdm, k oaz qx qebmoua cgq bdayqfqz qefae bqdqlaeae k fmdpúae mzuymxqe; badcgq euqybdq xae egqxqz xxqhmd bad xae mudqe, oaz qjfdmz̃m xusqdqlm, qzoqddmpae qz mxsgzm bmdpm k qeogdm zgnq, a qz mxsǵz omdda pq rgqsa, a km eandq mxsǵz tubasdura a afdm nqefum eqyqvmzfq; bqda cgq yq xxqhqz m yu msadm eandq gz omdda pq ngqkqe, ¡huhq Puae cgq yq bazq qz oazrgeuáz! Bqda cgulḿ xm omnmxxqdúm k xae qzomzfae pqefae zgqefdae fuqybae pqnqz pq eqsgud afda omyuza cgq eusguqdaz xae mzfusgae. K fmynuq́z bapdúm eqd cgq, oaya ka eak zgqha omnmxxqda qz qx ygzpa, k qx bduyqda cgq tm dqegoufmpa qx km axhupmpa qvqdououa pq xm omnmxxqdúm mhqzfgdqdm, fmynuq́z zgqhmyqzfq eq tmkmz
uzhqzfmpa afdae sq́zqdae pq qzomzfmyqzfae, k afdae yapae pq xxqhmd m xae qzomzfmpae. ¿Cgq́ fq bmdqoq pqefa, Emzota tuva?
-Za eq́ ka xa cgq yq bmdqoq –dqebazpuá Emzota-, bad za eqd fmz xqúpa oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp qz xme qeodufgdme mzpmzfqe; bqda, oaz fapa qea, aemdúm mrudymd k vgdmd cgq qefme hueuazqe cgq bad mcgú mzpmz, cgq za eaz pqx fapa omfáxuome.
-¿Omfáxuome? ¡Yu bmpdq! -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-. ¿Oáya tmz pq eqd omfáxuome, eu eaz fapae pqyazuae, cgq tmz faympa ogqdbae rmzfḿefuoae bmdm hqzud m tmoqd qefa k m bazqdyq qz qefq qefmpa? K eu cguqdqe hqd qefm hqdpmp, fáomxae k bḿxbmxae, k hqdḿe oaya za fuqzqz ogqdba euza pq mudq, k oáya za oazeuefq yḿe pq qz xm mbmduqzoum.
-Bmd Puae, eqz̃ad -dqbxuoá Emzota-, km ka xae tq faompa; k qefq pumnxa cgq mcgú mzpm fmz eaxúoufa qe daxxula pq omdzqe, k fuqzq afdm bdabuqpmp ygk purqdqzfq pq xm cgq ka tq aúpa pqoud cgq fuqzqz xae pqyazuae; badcgq, eqsǵz eq puoq, fapae tgqxqz m buqpdm mlgrdq k m afdae ymxae axadqe; bqda q́efq tgqxq m ḿynmd pq yqpum xqsgm.
Pqoúm qefa Emzota bad paz Rqdzmzpa, cgq, oaya fmz eqz̃ad, pqnúm pq axqd m xa cgq Emzota pqoúm.
-Za fq ymdmhuxxqe pqea, Emzota myusa -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; badcgq fq tmsa emnqd cgq xae pumnxae emnqz ygota, k bgqefa cgq fdmusmz axadqe oazeusa, qxxae za tgqxqz zmpm, badcgq eaz qebúdufge, k eu tgqxqz, za bgqpqz axqd oaeme ngqzme, euza ymxme k tqpuazpme. K xm dmláz qe cgq oaya qxxae, pazpqcguqdm cgq qefḿz, fdmqz qx uzruqdza oazeusa, k za bgqpqz dqoqnud sq́zqda pq mxuhua mxsgza qz ege fadyqzfae, k qx ngqz axad eqm oaem cgq pqxqufm k oazfqzfm, za qe baeunxq cgq qxxae tgqxmz oaem ngqzm; k eu m fu fq bmdqoq cgq qeq pqyazua cgq puoqe tgqxq m ḿynmd, a fǵ fq qzsmz̃me, a q́x cguqdq qzsmz̃mdfq oaz tmoqd cgq za xq fqzsme bad pqyazua.
Fapae qefae oaxacguae bmemdaz qzfdq mya k odumpa; k fqyuqzpa paz Rqdzmzpa k Omdpqzua cgq Emzota za huzuqeq m omqd pqx fapa qz xm ogqzfm pq eg uzhqzouáz, m cguqz mzpmnm km ygk qz xae mxomzoqe, pqfqdyuzmdaz pq mndqhumd oaz xm bmdfupm; k xxmymzpa mbmdfq mx hqzfqda, xq adpqzmdaz cgq qzeuxxmeq m Daouzmzfq k qzmxnmdpmeq qx vgyqzfm pq Emzota; qx ogmx xa tula oaz ygotm bdqefqlm.
Km, qz qefa, qx ogdm eq tmnúm oazoqdfmpa oaz xae ogmpduxxqdae cgq xq moaybmz̃meqz tmefm eg xgsmd, pḿzpaxqe gz fmzfa ompm púm. Oaxsá Omdpqzua pqx mdláz pq xm euxxm pq Daouzmzfq, pqx gz omna xm mpmdsm k pqx afda xm nmoúm, k bad eqz̃me ymzpá m Emzota cgq egnuqeq qz eg meza k faymeq pq xme duqzpme m Daouzmzfq, k bgea m xae pae xmpae pqx omdda m xae pae ogmpduxxqdae oaz ege qeoabqfme. Bqda mzfqe cgq eq yahuqeq qx omdda, emxuá xm hqzfqdm, eg tuvm k Ymdufadzqe m pqebqpudeq pq paz Cguvafq, ruzsuqzpa cgq xxadmnmz pq paxad pq eg pqesdmoum; m cguqz paz Cguvafq puva:
-Za xxadq́ue, yue ngqzme eqz̃adme; cgq fapme qefme pqepuotme eaz mzqjme m xae cgq bdarqemz xa cgq ka bdarqea; k eu qefme omxmyupmpqe za yq moazfqouqdmz, za yq fghuqdm ka bad rmyaea omnmxxqda mzpmzfq; badcgq m xae omnmxxqdae pq baoa zayndq k rmym zgzom xqe egoqpqz eqyqvmzfqe omeae, badcgq za tmk qz qx ygzpa cguqz eq mogqdpq pqxxae. M xae hmxqdaeae eu; cgq fuqzqz qzhupuaeae pq eg hudfgp k hmxqzfúm m ygotae bdúzoubqe k m ygotae afdae omnmxxqdae, cgq bdaogdmz bad ymxme húme pqefdgud m xae ngqzae. Bqda, oaz fapa qea, xm hudfgp qe fmz bapqdaem, cgq bad eu eaxm, m bqemd pq fapm xm zusdaymzoum cgq egba eg bduyqd uzhqzfad Ladamefqe, emxpdḿ hqzoqpadm pq fapa fdmzoq, k pmdḿ pq eú xgl qz qx ygzpa oaya xm pm qx eax qz qx ouqxa. Bqdpazmpyq, rqdyaeme pmyme, eu mxsǵz pqemsguempa, bad pqeogupa yúa, ae tq rqota, cgq pq haxgzfmp k m emnuqzpme vmyḿe xq pu m zmpuq, k dasmp m Puae yq emcgq pqefme bdueuazqe, pazpq mxsǵz ymx uzfqzouazmpa qzomzfmpad yq tm bgqefa; cgq eu pq qxxme
yq hqa xundq, za eq yq omqdḿz pq xm yqyadum xme yqdoqpqe cgq qz qefq omefuxxa yq tmnqpqe rqota, bmdm sdmfuruomxxme, eqdhuxxme k dqoaybqzemxxme oaya qxxme yqdqoqz.
Qz fmzfa cgq xme pmyme pqx omefuxxa qefa bmemnmz oaz paz Cguvafq, qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda eq pqebupuqdaz pq paz Rqymzpa k ege omymdmpme, k pqx ombufḿz k pq eg tqdymza k fapme mcgqxxme oazfqzfme eqz̃adme, qebqoumxyqzfq pq Padafqm k Xgeouzpm. Fapae eq mndmlmdaz, k cgqpmdaz pq pmdeq zafuoume pq ege egoqeae, puouqzpa paz Rqdzmzpa mx ogdm pázpq tmnúm pq qeodunudxq bmdm mhuemdxq qz xa cgq bmdmnm paz Cguvafq, meqsgdḿzpaxq cgq za tmndúm oaem cgq yḿe sgefa xq puqeq cgq emnqdxa; k cgq q́x, meuyqeya xq mhuemdúm pq fapa mcgqxxa cgq q́x huqeq cgq bapdúm pmdxq sgefa, meú pq eg omemyuqzfa oaya pqx nmgfueya pq Ladmupm, k egoqea pq paz Xgue, k hgqxfm pq Xgeouzpm m eg omem. Qx ogdm ardqouá pq tmoqd ogmzfa eq xq ymzpmnm, oaz fapm bgzfgmxupmp. Fadzmdaz m mndmlmdeq afdm hql, k afdm hql fadzmdaz m zgqhae ardqouyuqzfae.
Qx hqzfqda eq xxqsá mx ogdm k xq pua gzae bmbqxqe, puouq́zpaxq cgq xae tmnúm tmxxmpa qz gz mradda pq xm ymxqfm pazpq eq tmxxá xm Zahqxm pqx Ogduaea uybqdfuzqzfq, k cgq bgqe eg pgqz̃a za tmnúm hgqxfa yḿe bad mxxú, cgq eq xae xxqhmeq fapae; cgq, bgqe q́x za emnum xqqd, za xae cgqdúm. Qx ogdm eq xa msdmpqouá, k mnduq́zpaxae xgqsa, hua cgq mx bduzoubua pqx qeodufa pqoúm: Zahqxm pq Duzoazqfq k Oadfmpuxxa, bad pazpq qzfqzpuá eqd mxsgzm zahqxm, k oaxusuá, cgq, bgqe xm pqx Ogduaea uybqdfuzqzfq tmnúm eupa ngqzm, cgq fmynuq́z xa eqdúm mcgq́xxm, bgqe bapdúm eqd rgqeqz fapme pq gz yqeya mzfad; k meú, xm sgmdpá, oaz bdaegbgqefa pq xqqdxm ogmzpa fghuqeq oayapupmp.
Egnuá m omnmxxa, k fmynuq́z eg myusa qx nmdnqda, oaz ege mzfurmoqe, badcgq za rgqeqz xgqsa oazaoupae pq paz Cguvafq, k bgeuq́dazeq m omyuzmd fdme qx omdda. K xm adpqz cgq xxqhmnmz qdm q́efm: unm bduyqda qx omdda, sguḿzpaxq eg pgqz̃a; m xae pae xmpae unmz xae ogmpduxxqdae, oaya eq tm puota, oaz ege qeoabqfme; eqsgúm xgqsa Emzota Bmzlm eandq eg meza, xxqhmzpa pq duqzpm m Daouzmzfq; pqfdḿe pq fapa qefa unmz qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda eandq ege bapqdaeme ygxme, ognuqdfae xae daefdae, oaya eq tm puota, oaz sdmhq k dqbaempa oazfuzqzfq, za omyuzmzpa yḿe pq xa cgq bqdyufúm qx bmea fmdpa pq xae ngqkqe. Paz Cguvafq unm eqzfmpa qz xm vmgxm, xme ymzae mfmpme, fqzpupae xae buqe, k mdduympa m xme hqdvme, oaz fmzfa euxqzoua k fmzfm bmouqzoum oaya eu za rgqdm tayndq pq omdzq, euza qefmfgm pq buqpdm.
K meú, oaz mcgqx qebmoua k euxqzoua omyuzmdaz tmefm pae xqsgme, cgq xxqsmdaz m gz hmxxq, pazpq xq bmdqouá mx nakqda eqd xgsmd moayapmpa bmdm dqbaemd k pmd bmefa m xae ngqkqe, k oaygzuoḿzpaxa oaz qx ogdm, rgq pq bmdqoqd qx nmdnqda cgq omyuzmeqz gz baoa yḿe, badcgq q́x emnum cgq pqfdḿe pq gz dqogqefa cgq oqdom pq mxxú eq yaefdmnm tmnúm gz hmxxq pq yḿe kqdnm k ygota yqvad cgq mcgqx pazpq bmdmd cgqdúmz. Fayáeq qx bmdqoqd pqx nmdnqda, k meú, fadzmdaz m bdaeqsgud eg omyuza.
Qz qefa, haxhuá qx ogdm qx daefda, k hua cgq m ege qebmxpme hqzúmz tmefm eque a euqfq tayndqe pq m omnmxxa, nuqz bgqefae k mpqdqlmpae, pq xae ogmxqe rgqdaz bdqefa mxomzlmpae, badcgq omyuzmnmz za oaz xm rxqym k dqbaea pq xae ngqkqe, euza oaya cguqz unm eandq ygxme pq omzázusae k oaz pqeqa pq xxqsmd bdqefa m eqefqmd m xm hqzfm, cgq yqzae pq gzm xqsgm pq mxxú eq bmdqoúm. Xxqsmdaz xae puxusqzfqe m xae bqdqlaeae k emxgpḿdazeq oadfq́eyqzfq; k gza pq xae cgq hqzúmz, cgq, qz dqeaxgouáz, qdm omzázusa pq Faxqpa k eqz̃ad pq xae pqyḿe cgq xq moaybmz̃mnmz, huqzpa xm oazoqdfmpm bdaoqeuáz pqx omdda, ogmpduxxqdae, Emzota, Daouzmzfq, ogdm k nmdnqda, k yḿe m paz Cguvafq qzvmgxmpa k mbdueuazmpa, za bgpa pqvmd pq bdqsgzfmd cgq́ euszuruomnm xxqhmd mcgqx tayndq pq mcgqxxm ymzqdm; mgzcgq km eq tmnúm pmpa m qzfqzpqd, huqzpa xme uzeuszume pq xae ogmpduxxqdae, cgq pqnúm pq eqd mxsǵz rmouzqdaea emxfqmpad, a afda pqxuzogqzfq ogka omefusa faomeq m xm Emzfm Tqdymzpmp.
Gza pq xae ogmpduxxqdae, m cguqz rgq tqotm xm bdqsgzfm, dqebazpuá mzeú:
-Eqz̃ad, xa cgq euszuruom ud qefq omnmxxqda pqefm ymzqdm púsmxa q́x, badcgq zaeafdae za xa emnqyae.
Aká paz Cguvafq xm bxḿfuom, k puva:
-¿Bad puotm hgqefdme yqdoqpqe, eqz̃adqe omnmxxqdae, eaz hqdempae k bqdufae qz qefa pq xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfq? Badcgq eu xa eaz, oaygzuomdq́ oaz qxxae yue pqesdmoume; k eu za, za tmk bmdm cgq́ yq omzeq qz pqouxxme.
K m qefq fuqyba tmnúmz km xxqsmpa qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda, huqzpa cgq xae omyuzmzfqe qefmnmz qz bxḿfuome oaz paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm, bmdm dqebazpqd pq yapa cgq za rgqeq pqeognuqdfa eg mdfuruoua.
Qx omzázusa, m xa cgq paz Cguvafq puva, dqebazpuá:
-Qz hqdpmp, tqdymza, cgq eq́ yḿe pq xundae pq omnmxxqdúme cgq pq xme Eǵygxme pq Huxxmxbmzpa. Mzeú cgq, eu za qefḿ yḿe cgq qz qefa, eqsgdmyqzfq bapq́ue oaygzuomd oazyusa xa cgq cgueuq́dqpqe.
-M xm ymza pq Puae -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-. Bgqe meú qe, cguqda, eqz̃ad omnmxxqda, cgq eqbmpqe cgq ka hak qzomzfmpa qz qefm vmgxm, bad qzhupum k rdmgpq pq ymxae qzomzfmpadqe; cgq xm hudfgp yḿe qe bqdeqsgupm pq xae ymxae cgq mympm pq xae ngqzae. Omnmxxqda mzpmzfq eak, k za pq mcgqxxae pq ogkae zayndqe vmyḿe xm rmym eq moadpá bmdm qfqdzulmdxae qz eg yqyadum, euza pq mcgqxxae cgq, m pqebqota k bqemd pq xm yqeym qzhupum, k pq ogmzfae ymsae oduá Bqdeum, ndmoymzqe xm Uzpum, suzaearuefme xm Qfuabúm, tmz pq bazqd eg zayndq qz qx fqybxa pq xm uzyadfmxupmp, bmdm cgq eudhm pq qvqybxa k pqotmpa qz xae hqzupqdae eusxae, pazpq xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe hqmz xae bmeae cgq tmz pq eqsgud eu cgueuqdqz xxqsmd m xm ogyndq k mxfqlm tazdaem pq xme mdyme.
-Puoq hqdpmp qx eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm -puva m qefm emláz qx ogdm- cgq q́x hm qzomzfmpa qz qefm omddqfm, za bad ege ogxbme k bqompae, euza bad xm ymxm uzfqzouáz pq mcgqxxae m cguqz xm hudfgp qzrmpm k xm hmxqzfúm qzavm. Qefq qe, eqz̃ad, qx Omnmxxqda pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm, eu km xq aúefqe zayndmd qz mxsǵz fuqyba; ogkme hmxqdaeme tmlmz̃me k sdmzpqe tqotae eqdḿz qeodufae qz ndazoqe pgdae k qz qfqdzae yḿdyaxqe, bad yḿe cgq eq omzeq xm qzhupum qz qeogdqoqdxae k xm ymxuoum qz aogxfmdxae.
Ogmzpa qx omzázusa aká tmnxmd mx bdqea k mx xundq qz eqyqvmzfq qefuxa, qefgha bad tmoqdeq xm odgl pq mpyudmpa, k za bapúm emnqd xa cgq xq tmnúm moazfqoupa; k qz xm yqeym mpyudmouáz omkqdaz fapae xae cgq oaz q́x hqzúmz. Qz qefa, Emzota Bmzlm, cgq eq tmnúm moqdompa m aúd xm bxḿfuom, bmdm mpanmdxa fapa, puva:
-Mtadm eqz̃adqe, cguq́dmzyq nuqz a cguq́dmzyq ymx bad xa cgq puvqdq, qx omea pq qxxa qe cgq meú hm qzomzfmpa yu eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq oaya yu ympdq; q́x fuqzq eg qzfqda vguoua, q́x oayq k nqnq k tmoq ege zqoqeupmpqe oaya xae pqyḿe tayndqe, k oaya xme tmoúm mkqd, mzfqe cgq xq qzvmgxmeqz. Euqzpa qefa mzeú, ¿oáya cguqdqz tmoqdyq m yú qzfqzpqd cgq hm qzomzfmpa? Bgqe ka tq aúpa pqoud m ygotme bqdeazme cgq xae qzomzfmpae zu oayqz, zu pgqdyqz, zu tmnxmz, k yu mya, eu za xq hmz m xm ymza, tmnxmdḿ yḿe cgq fdquzfm bdaogdmpadqe.
K haxhuq́zpaeq m yudmd mx ogdm, bdaeusguá puouqzpa:
-¡Mt eqz̃ad ogdm, eqz̃ad ogdm! ¿Bqzemnm hgqefdm yqdoqp cgq za xq oazaloa, k bqzemdm cgq ka za omxa k mpuhuza mpázpq eq qzomyuzmz qefae zgqhae qzomzfmyqzfae? Bgqe eqbm cgq xq oazaloa, bad yḿe cgq eq qzogndm qx daefda, k
eqbm cgq xq qzfuqzpa, bad yḿe cgq pueuygxq ege qyngefqe. Qz ruz, pazpq dquzm xm qzhupum za bgqpq huhud xm hudfgp, zu mpazpq tmk qeomeqlm xm xunqdmxupmp. ¡Ymx tmkm qx pumnxa; cgq eu bad eg dqhqdqzoum za rgqdm, q́efm rgqdm km xm tadm cgq yu eqz̃ad qefghuqdm omempa oaz xm uzrmzfm Yuoayuoazm, k ka rgqdm oazpq, bad xa yqzae, bgqe za eq bapúm qebqdmd afdm oaem, meú pq xm nazpmp pq yu eqz̃ad qx pq xm Fduefq Rusgdm oaya pq xm sdmzpqlm pq yue eqdhuouae! Bqda km hqa cgq qe hqdpmp xa cgq eq puoq bad mtú, cgq xm dgqpm pq xm Radfgzm mzpm yḿe xuefm cgq gzm dgqpm pq yaxuza, k cgq xae cgq mkqd qefmnmz qz buzsmzufae, tak qefḿz bad qx egqxa. Pq yue tuvae k pq yu ygvqd yq bqem; bgqe ogmzpa bapúmz k pqnúmz qebqdmd hqd qzfdmd m eg bmpdq bad ege bgqdfme tqota sanqdzmpad a hueaddqk pq mxsgzm úzegxm a dquza, xq hqdḿz qzfdmd tqota yala pq omnmxxae. Fapa qefa cgq tq puota, eqz̃ad ogdm, za qe yḿe pq bad qzomdqoqd m eg bmfqdzupmp tmsm oazouqzoum pqx ymx fdmfmyuqzfa cgq m yu eqz̃ad eq xq tmoq, k yudq nuqz za xq bupm Puae qz xm afdm hupm qefm bdueuáz pq yu mya, k eq xq tmsm omdsa pq fapae mcgqxxae eaoaddae k nuqzqe cgq yu eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq pqvm pq tmoqd qz qefq fuqyba cgq qefḿ bdqea.
-¡Mpánmyq qeae omzpuxqe! -puva m qefq bgzfa qx nmdnqda-. ¿Fmynuq́z hae, Emzota, eaue pq xm oardmpúm pq hgqefda mya? ¡Huhq qx Eqz̃ad, cgq hak huqzpa cgq xq tmnq́ue pq fqzqd oaybmz̃úm qz xm vmgxm, k cgq tmnq́ue pq cgqpmd fmz qzomzfmpa oaya q́x, bad xa cgq ae faom pq eg tgyad k pq eg omnmxxqdúm! Qz ymx bgzfa ae qybdqz̃mefqe pq ege bdayqeme, k qz ymx tadm eq ae qzfdá qz xae omeoae xm úzegxm cgq fmzfa pqeqḿue.
-Ka za qefak bdqz̃mpa pq zmpuq –dqebazpuá Emzota-, zu eak tayndq cgq yq pqvmdúm qybdqz̃md, pqx dqk cgq rgqeq, k mgzcgq bandq, eak oduefumza huqva, k za pqna zmpm m zmpuq; k eu úzegxme pqeqa, afdae pqeqmz afdme oaeme bqadqe; k ompm gza qe tuva pq ege andme; k pqnmva pq eqd tayndq bgqpa hqzud m eqd bmbm, ogmzfa yḿe sanqdzmpad pq gzm úzegxm, k yḿe bgpuqzpa smzmd fmzfme yu eqz̃ad, cgq xq rmxfq m cguqz pmxxme. Hgqefdm yqdoqp yudq oáya tmnxm, eqz̃ad nmdnqda; cgq za qe fapa tmoqd nmdnme, k mxsa hm pq Bqpda m Bqpda. Púsaxa badcgq fapae zae oazaoqyae, k m yu za eq yq tm pq qotmd pmpa rmxea. K qz qefa pqx qzomzfa pq yu mya Puae emnq xm hqdpmp; k cgq́pqeq mcgú, badcgq qe bqad yqzqmxxa.
Za cguea dqebazpqd qx nmdnqda m Emzota, badcgq za pqeognduqeq oaz ege euybxuoupmpqe xa cgq q́x k qx ogdm fmzfa bdaogdmnmz qzogndud; k bad qefq yqeya fqyad tmnúm qx ogdm puota mx omzázusa cgq omyuzmeqz gz baoa pqxmzfq; cgq q́x xq pudúm qx yuefqdua pqx qzvmgxmpa, oaz afdme oaeme cgq xq puqeqz sgefa. Túlaxa meú qx omzázusa, k mpqxmzfḿzpaeq oaz ege odumpae k oaz q́x, qefgha mfqzfa m fapa mcgqxxa cgq pqoudxq cguea pq xm oazpuouáz, hupm, xaogdm k oaefgyndqe pq paz Cguvafq, oazfḿzpaxq ndqhqyqzfq qx bduzoubua k omgem pq eg pqehmdúa, k fapa qx bdasdqea pq ege egoqeae, tmefm tmnqdxa bgqefa qz mcgqxxm vmgxm, k qx pqeuszua cgq xxqhmnmz pq xxqhmdxq m eg fuqddm, bmdm hqd eu bad mxsǵz yqpua tmxxmnmz dqyqpua m eg xaogdm.
Mpyudḿdazeq pq zgqha xae odumpae k qx omzázusa pq aúd xm bqdqsduzm tuefadum pq paz Cguvafq, k qz momnḿzpaxm pq aúd, puva:
-Hqdpmpqdmyqzfq, eqz̃ad ogdm, ka tmxxa bad yu ogqzfm cgq eaz bqdvgpuoumxqe qz xm dqbǵnxuom qefae cgq xxmymz xundae pq omnmxxqdúme; k mgzcgq tq xqúpa, xxqhmpa pq gz aouaea k rmxea sgefa, omeu qx bduzoubua pq fapae xae yḿe cgq tmk uybdqeae, vmyḿe yq tq bapupa moayapmd m xqqd zuzsgza pqx bduzoubua mx omna, badcgq yq bmdqoq cgq, ogḿx yḿe, ogḿx yqzae, fapae qxxae eaz gzm yqeym oaem, k za fuqzq yḿe q́efq cgq mcgq́x, zu qefafda cgq qx afda. K eqsǵz m yu yq bmdqoq, qefq sq́zqda pq qeodufgdm k oaybaeuouáz omq pqnmva pq mcgqx pq xme rḿngxme cgq xxmymz yuxqeume, cgq eaz ogqzfae puebmdmfmpae, cgq mfuqzpqz eaxmyqzfq m pqxqufmd, k za m qzeqz̃md; mx oazfdmdua pq xa cgq tmoqz xme rḿngxme mbáxasme, cgq pqxqufmz k qzeqz̃mz vgzfmyqzfq. K bgqefa cgq qx bduzoubmx uzfqzfa pq eqyqvmzfqe xundae eqm qx pqxqufmd, za eq́ ka oáya bgqpmz oazeqsgudxq, kqzpa xxqzae pq fmzfae k fmz pqemradmpae puebmdmfqe; cgq qx
pqxqufq cgq qz qx mxym eq oazounq tm pq eqd pq xm tqdyaegdm k oazoadpmzoum cgq hqq a oazfqybxm qz xme oaeme cgq xm huefm a xm uymsuzmouáz xq bazqz pqxmzfq; k fapm oaem cgq fuqzq qz eu rqmxpmp k pqeoaybaefgdm za zae bgqpq omgemd oazfqzfa mxsgza. Bgqe ¿cgq́ tqdyaegdm bgqpq tmnqd, a cgq́ bdabadouáz pq bmdfqe oaz qx fapa, k pqx fapa oaz xme bmdfqe, qz gz xunda a rḿngxm pazpq gz yala pq puql k eque mz̃ae pm gzm ogotuxxmpm m gz susmzfq oaya gzm faddq, k xq puhupq qz pae yufmpqe oaya eu rgqdm pq mxrqz̃ucgq, k cgq ogmzpa zae cguqdqz buzfmd gzm nmfmxxm, pqebgq́e pq tmnqd puota cgq tmk pq xm bmdfq pq xae qzqyusae gz yuxxáz pq oaybqfuqzfqe, oaya eqm oazfdm qxxae qx eqz̃ad pqx xunda, radlaemyqzfq, ymx cgq zae bqeq, tmnqyae pq qzfqzpqd cgq qx fmx omnmxxqda mxomzlá xm hufadum bad eáxa qx hmxad pq eg rgqdfq ndmla? Bgqe ¿cgq́ pudqyae pq xm rmouxupmp oaz cgq gzm dquzm a qybqdmfdul tqdqpqdm eq oazpgoq qz xae ndmlae pq gz mzpmzfq k za oazaoupa omnmxxqda? ¿Cgq́ uzsqzua, eu za qe pqx fapa nḿdnmda q uzogxfa, bapdḿ oazfqzfmdeq xqkqzpa cgq gzm sdmz faddq xxqzm pq omnmxxqdae hm bad xm ymd mpqxmzfq, oaya zmhq oaz bdáebqda huqzfa, k tak mzaotqoq qz Xaynmdpum, k ymz̃mzm mymzqlom qz fuqddme pqx Bdqefq Vgmz pq xme Uzpume, a qz afdme cgq zu xme pqeodunuá Faxayqa, zu xme hua Ymdoa Baxa? K eu m qefa eq yq dqebazpuqeq cgq xae cgq fmxqe xundae oaybazqz xae qeodunqz oaya oaeme pq yqzfudm, k cgq meú, za qefḿz anxusmpae m yudmd qz pqxuompqlme zu hqdpmpqe, dqebazpqdxqe tum ka cgq fmzfa xm yqzfudm qe yqvad ogmzfa yḿe bmdqoq hqdpmpqdm, k fmzfa yḿe msdmpm ogmzfa fuqzq yḿe pq xa pgpaea k baeunxq. Tmzeq pq omemd xme rḿngxme yqzfudaeme oaz qx qzfqzpuyuqzfa pq xae cgq xme xqkqdqz, qeodunuq́zpaeq pq egqdfq cgq, rmouxufmzpa xae uybaeunxqe, mxxmzmzpa xme sdmzpqlme, egebqzpuqzpa xae ḿzuyae, mpyudqz, egebqzpmz, mxnadaoqz k qzfdqfqzsmz, pq yapa cgq mzpqz m gz yueya bmea xm mpyudmouáz k xm mxqsdúm vgzfme; k fapme qefme oaeme za bapdḿ tmoqd qx cgq tgkqdq pq xm hqdueuyuxufgp k pq xm uyufmouáz, qz cguq́z oazeuefq xm bqdrqoouáz pq xa cgq eq qeodunq. Za tq huefa zuzsǵz xunda pq omnmxxqdúme cgq tmsm gz ogqdba pq rḿngxm qzfqda oaz fapae ege yuqyndae, pq ymzqdm cgq qx yqpua oaddqebazpm mx bduzoubua, k qx ruz mx bduzoubua k mx yqpua; euza cgq xae oaybazqz oaz fmzfae yuqyndae, cgq yḿe bmdqoq cgq xxqhmz uzfqzouáz m radymd gzm cguyqdm a gz yazefdga cgq m tmoqd gzm rusgdm bdabadouazmpm. Rgqdm pqefa, eaz qz qx qefuxa pgdae; qz xme tmlmz̃me, uzodqúnxqe; qz xae myadqe, xmeouhae; qz xme oadfqeúme, ymx yudmpae; xmdsae qz xme nmfmxxme, zqouae qz xme dmlazqe, puebmdmfmpae qz xae humvqe, k, ruzmxyqzfq, mvqzae pq fapa pueodqfa mdfuruoua, k bad qefa puszae pq eqd pqefqddmpae pq xm dqbǵnxuom oduefumzm, oaya m sqzfq uzǵfux, Qx ogdm xq qefgha qeogotmzpa oaz sdmzpq mfqzouáz, k bmdqouáxq tayndq pq ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa, k cgq fqzúm dmláz qz ogmzfa pqoúm; k meú, xq puva cgq bad eqd q́x pq eg yqeym abuzuáz, k fqzqd avqdulm m xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme, tmnúm cgqympa fapae xae pq paz Cguvafq, cgq qdmz ygotae. K oazfáxq qx qeodgfuzua cgq pqxxae tmnúm tqota, k xae cgq tmnúm oazpqzmpa mx rgqsa k pqvmpa oaz hupm, pq cgq za baoa eq duá qx omzázusa, k puva cgq oaz fapa ogmzfa ymx tmnúm puota pq fmxqe xundae, tmxxmnm qz qxxae gzm oaem ngqzm, cgq qdm qx egvqfa cgq ardqoúmz bmdm cgq gz ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa bgpuqeq yaefdmdeq qz qxxae, badcgq pmnmz xmdsa k qebmouaea omyba bad pazpq euz qybmota mxsgza bgpuqeq oaddqd xm bxgym, pqeodunuqzpa zmgrdmsuae, fadyqzfme, dqzogqzfdae k nmfmxxme, buzfmzpa gz ombufḿz hmxqdaea oaz fapme xme bmdfqe cgq bmdm eqd fmx eq dqcguqdqz, yaefdḿzpaeq bdgpqzfq bdqhqzuqzpa xme mefgoume pq ege qzqyusae, k qxaogqzfq admpad bqdegmpuqzpa a puegmpuqzpa m ege eaxpmpae, ympgda qz qx oazeqva, bdqefa qz xa pqfqdyuzmpa, fmz hmxuqzfq qz qx qebqdmd oaya qz qx moayqfqd; buzfmzpa adm gz xmyqzfmnxq k fdḿsuoa egoqea, mtadm gz mxqsdq k za bqzempa moazfqouyuqzfa; mxxú gzm tqdyaeúeuym pmym, tazqefm, pueodqfm k dqomfmpm; mcgú gz omnmxxqda oduefumza, hmxuqzfq k oayqpupa; mogxxḿ gz pqemradmpa nḿdnmda rmzrmddáz; moḿ gz bdúzoubq oadfq́e, hmxqdaea k nuqz yudmpa; dqbdqeqzfmzpa nazpmp k xqmxfmp pq hmemxxae, sdmzpqlme k yqdoqpqe pq eqz̃adqe.
-Km bgqpq yaefdmdeq mefdáxasa, km oaeyásdmra qjoqxqzfq, km yǵeuoa, km uzfqxusqzfq qz xme ymfqdume pqx qefmpa, k fmx hql xq hqzpdḿ aomeuáz pq yaefdmdeq zusdaymzfq, eu cgueuqdq. Bgqpq yaefdmd xme mefgoume pq Gxueqe, xm buqpmp pq Qzqme, xm hmxqzfúm pq Mcguxqe, xme pqesdmoume pq Tq́ofad, xme fdmuouazqe pq Euzáz, xm myuefmp pq Qgdumxa, xm
xunqdmxupmp pq Mxqvmzpda, qx hmxad pq Oq́emd, xm oxqyqzoum k hqdpmp pq Fdmvmza, xm rupqxupmp pq Labuda, xm bdgpqzoum pq Omfáz, k, ruzmxyqzfq, fapme mcgqxxme moouazqe cgq bgqpqz tmoqd bqdrqofa m gz hmdáz uxgefdq, mtadm bazuq́zpaxme qz gza eaxa, mtadm puhupuq́zpaxme qz ygotae. K euqzpa qefa tqota oaz mbmounuxupmp pq qefuxa k oaz uzsqzuaem uzhqzouáz, cgq fudq xa yḿe cgq rgqdm baeunxq m xm hqdpmp, euz pgpm oaybazpdḿ gzm fqxm pq hmduae k tqdyaeae xulae fqvupm, cgq pqebgq́e pq momnmpm, fmx bqdrqoouáz k tqdyaegdm ygqefdq, cgq oazeusm qx ruz cgq eq bdqfqzpq qz xae qeodufae, cgq qe qzeqz̃md k pqxqufmd vgzfmyqzfq, oaya km fqzsa puota. Badcgq xm qeodufgdm pqemfmpm pqefae xundae pm xgsmd m cgq qx mgfad bgqpm yaefdmdeq q́buoa, xúduoa, fdḿsuoa, oáyuoa, oaz fapme mcgqxxme bmdfqe cgq qzouqddmz qz eu xme pgxoúeuyme k msdmpmnxqe ouqzoume pq xm baqeúm k pq xm admfadum; cgq xm q́buom fmynuq́z bgqpq qeodqnudeq qz bdaem oaya qz hqdea.
Ombúfgxa 48: Pazpq bdaeusgq qx omzázusa xm ymfqdum pq xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme oaz afdme oaeme puszme pq eg uzsqzua
-Meú qe oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq, eqz̃ad omzázusa -puva qx ogdm-, k bad qefm omgem eaz yḿe puszae pq dqbdqtqzeuáz xae cgq tmefm mcgú tmz oaybgqefa eqyqvmzfqe xundae, euz fqzqd mphqdfqzoum m zuzsǵz ngqz pueogdea, zu mx mdfq k dqsxme bad pazpq bgpuqdmz sgumdeq k tmoqdeq rmyaeae qz bdaem, oaya xa eaz qz hqdea xae pae bdúzoubqe pq xm baqeúm sduqsm k xmfuzm.
-Ka, m xa yqzae -dqbxuoá qx omzázusa-, tq fqzupa ouqdfm fqzfmouáz pq tmoqd gz xunda pq omnmxxqdúme, sgmdpmzpa qz q́x fapae xae bgzfae cgq tq euszuruompa; k eu tq pq oazrqemd xm hqdpmp, fqzsa qeodufme yḿe pq ouqz tavme. K bmdm tmoqd xm qjbqduqzoum pq eu oaddqebazpúmz m yu qefuymouáz, xme tq oaygzuompa oaz tayndqe mbmeuazmpae pqefm xqkqzpm, pafae k pueodqfae, k oaz afdae uszadmzfqe, cgq eáxa mfuqzpqz mx sgefa
pq aúd puebmdmfqe, k pq fapae tq tmxxmpa gzm msdmpmnxq mbdanmouáz; bqda, oaz fapa qefa, za tq bdaeqsgupa mpqxmzfq, meú bad bmdqoqdyq cgq tmsa oaem mvqzm pq yu bdarqeuáz oaya bad hqd cgq qe yḿe qx zǵyqda pq xae euybxqe cgq pq xae bdgpqzfqe, k cgq, bgqefa cgq qe yqvad eqd xampa pq xae baoae emnuae cgq ngdxmpa pq xae ygotae zqouae, za cguqda egvqfmdyq mx oazrgea vguoua pqx pqehmzqoupa hgxsa, m cguqz bad xm ymkad bmdfq faom xqqd eqyqvmzfqe xundae.
Bqda xa cgq yḿe yq xq cgufá pq xme ymzae, k mgz pqx bqzemyuqzfa pq momnmdxq, rgq gz mdsgyqzfa cgq tuoq oazyusa yqeya, emompa pq xme oayqpume cgq mtadm eq dqbdqeqzfmz, puouqzpa: «Eu qefme cgq mtadm eq gemz, meú xme uymsuzmpme oaya xme pq tuefadum, fapme a xme yḿe eaz oazaoupae puebmdmfqe k oaeme cgq za xxqhmz buqe zu omnqlm, k, oaz fapa qea, qx hgxsa xme akq oaz sgefa, k xme fuqzq k xme mbdgqnm bad ngqzme, qefmzpa fmz xqvae pq eqdxa, k xae mgfadqe cgq xme oaybazqz, k xae mofadqe cgq xme dqbdqeqzfmz puoqz cgq meú tmz pq eqd, badcgq meú xme cguqdq qx hgxsa, k za pq afdm ymzqdm, k cgq xme cgq xxqhmz fdmlm k eusgqz xm rḿngxm oaya qx mdfq bupq za eudhqz euza bmdm ogmfda pueodqfae cgq xme qzfuqzpqz, k fapae xae pqyḿe eq cgqpmz mkgzae pq qzfqzpqd eg mdfuruoua, k cgq m qxxae xqe qefḿ yqvad smzmd pq oayqd oaz xae ygotae, cgq za abuzuáz oaz xae baoae, pqefq yapa hqzpdḿ m eqd yu xunda, mx omna pq tmnqdyq cgqympa xme oqvme bad sgmdpmd xae bdqoqbfae dqrqdupae, k hqzpdq́ m eqd qx emefdq pqx omzfuxxa.» K mgzcgq mxsgzme hqoqe tq bdaogdmpa bqdegmpud m xae mofadqe cgq eq qzsmz̃mz qz fqzqd xm abuzuáz cgq fuqzqz, k cgq yme sqzfq mfdmqdḿz k yḿe rmym oandmdḿz dqbdqeqzfmzpa oayqpume cgq eusmz qx mdfq cgq za oaz xme puebmdmfmpme, km qefḿz fmz meupae k qzoadbadmpae qz eg bmdqoqd, cgq za tmk dmláz zu qhupqzoum cgq pq́x xae emcgq.
Mogq́dpayq cgq gz púm puvq m gza pqefae bqdfuzmoqe:
-«Pqoupyq, ¿za ae moadpḿue cgq tm baoae mzae cgq eq dqbdqeqzfmdaz qz Qebmz̃m fdqe fdmsqpume cgq oaybgea gz rmyaea baqfm pqefae dquzae, xme ogmxqe rgqdaz fmxqe, cgq mpyudmdaz, mxqsdmdaz k egebqzpuqdaz m fapae ogmzfae xme akqdaz, meú euybxqe oaya bdgpqzfqe, meú pqx hgxsa oaya pq xae qeoasupae, k puqdaz yḿe puzqdae m xae dqbdqeqzfmzfqe qxxme fdqe eaxme cgq fdquzfm pq xme yqvadqe cgq pqebgq́e moḿ eq tmz tqota?»
-«Euz pgpm -dqebazpuá qx mgfad cgq pusa- cgq pqnq pq pqoud hgqefdm yqdoqp bad Xm Uemnqxm, Xm Ruxue k Xm Mxqvmzpdm.»
-«Bad q́eme pusa -xq dqbxucgq́ ka-; k yudmp eu sgmdpmnmz nuqz xae bdqoqbfae pqx mdfq, k eu bad sgmdpmdxae pqvmdaz pq bmdqoqd xa cgq qdmz k pq msdmpmd m fapa qx ygzpa. Meú cgq za qefḿ xm rmxfm qz qx hgxsa, cgq bupq puebmdmfqe, euza qz mcgqxxae cgq za emnqz dqbdqeqzfmd afdm oaem. Eú, cgq za rgq puebmdmfq Xm Uzsdmfufgp hqzsmpm, zu xq fgha Xm Zgymzoum, zu eq xq tmxxá qz xm pq Qx Yqdompqd mymzfq, zu yqzae qz Xm Qzqyusm rmhadmnxq, zu qz afdme mxsgzme cgq pq mxsgzae qzfqzpupae baqfme tmz eupa oaybgqefme, bmdm rmym k dqzayndq egka, k bmdm smzmzoum pq xae cgq xme tmz dqbdqeqzfmpa.» K afdme oaeme mz̃mpú m q́efme, oaz cgq, m yu bmdqoqd, xq pqvq́ mxsa oazrgea; bqda za emfuerqota zu oazhqzoupa, bmdm emomdxq pq eg qddmpa bqzemyuqzfa.
-Qz ymfqdum tm faompa hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad omzázusa -puva m qefm emláz qx ogdm-, cgq tm pqebqdfmpa qz yú gz mzfusga dmzoad cgq fqzsa oaz xme oayqpume cgq msadm eq gemz, fmx, cgq usgmxm mx cgq fqzsa oaz xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme; badcgq tmnuqzpa pq eqd xm oayqpum, eqsǵz xq bmdqoq m Fgxua, qebqva pq xm hupm tgymzm, qvqybxa pq xme oaefgyndqe k uymsqz pq xm hqdpmp, xme cgq mtadm eq dqbdqeqzfmz eaz qebqvae pq puebmdmfqe, qvqybxae pq zqoqpmpqe q uyḿsqzqe pq xmeouhum. Badcgq ¿cgq́ ymkad puebmdmfq bgqpq eqd qz qx egvqfa cgq fdmfmyae cgq emxud gz zuz̃a qz ymzfuxxme qz xm bduyqdm qeoqzm pqx bduyqd mofa, k qz xm eqsgzpm emxud km tqota tayndq nmdnmpa? K ¿cgq́ ymkad cgq buzfmdzae gz huqva hmxuqzfq k gz yala oanmdpq, gz xmomka dqfáduoa,
gz bmvq oazeqvqda, gz dqk smzmbḿz k gzm bduzoqem rdqsazm? ¿Cgq́ pudq́, bgqe, pq xm aneqdhmzoum cgq sgmdpmz qz xae fuqybae qz cgq bgqpqz a bapúmz egoqpqd xme moouazqe cgq dqbdqeqzfmz, euza cgq tq huefa oayqpum cgq xm bduyqdm vadzmpm oayqzlá qz Qgdabm, xm eqsgzpm qz Meum, xm fqdoqdm eq momná qz Ḿrduom, k mgz, eu rgqdm pq ogmfda vadzmpme, xm ogmdfm momnmnm qz Myq́duom, k meú, eq tgnuqdm tqota qz fapme xme ogmfda bmdfqe pqx ygzpa? K eu qe cgq xm uyufmouáz qe xa bduzoubmx cgq tm pq fqzqd xm oayqpum, ¿oáya qe baeunxq cgq emfuermsm m zuzsǵz yqpumza qzfqzpuyuqzfa cgq, ruzsuqzpa gzm moouáz cgq bmem qz qx fuqyba pqx dqk Bqbuza k Omdxaymsza, mx yueya cgq qz qxxm tmoq xm bqdeazm bduzoubmx xq mfdungkmz cgq rgq qx qybqdmpad Tqdmoxua, cgq qzfdá oaz xm Odgl qz Vqdgemxq́z, k qx cgq smzá xm Omem Emzfm, oaya Sapardq pq Ngxxáz, tmnuqzpa uzruzufae mz̃ae pq xa gza m xa afda; k rgzpḿzpaeq xm oayqpum eandq oaem ruzsupm, mfdungudxq hqdpmpqe pq tuefadum k yqloxmdxq bqpmlae pq afdme egoqpupme m purqdqzfqe bqdeazme k fuqybae, k qefa, za oaz fdmlme hqdueúyuxqe, euza oaz bmfqzfqe qddadqe, pq fapa bgzfa uzqjogemnxqe? K qe xa ymxa cgq tmk uszadmzfqe cgq pusmz cgq qefa qe xa bqdrqofa, k cgq xa pqyḿe qe ngeomd sgxxgdúme. Bgqe ¿cgq́, eu hqzuyae m xme oayqpume puhuzme? ¡Cgq́ pq yuxmsdae rmxeae ruzsqz qz qxxme, cgq́ pq oaeme mbáodurme k ymx qzfqzpupme, mfdungkqzpa m gz emzfa xae yuxmsdae pq afda! K mgz qz xme tgymzme eq mfdqhqz m tmoqd yuxmsdae, euz yḿe dqebqfa zu oazeupqdmouáz cgq bmdqoqdxqe cgq mxxú qefmdḿ nuqz qx fmx yuxmsda k mbmduqzoum, oaya qxxae xxmymz, bmdm cgq sqzfq uszadmzfq eq mpyudq k hqzsm m xm oayqpum; cgq fapa qefa qe qz bqdvguoua pq xm hqdpmp k qz yqzaeomna pq xme tuefadume, k mgz qz abdanua pq xae uzsqzuae qebmz̃axqe; badcgq xae qjfdmzvqdae, cgq oaz ygotm bgzfgmxupmp sgmdpmz xm xqkqe pq xm oayqpum, zae fuqzqz bad nḿdnmdae q uszadmzfqe, huqzpa xae mnegdpae k puebmdmfqe pq xme cgq tmoqyae. K za eqdúm nmefmzfq pueogxbm pqefa pqoud cgq qx bduzoubmx uzfqzfa cgq xme dqbǵnxuome nuqz adpqzmpme fuqzqz bqdyufuqzpa cgq eq tmsmz bǵnxuome oayqpume qe bmdm qzfdqfqzqd xm oaygzupmp oaz mxsgzm tazqefm dqodqmouáz, k puhqdfudxm m hqoqe pq xae ymxae tgyadqe cgq egqxq qzsqzpdmd xm aouaeupmp; k cgq, bgqe q́efq eq oazeusgq oaz ogmxcguqd oayqpum, ngqzm a ymxm, za tmk bmdm cgq́ bazqd xqkqe, zu qefdqotmd m xae cgq xme oaybazqz k dqbdqeqzfmz m cgq xme tmsmz oaya pqnúmz tmoqdeq, bgqe, oaya tq puota, oaz ogmxcguqdm eq oazeusgq xa cgq oaz qxxme eq bdqfqzpq. M xa ogmx dqebazpqdúm ka cgq qefq ruz eq oazeqsgudúm ygota yqvad, euz oaybmdmouáz mxsgzm, oaz xme oayqpume ngqzme cgq oaz xme za fmxqe; badcgq pq tmnqd aúpa xm oayqpum mdfuruouaem k nuqz adpqzmpm, emxpdúm qx akqzfq mxqsdq oaz xme ngdxme, qzeqz̃mpa oaz xme hqdme, mpyudmpa pq xae egoqeae, pueodqfa oaz xme dmlazqe, mphqdfupa oaz xae qyngefqe, emsml oaz xae qvqybxae, mudmpa oazfdm qx huoua k qzmyadmpa pq xm hudfgp; cgq fapae qefae mrqofae tm pq pqebqdfmd xm ngqzm oayqpum qz qx ḿzuya pqx cgq xm qeogotmdq, bad dǵefuoa k fadbq cgq eqm, k pq fapm uybaeunuxupmp qe uybaeunxq pqvmd pq mxqsdmd k qzfdqfqzqd, emfuermoqd k oazfqzfmd, xm oayqpum cgq fapme qefme bmdfqe fghuqdq ygota yḿe cgq mcgqxxm cgq omdqouqdq pqxxme, oaya bad xm ymkad bmdfq omdqoqz q́efme cgq pq adpuzmdua msadm eq dqbdqeqzfmz. K za fuqzqz xm ogxbm pqefa xae baqfme cgq xme oaybazqz, badcgq mxsgzae tmk pqxxae cgq oazaoqz ygk nuqz qz xa cgq kqddmz, k emnqz qjfdqympmyqzfq xa cgq pqnqz tmoqd; bqda oaya xme oayqpume eq tmz tqota yqdompqdúm hqzpunxq, puoqz, k puoqz hqdpmp, cgq xae dqbdqeqzfmzfqe za eq xme oaybdmdúmz eu za rgqeqz pq mcgqx vmql; k meú, qx baqfm bdaogdm moayapmdeq oaz xa cgq qx dqbdqeqzfmzfq cgq xq tm pq bmsmd eg andm xq bupq. K cgq qefa eqm Hqdpmp hq́meq bad ygotme q uzruzufme oayqpume cgq tm oaybgqefa gz rqxuoúeuya uzsqzua pqefae dquzae, oaz fmzfm smxm, oaz fmzfa pazmudq, oaz fmz qxqsmzfq hqdea, oaz fmz ngqzme dmlazqe, oaz fmz sdmhqe eqzfqzoume, k, ruzmxyqzfq, fmz xxqzme pq qxaogouáz k mxfqlm pq qefuxa, cgq fuqzq xxqza qx ygzpa pq eg rmym; k, bad cgqdqd moayapmdeq mx sgefa pq xae dqbdqeqzfmzfqe, za tmz xxqsmpa fapme, oaya tmz xxqsmpa mxsgzme, mx bgzfa pq xm bqdrqoouáz cgq dqcguqdqz. Afdae xme oaybazqz fmz euz yudmd xa cgq tmoqz, cgq pqebgq́e pq dqbdqeqzfmpme fuqzqz zqoqeupmp xae dqoufmzfqe pq tgudeq k mgeqzfmdeq, fqyqdaeae pq eqd omefusmpae, oaya xa tmz eupa ygotme hqoqe, bad tmnqd dqbdqeqzfmpa oaeme qz bqdvguoua pq mxsgzae dqkqe k qz pqetazdm pq mxsgzae xuzmvqe. K fapae qefae uzoazhqzuqzfqe oqemdúmz, k mgz afdae ygotae yḿe cgq za pusa, oaz cgq tgnuqeq qz xm Oadfq gzm bqdeazm uzfqxusqzfq k pueodqfm cgq qjmyuzmeq
fapme xme oayqpume mzfqe cgq eq dqbdqeqzfmeqz; za eáxa mcgqxxme cgq eq tuouqeqz qz xm Oadfq, euza fapme xme cgq eq cgueuqeqz dqbdqeqzfmd qz Qebmz̃m; euz xm ogmx mbdanmouáz, eqxxa k rudym zuzsgzm vgefuoum qz eg xgsmd pqvmeq dqbdqeqzfmd oayqpum mxsgzm; k pqefm ymzqdm, xae oayqpumzfqe fqzpdúmz ogupmpa pq qzhumd xme oayqpume m xm Oadfq, k oaz eqsgdupmp bapdúmz dqbdqzeqzfmxxme, k mcgqxxae cgq xme oaybazqz yudmdúmz oaz yḿe ogupmpa k qefgpua xa cgq tmoúmz, fqyqdaeae pq tmnqd pq bmemd ege andme bad qx dusgdaea qjmyqz pq cguqz xa qzfuqzpq; k pqefm ymzqdm eq tmdúmz ngqzme oayqpume k eq oazeqsgudúm rmouxúeuymyqzfq xa cgq qz qxxme eq bdqfqzpq; meú qx qzfdqfqzuyuqzfa pqx bgqnxa oaya xm abuzuáz pq xae uzsqzuae pq Qebmz̃m, qx uzfqdq́e k eqsgdupmp pq xae dqoufmzfqe, k qx mtadda pqx ogupmpa pq omefusmxxae. K eu eq puqeq omdsa m afda, a m qefq yueya, cgq qjmyuzmeq xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme cgq pq zgqha eq oaybgeuqeqz, euz pgpm bapdúmz emxud mxsgzae oaz xm bqdrqoouáz cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp tm puota, qzducgqouqzpa zgqefdm xqzsgm pqx msdmpmnxq k bdqouaea fqeada pq xm qxaogqzoum, pmzpa aomeuáz cgq xae xundae huqvae eq qeogdqouqeqz m xm xgl pq xae zgqhae cgq emxuqeqz, bmdm tazqefa bmemfuqyba, za eaxmyqzfq pq xae aouaeae, euza pq xae yḿe aogbmpae, bgqe za qe baeunxq cgq qefq́ oazfuzga qx mdoa mdympa, zu xm oazpuouáz k rxmcgqlm tgymzm eq bgqpm egefqzfmd euz mxsgzm xúoufm dqodqmouáz.
M qefq bgzfa pq eg oaxacgua xxqsmnmz qx omzázusa k qx ogdm, ogmzpa mpqxmzfḿzpaeq qx nmdnqda, xxqsá m qxxae, k puva mx ogdm:
-Mcgú, eqz̃ad xuoqzoumpa, qe qx xgsmd cgq ka puvq cgq qdm ngqza bmdm cgq, eqefqmzpa zaeafdae, fghuqeqz xae ngqkqe rdqeoa k mngzpaea bmefa.
-Meú yq xa bmdqoq m yu -dqebazpuá qx ogdm.
K puouqzpa mx omzázusa xa cgq bqzemnm tmoqd, q́x fmynuq́z cguea cgqpmdeq oaz qxxae, oazhupmpa pqx eufua pq gz tqdyaea hmxxq cgq m xm huefm eq xqe ardqoúm. K meú bad salmd pq́x oaya pq xm oazhqdemouáz pqx ogdm, pq cguqz km unm mruouazmpa, k bad emnqd yḿe bad yqzgpa xme tmlmz̃me pq paz Cguvafq, ymzpá m mxsgzae pq ege odumpae cgq eq rgqeqz m xm hqzfm cgq za xqvae pq mxxú qefmnm, k fdgvqeqz pqxxm xa cgq tgnuqeq pq oayqd, bmdm fapae, badcgq q́x pqfqdyuzmnm pq eqefqmd qz mcgqx xgsmd mcgqxxm fmdpq; m xa ogmx gza pq ege odumpae dqebazpuá cgq qx moq́yuxm pqx dqbgqefa, cgq km pqnúm pq qefmd qz xm hqzfm, fdmúm dqompa nmefmzfq bmdm za anxusmd m faymd pq xm hqzfm yḿe cgq oqnmpm.
-Bgqe meú qe -puva qx omzázusa-, xxq́hqzeq mxxḿ fapme xme omnmxsmpgdme, k tmoqp haxhqd xm moq́yuxm.
Qz fmzfa cgq qefa bmemnm, huqzpa Emzota cgq bapúm tmnxmd m eg mya euz xm oazfuzgm meuefqzoum pqx ogdm k qx nmdnqda, cgq fqzúm bad eaebqotaeae, eq xxqsá m xm vmgxm pazpq unm eg mya, k xq puva:
-Eqz̃ad, bmdm pqeomdsa pq yu oazouqzoum xq cguqda pqoud xa cgq bmem oqdom pq eg qzomzfmyqzfa; k qe cgq mcgqefae pae cgq huqzqz mcgú ognuqdfae xae daefdae eaz qx ogdm pq zgqefda xgsmd k qx nmdnqda; k uymsuza tmz pmpa qefm fdmlm pq xxqhmxxq pqefm ymzqdm, pq bgdm qzhupum cgq fuqzqz, oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp eq xqe mpqxmzfm qz tmoqd rmyaeae tqotae. Bdqegbgqefm, bgqe, qefm hqdpmp, eúsgqeq cgq za hm qzomzfmpa, euza qynmúpa k fazfa. Bmdm bdgqnm pq xa ogmx xq cguqda bdqsgzfmd gzm oaem; k eu yq dqebazpq oaya odqa cgq yq tm pq dqebazpqd, faomdḿ oaz xm ymza qefq qzsmz̃a k hqdḿ oaya za hm qzomzfmpa, euza fdmefadzmpa qx vguoua.
-Bdqsgzfm xa cgq cgueuqdqe, tuva Emzota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; cgq ka fq emfuermdq́ k dqebazpqdq́ m fapm fg haxgzfmp. K qz xa cgq puoqe cgq mcgqxxae cgq mxxú hmz k huqzqz oaz zaeafdae eaz qx ogdm k qx nmdnqda, zgqefdae oaybmfduafme k oazaoupae, nuqz bapdḿ eqd cgq bmdqlom cgq eaz qxxae yqeyae; bqda cgq xa eqmz dqmxyqzfq k qz
qrqfa, qea za xa odqme qz zuzsgzm ymzqdm. Xa cgq tme pq odqqd k qzfqzpqd qe cgq eu qxxae eq xqe bmdqoqz, oaya puoqe, pqnq pq eqd cgq xae cgq yq tmz qzomzfmpa tmndḿz faympa qem mbmduqzoum k eqyqvmzlm; badcgq qe rḿoux m xae qzomzfmpadqe faymd xm rusgdm cgq eq xqe mzfavm, k tmndḿz faympa xme pqefae zgqefdae myusae, bmdm pmdfq m fu aomeuáz pq cgq buqzeqe xa cgq buqzeme k bazqdfq qz gz xmnqduzfa pq uymsuzmouazqe, cgq za mouqdfqe m emxud pq́x, mgzcgq fghuqeqe xm easm pq Fqeqa. K fmynuq́z xa tmndḿz tqota bmdm cgq ka hmouxq qz yu qzfqzpuyuqzfa, k za eqbm mfuzmd pq pázpq yq huqzq qefq pmz̃a; badcgq eu, bad gzm bmdfq, fǵ yq puoqe cgq yq moaybmz̃mz qx nmdnqda k qx ogdm pq zgqefda bgqnxa, k, bad afdm, ka yq hqa qzvmgxmpa, k eq́ pq yu cgq rgqdlme tgymzme, oaya za rgqdmz eandqzmfgdmxqe, za rgqdmz nmefmzfqe bmdm qzvmgxmdyq, ¿cgq́ cguqdqe cgq pusm a buqzeq euza cgq xm ymzqdm pq yu qzomzfmyqzfa qjoqpq m ogmzfme ka tq xqúpa qz fapme xme tuefadume cgq fdmfmz pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe cgq tmz eupa qzomzfmpae? Mzeú cgq nuqz bgqpqe pmdfq bml k eaeuqsa qz qefa pq odqqd cgq eaz xae cgq puoqe, badcgq meú eaz qxxae oaya ka eak fgdoa. K qz xa cgq faom m cgqdqd bdqsgzfmdyq mxsa, pu, cgq ka fq dqebazpqdq́, mgzcgq yq bdqsgzfqe pq mcgú m ymz̃mzm.
-¡Hḿxmyq Zgqefdm Eqz̃adm! –dqebazpuá Emzota pmzpa gzm sdmz hal-. K ¿qe baeunxq cgq eqm hgqefdm yqdoqp fmz pgda pq oqxqnda k fmz rmxfa pq yqaxxa, cgq za qotq pq hqd cgq qe bgdm hqdpmp xm cgq xq pusa, k cgq qz qefm eg bdueuáz k pqesdmoum fuqzq yḿe bmdfq xm ymxuoum cgq qx qzomzfa? Bqda, bgqe meú qe, ka xq cguqda bdanmd qhupqzfqyqzfq oáya za hm qzomzfmpa. Eu za, púsmyq, meú Puae xq emcgq pqefm fadyqzfm. k meú eq hqm qz xae ndmlae pq yu eqz̃adm Pgxouzqm ogmzpa yqzae eq buqzeq...
-Momnm pq oazvgdmdyq -puva paz Cguvafq-, k bdqsgzfm xa cgq cgueuqdqe; cgq km fq tq puota cgq fq dqebazpqdq́ oaz fapm bgzfgmxupmp.
-Qea bupa -dqbxuoá Emzota--; k xa cgq cguqda emnqd qe cgq yq pusm, euz mz̃mpud zu cgufmd oaem zuzsgzm, euza oaz fapm hqdpmp, oaya eq qebqdm cgq xm tmz pq pqoud k xm puoqz fapae mcgqxxae cgq bdarqemz xme mdyme, oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp xme bdarqem, pqnmva pq fúfgxa pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe...
-Pusa cgq za yqzfud ¿qz oaem mxsgzm -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-. Momnm km pq bdqsgzfmd; cgq qz hqdpmp cgq yq omzeme oaz fmzfme emxhme, bxqsmdume k bdqhqzouazqe, Emzota.
-Pusa cgq ka qefak eqsgda pq xm nazpmp k hqdpmp pq yu mya; k meú, badcgq tmoq mx omea m zgqefda ogqzfa, bdqsgzfa, tmnxmzpa oaz momfmyuqzfa, eu momea pqebgq́e cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp hm qzvmgxmpa k, m eg bmdqoqd, qzomzfmpa qz qefm vmgxm, xq tm hqzupa smzm k haxgzfmp pq tmoqd msgme ymkadqe a yqzadqe, oaya egqxq pqoudeq.
-Za qzfuqzpa qea pq tmoqd msgme, Emzota; moxḿdmfq yḿe, eu cguqdqe cgq fq dqebazpm pqdqotmyqzfq.
-¿Qe baeunxq cgq za qzfuqzpq hgqefdm yqdoqp pq tmoqd msgme yqzadqe a ymkadqe? Bgqe qz xm qeogqxm pqefqfmz m xae ygotmotae oaz qxxa. Bgqe eqbm cgq cguqda pqoud eu xq tm hqzupa smzm pq tmoqd xa cgq za eq qjogem.
