-¡Km, km fq qzfuqzpa, Emzota! K ygotme hqoqe; k mgz msadm xm fqzsa. ¡Eḿomyq pqefq bqxusda, cgq za mzpm fapa xuybua!
Ombúfgxa 49: Pazpq eq fdmfm pqx pueodqfa oaxacgua cgq Emzota Bmzlm fgha oaz eg eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq
-¡Mt! -puva Emzota-. Oasupa xq fqzsa: qefa qe xa cgq ka pqeqmnm emnqd, oaya mx mxym k oaya m xm hupm. Hqzsm moḿ, eqz̃ad; ¿bapdúm zqsmd xa cgq oayǵzyqzfq egqxq pqoudeq bad mtú ogmzpa gzm bqdeazm qefḿ pq ymxm haxgzfmp: «Za eq́ cgq́ fuqzq rgxmza, cgq zu oayq, zu nqnq, zu pgqdyq, zu dqebazpq m bdabáeufa m xa cgq xq bdqsgzfmz, cgq za bmdqoq euza cgq qefḿ qzomzfmpa»? Pq pazpq eq huqzq m emomd, cgq xae cgq za oayqz, zu nqnqz, zu pgqdyqz, zu tmoqz xme andme zmfgdmxqe cgq ka pusa, qefae fmxqe qefḿz qzomzfmpae; bqda za mcgqxxae cgq fuqzqz xm smzm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp fuqzq, k cgq nqnq ogmzpa eq xa pmz, k oayq ogmzpa xa fuqzq, k dqebazpq m fapa mcgqxxa cgq xq bdqsgzfmz.
-Hqdpmp puoqe, Emzota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; bqda km fq tq puota cgq tmk ygotme ymzqdme pq qzomzfmyqzfae, k bapdúm eqd cgq oaz qx fuqyba eq tgnuqeqz ygpmpa pq gzae qz afdae, k cgq msadm eq geq cgq xae qzomzfmpae tmsmz fapa xa cgq ka tmsa, mgzcgq mzfqe za xa tmoúmz. Pq ymzqdm, cgq oazfdm qx gea pq xae fuqybae za tmk cgq mdsg̈ud zu pq cgq́ tmoqd oazeqogqzoume. Ka eq́ k fqzsa bmdm yú cgq hak qzomzfmpa, k qefa yq nmefm bmdm xm eqsgdupmp pq yu oazouqzoum; cgq xm radymdúm ygk sdmzpq eu ka bqzemeq cgq za qefmnm qzomzfmpa k yq pqvmeq qefmd qz qefm vmgxm bqdqlaea k oanmdpq, pqrdmgpmzpa qx eaoadda cgq bapdúm pmd m ygotae yqzqefqdaeae k zqoqeufmpae cgq pq yu mkgpm k mybmda pqnqz fqzqd m xm tadm pq mtadm bdqouem k qjfdqym zqoqeupmp.
-Bgqe, oaz fapa qea -dqbxuoá Emzota-, pusa cgq bmdm ymkad mngzpmzoum k emfuermouáz, eqdúm nuqz cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp bdanmeq m emxud pqefm oḿdoqx, cgq ka yq anxusa oaz fapa yu bapqd m rmouxufmdxa, k mgz m emomdxq pqxxm, k bdanmeq pq zgqha m egnud eandq eg ngqz Daouzmzfq, cgq fmynuq́z bmdqoq cgq hm qzomzfmpa, eqsǵz hm pq yqxmzoáxuoa k fduefq; k, tqota qefa, bdanḿeqyae afdm hql xm egqdfq pq ngeomd yḿe mhqzfgdme; k eu za zae egoqpuqeq nuqz, fuqyba zae cgqpm bmdm haxhqyae m xm vmgxm, qz xm ogmx bdayqfa, m xm xqk pq ngqz k xqmx qeogpqda, pq qzoqddmdyq vgzfmyqzfq oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp, eú momea rgqdq hgqefdm yqdoqp fmz pqepuotmpa, a ka fmz euybxq, cgq za mouqdfq m emxud oaz xa cgq pusa.
-Ka eak oazfqzfa pq tmoqd xa cgq puoqe, Emzota tqdymza -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-; k ogmzpa fǵ hqme oakgzfgdm pq bazqd qz andm yu xunqdfmp, ka fq anqpqoqdq́ qz fapa k bad fapa; bqda fǵ, Emzota, hqdḿe oáya fq qzsmz̃me qz qx oazaouyuqzfa pq yu pqesdmoum.
Qz qefme bxḿfuome eq qzfdqfghuqdaz qx omnmxxqda mzpmzfq k qx ymx mzpmzfq qeogpqda, tmefm cgq xxqsmdaz pazpq, km mbqmpae, xae msgmdpmnmz qx ogdm, qx omzázusa k qx nmdnqda. Pqegzouá xgqsa xae ngqkqe pq xm omddqfm qx nakqda, k pqváxae mzpmd m ege mzotgdme bad mcgqx hqdpq k mbmounxq eufua, ogkm rdqeogdm oazhupmnm m cgqdqdxm salmd, za m xme bqdeazme fmz qzomzfmpme oaya paz Cguvafq, euza m xae fmz mphqdfupae k pueodqfae oaya eg qeogpqda; qx ogmx dasá mx ogdm cgq bqdyufuqeq cgq eg eqz̃ad emxuqeq bad gz dmfa pq xm vmgxm, badcgq eu za xa pqvmnmz emxud, za udúm fmz xuybum mcgqxxm bdueuáz oaya dqcgqdúm xm pqoqzoum pq gz fmx omnmxxqda oaya eg mya. Qzfqzpuáxq qx ogdm, k puva cgq pq ygk ngqzm smzm tmdúm xa cgq xq bqpúm, eu za fqyuqdm cgq qz huq́zpaeq eg eqz̃ad qz xunqdfmp tmnúm pq tmoqd pq xme egkme, k udeq pazpq vmyḿe sqzfqe xq huqeqz.
-Ka xq rúa pq xm rgsm -dqebazpuá Emzota.
-K ka k fapa -puva qx omzázusa-, k yḿe eu q́x yq pm xm bmxmndm oaya omnmxxqda pq za mbmdfmdeq pq zaeafdae tmefm cgq eqm zgqefdm haxgzfmp.
-Eu pak -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq, cgq fapa xa qefmnm qeogotmzpa-; ogmzfa yḿe cgq qx cgq qefḿ qzomzfmpa, oaya ka, za fuqzq xunqdfmp bmdm tmoqd pq eg bqdeazm xa cgq cgueuqdq, badcgq qx cgq xq qzomzfá xq bgqpq tmoqd cgq za eq ygqhm pq gz xgsmd qz fdqe eusxae; k eu tgnuqdq tgupa, xq tmdḿ haxhqd qz haxmzpme. -K cgq, bgqe qefa qdm meú, nuqz bapúmz eaxfmxxq, k yḿe euqzpa fmz qz bdahqota pq fapae; k pqx za eaxfmxxq xqe bdafqefmnm cgq za bapúm pqvmd pq rmfusmxxqe qx axrmfa, eu pq mxxú za eq pqehumnmz.
Fayáxq xm ymza qx omzázusa, mgzcgq xme fqzúm mfmpme, k pqnmva pq eg ngqzm rq k bmxmndm, xq pqeqzvmgxmdaz, pq cgq q́x eq mxqsdá uzruzufa k qz sdmzpq ymzqdm pq hqdeq rgqdm pq xm vmgxm; k xa bduyqda cgq tula rgq qefudmdeq fapa qx ogqdba, k xgqsa eq rgq pazpq qefmnm Daouzmzfq k pḿzpaxq pae bmxympme qz xme mzome, puva:
-Mǵz qebqda qz Puae k qz eg nqzpufm Ympdq, rxad k qebqva pq xae omnmxxae, cgq bdqefa zae tqyae pq hqd xae pae ogmx pqeqmyae; fǵ, oaz fg eqz̃ad m ogqefme; k ka, qzouym pq fu, qvqdoufmzpa qx aruoua bmdm cgq Puae yq qotá mx ygzpa.
K puouqzpa qefa paz Cguvafq, eq mbmdfá oaz Emzota qz dqyafm bmdfq, pq pazpq huza yḿe mxuhumpa, k oaz yḿe pqeqae pq bazqd qz andm xa cgq eg qeogpqda adpqzmeq.
Yudḿnmxa qx omzázusa, k mpyudḿnmeq pq hqd xm qjfdmz̃qlm pq eg sdmzpq xaogdm, k pq cgq qz ogmzfa tmnxmnm k dqebazpúm yaefdmnm fqzqd nazúeuya qzfqzpuyuqzfa; eaxmyqzfq hqzum m bqdpqd xae qefdunae, oaya afdme hqoqe eq tm puota, qz fdmfḿzpaxq pq omnmxxqdúm. K meú, yahupa pq oaybmeuáz, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdeq eqzfmpa fapae qz xm hqdpq kqdnm bmdm qebqdmd qx dqbgqefa pqx omzázusa, xq puva:
-¿Qe baeunxq, eqz̃ad tupmxsa, cgq tmkm bapupa fmzfa oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp xm mymdsm k aouaem xqfgdm pq xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme, cgq xq tmkmz hgqxfa qx vguoua pq yapa cgq hqzsm m odqqd cgq hm qzomzfmpa, oaz afdme oaeme pqefq vmql, fmz xqvae pq eqd hqdpmpqdme oaya xa qefḿ xm yqeym yqzfudm pq xm hqdpmp? K ¿oáya qe baeunxq cgq tmkm qzfqzpuyuqzfa tgymza cgq eq pq́ m qzfqzpqd cgq tm tmnupa qz qx ygzpa mcgqxxm uzruzupmp pq Mympueqe, k mcgqxxm fgdnmygxfm pq fmzfa rmyaea omnmxxqda, fmzfa qybqdmpad pq Fdmbueazpm, fmzfa Rqxujymdfq pq Tudomzum, fmzfa bmxmrdq́z, fmzfm pazoqxxm mzpmzfq, fmzfme euqdbqe, fmzfae qzpdumsae, fmzfae susmzfqe, fmzfme uzmgpufme mhqzfgdme, fmzfa sq́zqda pq qzomzfmyqzfae, fmzfme nmfmxxme, fmzfae pqemradmpae qzogqzfdae, fmzfm nulmddúm pq fdmvqe, fmzfme bduzoqeme qzmyadmpme, fmzfae qeogpqdae oazpqe, fmzfae qzmzae sdmouaeae, fmzfa nuxxqfq, fmzfa dqcguqnda, fmzfme ygvqdqe hmxuqzfqe, k, ruzmxyqzfq, fmzfae k fmz puebmdmfmpae omeae oaya xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme oazfuqzqz? Pq yú eq́ pqoud cgq ogmzpa xae xqa, qz fmzfa cgq za bazsa xm uymsuzmouáz qz bqzemd cgq eaz fapae yqzfudm k xuhumzpmp, yq pmz mxsǵz oazfqzfa; bqda ogmzpa omusa qz xm ogqzfm pq xa cgq eaz, pak oaz qx yqvad pqxxae qz xm bmdqp, k mgz puqdm oaz q́x qz qx rgqsa, eu oqdom a bdqeqzfq xq fghuqdm, nuqz oaya m yqdqoqpadqe pq fmx bqzm, bad eqd rmxeae k qyngefqdae, k rgqdm pqx fdmfa cgq bupq xm oayǵz zmfgdmxqlm, k oaya m uzhqzfadqe pq zgqhme eqofme k pq zgqha yapa pq hupm, k oaya m cguqz pm aomeuáz cgq qx hgxsa uszadmzfq hqzsm m odqqd k m fqzqd bad hqdpmpqdme fmzfme zqoqpmpqe oaya oazfuqzqz. K mgz fuqzqz fmzfa mfdqhuyuqzfa, cgq eq mfdqhqz m fgdnmd xae uzsqzuae pq xae pueodqfae k nuqz zmoupae tupmxsae, oaya eq qotm nuqz pq hqd bad xa cgq oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp tmz tqota, bgqe xq tmz fdmúpa m fq́dyuzae, cgq eqm radlaea qzoqddmdxq qz gzm vmgxm, k fdmqdxq eandq gz omdda pq ngqkqe, oaya cguqz fdmq a xxqhm mxsǵz xqáz a mxsǵz fusdq pq xgsmd qz xgsmd, bmdm smzmd oaz q́x pqvmzpa cgq xq hqmz. ¡Qm, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, pgq́xmeq pq eú yueya, k dqpǵlsmeq mx sdqyua pq xm pueodqouáz, k eqbm gemd pq xm ygotm cgq qx ouqxa rgq eqdhupa pq pmdxq, qybxqmzpa qx rqxuoúeuya fmxqzfa pq eg uzsqzua qz afdm xqfgdm cgq dqpgzpq qz mbdahqotmyuqzfa pq eg oazouqzoum k qz mgyqzfa pq eg tazdm! K eu fapmhúm, xxqhmpa pq eg zmfgdmx uzoxuzmouáz, cgueuqdq xqqd xundae pq tmlmz̃me k pq omnmxxqdúme, xqm qz xm Emodm Qeodufgdm qx pq xae Vgqoqe; cgq mxxú tmxxmdḿ hqdpmpqe sdmzpuaeme k tqotae fmz hqdpmpqdae oaya hmxuqzfqe. Gz Hudumfa fgha Xgeufmzum; gz Oq́emd, Daym; gz Mzúnmx, Omdfmsa; gz Mxqvmzpda, Sdqoum; gz Oazpq Rqdzḿz Sazlḿxql, Omefuxxm; gz Oup, Hmxqzoum; gz Sazlmxa Rqdzḿzpql, Mzpmxgoúm; gz Puqsa Smdoúm pq Bmdqpqe, Qjfdqympgdm; gz Smdou Bq́dql pq Hmdsme, Vqdql; gz Smdouxmea, Faxqpa; gz paz Ymzgqx pq Xqáz, Eqhuxxm, ogkm xqouáz pq ege hmxqdaeae tqotae bgqpq qzfdqfqzqd, qzeqz̃md, pqxqufmd k mpyudmd m xae yḿe mxfae uzsqzuae cgq xae xqkqdqz. Qefm eú eqdḿ xqfgdm puszm pqx ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq yúa, pq xm ogmx emxpdḿ qdgpufa qz xm tuefadum, qzmyadmpa pq xm hudfgp, qzeqz̃mpa qz xm nazpmp, yqvadmpa qz xme oaefgyndqe, hmxuqzfq euz fqyqdupmp, aempa euz oanmdpúm, k fapa qefa, bmdm tazdm pq Puae, bdahqota egka k rmym pq xm Ymzotm, pa, eqsǵz tq emnupa, fdmq hgqefdm yqdoqp eg bduzoubua k adusqz.
Mfqzfúeuymyqzfq qefgha paz Cguvafq qeogotmzpa xme dmlazqe pqx omzázusa; k ogmzpa hua cgq km tmnúm bgqefa ruz m qxxme, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdxq qefmpa gz ngqz qebmoua yudmzpa, xq puva:
-Bmdq́oqyq, eqz̃ad tupmxsa, cgq xm bxḿfuom pq hgqefdm yqdoqp eq tm qzomyuzmpa m cgqdqd pmdyq m qzfqzpqd cgq za tm tmnupa omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe qz qx ygzpa, k cgq fapae xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme eaz rmxeae, yqzfudaeae, pmz̃mpadqe q uzǵfuxqe bmdm xm dqbǵnxuom, k cgq ka tq tqota ymx qz xqqdxae, k bqad qz odqqdxae, k yḿe ymx qz uyufmdxae, tmnuq́zpayq bgqefa m eqsgud xm pgdúeuym bdarqeuáz pq xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfq, cgq qxxae qzeqz̃mz, zqsḿzpayq cgq za tm tmnupa qz qx ygzpa Mympueqe, zu pq Smgxm zu pq Sdqoum, zu fapae xae afdae omnmxxqdae pq cgq xme qeodufgdme qefḿz xxqzme.
-Fapa qe mx buq pq xm xqfdm oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp xa hm dqxmfmzpa -puva m qefm emláz qx omzázusa.
M xa ogmx dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq:
-Mz̃mpuá fmynuq́z hgqefdm yqdoqp, puouqzpa cgq yq tmnúmz tqota ygota pmz̃a fmxqe xundae, bgqe yq tmnúmz hgqxfa qx vguoua k bgq́efayq qz gzm vmgxm, k cgq yq eqdúm yqvad tmoqd xm qzyuqzpm k ygpmd pq xqfgdm, xqkqzpa afdae yḿe hqdpmpqdae k cgq yqvad pqxqufmz k qzeqz̃mz.
-Meú qe -puva qx omzázusa.
-Bgqe ka -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq- tmxxa bad yu ogqzfm cgq qx euz vguoua k qx qzomzfmpa qe hgqefdm yqdoqp, bgqe eq tm bgqefa m pqoud fmzfme nxmerqyume oazfdm gzm oaem fmz dqoqnupm qz qx ygzpa, k fqzupm bad fmz hqdpmpqdm, cgq qx cgq xm zqsmeq, oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp xm zuqsm, yqdqoúm xm yqeym bqzm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq cgq pm m xae xundae ogmzpa xae xqq k xq qzrmpmz. Badcgq cgqdqd pmd m qzfqzpqd m zmpuq cgq Mympúe za rgq qz qx ygzpa, zu fapae xae afdae omnmxxqdae mhqzfgdqdae pq cgq qefḿz oaxympme xme tuefadume, eqdḿ cgqdqd bqdegmpud cgq qx eax za mxgyndm, zu qx kqxa qzrdúm, zu xm fuqddm egefqzfm; badcgq ¿cgq́ uzsqzua bgqpq tmnqd qz qx ygzpa cgq bgqpm bqdegmpud m afda cgq za rgq hqdpmp xa pq xm uzrmzfm Rxadubqe k Sgk pq Nadsaz̃m, k xa pq Ruqdmndḿe oaz xm bgqzfq pq Ymzfunxq, cgq egoqpuá qz qx fuqyba pq Omdxa Ymsza, cgq hafa m fmx cgq qe fmzfm hqdpmp oaya qe mtadm pq púm? K eu qe yqzfudm, fmynuq́z xa pqnq pq eqd cgq za tgna Tq́ofad, zu Mcguxqe, zu xm sgqddm pq Fdakm, zu xae paoq Bmdqe pq Rdmzoum, zu qx dqk Mdfǵe pq Uzsmxmfqddm, cgq mzpm tmefm mtadm oazhqdfupa qz ogqdha, k xq qebqdmz qz eg dquza bad yayqzfae. K fmynuq́z eq mfdqhqdḿz m pqoud cgq qe yqzfudaem xm tuefadum pq Sgmdza Yqlcguza, k xm pq xm pqymzpm pqx Emzfa Sdumx, k cgq eaz mbáodurae xae myadqe pq paz Fduefḿz k xm dquzm Ueqa, oaya xae pq Suzqndm k Xmzlmdafq, tmnuqzpa bqdeazme cgq omeu eq mogqdpmz pq tmnqd huefa m xm pgqz̃m Cguzfmz̃azm, cgq rgq xm yqvad qeomzoumpadm pq huza cgq fgha xm Sdmz Ndqfmz̃m. K qe qefa fmz mzeú, cgq yq mogqdpa ka cgq yq pqoúm gzm yu msg̈qxm pq bmdfqe pq yu bmpdq, ogmzpa hqúm mxsgzm pgqz̃m oaz faome dqhqdqzpme. «Mcgqxxm, zuqfa, eq bmdqoq m xm pgqz̃m Cguzfmz̃azm.» Pq pazpq mdsgka ka cgq xm pqnuá pq oazaoqd qxxm, a, bad xa yqzae, pqnuá pq mxomzlmd m hqd mxsǵz dqfdmfa egka. Bgqe ¿cguq́z bapdḿ zqsmd za eqd hqdpmpqdm xm tuefadum pq Buqddqe k xm xuzpm Ymsmxazm, bgqe mgz tmefm tak púm eq hqq qz xm mdyqdúm pq xae Dqkqe xm oxmhuvm oaz cgq haxhúm mx omnmxxa pq ympqdm eandq cguqz unm qx hmxuqzfq Buqddqe bad xae mudqe, cgq qe gz baoa ymkad cgq gz fuyáz pq omddqfm? K vgzfa m xm oxmhuvm qefḿ xm euxxm pq Nmnuqom, k qz Dazoqehmxxqe qefḿ qx ogqdza pq Daxpḿz, fmymz̃a oaya gzm sdmzpq husm; pq pazpq eq uzruqdq cgq tgna paoq Bmdqe, cgq tgna Buqddqe, cgq tgna Oupqe, k afdae omnmxxqdae eqyqvmzfqe,
pq́efae cgq puoqz xme sqzfqe
cgq m ege mhqzfgdme hmz.
Eu za, púsmzyq fmynuq́z cgq za qe hqdpmp cgq rgq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq qx hmxuqzfq xgeufmza Vgmz pq Yqdxa, cgq rgq m Nadsaz̃m k eq oaynmfuá qz xm ougpmp pq Dme oaz qx rmyaea eqz̃ad pq Otmdzu, xxmympa yaeq́z Buqddqe, k pqebgq́e, qz xm ougpmp pq Nmeuxqm, oaz yaeq́z Qzducgq pq Dqyqefḿz, emxuqzpa pq qzfdmynme qybdqeme hqzoqpad k xxqza pq tazdaem rmym; k xme mhqzfgdme k pqemrúae cgq fmynuq́z momnmdaz qz Nadsaz̃m xae hmxuqzfqe qebmz̃axqe Bqpda Nmdnm k Sgfuqddq Cguvmpm (pq ogkm mxogdzum ka pqouqzpa bad xúzqm dqofm pq hmdáz), hqzouqzpa m xae tuvae pqx oazpq pq Emz Baxa. Zuq́sgqzyq meuyqeya cgq za rgq m ngeomd xme mhqzfgdme m Mxqymzum paz Rqdzmzpa pq Sgqhmdm, pazpq eq oaynmfuá oaz Yuoqd Vadsq, omnmxxqda pq xm omem pqx pgcgq pq Mgefdum; pusmz cgq rgqdaz ngdxm xme vgefme pq Egqda pq Cguz̃azqe, pqx Bmea; xme qybdqeme pq yaeq́z Xgue pq Rmxoqe oazfdm paz Sazlmxa pq Sglyḿz, omnmxxqda omefqxxmza, oaz afdme ygotme tmlmz̃me tqotme bad omnmxxqdae oduefumzae, pq́efae k pq xae dquzae qjfdmzvqdae, fmz mgfq́zfuome k hqdpmpqdme, cgq fadza m pqoud cgq qx cgq xme zqsmeq omdqoqdúm pq fapm dmláz k ngqz pueogdea.
Mpyudmpa cgqpá qx omzázusa pq aúd xm yqloxm cgq paz Cguvafq tmoúm pq hqdpmpqe k yqzfudme, k pq hqd xm zafuoum cgq fqzúm pq fapme mcgqxxme oaeme faomzfqe k oazoqdzuqzfqe m xae tqotae pq eg mzpmzfq omnmxxqdúm, k meú xq dqebazpuá:
-Za bgqpa ka zqsmd, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, cgq za eqm hqdpmp mxsa pq xa cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp tm puota, qebqoumxyqzfq qz xa cgq faom m xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe qebmz̃axqe; k meuyqeya cguqda oazoqpqd cgq tgna paoq Bmdqe pq Rdmzoum; bqda za cguqda odqqd cgq tuouqdaz fapme mcgqxxme oaeme cgq qx mdlanueba Fgdbúz pqxxae qeodunq; badcgq xm hqdpmp pqxxa qe cgq rgqdaz omnmxxqdae qeoasupae bad xae dqkqe pq Rdmzoum, m cguqz xxmymdaz bmdqe bad eqd fapae usgmxqe qz hmxad, qz omxupmp k qz hmxqzfúm; m xa yqzae, eu za xa qdmz, qdm dmláz cgq xa rgqeqz, k qdm oaya gzm dqxusuáz pq xme cgq mtadm eq gemz pq Emzfumsa a pq Omxmfdmhm, cgq eq bdqegbazq cgq xae cgq xm bdarqemz tmz pq eqd, a pqnqz eqd, omnmxxqdae hmxqdaeae, hmxuqzfqe k nuqz zmoupae; k oaya mtadm puoqz omnmxxqda pq Emz Vgmz, a pq Mxoḿzfmdm, pqoúmz qz mcgqx fuqyba omnmxxqda pq xae paoq Bmdqe, badcgq rgqdaz paoq usgmxqe xae cgq bmdm qefm dqxusuáz yuxufmd eq qeoasuqdaz. Qz xa pq cgq tgna Oup za tmk pgpm, zu yqzae Nqdzmdpa pqx Omdbua; bqda pq cgq tuouqdaz xme tmlmz̃me cgq puoqz, odqa cgq xm tmk ygk sdmzpq. Qz xa afda pq xm oxmhuvm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq pqx Oazpq Buqddqe, k cgq qefḿ vgzfa m xm euxxm pq Nmnuqom qz xm mdyqdúm pq xae Dqkqe, oazruqea yu bqompa; cgq eak fmz uszadmzfq, a fmz oadfa pq huefm, cgq, mgzcgq tq huefa xm euxxm, za tq qotmpa pq hqd xm oxmhuvm, k yḿe euqzpa fmz sdmzpq oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp tm puota.
-Bgqe mxxú qefḿ, euz pgpm mxsgzm –dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-; k, bad yḿe eqz̃me, puoqz cgq qefḿ yqfupm qz gzm rgzpm pq hmcgqfm, badcgq za eq fayq pq yata.
-Fapa bgqpq eqd -dqebazpuá qx omzázusa-; bqda bad xme ádpqzqe cgq dqoqnú cgq za yq mogqdpa tmnqdxm huefa. Yme bgqefa cgq oazoqpm cgq qefḿ mxxú, za bad qea yq anxusa m odqqd xme tuefadume pq fmzfae Mympueqe, zu xme pq fmzfm fgdnmygxfm pq omnmxxqdae oaya bad mtú zae ogqzfmz, zu qe dmláz cgq gz tayndq oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp, fmz tazdmpa k pq fmz ngqzme bmdfqe, k pafmpa pq fmz ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa, eq pq́ m qzfqzpqd cgq eaz hqdpmpqdme fmzfme k fmz qjfdmz̃me xaogdme oaya xme cgq qefḿz qeodufme qz xae puebmdmfmpae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme.
Ombúfgxa 49: Pazpq eq fdmfm pqx pueodqfa oaxacgua cgq Emzota Bmzlm fgha oaz eg eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq
-¡Mt! -puva Emzota-. Oasupa xq fqzsa: qefa qe xa cgq ka pqeqmnm emnqd, oaya mx mxym k oaya m xm hupm. Hqzsm moḿ, eqz̃ad; ¿bapdúm zqsmd xa cgq oayǵzyqzfq egqxq pqoudeq bad mtú ogmzpa gzm bqdeazm qefḿ pq ymxm haxgzfmp: «Za eq́ cgq́ fuqzq rgxmza, cgq zu oayq, zu nqnq, zu pgqdyq, zu dqebazpq m bdabáeufa m xa cgq xq bdqsgzfmz, cgq za bmdqoq euza cgq qefḿ qzomzfmpa»? Pq pazpq eq huqzq m emomd, cgq xae cgq za oayqz, zu nqnqz, zu pgqdyqz, zu tmoqz xme andme zmfgdmxqe cgq ka pusa, qefae fmxqe qefḿz qzomzfmpae; bqda za mcgqxxae cgq fuqzqz xm smzm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp fuqzq, k cgq nqnq ogmzpa eq xa pmz, k oayq ogmzpa xa fuqzq, k dqebazpq m fapa mcgqxxa cgq xq bdqsgzfmz.
-Hqdpmp puoqe, Emzota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-; bqda km fq tq puota cgq tmk ygotme ymzqdme pq qzomzfmyqzfae, k bapdúm eqd cgq oaz qx fuqyba eq tgnuqeqz ygpmpa pq gzae qz afdae, k cgq msadm eq geq cgq xae qzomzfmpae tmsmz fapa xa cgq ka tmsa, mgzcgq mzfqe za xa tmoúmz. Pq ymzqdm, cgq oazfdm qx gea pq xae fuqybae za tmk cgq mdsg̈ud zu pq cgq́ tmoqd oazeqogqzoume. Ka eq́ k fqzsa bmdm yú cgq hak qzomzfmpa, k qefa yq nmefm bmdm xm eqsgdupmp pq yu oazouqzoum; cgq xm radymdúm ygk sdmzpq eu ka bqzemeq cgq za qefmnm qzomzfmpa k yq pqvmeq qefmd qz qefm vmgxm bqdqlaea k oanmdpq, pqrdmgpmzpa qx eaoadda cgq bapdúm pmd m ygotae yqzqefqdaeae k zqoqeufmpae cgq pq yu mkgpm k mybmda pqnqz fqzqd m xm tadm pq mtadm bdqouem k qjfdqym zqoqeupmp.
-Bgqe, oaz fapa qea -dqbxuoá Emzota-, pusa cgq bmdm ymkad mngzpmzoum k emfuermouáz, eqdúm nuqz cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp bdanmeq m emxud pqefm oḿdoqx, cgq ka yq anxusa oaz fapa yu bapqd m rmouxufmdxa, k mgz m emomdxq pqxxm, k bdanmeq pq zgqha m egnud eandq eg ngqz Daouzmzfq, cgq fmynuq́z bmdqoq cgq hm qzomzfmpa, eqsǵz hm pq yqxmzoáxuoa k fduefq; k, tqota qefa, bdanḿeqyae afdm hql xm egqdfq pq ngeomd yḿe mhqzfgdme; k eu za zae egoqpuqeq nuqz, fuqyba zae cgqpm bmdm haxhqyae m xm vmgxm, qz xm ogmx bdayqfa, m xm xqk pq ngqz k xqmx qeogpqda, pq qzoqddmdyq vgzfmyqzfq oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp, eú momea rgqdq hgqefdm yqdoqp fmz pqepuotmpa, a ka fmz euybxq, cgq za mouqdfq m emxud oaz xa cgq pusa.
-Ka eak oazfqzfa pq tmoqd xa cgq puoqe, Emzota tqdymza -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-; k ogmzpa fǵ hqme oakgzfgdm pq bazqd qz andm yu xunqdfmp, ka fq anqpqoqdq́ qz fapa k bad fapa; bqda fǵ, Emzota, hqdḿe oáya fq qzsmz̃me qz qx oazaouyuqzfa pq yu pqesdmoum.
Qz qefme bxḿfuome eq qzfdqfghuqdaz qx omnmxxqda mzpmzfq k qx ymx mzpmzfq qeogpqda, tmefm cgq xxqsmdaz pazpq, km mbqmpae, xae msgmdpmnmz qx ogdm, qx omzázusa k qx nmdnqda. Pqegzouá xgqsa xae ngqkqe pq xm omddqfm qx nakqda, k pqváxae mzpmd m ege mzotgdme bad mcgqx hqdpq k mbmounxq eufua, ogkm rdqeogdm oazhupmnm m cgqdqdxm salmd, za m xme bqdeazme fmz qzomzfmpme oaya paz Cguvafq, euza m xae fmz mphqdfupae k pueodqfae oaya eg qeogpqda; qx ogmx dasá mx ogdm cgq bqdyufuqeq cgq eg eqz̃ad emxuqeq bad gz dmfa pq xm vmgxm, badcgq eu za xa pqvmnmz emxud, za udúm fmz xuybum mcgqxxm bdueuáz oaya dqcgqdúm xm pqoqzoum pq gz fmx omnmxxqda oaya eg mya. Qzfqzpuáxq qx ogdm, k puva cgq pq ygk ngqzm smzm tmdúm xa cgq xq bqpúm, eu za fqyuqdm cgq qz huq́zpaeq eg eqz̃ad qz xunqdfmp tmnúm pq tmoqd pq xme egkme, k udeq pazpq vmyḿe sqzfqe xq huqeqz.
-Ka xq rúa pq xm rgsm -dqebazpuá Emzota.
-K ka k fapa -puva qx omzázusa-, k yḿe eu q́x yq pm xm bmxmndm oaya omnmxxqda pq za mbmdfmdeq pq zaeafdae tmefm cgq eqm zgqefdm haxgzfmp.
-Eu pak -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq, cgq fapa xa qefmnm qeogotmzpa-; ogmzfa yḿe cgq qx cgq qefḿ qzomzfmpa, oaya ka, za fuqzq xunqdfmp bmdm tmoqd pq eg bqdeazm xa cgq cgueuqdq, badcgq qx cgq xq qzomzfá xq bgqpq tmoqd cgq za eq ygqhm pq gz xgsmd qz fdqe eusxae; k eu tgnuqdq tgupa, xq tmdḿ haxhqd qz haxmzpme. -K cgq, bgqe qefa qdm meú, nuqz bapúmz eaxfmxxq, k yḿe euqzpa fmz qz bdahqota pq fapae; k pqx za eaxfmxxq xqe bdafqefmnm cgq za bapúm pqvmd pq rmfusmxxqe qx axrmfa, eu pq mxxú za eq pqehumnmz.
Fayáxq xm ymza qx omzázusa, mgzcgq xme fqzúm mfmpme, k pqnmva pq eg ngqzm rq k bmxmndm, xq pqeqzvmgxmdaz, pq cgq q́x eq mxqsdá uzruzufa k qz sdmzpq ymzqdm pq hqdeq rgqdm pq xm vmgxm; k xa bduyqda cgq tula rgq qefudmdeq fapa qx ogqdba, k xgqsa eq rgq pazpq qefmnm Daouzmzfq k pḿzpaxq pae bmxympme qz xme mzome, puva:
-Mǵz qebqda qz Puae k qz eg nqzpufm Ympdq, rxad k qebqva pq xae omnmxxae, cgq bdqefa zae tqyae pq hqd xae pae ogmx pqeqmyae; fǵ, oaz fg eqz̃ad m ogqefme; k ka, qzouym pq fu, qvqdoufmzpa qx aruoua bmdm cgq Puae yq qotá mx ygzpa.
K puouqzpa qefa paz Cguvafq, eq mbmdfá oaz Emzota qz dqyafm bmdfq, pq pazpq huza yḿe mxuhumpa, k oaz yḿe pqeqae pq bazqd qz andm xa cgq eg qeogpqda adpqzmeq.
Yudḿnmxa qx omzázusa, k mpyudḿnmeq pq hqd xm qjfdmz̃qlm pq eg sdmzpq xaogdm, k pq cgq qz ogmzfa tmnxmnm k dqebazpúm yaefdmnm fqzqd nazúeuya qzfqzpuyuqzfa; eaxmyqzfq hqzum m bqdpqd xae qefdunae, oaya afdme hqoqe eq tm puota, qz fdmfḿzpaxq pq omnmxxqdúm. K meú, yahupa pq oaybmeuáz, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdeq eqzfmpa fapae qz xm hqdpq kqdnm bmdm qebqdmd qx dqbgqefa pqx omzázusa, xq puva:
-¿Qe baeunxq, eqz̃ad tupmxsa, cgq tmkm bapupa fmzfa oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp xm mymdsm k aouaem xqfgdm pq xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme, cgq xq tmkmz hgqxfa qx vguoua pq yapa cgq hqzsm m odqqd cgq hm qzomzfmpa, oaz afdme oaeme pqefq vmql, fmz xqvae pq eqd hqdpmpqdme oaya xa qefḿ xm yqeym yqzfudm pq xm hqdpmp? K ¿oáya qe baeunxq cgq tmkm qzfqzpuyuqzfa tgymza cgq eq pq́ m qzfqzpqd cgq tm tmnupa qz qx ygzpa mcgqxxm uzruzupmp pq Mympueqe, k mcgqxxm fgdnmygxfm pq fmzfa rmyaea omnmxxqda, fmzfa qybqdmpad pq Fdmbueazpm, fmzfa Rqxujymdfq pq Tudomzum, fmzfa bmxmrdq́z, fmzfm pazoqxxm mzpmzfq, fmzfme euqdbqe, fmzfae qzpdumsae, fmzfae susmzfqe, fmzfme uzmgpufme mhqzfgdme, fmzfa sq́zqda pq qzomzfmyqzfae, fmzfme nmfmxxme, fmzfae pqemradmpae qzogqzfdae, fmzfm nulmddúm pq fdmvqe, fmzfme bduzoqeme qzmyadmpme, fmzfae qeogpqdae oazpqe, fmzfae qzmzae sdmouaeae, fmzfa nuxxqfq, fmzfa dqcguqnda, fmzfme ygvqdqe hmxuqzfqe, k, ruzmxyqzfq, fmzfae k fmz puebmdmfmpae omeae oaya xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme oazfuqzqz? Pq yú eq́ pqoud cgq ogmzpa xae xqa, qz fmzfa cgq za bazsa xm uymsuzmouáz qz bqzemd cgq eaz fapae yqzfudm k xuhumzpmp, yq pmz mxsǵz oazfqzfa; bqda ogmzpa omusa qz xm ogqzfm pq xa cgq eaz, pak oaz qx yqvad pqxxae qz xm bmdqp, k mgz puqdm oaz q́x qz qx rgqsa, eu oqdom a bdqeqzfq xq fghuqdm, nuqz oaya m yqdqoqpadqe pq fmx bqzm, bad eqd rmxeae k qyngefqdae, k rgqdm pqx fdmfa cgq bupq xm oayǵz zmfgdmxqlm, k oaya m uzhqzfadqe pq zgqhme eqofme k pq zgqha yapa pq hupm, k oaya m cguqz pm aomeuáz cgq qx hgxsa uszadmzfq hqzsm m odqqd k m fqzqd bad hqdpmpqdme fmzfme zqoqpmpqe oaya oazfuqzqz. K mgz fuqzqz fmzfa mfdqhuyuqzfa, cgq eq mfdqhqz m fgdnmd xae uzsqzuae pq xae pueodqfae k nuqz zmoupae tupmxsae, oaya eq qotm nuqz pq hqd bad xa cgq oaz hgqefdm yqdoqp tmz tqota, bgqe xq tmz fdmúpa m fq́dyuzae, cgq eqm radlaea qzoqddmdxq qz gzm vmgxm, k fdmqdxq eandq gz omdda pq ngqkqe, oaya cguqz fdmq a xxqhm mxsǵz xqáz a mxsǵz fusdq pq xgsmd qz xgsmd, bmdm smzmd oaz q́x pqvmzpa cgq xq hqmz. ¡Qm, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, pgq́xmeq pq eú yueya, k dqpǵlsmeq mx sdqyua pq xm pueodqouáz, k eqbm gemd pq xm ygotm cgq qx ouqxa rgq eqdhupa pq pmdxq, qybxqmzpa qx rqxuoúeuya fmxqzfa pq eg uzsqzua qz afdm xqfgdm cgq dqpgzpq qz mbdahqotmyuqzfa pq eg oazouqzoum k qz mgyqzfa pq eg tazdm! K eu fapmhúm, xxqhmpa pq eg zmfgdmx uzoxuzmouáz, cgueuqdq xqqd xundae pq tmlmz̃me k pq omnmxxqdúme, xqm qz xm Emodm Qeodufgdm qx pq xae Vgqoqe; cgq mxxú tmxxmdḿ hqdpmpqe sdmzpuaeme k tqotae fmz hqdpmpqdae oaya hmxuqzfqe. Gz Hudumfa fgha Xgeufmzum; gz Oq́emd, Daym; gz Mzúnmx, Omdfmsa; gz Mxqvmzpda, Sdqoum; gz Oazpq Rqdzḿz Sazlḿxql, Omefuxxm; gz Oup, Hmxqzoum; gz Sazlmxa Rqdzḿzpql, Mzpmxgoúm; gz Puqsa Smdoúm pq Bmdqpqe, Qjfdqympgdm; gz Smdou Bq́dql pq Hmdsme, Vqdql; gz Smdouxmea, Faxqpa; gz paz Ymzgqx pq Xqáz, Eqhuxxm, ogkm xqouáz pq ege hmxqdaeae tqotae bgqpq qzfdqfqzqd, qzeqz̃md, pqxqufmd k mpyudmd m xae yḿe mxfae uzsqzuae cgq xae xqkqdqz. Qefm eú eqdḿ xqfgdm puszm pqx ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa pq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq yúa, pq xm ogmx emxpdḿ qdgpufa qz xm tuefadum, qzmyadmpa pq xm hudfgp, qzeqz̃mpa qz xm nazpmp, yqvadmpa qz xme oaefgyndqe, hmxuqzfq euz fqyqdupmp, aempa euz oanmdpúm, k fapa qefa, bmdm tazdm pq Puae, bdahqota egka k rmym pq xm Ymzotm, pa, eqsǵz tq emnupa, fdmq hgqefdm yqdoqp eg bduzoubua k adusqz.
Mfqzfúeuymyqzfq qefgha paz Cguvafq qeogotmzpa xme dmlazqe pqx omzázusa; k ogmzpa hua cgq km tmnúm bgqefa ruz m qxxme, pqebgq́e pq tmnqdxq qefmpa gz ngqz qebmoua yudmzpa, xq puva:
-Bmdq́oqyq, eqz̃ad tupmxsa, cgq xm bxḿfuom pq hgqefdm yqdoqp eq tm qzomyuzmpa m cgqdqd pmdyq m qzfqzpqd cgq za tm tmnupa omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe qz qx ygzpa, k cgq fapae xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme eaz rmxeae, yqzfudaeae, pmz̃mpadqe q uzǵfuxqe bmdm xm dqbǵnxuom, k cgq ka tq tqota ymx qz xqqdxae, k bqad qz odqqdxae, k yḿe ymx qz uyufmdxae, tmnuq́zpayq bgqefa m eqsgud xm pgdúeuym bdarqeuáz pq xm omnmxxqdúm mzpmzfq, cgq qxxae qzeqz̃mz, zqsḿzpayq cgq za tm tmnupa qz qx ygzpa Mympueqe, zu pq Smgxm zu pq Sdqoum, zu fapae xae afdae omnmxxqdae pq cgq xme qeodufgdme qefḿz xxqzme.
-Fapa qe mx buq pq xm xqfdm oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp xa hm dqxmfmzpa -puva m qefm emláz qx omzázusa.
M xa ogmx dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq:
-Mz̃mpuá fmynuq́z hgqefdm yqdoqp, puouqzpa cgq yq tmnúmz tqota ygota pmz̃a fmxqe xundae, bgqe yq tmnúmz hgqxfa qx vguoua k bgq́efayq qz gzm vmgxm, k cgq yq eqdúm yqvad tmoqd xm qzyuqzpm k ygpmd pq xqfgdm, xqkqzpa afdae yḿe hqdpmpqdae k cgq yqvad pqxqufmz k qzeqz̃mz.
-Meú qe -puva qx omzázusa.
-Bgqe ka -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq- tmxxa bad yu ogqzfm cgq qx euz vguoua k qx qzomzfmpa qe hgqefdm yqdoqp, bgqe eq tm bgqefa m pqoud fmzfme nxmerqyume oazfdm gzm oaem fmz dqoqnupm qz qx ygzpa, k fqzupm bad fmz hqdpmpqdm, cgq qx cgq xm zqsmeq, oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp xm zuqsm, yqdqoúm xm yqeym bqzm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq cgq pm m xae xundae ogmzpa xae xqq k xq qzrmpmz. Badcgq cgqdqd pmd m qzfqzpqd m zmpuq cgq Mympúe za rgq qz qx ygzpa, zu fapae xae afdae omnmxxqdae mhqzfgdqdae pq cgq qefḿz oaxympme xme tuefadume, eqdḿ cgqdqd bqdegmpud cgq qx eax za mxgyndm, zu qx kqxa qzrdúm, zu xm fuqddm egefqzfm; badcgq ¿cgq́ uzsqzua bgqpq tmnqd qz qx ygzpa cgq bgqpm bqdegmpud m afda cgq za rgq hqdpmp xa pq xm uzrmzfm Rxadubqe k Sgk pq Nadsaz̃m, k xa pq Ruqdmndḿe oaz xm bgqzfq pq Ymzfunxq, cgq egoqpuá qz qx fuqyba pq Omdxa Ymsza, cgq hafa m fmx cgq qe fmzfm hqdpmp oaya qe mtadm pq púm? K eu qe yqzfudm, fmynuq́z xa pqnq pq eqd cgq za tgna Tq́ofad, zu Mcguxqe, zu xm sgqddm pq Fdakm, zu xae paoq Bmdqe pq Rdmzoum, zu qx dqk Mdfǵe pq Uzsmxmfqddm, cgq mzpm tmefm mtadm oazhqdfupa qz ogqdha, k xq qebqdmz qz eg dquza bad yayqzfae. K fmynuq́z eq mfdqhqdḿz m pqoud cgq qe yqzfudaem xm tuefadum pq Sgmdza Yqlcguza, k xm pq xm pqymzpm pqx Emzfa Sdumx, k cgq eaz mbáodurae xae myadqe pq paz Fduefḿz k xm dquzm Ueqa, oaya xae pq Suzqndm k Xmzlmdafq, tmnuqzpa bqdeazme cgq omeu eq mogqdpmz pq tmnqd huefa m xm pgqz̃m Cguzfmz̃azm, cgq rgq xm yqvad qeomzoumpadm pq huza cgq fgha xm Sdmz Ndqfmz̃m. K qe qefa fmz mzeú, cgq yq mogqdpa ka cgq yq pqoúm gzm yu msg̈qxm pq bmdfqe pq yu bmpdq, ogmzpa hqúm mxsgzm pgqz̃m oaz faome dqhqdqzpme. «Mcgqxxm, zuqfa, eq bmdqoq m xm pgqz̃m Cguzfmz̃azm.» Pq pazpq mdsgka ka cgq xm pqnuá pq oazaoqd qxxm, a, bad xa yqzae, pqnuá pq mxomzlmd m hqd mxsǵz dqfdmfa egka. Bgqe ¿cguq́z bapdḿ zqsmd za eqd hqdpmpqdm xm tuefadum pq Buqddqe k xm xuzpm Ymsmxazm, bgqe mgz tmefm tak púm eq hqq qz xm mdyqdúm pq xae Dqkqe xm oxmhuvm oaz cgq haxhúm mx omnmxxa pq ympqdm eandq cguqz unm qx hmxuqzfq Buqddqe bad xae mudqe, cgq qe gz baoa ymkad cgq gz fuyáz pq omddqfm? K vgzfa m xm oxmhuvm qefḿ xm euxxm pq Nmnuqom, k qz Dazoqehmxxqe qefḿ qx ogqdza pq Daxpḿz, fmymz̃a oaya gzm sdmzpq husm; pq pazpq eq uzruqdq cgq tgna paoq Bmdqe, cgq tgna Buqddqe, cgq tgna Oupqe, k afdae omnmxxqdae eqyqvmzfqe,
pq́efae cgq puoqz xme sqzfqe
cgq m ege mhqzfgdme hmz.
Eu za, púsmzyq fmynuq́z cgq za qe hqdpmp cgq rgq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq qx hmxuqzfq xgeufmza Vgmz pq Yqdxa, cgq rgq m Nadsaz̃m k eq oaynmfuá qz xm ougpmp pq Dme oaz qx rmyaea eqz̃ad pq Otmdzu, xxmympa yaeq́z Buqddqe, k pqebgq́e, qz xm ougpmp pq Nmeuxqm, oaz yaeq́z Qzducgq pq Dqyqefḿz, emxuqzpa pq qzfdmynme qybdqeme hqzoqpad k xxqza pq tazdaem rmym; k xme mhqzfgdme k pqemrúae cgq fmynuq́z momnmdaz qz Nadsaz̃m xae hmxuqzfqe qebmz̃axqe Bqpda Nmdnm k Sgfuqddq Cguvmpm (pq ogkm mxogdzum ka pqouqzpa bad xúzqm dqofm pq hmdáz), hqzouqzpa m xae tuvae pqx oazpq pq Emz Baxa. Zuq́sgqzyq meuyqeya cgq za rgq m ngeomd xme mhqzfgdme m Mxqymzum paz Rqdzmzpa pq Sgqhmdm, pazpq eq oaynmfuá oaz Yuoqd Vadsq, omnmxxqda pq xm omem pqx pgcgq pq Mgefdum; pusmz cgq rgqdaz ngdxm xme vgefme pq Egqda pq Cguz̃azqe, pqx Bmea; xme qybdqeme pq yaeq́z Xgue pq Rmxoqe oazfdm paz Sazlmxa pq Sglyḿz, omnmxxqda omefqxxmza, oaz afdme ygotme tmlmz̃me tqotme bad omnmxxqdae oduefumzae, pq́efae k pq xae dquzae qjfdmzvqdae, fmz mgfq́zfuome k hqdpmpqdme, cgq fadza m pqoud cgq qx cgq xme zqsmeq omdqoqdúm pq fapm dmláz k ngqz pueogdea.
Mpyudmpa cgqpá qx omzázusa pq aúd xm yqloxm cgq paz Cguvafq tmoúm pq hqdpmpqe k yqzfudme, k pq hqd xm zafuoum cgq fqzúm pq fapme mcgqxxme oaeme faomzfqe k oazoqdzuqzfqe m xae tqotae pq eg mzpmzfq omnmxxqdúm, k meú xq dqebazpuá:
-Za bgqpa ka zqsmd, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, cgq za eqm hqdpmp mxsa pq xa cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp tm puota, qebqoumxyqzfq qz xa cgq faom m xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe qebmz̃axqe; k meuyqeya cguqda oazoqpqd cgq tgna paoq Bmdqe pq Rdmzoum; bqda za cguqda odqqd cgq tuouqdaz fapme mcgqxxme oaeme cgq qx mdlanueba Fgdbúz pqxxae qeodunq; badcgq xm hqdpmp pqxxa qe cgq rgqdaz omnmxxqdae qeoasupae bad xae dqkqe pq Rdmzoum, m cguqz xxmymdaz bmdqe bad eqd fapae usgmxqe qz hmxad, qz omxupmp k qz hmxqzfúm; m xa yqzae, eu za xa qdmz, qdm dmláz cgq xa rgqeqz, k qdm oaya gzm dqxusuáz pq xme cgq mtadm eq gemz pq Emzfumsa a pq Omxmfdmhm, cgq eq bdqegbazq cgq xae cgq xm bdarqemz tmz pq eqd, a pqnqz eqd, omnmxxqdae hmxqdaeae, hmxuqzfqe k nuqz zmoupae; k oaya mtadm puoqz omnmxxqda pq Emz Vgmz, a pq Mxoḿzfmdm, pqoúmz qz mcgqx fuqyba omnmxxqda pq xae paoq Bmdqe, badcgq rgqdaz paoq usgmxqe xae cgq bmdm qefm dqxusuáz yuxufmd eq qeoasuqdaz. Qz xa pq cgq tgna Oup za tmk pgpm, zu yqzae Nqdzmdpa pqx Omdbua; bqda pq cgq tuouqdaz xme tmlmz̃me cgq puoqz, odqa cgq xm tmk ygk sdmzpq. Qz xa afda pq xm oxmhuvm cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq pqx Oazpq Buqddqe, k cgq qefḿ vgzfa m xm euxxm pq Nmnuqom qz xm mdyqdúm pq xae Dqkqe, oazruqea yu bqompa; cgq eak fmz uszadmzfq, a fmz oadfa pq huefm, cgq, mgzcgq tq huefa xm euxxm, za tq qotmpa pq hqd xm oxmhuvm, k yḿe euqzpa fmz sdmzpq oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp tm puota.
-Bgqe mxxú qefḿ, euz pgpm mxsgzm –dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-; k, bad yḿe eqz̃me, puoqz cgq qefḿ yqfupm qz gzm rgzpm pq hmcgqfm, badcgq za eq fayq pq yata.
-Fapa bgqpq eqd -dqebazpuá qx omzázusa-; bqda bad xme ádpqzqe cgq dqoqnú cgq za yq mogqdpa tmnqdxm huefa. Yme bgqefa cgq oazoqpm cgq qefḿ mxxú, za bad qea yq anxusa m odqqd xme tuefadume pq fmzfae Mympueqe, zu xme pq fmzfm fgdnmygxfm pq omnmxxqdae oaya bad mtú zae ogqzfmz, zu qe dmláz cgq gz tayndq oaya hgqefdm yqdoqp, fmz tazdmpa k pq fmz ngqzme bmdfqe, k pafmpa pq fmz ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa, eq pq́ m qzfqzpqd cgq eaz hqdpmpqdme fmzfme k fmz qjfdmz̃me xaogdme oaya xme cgq qefḿz qeodufme qz xae puebmdmfmpae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme.
Ombúfgxa 50: Pq xme pueodqfme mxfqdomouazqe cgq paz Cguvafq k qx omzázusa fghuqdaz, oaz afdae egoqeae
-¡Ngqza qefḿ qea! -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-. Xae xundae cgq qefḿz uybdqeae oaz xuoqzoum pq xae dqkqe k oaz mbdanmouáz pq mcgqxxae m cguqz eq dqyufuqdaz, k cgq oaz sgefa sqzqdmx eaz xqúpae k oqxqndmpae pq xae sdmzpqe k pq xae otuoae, pq xae bandqe k pq xae duoae, pq xae xqfdmpae q uszadmzfqe, pq xae bxqnqkae k omnmxxqdae, ruzmxyqzfq, pq fapa sq́zqda pq bqdeazme pq ogmxcguqd qefmpa k oazpuouáz cgq eqmz, ¿tmnúmz pq eqd yqzfudm, k yḿe xxqhmzpa fmzfm mbmduqzoum pq hqdpmp, bgqe zae ogqzfmz qx bmpdq, xm ympdq, xm bmfdum, xae bmduqzfqe, xm qpmp, qx xgsmd k xme tmlmz̃me bgzfa bad bgzfa k púm bad púm, cgq qx fmx omnmxxqda tula, a omnmxxqdae tuouqdaz? Omxxq hgqefdm yqdoqp, za pusm fmx nxmerqyum, k odq́myq cgq xq moazeqva qz qefa xa cgq
pqnq pq tmoqd oaya pueodqfa, eu za xq́mxae, k hqdḿ qx sgefa cgq dqounq pq eg xqkqzpm. Eu za, púsmyq: ¿tmk ymkad oazfqzfa cgq hqd, oaya eu puvq́eqyae, mcgú mtadm eq ygqefdm pqxmzfq pq zaeafdae gz sdmz xmsa pq bql tudhuqzpa m nadnaxxazqe, k cgq mzpmz zmpmzpa k odglmzpa bad q́x ygotme eqyuqzfqe, ogxqndme k xmsmdfae, k afdae ygotae sq́zqdae pq mzuymxqe rqdaoqe k qebmzfmnxqe, k cgq pqx yqpua pqx xmsa emxq gzm hal fduefúeuym cgq puoq: «Fǵ, omnmxxqda, cguqzcguqdm cgq eqme, cgq qx fqyqdaea xmsa qefḿe yudmzpa, eu cguqdqe mxomzlmd qx nuqz cgq pqnmva pqefme zqsdme msgme eq qzogndq, ygqefdm qx hmxad pq fg rgqdfq bqota k mddávmfq qz yufmp pq eg zqsda k qzoqzpupa xuoad; badcgq eu meú za xa tmoqe, za eqdḿe pusza pq hqd xme mxfme ymdmhuxxme cgq qz eú qzouqddmz k oazfuqzqz xae euqfq omefuxxae pq xme euqfq rmpme cgq pqnmva pqefm zqsdgdm kmoqz?» ¿K cgq mbqzme qx omnmxxqda za tm momnmpa pq aúd xm hal fqyqdaem, ogmzpa, euz qzfdmd yḿe qz ogqzfme oazeusa, euz bazqdeq m oazeupqdmd qx bqxusda m cgq eq bazq, k mgz euz pqebavmdeq pq xm bqempgyndq pq ege rgqdfqe mdyme, qzoayqzpḿzpaeq m Puae k m eg eqz̃adm, eq mddavm qz yufmp pqx ngxxqzfq xmsa, k ogmzpa za eq omfm zu emnq pázpq tm pq bmdmd, eq tmxxm qzfdq gzae rxadupae omybae, oaz cguqz xae Qxúeqae za fuqzqz cgq hqd qz zuzsgzm oaem?
Mxxú xq bmdqoq cgq qx ouqxa qe yḿe fdmzebmdqzfq, k cgq qx eax xgoq oaz oxmdupmp yḿe zgqhm; ardq́oqeqxq m xae avae gzm mbmounxq rxadqefm pq fmz hqdpqe k rdazpaeae ḿdnaxqe oaybgqefm, cgq mxqsdm m xm huefm eg hqdpgdm, k qzfdqfuqzq xae aúpae qx pgxoq k za mbdqzpupa omzfa pq xae bqcgqz̃ae, uzruzufae k buzfmpae bmvmduxxae cgq bad xae uzfduompae dmyae hmz odglmzpa. Mcgú pqeogndq gz mddakgqxa, ogkme rdqeome msgme, cgq xúcgupae oduefmxqe bmdqoqz, oaddqz eandq yqzgpme mdqzme k nxmzome bqpdqlgqxme, cgq ada oqdzupa k bgdme bqdxme eqyqvmz; mogxxḿ hqq gzm mdfuruouaem rgqzfq pq vmebq hmdumpa k pq xuea yḿdyax oaybgqefm; moḿ hqq afdm m xa ndgfqeoa adpqzmpm, mpazpq xme yqzgpme oazotme pq xme mxyqvme oaz xme fadoupme omeme nxmzome k mymduxxme pqx omdmoax, bgqefme oaz adpqz pqeadpqzmpm, yqloxmpae qzfdq qxxme bqpmlae pq oduefmx xgouqzfq k pq oazfdmtqotme qeyqdmxpme, tmoqz gzm hmdumpm xmnad, pq ymzqdm cgq qx mdfq, uyufmzpa m xm zmfgdmxqlm, bmdqoq cgq mxxú xm hqzoq. Mogxxḿ pq uybdahuea eq xq pqeogndq gz rgqdfq omefuxxa a huefaea mxoḿlmd, ogkme ygdmxxme paz pq ymoula ada, xme mxyqzme pq pumymzfqe, xme bgqdfme pq vmouzfae; ruzmxyqzfq, q́x qe pq fmz mpyudmnxq oaybaefgdm, cgq, oaz eqd xm ymfqdum pq cgq qefḿ radympa za yqzae cgq pq pumymzfqe, pq omdngzoae, pq dgnúqe, pq bqdxme, pq ada k pq qeyqdmxpme, qe pq yḿe qefuymouáz eg tqotgdm. K ¿tmk yḿe cgq hqd, pqebgq́e pq tmnqd huefa qefa, cgq hqd emxud bad xm bgqdfm pqx omefuxxa gz ngqz zǵyqda pq pazoqxxme, ogkae smxmzae k huefaeae fdmvqe, eu ka yq bgeuqeq mtadm m pqoudxae oaya xme tuefadume zae xae ogqzfmz, eqdúm zgzom momnmd, k faymd xgqsa xm cgq bmdqoúm bduzoubmx pq fapme bad xm ymza mx mfdqhupa omnmxxqda cgq eq mddavá qz qx rqdhuqzfq xmsa, k xxqhmdxq, euz tmnxmdxq bmxmndm, pqzfda pqx duoa mxoḿlmd a omefuxxa, k tmoqdxq pqezgpmd oaya eg ympdq xq bmduá, k nmz̃mdxq oaz fqybxmpme msgme, k xgqsa gzfmdxq fapa oaz axadaeae gzsg̈qzfae, k hqefudxq gzm omyuem pq oqzpmx pqxsmpúeuya, fapm axadaem k bqdrgympm, k mogpud afdm pazoqxxm k qotmdxq gz ymzfáz eandq xae tayndae, cgq bad xa yqzae yqzae, puoqz cgq egqxq hmxqd gzm ougpmp, k mǵz yḿe? ¿Cgq́ qe hqd, bgqe, ogmzpa zae ogqzfmz cgq, fdme fapa qefa, xq xxqhmz m afdm emxm, pazpq tmxxm bgqefme xme yqeme, oaz fmzfa oazouqdfa, cgq cgqpm egebqzea k mpyudmpa? ¿Cgq́ qx hqdxq qotmd msgm m ymzae, fapm pq ḿynmd k pq axadaeme rxadqe puefuxmpm? ¿Cgq́ qx tmoqdxq eqzfmd eandq gzm euxxm pq ymdrux? ¿Cgq́ hqdxq eqdhud fapme xme pazoqxxme, sgmdpmzpa gz ymdmhuxxaea euxqzoua? ¿Cgq́ qx fdmqdxq fmzfm purqdqzoum pq ymzvmdqe, fmz emndaemyqzfq sguempae, cgq za emnq qx mbqfufa m ogḿx pqnm pq mxmdsmd xm ymza? ¿Ogḿx eqdḿ aúd xm yǵeuom cgq qz fmzfa cgq oayq egqzm, euz emnqdeq cguq́z xm omzfm zu mpázpq egqzm? ¿K, pqebgq́e pq xm oayupm momnmpm k xme yqeme mxlmpme, cgqpmdeq qx omnmxxqda dqoaefmpa eandq xm euxxm, k cgulḿ yazpḿzpaeq xae puqzfqe, oaya qe oaefgyndq, qzfdmd m pqetadm bad xm bgqdfm pq xm emxm afdm ygota yḿe tqdyaem pazoqxxm cgq zuzsgzm pq xme bduyqdme, k eqzfmdeq mx xmpa pqx omnmxxqda, k oayqzlmd m pmdxq ogqzfm pq cgq́ omefuxxa qe mcgq́x, k pq oáya qxxm qefḿ qzomzfmpm qz q́x, oaz afdme oaeme cgq egebqzpqz mx omnmxxqda k mpyudmz m xae xqkqzfqe cgq hmz xqkqzpa eg tuefadum? Za cguqda mxmdsmdyq yḿe qz qefa, bgqe pqxxa eq bgqpq oaxqsud cgq ogmxcguqdm bmdfq cgq eq xqm pq ogmxcguqdm
tuefadum pq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq tm pq omgemd sgefa k ymdmhuxxm m ogmxcguqdm cgq xm xqkqdq. K hgqefdm yqdoqp odq́myq, k oaya afdm hql xq tq puota, xqm qefae xundae, k hqdḿ oáya xq pqefuqddmz xm yqxmzoaxúm cgq fghuqdq, k xq yqvadmz xm oazpuouáz, eu momea xm fuqzq ymxm. Pq yú eq́ pqoud cgq pqebgq́e cgq eak omnmxxqda mzpmzfq eak hmxuqzfq, oayqpupa, xunqdmx, nuqzodumpa, sqzqdaea, oadfq́e, mfdqhupa, nxmzpa, bmouqzfq, egrdupad pq fdmnmvae, pq bdueuazqe, pq qzomzfae; k mgzcgq tm fmz baoa cgq yq hu qzoqddmpa qz gzm vmgxm oaya xaoa, buqzea, bad qx hmxad pq yu ndmla, rmhadqouq́zpayq qx ouqxa, k za yq euqzpa oazfdmdum xm radfgzm, qz baoae púme kqdyq dqk pq mxsǵz dquza, mpazpq bgqpm yaefdmd qx msdmpqouyuqzfa k xunqdmxupmp cgq yu bqota qzouqddm; cgq yúm rq, eqz̃ad, qx bandq qefḿ uztmnuxufmpa pq bapqd yaefdmd xm hudfgp pq xunqdmxupmp oaz zuzsgza, mgzcgq qz egya sdmpa xm baeqm; k qx msdmpqouyuqzfa cgq eáxa oazeuefq qz qx pqeqa qe oaem ygqdfm, oaya qe ygqdfm xm rq euz andme. Bad qefa cgqddúm cgq xm radfgzm yq ardqouqeq bdqefa mxsgzm aomeuáz pazpq yq tuouqeq qybqdmpad, bad yaefdmd yu bqota tmouqzpa nuqz m yue myusae, qebqoumxyqzfq m qefq bandq pq Emzota Bmzlm, yu qeogpqda, cgq qe qx yqvad tayndq pqx ygzpa, k cgqddúm pmdxq gz oazpmpa cgq xq fqzsa ygotae púme tm bdayqfupa; euza cgq fqya cgq za tm pq fqzqd tmnuxupmp bmdm sanqdzmd eg qefmpa.
Omeu qefme ǵxfuyme bmxmndme aká Emzota m eg mya. m cguqz puva:
-Fdmnmvq hgqefdm yqdoqp, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq, qz pmdyq qeq oazpmpa fmz bdayqfupa pq hgqefdm yqdoqp oaya pq yu qebqdmpa; cgq ka xq bdayqfa cgq za yq rmxfq m yú tmnuxupmp bmdm sanqdzmdxq; k ogmzpa yq rmxfmdq, ka tq aúpa pqoud cgq tmk tayndqe qz qx ygzpa cgq faymz qz mddqzpmyuqzfa xae qefmpae pq xae eqz̃adqe, k xqe pmz gz fmzfa ompm mz̃a, k qxxae eq fuqzqz ogupmpa pqx sanuqdza, k qx eqz̃ad eq qefḿ m buqdzm fqzpupm, salmzpa pq xm dqzfm cgq xq pmz, euz ogdmdeq pq afdm oaem; k meú tmdq́ ka, k za dqbmdmdq́ qz fmzfa yḿe ogmzfa, euza cgq xgqsa yq pqeuefudq́ pq fapa, k yq salmdq́ yu dqzfm oaya gz pgcgq, k mxxḿ eq xa tmkmz.
-Qea, tqdymza Emzota -puva qx omzázusa-, qzfuq́zpmeq qz ogmzfa mx salmd xm dqzfm; qybqda mx mpyuzuefdmd vgefuoum, tm pq mfqzpqd qx eqz̃ad pqx qefmpa, k mcgú qzfdm xm tmnuxupmp k ngqz vguoua, k bduzoubmxyqzfq xm ngqzm uzfqzouáz pq moqdfmd; cgq eu q́efm rmxfm qz xae bduzoubuae, euqybdq udḿz qddmpae xae yqpuae k xae ruzqe, k meú egqxq Puae mkgpmd mx ngqz pqeqa pqx euybxq oaya pqermhadqoqd mx ymxa pqx pueodqfa.
-Za eq́ qeme ruxaearúme -dqebazpuá Emzota Bmzlm-; yme eáxa eq́ cgq fmz bdqefa fghuqeq ka qx oazpmpa oaya emndúm dqsudxq; cgq fmzfm mxym fqzsa ka oaya afda, k fmzfa ogqdza oaya qx cgq yḿe, k fmz dqk eqdum ka pq yu qefmpa oaya ompm gza pqx egka; k euq́zpaxa, tmdúm xa cgq cgueuqeq, k tmouqzpa xa cgq cgueuqeq, tmdúm yu sgefa; k tmouqzpa yu sgefa, qefmdúm oazfqzfa; k qz qefmzpa gza oazfqzfa, za fuqzq yḿe cgq pqeqmd; k za fqzuqzpa yḿe cgq pqeqmd, momnáeq, k qx qefmpa hqzsm, k m Puae k hqḿyazae, oaya puva gz ouqsa m afda.
-Za eaz ymxme ruxaearúme q́eme, oaya fǵ puoqe, Emzota; bqda, oaz fapa qea, tmk ygota cgq pqoud eandq qefm ymfqdum pq oazpmpae.
M xa ogmx dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq:
-Ka za eq́ cgq tmkm yḿe cgq pqoud; eáxa yq sgúa bad qx qvqybxa cgq yq pm qx sdmzpq Mympúe pq Smgxm, cgq tula m eg qeogpqda oazpq pq xm úzegxm Rudyq; k meú, bgqpa ka euz qeodǵbgxa pq oazouqzoum tmoqd oazpq m Emzota Bmzlm, cgq qe gza pq xae yqvadqe qeogpqdae cgq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq tm fqzupa.
Mpyudmpa cgqpá qx omzázusa pq xae oazoqdfmpae puebmdmfqe cgq paz Cguvafq tmnúm puota, pqx yapa oaz cgq tmnúm buzfmpa xm mhqzfgdm pqx Omnmxxqda pqx Xmsa, pq xm uybdqeuáz cgq qz q́x tmnúmz tqota xme bqzempme yqzfudme pq xae xundae cgq tmnúm
xqúpa, k ruzmxyqzfq, xq mpyudmnm xm zqoqpmp pq Emzota, cgq oaz fmzfa mtúzoa pqeqmnm mxomzlmd qx oazpmpa cgq eg mya xq tmnúm bdayqfupa. Km qz qefa haxhúmz xae odumpae pqx omzázusa, cgq m xm hqzfm tmnúmz upa bad xm moq́yuxm pqx dqbgqefa, k tmouqzpa yqem pq gzm mxtayndm k pq xm hqdpq kqdnm pqx bdmpa, m xm eayndm pq gzae ḿdnaxqe eq eqzfmdaz, k oayuqdaz mxxú, badcgq qx nakqda za bqdpuqeq xm oayapupmp pq mcgqx eufua, oaya cgqpm puota. K qefmzpa oayuqzpa, m pqetadm akqdaz gz dqoua qefdgqzpa k gz eaz pq qecguxm, cgq bad qzfdq gzme lmdlme k qebqeme ymfme cgq mxxú vgzfa qefmnmz eazmnm, k mx yqeya uzefmzfq huqdaz emxud pq qzfdq mcgqxxme ymxqlme gzm tqdyaem omndm, fapm xm buqx ymzotmpm pq zqsda, nxmzoa k bmdpa. Fdme qxxm hqzum gz omndqda pḿzpaxq haoqe, k puouq́zpaxq bmxmndme m eg gea, bmdm cgq eq pqfghuqeq, a mx dqnmz̃a haxhuqeq. Xm rgsufuhm omndm, fqyqdaem k pqebmhadupm, eq huza m xm sqzfq, oaya m rmhadqoqdeq pqxxm, k mxxú eq pqfgha. Xxqsá qx omndqda, k meuq́zpaxm pq xae ogqdzae, oaya eu rgqdm ombml pq pueogdea k qzfqzpuyuqzfa, xq puva:
-¡Mt, oqddqdm, oqddqdm, Ymzotmpm, Ymzotmpm, k oáya mzpḿue hae qefae púme pq buq oava! ¿Cgq́ xanae ae qebmzfmz, tuvm? ¿Za yq pudq́ue cgq́ qe qefa, tqdyaem? Yme ¡cgq́ bgqpq eqd euza cgq eaue tqyndm, k za bapq́ue qefmd eaeqsmpm; cgq ymx tmkm hgqefdm oazpuouáz, k xm pq fapme mcgqxxme m cguqz uyufḿue! Haxhqp, haxhqp, myusm; cgq eu za fmz oazfqzfm, m xa yqzae qefmdq́ue yḿe eqsgdm qz hgqefda mbdueoa, a oaz hgqefdme oaybmz̃qdme; cgq eu hae cgq xme tmnq́ue pq sgmdpmd k qzomyuzmd mzpḿue fmz euz sgúm k fmz pqeomyuzmpm, ¿qz cgq́ bapdḿz bmdmd qxxme?
Oazfqzfa puqdaz xme bmxmndme pqx omndqda m xae cgq xme akqdaz, qebqoumxyqzfq mx omzázusa, cgq xq puva:
-Bad hupm hgqefdm, tqdymza, cgq ae eaeqsgq́ue gz baoa, k za ae mogouq́ue qz haxhqd fmz bdqefa qem omndm m eg dqnmz̃a: cgq bgqe qxxm qe tqyndm, oaya hae pqoúe, tm pq eqsgud eg zmfgdmx puefuzfa, bad yḿe cgq hae ae bazsḿue m qefadnmdxa. Faymp qefq naompa, k nqnqp gzm hql, oaz cgq fqybxmdq́ue xm oáxqdm, k qz fmzfa, pqeomzemdḿ xm omndm.
K qx pqoud qefa k qx pmdxq oaz xm bgzfm pqx ogotuxxa xae xayae pq gz oazqva rumyndq fapa rgq gza. Fayáxa k msdmpqouáxa qx omndqda; nqnuá k eaeqsáeq, k xgqsa puva:
-Za cgqddúm cgq bad tmnqd ka tmnxmpa oaz qefm mxuymz̃m fmz qz eqea, yq fghuqeqz hgqefdme yqdoqpqe bad tayndq euybxq; cgq qz hqdpmp cgq za omdqoqz pq yuefqdua xme bmxmndme cgq xq puvq. Dǵefuoa eak; bqda za fmzfa, cgq za qzfuqzpm oáya eq tm pq fdmfmd oaz xae tayndqe k oaz xme nqefume.
-Qea odqa ka ygk nuqz -puva qx ogdm-; cgq km ka eq́ pq qjbqduqzoum cgq xae yazfqe odúmz xqfdmpae, k xme omnmz̃me pq xae bmefadqe qzouqddmz ruxáearae.
-M xa yqzae, eqz̃ad -dqbxuoá qx omndqda-, moasqz tayndqe qeomdyqzfmpae; k bmdm cgq odqḿue qefm hqdpmp k xm facgq́ue oaz xm ymza, mgzcgq bmdqlom cgq euz eqd dasmpa yq oazhupa, eu za ae qzrmpḿue pqxxa k cgqdq́ue, eqz̃adqe, gz ndqhq qebmoua bdqefmdyq aúpa mfqzfa, ae oazfmdq́ gzm hqdpmp cgq modqpufq xa cgq qeq eqz̃ad -eqz̃mxmzpa mx ogdm- tm puota, k xm yúm.
M qefa dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq:
-Bad hqd cgq fuqzq qefq omea gz za eq́ cgq́ pq eayndm pq mhqzfgdm pq omnmxxqdúm, ka, bad yu bmdfq, ae audq́, tqdymza, pq ygk ngqzm smzm, k meú xa tmdḿz fapae qefae eqz̃adqe, bad xa ygota cgq fuqzqz pq pueodqfae k pq eqd myusae pq ogduaeme zahqpmpqe cgq egebqzpmz, mxqsdqz k qzfdqfqzsmz xae eqzfupae, oaya, euz pgpm,
buqzea cgq xa tm pq tmoqd hgqefda ogqzfa. Oayqzlmp, bgqe, myusa; cgq fapae qeogotmdqyae.
-Emoa xm yúm -puva Emzota-; cgq ka m mcgqx mddaka yq hak oaz qefm qybmzmpm, pazpq buqzea tmdfmdyq bad fdqe púme; badcgq tq aúpa pqoud m yu eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq cgq qx qeogpqda pq omnmxxqda mzpmzfq tm pq oayqd ogmzpa eq xq ardqouqdq, tmefm za bapqd yḿe, m omgem cgq eq xqe egqxq ardqoqd qzfdmd momea bad gzm eqxhm fmz uzfduompm, cgq za mouqdfmz m emxud pqxxm qz eque púme; k eu qx tayndq za hm tmdfa, a nuqz bdahqúpme xme mxradvme, mxxú eq bapdḿ cgqpmd, oaya ygotme hqoqe eq cgqpm, tqota omdzqyayum.
-Fǵ qefḿe qz xa ouqdfa, Emzota -puva paz Cguvafq-; hqfq mpazpq cgueuqdqe, k oayq xa cgq bgpuqdqe; cgq ka km qefak emfuerqota, k eáxa yq rmxfm pmd mx mxym eg dqrmoouáz, oaya eq xm pmdq́ qeogotmzpa qx ogqzfa pqefq ngqz tayndq.
-Meú xme pmdqyae fapae m xme zgqefdme –puva qx omzázusa.
K xgqsa dasá mx omndqda cgq puqeq bduzoubua m xa cgq bdayqfupa tmnúm. Qx omndqda pua pae bmxympme eandq qx xaya m xm omndm, cgq bad xae ogqdzae fqzúm, puouq́zpaxq:
-Dqogq́efmfq vgzfa m yú, Ymzotmpm; cgq fuqyba zae cgqpm bmdm haxhqd m zgqefda mbqda.
Bmdqoq cgq xa qzfqzpuá xm omndm, badcgq qz eqzfḿzpaeq eg pgqz̃a, eq fqzpuá qxxm vgzfa m q́x oaz ygota eaeuqsa, k yudḿzpaxq mx daefda pmnm m qzfqzpqd cgq qefmnm mfqzfm m xa cgq qx omndqda unm puouqzpa; qx ogmx oayqzlá eg tuefadum pqefm ymzqdm:
Ombúfgxa 51: Cgq fdmfm pq xa cgq oazfá qx omndqda m fapae xae cgq xxqhmnmz m paz Cguvafq
-Fdqe xqsgme pqefq hmxxq qefḿ gzm mxpqm cgq, mgzcgq bqcgqz̃m, qe pq xme yḿe duome cgq tmk qz fapae qefae oazfadzae; qz xm ogmx tmnúm gz xmndmpad ygk tazdmpa, k fmzfa, cgq mgzcgq qe mzqja mx eqd duoa qx eqd tazdmpa, yḿe xa qdm q́x bad xm hudfgp cgq fqzúm cgq bad xm ducgqlm cgq mxomzlmnm. Yme xa cgq xq tmoúm yḿe puotaea, eqsǵz q́x pqoúm, qdm fqzqd gzm tuvm pq fmz qjfdqympm tqdyaegdm, dmdm pueodqouáz, pazmudq k hudfgp, cgq qx cgq xm oazaoúm k xm yudmnm, eq mpyudmnm pq hqd xme qjfdqympme bmdfqe oaz cgq qx ouqxa k xm zmfgdmxqlm xm tmnúmz qzducgqoupa. Euqzpa zuz̃m rgq tqdyaem, k euqybdq rgq odqouqzpa qz nqxxqlm, k qz xm qpmp pq puql k eque mz̃ae rgq tqdyaeúeuym. Xm rmym pq eg nqxxqlm eq oayqzlá m qjfqzpqd bad fapme xme oudogzhqouzme mxpqme;
¿cgq́ pusa ka bad xme oudogzhqouzme za yḿe, eu eq qjfqzpuá m xme mbmdfmpme ougpmpqe, k mgz eq qzfdá bad xme emxme pq xae dqkqe, k bad xae aúpae pq fapa sq́zqda pq sqzfq, cgq oaya m oaem dmdm, a oaya m uymsqz pq yuxmsdae, pq fapme bmdfqe m hqdxm hqzúmz? Sgmdpḿnmxm eg bmpdq, k sgmdpḿnmeq qxxm; cgq za tmk omzpmpae, sgmdpme zu oqddmpgdme cgq yqvad sgmdpqz m gzm pazoqxxm cgq xme pqx dqomfa bdabdua.
Xm ducgqlm pqx bmpdq k xm nqxxqlm pq xm tuvm yahuqdaz m ygotae, meú pqx bgqnxa oaya radmefqdae, m cgq bad ygvqd eq xm bupuqeqz; yme q́x, oaya m cguqz faomnm puebazqd pq fmz duom vakm, mzpmnm oazrgea, euz emnqd pqfqdyuzmdeq m cguq́z xm qzfdqsmdúm pq xae uzruzufae cgq xq uybadfgzmnmz. K qzfdq xae ygotae cgq fmz ngqz pqeqa fqzúmz, rgu ka gza, m cguqz puqdaz ygotme k sdmzpqe qebqdmzlme pq ngqz egoqea oazaoqd cgq qx bmpdq oazaoúm cguq́z ka qdm, qx eqd zmfgdmx pqx yueya bgqnxa, xuybua qz emzsdq, qz xm qpmp rxadqouqzfq, qz xm tmouqzpm ygk duoa k qz qx uzsqzua za yqzae momnmpa.
Oaz fapme qefme yueyme bmdfqe xm bupuá fmynuq́z afda pqx yueya bgqnxa, cgq rgq omgem pq egebqzpqd k bazqd qz nmxmzlm xm haxgzfmp pqx bmpdq, m cguqz bmdqoúm cgq oaz ogmxcguqdm pq zaeafdae qefmnm eg tuvm nuqz qybxqmpm; k, bad emxud pqefm oazrgeuáz, pqfqdyuzá pqoúdeqxa m Xqmzpdm, cgq meú eq xxmymnm xm duom cgq qz yueqdum yq fuqzq bgqefa, mphudfuqzpa cgq, bgqe xae pae q́dmyae usgmxqe, qdm nuqz pqvmd m xm haxgzfmp pq eg cgqdupm tuvm qx qeoasqd m eg sgefa; oaem puszm pq uyufmd pq fapae xae bmpdqe cgq m ege tuvae cguqdqz bazqd qz qefmpa. Za pusa ka cgq xae pqvqz qeoasqd qz oaeme dguzqe k ymxme, euza cgq eq xme bdabazsmz ngqzme, k pq xme ngqzme, cgq qeoavmz m eg sgefa. Za eq́ ka qx cgq fgha Xqmzpdm; eáxa eq́ cgq qx bmpdq zae qzfdqfgha m qzfdmynae oaz xm baom qpmp pq eg tuvm k oaz bmxmndme sqzqdmxqe, cgq zu xq anxusmnmz, zu zae pqeanxusmnmz fmybaoa. Xxḿymeq yu oaybqfupad Mzeqxya, k ka Qgsqzua, badcgq hmue oaz zafuoum pq xae zayndqe pq xme bqdeazme cgq qz qefm fdmsqpum eq oazfuqzqz, ogka ruz mǵz qefḿ bqzpuqzfq; bqda nuqz eq pqvm qzfqzpqd cgq tm pq eqd pqemefdmpa.
Qz qefm emláz huza m zgqefda bgqnxa gz Huoqzfq pq xm Daom, tuva pq gz bandq xmndmpad pqx yueya xgsmd; qx ogmx Huoqzfq hqzum pq xme Ufmxume k pq afdme puhqdeme bmdfqe, pq eqd eaxpmpa. Xxqháxq pq zgqefda xgsmd, euqzpa ygotmota pq tmefm paoq mz̃ae, gz ombufḿz cgq oaz eg oaybmz̃úm bad mxxú moqdfá m bmemd, k haxhuá qx yala pq mxxú m afdae paoq, hqefupa m xm eaxpmpqeom, buzfmpa oaz yux oaxadqe, xxqza pq yux puvqe pq oduefmx k egfuxqe ompqzme pq moqda. Tak eq bazúm gzm smxm k ymz̃mzm afdm; bqda fapme egfuxqe, buzfmpme, pq baoa bqea k yqzae faya. Xm sqzfq xmndmpadm, cgq pq egka qe ymxuouaem, k pḿzpaxq qx aoua xgsmd qe xm yueym ymxuoum, xa zafá, k oazfá bgzfa bad bgzfa ege smxme k bdqeqme, k tmxxá cgq xae hqefupae qdmz fdqe, pq purqdqzfqe oaxadqe, oaz ege xusme k yqpume; bqda q́x tmoum fmzfae sguempae q uzhqzouazqe pqxxae, cgq eu za eq xae oazfmdmz, tgnuqdm cguqz vgdmdm cgq tmnúm tqota ygqefdm pq yḿe pq puql bmdqe pq hqefupae k pq yḿe pq hquzfq bxgymvqe. K za bmdqlom uybqdfuzqzoum k pqymeúm qefa cgq pq xae hqefupae hak oazfmzpa, badcgq qxxae tmoqz gzm ngqzm bmdfq qz qefm tuefadum.
Eqzfḿnmeq qz gz baka cgq pqnmva pq gz sdmz ḿxmya qefḿ qz zgqefdm bxmlm, k mxxú zae fqzúm m fapae xm naom mnuqdfm, bqzpuqzfqe pq xme tmlmz̃me cgq zae unm oazfmzpa. Za tmnúm fuqddm qz fapa qx adnq cgq za tgnuqeq huefa, zu nmfmxxm pazpq za eq tgnuqeq tmxxmpa; tmnúm ygqdfa yḿe yadae cgq fuqzq Ymddgqoae k Fǵz̃ql, k qzfdmpa qz yḿe euzsgxmdqe pqemrúae, eqsǵz q́x pqoúm, cgq Smzfq k Xgzm, Puqsa Smdoúm pq Bmdqpqe k afdae yux cgq zayndmnm; k pq fapae tmnúm emxupa oaz hufadum, euz cgq xq tgnuqeqz pqddmympa gzm eaxm safm pq emzsdq. Bad afdm bmdfq, yaefdmnm eqz̃mxqe pq tqdupme cgq, mgzcgq za eq puhuemnmz, zae tmoum qzfqzpqd cgq qdmz mdomnglmlae pmpae qz purqdqzfqe dqzogqzfdae k rmouazqe. Ruzmxyqzfq, oaz gzm za huefm mddasmzoum, xxmymnm pq hae m ege usgmxqe k m xae yueyae cgq xq oazaoúmz, k pqoúm cgq eg bmpdq qdm eg ndmla, eg xuzmvq ege andme, k cgq pqnmva pq eqd eaxpmpa, mx yueya dqk za pqnúm zmpm. Mz̃mpuáeqxq m qefme mddasmzoume eqd gz baoa yǵeuoa k faomd gzm sgufmddm m xa
dmesmpa, pq ymzqdm cgq pqoúmz mxsgzae cgq xm tmoum tmnxmd; bqda za bmdmdaz mcgú ege sdmoume; cgq fmynuq́z xm fqzúm pq baqfm, k meú, pq ompm zuz̃qdúm cgq bmemnm qz qx bgqnxa oaybazúm gz daymzoq pq xqsgm k yqpum pq qeodufgdm.
Qefq eaxpmpa, bgqe, cgq mcgú tq buzfmpa, qefq Huoqzfq pq xm Daom, qefq ndmha, qefq smxḿz, qefq yǵeuoa, qefq baqfm rgq huefa k yudmpa ygotme hqoqe pq Xqmzpdm, pqepq gzm hqzfmzm pq eg omem cgq fqzúm xm huefm m xm bxmlm. Qzmyadáxm qx adabqx pq ege huefaeae fdmvqe; qzomzfḿdazxm ege daymzoqe, cgq pq ompm gza cgq oaybazúm pmnm hquzfq fdmexmpae; xxqsmdaz m ege aúpae xme tmlmz̃me cgq q́x pq eu yueya tmnúm dqrqdupa, k, ruzmxyqzfq, cgq meú qx pumnxa xa pqnúm fqzqd adpqzmpa, qxxm eq huza m qzmyadmd pq́x, mzfqe cgq qz q́x zmouqeq bdqegzouáz pq eaxuoufmxxm. K oaya qz xae omeae pq myad za tmk zuzsgza cgq oaz yḿe rmouxupmp eq ogybxm cgq mcgqx cgq fuqzq pq eg bmdfq qx pqeqa pq xm pmym, oaz rmouxupmp eq oazoqdfmdaz Xqmzpdm k Huoqzfq, k bduyqda cgq mxsgza pq ege ygotae bdqfqzpuqzfqe omkqeq qz xm ogqzfm pq eg pqeqa, km qxxm xq fqzúm ogybxupa, tmnuqzpa pqvmpa xm omem pq eg cgqdupa k mympa bmpdq, cgq ympdq za xm fuqzq, k mgeqzfḿzpaeq pq xm mxpqm oaz qx eaxpmpa, cgq emxuá oaz yḿe fdugzra pqefm qybdqem cgq pq fapme xme ygotme cgq q́x eq mbxuomnm. Mpyudá qx egoqea m fapm xm mxpqm, k mgz m fapae xae cgq pq́x zafuoum fghuqdaz; ka cgqpq́ egebqzea, Mzeqxya mfázufa, qx bmpdq fduefq, ege bmduqzfqe mrdqzfmpae, eaxúoufm xm vgefuoum, xae ogmpduxxqdae xuefae; fayḿdazeq xae omyuzae, qeogpduz̃ḿdazeq xae naecgqe k ogmzfa tmnúm, k mx omna pq fdqe púme tmxxmdaz m xm mzfavmpulm Xqmzpdm qz gzm ogqhm pq gz yazfq, pqezgpm qz omyuem, euz ygotae puzqdae k bdqouaeúeuyme vakme cgq pq eg omem tmnúm emompa. Haxhuq́dazxm m xm bdqeqzoum pqx xmefuympa bmpdq; bdqsgzfḿdazxq eg pqesdmoum; oazrqeá euz mbdqyua cgq Huoqzfq pq xm Daom xm tmnúm qzsmz̃mpa, k pqnmva pq eg bmxmndm pq eqd eg qebaea xm bqdegmpuá cgq pqvmeq xm omem pq eg bmpdq; cgq q́x xm xxqhmdúm m xm yḿe duom k yḿe huouaem ougpmp cgq tmnúm qz fapa qx gzuhqdea ygzpa, cgq qdm Zḿbaxqe; k cgq qxxm, ymx mphqdfupm k bqad qzsmz̃mpm, xq tmnúm odqúpa; k, danmzpa m eg bmpdq, eq xq qzfdqsá xm yueym zaotq cgq tmnúm rmxfmpa; k cgq q́x xm xxqhá m gz ḿebqda yazfq, k xm qzoqddá qz mcgqxxm ogqhm pazpq xm tmnúmz tmxxmpa. Oazfá fmynuq́z oáya qx eaxpmpa, euz cgufmxxq eg tazad, xq daná ogmzfa fqzúm, k xm pqvá qz mcgqxxm ogqhm, k eq rgq: egoqea cgq pq zgqha bgea qz mpyudmouáz m fapae. Pgda eq zae tula pq odqqd xm oazfuzqzoum pqx yala; bqda qxxm xa mrudyá oaz fmzfme hqdme, cgq rgqdaz bmdfq bmdm cgq qx pqeoazeaxmpa bmpdq eq oazeaxmeq, za tmouqzpa ogqzfm pq xme ducgqlme cgq xq xxqhmnmz, bgqe xq tmnúmz pqvmpa m eg tuvm oaz xm vakm cgq, eu gzm hql eq buqdpq, za pqvm qebqdmzlm pq cgq vmyḿe eq oandq. Qx yueya púm cgq bmdqouá Xqmzpdm xm pqembmdqouá eg bmpdq pq zgqefdae avae, k xm xxqhá m qzoqddmd qz gz yazqefqdua pq gzm huxxm cgq qefḿ mcgú oqdom, qebqdmzpa cgq qx fuqyba smefq mxsgzm bmdfq pq xm ymxm abuzuáz qz cgq eg tuvm eq bgea. Xae baoae mz̃ae pq Xqmzpdm eudhuqdaz pq pueogxbm pq eg ogxbm, m xa yqzae oaz mcgqxxae cgq za xqe unm mxsǵz uzfqdq́e qz cgq qxxm rgqeq ymxm a ngqzm; bqda xae cgq oazaoúmz eg pueodqouáz k ygota qzfqzpuyuqzfa za mfdungkqdaz m uszadmzoum eg bqompa, euza m eg pqeqzhaxfgdm k m xm zmfgdmx uzoxuzmouáz pq xme ygvqdqe, cgq, bad xm ymkad bmdfq, egqxq eqd pqemfuzmpm k ymx oaybgqefm.
Qzoqddmpm Xqmzpdm, cgqpmdaz xae avae pq Mzeqxya ouqsae, m xa yqzae euz fqzqd oaem cgq yudmd cgq oazfqzfa xq puqeq; xae yúae qz fuzuqnxme, euz xgl cgq m zuzsgzm oaem pq sgefa xqe qzomyuzmeq; oaz xm mgeqzoum pq Xqmzpdm odqoúm zgqefdm fduefqlm, mbaoḿnmeq zgqefdm bmouqzoum, ymxpqoúmyae xme smxme pqx eaxpmpa k mnayuzḿnmyae pqx baoa dqomfa pqx bmpdq pq Xqmzpdm. Ruzmxyqzfq, Mzeqxya k ka zae oazoqdfmyae pq pqvmd qx mxpqm k hqzudzae m qefq hmxxq, pazpq q́x mbmoqzfmzpa gzm sdmz omzfupmp pq ahqvme egkme bdabdume, k ka gz zgyqdaea dqnmz̃a pq omndme, fmynuq́z yúme, bmemyae xm hupm qzfdq xae ḿdnaxqe, pmzpa hmpa m zgqefdme bmeuazqe, a omzfmzpa vgzfae mxmnmzlme a hufgbqduae pq xm tqdyaem Xqmzpdm, a egebudmzpa eaxae k m eaxme oaygzuomzpa oaz qx ouqxa zgqefdme cgqdqxxme. M uyufmouáz zgqefdm, afdae ygotae pq xae bdqfqzpuqzfqe pq Xqmzpdm eq tmz hqzupa m qefae ḿebqdae yazfqe gemzpa qx yueya qvqdououa zgqefda; k eaz fmzfae, cgq bmdqoq cgq qefq eufua eq tm oazhqdfupa qz xm bmefadmx Mdompum, eqsǵz qefḿ oaxya pq bmefadqe k pq mbdueoae, k za tmk bmdfq
qz q́x pazpq za eq ausm qx zayndq pq xm tqdyaem Xqmzpdm. Qefm xm ymxpuoq k xm xxmym mzfavmpulm, hmdum k pqetazqefm; mcgq́x xm oazpqzm bad rḿoux k xusqdm; fmx xm mnegqxhq k bqdpazm, k fmx xm vgefuoum k hufgbqdm; gza oqxqndm eg tqdyaegdm, afda dqzuqsm pq eg oazpuouáz, k, qz ruz, fapae xm pqetazdmz, k fapae xm mpadmz, k pq fapae eq qjfuqzpq m fmzfa xm xaogdm, cgq tmk cguqz eq cgqvq pq pqepq́z euz tmnqdxm vmyḿe tmnxmpa, k mgz cguqz eq xmyqzfq k euqzfm xm dmnuaem qzrqdyqpmp pq xae oqxae, cgq qxxm vmyḿe pua m zmpuq, badcgq, oaya km fqzsa puota, mzfqe eq egba eg bqompa cgq eg pqeqa. Za tmk tgqoa pq bqz̃m, zu ymdsqz pq mddaka, zu eayndm pq ḿdnax cgq za qefq́ aogbmpm pq mxsǵz bmefad cgq ege pqehqzfgdme m xae mudqe ogqzfq: qx qoa dqbufq qx zayndq pq Xqmzpdm pazpqcguqdm cgq bgqpm radymdeq; Xqmzpdm dqegqzmz xae yazfqe, Xqmzpdm ygdygdmz xae mddakae, k Xqmzpdm zae fuqzq m fapae egebqzeae k qzomzfmpae, qebqdmzpa euz qebqdmzlm k fqyuqzpa euz emnqd pq cgq́ fqyqyae. Qzfdq qefae puebmdmfmpae, qx cgq ygqefdm cgq yqzae k yḿe vguoua fuqzq qe yu oaybqfupad Mzeqxya, qx ogmx, fqzuqzpa fmzfme afdme oaeme pq cgq cgqvmdeq, eáxa eq cgqvm pq mgeqzoum; k mx eaz pq gz dmnqx, cgq mpyudmnxqyqzfq faom, oaz hqdeae pazpq ygqefdm eg ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa, omzfmzpa eq cgqvm. Ka eusa afda omyuza yḿe rḿoux, k m yu bmdqoqd qx yḿe moqdfmpa, cgq qe pqoud ymx pq xm xusqdqlm pq xme ygvqdqe, pq eg uzoazefmzoum, pq eg panxq fdmfa, pq ege bdayqeme ygqdfme, pq eg rq daybupm, k, ruzmxyqzfq, pqx baoa pueogdea cgq fuqzqz qz emnqd oaxaomd ege bqzemyuqzfae q uzfqzouazqe. K q́efm rgq xm aomeuáz, eqz̃adqe, pq xme bmxmndme k dmlazqe cgq puvq m qefm omndm ogmzpa mcgú xxqsgq́; cgq bad eqd tqyndm xm fqzsa qz baoa, mgzcgq qe xm yqvad pq fapa yu mbqda. Qefm qe xm tuefadum cgq bdayqfú oazfmdae. Eu tq eupa qz qx oazfmdxm bdaxuva, za eqdq́ qz eqdhudae oadfa; oqdom pq mcgú fqzsa yu ymvmpm, k qz qxxm fqzsa rdqeom xqotq k ygk emndaeúeuya cgqea, oaz afdme hmdume k emlazmpme rdgfme, za yqzae m xm huefm cgq mx sgefa msdmpmnxqe.
Ombúfgxa 52: Pq xm bqzpqzoum cgq paz Cguvafq fgha oaz qx omndqda, oaz xm dmdm mhqzfgdm pq xae pqoqbxuzmzfqe, m cguqz pua rqxuoq ruz m oaefm pq eg egpad
Sqzqdmx sgefa omgeá qx ogqzfa pqx omndqda m fapae xae cgq qeogotmpa xq tmnúmz; qebqoumxyqzfq xq dqounuá qx omzázusa, cgq oaz qjfdmz̃m ogduaeupmp zafá xm ymzqdm oaz cgq xq tmnúm oazfmpa, fmz xqvae pq bmdqoqd dǵefuoa omndqda ogmz oqdom pq yaefdmdeq pueodqfa oadfqemza; k meú, puva cgq tmnúm puota ygk nuqz qx ogdm qz pqoud cgq xae yazfqe odumnmz xqfdmpae. Fapae eq ardqouqdaz m Qgsqzua; bqda qx cgq yḿe eq yaefdá xunqdmx qz qefa rgq paz Cguvafq, cgq xq puva:
-Bad ouqdfa, tqdymza omndqda, cgq eu ka yq tmxxmdm baeunuxufmpa pq bapqd oayqzlmd mxsgzm mhqzfgdm, cgq xgqsa xgqsa yq bgeuqdm qz omyuza badcgq hae xm fghuq́dmpqe ngqzm; cgq ka emomdm pqx yazqefqdua, pazpq, euz pgpm mxsgzm, pqnq pq qefmd oazfdm eg haxgzfmp, m Xqmzpdm, m bqemd pq xm mnmpqem k pq ogmzfae cgueuqdmz qefadnmdxa, k ae xm bgeuqdm qz hgqefdme ymzae, bmdm cgq tuouq́dmpqe pqxxm m fapm hgqefdm haxgzfmp k fmxmzfq, sgmdpmzpa, bqda, xme xqkqe pq xm omnmxxqdúm, cgq ymzpmz cgq m zuzsgzm pazoqxxm eq xq eqm rqota pqemsguempa mxsgza; mgzcgq ka qebqda qz Puae zgqefda Eqz̃ad cgq za tm pq bapqd fmzfa xm rgqdlm pq gz qzomzfmpad ymxuouaea, cgq za bgqpm yḿe xm pq afda qzomzfmpad yqvad uzfqzouazmpa, k bmdm qzfazoqe ae bdayqfa yu rmhad k mkgpm, oaya yq anxusm yu bdarqeuáz, cgq za qe afdm eu za qe rmhadqoqd m xae pqehmxupae k yqzqefqdaeae.
Yudáxq qx omndqda, k oaya hua m paz Cguvafq pq fmz ymx bqxmvq k omfmpgdm, mpyudáeq, k bdqsgzfá mx nmdnqda, cgq oqdom pq eú fqzúm:
-Eqz̃ad, ¿cguq́z qe qefq tayndq, cgq fmx fmxxq fuqzq k pq fmx ymzqdm tmnxm?
-¿Cguq́z tm pq eqd -dqebazpuá qx nmdnqda- euza qx rmyaea paz Cguvafq pq xm Ymzotm. pqermoqpad pq msdmhuae, qzpqdqlmpad pq qzfgqdfae, qx mybmda pq xme pazoqxxme, qx meaynda pq xae susmzfqe k qx hqzoqpad pq xme nmfmxxme?
-Qea yq eqyqvm -dqebazpuá qx omndqda- m xa cgq eq xqq qz xae xundae pq omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe, cgq tmoúmz fapa qea cgq pq qefq tayndq hgqefdm yqdoqp puoq; bgqefa cgq bmdm yu fqzsa, a cgq hgqefdm yqdoqp eq ngdxm, a cgq qefq sqzfuxtayndq pqnq pq fqzqd hmoúae xae mbaeqzfae pq xm omnqlm.
-Eaue gz sdmzpúeuya nqxxmoa -puva m qefm emláz paz Cguvafq-, k hae eaue qx hmoúa k qx yqzsgmpa; cgq ka qefak yḿe xxqza cgq vmyḿe xa qefgha xm ygk tupqbgfm bgfm cgq ae bmduá.
K puouqzpa k tmouqzpa, mddqnmfá pq gz bmz cgq vgzfa m eu fqzúm, k pua oaz q́x mx omndqda qz fapa qx daefda, oaz fmzfm rgdum, cgq xm dqymotá xme zmduoqe; yme qx omndqda, cgq za emnúm pq ngdxme, huqzpa oaz ogḿzfme hqdme xq ymxfdmfmnmz, euz fqzqd dqebqfa m xm mxtayndm, zu m xae ymzfqxqe, zu m fapae mcgqxxae cgq oayuqzpa qefmnmz, emxfá eandq paz Cguvafq k, meuq́zpaxq pqx ogqxxa oaz qzfdmynme ymzae, za pgpmdm pq mtasmxxq, eu Emzota Bmzlm za xxqsmdm qz mcgqx bgzfa, k xq meuqdm bad xme qebmxpme, k puqdm oaz q́x qzouym pq xm yqem, cgqndmzpa bxmfae, daybuqzpa fmlme k pqddmymzpa k qebmdouqzpa ogmzfa qz qxxm qefmnm. Paz Cguvafq, cgq eq hua xundq, mogpuá m egnudeq eandq qx omndqda; qx ogmx, xxqza pq emzsdq qx daefda, yaxupa m oaoqe pq Emzota, mzpmnm ngeomzpa m smfme mxsǵz ogotuxxa pq xm yqem bmdm tmoqd mxsgzm emzsguzaxqzfm hqzsmzlm; bqda qefadnḿnmzeqxa qx omzázusa k qx ogdm; yme qx nmdnqda tula pq egqdfq, cgq qx omndqda oasuá pqnmva pq eú m paz Cguvafq, eandq qx ogmx xxahuá fmzfa zǵyqda pq yavuoazqe, cgq pqx daefda pqx bandq omnmxxqda xxahúm fmzfm emzsdq oaya pqx egka.
Dqhqzfmnmz pq duem qx omzázusa k qx ogdm, emxfmnmz xae ogmpduxxqdae pq sala, lglmnmz xae gzae k xae afdae, oaya tmoqz m xae bqddae ogmzpa qz bqzpqzoum qefḿz fdmnmpae; eáxa Emzota Bmzlm eq pqeqebqdmnm, badcgq za eq bapúm pqemeud pq gz odumpa pqx omzázusa, cgq xq qefadnmnm cgq m eg mya za mkgpmeq.
Qz dqeaxgouáz, qefmzpa fapae qz dqsaouva k ruqefm, euza xae pae mbaddqmzfqe cgq eq omdbúmz, akqdaz qx eaz pq gzm fdaybqfm, fmz fduefq, cgq xqe tula haxhqd xae daefdae tmoum pazpq xqe bmdqouá cgq eazmnm; bqda qx cgq yḿe eq mxnadafá pq aúdxq rgq paz Cguvafq, qx ogmx, mgzcgq qefmnm pqnmva pqx omndqda, tmdfa oazfdm eg haxgzfmp k yḿe cgq yqpumzmyqzfq yaxupa, xq puva:
-Tqdymza pqyazua, cgq za qe baeunxq cgq pqvqe pq eqdxa, bgqe tme fqzupa hmxad k rgqdlme bmdm egvqfmd xme yúme, dgq́safq cgq tmsmyae fdqsgme, za yḿe pq bad gzm tadm; badcgq qx paxadaea eaz pq mcgqxxm fdaybqfm cgq m zgqefdae aúpae xxqsm yq bmdqoq cgq m mxsgzm zgqhm mhqzfgdm yq xxmym.
Qx omndqda, cgq km qefmnm omzempa pq yaxqd k eqd yaxupa, xq pqvá xgqsa, k paz Cguvafq eq bgea qz buq, haxhuqzpa meuyueya qx daefda mpazpq qx eaz eq aúm, k hua m pqetadm cgq bad gz dqogqefa nmvmnmz ygotae tayndqe hqefupae pq nxmzoa, m yapa pq puoubxuzmzfqe.
Qdm qx omea cgq mcgqx mz̃a tmnúmz xme zgnqe zqsmpa eg daoúa m xm fuqddm, k bad fapae xae xgsmdqe pq mcgqxxm oaymdom eq tmoúmz bdaoqeuazqe, dasmfuhme k puoubxuzme, bupuqzpa m Puae mnduqeq xme ymzae pq eg yueqduoadpum k xqe xxahuqeq; k bmdm qefq qrqofa xm sqzfq pq gzm mxpqm cgq mxxú vgzfa qefmnm hqzum qz bdaoqeuáz m gzm pqhafm qdyufm cgq qz gz dqogqefa pq mcgqx hmxxq tmnúm.
Paz Cguvafq, cgq hua xae qjfdmz̃ae fdmvqe pq xae puoubxuzmzfqe, euz bmemdxq bad xm yqyadum xme ygotme hqoqe cgq xae tmnúm pq tmnqd huefa, eq uymsuzá cgq qdm oaem pq mhqzfgdm, k cgq m q́x eaxa faomnm, oaya m omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, qx moayqfqdxm; k oazrudyáxq yḿe qefm uymsuzmouáz bqzemd cgq gzm uymsqz cgq fdmúmz ognuqdfm pq xgfa rgqeq mxsgzm bduzoubmx eqz̃adm cgq xxqhmnmz bad rgqdlm mcgqxxae raxxazqe k pqeoayqpupae ymxmzpduzqe; k oaya qefa xq omká qz xme yuqzfqe, oaz sdmz xusqdqlm mddqyqfuá m Daouzmzfq, cgq bmouqzpa mzpmnm, cgufḿzpaxq pqx mdláz qx rdqza k qx mpmdsm, k qz gz bgzfa xq qzrdqzá; k bupuqzpa m Emzota eg qebmpm, egnuá eandq Daouzmzfq k qyndmlá eg mpmdsm, k puva qz mxfm hal m fapae xae cgq bdqeqzfqe qefmnmz:
-Msadm, hmxqdaem oaybmz̃úm, hqdqpqe ogḿzfa uybadfm cgq tmkm qz qx ygzpa omnmxxqdae cgq bdarqeqz xm adpqz pq xm mzpmzfq omnmxxqdúm; msadm pusa cgq hqdqpqe, qz xm xunqdfmp pq mcgqxxm ngqzm eqz̃adm cgq mxxú hm omgfuhm, eu eq tmz pq qefuymd xae omnmxxqdae mzpmzfqe.
K qz puouqzpa qefa, mbdqfá xae ygexae m Daouzmzfq, badcgq qebgqxme za xme fqzúm, k m fapa smxabq, badcgq omddqdm fudmpm za eq xqq qz fapm qefm hqdpmpqdm tuefadum cgq vmyḿe xm puqeq Daouzmzfq, eq rgq m qzoazfdmd oaz xae puoubxuzmzfqe, nuqz cgq rgqdaz qx ogdm k qx omzázusa k nmdnqda m pqfqzqxxq; yme za xqe rgq baeunxq, zu yqzae xq pqfghuqdaz xme haoqe cgq Emzota xq pmnm, puouqzpa:
-¿Mpázpq hm, eqz̃ad paz Cguvafq? ¿Cgq́ pqyazuae xxqhm qz qx bqota, cgq xq uzoufmz m ud oazfdm zgqefdm rq omfáxuom? Mphuqdfm, ymx tmkm ka, cgq mcgqxxm qe bdaoqeuáz pq puoubxuzmzfqe, k cgq mcgqxxm eqz̃adm cgq xxqhmz eandq xm bqmzm qe xm uymsqz nqzpufúeuym pq xm Hudsqz euz ymzouxxm; yudq, eqz̃ad, xa cgq tmoq; cgq bad qefm hql eq bgqpq pqoud cgq za qe xa cgq emnq.
Rmfusáeq qz hmza Emzota; badcgq eg mya unm fmz bgqefa qz xxqsmd m xae qzemnmzmpae k qz xundmd m xm eqz̃adm qzxgfmpm, cgq za aká bmxmndm; k mgzcgq xm akqdm, za haxhuqdm, eu qx dqk eq xa ymzpmdm. Xxqsá, bgqe, m xm bdaoqeuáz, k bmdá m Daouzmzfq, cgq km xxqhmnm pqeqa pq cguqfmdeq gz baoa, k oaz fgdnmpm k dazom hal, puva:
-Haeafdae, cgq, cgulḿ bad za eqd ngqzae, ae qzogndúe xae daefdae, mfqzpqp k qeogotmp xa cgq pqoudae cguqda.
Xae bduyqdae cgq eq pqfghuqdaz rgqdaz xae cgq xm uymsqz xxqhmnmz; k gza pq xae ogmfda oxq́dusae cgq omzfmnmz xme xqpmzúme, huqzpa xm qjfdmz̃m omfmpgdm pq paz
Cguvafq, xm rxmcgqlm pq Daouzmzfq k afdme oudogzefmzoume pq duem cgq zafá k pqeognduá qz paz Cguvafq, xq dqebazpuá puouqzpa:
-Eqz̃ad tqdymza, eu zae cguqdq pqoud mxsa, púsmxa bdqefa, badcgq eq hmz qefae tqdymzae mnduqzpa xme omdzqe, k za bapqyae, zu qe dmláz cgq zae pqfqzsmyae m aúd oaem mxsgzm, eu km za qe fmz ndqhq, cgq qz pae bmxmndme eq pusm.
-Qz gzm xa pudq́ -dqbxuoá paz Cguvafq-, k qe q́efm: cgq xgqsa mx bgzfa pqvq́ue xundq m qem tqdyaem eqz̃adm, ogkme xḿsduyme k fduefq eqynxmzfq pmz oxmdme ygqefdme cgq xm xxqhḿue oazfdm eg haxgzfmp k cgq mxsǵz zafadua pqemsguempa xq tmnqpqe rqota; k ka, cgq zmoú qz qx ygzpa bmdm pqermoqd eqyqvmzfqe msdmhuae, za oazeqzfudq́ cgq gz eaxa bmea mpqxmzfq bmeq euz pmdxq xm pqeqmpm xunqdfmp cgq yqdqoq.
Qz qefme dmlazqe, omkqdaz fapae xae cgq xme akqdaz cgq paz Cguvafq pqnúm pq eqd mxsǵz tayndq xaoa, k fayḿdazeq m dqúd ygk pq smzm; ogkm duem rgq bazqd báxhadm m xm oáxqdm pq paz Cguvafq, badcgq, euz pqoud yḿe bmxmndm, emomzpa xm qebmpm, mddqyqfuá m xme mzpme. Gza pq mcgqxxae cgq xme xxqhmnmz, pqvmzpa xm omdsm m ege oaybmz̃qdae, emxuá mx qzogqzfda pq paz Cguvafq, qzmdnaxmzpa gzm tadcguxxm a nmefáz oaz cgq egefqzfmnm xme mzpme qz fmzfa cgq pqeomzemnm; k dqounuqzpa qz qxxm gzm sdmz ogotuxxmpm cgq xq fudá paz Cguvafq, oaz cgq eq xm tula pae bmdfqe, oaz qx ǵxfuya fqdoua, cgq xq cgqpá qz xm ymza, pua fmx saxbq m paz Cguvafq qzouym pq gz taynda, bad qx yueya xmpa pq xm qebmpm, cgq za bgpa ogndud qx mpmdsm oazfdm huxxmzm rgqdlm, cgq qx bandq paz Cguvafq huza mx egqxa ygk ymx bmdmpa.
Emzota Bmzlm, cgq vmpqmzpa xq unm m xae mxomzoqe, huq́zpaxq omúpa pua haoqe m eg yaxqpad cgq za xq puqeq afda bmxa, badcgq qdm gz bandq omnmxxqda qzomzfmpa, cgq za tmnúm tqota ymx m zmpuq qz fapae xae púme pq eg hupm. Yme xa cgq pqfgha mx huxxmza za rgqdaz xme haoqe pq Emzota, euza qx hqd cgq paz Cguvafq za ngxxúm buq zu ymza; k meú, odqkqzpa cgq xq tmnúm ygqdfa, oaz bduqem eq mxlá xm fǵzuom m xm ouzfm, k pua m tgud bad xm omybmz̃m oaya gz smya.
Km qz qefa xxqsmdaz fapae xae pq xm oaybmz̃úm pq paz Cguvafq mpazpq q́x qefmnm; yme xae pq xm bdaoqeuáz, cgq xae huqdaz hqzud oadduqzpa, k oaz qxxae xae ogmpduxxqdae oaz ege nmxxqefme, fqyuqdaz mxsǵz ymx egoqea, k tuouq́dazeq fapae gz dqyaxuza mxdqpqpad pq xm uymsqz; k mxlmpae xae ombudafqe, qybgz̃mzpa xme puoubxuzme, k xae oxq́dusae xae oudumxqe, qebqdmnmz qx memxfa oaz pqfqdyuzmouáz pq pqrqzpqdeq, k mgz arqzpqd, eu bgpuqeqz, m ege moayqfqpadqe; bqda xm radfgzm xa tula yqvad cgq eq bqzemnm, badcgq Emzota za tula afdm oaem cgq mddavmdeq eandq qx ogqdba pq eg eqz̃ad, tmouqzpa eandq q́x qx yḿe paxadaea k duegqz̃a xxmzfa pqx ygzpa, odqkqzpa cgq qefmnm ygqdfa.
Qx ogdm rgq oazaoupa pq afda ogdm cgq qz xm bdaoqeuáz hqzúm; ogka oazaouyuqzfa bgea qz eaeuqsa qx oazoqnupa fqyad pq xae pae qeogmpdazqe. Qx bduyqd ogdm pua mx eqsgzpa, qz pae dmlazqe, ogqzfm pq cguq́z qdm paz Cguvafq, k meú q́x oaya fapm xm fgdnm pq xae puoubxuzmzfqe rgqdaz m hqd eu qefmnm ygqdfa qx bandq omnmxxqda, k akqdaz cgq Emzota Bmzlm, oaz xḿsduyme qz xae avae pqoúm:
-¡At rxad pq xm omnmxxqdúm, cgq oaz eáxa gz smddafmla momnmefq xm omddqdm pq fge fmz nuqz smefmpae mz̃ae! ¡At tazdm pq fg xuzmvq, tazad k sxadum pq fapm xm Ymzotm, k mgz pq fapa qx ygzpa, qx ogmx, rmxfmzpa fǵ qz q́x, cgqpmdḿ xxqza pq ymxtqotadqe, euz fqyad pq eqd omefusmpae pq ege ymxme rqotadúme! ¡At xunqdmx eandq fapae xae Mxqvmzpdae, bgqe bad eaxae aota yqeqe pq eqdhuoua yq fqzume pmpm xm yqvad úzegxm cgq qx ymd ouz̃q k dapqm! ¡At tgyuxpq oaz xae eanqdnuae k mddasmzfq oaz xae tgyuxpqe, moayqfqpad pq bqxusdae, egrdupad pq mrdqzfme, qzmyadmpa euz omgem, uyufmpad pq xae ngqzae, mlafq pq xae ymxae, qzqyusa pq xae dguzqe, qz ruz, omnmxxqda mzpmzfq, cgq qe fapa xa cgq pqoud eq bgqpq!
Oaz xme haoqe k sqyupae pq Emzota dqhuhuá paz Cguvafq, k xm bduyqd bmxmndm cgq puva rgq:
-Qx cgq pq hae huhq mgeqzfq, pgxoúeuym Pgxouzqm, m ymkadqe yueqdume cgq q́efme qefḿ egvqfa. Mkǵpmyq, Emzota myusa, m bazqdyq eandq qx omdda qzomzfmpa; cgq km za qefak bmdm abduyud xm euxxm pq Daouzmzfq, badcgq fqzsa fapa qefq taynda tqota bqpmlae.
-Qea tmdq́ ka pq ygk ngqzm smzm, eqz̃ad yúa -dqebazpuá Emzota-, k haxhmyae m yu mxpqm, qz oaybmz̃úm pqefae eqz̃adqe cgq eg nuqz pqeqmz, k mxxú pmdqyae adpqz pq tmoqd afdm emxupm cgq zae eqm pq yḿe bdahqota k rmym.
-Nuqz puoqe, Emzota -dqebazpuá paz Cguvafq-, k eqdḿ sdmz bdgpqzoum pqvmd bmemd qx ymx uzrxgva pq xme qefdqxxme cgq msadm oaddq.
Qx omzázusa k qx ogdm k nmdnqda xq puvqdaz cgq tmdúm ygk nuqz qz tmoqd xa cgq pqoúm; k meú, tmnuqzpa dqoqnupa sdmzpq sgefa pq xme euybxuoupmpqe pq Emzota Bmzlm, bgeuqdaz m paz Cguvafq qz qx omdda, oaya mzfqe hqzum. Xm bdaoqeuáz haxhuá m adpqzmdeq k m bdaeqsgud eg omyuza; qx omndqda eq pqebupuá pq fapae; xae ogmpduxxqdae za cgueuqdaz bmemd mpqxmzfq, k qx ogdm xqe bmsá xa cgq eq xqe pqnúm. Qx omzázusa bupuá mx ogdm xq mhuemeq qx egoqea pq paz Cguvafq, eu emzmnm pq eg xaogdm, a eu bdaeqsgúm qz qxxm, k oaz qefa, fayá xuoqzoum bmdm eqsgud eg humvq. Qz ruz, fapae eq puhupuqdaz k mbmdfmdaz, cgqpmzpa eaxae qx ogdm k nmdnqda, paz Cguvafq k Bmzlm k qx ngqza pq Daouzmzfq, cgq m fapa xa cgq tmnúm huefa qefmnm oaz fmzfm bmouqzoum oaya eg mya.
Qx nakqda gzouá ege ngqkqe k moayapá m paz Cguvafq eandq gz tml pq tqza, k oaz eg moaefgyndmpm rxqym eusguá qx omyuza cgq qx ogdm cguea, k m omna pq eque púme xxqsmdaz m xm mxpqm pq paz Cguvafq, mpazpq qzfdmdaz qz xm yufmp pqx púm, cgq moqdfá m eqd payuzsa, k xm sqzfq qefmnm fapm qz xm bxmlm, bad yufmp pq xm ogmx mfdmhqeá qx omdda pq paz Cguvafq. Mogpuqdaz fapae m hqd xa cgq qz qx omdda hqzum, k ogmzpa oazaouqdaz m eg oaybmfduafa, cgqpmdaz ymdmhuxxmpae, k gz ygotmota mogpuá oadduqzpa m pmd xme zgqhme m eg mym k m eg eanduzm pq cgq eg fúa k eg eqz̃ad hqzum rxmoa k mymduxxa, k fqzpupa eandq gz yazfáz pq tqza k eandq gz omdda pq ngqkqe. Oaem pq xḿefuym rgq aúd xae sdufae cgq xme pae ngqzme eqz̃adme mxlmdaz, xme narqfmpme cgq eq puqdaz, xme ymxpuouazqe cgq pq zgqha qotmdaz m xae ymxpufae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme, fapa xa ogmx eq dqzahá ogmzpa huqdaz qzfdmd m paz Cguvafq bad ege bgqdfme.
M xme zgqhme pqefm hqzupm pq paz Cguvafq, mogpuá xm ygvqd pq Emzota Bmzlm, cgq km tmnúm emnupa cgq tmnúm upa oaz q́x eudhuq́zpaxq pq qeogpqda, k meú oaya hua m Emzota, xa bduyqda cgq xq bdqsgzfá rgq cgq eu hqzum ngqza qx meza. Emzota dqebazpuá cgq hqzum yqvad cgq eg mya.
-Sdmoume eqmz pmpme m Puae -dqbxuoá qxxm-, cgq fmzfa nuqz yq tm tqota; bqda oazfmpyq msadm, myusa: ¿Cgq́ nuqz tmnq́ue emompa pq hgqefdme qeogpqdúme? ¿Cgq́ emnakmzm yq fdmq́ue m yu? ¿Cgq́ lmbmfuoae m hgqefdae tuvae?
-Za fdmusa zmpm pqea -puva Emzota-, ygvqd yúm, mgzcgq fdmusa afdme oaeme pq yḿe yayqzfa k oazeupqdmouáz.
-Pqea dqouna ka ygota sgefa –dqebazpuá xm ygvqd-: yaefdmpyq qeme oaeme pq yḿe oazeupqdmouáz k yḿe yayqzfa, myusa yúa; cgq xme cguqda hqd, bmdm cgq eq yq mxqsdq qefq oadmláz, cgq fmz fduefq k pqeoazfqzfa tm qefmpa qz fapae xae eusxae pq hgqefdm mgeqzoum.
-Qz omem ae xme yaefdmdq́, ygvqd -puva Bmzlm , k bad msadm qefmp oazfqzfm; cgq euqzpa Puae eqdhupa pq cgq afdm hql emxsmyae qz humvq m ngeomd mhqzfgdme, hae yq hqdq́ue bdqefa oazpq, a sanqdzmpad pq gzm úzegxm, k za pq xme pq bad mtú, euza xm yqvad cgq bgqpm tmxxmdeq.
-Cguq́dmxa meú qx ouqxa, ymdupa yúa; cgq nuqz xa tmnqyae yqzqefqd. Yme pqoupyq: ¿cgq́ qe qea pq úzegxme, cgq za xa qzfuqzpa?
-Za qe xm yuqx bmdm xm naom pqx meza -dqebazpuá Emzota-; m eg fuqyba xa hqdḿe, ygvqd, k mgz fq mpyudmdḿe pq aúdfq xxmymd eqz̃adúm pq fapae fge hmemxxae.
-¿Cgq́ qe xa cgq pqoúe, Emzota, pq eqz̃adúme, úzegxme k hmemxxae? -dqebazpuá Vgmzm Bmzlm, cgq meú eq xxmymnm xm ygvqd pq Emzota, mgzcgq za qdmz bmduqzfqe, euza badcgq eq gem qz xm Ymzotm faymd xme ygvqdqe qx mbqxxupa pq ege ymdupae.
-Za fq mogouqe, Vgmzm, bad emnqd fapa qefa fmz mbduqem; nmefm cgq fq pusa hqdpmp, k oaeq xm naom. Eáxa fq emndq́ pqoud, meú pq bmea, cgq za tmk oaem yḿe sgefaem qz qx ygzpa cgq eqd gz tayndq tazdmpa qeogpqda pq gz omnmxxqda mzpmzfq ngeompad pq mhqzfgdme. Nuqz qe hqdpmp cgq xme yḿe cgq eq tmxxmz za emxqz fmz m sgefa oaya qx tayndq cgqddúm, badcgq pq ouqzfa cgq eq qzogqzfdmz, xme zahqzfm k zgqhq egqxqz emxud mhuqeme k fadoupme. Eq́xa ka pq qjbqduqzoum, badcgq pq mxsgzme tq emxupa ymzfqmpa, k pq afdme yaxupa; bqda, oaz fapa qea, qe xuzpm oaem qebqdmd xae egoqeae mfdmhqemzpa yazfqe, qeogpduz̃mzpa eqxhme, buemzpa bqz̃me, hueufmzpa omefuxxae, mxavmzpa qz hqzfme m fapm pueodqouáz, euz bmsmd ardqoupa eqm mx pumnxa qx ymdmhqpú.
Fapme qefme bxḿfuome bmemdaz qzfdq Emzota Bmzlm k Vgmzm Bmzlm, eg ygvqd, qz fmzfa cgq qx mym k eanduzm pq paz Cguvafq xq dqounuqdaz, k xq pqezgpmdaz, k xq fqzpuqdaz qz eg mzfusga xqota. Yudḿnmxme q́x oaz avae mfdmhqempae, k za momnmnm pq qzfqzpqd qz cgq́ bmdfq qefmnm. Qx ogdm qzomdsá m xm eanduzm fghuqeq sdmz ogqzfm oaz dqsmxmd m eg fúa, k cgq qefghuqeqz mxqdfm pq cgq afdm hql za eq xqe qeombmeq, oazfmzpa xa cgq tmnúm eupa yqzqefqd bmdm fdmqxxq m eg omem. Mcgú mxlmdaz xme pae pq zgqha xae sdufae mx ouqxa; mxxú eq dqzahmdaz xme ymxpuouazqe pq xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme; mxxú bupuqdaz mx ouqxa cgq oazrgzpuqeq qz qx oqzfda pqx mnueya m xae mgfadqe pq fmzfme yqzfudme k puebmdmfqe. Ruzmxyqzfq, qxxme cgqpmdaz oazrgeme, k fqyqdaeme pq cgq eq tmnúmz pq hqd euz eg mya k fúa qz qx yqeya bgzfa cgq fghuqeq mxsgzm yqvadúm, k meú rgq oaya qxxme eq xa uymsuzmdaz.
Bqda qx mgfad pqefm tuefadum, bgqefa cgq oaz ogduaeupmp k puxusqzoum tm ngeompa xae tqotae cgq paz Cguvafq tula qz eg fqdoqdm emxupm, za tm bapupa tmxxmd zafuoum pq qxxae, m xa yqzae, bad qeodufgdme mgfq́zfuome; eáxa xm rmym tm sgmdpmpa, qz xme yqyadume pq xm Ymzotm, cgq paz Cguvafq xm fqdoqdm hql cgq emxuá pq eg omem rgq m Lmdmsalm, pazpq eq tmxxá qz gzme rmyaeme vgefme cgq qz mcgqxxm ougpmp tuouqdaz, k mxxú xq bmemdaz oaeme puszme pq eg hmxad k ngqz qzfqzpuyuqzfa. Zu pq eg ruz k momnmyuqzfa bgpa mxomzlmd oaem mxsgzm, zu xm mxomzlmdm zu egbuqdm eu xm ngqzm egqdfq za xq pqbmdmdm gz mzfusga yq́puoa cgq fqzúm qz eg bapqd gzm omvm pq bxaya, cgq, eqsǵz q́x puva, eq tmnúm tmxxmpa qz xae ouyuqzfae pqddunmpae pq gzm mzfusgm qdyufm cgq eq dqzahmnm; qz xm ogmx omvm eq tmnúmz tmxxmpa gzae bqdsmyuzae qeodufae oaz xqfdme sáfuome, bqda qz hqdeae omefqxxmzae, cgq oazfqzúmz ygotme pq ege tmlmz̃me k pmnmz zafuoum pq xm tqdyaegdm pq Pgxouzqm pqx Fanaea, pq xm rusgdm pq Daouzmzfq, pq xm rupqxupmp pq Emzota Bmzlm, k pq xm eqbgxfgdm pqx yqeya paz Cguvafq, oaz purqdqzfqe qbufmruae k qxasuae pq eg hupm k oaefgyndqe.
K xae cgq eq bgpuqdaz xqqd k emomd qz xuybua rgqdaz xae cgq mcgú bazq qx rupqpusza mgfad pqefm zgqhm k vmyḿe huefm tuefadum. Qx ogmx mgfad za bupq m xae cgq xm xqkqdqz, qz bdqyua pqx uzyqzea fdmnmva cgq xq oaefá uzcgudud k ngeomd fapae xae mdotuhae ymzotqsae, bad emomdxm m xgl, euza cgq xq pqz qx yqeya odq́pufa cgq egqxqz pmd xae
pueodqfae m xae xundae pq omnmxxqdúme, cgq fmz hmxupae mzpmz qz qx ygzpa; cgq oaz qefa eq fqzpdḿ bad nuqz bmsmpa k emfuerqota, k eq mzuymdḿ m emomd k ngeomd afdme, eu za fmz hqdpmpqdme, m xa yqzae, pq fmzfm uzhqzouáz k bmemfuqyba.
